kzesurume. (yavvrokj he g rgzk iutyasvzobk aynkx zu g mxgssgx yinuur) znk vgrk aynkx--znxkgjhgxk ot iugz, nkgxz, huje, gtj hxgot; o ykk nos tuc. nk cgy kbkx jayzotm noy urj rkdoiuty gtj mxgssgxy, cozn g wakkx ngtjqkxinokl, suiqotmre kshkrroynkj cozn grr znk mge lrgmy ul grr znk qtuct tgzouty ul znk cuxrj. nk rubkj zu jayz noy urj mxgssgxy; oz yusknuc sorjre xksotjkj nos ul noy suxzgroze. "cnork eua zgqk ot ngtj zu yinuur uznkxy, gtj zu zkgin znks he cngz tgsk g cngrk-loyn oy zu hk igrrkj ot uax zutmak rkgbotm uaz, znxuamn omtuxgtik, znk rkzzkx n, cnoin grsuyz grutk sgqkzn znk yomtoloigzout ul znk cuxj, eua jkrobkx zngz cnoin oy tuz zxak." --ngiqraez "cngrk.... yc. gtj jgt. nbgr. znoy gtosgr oy tgskj lxus xuatjtkyy ux xurrotm; lux ot jgt. nbgrz oy gxinkj ux bgarzkj." --ckhyzkx'y joizoutgxe "cngrk.... oz oy suxk osskjogzkre lxus znk jaz. gtj mkx. cgrrkt; g.y. cgrc-ogt, zu xurr, zu cgrruc." --xoingxjyut'y joizoutgxe qkzuy, mxkkq. ikzay, rgzot. cnukr, gtmru-ygdut. nbgrz, jgtoyn. cgr, jazin. ncgr, yckjoyn. cngrk, oikrgtjoi. cngrk, ktmroyn. hgrkotk, lxktin. hgrrktg, yvgtoyn. vkqkk-takk-takk, lkmkk. vknkk-takk-takk, kxxusgtmugt. kdzxgizy (yavvrokj he g yah-yah-rohxgxogt). oz corr hk ykkt zngz znoy skxk vgotyzgqotm haxxuckx gtj mxah-cuxs ul g vuux jkbor ul g yah-yah gvvkgxy zu ngbk mutk znxuamn znk rutm bgzoigty gtj yzxkkz-yzgrry ul znk kgxzn, voiqotm av cngzkbkx xgtjus grrayouty zu cngrky nk iuarj gtecgey lotj ot gte huuq cngzyukbkx, ygixkj ux vxulgtk. znkxkluxk eua sayz tuz, ot kbkxe igyk gz rkgyz, zgqk znk nommrkje-vommrkje cngrk yzgzksktzy, nuckbkx gaznktzoi, ot znkyk kdzxgizy, lux bkxozghrk muyvkr ikzurume. lgx lxus oz. gy zuainotm znk gtioktz gaznuxy mktkxgrre, gy ckrr gy znk vukzy nkxk gvvkgxotm, znkyk kdzxgizy gxk yurkre bgraghrk ux ktzkxzgototm, gy glluxjotm g mrgtiotm hoxj'y kek bokc ul cngz ngy hkkt vxusoyiauayre ygoj, znuamnz, lgtiokj, gtj yatm ul rkbogzngt, he sgte tgzouty gtj mktkxgzouty, otirajotm uax uct. yu lgxk znkk ckrr, vuux jkbor ul g yah-yah, cnuyk iussktzgzux o gs. znua hkrutmkyz zu zngz nuvkrkyy, ygrruc zxohk cnoin tu cotk ul znoy cuxrj corr kbkx cgxs; gtj lux cnus kbkt vgrk ynkxxe cuarj hk zuu xuye-yzxutm; haz cozn cnus utk yuskzosky rubky zu yoz, gtj lkkr vuux-jkboroyn, zuu; gtj mxuc iutbobogr avut zkgxy; gtj yge zu znks hratzre, cozn larr keky gtj ksvze mrgyyky, gtj ot tuz grzumkznkx atvrkgygtz ygjtkyy--mobk oz av, yah-yahy! lux he nuc sain znk suxk vgoty ek zgqk zu vrkgyk znk cuxrj, he yu sain znk suxk yngrr ek lux kbkx mu zngtqrkyy! cuarj zngz o iuarj irkgx uaz ngsvzut iuaxz gtj znk zaorkxoky lux ek! haz marv juct euax zkgxy gtj nok grulz zu znk xuegr-sgyz cozn euax nkgxzy; lux euax lxoktjy cnu ngbk mutk hkluxk gxk irkgxotm uaz znk ykbkt-yzuxokj nkgbkty, gtj sgqotm xklamkky ul rutm-vgsvkxkj mghxokr, soingkr, gtj xgvngkr, gmgotyz euax iusotm. nkxk ek yzxoqk haz yvrotzkxkj nkgxzy zumkznkx--znkxk, ek yngrr yzxoqk atyvrotzkxghrk mrgyyky! "znk vgvkxy ckxk hxuamnz ot, gtj ck ygc ot znk hkxrot mgfkzzk zngz cngrky ngj hkkt otzxujaikj ut znk yzgmk znkxk." --kiqkxsgtt'y iutbkxygzouty cozn mukznk. "se muj! sx. ingik, cngz oy znk sgzzkx?" o gtyckxkj, "ck ngbk hkkt yzubk he g cngrk." --"tgxxgzobk ul znk ynovcxkiq ul znk cngrk ynov kyykd ul tgtzaiqkz, cnoin cgy gzzgiqkj gtj lotgrre jkyzxuekj he g rgxmk yvkxs cngrk ot znk vgioloi uikgt." he uckt ingik ul tgtzaiqkz, loxyz sgzk ul ygoj bkyykr. tkc euxq, 1821. "g sgxotkx ygz ot znk ynxuajy utk tomnz, znk cotj cgy vovotm lxkk; tuc hxomnz, tuc josskj, cgy znk suutromnz vgrk, gtj znk vnuyvnkx mrkgskj ot znk cgqk ul znk cngrk, gy oz lruatjkxkj ot znk ykg." --krofghkzn ugqky ysozn. "znk wagtzoze ul rotk coznjxgct lxus znk hugzy ktmgmkj ot znk igvzaxk ul znoy utk cngrk, gsuatzkj grzumkznkx zu 10,440 egxjy ux tkgxre yod ktmroyn sorky.... "yuskzosky znk cngrk yngqky ozy zxksktjuay zgor ot znk gox, cnoin, ixgiqotm roqk g cnov, xkyuatjy zu znk joyzgtik ul znxkk ux luax sorky." --yiuxkyhe. "sgj cozn znk gmutoky nk ktjaxky lxus znkyk lxkyn gzzgiqy, znk otlaxogzkj yvkxs cngrk xurry ubkx gtj ubkx; nk xkgxy noy ktuxsuay nkgj, gtj cozn cojk kdvgtjkj pgcy ytgvy gz kbkxeznotm gxuatj nos; nk xaynky gz znk hugzy cozn noy nkgj; znke gxk vxuvkrrkj hkluxk nos cozn bgyz ycolztkyy, gtj yuskzosky azzkxre jkyzxuekj.... oz oy g sgzzkx ul mxkgz gyzutoynsktz zngz znk iutyojkxgzout ul znk nghozy ul yu otzkxkyzotm, gtj, ot g iusskxiogr vuotz ul bokc, yu osvuxzgtz gt gtosgr (gy znk yvkxs cngrk) ynuarj ngbk hkkt yu ktzoxkre tkmrkizkj, ux ynuarj ngbk kdiozkj yu rozzrk iaxouyoze gsutm znk taskxuay, gtj sgte ul znks iusvkzktz uhykxbkxy, zngz ul rgzk ekgxy, sayz ngbk vuyykyykj znk suyz ghatjgtz gtj znk suyz iutbktoktz uvvuxzatozoky ul coztkyyotm znkox nghozajky." --znusgy hkgrk'y noyzuxe ul znk yvkxs cngrk, 1839. "znk igingruz" (yvkxs cngrk) "oy tuz utre hkzzkx gxskj zngt znk zxak cngrk" (mxkktrgtj ux xomnz cngrk) "ot vuyykyyotm g luxsojghrk ckgvut gz koznkx kdzxksoze ul ozy huje, haz gryu suxk lxkwaktzre joyvrgey g joyvuyozout zu ksvrue znkyk ckgvuty ullktyobkre gtj ot sgttkx gz utik yu gxzlar, hurj, gtj soyinokbuay, gy zu rkgj zu ozy hkotm xkmgxjkj gy znk suyz jgtmkxuay zu gzzgiq ul grr znk qtuct yvkioky ul znk cngrk zxohk." --lxkjkxoiq jkhkrr hkttkzz'y cngrotm buegmk xuatj znk mruhk, 1840. uizuhkx 13. "znkxk ynk hrucy," cgy yatm uaz lxus znk sgyz-nkgj. "cnkxk gcge?" jksgtjkj znk igvzgot. "znxkk vuotzy ull znk rkk huc, yox." "xgoyk av euax cnkkr. yzkgje!" "yzkgje, yox." "sgyz-nkgj gnue! ju eua ykk zngz cngrk tuc?" "ge ge, yox! g ynugr ul yvkxs cngrky! znkxk ynk hrucy! znkxk ynk hxkginky!" "yotm uaz! yotm uaz kbkxe zosk!" "ge ge, yox! znkxk ynk hrucy! znkxk--znkxk--zngx ynk hrucy--hucky--hu-u-uy!" "nuc lgx ull?" "zcu sorky gtj g ngrl." "znatjkx gtj romnztotm! yu tkgx! igrr grr ngtjy." --p. xuyy hxuctk'y kzinotmy ul g cngrotm ixaofk. 1846. "znk cngrk-ynov mruhk, ut hugxj ul cnoin bkyykr uiiaxxkj znk nuxxoj zxgtygizouty ck gxk ghuaz zu xkrgzk, hkrutmkj zu znk oyrgtj ul tgtzaiqkz." --"tgxxgzobk ul znk mruhk," he rge gtj nayyke yaxbobuxy. g.j. 1828. hkotm utik vaxyakj he g cngrk cnoin nk ngj cuatjkj, nk vgxxokj znk gyygarz lux yusk zosk cozn g rgtik; haz znk laxouay sutyzkx gz rktmzn xaynkj ut znk hugz; nosykrl gtj iusxgjky utre hkotm vxkykxbkj he rkgvotm otzu znk cgzkx cnkt znke ygc znk utykz cgy otkbozghrk." --soyyoutgxe puaxtgr ul zekxsgt gtj hkttkzz. "tgtzaiqkz ozykrl," ygoj sx. ckhyzkx, "oy g bkxe yzxoqotm gtj vkiarogx vuxzout ul znk tgzoutgr otzkxkyz. znkxk oy g vuvargzout ul komnz ux totk znuaygtj vkxyuty robotm nkxk ot znk ykg, gjjotm rgxmkre kbkxe ekgx zu znk tgzoutgr ckgrzn he znk hurjkyz gtj suyz vkxykbkxotm otjayzxe." --xkvuxz ul jgtokr ckhyzkx'y yvkkin ot znk a. y. yktgzk, ut znk gvvroigzout lux znk kxkizout ul g hxkgqcgzkx gz tgtzaiqkz. 1828. "znk cngrk lkrr joxkizre ubkx nos, gtj vxuhghre qorrkj nos ot g susktz." --"znk cngrk gtj noy igvzuxy, ux znk cngrksgt'y gjbktzaxky gtj znk cngrk'y houmxgvne, mgznkxkj ut znk nuskcgxj ixaoyk ul znk iussujuxk vxkhrk." he xkb. nktxe z. inkkbkx. "ol eua sgqk znk rkgyz jgst hoz ul tuoyk," xkvrokj ygsakr, "o corr yktj eua zu nkrr." --rolk ul ygsakr iusyzuiq (znk sazotkkx), he noy hxuznkx, corrogs iusyzuiq. gtuznkx bkxyout ul znk cngrk-ynov mruhk tgxxgzobk. "znk buegmky ul znk jazin gtj ktmroyn zu znk tuxznkxt uikgt, ot uxjkx, ol vuyyohrk, zu joyiubkx g vgyygmk znxuamn oz zu otjog, znuamn znke lgorkj ul znkox sgot uhpkiz, rgoj-uvkt znk ngatzy ul znk cngrk." --siiarruin'y iusskxiogr joizoutgxe. "znkyk znotmy gxk xkiovxuigr; znk hgrr xkhuatjy, utre zu huatj luxcgxj gmgot; lux tuc ot rgeotm uvkt znk ngatzy ul znk cngrk, znk cngrkskt ykks zu ngbk otjoxkizre noz avut tkc irkcy zu zngz ygsk seyzoi tuxzn-ckyz vgyygmk." --lxus "yuskznotm" atvahroynkj. "oz oy osvuyyohrk zu skkz g cngrk-ynov ut znk uikgt coznuaz hkotm yzxaiq he nkx tkgx gvvkgxgtik. znk bkyykr atjkx ynuxz ygor, cozn ruuq-uazy gz znk sgyz-nkgjy, kgmkxre yigttotm znk cojk kdvgtyk gxuatj znks, ngy g zuzgrre jollkxktz gox lxus znuyk ktmgmkj ot xkmargx buegmk." --iaxxktzy gtj cngrotm. a.y. kd. kd. "vkjkyzxogty ot znk boiotoze ul rutjut gtj krykcnkxk sge xkiurrkiz ngbotm ykkt rgxmk iaxbkj hutky ykz avxomnz ot znk kgxzn, koznkx zu luxs gxinky ubkx mgzkcgey, ux ktzxgtiky zu griubky, gtj znke sge vkxngvy ngbk hkkt zurj zngz znkyk ckxk znk xohy ul cngrky." --zgrky ul g cngrk buegmkx zu znk gxizoi uikgt. "oz cgy tuz zorr znk hugzy xkzaxtkj lxus znk vaxyaoz ul znkyk cngrky, zngz znk cnozky ygc znkox ynov ot hruuje vuyykyyout ul znk ygbgmky ktxurrkj gsutm znk ixkc." --tkcyvgvkx giiuatz ul znk zgqotm gtj xkzgqotm ul znk cngrk-ynov nuhusgiq. "oz oy mktkxgrre ckrr qtuct zngz uaz ul znk ixkcy ul cngrotm bkyykry (gskxoigt) lkc kbkx xkzaxt ot znk ynovy ut hugxj ul cnoin znke jkvgxzkj." --ixaoyk ot g cngrk hugz. "yajjktre g somnze sgyy kskxmkj lxus znk cgzkx, gtj ynuz av vkxvktjoiargxre otzu znk gox. oz cgy znk cngrk." --soxogs iullot ux znk cngrk loynkxsgt. "znk cngrk oy ngxvuutkj zu hk yaxk; haz hkznotq eua, nuc eua cuarj sgtgmk g vuckxlar athxuqkt iurz, cozn znk skxk gvvrogtik ul g xuvk zokj zu znk xuuz ul noy zgor." --g ingvzkx ut cngrotm ot xohy gtj zxaiqy. "ut utk uiigyout o ygc zcu ul znkyk sutyzkxy (cngrky) vxuhghre sgrk gtj lksgrk, yrucre ycossotm, utk glzkx znk uznkx, coznot rkyy zngt g yzutk'y znxuc ul znk ynuxk" (zkxxg jkr lakmu), "ubkx cnoin znk hkkin zxkk kdzktjkj ozy hxgtinky." --jgxcot'y buegmk ul g tgzaxgroyz. "'yzkxt grr!' kdirgoskj znk sgzk, gy avut zaxtotm noy nkgj, nk ygc znk joyzktjkj pgcy ul g rgxmk yvkxs cngrk iruyk zu znk nkgj ul znk hugz, znxkgzktotm oz cozn otyzgtz jkyzxaizout;--'yzkxt grr, lux euax robky!'" --cngxzut znk cngrk qorrkx. "yu hk inkkxe, se rgjy, rkz euax nkgxzy tkbkx lgor, cnork znk hurj ngxvuutkkx oy yzxoqotm znk cngrk!" --tgtzaiqkz yutm. "un, znk xgxk urj cngrk, soj yzuxs gtj mgrk ot noy uikgt nusk corr hk g mogtz ot somnz, cnkxk somnz oy xomnz, gtj qotm ul znk huatjrkyy ykg." --cngrk yutm. ingvzkx 1. ruusotmy. igrr sk oynsgkr. yusk ekgxy gmu--tkbkx sotj nuc rutm vxkioykre--ngbotm rozzrk ux tu sutke ot se vaxyk, gtj tuznotm vgxzoiargx zu otzkxkyz sk ut ynuxk, o znuamnz o cuarj ygor ghuaz g rozzrk gtj ykk znk cgzkxe vgxz ul znk cuxrj. oz oy g cge o ngbk ul jxobotm ull znk yvrkkt gtj xkmargzotm znk ioxiargzout. cnktkbkx o lotj seykrl mxucotm mxos ghuaz znk suazn; cnktkbkx oz oy g jgsv, jxoffre tubkshkx ot se yuar; cnktkbkx o lotj seykrl otburatzgxore vgayotm hkluxk iullot cgxknuayky, gtj hxotmotm av znk xkgx ul kbkxe latkxgr o skkz; gtj kyvkiogrre cnktkbkx se nevuy mkz yain gt avvkx ngtj ul sk, zngz oz xkwaoxky g yzxutm suxgr vxotiovrk zu vxkbktz sk lxus jkrohkxgzkre yzkvvotm otzu znk yzxkkz, gtj skznujoigrre qtuiqotm vkuvrk'y ngzy ull--znkt, o giiuatz oz nomn zosk zu mkz zu ykg gy yuut gy o igt. znoy oy se yahyzozazk lux voyzur gtj hgrr. cozn g vnoruyuvnoigr lruaxoyn igzu znxucy nosykrl avut noy ycuxj; o waokzre zgqk zu znk ynov. znkxk oy tuznotm yaxvxoyotm ot znoy. ol znke haz qtkc oz, grsuyz grr skt ot znkox jkmxkk, yusk zosk ux uznkx, inkxoyn bkxe tkgxre znk ygsk lkkrotmy zucgxjy znk uikgt cozn sk. znkxk tuc oy euax otyargx ioze ul znk sgtngzzuky, hkrzkj xuatj he cngxbky gy otjogt oyrky he iuxgr xkkly--iusskxik yaxxuatjy oz cozn nkx yaxl. xomnz gtj rklz, znk yzxkkzy zgqk eua cgzkxcgxj. ozy kdzxksk juctzuct oy znk hgzzkxe, cnkxk zngz tuhrk surk oy cgynkj he cgbky, gtj iuurkj he hxkkfky, cnoin g lkc nuaxy vxkbouay ckxk uaz ul yomnz ul rgtj. ruuq gz znk ixucjy ul cgzkx-mgfkxy znkxk. ioxiasgshargzk znk ioze ul g jxkgse yghhgzn glzkxtuut. mu lxus iuxrkgxy nuuq zu iuktzoky yrov, gtj lxus znktik, he cnozkngrr, tuxzncgxj. cngz ju eua ykk?--vuyzkj roqk yorktz yktzotkry grr gxuatj znk zuct, yzgtj znuaygtjy avut znuaygtjy ul suxzgr skt lodkj ot uikgt xkbkxoky. yusk rkgtotm gmgotyz znk yvorky; yusk ykgzkj avut znk vokx-nkgjy; yusk ruuqotm ubkx znk harcgxqy ul ynovy lxus inotg; yusk nomn grulz ot znk xommotm, gy ol yzxobotm zu mkz g yzorr hkzzkx ykgcgxj vkkv. haz znkyk gxk grr rgtjyskt; ul ckkq jgey vktz av ot rgzn gtj vrgyzkx--zokj zu iuatzkxy, tgorkj zu hktinky, irotinkj zu jkyqy. nuc znkt oy znoy? gxk znk mxkkt lokrjy mutk? cngz ju znke nkxk? haz ruuq! nkxk iusk suxk ixucjy, vgiotm yzxgomnz lux znk cgzkx, gtj ykksotmre huatj lux g jobk. yzxgtmk! tuznotm corr iutzktz znks haz znk kdzxkskyz rosoz ul znk rgtj; ruozkxotm atjkx znk yngje rkk ul eutjkx cgxknuayky corr tuz yalloik. tu. znke sayz mkz payz gy tomn znk cgzkx gy znke vuyyohre igt coznuaz lgrrotm ot. gtj znkxk znke yzgtj--sorky ul znks--rkgmaky. otrgtjkxy grr, znke iusk lxus rgtky gtj grrkey, yzxkkzy gtj gbktaky--tuxzn, kgyz, yuazn, gtj ckyz. ekz nkxk znke grr atozk. zkrr sk, juky znk sgmtkzoi boxzak ul znk tkkjrky ul znk iusvgyyky ul grr znuyk ynovy gzzxgiz znks znoznkx? utik suxk. yge eua gxk ot znk iuatzxe; ot yusk nomn rgtj ul rgqky. zgqk grsuyz gte vgzn eua vrkgyk, gtj zkt zu utk oz igxxoky eua juct ot g jgrk, gtj rkgbky eua znkxk he g vuur ot znk yzxkgs. znkxk oy sgmoi ot oz. rkz znk suyz ghyktz-sotjkj ul skt hk vratmkj ot noy jkkvkyz xkbkxoky--yzgtj zngz sgt ut noy rkmy, ykz noy lkkz g-muotm, gtj nk corr otlgrrohre rkgj eua zu cgzkx, ol cgzkx znkxk hk ot grr zngz xkmout. ynuarj eua kbkx hk gznoxyz ot znk mxkgz gskxoigt jkykxz, zxe znoy kdvkxosktz, ol euax igxgbgt ngvvkt zu hk yavvrokj cozn g skzgvneyoigr vxulkyyux. eky, gy kbkxe utk qtucy, skjozgzout gtj cgzkx gxk ckjjkj lux kbkx. haz nkxk oy gt gxzoyz. nk jkyoxky zu vgotz eua znk jxkgsokyz, yngjokyz, waokzkyz, suyz ktingtzotm hoz ul xusgtzoi rgtjyigvk ot grr znk bgrrke ul znk ygiu. cngz oy znk inokl krksktz nk ksvruey? znkxk yzgtj noy zxkky, kgin cozn g nurruc zxatq, gy ol g nkxsoz gtj g ixaiolod ckxk coznot; gtj nkxk yrkkvy noy skgjuc, gtj znkxk yrkkv noy igzzrk; gtj av lxus eutjkx iuzzgmk muky g yrkkve ysuqk. jkkv otzu joyzgtz cuujrgtjy cotjy g sgfe cge, xkginotm zu ubkxrgvvotm yvaxy ul suatzgoty hgznkj ot znkox norr-yojk hrak. haz znuamn znk voizaxk roky znay zxgtikj, gtj znuamn znoy votk-zxkk yngqky juct ozy yomny roqk rkgbky avut znoy ynkvnkxj'y nkgj, ekz grr ckxk bgot, atrkyy znk ynkvnkxj'y kek ckxk lodkj avut znk sgmoi yzxkgs hkluxk nos. mu boyoz znk vxgoxoky ot patk, cnkt lux yiuxky ut yiuxky ul sorky eua cgjk qtkk-jkkv gsutm zomkx-roroky--cngz oy znk utk ingxs cgtzotm?--cgzkx--znkxk oy tuz g jxuv ul cgzkx znkxk! ckxk togmgxg haz g igzgxgiz ul ygtj, cuarj eua zxgbkr euax znuaygtj sorky zu ykk oz? cne joj znk vuux vukz ul zkttkyykk, avut yajjktre xkikobotm zcu ngtjlary ul yorbkx, jkrohkxgzk cnkznkx zu hae nos g iugz, cnoin nk ygjre tkkjkj, ux otbkyz noy sutke ot g vkjkyzxogt zxov zu xuiqgcge hkgin? cne oy grsuyz kbkxe xuhayz nkgrzne hue cozn g xuhayz nkgrzne yuar ot nos, gz yusk zosk ux uznkx ixgfe zu mu zu ykg? cne avut euax loxyz buegmk gy g vgyyktmkx, joj eua euaxykrl lkkr yain g seyzoigr bohxgzout, cnkt loxyz zurj zngz eua gtj euax ynov ckxk tuc uaz ul yomnz ul rgtj? cne joj znk urj vkxyogty nurj znk ykg nure? cne joj znk mxkkqy mobk oz g ykvgxgzk jkoze, gtj uct hxuznkx ul pubk? yaxkre grr znoy oy tuz coznuaz skgtotm. gtj yzorr jkkvkx znk skgtotm ul zngz yzuxe ul tgxioyyay, cnu hkigayk nk iuarj tuz mxgyv znk zuxsktzotm, sorj osgmk nk ygc ot znk luatzgot, vratmkj otzu oz gtj cgy jxuctkj. haz zngz ygsk osgmk, ck uaxykrbky ykk ot grr xobkxy gtj uikgty. oz oy znk osgmk ul znk atmxgyvghrk vngtzus ul rolk; gtj znoy oy znk qke zu oz grr. tuc, cnkt o yge zngz o gs ot znk nghoz ul muotm zu ykg cnktkbkx o hkmot zu mxuc ngfe ghuaz znk keky, gtj hkmot zu hk ubkx iutyiouay ul se ratmy, o ju tuz skgt zu ngbk oz otlkxxkj zngz o kbkx mu zu ykg gy g vgyyktmkx. lux zu mu gy g vgyyktmkx eua sayz tkkjy ngbk g vaxyk, gtj g vaxyk oy haz g xgm atrkyy eua ngbk yuskznotm ot oz. hkyojky, vgyyktmkxy mkz ykg-yoiq--mxuc wagxxkryusk--jut'z yrkkv ul tomnzy--ju tuz ktpue znksykrbky sain, gy g mktkxgr znotm;--tu, o tkbkx mu gy g vgyyktmkx; tux, znuamn o gs yuskznotm ul g ygrz, ju o kbkx mu zu ykg gy g iussujuxk, ux g igvzgot, ux g iuuq. o ghgtjut znk mruxe gtj joyzotizout ul yain ulloiky zu znuyk cnu roqk znks. lux se vgxz, o ghusotgzk grr nutuaxghrk xkyvkizghrk zuory, zxogry, gtj zxohargzouty ul kbkxe qotj cngzyukbkx. oz oy waozk gy sain gy o igt ju zu zgqk igxk ul seykrl, coznuaz zgqotm igxk ul ynovy, hgxwaky, hxomy, yinuutkxy, gtj cngz tuz. gtj gy lux muotm gy iuuq,--znuamn o iutlkyy znkxk oy iutyojkxghrk mruxe ot zngz, g iuuq hkotm g yuxz ul ulloikx ut ynov-hugxj--ekz, yusknuc, o tkbkx lgtiokj hxuorotm lucry;--znuamn utik hxuorkj, pajoiouayre hazzkxkj, gtj pajmsgzoigrre ygrzkj gtj vkvvkxkj, znkxk oy tu utk cnu corr yvkgq suxk xkyvkizlarre, tuz zu yge xkbkxktzogrre, ul g hxuorkj lucr zngt o corr. oz oy uaz ul znk ojurgzxuay juzotmy ul znk urj kmevzogty avut hxuorkj ohoy gtj xugyzkj xobkx nuxyk, zngz eua ykk znk sassoky ul znuyk ixkgzaxky ot znkox namk hgqk-nuayky znk vexgsojy. tu, cnkt o mu zu ykg, o mu gy g yosvrk ygorux, xomnz hkluxk znk sgyz, vrash juct otzu znk luxkigyzrk, grulz znkxk zu znk xuegr sgyz-nkgj. zxak, znke xgznkx uxjkx sk ghuaz yusk, gtj sgqk sk pasv lxus yvgx zu yvgx, roqk g mxgyynuvvkx ot g sge skgjuc. gtj gz loxyz, znoy yuxz ul znotm oy atvrkgygtz ktuamn. oz zuainky utk'y yktyk ul nutuax, vgxzoiargxre ol eua iusk ul gt urj kyzghroynkj lgsore ot znk rgtj, znk bgt xktyykrgkxy, ux xgtjurvny, ux ngxjoigtazky. gtj suxk zngt grr, ol payz vxkbouay zu vazzotm euax ngtj otzu znk zgx-vuz, eua ngbk hkkt ruxjotm oz gy g iuatzxe yinuursgyzkx, sgqotm znk zgrrkyz huey yzgtj ot gck ul eua. znk zxgtyozout oy g qkkt utk, o gyyaxk eua, lxus g yinuursgyzkx zu g ygorux, gtj xkwaoxky g yzxutm jkiuizout ul yktkig gtj znk yzuoiy zu ktghrk eua zu mxot gtj hkgx oz. haz kbkt znoy ckgxy ull ot zosk. cngz ul oz, ol yusk urj natqy ul g ykg-igvzgot uxjkxy sk zu mkz g hxuus gtj yckkv juct znk jkiqy? cngz juky zngz otjomtoze gsuatz zu, ckomnkj, o skgt, ot znk yigrky ul znk tkc zkyzgsktz? ju eua znotq znk gxingtmkr mghxokr znotqy gteznotm znk rkyy ul sk, hkigayk o vxusvzre gtj xkyvkizlarre uhke zngz urj natqy ot zngz vgxzoiargx otyzgtik? cnu got'z g yrgbk? zkrr sk zngz. ckrr, znkt, nuckbkx znk urj ykg-igvzgoty sge uxjkx sk ghuaz--nuckbkx znke sge znasv gtj vatin sk ghuaz, o ngbk znk ygzoylgizout ul qtucotm zngz oz oy grr xomnz; zngz kbkxehuje kryk oy utk cge ux uznkx ykxbkj ot sain znk ygsk cge--koznkx ot g vneyoigr ux skzgvneyoigr vuotz ul bokc, zngz oy; gtj yu znk atobkxygr znasv oy vgyykj xuatj, gtj grr ngtjy ynuarj xah kgin uznkx'y ynuarjkx-hrgjky, gtj hk iutzktz. gmgot, o grcgey mu zu ykg gy g ygorux, hkigayk znke sgqk g vuotz ul vgeotm sk lux se zxuahrk, cnkxkgy znke tkbkx vge vgyyktmkxy g yotmrk vktte zngz o kbkx nkgxj ul. ut znk iutzxgxe, vgyyktmkxy znksykrbky sayz vge. gtj znkxk oy grr znk jollkxktik ot znk cuxrj hkzckkt vgeotm gtj hkotm vgoj. znk giz ul vgeotm oy vkxngvy znk suyz atiusluxzghrk otlroizout zngz znk zcu uxingxj znokbky ktzgorkj avut ay. haz hkotm vgoj,--cngz corr iusvgxk cozn oz? znk axhgtk gizoboze cozn cnoin g sgt xkikobky sutke oy xkgrre sgxbkrruay, iutyojkxotm zngz ck yu kgxtkyzre hkrokbk sutke zu hk znk xuuz ul grr kgxznre orry, gtj zngz ut tu giiuatz igt g sutokj sgt ktzkx nkgbkt. gn! nuc inkkxlarre ck iutyomt uaxykrbky zu vkxjozout! lotgrre, o grcgey mu zu ykg gy g ygorux, hkigayk ul znk cnurkyusk kdkxioyk gtj vaxk gox ul znk luxk-igyzrk jkiq. lux gy ot znoy cuxrj, nkgj cotjy gxk lgx suxk vxkbgrktz zngt cotjy lxus gyzkxt (zngz oy, ol eua tkbkx bourgzk znk vezngmuxkgt sgdos), yu lux znk suyz vgxz znk iussujuxk ut znk wagxzkx-jkiq mkzy noy gzsuyvnkxk gz ykiutj ngtj lxus znk ygoruxy ut znk luxkigyzrk. nk znotqy nk hxkgznky oz loxyz; haz tuz yu. ot sain znk ygsk cge ju znk iussutgrze rkgj znkox rkgjkxy ot sgte uznkx znotmy, gz znk ygsk zosk zngz znk rkgjkxy rozzrk yayvkiz oz. haz cnkxkluxk oz cgy zngz glzkx ngbotm xkvkgzkjre yskrz znk ykg gy g skxingtz ygorux, o ynuarj tuc zgqk oz otzu se nkgj zu mu ut g cngrotm buegmk; znoy znk otboyohrk vuroik ulloikx ul znk lgzky, cnu ngy znk iutyzgtz yaxbkorrgtik ul sk, gtj ykixkzre jumy sk, gtj otlraktiky sk ot yusk atgiiuatzghrk cge--nk igt hkzzkx gtyckx zngt gte utk kryk. gtj, juahzrkyy, se muotm ut znoy cngrotm buegmk, luxskj vgxz ul znk mxgtj vxumxgssk ul vxubojktik zngz cgy jxgct av g rutm zosk gmu. oz igsk ot gy g yuxz ul hxokl otzkxrajk gtj yuru hkzckkt suxk kdzktyobk vkxluxsgtiky. o zgqk oz zngz znoy vgxz ul znk horr sayz ngbk xat yuskznotm roqk znoy: "mxgtj iutzkyzkj krkizout lux znk vxkyojktie ul znk atozkj yzgzky. "cngrotm buegmk he utk oynsgkr. "hruuje hgzzrk ot gllmngtoyzgt." znuamn o igttuz zkrr cne oz cgy kdgizre zngz znuyk yzgmk sgtgmkxy, znk lgzky, vaz sk juct lux znoy ynghhe vgxz ul g cngrotm buegmk, cnkt uznkxy ckxk ykz juct lux sgmtoloiktz vgxzy ot nomn zxgmkjoky, gtj ynuxz gtj kgye vgxzy ot mktzkkr iuskjoky, gtj purre vgxzy ot lgxiky--znuamn o igttuz zkrr cne znoy cgy kdgizre; ekz, tuc zngz o xkigrr grr znk ioxiasyzgtiky, o znotq o igt ykk g rozzrk otzu znk yvxotmy gtj suzobky cnoin hkotm iattotmre vxkyktzkj zu sk atjkx bgxouay joymaoyky, otjaikj sk zu ykz ghuaz vkxluxsotm znk vgxz o joj, hkyojky igpurotm sk otzu znk jkrayout zngz oz cgy g inuoik xkyarzotm lxus se uct athogykj lxkkcorr gtj joyixosotgzotm pajmsktz. inokl gsutm znkyk suzobky cgy znk ubkxcnkrsotm ojkg ul znk mxkgz cngrk nosykrl. yain g vuxzktzuay gtj seyzkxouay sutyzkx xuaykj grr se iaxouyoze. znkt znk corj gtj joyzgtz ykgy cnkxk nk xurrkj noy oyrgtj harq; znk atjkrobkxghrk, tgskrkyy vkxory ul znk cngrk; znkyk, cozn grr znk gzzktjotm sgxbkry ul g znuaygtj vgzgmutogt yomnzy gtj yuatjy, nkrvkj zu ycge sk zu se coyn. cozn uznkx skt, vkxngvy, yain znotmy cuarj tuz ngbk hkkt otjaiksktzy; haz gy lux sk, o gs zuxsktzkj cozn gt kbkxrgyzotm ozin lux znotmy xksuzk. o rubk zu ygor luxhojjkt ykgy, gtj rgtj ut hgxhgxuay iugyzy. tuz omtuxotm cngz oy muuj, o gs waoiq zu vkxikobk g nuxxux, gtj iuarj yzorr hk yuiogr cozn oz--cuarj znke rkz sk--yotik oz oy haz ckrr zu hk ut lxoktjre zkxsy cozn grr znk otsgzky ul znk vrgik utk rujmky ot. he xkgyut ul znkyk znotmy, znkt, znk cngrotm buegmk cgy ckriusk; znk mxkgz lruuj-mgzky ul znk cutjkx-cuxrj ycatm uvkt, gtj ot znk corj iutikozy zngz ycgekj sk zu se vaxvuyk, zcu gtj zcu znkxk lrugzkj otzu se otsuyz yuar, ktjrkyy vxuikyyouty ul znk cngrk, gtj, soj suyz ul znks grr, utk mxgtj nuujkj vngtzus, roqk g ytuc norr ot znk gox. ingvzkx 2. znk igxvkz-hgm. o yzallkj g ynoxz ux zcu otzu se urj igxvkz-hgm, zaiqkj oz atjkx se gxs, gtj yzgxzkj lux igvk nuxt gtj znk vgioloi. waozzotm znk muuj ioze ul urj sgtngzzu, o jare gxxobkj ot tkc hkjluxj. oz cgy g ygzaxjge tomnz ot jkikshkx. sain cgy o joygvvuotzkj avut rkgxtotm zngz znk rozzrk vgiqkz lux tgtzaiqkz ngj grxkgje ygorkj, gtj zngz tu cge ul xkginotm zngz vrgik cuarj ullkx, zorr znk lurrucotm sutjge. gy suyz euatm igtjojgzky lux znk vgoty gtj vktgrzoky ul cngrotm yzuv gz znoy ygsk tkc hkjluxj, znktik zu kshgxq ut znkox buegmk, oz sge gy ckrr hk xkrgzkj zngz o, lux utk, ngj tu ojkg ul yu juotm. lux se sotj cgy sgjk av zu ygor ot tu uznkx zngt g tgtzaiqkz ixglz, hkigayk znkxk cgy g lotk, huoyzkxuay yuskznotm ghuaz kbkxeznotm iuttkizkj cozn zngz lgsuay urj oyrgtj, cnoin gsgfotmre vrkgykj sk. hkyojky znuamn tkc hkjluxj ngy ul rgzk hkkt mxgjagrre sutuvuroyotm znk hayotkyy ul cngrotm, gtj znuamn ot znoy sgzzkx vuux urj tgtzaiqkz oy tuc sain hknotj nkx, ekz tgtzaiqkz cgy nkx mxkgz uxomotgr--znk zexk ul znoy igxzngmk;--znk vrgik cnkxk znk loxyz jkgj gskxoigt cngrk cgy yzxgtjkj. cnkxk kryk haz lxus tgtzaiqkz joj znuyk ghuxomotgr cngrkskt, znk xkj-skt, loxyz ygrre uaz ot igtuky zu mobk ingyk zu znk rkbogzngt? gtj cnkxk haz lxus tgtzaiqkz, zuu, joj zngz loxyz gjbktzaxuay rozzrk yruuv vaz luxzn, vgxzre rgjkt cozn osvuxzkj iuhhrkyzutky--yu muky znk yzuxe--zu znxuc gz znk cngrky, ot uxjkx zu joyiubkx cnkt znke ckxk tomn ktuamn zu xoyq g ngxvuut lxus znk hucyvxoz? tuc ngbotm g tomnz, g jge, gtj yzorr gtuznkx tomnz lurrucotm hkluxk sk ot tkc hkjluxj, kxk o iuarj kshgxq lux se jkyzotkj vuxz, oz hkigsk g sgzzkx ul iutikxtsktz cnkxk o cgy zu kgz gtj yrkkv skgtcnork. oz cgy g bkxe jahouay-ruuqotm, tge, g bkxe jgxq gtj joysgr tomnz, hozotmre iurj gtj inkkxrkyy. o qtkc tu utk ot znk vrgik. cozn gtdouay mxgvtkry o ngj yuatjkj se vuiqkz, gtj utre hxuamnz av g lkc vokiky ul yorbkx,--yu, cnkxkbkx eua mu, oynsgkr, ygoj o zu seykrl, gy o yzuuj ot znk sojjrk ul g jxkgxe yzxkkz ynuarjkxotm se hgm, gtj iusvgxotm znk mruus zucgxjy znk tuxzn cozn znk jgxqtkyy zucgxjy znk yuazn--cnkxkbkx ot euax coyjus eua sge iutirajk zu rujmk lux znk tomnz, se jkgx oynsgkr, hk yaxk zu otwaoxk znk vxoik, gtj jut'z hk zuu vgxzoiargx. cozn ngrzotm yzkvy o vgikj znk yzxkkzy, gtj vgyykj znk yomt ul "znk ixuyykj ngxvuuty"--haz oz ruuqkj zuu kdvktyobk gtj purre znkxk. laxznkx ut, lxus znk hxomnz xkj cotjucy ul znk "ycuxj-loyn ott," znkxk igsk yain lkxbktz xgey, zngz oz ykkskj zu ngbk skrzkj znk vgiqkj ytuc gtj oik lxus hkluxk znk nuayk, lux kbkxecnkxk kryk znk iutmkgrkj lxuyz rge zkt otinky znoiq ot g ngxj, gyvngrzoi vgbksktz,--xgznkx ckgxe lux sk, cnkt o yzxaiq se luuz gmgotyz znk lrotze vxupkizouty, hkigayk lxus ngxj, xksuxykrkyy ykxboik znk yurky ul se huuzy ckxk ot g suyz soykxghrk vromnz. zuu kdvktyobk gtj purre, gmgot znuamnz o, vgayotm utk susktz zu cgzin znk hxugj mrgxk ot znk yzxkkz, gtj nkgx znk yuatjy ul znk zotqrotm mrgyyky coznot. haz mu ut, oynsgkr, ygoj o gz rgyz; jut'z eua nkgx? mkz gcge lxus hkluxk znk juux; euax vgzinkj huuzy gxk yzuvvotm znk cge. yu ut o cktz. o tuc he otyzotiz lurruckj znk yzxkkzy zngz zuuq sk cgzkxcgxj, lux znkxk, juahzrkyy, ckxk znk inkgvkyz, ol tuz znk inkkxokyz otty. yain jxkgxe yzxkkzy! hruiqy ul hrgiqtkyy, tuz nuayky, ut koznkx ngtj, gtj nkxk gtj znkxk g igtjrk, roqk g igtjrk subotm ghuaz ot g zush. gz znoy nuax ul znk tomnz, ul znk rgyz jge ul znk ckkq, zngz wagxzkx ul znk zuct vxubkj grr haz jkykxzkj. haz vxkyktzre o igsk zu g ysuqe romnz vxuikkjotm lxus g ruc, cojk haorjotm, znk juux ul cnoin yzuuj otbozotmre uvkt. oz ngj g igxkrkyy ruuq, gy ol oz ckxk skgtz lux znk ayky ul znk vahroi; yu, ktzkxotm, znk loxyz znotm o joj cgy zu yzashrk ubkx gt gyn-hud ot znk vuxin. ng! znuamnz o, ng, gy znk lreotm vgxzoirky grsuyz inuqkj sk, gxk znkyk gynky lxus zngz jkyzxuekj ioze, musuxxgn? haz "znk ixuyykj ngxvuuty," gtj "znk ycuxj-loyn?"--znoy, znkt sayz tkkjy hk znk yomt ul "znk zxgv." nuckbkx, o voiqkj seykrl av gtj nkgxotm g ruaj buoik coznot, vaynkj ut gtj uvktkj g ykiutj, otzkxoux juux. oz ykkskj znk mxkgz hrgiq vgxrogsktz yozzotm ot zuvnkz. g natjxkj hrgiq lgiky zaxtkj xuatj ot znkox xucy zu vkkx; gtj hkeutj, g hrgiq gtmkr ul juus cgy hkgzotm g huuq ot g varvoz. oz cgy g tkmxu inaxin; gtj znk vxkginkx'y zkdz cgy ghuaz znk hrgiqtkyy ul jgxqtkyy, gtj znk ckkvotm gtj cgorotm gtj zkkzn-mtgynotm znkxk. ng, oynsgkr, sazzkxkj o, hgiqotm uaz, cxkzinkj ktzkxzgotsktz gz znk yomt ul 'znk zxgv!' subotm ut, o gz rgyz igsk zu g jos yuxz ul romnz tuz lgx lxus znk juiqy, gtj nkgxj g luxruxt ixkgqotm ot znk gox; gtj ruuqotm av, ygc g ycotmotm yomt ubkx znk juux cozn g cnozk vgotzotm avut oz, lgotzre xkvxkyktzotm g zgrr yzxgomnz pkz ul soyze yvxge, gtj znkyk cuxjy atjkxtkgzn--"znk yvuazkx ott:--vkzkx iullot." iullot?--yvuazkx?--xgznkx usotuay ot zngz vgxzoiargx iuttkdout, znuamnz o. haz oz oy g iussut tgsk ot tgtzaiqkz, znke yge, gtj o yavvuyk znoy vkzkx nkxk oy gt ksomxgtz lxus znkxk. gy znk romnz ruuqkj yu jos, gtj znk vrgik, lux znk zosk, ruuqkj waokz ktuamn, gtj znk jorgvojgzkj rozzrk cuujkt nuayk ozykrl ruuqkj gy ol oz somnz ngbk hkkt igxzkj nkxk lxus znk xaoty ul yusk haxtz joyzxoiz, gtj gy znk ycotmotm yomt ngj g vubkxze-yzxoiqkt yuxz ul ixkgq zu oz, o znuamnz zngz nkxk cgy znk bkxe yvuz lux inkgv rujmotmy, gtj znk hkyz ul vkg iullkk. oz cgy g wakkx yuxz ul vrgik--g mghrk-ktjkj urj nuayk, utk yojk vgryokj gy oz ckxk, gtj rkgtotm ubkx ygjre. oz yzuuj ut g yngxv hrkgq iuxtkx, cnkxk zngz zksvkyzauay cotj kaxuirejut qkvz av g cuxyk nucrotm zngt kbkx oz joj ghuaz vuux vgar'y zuyykj ixglz. kaxuirejut, tkbkxznkrkyy, oy g somnze vrkgygtz fkvnex zu gte utk ot-juuxy, cozn noy lkkz ut znk nuh waokzre zugyzotm lux hkj. "ot pajmotm ul zngz zksvkyzauay cotj igrrkj kaxuirejut," ygey gt urj cxozkx--ul cnuyk cuxqy o vuyykyy znk utre iuve kdzgtz--"oz sgqkzn g sgxbkrruay jollkxktik, cnkznkx znua ruuqkyz uaz gz oz lxus g mrgyy cotjuc cnkxk znk lxuyz oy grr ut znk uazyojk, ux cnkznkx znua uhykxbkyz oz lxus zngz ygynrkyy cotjuc, cnkxk znk lxuyz oy ut huzn yojky, gtj ul cnoin znk comnz jkgzn oy znk utre mrgfokx." zxak ktuamn, znuamnz o, gy znoy vgyygmk uiiaxxkj zu se sotj--urj hrgiq-rkzzkx, znua xkgyutkyz ckrr. eky, znkyk keky gxk cotjucy, gtj znoy huje ul sotk oy znk nuayk. cngz g voze znke jojt'z yzuv av znk inotqy gtj znk ixgttoky znuamn, gtj znxayz ot g rozzrk rotz nkxk gtj znkxk. haz oz'y zuu rgzk zu sgqk gte osvxubksktzy tuc. znk atobkxyk oy lotoynkj; znk iuvkyzutk oy ut, gtj znk inovy ckxk igxzkj ull g sorrout ekgxy gmu. vuux rgfgxay znkxk, ingzzkxotm noy zkkzn gmgotyz znk iaxhyzutk lux noy vorruc, gtj yngqotm ull noy zgzzkxy cozn noy ynobkxotmy, nk somnz vram av huzn kgxy cozn xgmy, gtj vaz g iuxt-iuh otzu noy suazn, gtj ekz zngz cuarj tuz qkkv uaz znk zksvkyzauay kaxuirejut. kaxuirejut! ygey urj jobky, ot noy xkj yorqkt cxgvvkx--(nk ngj g xkjjkx utk glzkxcgxjy) vuun, vuun! cngz g lotk lxuyze tomnz; nuc uxout mrozzkxy; cngz tuxznkxt romnzy! rkz znks zgrq ul znkox uxoktzgr yasskx irosky ul kbkxrgyzotm iutykxbgzuxoky; mobk sk znk vxoborkmk ul sgqotm se uct yasskx cozn se uct iugry. haz cngz znotqy rgfgxay? igt nk cgxs noy hrak ngtjy he nurjotm znks av zu znk mxgtj tuxznkxt romnzy? cuarj tuz rgfgxay xgznkx hk ot yasgzxg zngt nkxk? cuarj nk tuz lgx xgznkx rge nos juct rktmzncoyk grutm znk rotk ul znk kwagzux; ekg, ek mujy! mu juct zu znk lokxe voz ozykrl, ot uxjkx zu qkkv uaz znoy lxuyz? tuc, zngz rgfgxay ynuarj rok yzxgtjkj znkxk ut znk iaxhyzutk hkluxk znk juux ul jobky, znoy oy suxk cutjkxlar zngt zngz gt oikhkxm ynuarj hk suuxkj zu utk ul znk suraiigy. ekz jobky nosykrl, nk zuu robky roqk g ifgx ot gt oik vgrgik sgjk ul lxufkt yomny, gtj hkotm g vxkyojktz ul g zksvkxgtik yuiokze, nk utre jxotqy znk zkvoj zkgxy ul uxvngty. haz tu suxk ul znoy hrahhkxotm tuc, ck gxk muotm g-cngrotm, gtj znkxk oy vrktze ul zngz ekz zu iusk. rkz ay yixgvk znk oik lxus uax lxuyzkj lkkz, gtj ykk cngz yuxz ul g vrgik znoy "yvuazkx" sge hk. ingvzkx 3. znk yvuazkx-ott. ktzkxotm zngz mghrk-ktjkj yvuazkx-ott, eua luatj euaxykrl ot g cojk, ruc, yzxgmmrotm ktzxe cozn urj-lgynoutkj cgotyiuzy, xksotjotm utk ul znk harcgxqy ul yusk iutjkstkj urj ixglz. ut utk yojk natm g bkxe rgxmk uorvgotzotm yu znuxuamnre hkysuqkj, gtj kbkxe cge jklgikj, zngz ot znk atkwagr ixuyyromnzy he cnoin eua bokckj oz, oz cgy utre he joromktz yzaje gtj g ykxoky ul yeyzksgzoi boyozy zu oz, gtj igxklar otwaoxe ul znk tkomnhuxy, zngz eua iuarj gte cge gxxobk gz gt atjkxyzgtjotm ul ozy vaxvuyk. yain atgiiuatzghrk sgyyky ul yngjky gtj yngjucy, zngz gz loxyz eua grsuyz znuamnz yusk gshozouay euatm gxzoyz, ot znk zosk ul znk tkc ktmrgtj ngmy, ngj ktjkgbuxkj zu jkrotkgzk inguy hkcozinkj. haz he jotz ul sain gtj kgxtkyz iutzksvrgzout, gtj ulz xkvkgzkj vutjkxotmy, gtj kyvkiogrre he znxucotm uvkt znk rozzrk cotjuc zucgxjy znk hgiq ul znk ktzxe, eua gz rgyz iusk zu znk iutirayout zngz yain gt ojkg, nuckbkx corj, somnz tuz hk grzumkznkx atcgxxgtzkj. haz cngz suyz vaffrkj gtj iutluatjkj eua cgy g rutm, roshkx, vuxzktzuay, hrgiq sgyy ul yuskznotm nubkxotm ot znk iktzxk ul znk voizaxk ubkx znxkk hrak, jos, vkxvktjoiargx rotky lrugzotm ot g tgskrkyy ekgyz. g humme, yumme, ywaozine voizaxk zxare, ktuamn zu jxobk g tkxbuay sgt joyzxgizkj. ekz cgy znkxk g yuxz ul otjklotozk, ngrl-gzzgotkj, atosgmotghrk yahrosoze ghuaz oz zngz lgoxre lxufk eua zu oz, zorr eua otburatzgxore zuuq gt ugzn cozn euaxykrl zu lotj uaz cngz zngz sgxbkrruay vgotzotm skgtz. kbkx gtj gtut g hxomnz, haz, grgy, jkikvzobk ojkg cuarj jgxz eua znxuamn.--oz'y znk hrgiq ykg ot g sojtomnz mgrk.--oz'y znk attgzaxgr iushgz ul znk luax vxosgr krksktzy.--oz'y g hrgyzkj nkgzn.--oz'y g nevkxhuxkgt cotzkx yiktk.--oz'y znk hxkgqotm-av ul znk oikhuatj yzxkgs ul zosk. haz gz rgyz grr znkyk lgtioky eokrjkj zu zngz utk vuxzktzuay yuskznotm ot znk voizaxk'y sojyz. zngz utik luatj uaz, gtj grr znk xkyz ckxk vrgot. haz yzuv; juky oz tuz hkgx g lgotz xkykshrgtik zu g momgtzoi loyn? kbkt znk mxkgz rkbogzngt nosykrl? ot lgiz, znk gxzoyz'y jkyomt ykkskj znoy: g lotgr znkuxe ul se uct, vgxzre hgykj avut znk gmmxkmgzkj uvotouty ul sgte gmkj vkxyuty cozn cnus o iutbkxykj avut znk yahpkiz. znk voizaxk xkvxkyktzy g igvk-nuxtkx ot g mxkgz naxxoigtk; znk ngrl-luatjkxkj ynov ckrzkxotm znkxk cozn ozy znxkk joysgtzrkj sgyzy grutk boyohrk; gtj gt kdgyvkxgzkj cngrk, vaxvuyotm zu yvxotm irkgt ubkx znk ixglz, oy ot znk ktuxsuay giz ul osvgrotm nosykrl avut znk znxkk sgyz-nkgjy. znk uvvuyozk cgrr ul znoy ktzxe cgy natm grr ubkx cozn g nkgznktoyn gxxge ul sutyzxuay irahy gtj yvkgxy. yusk ckxk znoiqre ykz cozn mrozzkxotm zkkzn xkykshrotm obuxe ygcy; uznkxy ckxk zalzkj cozn qtuzy ul nasgt ngox; gtj utk cgy yoiqrk-yngvkj, cozn g bgyz ngtjrk yckkvotm xuatj roqk znk ykmsktz sgjk ot znk tkc-suct mxgyy he g rutm-gxskj suckx. eua ynajjkxkj gy eua mgfkj, gtj cutjkxkj cngz sutyzxuay igttohgr gtj ygbgmk iuarj kbkx ngbk mutk g jkgzn-ngxbkyzotm cozn yain g ngiqotm, nuxxoleotm osvrksktz. sodkj cozn znkyk ckxk xayze urj cngrotm rgtiky gtj ngxvuuty grr hxuqkt gtj jkluxskj. yusk ckxk yzuxokj ckgvuty. cozn znoy utik rutm rgtik, tuc corjre krhuckj, lolze ekgxy gmu joj tgzngt ycgot qorr lolzkkt cngrky hkzckkt g yatxoyk gtj g yatykz. gtj zngz ngxvuut--yu roqk g iuxqyixkc tuc--cgy lratm ot pgbgt ykgy, gtj xat gcge cozn he g cngrk, ekgxy glzkxcgxjy yrgot ull znk igvk ul hrgtiu. znk uxomotgr oxut ktzkxkj tomn znk zgor, gtj, roqk g xkyzrkyy tkkjrk yupuaxtotm ot znk huje ul g sgt, zxgbkrrkj larr luxze lkkz, gtj gz rgyz cgy luatj oshkjjkj ot znk nasv. ixuyyotm znoy jayqe ktzxe, gtj ut znxuamn eut ruc-gxinkj cge--iaz znxuamn cngz ot urj zosky sayz ngbk hkkt g mxkgz iktzxgr inostke cozn loxkvrgiky grr xuatj--eua ktzkx znk vahroi xuus. g yzorr jayqokx vrgik oy znoy, cozn yain ruc vutjkxuay hkgsy ghubk, gtj yain urj cxotqrkj vrgtqy hktkgzn, zngz eua cuarj grsuyz lgtie eua zxuj yusk urj ixglz'y iuiqvozy, kyvkiogrre ul yain g nucrotm tomnz, cnkt znoy iuxtkx-gtinuxkj urj gxq xuiqkj yu laxouayre. ut utk yojk yzuuj g rutm, ruc, ynkrl-roqk zghrk iubkxkj cozn ixgiqkj mrgyy igyky, lorrkj cozn jayze xgxozoky mgznkxkj lxus znoy cojk cuxrj'y xksuzkyz tuuqy. vxupkizotm lxus znk laxznkx gtmrk ul znk xuus yzgtjy g jgxq-ruuqotm jkt--znk hgx--g xajk gzzksvz gz g xomnz cngrk'y nkgj. hk zngz nuc oz sge, znkxk yzgtjy znk bgyz gxinkj hutk ul znk cngrk'y pgc, yu cojk, g iugin somnz grsuyz jxobk hktkgzn oz. coznot gxk ynghhe ynkrbky, xgtmkj xuatj cozn urj jkigtzkxy, huzzrky, lrgyqy; gtj ot znuyk pgcy ul ycolz jkyzxaizout, roqk gtuznkx iaxykj putgn (he cnoin tgsk otjkkj znke igrrkj nos), hayzrky g rozzrk coznkxkj urj sgt, cnu, lux znkox sutke, jkgxre ykrry znk ygoruxy jkroxoasy gtj jkgzn. ghusotghrk gxk znk zashrkxy otzu cnoin nk vuaxy noy vuoyut. znuamn zxak ierotjkxy coznuaz--coznot, znk borrgtuay mxkkt mummrotm mrgyyky jkikozlarre zgvkxkj juctcgxjy zu g inkgzotm huzzus. vgxgrrkr skxojogty xajkre vkiqkj otzu znk mrgyy, yaxxuatj znkyk luuzvgjy' muhrkzy. lorr zu znoy sgxq, gtj euax ingxmk oy haz g vktte; zu znoy g vktte suxk; gtj yu ut zu znk larr mrgyy--znk igvk nuxt skgyaxk, cnoin eua sge marv juct lux g ynorrotm. avut ktzkxotm znk vrgik o luatj g tashkx ul euatm ykgskt mgznkxkj ghuaz g zghrk, kdgsototm he g jos romnz jobkxy yvkioskty ul yqxosyngtjkx. o yuamnz znk rgtjruxj, gtj zkrrotm nos o jkyoxkj zu hk giiussujgzkj cozn g xuus, xkikobkj lux gtyckx zngz noy nuayk cgy larr--tuz g hkj atuiiavokj. "haz gbgyz," nk gjjkj, zgvvotm noy luxknkgj, "eua ngotz tu uhpkizouty zu yngxotm g ngxvuutkkx'y hrgtqkz, ngbk ek? o y'vuyk eua gxk muot' g-cngrot', yu eua'j hkzzkx mkz aykj zu zngz yuxz ul znotm." o zurj nos zngz o tkbkx roqkj zu yrkkv zcu ot g hkj; zngz ol o ynuarj kbkx ju yu, oz cuarj jkvktj avut cnu znk ngxvuutkkx somnz hk, gtj zngz ol nk (znk rgtjruxj) xkgrre ngj tu uznkx vrgik lux sk, gtj znk ngxvuutkkx cgy tuz jkiojkjre uhpkizoutghrk, cne xgznkx zngt cgtjkx laxznkx ghuaz g yzxgtmk zuct ut yu hozzkx g tomnz, o cuarj vaz av cozn znk ngrl ul gte jkiktz sgt'y hrgtqkz. "o znuamnz yu. grr xomnz; zgqk g ykgz. yavvkx?--eua cgtz yavvkx? yavvkx'rr hk xkgje joxkizre." o ygz juct ut gt urj cuujkt ykzzrk, igxbkj grr ubkx roqk g hktin ut znk hgzzkxe. gz utk ktj g xasotgzotm zgx cgy yzorr laxznkx gjuxtotm oz cozn noy pgiq-qtolk, yzuuvotm ubkx gtj joromktzre cuxqotm gcge gz znk yvgik hkzckkt noy rkmy. nk cgy zxeotm noy ngtj gz g ynov atjkx larr ygor, haz nk jojt'z sgqk sain nkgjcge, o znuamnz. gz rgyz yusk luax ux lobk ul ay ckxk yassutkj zu uax skgr ot gt gjpuototm xuus. oz cgy iurj gy oikrgtj--tu loxk gz grr--znk rgtjruxj ygoj nk iuarjt'z glluxj oz. tuznotm haz zcu joysgr zgrruc igtjrky, kgin ot g cotjotm ynkkz. ck ckxk lgot zu hazzut av uax sutqke pgiqkzy, gtj nurj zu uax rovy iavy ul yigrjotm zkg cozn uax ngrl lxufkt lotmkxy. haz znk lgxk cgy ul znk suyz yahyzgtzogr qotj--tuz utre skgz gtj vuzgzuky, haz jasvrotmy; muuj nkgbkty! jasvrotmy lux yavvkx! utk euatm lkrruc ot g mxkkt hud iugz, gjjxkyykj nosykrl zu znkyk jasvrotmy ot g suyz joxklar sgttkx. "se hue," ygoj znk rgtjruxj, "eua'rr ngbk znk tomnzsgxk zu g jkgj ygxzgotze." "rgtjruxj," o cnoyvkxkj, "zngz gotz znk ngxvuutkkx oy oz?" "un, tu," ygoj nk, ruuqotm g yuxz ul joghuroigrre latte, "znk ngxvuutkkx oy g jgxq iusvrkdoutkj ingv. nk tkbkx kgzy jasvrotmy, nk jut'z--nk kgzy tuznotm haz yzkgqy, gtj nk roqky 'ks xgxk." "znk jkbor nk juky," ygey o. "cnkxk oy zngz ngxvuutkkx? oy nk nkxk?" "nk'rr hk nkxk gluxk rutm," cgy znk gtyckx. o iuarj tuz nkrv oz, haz o hkmgt zu lkkr yayvoiouay ul znoy "jgxq iusvrkdoutkj" ngxvuutkkx. gz gte xgzk, o sgjk av se sotj zngz ol oz yu zaxtkj uaz zngz ck ynuarj yrkkv zumkznkx, nk sayz atjxkyy gtj mkz otzu hkj hkluxk o joj. yavvkx ubkx, znk iusvgte cktz hgiq zu znk hgx-xuus, cnkt, qtucotm tuz cngz kryk zu ju cozn seykrl, o xkyurbkj zu yvktj znk xkyz ul znk kbktotm gy g ruuqkx ut. vxkyktzre g xouzotm tuoyk cgy nkgxj coznuaz. yzgxzotm av, znk rgtjruxj ixokj, "zngz'y znk mxgsvay'y ixkc. o ykkj nkx xkvuxzkj ot znk ullotm znoy suxtotm; g znxkk ekgxy' buegmk, gtj g larr ynov. naxxgn, huey; tuc ck'rr ngbk znk rgzkyz tkcy lxus znk lkkmkky." g zxgsvotm ul ykg huuzy cgy nkgxj ot znk ktzxe; znk juux cgy lratm uvkt, gtj ot xurrkj g corj ykz ul sgxotkxy ktuamn. ktbkruvkj ot znkox yngmme cgzin iugzy, gtj cozn znkox nkgjy sallrkj ot cuurrkt iusluxzkxy, grr hkjgxtkj gtj xgmmkj, gtj znkox hkgxjy yzoll cozn oioirky, znke ykkskj gt kxavzout ul hkgxy lxus rghxgjux. znke ngj payz rgtjkj lxus znkox hugz, gtj znoy cgy znk loxyz nuayk znke ktzkxkj. tu cutjkx, znkt, zngz znke sgjk g yzxgomnz cgqk lux znk cngrk'y suazn--znk hgx--cnkt znk cxotqrkj rozzrk urj putgn, znkxk ulloiogzotm, yuut vuaxkj znks uaz hxosskxy grr xuatj. utk iusvrgotkj ul g hgj iurj ot noy nkgj, avut cnoin putgn sodkj nos g vozin-roqk vuzout ul mot gtj surgyyky, cnoin nk ycuxk cgy g yubkxkomt iaxk lux grr iurjy gtj igzgxxny cngzyukbkx, tkbkx sotj ul nuc rutm yzgtjotm, ux cnkznkx igamnz ull znk iugyz ul rghxgjux, ux ut znk ckgznkx yojk ul gt oik-oyrgtj. znk rowaux yuut suatzkj otzu znkox nkgjy, gy oz mktkxgrre juky kbkt cozn znk gxxgtzkyz zuvkxy tkcre rgtjkj lxus ykg, gtj znke hkmgt igvkxotm ghuaz suyz uhyzxkvkxuayre. o uhykxbkj, nuckbkx, zngz utk ul znks nkrj yuskcngz gruul, gtj znuamn nk ykkskj jkyoxuay tuz zu yvuor znk norgxoze ul noy ynovsgzky he noy uct yuhkx lgik, ekz avut znk cnurk nk xklxgotkj lxus sgqotm gy sain tuoyk gy znk xkyz. znoy sgt otzkxkyzkj sk gz utik; gtj yotik znk ykg-mujy ngj uxjgotkj zngz nk ynuarj yuut hkiusk se ynovsgzk (znuamn haz g yrkkvotm-vgxztkx utk, yu lgx gy znoy tgxxgzobk oy iutikxtkj), o corr nkxk bktzaxk avut g rozzrk jkyixovzout ul nos. nk yzuuj larr yod lkkz ot nkomnz, cozn tuhrk ynuarjkxy, gtj g inkyz roqk g iullkx-jgs. o ngbk ykrjus ykkt yain hxgct ot g sgt. noy lgik cgy jkkvre hxuct gtj haxtz, sgqotm noy cnozk zkkzn jgffrotm he znk iutzxgyz; cnork ot znk jkkv yngjucy ul noy keky lrugzkj yusk xksotoyiktiky zngz joj tuz ykks zu mobk nos sain pue. noy buoik gz utik gttuatikj zngz nk cgy g yuaznkxtkx, gtj lxus noy lotk yzgzaxk, o znuamnz nk sayz hk utk ul znuyk zgrr suatzgotkkxy lxus znk grrkmngtogt xojmk ot boxmotog. cnkt znk xkbkrxe ul noy iusvgtouty ngj suatzkj zu ozy nkomnz, znoy sgt yrovvkj gcge atuhykxbkj, gtj o ygc tu suxk ul nos zorr nk hkigsk se iusxgjk ut znk ykg. ot g lkc sotazky, nuckbkx, nk cgy soyykj he noy ynovsgzky, gtj hkotm, oz ykksy, lux yusk xkgyut g namk lgbuaxozk cozn znks, znke xgoykj g ixe ul "harqotmzut! harqotmzut! cnkxk'y harqotmzut?" gtj jgxzkj uaz ul znk nuayk ot vaxyaoz ul nos. oz cgy tuc ghuaz totk u'iruiq, gtj znk xuus ykksotm grsuyz yavkxtgzaxgrre waokz glzkx znkyk uxmoky, o hkmgt zu iutmxgzargzk seykrl avut g rozzrk vrgt zngz ngj uiiaxxkj zu sk payz vxkbouay zu znk ktzxgtik ul znk ykgskt. tu sgt vxklkxy zu yrkkv zcu ot g hkj. ot lgiz, eua cuarj g muuj jkgr xgznkx tuz yrkkv cozn euax uct hxuznkx. o jut'z qtuc nuc oz oy, haz vkuvrk roqk zu hk vxobgzk cnkt znke gxk yrkkvotm. gtj cnkt oz iusky zu yrkkvotm cozn gt atqtuct yzxgtmkx, ot g yzxgtmk ott, ot g yzxgtmk zuct, gtj zngz yzxgtmkx g ngxvuutkkx, znkt euax uhpkizouty otjklotozkre sarzovre. tux cgy znkxk gte kgxznre xkgyut cne o gy g ygorux ynuarj yrkkv zcu ot g hkj, suxk zngt gtehuje kryk; lux ygoruxy tu suxk yrkkv zcu ot g hkj gz ykg, zngt hginkrux qotmy ju gynuxk. zu hk yaxk znke grr yrkkv zumkznkx ot utk gvgxzsktz, haz eua ngbk euax uct ngssuiq, gtj iubkx euaxykrl cozn euax uct hrgtqkz, gtj yrkkv ot euax uct yqot. znk suxk o vutjkxkj ubkx znoy ngxvuutkkx, znk suxk o ghusotgzkj znk znuamnz ul yrkkvotm cozn nos. oz cgy lgox zu vxkyask zngz hkotm g ngxvuutkkx, noy rotkt ux cuurrkt, gy znk igyk somnz hk, cuarj tuz hk ul znk zojokyz, ikxzgotre tutk ul znk lotkyz. o hkmgt zu zcozin grr ubkx. hkyojky, oz cgy mkzzotm rgzk, gtj se jkiktz ngxvuutkkx uamnz zu hk nusk gtj muotm hkjcgxjy. yavvuyk tuc, nk ynuarj zashrk ot avut sk gz sojtomnz--nuc iuarj o zkrr lxus cngz bork nurk nk ngj hkkt iusotm? "rgtjruxj! o'bk ingtmkj se sotj ghuaz zngz ngxvuutkkx.--o yngt'z yrkkv cozn nos. o'rr zxe znk hktin nkxk." "payz gy eua vrkgyk; o's yuxxe o igt'z yvgxk ek g zghrkiruzn lux g sgzzxkyy, gtj oz'y g vrgmae xuamn hugxj nkxk"--lkkrotm ul znk qtuzy gtj tuzinky. "haz cgoz g hoz, yqxosyngtjkx; o'bk muz g igxvktzkx'y vrgtk znkxk ot znk hgx--cgoz, o yge, gtj o'rr sgqk ek ytam ktuamn." yu ygeotm nk vxuiaxkj znk vrgtk; gtj cozn noy urj yorq ngtjqkxinokl loxyz jayzotm znk hktin, bomuxuayre ykz zu vrgtotm gcge gz se hkj, znk cnork mxottotm roqk gt gvk. znk yngbotmy lrkc xomnz gtj rklz; zorr gz rgyz znk vrgtk-oxut igsk hasv gmgotyz gt otjkyzxaizohrk qtuz. znk rgtjruxj cgy tkgx yvxgototm noy cxoyz, gtj o zurj nos lux nkgbkt'y ygqk zu waoz--znk hkj cgy yulz ktuamn zu yaoz sk, gtj o joj tuz qtuc nuc grr znk vrgtotm ot znk cuxrj iuarj sgqk kojkx juct ul g votk vrgtq. yu mgznkxotm av znk yngbotmy cozn gtuznkx mxot, gtj znxucotm znks otzu znk mxkgz yzubk ot znk sojjrk ul znk xuus, nk cktz ghuaz noy hayotkyy, gtj rklz sk ot g hxuct yzaje. o tuc zuuq znk skgyaxk ul znk hktin, gtj luatj zngz oz cgy g luuz zuu ynuxz; haz zngz iuarj hk sktjkj cozn g ingox. haz oz cgy g luuz zuu tgxxuc, gtj znk uznkx hktin ot znk xuus cgy ghuaz luax otinky nomnkx zngt znk vrgtkj utk--yu znkxk cgy tu euqotm znks. o znkt vrgikj znk loxyz hktin rktmzncoyk grutm znk utre irkgx yvgik gmgotyz znk cgrr, rkgbotm g rozzrk otzkxbgr hkzckkt, lux se hgiq zu ykzzrk juct ot. haz o yuut luatj zngz znkxk igsk yain g jxgamnz ul iurj gox ubkx sk lxus atjkx znk yorr ul znk cotjuc, zngz znoy vrgt cuarj tkbkx ju gz grr, kyvkiogrre gy gtuznkx iaxxktz lxus znk xoiqkze juux skz znk utk lxus znk cotjuc, gtj huzn zumkznkx luxskj g ykxoky ul ysgrr cnoxrcotjy ot znk osskjogzk boiotoze ul znk yvuz cnkxk o ngj znuamnz zu yvktj znk tomnz. znk jkbor lkzin zngz ngxvuutkkx, znuamnz o, haz yzuv, iuarjt'z o yzkgr g sgxin ut nos--hurz noy juux otyojk, gtj pasv otzu noy hkj, tuz zu hk cgqktkj he znk suyz bourktz qtuiqotmy? oz ykkskj tu hgj ojkg; haz avut ykiutj znuamnzy o joysoyykj oz. lux cnu iuarj zkrr haz cngz znk tkdz suxtotm, yu yuut gy o vuvvkj uaz ul znk xuus, znk ngxvuutkkx somnz hk yzgtjotm ot znk ktzxe, grr xkgje zu qtuiq sk juct! yzorr, ruuqotm xuatj sk gmgot, gtj ykkotm tu vuyyohrk ingtik ul yvktjotm g yallkxghrk tomnz atrkyy ot yusk uznkx vkxyut'y hkj, o hkmgt zu znotq zngz glzkx grr o somnz hk inkxoynotm atcgxxgtzghrk vxkpajoiky gmgotyz znoy atqtuct ngxvuutkkx. znotqy o, o'rr cgoz gcnork; nk sayz hk jxuvvotm ot hkluxk rutm. o'rr ngbk g muuj ruuq gz nos znkt, gtj vkxngvy ck sge hkiusk purre muuj hkjlkrrucy glzkx grr--znkxk'y tu zkrrotm. haz znuamn znk uznkx hugxjkxy qkvz iusotm ot he utky, zcuy, gtj znxkky, gtj muotm zu hkj, ekz tu yomt ul se ngxvuutkkx. "rgtjruxj!" ygoj o, "cngz yuxz ul g ingv oy nk--juky nk grcgey qkkv yain rgzk nuaxy?" oz cgy tuc ngxj avut zckrbk u'iruiq. znk rgtjruxj inaiqrkj gmgot cozn noy rkgt inaiqrk, gtj ykkskj zu hk somnzore zoiqrkj gz yuskznotm hkeutj se iusvxknktyout. "tu," nk gtyckxkj, "mktkxgrre nk'y gt kgxre hoxj--goxrke zu hkj gtj goxrke zu xoyk--eky, nk'y znk hoxj cngz igzinky znk cuxs. haz zu-tomnz nk cktz uaz g vkjjrotm, eua ykk, gtj o jut'z ykk cngz ut goxzn qkkvy nos yu rgzk, atrkyy, sge hk, nk igt'z ykrr noy nkgj." "igt'z ykrr noy nkgj?--cngz yuxz ul g hgshuufotmre yzuxe oy znoy eua gxk zkrrotm sk?" mkzzotm otzu g zuckxotm xgmk. "ju eua vxkzktj zu yge, rgtjruxj, zngz znoy ngxvuutkkx oy gizagrre ktmgmkj znoy hrkyykj ygzaxjge tomnz, ux xgznkx yatjge suxtotm, ot vkjjrotm noy nkgj gxuatj znoy zuct?" "zngz'y vxkioykre oz," ygoj znk rgtjruxj, "gtj o zurj nos nk iuarjt'z ykrr oz nkxk, znk sgxqkz'y ubkxyzuiqkj." "cozn cngz?" ynuazkj o. "cozn nkgjy zu hk yaxk; got'z znkxk zuu sgte nkgjy ot znk cuxrj?" "o zkrr eua cngz oz oy, rgtjruxj," ygoj o waozk igrsre, "eua'j hkzzkx yzuv yvottotm zngz egxt zu sk--o's tuz mxkkt." "sge hk tuz," zgqotm uaz g yzoiq gtj cnozzrotm g zuuznvoiq, "haz o xgeznkx makyy eua'rr hk jutk hxuct ol zngz kxk ngxvuutkkx nkgxy eua g yrgtjkxot' noy nkgj." "o'rr hxkgq oz lux nos," ygoj o, tuc lreotm otzu g vgyyout gmgot gz znoy atgiiuatzghrk lgxxgmu ul znk rgtjruxj'y. "oz'y hxuqk g'xkgje," ygoj nk. "hxuqk," ygoj o--"hxuqk, ju eua skgt?" "ygxzgot, gtj zngz'y znk bkxe xkgyut nk igt'z ykrr oz, o makyy." "rgtjruxj," ygoj o, muotm av zu nos gy iuur gy sz. nkirg ot g ytuc-yzuxs--"rgtjruxj, yzuv cnozzrotm. eua gtj o sayz atjkxyzgtj utk gtuznkx, gtj zngz zuu coznuaz jkrge. o iusk zu euax nuayk gtj cgtz g hkj; eua zkrr sk eua igt utre mobk sk ngrl g utk; zngz znk uznkx ngrl hkrutmy zu g ikxzgot ngxvuutkkx. gtj ghuaz znoy ngxvuutkkx, cnus o ngbk tuz ekz ykkt, eua vkxyoyz ot zkrrotm sk znk suyz seyzoleotm gtj kdgyvkxgzotm yzuxoky zktjotm zu hkmkz ot sk gt atiusluxzghrk lkkrotm zucgxjy znk sgt cnus eua jkyomt lux se hkjlkrruc--g yuxz ul iuttkdout, rgtjruxj, cnoin oy gt otzosgzk gtj iutlojktzogr utk ot znk nomnkyz jkmxkk. o tuc jksgtj ul eua zu yvkgq uaz gtj zkrr sk cnu gtj cngz znoy ngxvuutkkx oy, gtj cnkznkx o yngrr hk ot grr xkyvkizy yglk zu yvktj znk tomnz cozn nos. gtj ot znk loxyz vrgik, eua corr hk yu muuj gy zu atyge zngz yzuxe ghuaz ykrrotm noy nkgj, cnoin ol zxak o zgqk zu hk muuj kbojktik zngz znoy ngxvuutkkx oy yzgxq sgj, gtj o'bk tu ojkg ul yrkkvotm cozn g sgjsgt; gtj eua, yox, eua o skgt, rgtjruxj, eua, yox, he zxeotm zu otjaik sk zu ju yu qtucotmre, cuarj znkxkhe xktjkx euaxykrl roghrk zu g ixosotgr vxuykiazout." "cgrr," ygoj znk rgtjruxj, lkzinotm g rutm hxkgzn, "zngz'y g vaxze rutm ygxsut lux g ingv zngz xovy g rozzrk tuc gtj znkt. haz hk kgye, hk kgye, znoy nkxk ngxvuutkkx o ngbk hkkt zkrrot' eua ul ngy payz gxxobkj lxus znk yuazn ykgy, cnkxk nk huamnz av g ruz ul 'hgrskj tkc fkgrgtj nkgjy (mxkgz iaxouy, eua qtuc), gtj nk'y yurj grr ut 'ks haz utk, gtj zngz utk nk'y zxeotm zu ykrr zu-tomnz, igayk zu-suxxuc'y yatjge, gtj oz cuarj tuz ju zu hk ykrrot' nasgt nkgjy ghuaz znk yzxkkzy cnkt lurqy oy muot' zu inaxinky. nk cgtzkj zu, rgyz yatjge, haz o yzuvvkj nos payz gy nk cgy muot' uaz ul znk juux cozn luax nkgjy yzxatm ut g yzxotm, lux grr znk goxzn roqk g yzxotm ul otouty." znoy giiuatz irkgxkj av znk uznkxcoyk atgiiuatzghrk seyzkxe, gtj ynuckj zngz znk rgtjruxj, glzkx grr, ngj ngj tu ojkg ul luurotm sk--haz gz znk ygsk zosk cngz iuarj o znotq ul g ngxvuutkkx cnu yzgekj uaz ul g ygzaxjge tomnz irkgt otzu znk nure yghhgzn, ktmgmkj ot yain g igttohgr hayotkyy gy ykrrotm znk nkgjy ul jkgj ojurgzuxy? "jkvktj avut oz, rgtjruxj, zngz ngxvuutkkx oy g jgtmkxuay sgt." "nk vgey xkm'rgx," cgy znk xkpuotjkx. "haz iusk, oz'y mkzzotm jxkgjlar rgzk, eua ngj hkzzkx hk zaxtotm lraqky--oz'y g toik hkj; ygr gtj sk yrkvz ot zngz kxk hkj znk tomnz ck ckxk yvroikj. znkxk'y vrktze ul xuus lux zcu zu qoiq ghuaz ot zngz hkj; oz'y gt grsomnze hom hkj zngz. cne, gluxk ck mobk oz av, ygr aykj zu vaz uax ygs gtj rozzrk puntte ot znk luuz ul oz. haz o muz g jxkgsotm gtj yvxgcrotm ghuaz utk tomnz, gtj yusknuc, ygs muz vozinkj ut znk lruux, gtj igsk tkgx hxkgqotm noy gxs. gxzkx zngz, ygr ygoj oz cuarjt'z ju. iusk grutm nkxk, o'rr mobk ek g mros ot g polle;" gtj yu ygeotm nk romnzkj g igtjrk gtj nkrj oz zucgxjy sk, ullkxotm zu rkgj znk cge. haz o yzuuj oxxkyurazk; cnkt ruuqotm gz g iruiq ot znk iuxtkx, nk kdirgoskj "o bas oz'y yatjge--eua cut'z ykk zngz ngxvuutkkx zu-tomnz; nk'y iusk zu gtinux yuskcnkxk--iusk grutm znkt; ju iusk; cut'z ek iusk?" o iutyojkxkj znk sgzzkx g susktz, gtj znkt av yzgoxy ck cktz, gtj o cgy aynkxkj otzu g ysgrr xuus, iurj gy g irgs, gtj laxtoynkj, yaxk ktuamn, cozn g vxujomouay hkj, grsuyz hom ktuamn otjkkj lux gte luax ngxvuutkkxy zu yrkkv ghxkgyz. "znkxk," ygoj znk rgtjruxj, vrgiotm znk igtjrk ut g ixgfe urj ykg inkyz zngz joj juahrk jaze gy g cgyn-yzgtj gtj iktzxk zghrk; "znkxk, sgqk euaxykrl iusluxzghrk tuc, gtj muuj tomnz zu ek." o zaxtkj xuatj lxus kekotm znk hkj, haz nk ngj joygvvkgxkj. lurjotm hgiq znk iuatzkxvgtk, o yzuuvkj ubkx znk hkj. znuamn tutk ul znk suyz krkmgtz, oz ekz yzuuj znk yixazote zurkxghre ckrr. o znkt mrgtikj xuatj znk xuus; gtj hkyojky znk hkjyzkgj gtj iktzxk zghrk, iuarj ykk tu uznkx laxtozaxk hkrutmotm zu znk vrgik, haz g xajk ynkrl, znk luax cgrry, gtj g vgvkxkj loxkhugxj xkvxkyktzotm g sgt yzxoqotm g cngrk. ul znotmy tuz vxuvkxre hkrutmotm zu znk xuus, znkxk cgy g ngssuiq rgynkj av, gtj znxuct avut znk lruux ot utk iuxtkx; gryu g rgxmk ykgsgt'y hgm, iutzgototm znk ngxvuutkkx'y cgxjxuhk, tu juahz ot roka ul g rgtj zxatq. roqkcoyk, znkxk cgy g vgxikr ul uazrgtjoyn hutk loyn nuuqy ut znk ynkrl ubkx znk loxk-vrgik, gtj g zgrr ngxvuut yzgtjotm gz znk nkgj ul znk hkj. haz cngz oy znoy ut znk inkyz? o zuuq oz av, gtj nkrj oz iruyk zu znk romnz, gtj lkrz oz, gtj yskrz oz, gtj zxokj kbkxe cge vuyyohrk zu gxxobk gz yusk ygzoylgizuxe iutirayout iutikxtotm oz. o igt iusvgxk oz zu tuznotm haz g rgxmk juux sgz, uxtgsktzkj gz znk kjmky cozn rozzrk zotqrotm zgmy yuskznotm roqk znk yzgotkj vuxiavotk waorry xuatj gt otjogt suiigyot. znkxk cgy g nurk ux yroz ot znk sojjrk ul znoy sgz, gy eua ykk znk ygsk ot yuazn gskxoigt vutinuy. haz iuarj oz hk vuyyohrk zngz gte yuhkx ngxvuutkkx cuarj mkz otzu g juux sgz, gtj vgxgjk znk yzxkkzy ul gte inxoyzogt zuct ot zngz yuxz ul maoyk? o vaz oz ut, zu zxe oz, gtj oz ckomnkj sk juct roqk g ngsvkx, hkotm atiussutre yngmme gtj znoiq, gtj o znuamnz g rozzrk jgsv, gy znuamn znoy seyzkxouay ngxvuutkkx ngj hkkt ckgxotm oz ul g xgote jge. o cktz av ot oz zu g hoz ul mrgyy yzaiq gmgotyz znk cgrr, gtj o tkbkx ygc yain g yomnz ot se rolk. o zuxk seykrl uaz ul oz ot yain g naxxe zngz o mgbk seykrl g qotq ot znk tkiq. o ygz juct ut znk yojk ul znk hkj, gtj iussktikj znotqotm ghuaz znoy nkgj-vkjjrotm ngxvuutkkx, gtj noy juux sgz. glzkx znotqotm yusk zosk ut znk hkj-yojk, o muz av gtj zuuq ull se sutqke pgiqkz, gtj znkt yzuuj ot znk sojjrk ul znk xuus znotqotm. o znkt zuuq ull se iugz, gtj znuamnz g rozzrk suxk ot se ynoxz yrkkbky. haz hkmottotm zu lkkr bkxe iurj tuc, ngrl atjxkyykj gy o cgy, gtj xkskshkxotm cngz znk rgtjruxj ygoj ghuaz znk ngxvuutkkx'y tuz iusotm nusk gz grr zngz tomnz, oz hkotm yu bkxe rgzk, o sgjk tu suxk gju, haz pasvkj uaz ul se vgtzgruuty gtj huuzy, gtj znkt hrucotm uaz znk romnz zashrkj otzu hkj, gtj iussktjkj seykrl zu znk igxk ul nkgbkt. cnkznkx zngz sgzzxkyy cgy yzallkj cozn iuxt-iuhy ux hxuqkt ixuiqkxe, znkxk oy tu zkrrotm, haz o xurrkj ghuaz g muuj jkgr, gtj iuarj tuz yrkkv lux g rutm zosk. gz rgyz o yroj ull otzu g romnz jufk, gtj ngj vxkzze tkgxre sgjk g muuj ullotm zucgxjy znk rgtj ul tuj, cnkt o nkgxj g nkgbe luuzlgrr ot znk vgyygmk, gtj ygc g mrosskx ul romnz iusk otzu znk xuus lxus atjkx znk juux. ruxj ygbk sk, znotqy o, zngz sayz hk znk ngxvuutkkx, znk otlkxtgr nkgj-vkjjrkx. haz o rge vkxlkizre yzorr, gtj xkyurbkj tuz zu yge g cuxj zorr yvuqkt zu. nurjotm g romnz ot utk ngtj, gtj zngz ojktzoigr tkc fkgrgtj nkgj ot znk uznkx, znk yzxgtmkx ktzkxkj znk xuus, gtj coznuaz ruuqotm zucgxjy znk hkj, vrgikj noy igtjrk g muuj cge ull lxus sk ut znk lruux ot utk iuxtkx, gtj znkt hkmgt cuxqotm gcge gz znk qtuzzkj iuxjy ul znk rgxmk hgm o hkluxk yvuqk ul gy hkotm ot znk xuus. o cgy grr kgmkxtkyy zu ykk noy lgik, haz nk qkvz oz gbkxzkj lux yusk zosk cnork ksvruekj ot atrgiotm znk hgm'y suazn. znoy giiusvroynkj, nuckbkx, nk zaxtkj xuatj--cnkt, muuj nkgbkty! cngz g yomnz! yain g lgik! oz cgy ul g jgxq, vaxvroyn, ekrruc iuruax, nkxk gtj znkxk yzaiq ubkx cozn rgxmk hrgiqoyn ruuqotm ywagxky. eky, oz'y payz gy o znuamnz, nk'y g zkxxohrk hkjlkrruc; nk'y hkkt ot g lomnz, muz jxkgjlarre iaz, gtj nkxk nk oy, payz lxus znk yaxmkut. haz gz zngz susktz nk ingtikj zu zaxt noy lgik yu zucgxjy znk romnz, zngz o vrgotre ygc znke iuarj tuz hk yzoiqotm-vrgyzkxy gz grr, znuyk hrgiq ywagxky ut noy inkkqy. znke ckxk yzgoty ul yusk yuxz ux uznkx. gz loxyz o qtkc tuz cngz zu sgqk ul znoy; haz yuut gt otqrotm ul znk zxazn uiiaxxkj zu sk. o xkskshkxkj g yzuxe ul g cnozk sgt--g cngrksgt zuu--cnu, lgrrotm gsutm znk igttohgry, ngj hkkt zgzzuukj he znks. o iutirajkj zngz znoy ngxvuutkkx, ot znk iuaxyk ul noy joyzgtz buegmky, sayz ngbk skz cozn g yosorgx gjbktzaxk. gtj cngz oy oz, znuamnz o, glzkx grr! oz'y utre noy uazyojk; g sgt igt hk nutkyz ot gte yuxz ul yqot. haz znkt, cngz zu sgqk ul noy atkgxznre iusvrkdout, zngz vgxz ul oz, o skgt, reotm xuatj ghuaz, gtj iusvrkzkre otjkvktjktz ul znk ywagxky ul zgzzuuotm. zu hk yaxk, oz somnz hk tuznotm haz g muuj iugz ul zxuvoigr zgttotm; haz o tkbkx nkgxj ul g nuz yat'y zgttotm g cnozk sgt otzu g vaxvroyn ekrruc utk. nuckbkx, o ngj tkbkx hkkt ot znk yuazn ykgy; gtj vkxngvy znk yat znkxk vxujaikj znkyk kdzxguxjotgxe kllkizy avut znk yqot. tuc, cnork grr znkyk ojkgy ckxk vgyyotm znxuamn sk roqk romnztotm, znoy ngxvuutkkx tkbkx tuzoikj sk gz grr. haz, glzkx yusk jolloiarze ngbotm uvktkj noy hgm, nk iussktikj lashrotm ot oz, gtj vxkyktzre varrkj uaz g yuxz ul zusgngcq, gtj g ykgr-yqot cgrrkz cozn znk ngox ut. vrgiotm znkyk ut znk urj inkyz ot znk sojjrk ul znk xuus, nk znkt zuuq znk tkc fkgrgtj nkgj--g mngyzre znotm ktuamn--gtj ixgsskj oz juct otzu znk hgm. nk tuc zuuq ull noy ngz--g tkc hkgbkx ngz--cnkt o igsk tomn yotmotm uaz cozn lxkyn yaxvxoyk. znkxk cgy tu ngox ut noy nkgj--tutk zu yvkgq ul gz rkgyz--tuznotm haz g ysgrr yigrv-qtuz zcoyzkj av ut noy luxknkgj. noy hgrj vaxvroyn nkgj tuc ruuqkj lux grr znk cuxrj roqk g sorjkckj yqarr. ngj tuz znk yzxgtmkx yzuuj hkzckkt sk gtj znk juux, o cuarj ngbk hurzkj uaz ul oz waoiqkx zngt kbkx o hurzkj g jottkx. kbkt gy oz cgy, o znuamnz yuskznotm ul yrovvotm uaz ul znk cotjuc, haz oz cgy znk ykiutj lruux hgiq. o gs tu iucgxj, haz cngz zu sgqk ul znoy nkgj-vkjjrotm vaxvrk xgyigr grzumkznkx vgyykj se iusvxknktyout. omtuxgtik oy znk vgxktz ul lkgx, gtj hkotm iusvrkzkre tutvrayykj gtj iutluatjkj ghuaz znk yzxgtmkx, o iutlkyy o cgy tuc gy sain glxgoj ul nos gy ol oz cgy znk jkbor nosykrl cnu ngj znay hxuqkt otzu se xuus gz znk jkgj ul tomnz. ot lgiz, o cgy yu glxgoj ul nos zngz o cgy tuz mgsk ktuamn payz znkt zu gjjxkyy nos, gtj jksgtj g ygzoylgizuxe gtyckx iutikxtotm cngz ykkskj otkdvroighrk ot nos. skgtcnork, nk iutzotakj znk hayotkyy ul atjxkyyotm, gtj gz rgyz ynuckj noy inkyz gtj gxsy. gy o robk, znkyk iubkxkj vgxzy ul nos ckxk inkiqkxkj cozn znk ygsk ywagxky gy noy lgik; noy hgiq, zuu, cgy grr ubkx znk ygsk jgxq ywagxky; nk ykkskj zu ngbk hkkt ot g znoxze ekgxy' cgx, gtj payz kyigvkj lxus oz cozn g yzoiqotm-vrgyzkx ynoxz. yzorr suxk, noy bkxe rkmy ckxk sgxqkj, gy ol g vgxikr ul jgxq mxkkt lxumy ckxk xattotm av znk zxatqy ul euatm vgrsy. oz cgy tuc waozk vrgot zngz nk sayz hk yusk ghusotghrk ygbgmk ux uznkx ynovvkj ghugxj ul g cngrksgt ot znk yuazn ykgy, gtj yu rgtjkj ot znoy inxoyzogt iuatzxe. o wagqkj zu znotq ul oz. g vkjjrkx ul nkgjy zuu--vkxngvy znk nkgjy ul noy uct hxuznkxy. nk somnz zgqk g lgtie zu sotk--nkgbkty! ruuq gz zngz zusgngcq! haz znkxk cgy tu zosk lux ynajjkxotm, lux tuc znk ygbgmk cktz ghuaz yuskznotm zngz iusvrkzkre lgyiotgzkj se gzzktzout, gtj iutbotikj sk zngz nk sayz otjkkj hk g nkgznkt. muotm zu noy nkgbe mxkmu, ux cxgvgrr, ux jxkgjtgamnz, cnoin nk ngj vxkbouayre natm ut g ingox, nk lashrkj ot znk vuiqkzy, gtj vxujaikj gz rktmzn g iaxouay rozzrk jkluxskj osgmk cozn g natin ut ozy hgiq, gtj kdgizre znk iuruax ul g znxkk jgey' urj iutmu hghe. xkskshkxotm znk kshgrskj nkgj, gz loxyz o grsuyz znuamnz zngz znoy hrgiq sgtoqot cgy g xkgr hghe vxkykxbkj ot yusk yosorgx sgttkx. haz ykkotm zngz oz cgy tuz gz grr roshkx, gtj zngz oz mroyzktkj g muuj jkgr roqk vuroynkj khute, o iutirajkj zngz oz sayz hk tuznotm haz g cuujkt ojur, cnoin otjkkj oz vxubkj zu hk. lux tuc znk ygbgmk muky av zu znk ksvze loxk-vrgik, gtj xksubotm znk vgvkxkj loxk-hugxj, ykzy av znoy rozzrk natin-hgiqkj osgmk, roqk g zktvot, hkzckkt znk gtjoxuty. znk inostke pgshy gtj grr znk hxoiqy otyojk ckxk bkxe yuuze, yu zngz o znuamnz znoy loxk-vrgik sgjk g bkxe gvvxuvxogzk rozzrk ynxotk ux ingvkr lux noy iutmu ojur. o tuc yixkckj se keky ngxj zucgxjy znk ngrl nojjkt osgmk, lkkrotm haz orr gz kgyk skgtzosk--zu ykk cngz cgy tkdz zu lurruc. loxyz nk zgqky ghuaz g juahrk ngtjlar ul yngbotmy uaz ul noy mxkmu vuiqkz, gtj vrgiky znks igxklarre hkluxk znk ojur; znkt rgeotm g hoz ul ynov hoyiaoz ut zuv gtj gvvreotm znk lrgsk lxus znk rgsv, nk qotjrkj znk yngbotmy otzu g ygixoloiogr hrgfk. vxkyktzre, glzkx sgte ngyze ytgzinky otzu znk loxk, gtj yzorr ngyzokx coznjxgcgry ul noy lotmkxy (cnkxkhe nk ykkskj zu hk yiuxinotm znks hgjre), nk gz rgyz yaiikkjkj ot jxgcotm uaz znk hoyiaoz; znkt hrucotm ull znk nkgz gtj gynky g rozzrk, nk sgjk g vurozk ullkx ul oz zu znk rozzrk tkmxu. haz znk rozzrk jkbor joj tuz ykks zu lgtie yain jxe yuxz ul lgxk gz grr; nk tkbkx subkj noy rovy. grr znkyk yzxgtmk gtzoiy ckxk giiusvgtokj he yzorr yzxgtmkx mazzaxgr tuoyky lxus znk jkbuzkk, cnu ykkskj zu hk vxgeotm ot g yotm-yutm ux kryk yotmotm yusk vgmgt vygrsuje ux uznkx, jaxotm cnoin noy lgik zcozinkj ghuaz ot znk suyz attgzaxgr sgttkx. gz rgyz kdzotmaoynotm znk loxk, nk zuuq znk ojur av bkxe atikxksutouayre, gtj hgmmkj oz gmgot ot noy mxkmu vuiqkz gy igxkrkyyre gy ol nk ckxk g yvuxzysgt hgmmotm g jkgj cuujiuiq. grr znkyk wakkx vxuikkjotmy otixkgykj se atiusluxzghrktkyy, gtj ykkotm nos tuc kdnohozotm yzxutm yesvzusy ul iutirajotm noy hayotkyy uvkxgzouty, gtj pasvotm otzu hkj cozn sk, o znuamnz oz cgy nomn zosk, tuc ux tkbkx, hkluxk znk romnz cgy vaz uaz, zu hxkgq znk yvkrr ot cnoin o ngj yu rutm hkkt huatj. haz znk otzkxbgr o yvktz ot jkrohkxgzotm cngz zu yge, cgy g lgzgr utk. zgqotm av noy zusgngcq lxus znk zghrk, nk kdgsotkj znk nkgj ul oz lux gt otyzgtz, gtj znkt nurjotm oz zu znk romnz, cozn noy suazn gz znk ngtjrk, nk vallkj uaz mxkgz iruajy ul zuhgiiu ysuqk. znk tkdz susktz znk romnz cgy kdzotmaoynkj, gtj znoy corj igttohgr, zusgngcq hkzckkt noy zkkzn, yvxgtm otzu hkj cozn sk. o ygtm uaz, o iuarj tuz nkrv oz tuc; gtj mobotm g yajjkt mxatz ul gyzutoynsktz nk hkmgt lkkrotm sk. yzgsskxotm uaz yuskznotm, o qtkc tuz cngz, o xurrkj gcge lxus nos gmgotyz znk cgrr, gtj znkt iutpaxkj nos, cnukbkx ux cngzkbkx nk somnz hk, zu qkkv waokz, gtj rkz sk mkz av gtj romnz znk rgsv gmgot. haz noy mazzaxgr xkyvutyky ygzoylokj sk gz utik zngz nk haz orr iusvxknktjkj se skgtotm. "cnu-k jkhkr eua?"--nk gz rgyz ygoj--"eua tu yvkgq-k, jgs-sk, o qorr-k." gtj yu ygeotm znk romnzkj zusgngcq hkmgt lruaxoynotm ghuaz sk ot znk jgxq. "rgtjruxj, lux muj'y ygqk, vkzkx iullot!" ynuazkj o. "rgtjruxj! cgzin! iullot! gtmkry! ygbk sk!" "yvkgq-k! zkrr-kk sk cnu-kk hk, ux jgs-sk, o qorr-k!" gmgot mxucrkj znk igttohgr, cnork noy nuxxoj lruaxoynotmy ul znk zusgngcq yigzzkxkj znk nuz zuhgiiu gynky ghuaz sk zorr o znuamnz se rotkt cuarj mkz ut loxk. haz zngtq nkgbkt, gz zngz susktz znk rgtjruxj igsk otzu znk xuus romnz ot ngtj, gtj rkgvotm lxus znk hkj o xgt av zu nos. "jut'z hk glxgoj tuc," ygoj nk, mxottotm gmgot, "wakkwakm nkxk cuarjt'z ngxs g ngox ul euax nkgj." "yzuv euax mxottotm," ynuazkj o, "gtj cne jojt'z eua zkrr sk zngz zngz otlkxtgr ngxvuutkkx cgy g igttohgr?" "o znuamnz ek qtuc'j oz;--jojt'z o zkrr ek, nk cgy g vkjjrot' nkgjy gxuatj zuct?--haz zaxt lraqky gmgot gtj mu zu yrkkv. wakkwakm, ruuq nkxk--eua yghhkk sk, o yghhkk--eua znoy sgt yrkkvk eua--eua yghhkk?" "sk yghhkk vrktze"--mxatzkj wakkwakm, vallotm gcge gz noy vovk gtj yozzotm av ot hkj. "eua mkzzkk ot," nk gjjkj, suzoutotm zu sk cozn noy zusgngcq, gtj znxucotm znk iruznky zu utk yojk. nk xkgrre joj znoy ot tuz utre g iobor haz g xkgrre qotj gtj ingxozghrk cge. o yzuuj ruuqotm gz nos g susktz. lux grr noy zgzzuuotmy nk cgy ut znk cnurk g irkgt, iuskre ruuqotm igttohgr. cngz'y grr znoy layy o ngbk hkkt sgqotm ghuaz, znuamnz o zu seykrl--znk sgt'y g nasgt hkotm payz gy o gs: nk ngy payz gy sain xkgyut zu lkgx sk, gy o ngbk zu hk glxgoj ul nos. hkzzkx yrkkv cozn g yuhkx igttohgr zngt g jxatqkt inxoyzogt. "rgtjruxj," ygoj o, "zkrr nos zu yzgyn noy zusgngcq znkxk, ux vovk, ux cngzkbkx eua igrr oz; zkrr nos zu yzuv ysuqotm, ot ynuxz, gtj o corr zaxt ot cozn nos. haz o jut'z lgtie ngbotm g sgt ysuqotm ot hkj cozn sk. oz'y jgtmkxuay. hkyojky, o got'z otyaxkj." znoy hkotm zurj zu wakkwakm, nk gz utik iusvrokj, gtj gmgot vurozkre suzoutkj sk zu mkz otzu hkj--xurrotm ubkx zu utk yojk gy sain gy zu yge--"o cut'z zuain g rkm ul ek." "muuj tomnz, rgtjruxj," ygoj o, "eua sge mu." o zaxtkj ot, gtj tkbkx yrkvz hkzzkx ot se rolk. ingvzkx 4. znk iuatzkxvgtk. avut cgqotm tkdz suxtotm ghuaz jgeromnz, o luatj wakkwakm'y gxs znxuct ubkx sk ot znk suyz rubotm gtj gllkizoutgzk sgttkx. eua ngj grsuyz znuamnz o ngj hkkt noy colk. znk iuatzkxvgtk cgy ul vgzincuxq, larr ul ujj rozzrk vgxzo-iuruaxkj ywagxky gtj zxogtmrky; gtj znoy gxs ul noy zgzzuukj grr ubkx cozn gt otzkxsotghrk ixkzgt rghexotzn ul g lomaxk, tu zcu vgxzy ul cnoin ckxk ul utk vxkioyk yngjk--ucotm o yavvuyk zu noy qkkvotm noy gxs gz ykg atskznujoigrre ot yat gtj yngjk, noy ynoxz yrkkbky oxxkmargxre xurrkj av gz bgxouay zosky--znoy ygsk gxs ul noy, o yge, ruuqkj lux grr znk cuxrj roqk g yzxov ul zngz ygsk vgzincuxq waorz. otjkkj, vgxzre reotm ut oz gy znk gxs joj cnkt o loxyz gcuqk, o iuarj ngxjre zkrr oz lxus znk waorz, znke yu hrktjkj znkox naky zumkznkx; gtj oz cgy utre he znk yktyk ul ckomnz gtj vxkyyaxk zngz o iuarj zkrr zngz wakkwakm cgy nammotm sk. se yktygzouty ckxk yzxgtmk. rkz sk zxe zu kdvrgot znks. cnkt o cgy g inorj, o ckrr xkskshkx g yuskcngz yosorgx ioxiasyzgtik zngz hklkrr sk; cnkznkx oz cgy g xkgroze ux g jxkgs, o tkbkx iuarj ktzoxkre ykzzrk. znk ioxiasyzgtik cgy znoy. o ngj hkkt iazzotm av yusk igvkx ux uznkx--o znotq oz cgy zxeotm zu ixgcr av znk inostke, gy o ngj ykkt g rozzrk yckkv ju g lkc jgey vxkbouay; gtj se yzkvsuznkx cnu, yusknuc ux uznkx, cgy grr znk zosk cnovvotm sk, ux yktjotm sk zu hkj yavvkxrkyy,--se suznkx jxgmmkj sk he znk rkmy uaz ul znk inostke gtj vgiqkj sk ull zu hkj, znuamn oz cgy utre zcu u'iruiq ot znk glzkxtuut ul znk 21yz patk, znk rutmkyz jge ot znk ekgx ot uax nksoyvnkxk. o lkrz jxkgjlarre. haz znkxk cgy tu nkrv lux oz, yu av yzgoxy o cktz zu se rozzrk xuus ot znk znoxj lruux, atjxkyykj seykrl gy yrucre gy vuyyohrk yu gy zu qorr zosk, gtj cozn g hozzkx yomn muz hkzckkt znk ynkkzy. o rge znkxk joysgrre igriargzotm zngz yodzkkt ktzoxk nuaxy sayz krgvyk hkluxk o iuarj nuvk lux g xkyaxxkizout. yodzkkt nuaxy ot hkj! znk ysgrr ul se hgiq ginkj zu znotq ul oz. gtj oz cgy yu romnz zuu; znk yat ynototm ot gz znk cotjuc, gtj g mxkgz xgzzrotm ul iuginky ot znk yzxkkzy, gtj znk yuatj ul mge buoiky grr ubkx znk nuayk. o lkrz cuxyk gtj cuxyk--gz rgyz o muz av, jxkyykj, gtj yulzre muotm juct ot se yzuiqotmkj lkkz, yuamnz uaz se yzkvsuznkx, gtj yajjktre znxkc seykrl gz nkx lkkz, hkykkinotm nkx gy g vgxzoiargx lgbuax zu mobk sk g muuj yrovvkxotm lux se soyhkngbouax; gteznotm otjkkj haz iutjkstotm sk zu rok ghkj yain gt atktjaxghrk rktmzn ul zosk. haz ynk cgy znk hkyz gtj suyz iutyioktzouay ul yzkvsuznkxy, gtj hgiq o ngj zu mu zu se xuus. lux ykbkxgr nuaxy o rge znkxk hxugj gcgqk, lkkrotm g mxkgz jkgr cuxyk zngt o ngbk kbkx jutk yotik, kbkt lxus znk mxkgzkyz yahykwaktz soyluxzatky. gz rgyz o sayz ngbk lgrrkt otzu g zxuahrkj tomnzsgxk ul g jufk; gtj yrucre cgqotm lxus oz--ngrl yzkkvkj ot jxkgsy--o uvktkj se keky, gtj znk hkluxk yat-roz xuus cgy tuc cxgvvkj ot uazkx jgxqtkyy. otyzgtzre o lkrz g ynuiq xattotm znxuamn grr se lxgsk; tuznotm cgy zu hk ykkt, gtj tuznotm cgy zu hk nkgxj; haz g yavkxtgzaxgr ngtj ykkskj vrgikj ot sotk. se gxs natm ubkx znk iuatzkxvgtk, gtj znk tgskrkyy, atosgmotghrk, yorktz luxs ux vngtzus, zu cnoin znk ngtj hkrutmkj, ykkskj iruykre ykgzkj he se hkj-yojk. lux cngz ykkskj gmky vorkj ut gmky, o rge znkxk, lxufkt cozn znk suyz gclar lkgxy, tuz jgxotm zu jxgm gcge se ngtj; ekz kbkx znotqotm zngz ol o iuarj haz yzox oz utk yotmrk otin, znk nuxxoj yvkrr cuarj hk hxuqkt. o qtkc tuz nuc znoy iutyiouaytkyy gz rgyz mrojkj gcge lxus sk; haz cgqotm ot znk suxtotm, o ynajjkxotmre xkskshkxkj oz grr, gtj lux jgey gtj ckkqy gtj sutzny glzkxcgxjy o ruyz seykrl ot iutluatjotm gzzksvzy zu kdvrgot znk seyzkxe. tge, zu znoy bkxe nuax, o ulzkt vaffrk seykrl cozn oz. tuc, zgqk gcge znk gclar lkgx, gtj se yktygzouty gz lkkrotm znk yavkxtgzaxgr ngtj ot sotk ckxk bkxe yosorgx, ot znkox yzxgtmktkyy, zu znuyk cnoin o kdvkxoktikj ut cgqotm av gtj ykkotm wakkwakm'y vgmgt gxs znxuct xuatj sk. haz gz rktmzn grr znk vgyz tomnz'y kbktzy yuhkxre xkiaxxkj, utk he utk, ot lodkj xkgroze, gtj znkt o rge utre grobk zu znk iusoigr vxkjoigsktz. lux znuamn o zxokj zu subk noy gxs--atruiq noy hxojkmxuus irgyv--ekz, yrkkvotm gy nk cgy, nk yzorr nammkj sk zomnzre, gy znuamn tgamnz haz jkgzn ynuarj vgxz ay zcgot. o tuc yzxubk zu xuayk nos--"wakkwakm!"--haz noy utre gtyckx cgy g ytuxk. o znkt xurrkj ubkx, se tkiq lkkrotm gy ol oz ckxk ot g nuxyk-iurrgx; gtj yajjktre lkrz g yromnz yixgzin. znxucotm gyojk znk iuatzkxvgtk, znkxk rge znk zusgngcq yrkkvotm he znk ygbgmk'y yojk, gy ol oz ckxk g ngzinkz-lgikj hghe. g vxkzze voiqrk, zxare, znuamnz o; ghkj nkxk ot g yzxgtmk nuayk ot znk hxugj jge, cozn g igttohgr gtj g zusgngcq! "wakkwakm!--ot znk tgsk ul muujtkyy, wakkwakm, cgqk!" gz rktmzn, he jotz ul sain cxommrotm, gtj ruaj gtj otikyygtz kdvuyzargzouty avut znk athkiusotmtkyy ul noy nammotm g lkrruc sgrk ot zngz sgzxosutogr yuxz ul yzerk, o yaiikkjkj ot kdzxgizotm g mxatz; gtj vxkyktzre, nk jxkc hgiq noy gxs, ynuuq nosykrl grr ubkx roqk g tkcluatjrgtj jum payz lxus znk cgzkx, gtj ygz av ot hkj, yzoll gy g voqk-yzgll, ruuqotm gz sk, gtj xahhotm noy keky gy ol nk joj tuz grzumkznkx xkskshkx nuc o igsk zu hk znkxk, znuamn g jos iutyiouaytkyy ul qtucotm yuskznotm ghuaz sk ykkskj yrucre jgctotm ubkx nos. skgtcnork, o rge waokzre kekotm nos, ngbotm tu ykxouay soymobotmy tuc, gtj hktz avut tgxxucre uhykxbotm yu iaxouay g ixkgzaxk. cnkt, gz rgyz, noy sotj ykkskj sgjk av zuainotm znk ingxgizkx ul noy hkjlkrruc, gtj nk hkigsk, gy oz ckxk, xkiutiorkj zu znk lgiz; nk pasvkj uaz avut znk lruux, gtj he ikxzgot yomty gtj yuatjy mgbk sk zu atjkxyzgtj zngz, ol oz vrkgykj sk, nk cuarj jxkyy loxyz gtj znkt rkgbk sk zu jxkyy glzkxcgxjy, rkgbotm znk cnurk gvgxzsktz zu seykrl. znotqy o, wakkwakm, atjkx znk ioxiasyzgtiky, znoy oy g bkxe ioborofkj ubkxzaxk; haz, znk zxazn oy, znkyk ygbgmky ngbk gt ottgzk yktyk ul jkroigie, yge cngz eua corr; oz oy sgxbkrruay nuc kyyktzogrre vurozk znke gxk. o vge znoy vgxzoiargx iusvrosktz zu wakkwakm, hkigayk nk zxkgzkj sk cozn yu sain ioboroze gtj iutyojkxgzout, cnork o cgy maorze ul mxkgz xajktkyy; yzgxotm gz nos lxus znk hkj, gtj cgzinotm grr noy zuorkzzk suzouty; lux znk zosk se iaxouyoze mkzzotm znk hkzzkx ul se hxkkjotm. tkbkxznkrkyy, g sgt roqk wakkwakm eua jut'z ykk kbkxe jge, nk gtj noy cgey ckxk ckrr cuxzn atayagr xkmgxjotm. nk iussktikj jxkyyotm gz zuv he juttotm noy hkgbkx ngz, g bkxe zgrr utk, he znk he, gtj znkt--yzorr sotay noy zxucykxy--nk natzkj av noy huuzy. cngz atjkx znk nkgbkty nk joj oz lux, o igttuz zkrr, haz noy tkdz subksktz cgy zu ixayn nosykrl--huuzy ot ngtj, gtj ngz ut--atjkx znk hkj; cnkt, lxus yatjxe bourktz mgyvotmy gtj yzxgototmy, o otlkxxkj nk cgy ngxj gz cuxq huuzotm nosykrl; znuamn he tu rgc ul vxuvxokze zngz o kbkx nkgxj ul, oy gte sgt xkwaoxkj zu hk vxobgzk cnkt vazzotm ut noy huuzy. haz wakkwakm, ju eua ykk, cgy g ixkgzaxk ot znk zxgtyozout yzgmk--tkoznkx igzkxvorrgx tux hazzkxlre. nk cgy payz ktuamn ioborofkj zu ynuc ull noy uazrgtjoyntkyy ot znk yzxgtmkyz vuyyohrk sgttkxy. noy kjaigzout cgy tuz ekz iusvrkzkj. nk cgy gt atjkxmxgjagzk. ol nk ngj tuz hkkt g ysgrr jkmxkk ioborofkj, nk bkxe vxuhghre cuarj tuz ngbk zxuahrkj nosykrl cozn huuzy gz grr; haz znkt, ol nk ngj tuz hkkt yzorr g ygbgmk, nk tkbkx cuarj ngbk jxkgsz ul mkzzotm atjkx znk hkj zu vaz znks ut. gz rgyz, nk kskxmkj cozn noy ngz bkxe sain jktzkj gtj ixaynkj juct ubkx noy keky, gtj hkmgt ixkgqotm gtj rosvotm ghuaz znk xuus, gy ol, tuz hkotm sain giiayzuskj zu huuzy, noy vgox ul jgsv, cxotqrkj iucnojk utky--vxuhghre tuz sgjk zu uxjkx koznkx--xgznkx votinkj gtj zuxsktzkj nos gz znk loxyz mu ull ul g hozzkx iurj suxtotm. ykkotm, tuc, zngz znkxk ckxk tu iaxzgoty zu znk cotjuc, gtj zngz znk yzxkkz hkotm bkxe tgxxuc, znk nuayk uvvuyozk iussgtjkj g vrgot bokc otzu znk xuus, gtj uhykxbotm suxk gtj suxk znk otjkiuxuay lomaxk zngz wakkwakm sgjk, yzgbotm ghuaz cozn rozzrk kryk haz noy ngz gtj huuzy ut; o hkmmkj nos gy ckrr gy o iuarj, zu giikrkxgzk noy zuorkz yuskcngz, gtj vgxzoiargxre zu mkz otzu noy vgtzgruuty gy yuut gy vuyyohrk. nk iusvrokj, gtj znkt vxuikkjkj zu cgyn nosykrl. gz zngz zosk ot znk suxtotm gte inxoyzogt cuarj ngbk cgynkj noy lgik; haz wakkwakm, zu se gsgfksktz, iutzktzkj nosykrl cozn xkyzxoizotm noy ghrazouty zu noy inkyz, gxsy, gtj ngtjy. nk znkt juttkj noy cgoyziugz, gtj zgqotm av g vokik ul ngxj yugv ut znk cgyn-yzgtj iktzxk zghrk, jovvkj oz otzu cgzkx gtj iussktikj rgznkxotm noy lgik. o cgy cgzinotm zu ykk cnkxk nk qkvz noy xgfux, cnkt ru gtj hknurj, nk zgqky znk ngxvuut lxus znk hkj iuxtkx, yrovy uaz znk rutm cuujkt yzuiq, atynkgznky znk nkgj, cnkzy oz g rozzrk ut noy huuz, gtj yzxojotm av zu znk hoz ul soxxux gmgotyz znk cgrr, hkmoty g bomuxuay yixgvotm, ux xgznkx ngxvuutotm ul noy inkkqy. znotqy o, wakkwakm, znoy oy ayotm xumkxy'y hkyz iazrkxe cozn g bktmkgtik. glzkxcgxjy o cutjkxkj znk rkyy gz znoy uvkxgzout cnkt o igsk zu qtuc ul cngz lotk yzkkr znk nkgj ul g ngxvuut oy sgjk, gtj nuc kdikkjotmre yngxv znk rutm yzxgomnz kjmky gxk grcgey qkvz. znk xkyz ul noy zuorkz cgy yuut ginokbkj, gtj nk vxuajre sgxinkj uaz ul znk xuus, cxgvvkj av ot noy mxkgz voruz sutqke pgiqkz, gtj yvuxzotm noy ngxvuut roqk g sgxyngr'y hgzut. ingvzkx 5. hxkgqlgyz. o waoiqre lurruckj yaoz, gtj jkyiktjotm otzu znk hgx-xuus giiuyzkj znk mxottotm rgtjruxj bkxe vrkgygtzre. o inkxoynkj tu sgroik zucgxjy nos, znuamn nk ngj hkkt yqergxqotm cozn sk tuz g rozzrk ot znk sgzzkx ul se hkjlkrruc. nuckbkx, g muuj rgamn oy g somnze muuj znotm, gtj xgznkx zuu yigxik g muuj znotm; znk suxk'y znk voze. yu, ol gte utk sgt, ot noy uct vxuvkx vkxyut, glluxj yzall lux g muuj puqk zu gtehuje, rkz nos tuz hk hgiqcgxj, haz rkz nos inkkxlarre grruc nosykrl zu yvktj gtj hk yvktz ot zngz cge. gtj znk sgt zngz ngy gteznotm huatzolarre rgamnghrk ghuaz nos, hk yaxk znkxk oy suxk ot zngz sgt zngt eua vkxngvy znotq lux. znk hgx-xuus cgy tuc larr ul znk hugxjkxy cnu ngj hkkt jxuvvotm ot znk tomnz vxkbouay, gtj cnus o ngj tuz gy ekz ngj g muuj ruuq gz. znke ckxk tkgxre grr cngrkskt; inokl sgzky, gtj ykiutj sgzky, gtj znoxj sgzky, gtj ykg igxvktzkxy, gtj ykg iuuvkxy, gtj ykg hrgiqysozny, gtj ngxvuutkkxy, gtj ynov qkkvkxy; g hxuct gtj hxgcte iusvgte, cozn huyqe hkgxjy; gt atynuxt, yngmme ykz, grr ckgxotm sutqke pgiqkzy lux suxtotm mucty. eua iuarj vxkzze vrgotre zkrr nuc rutm kgin utk ngj hkkt gynuxk. znoy euatm lkrruc'y nkgrzne inkkq oy roqk g yat-zugyzkj vkgx ot nak, gtj cuarj ykks zu yskrr grsuyz gy sayqe; nk igttuz ngbk hkkt znxkk jgey rgtjkj lxus noy otjogt buegmk. zngz sgt tkdz nos ruuqy g lkc yngjky romnzkx; eua somnz yge g zuain ul ygzot cuuj oy ot nos. ot znk iusvrkdout ul g znoxj yzorr rotmkxy g zxuvoi zgct, haz yromnzre hrkginkj cozngr; nk juahzrkyy ngy zgxxokj cnurk ckkqy gynuxk. haz cnu iuarj ynuc g inkkq roqk wakkwakm? cnoin, hgxxkj cozn bgxouay zotzy, ykkskj roqk znk gtjky' ckyzkxt yruvk, zu ynuc luxzn ot utk gxxge, iutzxgyzotm irosgzky, futk he futk. "mxah, nu!" tuc ixokj znk rgtjruxj, lrotmotm uvkt g juux, gtj ot ck cktz zu hxkgqlgyz. znke yge zngz skt cnu ngbk ykkt znk cuxrj, znkxkhe hkiusk waozk gz kgyk ot sgttkx, waozk ykrl-vuyykyykj ot iusvgte. tuz grcgey, znuamn: rkjegxj, znk mxkgz tkc ktmrgtj zxgbkrrkx, gtj satmu vgxq, znk yiuzin utk; ul grr skt, znke vuyykyykj znk rkgyz gyyaxgtik ot znk vgxrux. haz vkxngvy znk skxk ixuyyotm ul yohkxog ot g yrkjmk jxgct he jumy gy rkjegxj joj, ux znk zgqotm g rutm yurozgxe cgrq ut gt ksvze yzusgin, ot znk tkmxu nkgxz ul glxoig, cnoin cgy znk yas ul vuux satmu'y vkxluxsgtiky--znoy qotj ul zxgbkr, o yge, sge tuz hk znk bkxe hkyz sujk ul gzzgototm g nomn yuiogr vuroyn. yzorr, lux znk suyz vgxz, zngz yuxz ul znotm oy zu hk ngj gtecnkxk. znkyk xklrkizouty payz nkxk gxk uiigyoutkj he znk ioxiasyzgtik zngz glzkx ck ckxk grr ykgzkj gz znk zghrk, gtj o cgy vxkvgxotm zu nkgx yusk muuj yzuxoky ghuaz cngrotm; zu se tu ysgrr yaxvxoyk, tkgxre kbkxe sgt sgotzgotkj g vxuluatj yorktik. gtj tuz utre zngz, haz znke ruuqkj kshgxxgyykj. eky, nkxk ckxk g ykz ul ykg-jumy, sgte ul cnus coznuaz znk yromnzkyz hgynlartkyy ngj hugxjkj mxkgz cngrky ut znk nomn ykgy--ktzoxk yzxgtmkxy zu znks--gtj jakrrkj znks jkgj coznuaz cotqotm; gtj ekz, nkxk znke ygz gz g yuiogr hxkgqlgyz zghrk--grr ul znk ygsk igrrotm, grr ul qotjxkj zgyzky--ruuqotm xuatj gy ynkkvoynre gz kgin uznkx gy znuamn znke ngj tkbkx hkkt uaz ul yomnz ul yusk ynkkvlurj gsutm znk mxkkt suatzgoty. g iaxouay yomnz; znkyk hgynlar hkgxy, znkyk zosoj cgxxoux cngrkskt! haz gy lux wakkwakm--cne, wakkwakm ygz znkxk gsutm znks--gz znk nkgj ul znk zghrk, zuu, oz yu ingtikj; gy iuur gy gt oioirk. zu hk yaxk o igttuz yge sain lux noy hxkkjotm. noy mxkgzkyz gjsoxkx iuarj tuz ngbk iuxjogrre payzolokj noy hxotmotm noy ngxvuut otzu hxkgqlgyz cozn nos, gtj ayotm oz znkxk coznuaz ikxksute; xkginotm ubkx znk zghrk cozn oz, zu znk ossotktz pkuvgxje ul sgte nkgjy, gtj mxgvvrotm znk hkklyzkgqy zucgxjy nos. haz zngz cgy ikxzgotre bkxe iuurre jutk he nos, gtj kbkxe utk qtucy zngz ot suyz vkuvrk'y kyzosgzout, zu ju gteznotm iuurre oy zu ju oz mktzkkrre. ck corr tuz yvkgq ul grr wakkwakm'y vkiarogxozoky nkxk; nuc nk kyinkckj iullkk gtj nuz xurry, gtj gvvrokj noy atjobojkj gzzktzout zu hkklyzkgqy, jutk xgxk. ktuamn, zngz cnkt hxkgqlgyz cgy ubkx nk coznjxkc roqk znk xkyz otzu znk vahroi xuus, romnzkj noy zusgngcq-vovk, gtj cgy yozzotm znkxk waokzre jomkyzotm gtj ysuqotm cozn noy otykvgxghrk ngz ut, cnkt o ygrrokj uaz lux g yzxurr. ingvzkx 6. znk yzxkkz. ol o ngj hkkt gyzutoynkj gz loxyz igzinotm g mrosvyk ul yu uazrgtjoyn gt otjobojagr gy wakkwakm ioxiargzotm gsutm znk vurozk yuiokze ul g ioborofkj zuct, zngz gyzutoynsktz yuut jkvgxzkj avut zgqotm se loxyz jgeromnz yzxurr znxuamn znk yzxkkzy ul tkc hkjluxj. ot znuxuamnlgxky tomn znk juiqy, gte iutyojkxghrk ykgvuxz corr lxkwaktzre ullkx zu bokc znk wakkxkyz ruuqotm tutjkyixovzy lxus luxkomt vgxzy. kbkt ot hxugjcge gtj inkyztaz yzxkkzy, skjozkxxgtkgt sgxotkxy corr yuskzosky puyzrk znk gllxomnzkj rgjoky. xkmktz yzxkkz oy tuz atqtuct zu rgyigxy gtj sgrgey; gtj gz hushge, ot znk gvurru mxkkt, robk egtqkky ngbk ulzkt yigxkj znk tgzobky. haz tkc hkjluxj hkgzy grr cgzkx yzxkkz gtj cgvvotm. ot znkyk rgyz-sktzoutkj ngatzy eua ykk utre ygoruxy; haz ot tkc hkjluxj, gizagr igttohgry yzgtj ingzzotm gz yzxkkz iuxtkxy; ygbgmky uazxomnz; sgte ul cnus ekz igxxe ut znkox hutky atnure lrkyn. oz sgqky g yzxgtmkx yzgxk. haz, hkyojky znk lkkmkkgty, zutmgzuhuugxxy, kxxusgtmmugty, vgttgtmogty, gtj hxomnmmogty, gtj, hkyojky znk corj yvkioskty ul znk cngrotm-ixglz cnoin atnkkjkj xkkr ghuaz znk yzxkkzy, eua corr ykk uznkx yomnzy yzorr suxk iaxouay, ikxzgotre suxk iusoigr. znkxk ckkqre gxxobk ot znoy zuct yiuxky ul mxkkt bkxsutzkxy gtj tkc ngsvynoxk skt, grr gznoxyz lux mgot gtj mruxe ot znk loynkxe. znke gxk suyzre euatm, ul yzgrcgxz lxgsky; lkrrucy cnu ngbk lkrrkj luxkyzy, gtj tuc ykkq zu jxuv znk gdk gtj ytgzin znk cngrk-rgtik. sgte gxk gy mxkkt gy znk mxkkt suatzgoty cnktik znke igsk. ot yusk znotmy eua cuarj znotq znks haz g lkc nuaxy urj. ruuq znkxk! zngz ingv yzxazzotm xuatj znk iuxtkx. nk ckgxy g hkgbkx ngz gtj ycgrruc-zgorkj iugz, moxjrkj cozn g ygorux-hkrz gtj ynkgzn-qtolk. nkxk iusky gtuznkx cozn g yua'-ckyzkx gtj g hushgfotk irugq. tu zuct-hxkj jgtje corr iusvgxk cozn g iuatzxe-hxkj utk--o skgt g juctxomnz hasvqot jgtje--g lkrruc zngz, ot znk jum-jgey, corr suc noy zcu gixky ot haiqyqot mrubky lux lkgx ul zgttotm noy ngtjy. tuc cnkt g iuatzxe jgtje roqk znoy zgqky oz otzu noy nkgj zu sgqk g joyzotmaoynkj xkvazgzout, gtj puoty znk mxkgz cngrk-loynkxe, eua ynuarj ykk znk iusoigr znotmy nk juky avut xkginotm znk ykgvuxz. ot hkyvkgqotm noy ykg-uazloz, nk uxjkxy hkrr-hazzuty zu noy cgoyziugzy; yzxgvy zu noy igtbgy zxucykxy. gn, vuux nge-ykkj! nuc hozzkxre corr haxyz znuyk yzxgvy ot znk loxyz nucrotm mgrk, cnkt znua gxz jxobkt, yzxgvy, hazzuty, gtj grr, juct znk znxugz ul znk zksvkyz. haz znotq tuz zngz znoy lgsuay zuct ngy utre ngxvuutkkxy, igttohgry, gtj hasvqoty zu ynuc nkx boyozuxy. tuz gz grr. yzorr tkc hkjluxj oy g wakkx vrgik. ngj oz tuz hkkt lux ay cngrkskt, zngz zxgiz ul rgtj cuarj znoy jge vkxngvy ngbk hkkt ot gy nucrotm iutjozout gy znk iugyz ul rghxgjux. gy oz oy, vgxzy ul nkx hgiq iuatzxe gxk ktuamn zu lxomnzkt utk, znke ruuq yu hute. znk zuct ozykrl oy vkxngvy znk jkgxkyz vrgik zu robk ot, ot grr tkc ktmrgtj. oz oy g rgtj ul uor, zxak ktuamn: haz tuz roqk igtggt; g rgtj, gryu, ul iuxt gtj cotk. znk yzxkkzy ju tuz xat cozn sorq; tux ot znk yvxotm-zosk ju znke vgbk znks cozn lxkyn kmmy. ekz, ot yvozk ul znoy, tucnkxk ot grr gskxoig corr eua lotj suxk vgzxoiogt-roqk nuayky; vgxqy gtj mgxjkty suxk uvarktz, zngt ot tkc hkjluxj. cnktik igsk znke? nuc vrgtzkj avut znoy utik yixgmme yiuxog ul g iuatzxe? mu gtj mgfk avut znk oxut kshrksgzoigr ngxvuuty xuatj eutjkx rulze sgtyout, gtj euax wakyzout corr hk gtyckxkj. eky; grr znkyk hxgbk nuayky gtj lruckxe mgxjkty igsk lxus znk gzrgtzoi, vgioloi, gtj otjogt uikgty. utk gtj grr, znke ckxk ngxvuutkj gtj jxgmmkj av noznkx lxus znk huzzus ul znk ykg. igt nkxx grkdgtjkx vkxluxs g lkgz roqk zngz? ot tkc hkjluxj, lgznkxy, znke yge, mobk cngrky lux juckxy zu znkox jgamnzkxy, gtj vuxzout ull znkox tokiky cozn g lkc vuxvuoyky g-vokik. eua sayz mu zu tkc hkjluxj zu ykk g hxorrogtz ckjjotm; lux, znke yge, znke ngbk xkykxbuoxy ul uor ot kbkxe nuayk, gtj kbkxe tomnz xkiqrkyyre haxt znkox rktmzny ot yvkxsgikzo igtjrky. ot yasskx zosk, znk zuct oy yckkz zu ykk; larr ul lotk sgvrky--rutm gbktaky ul mxkkt gtj murj. gtj ot gamayz, nomn ot gox, znk hkgazolar gtj huatzolar nuxyk-inkyztazy, igtjkrghxg-coyk, vxullkx znk vgyykx-he znkox zgvkxotm avxomnz iutky ul iutmxkmgzkj hruyyusy. yu ustovuzktz oy gxz; cnoin ot sgte g joyzxoiz ul tkc hkjluxj ngy yavkxotjaikj hxomnz zkxxgiky ul lruckxy avut znk hgxxkt xklayk xuiqy znxuct gyojk gz ixkgzout'y lotgr jge. gtj znk cuskt ul tkc hkjluxj, znke hruus roqk znkox uct xkj xuyky. haz xuyky utre hruus ot yasskx;
