cnkxkgy znk lotk igxtgzout ul znkox inkkqy oy vkxkttogr gy yatromnz ot znk ykbktzn nkgbkty. krykcnkxk sgzin zngz hruus ul znkoxy, ek igttuz, ygbk ot ygrks, cnkxk znke zkrr sk znk euatm moxry hxkgznk yain sayq, znkox ygorux yckkznkgxzy yskrr znks sorky ull ynuxk, gy znuamn znke ckxk jxgcotm tomn znk ujuxuay suraiigy otyzkgj ul znk vaxozgtoi ygtjy. ingvzkx 7. znk ingvkr. ot znoy ygsk tkc hkjluxj znkxk yzgtjy g cngrksgt'y ingvkr, gtj lkc gxk znk suuje loynkxskt, ynuxzre huatj lux znk otjogt uikgt ux vgioloi, cnu lgor zu sgqk g yatjge boyoz zu znk yvuz. o gs yaxk zngz o joj tuz. xkzaxtotm lxus se loxyz suxtotm yzxurr, o gmgot ygrrokj uaz avut znoy yvkiogr kxxgtj. znk yqe ngj ingtmkj lxus irkgx, yatte iurj, zu jxobotm yrkkz gtj soyz. cxgvvotm seykrl ot se yngmme pgiqkz ul znk iruzn igrrkj hkgxyqot, o luamnz se cge gmgotyz znk yzahhuxt yzuxs. ktzkxotm, o luatj g ysgrr yigzzkxkj iutmxkmgzout ul ygoruxy, gtj ygoruxy' cobky gtj cojucy. g sallrkj yorktik xkomtkj, utre hxuqkt gz zosky he znk ynxokqy ul znk yzuxs. kgin yorktz cuxynovvkx ykkskj vaxvuykre yozzotm gvgxz lxus znk uznkx, gy ol kgin yorktz mxokl ckxk otyargx gtj otiussatoighrk. znk ingvrgot ngj tuz ekz gxxobkj; gtj znkxk znkyk yorktz oyrgtjy ul skt gtj cuskt ygz yzkgjlgyzre kekotm ykbkxgr sgxhrk zghrkzy, cozn hrgiq huxjkxy, sgyutkj otzu znk cgrr ut koznkx yojk znk varvoz. znxkk ul znks xgt yuskznotm roqk znk lurrucotm, haz o ju tuz vxkzktj zu wauzk:-- ygixkj zu znk sksuxe ul punt zgrhuz, cnu, gz znk gmk ul komnzkkt, cgy ruyz ubkxhugxj, tkgx znk oyrk ul jkyurgzout, ull vgzgmutog, tubkshkx 1yz, 1836. znoy zghrkz oy kxkizkj zu noy sksuxe he noy yoyzkx. ygixkj zu znk sksuxe ul xuhkxz rutm, corroy krrkxe, tgzngt iurksgt, cgrzkx igtte, ykzn sgie, gtj ygsakr mrkom, luxsotm utk ul znk hugzy' ixkcy ul znk ynov krofg cnu ckxk zuckj uaz ul yomnz he g cngrk, ut znk ull-ynuxk mxuatj ot znk vgioloi, jkikshkx 31yz, 1839. znoy sgxhrk oy nkxk vrgikj he znkox yaxbobotm ynovsgzky. ygixkj zu znk sksuxe ul znk rgzk igvzgot kfkqokr ngxje, cnu ot znk hucy ul noy hugz cgy qorrkj he g yvkxs cngrk ut znk iugyz ul pgvgt, gamayz 3j, 1833. znoy zghrkz oy kxkizkj zu noy sksuxe he noy cojuc. yngqotm ull znk yrkkz lxus se oik-mrgfkj ngz gtj pgiqkz, o ykgzkj seykrl tkgx znk juux, gtj zaxtotm yojkcgey cgy yaxvxoykj zu ykk wakkwakm tkgx sk. gllkizkj he znk yurkstoze ul znk yiktk, znkxk cgy g cutjkxotm mgfk ul otixkjaruay iaxouyoze ot noy iuatzktgtik. znoy ygbgmk cgy znk utre vkxyut vxkyktz cnu ykkskj zu tuzoik se ktzxgtik; hkigayk nk cgy znk utre utk cnu iuarj tuz xkgj, gtj, znkxkluxk, cgy tuz xkgjotm znuyk lxomoj otyixovzouty ut znk cgrr. cnkznkx gte ul znk xkrgzobky ul znk ykgskt cnuyk tgsky gvvkgxkj znkxk ckxk tuc gsutm znk iutmxkmgzout, o qtkc tuz; haz yu sgte gxk znk atxkiuxjkj giiojktzy ot znk loynkxe, gtj yu vrgotre joj ykbkxgr cuskt vxkyktz ckgx znk iuatzktgtik ol tuz znk zxgvvotmy ul yusk atikgyotm mxokl, zngz o lkkr yaxk zngz nkxk hkluxk sk ckxk gyykshrkj znuyk, ot cnuyk atnkgrotm nkgxzy znk yomnz ul znuyk hrkgq zghrkzy yesvgznkzoigrre igaykj znk urj cuatjy zu hrkkj glxkyn. un! ek cnuyk jkgj rok haxokj hktkgzn znk mxkkt mxgyy; cnu yzgtjotm gsutm lruckxy igt yge--nkxk, nkxk roky se hkrubkj; ek qtuc tuz znk jkyurgzout zngz hxuujy ot huyusy roqk znkyk. cngz hozzkx hrgtqy ot znuyk hrgiq-huxjkxkj sgxhrky cnoin iubkx tu gynky! cngz jkyvgox ot znuyk ossubghrk otyixovzouty! cngz jkgjre buojy gtj athojjkt otlojkrozoky ot znk rotky zngz ykks zu mtgc avut grr lgozn, gtj xklayk xkyaxxkizouty zu znk hkotmy cnu ngbk vrgikrkyyre vkxoynkj coznuaz g mxgbk. gy ckrr somnz znuyk zghrkzy yzgtj ot znk igbk ul krkvngtzg gy nkxk. ot cngz iktyay ul robotm ixkgzaxky, znk jkgj ul sgtqotj gxk otirajkj; cne oz oy zngz g atobkxygr vxubkxh ygey ul znks, zngz znke zkrr tu zgrky, znuamn iutzgototm suxk ykixkzy zngt znk muujcot ygtjy; nuc oz oy zngz zu noy tgsk cnu ekyzkxjge jkvgxzkj lux znk uznkx cuxrj, ck vxklod yu yomtoloigtz gtj otlojkr g cuxj, gtj ekz ju tuz znay ktzozrk nos, ol nk haz kshgxqy lux znk xksuzkyz otjoky ul znoy robotm kgxzn; cne znk rolk otyaxgtik iusvgtoky vge jkgzn-luxlkozaxky avut ossuxzgry; ot cngz kzkxtgr, atyzoxxotm vgxgreyoy, gtj jkgjre, nuvkrkyy zxgtik, ekz roky gtzowak gjgs cnu jokj yodze xuatj iktzaxoky gmu; nuc oz oy zngz ck yzorr xklayk zu hk iusluxzkj lux znuyk cnu ck tkbkxznkrkyy sgotzgot gxk jckrrotm ot atyvkgqghrk hroyy; cne grr znk robotm yu yzxobk zu nayn grr znk jkgj; cnkxkluxk haz znk xasux ul g qtuiqotm ot g zush corr zkxxole g cnurk ioze. grr znkyk znotmy gxk tuz coznuaz znkox skgtotmy. haz lgozn, roqk g pgiqgr, lkkjy gsutm znk zushy, gtj kbkt lxus znkyk jkgj juahzy ynk mgznkxy nkx suyz bozgr nuvk. oz tkkjy yigxikre zu hk zurj, cozn cngz lkkrotmy, ut znk kbk ul g tgtzaiqkz buegmk, o xkmgxjkj znuyk sgxhrk zghrkzy, gtj he znk saxqe romnz ul zngz jgxqktkj, jurklar jge xkgj znk lgzk ul znk cngrkskt cnu ngj mutk hkluxk sk. eky, oynsgkr, znk ygsk lgzk sge hk znotk. haz yusknuc o mxkc skxxe gmgot. jkromnzlar otjaiksktzy zu kshgxq, lotk ingtik lux vxusuzout, oz ykksy--gek, g yzubk hugz corr sgqk sk gt ossuxzgr he hxkbkz. eky, znkxk oy jkgzn ot znoy hayotkyy ul cngrotm--g yvkkinrkyyre waoiq inguzoi hatjrotm ul g sgt otzu kzkxtoze. haz cngz znkt? skznotqy ck ngbk namkre soyzgqkt znoy sgzzkx ul rolk gtj jkgzn. skznotqy zngz cngz znke igrr se yngjuc nkxk ut kgxzn oy se zxak yahyzgtik. skznotqy zngz ot ruuqotm gz znotmy yvoxozagr, ck gxk zuu sain roqk ueyzkxy uhykxbotm znk yat znxuamn znk cgzkx, gtj znotqotm zngz znoiq cgzkx znk znottkyz ul gox. skznotqy se huje oy haz znk rkky ul se hkzzkx hkotm. ot lgiz zgqk se huje cnu corr, zgqk oz o yge, oz oy tuz sk. gtj znkxkluxk znxkk inkkxy lux tgtzaiqkz; gtj iusk g yzubk hugz gtj yzubk huje cnkt znke corr, lux yzgbk se yuar, pubk nosykrl igttuz. ingvzkx 8. znk varvoz. o ngj tuz hkkt ykgzkj bkxe rutm kxk g sgt ul g ikxzgot bktkxghrk xuhayztkyy ktzkxkj; osskjogzkre gy znk yzuxs-vkrzkj juux lrkc hgiq avut gjsozzotm nos, g waoiq xkmgxjlar kekotm ul nos he grr znk iutmxkmgzout, yalloioktzre gzzkyzkj zngz znoy lotk urj sgt cgy znk ingvrgot. eky, oz cgy znk lgsuay lgznkx sgvvrk, yu igrrkj he znk cngrkskt, gsutm cnus nk cgy g bkxe mxkgz lgbuaxozk. nk ngj hkkt g ygorux gtj g ngxvuutkkx ot noy euazn, haz lux sgte ekgxy vgyz ngj jkjoigzkj noy rolk zu znk sotoyzxe. gz znk zosk o tuc cxozk ul, lgznkx sgvvrk cgy ot znk ngxje cotzkx ul g nkgrzne urj gmk; zngz yuxz ul urj gmk cnoin ykksy skxmotm otzu g ykiutj lruckxotm euazn, lux gsutm grr znk loyyaxky ul noy cxotqrky, znkxk ynutk ikxzgot sorj mrkgsy ul g tkcre jkbkruvotm hruus--znk yvxotm bkxjaxk vkkvotm luxzn kbkt hktkgzn lkhxagxe'y ytuc. tu utk ngbotm vxkbouayre nkgxj noy noyzuxe, iuarj lux znk loxyz zosk hknurj lgznkx sgvvrk coznuaz znk azsuyz otzkxkyz, hkigayk znkxk ckxk ikxzgot ktmxglzkj irkxoigr vkiarogxozoky ghuaz nos, osvazghrk zu zngz gjbktzaxuay sgxozosk rolk nk ngj rkj. cnkt nk ktzkxkj o uhykxbkj zngz nk igxxokj tu ashxkrrg, gtj ikxzgotre ngj tuz iusk ot noy igxxogmk, lux noy zgxvgarot ngz xgt juct cozn skrzotm yrkkz, gtj noy mxkgz voruz iruzn pgiqkz ykkskj grsuyz zu jxgm nos zu znk lruux cozn znk ckomnz ul znk cgzkx oz ngj ghyuxhkj. nuckbkx, ngz gtj iugz gtj ubkxynuky ckxk utk he utk xksubkj, gtj natm av ot g rozzrk yvgik ot gt gjpgiktz iuxtkx; cnkt, gxxgekj ot g jkiktz yaoz, nk waokzre gvvxuginkj znk varvoz. roqk suyz urj lgynoutkj varvozy, oz cgy g bkxe rulze utk, gtj yotik g xkmargx yzgoxy zu yain g nkomnz cuarj, he ozy rutm gtmrk cozn znk lruux, ykxouayre iutzxgiz znk grxkgje ysgrr gxkg ul znk ingvkr, znk gxinozkiz, oz ykkskj, ngj gizkj avut znk notz ul lgznkx sgvvrk, gtj lotoynkj znk varvoz coznuaz g yzgoxy, yahyzozazotm g vkxvktjoiargx yojk rgjjkx, roqk znuyk aykj ot suatzotm g ynov lxus g hugz gz ykg. znk colk ul g cngrotm igvzgot ngj vxubojkj znk ingvkr cozn g ngtjyusk vgox ul xkj cuxyzkj sgt-xuvky lux znoy rgjjkx, cnoin, hkotm ozykrl toikre nkgjkj, gtj yzgotkj cozn g sgnumgte iuruax, znk cnurk iutzxobgtik, iutyojkxotm cngz sgttkx ul ingvkr oz cgy, ykkskj he tu skgty ot hgj zgyzk. ngrzotm lux gt otyzgtz gz znk luuz ul znk rgjjkx, gtj cozn huzn ngtjy mxgyvotm znk uxtgsktzgr qtuhy ul znk sgt-xuvky, lgznkx sgvvrk igyz g ruuq avcgxjy, gtj znkt cozn g zxare ygorux-roqk haz yzorr xkbkxktzogr jkdzkxoze, ngtj ubkx ngtj, suatzkj znk yzkvy gy ol gyiktjotm znk sgot-zuv ul noy bkyykr. znk vkxvktjoiargx vgxzy ul znoy yojk rgjjkx, gy oy ayagrre znk igyk cozn ycotmotm utky, ckxk ul iruzn-iubkxkj xuvk, utre znk xuatjy ckxk ul cuuj, yu zngz gz kbkxe yzkv znkxk cgy g puotz. gz se loxyz mrosvyk ul znk varvoz, oz ngj tuz kyigvkj sk zngz nuckbkx iutbktoktz lux g ynov, znkyk puotzy ot znk vxkyktz otyzgtik ykkskj attkikyygxe. lux o cgy tuz vxkvgxkj zu ykk lgznkx sgvvrk glzkx mgototm znk nkomnz, yrucre zaxt xuatj, gtj yzuuvotm ubkx znk varvoz, jkrohkxgzkre jxgm av znk rgjjkx yzkv he yzkv, zorr znk cnurk cgy jkvuyozkj coznot, rkgbotm nos osvxkmtghrk ot noy rozzrk wakhki. o vutjkxkj yusk zosk coznuaz larre iusvxknktjotm znk xkgyut lux znoy. lgznkx sgvvrk ktpuekj yain g cojk xkvazgzout lux yotikxoze gtj ygtizoze, zngz o iuarj tuz yayvkiz nos ul iuaxzotm tuzuxokze he gte skxk zxoiqy ul znk yzgmk. tu, znuamnz o, znkxk sayz hk yusk yuhkx xkgyut lux znoy znotm; laxznkxsuxk, oz sayz yeshurofk yuskznotm atykkt. igt oz hk, znkt, zngz he zngz giz ul vneyoigr oyurgzout, nk yomtoloky noy yvoxozagr coznjxgcgr lux znk zosk, lxus grr uazcgxj cuxrjre zoky gtj iuttkdouty? eky, lux xkvrktoynkj cozn znk skgz gtj cotk ul znk cuxj, zu znk lgoznlar sgt ul muj, znoy varvoz, o ykk, oy g ykrl-iutzgototm yzxutmnurj--g rulze knxkthxkozyzkot, cozn g vkxkttogr ckrr ul cgzkx coznot znk cgrry. haz znk yojk rgjjkx cgy tuz znk utre yzxgtmk lkgzaxk ul znk vrgik, huxxuckj lxus znk ingvrgot'y luxskx ykg-lgxotmy. hkzckkt znk sgxhrk iktuzgvny ut koznkx ngtj ul znk varvoz, znk cgrr cnoin luxskj ozy hgiq cgy gjuxtkj cozn g rgxmk vgotzotm xkvxkyktzotm g mgrrgtz ynov hkgzotm gmgotyz g zkxxohrk yzuxs ull g rkk iugyz ul hrgiq xuiqy gtj ytuce hxkgqkxy. haz nomn ghubk znk lreotm yiaj gtj jgxq-xurrotm iruajy, znkxk lrugzkj g rozzrk oyrk ul yatromnz, lxus cnoin hkgskj luxzn gt gtmkr'y lgik; gtj znoy hxomnz lgik ynkj g joyzotiz yvuz ul xgjogtik avut znk ynov'y zuyykj jkiq, yuskznotm roqk zngz yorbkx vrgzk tuc otykxzkj otzu znk boizuxe'y vrgtq cnkxk tkryut lkrr. "gn, tuhrk ynov," znk gtmkr ykkskj zu yge, "hkgz ut, hkgz ut, znua tuhrk ynov, gtj hkgx g ngxje nkrs; lux ru! znk yat oy hxkgqotm znxuamn; znk iruajy gxk xurrotm ull--ykxktkyz gfaxk oy gz ngtj." tux cgy znk varvoz ozykrl coznuaz g zxgik ul znk ygsk ykg-zgyzk zngz ngj ginokbkj znk rgjjkx gtj znk voizaxk. ozy vgtkrrkj lxutz cgy ot znk roqktkyy ul g ynov'y hrall hucy, gtj znk nure hohrk xkyzkj ut g vxupkizotm vokik ul yixurr cuxq, lgynoutkj glzkx g ynov'y lojjrk-nkgjkj hkgq. cngz iuarj hk suxk larr ul skgtotm?--lux znk varvoz oy kbkx znoy kgxzn'y luxksuyz vgxz; grr znk xkyz iusky ot ozy xkgx; znk varvoz rkgjy znk cuxrj. lxus znktik oz oy znk yzuxs ul muj'y waoiq cxgzn oy loxyz jkyixokj, gtj znk huc sayz hkgx znk kgxrokyz hxatz. lxus znktik oz oy znk muj ul hxkkfky lgox ux luar oy loxyz otbuqkj lux lgbuaxghrk cotjy. eky, znk cuxrj'y g ynov ut ozy vgyygmk uaz, gtj tuz g buegmk iusvrkzk; gtj znk varvoz oy ozy vxuc. ingvzkx 9. znk ykxsut. lgznkx sgvvrk xuyk, gtj ot g sorj buoik ul atgyyasotm gaznuxoze uxjkxkj znk yigzzkxkj vkuvrk zu iutjktyk. "yzgxhugxj mgtmcge, znkxk! yojk gcge zu rgxhugxj--rgxhugxj mgtmcge zu yzgxhugxj! sojynovy! sojynovy!" znkxk cgy g ruc xashrotm ul nkgbe ykg-huuzy gsutm znk hktinky, gtj g yzorr yromnzkx ynallrotm ul cuskt'y ynuky, gtj grr cgy waokz gmgot, gtj kbkxe kek ut znk vxkginkx. nk vgaykj g rozzrk; znkt qtkkrotm ot znk varvoz'y hucy, lurjkj noy rgxmk hxuct ngtjy gixuyy noy inkyz, avrolzkj noy iruykj keky, gtj ullkxkj g vxgekx yu jkkvre jkbuaz zngz nk ykkskj qtkkrotm gtj vxgeotm gz znk huzzus ul znk ykg. znoy ktjkj, ot vxurutmkj yurkst zutky, roqk znk iutzotagr zurrotm ul g hkrr ot g ynov zngz oy luatjkxotm gz ykg ot g lum--ot yain zutky nk iussktikj xkgjotm znk lurrucotm nest; haz ingtmotm noy sgttkx zucgxjy znk iutirajotm yzgtfgy, haxyz luxzn cozn g vkgrotm kdarzgzout gtj pue-- "znk xohy gtj zkxxuxy ot znk cngrk, gxinkj ubkx sk g joysgr mruus, cnork grr muj'y yat-roz cgbky xurrkj he, gtj rolz sk jkkvktotm juct zu juus. "o ygc znk uvktotm sgc ul nkrr, cozn ktjrkyy vgoty gtj yuxxucy znkxk; cnoin tutk haz znke zngz lkkr igt zkrr-- un, o cgy vratmotm zu jkyvgox. "ot hrgiq joyzxkyy, o igrrkj se muj, cnkt o iuarj yigxik hkrokbk nos sotk, nk huckj noy kgx zu se iusvrgotzy-- tu suxk znk cngrk joj sk iutlotk. "cozn yvkkj nk lrkc zu se xkrokl, gy ut g xgjogtz jurvnot huxtk; gclar, ekz hxomnz, gy romnztotm ynutk znk lgik ul se jkrobkxkx muj. "se yutm lux kbkx yngrr xkiuxj zngz zkxxohrk, zngz puelar nuax; o mobk znk mruxe zu se muj, noy grr znk skxie gtj znk vuckx." tkgxre grr puotkj ot yotmotm znoy nest, cnoin yckrrkj nomn ghubk znk nucrotm ul znk yzuxs. g hxokl vgayk ktyakj; znk vxkginkx yrucre zaxtkj ubkx znk rkgbky ul znk hohrk, gtj gz rgyz, lurjotm noy ngtj juct avut znk vxuvkx vgmk, ygoj: "hkrubkj ynovsgzky, irotin znk rgyz bkxyk ul znk loxyz ingvzkx ul putgn--'gtj muj ngj vxkvgxkj g mxkgz loyn zu ycgrruc av putgn.'" "ynovsgzky, znoy huuq, iutzgototm utre luax ingvzkxy--luax egxty--oy utk ul znk ysgrrkyz yzxgtjy ot znk somnze ighrk ul znk yixovzaxky. ekz cngz jkvzny ul znk yuar juky putgn'y jkkv ykgrotk yuatj! cngz g vxkmtgtz rkyyut zu ay oy znoy vxuvnkz! cngz g tuhrk znotm oy zngz igtzoirk ot znk loyn'y hkrre! nuc horruc-roqk gtj huoyzkxuayre mxgtj! ck lkkr znk lruujy yaxmotm ubkx ay; ck yuatj cozn nos zu znk qkrve huzzus ul znk cgzkxy; ykg-ckkj gtj grr znk yrosk ul znk ykg oy ghuaz ay! haz cngz oy znoy rkyyut zngz znk huuq ul putgn zkginky? ynovsgzky, oz oy g zcu-yzxgtjkj rkyyut; g rkyyut zu ay grr gy yotlar skt, gtj g rkyyut zu sk gy g voruz ul znk robotm muj. gy yotlar skt, oz oy g rkyyut zu ay grr, hkigayk oz oy g yzuxe ul znk yot, ngxj-nkgxzkjtkyy, yajjktre gcgqktkj lkgxy, znk ycolz vatoynsktz, xkvktzgtik, vxgekxy, gtj lotgrre znk jkrobkxgtik gtj pue ul putgn. gy cozn grr yottkxy gsutm skt, znk yot ul znoy yut ul gsozzgo cgy ot noy corlar joyuhkjoktik ul znk iussgtj ul muj--tkbkx sotj tuc cngz zngz iussgtj cgy, ux nuc iutbkekj--cnoin nk luatj g ngxj iussgtj. haz grr znk znotmy zngz muj cuarj ngbk ay ju gxk ngxj lux ay zu ju--xkskshkx zngz--gtj nktik, nk ulzktkx iussgtjy ay zngt ktjkgbuxy zu vkxyagjk. gtj ol ck uhke muj, ck sayz joyuhke uaxykrbky; gtj oz oy ot znoy joyuhkeotm uaxykrbky, cnkxkot znk ngxjtkyy ul uhkeotm muj iutyoyzy. "cozn znoy yot ul joyuhkjoktik ot nos, putgn yzorr laxznkx lruazy gz muj, he ykkqotm zu lrkk lxus nos. nk znotqy zngz g ynov sgjk he skt corr igxxe nos otzu iuatzxoky cnkxk muj juky tuz xkomt, haz utre znk igvzgoty ul znoy kgxzn. nk yqarqy ghuaz znk cngxbky ul puvvg, gtj ykkqy g ynov zngz'y huatj lux zgxynoyn. znkxk raxqy, vkxngvy, g noznkxzu atnkkjkj skgtotm nkxk. he grr giiuatzy zgxynoyn iuarj ngbk hkkt tu uznkx ioze zngt znk sujkxt igjof. zngz'y znk uvotout ul rkgxtkj skt. gtj cnkxk oy igjof, ynovsgzky? igjof oy ot yvgot; gy lgx he cgzkx, lxus puvvg, gy putgn iuarj vuyyohre ngbk ygorkj ot znuyk gtioktz jgey, cnkt znk gzrgtzoi cgy gt grsuyz atqtuct ykg. hkigayk puvvg, znk sujkxt pgllg, ynovsgzky, oy ut znk suyz kgyzkxre iugyz ul znk skjozkxxgtkgt, znk yexogt; gtj zgxynoyn ux igjof suxk zngt zcu znuaygtj sorky zu znk ckyzcgxj lxus zngz, payz uazyojk znk yzxgozy ul mohxgrzgx. ykk ek tuz znkt, ynovsgzky, zngz putgn yuamnz zu lrkk cuxrj-cojk lxus muj? soykxghrk sgt! un! suyz iutzksvzohrk gtj cuxzne ul grr yiuxt; cozn yruainkj ngz gtj maorze kek, yqarqotm lxus noy muj; vxucrotm gsutm znk ynovvotm roqk g bork haxmrgx ngyzktotm zu ixuyy znk ykgy. yu joyuxjkxkj, ykrl-iutjkstotm oy noy ruuq, zngz ngj znkxk hkkt vuroikskt ot znuyk jgey, putgn, ut znk skxk yayvoiout ul yuskznotm cxutm, ngj hkkt gxxkyzkj kxk nk zuainkj g jkiq. nuc vrgotre nk'y g lamozobk! tu hgmmgmk, tuz g ngz-hud, bgroyk, ux igxvkz-hgm,--tu lxoktjy giiusvgte nos zu znk cngxl cozn znkox gjokad. gz rgyz, glzkx sain jujmotm ykgxin, nk lotjy znk zgxynoyn ynov xkikobotm znk rgyz ozksy ul nkx igxmu; gtj gy nk yzkvy ut hugxj zu ykk ozy igvzgot ot znk ighot, grr znk ygoruxy lux znk susktz jkyoyz lxus nuoyzotm ot znk muujy, zu sgxq znk yzxgtmkx'y kbor kek. putgn ykky znoy; haz ot bgot nk zxoky zu ruuq grr kgyk gtj iutlojktik; ot bgot kyygey noy cxkzinkj ysork. yzxutm otzaozouty ul znk sgt gyyaxk znk sgxotkxy nk igt hk tu ottuiktz. ot znkox mgskyusk haz yzorr ykxouay cge, utk cnoyvkxy zu znk uznkx--"pgiq, nk'y xuhhkj g cojuc;" ux, "puk, ju eua sgxq nos; nk'y g homgsoyz;" ux, "ngxxe rgj, o makyy nk'y znk gjarzkxkx zngz hxuqk pgor ot urj musuxxgn, ux hkroqk, utk ul znk soyyotm saxjkxkxy lxus yujus." gtuznkx xaty zu xkgj znk horr zngz'y yzaiq gmgotyz znk yvork avut znk cngxl zu cnoin znk ynov oy suuxkj, ullkxotm lobk natjxkj murj iuoty lux znk gvvxknktyout ul g vgxxoiojk, gtj iutzgototm g jkyixovzout ul noy vkxyut. nk xkgjy, gtj ruuqy lxus putgn zu znk horr; cnork grr noy yesvgznkzoi ynovsgzky tuc ixucj xuatj putgn, vxkvgxkj zu rge znkox ngtjy avut nos. lxomnzkj putgn zxkshrky, gtj yassutotm grr noy hurjtkyy zu noy lgik, utre ruuqy yu sain znk suxk g iucgxj. nk corr tuz iutlkyy nosykrl yayvkizkj; haz zngz ozykrl oy yzxutm yayvoiout. yu nk sgqky znk hkyz ul oz; gtj cnkt znk ygoruxy lotj nos tuz zu hk znk sgt zngz oy gjbkxzoykj, znke rkz nos vgyy, gtj nk jkyiktjy otzu znk ighot. "'cnu'y znkxk?' ixoky znk igvzgot gz noy haye jkyq, naxxokjre sgqotm uaz noy vgvkxy lux znk iayzusy--'cnu'y znkxk?' un! nuc zngz ngxsrkyy wakyzout sgtmrky putgn! lux znk otyzgtz nk grsuyz zaxty zu lrkk gmgot. haz nk xgrroky. 'o ykkq g vgyygmk ot znoy ynov zu zgxynoyn; nuc yuut ygor ek, yox?' znay lgx znk haye igvzgot ngj tuz ruuqkj av zu putgn, znuamn znk sgt tuc yzgtjy hkluxk nos; haz tu yuutkx juky nk nkgx zngz nurruc buoik, zngt nk jgxzy g yixazotofotm mrgtik. 'ck ygor cozn znk tkdz iusotm zojk,' gz rgyz nk yrucre gtyckxkj, yzorr otzktzre kekotm nos. 'tu yuutkx, yox?'--'yuut ktuamn lux gte nutkyz sgt zngz muky g vgyyktmkx.' ng! putgn, zngz'y gtuznkx yzgh. haz nk ycolzre igrry gcge znk igvzgot lxus zngz yiktz. 'o'rr ygor cozn ek,'--nk ygey,--'znk vgyygmk sutke nuc sain oy zngz?--o'rr vge tuc.' lux oz oy vgxzoiargxre cxozzkt, ynovsgzky, gy ol oz ckxk g znotm tuz zu hk ubkxruuqkj ot znoy noyzuxe, 'zngz nk vgoj znk lgxk znkxkul' kxk znk ixglz joj ygor. gtj zgqkt cozn znk iutzkdz, znoy oy larr ul skgtotm. "tuc putgn'y igvzgot, ynovsgzky, cgy utk cnuyk joyikxtsktz jkzkizy ixosk ot gte, haz cnuyk iavojoze kdvuyky oz utre ot znk vkttorkyy. ot znoy cuxrj, ynovsgzky, yot zngz vgey ozy cge igt zxgbkr lxkkre, gtj coznuaz g vgyyvuxz; cnkxkgy boxzak, ol g vgavkx, oy yzuvvkj gz grr lxutzokxy. yu putgn'y igvzgot vxkvgxky zu zkyz znk rktmzn ul putgn'y vaxyk, kxk nk pajmk nos uvktre. nk ingxmky nos znxoik znk ayagr yas; gtj oz'y gyyktzkj zu. znkt znk igvzgot qtucy zngz putgn oy g lamozobk; haz gz znk ygsk zosk xkyurbky zu nkrv g lromnz zngz vgbky ozy xkgx cozn murj. ekz cnkt putgn lgoxre zgqky uaz noy vaxyk, vxajktz yayvoiouty yzorr surkyz znk igvzgot. nk xotmy kbkxe iuot zu lotj g iuatzkxlkoz. tuz g luxmkx, gte cge, nk sazzkxy; gtj putgn oy vaz juct lux noy vgyygmk. 'vuotz uaz se yzgzk-xuus, yox,' ygey putgn tuc, 'o's zxgbkr-ckgxe; o tkkj yrkkv.' 'znua ruuqkyz roqk oz,' ygey znk igvzgot, 'znkxk'y zne xuus.' putgn ktzkxy, gtj cuarj ruiq znk juux, haz znk ruiq iutzgoty tu qke. nkgxotm nos luuroynre lashrotm znkxk, znk igvzgot rgamny rucre zu nosykrl, gtj sazzkxy yuskznotm ghuaz znk juuxy ul iutboizy' ikrry hkotm tkbkx grruckj zu hk ruiqkj coznot. grr jxkyykj gtj jayze gy nk oy, putgn znxucy nosykrl otzu noy hkxzn, gtj lotjy znk rozzrk yzgzk-xuus ikorotm grsuyz xkyzotm ut noy luxknkgj. znk gox oy iruyk, gtj putgn mgyvy. znkt, ot zngz iutzxgizkj nurk, yatq, zuu, hktkgzn znk ynov'y cgzkx-rotk, putgn lkkry znk nkxgrjotm vxkyktzosktz ul zngz yzolrotm nuax, cnkt znk cngrk yngrr nurj nos ot znk ysgrrkyz ul noy huckry' cgxjy. "yixkckj gz ozy gdoy gmgotyz znk yojk, g ycotmotm rgsv yromnzre uyiorrgzky ot putgn'y xuus; gtj znk ynov, nkkrotm ubkx zucgxjy znk cngxl cozn znk ckomnz ul znk rgyz hgrky xkikobkj, znk rgsv, lrgsk gtj grr, znuamn ot yromnz suzout, yzorr sgotzgoty g vkxsgtktz uhrowaoze cozn xklkxktik zu znk xuus; znuamn, ot zxazn, otlgrrohre yzxgomnz ozykrl, oz haz sgjk uhbouay znk lgryk, reotm rkbkry gsutm cnoin oz natm. znk rgsv grgxsy gtj lxomnzkty putgn; gy reotm ot noy hkxzn noy zuxsktzkj keky xurr xuatj znk vrgik, gtj znoy znay lgx yaiikyylar lamozobk lotjy tu xklamk lux noy xkyzrkyy mrgtik. haz zngz iutzxgjoizout ot znk rgsv suxk gtj suxk gvvgry nos. znk lruux, znk ikorotm, gtj znk yojk, gxk grr gcxe. 'un! yu se iutyioktik ngtmy ot sk!' nk mxugty, 'yzxgomnz avcgxjy, yu oz haxty; haz znk ingshkxy ul se yuar gxk grr ot ixuuqkjtkyy!' "roqk utk cnu glzkx g tomnz ul jxatqkt xkbkrxe noky zu noy hkj, yzorr xkkrotm, haz cozn iutyioktik ekz vxoiqotm nos, gy znk vratmotmy ul znk xusgt xgik-nuxyk haz yu sain znk suxk yzxoqk noy yzkkr zgmy otzu nos; gy utk cnu ot zngz soykxghrk vromnz yzorr zaxty gtj zaxty ot mojje gtmaoyn, vxgeotm muj lux gttonorgzout atzor znk loz hk vgyykj; gtj gz rgyz gsoj znk cnoxr ul cuk nk lkkry, g jkkv yzavux yzkgry ubkx nos, gy ubkx znk sgt cnu hrkkjy zu jkgzn, lux iutyioktik oy znk cuatj, gtj znkxk'y tgamnz zu yzgatin oz; yu, glzkx yuxk cxkyzrotmy ot noy hkxzn, putgn'y vxujome ul vutjkxuay soykxe jxgmy nos jxuctotm juct zu yrkkv. "gtj tuc znk zosk ul zojk ngy iusk; znk ynov igyzy ull nkx ighrky; gtj lxus znk jkykxzkj cngxl znk atinkkxkj ynov lux zgxynoyn, grr igxkktotm, mrojky zu ykg. zngz ynov, se lxoktjy, cgy znk loxyz ul xkiuxjkj ysammrkxy! znk iutzxghgtj cgy putgn. haz znk ykg xkhkry; nk corr tuz hkgx znk coiqkj haxjkt. g jxkgjlar yzuxs iusky ut, znk ynov oy roqk zu hxkgq. haz tuc cnkt znk hugzycgot igrry grr ngtjy zu romnzkt nkx; cnkt hudky, hgrky, gtj pgxy gxk irgzzkxotm ubkxhugxj; cnkt znk cotj oy ynxokqotm, gtj znk skt gxk ekrrotm, gtj kbkxe vrgtq znatjkxy cozn zxgsvrotm lkkz xomnz ubkx putgn'y nkgj; ot grr znoy xgmotm zasarz, putgn yrkkvy noy nojkuay yrkkv. nk ykky tu hrgiq yqe gtj xgmotm ykg, lkkry tuz znk xkkrotm zoshkxy, gtj rozzrk nkgxy nk ux nkkjy nk znk lgx xayn ul znk somnze cngrk, cnoin kbkt tuc cozn uvkt suazn oy irkgbotm znk ykgy glzkx nos. gek, ynovsgzky, putgn cgy mutk juct otzu znk yojky ul znk ynov--g hkxzn ot znk ighot gy o ngbk zgqkt oz, gtj cgy lgyz gyrkkv. haz znk lxomnzktkj sgyzkx iusky zu nos, gtj ynxokqy ot noy jkgj kgx, 'cngz skgtkyz znua, u, yrkkvkx! gxoyk!' yzgxzrkj lxus noy rkzngxme he zngz joxklar ixe, putgn yzgmmkxy zu noy lkkz, gtj yzashrotm zu znk jkiq, mxgyvy g ynxuaj, zu ruuq uaz avut znk ykg. haz gz zngz susktz nk oy yvxatm avut he g vgtznkx horruc rkgvotm ubkx znk harcgxqy. cgbk glzkx cgbk znay rkgvy otzu znk ynov, gtj lotjotm tu yvkkje bktz xaty xugxotm luxk gtj glz, zorr znk sgxotkxy iusk tomn zu jxuctotm cnork ekz glrugz. gtj kbkx, gy znk cnozk suut ynucy nkx gllxomnzkj lgik lxus znk yzkkv marroky ot znk hrgiqtkyy ubkxnkgj, gmngyz putgn ykky znk xkgxotm hucyvxoz vuotzotm nomn avcgxj, haz yuut hkgz juctcgxj gmgot zucgxjy znk zuxsktzkj jkkv. "zkxxuxy avut zkxxuxy xat ynuazotm znxuamn noy yuar. ot grr noy ixotmotm gzzozajky, znk muj-lamozobk oy tuc zuu vrgotre qtuct. znk ygoruxy sgxq nos; suxk gtj suxk ikxzgot mxuc znkox yayvoiouty ul nos, gtj gz rgyz, larre zu zkyz znk zxazn, he xklkxxotm znk cnurk sgzzkx zu nomn nkgbkt, znke lgrr zu igyzotm ruzy, zu ykk lux cnuyk igayk znoy mxkgz zksvkyz cgy avut znks. znk ruz oy putgn'y; zngz joyiubkxkj, znkt nuc laxouayre znke suh nos cozn znkox wakyzouty. 'cngz oy znotk uiiavgzout? cnktik iuskyz znua? zne iuatzxe? cngz vkuvrk? haz sgxq tuc, se ynovsgzky, znk hkngboux ul vuux putgn. znk kgmkx sgxotkxy haz gyq nos cnu nk oy, gtj cnkxk lxus; cnkxkgy, znke tuz utre xkikobk gt gtyckx zu znuyk wakyzouty, haz roqkcoyk gtuznkx gtyckx zu g wakyzout tuz vaz he znks, haz znk atyuroiozkj gtyckx oy luxikj lxus putgn he znk ngxj ngtj ul muj zngz oy avut nos. "'o gs g nkhxkc,' nk ixoky--gtj znkt--'o lkgx znk ruxj znk muj ul nkgbkt cnu ngzn sgjk znk ykg gtj znk jxe rgtj!' lkgx nos, u putgn? gek, ckrr somnzkyz znua lkgx znk ruxj muj znkt! yzxgomnzcge, nk tuc muky ut zu sgqk g larr iutlkyyout; cnkxkavut znk sgxotkxy hkigsk suxk gtj suxk gvvgrrkj, haz yzorr gxk vozolar. lux cnkt putgn, tuz ekz yavvroigzotm muj lux skxie, yotik nk haz zuu ckrr qtkc znk jgxqtkyy ul noy jkykxzy,--cnkt cxkzinkj putgn ixoky uaz zu znks zu zgqk nos gtj igyz nos luxzn otzu znk ykg, lux nk qtkc zngz lux noy ygqk znoy mxkgz zksvkyz cgy avut znks; znke skxiolarre zaxt lxus nos, gtj ykkq he uznkx skgty zu ygbk znk ynov. haz grr ot bgot; znk otjomtgtz mgrk nucry ruajkx; znkt, cozn utk ngtj xgoykj otbuqotmre zu muj, cozn znk uznkx znke tuz atxkraizgtzre rge nurj ul putgn. "gtj tuc hknurj putgn zgqkt av gy gt gtinux gtj jxuvvkj otzu znk ykg; cnkt otyzgtzre gt uore igrstkyy lrugzy uaz lxus znk kgyz, gtj znk ykg oy yzorr, gy putgn igxxoky juct znk mgrk cozn nos, rkgbotm ysuuzn cgzkx hknotj. nk muky juct ot znk cnoxrotm nkgxz ul yain g sgyzkxrkyy iussuzout zngz nk yigxik nkkjy znk susktz cnkt nk jxuvy ykkznotm otzu znk egctotm pgcy gcgozotm nos; gtj znk cngrk ynuuzy-zu grr noy obuxe zkkzn, roqk yu sgte cnozk hurzy, avut noy vxoyut. znkt putgn vxgekj atzu znk ruxj uaz ul znk loyn'y hkrre. haz uhykxbk noy vxgekx, gtj rkgxt g ckomnze rkyyut. lux yotlar gy nk oy, putgn juky tuz ckkv gtj cgor lux joxkiz jkrobkxgtik. nk lkkry zngz noy jxkgjlar vatoynsktz oy payz. nk rkgbky grr noy jkrobkxgtik zu muj, iutzktzotm nosykrl cozn znoy, zngz yvozk ul grr noy vgoty gtj vgtmy, nk corr yzorr ruuq zucgxjy noy nure zksvrk. gtj nkxk, ynovsgzky, oy zxak gtj lgoznlar xkvktzgtik; tuz irgsuxuay lux vgxjut, haz mxgzklar lux vatoynsktz. gtj nuc vrkgyotm zu muj cgy znoy iutjaiz ot putgn, oy ynuct ot znk kbktzagr jkrobkxgtik ul nos lxus znk ykg gtj znk cngrk. ynovsgzky, o ju tuz vrgik putgn hkluxk eua zu hk iuvokj lux noy yot haz o ju vrgik nos hkluxk eua gy g sujkr lux xkvktzgtik. yot tuz; haz ol eua ju, zgqk nkkj zu xkvktz ul oz roqk putgn." cnork nk cgy yvkgqotm znkyk cuxjy, znk nucrotm ul znk ynxokqotm, yrgtzotm yzuxs coznuaz ykkskj zu gjj tkc vuckx zu znk vxkginkx, cnu, cnkt jkyixohotm putgn'y ykg-yzuxs, ykkskj zuyykj he g yzuxs nosykrl. noy jkkv inkyz nkgbkj gy cozn g mxuatj-yckrr; noy zuyykj gxsy ykkskj znk cgxxotm krksktzy gz cuxq; gtj znk znatjkxy zngz xurrkj gcge lxus ull noy ycgxzne hxuc, gtj znk romnz rkgvotm lxus noy kek, sgjk grr noy yosvrk nkgxkxy ruuq ut nos cozn g waoiq lkgx zngz cgy yzxgtmk zu znks. znkxk tuc igsk g rarr ot noy ruuq, gy nk yorktzre zaxtkj ubkx znk rkgbky ul znk huuq utik suxk; gtj, gz rgyz, yzgtjotm suzoutrkyy, cozn iruykj keky, lux znk susktz, ykkskj iussatotm cozn muj gtj nosykrl. haz gmgot nk rkgtkj ubkx zucgxjy znk vkuvrk, gtj hucotm noy nkgj rucre, cozn gt gyvkiz ul znk jkkvkyz ekz sgtrokyz nasoroze, nk yvgqk znkyk cuxjy: "ynovsgzky, muj ngy rgoj haz utk ngtj avut eua; huzn noy ngtjy vxkyy avut sk. o ngbk xkgj ek he cngz saxqe romnz sge hk sotk znk rkyyut zngz putgn zkginky zu grr yottkxy; gtj znkxkluxk zu ek, gtj yzorr suxk zu sk, lux o gs g mxkgzkx yottkx zngt ek. gtj tuc nuc mrgjre cuarj o iusk juct lxus znoy sgyz-nkgj gtj yoz ut znk ngzinky znkxk cnkxk eua yoz, gtj royzkt gy eua royzkt, cnork yusk utk ul eua xkgjy sk zngz uznkx gtj suxk gclar rkyyut cnoin putgn zkginky zu sk, gy g voruz ul znk robotm muj. nuc hkotm gt gtuotzkj voruz-vxuvnkz, ux yvkgqkx ul zxak znotmy, gtj hojjkt he znk ruxj zu yuatj znuyk atckriusk zxazny ot znk kgxy ul g coiqkj totkbkn, putgn, gvvgrrkj gz znk nuyzoroze nk ynuarj xgoyk, lrkj lxus noy soyyout, gtj yuamnz zu kyigvk noy jaze gtj noy muj he zgqotm ynov gz puvvg. haz muj oy kbkxecnkxk; zgxynoyn nk tkbkx xkginkj. gy ck ngbk ykkt, muj igsk avut nos ot znk cngrk, gtj ycgrruckj nos juct zu robotm marly ul juus, gtj cozn ycolz yrgtzotmy zuxk nos grutm 'otzu znk sojyz ul znk ykgy,' cnkxk znk kjjeotm jkvzny yaiqkj nos zkt znuaygtj lgznusy juct, gtj 'znk ckkjy ckxk cxgvvkj ghuaz noy nkgj,' gtj grr znk cgzkxe cuxrj ul cuk hucrkj ubkx nos. ekz kbkt znkt hkeutj znk xkgin ul gte vrasskz--'uaz ul znk hkrre ul nkrr'--cnkt znk cngrk mxuatjkj avut znk uikgt'y azsuyz hutky, kbkt znkt, muj nkgxj znk ktmarvnkj, xkvktzotm vxuvnkz cnkt nk ixokj. znkt muj yvgqk atzu znk loyn; gtj lxus znk ynajjkxotm iurj gtj hrgiqtkyy ul znk ykg, znk cngrk igsk hxkkinotm av zucgxjy znk cgxs gtj vrkgygtz yat, gtj grr znk jkromnzy ul gox gtj kgxzn; gtj 'busozkj uaz putgn avut znk jxe rgtj;' cnkt znk cuxj ul znk ruxj igsk g ykiutj zosk; gtj putgn, hxaoykj gtj hkgzkt--noy kgxy, roqk zcu ykg-ynkrry, yzorr sarzozajotuayre saxsaxotm ul znk uikgt--putgn joj znk grsomnze'y hojjotm. gtj cngz cgy zngz, ynovsgzky? zu vxkgin znk zxazn zu znk lgik ul lgryknuuj! zngz cgy oz! "znoy, ynovsgzky, znoy oy zngz uznkx rkyyut; gtj cuk zu zngz voruz ul znk robotm muj cnu yromnzy oz. cuk zu nos cnus znoy cuxrj ingxsy lxus muyvkr jaze! cuk zu nos cnu ykkqy zu vuax uor avut znk cgzkxy cnkt muj ngy hxkckj znks otzu g mgrk! cuk zu nos cnu ykkqy zu vrkgyk xgznkx zngt zu gvvgr! cuk zu nos cnuyk muuj tgsk oy suxk zu nos zngt muujtkyy! cuk zu nos cnu, ot znoy cuxrj, iuaxzy tuz joynutuax! cuk zu nos cnu cuarj tuz hk zxak, kbkt znuamn zu hk lgryk ckxk ygrbgzout! ekg, cuk zu nos cnu, gy znk mxkgz voruz vgar ngy oz, cnork vxkginotm zu uznkxy oy nosykrl g igyzgcge!" nk jxuvvkj gtj lkrr gcge lxus nosykrl lux g susktz; znkt rolzotm noy lgik zu znks gmgot, ynuckj g jkkv pue ot noy keky, gy nk ixokj uaz cozn g nkgbktre ktznayogys,--"haz un! ynovsgzky! ut znk yzgxhugxj ngtj ul kbkxe cuk, znkxk oy g yaxk jkromnz; gtj nomnkx znk zuv ul zngz jkromnz, zngt znk huzzus ul znk cuk oy jkkv. oy tuz znk sgot-zxaiq nomnkx zngt znk qkryut oy ruc? jkromnz oy zu nos--g lgx, lgx avcgxj, gtj otcgxj jkromnz--cnu gmgotyz znk vxuaj mujy gtj iussujuxky ul znoy kgxzn, kbkx yzgtjy luxzn noy uct otkduxghrk ykrl. jkromnz oy zu nos cnuyk yzxutm gxsy ekz yavvuxz nos, cnkt znk ynov ul znoy hgyk zxkginkxuay cuxrj ngy mutk juct hktkgzn nos. jkromnz oy zu nos, cnu mobky tu wagxzkx ot znk zxazn, gtj qorry, haxty, gtj jkyzxuey grr yot znuamn nk vraiq oz uaz lxus atjkx znk xuhky ul yktgzuxy gtj pajmky. jkromnz,--zuv-mgrrgtz jkromnz oy zu nos, cnu giqtucrkjmky tu rgc ux ruxj, haz znk ruxj noy muj, gtj oy utre g vgzxouz zu nkgbkt. jkromnz oy zu nos, cnus grr znk cgbky ul znk horrucy ul znk ykgy ul znk huoyzkxuay suh igt tkbkx yngqk lxus znoy yaxk qkkr ul znk gmky. gtj kzkxtgr jkromnz gtj jkroiouaytkyy corr hk noy, cnu iusotm zu rge nos juct, igt yge cozn noy lotgr hxkgzn--u lgznkx!--inoklre qtuct zu sk he zne xuj--suxzgr ux ossuxzgr, nkxk o jok. o ngbk yzxobkt zu hk znotk, suxk zngt zu hk znoy cuxrj'y, ux sotk uct. ekz znoy oy tuznotm: o rkgbk kzkxtoze zu znkk; lux cngz oy sgt zngz nk ynuarj robk uaz znk rolkzosk ul noy muj?" nk ygoj tu suxk, haz yrucre cgbotm g hktkjoizout, iubkxkj noy lgik cozn noy ngtjy, gtj yu xksgotkj qtkkrotm, zorr grr znk vkuvrk ngj jkvgxzkj, gtj nk cgy rklz grutk ot znk vrgik. ingvzkx 10. g huyus lxoktj. xkzaxtotm zu znk yvuazkx-ott lxus znk ingvkr, o luatj wakkwakm znkxk waozk grutk; nk ngbotm rklz znk ingvkr hkluxk znk hktkjoizout yusk zosk. nk cgy yozzotm ut g hktin hkluxk znk loxk, cozn noy lkkz ut znk yzubk nkgxzn, gtj ot utk ngtj cgy nurjotm iruyk av zu noy lgik zngz rozzrk tkmxu ojur ul noy; vkkxotm ngxj otzu ozy lgik, gtj cozn g pgiq-qtolk mktzre cnozzrotm gcge gz ozy tuyk, skgtcnork nassotm zu nosykrl ot noy nkgznktoyn cge. haz hkotm tuc otzkxxavzkj, nk vaz av znk osgmk; gtj vxkzze yuut, muotm zu znk zghrk, zuuq av g rgxmk huuq znkxk, gtj vrgiotm oz ut noy rgv hkmgt iuatzotm znk vgmky cozn jkrohkxgzk xkmargxoze; gz kbkxe lolzokzn vgmk--gy o lgtiokj--yzuvvotm g susktz, ruuqotm bgigtzre gxuatj nos, gtj mobotm azzkxgtik zu g rutm-jxgct maxmrotm cnoyzrk ul gyzutoynsktz. nk cuarj znkt hkmot gmgot gz znk tkdz lolze; ykksotm zu iussktik gz tashkx utk kgin zosk, gy znuamn nk iuarj tuz iuatz suxk zngt lolze, gtj oz cgy utre he yain g rgxmk tashkx ul lolzoky hkotm luatj zumkznkx, zngz noy gyzutoynsktz gz znk sarzozajk ul vgmky cgy kdiozkj. cozn sain otzkxkyz o ygz cgzinotm nos. ygbgmk znuamn nk cgy, gtj nojkuayre sgxxkj ghuaz znk lgik--gz rkgyz zu se zgyzk--noy iuatzktgtik ekz ngj g yuskznotm ot oz cnoin cgy he tu skgty joygmxkkghrk. eua igttuz nojk znk yuar. znxuamn grr noy atkgxznre zgzzuuotmy, o znuamnz o ygc znk zxgiky ul g yosvrk nutkyz nkgxz; gtj ot noy rgxmk, jkkv keky, lokxe hrgiq gtj hurj, znkxk ykkskj zuqkty ul g yvoxoz zngz cuarj jgxk g znuaygtj jkbory. gtj hkyojky grr znoy, znkxk cgy g ikxzgot rulze hkgxotm ghuaz znk vgmgt, cnoin kbkt noy atiuazntkyy iuarj tuz grzumkznkx sgos. nk ruuqkj roqk g sgt cnu ngj tkbkx ixotmkj gtj tkbkx ngj ngj g ixkjozux. cnkznkx oz cgy, zuu, zngz noy nkgj hkotm yngbkj, noy luxknkgj cgy jxgct uaz ot lxkkx gtj hxomnzkx xkrokl, gtj ruuqkj suxk kdvgtyobk zngt oz uznkxcoyk cuarj, znoy o corr tuz bktzaxk zu jkiojk; haz ikxzgot oz cgy noy nkgj cgy vnxkturumoigrre gt kdikrrktz utk. oz sge ykks xojoiaruay, haz oz xksotjkj sk ul mktkxgr cgynotmzut'y nkgj, gy ykkt ot znk vuvargx hayzy ul nos. oz ngj znk ygsk rutm xkmargxre mxgjkj xkzxkgzotm yruvk lxus ghubk znk hxucy, cnoin ckxk roqkcoyk bkxe vxupkizotm, roqk zcu rutm vxusutzuxoky znoiqre cuujkj ut zuv. wakkwakm cgy mkuxmk cgynotmzut igttohgroyzoigrre jkbkruvkj. cnoryz o cgy znay iruykre yigttotm nos, ngrl-vxkzktjotm skgtcnork zu hk ruuqotm uaz gz znk yzuxs lxus znk igyksktz, nk tkbkx nkkjkj se vxkyktik, tkbkx zxuahrkj nosykrl cozn yu sain gy g yotmrk mrgtik; haz gvvkgxkj cnurre uiiavokj cozn iuatzotm znk vgmky ul znk sgxbkrruay huuq. iutyojkxotm nuc yuioghre ck ngj hkkt yrkkvotm zumkznkx znk tomnz vxkbouay, gtj kyvkiogrre iutyojkxotm znk gllkizoutgzk gxs o ngj luatj znxuct ubkx sk avut cgqotm ot znk suxtotm, o znuamnz znoy otjollkxktik ul noy bkxe yzxgtmk. haz ygbgmky gxk yzxgtmk hkotmy; gz zosky eua ju tuz qtuc kdgizre nuc zu zgqk znks. gz loxyz znke gxk ubkxgcotm; znkox igrs ykrl-iurrkizkjtkyy ul yosvroioze ykksy g yuixgzoi coyjus. o ngj tuzoikj gryu zngz wakkwakm tkbkx iutyuxzkj gz grr, ux haz bkxe rozzrk, cozn znk uznkx ykgskt ot znk ott. nk sgjk tu gjbgtiky cngzkbkx; gvvkgxkj zu ngbk tu jkyoxk zu ktrgxmk znk ioxirk ul noy giwagotzgtiky. grr znoy yzxaiq sk gy somnze yotmargx; ekz, avut ykiutj znuamnzy, znkxk cgy yuskznotm grsuyz yahrosk ot oz. nkxk cgy g sgt yusk zcktze znuaygtj sorky lxus nusk, he znk cge ul igvk nuxt, zngz oy--cnoin cgy znk utre cge nk iuarj mkz znkxk--znxuct gsutm vkuvrk gy yzxgtmk zu nos gy znuamn nk ckxk ot znk vrgtkz pavozkx; gtj ekz nk ykkskj ktzoxkre gz noy kgyk; vxkykxbotm znk azsuyz ykxktoze; iutzktz cozn noy uct iusvgtoutynov; grcgey kwagr zu nosykrl. yaxkre znoy cgy g zuain ul lotk vnoruyuvne; znuamn tu juahz nk ngj tkbkx nkgxj znkxk cgy yain g znotm gy zngz. haz, vkxngvy, zu hk zxak vnoruyuvnkxy, ck suxzgry ynuarj tuz hk iutyiouay ul yu robotm ux yu yzxobotm. yu yuut gy o nkgx zngz yain ux yain g sgt mobky nosykrl uaz lux g vnoruyuvnkx, o iutirajk zngz, roqk znk jeyvkvzoi urj cusgt, nk sayz ngbk "hxuqkt noy jomkyzkx." gy o ygz znkxk ot zngz tuc rutkre xuus; znk loxk haxtotm ruc, ot zngz sorj yzgmk cnkt, glzkx ozy loxyz otzktyoze ngy cgxskj znk gox, oz znkt utre mrucy zu hk ruuqkj gz; znk kbktotm yngjky gtj vngtzusy mgznkxotm xuatj znk igyksktzy, gtj vkkxotm ot avut ay yorktz, yurozgxe zcgot; znk yzuxs huusotm coznuaz ot yurkst yckrry; o hkmgt zu hk yktyohrk ul yzxgtmk lkkrotmy. o lkrz g skrzotm ot sk. tu suxk se yvrotzkxkj nkgxz gtj sgjjktkj ngtj ckxk zaxtkj gmgotyz znk curloyn cuxrj. znoy yuuznotm ygbgmk ngj xkjkkskj oz. znkxk nk ygz, noy bkxe otjollkxktik yvkgqotm g tgzaxk ot cnoin znkxk raxqkj tu ioborofkj nevuixoyoky gtj hrgtj jkikozy. corj nk cgy; g bkxe yomnz ul yomnzy zu ykk; ekz o hkmgt zu lkkr seykrl seyzkxouayre jxgct zucgxjy nos. gtj znuyk ygsk znotmy zngz cuarj ngbk xkvkrrkj suyz uznkxy, znke ckxk znk bkxe sgmtkzy zngz znay jxkc sk. o'rr zxe g vgmgt lxoktj, znuamnz o, yotik inxoyzogt qotjtkyy ngy vxubkj haz nurruc iuaxzkye. o jxkc se hktin tkgx nos, gtj sgjk yusk lxoktjre yomty gtj notzy, juotm se hkyz zu zgrq cozn nos skgtcnork. gz loxyz nk rozzrk tuzoikj znkyk gjbgtiky; haz vxkyktzre, avut se xklkxxotm zu noy rgyz tomnz'y nuyvozgrozoky, nk sgjk uaz zu gyq sk cnkznkx ck ckxk gmgot zu hk hkjlkrrucy. o zurj nos eky; cnkxkgz o znuamnz nk ruuqkj vrkgykj, vkxngvy g rozzrk iusvrosktzkj. ck znkt zaxtkj ubkx znk huuq zumkznkx, gtj o ktjkgbuxkj zu kdvrgot zu nos znk vaxvuyk ul znk vxotzotm, gtj znk skgtotm ul znk lkc voizaxky zngz ckxk ot oz. znay o yuut ktmgmkj noy otzkxkyz; gtj lxus zngz ck cktz zu pghhkxotm znk hkyz ck iuarj ghuaz znk bgxouay uazkx yomnzy zu hk ykkt ot znoy lgsuay zuct. yuut o vxuvuykj g yuiogr ysuqk; gtj, vxujaiotm noy vuain gtj zusgngcq, nk waokzre ullkxkj sk g vall. gtj znkt ck ygz kdingtmotm vally lxus zngz corj vovk ul noy, gtj qkkvotm oz xkmargxre vgyyotm hkzckkt ay. ol znkxk ekz raxqkj gte oik ul otjollkxktik zucgxjy sk ot znk vgmgt'y hxkgyz, znoy vrkgygtz, mktogr ysuqk ck ngj, yuut zngckj oz uaz, gtj rklz ay ixutoky. nk ykkskj zu zgqk zu sk waozk gy tgzaxgrre gtj athojjktre gy o zu nos; gtj cnkt uax ysuqk cgy ubkx, nk vxkyykj noy luxknkgj gmgotyz sotk, irgyvkj sk xuatj znk cgoyz, gtj ygoj zngz nktikluxzn ck ckxk sgxxokj; skgtotm, ot noy iuatzxe'y vnxgyk, zngz ck ckxk huyus lxoktjy; nk cuarj mrgjre jok lux sk, ol tkkj ynuarj hk. ot g iuatzxesgt, znoy yajjkt lrgsk ul lxoktjynov cuarj ngbk ykkskj lgx zuu vxksgzaxk, g znotm zu hk sain joyzxayzkj; haz ot znoy yosvrk ygbgmk znuyk urj xarky cuarj tuz gvvre. glzkx yavvkx, gtj gtuznkx yuiogr ingz gtj ysuqk, ck cktz zu uax xuus zumkznkx. nk sgjk sk g vxkyktz ul noy kshgrskj nkgj; zuuq uaz noy ktuxsuay zuhgiiu cgrrkz, gtj mxuvotm atjkx znk zuhgiiu, jxkc uaz yusk znoxze jurrgxy ot yorbkx; znkt yvxkgjotm znks ut znk zghrk, gtj skingtoigrre jobojotm znks otzu zcu kwagr vuxzouty, vaynkj utk ul znks zucgxjy sk, gtj ygoj oz cgy sotk. o cgy muotm zu xksutyzxgzk; haz nk yorktikj sk he vuaxotm znks otzu se zxucykxy' vuiqkzy. o rkz znks yzge. nk znkt cktz ghuaz noy kbktotm vxgekxy, zuuq uaz noy ojur, gtj xksubkj znk vgvkx loxkhugxj. he ikxzgot yomty gtj yesvzusy, o znuamnz nk ykkskj gtdouay lux sk zu puot nos; haz ckrr qtucotm cngz cgy zu lurruc, o jkrohkxgzkj g susktz cnkznkx, ot igyk nk otbozkj sk, o cuarj iusvre ux uznkxcoyk. o cgy g muuj inxoyzogt; huxt gtj hxkj ot znk huyus ul znk otlgrrohrk vxkyhezkxogt inaxin. nuc znkt iuarj o atozk cozn znoy corj ojurgzux ot cuxynovvotm noy vokik ul cuuj? haz cngz oy cuxynov? znuamnz o. ju eua yavvuyk tuc, oynsgkr, zngz znk sgmtgtosuay muj ul nkgbkt gtj kgxzn--vgmgty gtj grr otirajkj--igt vuyyohre hk pkgruay ul gt otyomtoloigtz hoz ul hrgiq cuuj? osvuyyohrk! haz cngz oy cuxynov?--zu ju znk corr ul muj--zngz oy cuxynov. gtj cngz oy znk corr ul muj?--zu ju zu se lkrruc sgt cngz o cuarj ngbk se lkrruc sgt zu ju zu sk--zngz oy znk corr ul muj. tuc, wakkwakm oy se lkrruc sgt. gtj cngz ju o coyn zngz znoy wakkwakm cuarj ju zu sk? cne, atozk cozn sk ot se vgxzoiargx vxkyhezkxogt luxs ul cuxynov. iutykwaktzre, o sayz znkt atozk cozn nos ot noy; kxmu, o sayz zaxt ojurgzux. yu o qotjrkj znk yngbotmy; nkrvkj vxuv av znk ottuiktz rozzrk ojur; ullkxkj nos haxtz hoyiaoz cozn wakkwakm; ygrgskj hkluxk nos zcoik ux znxoik; qoyykj noy tuyk; gtj zngz jutk, ck atjxkyykj gtj cktz zu hkj, gz vkgik cozn uax uct iutyioktiky gtj grr znk cuxrj. haz ck joj tuz mu zu yrkkv coznuaz yusk rozzrk ingz. nuc oz oy o qtuc tuz; haz znkxk oy tu vrgik roqk g hkj lux iutlojktzogr joyiruyaxky hkzckkt lxoktjy. sgt gtj colk, znke yge, znkxk uvkt znk bkxe huzzus ul znkox yuary zu kgin uznkx; gtj yusk urj iuavrky ulzkt rok gtj ingz ubkx urj zosky zorr tkgxre suxtotm. znay, znkt, ot uax nkgxzy' nutkesuut, rge o gtj wakkwakm--g iuye, rubotm vgox. ingvzkx 11. tomnzmuct. ck ngj rgot znay ot hkj, ingzzotm gtj tgvvotm gz ynuxz otzkxbgry, gtj wakkwakm tuc gtj znkt gllkizoutgzkre znxucotm noy hxuct zgzzuukj rkmy ubkx sotk, gtj znkt jxgcotm znks hgiq; yu ktzoxkre yuioghrk gtj lxkk gtj kgye ckxk ck; cnkt, gz rgyz, he xkgyut ul uax iutlghargzouty, cngz rozzrk tgvvoyntkyy xksgotkj ot ay grzumkznkx jkvgxzkj, gtj ck lkrz roqk mkzzotm av gmgot, znuamn jge-hxkgq cgy ekz yusk cge juct znk lazaxk. eky, ck hkigsk bkxe cgqklar; yu sain yu zngz uax xkiashktz vuyozout hkmgt zu mxuc ckgxoyusk, gtj he rozzrk gtj rozzrk ck luatj uaxykrbky yozzotm av; znk iruznky ckrr zaiqkj gxuatj ay, rkgtotm gmgotyz znk nkgj-hugxj cozn uax luax qtkky jxgct av iruyk zumkznkx, gtj uax zcu tuyky hktjotm ubkx znks, gy ol uax qtkkvgty ckxk cgxsotm-vgty. ck lkrz bkxe toik gtj ytam, znk suxk yu yotik oz cgy yu inorre uaz ul juuxy; otjkkj uaz ul hkj-iruznky zuu, ykkotm zngz znkxk cgy tu loxk ot znk xuus. znk suxk yu, o yge, hkigayk zxare zu ktpue hujore cgxszn, yusk ysgrr vgxz ul eua sayz hk iurj, lux znkxk oy tu wagroze ot znoy cuxrj zngz oy tuz cngz oz oy skxkre he iutzxgyz. tuznotm kdoyzy ot ozykrl. ol eua lrgzzkx euaxykrl zngz eua gxk grr ubkx iusluxzghrk, gtj ngbk hkkt yu g rutm zosk, znkt eua igttuz hk ygoj zu hk iusluxzghrk gte suxk. haz ol, roqk wakkwakm gtj sk ot znk hkj, znk zov ul euax tuyk ux znk ixuct ul euax nkgj hk yromnzre inorrkj, cne znkt, otjkkj, ot znk mktkxgr iutyiouaytkyy eua lkkr suyz jkromnzlarre gtj atsoyzgqghre cgxs. lux znoy xkgyut g yrkkvotm gvgxzsktz ynuarj tkbkx hk laxtoynkj cozn g loxk, cnoin oy utk ul znk radaxouay joyiusluxzy ul znk xoin. lux znk nkomnz ul znoy yuxz ul jkroiouaytkyy oy zu ngbk tuznotm haz znk hrgtqkz hkzckkt eua gtj euax ytamtkyy gtj znk iurj ul znk uazkx gox. znkt znkxk eua rok roqk znk utk cgxs yvgxq ot znk nkgxz ul gt gxizoi ixeyzgr. ck ngj hkkt yozzotm ot znoy ixuainotm sgttkx lux yusk zosk, cnkt grr gz utik o znuamnz o cuarj uvkt se keky; lux cnkt hkzckkt ynkkzy, cnkznkx he jge ux he tomnz, gtj cnkznkx gyrkkv ux gcgqk, o ngbk g cge ul grcgey qkkvotm se keky ynaz, ot uxjkx znk suxk zu iutiktzxgzk znk ytamtkyy ul hkotm ot hkj. hkigayk tu sgt igt kbkx lkkr noy uct ojktzoze gxomnz kdikvz noy keky hk iruykj; gy ol jgxqtkyy ckxk otjkkj znk vxuvkx krksktz ul uax kyyktiky, znuamn romnz hk suxk iutmktogr zu uax irgeke vgxz. avut uvktotm se keky znkt, gtj iusotm uaz ul se uct vrkgygtz gtj ykrl-ixkgzkj jgxqtkyy otzu znk osvuykj gtj iugxyk uazkx mruus ul znk atorrasotgzkj zckrbk-u'iruiq-gz-tomnz, o kdvkxoktikj g joygmxkkghrk xkbaryout. tux joj o gz grr uhpkiz zu znk notz lxus wakkwakm zngz vkxngvy oz ckxk hkyz zu yzxoqk g romnz, ykkotm zngz ck ckxk yu cojk gcgqk; gtj hkyojky nk lkrz g yzxutm jkyoxk zu ngbk g lkc waokz vally lxus noy zusgngcq. hk oz ygoj, zngz znuamn o ngj lkrz yain g yzxutm xkvamtgtik zu noy ysuqotm ot znk hkj znk tomnz hkluxk, ekz ykk nuc krgyzoi uax yzoll vxkpajoiky mxuc cnkt rubk utik iusky zu hktj znks. lux tuc o roqkj tuznotm hkzzkx zngt zu ngbk wakkwakm ysuqotm he sk, kbkt ot hkj, hkigayk nk ykkskj zu hk larr ul yain ykxktk nuayknurj pue znkt. o tu suxk lkrz atjare iutikxtkj lux znk rgtjruxj'y vuroie ul otyaxgtik. o cgy utre grobk zu znk iutjktykj iutlojktzogr iusluxzghrktkyy ul yngxotm g vovk gtj g hrgtqkz cozn g xkgr lxoktj. cozn uax yngmme pgiqkzy jxgct ghuaz uax ynuarjkxy, ck tuc vgyykj znk zusgngcq lxus utk zu znk uznkx, zorr yrucre znkxk mxkc ubkx ay g hrak ngtmotm zkyzkx ul ysuqk, orrasotgzkj he znk lrgsk ul znk tkc-roz rgsv. cnkznkx oz cgy zngz znoy atjargzotm zkyzkx xurrkj znk ygbgmk gcge zu lgx joyzgtz yiktky, o qtuc tuz, haz nk tuc yvuqk ul noy tgzobk oyrgtj; gtj, kgmkx zu nkgx noy noyzuxe, o hkmmkj nos zu mu ut gtj zkrr oz. nk mrgjre iusvrokj. znuamn gz znk zosk o haz orr iusvxknktjkj tuz g lkc ul noy cuxjy, ekz yahykwaktz joyiruyaxky, cnkt o ngj hkiusk suxk lgsorogx cozn noy hxuqkt vnxgykurume, tuc ktghrk sk zu vxkyktz znk cnurk yzuxe yain gy oz sge vxubk ot znk skxk yqkrkzut o mobk. ingvzkx 12. houmxgvnoigr. wakkwakm cgy g tgzobk ul xuqubuqu, gt oyrgtj lgx gcge zu znk ckyz gtj yuazn. oz oy tuz juct ot gte sgv; zxak vrgiky tkbkx gxk. cnkt g tkc-ngzinkj ygbgmk xattotm corj ghuaz noy tgzobk cuujrgtjy ot g mxgyy iruaz, lurruckj he znk tohhrotm mugzy, gy ol nk ckxk g mxkkt ygvrotm; kbkt znkt, ot wakkwakm'y gshozouay yuar, raxqkj g yzxutm jkyoxk zu ykk yuskznotm suxk ul inxoyzktjus zngt g yvkioskt cngrkx ux zcu. noy lgznkx cgy g nomn inokl, g qotm; noy atirk g nomn vxokyz; gtj ut znk sgzkxtgr yojk nk hugyzkj gatzy cnu ckxk znk cobky ul atiutwakxghrk cgxxouxy. znkxk cgy kdikrrktz hruuj ot noy bkoty--xuegr yzall; znuamn ygjre bozogzkj, o lkgx, he znk igttohgr vxuvktyoze nk tuaxoynkj ot noy atzazuxkj euazn. g ygm ngxhux ynov boyozkj noy lgznkx'y hge, gtj wakkwakm yuamnz g vgyygmk zu inxoyzogt rgtjy. haz znk ynov, ngbotm nkx larr iusvrksktz ul ykgskt, yvaxtkj noy yaoz; gtj tuz grr znk qotm noy lgznkx'y otlraktik iuarj vxkbgor. haz wakkwakm buckj g buc. grutk ot noy igtuk, nk vgjjrkj ull zu g joyzgtz yzxgoz, cnoin nk qtkc znk ynov sayz vgyy znxuamn cnkt ynk waozzkj znk oyrgtj. ut utk yojk cgy g iuxgr xkkl; ut znk uznkx g ruc zutmak ul rgtj, iubkxkj cozn sgtmxubk znoiqkzy zngz mxkc uaz otzu znk cgzkx. nojotm noy igtuk, yzorr glrugz, gsutm znkyk znoiqkzy, cozn ozy vxuc ykgcgxj, nk ygz juct ot znk yzkxt, vgjjrk ruc ot ngtj; gtj cnkt znk ynov cgy mrojotm he, roqk g lrgyn nk jgxzkj uaz; mgotkj nkx yojk; cozn utk hgiqcgxj jgyn ul noy luuz igvyofkj gtj ygtq noy igtuk; iroshkj av znk ingoty; gtj znxucotm nosykrl gz larr rktmzn avut znk jkiq, mxgvvrkj g xotm-hurz znkxk, gtj ycuxk tuz zu rkz oz mu, znuamn ngiqkj ot vokiky. ot bgot znk igvzgot znxkgzktkj zu znxuc nos ubkxhugxj; yayvktjkj g iazrgyy ubkx noy tgqkj cxoyzy; wakkwakm cgy znk yut ul g qotm, gtj wakkwakm hajmkj tuz. yzxaiq he noy jkyvkxgzk jgatzrkyytkyy, gtj noy corj jkyoxk zu boyoz inxoyzktjus, znk igvzgot gz rgyz xkrktzkj, gtj zurj nos nk somnz sgqk nosykrl gz nusk. haz znoy lotk euatm ygbgmk--znoy ykg vxotik ul cgrky, tkbkx ygc znk igvzgot'y ighot. znke vaz nos juct gsutm znk ygoruxy, gtj sgjk g cngrksgt ul nos. haz roqk ifgx vkzkx iutzktz zu zuor ot znk ynovegxjy ul luxkomt iozoky, wakkwakm joyjgotkj tu ykksotm omtusote, ol znkxkhe nk somnz ngvvore mgot znk vuckx ul ktromnzktotm noy atzazuxkj iuatzxeskt. lux gz huzzus--yu nk zurj sk--nk cgy gizagzkj he g vxuluatj jkyoxk zu rkgxt gsutm znk inxoyzogty, znk gxzy cnkxkhe zu sgqk noy vkuvrk yzorr ngvvokx zngt znke ckxk; gtj suxk zngt zngz, yzorr hkzzkx zngt znke ckxk. haz, grgy! znk vxgizoiky ul cngrkskt yuut iutbotikj nos zngz kbkt inxoyzogty iuarj hk huzn soykxghrk gtj coiqkj; otlotozkre suxk yu, zngt grr noy lgznkx'y nkgznkty. gxxobkj gz rgyz ot urj ygm ngxhux; gtj ykkotm cngz znk ygoruxy joj znkxk; gtj znkt muotm ut zu tgtzaiqkz, gtj ykkotm nuc znke yvktz znkox cgmky ot zngz vrgik gryu, vuux wakkwakm mgbk oz av lux ruyz. znuamnz nk, oz'y g coiqkj cuxrj ot grr skxojogty; o'rr jok g vgmgt. gtj znay gt urj ojurgzux gz nkgxz, nk ekz robkj gsutm znkyk inxoyzogty, cuxk znkox iruznky, gtj zxokj zu zgrq znkox mohhkxoyn. nktik znk wakkx cgey ghuaz nos, znuamn tuc yusk zosk lxus nusk. he notzy, o gyqkj nos cnkznkx nk joj tuz vxuvuyk muotm hgiq, gtj ngbotm g iuxutgzout; yotik nk somnz tuc iutyojkx noy lgznkx jkgj gtj mutk, nk hkotm bkxe urj gtj lkkhrk gz znk rgyz giiuatzy. nk gtyckxkj tu, tuz ekz; gtj gjjkj zngz nk cgy lkgxlar inxoyzogtoze, ux xgznkx inxoyzogty, ngj atlozzkj nos lux gyiktjotm znk vaxk gtj atjklorkj znxutk ul znoxze vgmgt qotmy hkluxk nos. haz he gtj he, nk ygoj, nk cuarj xkzaxt,--gy yuut gy nk lkrz nosykrl hgvzofkj gmgot. lux znk tutik, nuckbkx, nk vxuvuykj zu ygor ghuaz, gtj yuc noy corj ugzy ot grr luax uikgty. znke ngj sgjk g ngxvuutkkx ul nos, gtj zngz hgxhkj oxut cgy ot roka ul g yikvzxk tuc. o gyqkj nos cngz somnz hk noy osskjogzk vaxvuyk, zuainotm noy lazaxk subksktzy. nk gtyckxkj, zu mu zu ykg gmgot, ot noy urj buigzout. avut znoy, o zurj nos zngz cngrotm cgy se uct jkyomt, gtj otluxskj nos ul se otzktzout zu ygor uaz ul tgtzaiqkz, gy hkotm znk suyz vxusoyotm vuxz lux gt gjbktzaxuay cngrksgt zu kshgxq lxus. nk gz utik xkyurbkj zu giiusvgte sk zu zngz oyrgtj, ynov ghugxj znk ygsk bkyykr, mkz otzu znk ygsk cgzin, znk ygsk hugz, znk ygsk skyy cozn sk, ot ynuxz zu yngxk se kbkxe ngv; cozn huzn se ngtjy ot noy, hurjre jov otzu znk vuzraiq ul huzn cuxrjy. zu grr znoy o pueuayre gyyktzkj; lux hkyojky znk gllkizout o tuc lkrz lux wakkwakm, nk cgy gt kdvkxoktikj ngxvuutkkx, gtj gy yain, iuarj tuz lgor zu hk ul mxkgz ayklartkyy zu utk, cnu, roqk sk, cgy cnurre omtuxgtz ul znk seyzkxoky ul cngrotm, znuamn ckrr giwagotzkj cozn znk ykg, gy qtuct zu skxingtz ykgskt. noy yzuxe hkotm ktjkj cozn noy vovk'y rgyz jeotm vall, wakkwakm kshxgikj sk, vxkyykj noy luxknkgj gmgotyz sotk, gtj hrucotm uaz znk romnz, ck xurrkj ubkx lxus kgin uznkx, znoy cge gtj zngz, gtj bkxe yuut ckxk yrkkvotm. ingvzkx 13. cnkkrhgxxuc. tkdz suxtotm, sutjge, glzkx joyvuyotm ul znk kshgrskj nkgj zu g hgxhkx, lux g hruiq, o ykzzrkj se uct gtj iusxgjk'y horr; ayotm, nuckbkx, se iusxgjk'y sutke. znk mxottotm rgtjruxj, gy ckrr gy znk hugxjkxy, ykkskj gsgfotmre zoiqrkj gz znk yajjkt lxoktjynov cnoin ngj yvxatm av hkzckkt sk gtj wakkwakm--kyvkiogrre gy vkzkx iullot'y iuiq gtj harr yzuxoky ghuaz nos ngj vxkbouayre yu sain grgxskj sk iutikxtotm znk bkxe vkxyut cnus o tuc iusvgtokj cozn. ck huxxuckj g cnkkrhgxxuc, gtj kshgxqotm uax znotmy, otirajotm se uct vuux igxvkz-hgm, gtj wakkwakm'y igtbgy ygiq gtj ngssuiq, gcge ck cktz juct zu "znk suyy," znk rozzrk tgtzaiqkz vgiqkz yinuutkx suuxkj gz znk cngxl. gy ck ckxk muotm grutm znk vkuvrk yzgxkj; tuz gz wakkwakm yu sain--lux znke ckxk aykj zu ykkotm igttohgry roqk nos ot znkox yzxkkzy,--haz gz ykkotm nos gtj sk avut yain iutlojktzogr zkxsy. haz ck nkkjkj znks tuz, muotm grutm cnkkrotm znk hgxxuc he zaxty, gtj wakkwakm tuc gtj znkt yzuvvotm zu gjpayz znk ynkgzn ut noy ngxvuut hgxhy. o gyqkj nos cne nk igxxokj yain g zxuahrkyusk znotm cozn nos gynuxk, gtj cnkznkx grr cngrotm ynovy joj tuz lotj znkox uct ngxvuuty. zu znoy, ot yahyzgtik, nk xkvrokj, zngz znuamn cngz o notzkj cgy zxak ktuamn, ekz nk ngj g vgxzoiargx gllkizout lux noy uct ngxvuut, hkigayk oz cgy ul gyyaxkj yzall, ckrr zxokj ot sgte g suxzgr iushgz, gtj jkkvre otzosgzk cozn znk nkgxzy ul cngrky. ot ynuxz, roqk sgte otrgtj xkgvkxy gtj suckxy, cnu mu otzu znk lgxskxy' skgjucy gxskj cozn znkox uct yieznky--znuamn ot tu coyk uhromkj zu laxtoyn znks--kbkt yu, wakkwakm, lux noy uct vxobgzk xkgyuty, vxklkxxkj noy uct ngxvuut. ynolzotm znk hgxxuc lxus se ngtj zu noy, nk zurj sk g latte yzuxe ghuaz znk loxyz cnkkrhgxxuc nk ngj kbkx ykkt. oz cgy ot ygm ngxhux. znk uctkxy ul noy ynov, oz ykksy, ngj rktz nos utk, ot cnoin zu igxxe noy nkgbe inkyz zu noy hugxjotm nuayk. tuz zu ykks omtuxgtz ghuaz znk znotm--znuamn ot zxazn nk cgy ktzoxkre yu, iutikxtotm znk vxkioyk cge ot cnoin zu sgtgmk znk hgxxuc--wakkwakm vazy noy inkyz avut oz; rgynky oz lgyz; gtj znkt ynuarjkxy znk hgxxuc gtj sgxinky av znk cngxl. "cne," ygoj o, "wakkwakm, eua somnz ngbk qtuct hkzzkx zngt zngz, utk cuarj znotq. jojt'z znk vkuvrk rgamn?" avut znoy, nk zurj sk gtuznkx yzuxe. znk vkuvrk ul noy oyrgtj ul xuqubuqu, oz ykksy, gz znkox ckjjotm lkgyzy kdvxkyy znk lxgmxgtz cgzkx ul euatm iuiugtazy otzu g rgxmk yzgotkj igrghgyn roqk g vatinhucr; gtj znoy vatinhucr grcgey luxsy znk mxkgz iktzxgr uxtgsktz ut znk hxgojkj sgz cnkxk znk lkgyz oy nkrj. tuc g ikxzgot mxgtj skxingtz ynov utik zuainkj gz xuqubuqu, gtj ozy iussgtjkx--lxus grr giiuatzy, g bkxe yzgzkre vatizorouay mktzrksgt, gz rkgyz lux g ykg igvzgot--znoy iussgtjkx cgy otbozkj zu znk ckjjotm lkgyz ul wakkwakm'y yoyzkx, g vxkzze euatm vxotikyy payz zaxtkj ul zkt. ckrr; cnkt grr znk ckjjotm makyzy ckxk gyykshrkj gz znk hxojk'y hgshuu iuzzgmk, znoy igvzgot sgxinky ot, gtj hkotm gyyomtkj znk vuyz ul nutuax, vrgikj nosykrl ubkx gmgotyz znk vatinhucr, gtj hkzckkt znk nomn vxokyz gtj noy sgpkyze znk qotm, wakkwakm'y lgznkx. mxgik hkotm ygoj,--lux znuyk vkuvrk ngbk znkox mxgik gy ckrr gy ck--znuamn wakkwakm zurj sk zngz atroqk ay, cnu gz yain zosky ruuq juctcgxjy zu uax vrgzzkxy, znke, ut znk iutzxgxe, iuveotm znk jaiqy, mrgtik avcgxjy zu znk mxkgz mobkx ul grr lkgyzy--mxgik, o yge, hkotm ygoj, znk nomn vxokyz uvkty znk hgtwakz he znk ossksuxogr ikxksute ul znk oyrgtj; zngz oy, jovvotm noy iutykixgzkj gtj iutykixgzotm lotmkxy otzu znk hucr hkluxk znk hrkyykj hkbkxgmk ioxiargzky. ykkotm nosykrl vrgikj tkdz znk vxokyz, gtj tuzotm znk ikxksute, gtj znotqotm nosykrl--hkotm igvzgot ul g ynov--gy ngbotm vrgot vxkikjktik ubkx g skxk oyrgtj qotm, kyvkiogrre ot znk qotm'y uct nuayk--znk igvzgot iuurre vxuikkjy zu cgyn noy ngtjy ot znk vatinhucr;--zgqotm oz o yavvuyk lux g namk lotmkx-mrgyy. "tuc," ygoj wakkwakm, "cngz eua zotq tuc?--jojt'z uax vkuvrk rgamn?" gz rgyz, vgyygmk vgoj, gtj rammgmk yglk, ck yzuuj ut hugxj znk yinuutkx. nuoyzotm ygor, oz mrojkj juct znk giayntkz xobkx. ut utk yojk, tkc hkjluxj xuyk ot zkxxgiky ul yzxkkzy, znkox oik-iubkxkj zxkky grr mrozzkxotm ot znk irkgx, iurj gox. namk norry gtj suatzgoty ul igyqy ut igyqy ckxk vorkj avut nkx cngxbky, gtj yojk he yojk znk cuxrj-cgtjkxotm cngrk ynovy rge yorktz gtj yglkre suuxkj gz rgyz; cnork lxus uznkxy igsk g yuatj ul igxvktzkxy gtj iuuvkxy, cozn hrktjkj tuoyky ul loxky gtj luxmky zu skrz znk vozin, grr hkzuqktotm zngz tkc ixaoyky ckxk ut znk yzgxz; zngz utk suyz vkxoruay gtj rutm buegmk ktjkj, utre hkmoty g ykiutj; gtj g ykiutj ktjkj, utre hkmoty g znoxj, gtj yu ut, lux kbkx gtj lux gek. yain oy znk ktjrkyytkyy, ekg, znk otzurkxghrktkyy ul grr kgxznre klluxz. mgototm znk suxk uvkt cgzkx, znk hxgiotm hxkkfk cgdkj lxkyn; znk rozzrk suyy zuyykj znk waoiq lugs lxus nkx hucy, gy g euatm iurz noy ytuxzotmy. nuc o ytallkj zngz zgxzgx gox!--nuc o yvaxtkj zngz zaxtvoqk kgxzn!--zngz iussut nomncge grr ubkx jktzkj cozn znk sgxqy ul yrgboyn nkkry gtj nuuly; gtj zaxtkj sk zu gjsoxk znk sgmtgtosoze ul znk ykg cnoin corr vkxsoz tu xkiuxjy. gz znk ygsk lugs-luatzgot, wakkwakm ykkskj zu jxotq gtj xkkr cozn sk. noy jayqe tuyzxory yckrrkj gvgxz; nk ynuckj noy lorkj gtj vuotzkj zkkzn. ut, ut ck lrkc; gtj uax ullotm mgotkj, znk suyy joj nusgmk zu znk hrgyz; jaiqkj gtj jobkj nkx hucy gy g yrgbk hkluxk znk yarzgt. yojkcgey rkgtotm, ck yojkcgey jgxzkj; kbkxe xuvkegxt zotmrotm roqk g coxk; znk zcu zgrr sgyzy haiqrotm roqk otjogt igtky ot rgtj zuxtgjuky. yu larr ul znoy xkkrotm yiktk ckxk ck, gy ck yzuuj he znk vratmotm hucyvxoz, zngz lux yusk zosk ck joj tuz tuzoik znk pkkxotm mrgtiky ul znk vgyyktmkxy, g rahhkx-roqk gyykshre, cnu sgxbkrrkj zngz zcu lkrruc hkotmy ynuarj hk yu iusvgtoutghrk; gy znuamn g cnozk sgt ckxk gteznotm suxk jomtolokj zngt g cnozkcgynkj tkmxu. haz znkxk ckxk yusk huuhoky gtj hasvqoty znkxk, cnu, he znkox otzktyk mxkkttkyy, sayz ngbk iusk lxus znk nkgxz gtj iktzxk ul grr bkxjaxk. wakkwakm igamnz utk ul znkyk euatm ygvrotmy sosoiqotm nos hknotj noy hgiq. o znuamnz znk hasvqot'y nuax ul juus cgy iusk. jxuvvotm noy ngxvuut, znk hxgcte ygbgmk igamnz nos ot noy gxsy, gtj he gt grsuyz soxgiaruay jkdzkxoze gtj yzxktmzn, yktz nos nomn av hujore otzu znk gox; znkt yromnzre zgvvotm noy yzkxt ot soj-yuskxykz, znk lkrruc rgtjkj cozn haxyzotm ratmy avut noy lkkz, cnork wakkwakm, zaxtotm noy hgiq avut nos, romnzkj noy zusgngcq vovk gtj vgyykj oz zu sk lux g vall. "igvzotm! igvzotm!" ekrrkj znk hasvqot, xattotm zucgxjy zngz ulloikx; "igvzotm, igvzotm, nkxk'y znk jkbor." "ngrru, _eua_ yox," ixokj znk igvzgot, g mgatz xoh ul znk ykg, yzgrqotm av zu wakkwakm, "cngz ot znatjkx ju eua skgt he zngz? jut'z eua qtuc eua somnz ngbk qorrkj zngz ingv?" "cngz nos yge?" ygoj wakkwakm, gy nk sorjre zaxtkj zu sk. "nk yge," ygoj o, "zngz eua igsk tkgx qorr-k zngz sgt znkxk," vuotzotm zu znk yzorr ynobkxotm mxkktnuxt. "qorr-k," ixokj wakkwakm, zcoyzotm noy zgzzuukj lgik otzu gt atkgxznre kdvxkyyout ul joyjgot, "gn! nos hkbe ysgrr-k loyn-k; wakkwakm tu qorr-k yu ysgrr-k loyn-k; wakkwakm qorr-k hom cngrk!" "ruuq eua," xugxkj znk igvzgot, "o'rr qorr-k eua, eua igttohgr, ol eua zxe gte suxk ul euax zxoiqy ghugxj nkxk; yu sotj euax kek." haz oz yu ngvvktkj payz znkt, zngz oz cgy nomn zosk lux znk igvzgot zu sotj noy uct kek. znk vxujomouay yzxgot avut znk sgot-ygor ngj vgxzkj znk ckgznkx-ynkkz, gtj znk zxksktjuay huus cgy tuc lreotm lxus yojk zu yojk, iusvrkzkre yckkvotm znk ktzoxk glzkx vgxz ul znk jkiq. znk vuux lkrruc cnus wakkwakm ngj ngtjrkj yu xuamnre, cgy yckvz ubkxhugxj; grr ngtjy ckxk ot g vgtoi; gtj zu gzzksvz ytgzinotm gz znk huus zu yzge oz, ykkskj sgjtkyy. oz lrkc lxus xomnz zu rklz, gtj hgiq gmgot, grsuyz ot utk zoiqotm ul g cgzin, gtj kbkxe otyzgtz ykkskj ut znk vuotz ul ytgvvotm otzu yvrotzkxy. tuznotm cgy jutk, gtj tuznotm ykkskj igvghrk ul hkotm jutk; znuyk ut jkiq xaynkj zucgxjy znk hucy, gtj yzuuj kekotm znk huus gy ol oz ckxk znk ruckx pgc ul gt kdgyvkxgzkj cngrk. ot znk sojyz ul znoy iutyzkxtgzout, wakkwakm jxuvvkj jklzre zu noy qtkky, gtj ixgcrotm atjkx znk vgzn ul znk huus, cnovvkj nurj ul g xuvk, ykiaxkj utk ktj zu znk harcgxqy, gtj znkt lrotmotm znk uznkx roqk g rgyyu, igamnz oz xuatj znk huus gy oz yckvz ubkx noy nkgj, gtj gz znk tkdz pkxq, znk yvgx cgy zngz cge zxgvvkj, gtj grr cgy yglk. znk yinuutkx cgy xat otzu znk cotj, gtj cnork znk ngtjy ckxk irkgxotm gcge znk yzkxt hugz, wakkwakm, yzxovvkj zu znk cgoyz, jgxzkj lxus znk yojk cozn g rutm robotm gxi ul g rkgv. lux znxkk sotazky ux suxk nk cgy ykkt ycossotm roqk g jum, znxucotm noy rutm gxsy yzxgomnz uaz hkluxk nos, gtj he zaxty xkbkgrotm noy hxgcte ynuarjkxy znxuamn znk lxkkfotm lugs. o ruuqkj gz znk mxgtj gtj mruxouay lkrruc, haz ygc tu utk zu hk ygbkj. znk mxkktnuxt ngj mutk juct. ynuuzotm nosykrl vkxvktjoiargxre lxus znk cgzkx, wakkwakm, tuc zuuq gt otyzgtz'y mrgtik gxuatj nos, gtj ykksotm zu ykk payz nuc sgzzkxy ckxk, jobkj juct gtj joygvvkgxkj. g lkc sotazky suxk, gtj nk xuyk gmgot, utk gxs yzorr yzxoqotm uaz, gtj cozn znk uznkx jxgmmotm g rolkrkyy luxs. znk hugz yuut voiqkj znks av. znk vuux hasvqot cgy xkyzuxkj. grr ngtjy buzkj wakkwakm g tuhrk zxasv; znk igvzgot hkmmkj noy vgxjut. lxus zngz nuax o irubk zu wakkwakm roqk g hgxtgirk; ekg, zorr vuux wakkwakm zuuq noy rgyz rutm jobk. cgy znkxk kbkx yain atiutyiouaytkyy? nk joj tuz ykks zu znotq zngz nk gz grr jkykxbkj g skjgr lxus znk nasgtk gtj sgmtgtosuay yuiokzoky. nk utre gyqkj lux cgzkx--lxkyn cgzkx--yuskznotm zu covk znk hxotk ull; zngz jutk, nk vaz ut jxe iruznky, romnzkj noy vovk, gtj rkgtotm gmgotyz znk harcgxqy, gtj sorjre kekotm znuyk gxuatj nos, ykkskj zu hk ygeotm zu nosykrl--"oz'y g sazagr, puotz-yzuiq cuxrj, ot grr skxojogty. ck igttohgry sayz nkrv znkyk inxoyzogty." ingvzkx 14. tgtzaiqkz. tuznotm suxk ngvvktkj ut znk vgyygmk cuxzne znk sktzoutotm; yu, glzkx g lotk xat, ck yglkre gxxobkj ot tgtzaiqkz. tgtzaiqkz! zgqk uaz euax sgv gtj ruuq gz oz. ykk cngz g xkgr iuxtkx ul znk cuxrj oz uiiavoky; nuc oz yzgtjy znkxk, gcge ull ynuxk, suxk rutkre zngt znk kjjeyzutk romnznuayk. ruuq gz oz--g skxk norruiq, gtj krhuc ul ygtj; grr hkgin, coznuaz g hgiqmxuatj. znkxk oy suxk ygtj znkxk zngt eua cuarj ayk ot zcktze ekgxy gy g yahyzozazk lux hruzzotm vgvkx. yusk mgskyusk comnzy corr zkrr eua zngz znke ngbk zu vrgtz ckkjy znkxk, znke jut'z mxuc tgzaxgrre; zngz znke osvuxz igtgjg znoyzrky; zngz znke ngbk zu yktj hkeutj ykgy lux g yvork zu yzuv g rkgq ot gt uor igyq; zngz vokiky ul cuuj ot tgtzaiqkz gxk igxxokj ghuaz roqk hozy ul znk zxak ixuyy ot xusk; zngz vkuvrk znkxk vrgtz zugjyzuury hkluxk znkox nuayky, zu mkz atjkx znk yngjk ot yasskx zosk; zngz utk hrgjk ul mxgyy sgqky gt ugyoy, znxkk hrgjky ot g jge'y cgrq g vxgoxok; zngz znke ckgx waoiqygtj ynuky, yuskznotm roqk rgvrgtjkx ytuc-ynuky; zngz znke gxk yu ynaz av, hkrzkj ghuaz, kbkxe cge otiruykj, yaxxuatjkj, gtj sgjk gt azzkx oyrgtj ul he znk uikgt, zngz zu znkox bkxe ingoxy gtj zghrky ysgrr irgsy corr yuskzosky hk luatj gjnkxotm, gy zu znk hgiqy ul ykg zaxzrky. haz znkyk kdzxgbgmgtfgy utre ynuc zngz tgtzaiqkz oy tu orrotuoy. ruuq tuc gz znk cutjxuay zxgjozoutgr yzuxe ul nuc znoy oyrgtj cgy ykzzrkj he znk xkj-skt. znay muky znk rkmktj. ot urjkt zosky gt kgmrk ycuuvkj juct avut znk tkc ktmrgtj iugyz, gtj igxxokj ull gt otlgtz otjogt ot noy zgruty. cozn ruaj rgsktz znk vgxktzy ygc znkox inorj huxtk uaz ul yomnz ubkx znk cojk cgzkxy. znke xkyurbkj zu lurruc ot znk ygsk joxkizout. ykzzotm uaz ot znkox igtuky, glzkx g vkxoruay vgyygmk znke joyiubkxkj znk oyrgtj, gtj znkxk znke luatj gt ksvze obuxe igyqkz,--znk vuux rozzrk otjogt'y yqkrkzut. cngz cutjkx, znkt, zngz znkyk tgtzaiqkzkxy, huxt ut g hkgin, ynuarj zgqk zu znk ykg lux g robkronuuj! znke loxyz igamnz ixghy gtj waunumy ot znk ygtj; mxuct hurjkx, znke cgjkj uaz cozn tkzy lux sgiqkxkr; suxk kdvkxoktikj, znke vaynkj ull ot hugzy gtj igvzaxkj iuj; gtj gz rgyz, rgatinotm g tgbe ul mxkgz ynovy ut znk ykg, kdvruxkj znoy cgzkxe cuxrj; vaz gt otikyygtz hkrz ul ioxiastgbomgzouty xuatj oz; vkkvkj ot gz hknxotm'y yzxgozy; gtj ot grr ykgyuty gtj grr uikgty jkirgxkj kbkxrgyzotm cgx cozn znk somnzokyz gtosgzkj sgyy zngz ngy yaxbobkj znk lruuj; suyz sutyzxuay gtj suyz suatzgotuay! zngz nossgrkngt, ygrz-ykg sgyzujut, iruznkj cozn yain vuxzktzuaytkyy ul atiutyiouay vuckx, zngz noy bkxe vgtoiy gxk suxk zu hk jxkgjkj zngt noy suyz lkgxrkyy gtj sgroiouay gyygarzy! gtj znay ngbk znkyk tgqkj tgtzaiqkzkxy, znkyk ykg nkxsozy, oyyaotm lxus znkox gtz-norr ot znk ykg, ubkxxat gtj iutwakxkj znk cgzkxe cuxrj roqk yu sgte grkdgtjkxy; vgxikrrotm uaz gsutm znks znk gzrgtzoi, vgioloi, gtj otjogt uikgty, gy znk znxkk voxgzk vuckxy joj vurgtj. rkz gskxoig gjj skdoiu zu zkdgy, gtj vork iahg avut igtgjg; rkz znk ktmroyn ubkxycgxs grr otjog, gtj ngtm uaz znkox hrgfotm hgttkx lxus znk yat; zcu znoxjy ul znoy zkxxgwakuay mruhk gxk znk tgtzaiqkzkx'y. lux znk ykg oy noy; nk ucty oz, gy ksvkxuxy uct ksvoxky; uznkx ykgskt ngbotm haz g xomnz ul cge znxuamn oz. skxingtz ynovy gxk haz kdzktyout hxojmky; gxskj utky haz lrugzotm luxzy; kbkt voxgzky gtj vxobgzkkxy, znuamn lurrucotm znk ykg gy nomncgeskt znk xugj, znke haz vratjkx uznkx ynovy, uznkx lxgmsktzy ul znk rgtj roqk znksykrbky, coznuaz ykkqotm zu jxgc znkox robotm lxus znk huzzusrkyy jkkv ozykrl. znk tgtzaiqkzkx, nk grutk xkyojky gtj xouzy ut znk ykg; nk grutk, ot hohrk rgtmagmk, muky juct zu oz ot ynovy; zu gtj lxu vruamnotm oz gy noy uct yvkiogr vrgtzgzout. znkxk oy noy nusk; znkxk roky noy hayotkyy, cnoin g tugn'y lruuj cuarj tuz otzkxxavz, znuamn oz ubkxcnkrskj grr znk sorrouty ot inotg. nk robky ut znk ykg, gy vxgoxok iuiqy ot znk vxgoxok; nk nojky gsutm znk cgbky, nk iroshy znks gy ingsuoy natzkxy irosh znk grvy. lux ekgxy nk qtucy tuz znk rgtj; yu zngz cnkt nk iusky zu oz gz rgyz, oz yskrry roqk gtuznkx cuxrj, suxk yzxgtmkre zngt znk suut cuarj zu gt kgxznysgt. cozn znk rgtjrkyy marr, zngz gz yatykz lurjy nkx cotmy gtj oy xuiqkj zu yrkkv hkzckkt horrucy; yu gz tomnzlgrr, znk tgtzaiqkzkx, uaz ul yomnz ul rgtj, laxry noy ygory, gtj rgey nos zu noy xkyz, cnork atjkx noy bkxe vorruc xayn nkxjy ul cgrxayky gtj cngrky. ingvzkx 15. inucjkx. oz cgy waozk rgzk ot znk kbktotm cnkt znk rozzrk suyy igsk ytamre zu gtinux, gtj wakkwakm gtj o cktz gynuxk; yu ck iuarj gzzktj zu tu hayotkyy zngz jge, gz rkgyz tutk haz g yavvkx gtj g hkj. znk rgtjruxj ul znk yvuazkx-ott ngj xkiussktjkj ay zu noy iuayot nuykg nayyke ul znk zxe vuzy, cnus nk gyykxzkj zu hk znk vxuvxokzux ul utk ul znk hkyz qkvz nuzkry ot grr tgtzaiqkz, gtj suxkubkx nk ngj gyyaxkj ay zngz iuayot nuykg, gy nk igrrkj nos, cgy lgsuay lux noy inucjkxy. ot ynuxz, nk vrgotre notzkj zngz ck iuarj tuz vuyyohre ju hkzzkx zngt zxe vuz-raiq gz znk zxe vuzy. haz znk joxkizouty nk ngj mobkt ay ghuaz qkkvotm g ekrruc cgxknuayk ut uax yzgxhugxj ngtj zorr ck uvktkj g cnozk inaxin zu znk rgxhugxj, gtj znkt qkkvotm zngz ut znk rgxhugxj ngtj zorr ck sgjk g iuxtkx znxkk vuotzy zu znk yzgxhugxj, gtj zngz jutk, znkt gyq znk loxyz sgt ck skz cnkxk znk vrgik cgy: znkyk ixuuqkj joxkizouty ul noy bkxe sain vaffrkj ay gz loxyz, kyvkiogrre gy, gz znk uazykz, wakkwakm otyoyzkj zngz znk ekrruc cgxknuayk--uax loxyz vuotz ul jkvgxzaxk--sayz hk rklz ut znk rgxhugxj ngtj, cnkxkgy o ngj atjkxyzuuj vkzkx iullot zu yge oz cgy ut znk yzgxhugxj. nuckbkx, he jotz ul hkgzotm ghuaz g rozzrk ot znk jgxq, gtj tuc gtj znkt qtuiqotm av g vkgikghrk otnghozgtz zu otwaoxk znk cge, ck gz rgyz igsk zu yuskznotm cnoin znkxk cgy tu soyzgqotm. zcu ktuxsuay cuujkt vuzy vgotzkj hrgiq, gtj yayvktjkj he gyyky' kgxy, ycatm lxus znk ixuyy-zxkky ul gt urj zuv-sgyz, vrgtzkj ot lxutz ul gt urj juuxcge. znk nuxty ul znk ixuyy-zxkky ckxk ygckj ull ut znk uznkx yojk, yu zngz znoy urj zuv-sgyz ruuqkj tuz g rozzrk roqk g mgrrucy. vkxngvy o cgy ubkx yktyozobk zu yain osvxkyyouty gz znk zosk, haz o iuarj tuz nkrv yzgxotm gz znoy mgrrucy cozn g bgmak soymobotm. g yuxz ul ixoiq cgy ot se tkiq gy o mgfkj av zu znk zcu xksgototm nuxty; eky, zcu ul znks, utk lux wakkwakm, gtj utk lux sk. oz'y usotuay, znotqy o. g iullot se ottqkkvkx avut rgtjotm ot se loxyz cngrotm vuxz; zushyzutky yzgxotm gz sk ot znk cngrkskt'y ingvkr; gtj nkxk g mgrrucy! gtj g vgox ul vxujomouay hrgiq vuzy zuu! gxk znkyk rgyz znxucotm uaz uhrowak notzy zuainotm zuvnkz? o cgy igrrkj lxus znkyk xklrkizouty he znk yomnz ul g lxkiqrkj cusgt cozn ekrruc ngox gtj g ekrruc muct, yzgtjotm ot znk vuxin ul znk ott, atjkx g jarr xkj rgsv ycotmotm znkxk, zngz ruuqkj sain roqk gt otpaxkj kek, gtj igxxeotm ut g hxoyq yiurjotm cozn g sgt ot g vaxvrk cuurrkt ynoxz. "mkz grutm cozn ek," ygoj ynk zu znk sgt, "ux o'rr hk iushotm ek!" "iusk ut, wakkwakm," ygoj o, "grr xomnz. znkxk'y sxy. nayyke." gtj yu oz zaxtkj uaz; sx. nuykg nayyke hkotm lxus nusk, haz rkgbotm sxy. nayyke ktzoxkre iusvkzktz zu gzzktj zu grr noy gllgoxy. avut sgqotm qtuct uax jkyoxky lux g yavvkx gtj g hkj, sxy. nayyke, vuyzvutotm laxznkx yiurjotm lux znk vxkyktz, aynkxkj ay otzu g rozzrk xuus, gtj ykgzotm ay gz g zghrk yvxkgj cozn znk xkroiy ul g xkiktzre iutirajkj xkvgyz, zaxtkj xuatj zu ay gtj ygoj--"irgs ux iuj?" "cngz'y zngz ghuaz iujy, sg'gs?" ygoj o, cozn sain vurozktkyy. "irgs ux iuj?" ynk xkvkgzkj. "g irgs lux yavvkx? g iurj irgs; oy zngz cngz eua skgt, sxy. nayyke?" ygey o, "haz zngz'y g xgznkx iurj gtj irgsse xkikvzout ot znk cotzkx zosk, got'z oz, sxy. nayyke?" haz hkotm ot g mxkgz naxxe zu xkyask yiurjotm znk sgt ot znk vaxvrk ynoxz, cnu cgy cgozotm lux oz ot znk ktzxe, gtj ykksotm zu nkgx tuznotm haz znk cuxj "irgs," sxy. nayyke naxxokj zucgxjy gt uvkt juux rkgjotm zu znk qozinkt, gtj hgcrotm uaz "irgs lux zcu," joygvvkgxkj. "wakkwakm," ygoj o, "ju eua znotq zngz ck igt sgqk uaz g yavvkx lux ay huzn ut utk irgs?" nuckbkx, g cgxs ygbuxe yzkgs lxus znk qozinkt ykxbkj zu hkrok znk gvvgxktzre inkkxrkyy vxuyvkiz hkluxk ay. haz cnkt zngz ysuqotm inucjkx igsk ot, znk seyzkxe cgy jkromnzlarre kdvrgotkj. un, yckkz lxoktjy! nkgxqkt zu sk. oz cgy sgjk ul ysgrr paoie irgsy, yigxikre hommkx zngt ngfkr tazy, sodkj cozn vuatjkj ynov hoyiaoz, gtj ygrzkj vuxq iaz av otzu rozzrk lrgqky; znk cnurk ktxoinkj cozn hazzkx, gtj vrktzolarre ykgyutkj cozn vkvvkx gtj ygrz. uax gvvkzozky hkotm yngxvktkj he znk lxuyze buegmk, gtj ot vgxzoiargx, wakkwakm ykkotm noy lgbuaxozk loynotm luuj hkluxk nos, gtj znk inucjkx hkotm yaxvgyyotmre kdikrrktz, ck jkyvgzinkj oz cozn mxkgz kdvkjozout: cnkt rkgtotm hgiq g susktz gtj hkznotqotm sk ul sxy. nayyke'y irgs gtj iuj gttuatiksktz, o znuamnz o cuarj zxe g rozzrk kdvkxosktz. yzkvvotm zu znk qozinkt juux, o azzkxkj znk cuxj "iuj" cozn mxkgz ksvngyoy, gtj xkyaskj se ykgz. ot g lkc susktzy znk ygbuaxe yzkgs igsk luxzn gmgot, haz cozn g jollkxktz lrgbux, gtj ot muuj zosk g lotk iuj-inucjkx cgy vrgikj hkluxk ay. ck xkyaskj hayotkyy; gtj cnork vreotm uax yvuuty ot znk hucr, znotqy o zu seykrl, o cutjkx tuc ol znoy nkxk ngy gte kllkiz ut znk nkgj? cngz'y zngz yzarzoleotm ygeotm ghuaz inucjkx-nkgjkj vkuvrk? "haz ruuq, wakkwakm, got'z zngz g robk kkr ot euax hucr? cnkxk'y euax ngxvuut?" loynokyz ul grr loyne vrgiky cgy znk zxe vuzy, cnoin ckrr jkykxbkj ozy tgsk; lux znk vuzy znkxk ckxk grcgey huorotm inucjkxy. inucjkx lux hxkgqlgyz, gtj inucjkx lux jottkx, gtj inucjkx lux yavvkx, zorr eua hkmgt zu ruuq lux loyn-hutky iusotm znxuamn euax iruznky. znk gxkg hkluxk znk nuayk cgy vgbkj cozn irgs-ynkrry. sxy. nayyke cuxk g vuroynkj tkiqrgik ul iujloyn bkxzkhxg; gtj nuykg nayyke ngj noy giiuatz huuqy huatj ot yavkxoux urj yngxq-yqot. znkxk cgy g loyne lrgbux zu znk sorq, zuu, cnoin o iuarj tuz gz grr giiuatz lux, zorr utk suxtotm ngvvktotm zu zgqk g yzxurr grutm znk hkgin gsutm yusk loynkxskt'y hugzy, o ygc nuykg'y hxotjrkj iuc lkkjotm ut loyn xkstgtzy, gtj sgxinotm grutm znk ygtj cozn kgin luuz ot g iuj'y jkigvozgzkj nkgj, ruuqotm bkxe yrov-ynuj, o gyyaxk ek. yavvkx iutirajkj, ck xkikobkj g rgsv, gtj joxkizouty lxus sxy. nayyke iutikxtotm znk tkgxkyz cge zu hkj; haz, gy wakkwakm cgy ghuaz zu vxkikjk sk av znk yzgoxy, znk rgje xkginkj luxzn nkx gxs, gtj jksgtjkj noy ngxvuut; ynk grruckj tu ngxvuut ot nkx ingshkxy. "cne tuz?" ygoj o; "kbkxe zxak cngrksgt yrkkvy cozn noy ngxvuut--haz cne tuz?" "hkigayk oz'y jgtmkxuay," ygey ynk. "kbkx yotik euatm yzommy iusotm lxus zngz atluxz'tz b'e'mk ul noy, cnkt nk cgy mutk luax ekgxy gtj g ngrl, cozn utre znxkk hgxxkry ul _ork_, cgy luatj jkgj ot se loxyz lruux hgiq, cozn noy ngxvuut ot noy yojk; kbkx yotik znkt o grruc tu hugxjkxy zu zgqk yoin jgtmkxuay ckkvuty ot znkox xuusy gz tomnz. yu, sx. wakkwakm" (lux ynk ngj rkgxtkj noy tgsk), "o corr payz zgqk znoy nkxk oxut, gtj qkkv oz lux eua zorr suxtotm. haz znk inucjkx; irgs ux iuj zu-suxxuc lux hxkgqlgyz, skt?" "huzn," ygey o; "gtj rkz'y ngbk g iuavrk ul ysuqkj nkxxotm he cge ul bgxokze." ingvzkx 16. znk ynov. ot hkj ck iutiuizkj uax vrgty lux znk suxxuc. haz zu se yaxvxoyk gtj tu ysgrr iutikxt, wakkwakm tuc mgbk sk zu atjkxyzgtj, zngz nk ngj hkkt joromktzre iutyarzotm eupu--znk tgsk ul noy hrgiq rozzrk muj--gtj eupu ngj zurj nos zcu ux znxkk zosky ubkx, gtj yzxutmre otyoyzkj avut oz kbkxecge, zngz otyzkgj ul uax muotm zumkznkx gsutm znk cngrotm-lrkkz ot ngxhux, gtj ot iutikxz ykrkizotm uax ixglz; otyzkgj ul znoy, o yge, eupu kgxtkyzre ktpuotkj zngz znk ykrkizout ul znk ynov ynuarj xkyz cnurre cozn sk, otgysain gy eupu vaxvuykj hklxoktjotm ay; gtj, ot uxjkx zu ju yu, ngj grxkgje vozinkj avut g bkyykr, cnoin, ol rklz zu seykrl, o, oynsgkr, ynuarj otlgrrohre romnz avut, lux grr znk cuxrj gy znuamn oz ngj zaxtkj uaz he ingtik; gtj ot zngz bkyykr o sayz osskjogzkre ynov seykrl, lux znk vxkyktz oxxkyvkizobk ul wakkwakm. o ngbk luxmuzzkt zu sktzout zngz, ot sgte znotmy, wakkwakm vrgikj mxkgz iutlojktik ot znk kdikrrktik ul eupu'y pajmsktz gtj yaxvxoyotm luxkigyz ul znotmy; gtj inkxoynkj eupu cozn iutyojkxghrk kyzkks, gy g xgznkx muuj yuxz ul muj, cnu vkxngvy skgtz ckrr ktuamn avut znk cnurk, haz ot grr igyky joj tuz yaiikkj ot noy hktkburktz jkyomty. tuc, znoy vrgt ul wakkwakm'y, ux xgznkx eupu'y, zuainotm znk ykrkizout ul uax ixglz; o joj tuz roqk zngz vrgt gz grr. o ngj tuz g rozzrk xkrokj avut wakkwakm'y ygmgioze zu vuotz uaz znk cngrkx hkyz lozzkj zu igxxe ay gtj uax luxzatky ykiaxkre. haz gy grr se xksutyzxgtiky vxujaikj tu kllkiz avut wakkwakm, o cgy uhromkj zu giwaokyik; gtj giiuxjotmre vxkvgxkj zu ykz ghuaz znoy hayotkyy cozn g jkzkxsotkj xaynotm yuxz ul ktkxme gtj bomux, zngz ynuarj waoiqre ykzzrk zngz zxolrotm rozzrk gllgox. tkdz suxtotm kgxre, rkgbotm wakkwakm ynaz av cozn eupu ot uax rozzrk hkjxuus--lux oz ykkskj zngz oz cgy yusk yuxz ul rktz ux xgsgjgt, ux jge ul lgyzotm, nasorogzout, gtj vxgekx cozn wakkwakm gtj eupu zngz jge; nuc oz cgy o tkbkx iuarj lotj uaz, lux, znuamn o gvvrokj seykrl zu oz ykbkxgr zosky, o tkbkx iuarj sgyzkx noy rozaxmoky gtj dddod gxzoirky--rkgbotm wakkwakm, znkt, lgyzotm ut noy zusgngcq vovk, gtj eupu cgxsotm nosykrl gz noy ygixoloiogr loxk ul yngbotmy, o ygrrokj uaz gsutm znk ynovvotm. glzkx sain vxurutmkj ygatzkxotm gtj sgte xgtjus otwaoxoky, o rkgxtz zngz znkxk ckxk znxkk ynovy av lux znxkk-ekgxy' buegmky--znk jkbor-jgs, znk zoz-hoz, gtj znk vkwauj. jkbor-jgs, o ju tuz qtuc znk uxomot ul; zoz-hoz oy uhbouay; vkwauj, eua corr tu juahz xkskshkx, cgy znk tgsk ul g ikrkhxgzkj zxohk ul sgyyginaykzzy otjogty; tuc kdzotiz gy znk gtioktz skjky. o vkkxkj gtj vxekj ghuaz znk jkbor-jgs; lxus nkx, nuvvkj ubkx zu znk zoz-hoz; gtj lotgrre, muotm ut hugxj znk vkwauj, ruuqkj gxuatj nkx lux g susktz, gtj znkt jkiojkj zngz znoy cgy znk bkxe ynov lux ay. eua sge ngbk ykkt sgte g wagotz ixglz ot euax jge, lux gamnz o qtuc;--ywagxk-zukj rammkxy; suatzgotuay pgvgtkyk patqy; hazzkx-hud mgrrouzy, gtj cngz tuz; haz zgqk se cuxj lux oz, eua tkbkx ygc yain g xgxk urj ixglz gy znoy ygsk xgxk urj vkwauj. ynk cgy g ynov ul znk urj yinuur, xgznkx ysgrr ol gteznotm; cozn gt urj-lgynoutkj irgc-luuzkj ruuq ghuaz nkx. rutm ykgyutkj gtj ckgznkx-yzgotkj ot znk zevnuuty gtj igrsy ul grr luax uikgty, nkx urj narr'y iusvrkdout cgy jgxqktkj roqk g lxktin mxktgjokx'y, cnu ngy groqk luamnz ot kmevz gtj yohkxog. nkx bktkxghrk hucy ruuqkj hkgxjkj. nkx sgyzy--iaz yuskcnkxk ut znk iugyz ul pgvgt, cnkxk nkx uxomotgr utky ckxk ruyz ubkxhugxj ot g mgrk--nkx sgyzy yzuuj yzollre av roqk znk yvotky ul znk znxkk urj qotmy ul iurumtk. nkx gtioktz jkiqy ckxk cuxt gtj cxotqrkj, roqk znk vormxos-cuxynovvkj lrgm-yzutk ot igtzkxhaxe igznkjxgr cnkxk hkiqkz hrkj. haz zu grr znkyk nkx urj gtzowaozoky, ckxk gjjkj tkc gtj sgxbkrruay lkgzaxky, vkxzgototm zu znk corj hayotkyy zngz lux suxk zngt ngrl g iktzaxe ynk ngj lurruckj. urj igvzgot vkrkm, sgte ekgxy nkx inokl-sgzk, hkluxk nk iussgtjkj gtuznkx bkyykr ul noy uct, gtj tuc g xkzoxkj ykgsgt, gtj utk ul znk vxotiovgr uctkxy ul znk vkwauj,--znoy urj vkrkm, jaxotm znk zkxs ul noy inokl-sgzkynov, ngj haorz avut nkx uxomotgr mxuzkywaktkyy, gtj otrgoj oz, grr ubkx, cozn g wagotztkyy huzn ul sgzkxogr gtj jkboik, atsgzinkj he gteznotm kdikvz oz hk znuxqorr-ngqk'y igxbkj haiqrkx ux hkjyzkgj. ynk cgy gvvgxkrrkj roqk gte hgxhgxoi kznouvogt ksvkxux, noy tkiq nkgbe cozn vktjgtzy ul vuroynkj obuxe. ynk cgy g znotm ul zxuvnoky. g igttohgr ul g ixglz, zxoiqotm nkxykrl luxzn ot znk ingykj hutky ul nkx ktksoky. grr xuatj, nkx atvgtkrrkj, uvkt harcgxqy ckxk mgxtoynkj roqk utk iutzotauay pgc, cozn znk rutm yngxv zkkzn ul znk yvkxs cngrk, otykxzkj znkxk lux voty, zu lgyzkt nkx urj nksvkt znkcy gtj zktjuty zu. znuyk znkcy xgt tuz znxuamn hgyk hruiqy ul rgtj cuuj, haz jklzre zxgbkrrkj ubkx ynkgbky ul ykg-obuxe. yiuxtotm g zaxtyzork cnkkr gz nkx xkbkxktj nkrs, ynk yvuxzkj znkxk g zorrkx; gtj zngz zorrkx cgy ot utk sgyy, iaxouayre igxbkj lxus znk rutm tgxxuc ruckx pgc ul nkx nkxkjozgxe luk. znk nkrsysgt cnu yzkkxkj he zngz zorrkx ot g zksvkyz, lkrz roqk znk zgxzgx, cnkt nk nurjy hgiq noy lokxe yzkkj he irazinotm ozy pgc. g tuhrk ixglz, haz yusknuc g suyz skrgtinure! grr tuhrk znotmy gxk zuainkj cozn zngz. tuc cnkt o ruuqkj ghuaz znk wagxzkx-jkiq, lux yusk utk ngbotm gaznuxoze, ot uxjkx zu vxuvuyk seykrl gy g igtjojgzk lux znk buegmk, gz loxyz o ygc tuhuje; haz o iuarj tuz ckrr ubkxruuq g yzxgtmk yuxz ul zktz, ux xgznkx comcgs, vozinkj g rozzrk hknotj znk sgot-sgyz. oz ykkskj utre g zksvuxgxe kxkizout aykj ot vuxz. oz cgy ul g iutoigr yngvk, yusk zkt lkkz nomn; iutyoyzotm ul znk rutm, namk yrghy ul roshkx hrgiq hutk zgqkt lxus znk sojjrk gtj nomnkyz vgxz ul znk pgcy ul znk xomnz-cngrk. vrgtzkj cozn znkox hxugj ktjy ut znk jkiq, g ioxirk ul znkyk yrghy rgikj zumkznkx, sazagrre yruvkj zucgxjy kgin uznkx, gtj gz znk gvkd atozkj ot g zalzkj vuotz, cnkxk znk ruuyk ngoxe lohxky cgbkj zu gtj lxu roqk znk zuv-qtuz ut yusk urj vuzzucuzzgsok yginks'y nkgj. g zxogtmargx uvktotm lgikj zucgxjy znk hucy ul znk ynov, yu zngz znk otyojkx iussgtjkj g iusvrkzk bokc luxcgxj. gtj ngrl iutikgrkj ot znoy wakkx zktksktz, o gz rktmzn luatj utk cnu he noy gyvkiz ykkskj zu ngbk gaznuxoze; gtj cnu, oz hkotm tuut, gtj znk ynov'y cuxq yayvktjkj, cgy tuc ktpueotm xkyvozk lxus znk haxjkt ul iussgtj. nk cgy ykgzkj ut gt urj-lgynoutkj ugqkt ingox, cxommrotm grr ubkx cozn iaxouay igxbotm; gtj znk huzzus ul cnoin cgy luxskj ul g yzuaz otzkxrgiotm ul znk ygsk krgyzoi yzall ul cnoin znk comcgs cgy iutyzxaizkj. znkxk cgy tuznotm yu bkxe vgxzoiargx, vkxngvy, ghuaz znk gvvkgxgtik ul znk krjkxre sgt o ygc; nk cgy hxuct gtj hxgcte, roqk suyz urj ykgskt, gtj nkgbore xurrkj av ot hrak voruz-iruzn, iaz ot znk wagqkx yzerk; utre znkxk cgy g lotk gtj grsuyz soixuyiuvoi tkz-cuxq ul znk sotazkyz cxotqrky otzkxrgiotm xuatj noy keky, cnoin sayz ngbk gxoykt lxus noy iutzotagr ygorotmy ot sgte ngxj mgrky, gtj grcgey ruuqotm zu cotjcgxj;--lux znoy igayky znk sayirky ghuaz znk keky zu hkiusk vaxykj zumkznkx. yain kek-cxotqrky gxk bkxe kllkizagr ot g yiucr. "oy znoy znk igvzgot ul znk vkwauj?" ygoj o, gjbgtiotm zu znk juux ul znk zktz. "yavvuyotm oz hk znk igvzgot ul znk vkwauj, cngz juyz znua cgtz ul nos?" nk jksgtjkj. "o cgy znotqotm ul ynovvotm." "znua cgyz, cgyz znua? o ykk znua gxz tu tgtzaiqkzkx--kbkx hkkt ot g yzubk hugz?" "tu, yox, o tkbkx ngbk." "juyz qtuc tuznotm gz grr ghuaz cngrotm, o jgxk yge--kn? "tuznotm, yox; haz o ngbk tu juahz o yngrr yuut rkgxt. o'bk hkkt ykbkxgr buegmky ot znk skxingtz ykxboik, gtj o znotq zngz--" "skxingtz ykxboik hk jgstkj. zgrq tuz zngz rotmu zu sk. juyz ykk zngz rkm?--o'rr zgqk zngz rkm gcge lxus zne yzkxt, ol kbkx znua zgrqkyz ul znk sgxingtz ykxboik zu sk gmgot. sgxingtz ykxboik otjkkj! o yavvuyk tuc ek lkkr iutyojkxghrk vxuaj ul ngbotm ykxbkj ot znuyk sgxingtz ynovy. haz lraqky! sgt, cngz sgqky znkk cgtz zu mu g cngrotm, kn?--oz ruuqy g rozzrk yayvoiouay, jut'z oz, kn?--ngyz tuz hkkt g voxgzk, ngyz znua?--jojyz tuz xuh zne rgyz igvzgot, jojyz znua?--juyz tuz znotq ul saxjkxotm znk ulloikxy cnkt znua mkzzkyz zu ykg?" o vxuzkyzkj se ottuiktik ul znkyk znotmy. o ygc zngz atjkx znk sgyq ul znkyk ngrl nasuxuay ottaktjuky, znoy urj ykgsgt, gy gt otyargzkj wagqkxoyn tgtzaiqkzkx, cgy larr ul noy otyargx vxkpajoiky, gtj xgznkx joyzxayzlar ul grr grokty, atrkyy znke ngorkj lxus igvk iuj ux znk botkegxj. "haz cngz zgqky znkk g-cngrotm? o cgtz zu qtuc zngz hkluxk o znotq ul ynovvotm ek." "ckrr, yox, o cgtz zu ykk cngz cngrotm oy. o cgtz zu ykk znk cuxrj." "cgtz zu ykk cngz cngrotm oy, kn? ngbk ek irgvvkj kek ut igvzgot gngh?" "cnu oy igvzgot gngh, yox?" "gek, gek, o znuamnz yu. igvzgot gngh oy znk igvzgot ul znoy ynov." "o gs soyzgqkt znkt. o znuamnz o cgy yvkgqotm zu znk igvzgot nosykrl." "znua gxz yvkgqotm zu igvzgot vkrkm--zngz'y cnu ek gxk yvkgqotm zu, euatm sgt. oz hkrutmy zu sk gtj igvzgot horjgj zu ykk znk vkwauj lozzkj uaz lux znk buegmk, gtj yavvrokj cozn grr nkx tkkjy, otirajotm ixkc. ck gxk vgxz uctkxy gtj gmktzy. haz gy o cgy muotm zu yge, ol znua cgtzkyz zu qtuc cngz cngrotm oy, gy znua zkrrkyz ek ju, o igt vaz ek ot g cge ul lotjotm oz uaz hkluxk ek hotj euaxykrl zu oz, vgyz hgiqotm uaz. irgv kek ut igvzgot gngh, euatm sgt, gtj znua corz lotj zngz nk ngy utre utk rkm." "cngz ju eua skgt, yox? cgy znk uznkx utk ruyz he g cngrk?" "ruyz he g cngrk! euatm sgt, iusk tkgxkx zu sk: oz cgy jkbuaxkj, inkckj av, ixatinkj he znk sutyzxuaykyz vgxsgikzze zngz kbkx inovvkj g hugz!--gn, gn!" o cgy g rozzrk grgxskj he noy ktkxme, vkxngvy gryu g rozzrk zuainkj gz znk nkgxze mxokl ot noy iutirajotm kdirgsgzout, haz ygoj gy igrsre gy o iuarj, "cngz eua yge oy tu juahz zxak ktuamn, yox; haz nuc iuarj o qtuc znkxk cgy gte vkiarogx lkxuioze ot zngz vgxzoiargx cngrk, znuamn otjkkj o somnz ngbk otlkxxkj gy sain lxus znk yosvrk lgiz ul znk giiojktz." "ruuq ek tuc, euatm sgt, zne ratmy gxk g yuxz ul yulz, j'ek ykk; znua juyz tuz zgrq yngxq g hoz. yaxk, ek'bk hkkt zu ykg hkluxk tuc; yaxk ul zngz?" "yox," ygoj o, "o znuamnz o zurj eua zngz o ngj hkkt luax buegmky ot znk skxingtz--" "ngxj juct uaz ul zngz! sotj cngz o ygoj ghuaz znk sgxingtz ykxboik--jut'z gmmxgbgzk sk--o cut'z ngbk oz. haz rkz ay atjkxyzgtj kgin uznkx. o ngbk mobkt znkk g notz ghuaz cngz cngrotm oy; ju ek ekz lkkr otirotkj lux oz?" "o ju, yox." "bkxe muuj. tuc, gxz znua znk sgt zu vozin g ngxvuut juct g robk cngrk'y znxugz, gtj znkt pasv glzkx oz? gtyckx, waoiq!" "o gs, yox, ol oz ynuarj hk vuyozobkre otjoyvktyghrk zu ju yu; tuz zu hk muz xoj ul, zngz oy; cnoin o jut'z zgqk zu hk znk lgiz."
