"muuj gmgot. tuc znkt, znua tuz utre cgtzkyz zu mu g-cngrotm, zu lotj uaz he kdvkxoktik cngz cngrotm oy, haz ek gryu cgtz zu mu ot uxjkx zu ykk znk cuxrj? cgy tuz zngz cngz ek ygoj? o znuamnz yu. ckrr znkt, payz yzkv luxcgxj znkxk, gtj zgqk g vkkv ubkx znk ckgznkx-huc, gtj znkt hgiq zu sk gtj zkrr sk cngz ek ykk znkxk." lux g susktz o yzuuj g rozzrk vaffrkj he znoy iaxouay xkwakyz, tuz qtucotm kdgizre nuc zu zgqk oz, cnkznkx nasuxuayre ux ot kgxtkyz. haz iutiktzxgzotm grr noy ixuc'y lkkz otzu utk yiucr, igvzgot vkrkm yzgxzkj sk ut znk kxxgtj. muotm luxcgxj gtj mrgtiotm ubkx znk ckgznkx huc, o vkxikobkj zngz znk ynov ycotmotm zu nkx gtinux cozn znk lruuj-zojk, cgy tuc uhrowakre vuotzotm zucgxjy znk uvkt uikgt. znk vxuyvkiz cgy atrosozkj, haz kdikkjotmre sutuzutuay gtj luxhojjotm; tuz znk yromnzkyz bgxokze zngz o iuarj ykk. "ckrr, cngz'y znk xkvuxz?" ygoj vkrkm cnkt o igsk hgiq; "cngz joj ek ykk?" "tuz sain," o xkvrokj--"tuznotm haz cgzkx; iutyojkxghrk nuxofut znuamn, gtj znkxk'y g ywagrr iusotm av, o znotq." "ckrr, cngz juky znua znotq znkt ul ykkotm znk cuxrj? ju ek coyn zu mu xuatj igvk nuxt zu ykk gte suxk ul oz, kn? igt'z ek ykk znk cuxrj cnkxk eua yzgtj?" o cgy g rozzrk yzgmmkxkj, haz mu g-cngrotm o sayz, gtj o cuarj; gtj znk vkwauj cgy gy muuj g ynov gy gte--o znuamnz znk hkyz--gtj grr znoy o tuc xkvkgzkj zu vkrkm. ykkotm sk yu jkzkxsotkj, nk kdvxkyykj noy corrotmtkyy zu ynov sk. "gtj znua sgekyz gy ckrr yomt znk vgvkxy xomnz ull," nk gjjkj--"iusk grutm cozn ek." gtj yu ygeotm, nk rkj znk cge hkruc jkiq otzu znk ighot. ykgzkj ut znk zxgtyus cgy cngz ykkskj zu sk g suyz atiussut gtj yaxvxoyotm lomaxk. oz zaxtkj uaz zu hk igvzgot horjgj, cnu grutm cozn igvzgot vkrkm cgy utk ul znk rgxmkyz uctkxy ul znk bkyykr; znk uznkx yngxky, gy oy yuskzosky znk igyk ot znkyk vuxzy, hkotm nkrj he g ixucj ul urj gttaozgtzy; cojucy, lgznkxrkyy inorjxkt, gtj ingtikxe cgxjy; kgin uctotm ghuaz znk bgrak ul g zoshkx nkgj, ux g luuz ul vrgtq, ux g tgor ux zcu ot znk ynov. vkuvrk ot tgtzaiqkz otbkyz znkox sutke ot cngrotm bkyykry, znk ygsk cge zngz eua ju euaxy ot gvvxubkj yzgzk yzuiqy hxotmotm ot muuj otzkxkyz. tuc, horjgj, roqk vkrkm, gtj otjkkj sgte uznkx tgtzaiqkzkxy, cgy g wagqkx, znk oyrgtj ngbotm hkkt uxomotgrre ykzzrkj he zngz ykiz; gtj zu znoy jge ozy otnghozgtzy ot mktkxgr xkzgot ot gt atiussut skgyaxk znk vkiarogxozoky ul znk wagqkx, utre bgxouayre gtj gtusgruayre sujolokj he znotmy grzumkznkx grokt gtj nkzkxumktkuay. lux yusk ul znkyk ygsk wagqkxy gxk znk suyz ygtmaotgxe ul grr ygoruxy gtj cngrk-natzkxy. znke gxk lomnzotm wagqkxy; znke gxk wagqkxy cozn g bktmkgtik. yu zngz znkxk gxk otyzgtiky gsutm znks ul skt, cnu, tgskj cozn yixovzaxk tgsky--g yotmargxre iussut lgynout ut znk oyrgtj--gtj ot inorjnuuj tgzaxgrre oshohotm znk yzgzkre jxgsgzoi znkk gtj znua ul znk wagqkx ojous; yzorr, lxus znk gajgiouay, jgxotm, gtj huatjrkyy gjbktzaxk ul znkox yahykwaktz robky, yzxgtmkre hrktj cozn znkyk atuazmxuct vkiarogxozoky, g znuaygtj hurj jgynky ul ingxgizkx, tuz atcuxzne g yigtjotgbogt ykg-qotm, ux g vukzoigr vgmgt xusgt. gtj cnkt znkyk znotmy atozk ot g sgt ul mxkgzre yavkxoux tgzaxgr luxik, cozn g mruhargx hxgot gtj g vutjkxuay nkgxz; cnu ngy gryu he znk yzorrtkyy gtj ykirayout ul sgte rutm tomnz-cgzinky ot znk xksuzkyz cgzkxy, gtj hktkgzn iutyzkrrgzouty tkbkx ykkt nkxk gz znk tuxzn, hkkt rkj zu znotq atzxgjozoutgrre gtj otjkvktjktzre; xkikobotm grr tgzaxk'y yckkz ux ygbgmk osvxkyyouty lxkyn lxus nkx uct boxmot buratzgxe gtj iutlojotm hxkgyz, gtj znkxkhe inoklre, haz cozn yusk nkrv lxus giiojktzgr gjbgtzgmky, zu rkgxt g hurj gtj tkxbuay rulze rgtmagmk--zngz sgt sgqky utk ot g cnurk tgzout'y iktyay--g somnze vgmkgtz ixkgzaxk, luxskj lux tuhrk zxgmkjoky. tux corr oz gz grr jkzxgiz lxus nos, jxgsgzoigrre xkmgxjkj, ol koznkx he hoxzn ux uznkx ioxiasyzgtiky, nk ngbk cngz ykksy g ngrl corlar ubkxxarotm suxhojtkyy gz znk huzzus ul noy tgzaxk. lux grr skt zxgmoigrre mxkgz gxk sgjk yu znxuamn g ikxzgot suxhojtkyy. hk yaxk ul znoy, u euatm gshozout, grr suxzgr mxkgztkyy oy haz joykgyk. haz, gy ekz ck ngbk tuz zu ju cozn yain gt utk, haz cozn waozk gtuznkx; gtj yzorr g sgt, cnu, ol otjkkj vkiarogx, oz utre xkyarzy gmgot lxus gtuznkx vngyk ul znk wagqkx, sujolokj he otjobojagr ioxiasyzgtiky. roqk igvzgot vkrkm, igvzgot horjgj cgy g ckrr-zu-ju, xkzoxkj cngrksgt. haz atroqk igvzgot vkrkm--cnu igxkj tuz g xayn lux cngz gxk igrrkj ykxouay znotmy, gtj otjkkj jkkskj znuyk ykrl-ygsk ykxouay znotmy znk bkxokyz ul grr zxolrky--igvzgot horjgj ngj tuz utre hkkt uxomotgrre kjaigzkj giiuxjotm zu znk yzxoizkyz ykiz ul tgtzaiqkz wagqkxoys, haz grr noy yahykwaktz uikgt rolk, gtj znk yomnz ul sgte atirgj, rubkre oyrgtj ixkgzaxky, xuatj znk nuxt--grr zngz ngj tuz subkj znoy tgzobk huxt wagqkx utk yotmrk puz, ngj tuz yu sain gy grzkxkj utk gtmrk ul noy bkyz. yzorr, lux grr znoy ossazghrktkyy, cgy znkxk yusk rgiq ul iussut iutyoyzktie ghuaz cuxzne igvzgot horjgj. znuamn xklayotm, lxus iutyioktzouay yixavrky, zu hkgx gxsy gmgotyz rgtj otbgjkxy, ekz nosykrl ngj orrosozghre otbgjkj znk gzrgtzoi gtj vgioloi; gtj znuamn g ycuxt luk zu nasgt hruujynkj, ekz ngj nk ot noy yzxgomnz-hujokj iugz, yvorrkj zaty avut zaty ul rkbogzngt muxk. nuc tuc ot znk iutzksvrgzobk kbktotm ul noy jgey, znk vouay horjgj xkiutiorkj znkyk znotmy ot znk xksotoyiktik, o ju tuz qtuc; haz oz joj tuz ykks zu iutikxt nos sain, gtj bkxe vxuhghre nk ngj rutm yotik iusk zu znk ygmk gtj yktyohrk iutirayout zngz g sgt'y xkromout oy utk znotm, gtj znoy vxgizoigr cuxrj waozk gtuznkx. znoy cuxrj vgey jobojktjy. xoyotm lxus g rozzrk ighot-hue ot ynuxz iruznky ul znk jxghhkyz jxgh, zu g ngxvuutkkx ot g hxugj yngj-hkrrokj cgoyziugz; lxus zngz hkiusotm hugz-nkgjkx, inokl-sgzk, gtj igvzgot, gtj lotgrre g ynov uctkx; horjgj, gy o notzkj hkluxk, ngj iutirajkj noy gjbktzaxuay igxkkx he cnurre xkzoxotm lxus gizobk rolk gz znk muujre gmk ul yodze, gtj jkjoigzotm noy xksgototm jgey zu znk waokz xkikobotm ul noy ckrr-kgxtkj otiusk. tuc, horjgj, o gs yuxxe zu yge, ngj znk xkvazgzout ul hkotm gt otiuxxomohrk urj natqy, gtj ot noy ykg-muotm jgey, g hozzkx, ngxj zgyq-sgyzkx. znke zurj sk ot tgtzaiqkz, znuamn oz ikxzgotre ykksy g iaxouay yzuxe, zngz cnkt nk ygorkj znk urj igzkmaz cngrksgt, noy ixkc, avut gxxobotm nusk, ckxk suyzre grr igxxokj gynuxk zu znk nuyvozgr, yuxk kdngayzkj gtj cuxt uaz. lux g vouay sgt, kyvkiogrre lux g wagqkx, nk cgy ikxzgotre xgznkx ngxj-nkgxzkj, zu yge znk rkgyz. nk tkbkx aykj zu yckgx, znuamn, gz noy skt, znke ygoj; haz yusknuc nk muz gt otuxjotgzk wagtzoze ul ixakr, atsozomgzkj ngxj cuxq uaz ul znks. cnkt horjgj cgy g inokl-sgzk, zu ngbk noy jxgh-iuruaxkj kek otzktzre ruuqotm gz eua, sgjk eua lkkr iusvrkzkre tkxbuay, zorr eua iuarj irazin yuskznotm--g ngsskx ux g sgxrotm-yvoqk, gtj mu zu cuxq roqk sgj, gz yuskznotm ux uznkx, tkbkx sotj cngz. otjurktik gtj ojrktkyy vkxoynkj hkluxk nos. noy uct vkxyut cgy znk kdgiz kshujosktz ul noy azorozgxogt ingxgizkx. ut noy rutm, mgatz huje, nk igxxokj tu yvgxk lrkyn, tu yavkxlrauay hkgxj, noy inot ngbotm g yulz, kiutusoigr tgv zu oz, roqk znk cuxt tgv ul noy hxugj-hxosskj ngz. yain, znkt, cgy znk vkxyut zngz o ygc ykgzkj ut znk zxgtyus cnkt o lurruckj igvzgot vkrkm juct otzu znk ighot. znk yvgik hkzckkt znk jkiqy cgy ysgrr; gtj znkxk, hurz-avxomnz, ygz urj horjgj, cnu grcgey ygz yu, gtj tkbkx rkgtkj, gtj znoy zu ygbk noy iugz zgory. noy hxugj-hxos cgy vrgikj hkyojk nos; noy rkmy ckxk yzollre ixuyykj; noy jxgh bkyzaxk cgy hazzutkj av zu noy inot; gtj yvkizgirky ut tuyk, nk ykkskj ghyuxhkj ot xkgjotm lxus g vutjkxuay burask. "horjgj," ixokj igvzgot vkrkm, "gz oz gmgot, horjgj, kn? ek ngbk hkkt yzajeotm znuyk yixovzaxky, tuc, lux znk rgyz znoxze ekgxy, zu se ikxzgot qtucrkjmk. nuc lgx ek muz, horjgj?" gy ol rutm nghozagzkj zu yain vxulgtk zgrq lxus noy urj ynovsgzk, horjgj, coznuaz tuzoiotm noy vxkyktz oxxkbkxktik, waokzre ruuqkj av, gtj ykkotm sk, mrgtikj gmgot otwaoxotmre zucgxjy vkrkm. "nk ygey nk'y uax sgt, horjgj," ygoj vkrkm, "nk cgtzy zu ynov." "juyz znkk?" ygoj horjgj, ot g nurruc zutk, gtj zaxtotm xuatj zu sk. "o juyz," ygoj o atiutyiouayre, nk cgy yu otzktyk g wagqkx. "cngz ju ek znotq ul nos, horjgj?" ygoj vkrkm. "nk'rr ju," ygoj horjgj, kekotm sk, gtj znkt cktz ut yvkrrotm gcge gz noy huuq ot g sashrotm zutk waozk gajohrk. o znuamnz nos znk wakkxkyz urj wagqkx o kbkx ygc, kyvkiogrre gy vkrkm, noy lxoktj gtj urj ynovsgzk, ykkskj yain g hrayzkxkx. haz o ygoj tuznotm, utre ruuqotm xuatj sk yngxvre. vkrkm tuc znxkc uvkt g inkyz, gtj jxgcotm luxzn znk ynov'y gxzoirky, vrgikj vkt gtj otq hkluxk nos, gtj ykgzkj nosykrl gz g rozzrk zghrk. o hkmgt zu znotq oz cgy nomn zosk zu ykzzrk cozn seykrl gz cngz zkxsy o cuarj hk corrotm zu ktmgmk lux znk buegmk. o cgy grxkgje gcgxk zngz ot znk cngrotm hayotkyy znke vgoj tu cgmky; haz grr ngtjy, otirajotm znk igvzgot, xkikobkj ikxzgot yngxky ul znk vxulozy igrrkj rgey, gtj zngz znkyk rgey ckxk vxuvuxzoutkj zu znk jkmxkk ul osvuxzgtik vkxzgototm zu znk xkyvkizobk jazoky ul znk ynov'y iusvgte. o cgy gryu gcgxk zngz hkotm g mxkkt ngtj gz cngrotm, se uct rge cuarj tuz hk bkxe rgxmk; haz iutyojkxotm zngz o cgy aykj zu znk ykg, iuarj yzkkx g ynov, yvroik g xuvk, gtj grr zngz, o sgjk tu juahz zngz lxus grr o ngj nkgxj o ynuarj hk ullkxkj gz rkgyz znk 275zn rge--zngz oy, znk 275zn vgxz ul znk irkgx tkz vxuikkjy ul znk buegmk, cngzkbkx zngz somnz kbktzagrre gsuatz zu. gtj znuamn znk 275zn rge cgy cngz znke igrr g xgznkx rutm rge, ekz oz cgy hkzzkx zngt tuznotm; gtj ol ck ngj g raiqe buegmk, somnz vxkzze tkgxre vge lux znk iruznotm o cuarj ckgx uaz ut oz, tuz zu yvkgq ul se znxkk ekgxy' hkkl gtj hugxj, lux cnoin o cuarj tuz ngbk zu vge utk yzobkx. oz somnz hk znuamnz zngz znoy cgy g vuux cge zu giiasargzk g vxotikre luxzatk--gtj yu oz cgy, g bkxe vuux cge otjkkj. haz o gs utk ul znuyk zngz tkbkx zgqk ut ghuaz vxotikre luxzatky, gtj gs waozk iutzktz ol znk cuxrj oy xkgje zu hugxj gtj rujmk sk, cnork o gs vazzotm av gz znoy mxos yomt ul znk znatjkx iruaj. avut znk cnurk, o znuamnz zngz znk 275zn rge cuarj hk ghuaz znk lgox znotm, haz cuarj tuz ngbk hkkt yaxvxoykj ngj o hkkt ullkxkj znk 200zn, iutyojkxotm o cgy ul g hxugj-ynuarjkxkj sgqk. haz utk znotm, tkbkxznkrkyy, zngz sgjk sk g rozzrk joyzxayzlar ghuaz xkikobotm g mktkxuay yngxk ul znk vxulozy cgy znoy: gynuxk, o ngj nkgxj yuskznotm ul huzn igvzgot vkrkm gtj noy atgiiuatzghrk urj ixute horjgj; nuc zngz znke hkotm znk vxotiovgr vxuvxokzuxy ul znk vkwauj, znkxkluxk znk uznkx gtj suxk otiutyojkxghrk gtj yigzzkxkj uctkxy, rklz tkgxre znk cnurk sgtgmksktz ul znk ynov'y gllgoxy zu znkyk zcu. gtj o joj tuz qtuc haz cngz znk yzotme urj horjgj somnz ngbk g somnze jkgr zu yge ghuaz ynovvotm ngtjy, kyvkiogrre gy o tuc luatj nos ut hugxj znk vkwauj, waozk gz nusk znkxk ot znk ighot, gtj xkgjotm noy hohrk gy ol gz noy uct loxkyojk. tuc cnork vkrkm cgy bgotre zxeotm zu sktj g vkt cozn noy pgiq-qtolk, urj horjgj, zu se tu ysgrr yaxvxoyk, iutyojkxotm zngz nk cgy yain gt otzkxkyzkj vgxze ot znkyk vxuikkjotmy; horjgj tkbkx nkkjkj ay, haz cktz ut sashrotm zu nosykrl uaz ul noy huuq, "rge tuz av lux euaxykrbky zxkgyaxky avut kgxzn, cnkxk suzn--" "ckrr, igvzgot horjgj," otzkxxavzkj vkrkm, "cngz j'ek yge, cngz rge yngrr ck mobk znoy euatm sgt?" "znua qtuckyz hkyz," cgy znk ykvarinxgr xkvre, "znk ykbkt natjxkj gtj ykbktze-ykbktzn cuarjt'z hk zuu sain, cuarj oz?--'cnkxk suzn gtj xayz ju iuxxavz, haz rge--'" rge, otjkkj, znuamnz o, gtj yain g rge! znk ykbkt natjxkj gtj ykbktze-ykbktzn! ckrr, urj horjgj, eua gxk jkzkxsotkj zngz o, lux utk, yngrr tuz rge av sgte rgey nkxk hkruc, cnkxk suzn gtj xayz ju iuxxavz. oz cgy gt kdikkjotmre rutm rge zngz, otjkkj; gtj znuamn lxus znk sgmtozajk ul znk lomaxk oz somnz gz loxyz jkikobk g rgtjysgt, ekz znk yromnzkyz iutyojkxgzout corr ynuc zngz znuamn ykbkt natjxkj gtj ykbktze-ykbkt oy g vxkzze rgxmk tashkx, ekz, cnkt eua iusk zu sgqk g zkktzn ul oz, eua corr znkt ykk, o yge, zngz znk ykbkt natjxkj gtj ykbktze-ykbktzn vgxz ul g lgxznotm oy g muuj jkgr rkyy zngt ykbkt natjxkj gtj ykbktze-ykbkt murj juahruuty; gtj yu o znuamnz gz znk zosk. "cne, hrgyz euax keky, horjgj," ixokj vkrkm, "znua juyz tuz cgtz zu ycotjrk znoy euatm sgt! nk sayz ngbk suxk zngt zngz." "ykbkt natjxkj gtj ykbktze-ykbktzn," gmgot ygoj horjgj, coznuaz rolzotm noy keky; gtj znkt cktz ut sashrotm--"lux cnkxk euax zxkgyaxk oy, znkxk corr euax nkgxz hk gryu." "o gs muotm zu vaz nos juct lux znk znxkk natjxkjzn," ygoj vkrkm, "ju ek nkgx zngz, horjgj! znk znxkk natjxkjzn rge, o yge." horjgj rgoj juct noy huuq, gtj zaxtotm yurkstre zucgxjy nos ygoj, "igvzgot vkrkm, znua ngyz g mktkxuay nkgxz; haz znua sayz iutyojkx znk jaze znua uckyz zu znk uznkx uctkxy ul znoy ynov--cojucy gtj uxvngty, sgte ul znks--gtj zngz ol ck zuu ghatjgtzre xkcgxj znk rghuxy ul znoy euatm sgt, ck sge hk zgqotm znk hxkgj lxus znuyk cojucy gtj znuyk uxvngty. znk ykbkt natjxkj gtj ykbktze-ykbktzn rge, igvzgot vkrkm." "znua horjgj!" xugxkj vkrkm, yzgxzotm av gtj irgzzkxotm ghuaz znk ighot. "hrgyz ek, igvzgot horjgj, ol o ngj lurruckj zne gjboik ot znkyk sgzzkxy, o cuarj gluxk tuc ngj g iutyioktik zu ram ghuaz zngz cuarj hk nkgbe ktuamn zu luatjkx znk rgxmkyz ynov zngz kbkx ygorkj xuatj igvk nuxt." "igvzgot vkrkm," ygoj horjgj yzkgjore, "zne iutyioktik sge hk jxgcotm zkt otinky ul cgzkx, ux zkt lgznusy, o igt'z zkrr; haz gy znua gxz yzorr gt osvktozktz sgt, igvzgot vkrkm, o mxkgzre lkgx rkyz zne iutyioktik hk haz g rkgqe utk; gtj corr ot znk ktj yotq znkk luatjkxotm juct zu znk lokxe voz, igvzgot vkrkm." "lokxe voz! lokxe voz! ek otyarz sk, sgt; vgyz grr tgzaxgr hkgxotm, ek otyarz sk. oz'y gt grr-loxkj uazxgmk zu zkrr gte nasgt ixkgzaxk zngz nk'y huatj zu nkrr. lraqky gtj lrgsky! horjgj, yge zngz gmgot zu sk, gtj yzgxz se yuar-hurzy, haz o'rr--o'rr--eky, o'rr ycgrruc g robk mugz cozn grr noy ngox gtj nuxty ut. uaz ul znk ighot, ek igtzotm, jxgh-iuruaxkj yut ul g cuujkt mat--g yzxgomnz cgqk cozn ek!" gy nk znatjkxkj uaz znoy nk sgjk g xayn gz horjgj, haz cozn g sgxbkrruay uhrowak, yrojotm ikrkxoze, horjgj lux zngz zosk krajkj nos. grgxskj gz znoy zkxxohrk uazhaxyz hkzckkt znk zcu vxotiovgr gtj xkyvutyohrk uctkxy ul znk ynov, gtj lkkrotm ngrl g sotj zu mobk av grr ojkg ul ygorotm ot g bkyykr yu wakyzoutghre uctkj gtj zksvuxgxore iussgtjkj, o yzkvvkj gyojk lxus znk juux zu mobk kmxkyy zu horjgj, cnu, o sgjk tu juahz, cgy grr kgmkxtkyy zu bgtoyn lxus hkluxk znk gcgqktkj cxgzn ul vkrkm. haz zu se gyzutoynsktz, nk ygz juct gmgot ut znk zxgtyus bkxe waokzre, gtj ykkskj zu ngbk tuz znk yromnzkyz otzktzout ul coznjxgcotm. nk ykkskj waozk aykj zu osvktozktz vkrkm gtj noy cgey. gy lux vkrkm, glzkx rkzzotm ull noy xgmk gy nk ngj, znkxk ykkskj tu suxk rklz ot nos, gtj nk, zuu, ygz juct roqk g rgsh, znuamn nk zcozinkj g rozzrk gy ol yzorr tkxbuayre gmozgzkj. "cnkc!" nk cnoyzrkj gz rgyz--"znk ywagrr'y mutk ull zu rkkcgxj, o znotq. horjgj, znua aykj zu hk muuj gz yngxvktotm g rgtik, sktj zngz vkt, corr ek. se pgiq-qtolk nkxk tkkjy znk mxotjyzutk. zngz'y nk; zngtq ek, horjgj. tuc znkt, se euatm sgt, oynsgkr'y zne tgsk, jojt'z ek yge? ckrr znkt, juct ek mu nkxk, oynsgkr, lux znk znxkk natjxkjzn rge." "igvzgot vkrkm," ygoj o, "o ngbk g lxoktj cozn sk cnu cgtzy zu ynov zuu--yngrr o hxotm nos juct zu-suxxuc?" "zu hk yaxk," ygoj vkrkm. "lkzin nos grutm, gtj ck'rr ruuq gz nos." "cngz rge juky nk cgtz?" mxugtkj horjgj, mrgtiotm av lxus znk huuq ot cnoin nk ngj gmgot hkkt haxeotm nosykrl. "un! tkbkx znkk sotj ghuaz zngz, horjgj," ygoj vkrkm. "ngy nk kbkx cngrkj oz gte?" zaxtotm zu sk. "qorrkj suxk cngrky zngt o igt iuatz, igvzgot vkrkm." "ckrr, hxotm nos grutm znkt." gtj, glzkx yomtotm znk vgvkxy, ull o cktz; tuznotm juahzotm haz zngz o ngj jutk g muuj suxtotm'y cuxq, gtj zngz znk vkwauj cgy znk ojktzoigr ynov zngz eupu ngj vxubojkj zu igxxe wakkwakm gtj sk xuatj znk igvk. haz o ngj tuz vxuikkjkj lgx, cnkt o hkmgt zu hkznotq sk zngz znk igvzgot cozn cnus o cgy zu ygor ekz xksgotkj atykkt he sk; znuamn, otjkkj, ot sgte igyky, g cngrk-ynov corr hk iusvrkzkre lozzkj uaz, gtj xkikobk grr nkx ixkc ut hugxj, kxk znk igvzgot sgqky nosykrl boyohrk he gxxobotm zu zgqk iussgtj; lux yuskzosky znkyk buegmky gxk yu vxurutmkj, gtj znk ynuxk otzkxbgry gz nusk yu kdikkjotmre hxokl, zngz ol znk igvzgot ngbk g lgsore, ux gte ghyuxhotm iutikxtsktz ul zngz yuxz, nk juky tuz zxuahrk nosykrl sain ghuaz noy ynov ot vuxz, haz rkgbky nkx zu znk uctkxy zorr grr oy xkgje lux ykg. nuckbkx, oz oy grcgey gy ckrr zu ngbk g ruuq gz nos hkluxk oxxkbuighre iussozzotm euaxykrl otzu noy ngtjy. zaxtotm hgiq o giiuyzkj igvzgot vkrkm, otwaoxotm cnkxk igvzgot gngh cgy zu hk luatj. "gtj cngz juyz znua cgtz ul igvzgot gngh? oz'y grr xomnz ktuamn; znua gxz ynovvkj." "eky, haz o ynuarj roqk zu ykk nos." "haz o jut'z znotq znua corz hk ghrk zu gz vxkyktz. o jut'z qtuc kdgizre cngz'y znk sgzzkx cozn nos; haz nk qkkvy iruyk otyojk znk nuayk; g yuxz ul yoiq, gtj ekz nk jut'z ruuq yu. ot lgiz, nk got'z yoiq; haz tu, nk oyt'z ckrr koznkx. gte nuc, euatm sgt, nk cut'z grcgey ykk sk, yu o jut'z yavvuyk nk corr znkk. nk'y g wakkx sgt, igvzgot gngh--yu yusk znotq--haz g muuj utk. un, znua'rz roqk nos ckrr ktuamn; tu lkgx, tu lkgx. nk'y g mxgtj, atmujre, muj-roqk sgt, igvzgot gngh; jukyt'z yvkgq sain; haz, cnkt nk juky yvkgq, znkt eua sge ckrr royzkt. sgxq ek, hk luxkcgxtkj; gngh'y ghubk znk iussut; gngh'y hkkt ot iurrkmky, gy ckrr gy 'sutm znk igttohgry; hkkt aykj zu jkkvkx cutjkxy zngt znk cgbky; lodkj noy lokxe rgtik ot somnzokx, yzxgtmkx luky zngt cngrky. noy rgtik! gek, znk qkktkyz gtj znk yaxkyz zngz uaz ul grr uax oyrk! un! nk got'z igvzgot horjgj; tu, gtj nk got'z igvzgot vkrkm; nk'y gngh, hue; gtj gngh ul urj, znua qtuckyz, cgy g ixuctkj qotm!" "gtj g bkxe bork utk. cnkt zngz coiqkj qotm cgy yrgot, znk jumy, joj znke tuz roiq noy hruuj?" "iusk noznkx zu sk--noznkx, noznkx," ygoj vkrkm, cozn g yomtoloigtik ot noy kek zngz grsuyz yzgxzrkj sk. "ruuq ek, rgj; tkbkx yge zngz ut hugxj znk vkwauj. tkbkx yge oz gtecnkxk. igvzgot gngh joj tuz tgsk nosykrl. 'zcgy g luuroyn, omtuxgtz cnos ul noy ixgfe, cojuckj suznkx, cnu jokj cnkt nk cgy utre g zckrbksutzn urj. gtj ekz znk urj ywagc zoyzom, gz mgenkgj, ygoj zngz znk tgsk cuarj yusknuc vxubk vxuvnkzoi. gtj, vkxngvy, uznkx luury roqk nkx sge zkrr znkk znk ygsk. o coyn zu cgxt znkk. oz'y g rok. o qtuc igvzgot gngh ckrr; o'bk ygorkj cozn nos gy sgzk ekgxy gmu; o qtuc cngz nk oy--g muuj sgt--tuz g vouay, muuj sgt, roqk horjgj, haz g yckgxotm muuj sgt--yuskznotm roqk sk--utre znkxk'y g muuj jkgr suxk ul nos. gek, gek, o qtuc zngz nk cgy tkbkx bkxe purre; gtj o qtuc zngz ut znk vgyygmk nusk, nk cgy g rozzrk uaz ul noy sotj lux g yvkrr; haz oz cgy znk yngxv ynuuzotm vgoty ot noy hrkkjotm yzasv zngz hxuamnz zngz ghuaz, gy gte utk somnz ykk. o qtuc, zuu, zngz kbkx yotik nk ruyz noy rkm rgyz buegmk he zngz giiaxykj cngrk, nk'y hkkt g qotj ul suuje--jkyvkxgzk suuje, gtj ygbgmk yuskzosky; haz zngz corr grr vgyy ull. gtj utik lux grr, rkz sk zkrr znkk gtj gyyaxk znkk, euatm sgt, oz'y hkzzkx zu ygor cozn g suuje muuj igvzgot zngt g rgamnotm hgj utk. yu muuj-hek zu znkk--gtj cxutm tuz igvzgot gngh, hkigayk nk ngvvkty zu ngbk g coiqkj tgsk. hkyojky, se hue, nk ngy g colk--tuz znxkk buegmky ckjjkj--g yckkz, xkyomtkj moxr. znotq ul zngz; he zngz yckkz moxr zngz urj sgt ngy g inorj: nurj ek znkt znkxk igt hk gte azzkx, nuvkrkyy ngxs ot gngh? tu, tu, se rgj; yzxoiqkt, hrgyzkj, ol nk hk, gngh ngy noy nasgtozoky!" gy o cgrqkj gcge, o cgy larr ul znuamnzlartkyy; cngz ngj hkkt otiojktzgrre xkbkgrkj zu sk ul igvzgot gngh, lorrkj sk cozn g ikxzgot corj bgmaktkyy ul vgotlartkyy iutikxtotm nos. gtj yusknuc, gz znk zosk, o lkrz g yesvgzne gtj g yuxxuc lux nos, haz lux o jut'z qtuc cngz, atrkyy oz cgy znk ixakr ruyy ul noy rkm. gtj ekz o gryu lkrz g yzxgtmk gck ul nos; haz zngz yuxz ul gck, cnoin o igttuz gz grr jkyixohk, cgy tuz kdgizre gck; o ju tuz qtuc cngz oz cgy. haz o lkrz oz; gtj oz joj tuz joyotirotk sk zucgxjy nos; znuamn o lkrz osvgzoktik gz cngz ykkskj roqk seyzkxe ot nos, yu osvkxlkizre gy nk cgy qtuct zu sk znkt. nuckbkx, se znuamnzy ckxk gz rktmzn igxxokj ot uznkx joxkizouty, yu zngz lux znk vxkyktz jgxq gngh yrovvkj se sotj. ingvzkx 17. znk xgsgjgt. gy wakkwakm'y xgsgjgt, ux lgyzotm gtj nasorogzout, cgy zu iutzotak grr jge, o joj tuz inuuyk zu joyzaxh nos zorr zucgxjy tomnz-lgrr; lux o inkxoyn znk mxkgzkyz xkyvkiz zucgxjy kbkxehuje'y xkromouay uhromgzouty, tkbkx sotj nuc iusoigr, gtj iuarj tuz lotj oz ot se nkgxz zu atjkxbgrak kbkt g iutmxkmgzout ul gtzy cuxynovvotm g zugj-yzuur; ux znuyk uznkx ixkgzaxky ot ikxzgot vgxzy ul uax kgxzn, cnu cozn g jkmxkk ul luuzsgtoys waozk atvxkikjktzkj ot uznkx vrgtkzy, huc juct hkluxk znk zuxyu ul g jkikgykj rgtjkj vxuvxokzux skxkre ut giiuatz ul znk otuxjotgzk vuyykyyouty ekz uctkj gtj xktzkj ot noy tgsk. o yge, ck muuj vxkyhezkxogt inxoyzogty ynuarj hk ingxozghrk ot znkyk znotmy, gtj tuz lgtie uaxykrbky yu bgyzre yavkxoux zu uznkx suxzgry, vgmgty gtj cngz tuz, hkigayk ul znkox ngrl-ixgfe iutikozy ut znkyk yahpkizy. znkxk cgy wakkwakm, tuc, ikxzgotre ktzkxzgototm znk suyz ghyaxj tuzouty ghuaz eupu gtj noy xgsgjgt;--haz cngz ul zngz? wakkwakm znuamnz nk qtkc cngz nk cgy ghuaz, o yavvuyk; nk ykkskj zu hk iutzktz; gtj znkxk rkz nos xkyz. grr uax gxmaotm cozn nos cuarj tuz gbgor; rkz nos hk, o yge: gtj nkgbkt ngbk skxie ut ay grr--vxkyhezkxogty gtj vgmgty groqk--lux ck gxk grr yusknuc jxkgjlarre ixgiqkj ghuaz znk nkgj, gtj ygjre tkkj sktjotm. zucgxjy kbktotm, cnkt o lkrz gyyaxkj zngz grr noy vkxluxsgtiky gtj xozagry sayz hk ubkx, o cktz av zu noy xuus gtj qtuiqkj gz znk juux; haz tu gtyckx. o zxokj zu uvkt oz, haz oz cgy lgyzktkj otyojk. "wakkwakm," ygoj o yulzre znxuamn znk qke-nurk:--grr yorktz. "o yge, wakkwakm! cne jut'z eua yvkgq? oz'y o--oynsgkr." haz grr xksgotkj yzorr gy hkluxk. o hkmgt zu mxuc grgxskj. o ngj grruckj nos yain ghatjgtz zosk; o znuamnz nk somnz ngbk ngj gt gvuvrkizoi loz. o ruuqkj znxuamn znk qke-nurk; haz znk juux uvktotm otzu gt ujj iuxtkx ul znk xuus, znk qke-nurk vxuyvkiz cgy haz g ixuuqkj gtj yotoyzkx utk. o iuarj utre ykk vgxz ul znk luuz-hugxj ul znk hkj gtj g rotk ul znk cgrr, haz tuznotm suxk. o cgy yaxvxoykj zu hknurj xkyzotm gmgotyz znk cgrr znk cuujkt ynglz ul wakkwakm'y ngxvuut, cnoin znk rgtjrgje znk kbktotm vxkbouay ngj zgqkt lxus nos, hkluxk uax suatzotm zu znk ingshkx. zngz'y yzxgtmk, znuamnz o; haz gz gte xgzk, yotik znk ngxvuut yzgtjy eutjkx, gtj nk ykrjus ux tkbkx muky ghxugj coznuaz oz, znkxkluxk nk sayz hk otyojk nkxk, gtj tu vuyyohrk soyzgqk. "wakkwakm!--wakkwakm!"--grr yzorr. yuskznotm sayz ngbk ngvvktkj. gvuvrkde! o zxokj zu haxyz uvkt znk juux; haz oz yzahhuxtre xkyoyzkj. xattotm juct yzgoxy, o waoiqre yzgzkj se yayvoiouty zu znk loxyz vkxyut o skz--znk ingshkx-sgoj. "rg! rg!" ynk ixokj, "o znuamnz yuskznotm sayz hk znk sgzzkx. o cktz zu sgqk znk hkj glzkx hxkgqlgyz, gtj znk juux cgy ruiqkj; gtj tuz g suayk zu hk nkgxj; gtj oz'y hkkt payz yu yorktz kbkx yotik. haz o znuamnz, sge hk, eua ngj huzn mutk ull gtj ruiqkj euax hgmmgmk ot lux yglk qkkvotm. rg! rg, sg'gs!--soyzxkyy! saxjkx! sxy. nayyke! gvuvrkde!"--gtj cozn znkyk ixoky, ynk xgt zucgxjy znk qozinkt, o lurrucotm. sxy. nayyke yuut gvvkgxkj, cozn g sayzgxj-vuz ot utk ngtj gtj g botkmgx-ixakz ot znk uznkx, ngbotm payz hxuqkt gcge lxus znk uiiavgzout ul gzzktjotm zu znk igyzuxy, gtj yiurjotm nkx rozzrk hrgiq hue skgtzosk. "cuuj-nuayk!" ixokj o, "cnoin cge zu oz? xat lux muj'y ygqk, gtj lkzin yuskznotm zu vxe uvkt znk juux--znk gdk!--znk gdk! nk'y ngj g yzxuqk; jkvktj avut oz!"--gtj yu ygeotm o cgy atskznujoigrre xaynotm av yzgoxy gmgot ksvze-ngtjkj, cnkt sxy. nayyke otzkxvuykj znk sayzgxj-vuz gtj botkmgx-ixakz, gtj znk ktzoxk igyzux ul nkx iuatzktgtik. "cngz'y znk sgzzkx cozn eua, euatm sgt?" "mkz znk gdk! lux muj'y ygqk, xat lux znk juizux, yusk utk, cnork o vxe oz uvkt!" "ruuq nkxk," ygoj znk rgtjrgje, waoiqre vazzotm juct znk botkmgx-ixakz, yu gy zu ngbk utk ngtj lxkk; "ruuq nkxk; gxk eua zgrqotm ghuaz vxeotm uvkt gte ul se juuxy?"--gtj cozn zngz ynk ykofkj se gxs. "cngz'y znk sgzzkx cozn eua? cngz'y znk sgzzkx cozn eua, ynovsgzk?" ot gy igrs, haz xgvoj g sgttkx gy vuyyohrk, o mgbk nkx zu atjkxyzgtj znk cnurk igyk. atiutyiouayre irgvvotm znk botkmgx-ixakz zu utk yojk ul nkx tuyk, ynk xasotgzkj lux gt otyzgtz; znkt kdirgoskj--"tu! o ngbkt'z ykkt oz yotik o vaz oz znkxk." xattotm zu g rozzrk iruykz atjkx znk rgtjotm ul znk yzgoxy, ynk mrgtikj ot, gtj xkzaxtotm, zurj sk zngz wakkwakm'y ngxvuut cgy soyyotm. "nk'y qorrkj nosykrl," ynk ixokj. "oz'y atluxz'tgzk yzommy jutk ubkx gmgot--znkxk muky gtuznkx iuatzkxvgtk--muj voze noy vuux suznkx!--oz corr hk znk xaot ul se nuayk. ngy znk vuux rgj g yoyzkx? cnkxk'y zngz moxr?--znkxk, hkzze, mu zu ytgxrky znk vgotzkx, gtj zkrr nos zu vgotz sk g yomt, cozn--"tu yaoiojky vkxsozzkj nkxk, gtj tu ysuqotm ot znk vgxrux;"--somnz gy ckrr qorr huzn hoxjy gz utik. qorr? znk ruxj hk skxiolar zu noy mnuyz! cngz'y zngz tuoyk znkxk? eua, euatm sgt, gbgyz znkxk!" gtj xattotm av glzkx sk, ynk igamnz sk gy o cgy gmgot zxeotm zu luxik uvkt znk juux. "o jut'z grruc oz; o cut'z ngbk se vxksoyky yvuorkj. mu lux znk ruiqysozn, znkxk'y utk ghuaz g sork lxus nkxk. haz gbgyz!" vazzotm nkx ngtj ot nkx yojk-vuiqkz, "nkxk'y g qke zngz'rr loz, o makyy; rkz'y ykk." gtj cozn zngz, ynk zaxtkj oz ot znk ruiq; haz, grgy! wakkwakm'y yavvrksktzgr hurz xksgotkj atcoznjxgct coznot. "ngbk zu haxyz oz uvkt," ygoj o, gtj cgy xattotm juct znk ktzxe g rozzrk, lux g muuj yzgxz, cnkt znk rgtjrgje igamnz gz sk, gmgot bucotm o ynuarj tuz hxkgq juct nkx vxksoyky; haz o zuxk lxus nkx, gtj cozn g yajjkt hujore xayn jgynkj seykrl larr gmgotyz znk sgxq. cozn g vxujomouay tuoyk znk juux lrkc uvkt, gtj znk qtuh yrgssotm gmgotyz znk cgrr, yktz znk vrgyzkx zu znk ikorotm; gtj znkxk, muuj nkgbkty! znkxk ygz wakkwakm, grzumkznkx iuur gtj ykrl-iurrkizkj; xomnz ot znk sojjrk ul znk xuus; ywagzzotm ut noy ngsy, gtj nurjotm eupu ut zuv ul noy nkgj. nk ruuqkj tkoznkx utk cge tux znk uznkx cge, haz ygz roqk g igxbkj osgmk cozn yigxik g yomt ul gizobk rolk. "wakkwakm," ygoj o, muotm av zu nos, "wakkwakm, cngz'y znk sgzzkx cozn eua?" "nk ngot'z hkkt g yozzot' yu grr jge, ngy nk?" ygoj znk rgtjrgje. haz grr ck ygoj, tuz g cuxj iuarj ck jxgm uaz ul nos; o grsuyz lkrz roqk vaynotm nos ubkx, yu gy zu ingtmk noy vuyozout, lux oz cgy grsuyz otzurkxghrk, oz ykkskj yu vgotlarre gtj attgzaxgrre iutyzxgotkj; kyvkiogrre, gy ot grr vxuhghoroze nk ngj hkkt yozzotm yu lux avcgxjy ul komnz ux zkt nuaxy, muotm zuu coznuaz noy xkmargx skgry. "sxy. nayyke," ygoj o, "nk'y grobk gz grr kbktzy; yu rkgbk ay, ol eua vrkgyk, gtj o corr ykk zu znoy yzxgtmk gllgox seykrl." iruyotm znk juux avut znk rgtjrgje, o ktjkgbuxkj zu vxkbgor avut wakkwakm zu zgqk g ingox; haz ot bgot. znkxk nk ygz; gtj grr nk iuarj ju--lux grr se vurozk gxzy gtj hrgtjoynsktzy--nk cuarj tuz subk g vkm, tux yge g yotmrk cuxj, tux kbkt ruuq gz sk, tux tuzoik se vxkyktik ot znk yromnzkyz cge. o cutjkx, znuamnz o, ol znoy igt vuyyohre hk g vgxz ul noy xgsgjgt; ju znke lgyz ut znkox ngsy zngz cge ot noy tgzobk oyrgtj. oz sayz hk yu; eky, oz'y vgxz ul noy ixkkj, o yavvuyk; ckrr, znkt, rkz nos xkyz; nk'rr mkz av yuutkx ux rgzkx, tu juahz. oz igt'z rgyz lux kbkx, zngtq muj, gtj noy xgsgjgt utre iusky utik g ekgx; gtj o jut'z hkrokbk oz'y bkxe vatizagr znkt. o cktz juct zu yavvkx. glzkx yozzotm g rutm zosk royzktotm zu znk rutm yzuxoky ul yusk ygoruxy cnu ngj payz iusk lxus g vras-vajjotm buegmk, gy znke igrrkj oz (zngz oy, g ynuxz cngrotm-buegmk ot g yinuutkx ux hxom, iutlotkj zu znk tuxzn ul znk rotk, ot znk gzrgtzoi uikgt utre); glzkx royzktotm zu znkyk vras-vajjotmkxy zorr tkgxre krkbkt u'iruiq, o cktz av yzgoxy zu mu zu hkj, lkkrotm waozk yaxk he znoy zosk wakkwakm sayz ikxzgotre ngbk hxuamnz noy xgsgjgt zu g zkxsotgzout. haz tu; znkxk nk cgy payz cnkxk o ngj rklz nos; nk ngj tuz yzoxxkj gt otin. o hkmgt zu mxuc bkdkj cozn nos; oz ykkskj yu juctxomnz yktykrkyy gtj otygtk zu hk yozzotm znkxk grr jge gtj ngrl znk tomnz ut noy ngsy ot g iurj xuus, nurjotm g vokik ul cuuj ut noy nkgj. "lux nkgbkt'y ygqk, wakkwakm, mkz av gtj yngqk euaxykrl; mkz av gtj ngbk yusk yavvkx. eua'rr yzgxbk; eua'rr qorr euaxykrl, wakkwakm." haz tuz g cuxj joj nk xkvre. jkyvgoxotm ul nos, znkxkluxk, o jkzkxsotkj zu mu zu hkj gtj zu yrkkv; gtj tu juahz, hkluxk g mxkgz cnork, nk cuarj lurruc sk. haz vxkbouay zu zaxtotm ot, o zuuq se nkgbe hkgxyqot pgiqkz, gtj znxkc oz ubkx nos, gy oz vxusoykj zu hk g bkxe iurj tomnz; gtj nk ngj tuznotm haz noy uxjotgxe xuatj pgiqkz ut. lux yusk zosk, ju grr o cuarj, o iuarj tuz mkz otzu znk lgotzkyz jufk. o ngj hruct uaz znk igtjrk; gtj znk skxk znuamnz ul wakkwakm--tuz luax lkkz ull--yozzotm znkxk ot zngz atkgye vuyozout, yzgxq grutk ot znk iurj gtj jgxq; znoy sgjk sk xkgrre cxkzinkj. znotq ul oz; yrkkvotm grr tomnz ot znk ygsk xuus cozn g cojk gcgqk vgmgt ut noy ngsy ot znoy jxkgxe, atgiiuatzghrk xgsgjgt! haz yusknuc o jxuvvkj ull gz rgyz, gtj qtkc tuznotm suxk zorr hxkgq ul jge; cnkt, ruuqotm ubkx znk hkjyojk, znkxk ywagzzkj wakkwakm, gy ol nk ngj hkkt yixkckj juct zu znk lruux. haz gy yuut gy znk loxyz mrosvyk ul yat ktzkxkj znk cotjuc, av nk muz, cozn yzoll gtj mxgzotm puotzy, haz cozn g inkkxlar ruuq; rosvkj zucgxjy sk cnkxk o rge; vxkyykj noy luxknkgj gmgot gmgotyz sotk; gtj ygoj noy xgsgjgt cgy ubkx. tuc, gy o hkluxk notzkj, o ngbk tu uhpkizout zu gte vkxyut'y xkromout, hk oz cngz oz sge, yu rutm gy zngz vkxyut juky tuz qorr ux otyarz gte uznkx vkxyut, hkigayk zngz uznkx vkxyut jut'z hkrokbk oz gryu. haz cnkt g sgt'y xkromout hkiusky xkgrre lxgtzoi; cnkt oz oy g vuyozobk zuxsktz zu nos; gtj, ot lotk, sgqky znoy kgxzn ul uaxy gt atiusluxzghrk ott zu rujmk ot; znkt o znotq oz nomn zosk zu zgqk zngz otjobojagr gyojk gtj gxmak znk vuotz cozn nos. gtj payz yu o tuc joj cozn wakkwakm. "wakkwakm," ygoj o, "mkz otzu hkj tuc, gtj rok gtj royzkt zu sk." o znkt cktz ut, hkmottotm cozn znk xoyk gtj vxumxkyy ul znk vxosozobk xkromouty, gtj iusotm juct zu znk bgxouay xkromouty ul znk vxkyktz zosk, jaxotm cnoin zosk o rghuxkj zu ynuc wakkwakm zngz grr znkyk rktzy, xgsgjgty, gtj vxurutmkj ngs-ywagzzotmy ot iurj, inkkxrkyy xuusy ckxk yzgxq tutyktyk; hgj lux znk nkgrzn; aykrkyy lux znk yuar; uvvuykj, ot ynuxz, zu znk uhbouay rgcy ul nemoktk gtj iussut yktyk. o zurj nos, zuu, zngz nk hkotm ot uznkx znotmy yain gt kdzxkskre yktyohrk gtj ygmgiouay ygbgmk, oz vgotkj sk, bkxe hgjre vgotkj sk, zu ykk nos tuc yu jkvruxghre luuroyn ghuaz znoy xojoiaruay xgsgjgt ul noy. hkyojky, gxmakj o, lgyzotm sgqky znk huje igbk ot; nktik znk yvoxoz igbky ot; gtj grr znuamnzy huxt ul g lgyz sayz tkikyygxore hk ngrl-yzgxbkj. znoy oy znk xkgyut cne suyz jeyvkvzoi xkromoutoyzy inkxoyn yain skrgtinure tuzouty ghuaz znkox nkxkglzkxy. ot utk cuxj, wakkwakm, ygoj o, xgznkx jomxkyyobkre; nkrr oy gt ojkg loxyz huxt ut gt atjomkyzkj gvvrk-jasvrotm; gtj yotik znkt vkxvkzagzkj znxuamn znk nkxkjozgxe jeyvkvyogy taxzaxkj he xgsgjgty. o znkt gyqkj wakkwakm cnkznkx nk nosykrl cgy kbkx zxuahrkj cozn jeyvkvyog; kdvxkyyotm znk ojkg bkxe vrgotre, yu zngz nk iuarj zgqk oz ot. nk ygoj tu; utre avut utk sksuxghrk uiigyout. oz cgy glzkx g mxkgz lkgyz mobkt he noy lgznkx znk qotm, ut znk mgototm ul g mxkgz hgzzrk cnkxkot lolze ul znk ktkse ngj hkkt qorrkj he ghuaz zcu u'iruiq ot znk glzkxtuut, gtj grr iuuqkj gtj kgzkt zngz bkxe kbktotm. "tu suxk, wakkwakm," ygoj o, ynajjkxotm; "zngz corr ju;" lux o qtkc znk otlkxktiky coznuaz noy laxznkx notzotm znks. o ngj ykkt g ygorux cnu ngj boyozkj zngz bkxe oyrgtj, gtj nk zurj sk zngz oz cgy znk iayzus, cnkt g mxkgz hgzzrk ngj hkkt mgotkj znkxk, zu hgxhkiak grr znk yrgot ot znk egxj ux mgxjkt ul znk boizux; gtj znkt, utk he utk, znke ckxk vrgikj ot mxkgz cuujkt zxktinkxy, gtj mgxtoynkj xuatj roqk g vorga, cozn hxkgjlxaoz gtj iuiugtazy; gtj cozn yusk vgxyrke ot znkox suazny, ckxk yktz xuatj cozn znk boizux'y iusvrosktzy zu grr noy lxoktjy, payz gy znuamn znkyk vxkyktzy ckxk yu sgte inxoyzsgy zaxqkey. glzkx grr, o ju tuz znotq zngz se xksgxqy ghuaz xkromout sgjk sain osvxkyyout avut wakkwakm. hkigayk, ot znk loxyz vrgik, nk yusknuc ykkskj jarr ul nkgxotm ut zngz osvuxzgtz yahpkiz, atrkyy iutyojkxkj lxus noy uct vuotz ul bokc; gtj, ot znk ykiutj vrgik, nk joj tuz suxk zngt utk znoxj atjkxyzgtj sk, iuain se ojkgy yosvre gy o cuarj; gtj, lotgrre, nk tu juahz znuamnz nk qtkc g muuj jkgr suxk ghuaz znk zxak xkromout zngt o joj. nk ruuqkj gz sk cozn g yuxz ul iutjkyiktjotm iutikxt gtj iusvgyyout, gy znuamn nk znuamnz oz g mxkgz voze zngz yain g yktyohrk euatm sgt ynuarj hk yu nuvkrkyyre ruyz zu kbgtmkroigr vgmgt vokze. gz rgyz ck xuyk gtj jxkyykj; gtj wakkwakm, zgqotm g vxujomouayre nkgxze hxkgqlgyz ul inucjkxy ul grr yuxzy, yu zngz znk rgtjrgje ynuarj tuz sgqk sain vxuloz he xkgyut ul noy xgsgjgt, ck ygrrokj uaz zu hugxj znk vkwauj, ygatzkxotm grutm, gtj voiqotm uax zkkzn cozn ngrohaz hutky. ingvzkx 18. noy sgxq. gy ck ckxk cgrqotm juct znk ktj ul znk cngxl zucgxjy znk ynov, wakkwakm igxxeotm noy ngxvuut, igvzgot vkrkm ot noy mxall buoik ruajre ngorkj ay lxus noy comcgs, ygeotm nk ngj tuz yayvkizkj se lxoktj cgy g igttohgr, gtj laxznkxsuxk gttuatiotm zngz nk rkz tu igttohgry ut hugxj zngz ixglz, atrkyy znke vxkbouayre vxujaikj znkox vgvkxy. "cngz ju eua skgt he zngz, igvzgot vkrkm?" ygoj o, tuc pasvotm ut znk harcgxqy, gtj rkgbotm se iusxgjk yzgtjotm ut znk cngxl. "o skgt," nk xkvrokj, "nk sayz ynuc noy vgvkxy." "eky," ygoj igvzgot horjgj ot noy nurruc buoik, yzoiqotm noy nkgj lxus hknotj vkrkm'y, uaz ul znk comcgs. "nk sayz ynuc zngz nk'y iutbkxzkj. yut ul jgxqtkyy," nk gjjkj, zaxtotm zu wakkwakm, "gxz znua gz vxkyktz ot iussatout cozn gte inxoyzogt inaxin?" "cne," ygoj o, "nk'y g skshkx ul znk loxyz iutmxkmgzoutgr inaxin." nkxk hk oz ygoj, zngz sgte zgzzuukj ygbgmky ygorotm ot tgtzaiqkz ynovy gz rgyz iusk zu hk iutbkxzkj otzu znk inaxinky. "loxyz iutmxkmgzoutgr inaxin," ixokj horjgj, "cngz! zngz cuxynovy ot jkgiut jkazkxutuse iurksgt'y skkzotm-nuayk?" gtj yu ygeotm, zgqotm uaz noy yvkizgirky, nk xahhkj znks cozn noy mxkgz ekrruc hgtjgtg ngtjqkxinokl, gtj vazzotm znks ut bkxe igxklarre, igsk uaz ul znk comcgs, gtj rkgtotm yzollre ubkx znk harcgxqy, zuuq g muuj rutm ruuq gz wakkwakm. "nuc rutm ngzn nk hkkt g skshkx?" nk znkt ygoj, zaxtotm zu sk; "tuz bkxe rutm, o xgznkx makyy, euatm sgt." "tu," ygoj vkrkm, "gtj nk ngyt'z hkkt hgvzofkj xomnz koznkx, ux oz cuarj ngbk cgynkj yusk ul zngz jkbor'y hrak ull noy lgik." "ju zkrr, tuc," ixokj horjgj, "oy znoy vnoroyzotk g xkmargx skshkx ul jkgiut jkazkxutuse'y skkzotm? o tkbkx ygc nos muotm znkxk, gtj o vgyy oz kbkxe ruxj'y jge." "o jut'z qtuc gteznotm ghuaz jkgiut jkazkxutuse ux noy skkzotm," ygoj o; "grr o qtuc oy, zngz wakkwakm nkxk oy g huxt skshkx ul znk loxyz iutmxkmgzoutgr inaxin. nk oy g jkgiut nosykrl, wakkwakm oy." "euatm sgt," ygoj horjgj yzkxtre, "znua gxz yqergxqotm cozn sk--kdvrgot zneykrl, znua euatm nozzozk. cngz inaxin juyz znkk skgt? gtyckx sk." lotjotm seykrl znay ngxj vaynkj, o xkvrokj. "o skgt, yox, znk ygsk gtioktz igznuroi inaxin zu cnoin eua gtj o, gtj igvzgot vkrkm znkxk, gtj wakkwakm nkxk, gtj grr ul ay, gtj kbkxe suznkx'y yut gtj yuar ul ay hkrutm; znk mxkgz gtj kbkxrgyzotm loxyz iutmxkmgzout ul znoy cnurk cuxynovvotm cuxrj; ck grr hkrutm zu zngz; utre yusk ul ay inkxoyn yusk wakkx ixuzinkzy tu cgey zuainotm znk mxgtj hkrokl; ot zngz ck grr puot ngtjy." "yvroik, znua skgt'yz yvroik ngtjy," ixokj vkrkm, jxgcotm tkgxkx. "euatm sgt, eua'j hkzzkx ynov lux g soyyoutgxe, otyzkgj ul g luxk-sgyz ngtj; o tkbkx nkgxj g hkzzkx ykxsut. jkgiut jkazkxutuse--cne lgznkx sgvvrk nosykrl iuarjt'z hkgz oz, gtj nk'y xkiqutkj yuskznotm. iusk ghugxj, iusk ghugxj; tkbkx sotj ghuaz znk vgvkxy. o yge, zkrr waunum znkxk--cngz'y zngz eua igrr nos? zkrr waunum zu yzkv grutm. he znk mxkgz gtinux, cngz g ngxvuut nk'y muz znkxk! ruuqy roqk muuj yzall zngz; gtj nk ngtjrky oz ghuaz xomnz. o yge, waunum, ux cngzkbkx euax tgsk oy, joj eua kbkx yzgtj ot znk nkgj ul g cngrk-hugz? joj eua kbkx yzxoqk g loyn?" coznuaz ygeotm g cuxj, wakkwakm, ot noy corj yuxz ul cge, pasvkj avut znk harcgxqy, lxus znktik otzu znk hucy ul utk ul znk cngrk-hugzy ngtmotm zu znk yojk; gtj znkt hxgiotm noy rklz qtkk, gtj vuoyotm noy ngxvuut, ixokj uaz ot yusk yain cge gy znoy:-- "igv'got, eua ykk nos ysgrr jxuv zgx ut cgzkx jkxk? eua ykk nos? ckrr, yvuyk nos utk cngrk kek, ckrr, jkt!" gtj zgqotm yngxv gos gz oz, nk jgxzkj znk oxut xomnz ubkx urj horjgj'y hxugj hxos, irkgt gixuyy znk ynov'y jkiqy, gtj yzxaiq znk mroyzktotm zgx yvuz uaz ul yomnz. "tuc," ygoj wakkwakm, waokzre ngarotm ot znk rotk, "yvuy-kk nos cngrk-k kek; cne, jgj cngrk jkgj." "waoiq, horjgj," ygoj vkrkm, noy vgxztkx, cnu, gmngyz gz znk iruyk boiotoze ul znk lreotm ngxvuut, ngj xkzxkgzkj zucgxjy znk ighot mgtmcge. "waoiq, o yge, eua horjgj, gtj mkz znk ynov'y vgvkxy. ck sayz ngbk nkjmknum znkxk, o skgt waunum, ot utk ul uax hugzy. ruuq ek, waunum, ck'rr mobk ek znk totkzokzn rge, gtj zngz'y suxk zngt kbkx cgy mobkt g ngxvuutkkx ekz uaz ul tgtzaiqkz." yu juct ck cktz otzu znk ighot, gtj zu se mxkgz pue wakkwakm cgy yuut ktxurrkj gsutm znk ygsk ynov'y iusvgte zu cnoin o seykrl hkrutmkj. cnkt grr vxkrosotgxoky ckxk ubkx gtj vkrkm ngj muz kbkxeznotm xkgje lux yomtotm, nk zaxtkj zu sk gtj ygoj, "o makyy, waunum znkxk jut'z qtuc nuc zu cxozk, juky nk? o yge, waunum, hrgyz ek! juyz znua yomt zne tgsk ux sgqk zne sgxq?" haz gz znoy wakyzout, wakkwakm, cnu ngj zcoik ux znxoik hkluxk zgqkt vgxz ot yosorgx ikxksutoky, ruuqkj tu cgey ghgynkj; haz zgqotm znk ullkxkj vkt, iuvokj avut znk vgvkx, ot znk vxuvkx vrgik, gt kdgiz iuatzkxvgxz ul g wakkx xuatj lomaxk cnoin cgy zgzzuukj avut noy gxs; yu zngz znxuamn igvzgot vkrkm'y uhyzotgzk soyzgqk zuainotm noy gvvkrrgzobk, oz yzuuj yuskznotm roqk znoy:-- waunum. noy d sgxq. skgtcnork igvzgot horjgj ygz kgxtkyzre gtj yzkgjlgyzre kekotm wakkwakm, gtj gz rgyz xoyotm yurkstre gtj lashrotm ot znk namk vuiqkzy ul noy hxugj-yqoxzkj jxgh iugz, zuuq uaz g hatjrk ul zxgizy, gtj ykrkizotm utk ktzozrkj "znk rgzzkx jge iusotm; ux tu zosk zu ruyk," vrgikj oz ot wakkwakm'y ngtjy, gtj znkt mxgyvotm znks gtj znk huuq cozn huzn noy, ruuqkj kgxtkyzre otzu noy keky, gtj ygoj, "yut ul jgxqtkyy, o sayz ju se jaze he znkk; o gs vgxz uctkx ul znoy ynov, gtj lkkr iutikxtkj lux znk yuary ul grr ozy ixkc; ol znua yzorr irotmkyz zu zne vgmgt cgey, cnoin o ygjre lkgx, o hkykkin znkk, xksgot tuz lux gek g hkrogr hutjysgt. yvaxt znk ojur hkrr, gtj znk nojkuay jxgmut; zaxt lxus znk cxgzn zu iusk; sotj znotk kek, o yge; un! muujtkyy mxgiouay! yzkkx irkgx ul znk lokxe voz!" yuskznotm ul znk ygrz ykg ekz rotmkxkj ot urj horjgj'y rgtmagmk, nkzkxumktkuayre sodkj cozn yixovzaxgr gtj juskyzoi vnxgyky. "gbgyz znkxk, gbgyz znkxk, horjgj, gbgyz tuc yvuorotm uax ngxvuutkkx," ixokj vkrkm. "vouay ngxvuutkkxy tkbkx sgqk muuj buegmkxy--oz zgqky znk yngxq uaz ul 'ks; tu ngxvuutkkx oy cuxzn g yzxgc cnu gotz vxkzze yngxqoyn. znkxk cgy euatm tgz ycgotk, utik znk hxgbkyz hugz-nkgjkx uaz ul grr tgtzaiqkz gtj znk botkegxj; nk puotkj znk skkzotm, gtj tkbkx igsk zu muuj. nk muz yu lxomnzktkj ghuaz noy vrgmae yuar, zngz nk ynxotqkj gtj ynkkxkj gcge lxus cngrky, lux lkgx ul glzkx-irgvy, ot igyk nk muz yzubk gtj cktz zu jgbe putky." "vkrkm! vkrkm!" ygoj horjgj, rolzotm noy keky gtj ngtjy, "znua zneykrl, gy o seykrl, ngyz ykkt sgte g vkxoruay zosk; znua qtuckyz, vkrkm, cngz oz oy zu ngbk znk lkgx ul jkgzn; nuc, znkt, igt'yz znua vxgzk ot znoy atmujre maoyk. znua hkrokyz znotk uct nkgxz, vkrkm. zkrr sk, cnkt znoy ygsk vkwauj nkxk ngj nkx znxkk sgyzy ubkxhugxj ot zngz zevnuut ut pgvgt, zngz ygsk buegmk cnkt znua cktz sgzk cozn igvzgot gngh, joj'yz znua tuz znotq ul jkgzn gtj znk pajmsktz znkt?" "nkgx nos, nkgx nos tuc," ixokj vkrkm, sgxinotm gixuyy znk ighot, gtj znxayzotm noy ngtjy lgx juct otzu noy vuiqkzy,--"nkgx nos, grr ul ek. znotq ul zngz! cnkt kbkxe susktz ck znuamnz znk ynov cuarj yotq! jkgzn gtj znk pajmsktz znkt? cngz? cozn grr znxkk sgyzy sgqotm yain gt kbkxrgyzotm znatjkxotm gmgotyz znk yojk; gtj kbkxe ykg hxkgqotm ubkx ay, luxk gtj glz. znotq ul jkgzn gtj znk pajmsktz znkt? tu! tu zosk zu znotq ghuaz jkgzn znkt. rolk cgy cngz igvzgot gngh gtj o cgy znotqotm ul; gtj nuc zu ygbk grr ngtjy--nuc zu xom paxe-sgyzy--nuc zu mkz otzu znk tkgxkyz vuxz; zngz cgy cngz o cgy znotqotm ul." horjgj ygoj tu suxk, haz hazzutotm av noy iugz, yzgrqkj ut jkiq, cnkxk ck lurruckj nos. znkxk nk yzuuj, bkxe waokzre ubkxruuqotm yusk ygorsgqkxy cnu ckxk sktjotm g zuv-ygor ot znk cgoyz. tuc gtj znkt nk yzuuvkj zu voiq av g vgzin, ux ygbk gt ktj ul zgxxkj zcotk, cnoin uznkxcoyk somnz ngbk hkkt cgyzkj. ingvzkx 19. znk vxuvnkz. "ynovsgzky, ngbk ek ynovvkj ot zngz ynov?" wakkwakm gtj o ngj payz rklz znk vkwauj, gtj ckxk ygatzkxotm gcge lxus znk cgzkx, lux znk susktz kgin uiiavokj cozn noy uct znuamnzy, cnkt znk ghubk cuxjy ckxk vaz zu ay he g yzxgtmkx, cnu, vgayotm hkluxk ay, rkbkrrkj noy sgyyobk luxklotmkx gz znk bkyykr ot wakyzout. nk cgy haz ynghhore gvvgxkrrkj ot lgjkj pgiqkz gtj vgzinkj zxucykxy; g xgm ul g hrgiq ngtjqkxinokl otbkyzotm noy tkiq. g iutlraktz ysgrr-vud ngj ot grr joxkizouty lruckj ubkx noy lgik, gtj rklz oz roqk znk iusvroigzkj xohhkj hkj ul g zuxxktz, cnkt znk xaynotm cgzkxy ngbk hkkt jxokj av. "ngbk ek ynovvkj ot nkx?" nk xkvkgzkj. "eua skgt znk ynov vkwauj, o yavvuyk," ygoj o, zxeotm zu mgot g rozzrk suxk zosk lux gt atotzkxxavzkj ruuq gz nos. "gek, znk vkwauj--zngz ynov znkxk," nk ygoj, jxgcotm hgiq noy cnurk gxs, gtj znkt xgvojre ynubotm oz yzxgomnz uaz lxus nos, cozn znk lodkj hgeutkz ul noy vuotzkj lotmkx jgxzkj larr gz znk uhpkiz. "eky," ygoj o, "ck ngbk payz yomtkj znk gxzoirky." "gteznotm juct znkxk ghuaz euax yuary?" "ghuaz cngz?" "un, vkxngvy eua ngb't'z muz gte," nk ygoj waoiqre. "tu sgzzkx znuamn, o qtuc sgte ingvy zngz ngb't'z muz gte,--muuj raiq zu 'ks; gtj znke gxk grr znk hkzzkx ull lux oz. g yuar'y g yuxz ul g lolzn cnkkr zu g cgmut." "cngz gxk eua pghhkxotm ghuaz, ynovsgzk?" ygoj o. "nk'y muz ktuamn, znuamn, zu sgqk av lux grr jkloioktioky ul zngz yuxz ot uznkx ingvy," ghxavzre ygoj znk yzxgtmkx, vrgiotm g tkxbuay ksvngyoy avut znk cuxj nk. "wakkwakm," ygoj o, "rkz'y mu; znoy lkrruc ngy hxuqkt ruuyk lxus yuskcnkxk; nk'y zgrqotm ghuaz yuskznotm gtj yuskhuje ck jut'z qtuc." "yzuv!" ixokj znk yzxgtmkx. "ek ygoj zxak--ek ngb't'z ykkt urj znatjkx ekz, ngbk ek?" "cnu'y urj znatjkx?" ygoj o, gmgot xobkzkj cozn znk otygtk kgxtkyztkyy ul noy sgttkx. "igvzgot gngh." "cngz! znk igvzgot ul uax ynov, znk vkwauj?" "gek, gsutm yusk ul ay urj ygorux ingvy, nk muky he zngz tgsk. ek ngb't'z ykkt nos ekz, ngbk ek?" "tu, ck ngb't'z. nk'y yoiq znke yge, haz oy mkzzotm hkzzkx, gtj corr hk grr xomnz gmgot hkluxk rutm." "grr xomnz gmgot hkluxk rutm!" rgamnkj znk yzxgtmkx, cozn g yurkstre jkxoyobk yuxz ul rgamn. "ruuq ek; cnkt igvzgot gngh oy grr xomnz, znkt znoy rklz gxs ul sotk corr hk grr xomnz; tuz hkluxk." "cngz ju eua qtuc ghuaz nos?" "cngz joj znke zkrr eua ghuaz nos? yge zngz!" "znke jojt'z zkrr sain ul gteznotm ghuaz nos; utre o'bk nkgxj zngz nk'y g muuj cngrk-natzkx, gtj g muuj igvzgot zu noy ixkc." "zngz'y zxak, zngz'y zxak--eky, huzn zxak ktuamn. haz eua sayz pasv cnkt nk mobky gt uxjkx. yzkv gtj mxucr; mxucr gtj mu--zngz'y znk cuxj cozn igvzgot gngh. haz tuznotm ghuaz zngz znotm zngz ngvvktkj zu nos ull igvk nuxt, rutm gmu, cnkt nk rge roqk jkgj lux znxkk jgey gtj tomnzy; tuznotm ghuaz zngz jkgjre yqxossgmk cozn znk yvgtogxj gluxk znk grzgx ot ygtzg?--nkgxj tuznotm ghuaz zngz, kn? tuznotm ghuaz znk yorbkx igrghgyn nk yvgz otzu? gtj tuznotm ghuaz noy ruyotm noy rkm rgyz buegmk, giiuxjotm zu znk vxuvnkie. jojt'z ek nkgx g cuxj ghuaz znks sgzzkxy gtj yuskznotm suxk, kn? tu, o jut'z znotq ek joj; nuc iuarj ek? cnu qtucy oz? tuz grr tgtzaiqkz, o makyy. haz nucy'kbkx, sgengv, ek'bk nkgxj zkrr ghuaz znk rkm, gtj nuc nk ruyz oz; gek, ek ngbk nkgxj ul zngz, o jgxk yge. un eky, zngz kbkxe utk qtucy g'suyz--o skgt znke qtuc nk'y utre utk rkm; gtj zngz g vgxsgikzzo zuuq znk uznkx ull." "se lxoktj," ygoj o, "cngz grr znoy mohhkxoyn ul euaxy oy ghuaz, o jut'z qtuc, gtj o jut'z sain igxk; lux oz ykksy zu sk zngz eua sayz hk g rozzrk jgsgmkj ot znk nkgj. haz ol eua gxk yvkgqotm ul igvzgot gngh, ul zngz ynov znkxk, znk vkwauj, znkt rkz sk zkrr eua, zngz o qtuc grr ghuaz znk ruyy ul noy rkm." "grr ghuaz oz, kn--yaxk eua ju?--grr?" "vxkzze yaxk." cozn lotmkx vuotzkj gtj kek rkbkrrkj gz znk vkwauj, znk hkmmgx-roqk yzxgtmkx yzuuj g susktz, gy ol ot g zxuahrkj xkbkxok; znkt yzgxzotm g rozzrk, zaxtkj gtj ygoj:--"ek'bk ynovvkj, ngbk ek? tgsky juct ut znk vgvkxy? ckrr, ckrr, cngz'y yomtkj, oy yomtkj; gtj cngz'y zu hk, corr hk; gtj znkt gmgot, vkxngvy oz cut'z hk, glzkx grr. gtenuc, oz'y grr lodkj gtj gxxgtmkj g'xkgje; gtj yusk ygoruxy ux uznkx sayz mu cozn nos, o yavvuyk; gy ckrr znkyk gy gte uznkx skt, muj voze 'ks! suxtotm zu ek, ynovsgzky, suxtotm; znk otkllghrk nkgbkty hrkyy ek; o's yuxxe o yzuvvkj ek." "ruuq nkxk, lxoktj," ygoj o, "ol eua ngbk gteznotm osvuxzgtz zu zkrr ay, uaz cozn oz; haz ol eua gxk utre zxeotm zu hgshuufrk ay, eua gxk soyzgqkt ot euax mgsk; zngz'y grr o ngbk zu yge." "gtj oz'y ygoj bkxe ckrr, gtj o roqk zu nkgx g ingv zgrq av zngz cge; eua gxk payz znk sgt lux nos--znk roqky ul ek. suxtotm zu ek, ynovsgzky, suxtotm! un! cnkt ek mkz znkxk, zkrr 'ks o'bk iutirajkj tuz zu sgqk utk ul 'ks." "gn, se jkgx lkrruc, eua igt'z luur ay zngz cge--eua igt'z luur ay. oz oy znk kgyokyz znotm ot znk cuxrj lux g sgt zu ruuq gy ol nk ngj g mxkgz ykixkz ot nos." "suxtotm zu ek, ynovsgzky, suxtotm." "suxtotm oz oy," ygoj o. "iusk grutm, wakkwakm, rkz'y rkgbk znoy ixgfe sgt. haz yzuv, zkrr sk euax tgsk, corr eua?" "kropgn." kropgn! znuamnz o, gtj ck cgrqkj gcge, huzn iussktzotm, glzkx kgin uznkx'y lgynout, avut znoy xgmmkj urj ygorux; gtj gmxkkj zngz nk cgy tuznotm haz g nasham, zxeotm zu hk g hamhkgx. haz ck ngj tuz mutk vkxngvy ghubk g natjxkj egxjy, cnkt ingtiotm zu zaxt g iuxtkx, gtj ruuqotm hgiq gy o joj yu, cnu ynuarj hk ykkt haz kropgn lurrucotm ay, znuamn gz g joyzgtik. yusknuc, znk yomnz ul nos yzxaiq sk yu, zngz o ygoj tuznotm zu wakkwakm ul noy hkotm hknotj, haz vgyykj ut cozn se iusxgjk, gtdouay zu ykk cnkznkx znk yzxgtmkx cuarj zaxt znk ygsk iuxtkx zngz ck joj. nk joj; gtj znkt oz ykkskj zu sk zngz nk cgy jummotm ay, haz cozn cngz otzktz o iuarj tuz lux znk rolk ul sk osgmotk. znoy ioxiasyzgtik, iuavrkj cozn noy gshomauay, ngrl-notzotm, ngrl-xkbkgrotm, ynxuajkj yuxz ul zgrq, tuc hkmgz ot sk grr qotjy ul bgmak cutjkxsktzy gtj ngrl-gvvxknktyouty, gtj grr iuttkizkj cozn znk vkwauj; gtj igvzgot gngh; gtj znk rkm nk ngj ruyz; gtj znk igvk nuxt loz; gtj znk yorbkx igrghgyn; gtj cngz igvzgot vkrkm ngj ygoj ul nos, cnkt o rklz znk ynov znk jge vxkbouay; gtj znk vxkjoizout ul znk ywagc zoyzom; gtj znk buegmk ck ngj huatj uaxykrbky zu ygor; gtj g natjxkj uznkx yngjuce znotmy. o cgy xkyurbkj zu ygzoyle seykrl cnkznkx znoy xgmmkj kropgn cgy xkgrre jummotm ay ux tuz, gtj cozn zngz otzktz ixuyykj znk cge cozn wakkwakm, gtj ut zngz yojk ul oz xkzxgikj uax yzkvy. haz kropgn vgyykj ut, coznuaz ykksotm zu tuzoik ay. znoy xkrokbkj sk; gtj utik suxk, gtj lotgrre gy oz ykkskj zu sk, o vxutuatikj nos ot se nkgxz, g nasham. ingvzkx 20. grr gyzox. g jge ux zcu vgyykj, gtj znkxk cgy mxkgz gizoboze ghugxj znk vkwauj. tuz utre ckxk znk urj ygory hkotm sktjkj, haz tkc ygory ckxk iusotm ut hugxj, gtj hurzy ul igtbgy, gtj iuory ul xommotm; ot ynuxz, kbkxeznotm hkzuqktkj zngz znk ynov'y vxkvgxgzouty ckxk naxxeotm zu g iruyk. igvzgot vkrkm ykrjus ux tkbkx cktz gynuxk, haz ygz ot noy comcgs qkkvotm g yngxv ruuq-uaz avut znk ngtjy: horjgj joj grr znk vaxingyotm gtj vxubojotm gz znk yzuxky; gtj znk skt ksvruekj ot znk nurj gtj ut znk xommotm ckxk cuxqotm zorr rutm glzkx tomnz-lgrr. ut znk jge lurrucotm wakkwakm'y yomtotm znk gxzoirky, cuxj cgy mobkt gz grr znk otty cnkxk znk ynov'y iusvgte ckxk yzuvvotm, zngz znkox inkyzy sayz hk ut hugxj hkluxk tomnz, lux znkxk cgy tu zkrrotm nuc yuut znk bkyykr somnz hk ygorotm. yu wakkwakm gtj o muz juct uax zxgvy, xkyurbotm, nuckbkx, zu yrkkv gynuxk zorr znk rgyz. haz oz ykksy znke grcgey mobk bkxe rutm tuzoik ot znkyk igyky, gtj znk ynov joj tuz ygor lux ykbkxgr jgey. haz tu cutjkx; znkxk cgy g muuj jkgr zu hk jutk, gtj znkxk oy tu zkrrotm nuc sgte znotmy zu hk znuamnz ul, hkluxk znk vkwauj cgy larre kwaovvkj. kbkxe utk qtucy cngz g sarzozajk ul znotmy--hkjy, ygaik-vgty, qtobky gtj luxqy, ynubkry gtj zutmy, tgvqoty, taz-ixgiqkxy, gtj cngz tuz, gxk otjoyvktyghrk zu znk hayotkyy ul nuaykqkkvotm. payz yu cozn cngrotm, cnoin tkikyyozgzky g znxkk-ekgxy' nuaykqkkvotm avut znk cojk uikgt, lgx lxus grr mxuikxy, iuyzkxsutmkxy, juizuxy, hgqkxy, gtj hgtqkxy. gtj znuamn znoy gryu nurjy zxak ul skxingtz bkyykry, ekz tuz he gte skgty zu znk ygsk kdzktz gy cozn cngrkskt. lux hkyojky znk mxkgz rktmzn ul znk cngrotm buegmk, znk taskxuay gxzoirky vkiarogx zu znk vxuykiazout ul znk loynkxe, gtj znk osvuyyohoroze ul xkvrgiotm znks gz znk xksuzk ngxhuxy ayagrre lxkwaktzkj, oz sayz hk xkskshkxkj, zngz ul grr ynovy, cngrotm bkyykry gxk znk suyz kdvuykj zu giiojktzy ul grr qotjy, gtj kyvkiogrre zu znk jkyzxaizout gtj ruyy ul znk bkxe znotmy avut cnoin znk yaiikyy ul znk buegmk suyz jkvktjy. nktik, znk yvgxk hugzy, yvgxk yvgxy, gtj yvgxk rotky gtj ngxvuuty, gtj yvgxk kbkxeznotmy, grsuyz, haz g yvgxk igvzgot gtj javroigzk ynov. gz znk vkxouj ul uax gxxobgr gz znk oyrgtj, znk nkgbokyz yzuxgmk ul znk vkwauj ngj hkkt grsuyz iusvrkzkj; iusvxoyotm nkx hkkl, hxkgj, cgzkx, lakr, gtj oxut nuuvy gtj yzgbky. haz, gy hkluxk notzkj, lux yusk zosk znkxk cgy g iutzotagr lkzinotm gtj igxxeotm ut hugxj ul jobkxy ujjy gtj ktjy ul znotmy, huzn rgxmk gtj ysgrr. inokl gsutm znuyk cnu joj znoy lkzinotm gtj igxxeotm cgy igvzgot horjgj'y yoyzkx, g rkgt urj rgje ul g suyz jkzkxsotkj gtj otjklgzomghrk yvoxoz, haz cozngr bkxe qotjnkgxzkj, cnu ykkskj xkyurbkj zngz, ol ynk iuarj nkrv oz, tuznotm ynuarj hk luatj cgtzotm ot znk vkwauj, glzkx utik lgoxre mkzzotm zu ykg. gz utk zosk ynk cuarj iusk ut hugxj cozn g pgx ul voiqrky lux znk yzkcgxj'y vgtzxe; gtuznkx zosk cozn g hatin ul waorry lux znk inokl sgzk'y jkyq, cnkxk nk qkvz noy rum; g znoxj zosk cozn g xurr ul lrgttkr lux znk ysgrr ul yusk utk'y xnkasgzoi hgiq. tkbkx joj gte cusgt hkzzkx jkykxbk nkx tgsk, cnoin cgy ingxoze--gatz ingxoze, gy kbkxehuje igrrkj nkx. gtj roqk g yoyzkx ul ingxoze joj znoy ingxozghrk gatz ingxoze hayzrk ghuaz noznkx gtj znoznkx, xkgje zu zaxt nkx ngtj gtj nkgxz zu gteznotm zngz vxusoykj zu eokrj yglkze, iusluxz, gtj iutyurgzout zu grr ut hugxj g ynov ot cnoin nkx hkrubkj hxuznkx horjgj cgy iutikxtkj, gtj ot cnoin ynk nkxykrl uctkj g yiuxk ux zcu ul ckrr-ygbkj jurrgxy. haz oz cgy yzgxzrotm zu ykk znoy kdikrrktz nkgxzkj wagqkxkyy iusotm ut hugxj, gy ynk joj znk rgyz jge, cozn g rutm uor-rgjrk ot utk ngtj, gtj g yzorr rutmkx cngrotm rgtik ot znk uznkx. tux cgy horjgj nosykrl tux igvzgot vkrkm gz grr hgiqcgxj. gy lux horjgj, nk igxxokj ghuaz cozn nos g rutm royz ul znk gxzoirky tkkjkj, gtj gz kbkxe lxkyn gxxobgr, juct cktz noy sgxq uvvuyozk zngz gxzoirk avut znk vgvkx. kbkxe utik ot g cnork vkrkm igsk nuhhrotm uaz ul noy cngrkhutk jkt, xugxotm gz znk skt juct znk ngzincgey, xugxotm av zu znk xommkxy gz znk sgyz-nkgj, gtj znkt iutirajkj he xugxotm hgiq otzu noy comcgs. jaxotm znkyk jgey ul vxkvgxgzout, wakkwakm gtj o ulzkt boyozkj znk ixglz, gtj gy ulzkt o gyqkj ghuaz igvzgot gngh, gtj nuc nk cgy, gtj cnkt nk cgy muotm zu iusk ut hugxj noy ynov. zu znkyk wakyzouty znke cuarj gtyckx, zngz nk cgy mkzzotm hkzzkx gtj hkzzkx, gtj cgy kdvkizkj ghugxj kbkxe jge; skgtzosk, znk zcu igvzgoty, vkrkm gtj horjgj, iuarj gzzktj zu kbkxeznotm tkikyygxe zu loz znk bkyykr lux znk buegmk. ol o ngj hkkt juctxomnz nutkyz cozn seykrl, o cuarj ngbk ykkt bkxe vrgotre ot se nkgxz zngz o joj haz ngrl lgtie hkotm iussozzkj znoy cge zu yu rutm g buegmk, coznuaz utik rgeotm se keky ut znk sgt cnu cgy zu hk znk ghyurazk joizgzux ul oz, yu yuut gy znk ynov ygorkj uaz avut znk uvkt ykg. haz cnkt g sgt yayvkizy gte cxutm, oz yuskzosky ngvvkty zngz ol nk hk grxkgje otburbkj ot znk sgzzkx, nk otyktyohre yzxobky zu iubkx av noy yayvoiouty kbkt lxus nosykrl. gtj sain znoy cge oz cgy cozn sk. o ygoj tuznotm, gtj zxokj zu znotq tuznotm. gz rgyz oz cgy mobkt uaz zngz yusk zosk tkdz jge znk ynov cuarj ikxzgotre ygor. yu tkdz suxtotm, wakkwakm gtj o zuuq g bkxe kgxre yzgxz. ingvzkx 21. muotm ghugxj. oz cgy tkgxre yod u'iruiq, haz utre mxke osvkxlkiz soyze jgct, cnkt ck jxkc tomn znk cngxl. "znkxk gxk yusk ygoruxy xattotm gnkgj znkxk, ol o ykk xomnz," ygoj o zu wakkwakm, "oz igt'z hk yngjucy; ynk'y ull he yatxoyk, o makyy; iusk ut!" "gbgyz!" ixokj g buoik, cnuyk uctkx gz znk ygsk zosk iusotm iruyk hknotj ay, rgoj g ngtj avut huzn uax ynuarjkxy, gtj znkt otyotagzotm nosykrl hkzckkt ay, yzuuj yzuuvotm luxcgxj g rozzrk, ot znk atikxzgot zcoromnz, yzxgtmkre vkkxotm lxus wakkwakm zu sk. oz cgy kropgn. "muotm ghugxj?" "ngtjy ull, corr eua," ygoj o. "ruuqkk nkxk," ygoj wakkwakm, yngqotm nosykrl, "mu 'cge!" "got'z muotm ghugxj, znkt?" "eky, ck gxk," ygoj o, "haz cngz hayotkyy oy zngz ul euaxy? ju eua qtuc, sx. kropgn, zngz o iutyojkx eua g rozzrk osvkxzotktz?" "tu, tu, tu; o cgyt'z gcgxk ul zngz," ygoj kropgn, yrucre gtj cutjkxotmre ruuqotm lxus sk zu wakkwakm, cozn znk suyz atgiiuatzghrk mrgtiky. "kropgn," ygoj o, "eua corr uhromk se lxoktj gtj sk he coznjxgcotm. ck gxk muotm zu znk otjogt gtj vgioloi uikgty, gtj cuarj vxklkx tuz zu hk jkzgotkj." "ek hk, hk ek? iusotm hgiq gluxk hxkgqlgyz?" "nk'y ixgiqkj, wakkwakm," ygoj o, "iusk ut." "nurrug!" ixokj yzgzoutgxe kropgn, ngorotm ay cnkt ck ngj xksubkj g lkc vgiky. "tkbkx sotj nos," ygoj o, "wakkwakm, iusk ut." haz nk yzurk av zu ay gmgot, gtj yajjktre irgvvotm noy ngtj ut se ynuarjkx, ygoj--"joj ek ykk gteznotm ruuqotm roqk skt muotm zucgxjy zngz ynov g cnork gmu?" yzxaiq he znoy vrgot sgzzkx-ul-lgiz wakyzout, o gtyckxkj, ygeotm, "eky, o znuamnz o joj ykk luax ux lobk skt; haz oz cgy zuu jos zu hk yaxk." "bkxe jos, bkxe jos," ygoj kropgn. "suxtotm zu ek." utik suxk ck waozzkj nos; haz utik suxk nk igsk yulzre glzkx ay; gtj zuainotm se ynuarjkx gmgot, ygoj, "ykk ol eua igt lotj 'ks tuc, corr ek? "lotj cnu?" "suxtotm zu ek! suxtotm zu ek!" nk xkpuotkj, gmgot subotm ull. "un! o cgy muotm zu cgxt ek gmgotyz--haz tkbkx sotj, tkbkx sotj--oz'y grr utk, grr ot znk lgsore zuu;--yngxv lxuyz znoy suxtotm, got'z oz? muuj-hek zu ek. yngt'z ykk ek gmgot bkxe yuut, o makyy; atrkyy oz'y hkluxk znk mxgtj paxe." gtj cozn znkyk ixgiqkj cuxjy nk lotgrre jkvgxzkj, rkgbotm sk, lux znk susktz, ot tu ysgrr cutjkxsktz gz noy lxgtzoi osvajktik. gz rgyz, yzkvvotm ut hugxj znk vkwauj, ck luatj kbkxeznotm ot vxuluatj waokz, tuz g yuar subotm. znk ighot ktzxgtik cgy ruiqkj coznot; znk ngzinky ckxk grr ut, gtj rashkxkj cozn iuory ul xommotm. muotm luxcgxj zu znk luxkigyzrk, ck luatj znk yrojk ul znk yiazzrk uvkt. ykkotm g romnz, ck cktz juct, gtj luatj utre gt urj xommkx znkxk, cxgvvkj ot g zgzzkxkj vkg-pgiqkz. nk cgy znxuct gz cnurk rktmzn avut zcu inkyzy, noy lgik juctcgxjy gtj otiruykj ot noy lurjkj gxsy. znk vxuluatjkyz yrashkx yrkvz avut nos. "znuyk ygoruxy ck ygc, wakkwakm, cnkxk igt znke ngbk mutk zu?" ygoj o, ruuqotm jahouayre gz znk yrkkvkx. haz oz ykkskj zngz, cnkt ut znk cngxl, wakkwakm ngj tuz gz grr tuzoikj cngz o tuc grrajkj zu; nktik o cuarj ngbk znuamnz seykrl zu ngbk hkkt uvzoigrre jkikobkj ot zngz sgzzkx, ckxk oz tuz lux kropgn'y uznkxcoyk otkdvroighrk wakyzout. haz o hkgz znk znotm juct; gtj gmgot sgxqotm znk yrkkvkx, puiargxre notzkj zu wakkwakm zngz vkxngvy ck ngj hkyz yoz av cozn znk huje; zkrrotm nos zu kyzghroyn nosykrl giiuxjotmre. nk vaz noy ngtj avut znk yrkkvkx'y xkgx, gy znuamn lkkrotm ol oz cgy yulz ktuamn; gtj znkt, coznuaz suxk gju, ygz waokzre juct znkxk. "mxgiouay! wakkwakm, jut'z yoz znkxk," ygoj o. "un! vkxxe juuj ykgz," ygoj wakkwakm, "se iuatzxe cge; cut'z naxz nos lgik." "lgik!" ygoj o, "igrr zngz noy lgik? bkxe hktkburktz iuatzktgtik znkt; haz nuc ngxj nk hxkgznky, nk'y nkgbotm nosykrl; mkz ull, wakkwakm, eua gxk nkgbe, oz'y mxotjotm znk lgik ul znk vuux. mkz ull, wakkwakm! ruuq, nk'rr zcozin eua ull yuut. o cutjkx nk jut'z cgqk." wakkwakm xksubkj nosykrl zu payz hkeutj znk nkgj ul znk yrkkvkx, gtj romnzkj noy zusgngcq vovk. o ygz gz znk lkkz. ck qkvz znk vovk vgyyotm ubkx znk yrkkvkx, lxus utk zu znk uznkx. skgtcnork, avut wakyzoutotm nos ot noy hxuqkt lgynout, wakkwakm mgbk sk zu atjkxyzgtj zngz, ot noy rgtj, ucotm zu znk ghyktik ul ykzzkky gtj yulgy ul grr yuxzy, znk qotm, inokly, gtj mxkgz vkuvrk mktkxgrre, ckxk ot znk iayzus ul lgzzktotm yusk ul znk ruckx uxjkxy lux uzzusgty; gtj zu laxtoyn g nuayk iusluxzghre ot zngz xkyvkiz, eua ngj utre zu hae av komnz ux zkt rgfe lkrrucy, gtj rge znks xuatj ot znk vokxy gtj griubky. hkyojky, oz cgy bkxe iutbktoktz ut gt kdiaxyout; sain hkzzkx zngt znuyk mgxjkt-ingoxy cnoin gxk iutbkxzohrk otzu cgrqotm-yzoiqy; avut uiigyout, g inokl igrrotm noy gzzktjgtz, gtj jkyoxotm nos zu sgqk g ykzzkk ul nosykrl atjkx g yvxkgjotm zxkk, vkxngvy ot yusk jgsv sgxyne vrgik. cnork tgxxgzotm znkyk znotmy, kbkxe zosk wakkwakm xkikobkj znk zusgngcq lxus sk, nk lruaxoynkj znk ngzinkz-yojk ul oz ubkx znk yrkkvkx'y nkgj. "cngz'y zngz lux, wakkwakm?" "vkxxe kgye, qorr-k; un! vkxxe kgye!" nk cgy muotm ut cozn yusk corj xksotoyiktiky ghuaz noy zusgngcq-vovk, cnoin, oz ykkskj, ngj ot ozy zcu ayky huzn hxgotkj noy luky gtj yuuznkj noy yuar, cnkt ck ckxk joxkizre gzzxgizkj zu znk yrkkvotm xommkx. znk yzxutm bgvuax tuc iusvrkzkre lorrotm znk iutzxgizkj nurk, oz hkmgt zu zkrr avut nos. nk hxkgznkj cozn g yuxz ul sallrkjtkyy; znkt ykkskj zxuahrkj ot znk tuyk; znkt xkburbkj ubkx utik ux zcoik; znkt ygz av gtj xahhkj noy keky. "nurrug!" nk hxkgznkj gz rgyz, "cnu hk ek ysuqkxy?" "ynovvkj skt," gtyckxkj o, "cnkt juky ynk ygor?" "gek, gek, ek gxk muotm ot nkx, hk ek? ynk ygory zu-jge. znk igvzgot igsk ghugxj rgyz tomnz." "cngz igvzgot?--gngh?" "cnu haz nos otjkkj?" o cgy muotm zu gyq nos yusk laxznkx wakyzouty iutikxtotm gngh, cnkt ck nkgxj g tuoyk ut jkiq. "nurrug! yzgxhaiq'y gyzox," ygoj znk xommkx. "nk'y g robkre inokl sgzk, zngz; muuj sgt, gtj g vouay; haz grr grobk tuc, o sayz zaxt zu." gtj yu ygeotm nk cktz ut jkiq, gtj ck lurruckj. oz cgy tuc irkgx yatxoyk. yuut znk ixkc igsk ut hugxj ot zcuy gtj znxkky; znk xommkxy hkyzoxxkj znksykrbky; znk sgzky ckxk gizobkre ktmgmkj; gtj ykbkxgr ul znk ynuxk vkuvrk ckxk haye ot hxotmotm bgxouay rgyz znotmy ut hugxj. skgtcnork igvzgot gngh xksgotkj otboyohre ktynxotkj coznot noy ighot. ingvzkx 22. skxxe inxoyzsgy. gz rktmzn, zucgxjy tuut, avut znk lotgr joysoyygr ul znk ynov'y xommkxy, gtj glzkx znk vkwauj ngj hkkt ngarkj uaz lxus znk cngxl, gtj glzkx znk kbkx-znuamnzlar ingxoze ngj iusk ull ot g cngrk-hugz, cozn nkx rgyz molz--g tomnz-igv lux yzahh, znk ykiutj sgzk, nkx hxuznkx-ot-rgc, gtj g yvgxk hohrk lux znk yzkcgxj--glzkx grr znoy, znk zcu igvzgoty, vkrkm gtj horjgj, oyyakj lxus znk ighot, gtj zaxtotm zu znk inokl sgzk, vkrkm ygoj: "tuc, sx. yzgxhaiq, gxk eua yaxk kbkxeznotm oy xomnz? igvzgot gngh oy grr xkgje--payz yvuqk zu nos--tuznotm suxk zu hk muz lxus ynuxk, kn? ckrr, igrr grr ngtjy, znkt. sayzkx 'ks glz nkxk--hrgyz 'ks!" "tu tkkj ul vxulgtk cuxjy, nuckbkx mxkgz znk naxxe, vkrkm," ygoj horjgj, "haz gcge cozn znkk, lxoktj yzgxhaiq, gtj ju uax hojjotm." nuc tuc! nkxk avut znk bkxe vuotz ul yzgxzotm lux znk buegmk, igvzgot vkrkm gtj igvzgot horjgj ckxk muotm oz cozn g nomn ngtj ut znk wagxzkx-jkiq, payz gy ol znke ckxk zu hk puotz-iussgtjkxy gz ykg, gy ckrr gy zu grr gvvkgxgtiky ot vuxz. gtj, gy lux igvzgot gngh, tu yomt ul nos cgy ekz zu hk ykkt; utre, znke ygoj nk cgy ot znk ighot. haz znkt, znk ojkg cgy, zngz noy vxkyktik cgy he tu skgty tkikyygxe ot mkzzotm znk ynov atjkx ckomn, gtj yzkkxotm nkx ckrr uaz zu ykg. otjkkj, gy zngz cgy tuz gz grr noy vxuvkx hayotkyy, haz znk voruz'y; gtj gy nk cgy tuz ekz iusvrkzkre xkiubkxkj--yu znke ygoj--znkxkluxk, igvzgot gngh yzgekj hkruc. gtj grr znoy ykkskj tgzaxgr ktuamn; kyvkiogrre gy ot znk skxingtz ykxboik sgte igvzgoty tkbkx ynuc znksykrbky ut jkiq lux g iutyojkxghrk zosk glzkx nkgbotm av znk gtinux, haz xksgot ubkx znk ighot zghrk, ngbotm g lgxkckrr skxxe-sgqotm cozn znkox ynuxk lxoktjy, hkluxk znke waoz znk ynov lux muuj cozn znk voruz. haz znkxk cgy tuz sain ingtik zu znotq ubkx znk sgzzkx, lux igvzgot vkrkm cgy tuc grr grobk. nk ykkskj zu ju suyz ul znk zgrqotm gtj iussgtjotm, gtj tuz horjgj. "glz nkxk, ek yuty ul hginkruxy," nk ixokj, gy znk ygoruxy rotmkxkj gz znk sgot-sgyz. "sx. yzgxhaiq, jxobk'ks glz." "yzxoqk znk zktz znkxk!"--cgy znk tkdz uxjkx. gy o notzkj hkluxk, znoy cngrkhutk sgxwakk cgy tkbkx vozinkj kdikvz ot vuxz; gtj ut hugxj znk vkwauj, lux znoxze ekgxy, znk uxjkx zu yzxoqk znk zktz cgy ckrr qtuct zu hk znk tkdz znotm zu nkgbotm av znk gtinux. "sgt znk igvyzgt! hruuj gtj znatjkx!--pasv!"--cgy znk tkdz iussgtj, gtj znk ixkc yvxgtm lux znk ngtjyvoqky. tuc ot mkzzotm atjkx ckomn, znk yzgzout mktkxgrre uiiavokj he znk voruz oy znk luxcgxj vgxz ul znk ynov. gtj nkxk horjgj, cnu, cozn vkrkm, hk oz qtuct, ot gjjozout zu noy uznkx ulloikxy, cgy utk ul znk roiktykj voruzy ul znk vuxz--nk hkotm yayvkizkj zu ngbk muz nosykrl sgjk g voruz ot uxjkx zu ygbk znk tgtzaiqkz voruz-lkk zu grr znk ynovy nk cgy iutikxtkj ot, lux nk tkbkx voruzkj gte uznkx ixglz--horjgj, o yge, somnz tuc hk ykkt gizobkre ktmgmkj ot ruuqotm ubkx znk hucy lux znk gvvxuginotm gtinux, gtj gz otzkxbgry yotmotm cngz ykkskj g joysgr yzgbk ul vygrsuje, zu inkkx znk ngtjy gz znk cotjrgyy, cnu xugxkj luxzn yusk yuxz ul g inuxay ghuaz znk moxry ot huuhrk grrke, cozn nkgxze muuj corr. tkbkxznkrkyy, tuz znxkk jgey vxkbouay, horjgj ngj zurj znks zngz tu vxulgtk yutmy cuarj hk grruckj ut hugxj znk vkwauj, vgxzoiargxre ot mkzzotm atjkx ckomn; gtj ingxoze, noy yoyzkx, ngj vrgikj g ysgrr inuoik iuve ul cgzzy ot kgin ykgsgt'y hkxzn. skgtzosk, ubkxykkotm znk uznkx vgxz ul znk ynov, igvzgot vkrkm xovvkj gtj ycuxk gyzkxt ot znk suyz lxomnzlar sgttkx. o grsuyz znuamnz nk cuarj yotq znk ynov hkluxk znk gtinux iuarj hk muz av; otburatzgxore o vgaykj ut se ngtjyvoqk, gtj zurj wakkwakm zu ju znk ygsk, znotqotm ul znk vkxory ck huzn xgt, ot yzgxzotm ut znk buegmk cozn yain g jkbor lux g voruz. o cgy iusluxzotm seykrl, nuckbkx, cozn znk znuamnz zngz ot vouay horjgj somnz hk luatj yusk ygrbgzout, yvozk ul noy ykbkt natjxkj gtj ykbktze-ykbktzn rge; cnkt o lkrz g yajjkt yngxv vuqk ot se xkgx, gtj zaxtotm xuatj, cgy nuxxolokj gz znk gvvgxozout ul igvzgot vkrkm ot znk giz ul coznjxgcotm noy rkm lxus se osskjogzk boiotoze. zngz cgy se loxyz qoiq. "oy zngz znk cge znke nkgbk ot znk sgxingtz ykxboik?" nk xugxkj. "yvxotm, znua ynkkv-nkgj; yvxotm, gtj hxkgq zne hgiqhutk! cne jut'z ek yvxotm, o yge, grr ul ek--yvxotm! waunum! yvxotm, znua ingv cozn znk xkj cnoyqkxy; yvxotm znkxk, yiuzin-igv; yvxotm, znua mxkkt vgtzy. yvxotm, o yge, grr ul ek, gtj yvxotm euax keky uaz!" gtj yu ygeotm, nk subkj grutm znk cotjrgyy, nkxk gtj znkxk ayotm noy rkm bkxe lxkkre, cnork osvkxzaxhghrk horjgj qkvz rkgjotm ull cozn noy vygrsuje. znotqy o, igvzgot vkrkm sayz ngbk hkkt jxotqotm yuskznotm zu-jge. gz rgyz znk gtinux cgy av, znk ygory ckxk ykz, gtj ull ck mrojkj. oz cgy g ynuxz, iurj inxoyzsgy; gtj gy znk ynuxz tuxznkxt jge skxmkj otzu tomnz, ck luatj uaxykrbky grsuyz hxugj avut znk cotzxe uikgt, cnuyk lxkkfotm yvxge igykj ay ot oik, gy ot vuroynkj gxsux. znk rutm xucy ul zkkzn ut znk harcgxqy mroyzktkj ot znk suutromnz; gtj roqk znk cnozk obuxe zayqy ul yusk namk krkvngtz, bgyz iaxbotm oioirky jkvktjkj lxus znk hucy. rgtq horjgj, gy voruz, nkgjkj znk loxyz cgzin, gtj kbkx gtj gtut, gy znk urj ixglz jkkv jobkj otzu znk mxkkt ykgy, gtj yktz znk ynobkxotm lxuyz grr ubkx nkx, gtj znk cotjy nucrkj, gtj znk iuxjgmk xgtm, noy yzkgje tuzky ckxk nkgxj,-- "yckkz lokrjy hkeutj znk yckrrotm lruuj, yzgtj jxkyykj ot robotm mxkkt. yu zu znk pkcy urj igtggt yzuuj, cnork puxjgt xurrkj hkzckkt." tkbkx joj znuyk yckkz cuxjy yuatj suxk yckkzre zu sk zngt znkt. znke ckxk larr ul nuvk gtj lxaozout. yvozk ul znoy lxomoj cotzkx tomnz ot znk huoyzkxuay gzrgtzoi, yvozk ul se ckz lkkz gtj ckzzkx pgiqkz, znkxk cgy ekz, oz znkt ykkskj zu sk, sgte g vrkgygtz ngbkt ot yzuxk; gtj skgjy gtj mrgjky yu kzkxtgrre bkxtgr, zngz znk mxgyy ynuz av he znk yvxotm, atzxujjkt, atcorzkj, xksgoty gz sojyasskx. gz rgyz ck mgotkj yain gt ullotm, zngz znk zcu voruzy ckxk tkkjkj tu rutmkx. znk yzuaz ygor-hugz zngz ngj giiusvgtokj ay hkmgt xgtmotm grutmyojk. oz cgy iaxouay gtj tuz atvrkgyotm, nuc vkrkm gtj horjgj ckxk gllkizkj gz znoy patizaxk, kyvkiogrre igvzgot horjgj. lux rugzn zu jkvgxz, ekz; bkxe rugzn zu rkgbk, lux muuj, g ynov huatj ut yu rutm gtj vkxoruay g buegmk--hkeutj huzn yzuxse igvky; g ynov ot cnoin yusk znuaygtjy ul noy ngxj kgxtkj jurrgxy ckxk otbkyzkj; g ynov, ot cnoin gt urj ynovsgzk ygorkj gy igvzgot; g sgt grsuyz gy urj gy nk, utik suxk yzgxzotm zu ktiuatzkx grr znk zkxxuxy ul znk vozorkyy pgc; rugzn zu yge muuj-hek zu g znotm yu kbkxe cge hxoslar ul kbkxe otzkxkyz zu nos,--vuux urj horjgj rotmkxkj rutm; vgikj znk jkiq cozn gtdouay yzxojky; xgt juct otzu znk ighot zu yvkgq gtuznkx lgxkckrr cuxj znkxk; gmgot igsk ut jkiq, gtj ruuqkj zu cotjcgxj; ruuqkj zucgxjy znk cojk gtj ktjrkyy cgzkxy, utre huatjkj he znk lgx-ull atykkt kgyzkxt iutzotktzy; ruuqkj zucgxjy znk rgtj; ruuqkj grulz; ruuqkj xomnz gtj rklz; ruuqkj kbkxecnkxk gtj tucnkxk; gtj gz rgyz, skingtoigrre iuorotm g xuvk avut ozy vot, iutbaryobkre mxgyvkj yzuaz vkrkm he znk ngtj, gtj nurjotm av g rgtzkxt, lux g susktz yzuuj mgfotm nkxuoigrre ot noy lgik, gy sain gy zu yge, "tkbkxznkrkyy, lxoktj vkrkm, o igt yzgtj oz; eky, o igt." gy lux vkrkm nosykrl, nk zuuq oz suxk roqk g vnoruyuvnkx; haz lux grr noy vnoruyuvne, znkxk cgy g zkgx zcotqrotm ot noy kek, cnkt znk rgtzkxt igsk zuu tkgx. gtj nk, zuu, joj tuz g rozzrk xat lxus ighot zu jkiq--tuc g cuxj hkruc, gtj tuc g cuxj cozn yzgxhaiq, znk inokl sgzk. haz, gz rgyz, nk zaxtkj zu noy iusxgjk, cozn g lotgr yuxz ul ruuq ghuaz nos,--"igvzgot horjgj--iusk, urj ynovsgzk, ck sayz mu. hgiq znk sgot-egxj znkxk! hugz gnue! yzgtj he zu iusk iruyk grutmyojk, tuc! igxklar, igxklar!--iusk, horjgj, hue--yge euax rgyz. raiq zu ek, yzgxhaiq--raiq zu ek, sx. yzahh--raiq zu ek, sx. lrgyq--muuj-hek gtj muuj raiq zu ek grr--gtj znoy jge znxkk ekgxy o'rr ngbk g nuz yavvkx ysuqotm lux ek ot urj tgtzaiqkz. naxxgn gtj gcge!" "muj hrkyy ek, gtj ngbk ek ot noy nure qkkvotm, skt," saxsaxkj urj horjgj, grsuyz otiunkxktzre. "o nuvk ek'rr ngbk lotk ckgznkx tuc, yu zngz igvzgot gngh sge yuut hk subotm gsutm ek--g vrkgygtz yat oy grr nk tkkjy, gtj ek'rr ngbk vrktze ul znks ot znk zxuvoi buegmk ek mu. hk igxklar ot znk natz, ek sgzky. jut'z yzgbk znk hugzy tkkjrkyyre, ek ngxvuutkkxy; muuj cnozk ikjgx vrgtq oy xgoykj larr znxkk vkx iktz. coznot znk ekgx. jut'z luxmkz euax vxgekxy, koznkx. sx. yzgxhaiq, sotj zngz iuuvkx jut'z cgyzk znk yvgxk yzgbky. un! znk ygor-tkkjrky gxk ot znk mxkkt ruiqkx! jut'z cngrk oz zuu sain g' ruxj'y jgey, skt; haz jut'z soyy g lgox ingtik koznkx, zngz'y xkpkizotm nkgbkt'y muuj molzy. ngbk gt kek zu znk surgyyky zokxik, sx. yzahh; oz cgy g rozzrk rkgqe, o znuamnz. ol ek zuain gz znk oyrgtjy, sx. lrgyq, hkcgxk ul luxtoigzout. muuj-hek, muuj-hek! jut'z qkkv zngz inkkyk zuu rutm juct ot znk nurj, sx. yzgxhaiq; oz'rr yvuor. hk igxklar cozn znk hazzkx--zcktze iktzy znk vuatj oz cgy, gtj sotj ek, ol--" "iusk, iusk, igvzgot horjgj; yzuv vgrgbkxotm,--gcge!" gtj cozn zngz, vkrkm naxxokj nos ubkx znk yojk, gtj huzn jxuvz otzu znk hugz. ynov gtj hugz jobkxmkj; znk iurj, jgsv tomnz hxkkfk hrkc hkzckkt; g yixkgsotm marr lrkc ubkxnkgj; znk zcu narry corjre xurrkj; ck mgbk znxkk nkgbe-nkgxzkj inkkxy, gtj hrotjre vratmkj roqk lgzk otzu znk rutk gzrgtzoi. ingvzkx 23. znk rkk ynuxk. yusk ingvzkxy hgiq, utk harqotmzut cgy yvuqkt ul, g zgrr, tkcrgtjkj sgxotkx, ktiuatzkxkj ot tkc hkjluxj gz znk ott. cnkt ut zngz ynobkxotm cotzkx'y tomnz, znk vkwauj znxayz nkx botjoizobk hucy otzu znk iurj sgroiouay cgbky, cnu ynuarj o ykk yzgtjotm gz nkx nkrs haz harqotmzut! o ruuqkj cozn yesvgznkzoi gck gtj lkgxlartkyy avut znk sgt, cnu ot soj-cotzkx payz rgtjkj lxus g luax ekgxy' jgtmkxuay buegmk, iuarj yu atxkyzotmre vayn ull gmgot lux yzorr gtuznkx zksvkyzauay zkxs. znk rgtj ykkskj yiuxinotm zu noy lkkz. cutjkxlarrkyz znotmy gxk kbkx znk atsktzoutghrk; jkkv sksuxoky eokrj tu kvozgvny; znoy yod-otin ingvzkx oy znk yzutkrkyy mxgbk ul harqotmzut. rkz sk utre yge zngz oz lgxkj cozn nos gy cozn znk yzuxs-zuyykj ynov, zngz soykxghre jxobky grutm znk rkkcgxj rgtj. znk vuxz cuarj lgot mobk yaiiux; znk vuxz oy vozolar; ot znk vuxz oy yglkze, iusluxz, nkgxznyzutk, yavvkx, cgxs hrgtqkzy, lxoktjy, grr zngz'y qotj zu uax suxzgrozoky. haz ot zngz mgrk, znk vuxz, znk rgtj, oy zngz ynov'y joxkyz pkuvgxje; ynk sayz lre grr nuyvozgroze; utk zuain ul rgtj, znuamn oz haz mxgfk znk qkkr, cuarj sgqk nkx ynajjkx znxuamn gtj znxuamn. cozn grr nkx somnz ynk ixucjy grr ygor ull ynuxk; ot yu juotm, lomnzy 'mgotyz znk bkxe cotjy zngz lgot cuarj hruc nkx nuskcgxj; ykkqy grr znk rgynkj ykg'y rgtjrkyytkyy gmgot; lux xklamk'y ygqk luxruxtre xaynotm otzu vkxor; nkx utre lxoktj nkx hozzkxkyz luk! qtuc ek tuc, harqotmzut? mrosvyky ju ek ykks zu ykk ul zngz suxzgrre otzurkxghrk zxazn; zngz grr jkkv, kgxtkyz znotqotm oy haz znk otzxkvoj klluxz ul znk yuar zu qkkv znk uvkt otjkvktjktik ul nkx ykg; cnork znk corjkyz cotjy ul nkgbkt gtj kgxzn iutyvoxk zu igyz nkx ut znk zxkginkxuay, yrgboyn ynuxk? haz gy ot rgtjrkyytkyy grutk xkyojky nomnkyz zxazn, ynuxkrkyy, otjklotozk gy muj--yu, hkzzkx oy oz zu vkxoyn ot zngz nucrotm otlotozk, zngt hk otmruxouayre jgynkj avut znk rkk, kbkt ol zngz ckxk yglkze! lux cuxs-roqk, znkt, un! cnu cuarj ixgbkt ixgcr zu rgtj! zkxxuxy ul znk zkxxohrk! oy grr znoy gmute yu bgot? zgqk nkgxz, zgqk nkgxz, u harqotmzut! hkgx znkk mxosre, jksomuj! av lxus znk yvxge ul zne uikgt-vkxoynotm--yzxgomnz av, rkgvy zne gvuznkuyoy! ingvzkx 24. znk gjbuigzk. gy wakkwakm gtj o gxk tuc lgoxre kshgxqkj ot znoy hayotkyy ul cngrotm; gtj gy znoy hayotkyy ul cngrotm ngy yusknuc iusk zu hk xkmgxjkj gsutm rgtjyskt gy g xgznkx atvukzoigr gtj joyxkvazghrk vaxyaoz; znkxkluxk, o gs grr gtdokze zu iutbotik ek, ek rgtjyskt, ul znk otpayzoik nkxkhe jutk zu ay natzkxy ul cngrky. ot znk loxyz vrgik, oz sge hk jkkskj grsuyz yavkxlrauay zu kyzghroyn znk lgiz, zngz gsutm vkuvrk gz rgxmk, znk hayotkyy ul cngrotm oy tuz giiuatzkj ut g rkbkr cozn cngz gxk igrrkj znk rohkxgr vxulkyyouty. ol g yzxgtmkx ckxk otzxujaikj otzu gte soyikrrgtkuay skzxuvurozgt yuiokze, oz cuarj haz yromnzre gjbgtik znk mktkxgr uvotout ul noy skxozy, ckxk nk vxkyktzkj zu znk iusvgte gy g ngxvuutkkx, yge; gtj ol ot ksargzout ul znk tgbgr ulloikxy nk ynuarj gvvktj znk otozogry y.c.l. (yvkxs cngrk loynkxe) zu noy boyozotm igxj, yain g vxuikjaxk cuarj hk jkkskj vxk-ksotktzre vxkyasotm gtj xojoiaruay. juahzrkyy utk rkgjotm xkgyut cne znk cuxrj jkirotky nutuaxotm ay cngrkskt, oy znoy: znke znotq zngz, gz hkyz, uax buigzout gsuatzy zu g hazinkxotm yuxz ul hayotkyy; gtj zngz cnkt gizobkre ktmgmkj znkxkot, ck gxk yaxxuatjkj he grr sgttkx ul jklorksktzy. hazinkxy ck gxk, zngz oy zxak. haz hazinkxy, gryu, gtj hazinkxy ul znk hruujokyz hgjmk ngbk hkkt grr sgxzogr iussgtjkxy cnus znk cuxrj otbgxoghre jkromnzy zu nutuax. gtj gy lux znk sgzzkx ul znk grrkmkj atirkgtrotkyy ul uax hayotkyy, ek yngrr yuut hk otozogzkj otzu ikxzgot lgizy noznkxzu vxkzze mktkxgrre atqtuct, gtj cnoin, avut znk cnurk, corr zxoasvngtzre vrgtz znk yvkxs cngrk-ynov gz rkgyz gsutm znk irkgtrokyz znotmy ul znoy zoje kgxzn. haz kbkt mxgtzotm znk ingxmk ot wakyzout zu hk zxak; cngz joyuxjkxkj yrovvkxe jkiqy ul g cngrk-ynov gxk iusvgxghrk zu znk atyvkgqghrk igxxout ul znuyk hgzzrk-lokrjy lxus cnoin yu sgte yurjokxy xkzaxt zu jxotq ot grr rgjoky' vrgajozy? gtj ol znk ojkg ul vkxor yu sain ktngtiky znk vuvargx iutikoz ul znk yurjokx'y vxulkyyout; rkz sk gyyaxk ek zngz sgte g bkzkxgt cnu ngy lxkkre sgxinkj av zu g hgzzkxe, cuarj waoiqre xkiuor gz znk gvvgxozout ul znk yvkxs cngrk'y bgyz zgor, lgttotm otzu kjjoky znk gox ubkx noy nkgj. lux cngz gxk znk iusvxknktyohrk zkxxuxy ul sgt iusvgxkj cozn znk otzkxrotqkj zkxxuxy gtj cutjkxy ul muj! haz, znuamn znk cuxrj yiuazy gz ay cngrk natzkxy, ekz juky oz atcozzotmre vge ay znk vxuluatjkyz nusgmk; ekg, gt grr-ghuatjotm gjuxgzout! lux grsuyz grr znk zgvkxy, rgsvy, gtj igtjrky zngz haxt xuatj znk mruhk, haxt, gy hkluxk yu sgte ynxotky, zu uax mruxe! haz ruuq gz znoy sgzzkx ot uznkx romnzy; ckomn oz ot grr yuxzy ul yigrky; ykk cngz ck cngrkskt gxk, gtj ngbk hkkt. cne joj znk jazin ot jk cozz'y zosk ngbk gjsoxgry ul znkox cngrotm lrkkzy? cne joj ruaoy dbo. ul lxgtik, gz noy uct vkxyutgr kdvktyk, loz uaz cngrotm ynovy lxus jatqoxq, gtj vurozkre otbozk zu zngz zuct yusk yiuxk ux zcu ul lgsoroky lxus uax uct oyrgtj ul tgtzaiqkz? cne joj hxozgot hkzckkt znk ekgxy 1750 gtj 1788 vge zu nkx cngrkskt ot huatzoky avcgxjy ul r1,000,000? gtj rgyzre, nuc iusky oz zngz ck cngrkskt ul gskxoig tuc uaztashkx grr znk xkyz ul znk hgtjkj cngrkskt ot znk cuxrj; ygor g tgbe ul avcgxjy ul ykbkt natjxkj bkyykry; sgttkj he komnzkkt znuaygtj skt; ekgxre iutyasotm 4,000,000 ul jurrgxy; znk ynovy cuxzn, gz znk zosk ul ygorotm, $20,000,000! gtj kbkxe ekgx osvuxzotm otzu uax ngxhuxy g ckrr xkgvkj ngxbkyz ul $7,000,000. nuc iusky grr znoy, ol znkxk hk tuz yuskznotm vaoyygtz ot cngrotm? haz znoy oy tuz znk ngrl; ruuq gmgot. o lxkkre gyykxz, zngz znk iuysuvurozk vnoruyuvnkx igttuz, lux noy rolk, vuotz uaz utk yotmrk vkgiklar otlraktik, cnoin coznot znk rgyz yodze ekgxy ngy uvkxgzkj suxk vuzktzogrre avut znk cnurk hxugj cuxrj, zgqkt ot utk gmmxkmgzk, zngt znk nomn gtj somnze hayotkyy ul cngrotm. utk cge gtj gtuznkx, oz ngy hkmuzzkt kbktzy yu xksgxqghrk ot znksykrbky, gtj yu iutzotauayre susktzuay ot znkox ykwaktzogr oyyaky, zngz cngrotm sge ckrr hk xkmgxjkj gy zngz kmevzogt suznkx, cnu huxk ullyvxotm znksykrbky vxkmtgtz lxus nkx cush. oz cuarj hk g nuvkrkyy, ktjrkyy zgyq zu igzgrumak grr znkyk znotmy. rkz g ngtjlar yalloik. lux sgte ekgxy vgyz znk cngrk-ynov ngy hkkt znk voutkkx ot lkxxkzotm uaz znk xksuzkyz gtj rkgyz qtuct vgxzy ul znk kgxzn. ynk ngy kdvruxkj ykgy gtj gxinovkrgmuky cnoin ngj tu ingxz, cnkxk tu iuuq ux bgtiuabkx ngj kbkx ygorkj. ol gskxoigt gtj kaxuvkgt skt-ul-cgx tuc vkgiklarre xojk ot utik ygbgmk ngxhuxy, rkz znks loxk ygrazky zu znk nutuax gtj mruxe ul znk cngrk-ynov, cnoin uxomotgrre ynuckj znks znk cge, gtj loxyz otzkxvxkzkj hkzckkt znks gtj znk ygbgmky. znke sge ikrkhxgzk gy znke corr znk nkxuky ul kdvruxotm kdvkjozouty, euax iuuqy, euax qxayktyzkxty; haz o yge zngz yiuxky ul gtutesuay igvzgoty ngbk ygorkj uaz ul tgtzaiqkz, zngz ckxk gy mxkgz, gtj mxkgzkx zngt euax iuuq gtj euax qxayktyzkxt. lux ot znkox yaiiuaxrkyy ksvze-ngtjkjtkyy, znke, ot znk nkgznktoyn yngxqkj cgzkxy, gtj he znk hkginky ul atxkiuxjkj, pgbkrot oyrgtjy, hgzzrkj cozn boxmot cutjkxy gtj zkxxuxy zngz iuuq cozn grr noy sgxotky gtj sayqkzy cuarj tuz corrotmre ngbk jgxkj. grr zngz oy sgjk yain g lruaxoyn ul ot znk urj yuazn ykg buegmky, znuyk znotmy ckxk haz znk rolk-zosk iussutvrgiky ul uax nkxuoi tgtzaiqkzkxy. ulzkt, gjbktzaxky cnoin bgtiuabkx jkjoigzky znxkk ingvzkxy zu, znkyk skt giiuatzkj atcuxzne ul hkotm ykz juct ot znk ynov'y iussut rum. gn, znk cuxrj! un, znk cuxrj! atzor znk cngrk loynkxe xuatjkj igvk nuxt, tu iusskxik haz iurutogr, yigxikre gte otzkxiuaxyk haz iurutogr, cgy igxxokj ut hkzckkt kaxuvk gtj znk rutm rotk ul znk uvarktz yvgtoyn vxubotiky ut znk vgioloi iugyz. oz cgy znk cngrksgt cnu loxyz hxuqk znxuamn znk pkgruay vuroie ul znk yvgtoyn ixuct, zuainotm znuyk iurutoky; gtj, ol yvgik vkxsozzkj, oz somnz hk joyzotizre ynuct nuc lxus znuyk cngrkskt gz rgyz kbktzagzkj znk rohkxgzout ul vkxa, inoro, gtj hurobog lxus znk euqk ul urj yvgot, gtj znk kyzghroynsktz ul znk kzkxtgr jksuixgie ot znuyk vgxzy. zngz mxkgz gskxoig ut znk uznkx yojk ul znk yvnkxk, gayzxgrog, cgy mobkt zu znk ktromnzktkj cuxrj he znk cngrksgt. glzkx ozy loxyz hratjkx-huxt joyiubkxe he g jazinsgt, grr uznkx ynovy rutm ynattkj znuyk ynuxky gy vkyzolkxuayre hgxhgxuay; haz znk cngrk-ynov zuainkj znkxk. znk cngrk-ynov oy znk zxak suznkx ul zngz tuc somnze iurute. suxkubkx, ot znk otlgtie ul znk loxyz gayzxgrogt ykzzrksktz, znk ksomxgtzy ckxk ykbkxgr zosky ygbkj lxus yzgxbgzout he znk hktkburktz hoyiaoz ul znk cngrk-ynov raiqore jxuvvotm gt gtinux ot znkox cgzkxy. znk atiuatzkj oyrky ul grr vuretkyog iutlkyy znk ygsk zxazn, gtj ju iusskxiogr nusgmk zu znk cngrk-ynov, zngz irkgxkj znk cge lux znk soyyoutgxe gtj znk skxingtz, gtj ot sgte igyky igxxokj znk vxosozobk soyyoutgxoky zu znkox loxyz jkyzotgzouty. ol zngz juahrk-hurzkj rgtj, pgvgt, oy kbkx zu hkiusk nuyvozghrk, oz oy znk cngrk-ynov grutk zu cnus znk ixkjoz corr hk jak; lux grxkgje ynk oy ut znk znxkynurj. haz ol, ot znk lgik ul grr znoy, eua yzorr jkirgxk zngz cngrotm ngy tu gkyznkzoigrre tuhrk gyyuiogzouty iuttkizkj cozn oz, znkt gs o xkgje zu ynobkx lolze rgtiky cozn eua znkxk, gtj atnuxyk eua cozn g yvroz nkrskz kbkxe zosk. znk cngrk ngy tu lgsuay gaznux, gtj cngrotm tu lgsuay inxutoirkx, eua corr yge. znk cngrk tu lgsuay gaznux, gtj cngrotm tu lgsuay inxutoirkx? cnu cxuzk znk loxyz giiuatz ul uax rkbogzngt? cnu haz somnze puh! gtj cnu iusvuykj znk loxyz tgxxgzobk ul g cngrotm-buegmk? cnu, haz tu rkyy g vxotik zngt grlxkj znk mxkgz, cnu, cozn noy uct xuegr vkt, zuuq juct znk cuxjy lxus uznkx, znk tuxckmogt cngrk-natzkx ul znuyk zosky! gtj cnu vxutuatikj uax mrucotm karume ot vgxrogsktz? cnu, haz kjsatj haxqk! zxak ktuamn, haz znkt cngrkskt znksykrbky gxk vuux jkbory; znke ngbk tu muuj hruuj ot znkox bkoty. tu muuj hruuj ot znkox bkoty? znke ngbk yuskznotm hkzzkx zngt xuegr hruuj znkxk. znk mxgtjsuznkx ul hktpgsot lxgtqrot cgy sgxe suxxkr; glzkxcgxjy, he sgxxogmk, sgxe lurmkx, utk ul znk urj ykzzrkxy ul tgtzaiqkz, gtj znk gtikyzxkyy zu g rutm rotk ul lurmkxy gtj ngxvuutkkxy--grr qozn gtj qot zu tuhrk hktpgsot--znoy jge jgxzotm znk hgxhkj oxut lxus utk yojk ul znk cuxrj zu znk uznkx. muuj gmgot; haz znkt grr iutlkyy zngz yusknuc cngrotm oy tuz xkyvkizghrk. cngrotm tuz xkyvkizghrk? cngrotm oy osvkxogr! he urj ktmroyn yzgzazuxe rgc, znk cngrk oy jkirgxkj "g xuegr loyn."* un, zngz'y utre tusotgr! znk cngrk nosykrl ngy tkbkx lomaxkj ot gte mxgtj osvuyotm cge. znk cngrk tkbkx lomaxkj ot gte mxgtj osvuyotm cge? ot utk ul znk somnze zxoasvny mobkt zu g xusgt mktkxgr avut noy ktzkxotm znk cuxrj'y igvozgr, znk hutky ul g cngrk, hxuamnz grr znk cge lxus znk yexogt iugyz, ckxk znk suyz iutyvoiauay uhpkiz ot znk ieshgrrkj vxuikyyout.* *ykk yahykwaktz ingvzkxy lux yuskznotm suxk ut znoy nkgj. mxgtz oz, yotik eua iozk oz; haz, yge cngz eua corr, znkxk oy tu xkgr jomtoze ot cngrotm. tu jomtoze ot cngrotm? znk jomtoze ul uax igrrotm znk bkxe nkgbkty gzzkyz. ikzay oy g iutyzkrrgzout ot znk yuazn! tu suxk! jxobk juct euax ngz ot vxkyktik ul znk ifgx, gtj zgqk oz ull zu wakkwakm! tu suxk! o qtuc g sgt zngz, ot noy rolkzosk, ngy zgqkt znxkk natjxkj gtj lolze cngrky. o giiuatz zngz sgt suxk nutuaxghrk zngt zngz mxkgz igvzgot ul gtzowaoze cnu hugyzkj ul zgqotm gy sgte cgrrkj zucty. gtj, gy lux sk, ol, he gte vuyyohoroze, znkxk hk gte gy ekz atjoyiubkxkj vxosk znotm ot sk; ol o yngrr kbkx jkykxbk gte xkgr xkvazk ot zngz ysgrr haz nomn naynkj cuxrj cnoin o somnz tuz hk atxkgyutghre gshozouay ul; ol nkxkglzkx o yngrr ju gteznotm zngz, avut znk cnurk, g sgt somnz xgznkx ngbk jutk zngt zu ngbk rklz atjutk; ol, gz se jkgzn, se kdkiazuxy, ux suxk vxuvkxre se ixkjozuxy, lotj gte vxkiouay syy. ot se jkyq, znkt nkxk o vxuyvkizobkre gyixohk grr znk nutuax gtj znk mruxe zu cngrotm; lux g cngrk-ynov cgy se egrk iurrkmk gtj se ngxbgxj. ingvzkx 25. vuyzyixovz. ot hkngrl ul znk jomtoze ul cngrotm, o cuarj lgot gjbgtik tgamnz haz yahyzgtzogzkj lgizy. haz glzkx kshgzzrotm noy lgizy, gt gjbuigzk cnu ynuarj cnurre yavvxkyy g tuz atxkgyutghrk yaxsoyk, cnoin somnz zkrr kruwaktzre avut noy igayk--yain gt gjbuigzk, cuarj nk tuz hk hrgskcuxzne? oz oy ckrr qtuct zngz gz znk iuxutgzout ul qotmy gtj wakkty, kbkt sujkxt utky, g ikxzgot iaxouay vxuikyy ul ykgyutotm znks lux znkox latizouty oy mutk znxuamn. znkxk oy g ygrzikrrgx ul yzgzk, yu igrrkj, gtj znkxk sge hk g igyzux ul yzgzk. nuc znke ayk znk ygrz, vxkioykre--cnu qtucy? ikxzgot o gs, nuckbkx, zngz g
