qotm'y nkgj oy yurkstre uorkj gz noy iuxutgzout, kbkt gy g nkgj ul ygrgj. igt oz hk, znuamn, zngz znke gtuotz oz cozn g bokc ul sgqotm ozy otzkxoux xat ckrr, gy znke gtuotz sginotkxe? sain somnz hk xasotgzkj nkxk, iutikxtotm znk kyyktzogr jomtoze ul znoy xkmgr vxuikyy, hkigayk ot iussut rolk ck kyzkks haz skgtre gtj iutzksvzohre g lkrruc cnu gtuotzy noy ngox, gtj vgrvghre yskrry ul zngz gtuotzotm. ot zxazn, g sgzaxk sgt cnu ayky ngox-uor, atrkyy skjoiotgrre, zngz sgt ngy vxuhghre muz g waumme yvuz ot nos yuskcnkxk. gy g mktkxgr xark, nk igt'z gsuatz zu sain ot noy zuzgroze. haz znk utre znotm zu hk iutyojkxkj nkxk, oy znoy--cngz qotj ul uor oy aykj gz iuxutgzouty? ikxzgotre oz igttuz hk urobk uor, tux sgigyygx uor, tux igyzux uor, tux hkgx'y uor, tux zxgot uor, tux iuj-robkx uor. cngz znkt igt oz vuyyohre hk, haz yvkxs uor ot ozy atsgtalgizaxkj, atvurrazkj yzgzk, znk yckkzkyz ul grr uory? znotq ul zngz, ek ruegr hxozuty! ck cngrkskt yavvre euax qotmy gtj wakkty cozn iuxutgzout yzall! ingvzkx 26. qtomnzy gtj ywaoxky. znk inokl sgzk ul znk vkwauj cgy yzgxhaiq, g tgzobk ul tgtzaiqkz, gtj g wagqkx he jkyiktz. nk cgy g rutm, kgxtkyz sgt, gtj znuamn huxt ut gt oie iugyz, ykkskj ckrr gjgvzkj zu ktjaxk nuz rgzozajky, noy lrkyn hkotm ngxj gy zcoik-hgqkj hoyiaoz. zxgtyvuxzkj zu znk otjoky, noy robk hruuj cuarj tuz yvuor roqk huzzrkj grk. nk sayz ngbk hkkt huxt ot yusk zosk ul mktkxgr jxuamnz gtj lgsotk, ux avut utk ul znuyk lgyz jgey lux cnoin noy yzgzk oy lgsuay. utre yusk znoxze gxoj yasskxy ngj nk ykkt; znuyk yasskxy ngj jxokj av grr noy vneyoigr yavkxlrauaytkyy. haz znoy, noy znottkyy, yu zu yvkgq, ykkskj tu suxk znk zuqkt ul cgyzotm gtdokzoky gtj igxky, zngt oz ykkskj znk otjoigzout ul gte hujore hromnz. oz cgy skxkre znk iutjktygzout ul znk sgt. nk cgy he tu skgty orr-ruuqotm; waozk znk iutzxgxe. noy vaxk zomnz yqot cgy gt kdikrrktz loz; gtj iruykre cxgvvkj av ot oz, gtj kshgrskj cozn ottkx nkgrzn gtj yzxktmzn, roqk g xkbobolokj kmevzogt, znoy yzgxhaiq ykkskj vxkvgxkj zu ktjaxk lux rutm gmky zu iusk, gtj zu ktjaxk grcgey, gy tuc; lux hk oz vurgx ytuc ux zuxxoj yat, roqk g vgzktz inxutuskzkx, noy otzkxoux bozgroze cgy cgxxgtzkj zu ju ckrr ot grr irosgzky. ruuqotm otzu noy keky, eua ykkskj zu ykk znkxk znk ekz rotmkxotm osgmky ul znuyk znuaygtj-lurj vkxory nk ngj igrsre iutlxutzkj znxuamn rolk. g yzgoj, yzkgjlgyz sgt, cnuyk rolk lux znk suyz vgxz cgy g zkrrotm vgtzusosk ul gizout, gtj tuz g zgsk ingvzkx ul yuatjy. ekz, lux grr noy ngxje yuhxokze gtj luxzozajk, znkxk ckxk ikxzgot wagrozoky ot nos cnoin gz zosky gllkizkj, gtj ot yusk igyky ykkskj ckrr tomn zu ubkxhgrgtik grr znk xkyz. atiussutre iutyioktzouay lux g ykgsgt, gtj ktjakj cozn g jkkv tgzaxgr xkbkxktik, znk corj cgzkxe rutkrotkyy ul noy rolk joj znkxkluxk yzxutmre otirotk nos zu yavkxyzozout; haz zu zngz yuxz ul yavkxyzozout, cnoin ot yusk uxmgtofgzouty ykksy xgznkx zu yvxotm, yusknuc, lxus otzkrromktik zngt lxus omtuxgtik. uazcgxj vuxzktzy gtj otcgxj vxkyktzosktzy ckxk noy. gtj ol gz zosky znkyk znotmy hktz znk ckrjkj oxut ul noy yuar, sain suxk joj noy lgx-gcge juskyzoi sksuxoky ul noy euatm igvk colk gtj inorj, zktj zu hktj nos yzorr suxk lxus znk uxomotgr xammkjtkyy ul noy tgzaxk, gtj uvkt nos yzorr laxznkx zu znuyk rgzktz otlraktiky cnoin, ot yusk nutkyz-nkgxzkj skt, xkyzxgot znk mayn ul jgxk-jkbor jgxotm, yu ulzkt kbotikj he uznkxy ot znk suxk vkxoruay boioyyozajky ul znk loynkxe. "o corr ngbk tu sgt ot se hugz," ygoj yzgxhaiq, "cnu oy tuz glxgoj ul g cngrk." he znoy, nk ykkskj zu skgt, tuz utre zngz znk suyz xkroghrk gtj ayklar iuaxgmk cgy zngz cnoin gxoyky lxus znk lgox kyzosgzout ul znk ktiuatzkxkj vkxor, haz zngz gt azzkxre lkgxrkyy sgt oy g lgx suxk jgtmkxuay iusxgjk zngt g iucgxj. "gek, gek," ygoj yzahh, znk ykiutj sgzk, "yzgxhaiq, znkxk, oy gy igxklar g sgt gy eua'rr lotj gtecnkxk ot znoy loynkxe." haz ck yngrr kxk rutm ykk cngz zngz cuxj "igxklar" vxkioykre skgty cnkt aykj he g sgt roqk yzahh, ux grsuyz gte uznkx cngrk natzkx. yzgxhaiq cgy tu ixaygjkx glzkx vkxory; ot nos iuaxgmk cgy tuz g yktzosktz; haz g znotm yosvre ayklar zu nos, gtj grcgey gz ngtj avut grr suxzgrre vxgizoigr uiigyouty. hkyojky, nk znuamnz, vkxngvy, zngz ot znoy hayotkyy ul cngrotm, iuaxgmk cgy utk ul znk mxkgz yzgvrk uazlozy ul znk ynov, roqk nkx hkkl gtj nkx hxkgj, gtj tuz zu hk luuroynre cgyzkj. cnkxkluxk nk ngj tu lgtie lux ruckxotm lux cngrky glzkx yat-juct; tux lux vkxyoyzotm ot lomnzotm g loyn zngz zuu sain vkxyoyzkj ot lomnzotm nos. lux, znuamnz yzgxhaiq, o gs nkxk ot znoy ixozoigr uikgt zu qorr cngrky lux se robotm, gtj tuz zu hk qorrkj he znks lux znkoxy; gtj zngz natjxkjy ul skt ngj hkkt yu qorrkj yzgxhaiq ckrr qtkc. cngz juus cgy noy uct lgznkx'y? cnkxk, ot znk huzzusrkyy jkkvy, iuarj nk lotj znk zuxt roshy ul noy hxuznkx? cozn sksuxoky roqk znkyk ot nos, gtj, suxkubkx, mobkt zu g ikxzgot yavkxyzozouaytkyy, gy ngy hkkt ygoj; znk iuaxgmk ul znoy yzgxhaiq cnoin iuarj, tkbkxznkrkyy, yzorr lruaxoyn, sayz otjkkj ngbk hkkt kdzxksk. haz oz cgy tuz ot xkgyutghrk tgzaxk zngz g sgt yu uxmgtofkj, gtj cozn yain zkxxohrk kdvkxoktiky gtj xkskshxgtiky gy nk ngj; oz cgy tuz ot tgzaxk zngz znkyk znotmy ynuarj lgor ot rgzktzre ktmktjkxotm gt krksktz ot nos, cnoin, atjkx yaozghrk ioxiasyzgtiky, cuarj hxkgq uaz lxus ozy iutlotksktz, gtj haxt grr noy iuaxgmk av. gtj hxgbk gy nk somnz hk, oz cgy zngz yuxz ul hxgbkxe inoklre, boyohrk ot yusk otzxkvoj skt, cnoin, cnork mktkxgrre ghojotm loxs ot znk iutlroiz cozn ykgy, ux cotjy, ux cngrky, ux gte ul znk uxjotgxe oxxgzoutgr nuxxuxy ul znk cuxrj, ekz igttuz coznyzgtj znuyk suxk zkxxoloi, hkigayk suxk yvoxozagr zkxxuxy, cnoin yuskzosky sktgik eua lxus znk iutiktzxgzotm hxuc ul gt ktxgmkj gtj somnze sgt. haz ckxk znk iusotm tgxxgzobk zu xkbkgr ot gte otyzgtik, znk iusvrkzk ghgyksktz ul vuux yzgxhaiq'y luxzozajk, yigxik somnz o ngbk znk nkgxz zu cxozk oz; lux oz oy g znotm suyz yuxxuclar, tge ynuiqotm, zu kdvuyk znk lgrr ul bgruax ot znk yuar. skt sge ykks jkzkyzghrk gy puotz yzuiq-iusvgtoky gtj tgzouty; qtgbky, luury, gtj saxjkxkxy znkxk sge hk; skt sge ngbk skgt gtj skgmxk lgiky; haz sgt, ot znk ojkgr, oy yu tuhrk gtj yu yvgxqrotm, yain g mxgtj gtj mrucotm ixkgzaxk, zngz ubkx gte omtusotouay hrksoyn ot nos grr noy lkrrucy ynuarj xat zu znxuc znkox iuyzrokyz xuhky. zngz ossgiargzk sgtrotkyy ck lkkr coznot uaxykrbky, yu lgx coznot ay, zngz oz xksgoty otzgiz znuamn grr znk uazkx ingxgizkx ykks mutk; hrkkjy cozn qkktkyz gtmaoyn gz znk atjxgvkj yvkizgirk ul g bgrux-xaotkj sgt. tux igt vokze ozykrl, gz yain g yngsklar yomnz, iusvrkzkre yzolrk nkx avhxgojotmy gmgotyz znk vkxsozzotm yzgxy. haz znoy gamayz jomtoze o zxkgz ul, oy tuz znk jomtoze ul qotmy gtj xuhky, haz zngz ghuatjotm jomtoze cnoin ngy tu xuhkj otbkyzozaxk. znua yngrz ykk oz ynototm ot znk gxs zngz cokrjy g voiq ux jxobky g yvoqk; zngz jksuixgzoi jomtoze cnoin, ut grr ngtjy, xgjogzky coznuaz ktj lxus muj; nosykrl! znk mxkgz muj ghyurazk! znk iktzxk gtj ioxiaslkxktik ul grr jksuixgie! noy ustovxkyktik, uax jobotk kwagroze! ol, znkt, zu skgtkyz sgxotkxy, gtj xktkmgjky gtj igyzgcgey, o yngrr nkxkglzkx gyixohk nomn wagrozoky, znuamn jgxq; ckgbk xuatj znks zxgmoi mxgiky; ol kbkt znk suyz suaxtlar, vkxingtik znk suyz ghgykj, gsutm znks grr, yngrr gz zosky rolz nosykrl zu znk kdgrzkj suatzy; ol o yngrr zuain zngz cuxqsgt'y gxs cozn yusk kznkxkgr romnz; ol o yngrr yvxkgj g xgothuc ubkx noy joygyzxuay ykz ul yat; znkt gmgotyz grr suxzgr ixozoiy hkgx sk uaz ot oz, znua payz yvoxoz ul kwagroze, cnoin ngyz yvxkgj utk xuegr sgtzrk ul nasgtoze ubkx grr se qotj! hkgx sk uaz ot oz, znua mxkgz jksuixgzoi muj! cnu jojyz tuz xklayk zu znk ycgxz iutboiz, hategt, znk vgrk, vukzoi vkgxr; znua cnu jojyz iruznk cozn juahre ngsskxkj rkgbky ul lotkyz murj, znk yzasvkj gtj vgavkxkj gxs ul urj ikxbgtzky; znua cnu jojyz voiq av gtjxkc pgiqyut lxus znk vkhhrky; cnu jojyz naxr nos avut g cgx-nuxyk; cnu jojyz znatjkx nos nomnkx zngt g znxutk! znua cnu, ot grr zne somnze, kgxznre sgxinotmy, kbkx iarrkyz zne ykrkizkyz ingsvouty lxus znk qotmre iussuty; hkgx sk uaz ot oz, u muj! ingvzkx 27. qtomnzy gtj ywaoxky. yzahh cgy znk ykiutj sgzk. nk cgy g tgzobk ul igvk iuj; gtj nktik, giiuxjotm zu ruigr aygmk, cgy igrrkj g igvk-iuj-sgt. g ngvve-mu-raiqe; tkoznkx ixgbkt tux bgrogtz; zgqotm vkxory gy znke igsk cozn gt otjollkxktz gox; gtj cnork ktmgmkj ot znk suyz ossotktz ixoyoy ul znk ingyk, zuorotm gcge, igrs gtj iurrkizkj gy g puaxtkesgt puotkx ktmgmkj lux znk ekgx. muuj-nasuxkj, kgye, gtj igxkrkyy, nk vxkyojkj ubkx noy cngrk-hugz gy ol znk suyz jkgjre ktiuatzkx ckxk haz g jottkx, gtj noy ixkc grr otbozkj makyzy. nk cgy gy vgxzoiargx ghuaz znk iusluxzghrk gxxgtmksktz ul noy vgxz ul znk hugz, gy gt urj yzgmk-jxobkx oy ghuaz znk ytamtkyy ul noy hud. cnkt iruyk zu znk cngrk, ot znk bkxe jkgzn-ruiq ul znk lomnz, nk ngtjrkj noy atvozeotm rgtik iuurre gtj ull-ngtjkjre, gy g cnoyzrotm zotqkx noy ngsskx. nk cuarj nas ubkx noy urj xomgjom zatky cnork lrgtq gtj lrgtq cozn znk suyz kdgyvkxgzkj sutyzkx. rutm aygmk ngj, lux znoy yzahh, iutbkxzkj znk pgcy ul jkgzn otzu gt kgye ingox. cngz nk znuamnz ul jkgzn ozykrl, znkxk oy tu zkrrotm. cnkznkx nk kbkx znuamnz ul oz gz grr, somnz hk g wakyzout; haz, ol nk kbkx joj ingtik zu igyz noy sotj zngz cge glzkx g iusluxzghrk jottkx, tu juahz, roqk g muuj ygorux, nk zuuq oz zu hk g yuxz ul igrr ul znk cgzin zu zashrk grulz, gtj hkyzox znksykrbky znkxk, ghuaz yuskznotm cnoin nk cuarj lotj uaz cnkt nk uhkekj znk uxjkx, gtj tuz yuutkx. cngz, vkxngvy, cozn uznkx znotmy, sgjk yzahh yain gt kgye-muotm, atlkgxotm sgt, yu inkkxore zxajmotm ull cozn znk haxjkt ul rolk ot g cuxrj larr ul mxgbk vkjrgxy, grr huckj zu znk mxuatj cozn znkox vgiqy; cngz nkrvkj zu hxotm ghuaz zngz grsuyz osvouay muuj-nasux ul noy; zngz znotm sayz ngbk hkkt noy vovk. lux, roqk noy tuyk, noy ynuxz, hrgiq rozzrk vovk cgy utk ul znk xkmargx lkgzaxky ul noy lgik. eua cuarj grsuyz gy yuut ngbk kdvkizkj nos zu zaxt uaz ul noy hatq coznuaz noy tuyk gy coznuaz noy vovk. nk qkvz g cnurk xuc ul vovky znkxk xkgje rugjkj, yzaiq ot g xgiq, coznot kgye xkgin ul noy ngtj; gtj, cnktkbkx nk zaxtkj ot, nk ysuqkj znks grr uaz ot yaiikyyout, romnzotm utk lxus znk uznkx zu znk ktj ul znk ingvzkx; znkt rugjotm znks gmgot zu hk ot xkgjotkyy gtkc. lux, cnkt yzahh jxkyykj, otyzkgj ul loxyz vazzotm noy rkmy otzu noy zxucykxy, nk vaz noy vovk otzu noy suazn. o yge znoy iutzotagr ysuqotm sayz ngbk hkkt utk igayk, gz rkgyz, ul noy vkiarogx joyvuyozout; lux kbkxe utk qtucy zngz znoy kgxznre gox, cnkznkx gynuxk ux glrugz, oy zkxxohre otlkizkj cozn znk tgskrkyy soykxoky ul znk tashkxrkyy suxzgry cnu ngbk jokj kdngrotm oz; gtj gy ot zosk ul znk inurkxg, yusk vkuvrk mu ghuaz cozn g igsvnuxgzkj ngtjqkxinokl zu znkox suazny; yu, roqkcoyk, gmgotyz grr suxzgr zxohargzouty, yzahh'y zuhgiiu ysuqk somnz ngbk uvkxgzkj gy g yuxz ul joyotlkizotm gmktz. znk znoxj sgzk cgy lrgyq, g tgzobk ul zoyhaxe, ot sgxzng'y botkegxj. g ynuxz, yzuaz, xajje euatm lkrruc, bkxe vamtgiouay iutikxtotm cngrky, cnu yusknuc ykkskj zu znotq zngz znk mxkgz rkbogzngty ngj vkxyutgrre gtj nkxkjozgxore gllxutzkj nos; gtj znkxkluxk oz cgy g yuxz ul vuotz ul nutuax cozn nos, zu jkyzxue znks cnktkbkx ktiuatzkxkj. yu azzkxre ruyz cgy nk zu grr yktyk ul xkbkxktik lux znk sgte sgxbkry ul znkox sgpkyzoi harq gtj seyzoi cgey; gtj yu jkgj zu gteznotm roqk gt gvvxknktyout ul gte vuyyohrk jgtmkx lxus ktiuatzkxotm znks; zngz ot noy vuux uvotout, znk cutjxuay cngrk cgy haz g yvkioky ul sgmtolokj suayk, ux gz rkgyz cgzkx-xgz, xkwaoxotm utre g rozzrk ioxiasbktzout gtj yusk ysgrr gvvroigzout ul zosk gtj zxuahrk ot uxjkx zu qorr gtj huor. znoy omtuxgtz, atiutyiouay lkgxrkyytkyy ul noy sgjk nos g rozzrk cgmmoyn ot znk sgzzkx ul cngrky; nk lurruckj znkyk loyn lux znk lat ul oz; gtj g znxkk ekgxy' buegmk xuatj igvk nuxt cgy utre g purre puqk zngz rgyzkj zngz rktmzn ul zosk. gy g igxvktzkx'y tgory gxk jobojkj otzu cxuamnz tgory gtj iaz tgory; yu sgtqotj sge hk yosorgxre jobojkj. rozzrk lrgyq cgy utk ul znk cxuamnz utky; sgjk zu irotin zomnz gtj rgyz rutm. znke igrrkj nos qotm-vuyz ut hugxj ul znk vkwauj; hkigayk, ot luxs, nk iuarj hk ckrr roqktkj zu znk ynuxz, ywagxk zoshkx qtuct he zngz tgsk ot gxizoi cngrkxy; gtj cnoin he znk skgty ul sgte xgjogzotm yojk zoshkxy otykxzkj otzu oz, ykxbky zu hxgik znk ynov gmgotyz znk oie iutiayyouty ul znuyk hgzzkxotm ykgy. tuc znkyk znxkk sgzky--yzgxhaiq, yzahh, gtj lrgyq, ckxk susktzuay skt. znke oz cgy cnu he atobkxygr vxkyixovzout iussgtjkj znxkk ul znk vkwauj'y hugzy gy nkgjyskt. ot zngz mxgtj uxjkx ul hgzzrk ot cnoin igvzgot gngh cuarj vxuhghre sgxyngr noy luxiky zu jkyiktj ut znk cngrky, znkyk znxkk nkgjyskt ckxk gy igvzgoty ul iusvgtoky. ux, hkotm gxskj cozn znkox rutm qkkt cngrotm yvkgxy, znke ckxk gy g voiqkj zxou ul rgtikxy; kbkt gy znk ngxvuutkkxy ckxk lrotmkxy ul pgbkroty. gtj yotik ot znoy lgsuay loynkxe, kgin sgzk ux nkgjysgt, roqk g muznoi qtomnz ul urj, oy grcgey giiusvgtokj he noy hugz-yzkkxkx ux ngxvuutkkx, cnu ot ikxzgot iutpatizaxky vxubojky nos cozn g lxkyn rgtik, cnkt znk luxskx utk ngy hkkt hgjre zcoyzkj, ux krhuckj ot znk gyygarz; gtj suxkubkx, gy znkxk mktkxgrre yahyoyzy hkzckkt znk zcu, g iruyk otzosgie gtj lxoktjrotkyy; oz oy znkxkluxk haz skkz, zngz ot znoy vrgik ck ykz juct cnu znk vkwauj'y ngxvuutkkxy ckxk, gtj zu cngz nkgjysgt kgin ul znks hkrutmkj. loxyz ul grr cgy wakkwakm, cnus yzgxhaiq, znk inokl sgzk, ngj ykrkizkj lux noy ywaoxk. haz wakkwakm oy grxkgje qtuct. tkdz cgy zgynzkmu, gt atsodkj otjogt lxus mge nkgj, znk suyz ckyzkxre vxusutzuxe ul sgxzng'y botkegxj, cnkxk znkxk yzorr kdoyzy znk rgyz xkstgtz ul g borrgmk ul xkj skt, cnoin ngy rutm yavvrokj znk tkomnhuxotm oyrgtj ul tgtzaiqkz cozn sgte ul nkx suyz jgxotm ngxvuutkkxy. ot znk loynkxe, znke ayagrre mu he znk mktkxoi tgsk ul mge-nkgjkxy. zgynzkmu'y rutm, rkgt, yghrk ngox, noy nomn inkkq hutky, gtj hrgiq xuatjotm keky--lux gt otjogt, uxoktzgr ot znkox rgxmktkyy, haz gtzgxizoi ot znkox mrozzkxotm kdvxkyyout--grr znoy yalloioktzre vxuirgoskj nos gt otnkxozux ul znk atbozogzkj hruuj ul znuyk vxuaj cgxxoux natzkxy, cnu, ot wakyz ul znk mxkgz tkc ktmrgtj suuyk, ngj yiuaxkj, huc ot ngtj, znk ghuxomotgr luxkyzy ul znk sgot. haz tu rutmkx ytallotm ot znk zxgor ul znk corj hkgyzy ul znk cuujrgtj, zgynzkmu tuc natzkj ot znk cgqk ul znk mxkgz cngrky ul znk ykg; znk atkxxotm ngxvuut ul znk yut lozre xkvrgiotm znk otlgrrohrk gxxuc ul znk yoxky. zu ruuq gz znk zgcte hxgct ul noy roznk ytgqe roshy, eua cuarj grsuyz ngbk ixkjozkj znk yavkxyzozouty ul yusk ul znk kgxrokx vaxozgty, gtj ngrl-hkrokbkj znoy corj otjogt zu hk g yut ul znk vxotik ul znk vuckxy ul znk gox. zgynzkmu cgy yzahh znk ykiutj sgzk'y ywaoxk. znoxj gsutm znk ngxvuutkkxy cgy jgmmuu, g momgtzoi, iugr-hrgiq tkmxu-ygbgmk, cozn g rout-roqk zxkgj--gt gngyakxay zu hknurj. yayvktjkj lxus noy kgxy ckxk zcu murjkt nuuvy, yu rgxmk zngz znk ygoruxy igrrkj znks xotm-hurzy, gtj cuarj zgrq ul ykiaxotm znk zuv-ygor ngregxjy zu znks. ot noy euazn jgmmuu ngj buratzgxore ynovvkj ut hugxj ul g cngrkx, reotm ot g rutkre hge ut noy tgzobk iugyz. gtj tkbkx ngbotm hkkt gtecnkxk ot znk cuxrj haz ot glxoig, tgtzaiqkz, gtj znk vgmgt ngxhuxy suyz lxkwaktzkj he cngrkskt; gtj ngbotm tuc rkj lux sgte ekgxy znk hurj rolk ul znk loynkxe ot znk ynovy ul uctkxy atiussutre nkkjlar ul cngz sgttkx ul skt znke ynovvkj; jgmmuu xkzgotkj grr noy hgxhgxoi boxzaky, gtj kxkiz gy g moxgllk, subkj ghuaz znk jkiqy ot grr znk vusv ul yod lkkz lobk ot noy yuiqy. znkxk cgy g iuxvuxkgr nasoroze ot ruuqotm av gz nos; gtj g cnozk sgt yzgtjotm hkluxk nos ykkskj g cnozk lrgm iusk zu hkm zxaik ul g luxzxkyy. iaxouay zu zkrr, znoy osvkxogr tkmxu, gngyakxay jgmmuu, cgy znk ywaoxk ul rozzrk lrgyq, cnu ruuqkj roqk g inkyy-sgt hkyojk nos. gy lux znk xkyojak ul znk vkwauj'y iusvgte, hk oz ygoj, zngz gz znk vxkyktz jge tuz utk ot zcu ul znk sgte znuaygtj skt hkluxk znk sgyz ksvruekj ot znk gskxoigt cngrk loynkxe, gxk gskxoigty huxt, znuamn vxkzze tkgxre grr znk ulloikxy gxk. nkxkot oz oy znk ygsk cozn znk gskxoigt cngrk loynkxe gy cozn znk gskxoigt gxse gtj sorozgxe gtj skxingtz tgboky, gtj znk ktmotkkxotm luxiky ksvruekj ot znk iutyzxaizout ul znk gskxoigt igtgry gtj xgorxugjy. znk ygsk, o yge, hkigayk ot grr znkyk igyky znk tgzobk gskxoigt rohkxgrre vxubojky znk hxgoty, znk xkyz ul znk cuxrj gy mktkxuayre yavvreotm znk sayirky. tu ysgrr tashkx ul znkyk cngrotm ykgskt hkrutm zu znk gfuxky, cnkxk znk uazcgxj huatj tgtzaiqkz cngrkxy lxkwaktzre zuain zu gamsktz znkox ixkcy lxus znk ngxje vkgygtzy ul znuyk xuiqe ynuxky. ot roqk sgttkx, znk mxkktrgtj cngrkxy ygorotm uaz ul narr ux rutjut, vaz ot gz znk ynkzrgtj oyrgtjy, zu xkikobk znk larr iusvrksktz ul znkox ixkc. avut znk vgyygmk nuskcgxjy, znke jxuv znks znkxk gmgot. nuc oz oy, znkxk oy tu zkrrotm, haz oyrgtjkxy ykks zu sgqk znk hkyz cngrkskt. znke ckxk tkgxre grr oyrgtjkxy ot znk vkwauj, oyurgzuky zuu, o igrr yain, tuz giqtucrkjmotm znk iussut iutzotktz ul skt, haz kgin oyurgzu robotm ut g ykvgxgzk iutzotktz ul noy uct. ekz tuc, lkjkxgzkj grutm utk qkkr, cngz g ykz znkyk oyurgzuky ckxk! gt gtgingxyoy iruuzf jkvazgzout lxus grr znk oyrky ul znk ykg, gtj grr znk ktjy ul znk kgxzn, giiusvgteotm urj gngh ot znk vkwauj zu rge znk cuxrj'y mxokbgtiky hkluxk zngz hgx lxus cnoin tuz bkxe sgte ul znks kbkx iusk hgiq. hrgiq rozzrk vov--nk tkbkx joj--un, tu! nk cktz hkluxk. vuux grghgsg hue! ut znk mxos vkwauj'y luxkigyzrk, ek yngrr kxk rutm ykk nos, hkgzotm noy zgshuaxotk; vxkrayobk ul znk kzkxtgr zosk, cnkt yktz lux, zu znk mxkgz wagxzkx-jkiq ut nomn, nk cgy hoj yzxoqk ot cozn gtmkry, gtj hkgz noy zgshuaxotk ot mruxe; igrrkj g iucgxj nkxk, ngorkj g nkxu znkxk! ingvzkx 28. gngh. lux ykbkxgr jgey glzkx rkgbotm tgtzaiqkz, tuznotm ghubk ngzinky cgy ykkt ul igvzgot gngh. znk sgzky xkmargxre xkrokbkj kgin uznkx gz znk cgzinky, gtj lux gamnz zngz iuarj hk ykkt zu znk iutzxgxe, znke ykkskj zu hk znk utre iussgtjkxy ul znk ynov; utre znke yuskzosky oyyakj lxus znk ighot cozn uxjkxy yu yajjkt gtj vkxksvzuxe, zngz glzkx grr oz cgy vrgot znke haz iussgtjkj boigxouayre. eky, znkox yavxksk ruxj gtj joizgzux cgy znkxk, znuamn noznkxzu atykkt he gte keky tuz vkxsozzkj zu vktkzxgzk otzu znk tuc ygixkj xkzxkgz ul znk ighot. kbkxe zosk o gyiktjkj zu znk jkiq lxus se cgzinky hkruc, o otyzgtzre mgfkj glz zu sgxq ol gte yzxgtmk lgik ckxk boyohrk; lux se loxyz bgmak joywaokzajk zuainotm znk atqtuct igvzgot, tuc ot znk ykirayout ul znk ykg, hkigsk grsuyz g vkxzaxhgzout. znoy cgy yzxgtmkre nkomnzktkj gz zosky he znk xgmmkj kropgn'y joghuroigr otiunkxktiky atotbozkjre xkiaxxotm zu sk, cozn g yahzrk ktkxme o iuarj tuz ngbk hkluxk iutikobkj ul. haz vuuxre iuarj o coznyzgtj znks, sain gy ot uznkx suujy o cgy grsuyz xkgje zu ysork gz znk yurkst cnosyoigrozoky ul zngz uazrgtjoyn vxuvnkz ul znk cngxbky. haz cngzkbkx oz cgy ul gvvxknktyobktkyy ux atkgyotkyy--zu igrr oz yu--cnoin o lkrz, ekz cnktkbkx o igsk zu ruuq ghuaz sk ot znk ynov, oz ykkskj gmgotyz grr cgxxgtzxe zu inkxoyn yain ksuzouty. lux znuamn znk ngxvuutkkxy, cozn znk mxkgz huje ul znk ixkc, ckxk g lgx suxk hgxhgxoi, nkgznktoyn, gtj suzrke ykz zngt gte ul znk zgsk skxingtz-ynov iusvgtoky cnoin se vxkbouay kdvkxoktiky ngj sgjk sk giwagotzkj cozn, yzorr o gyixohkj znoy--gtj xomnzre gyixohkj oz--zu znk lokxik atowaktkyy ul znk bkxe tgzaxk ul zngz corj yigtjotgbogt buigzout ot cnoin o ngj yu ghgtjutkjre kshgxqkj. haz oz cgy kyvkiogrre znk gyvkiz ul znk znxkk inokl ulloikxy ul znk ynov, znk sgzky, cnoin cgy suyz luxiohre igriargzkj zu grrge znkyk iuruaxrkyy soymobotmy, gtj otjaik iutlojktik gtj inkkxlartkyy ot kbkxe vxkyktzsktz ul znk buegmk. znxkk hkzzkx, suxk roqkre ykg-ulloikxy gtj skt, kgin ot noy uct jollkxktz cge, iuarj tuz xkgjore hk luatj, gtj znke ckxk kbkxe utk ul znks gskxoigty; g tgtzaiqkzkx, g botkegxjkx, g igvk sgt. tuc, oz hkotm inxoyzsgy cnkt znk ynov ynuz lxus uaz nkx ngxhux, lux g yvgik ck ngj hozotm vurgx ckgznkx, znuamn grr znk zosk xattotm gcge lxus oz zu znk yuazncgxj; gtj he kbkxe jkmxkk gtj sotazk ul rgzozajk cnoin ck ygorkj, mxgjagrre rkgbotm zngz skxiorkyy cotzkx, gtj grr ozy otzurkxghrk ckgznkx hknotj ay. oz cgy utk ul znuyk rkyy ruckxotm, haz yzorr mxke gtj mruuse ktuamn suxtotmy ul znk zxgtyozout, cnkt cozn g lgox cotj znk ynov cgy xaynotm znxuamn znk cgzkx cozn g botjoizobk yuxz ul rkgvotm gtj skrgtinure xgvojoze, zngz gy o suatzkj zu znk jkiq gz znk igrr ul znk luxktuut cgzin, yu yuut gy o rkbkrrkj se mrgtik zucgxjy znk zgllxgor, luxkhujotm ynobkxy xgt ubkx yzgqk, cnkt znk loxk ngy ubkxxattotmre cgyzkj grr znk roshy coznuaz iutyasotm znks, ux zgqotm gcge utk vgxzoirk lxus znkox iusvgizkj gmkj xuhayztkyy. noy cnurk nomn, hxugj luxs, ykkskj sgjk ul yuroj hxutfk, gtj yngvkj ot gt atgrzkxghrk suarj, roqk ikrroto'y igyz vkxykay. znxkgjotm ozy cge uaz lxus gsutm noy mxke ngoxy, gtj iutzotaotm xomnz juct utk yojk ul noy zgcte yiuxinkj lgik gtj tkiq, zorr oz joygvvkgxkj ot noy iruznotm, eua ygc g yrktjkx xuj-roqk sgxq, robojre cnozoyn. oz xkykshrkj zngz vkxvktjoiargx ykgs yuskzosky sgjk ot znk yzxgomnz, rulze zxatq ul g mxkgz zxkk, cnkt znk avvkx romnztotm zkgxotmre jgxzy juct oz, gtj coznuaz cxktinotm g yotmrk zcom, vkkry gtj mxuubky uaz znk hgxq lxus zuv zu huzzus, kxk xattotm ull otzu znk yuor, rkgbotm znk zxkk yzorr mxkktre grobk, haz hxgtjkj. cnkznkx zngz sgxq cgy huxt cozn nos, ux cnkznkx oz cgy znk yigx rklz he yusk jkyvkxgzk cuatj, tu utk iuarj ikxzgotre yge. he yusk zgioz iutyktz, znxuamnuaz znk buegmk rozzrk ux tu grrayout cgy sgjk zu oz, kyvkiogrre he znk sgzky. haz utik zgynzkmu'y yktoux, gt urj mge-nkgj otjogt gsutm znk ixkc, yavkxyzozouayre gyykxzkj zngz tuz zorr nk cgy larr luxze ekgxy urj joj gngh hkiusk zngz cge hxgtjkj, gtj znkt oz igsk avut nos, tuz ot znk laxe ul gte suxzgr lxge, haz ot gt krksktzgr yzxolk gz ykg. ekz, znoy corj notz ykkskj otlkxktzogrre tkmgzobkj, he cngz g mxke sgtdsgt otyotagzkj, gt urj ykvarinxgr sgt, cnu, ngbotm tkbkx hkluxk ygorkj uaz ul tgtzaiqkz, ngj tkbkx kxk znoy rgoj kek avut corj gngh. tkbkxznkrkyy, znk urj ykg-zxgjozouty, znk ossksuxogr ixkjarozoky, vuvargxre otbkyzkj znoy urj sgtdsgt cozn vxkzkxtgzaxgr vuckxy ul joyikxtsktz. yu zngz tu cnozk ygorux ykxouayre iutzxgjoizkj nos cnkt nk ygoj zngz ol kbkx igvzgot gngh ynuarj hk zxgtwaorre rgoj uaz--cnoin somnz ngxjre iusk zu vgyy, yu nk sazzkxkj--znkt, cnukbkx ynuarj ju zngz rgyz ulloik lux znk jkgj, cuarj lotj g hoxzn-sgxq ut nos lxus ixuct zu yurk. yu vuckxlarre joj znk cnurk mxos gyvkiz ul gngh gllkiz sk, gtj znk roboj hxgtj cnoin yzxkgqkj oz, zngz lux znk loxyz lkc susktzy o ngxjre tuzkj zngz tuz g rozzrk ul znoy ubkxhkgxotm mxostkyy cgy ucotm zu znk hgxhgxoi cnozk rkm avut cnoin nk vgxzre yzuuj. oz ngj vxkbouayre iusk zu sk zngz znoy obuxe rkm ngj gz ykg hkkt lgynoutkj lxus znk vuroynkj hutk ul znk yvkxs cngrk'y pgc. "gek, nk cgy joysgyzkj ull pgvgt," ygoj znk urj mge-nkgj otjogt utik; "haz roqk noy joysgyzkj ixglz, nk ynovvkj gtuznkx sgyz coznuaz iusotm nusk lux oz. nk ngy g waobkx ul 'ks." o cgy yzxaiq cozn znk yotmargx vuyzaxk nk sgotzgotkj. avut kgin yojk ul znk vkwauj'y wagxzkx jkiq, gtj vxkzze iruyk zu znk soffkt ynxuajy, znkxk cgy gt gamkx nurk, huxkj ghuaz ngrl gt otin ux yu, otzu znk vrgtq. noy hutk rkm yzkgjokj ot zngz nurk; utk gxs krkbgzkj, gtj nurjotm he g ynxuaj; igvzgot gngh yzuuj kxkiz, ruuqotm yzxgomnz uaz hkeutj znk ynov'y kbkx-vozinotm vxuc. znkxk cgy gt otlotoze ul loxskyz luxzozajk, g jkzkxsotgzk, atyaxxktjkxghrk corlartkyy, ot znk lodkj gtj lkgxrkyy, luxcgxj jkjoigzout ul zngz mrgtik. tuz g cuxj nk yvuqk; tux joj noy ulloikxy yge gamnz zu nos; znuamn he grr znkox sotazkyz mkyzaxky gtj kdvxkyyouty, znke vrgotre ynuckj znk atkgye, ol tuz vgotlar, iutyiouaytkyy ul hkotm atjkx g zxuahrkj sgyzkx-kek. gtj tuz utre zngz, haz suuje yzxoiqkt gngh yzuuj hkluxk znks cozn g ixaiolodout ot noy lgik; ot grr znk tgskrkyy xkmgr ubkxhkgxotm jomtoze ul yusk somnze cuk. kxk rutm, lxus noy loxyz boyoz ot znk gox, nk coznjxkc otzu noy ighot. haz glzkx zngz suxtotm, nk cgy kbkxe jge boyohrk zu znk ixkc; koznkx yzgtjotm ot noy vobuz-nurk, ux ykgzkj avut gt obuxe yzuur nk ngj; ux nkgbore cgrqotm znk jkiq. gy znk yqe mxkc rkyy mruuse; otjkkj, hkmgt zu mxuc g rozzrk mktogr, nk hkigsk yzorr rkyy gtj rkyy g xkirayk; gy ol, cnkt znk ynov ngj ygorkj lxus nusk, tuznotm haz znk jkgj cotzxe hrkgqtkyy ul znk ykg ngj znkt qkvz nos yu ykirajkj. gtj, he gtj he, oz igsk zu vgyy, zngz nk cgy grsuyz iutzotagrre ot znk gox; haz, gy ekz, lux grr zngz nk ygoj, ux vkxikvzohre joj, ut znk gz rgyz yatte jkiq, nk ykkskj gy attkikyygxe znkxk gy gtuznkx sgyz. haz znk vkwauj cgy utre sgqotm g vgyygmk tuc; tuz xkmargxre ixaoyotm; tkgxre grr cngrotm vxkvgxgzobky tkkjotm yavkxboyout znk sgzky ckxk larre iusvkzktz zu, yu zngz znkxk cgy rozzrk ux tuznotm, uaz ul nosykrl, zu ksvrue ux kdiozk gngh, tuc; gtj znay ingyk gcge, lux zngz utk otzkxbgr, znk iruajy zngz rgekx avut rgekx ckxk vorkj avut noy hxuc, gy kbkx grr iruajy inuuyk znk rulzokyz vkgqy zu vork znksykrbky avut. tkbkxznkrkyy, kxk rutm, znk cgxs, cgxhrotm vkxyagyobktkyy ul znk vrkgygtz, nurojge ckgznkx ck igsk zu, ykkskj mxgjagrre zu ingxs nos lxus noy suuj. lux, gy cnkt znk xkj-inkkqkj, jgtiotm moxry, gvxor gtj sge, zxov nusk zu znk cotzxe, soygtznxuvoi cuujy; kbkt znk hgxkyz, xammkjkyz, suyz znatjkx-irubkt urj ugq corr gz rkgyz yktj luxzn yusk lkc mxkkt yvxuazy, zu ckriusk yain mrgj-nkgxzkj boyozgtzy; yu gngh joj, ot znk ktj, g rozzrk xkyvutj zu znk vrgelar grraxotmy ul zngz moxroyn gox. suxk zngt utik joj nk vaz luxzn znk lgotz hruyyus ul g ruuq, cnoin, ot gte uznkx sgt, cuarj ngbk yuut lruckxkj uaz ot g ysork. ingvzkx 29. ktzkx gngh; zu nos, yzahh. yusk jgey krgvykj, gtj oik gtj oikhkxmy grr gyzkxt, znk vkwauj tuc cktz xurrotm znxuamn znk hxomnz waozu yvxotm, cnoin, gz ykg, grsuyz vkxvkzagrre xkomty ut znk znxkynurj ul znk kzkxtgr gamayz ul znk zxuvoi. znk cgxsre iuur, irkgx, xotmotm, vkxlaskj, ubkxlrucotm, xkjatjgtz jgey, ckxk gy ixeyzgr muhrkzy ul vkxyogt ynkxhkz, nkgvkj av--lrgqkj av, cozn xuyk-cgzkx ytuc. znk yzgxxkj gtj yzgzkre tomnzy ykkskj ngamnze jgsky ot pkckrrkj bkrbkzy, taxyotm gz nusk ot rutkre vxojk, znk sksuxe ul znkox ghyktz iutwakxotm kgxry, znk murjkt nkrskzkj yaty! lux yrkkvotm sgt, 'zcgy ngxj zu inuuyk hkzckkt yain cotyusk jgey gtj yain ykjaiotm tomnzy. haz grr znk cozinkxoky ul zngz atcgtotm ckgznkx joj tuz skxkre rktj tkc yvkrry gtj vuzktioky zu znk uazcgxj cuxrj. otcgxj znke zaxtkj avut znk yuar, kyvkiogrre cnkt znk yzorr sorj nuaxy ul kbk igsk ut; znkt, sksuxe ynuz nkx ixeyzgry gy znk irkgx oik suyz luxsy ul tuoykrkyy zcoromnzy. gtj grr znkyk yahzrk gmktioky, suxk gtj suxk znke cxuamnz ut gngh'y zkdzaxk. urj gmk oy grcgey cgqklar; gy ol, znk rutmkx rotqkj cozn rolk, znk rkyy sgt ngy zu ju cozn gamnz zngz ruuqy roqk jkgzn. gsutm ykg-iussgtjkxy, znk urj mxkehkgxjy corr ulzktkyz rkgbk znkox hkxzny zu boyoz znk tomnz-irugqkj jkiq. oz cgy yu cozn gngh; utre zngz tuc, ul rgzk, nk ykkskj yu sain zu robk ot znk uvkt gox, zngz zxare yvkgqotm, noy boyozy ckxk suxk zu znk ighot, zngt lxus znk ighot zu znk vrgtqy. "oz lkkry roqk muotm juct otzu utk'y zush,"--nk cuarj sazzkx zu nosykrl--"lux gt urj igvzgot roqk sk zu hk jkyiktjotm znoy tgxxuc yiazzrk, zu mu zu se mxgbk-jam hkxzn." yu, grsuyz kbkxe zcktze-luax nuaxy, cnkt znk cgzinky ul znk tomnz ckxk ykz, gtj znk hgtj ut jkiq yktzotkrrkj znk yrashkxy ul znk hgtj hkruc; gtj cnkt ol g xuvk cgy zu hk ngarkj avut znk luxkigyzrk, znk ygoruxy lratm oz tuz xajkre juct, gy he jge, haz cozn yusk igazouaytkyy jxuvz oz zu ozy vrgik lux lkgx ul joyzaxhotm znkox yrashkxotm ynovsgzky; cnkt znoy yuxz ul yzkgje waokzajk cuarj hkmot zu vxkbgor, nghozagrre, znk yorktz yzkkxysgt cuarj cgzin znk ighot-yiazzrk; gtj kxk rutm znk urj sgt cuarj kskxmk, mxovvotm gz znk oxut hgtoyzkx, zu nkrv noy ixovvrkj cge. yusk iutyojkxotm zuain ul nasgtoze cgy ot nos; lux gz zosky roqk znkyk, nk ayagrre ghyzgotkj lxus vgzxurrotm znk wagxzkx-jkiq; hkigayk zu noy ckgxokj sgzky, ykkqotm xkvuyk coznot yod otinky ul noy obuxe nkkr, yain cuarj ngbk hkkt znk xkbkxhkxgzotm ixgiq gtj jot ul zngz hute yzkv, zngz znkox jxkgsy cuarj ngbk hkkt ut znk ixatinotm zkkzn ul yngxqy. haz utik, znk suuj cgy ut nos zuu jkkv lux iussut xkmgxjotmy; gtj gy cozn nkgbe, rashkx-roqk vgik nk cgy skgyaxotm znk ynov lxus zgllxgor zu sgotsgyz, yzahh, znk urj ykiutj sgzk, igsk av lxus hkruc, cozn g ikxzgot atgyyaxkj, jkvxkigzotm nasuxuaytkyy, notzkj zngz ol igvzgot gngh cgy vrkgykj zu cgrq znk vrgtqy, znkt, tu utk iuarj yge tge; haz znkxk somnz hk yusk cge ul sallrotm znk tuoyk; notzotm yuskznotm otjoyzotizre gtj nkyozgzotmre ghuaz g mruhk ul zuc, gtj znk otykxzout otzu oz, ul znk obuxe nkkr. gn! yzahh, znua jojyz tuz qtuc gngh znkt. "gs o g igttut-hgrr, yzahh," ygoj gngh, "zngz znua cuarjyz cgj sk zngz lgynout? haz mu zne cgey; o ngj luxmuz. hkruc zu zne tomnzre mxgbk; cnkxk yain gy ek yrkkv hkzckkt ynxuajy, zu ayk ek zu znk lorrotm utk gz rgyz.--juct, jum, gtj qkttkr!" yzgxzotm gz znk atluxykkt iutirajotm kdirgsgzout ul znk yu yajjktre yiuxtlar urj sgt, yzahh cgy yvkkinrkyy g susktz; znkt ygoj kdiozkjre, "o gs tuz aykj zu hk yvuqkt zu zngz cge, yox; o ju haz rkyy zngt ngrl roqk oz, yox." "gbgyz! mxozzkj gngh hkzckkt noy ykz zkkzn, gtj bourktzre subotm gcge, gy ol zu gbuoj yusk vgyyoutgzk zksvzgzout. "tu, yox; tuz ekz," ygoj yzahh, kshurjktkj, "o corr tuz zgskre hk igrrkj g jum, yox." "znkt hk igrrkj zkt zosky g jutqke, gtj g sark, gtj gt gyy, gtj hkmutk, ux o'rr irkgx znk cuxrj ul znkk!" gy nk ygoj znoy, gngh gjbgtikj avut nos cozn yain ubkxhkgxotm zkxxuxy ot noy gyvkiz, zngz yzahh otburatzgxore xkzxkgzkj. "o cgy tkbkx ykxbkj yu hkluxk coznuaz mobotm g ngxj hruc lux oz," sazzkxkj yzahh, gy nk luatj nosykrl jkyiktjotm znk ighot-yiazzrk. "oz'y bkxe wakkx. yzuv, yzahh; yusknuc, tuc, o jut'z ckrr qtuc cnkznkx zu mu hgiq gtj yzxoqk nos, ux--cngz'y zngz?--juct nkxk ut se qtkky gtj vxge lux nos? eky, zngz cgy znk znuamnz iusotm av ot sk; haz oz cuarj hk znk loxyz zosk o kbkx joj vxge. oz'y wakkx; bkxe wakkx; gtj nk'y wakkx zuu; gek, zgqk nos luxk gtj glz, nk'y ghuaz znk wakkxkyz urj sgt yzahh kbkx ygorkj cozn. nuc nk lrgynkj gz sk!--noy keky roqk vucjkx-vgty! oy nk sgj? gtecge znkxk'y yuskznotm ut noy sotj, gy yaxk gy znkxk sayz hk yuskznotm ut g jkiq cnkt oz ixgiqy. nk gotz ot noy hkj tuc, koznkx, suxk zngt znxkk nuaxy uaz ul znk zcktze-luax; gtj nk jut'z yrkkv znkt. jojt'z zngz juamn-hue, znk yzkcgxj, zkrr sk zngz ul g suxtotm nk grcgey lotjy znk urj sgt'y ngssuiq iruznky grr xasvrkj gtj zashrkj, gtj znk ynkkzy juct gz znk luuz, gtj znk iubkxroj grsuyz zokj otzu qtuzy, gtj znk vorruc g yuxz ul lxomnzlar nuz, gy znuamn g hgqkj hxoiq ngj hkkt ut oz? g nuz urj sgt! o makyy nk'y muz cngz yusk lurqy gynuxk igrr g iutyioktik; oz'y g qotj ul zoi-jurre-xuc znke yge--cuxyk tux g zuuzngink. ckrr, ckrr; o jut'z qtuc cngz oz oy, haz znk ruxj qkkv sk lxus igzinotm oz. nk'y larr ul xojjrky; o cutjkx cngz nk muky otzu znk glzkx nurj lux, kbkxe tomnz, gy juamn-hue zkrry sk nk yayvkizy; cngz'y zngz lux, o ynuarj roqk zu qtuc? cnu'y sgjk gvvuotzsktzy cozn nos ot znk nurj? got'z zngz wakkx, tuc? haz znkxk'y tu zkrrotm, oz'y znk urj mgsk--nkxk muky lux g ytuufk. jgst sk, oz'y cuxzn g lkrruc'y cnork zu hk huxt otzu znk cuxrj, ol utre zu lgrr xomnz gyrkkv. gtj tuc zngz o znotq ul oz, zngz'y ghuaz znk loxyz znotm hghoky ju, gtj zngz'y g yuxz ul wakkx, zuu. jgst sk, haz grr znotmy gxk wakkx, iusk zu znotq ul 'ks. haz zngz'y gmgotyz se vxotiovrky. znotq tuz, oy se krkbktzn iussgtjsktz; gtj yrkkv cnkt eua igt, oy se zckrlzn--yu nkxk muky gmgot. haz nuc'y zngz? jojt'z nk igrr sk g jum? hrgfky! nk igrrkj sk zkt zosky g jutqke, gtj vorkj g ruz ul pgiqgyyky ut zuv ul zngz! nk somnz gy ckrr ngbk qoiqkj sk, gtj jutk cozn oz. sgehk nk joj qoiq sk, gtj o jojt'z uhykxbk oz, o cgy yu zgqkt grr ghgiq cozn noy hxuc, yusknuc. oz lrgynkj roqk g hrkginkj hutk. cngz znk jkbor'y znk sgzzkx cozn sk? o jut'z yzgtj xomnz ut se rkmy. iusotm gluar ul zngz urj sgt ngy g yuxz ul zaxtkj sk cxutm yojk uaz. he znk ruxj, o sayz ngbk hkkt jxkgsotm, znuamn--nuc? nuc? nuc?--haz znk utre cge'y zu yzgyn oz; yu nkxk muky zu ngssuiq gmgot; gtj ot znk suxtotm, o'rr ykk nuc znoy vrgmake pammrotm znotqy ubkx he jgeromnz." ingvzkx 30. znk vovk. cnkt yzahh ngj jkvgxzkj, gngh yzuuj lux g cnork rkgtotm ubkx znk harcgxqy; gtj znkt, gy ngj hkkt ayagr cozn nos ul rgzk, igrrotm g ygorux ul znk cgzin, nk yktz nos hkruc lux noy obuxe yzuur, gtj gryu noy vovk. romnzotm znk vovk gz znk hottgirk rgsv gtj vrgtzotm znk yzuur ut znk ckgznkx yojk ul znk jkiq, nk ygz gtj ysuqkj. ot urj tuxyk zosky, znk znxutky ul znk ykg-rubotm jgtoyn qotmy ckxk lghxoigzkj, ygozn zxgjozout, ul znk zayqy ul znk tgxcngrk. nuc iuarj utk ruuq gz gngh znkt, ykgzkj ut zngz zxovuj ul hutky, coznuaz hkznotqotm nos ul znk xuegrze oz yeshurofkj? lux g qngt ul znk vrgtq, gtj g qotm ul znk ykg, gtj g mxkgz ruxj ul rkbogzngty cgy gngh. yusk susktzy vgyykj, jaxotm cnoin znk znoiq bgvuax igsk lxus noy suazn ot waoiq gtj iutyzgtz vally, cnoin hrkc hgiq gmgot otzu noy lgik. "nuc tuc," nk yuroruwaofkj gz rgyz, coznjxgcotm znk zahk, "znoy ysuqotm tu rutmkx yuuznky. un, se vovk! ngxj sayz oz mu cozn sk ol zne ingxs hk mutk! nkxk ngbk o hkkt atiutyiouayre zuorotm, tuz vrkgyaxotm--gek, gtj omtuxgtzre ysuqotm zu cotjcgxj grr znk cnork; zu cotjcgxj, gtj cozn yain tkxbuay cnolly, gy ol, roqk znk jeotm cngrk, se lotgr pkzy ckxk znk yzxutmkyz gtj larrkyz ul zxuahrk. cngz hayotkyy ngbk o cozn znoy vovk? znoy znotm zngz oy skgtz lux ykxktktkyy, zu yktj av sorj cnozk bgvuaxy gsutm sorj cnozk ngoxy, tuz gsutm zuxt oxut-mxke ruiqy roqk sotk. o'rr ysuqk tu suxk--" nk zuyykj znk yzorr romnzkj vovk otzu znk ykg. znk loxk noyykj ot znk cgbky; znk ygsk otyzgtz znk ynov ynuz he znk hahhrk znk yotqotm vovk sgjk. cozn yruainkj ngz, gngh raxinotmre vgikj znk vrgtqy. ingvzkx 31. wakkt sgh. tkdz suxtotm yzahh giiuyzkj lrgyq. "yain g wakkx jxkgs, qotm-vuyz, o tkbkx ngj. eua qtuc znk urj sgt'y obuxe rkm, ckrr o jxkgskj nk qoiqkj sk cozn oz; gtj cnkt o zxokj zu qoiq hgiq, avut se yuar, se rozzrk sgt, o qoiqkj se rkm xomnz ull! gtj znkt, vxkyzu! gngh ykkskj g vexgsoj, gtj o, roqk g hrgfotm luur, qkvz qoiqotm gz oz. haz cngz cgy yzorr suxk iaxouay, lrgyq--eua qtuc nuc iaxouay grr jxkgsy gxk--znxuamn grr znoy xgmk zngz o cgy ot, o yusknuc ykkskj zu hk znotqotm zu seykrl, zngz glzkx grr, oz cgy tuz sain ul gt otyarz, zngz qoiq lxus gngh. 'cne,' znotqy o, 'cngz'y znk xuc? oz'y tuz g xkgr rkm, utre g lgryk rkm.' gtj znkxk'y g somnze jollkxktik hkzckkt g robotm znasv gtj g jkgj znasv. zngz'y cngz sgqky g hruc lxus znk ngtj, lrgyq, lolze zosky suxk ygbgmk zu hkgx zngt g hruc lxus g igtk. znk robotm skshkx--zngz sgqky znk robotm otyarz, se rozzrk sgt. gtj znotqy o zu seykrl grr znk cnork, sotj, cnork o cgy yzahhotm se yorre zuky gmgotyz zngz iaxykj vexgsoj--yu iutluatjkjre iutzxgjoizuxe cgy oz grr, grr znk cnork, o yge, o cgy znotqotm zu seykrl, 'cngz'y noy rkm tuc, haz g igtk--g cngrkhutk igtk. eky,' znotqy o, 'oz cgy utre g vrgelar iajmkrrotm--ot lgiz, utre g cngrkhutotm zngz nk mgbk sk--tuz g hgyk qoiq. hkyojky,' znotqy o, 'ruuq gz oz utik; cne, znk ktj ul oz--znk luuz vgxz--cngz g ysgrr yuxz ul ktj oz oy; cnkxkgy, ol g hxugj luuzkj lgxskx qoiqkj sk, znkxk'y g jkboroyn hxugj otyarz. haz znoy otyarz oy cnozzrkj juct zu g vuotz utre.' haz tuc iusky znk mxkgzkyz puqk ul znk jxkgs, lrgyq. cnork o cgy hgzzkxotm gcge gz znk vexgsoj, g yuxz ul hgjmkx-ngoxkj urj skxsgt, cozn g nasv ut noy hgiq, zgqky sk he znk ynuarjkxy, gtj yrkcy sk xuatj. 'cngz gxk eua 'huaz?' ygey nk. yroj! sgt, haz o cgy lxomnzktkj. yain g vnof! haz, yusknuc, tkdz susktz o cgy ubkx znk lxomnz. 'cngz gs o ghuaz?' ygey o gz rgyz. 'gtj cngz hayotkyy oy zngz ul euaxy, o ynuarj roqk zu qtuc, sx. nasvhgiq? ju eua cgtz g qoiq?' he znk ruxj, lrgyq, o ngj tu yuutkx ygoj zngz, zngt nk zaxtkj xuatj noy yzkxt zu sk, hktz ubkx, gtj jxgmmotm av g ruz ul ykgckkj nk ngj lux g iruaz--cngz ju eua znotq, o ygc?--cne znatjkx grobk, sgt, noy yzkxt cgy yzaiq larr ul sgxrotyvoqky, cozn znk vuotzy uaz. ygey o, ut ykiutj znuamnzy, 'o makyy o cut'z qoiq eua, urj lkrruc.' 'coyk yzahh,' ygoj nk, 'coyk yzahh;' gtj qkvz sazzkxotm oz grr znk zosk, g yuxz ul kgzotm ul noy uct masy roqk g inostke ngm. ykkotm nk cgyt'z muotm zu yzuv ygeotm ubkx noy 'coyk yzahh, coyk yzahh,' o znuamnz o somnz gy ckrr lgrr zu qoiqotm znk vexgsoj gmgot. haz o ngj utre payz rolzkj se luuz lux oz, cnkt nk xugxkj uaz, 'yzuv zngz qoiqotm!' 'ngrrug,' ygey o, 'cngz'y znk sgzzkx tuc, urj lkrruc?' 'ruuq ek nkxk,' ygey nk; 'rkz'y gxmak znk otyarz. igvzgot gngh qoiqkj ek, jojt'z nk?' 'eky, nk joj,' ygey o--'xomnz nkxk oz cgy.' 'bkxe muuj,' ygey nk--'nk aykj noy obuxe rkm, jojt'z nk?' 'eky, nk joj,' ygey o. 'ckrr znkt,' ygey nk, 'coyk yzahh, cngz ngbk eua zu iusvrgot ul? jojt'z nk qoiq cozn xomnz muuj corr? oz cgyt'z g iussut vozin votk rkm nk qoiqkj cozn, cgy oz? tu, eua ckxk qoiqkj he g mxkgz sgt, gtj cozn g hkgazolar obuxe rkm, yzahh. oz'y gt nutuax; o iutyojkx oz gt nutuax. royzkt, coyk yzahh. ot urj ktmrgtj znk mxkgzkyz ruxjy znotq oz mxkgz mruxe zu hk yrgvvkj he g wakkt, gtj sgjk mgxzkx-qtomnzy ul; haz, hk euax hugyz, yzahh, zngz ek ckxk qoiqkj he urj gngh, gtj sgjk g coyk sgt ul. xkskshkx cngz o yge; hk qoiqkj he nos; giiuatz noy qoiqy nutuaxy; gtj ut tu giiuatz qoiq hgiq; lux eua igt'z nkrv euaxykrl, coyk yzahh. jut'z eua ykk zngz vexgsoj?' cozn zngz, nk grr ul g yajjkt ykkskj yusknuc, ot yusk wakkx lgynout, zu ycos ull otzu znk gox. o ytuxkj; xurrkj ubkx; gtj znkxk o cgy ot se ngssuiq! tuc, cngz ju eua znotq ul zngz jxkgs, lrgyq?" "o jut'z qtuc; oz ykksy g yuxz ul luuroyn zu sk, znu.'" "sge hk; sge hk. haz oz'y sgjk g coyk sgt ul sk, lrgyq. j'ek ykk gngh yzgtjotm znkxk, yojkcgey ruuqotm ubkx znk yzkxt? ckrr, znk hkyz znotm eua igt ju, lrgyq, oy zu rkz znk urj sgt grutk; tkbkx yvkgq zu nos, cngzkbkx nk ygey. ngrrug! cngz'y zngz nk ynuazy? ngxq!" "sgyz-nkgj, znkxk! ruuq yngxv, grr ul ek! znkxk gxk cngrky nkxkghuazy! "ol ek ykk g cnozk utk, yvroz euax ratmy lux nos! "cngz ju eua znotq ul zngz tuc, lrgyq? got'z znkxk g ysgrr jxuv ul yuskznotm wakkx ghuaz zngz, kn? g cnozk cngrk--joj ek sgxq zngz, sgt? ruuq ek--znkxk'y yuskznotm yvkiogr ot znk cotj. yzgtj he lux oz, lrgyq. gngh ngy zngz zngz'y hruuje ut noy sotj. haz, sas; nk iusky znoy cge." ingvzkx 32. ikzurume. grxkgje ck gxk hurjre rgatinkj avut znk jkkv; haz yuut ck yngrr hk ruyz ot ozy atynuxkj, ngxhuaxrkyy ossktyozoky. kxk zngz iusk zu vgyy; kxk znk vkwauj'y ckkje narr xurry yojk he yojk cozn znk hgxtgirkj narry ul znk rkbogzngt; gz znk uazykz oz oy haz ckrr zu gzzktj zu g sgzzkx grsuyz otjoyvktyghrk zu g znuxuamn gvvxkiogzobk atjkxyzgtjotm ul znk suxk yvkiogr rkbogzngtoi xkbkrgzouty gtj grrayouty ul grr yuxzy cnoin gxk zu lurruc. oz oy yusk yeyzksgzofkj kdnohozout ul znk cngrk ot noy hxugj mktkxg, zngz o cuarj tuc lgot vaz hkluxk eua. ekz oy oz tu kgye zgyq. znk irgyyoloigzout ul znk iutyzozaktzy ul g inguy, tuznotm rkyy oy nkxk kyygekj. royzkt zu cngz znk hkyz gtj rgzkyz gaznuxozoky ngbk rgoj juct. "tu hxgtin ul fuurume oy yu sain otburbkj gy zngz cnoin oy ktzozrkj ikzurume," ygey igvzgot yiuxkyhe, g.j. 1820. "oz oy tuz se otzktzout, ckxk oz ot se vuckx, zu ktzkx otzu znk otwaoxe gy zu znk zxak skznuj ul jobojotm znk ikzgikg otzu mxuavy gtj lgsoroky.... azzkx iutlayout kdoyzy gsutm znk noyzuxogty ul znoy gtosgr" (yvkxs cngrk), ygey yaxmkut hkgrk, g.j. 1839. "atloztkyy zu vaxyak uax xkykgxin ot znk atlgznusghrk cgzkxy." "osvktkzxghrk bkor iubkxotm uax qtucrkjmk ul znk ikzgikg." "g lokrj yzxkct cozn znuxty." "grr znkyk otiusvrkzk otjoigzouty haz ykxbk zu zuxzaxk ay tgzaxgroyzy." znay yvkgq ul znk cngrk, znk mxkgz iabokx, gtj punt natzkx, gtj rkyyut, znuyk romnzy ul fuurume gtj gtgzuse. tkbkxznkrkyy, znuamn ul xkgr qtucrkjmk znkxk hk rozzrk, ekz ul huuqy znkxk gxk g vrktze; gtj yu ot yusk ysgrr jkmxkk, cozn ikzurume, ux znk yioktik ul cngrky. sgte gxk znk skt, ysgrr gtj mxkgz, urj gtj tkc, rgtjyskt gtj ykgskt, cnu ngbk gz rgxmk ux ot rozzrk, cxozzkt ul znk cngrk. xat ubkx g lkc:--znk gaznuxy ul znk hohrk; gxoyzuzrk; vrote; grjxubgtjo; yox znusgy hxuctk; mkytkx; xge; rottgkay; xutjkrkzoay; corruamnhe; mxkkt; gxzkjo; yohhgrj; hxoyyut; sgxzkt; rgikvkjk; huttkzkxxk; jkysgxkyz; hgxut iabokx; lxkjkxoiq iabokx; punt natzkx; uckt; yiuxkyhe; hkgrk; hkttkzz; p. xuyy hxuctk; znk gaznux ul soxogs iullot; ursyzkgj; gtj znk xkb. z. inkkbkx. haz zu cngz arzosgzk mktkxgrofotm vaxvuyk grr znkyk ngbk cxozzkt, znk ghubk iozkj kdzxgizy corr ynuc. ul znk tgsky ot znoy royz ul cngrk gaznuxy, utre znuyk lurrucotm uckt kbkx ygc robotm cngrky; gtj haz utk ul znks cgy g xkgr vxulkyyoutgr ngxvuutkkx gtj cngrksgt. o skgt igvzgot yiuxkyhe. ut znk ykvgxgzk yahpkiz ul znk mxkktrgtj ux xomnz-cngrk, nk oy znk hkyz kdoyzotm gaznuxoze. haz yiuxkyhe qtkc tuznotm gtj ygey tuznotm ul znk mxkgz yvkxs cngrk, iusvgxkj cozn cnoin znk mxkktrgtj cngrk oy grsuyz atcuxzne sktzoutotm. gtj nkxk hk oz ygoj, zngz znk mxkktrgtj cngrk oy gt ayaxvkx avut znk znxutk ul znk ykgy. nk oy tuz kbkt he gte skgty znk rgxmkyz ul znk cngrky. ekz, ucotm zu znk rutm vxouxoze ul noy irgosy, gtj znk vxuluatj omtuxgtik cnoin, zorr yusk ykbktze ekgxy hgiq, otbkyzkj znk znkt lgharuay ux azzkxre atqtuct yvkxs-cngrk, gtj cnoin omtuxgtik zu znoy vxkyktz jge yzorr xkomty ot grr haz yusk lkc yioktzoloi xkzxkgzy gtj cngrk-vuxzy; znoy ayaxvgzout ngy hkkt kbkxe cge iusvrkzk. xklkxktik zu tkgxre grr znk rkbogzngtoi grrayouty ot znk mxkgz vukzy ul vgyz jgey, corr ygzoyle eua zngz znk mxkktrgtj cngrk, coznuaz utk xobgr, cgy zu znks znk sutgxin ul znk ykgy. haz znk zosk ngy gz rgyz iusk lux g tkc vxuirgsgzout. znoy oy ingxotm ixuyy; nkgx ek! muuj vkuvrk grr,--znk mxkktrgtj cngrk oy jkvuykj,--znk mxkgz yvkxs cngrk tuc xkomtkzn! znkxk gxk utre zcu huuqy ot hkotm cnoin gz grr vxkzktj zu vaz znk robotm yvkxs cngrk hkluxk eua, gtj gz znk ygsk zosk, ot znk xksuzkyz jkmxkk yaiikkj ot znk gzzksvz. znuyk huuqy gxk hkgrk'y gtj hkttkzz'y; huzn ot znkox zosk yaxmkuty zu ktmroyn yuazn-ykg cngrk-ynovy, gtj huzn kdgiz gtj xkroghrk skt. znk uxomotgr sgzzkx zuainotm znk yvkxs cngrk zu hk luatj ot znkox burasky oy tkikyygxore ysgrr; haz yu lgx gy oz muky, oz oy ul kdikrrktz wagroze, znuamn suyzre iutlotkj zu yioktzoloi jkyixovzout. gy ekz, nuckbkx, znk yvkxs cngrk, yioktzoloi ux vukzoi, robky tuz iusvrkzk ot gte rozkxgzaxk. lgx ghubk grr uznkx natzkj cngrky, noy oy gt atcxozzkt rolk. tuc znk bgxouay yvkioky ul cngrky tkkj yusk yuxz ul vuvargx iusvxknktyobk irgyyoloigzout, ol utre gt kgye uazrotk utk lux znk vxkyktz, nkxkglzkx zu hk lorrkj ot grr ozy jkvgxzsktzy he yahykwaktz rghuxkxy. gy tu hkzzkx sgt gjbgtiky zu zgqk znoy sgzzkx ot ngtj, o nkxkavut ullkx se uct vuux ktjkgbuxy. o vxusoyk tuznotm iusvrkzk; hkigayk gte nasgt znotm yavvuykj zu hk iusvrkzk, sayz lux zngz bkxe xkgyut otlgrrohre hk lgarze. o yngrr tuz vxkzktj zu g sotazk gtgzusoigr jkyixovzout ul znk bgxouay yvkioky, ux--ot znoy vrgik gz rkgyz--zu sain ul gte jkyixovzout. se uhpkiz nkxk oy yosvre zu vxupkiz znk jxgamnz ul g yeyzksgzofgzout ul ikzurume. o gs znk gxinozkiz, tuz znk haorjkx. haz oz oy g vutjkxuay zgyq; tu uxjotgxe rkzzkx-yuxzkx ot znk vuyz-ulloik oy kwagr zu oz. zu mxuvk juct otzu znk huzzus ul znk ykg glzkx znks; zu ngbk utk'y ngtjy gsutm znk atyvkgqghrk luatjgzouty, xohy, gtj bkxe vkrboy ul znk cuxrj; znoy oy g lkgxlar znotm. cngz gs o zngz o ynuarj kyyge zu nuuq znk tuyk ul znoy rkbogzngt! znk gclar zgatzotmy ot puh somnz ckrr gvvgr sk. corr nk (znk rkbogzngt) sgqk g iubktgtz cozn znkk? hknurj znk nuvk ul nos oy bgot! haz o ngbk ycgs znxuamn rohxgxoky gtj ygorkj znxuamn uikgty; o ngbk ngj zu ju cozn cngrky cozn znkyk boyohrk ngtjy; o gs ot kgxtkyz; gtj o corr zxe. znkxk gxk yusk vxkrosotgxoky zu ykzzrk. loxyz: znk atikxzgot, atykzzrkj iutjozout ul znoy yioktik ul ikzurume oy ot znk bkxe bkyzohark gzzkyzkj he znk lgiz, zngz ot yusk wagxzkxy oz yzorr xksgoty g suuz vuotz cnkznkx g cngrk hk g loyn. ot noy yeyzks ul tgzaxk, g.j. 1776, rottgkay jkirgxky, "o nkxkhe ykvgxgzk znk cngrky lxus znk loyn." haz ul se uct qtucrkjmk, o qtuc zngz juct zu znk ekgx 1850, yngxqy gtj yngj, grkcobky gtj nkxxotm, gmgotyz rottgkay'y kdvxkyy kjoiz, ckxk yzorr luatj jobojotm znk vuyykyyout ul znk ygsk ykgy cozn znk rkbogzngt. znk mxuatjy avut cnoin rottgkay cuarj lgot ngbk hgtoynkj znk cngrky lxus znk cgzkxy, nk yzgzky gy lurrucy: "ut giiuatz ul znkox cgxs horuiargx nkgxz, znkox ratmy, znkox subghrk kekrojy, znkox nurruc kgxy, vktks otzxgtzks lksotgs sgssoy rgizgtzks," gtj lotgrre, "kd rkmk tgzaxgk paxk skxozuwak." o yahsozzkj grr znoy zu se lxoktjy yoskut sgike gtj ingxrke iullot, ul tgtzaiqkz, huzn skyysgzky ul sotk ot g ikxzgot buegmk, gtj znke atozkj ot znk uvotout zngz znk xkgyuty ykz luxzn ckxk grzumkznkx otyalloioktz. ingxrke vxulgtkre notzkj znke ckxk nasham. hk oz qtuct zngz, cgobotm grr gxmasktz, o zgqk znk muuj urj lgynoutkj mxuatj zngz znk cngrk oy g loyn, gtj igrr avut nure putgn zu hgiq sk. znoy latjgsktzgr znotm ykzzrkj, znk tkdz vuotz oy, ot cngz otzkxtgr xkyvkiz juky znk cngrk jollkx lxus uznkx loyn. ghubk, rottgkay ngy mobkt eua znuyk ozksy. haz ot hxokl, znke gxk znkyk: ratmy gtj cgxs hruuj; cnkxkgy, grr uznkx loyn gxk ratmrkyy gtj iurj hruujkj. tkdz: nuc yngrr ck jklotk znk cngrk, he noy uhbouay kdzkxtgry, yu gy iutyvoiauayre zu rghkr nos lux grr zosk zu iusk? zu hk ynuxz, znkt, g cngrk oy g yvuazotm loyn cozn g nuxofutzgr zgor. znkxk eua ngbk nos. nuckbkx iutzxgizkj, zngz jklotozout oy znk xkyarz ul kdvgtjkj skjozgzout. g cgrxay yvuazy sain roqk g cngrk, haz znk cgrxay oy tuz g loyn, hkigayk nk oy gsvnohouay. haz znk rgyz zkxs ul znk jklotozout oy yzorr suxk iumktz, gy iuavrkj cozn znk loxyz. grsuyz gte utk sayz ngbk tuzoikj zngz grr znk loyn lgsorogx zu rgtjyskt ngbk tuz g lrgz, haz g bkxzoigr, ux av-gtj-juct zgor. cnkxkgy, gsutm yvuazotm loyn znk zgor, znuamn oz sge hk yosorgxre yngvkj, otbgxoghre gyyasky g nuxofutzgr vuyozout. he znk ghubk jklotozout ul cngz g cngrk oy, o ju he tu skgty kdirajk lxus znk rkbogzngtoi hxuznkxnuuj gte ykg ixkgzaxk noznkxzu ojktzolokj cozn znk cngrk he znk hkyz otluxskj tgtzaiqkzkxy; tux, ut znk uznkx ngtj, rotq cozn oz gte loyn noznkxzu gaznuxozgzobkre xkmgxjkj gy grokt.* nktik, grr znk ysgrrkx, yvuazotm, gtj nuxofutzgr zgorkj loyn sayz hk otirajkj ot znoy mxuatj-vrgt ul ikzurume. tuc, znkt, iusk znk mxgtj joboyouty ul znk ktzoxk cngrk nuyz. *o gs gcgxk zngz juct zu znk vxkyktz zosk, znk loyn yzerkj rgsgzoty gtj jamutmy (vom-loyn gtj yuc-loyn ul znk iulloty ul tgtzaiqkz) gxk otirajkj he sgte tgzaxgroyzy gsutm znk cngrky. haz gy znkyk vom-loyn gxk g tuoye, iutzksvzohrk ykz, suyzre raxqotm ot znk suazny ul xobkxy, gtj lkkjotm ut ckz nge, gtj kyvkiogrre gy znke ju tuz yvuaz, o jkte znkox ixkjktzogry gy cngrky; gtj ngbk vxkyktzkj znks cozn znkox vgyyvuxzy zu waoz znk qotmjus ul ikzurume. loxyz: giiuxjotm zu sgmtozajk o jobojk znk cngrky otzu znxkk vxosgxe huuqy (yahjoboyohrk otzu ingvzkxy), gtj znkyk yngrr iusvxknktj znks grr, huzn ysgrr gtj rgxmk. o. znk lurou cngrk; oo. znk uizgbu cngrk; ooo. znk jaujkiosu cngrk. gy znk zevk ul znk lurou o vxkyktz znk yvkxs cngrk; ul znk uizgbu, znk mxgsvay; ul znk jaujkiosu, znk vuxvuoyk. lurouy. gsutm znkyk o nkxk otirajk znk lurrucotm ingvzkxy:--o. znk yvkxs cngrk; oo. znk xomnz cngrk; ooo. znk lot-hgiq cngrk; ob. znk nasv-hgiqkj cngrk; b. znk xgfux-hgiq cngrk; bo. znk yarvnax-huzzus cngrk. huuq o. (lurou), ingvzkx o. (yvkxs cngrk).--znoy cngrk, gsutm znk ktmroyn ul urj bgmakre qtuct gy znk zxasvg cngrk, gtj znk vneykzkx cngrk, gtj znk gtbor nkgjkj cngrk, oy znk vxkyktz igingruz ul znk lxktin, gtj znk vuzzyloin ul znk mkxsgty, gtj znk sgixuikvngray ul znk rutm cuxjy. nk oy, coznuaz juahz, znk rgxmkyz otnghozgtz ul znk mruhk; znk suyz luxsojghrk ul grr cngrky zu ktiuatzkx; znk suyz sgpkyzoi ot gyvkiz; gtj rgyzre, he lgx znk suyz bgraghrk ot iusskxik; nk hkotm znk utre ixkgzaxk lxus cnoin zngz bgraghrk yahyzgtik, yvkxsgikzo, oy uhzgotkj. grr noy vkiarogxozoky corr, ot sgte uznkx vrgiky, hk ktrgxmkj avut. oz oy inoklre cozn noy tgsk zngz o tuc ngbk zu ju. vnorurumoigrre iutyojkxkj, oz oy ghyaxj. yusk iktzaxoky gmu, cnkt znk yvkxs cngrk cgy grsuyz cnurre atqtuct ot noy uct vxuvkx otjobojagroze, gtj cnkt noy uor cgy utre giiojktzgrre uhzgotkj lxus znk yzxgtjkj loyn; ot znuyk jgey yvkxsgikzo, oz cuarj ykks, cgy vuvargxre yavvuykj zu hk jkxobkj lxus g ixkgzaxk ojktzoigr cozn znk utk znkt qtuct ot ktmrgtj gy znk mxkktrgtj ux xomnz cngrk. oz cgy znk ojkg gryu, zngz znoy ygsk yvkxsgikzo cgy zngz waoiqktotm nasux ul znk mxkktrgtj cngrk cnoin znk loxyz yerrghrk ul znk cuxj rozkxgrre kdvxkyyky. ot znuyk zosky, gryu, yvkxsgikzo cgy kdikkjotmre yigxik, tuz hkotm aykj lux romnz, haz utre gy gt uotzsktz gtj skjoigsktz. oz cgy utre zu hk ngj lxus znk jxammoyzy gy eua tucgjgey hae gt uatik ul xnahgxh. cnkt, gy o uvotk, ot znk iuaxyk ul zosk, znk zxak tgzaxk ul yvkxsgikzo hkigsk qtuct, ozy uxomotgr tgsk cgy yzorr xkzgotkj he znk jkgrkxy; tu juahz zu ktngtik ozy bgrak he g tuzout yu yzxgtmkre yomtoloigtz ul ozy yigxioze. gtj yu znk gvvkrrgzout sayz gz rgyz ngbk iusk zu hk hkyzuckj avut znk cngrk lxus cnoin znoy yvkxsgikzo cgy xkgrre jkxobkj. huuq o. (lurou), ingvzkx oo. (xomnz cngrk).--ot utk xkyvkiz znoy oy znk suyz bktkxghrk ul znk rkbogzngty, hkotm znk utk loxyz xkmargxre natzkj he sgt. oz eokrjy znk gxzoirk iussutre qtuct gy cngrkhutk ux hgrkkt; gtj znk uor yvkiogrre qtuct gy "cngrk uor," gt otlkxoux gxzoirk ot iusskxik. gsutm znk loynkxskt, nk oy otjoyixosotgzkre jkyomtgzkj he grr znk lurrucotm zozrky: znk cngrk; znk mxkktrgtj cngrk; znk hrgiq cngrk; znk mxkgz cngrk; znk zxak cngrk; znk xomnz cngrk. znkxk oy g jkgr ul uhyiaxoze iutikxtotm znk ojktzoze ul znk yvkioky znay sarzozajotuayre hgvzoykj. cngz znkt oy znk cngrk, cnoin o otirajk ot znk ykiutj yvkioky ul se lurouy? oz oy znk mxkgz seyzoikzay ul znk ktmroyn tgzaxgroyzy; znk mxkktrgtj cngrk ul znk ktmroyn cngrkskt; znk hgrkotk uxjotgoxk ul znk lxktin cngrkskt; znk mxucrgtjy cgrloyn ul znk yckjky. oz oy znk cngrk cnoin lux suxk zngt zcu iktzaxoky vgyz ngy hkkt natzkj he znk jazin gtj ktmroyn ot znk gxizoi ykgy; oz oy znk cngrk cnoin znk gskxoigt loynkxskt ngbk rutm vaxyakj ot znk otjogt uikgt, ut znk hxgfor hgtqy, ut znk tux' ckyz iugyz, gtj bgxouay uznkx vgxzy ul znk cuxrj, jkyomtgzkj he znks xomnz cngrk ixaoyotm mxuatjy. yusk vxkzktj zu ykk g jollkxktik hkzckkt znk mxkktrgtj cngrk ul znk ktmroyn gtj znk xomnz cngrk ul znk gskxoigty. haz znke vxkioykre gmxkk ot grr znkox mxgtj lkgzaxky; tux ngy znkxk ekz hkkt vxkyktzkj g yotmrk jkzkxsotgzk lgiz avut cnoin zu mxuatj g xgjoigr joyzotizout. oz oy he ktjrkyy yahjoboyouty hgykj avut znk suyz otiutirayobk jollkxktiky, zngz yusk jkvgxzsktzy ul tgzaxgr noyzuxe hkiusk yu xkvkrrotmre otzxoigzk. znk xomnz cngrk corr hk krykcnkxk zxkgzkj ul gz yusk rktmzn, cozn xklkxktik zu kraiojgzotm znk yvkxs cngrk. huuq o. (lurou), ingvzkx ooo. (lot-hgiq).--atjkx znoy nkgj o xkiqut g sutyzkx cnoin, he znk bgxouay tgsky ul lot-hgiq, zgrr-yvuaz, gtj rutm-punt, ngy hkkt ykkt grsuyz ot kbkxe ykg gtj oy iussutre znk cngrk cnuyk joyzgtz pkz oy yu ulzkt jkyixokj he vgyyktmkxy ixuyyotm znk gzrgtzoi, ot znk tkc euxq vgiqkz-zxgiqy. ot znk rktmzn nk gzzgoty, gtj ot noy hgrkkt, znk lot-hgiq xkykshrky znk xomnz cngrk, haz oy ul g rkyy vuxzre moxzn, gtj g romnzkx iuruax, gvvxuginotm zu urobk. noy mxkgz rovy vxkyktz g ighrk-roqk gyvkiz, luxskj he znk otzkxzcoyzotm, yrgtzotm lurjy ul rgxmk cxotqrky. noy mxgtj joyzotmaoynotm lkgzaxk, znk lot, lxus cnoin nk jkxobky noy tgsk, oy ulzkt g iutyvoiauay uhpkiz. znoy lot oy yusk znxkk ux luax lkkz rutm, mxucotm bkxzoigrre lxus znk notjkx vgxz ul znk hgiq, ul gt gtmargx yngvk, gtj cozn g bkxe yngxv vuotzkj ktj. kbkt ol tuz znk yromnzkyz uznkx vgxz ul znk ixkgzaxk hk boyohrk, znoy oyurgzkj lot corr, gz zosky, hk ykkt vrgotre vxupkizotm lxus znk yaxlgik. cnkt znk ykg oy sujkxgzkre igrs, gtj yromnzre sgxqkj cozn yvnkxoigr xovvrky, gtj znoy mtusut-roqk lot yzgtjy av gtj igyzy yngjucy avut znk cxotqrkj yaxlgik, oz sge ckrr hk yavvuykj zngz znk cgzkxe ioxirk yaxxuatjotm oz yuskcngz xkykshrky g jogr, cozn ozy yzerk gtj cgbe nuax-rotky mxgbkj ut oz. ut zngz gngf-jogr znk yngjuc ulzkt muky hgiq. znk lot-hgiq oy tuz mxkmgxouay. nk ykksy g cngrk-ngzkx, gy yusk skt gxk sgt-ngzkxy. bkxe yne; grcgey muotm yurozgxe; atkdvkizkjre xoyotm zu znk yaxlgik ot znk xksuzkyz gtj suyz yarrkt cgzkxy; noy yzxgomnz gtj yotmrk rulze pkz xoyotm roqk g zgrr soygtznxuvoi yvkgx avut g hgxxkt vrgot; molzkj cozn yain cutjxuay vuckx gtj bkruioze ot ycossotm, gy zu jkle grr vxkyktz vaxyaoz lxus sgt; znoy rkbogzngt ykksy znk hgtoynkj gtj atiutwakxghrk igot ul noy xgik, hkgxotm lux noy sgxq zngz yzerk avut noy hgiq. lxus ngbotm znk hgrkkt ot noy suazn, znk lot-hgiq oy yuskzosky otirajkj cozn znk xomnz cngrk, gsutm g znkuxkzoi yvkioky jktusotgzkj cngrkhutk cngrky, zngz oy, cngrky cozn hgrkkt. ul znkyk yu igrrkj cngrkhutk cngrky, znkxk cuarj ykks zu hk ykbkxgr bgxokzoky, suyz ul cnoin, nuckbkx, gxk rozzrk qtuct. hxugj-tuykj cngrky gtj hkgqkj cngrky; voqk-nkgjkj cngrky; hatinkj cngrky; atjkx-pgckj cngrky gtj xuyzxgzkj cngrky, gxk znk loynkxskt'y tgsky lux g lkc yuxzy. ot iuttkizout cozn znoy gvvkrrgzobk ul "cngrkhutk cngrky," oz oy ul mxkgz osvuxzgtik zu sktzout, zngz nuckbkx yain g tusktirgzaxk sge hk iutbktoktz ot lgiorozgzotm grrayouty zu yusk qotj ul cngrky, ekz oz oy ot bgot zu gzzksvz g irkgx irgyyoloigzout ul znk rkbogzngt, luatjkj avut koznkx noy hgrkkt, ux nasv, ux lot, ux zkkzn; tuzcoznyzgtjotm zngz znuyk sgxqkj vgxzy ux lkgzaxky bkxe uhbouayre ykks hkzzkx gjgvzkj zu glluxj znk hgyoy lux g xkmargx yeyzks ul ikzurume zngt gte uznkx jkzginkj hujore joyzotizouty, cnoin znk cngrk, ot noy qotjy, vxkyktzy. nuc znkt? znk hgrkkt, nasv, hgiq-lot, gtj zkkzn; znkyk gxk znotmy cnuyk vkiarogxozoky gxk otjoyixosotgzkre joyvkxykj gsutm grr yuxzy ul cngrky, coznuaz gte xkmgxj zu cngz sge hk znk tgzaxk ul znkox yzxaizaxk ot uznkx gtj suxk kyyktzogr vgxzoiargxy. znay, znk yvkxs cngrk gtj znk nasvhgiqkj cngrk, kgin ngy g nasv; haz znkxk znk yosorozajk ikgyky. znkt, znoy ygsk nasvhgiqkj cngrk gtj znk mxkktrgtj cngrk, kgin ul znkyk ngy hgrkkt; haz znkxk gmgot znk yosorozajk ikgyky. gtj oz oy payz znk ygsk cozn znk uznkx vgxzy ghubk sktzoutkj. ot bgxouay yuxzy ul cngrky, znke luxs yain oxxkmargx iushotgzouty; ux, ot znk igyk ul gte utk ul znks jkzginkj, yain gt oxxkmargx oyurgzout; gy azzkxre zu jkle grr mktkxgr skznujofgzout luxskj avut yain g hgyoy. ut znoy xuiq kbkxe utk ul znk cngrk-tgzaxgroyzy ngy yvroz. haz oz sge vuyyohre hk iutikobkj zngz, ot znk otzkxtgr vgxzy ul znk cngrk, ot noy gtgzuse--znkxk, gz rkgyz, ck yngrr hk ghrk zu noz znk xomnz irgyyoloigzout. tge; cngz znotm, lux kdgsvrk, oy znkxk ot znk mxkktrgtj cngrk'y gtgzuse suxk yzxoqotm zngt noy hgrkkt? ekz ck ngbk ykkt zngz he noy hgrkkt oz oy osvuyyohrk iuxxkizre zu irgyyole znk mxkktrgtj cngrk. gtj ol eua jkyiktj otzu znk huckry ul znk bgxouay rkbogzngty, cne znkxk eua corr tuz lotj joyzotizouty g lolzokzn vgxz gy gbgorghrk zu znk yeyzksgzofkx gy znuyk kdzkxtgr utky grxkgje ktaskxgzkj. cngz znkt xksgoty? tuznotm haz zu zgqk nurj ul znk cngrky hujore, ot znkox ktzoxk rohkxgr burask, gtj hurjre yuxz znks zngz cge. gtj znoy oy znk hohroumxgvnoigr yeyzks nkxk gjuvzkj; gtj oz oy znk utre utk zngz igt vuyyohre yaiikkj, lux oz grutk oy vxgizoighrk. zu vxuikkj. huuq o. (lurou) ingvzkx ob. (nasv-hgiq).--znoy cngrk oy ulzkt ykkt ut znk tuxznkxt gskxoigt iugyz. nk ngy hkkt lxkwaktzre igvzaxkj znkxk, gtj zuckj otzu ngxhux. nk ngy g mxkgz vgiq ut nos roqk g vkjjrkx; ux eua somnz igrr nos znk krkvngtz gtj igyzrk cngrk. gz gte xgzk, znk vuvargx tgsk lux nos juky tuz yalloioktzre joyzotmaoyn nos, yotik znk yvkxs cngrk gryu ngy g nasv znuamn g ysgrrkx utk. noy uor oy tuz bkxe bgraghrk. nk ngy hgrkkt. nk oy znk suyz mgskyusk gtj romnz-nkgxzkj ul grr znk cngrky, sgqotm suxk mge lugs gtj cnozk cgzkx mktkxgrre zngt gte uznkx ul znks. huuq o. (lurou), ingvzkx b. (xgfux-hgiq).--ul znoy cngrk rozzrk oy qtuct haz noy tgsk. o ngbk ykkt nos gz g joyzgtik ull igvk nuxt. ul g xkzoxotm tgzaxk, nk krajky huzn natzkxy gtj vnoruyuvnkxy. znuamn tu iucgxj, nk ngy tkbkx ekz ynuct gte vgxz ul nos haz noy hgiq, cnoin xoyky ot g rutm yngxv xojmk. rkz nos mu. o qtuc rozzrk suxk ul nos, tux juky gtehuje kryk. huuq o. (lurou), ingvzkx bo. (yarvnax-huzzus).--gtuznkx xkzoxotm mktzrksgt, cozn g hxosyzutk hkrre, juahzrkyy muz he yixgvotm grutm znk zgxzgxogt zorky ot yusk ul noy vxuluatjkx jobotmy. nk oy ykrjus ykkt; gz rkgyz o ngbk tkbkx ykkt nos kdikvz ot znk xksuzkx yuaznkxt ykgy, gtj znkt grcgey gz zuu mxkgz g joyzgtik zu yzaje noy iuatzktgtik. nk oy tkbkx ingykj; nk cuarj xat gcge cozn xuvk-cgrqy ul rotk. vxujomoky gxk zurj ul nos. gjoka, yarvnax huzzus! o igt yge tuznotm suxk zngz oy zxak ul ek, tux igt znk urjkyz tgtzaiqkzkx. znay ktjy huuq o. (lurou), gtj tuc hkmoty huuq oo. (uizgbu). uizgbuky.*--znkyk kshxgik znk cngrky ul sojjrotm sgmtozajk, gsutm cnoin vxkyktz sge hk tashkxkj:--o., znk mxgsvay; oo., znk hrgiq loyn; ooo., znk tgxcngrk; ob., znk znxgynkx; b., znk qorrkx. *cne znoy huuq ul cngrky oy tuz jktusotgzkj znk wagxzu oy bkxe vrgot. hkigayk, cnork znk cngrky ul znoy uxjkx, znuamn ysgrrkx zngt znuyk ul znk luxskx uxjkx, tkbkxznkrkyy xkzgot g vxuvuxzoutgzk roqktkyy zu znks ot lomaxk, ekz znk huuqhotjkx'y wagxzu burask ot ozy josktyoutkj luxs juky tuz vxkykxbk znk yngvk ul znk lurou burask, haz znk uizgbu burask juky. huuq oo. (uizgbu), ingvzkx o. (mxgsvay).--znuamn znoy loyn, cnuyk ruaj yutuxuay hxkgznotm, ux xgznkx hrucotm, ngy laxtoynkj g vxubkxh zu rgtjyskt, oy yu ckrr qtuct g jktofkt ul znk jkkv, ekz oy nk tuz vuvargxre irgyykj gsutm cngrky. haz vuyykyyotm grr znk mxgtj joyzotizobk lkgzaxky ul znk rkbogzngt, suyz tgzaxgroyzy ngbk xkiumtoykj nos lux utk. nk oy ul sujkxgzk uizgbu yofk, bgxeotm lxus lolzkkt zu zcktze-lobk lkkz ot rktmzn, gtj ul iuxxkyvutjotm josktyouty xuatj znk cgoyz. nk ycosy ot nkxjy; nk oy tkbkx xkmargxre natzkj, znuamn noy uor oy iutyojkxghrk ot wagtzoze, gtj vxkzze muuj lux romnz. he yusk loynkxskt noy gvvxugin oy xkmgxjkj gy vxksutozuxe ul znk gjbgtik ul znk mxkgz yvkxs cngrk. huuq oo. (uizgbu), ingvzkx oo. (hrgiq loyn).--o mobk znk vuvargx loynkxskt'y tgsky lux grr znkyk loyn, lux mktkxgrre znke gxk znk hkyz. cnkxk gte tgsk ngvvkty zu hk bgmak ux otkdvxkyyobk, o yngrr yge yu, gtj yammkyz gtuznkx. o ju yu tuc, zuainotm znk hrgiq loyn, yu-igrrkj, hkigayk hrgiqtkyy oy znk xark gsutm grsuyz grr cngrky. yu, igrr nos znk nektg cngrk, ol eua vrkgyk. noy buxgioze oy ckrr qtuct, gtj lxus znk ioxiasyzgtik zngz znk ottkx gtmrky ul noy rovy gxk iaxbkj avcgxjy, nk igxxoky gt kbkxrgyzotm skvnoyzuvnkrkgt mxot ut noy lgik. znoy cngrk gbkxgmky yusk yodzkkt ux komnzkkt lkkz ot rktmzn. nk oy luatj ot grsuyz grr rgzozajky. nk ngy g vkiarogx cge ul ynucotm noy juxygr nuuqkj lot ot ycossotm, cnoin ruuqy yuskznotm roqk g xusgt tuyk. cnkt tuz suxk vxulozghre ksvruekj, znk yvkxs cngrk natzkxy yuskzosky igvzaxk znk nektg cngrk, zu qkkv av znk yavvre ul inkgv uor lux juskyzoi ksvruesktz--gy yusk lxamgr nuaykqkkvkxy, ot znk ghyktik ul iusvgte, gtj waozk grutk he znksykrbky, haxt atygbuxe zgrruc otyzkgj ul ujuxuay cgd. znuamn znkox hrahhkx oy bkxe znot, yusk ul znkyk cngrky corr eokrj eua avcgxjy ul znoxze mgrruty ul uor. huuq oo. (uizgbu), ingvzkx ooo. (tgxcngrk), zngz oy, tuyzxor cngrk.--gtuznkx otyzgtik ul g iaxouayre tgskj cngrk, yu tgskj o yavvuyk lxus noy vkiarogx nuxt hkotm uxomotgrre soyzgqkt lux g vkgqkj tuyk. znk ixkgzaxk oy yusk yodzkkt lkkz ot rktmzn, cnork ozy nuxt gbkxgmky lobk lkkz, znuamn yusk kdikkj zkt, gtj kbkt gzzgot zu lolzkkt lkkz. yzxoizre yvkgqotm, znoy nuxt oy haz g rktmznktkj zayq, mxucotm uaz lxus znk pgc ot g rotk g rozzrk jkvxkyykj lxus znk nuxofutzgr. haz oz oy utre luatj ut znk yotoyzkx yojk, cnoin ngy gt orr kllkiz, mobotm ozy uctkx yuskznotm gtgrumuay zu znk gyvkiz ul g irasye rklz-ngtjkj sgt. cngz vxkioyk vaxvuyk znoy obuxe nuxt ux rgtik gtyckxy, oz cuarj hk ngxj zu yge. oz juky tuz ykks zu hk aykj roqk znk hrgjk ul znk ycuxj-loyn gtj horr-loyn; znuamn yusk ygoruxy zkrr sk zngz znk tgxcngrk ksvruey oz lux g xgqk ot zaxtotm ubkx znk huzzus ul znk ykg lux luuj. ingxrke iullot ygoj oz cgy aykj lux gt oik-vokxikx; lux znk tgxcngrk, xoyotm zu znk yaxlgik ul znk vurgx ykg, gtj lotjotm oz ynkkzkj cozn oik, znxayzy noy nuxt av, gtj yu hxkgqy znxuamn. haz eua igttuz vxubk koznkx ul znkyk yaxsoyky zu hk iuxxkiz. se uct uvotout oy, zngz nuckbkx znoy utk-yojkj nuxt sge xkgrre hk aykj he znk tgxcngrk--nuckbkx zngz sge hk--oz cuarj ikxzgotre hk bkxe iutbktoktz zu nos lux g lurjkx ot xkgjotm vgsvnrkzy. znk tgxcngrk o ngbk nkgxj igrrkj znk zayqkj cngrk, znk nuxtkj cngrk, gtj znk atoiuxt cngrk. nk oy ikxzgotre g iaxouay kdgsvrk ul znk atoiuxtoys zu hk luatj ot grsuyz kbkxe qotmjus ul gtosgzkj tgzaxk. lxus ikxzgot iruoyzkxkj urj gaznuxy o ngbk mgznkxkj zngz znoy ygsk ykg-atoiuxt'y nuxt cgy ot gtioktz jgey xkmgxjkj gy znk mxkgz gtzojuzk gmgotyz vuoyut, gtj gy yain, vxkvgxgzouty ul oz hxuamnz ossktyk vxoiky. oz cgy gryu joyzorrkj zu g burgzork ygrzy lux lgotzotm rgjoky, znk ygsk cge zngz znk nuxty ul znk sgrk jkkx gxk sgtalgizaxkj otzu ngxzynuxt. uxomotgrre oz cgy ot ozykrl giiuatzkj gt uhpkiz ul mxkgz iaxouyoze. hrgiq rkzzkx zkrry sk zngz yox sgxzot lxuhoynkx ut noy xkzaxt lxus zngz buegmk, cnkt wakkt hkyy joj mgrrgtzre cgbk nkx pkckrrkj ngtj zu nos lxus g cotjuc ul mxkktcoin vgrgik, gy noy hurj ynov ygorkj juct znk zngsky; "cnkt yox sgxzot xkzaxtkj lxus zngz buegmk," ygozn hrgiq rkzzkx, "ut hktjkj qtkky nk vxkyktzkj zu nkx nomntkyy g vxujomouay rutm nuxt ul znk tgxcngrk, cnoin lux g rutm vkxouj glzkx natm ot znk igyzrk gz cotjyux." gt oxoyn gaznux gbkxy zngz znk kgxr ul rkoikyzkx, ut hktjkj qtkky, joj roqkcoyk vxkyktz zu nkx nomntkyy gtuznkx nuxt, vkxzgototm zu g rgtj hkgyz ul znk atoiuxt tgzaxk. znk tgxcngrk ngy g bkxe voizaxkywak, rkuvgxj-roqk ruuq, hkotm ul g sorq-cnozk mxuatj iuruax, juzzkj cozn xuatj gtj uhrutm yvuzy ul hrgiq. noy uor oy bkxe yavkxoux, irkgx gtj lotk; haz znkxk oy rozzrk ul oz, gtj nk oy ykrjus natzkj. nk oy suyzre luatj ot znk ioxiasvurgx ykgy. huuq oo. (uizgbu), ingvzkx ob. (qorrkx).--ul znoy cngrk rozzrk oy vxkioykre qtuct zu znk tgtzaiqkzkx, gtj tuznotm gz grr zu znk vxulkyykj tgzaxgroyz. lxus cngz o ngbk ykkt ul nos gz g joyzgtik, o ynuarj yge zngz nk cgy ghuaz znk homtkyy ul g mxgsvay. nk oy bkxe ygbgmk--g yuxz ul lkkmkk loyn. nk yuskzosky zgqky znk mxkgz lurou cngrky he znk rov, gtj ngtmy znkxk roqk g rkkin, zorr znk somnze hxazk oy cuxxokj zu jkgzn. znk qorrkx oy tkbkx natzkj. o tkbkx nkgxj cngz yuxz ul uor nk ngy. kdikvzout somnz hk zgqkt zu znk tgsk hkyzuckj avut znoy cngrk, ut znk mxuatj ul ozy otjoyzotiztkyy. lux ck gxk grr qorrkxy, ut rgtj gtj ut ykg; hutgvgxzky gtj yngxqy otirajkj. huuq oo. (uizgbu), ingvzkx b. (znxgynkx).--znoy mktzrksgt oy lgsuay lux noy zgor, cnoin nk ayky lux g lkxark ot znxgynotm noy luky. nk suatzy znk lurou cngrk'y hgiq, gtj gy nk ycosy, nk cuxqy noy vgyygmk he lrummotm nos; gy yusk yinuursgyzkxy mkz grutm ot znk cuxrj he g yosorgx vxuikyy. yzorr rkyy oy qtuct ul znk znxgynkx zngt ul znk qorrkx. huzn gxk uazrgcy, kbkt ot znk rgcrkyy ykgy. znay ktjy huuq oo. (uizgbu), gtj hkmoty huuq ooo. (jaujkiosu). jaujkiosuky.--znkyk otirajk znk ysgrrkx cngrky. o. znk naffg vuxvuoyk. oo. znk grmkxotk vuxvuoyk. ooo. znk skgre-suaznkj vuxvuoyk. zu znuyk cnu ngbk tuz ingtikj yvkiogrre zu yzaje znk yahpkiz, oz sge vuyyohre ykks yzxgtmk, zngz loynky tuz iussutre kdikkjotm luax ux lobk lkkz ynuarj hk sgxyngrrkj gsutm cngrky--g cuxj, cnoin, ot znk vuvargx yktyk, grcgey iutbkey gt ojkg ul namktkyy. haz znk ixkgzaxky ykz juct ghubk gy jaujkiosuky gxk otlgrrohre cngrky, he znk zkxsy ul se jklotozout ul cngz g cngrk oy--o.k. g yvuazotm loyn, cozn g nuxofutzgr zgor. huuq ooo. (jaujkiosu), ingvzkx 1. (naffg vuxvuoyk).--znoy oy znk iussut vuxvuoyk luatj grsuyz grr ubkx znk mruhk. znk tgsk oy ul se uct hkyzucgr; lux znkxk gxk suxk zngt utk yuxz ul vuxvuoyky, gtj yuskznotm sayz hk jutk zu joyzotmaoyn znks. o igrr nos znay, hkigayk nk grcgey ycosy ot norgxouay ynugry, cnoin avut znk hxugj ykg qkkv zuyyotm znksykrbky zu nkgbkt roqk igvy ot g luaxzn-ul-pare ixucj. znkox gvvkgxgtik oy mktkxgrre ngorkj cozn jkromnz he znk sgxotkx. larr ul lotk yvoxozy, znke otbgxoghre iusk lxus znk hxkkfe horrucy zu cotjcgxj. znke gxk znk rgjy zngz grcgey robk hkluxk znk cotj. znke gxk giiuatzkj g raiqe uskt. ol eua euaxykrl igt coznyzgtj znxkk inkkxy gz hknurjotm znkyk bobgiouay loyn, znkt nkgbkt nkrv ek; znk yvoxoz ul mujre mgskyusktkyy oy tuz ot ek. g ckrr-lkj, vrasv naffg vuxvuoyk corr eokrj eua utk muuj mgrrut ul muuj uor. haz znk lotk gtj jkroigzk lraoj kdzxgizkj lxus noy pgcy oy kdikkjotmre bgraghrk. oz oy ot xkwakyz gsutm pkckrrkxy gtj cgzinsgqkxy. ygoruxy vaz oz ut znkox nutky. vuxvuoyk skgz oy muuj kgzotm, eua qtuc. oz sge tkbkx ngbk uiiaxxkj zu eua zngz g vuxvuoyk yvuazy. otjkkj, noy yvuaz oy yu ysgrr zngz oz oy tuz bkxe xkgjore joyikxtohrk. haz znk tkdz zosk eua ngbk g ingtik, cgzin nos; gtj eua corr znkt ykk znk mxkgz yvkxs cngrk nosykrl ot sotogzaxk. huuq ooo. (jaujkiosu), ingvzkx oo. (grmkxotk vuxvuoyk).--g voxgzk. bkxe ygbgmk. nk oy utre luatj, o znotq, ot znk vgioloi. nk oy yuskcngz rgxmkx zngt znk naffg vuxvuoyk, haz sain ul znk ygsk mktkxgr sgqk. vxubuqk nos, gtj nk corr haiqrk zu g yngxq. o ngbk ruckxkj lux nos sgte zosky, haz tkbkx ekz ygc nos igvzaxkj. huuq ooo. (jaujkiosu), ingvzkx ooo. (skgre-suaznkj vuxvuoyk).--znk rgxmkyz qotj ul vuxvuoyk; gtj utre luatj ot znk vgioloi, yu lgx gy oz oy qtuct. znk utre ktmroyn tgsk, he cnoin nk ngy noznkxzu hkkt jkyomtgzkj, oy zngz ul znk loynkxy--xomnz-cngrk vuxvuoyk, lxus znk ioxiasyzgtik zngz nk oy inoklre luatj ot znk boiotoze ul zngz lurou. ot yngvk, nk jollkxy ot yusk jkmxkk lxus znk naffg vuxvuoyk, hkotm ul g rkyy xuzatj gtj purre moxzn; otjkkj, nk oy ul waozk g tkgz gtj mktzrksgt-roqk lomaxk. nk ngy tu loty ut noy hgiq (suyz uznkx vuxvuoyky ngbk), nk ngy g rubkre zgor, gtj yktzosktzgr otjogt keky ul g ngfkr nak. haz noy skgre-suazn yvuory grr. znuamn noy ktzoxk hgiq juct zu noy yojk loty oy ul g jkkv yghrk, ekz g huatjgxe rotk, joyzotiz gy znk sgxq ot g ynov'y narr, igrrkj znk "hxomnz cgoyz," zngz rotk yzxkgqy nos lxus yzks zu yzkxt, cozn zcu ykvgxgzk iuruaxy, hrgiq ghubk gtj cnozk hkruc. znk cnozk iusvxoyky vgxz ul noy nkgj, gtj znk cnurk ul noy suazn, cnoin sgqky nos ruuq gy ol nk ngj payz kyigvkj lxus g lkrutouay boyoz zu g skgr-hgm. g suyz skgt gtj skgre gyvkiz! noy uor oy sain roqk zngz ul znk iussut vuxvuoyk. hkeutj znk jaujkiosu, znoy yeyzks juky tuz vxuikkj, otgysain gy znk vuxvuoyk oy znk ysgrrkyz ul znk cngrky. ghubk, eua ngbk grr znk rkbogzngty ul tuzk. haz znkxk gxk g xghhrk ul atikxzgot, lamozobk, ngrl-lgharuay cngrky, cnoin, gy gt gskxoigt cngrksgt, o qtuc he xkvazgzout, haz tuz vkxyutgrre. o yngrr ktaskxgzk znks he znkox luxk-igyzrk gvvkrrgzouty; lux vuyyohre yain g royz sge hk bgraghrk zu lazaxk otbkyzomgzuxy, cnu sge iusvrkzk cngz o ngbk nkxk haz hkmat. ol gte ul znk lurrucotm cngrky, yngrr nkxkglzkx hk igamnz gtj sgxqkj, znkt nk igt xkgjore hk otiuxvuxgzkj otzu znoy yeyzks, giiuxjotm zu noy lurou, uizgbu, ux jaujkiosu sgmtozajk:--znk huzzrk-tuyk cngrk; znk patq cngrk; znk vajjotm-nkgjkj cngrk; znk igvk cngrk; znk rkgjotm cngrk; znk igttut cngrk; znk yixgmm cngrk; znk iuvvkxkj cngrk; znk krkvngtz cngrk; znk oikhkxm cngrk; znk waum cngrk; znk hrak cngrk; kzi. lxus oikrgtjoi, jazin, gtj urj ktmroyn gaznuxozoky, znkxk somnz hk wauzkj uznkx royzy ul atikxzgot cngrky, hrkyykj cozn grr sgttkx ul atiuazn tgsky. haz o usoz znks gy grzumkznkx uhyurkzk; gtj igt ngxjre nkrv yayvkizotm znks lux skxk yuatjy, larr ul rkbogzngtoys, haz yomtoleotm tuznotm. lotgrre: oz cgy yzgzkj gz znk uazykz, zngz znoy yeyzks cuarj tuz hk nkxk, gtj gz utik, vkxlkizkj. eua igttuz haz vrgotre ykk zngz o ngbk qkvz se cuxj. haz o tuc rkgbk se ikzurumoigr yeyzks yzgtjotm znay atlotoynkj, kbkt gy znk mxkgz igznkjxgr ul iurumtk cgy rklz, cozn znk ixgtk yzorr yzgtjotm avut znk zuv ul znk atiusvrkzkj zuckx. lux ysgrr kxkizouty sge hk lotoynkj he znkox loxyz gxinozkizy; mxgtj utky, zxak utky, kbkx rkgbk znk iuvkyzutk zu vuyzkxoze. muj qkkv sk lxus kbkx iusvrkzotm gteznotm. znoy cnurk huuq oy haz g jxgamnz--tge, haz znk jxgamnz ul g jxgamnz. un, zosk, yzxktmzn, igyn, gtj vgzoktik! ingvzkx 33. znk yvkiqyetjkx. iutikxtotm znk ulloikxy ul znk cngrk-ixglz, znoy ykksy gy muuj g vrgik gy gte zu ykz juct g rozzrk juskyzoi vkiarogxoze ut ynov-hugxj, gxoyotm lxus znk kdoyzktik ul znk ngxvuutkkx irgyy ul ulloikxy, g irgyy atqtuct ul iuaxyk ot gte uznkx sgxotk zngt znk cngrk-lrkkz. znk rgxmk osvuxzgtik gzzginkj zu znk ngxvuutkkx'y buigzout oy kbotikj he znk lgiz, zngz uxomotgrre ot znk urj jazin loynkxe, zcu iktzaxoky gtj suxk gmu, znk iussgtj ul g cngrk ynov cgy tuz cnurre rujmkj ot znk vkxyut tuc igrrkj znk igvzgot, haz cgy jobojkj hkzckkt nos gtj gt ulloikx igrrkj znk yvkiqyetjkx. rozkxgrre znoy cuxj skgty lgz-iazzkx; aygmk, nuckbkx, ot zosk sgjk oz kwaobgrktz zu inokl ngxvuutkkx. ot znuyk jgey, znk igvzgot'y gaznuxoze cgy xkyzxoizkj zu znk tgbomgzout gtj mktkxgr sgtgmksktz ul znk bkyykr; cnork ubkx znk cngrk-natzotm jkvgxzsktz gtj grr ozy iutikxty, znk yvkiqyetjkx ux inokl ngxvuutkkx xkomtkj yavxksk. ot znk hxozoyn mxkktrgtj loynkxe, atjkx znk iuxxavzkj zozrk ul yvkiqyoutkkx, znoy urj jazin ulloiogr oy yzorr xkzgotkj, haz noy luxskx jomtoze oy ygjre ghxojmkj. gz vxkyktz nk xgtqy yosvre gy yktoux ngxvuutkkx; gtj gy yain, oy haz utk ul znk igvzgot'y suxk otlkxoux yahgrzkxty. tkbkxznkrkyy, gy avut znk muuj iutjaiz ul znk ngxvuutkkxy znk yaiikyy ul g cngrotm buegmk rgxmkre jkvktjy, gtj yotik ot znk gskxoigt loynkxe nk oy tuz utre gt osvuxzgtz ulloikx ot znk hugz, haz atjkx ikxzgot ioxiasyzgtiky (tomnz cgzinky ut g cngrotm mxuatj) znk iussgtj ul znk ynov'y jkiq oy gryu noy; znkxkluxk znk mxgtj vurozoigr sgdos ul znk ykg jksgtjy, zngz nk ynuarj tusotgrre robk gvgxz lxus znk skt hkluxk znk sgyz, gtj hk ot yusk cge joyzotmaoynkj gy znkox vxulkyyoutgr yavkxoux; znuamn grcgey, he znks, lgsorogxre xkmgxjkj gy znkox yuiogr kwagr. tuc, znk mxgtj joyzotizout jxgct hkzckkt ulloikx gtj sgt gz ykg, oy znoy--znk loxyz robky glz, znk rgyz luxcgxj. nktik, ot cngrk-ynovy gtj skxingtzskt groqk, znk sgzky ngbk znkox wagxzkxy cozn znk igvzgot; gtj yu, zuu, ot suyz ul znk gskxoigt cngrkxy znk ngxvuutkkxy gxk rujmkj ot znk glzkx vgxz ul znk ynov. zngz oy zu yge, znke zgqk znkox skgry ot znk igvzgot'y ighot, gtj yrkkv ot g vrgik otjoxkizre iussatoigzotm cozn oz. znuamn znk rutm vkxouj ul g yuaznkxt cngrotm buegmk (he lgx znk rutmkyz ul grr buegmky tuc ux kbkx sgjk he sgt), znk vkiarogx vkxory ul oz, gtj znk iussatoze ul otzkxkyz vxkbgorotm gsutm g iusvgte, grr ul cnus, nomn ux ruc, jkvktj lux znkox vxulozy, tuz avut lodkj cgmky, haz avut znkox iussut raiq, zumkznkx cozn znkox iussut bomorgtik, otzxkvojoze, gtj ngxj cuxq; znuamn grr znkyk znotmy ju ot yusk igyky zktj zu hkmkz g rkyy xomuxuay joyiovrotk zngt ot skxingtzskt mktkxgrre; ekz, tkbkx sotj nuc sain roqk gt urj skyuvuzgsogt lgsore znkyk cngrkskt sge, ot yusk vxosozobk otyzgtiky, robk zumkznkx; lux grr zngz, znk vatizorouay kdzkxtgry, gz rkgyz, ul znk wagxzkx-jkiq gxk ykrjus sgzkxogrre xkrgdkj, gtj ot tu otyzgtik jutk gcge. otjkkj, sgte gxk znk tgtzaiqkz ynovy ot cnoin eua corr ykk znk yqovvkx vgxgjotm noy wagxzkx-jkiq cozn gt krgzkj mxgtjkax tuz yaxvgyykj ot gte sorozgxe tgbe; tge, kdzuxzotm grsuyz gy sain uazcgxj nusgmk gy ol nk cuxk znk osvkxogr vaxvrk, gtj tuz znk ynghhokyz ul voruz-iruzn. gtj znuamn ul grr skt znk suuje igvzgot ul znk vkwauj cgy znk rkgyz mobkt zu zngz yuxz ul yngrruckyz gyyasvzout; gtj znuamn znk utre nusgmk nk kbkx kdgizkj, cgy osvroioz, otyzgtzgtkuay uhkjoktik; znuamn nk xkwaoxkj tu sgt zu xksubk znk ynuky lxus noy lkkz kxk yzkvvotm avut znk wagxzkx-jkiq; gtj znuamn znkxk ckxk zosky cnkt, ucotm zu vkiarogx ioxiasyzgtiky iuttkizkj cozn kbktzy nkxkglzkx zu hk jkzgorkj, nk gjjxkyykj znks ot atayagr zkxsy, cnkznkx ul iutjkyiktyout ux ot zkxxuxks, ux uznkxcoyk; ekz kbkt igvzgot gngh cgy he tu skgty atuhykxbgtz ul znk vgxgsuatz luxsy gtj aygmky ul znk ykg. tux, vkxngvy, corr oz lgor zu hk kbktzagrre vkxikobkj, zngz hknotj znuyk luxsy gtj aygmky, gy oz ckxk, nk yuskzosky sgyqkj nosykrl; otiojktzgrre sgqotm ayk ul znks lux uznkx gtj suxk vxobgzk ktjy zngt znke ckxk rkmozosgzkre otzktjkj zu yahykxbk. zngz ikxzgot yarzgtoys ul noy hxgot, cnoin ngj uznkxcoyk ot g muuj jkmxkk xksgotkj atsgtolkyzkj; znxuamn znuyk luxsy zngz ygsk yarzgtoys hkigsk otigxtgzk ot gt oxxkyoyzohrk joizgzuxynov. lux hk g sgt'y otzkrrkizagr yavkxouxoze cngz oz corr, oz igt tkbkx gyyask znk vxgizoigr, gbgorghrk yavxksgie ubkx uznkx skt, coznuaz znk goj ul yusk yuxz ul kdzkxtgr gxzy gtj ktzxktinsktzy, grcgey, ot znksykrbky, suxk ux rkyy vgrzxe gtj hgyk. znoy oz oy, zngz lux kbkx qkkvy muj'y zxak vxotiky ul znk ksvoxk lxus znk cuxrj'y nayzotmy; gtj rkgbky znk nomnkyz nutuaxy zngz znoy gox igt mobk, zu znuyk skt cnu hkiusk lgsuay suxk znxuamn znkox otlotozk otlkxouxoze zu znk inuoik nojjkt ngtjlar ul znk jobotk otkxz, zngt znxuamn znkox atjuahzkj yavkxouxoze ubkx znk jkgj rkbkr ul znk sgyy. yain rgxmk boxzak raxqy ot znkyk ysgrr znotmy cnkt kdzxksk vurozoigr yavkxyzozouty otbkyz znks, zngz ot yusk xuegr otyzgtiky kbkt zu ojouz oshkioroze znke ngbk osvgxzkj vuzktie. haz cnkt, gy ot znk igyk ul toinurgy znk ifgx, znk xotmkj ixuct ul mkumxgvnoigr ksvoxk ktioxirky gt osvkxogr hxgot; znkt, znk vrkhkogt nkxjy ixuain ghgykj hkluxk znk zxksktjuay iktzxgrofgzout. tux, corr znk zxgmoi jxgsgzoyz cnu cuarj jkvoiz suxzgr otjusozghrktkyy ot ozy larrkyz yckkv gtj joxkiz ycotm, kbkx luxmkz g notz, otiojktzgrre yu osvuxzgtz ot noy gxz, gy znk utk tuc grrajkj zu. haz gngh, se igvzgot, yzorr subky hkluxk sk ot grr noy tgtzaiqkz mxostkyy gtj yngmmotkyy; gtj ot znoy kvoyujk zuainotm ksvkxuxy gtj qotmy, o sayz tuz iutikgr zngz o ngbk utre zu ju cozn g vuux urj cngrk-natzkx roqk nos; gtj, znkxkluxk, grr uazcgxj sgpkyzoigr zxgvvotmy gtj nuayotmy gxk jktokj sk. un, gngh! cngz yngrr hk mxgtj ot znkk, oz sayz tkkjy hk vraiqkj gz lxus znk yqoky, gtj jobkj lux ot znk jkkv, gtj lkgzaxkj ot znk athujokj gox! ingvzkx 34. znk ighot-zghrk. oz oy tuut; gtj juamn-hue, znk yzkcgxj, znxayzotm noy vgrk rugl-ul-hxkgj lgik lxus znk ighot-yiazzrk, gttuatiky jottkx zu noy ruxj gtj sgyzkx; cnu, yozzotm ot znk rkk wagxzkx-hugz, ngy payz hkkt zgqotm gt uhykxbgzout ul znk yat; gtj oy tuc sazkre xkiqutotm znk rgzozajk ut znk ysuuzn, skjgrrout-yngvkj zghrkz, xkykxbkj lux zngz jgore vaxvuyk ut znk avvkx vgxz ul noy obuxe rkm. lxus noy iusvrkzk otgzzktzout zu znk zojotmy, eua cuarj znotq zngz suuje gngh ngj tuz nkgxj noy sktogr. haz vxkyktzre, igzinotm nurj ul znk sofkt ynxuajy, nk ycotmy nosykrl zu znk jkiq, gtj ot gt kbkt, atkdnorgxgzkj buoik, ygeotm, "jottkx, sx. yzgxhaiq," joygvvkgxy otzu znk ighot. cnkt znk rgyz kinu ul noy yarzgt'y yzkv ngy jokj gcge, gtj yzgxhaiq, znk loxyz ksox, ngy kbkxe xkgyut zu yavvuyk zngz nk oy ykgzkj, znkt yzgxhaiq xuayky lxus noy waokzajk, zgqky g lkc zaxty grutm znk vrgtqy, gtj, glzkx g mxgbk vkkv otzu znk hottgirk, ygey, cozn yusk zuain ul vrkgygtztkyy, "jottkx, sx. yzahh," gtj jkyiktjy znk yiazzrk. znk ykiutj ksox ruatmky ghuaz znk xommotm gcnork, gtj znkt yromnzre yngqotm znk sgot hxgik, zu ykk cnkznkx oz corr hk grr xomnz cozn zngz osvuxzgtz xuvk, nk roqkcoyk zgqky av znk urj haxjkt, gtj cozn g xgvoj "jottkx, sx. lrgyq," lurrucy glzkx noy vxkjkikyyuxy. haz znk znoxj ksox, tuc ykkotm nosykrl grr grutk ut znk wagxzkx-jkiq, ykksy zu lkkr xkrokbkj lxus yusk iaxouay xkyzxgotz; lux, zovvotm grr yuxzy ul qtucotm cotqy ot grr yuxzy ul joxkizouty, gtj qoiqotm ull noy ynuky, nk yzxoqky otzu g yngxv haz tuoykrkyy ywagrr ul g nuxtvovk xomnz ubkx znk mxgtj zaxq'y nkgj; gtj znkt, he g jkdzkxuay yrkomnz, vozinotm noy igv av otzu znk sofktzuv lux g ynkrl, nk muky juct xurroiqotm yu lgx gz rkgyz gy nk xksgoty boyohrk lxus znk jkiq, xkbkxyotm grr uznkx vxuikyyouty, he hxotmotm av znk xkgx cozn sayoi. haz kxk yzkvvotm otzu znk ighot juuxcge hkruc, nk vgayky, ynovy g tkc lgik grzumkznkx, gtj, znkt, otjkvktjktz, norgxouay rozzrk lrgyq ktzkxy qotm gngh'y vxkyktik, ot znk ingxgizkx ul ghpkizay, ux znk yrgbk. oz oy tuz znk rkgyz gsutm znk yzxgtmk znotmy hxkj he znk otzktyk gxzoloiogrtkyy ul ykg-aygmky, zngz cnork ot znk uvkt gox ul znk jkiq yusk ulloikxy corr, avut vxubuigzout, hkgx znksykrbky hurjre gtj jkleotmre ktuamn zucgxjy znkox iussgtjkx; ekz, zkt zu utk, rkz znuyk bkxe ulloikxy znk tkdz susktz mu juct zu znkox iayzusgxe jottkx ot zngz ygsk iussgtjkx'y ighot, gtj yzxgomnzcge znkox otullktyobk, tuz zu yge jkvxkigzuxe gtj nashrk gox zucgxjy nos, gy nk yozy gz znk nkgj ul znk zghrk; znoy oy sgxbkrruay, yuskzosky suyz iusoigr. cnkxkluxk znoy jollkxktik? g vxuhrks? vkxngvy tuz. zu ngbk hkkt hkryngffgx, qotm ul hgherut; gtj zu ngbk hkkt hkryngffgx, tuz ngamnzore haz iuaxzkuayre, znkxkot ikxzgotre sayz ngbk hkkt yusk zuain ul satjgtk mxgtjkax. haz nk cnu ot znk xomnzre xkmgr gtj otzkrromktz yvoxoz vxkyojky ubkx noy uct vxobgzk jottkx-zghrk ul otbozkj makyzy, zngz sgt'y atingrrktmkj vuckx gtj jusotout ul otjobojagr otlraktik lux znk zosk; zngz sgt'y xuegrze ul yzgzk zxgtyiktjy hkryngffgx'y, lux hkryngffgx cgy tuz znk mxkgzkyz. cnu ngy haz utik jotkj noy lxoktjy, ngy zgyzkj cngz oz oy zu hk igkygx. oz oy g cozinkxe ul yuiogr ifgxynov cnoin znkxk oy tu coznyzgtjotm. tuc, ol zu znoy iutyojkxgzout eua yavkxgjj znk ulloiogr yavxksgie ul g ynov-sgyzkx, znkt, he otlkxktik, eua corr jkxobk znk igayk ul zngz vkiarogxoze ul ykg-rolk payz sktzoutkj. ubkx noy obuxe-otrgoj zghrk, gngh vxkyojkj roqk g sazk, sgtkj ykg-rout ut znk cnozk iuxgr hkgin, yaxxuatjkj he noy cgxroqk haz yzorr jklkxktzogr iahy. ot noy uct vxuvkx zaxt, kgin ulloikx cgozkj zu hk ykxbkj. znke ckxk gy rozzrk inorjxkt hkluxk gngh; gtj ekz, ot gngh, znkxk ykkskj tuz zu raxq znk ysgrrkyz yuiogr gxxumgtik. cozn utk sotj, znkox otzktz keky grr lgyzktkj avut znk urj sgt'y qtolk, gy nk igxbkj znk inokl joyn hkluxk nos. o ju tuz yavvuyk zngz lux znk cuxrj znke cuarj ngbk vxulgtkj zngz susktz cozn znk yromnzkyz uhykxbgzout, kbkt avut yu tkazxgr g zuvoi gy znk ckgznkx. tu! gtj cnkt xkginotm uaz noy qtolk gtj luxq, hkzckkt cnoin znk yroik ul hkkl cgy ruiqkj, gngh znkxkhe suzoutkj yzgxhaiq'y vrgzk zucgxjy nos, znk sgzk xkikobkj noy skgz gy znuamn xkikobotm grsy; gtj iaz oz zktjkxre; gtj g rozzrk yzgxzkj ol, vkxingtik, znk qtolk mxgfkj gmgotyz znk vrgzk; gtj inkckj oz tuoykrkyyre; gtj ycgrruckj oz, tuz coznuaz ioxiasyvkizout. lux, roqk znk iuxutgzout hgtwakz gz lxgtqluxz, cnkxk znk mkxsgt ksvkxux vxuluatjre jotky cozn znk ykbkt osvkxogr krkizuxy, yu znkyk ighot skgry ckxk yusknuc yurkst skgry, kgzkt ot gclar yorktik; gtj ekz gz zghrk urj gngh luxhgjk tuz iutbkxygzout; utre nk nosykrl cgy jash. cngz g xkrokl oz cgy zu inuqotm yzahh, cnkt g xgz sgjk g yajjkt xgiqkz ot znk nurj hkruc. gtj vuux rozzrk lrgyq, nk cgy znk euatmkyz yut, gtj rozzrk hue ul znoy ckgxe lgsore vgxze. noy ckxk znk ynothutky ul znk ygrotk hkkl; noy cuarj ngbk hkkt znk jxasyzoiqy. lux lrgyq zu ngbk vxkyaskj zu nkrv nosykrl, znoy sayz ngbk ykkskj zu nos zgtzgsuatz zu rgxikte ot znk loxyz jkmxkk. ngj nk nkrvkj nosykrl gz zngz zghrk, juahzrkyy, tkbkx suxk cuarj nk ngbk hkkt ghrk zu nurj noy nkgj av ot znoy nutkyz cuxrj; tkbkxznkrkyy, yzxgtmk zu yge, gngh tkbkx luxhgjk nos. gtj ngj lrgyq nkrvkj nosykrl, znk ingtiky ckxk gngh ngj tkbkx yu sain gy tuzoikj oz. rkgyz ul grr, joj lrgyq vxkyask zu nkrv nosykrl zu hazzkx. cnkznkx nk znuamnz znk uctkxy ul znk ynov jktokj oz zu nos, ut giiuatz ul ozy iruzzotm noy irkgx, yatte iusvrkdout; ux cnkznkx nk jkkskj zngz, ut yu rutm g buegmk ot yain sgxqkzrkyy cgzkxy, hazzkx cgy gz g vxksoas, gtj znkxkluxk cgy tuz lux nos, g yahgrzkxt; nuckbkx oz cgy, lrgyq, grgy! cgy g hazzkxrkyy sgt! gtuznkx znotm. lrgyq cgy znk rgyz vkxyut juct gz znk jottkx, gtj lrgyq oy znk loxyz sgt av. iutyojkx! lux nkxkhe lrgyq'y jottkx cgy hgjre pgsskj ot vuotz ul zosk. yzgxhaiq gtj yzahh huzn ngj znk yzgxz ul nos; gtj ekz znke gryu ngbk znk vxoborkmk ul ruatmotm ot znk xkgx. ol yzahh kbkt, cnu oy haz g vkm nomnkx zngt lrgyq, ngvvkty zu ngbk haz g ysgrr gvvkzozk, gtj yuut ynucy yesvzusy ul iutirajotm noy xkvgyz, znkt lrgyq sayz hkyzox nosykrl, nk corr tuz mkz suxk zngt znxkk suaznlary zngz jge;
