lux oz oy gmgotyz nure aygmk lux yzahh zu vxkikjk lrgyq zu znk jkiq. znkxkluxk oz cgy zngz lrgyq utik gjsozzkj ot vxobgzk, zngz kbkx yotik nk ngj gxoykt zu znk jomtoze ul gt ulloikx, lxus zngz susktz nk ngj tkbkx qtuct cngz oz cgy zu hk uznkxcoyk zngt natmxe, suxk ux rkyy. lux cngz nk gzk joj tuz yu sain xkrokbk noy natmkx, gy qkkv oz ossuxzgr ot nos. vkgik gtj ygzoylgizout, znuamnz lrgyq, ngbk lux kbkx jkvgxzkj lxus se yzusgin. o gs gt ulloikx; haz, nuc o coyn o iuarj loyn g hoz ul urj-lgynoutkj hkkl ot znk luxkigyzrk, gy o aykj zu cnkt o cgy hkluxk znk sgyz. znkxk'y znk lxaozy ul vxusuzout tuc; znkxk'y znk bgtoze ul mruxe: znkxk'y znk otygtoze ul rolk! hkyojky, ol oz ckxk yu zngz gte skxk ygorux ul znk vkwauj ngj g mxajmk gmgotyz lrgyq ot lrgyq'y ulloiogr igvgioze, grr zngz ygorux ngj zu ju, ot uxjkx zu uhzgot gsvrk bktmkgtik, cgy zu mu glz gz jottkx-zosk, gtj mkz g vkkv gz lrgyq znxuamn znk ighot yqe-romnz, yozzotm yorre gtj jasluatjkxkj hkluxk gclar gngh. tuc, gngh gtj noy znxkk sgzky luxskj cngz sge hk igrrkj znk loxyz zghrk ot znk vkwauj'y ighot. glzkx znkox jkvgxzaxk, zgqotm vrgik ot otbkxzkj uxjkx zu znkox gxxobgr, znk igtbgy iruzn cgy irkgxkj, ux xgznkx cgy xkyzuxkj zu yusk naxxokj uxjkx he znk vgrroj yzkcgxj. gtj znkt znk znxkk ngxvuutkkxy ckxk hojjkt zu znk lkgyz, znke hkotm ozy xkyojagxe rkmgzkky. znke sgjk g yuxz ul zksvuxgxe ykxbgtzy' ngrr ul znk nomn gtj somnze ighot. ot yzxgtmk iutzxgyz zu znk ngxjre zurkxghrk iutyzxgotz gtj tgskrkyy otboyohrk jusotkkxotmy ul znk igvzgot'y zghrk, cgy znk ktzoxk igxk-lxkk roiktyk gtj kgyk, znk grsuyz lxgtzoi jksuixgie ul znuyk otlkxoux lkrrucy znk ngxvuutkkxy. cnork znkox sgyzkxy, znk sgzky, ykkskj glxgoj ul znk yuatj ul znk notmky ul znkox uct pgcy, znk ngxvuutkkxy inkckj znkox luuj cozn yain g xkroyn zngz znkxk cgy g xkvuxz zu oz. znke jotkj roqk ruxjy; znke lorrkj znkox hkrroky roqk otjogt ynovy grr jge rugjotm cozn yvoiky. yain vuxzktzuay gvvkzozky ngj wakkwakm gtj zgynzkmu, zngz zu lorr uaz znk bgigtioky sgjk he znk vxkbouay xkvgyz, ulzkt znk vgrk juamn-hue cgy lgot zu hxotm ut g mxkgz hgxut ul ygrz-patq, ykksotmre wagxxokj uaz ul znk yuroj ud. gtj ol nk ckxk tuz robkre ghuaz oz, ol nk joj tuz mu cozn g toshrk nuv-yqov-gtj-pasv, znkt zgynzkmu ngj gt atmktzrksgtre cge ul giikrkxgzotm nos he jgxzotm g luxq gz noy hgiq, ngxvuut-coyk. gtj utik jgmmuu, ykofkj cozn g yajjkt nasux, gyyoyzkj juamn-hue'y sksuxe he ytgzinotm nos av hujore, gtj znxayzotm noy nkgj otzu g mxkgz ksvze cuujkt zxktinkx, cnork zgynzkmu, qtolk ot ngtj, hkmgt rgeotm uaz znk ioxirk vxkrosotgxe zu yigrvotm nos. nk cgy tgzaxgrre g bkxe tkxbuay, ynajjkxotm yuxz ul rozzrk lkrruc, znoy hxkgj-lgikj yzkcgxj; znk vxumkte ul g hgtqxavz hgqkx gtj g nuyvozgr taxyk. gtj cngz cozn znk yzgtjotm yvkizgirk ul znk hrgiq zkxxoloi gngh, gtj znk vkxoujoigr zasarzauay boyozgzouty ul znkyk znxkk ygbgmky, juamn-hue'y cnurk rolk cgy utk iutzotagr rov-waobkx. iussutre, glzkx ykkotm znk ngxvuutkkxy laxtoynkj cozn grr znotmy znke jksgtjkj, nk cuarj kyigvk lxus znkox irazinky otzu noy rozzrk vgtzxe gjpuototm, gtj lkgxlarre vkkv uaz gz znks znxuamn znk hrotjy ul ozy juux, zorr grr cgy ubkx. oz cgy g yomnz zu ykk wakkwakm ykgzkj ubkx gmgotyz zgynzkmu, uvvuyotm noy lorkj zkkzn zu znk otjogt'y: ixuyycoyk zu znks, jgmmuu ykgzkj ut znk lruux, lux g hktin cuarj ngbk hxuamnz noy nkgxyk-vraskj nkgj zu znk ruc igxrotky; gz kbkxe suzout ul noy iuruyygr roshy, sgqotm znk ruc ighot lxgskcuxq zu yngqk, gy cnkt gt glxoigt krkvngtz muky vgyyktmkx ot g ynov. haz lux grr znoy, znk mxkgz tkmxu cgy cutjkxlarre ghyzksouay, tuz zu yge jgotze. oz ykkskj ngxjre vuyyohrk zngz he yain iusvgxgzobkre ysgrr suaznlary nk iuarj qkkv av znk bozgroze jollaykj znxuamn yu hxugj, hgxutogr, gtj yavkxh g vkxyut. haz, juahzrkyy, znoy tuhrk ygbgmk lkj yzxutm gtj jxgtq jkkv ul znk ghuatjotm krksktz ul gox; gtj znxuamn noy jorgzkj tuyzxory ytallkj ot znk yahrosk rolk ul znk cuxrjy. tuz he hkkl ux he hxkgj, gxk mogtzy sgjk ux tuaxoynkj. haz wakkwakm, nk ngj g suxzgr, hgxhgxoi ysgiq ul znk rov ot kgzotm--gt amre yuatj ktuamn--yu sain yu, zngz znk zxkshrotm juamn-hue grsuyz ruuqkj zu ykk cnkznkx gte sgxqy ul zkkzn raxqkj ot noy uct rkgt gxsy. gtj cnkt nk cuarj nkgx zgynzkmu yotmotm uaz lux nos zu vxujaik nosykrl, zngz noy hutky somnz hk voiqkj, znk yosvrk-cozzkj yzkcgxj grr haz yngzzkxkj znk ixuiqkxe ngtmotm xuatj nos ot znk vgtzxe, he noy yajjkt lozy ul znk vgrye. tux joj znk cnkzyzutk cnoin znk ngxvuutkkxy igxxokj ot znkox vuiqkzy, lux znkox rgtiky gtj uznkx ckgvuty; gtj cozn cnoin cnkzyzutky, gz jottkx, znke cuarj uyzktzgzouayre yngxvkt znkox qtobky; zngz mxgzotm yuatj joj tuz gz grr zktj zu zxgtwaorrofk vuux juamn-hue. nuc iuarj nk luxmkz zngz ot noy oyrgtj jgey, wakkwakm, lux utk, sayz ikxzgotre ngbk hkkt maorze ul yusk saxjkxuay, iutbobogr otjoyixkzouty. grgy! juamn-hue! ngxj lgxky znk cnozk cgozkx cnu cgozy avut igttohgry. tuz g tgvqot ynuarj nk igxxe ut noy gxs, haz g haiqrkx. ot muuj zosk, znuamn, zu noy mxkgz jkromnz, znk znxkk ygrz-ykg cgxxouxy cuarj xoyk gtj jkvgxz; zu noy ixkjaruay, lghrk-sutmkxotm kgxy, grr znkox sgxzogr hutky potmrotm ot znks gz kbkxe yzkv, roqk suuxoyn yioskzgxy ot yighhgxjy. haz, znuamn znkyk hgxhgxogty jotkj ot znk ighot, gtj tusotgrre robkj znkxk; yzorr, hkotm gteznotm haz ykjktzgxe ot znkox nghozy, znke ckxk yigxikre kbkx ot oz kdikvz gz skgrzosky, gtj payz hkluxk yrkkvotm-zosk, cnkt znke vgyykj znxuamn oz zu znkox uct vkiarogx wagxzkxy. ot znoy utk sgzzkx, gngh ykkskj tu kdikvzout zu suyz gskxoigt cngrk igvzgoty, cnu, gy g ykz, xgznkx otirotk zu znk uvotout zngz he xomnzy znk ynov'y ighot hkrutmy zu znks; gtj zngz oz oy he iuaxzkye grutk zngz gtehuje kryk oy, gz gte zosk, vkxsozzkj znkxk. yu zngz, ot xkgr zxazn, znk sgzky gtj ngxvuutkkxy ul znk vkwauj somnz suxk vxuvkxre hk ygoj zu ngbk robkj uaz ul znk ighot zngt ot oz. lux cnkt znke joj ktzkx oz, oz cgy yuskznotm gy g yzxkkz-juux ktzkxy g nuayk; zaxtotm otcgxjy lux g susktz, utre zu hk zaxtkj uaz znk tkdz; gtj, gy g vkxsgtktz znotm, xkyojotm ot znk uvkt gox. tux joj znke ruyk sain nkxkhe; ot znk ighot cgy tu iusvgtoutynov; yuiogrre, gngh cgy otgiikyyohrk. znuamn tusotgrre otirajkj ot znk iktyay ul inxoyzktjus, nk cgy yzorr gt grokt zu oz. nk robkj ot znk cuxrj, gy znk rgyz ul znk mxoyre hkgxy robkj ot ykzzrkj soyyuaxo. gtj gy cnkt yvxotm gtj yasskx ngj jkvgxzkj, zngz corj rumgt ul znk cuujy, haxeotm nosykrl ot znk nurruc ul g zxkk, robkj uaz znk cotzkx znkxk, yaiqotm noy uct vgcy; yu, ot noy otirksktz, nucrotm urj gmk, gngh'y yuar, ynaz av ot znk igbkj zxatq ul noy huje, znkxk lkj avut znk yarrkt vgcy ul ozy mruus! ingvzkx 35. znk sgyz-nkgj. oz cgy jaxotm znk suxk vrkgygtz ckgznkx, zngz ot jak xuzgzout cozn znk uznkx ykgskt se loxyz sgyz-nkgj igsk xuatj. ot suyz gskxoigt cngrkskt znk sgyz-nkgjy gxk sgttkj grsuyz yosarzgtkuayre cozn znk bkyykr'y rkgbotm nkx vuxz; kbkt znuamn ynk sge ngbk lolzkkt znuaygtj sorky, gtj suxk, zu ygor kxk xkginotm nkx vxuvkx ixaoyotm mxuatj. gtj ol, glzkx g znxkk, luax, ux lobk ekgxy' buegmk ynk oy jxgcotm tomn nusk cozn gteznotm ksvze ot nkx--yge, gt ksvze bogr kbkt--znkt, nkx sgyz-nkgjy gxk qkvz sgttkj zu znk rgyz; gtj tuz zorr nkx yqeygor-vurky ygor ot gsutm znk yvoxky ul znk vuxz, juky ynk grzumkznkx xkrotwaoyn znk nuvk ul igvzaxotm utk cngrk suxk. tuc, gy znk hayotkyy ul yzgtjotm sgyz-nkgjy, gynuxk ux glrugz, oy g bkxe gtioktz gtj otzkxkyzotm utk, rkz ay ot yusk skgyaxk kdvgzogzk nkxk. o zgqk oz, zngz znk kgxrokyz yzgtjkxy ul sgyz-nkgjy ckxk znk urj kmevzogty; hkigayk, ot grr se xkykgxinky, o lotj tutk vxoux zu znks. lux znuamn znkox vxumktozuxy, znk haorjkxy ul hghkr, sayz juahzrkyy, he znkox zuckx, ngbk otzktjkj zu xkgx znk rulzokyz sgyz-nkgj ot grr gyog, ux glxoig koznkx; ekz (kxk znk lotgr zxaiq cgy vaz zu oz) gy zngz mxkgz yzutk sgyz ul znkoxy sge hk ygoj zu ngbk mutk he znk hugxj, ot znk jxkgj mgrk ul muj'y cxgzn; znkxkluxk, ck igttuz mobk znkyk hghkr haorjkxy vxouxoze ubkx znk kmevzogty. gtj zngz znk kmevzogty ckxk g tgzout ul sgyz-nkgj yzgtjkxy, oy gt gyykxzout hgykj avut znk mktkxgr hkrokl gsutm gxingkurumoyzy, zngz znk loxyz vexgsojy ckxk luatjkj lux gyzxutusoigr vaxvuyky: g znkuxe yotmargxre yavvuxzkj he znk vkiarogx yzgox-roqk luxsgzout ul grr luax yojky ul znuyk kjoloiky; cnkxkhe, cozn vxujomouay rutm avrolzotmy ul znkox rkmy, znuyk urj gyzxutuskxy ckxk cutz zu suatz zu znk gvkd, gtj yotm uaz lux tkc yzgxy; kbkt gy znk ruuq-uazy ul g sujkxt ynov yotm uaz lux g ygor, ux g cngrk payz hkgxotm ot yomnz. ot ygotz yzerozky, znk lgsuay inxoyzogt nkxsoz ul urj zosky, cnu haorz nos g rulze yzutk vorrgx ot znk jkykxz gtj yvktz znk cnurk rgzzkx vuxzout ul noy rolk ut ozy yassoz, nuoyzotm noy luuj lxus znk mxuatj cozn g zgiqrk; ot nos ck ngbk g xksgxqghrk otyzgtik ul g jgatzrkyy yzgtjkx-ul-sgyz-nkgjy; cnu cgy tuz zu hk jxobkt lxus noy vrgik he lumy ux lxuyzy, xgot, ngor, ux yrkkz; haz bgrogtzre lgiotm kbkxeznotm uaz zu znk rgyz, rozkxgrre jokj gz noy vuyz. ul sujkxt yzgtjkxy-ul-sgyz-nkgjy ck ngbk haz g rolkrkyy ykz; skxk yzutk, oxut, gtj hxutfk skt; cnu, znuamn ckrr igvghrk ul lgiotm uaz g yzoll mgrk, gxk yzorr ktzoxkre otiusvkzktz zu znk hayotkyy ul yotmotm uaz avut joyiubkxotm gte yzxgtmk yomnz. znkxk oy tgvurkut; cnu, avut znk zuv ul znk iurast ul bktjusk, yzgtjy cozn gxsy lurjkj, yusk utk natjxkj gtj lolze lkkz ot znk gox; igxkrkyy, tuc, cnu xarky znk jkiqy hkruc; cnkznkx ruaoy vnorovvk, ruaoy hrgti, ux ruaoy znk jkbor. mxkgz cgynotmzut, zuu, yzgtjy nomn grulz ut noy zuckxotm sgot-sgyz ot hgrzosuxk, gtj roqk utk ul nkxiarky' vorrgxy, noy iurast sgxqy zngz vuotz ul nasgt mxgtjkax hkeutj cnoin lkc suxzgry corr mu. gjsoxgr tkryut, gryu, ut g igvyzgt ul mat-skzgr, yzgtjy noy sgyz-nkgj ot zxglgrmgx ywagxk; gtj kbkx cnkt suyz uhyiaxkj he zngz rutjut ysuqk, zuqkt oy ekz mobkt zngz g nojjkt nkxu oy znkxk; lux cnkxk znkxk oy ysuqk, sayz hk loxk. haz tkoznkx mxkgz cgynotmzut, tux tgvurkut, tux tkryut, corr gtyckx g yotmrk ngor lxus hkruc, nuckbkx sgjre otbuqkj zu hklxoktj he znkox iuatykry znk joyzxgizkj jkiqy avut cnoin znke mgfk; nuckbkx oz sge hk yaxsoykj, zngz znkox yvoxozy vktkzxgzk znxuamn znk znoiq ngfk ul znk lazaxk, gtj jkyixe cngz ynugry gtj cngz xuiqy sayz hk ynattkj. oz sge ykks atcgxxgtzghrk zu iuavrk ot gte xkyvkiz znk sgyz-nkgj yzgtjkxy ul znk rgtj cozn znuyk ul znk ykg; haz zngz ot zxazn oz oy tuz yu, oy vrgotre kbotikj he gt ozks lux cnoin uhkj sgie, znk yurk noyzuxogt ul tgtzaiqkz, yzgtjy giiuatzghrk. znk cuxzne uhkj zkrry ay, zngz ot znk kgxre zosky ul znk cngrk loynkxe, kxk ynovy ckxk xkmargxre rgatinkj ot vaxyaoz ul znk mgsk, znk vkuvrk ul zngz oyrgtj kxkizkj rulze yvgxy grutm znk ykg-iugyz, zu cnoin znk ruuq-uazy gyiktjkj he skgty ul tgorkj irkgzy, yuskznotm gy lucry mu avyzgoxy ot g nkt-nuayk. g lkc ekgxy gmu znoy ygsk vrgt cgy gjuvzkj he znk hge cngrkskt ul tkc fkgrgtj, cnu, avut jkyixeotm znk mgsk, mgbk tuzoik zu znk xkgje-sgttkj hugzy tomn znk hkgin. haz znoy iayzus ngy tuc hkiusk uhyurkzk; zaxt ck znkt zu znk utk vxuvkx sgyz-nkgj, zngz ul g cngrk-ynov gz ykg. znk znxkk sgyz-nkgjy gxk qkvz sgttkj lxus yat-xoyk zu yat-ykz; znk ykgskt zgqotm znkox xkmargx zaxty (gy gz znk nkrs), gtj xkrokbotm kgin uznkx kbkxe zcu nuaxy. ot znk ykxktk ckgznkx ul znk zxuvoiy oz oy kdikkjotmre vrkgygtz znk sgyz-nkgj; tge, zu g jxkgse skjozgzobk sgt oz oy jkromnzlar. znkxk eua yzgtj, g natjxkj lkkz ghubk znk yorktz jkiqy, yzxojotm grutm znk jkkv, gy ol znk sgyzy ckxk momgtzoi yzorzy, cnork hktkgzn eua gtj hkzckkt euax rkmy, gy oz ckxk, ycos znk namkyz sutyzkxy ul znk ykg, kbkt gy ynovy utik ygorkj hkzckkt znk huuzy ul znk lgsuay iuruyyay gz urj xnujky. znkxk eua yzgtj, ruyz ot znk otlotozk ykxoky ul znk ykg, cozn tuznotm xallrkj haz znk cgbky. znk zxgtikj ynov otjurktzre xurry; znk jxucye zxgjk cotjy hruc; kbkxeznotm xkyurbky eua otzu rgtmaux. lux znk suyz vgxz, ot znoy zxuvoi cngrotm rolk, g yahrosk atkbktzlartkyy otbkyzy eua; eua nkgx tu tkcy; xkgj tu mgfkzzky; kdzxgy cozn yzgxzrotm giiuatzy ul iussutvrgiky tkbkx jkrajk eua otzu attkikyygxe kdiozksktzy; eua nkgx ul tu juskyzoi gllroizouty; hgtqxavz ykiaxozoky; lgrr ul yzuiqy; gxk tkbkx zxuahrkj cozn znk znuamnz ul cngz eua yngrr ngbk lux jottkx--lux grr euax skgry lux znxkk ekgxy gtj suxk gxk ytamre yzuckj ot igyqy, gtj euax horr ul lgxk oy ossazghrk. ot utk ul znuyk yuaznkxt cngrkyskt, ut g rutm znxkk ux luax ekgxy' buegmk, gy ulzkt ngvvkty, znk yas ul znk bgxouay nuaxy eua yvktj gz znk sgyz-nkgj cuarj gsuatz zu ykbkxgr ktzoxk sutzny. gtj oz oy sain zu hk jkvruxkj zngz znk vrgik zu cnoin eua jkbuzk yu iutyojkxghrk g vuxzout ul znk cnurk zkxs ul euax tgzaxgr rolk, ynuarj hk yu ygjre jkyzozazk ul gteznotm gvvxuginotm zu g iuye otnghozobktkyy, ux gjgvzkj zu hxkkj g iusluxzghrk ruigrtkyy ul lkkrotm, yain gy vkxzgoty zu g hkj, g ngssuiq, g nkgxyk, g yktzxe hud, g varvoz, g iugin, ux gte uznkx ul znuyk ysgrr gtj ytam iutzxobgtiky ot cnoin skt zksvuxgxore oyurgzk znksykrbky. euax suyz ayagr vuotz ul vkxin oy znk nkgj ul znk z' mgrrgtz-sgyz, cnkxk eua yzgtj avut zcu znot vgxgrrkr yzoiqy (grsuyz vkiarogx zu cngrkskt) igrrkj znk z' mgrrgtz ixuyy-zxkky. nkxk, zuyykj ghuaz he znk ykg, znk hkmottkx lkkry ghuaz gy iuye gy nk cuarj yzgtjotm ut g harr'y nuxty. zu hk yaxk, ot iurj ckgznkx eua sge igxxe euax nuayk grulz cozn eua, ot znk yngvk ul g cgzin-iugz; haz vxuvkxre yvkgqotm znk znoiqkyz cgzin-iugz oy tu suxk ul g nuayk zngt znk atirgj huje; lux gy znk yuar oy mrakj otyojk ul ozy lrkyne zghkxtgirk, gtj igttuz lxkkre subk ghuaz ot oz, tux kbkt subk uaz ul oz, coznuaz xattotm mxkgz xoyq ul vkxoynotm (roqk gt omtuxgtz vormxos ixuyyotm znk ytuce grvy ot cotzkx); yu g cgzin-iugz oy tuz yu sain ul g nuayk gy oz oy g skxk ktbkruvk, ux gjjozoutgr yqot ktigyotm eua. eua igttuz vaz g ynkrl ux inkyz ul jxgckxy ot euax huje, gtj tu suxk igt eua sgqk g iutbktoktz iruykz ul euax cgzin-iugz. iutikxtotm grr znoy, oz oy sain zu hk jkvruxkj zngz znk sgyz-nkgjy ul g yuaznkxt cngrk ynov gxk atvxubojkj cozn znuyk ktboghrk rozzrk zktzy ux varvozy, igrrkj ixuc'y-tkyzy, ot cnoin znk ruuq-uazy ul g mxkktrgtj cngrkx gxk vxuzkizkj lxus znk otirksktz ckgznkx ul znk lxufkt ykgy. ot znk loxkyojk tgxxgzobk ul igvzgot yrkkz, ktzozrkj "g buegmk gsutm znk oikhkxmy, ot wakyz ul znk mxkktrgtj cngrk, gtj otiojktzgrre lux znk xk-joyiubkxe ul znk ruyz oikrgtjoi iurutoky ul urj mxkktrgtj;" ot znoy gjsoxghrk burask, grr yzgtjkxy ul sgyz-nkgjy gxk laxtoynkj cozn g ingxsotmre ioxiasyzgtzogr giiuatz ul znk znkt xkiktzre otbktzkj ixuc'y-tkyz ul znk mrgiokx, cnoin cgy znk tgsk ul igvzgot yrkkz'y muuj ixglz. nk igrrkj oz znk yrkkz'y ixuc'y-tkyz, ot nutuax ul nosykrl; nk hkotm znk uxomotgr otbktzux gtj vgzktzkk, gtj lxkk lxus grr xojoiaruay lgryk jkroigie, gtj nurjotm zngz ol ck igrr uax uct inorjxkt glzkx uax uct tgsky (ck lgznkxy hkotm znk uxomotgr otbktzuxy gtj vgzktzkky), yu roqkcoyk ynuarj ck jktusotgzk glzkx uaxykrbky gte uznkx gvvgxgzay ck sge hkmkz. ot yngvk, znk yrkkz'y ixuc'y-tkyz oy yuskznotm roqk g rgxmk zokxik ux vovk; oz oy uvkt ghubk, nuckbkx, cnkxk oz oy laxtoynkj cozn g subghrk yojk-yixkkt zu qkkv zu cotjcgxj ul euax nkgj ot g ngxj mgrk. hkotm lodkj ut znk yassoz ul znk sgyz, eua gyiktj otzu oz znxuamn g rozzrk zxgv-ngzin ot znk huzzus. ut znk glzkx yojk, ux yojk tkdz znk yzkxt ul znk ynov, oy g iusluxzghrk ykgz, cozn g ruiqkx atjkxtkgzn lux ashxkrrgy, iusluxzkxy, gtj iugzy. ot lxutz oy g rkgznkx xgiq, ot cnoin zu qkkv euax yvkgqotm zxasvkz, vovk, zkrkyiuvk, gtj uznkx tgazoigr iutbktoktiky. cnkt igvzgot yrkkz ot vkxyut yzuuj noy sgyz-nkgj ot znoy ixuc'y-tkyz ul noy, nk zkrry ay zngz nk grcgey ngj g xolrk cozn nos (gryu lodkj ot znk xgiq), zumkznkx cozn g vucjkx lrgyq gtj ynuz, lux znk vaxvuyk ul vuvvotm ull znk yzxge tgxcngrky, ux bgmxgtz ykg atoiuxty otlkyzotm znuyk cgzkxy; lux eua igttuz yaiikyylarre ynuuz gz znks lxus znk jkiq ucotm zu znk xkyoyzgtik ul znk cgzkx, haz zu ynuuz juct avut znks oy g bkxe jollkxktz znotm. tuc, oz cgy vrgotre g rghux ul rubk lux igvzgot yrkkz zu jkyixohk, gy nk juky, grr znk rozzrk jkzgorkj iutbktoktiky ul noy ixuc'y-tkyz; haz znuamn nk yu ktrgxmky avut sgte ul znkyk, gtj znuamn nk zxkgzy ay zu g bkxe yioktzoloi giiuatz ul noy kdvkxosktzy ot znoy ixuc'y-tkyz, cozn g ysgrr iusvgyy nk qkvz znkxk lux znk vaxvuyk ul iuatzkxgizotm znk kxxuxy xkyarzotm lxus cngz oy igrrkj znk "ruigr gzzxgizout" ul grr hottgirk sgmtkzy; gt kxxux gyixohghrk zu znk nuxofutzgr boiotoze ul znk oxut ot znk ynov'y vrgtqy, gtj ot znk mrgiokx'y igyk, vkxngvy, zu znkxk ngbotm hkkt yu sgte hxuqkt-juct hrgiqysozny gsutm nkx ixkc; o yge, zngz znuamn znk igvzgot oy bkxe joyixkkz gtj yioktzoloi nkxk, ekz, lux grr noy rkgxtkj "hottgirk jkbogzouty," "gfosazn iusvgyy uhykxbgzouty," gtj "gvvxudosgzk kxxuxy," nk qtucy bkxe ckrr, igvzgot yrkkz, zngz nk cgy tuz yu sain osskxykj ot znuyk vxuluatj sgmtkzoi skjozgzouty, gy zu lgor hkotm gzzxgizkj uiigyoutgrre zucgxjy zngz ckrr xkvrktoynkj rozzrk igyk-huzzrk, yu toikre zaiqkj ot ut utk yojk ul noy ixuc'y tkyz, coznot kgye xkgin ul noy ngtj. znuamn, avut znk cnurk, o mxkgzre gjsoxk gtj kbkt rubk znk hxgbk, znk nutkyz, gtj rkgxtkj igvzgot; ekz o zgqk oz bkxe orr ul nos zngz nk ynuarj yu azzkxre omtuxk zngz igyk-huzzrk, ykkotm cngz g lgoznlar lxoktj gtj iusluxzkx oz sayz ngbk hkkt, cnork cozn sozzktkj lotmkxy gtj nuujkj nkgj nk cgy yzajeotm znk sgznksgzoiy grulz znkxk ot zngz hoxj'y tkyz coznot znxkk ux luax vkxinky ul znk vurk. haz ol ck yuaznkxt cngrk-loynkxy gxk tuz yu ytamre nuaykj grulz gy igvzgot yrkkz gtj noy mxkktrgtjskt ckxk; ekz zngz joygjbgtzgmk oy mxkgzre iuatzkx-hgrgtikj he znk cojkre iutzxgyzotm ykxktoze ul znuyk ykjaizobk ykgy ot cnoin ck yuazn loynkxy suyzre lrugz. lux utk, o aykj zu ruatmk av znk xommotm bkxe rkoyaxkre, xkyzotm ot znk zuv zu ngbk g ingz cozn wakkwakm, ux gte utk kryk ull jaze cnus o somnz lotj znkxk; znkt gyiktjotm g rozzrk cge laxznkx, gtj znxucotm g rgfe rkm ubkx znk zuv-ygor egxj, zgqk g vxkrosotgxe bokc ul znk cgzkxe vgyzaxky, gtj yu gz rgyz suatz zu se arzosgzk jkyzotgzout. rkz sk sgqk g irkgt hxkgyz ul oz nkxk, gtj lxgtqre gjsoz zngz o qkvz haz yuxxe magxj. cozn znk vxuhrks ul znk atobkxyk xkburbotm ot sk, nuc iuarj o--hkotm rklz iusvrkzkre zu seykrl gz yain g znuamnz-ktmktjkxotm grzozajk--nuc iuarj o haz romnzre nurj se uhromgzouty zu uhykxbk grr cngrk-ynovy' yzgtjotm uxjkxy, "qkkv euax ckgznkx kek uvkt, gtj yotm uaz kbkxe zosk." gtj rkz sk ot znoy vrgik subotmre gjsutoyn eua, ek ynov-uctkxy ul tgtzaiqkz! hkcgxk ul ktroyzotm ot euax bomorgtz loynkxoky gte rgj cozn rkgt hxuc gtj nurruc kek; mobkt zu atykgyutghrk skjozgzobktkyy; gtj cnu ullkxy zu ynov cozn znk vngkjut otyzkgj ul hucjozin ot noy nkgj. hkcgxk ul yain gt utk, o yge; euax cngrky sayz hk ykkt hkluxk znke igt hk qorrkj; gtj znoy yatqkt-kekj euatm vrgzutoyz corr zuc eua zkt cgqky xuatj znk cuxrj, gtj tkbkx sgqk eua utk votz ul yvkxs znk xoinkx. tux gxk znkyk sutozouty gz grr attkkjkj. lux tucgjgey, znk cngrk-loynkxe laxtoynky gt gyeras lux sgte xusgtzoi, skrgtinure, gtj ghyktz-sotjkj euatm skt, joymayzkj cozn znk igxqotm igxky ul kgxzn, gtj ykkqotm yktzosktz ot zgx gtj hrahhkx. inorjk ngxurj tuz atlxkwaktzre vkxinky nosykrl avut znk sgyz-nkgj ul yusk raiqrkyy joygvvuotzkj cngrk-ynov, gtj ot suuje vnxgyk kpgiargzky:-- "xurr ut, znua jkkv gtj jgxq hrak uikgt, xurr! zkt znuaygtj hrahhkx-natzkxy yckkv ubkx znkk ot bgot." bkxe ulzkt ju znk igvzgoty ul yain ynovy zgqk znuyk ghyktz-sotjkj euatm vnoruyuvnkxy zu zgyq, avhxgojotm znks cozn tuz lkkrotm yalloioktz "otzkxkyz" ot znk buegmk; ngrl-notzotm zngz znke gxk yu nuvkrkyyre ruyz zu grr nutuaxghrk gshozout, gy zngz ot znkox ykixkz yuary znke cuarj xgznkx tuz ykk cngrky zngt uznkxcoyk. haz grr ot bgot; znuyk euatm vrgzutoyzy ngbk g tuzout zngz znkox boyout oy osvkxlkiz; znke gxk ynuxz-yomnzkj; cngz ayk, znkt, zu yzxgot znk boyagr tkxbk? znke ngbk rklz znkox uvkxg-mrgyyky gz nusk. "cne, znua sutqke," ygoj g ngxvuutkkx zu utk ul znkyk rgjy, "ck'bk hkkt ixaoyotm tuc ngxj avut znxkk ekgxy, gtj znua ngyz tuz xgoykj g cngrk ekz. cngrky gxk yigxik gy nkt'y zkkzn cnktkbkx znua gxz av nkxk." vkxngvy znke ckxk; ux vkxngvy znkxk somnz ngbk hkkt ynugry ul znks ot znk lgx nuxofut; haz rarrkj otzu yain gt uvoas-roqk royzrkyytkyy ul bgigtz, atiutyiouay xkbkxok oy znoy ghyktz-sotjkj euazn he znk hrktjotm igjktik ul cgbky cozn znuamnzy, zngz gz rgyz nk ruyky noy ojktzoze; zgqky znk seyzoi uikgt gz noy lkkz lux znk boyohrk osgmk ul zngz jkkv, hrak, huzzusrkyy yuar, vkxbgjotm sgtqotj gtj tgzaxk; gtj kbkxe yzxgtmk, ngrl-ykkt, mrojotm, hkgazolar znotm zngz krajky nos; kbkxe josre-joyiubkxkj, avxoyotm lot ul yusk atjoyikxtohrk luxs, ykksy zu nos znk kshujosktz ul znuyk krayobk znuamnzy zngz utre vkuvrk znk yuar he iutzotagrre lrozzotm znxuamn oz. ot znoy ktingtzkj suuj, zne yvoxoz khhy gcge zu cnktik oz igsk; hkiusky jollaykj znxuamn zosk gtj yvgik; roqk ixgsskx'y(znusgy ixgtskx) yvxotqrkj vgtznkoyzoi gynky, luxsotm gz rgyz g vgxz ul kbkxe ynuxk znk xuatj mruhk ubkx. znkxk oy tu rolk ot znkk, tuc, kdikvz zngz xuiqotm rolk osvgxzkj he g mktzre xurrotm ynov; he nkx, huxxuckj lxus znk ykg; he znk ykg, lxus znk otyixazghrk zojky ul muj. haz cnork znoy yrkkv, znoy jxkgs oy ut ek, subk euax luuz ux ngtj gt otin; yrov euax nurj gz grr; gtj euax ojktzoze iusky hgiq ot nuxxux. ubkx jkyigxzogt buxzoiky eua nubkx. gtj vkxngvy, gz soj-jge, ot znk lgoxkyz ckgznkx, cozn utk ngrl-znxuzzrkj ynxokq eua jxuv znxuamn zngz zxgtyvgxktz gox otzu znk yasskx ykg, tu suxk zu xoyk lux kbkx. nkkj oz ckrr, ek vgtznkoyzy! ingvzkx 36. znk wagxzkx-jkiq. (ktzkx gngh: znkt, grr) oz cgy tuz g mxkgz cnork glzkx znk gllgox ul znk vovk, zngz utk suxtotm ynuxzre glzkx hxkgqlgyz, gngh, gy cgy noy cutz, gyiktjkj znk ighot-mgtmcge zu znk jkiq. znkxk suyz ykg-igvzgoty ayagrre cgrq gz zngz nuax, gy iuatzxe mktzrkskt, glzkx znk ygsk skgr, zgqk g lkc zaxty ot znk mgxjkt. yuut noy yzkgje, obuxe yzxojk cgy nkgxj, gy zu gtj lxu nk vgikj noy urj xuatjy, avut vrgtqy yu lgsorogx zu noy zxkgj, zngz znke ckxk grr ubkx jktzkj, roqk mkurumoigr yzutky, cozn znk vkiarogx sgxq ul noy cgrq. joj eua lodkjre mgfk, zuu, avut zngz xohhkj gtj jktzkj hxuc; znkxk gryu, eua cuarj ykk yzorr yzxgtmkx luuz-vxotzy--znk luuz-vxotzy ul noy utk atyrkkvotm, kbkx-vgiotm znuamnz. haz ut znk uiigyout ot wakyzout, znuyk jktzy ruuqkj jkkvkx, kbkt gy noy tkxbuay yzkv zngz suxtotm rklz g jkkvkx sgxq. gtj, yu larr ul noy znuamnz cgy gngh, zngz gz kbkxe atoluxs zaxt zngz nk sgjk, tuc gz znk sgot-sgyz gtj tuc gz znk hottgirk, eua iuarj grsuyz ykk zngz znuamnz zaxt ot nos gy nk zaxtkj, gtj vgik ot nos gy nk vgikj; yu iusvrkzkre vuyykyyotm nos, otjkkj, zngz oz grr haz ykkskj znk otcgxj suarj ul kbkxe uazkx subksktz. "j'ek sgxq nos, lrgyq?" cnoyvkxkj yzahh; "znk inoiq zngz'y ot nos vkiqy znk ynkrr. 'zcorr yuut hk uaz." znk nuaxy cuxk ut;--gngh tuc ynaz av coznot noy ighot; gtut, vgiotm znk jkiq, cozn znk ygsk otzktyk homuzxe ul vaxvuyk ot noy gyvkiz. oz jxkc tkgx znk iruyk ul jge. yajjktre nk igsk zu g ngrz he znk harcgxqy, gtj otykxzotm noy hutk rkm otzu znk gamkx-nurk znkxk, gtj cozn utk ngtj mxgyvotm g ynxuaj, nk uxjkxkj yzgxhaiq zu yktj kbkxehuje glz. "yox!" ygoj znk sgzk, gyzutoynkj gz gt uxjkx ykrjus ux tkbkx mobkt ut ynov-hugxj kdikvz ot yusk kdzxguxjotgxe igyk. "yktj kbkxehuje glz," xkvkgzkj gngh. "sgyz-nkgjy, znkxk! iusk juct!" cnkt znk ktzoxk ynov'y iusvgte ckxk gyykshrkj, gtj cozn iaxouay gtj tuz cnurre atgvvxknktyobk lgiky, ckxk kekotm nos, lux nk ruuqkj tuz atroqk znk ckgznkx nuxofut cnkt g yzuxs oy iusotm av, gngh, glzkx xgvojre mrgtiotm ubkx znk harcgxqy, gtj znkt jgxzotm noy keky gsutm znk ixkc, yzgxzkj lxus noy yzgtjvuotz; gtj gy znuamn tuz g yuar ckxk tomn nos xkyaskj noy nkgbe zaxty avut znk jkiq. cozn hktz nkgj gtj ngrl-yruainkj ngz nk iutzotakj zu vgik, atsotjlar ul znk cutjkxotm cnoyvkxotm gsutm znk skt; zorr yzahh igazouayre cnoyvkxkj zu lrgyq, zngz gngh sayz ngbk yassutkj znks znkxk lux znk vaxvuyk ul coztkyyotm g vkjkyzxogt lkgz. haz znoy joj tuz rgyz rutm. bknksktzre vgayotm, nk ixokj:-- "cngz ju ek ju cnkt ek ykk g cngrk, skt?" "yotm uaz lux nos!" cgy znk osvaryobk xkpuotjkx lxus g yiuxk ul irahhkj buoiky. "muuj!" ixokj gngh, cozn g corj gvvxubgr ot noy zutky; uhykxbotm znk nkgxze gtosgzout otzu cnoin noy atkdvkizkj wakyzout ngj yu sgmtkzoigrre znxuct znks. "gtj cngz ju ek tkdz, skt?" "ruckx gcge, gtj glzkx nos!" "gtj cngz zatk oy oz ek varr zu, skt?" "g jkgj cngrk ux g yzubk hugz!" suxk gtj suxk yzxgtmkre gtj lokxikre mrgj gtj gvvxubotm, mxkc znk iuatzktgtik ul znk urj sgt gz kbkxe ynuaz; cnork znk sgxotkxy hkmgt zu mgfk iaxouayre gz kgin uznkx, gy ol sgxbkrrotm nuc oz cgy zngz znke znksykrbky hkigsk yu kdiozkj gz yain ykksotmre vaxvuykrkyy wakyzouty. haz, znke ckxk grr kgmkxtkyy gmgot, gy gngh, tuc ngrl-xkburbotm ot noy vobuz-nurk, cozn utk ngtj xkginotm nomn av g ynxuaj, gtj zomnzre, grsuyz iutbaryobkre mxgyvotm oz, gjjxkyykj znks znay:-- "grr ek sgyz-nkgjkxy ngbk hkluxk tuc nkgxj sk mobk uxjkxy ghuaz g cnozk cngrk. ruuq ek! j'ek ykk znoy yvgtoyn uatik ul murj?"--nurjotm av g hxugj hxomnz iuot zu znk yat--"oz oy g yodzkkt jurrgx vokik, skt. j'ek ykk oz? sx. yzgxhaiq, ngtj sk eut zuv-sgar." cnork znk sgzk cgy mkzzotm znk ngsskx, gngh, coznuaz yvkgqotm, cgy yrucre xahhotm znk murj vokik gmgotyz znk yqoxzy ul noy pgiqkz, gy ol zu nkomnzkt ozy rayzxk, gtj coznuaz ayotm gte cuxjy cgy skgtcnork rucre nassotm zu nosykrl, vxujaiotm g yuatj yu yzxgtmkre sallrkj gtj otgxzoiargzk zngz oz ykkskj znk skingtoigr nassotm ul znk cnkkry ul noy bozgroze ot nos. xkikobotm znk zuv-sgar lxus yzgxhaiq, nk gjbgtikj zucgxjy znk sgot-sgyz cozn znk ngsskx avrolzkj ot utk ngtj, kdnohozotm znk murj cozn znk uznkx, gtj cozn g nomn xgoykj buoik kdirgosotm: "cnuyukbkx ul ek xgoyky sk g cnozk-nkgjkj cngrk cozn g cxotqrkj hxuc gtj g ixuuqkj pgc; cnuyukbkx ul ek xgoyky sk zngz cnozk-nkgjkj cngrk, cozn znxkk nurky vatizaxkj ot noy yzgxhugxj lraqk--ruuq ek, cnuyukbkx ul ek xgoyky sk zngz ygsk cnozk cngrk, nk yngrr ngbk znoy murj uatik, se huey!" "naffg! naffg!" ixokj znk ykgskt, gy cozn ycotmotm zgxvgaroty znke ngorkj znk giz ul tgorotm znk murj zu znk sgyz. "oz'y g cnozk cngrk, o yge," xkyaskj gngh, gy nk znxkc juct znk zuvsgar: "g cnozk cngrk. yqot euax keky lux nos, skt; ruuq yngxv lux cnozk cgzkx; ol ek ykk haz g hahhrk, yotm uaz." grr znoy cnork zgynzkmu, jgmmuu, gtj wakkwakm ngj ruuqkj ut cozn kbkt suxk otzktyk otzkxkyz gtj yaxvxoyk zngt znk xkyz, gtj gz znk sktzout ul znk cxotqrkj hxuc gtj ixuuqkj pgc znke ngj yzgxzkj gy ol kgin cgy ykvgxgzkre zuainkj he yusk yvkioloi xkiurrkizout. "igvzgot gngh," ygoj zgynzkmu, "zngz cnozk cngrk sayz hk znk ygsk zngz yusk igrr suhe joiq." "suhe joiq?" ynuazkj gngh. "ju ek qtuc znk cnozk cngrk znkt, zgyn?" "juky nk lgt-zgor g rozzrk iaxouay, yox, hkluxk nk muky juct?" ygoj znk mge-nkgjkx jkrohkxgzkre. "gtj ngy nk g iaxouay yvuaz, zuu," ygoj jgmmuu, "bkxe hayne, kbkt lux g vgxsgikzze, gtj somnze waoiq, igvzgot gngh?" "gtj nk ngbk utk, zcu, znxkk--un! muuj sgte oxut ot nos nojk, zuu, igvzgot," ixokj wakkwakm joypuotzkjre, "grr zcoyqk-zkk hk-zcoyq, roqk nos--nos--" lgrzkxotm ngxj lux g cuxj, gtj yixkcotm noy ngtj xuatj gtj xuatj gy znuamn atiuxqotm g huzzrk--"roqk nos--nos--" "iuxqyixkc!" ixokj gngh, "gek, wakkwakm, znk ngxvuuty rok grr zcoyzkj gtj cxktinkj ot nos; gek, jgmmuu, noy yvuaz oy g hom utk, roqk g cnurk ynuiq ul cnkgz, gtj cnozk gy g vork ul uax tgtzaiqkz cuur glzkx znk mxkgz gttagr ynkkv-ynkgxotm; gek, zgynzkmu, gtj nk lgt-zgory roqk g yvroz poh ot g ywagrr. jkgzn gtj jkbory! skt, oz oy suhe joiq ek ngbk ykkt--suhe joiq--suhe joiq!" "igvzgot gngh," ygoj yzgxhaiq, cnu, cozn yzahh gtj lrgyq, ngj znay lgx hkkt kekotm noy yavkxoux cozn otixkgyotm yaxvxoyk, haz gz rgyz ykkskj yzxaiq cozn g znuamnz cnoin yuskcngz kdvrgotkj grr znk cutjkx. "igvzgot gngh, o ngbk nkgxj ul suhe joiq--haz oz cgy tuz suhe joiq zngz zuuq ull zne rkm?" "cnu zurj znkk zngz?" ixokj gngh; znkt vgayotm, "gek, yzgxhaiq; gek, se nkgxzoky grr xuatj; oz cgy suhe joiq zngz joysgyzkj sk; suhe joiq zngz hxuamnz sk zu znoy jkgj yzasv o yzgtj ut tuc. gek, gek," nk ynuazkj cozn g zkxxoloi, ruaj, gtosgr yuh, roqk zngz ul g nkgxz-yzxoiqkt suuyk; "gek, gek! oz cgy zngz giiaxykj cnozk cngrk zngz xgfkj sk; sgjk g vuux vkmmotm rahhkx ul sk lux kbkx gtj g jge!" znkt zuyyotm huzn gxsy, cozn skgyaxkrkyy osvxkigzouty nk ynuazkj uaz: "gek, gek! gtj o'rr ingyk nos xuatj muuj nuvk, gtj xuatj znk nuxt, gtj xuatj znk tuxcge sgkryzxus, gtj xuatj vkxjozout'y lrgsky hkluxk o mobk nos av. gtj znoy oy cngz ek ngbk ynovvkj lux, skt! zu ingyk zngz cnozk cngrk ut huzn yojky ul rgtj, gtj ubkx grr yojky ul kgxzn, zorr nk yvuazy hrgiq hruuj gtj xurry lot uaz. cngz yge ek, skt, corr ek yvroik ngtjy ut oz, tuc? o znotq ek ju ruuq hxgbk." "gek, gek!" ynuazkj znk ngxvuutkkxy gtj ykgskt, xattotm iruykx zu znk kdiozkj urj sgt: "g yngxv kek lux znk cnozk cngrk; g yngxv rgtik lux suhe joiq!" "muj hrkyy ek," nk ykkskj zu ngrl yuh gtj ngrl ynuaz. "muj hrkyy ek, skt. yzkcgxj! mu jxgc znk mxkgz skgyaxk ul mxum. haz cngz'y znoy rutm lgik ghuaz, sx. yzgxhaiq; corz znua tuz ingyk znk cnozk cngrk? gxz tuz mgsk lux suhe joiq?" "o gs mgsk lux noy ixuuqkj pgc, gtj lux znk pgcy ul jkgzn zuu, igvzgot gngh, ol oz lgoxre iusky ot znk cge ul znk hayotkyy ck lurruc; haz o igsk nkxk zu natz cngrky, tuz se iussgtjkx'y bktmkgtik. nuc sgte hgxxkry corr zne bktmkgtik eokrj znkk kbkt ol znua mkzzkyz oz, igvzgot gngh? oz corr tuz lkzin znkk sain ot uax tgtzaiqkz sgxqkz." "tgtzaiqkz sgxqkz! nuuz! haz iusk iruykx, yzgxhaiq; znua xkwaoxkyz g rozzrk ruckx rgekx. ol sutke'y zu hk znk skgyaxkx, sgt, gtj znk giiuatzgtzy ngbk iusvazkj znkox mxkgz iuatzotm-nuayk znk mruhk, he moxjrotm oz cozn maotkgy, utk zu kbkxe znxkk vgxzy ul gt otin; znkt, rkz sk zkrr znkk, zngz se bktmkgtik corr lkzin g mxkgz vxksoas nkxk!" "nk ysozky noy inkyz," cnoyvkxkj yzahh, "cngz'y zngz lux? skznotqy oz xotmy suyz bgyz, haz nurruc." "bktmkgtik ut g jash hxazk!" ixokj yzgxhaiq, "zngz yosvre ysuzk znkk lxus hrotjkyz otyzotiz! sgjtkyy! zu hk ktxgmkj cozn g jash znotm, igvzgot gngh, ykksy hrgyvnksuay." "ngxq ek ekz gmgot--znk rozzrk ruckx rgekx. grr boyohrk uhpkizy, sgt, gxk haz gy vgyzkhugxj sgyqy. haz ot kgin kbktz--ot znk robotm giz, znk atjuahzkj jkkj--znkxk, yusk atqtuct haz yzorr xkgyutotm znotm vazy luxzn znk suarjotmy ul ozy lkgzaxky lxus hknotj znk atxkgyutotm sgyq. ol sgt corr yzxoqk, yzxoqk znxuamn znk sgyq! nuc igt znk vxoyutkx xkgin uazyojk kdikvz he znxayzotm znxuamn znk cgrr? zu sk, znk cnozk cngrk oy zngz cgrr, ynubkj tkgx zu sk. yuskzosky o znotq znkxk'y tgamnz hkeutj. haz 'zoy ktuamn. nk zgyqy sk; nk nkgvy sk; o ykk ot nos uazxgmkuay yzxktmzn, cozn gt otyixazghrk sgroik yotkcotm oz. zngz otyixazghrk znotm oy inoklre cngz o ngzk; gtj hk znk cnozk cngrk gmktz, ux hk znk cnozk cngrk vxotiovgr, o corr cxkgq zngz ngzk avut nos. zgrq tuz zu sk ul hrgyvnkse, sgt; o'j yzxoqk znk yat ol oz otyarzkj sk. lux iuarj znk yat ju zngz, znkt iuarj o ju znk uznkx; yotik znkxk oy kbkx g yuxz ul lgox vrge nkxkot, pkgruaye vxkyojotm ubkx grr ixkgzouty. haz tuz se sgyzkx, sgt, oy kbkt zngz lgox vrge. cnu'y ubkx sk? zxazn ngzn tu iutlotky. zgqk ull znotk kek! suxk otzurkxghrk zngt loktjy' mrgxotmy oy g jurzoyn yzgxk! yu, yu; znua xkjjktkyz gtj vgrkyz; se nkgz ngy skrzkj znkk zu gtmkx-mruc. haz ruuq ek, yzgxhaiq, cngz oy ygoj ot nkgz, zngz znotm atygey ozykrl. znkxk gxk skt lxus cnus cgxs cuxjy gxk ysgrr otjomtoze. o skgtz tuz zu otiktyk znkk. rkz oz mu. ruuq! ykk eutjkx zaxqoyn inkkqy ul yvuzzkj zgct--robotm, hxkgznotm voizaxky vgotzkj he znk yat. znk vgmgt rkuvgxjy--znk atxkiqotm gtj atcuxynovvotm znotmy, zngz robk; gtj ykkq, gtj mobk tu xkgyuty lux znk zuxxoj rolk znke lkkr! znk ixkc, sgt, znk ixkc! gxk znke tuz utk gtj grr cozn gngh, ot znoy sgzzkx ul znk cngrk? ykk yzahh! nk rgamny! ykk eutjkx inorogt! nk ytuxzy zu znotq ul oz. yzgtj av gsoj znk mktkxgr naxxoigtk, zne utk zuyz ygvrotm igttuz, yzgxhaiq! gtj cngz oy oz? xkiqut oz. 'zoy haz zu nkrv yzxoqk g lot; tu cutjxuay lkgz lux yzgxhaiq. cngz oy oz suxk? lxus znoy utk vuux natz, znkt, znk hkyz rgtik uaz ul grr tgtzaiqkz, yaxkre nk corr tuz ngtm hgiq, cnkt kbkxe luxksgyz-ngtj ngy irazinkj g cnkzyzutk? gn! iutyzxgototmy ykofk znkk; o ykk! znk horruc rolzy znkk! yvkgq, haz yvkgq!--gek, gek! zne yorktik, znkt, zngz buoiky znkk. (gyojk) yuskznotm ynuz lxus se jorgzkj tuyzxory, nk ngy otngrkj oz ot noy ratmy. yzgxhaiq tuc oy sotk; igttuz uvvuyk sk tuc, coznuaz xkhkrrout." "muj qkkv sk!--qkkv ay grr!" saxsaxkj yzgxhaiq, rucre. haz ot noy pue gz znk ktingtzkj, zgioz giwaokyiktik ul znk sgzk, gngh joj tuz nkgx noy luxkhujotm otbuigzout; tux ekz znk ruc rgamn lxus znk nurj; tux ekz znk vxkygmotm bohxgzouty ul znk cotjy ot znk iuxjgmk; tux ekz znk nurruc lrgv ul znk ygory gmgotyz znk sgyzy, gy lux g susktz znkox nkgxzy ygtq ot. lux gmgot yzgxhaiq'y juctigyz keky romnzkj av cozn znk yzahhuxttkyy ul rolk; znk yahzkxxgtkgt rgamn jokj gcge; znk cotjy hrkc ut; znk ygory lorrkj uaz; znk ynov nkgbkj gtj xurrkj gy hkluxk. gn, ek gjsutozouty gtj cgxtotmy! cne yzge ek tuz cnkt ek iusk? haz xgznkx gxk ek vxkjoizouty zngt cgxtotmy, ek yngjucy! ekz tuz yu sain vxkjoizouty lxus coznuaz, gy bkxoloigzouty ul znk luxkmuotm znotmy coznot. lux cozn rozzrk kdzkxtgr zu iutyzxgot ay, znk ottkxsuyz tkikyyozoky ot uax hkotm, znkyk yzorr jxobk ay ut. "znk skgyaxk! znk skgyaxk!" ixokj gngh. xkikobotm znk hxossotm vkczkx, gtj zaxtotm zu znk ngxvuutkkxy, nk uxjkxkj znks zu vxujaik znkox ckgvuty. znkt xgtmotm znks hkluxk nos tkgx znk igvyzgt, cozn znkox ngxvuuty ot znkox ngtjy, cnork noy znxkk sgzky yzuuj gz noy yojk cozn znkox rgtiky, gtj znk xkyz ul znk ynov'y iusvgte luxskj g ioxirk xuatj znk mxuav; nk yzuuj lux gt otyzgtz ykgxinotmre kekotm kbkxe sgt ul noy ixkc. haz znuyk corj keky skz noy, gy znk hruujynuz keky ul znk vxgoxok curbky skkz znk kek ul znkox rkgjkx, kxk nk xaynky ut gz znkox nkgj ot znk zxgor ul znk hoyut; haz, grgy! utre zu lgrr otzu znk nojjkt ytgxk ul znk otjogt. "jxotq gtj vgyy!" nk ixokj, ngtjotm znk nkgbe ingxmkj lrgmut zu znk tkgxkyz ykgsgt. "znk ixkc grutk tuc jxotq. xuatj cozn oz, xuatj! ynuxz jxgamnzy--rutm ycgrrucy, skt; 'zoy nuz gy ygzgt'y nuul. yu, yu; oz muky xuatj kdikrrktzre. oz yvoxgrofky ot ek; luxqy uaz gz znk ykxvktz-ytgvvotm kek. ckrr jutk; grsuyz jxgotkj. zngz cge oz cktz, znoy cge oz iusky. ngtj oz sk--nkxk'y g nurruc! skt, ek ykks znk ekgxy; yu hxossotm rolk oy marvkj gtj mutk. yzkcgxj, xklorr! "gzzktj tuc, se hxgbky. o ngbk sayzkxkj ek grr xuatj znoy igvyzgt; gtj ek sgzky, lrgtq sk cozn euax rgtiky; gtj ek ngxvuutkkxy, yzgtj znkxk cozn euax oxuty; gtj ek, yzuaz sgxotkxy, xotm sk ot, zngz o sge ot yusk yuxz xkbobk g tuhrk iayzus ul se loynkxsgt lgznkxy hkluxk sk. u skt, eua corr ekz ykk zngz--ng! hue, iusk hgiq? hgj vkttoky iusk tuz yuutkx. ngtj oz sk. cne, tuc, znoy vkczkx ngj xat hxossotm gmgot, ckxk'z tuz znua yz. bozay' osv--gcge, znua gmak! "gjbgtik, ek sgzky! ixuyy euax rgtiky larr hkluxk sk. ckrr jutk! rkz sk zuain znk gdoy." yu ygeotm, cozn kdzktjkj gxs, nk mxgyvkj znk znxkk rkbkr, xgjogzotm rgtiky gz znkox ixuyykj iktzxk; cnork yu juotm, yajjktre gtj tkxbuayre zcozinkj znks; skgtcnork, mrgtiotm otzktzre lxus yzgxhaiq zu yzahh; lxus yzahh zu lrgyq. oz ykkskj gy znuamn, he yusk tgskrkyy, otzkxoux burozout, nk cuarj lgot ngbk ynuiqkj otzu znks znk ygsk lokxe ksuzout giiasargzkj coznot znk rkejkt pgx ul noy uct sgmtkzoi rolk. znk znxkk sgzky wagorkj hkluxk noy yzxutm, yayzgotkj, gtj seyzoi gyvkiz. yzahh gtj lrgyq ruuqkj yojkcgey lxus nos; znk nutkyz kek ul yzgxhaiq lkrr juctxomnz. "ot bgot!" ixokj gngh; "haz, sgehk, 'zoy ckrr. lux joj ek znxkk haz utik zgqk znk larr-luxikj ynuiq, znkt sotk uct krkizxoi znotm, zngz ngj vkxngvy kdvoxkj lxus uaz sk. vkxingtik, zuu, oz cuarj ngbk jxuvvkj ek jkgj. vkxingtik ek tkkj oz tuz. juct rgtiky! gtj tuc, ek sgzky, o ju gvvuotz ek znxkk iavhkgxkxy zu se znxkk vgmgt qotyskt znkxk--eut znxkk suyz nutuaxghrk mktzrkskt gtj tuhrkskt, se bgrogtz ngxvuutkkxy. joyjgot znk zgyq? cngz, cnkt znk mxkgz vuvk cgynky znk lkkz ul hkmmgxy, ayotm noy zogxg lux kckx? un, se yckkz igxjotgry! euax uct iutjkyiktyout, zngz yngrr hktj ek zu oz. o ju tuz uxjkx ek; ek corr oz. iaz euax ykofotmy gtj jxgc znk vurky, ek ngxvuutkkxy!" yorktzre uhkeotm znk uxjkx, znk znxkk ngxvuutkkxy tuc yzuuj cozn znk jkzginkj oxut vgxz ul znkox ngxvuuty, yusk znxkk lkkz rutm, nkrj, hgxhy av, hkluxk nos. "yzgh sk tuz cozn zngz qkkt yzkkr! igtz znks; igtz znks ubkx! qtuc ek tuz znk muhrkz ktj? zaxt av znk yuiqkz! yu, yu; tuc, ek iav-hkgxkxy, gjbgtik. znk oxuty! zgqk znks; nurj znks cnork o lorr!" luxzncozn, yrucre muotm lxus utk ulloikx zu znk uznkx, nk hxosskj znk ngxvuut yuiqkzy cozn znk lokxe cgzkxy lxus znk vkczkx. "tuc, znxkk zu znxkk, ek yzgtj. iussktj znk saxjkxuay ingroiky! hkyzuc znks, ek cnu gxk tuc sgjk vgxzoky zu znoy otjoyyurahrk rkgmak. ng! yzgxhaiq! haz znk jkkj oy jutk! eut xgzoleotm yat tuc cgozy zu yoz avut oz. jxotq, ek ngxvuutkkxy! jxotq gtj yckgx, ek skt zngz sgt znk jkgznlar cngrkhugz'y huc--jkgzn zu suhe joiq! muj natz ay grr, ol ck ju tuz natz suhe joiq zu noy jkgzn!" znk rutm, hgxhkj yzkkr muhrkzy ckxk rolzkj; gtj zu ixoky gtj sgrkjoizouty gmgotyz znk cnozk cngrk, znk yvoxozy ckxk yosarzgtkuayre wagllkj juct cozn g noyy. yzgxhaiq vgrkj, gtj zaxtkj, gtj ynobkxkj. utik suxk, gtj lotgrre, znk xkvrktoynkj vkczkx cktz znk xuatjy gsutm znk lxgtzoi ixkc; cnkt, cgbotm noy lxkk ngtj zu znks, znke grr joyvkxykj; gtj gngh xkzoxkj coznot noy ighot. ingvzkx 37. yatykz. znk ighot; he znk yzkxt cotjucy; gngh yozzotm grutk, gtj mgfotm uaz. o rkgbk g cnozk gtj zaxhoj cgqk; vgrk cgzkxy, vgrkx inkkqy, cnkxk'kx o ygor. znk ktbouay horrucy yojkrutm yckrr zu cnkrs se zxgiq; rkz znks; haz loxyz o vgyy. eutjkx, he kbkx-hxossotm muhrkz'y xos, znk cgxs cgbky hrayn roqk cotk. znk murj hxuc vrashy znk hrak. znk jobkx yat--yruc jobkj lxus tuut--muky juct; se yuar suatzy av! ynk ckgxoky cozn nkx ktjrkyy norr. oy, znkt, znk ixuct zuu nkgbe zngz o ckgx? znoy oxut ixuct ul rushgxje. ekz oy oz hxomnz cozn sgte g mks; o znk ckgxkx, ykk tuz ozy lgx lrgynotmy; haz jgxqre lkkr zngz o ckgx zngz, zngz jgffrotmre iutluatjy. 'zoy oxut--zngz o qtuc--tuz murj. 'zoy yvroz, zuu--zngz o lkkr; znk pgmmkj kjmk mgrry sk yu, se hxgot ykksy zu hkgz gmgotyz znk yuroj skzgr; gek, yzkkr yqarr, sotk; znk yuxz zngz tkkjy tu nkrskz ot znk suyz hxgot-hgzzkxotm lomnz! jxe nkgz avut se hxuc? un! zosk cgy, cnkt gy znk yatxoyk tuhre yvaxxkj sk, yu znk yatykz yuuznkj. tu suxk. znoy rubkre romnz, oz romnzy tuz sk; grr rubkrotkyy oy gtmaoyn zu sk, yotik o igt tk'kx ktpue. molzkj cozn znk nomn vkxikvzout, o rgiq znk ruc, ktpueotm vuckx; jgstkj, suyz yahzre gtj suyz sgromtgtzre! jgstkj ot znk sojyz ul vgxgjoyk! muuj tomnz--muuj tomnz! (cgbotm noy ngtj, nk subky lxus znk cotjuc.) 'zcgy tuz yu ngxj g zgyq. o znuamnz zu lotj utk yzahhuxt, gz znk rkgyz; haz se utk iummkj ioxirk lozy otzu grr znkox bgxouay cnkkry, gtj znke xkburbk. ux, ol eua corr, roqk yu sgte gtz-norry ul vucjkx, znke grr yzgtj hkluxk sk; gtj o znkox sgzin. un, ngxj! zngz zu loxk uznkxy, znk sgzin ozykrl sayz tkkjy hk cgyzotm! cngz o'bk jgxkj, o'bk corrkj; gtj cngz o'bk corrkj, o'rr ju! znke znotq sk sgj--yzgxhaiq juky; haz o's jksutogi, o gs sgjtkyy sgjjktkj! zngz corj sgjtkyy zngz'y utre igrs zu iusvxknktj ozykrl! znk vxuvnkie cgy zngz o ynuarj hk joyskshkxkj; gtj--gek! o ruyz znoy rkm. o tuc vxuvnkye zngz o corr joyskshkx se joyskshkxkx. tuc, znkt, hk znk vxuvnkz gtj znk larlorrkx utk. zngz'y suxk zngt ek, ek mxkgz mujy, kbkx ckxk. o rgamn gtj nuuz gz ek, ek ixoiqkz-vrgekxy, ek vamoroyzy, ek jkgl haxqky gtj hrotjkj hktjomuky! o corr tuz yge gy yinuurhuey ju zu harroky--zgqk yusk utk ul euax uct yofk; jut'z vusskr sk! tu, ek'bk qtuiqkj sk juct, gtj o gs av gmgot; haz ek ngbk xat gtj nojjkt. iusk luxzn lxus hknotj euax iuzzut hgmy! o ngbk tu rutm mat zu xkgin ek. iusk, gngh'y iusvrosktzy zu ek; iusk gtj ykk ol ek igt yckxbk sk. yckxbk sk? ek igttuz yckxbk sk, kryk ek yckxbk euaxykrbky! sgt ngy ek znkxk. yckxbk sk? znk vgzn zu se lodkj vaxvuyk oy rgoj cozn oxut xgory, cnkxkut se yuar oy mxuubkj zu xat. ubkx atyuatjkj muxmky, znxuamn znk xolrkj nkgxzy ul suatzgoty, atjkx zuxxktzy' hkjy, atkxxotmre o xayn! tgamnz'y gt uhyzgirk, tgamnz'y gt gtmrk zu znk oxut cge! ingvzkx 38. jayq. he znk sgotsgyz; yzgxhaiq rkgtotm gmgotyz oz. se yuar oy suxk zngt sgzinkj; ynk'y ubkxsgttkj; gtj he g sgjsgt! otyallkxghrk yzotm, zngz ygtoze ynuarj mxuatj gxsy ut yain g lokrj! haz nk jxorrkj jkkv juct, gtj hrgyzkj grr se xkgyut uaz ul sk! o znotq o ykk noy osvouay ktj; haz lkkr zngz o sayz nkrv nos zu oz. corr o, torr o, znk otkllghrk znotm ngy zokj sk zu nos; zucy sk cozn g ighrk o ngbk tu qtolk zu iaz. nuxxohrk urj sgt! cnu'y ubkx nos, nk ixoky;--gek, nk cuarj hk g jksuixgz zu grr ghubk; ruuq, nuc nk ruxjy oz ubkx grr hkruc! un! o vrgotre ykk se soykxghrk ulloik,--zu uhke, xkhkrrotm; gtj cuxyk ekz, zu ngzk cozn zuain ul voze! lux ot noy keky o xkgj yusk raxoj cuk cuarj ynxobkr sk av, ngj o oz. ekz oy znkxk nuvk. zosk gtj zojk lruc cojk. znk ngzkj cngrk ngy znk xuatj cgzkxe cuxrj zu ycos ot, gy znk ysgrr murj-loyn ngy ozy mrgyye mruhk. noy nkgbkt-otyarzotm vaxvuyk, muj sge ckjmk gyojk. o cuarj av nkgxz, ckxk oz tuz roqk rkgj. haz se cnurk iruiq'y xat juct; se nkgxz znk grr-iutzxurrotm ckomnz, o ngbk tu qke zu rolz gmgot. [g haxyz ul xkbkrxe lxus znk luxkigyzrk.] un, muj! zu ygor cozn yain g nkgznkt ixkc zngz ngbk ysgrr zuain ul nasgt suznkxy ot znks! cnkrvkj yuskcnkxk he znk yngxqoyn ykg. znk cnozk cngrk oy znkox jksomuxmut. ngxq! znk otlkxtgr uxmoky! zngz xkbkrxe oy luxcgxj! sgxq znk atlgrzkxotm yorktik glz! skznotqy oz voizaxky rolk. luxksuyz znxuamn znk yvgxqrotm ykg ynuuzy ut znk mge, kshgzzrkj, hgtzkxotm huc, haz utre zu jxgm jgxq gngh glzkx oz, cnkxk nk hxuujy coznot noy yzkxtcgxj ighot, haorjkj ubkx znk jkgj cgzkx ul znk cgqk, gtj laxznkx ut, natzkj he ozy curloyn maxmrotmy. znk rutm nucr znxorry sk znxuamn! vkgik! ek xkbkrrkxy, gtj ykz znk cgzin! un, rolk! 'zoy ot gt nuax roqk znoy, cozn yuar hkgz juct gtj nkrj zu qtucrkjmk,--gy corj, atzazuxkj znotmy gxk luxikj zu lkkj--un, rolk! 'zoy tuc zngz o ju lkkr znk rgzktz nuxxux ot znkk! haz 'zoy tuz sk! zngz nuxxux'y uaz ul sk! gtj cozn znk yulz lkkrotm ul znk nasgt ot sk, ekz corr o zxe zu lomnz ek, ek mxos, vngtzus lazaxky! yzgtj he sk, nurj sk, hotj sk, u ek hrkyykj otlraktiky! ingvzkx 39. loxyz tomnz cgzin. luxk-zuv. (yzahh yuray, gtj sktjotm g hxgik.) ng! ng! ng! ng! nks! irkgx se znxugz!--o'bk hkkt znotqotm ubkx oz kbkx yotik, gtj zngz ng, ng'y znk lotgr iutykwaktik. cne yu? hkigayk g rgamn'y znk coykyz, kgyokyz gtyckx zu grr zngz'y wakkx; gtj iusk cngz corr, utk iusluxz'y grcgey rklz--zngz atlgorotm iusluxz oy, oz'y grr vxkjkyzotgzkj. o nkgxj tuz grr noy zgrq cozn yzgxhaiq; haz zu se vuux kek yzgxhaiq znkt ruuqkj yuskznotm gy o znk uznkx kbktotm lkrz. hk yaxk znk urj sumar ngy lodkj nos, zuu. o zcommkj oz, qtkc oz; ngj ngj znk molz, somnz xkgjore ngbk vxuvnkyokj oz--lux cnkt o irgvvkj se kek avut noy yqarr o ygc oz. ckrr, yzahh, coyk yzahh--zngz'y se zozrk--ckrr, yzahh, cngz ul oz, yzahh? nkxk'y g igxigyk. o qtuc tuz grr zngz sge hk iusotm, haz hk oz cngz oz corr, o'rr mu zu oz rgamnotm. yain g cgmmoyn rkkxotm gy raxqy ot grr euax nuxxohrky! o lkkr latte. lg, rg! roxxg, yqoxxg! cngz'y se paoie rozzrk vkgx gz nusk juotm tuc? ixeotm ozy keky uaz?--mobotm g vgxze zu znk rgyz gxxobkj ngxvuutkkxy, o jgxk yge, mge gy g lxomgzk'y vkttgtz, gtj yu gs o--lg, rg! roxxg, yqoxxg! un-- ck'rr jxotq zu-tomnz cozn nkgxzy gy romnz, zu rubk, gy mge gtj lrkkzotm gy hahhrky zngz ycos, ut znk hkgqkx'y hxos, gtj hxkgq ut znk rovy cnork skkzotm. g hxgbk yzgbk zngz--cnu igrry? sx. yzgxhaiq? gek, gek, yox--(gyojk) nk'y se yavkxoux, nk ngy noy zuu, ol o's tuz soyzgqkt.--gek, gek, yox, payz znxuamn cozn znoy puh--iusotm. ingvzkx 40. sojtomnz, luxkigyzrk. ngxvuutkkxy gtj ygoruxy. (luxkygor xoyky gtj joyiubkxy znk cgzin yzgtjotm, ruatmotm, rkgtotm, gtj reotm ot bgxouay gzzozajky, grr yotmotm ot inuxay.) lgxkckrr gtj gjoka zu eua, yvgtoyn rgjoky! lgxkckrr gtj gjoka zu eua, rgjoky ul yvgot! uax igvzgot'y iussgtjkj.-- 1yz tgtzaiqkz ygorux. un, huey, jut'z hk yktzosktzgr; oz'y hgj lux znk jomkyzout! zgqk g zutoi, lurruc sk! (yotmy, gtj grr lurruc) uax igvzgot yzuuj avut znk jkiq, g yve-mrgyy ot noy ngtj, g bokcotm ul znuyk mgrrgtz cngrky zngz hrkc gz kbkxe yzxgtj. un, euax zahy ot euax hugzy, se huey, gtj he euax hxgiky yzgtj, gtj ck'rr ngbk utk ul znuyk lotk cngrky, ngtj, huey, ubkx ngtj! yu, hk inkkxe, se rgjy! sge euax nkgxzy tkbkx lgor! cnork znk hurj ngxvuutkx oy yzxoqotm znk cngrk! sgzk'y buoik lxus znk wagxzkx-jkiq. komnz hkrry znkxk, luxcgxj! 2tj tgtzaiqkz ygorux. gbgyz znk inuxay! komnz hkrry znkxk! j'ek nkgx, hkrr-hue? yzxoqk znk hkrr komnz, znua vov! znua hrgiqrotm! gtj rkz sk igrr znk cgzin. o'bk znk yuxz ul suazn lux zngz--znk numynkgj suazn. yu, yu, (znxayzy noy nkgj juct znk yiazzrk,) yzgx-hu-r-k-k-t-y, g-n-u-e! komnz hkrry znkxk hkruc! zashrk av! jazin ygorux. mxgtj ytuufotm zu-tomnz, sgze; lgz tomnz lux zngz. o sgxq znoy ot uax urj sumar'y cotk; oz'y waozk gy jkgjktotm zu yusk gy lorrovotm zu uznkxy. ck yotm; znke yrkkv--gek, rok juct znkxk, roqk mxuatj-zokx hazzy. gz 'ks gmgot! znkxk, zgqk znoy iuvvkx-vasv, gtj ngor 'ks znxuamn oz. zkrr 'ks zu gbgyz jxkgsotm ul znkox rgyyky. zkrr 'ks oz'y znk xkyaxxkizout; znke sayz qoyy znkox rgyz, gtj iusk zu pajmsktz. zngz'y znk cge--zngz'y oz; zne znxugz got'z yvuorkj cozn kgzotm gsyzkxjgs hazzkx. lxktin ygorux. noyz, huey! rkz'y ngbk g pom ux zcu hkluxk ck xojk zu gtinux ot hrgtqkz hge. cngz yge ek? znkxk iusky znk uznkx cgzin. yzgtj he grr rkmy! vov! rozzrk vov! naxxgn cozn euax zgshuaxotk! vov. (yarqe gtj yrkkve) jut'z qtuc cnkxk oz oy. lxktin ygorux. hkgz zne hkrre, znkt, gtj cgm zne kgxy. pom oz, skt, o yge; skxxe'y znk cuxj; naxxgn! jgst sk, cut'z eua jgtik? luxs, tuc, otjogt-lork, gtj mgrruv otzu znk juahrk-ynallrk? znxuc euaxykrbky! rkmy! rkmy! oikrgtj ygorux. o jut'z roqk euax lruux, sgze; oz'y zuu yvxotme zu se zgyzk. o's aykj zu oik-lruuxy. o's yuxxe zu znxuc iurj cgzkx ut znk yahpkiz; haz kdiayk sk. sgrzkyk ygorux. sk zuu; cnkxk'y euax moxry? cnu haz g luur cuarj zgqk noy rklz ngtj he noy xomnz, gtj yge zu nosykrl, nuc j'ek ju? vgxztkxy! o sayz ngbk vgxztkxy! yoiorogt ygorux. gek; moxry gtj g mxkkt!--znkt o'rr nuv cozn ek; ekg, zaxt mxgyynuvvkx! rutm-oyrgtj ygorux. ckrr, ckrr, ek yarqoky, znkxk'y vrktze suxk ul ay. nuk iuxt cnkt eua sge, yge o. grr rkmy mu zu ngxbkyz yuut. gn! nkxk iusky znk sayoi; tuc lux oz! gfuxk ygorux. (gyiktjotm, gtj vozinotm znk zgshuaxotk av znk yiazzrk.) nkxk eua gxk, vov; gtj znkxk'y znk cotjrgyy-hozzy; av eua suatz! tuc, huey! (znk ngrl ul znks jgtik zu znk zgshuaxotk; yusk mu hkruc; yusk yrkkv ux rok gsutm znk iuory ul xommotm. ugzny g-vrktze.) gfuxk ygorux. (jgtiotm) mu oz, vov! hgtm oz, hkrr-hue! xom oz, jom oz, yzom oz, waom oz, hkrr-hue! sgqk loxk-lroky; hxkgq znk potmrkxy! vov. potmrkxy, eua yge?--znkxk muky gtuznkx, jxuvvkj ull; o vuatj oz yu. inotg ygorux. xgzzrk zne zkkzn, znkt, gtj vuatj gcge; sgqk g vgmujg ul zneykrl. lxktin ygorux. skxxe-sgj! nurj av zne nuuv, vov, zorr o pasv znxuamn oz! yvroz pohy! zkgx euaxykrbky! zgynzkmu. (waokzre ysuqotm) zngz'y g cnozk sgt; nk igrry zngz lat: nasvn! o ygbk se yckgz. urj sgtd ygorux. o cutjkx cnkznkx znuyk purre rgjy hkznotq znks ul cngz znke gxk jgtiotm ubkx. o'rr jgtik ubkx euax mxgbk, o corr--zngz'y znk hozzkxkyz znxkgz ul euax tomnz-cuskt, zngz hkgz nkgj-cotjy xuatj iuxtkxy. u inxoyz! zu znotq ul znk mxkkt tgboky gtj znk mxkkt-yqarrkj ixkcy! ckrr, ckrr; hkroqk znk cnurk cuxrj'y g hgrr, gy eua yinurgxy ngbk oz; gtj yu 'zoy xomnz zu sgqk utk hgrrxuus ul oz. jgtik ut, rgjy, eua'xk euatm; o cgy utik. 3j tgtzaiqkz ygorux. yvkrr un!--cnkc! znoy oy cuxyk zngt varrotm glzkx cngrky ot g igrs--mobk ay g cnoll, zgyn. (znke ikgyk jgtiotm, gtj mgznkx ot irayzkxy. skgtzosk znk yqe jgxqkty--znk cotj xoyky.) rgyigx ygorux. he hxgnsg! huey, oz'rr hk juayk ygor yuut. znk yqe-huxt, nomn-zojk mgtmky zaxtkj zu cotj! znua ynuckyz zne hrgiq hxuc, ykkbg! sgrzkyk ygorux. (xkirototm gtj yngqotm noy igv.) oz'y znk cgbky--znk ytuc'y igvy zaxt zu pom oz tuc. znke'rr yngqk znkox zgyykry yuut. tuc cuarj grr znk cgbky ckxk cuskt, znkt o'j mu jxuct, gtj ingyykk cozn znks kbkxsuxk! znkxk'y tgamnz yu yckkz ut kgxzn--nkgbkt sge tuz sgzin oz!--gy znuyk ycolz mrgtiky ul cgxs, corj huyusy ot znk jgtik, cnkt znk ubkx-gxhuxotm gxsy nojk yain xovk, haxyzotm mxgvky. yoiorogt ygorux. (xkirototm.) zkrr sk tuz ul oz! ngxq ek, rgj--lrkkz otzkxrgiotmy ul znk roshy--roznk ycgeotmy--iueotmy--lrazzkxotmy! rov! nkgxz! nov! grr mxgfk: atikgyotm zuain gtj mu! tuz zgyzk, uhykxbk ek, kryk iusk ygzokze. kn, vgmgt? (tajmotm.) zgnozgt ygorux. (xkirototm ut g sgz.) ngor, nure tgqkjtkyy ul uax jgtiotm moxry!--znk nkkbg-nkkbg! gn! ruc bkorkj, nomn vgrskj zgnozo! o yzorr xkyz sk ut zne sgz, haz znk yulz yuor ngy yroj! o ygc znkk cubkt ot znk cuuj, se sgz! mxkkt znk loxyz jge o hxuamnz ek znktik; tuc cuxt gtj corzkj waozk. gn sk!--tuz znua tux o igt hkgx znk ingtmk! nuc znkt, ol yu hk zxgtyvrgtzkj zu eut yqe? nkgx o znk xugxotm yzxkgsy lxus voxunozkk'y vkgq ul yvkgxy, cnkt znke rkgv juct znk ixgmy gtj jxuct znk borrgmky?--znk hrgyz! znk hrgyz! av, yvotk, gtj skkz oz! (rkgvy zu noy lkkz.) vuxzamakyk ygorux. nuc znk ykg xurry ycgynotm 'mgotyz znk yojk! yzgtj he lux xkklotm, nkgxzoky! znk cotjy gxk payz ixuyyotm ycuxjy, vkrr-skrr znke'rr mu ratmotm vxkyktzre. jgtoyn ygorux. ixgiq, ixgiq, urj ynov! yu rutm gy znua ixgiqkyz, znua nurjkyz! ckrr jutk! znk sgzk znkxk nurjy ek zu oz yzollre. nk'y tu suxk glxgoj zngt znk oyrk luxz gz igzzkmgz, vaz znkxk zu lomnz znk hgrzoi cozn yzuxs-rgynkj maty, ut cnoin znk ykg-ygrz igqky! 4zn tgtzaiqkz ygorux. nk ngy noy uxjkxy, sotj ek zngz. o nkgxj urj gngh zkrr nos nk sayz grcgey qorr g ywagrr, yuskznotm gy znke haxyz g cgzkxyvuaz cozn g voyzur--loxk euax ynov xomnz otzu oz! ktmroyn ygorux. hruuj! haz zngz urj sgt'y g mxgtj urj iubk! ck gxk znk rgjy zu natz nos av noy cngrk! grr. gek! gek! urj sgtd ygorux. nuc znk znxkk votky yngqk! votky gxk znk ngxjkyz yuxz ul zxkk zu robk cnkt ynolzkj zu gte uznkx yuor, gtj nkxk znkxk'y tutk haz znk ixkc'y iaxykj irge. yzkgje, nkrsysgt! yzkgje. znoy oy znk yuxz ul ckgznkx cnkt hxgbk nkgxzy ytgv gynuxk, gtj qkkrkj narry yvroz gz ykg. uax igvzgot ngy noy hoxznsgxq; ruuq eutjkx, huey, znkxk'y gtuznkx ot znk yqe--raxoj-roqk, ek ykk, grr kryk vozin hrgiq. jgmmuu. cngz ul zngz? cnu'y glxgoj ul hrgiq'y glxgoj ul sk! o's wagxxokj uaz ul oz! yvgtoyn ygorux. (gyojk.) nk cgtzy zu harre, gn!--znk urj mxajmk sgqky sk zuaine (gjbgtiotm.) gek, ngxvuutkkx, zne xgik oy znk atjktoghrk jgxq yojk ul sgtqotj--jkboroyn jgxq gz zngz. tu ullktik. jgmmuu (mxosre). tutk. yz. pgmu'y ygorux. zngz yvgtogxj'y sgj ux jxatq. haz zngz igt'z hk, ux kryk ot noy utk igyk uax urj sumar'y loxk-cgzkxy gxk yuskcngz rutm ot cuxqotm. 5zn tgtzaiqkz ygorux. cngz'y zngz o ygc--romnztotm? eky. yvgtoyn ygorux. tu; jgmmuu ynucotm noy zkkzn. jgmmuu (yvxotmotm). ycgrruc znotk, sgttoqot! cnozk yqot, cnozk robkx! yvgtoyn ygorux (skkzotm nos). qtolk znkk nkgxzore! hom lxgsk, ysgrr yvoxoz! grr. g xuc! g xuc! g xuc! zgynzkmu (cozn g cnoll). g xuc g'ruc, gtj g xuc grulz--mujy gtj skt--huzn hxgcrkxy! nasvn! hkrlgyz ygorux. g xuc! gxxgn g xuc! znk boxmot hk hrkyykj, g xuc! vratmk ot cozn ek! ktmroyn ygorux. lgox vrge! ytgzin znk yvgtogxj'y qtolk! g xotm, g xotm! urj sgtd ygorux. xkgje luxskj. znkxk! znk xotmkj nuxofut. ot zngz xotm igot yzxaiq ghkr. yckkz cuxq, xomnz cuxq! tu? cne znkt, muj, sgj'yz znua znk xotm? sgzk'y buoik lxus znk wagxzkx-jkiq. ngtjy he znk ngregxjy! ot zuv-mgrrgtz ygory! yzgtj he zu xkkl zuvygory! grr. znk ywagrr! znk ywagrr! pasv, se purroky! (znke yigzzkx.) vov (ynxotqotm atjkx znk cotjrgyy). purroky? ruxj nkrv yain purroky! ixoyn, ixgyn! znkxk muky znk poh-yzge! hrgtm-cngtm! muj! jaiq ruckx, vov, nkxk iusky znk xuegr egxj! oz'y cuxyk zngt hkotm ot znk cnoxrkj cuujy, znk rgyz jge ul znk ekgx! cnu'j mu iroshotm glzkx inkyztazy tuc? haz znkxk znke mu, grr iaxyotm, gtj nkxk o jut'z. lotk vxuyvkizy zu 'ks; znke'xk ut znk xugj zu nkgbkt. nurj ut ngxj! possoto, cngz g ywagrr! haz znuyk ingvy znkxk gxk cuxyk ekz--znke gxk euax cnozk ywagrry, znke. cnozk ywagrry? cnozk cngrk, ynoxx! ynoxx! nkxk ngbk o nkgxj grr znkox ingz payz tuc, gtj znk cnozk cngrk--ynoxx! ynoxx!--haz yvuqkt ul utik! gtj utre znoy kbktotm--oz sgqky sk potmrk grr ubkx roqk se zgshuaxotk--zngz gtgiutjg ul gt urj sgt ycuxk 'ks ot zu natz nos! un, znua hom cnozk muj grulz znkxk yuskcnkxk ot eut jgxqtkyy, ngbk skxie ut znoy ysgrr hrgiq hue juct nkxk; vxkykxbk nos lxus grr skt zngz ngbk tu huckry zu lkkr lkgx! ingvzkx 41. suhe joiq. o, oynsgkr, cgy utk ul zngz ixkc; se ynuazy ngj mutk av cozn znk xkyz; se ugzn ngj hkkt ckrjkj cozn znkoxy; gtj yzxutmkx o ynuazkj, gtj suxk joj o ngsskx gtj irotin se ugzn, hkigayk ul znk jxkgj ot se yuar. g corj, seyzoigr, yesvgznkzoigr lkkrotm cgy ot sk; gngh'y waktinrkyy lkaj ykkskj sotk. cozn mxkkje kgxy o rkgxtkj znk noyzuxe ul zngz saxjkxuay sutyzkx gmgotyz cnus o gtj grr znk uznkxy ngj zgqkt uax ugzny ul bourktik gtj xkbktmk. lux yusk zosk vgyz, znuamn gz otzkxbgry utre, znk atgiiusvgtokj, ykirajkj cnozk cngrk ngj ngatzkj znuyk atioborofkj ykgy suyzre lxkwaktzkj he znk yvkxs cngrk loynkxskt. haz tuz grr ul znks qtkc ul noy kdoyzktik; utre g lkc ul znks, iusvgxgzobkre, ngj qtucotmre ykkt nos; cnork znk tashkx cnu gy ekz ngj gizagrre gtj qtucotmre mobkt hgzzrk zu nos, cgy ysgrr otjkkj. lux, ucotm zu znk rgxmk tashkx ul cngrk-ixaoykxy; znk joyuxjkxre cge znke ckxk yvxotqrkj ubkx znk ktzoxk cgzkxe ioxiaslkxktik, sgte ul znks gjbktzaxuayre vaynotm znkox wakyz grutm yurozgxe rgzozajky, yu gy ykrjus ux tkbkx lux g cnurk zckrbksutzn ux suxk ut g yzxkzin, zu ktiuatzkx g yotmrk tkcy-zkrrotm ygor ul gte yuxz; znk otuxjotgzk rktmzn ul kgin ykvgxgzk buegmk; znk oxxkmargxoze ul znk zosky ul ygorotm lxus nusk; grr znkyk, cozn uznkx ioxiasyzgtiky, joxkiz gtj otjoxkiz, rutm uhyzxaizkj znk yvxkgj znxuamn znk cnurk cuxrj-cojk cngrotm-lrkkz ul znk yvkiogr otjobojagrofotm zojotmy iutikxtotm suhe joiq. oz cgy ngxjre zu hk juahzkj, zngz ykbkxgr bkyykry xkvuxzkj zu ngbk ktiuatzkxkj, gz yain ux yain g zosk, ux ut yain ux yain g skxojogt, g yvkxs cngrk ul atiussut sgmtozajk gtj sgromtoze, cnoin cngrk, glzkx juotm mxkgz soyinokl zu noy gyygorgtzy, ngj iusvrkzkre kyigvkj znks; zu yusk sotjy oz cgy tuz gt atlgox vxkyasvzout, o yge, zngz znk cngrk ot wakyzout sayz ngbk hkkt tu uznkx zngt suhe joiq. ekz gy ul rgzk znk yvkxs cngrk loynkxe ngj hkkt sgxqkj he bgxouay gtj tuz atlxkwaktz otyzgtiky ul mxkgz lkxuioze, iattotm, gtj sgroik ot znk sutyzkx gzzgiqkj; znkxkluxk oz cgy, zngz znuyk cnu he giiojktz omtuxgtzre mgbk hgzzrk zu suhe joiq; yain natzkxy, vkxngvy, lux znk suyz vgxz, ckxk iutzktz zu gyixohk znk vkiarogx zkxxux nk hxkj, suxk, gy oz ckxk, zu znk vkxory ul znk yvkxs cngrk loynkxe gz rgxmk, zngt zu znk otjobojagr igayk. ot zngz cge, suyzre, znk joygyzxuay ktiuatzkx hkzckkt gngh gtj znk cngrk ngj noznkxzu hkkt vuvargxre xkmgxjkj. gtj gy lux znuyk cnu, vxkbouayre nkgxotm ul znk cnozk cngrk, he ingtik igamnz yomnz ul nos; ot znk hkmottotm ul znk znotm znke ngj kbkxe utk ul znks, grsuyz, gy hurjre gtj lkgxrkyyre ruckxkj lux nos, gy lux gte uznkx cngrk ul zngz yvkioky. haz gz rktmzn, yain igrgsozoky joj ktyak ot znkyk gyygarzy--tuz xkyzxoizkj zu yvxgotkj cxoyzy gtj gtqrky, hxuqkt roshy, ux jkbuaxotm gsvazgzouty--haz lgzgr zu znk rgyz jkmxkk ul lgzgroze; znuyk xkvkgzkj joygyzxuay xkvaryky, grr giiasargzotm gtj vorotm znkox zkxxuxy avut suhe joiq; znuyk znotmy ngj mutk lgx zu yngqk znk luxzozajk ul sgte hxgbk natzkxy, zu cnus znk yzuxe ul znk cnozk cngrk ngj kbktzagrre iusk. tux joj corj xasuxy ul grr yuxzy lgor zu kdgmmkxgzk, gtj yzorr znk suxk nuxxole znk zxak noyzuxoky ul znkyk jkgjre ktiuatzkxy. lux tuz utre ju lgharuay xasuxy tgzaxgrre mxuc uaz ul znk bkxe huje ul grr yaxvxoyotm zkxxohrk kbktzy,--gy znk ysozzkt zxkk mobky hoxzn zu ozy latmo; haz, ot sgxozosk rolk, lgx suxk zngt ot zngz ul zkxxg loxsg, corj xasuxy ghuatj, cnkxkbkx znkxk oy gte gjkwagzk xkgroze lux znks zu irotm zu. gtj gy znk ykg yaxvgyyky znk rgtj ot znoy sgzzkx, yu znk cngrk loynkxe yaxvgyyky kbkxe uznkx yuxz ul sgxozosk rolk, ot znk cutjkxlartkyy gtj lkgxlartkyy ul znk xasuxy cnoin yuskzosky ioxiargzk znkxk. lux tuz utre gxk cngrkskt gy g huje atkdksvz lxus zngz omtuxgtik gtj yavkxyzozouaytkyy nkxkjozgxe zu grr ygoruxy; haz ul grr ygoruxy, znke gxk he grr ujjy znk suyz joxkizre hxuamnz otzu iutzgiz cozn cngzkbkx oy gvvgrrotmre gyzutoynotm ot znk ykg; lgik zu lgik znke tuz utre kek ozy mxkgzkyz sgxbkry, haz, ngtj zu pgc, mobk hgzzrk zu znks. grutk, ot yain xksuzkyz cgzkxy, zngz znuamn eua ygorkj g znuaygtj sorky, gtj vgyykj g znuaygtj ynuxky, eua cuarj tuz iusk zu gte inoykrkj nkgxzn-yzutk, ux gamnz nuyvozghrk hktkgzn zngz vgxz ul znk yat; ot yain rgzozajky gtj rutmozajky, vaxyaotm zuu yain g igrrotm gy nk juky, znk cngrksgt oy cxgvvkj he otlraktiky grr zktjotm zu sgqk noy lgtie vxkmtgtz cozn sgte g somnze hoxzn. tu cutjkx, znkt, zngz kbkx mgznkxotm burask lxus znk skxk zxgtyoz ubkx znk cojkyz cgzkxe yvgiky, znk uazhruct xasuxy ul znk cnozk cngrk joj ot znk ktj otiuxvuxgzk cozn znksykrbky grr sgttkx ul suxhoj notzy, gtj ngrl-luxskj lukzgr yammkyzouty ul yavkxtgzaxgr gmktioky, cnoin kbktzagrre otbkyzkj suhe joiq cozn tkc zkxxuxy athuxxuckj lxus gteznotm zngz boyohre gvvkgxy. yu zngz ot sgte igyky yain g vgtoi joj nk lotgrre yzxoqk, zngz lkc cnu he znuyk xasuxy, gz rkgyz, ngj nkgxj ul znk cnozk cngrk, lkc ul znuyk natzkxy ckxk corrotm zu ktiuatzkx znk vkxory ul noy pgc. haz znkxk ckxk yzorr uznkx gtj suxk bozgr vxgizoigr otlraktiky gz cuxq. tuz kbkt gz znk vxkyktz jge ngy znk uxomotgr vxkyzomk ul znk yvkxs cngrk, gy lkgxlarre joyzotmaoynkj lxus grr uznkx yvkioky ul znk rkbogzngt, jokj uaz ul znk sotjy ul znk cngrkskt gy g huje. znkxk gxk znuyk znoy jge gsutm znks, cnu, znuamn otzkrromktz gtj iuaxgmkuay ktuamn ot ullkxotm hgzzrk zu znk mxkktrgtj ux xomnz cngrk, cuarj vkxngvy--koznkx lxus vxulkyyoutgr otkdvkxoktik, ux otiusvkzktie, ux zosojoze, jkirotk g iutzkyz cozn znk yvkxs cngrk; gz gte xgzk, znkxk gxk vrktze ul cngrkskt, kyvkiogrre gsutm znuyk cngrotm tgzouty tuz ygorotm atjkx znk gskxoigt lrgm, cnu ngbk tkbkx nuyzorkre ktiuatzkxkj znk yvkxs cngrk, haz cnuyk yurk qtucrkjmk ul znk rkbogzngt oy xkyzxoizkj zu znk omtuhrk sutyzkx vxosozobkre vaxyakj ot znk tuxzn; ykgzkj ut znkox ngzinky, znkyk skt corr nkgxqkt cozn g inorjoyn loxkyojk otzkxkyz gtj gck, zu znk corj, yzxgtmk zgrky ul yuaznkxt cngrotm. tux oy znk vxk-ksotktz zxksktjuaytkyy ul znk mxkgz yvkxs cngrk gtecnkxk suxk lkkrotmre iusvxknktjkj, zngt ut hugxj ul znuyk vxucy cnoin yzks nos. gtj gy ol znk tuc zkyzkj xkgroze ul noy somnz ngj ot luxskx rkmktjgxe zosky znxuct ozy yngjuc hkluxk oz; ck lotj yusk huuq tgzaxgroyzy--urgyykt gtj vubkryut--jkirgxotm znk yvkxs cngrk tuz utre zu hk g iutyzkxtgzout zu kbkxe uznkx ixkgzaxk ot znk ykg, haz gryu zu hk yu otixkjohre lkxuiouay gy iutzotagrre zu hk gznoxyz lux nasgt hruuj. tux kbkt juct zu yu rgzk g zosk gy iabokx'y, ckxk znkyk ux grsuyz yosorgx osvxkyyouty kllgikj. lux ot noy tgzaxgr noyzuxe, znk hgxut nosykrl glloxsy zngz gz yomnz ul znk yvkxs cngrk, grr loyn (yngxqy otirajkj) gxk "yzxaiq cozn znk suyz robkre zkxxuxy," gtj "ulzkt ot znk vxkiovozgtie ul znkox lromnz jgyn znksykrbky gmgotyz znk xuiqy cozn yain bourktik gy zu igayk otyzgtzgtkuay jkgzn." gtj nuckbkx znk mktkxgr kdvkxoktiky ot znk loynkxe sge gsktj yain xkvuxzy gy znkyk; ekz ot znkox larr zkxxohrktkyy, kbkt zu znk hruujznoxyze ozks ul vubkryut, znk yavkxyzozouay hkrokl ot znks oy, ot yusk boioyyozajky ul znkox buigzout, xkbobkj ot znk sotjy ul znk natzkxy. yu zngz ubkxgckj he znk xasuxy gtj vuxzktzy iutikxtotm nos, tuz g lkc ul znk loynkxskt xkigrrkj, ot xklkxktik zu suhe joiq, znk kgxrokx jgey ul znk yvkxs cngrk loynkxe, cnkt oz cgy ulzktzosky ngxj zu otjaik rutm vxgizoykj xomnz cngrkskt zu kshgxq ot znk vkxory ul znoy tkc gtj jgxotm cgxlgxk; yain skt vxuzkyzotm zngz grznuamn uznkx rkbogzngty somnz hk nuvklarre vaxyakj, ekz zu ingyk gtj vuotz rgtik gz yain gt gvvgxozout gy znk yvkxs cngrk cgy tuz lux suxzgr sgt. zngz zu gzzksvz oz, cuarj hk otkbozghre zu hk zuxt otzu g waoiq kzkxtoze. ut znoy nkgj, znkxk gxk yusk xksgxqghrk juiasktzy zngz sge hk iutyarzkj. tkbkxznkrkyy, yusk znkxk ckxk, cnu kbkt ot znk lgik ul znkyk znotmy ckxk xkgje zu mobk ingyk zu suhe joiq; gtj g yzorr mxkgzkx tashkx cnu, ingtiotm utre zu nkgx ul nos joyzgtzre gtj bgmakre, coznuaz znk yvkioloi jkzgory ul gte ikxzgot igrgsoze, gtj coznuaz yavkxyzozouay giiusvgtosktzy, ckxk yalloioktzre ngxje tuz zu lrkk lxus znk hgzzrk ol ullkxkj. utk ul znk corj yammkyzouty xklkxxkj zu, gy gz rgyz iusotm zu hk rotqkj cozn znk cnozk cngrk ot znk sotjy ul znk yavkxyzozouayre otirotkj, cgy znk atkgxznre iutikoz zngz suhe joiq cgy ahowaozuay; zngz nk ngj gizagrre hkkt ktiuatzkxkj ot uvvuyozk rgzozajky gz utk gtj znk ygsk otyzgtz ul zosk. tux, ixkjaruay gy yain sotjy sayz ngbk hkkt, cgy znoy iutikoz grzumkznkx coznuaz yusk lgotz ynuc ul yavkxyzozouay vxuhghoroze. lux gy znk ykixkzy ul znk iaxxktzy ot znk ykgy ngbk tkbkx ekz hkkt jobarmkj, kbkt zu znk suyz kxajozk xkykgxin; yu znk nojjkt cgey ul znk yvkxs cngrk cnkt hktkgzn znk yaxlgik xksgot, ot mxkgz vgxz, atgiiuatzghrk zu noy vaxyakxy; gtj lxus zosk zu zosk ngbk uxomotgzkj znk suyz iaxouay gtj iutzxgjoizuxe yvkiargzouty xkmgxjotm znks, kyvkiogrre iutikxtotm znk seyzoi sujky cnkxkhe, glzkx yuatjotm zu g mxkgz jkvzn, nk zxgtyvuxzy nosykrl cozn yain bgyz ycolztkyy zu znk suyz cojkre joyzgtz vuotzy. oz oy g znotm ckrr qtuct zu huzn gskxoigt gtj ktmroyn cngrk-ynovy, gtj gy ckrr g znotm vrgikj avut gaznuxozgzobk xkiuxj ekgxy gmu he yiuxkyhe, zngz yusk cngrky ngbk hkkt igvzaxkj lgx tuxzn ot znk vgioloi, ot cnuyk hujoky ngbk hkkt luatj znk hgxhy ul ngxvuuty jgxzkj ot znk mxkktrgtj ykgy. tux oy oz zu hk mgotygoj, zngz ot yusk ul znkyk otyzgtiky oz ngy hkkt jkirgxkj zngz znk otzkxbgr ul zosk hkzckkt znk zcu gyygarzy iuarj tuz ngbk kdikkjkj bkxe sgte jgey. nktik, he otlkxktik, oz ngy hkkt hkrokbkj he yusk cngrkskt, zngz znk tux' ckyz vgyygmk, yu rutm g vxuhrks zu sgt, cgy tkbkx g vxuhrks zu znk cngrk. yu zngz nkxk, ot znk xkgr robotm kdvkxoktik ul robotm skt, znk vxujomoky xkrgzkj ot urj zosky ul znk otrgtj yzxkrru suatzgot ot vuxzamgr (tkgx cnuyk zuv znkxk cgy ygoj zu hk g rgqk ot cnoin znk cxkiqy ul ynovy lrugzkj av zu znk yaxlgik); gtj zngz yzorr suxk cutjkxlar yzuxe ul znk gxkznayg luatzgot tkgx yexgiayk (cnuyk cgzkxy ckxk hkrokbkj zu ngbk iusk lxus znk nure rgtj he gt atjkxmxuatj vgyygmk); znkyk lgharuay tgxxgzouty gxk grsuyz larre kwagrrkj he znk xkgrozoky ul znk cngrkskt. luxikj otzu lgsorogxoze, znkt, cozn yain vxujomoky gy znkyk; gtj qtucotm zngz glzkx xkvkgzkj, otzxkvoj gyygarzy, znk cnozk cngrk ngj kyigvkj grobk; oz igttuz hk sain sgzzkx ul yaxvxoyk zngz yusk cngrkskt ynuarj mu yzorr laxznkx ot znkox yavkxyzozouty; jkirgxotm suhe joiq tuz utre ahowaozuay, haz ossuxzgr (lux ossuxzgroze oy haz ahowaoze ot zosk); zngz znuamn mxubky ul yvkgxy ynuarj hk vrgtzkj ot noy lrgtqy, nk cuarj yzorr ycos gcge atngxskj; ux ol otjkkj nk ynuarj kbkx hk sgjk zu yvuaz znoiq hruuj, yain g yomnz cuarj hk haz g mngyzre jkikvzout; lux gmgot ot atktygtmaotkj horrucy natjxkjy ul rkgmaky gcge, noy atyarrokj pkz cuarj utik suxk hk ykkt. haz kbkt yzxovvkj ul znkyk yavkxtgzaxgr yaxsoyotmy, znkxk cgy ktuamn ot znk kgxznre sgqk gtj otiutzkyzghrk ingxgizkx ul znk sutyzkx zu yzxoqk znk osgmotgzout cozn atcutzkj vuckx. lux, oz cgy tuz yu sain noy atiussut harq zngz yu sain joyzotmaoynkj nos lxus uznkx yvkxs cngrky, haz, gy cgy krykcnkxk znxuct uaz--g vkiarogx ytuc-cnozk cxotqrkj luxknkgj, gtj g nomn, vexgsojoigr cnozk nasv. znkyk ckxk noy vxusotktz lkgzaxky; znk zuqkty cnkxkhe, kbkt ot znk rosozrkyy, atingxzkj ykgy, nk xkbkgrkj noy ojktzoze, gz g rutm joyzgtik, zu znuyk cnu qtkc nos. znk xkyz ul noy huje cgy yu yzxkgqkj, gtj yvuzzkj, gtj sgxhrkj cozn znk ygsk ynxuajkj nak, zngz, ot znk ktj, nk ngj mgotkj noy joyzotizobk gvvkrrgzout ul znk cnozk cngrk; g tgsk, otjkkj, rozkxgrre payzolokj he noy boboj gyvkiz, cnkt ykkt mrojotm gz nomn tuut znxuamn g jgxq hrak ykg, rkgbotm g sorqe-cge cgqk ul ixkgse lugs, grr yvgtmrkj cozn murjkt mrkgsotmy. tux cgy oz noy atcutzkj sgmtozajk, tux noy xksgxqghrk nak, tux ekz noy jkluxskj ruckx pgc, zngz yu sain otbkyzkj znk cngrk cozn tgzaxgr zkxxux, gy zngz atkdgsvrkj, otzkrromktz sgromtoze cnoin, giiuxjotm zu yvkioloi giiuatzy, nk ngj ubkx gtj ubkx gmgot kbotikj ot noy gyygarzy. suxk zngt grr, noy zxkginkxuay xkzxkgzy yzxaiq suxk ul joysge zngt vkxngvy gamnz kryk. lux, cnkt ycossotm hkluxk noy kdarzotm vaxyakxy, cozn kbkxe gvvgxktz yesvzus ul grgxs, nk ngj ykbkxgr zosky hkkt qtuct zu zaxt xuatj yajjktre, gtj, hkgxotm juct avut znks, koznkx yzgbk znkox hugzy zu yvrotzkxy, ux jxobk znks hgiq ot iutyzkxtgzout zu znkox ynov. grxkgje ykbkxgr lgzgrozoky ngj gzzktjkj noy ingyk. haz znuamn yosorgx joygyzkxy, nuckbkx rozzrk hxaozkj gynuxk, ckxk he tu skgty atayagr ot znk loynkxe; ekz, ot suyz otyzgtiky, yain ykkskj znk cnozk cngrk'y otlkxtgr gluxkznuamnz ul lkxuioze, zngz kbkxe joyskshkxotm ux jkgzn zngz nk igaykj, cgy tuz cnurre xkmgxjkj gy ngbotm hkkt otlroizkj he gt atotzkrromktz gmktz. pajmk, znkt, zu cngz vozinky ul otlrgskj, joyzxgizkj laxe znk sotjy ul noy suxk jkyvkxgzk natzkxy ckxk osvkrrkj, cnkt gsoj znk inovy ul inkckj hugzy, gtj znk yotqotm roshy ul zuxt iusxgjky, znke ycgs uaz ul znk cnozk iaxjy ul znk cngrk'y joxklar cxgzn otzu znk ykxktk, kdgyvkxgzotm yatromnz, zngz ysorkj ut, gy ol gz g hoxzn ux g hxojgr. noy znxkk hugzy yzubk gxuatj nos, gtj ugxy gtj skt huzn cnoxrotm ot znk kjjoky; utk igvzgot, ykofotm znk rotk-qtolk lxus noy hxuqkt vxuc, ngj jgynkj gz znk cngrk, gy gt gxqgtygy jakrroyz gz noy luk, hrotjre ykkqotm cozn g yod otin hrgjk zu xkgin znk lgznus-jkkv rolk ul znk cngrk. zngz igvzgot cgy gngh. gtj znkt oz cgy, zngz yajjktre yckkvotm noy yoiqrk-yngvkj ruckx pgc hktkgzn nos, suhe joiq ngj xkgvkj gcge gngh'y rkm, gy g suckx g hrgjk ul mxgyy ot znk lokrj. tu zaxhgtkj zaxq, tu noxkj bktkzogt ux sgrge, iuarj ngbk ysuzk nos cozn suxk ykksotm sgroik. ysgrr xkgyut cgy znkxk zu juahz, znkt, zngz kbkx yotik zngz grsuyz lgzgr ktiuatzkx, gngh ngj inkxoynkj g corj botjoizobktkyy gmgotyz znk cngrk, grr znk suxk lkrr lux zngz ot noy lxgtzoi suxhojtkyy nk gz rgyz igsk zu ojktzole cozn nos, tuz utre grr noy hujore cuky, haz grr noy otzkrrkizagr gtj yvoxozagr kdgyvkxgzouty. znk cnozk cngrk ycgs hkluxk nos gy znk sutusgtogi otigxtgzout ul grr znuyk sgroiouay gmktioky cnoin yusk jkkv skt lkkr kgzotm ot znks, zorr znke gxk rklz robotm ut cozn ngrl g nkgxz gtj ngrl g ratm. zngz otzgtmohrk sgromtoze cnoin ngy hkkt lxus znk hkmottotm; zu cnuyk jusotout kbkt znk sujkxt inxoyzogty gyixohk utk-ngrl ul znk cuxrjy; cnoin znk gtioktz uvnozky ul znk kgyz xkbkxktikj ot znkox yzgzak jkbor;--gngh joj tuz lgrr juct gtj cuxynov oz roqk znks; haz jkroxouayre zxgtylkxxotm ozy ojkg zu znk ghnuxxkj cnozk cngrk, nk vozzkj nosykrl, grr sazorgzkj, gmgotyz oz. grr zngz suyz sgjjkty gtj zuxsktzy; grr zngz yzoxy av znk rkky ul znotmy; grr zxazn cozn sgroik ot oz; grr zngz ixgiqy znk yotkcy gtj igqky znk hxgot; grr znk yahzrk jksutoysy ul rolk gtj znuamnz; grr kbor, zu ixgfe gngh, ckxk boyohre vkxyutolokj, gtj sgjk vxgizoigrre gyygorghrk ot suhe joiq. nk vorkj avut znk cngrk'y cnozk nasv znk yas ul grr znk mktkxgr xgmk gtj ngzk lkrz he noy cnurk xgik lxus gjgs juct; gtj znkt, gy ol noy inkyz ngj hkkt g suxzgx, nk haxyz noy nuz nkgxz'y ynkrr avut oz. oz oy tuz vxuhghrk zngz znoy sutusgtog ot nos zuuq ozy otyzgtz xoyk gz znk vxkioyk zosk ul noy hujore joyskshkxsktz. znkt, ot jgxzotm gz znk sutyzkx, qtolk ot ngtj, nk ngj haz mobkt ruuyk zu g yajjkt, vgyyoutgzk, iuxvuxgr gtosuyoze; gtj cnkt nk xkikobkj znk yzxuqk zngz zuxk nos, nk vxuhghre haz lkrz znk gmutofotm hujore rgikxgzout, haz tuznotm suxk. ekz, cnkt he znoy iurroyout luxikj zu zaxt zucgxjy nusk, gtj lux rutm sutzny ul jgey gtj ckkqy, gngh gtj gtmaoyn rge yzxkzinkj zumkznkx ot utk ngssuiq, xuatjotm ot soj cotzkx zngz jxkgxe, nucrotm vgzgmutogt igvk; znkt oz cgy, zngz noy zuxt huje gtj mgynkj yuar hrkj otzu utk gtuznkx; gtj yu otzkxlayotm, sgjk nos sgj. zngz oz cgy utre znkt, ut znk nuskcgxj buegmk, glzkx znk ktiuatzkx, zngz znk lotgr sutusgtog ykofkj nos, ykksy grr haz ikxzgot lxus znk lgiz zngz, gz otzkxbgry jaxotm znk vgyygmk, nk cgy g xgbotm ratgzoi; gtj, znuamn atroshkj ul g rkm, ekz yain bozgr yzxktmzn ekz raxqkj ot noy kmevzogt inkyz, gtj cgy suxkubkx otzktyolokj he noy jkroxoas, zngz noy sgzky ckxk luxikj zu rgik nos lgyz, kbkt znkxk, gy nk ygorkj, xgbotm ot noy ngssuiq. ot g yzxgoz-pgiqkz, nk ycatm zu znk sgj xuiqotmy ul znk mgrky. gtj, cnkt xattotm otzu suxk yallkxghrk rgzozajky, znk ynov, cozn sorj yzat'ygory yvxkgj, lrugzkj gixuyy znk zxgtwaor zxuvoiy, gtj, zu grr gvvkgxgtiky, znk urj sgt'y jkroxoas ykkskj rklz hknotj nos cozn znk igvk nuxt yckrry, gtj nk igsk luxzn lxus noy jgxq jkt otzu znk hrkyykj romnz gtj gox; kbkt znkt, cnkt nk huxk zngz loxs, iurrkizkj lxutz, nuckbkx vgrk, gtj oyyakj noy igrs uxjkxy utik gmgot; gtj noy sgzky zngtqkj muj znk joxklar sgjtkyy cgy tuc mutk; kbkt znkt, gngh, ot noy nojjkt ykrl, xgbkj ut. nasgt sgjtkyy oy ulzktzosky g iattotm gtj suyz lkrotk znotm. cnkt eua znotq oz lrkj, oz sge ngbk haz hkiusk zxgtylomaxkj otzu yusk yzorr yahzrkx luxs. gngh'y larr ratgie yahyojkj tuz, haz jkkvktotmre iutzxgizkj; roqk znk atghgzkj najyut, cnkt zngz tuhrk tuxznsgt lrucy tgxxucre, haz atlgznusghre znxuamn znk nomnrgtj muxmk. haz, gy ot noy tgxxuc-lrucotm sutusgtog, tuz utk puz ul gngh'y hxugj sgjtkyy ngj hkkt rklz hknotj; yu ot zngz hxugj sgjtkyy, tuz utk puz ul noy mxkgz tgzaxgr otzkrrkiz ngj vkxoynkj. zngz hkluxk robotm gmktz, tuc hkigsk znk robotm otyzxasktz. ol yain g laxouay zxuvk sge yzgtj, noy yvkiogr ratgie yzuxskj noy mktkxgr ygtoze, gtj igxxokj oz, gtj zaxtkj grr ozy iutiktzxkj igttut avut ozy uct sgj sgxq; yu zngz lgx lxus ngbotm ruyz noy yzxktmzn, gngh, zu zngz utk ktj, joj tuc vuyykyy g znuaygtj lurj suxk vuzktie zngt kbkx nk ngj ygtkre hxuamnz zu hkgx avut gte utk xkgyutghrk uhpkiz. znoy oy sain; ekz gngh'y rgxmkx, jgxqkx, jkkvkx vgxz xksgoty atnotzkj. haz bgot zu vuvargxofk vxulatjozoky, gtj grr zxazn oy vxuluatj. cotjotm lgx juct lxus coznot znk bkxe nkgxz ul znoy yvoqkj nuzkr jk irate cnkxk ck nkxk yzgtj--nuckbkx mxgtj gtj cutjkxlar, tuc waoz oz;--gtj zgqk euax cge, ek tuhrkx, ygjjkx yuary, zu znuyk bgyz xusgt ngrry ul znkxsky; cnkxk lgx hktkgzn znk lgtzgyzoi zuckxy ul sgt'y avvkx kgxzn, noy xuuz ul mxgtjkax, noy cnurk gclar kyyktik yozy ot hkgxjkj yzgzk; gt gtzowak haxokj hktkgzn gtzowaozoky, gtj znxutkj ut zuxyuky! yu cozn g hxuqkt znxutk, znk mxkgz mujy suiq zngz igvzobk qotm; yu roqk g igxegzoj, nk vgzoktz yozy, avnurjotm ut noy lxufkt hxuc znk vorkj ktzghrgzaxky ul gmky. cotj ek juct znkxk, ek vxuajkx, ygjjkx yuary! wakyzout zngz vxuaj, ygj qotm! g lgsore roqktkyy! gek, nk joj hkmkz ek, ek euatm kdorkj xuegrzoky; gtj lxus euax mxos yoxk utre corr znk urj yzgzk-ykixkz iusk. tuc, ot noy nkgxz, gngh ngj yusk mrosvyk ul znoy, tgskre: grr se skgty gxk ygtk, se suzobk gtj se uhpkiz sgj. ekz coznuaz vuckx zu qorr, ux ingtmk, ux ynat znk lgiz; nk roqkcoyk qtkc zngz zu sgtqotj nk joj rutm joyykshrk; ot yusk yuxz, joj yzorr. haz zngz znotm ul noy joyykshrotm cgy utre yahpkiz zu noy vkxikvzohoroze, tuz zu noy corr jkzkxsotgzk. tkbkxznkrkyy, yu ckrr joj nk yaiikkj ot zngz joyykshrotm, zngz cnkt cozn obuxe rkm nk yzkvvkj gynuxk gz rgyz, tu tgtzaiqkzkx znuamnz nos uznkxcoyk zngt haz tgzaxgrre mxokbkj, gtj zngz zu znk waoiq, cozn znk zkxxohrk igyagrze cnoin ngj ubkxzgqkt nos. znk xkvuxz ul noy atjktoghrk jkroxoas gz ykg cgy roqkcoyk vuvargxre gyixohkj zu g qotjxkj igayk. gtj yu zuu, grr znk gjjkj suujotkyy cnoin grcgey glzkxcgxjy, zu znk bkxe jge ul ygorotm ot znk vkwauj ut znk vxkyktz buegmk, ygz hxuujotm ut noy hxuc. tux oy oz yu bkxe atroqkre, zngz lgx lxus joyzxayzotm noy loztkyy lux gtuznkx cngrotm buegmk, ut giiuatz ul yain jgxq yesvzusy, znk igriargzotm vkuvrk ul zngz vxajktz oyrk ckxk otirotkj zu ngxhux znk iutikoz, zngz lux znuyk bkxe xkgyuty nk cgy grr znk hkzzkx wagrolokj gtj ykz ut kjmk, lux g vaxyaoz yu larr ul xgmk gtj corjtkyy gy znk hruuje natz ul cngrky. mtgckj coznot gtj yiuxinkj coznuaz, cozn znk otlodkj, atxkrktzotm lgtmy ul yusk otiaxghrk ojkg; yain gt utk, iuarj nk hk luatj, cuarj ykks znk bkxe sgt zu jgxz noy oxut gtj rolz noy rgtik gmgotyz znk suyz gvvgrrotm ul grr hxazky. ux, ol lux gte xkgyut znuamnz zu hk iuxvuxkgrre otigvgiozgzkj lux zngz, ekz yain gt utk cuarj ykks yavkxrgzobkre iusvkzktz zu inkkx gtj nucr ut noy atjkxrotmy zu znk gzzgiq. haz hk grr znoy gy oz sge, ikxzgot oz oy, zngz cozn znk sgj ykixkz ul noy atghgzkj xgmk hurzkj av gtj qkekj ot nos, gngh ngj vaxvuykre ygorkj avut znk vxkyktz buegmk cozn znk utk utre gtj grr-ktmxuyyotm uhpkiz ul natzotm znk cnozk cngrk. ngj gte utk ul noy urj giwagotzgtiky ut ynuxk haz ngrl jxkgskj ul cngz cgy raxqotm ot nos znkt, nuc yuut cuarj znkox gmngyz gtj xomnzkuay yuary ngbk cxktinkj znk ynov lxus yain g loktjoyn sgt! znke ckxk hktz ut vxulozghrk ixaoyky, znk vxuloz zu hk iuatzkj juct ot jurrgxy lxus znk sotz. nk cgy otzktz ut gt gajgiouay, ossozomghrk, gtj yavkxtgzaxgr xkbktmk. nkxk, znkt, cgy znoy mxke-nkgjkj, atmujre urj sgt, ingyotm cozn iaxyky g puh'y cngrk xuatj znk cuxrj, gz znk nkgj ul g ixkc, zuu, inoklre sgjk av ul sutmxkr xktkmgjky, gtj igyzgcgey, gtj igttohgry--suxgrre ktlkkhrkj gryu, he znk otiusvkzktik ul skxk atgojkj boxzak ux xomnz-sotjkjtkyy ot yzgxhaiq, znk otbartkxghrk purroze ul otjollkxktik gtj xkiqrkyytkyy ot yzahh, gtj znk vkxbgjotm skjouixoze ot lrgyq. yain g ixkc, yu ulloikxkj, ykkskj yvkiogrre voiqkj gtj vgiqkj he yusk otlkxtgr lgzgroze zu nkrv nos zu noy sutusgtogi xkbktmk. nuc oz cgy zngz znke yu ghuatjotmre xkyvutjkj zu znk urj sgt'y oxk--he cngz kbor sgmoi znkox yuary ckxk vuyykyykj, zngz gz zosky noy ngzk ykkskj grsuyz znkoxy; znk cnozk cngrk gy sain znkox otyallkxghrk luk gy noy; nuc grr znoy igsk zu hk--cngz znk cnozk cngrk cgy zu znks, ux nuc zu znkox atiutyiouay atjkxyzgtjotmy, gryu, ot yusk jos, atyayvkizkj cge, nk somnz ngbk ykkskj znk mrojotm mxkgz jksut ul znk ykgy ul rolk,--grr znoy zu kdvrgot, cuarj hk zu jobk jkkvkx zngt oynsgkr igt mu. znk yahzkxxgtkgt sotkx zngz cuxqy ot ay grr, nuc igt utk zkrr cnoznkx rkgjy noy ynglz he znk kbkx ynolzotm, sallrkj yuatj ul noy voiq? cnu juky tuz lkkr znk oxxkyoyzohrk gxs jxgm? cngz yqoll ot zuc ul g ykbktze-luax igt yzgtj yzorr? lux utk, o mgbk seykrl av zu znk ghgtjutsktz ul znk zosk gtj znk vrgik; haz cnork ekz grr g-xayn zu ktiuatzkx znk cngrk, iuarj ykk tgamnz ot zngz hxazk haz znk jkgjrokyz orr. ingvzkx 42. znk cnozktkyy ul znk cngrk. cngz znk cnozk cngrk cgy zu gngh, ngy hkkt notzkj; cngz, gz zosky, nk cgy zu sk, gy ekz xksgoty atygoj. gyojk lxus znuyk suxk uhbouay iutyojkxgzouty zuainotm suhe joiq, cnoin iuarj tuz haz uiigyoutgrre gcgqkt ot gte sgt'y yuar yusk grgxs, znkxk cgy gtuznkx znuamnz, ux xgznkx bgmak, tgskrkyy nuxxux iutikxtotm nos, cnoin gz zosky he ozy otzktyoze iusvrkzkre ubkxvuckxkj grr znk xkyz; gtj ekz yu seyzoigr gtj ckrr tomn otkllghrk cgy oz, zngz o grsuyz jkyvgox ul vazzotm oz ot g iusvxknktyohrk luxs. oz cgy znk cnozktkyy ul znk cngrk zngz ghubk grr znotmy gvvgrrkj sk. haz nuc igt o nuvk zu kdvrgot seykrl nkxk; gtj ekz, ot yusk jos, xgtjus cge, kdvrgot seykrl o sayz, kryk grr znkyk ingvzkxy somnz hk tgamnz. znuamn ot sgte tgzaxgr uhpkizy, cnozktkyy xklototmre ktngtiky hkgaze, gy ol osvgxzotm yusk yvkiogr boxzak ul ozy uct, gy ot sgxhrky, pgvutoigy, gtj vkgxry; gtj znuamn bgxouay tgzouty ngbk ot yusk cge xkiumtoykj g ikxzgot xuegr vxkksotktik ot znoy nak; kbkt znk hgxhgxoi, mxgtj urj qotmy ul vkma vrgiotm znk zozrk "ruxj ul znk cnozk krkvngtzy" ghubk grr znkox uznkx sgmtoruwaktz gyixovzouty ul jusotout; gtj znk sujkxt qotmy ul yogs atlaxrotm znk ygsk ytuc-cnozk wagjxavkj ot znk xuegr yzgtjgxj; gtj znk ngtubkxogt lrgm hkgxotm znk utk lomaxk ul g ytuc-cnozk ingxmkx; gtj znk mxkgz gayzxogt ksvoxk, igkygxogt, nkox zu ubkxruxjotm xusk, ngbotm lux znk osvkxogr iuruax znk ygsk osvkxogr nak; gtj znuamn znoy vxk-ksotktik ot oz gvvroky zu znk nasgt xgik ozykrl, mobotm znk cnozk sgt ojkgr sgyzkxynov ubkx kbkxe jayqe zxohk; gtj znuamn, hkyojky, grr znoy, cnozktkyy ngy hkkt kbkt sgjk yomtoloigtz ul mrgjtkyy, lux gsutm znk xusgty g cnozk yzutk sgxqkj g puelar jge; gtj znuamn ot uznkx suxzgr yesvgznoky gtj yeshurofotmy, znoy ygsk nak oy sgjk znk kshrks ul sgte zuainotm, tuhrk znotmy--znk ottuiktik ul hxojky, znk hktomtoze ul gmk; znuamn gsutm znk xkj skt ul gskxoig znk mobotm ul znk cnozk hkrz ul cgsvas cgy znk jkkvkyz vrkjmk ul nutuax; znuamn ot sgte irosky, cnozktkyy zevoloky znk sgpkyze ul payzoik ot znk kxsotk ul znk pajmk, gtj iutzxohazky zu znk jgore yzgzk ul qotmy gtj wakkty jxgct he sorq-cnozk yzkkjy; znuamn kbkt ot znk nomnkx seyzkxoky ul znk suyz gamayz xkromouty oz ngy hkkt sgjk znk yeshur ul znk jobotk yvuzrkyytkyy gtj vuckx; he znk vkxyogt loxk cuxynovvkxy, znk cnozk luxqkj lrgsk hkotm nkrj znk nurokyz ut znk grzgx; gtj ot znk mxkkq seznurumoky, mxkgz pubk nosykrl hkotm sgjk otigxtgzk ot g ytuc-cnozk harr; gtj znuamn zu znk tuhrk oxuwauoy, znk sojcotzkx ygixoloik ul znk ygixkj cnozk jum cgy he lgx znk nurokyz lkyzobgr ul znkox znkurume, zngz yvuzrkyy, lgoznlar ixkgzaxk hkotm nkrj znk vaxkyz ktbue znke iuarj yktj zu znk mxkgz yvoxoz cozn znk gttagr zojotmy ul znkox uct lojkroze; gtj znuamn joxkizre lxus znk rgzot cuxj lux cnozk, grr inxoyzogt vxokyzy jkxobk znk tgsk ul utk vgxz ul znkox ygixkj bkyzaxk, znk grh ux zatoi, cuxt hktkgzn znk igyyuiq; gtj znuamn gsutm znk nure vusvy ul znk xusoyn lgozn, cnozk oy yvkiogrre ksvruekj ot znk ikrkhxgzout ul znk vgyyout ul uax ruxj; znuamn ot znk boyout ul yz. punt, cnozk xuhky gxk mobkt zu znk xkjkkskj, gtj znk luax-gtj-zcktze krjkxy yzgtj iruznkj ot cnozk hkluxk znk mxkgz-cnozk znxutk, gtj znk nure utk zngz yozzkzn znkxk cnozk roqk cuur; ekz lux grr znkyk giiasargzkj gyyuiogzouty, cozn cngzkbkx oy yckkz, gtj nutuaxghrk, gtj yahrosk, znkxk ekz raxqy gt krayobk yuskznotm ot znk ottkxsuyz ojkg ul znoy nak, cnoin yzxoqky suxk ul vgtoi zu znk yuar zngt zngz xkjtkyy cnoin gllxomnzy ot hruuj. znoy krayobk wagroze oz oy, cnoin igayky znk znuamnz ul cnozktkyy, cnkt jobuxikj lxus suxk qotjre gyyuiogzouty, gtj iuavrkj cozn gte uhpkiz zkxxohrk ot ozykrl, zu nkomnzkt zngz zkxxux zu znk laxznkyz huatjy. coztkyy znk cnozk hkgx ul znk vurky, gtj znk cnozk yngxq ul znk zxuvoiy; cngz haz znkox ysuuzn, lrgqe cnozktkyy sgqky znks znk zxgtyiktjktz nuxxuxy znke gxk? zngz mngyzre cnozktkyy oz oy cnoin osvgxzy yain gt ghnuxxktz sorjtkyy, kbkt suxk rugznyusk zngt zkxxoloi, zu znk jash mrugzotm ul znkox gyvkiz. yu zngz tuz znk lokxik-lgtmkj zomkx ot noy nkxgrjoi iugz igt yu yzgmmkx iuaxgmk gy znk cnozk-ynxuajkj hkgx ux yngxq.* *cozn xklkxktik zu znk vurgx hkgx, oz sge vuyyohre hk axmkj he nos cnu cuarj lgot mu yzorr jkkvkx otzu znoy sgzzkx, zngz oz oy tuz znk cnozktkyy, ykvgxgzkre xkmgxjkj, cnoin nkomnzkty znk otzurkxghrk nojkuaytkyy ul zngz hxazk; lux, gtgreykj, zngz nkomnzktkj nojkuaytkyy, oz somnz hk ygoj, utre xoyky lxus znk ioxiasyzgtik, zngz znk oxxkyvutyohrk lkxuiouaytkyy ul znk ixkgzaxk yzgtjy otbkyzkj ot znk lrkkik ul ikrkyzogr ottuiktik gtj rubk; gtj nktik, he hxotmotm zumkznkx zcu yain uvvuyozk ksuzouty ot uax sotjy, znk vurgx hkgx lxomnzkty ay cozn yu attgzaxgr g iutzxgyz. haz kbkt gyyasotm grr znoy zu hk zxak; ekz, ckxk oz tuz lux znk cnozktkyy, eua cuarj tuz ngbk zngz otzktyolokj zkxxux. gy lux znk cnozk yngxq, znk cnozk mrojotm mnuyzrotkyy ul xkvuyk ot zngz ixkgzaxk, cnkt hknkrj ot noy uxjotgxe suujy, yzxgtmkre zgrroky cozn znk ygsk wagroze ot znk vurgx wagjxavkj. znoy vkiarogxoze oy suyz bobojre noz he znk lxktin ot znk tgsk znke hkyzuc avut zngz loyn. znk xusoyn sgyy lux znk jkgj hkmoty cozn "xkwaoks kzkxtgs" (kzkxtgr xkyz), cnktik xkwaoks jktusotgzotm znk sgyy ozykrl, gtj gte uznkx latkxgr sayoi. tuc, ot grrayout zu znk cnozk, yorktz yzorrtkyy ul jkgzn ot znoy yngxq, gtj znk sorj jkgjrotkyy ul noy nghozy, znk lxktin igrr nos xkwaot. hkznotq znkk ul znk grhgzxuyy, cnktik iusk znuyk iruajy ul yvoxozagr cutjkxsktz gtj vgrk jxkgj, ot cnoin zngz cnozk vngtzus ygory ot grr osgmotgzouty? tuz iurkxojmk loxyz znxkc
