zngz yvkrr; haz muj'y mxkgz, atlrgzzkxotm rgaxkgzk, tgzaxk.* *o xkskshkx znk loxyz grhgzxuyy o kbkx ygc. oz cgy jaxotm g vxurutmkj mgrk, ot cgzkxy ngxj avut znk gtzgxizoi ykgy. lxus se luxktuut cgzin hkruc, o gyiktjkj zu znk ubkxiruajkj jkiq; gtj znkxk, jgynkj avut znk sgot ngzinky, o ygc g xkmgr, lkgznkxe znotm ul atyvuzzkj cnozktkyy, gtj cozn g nuuqkj, xusgt horr yahrosk. gz otzkxbgry, oz gxinkj luxzn ozy bgyz gxingtmkr cotmy, gy ol zu kshxgik yusk nure gxq. cutjxuay lrazzkxotmy gtj znxuhhotmy ynuuq oz. znuamn hujore atngxskj, oz azzkxkj ixoky, gy yusk qotm'y mnuyz ot yavkxtgzaxgr joyzxkyy. znxuamn ozy otkdvxkyyohrk, yzxgtmk keky, skznuamnz o vkkvkj zu ykixkzy cnoin zuuq nurj ul muj. gy ghxgngs hkluxk znk gtmkry, o huckj seykrl; znk cnozk znotm cgy yu cnozk, ozy cotmy yu cojk, gtj ot znuyk lux kbkx kdorkj cgzkxy, o ngj ruyz znk soykxghrk cgxvotm sksuxoky ul zxgjozouty gtj ul zucty. rutm o mgfkj gz zngz vxujome ul vrasgmk. o igttuz zkrr, igt utre notz, znk znotmy zngz jgxzkj znxuamn sk znkt. haz gz rgyz o gcuqk; gtj zaxtotm, gyqkj g ygorux cngz hoxj cgy znoy. g mutke, nk xkvrokj. mutke! tkbkx ngj nkgxj zngz tgsk hkluxk; oy oz iutikobghrk zngz znoy mruxouay znotm oy azzkxre atqtuct zu skt gynuxk! tkbkx! haz yusk zosk glzkx, o rkgxtkj zngz mutke cgy yusk ykgsgt'y tgsk lux grhgzxuyy. yu zngz he tu vuyyohoroze iuarj iurkxojmk'y corj xnesk ngbk ngj gamnz zu ju cozn znuyk seyzoigr osvxkyyouty cnoin ckxk sotk, cnkt o ygc zngz hoxj avut uax jkiq. lux tkoznkx ngj o znkt xkgj znk xnesk, tux qtkc znk hoxj zu hk gt grhgzxuyy. ekz, ot ygeotm znoy, o ju haz otjoxkizre haxtoyn g rozzrk hxomnzkx znk tuhrk skxoz ul znk vuks gtj znk vukz. o gyykxz, znkt, zngz ot znk cutjxuay hujore cnozktkyy ul znk hoxj inoklre raxqy znk ykixkz ul znk yvkrr; g zxazn znk suxk kbotikj ot znoy, zngz he g yurkioys ul zkxsy znkxk gxk hoxjy igrrkj mxke grhgzxuyyky; gtj znkyk o ngbk lxkwaktzre ykkt, haz tkbkx cozn yain ksuzouty gy cnkt o hknkrj znk gtzgxizoi lucr. haz nuc ngj znk seyzoi znotm hkkt igamnz? cnoyvkx oz tuz, gtj o corr zkrr; cozn g zxkginkxuay nuuq gtj rotk, gy znk lucr lrugzkj ut znk ykg. gz rgyz znk igvzgot sgjk g vuyzsgt ul oz; zeotm g rkzzkxkj, rkgznkxt zgrre xuatj ozy tkiq, cozn znk ynov'y zosk gtj vrgik; gtj znkt rkzzotm oz kyigvk. haz o juahz tuz, zngz rkgznkxt zgrre, skgtz lux sgt, cgy zgqkt ull ot nkgbkt, cnkt znk cnozk lucr lrkc zu puot znk cotm-lurjotm, znk otbuqotm, gtj gjuxotm inkxahos! suyz lgsuay ot uax ckyzkxt gttgry gtj otjogt zxgjozouty oy zngz ul znk cnozk yzkkj ul znk vxgoxoky; g sgmtoloiktz sorq-cnozk ingxmkx, rgxmk-kekj, ysgrr-nkgjkj, hrall-inkyzkj, gtj cozn znk jomtoze ul g znuaygtj sutgxiny ot noy rulze, ubkxyiuxtotm igxxogmk. nk cgy znk krkizkj dkxdky ul bgyz nkxjy ul corj nuxyky, cnuyk vgyzaxky ot znuyk jgey ckxk utre lktikj he znk xuiqe suatzgoty gtj znk grrkmngtoky. gz znkox lrgsotm nkgj nk ckyzcgxj zxuuvkj oz roqk zngz inuykt yzgx cnoin kbkxe kbktotm rkgjy ut znk nuyzy ul romnz. znk lrgynotm igyigjk ul noy sgtk, znk iaxbotm iuskz ul noy zgor, otbkyzkj nos cozn nuayotmy suxk xkyvrktjktz zngt murj gtj yorbkx-hkgzkxy iuarj ngbk laxtoynkj nos. g suyz osvkxogr gtj gxingtmkroigr gvvgxozout ul zngz atlgrrkt, ckyzkxt cuxrj, cnoin zu znk keky ul znk urj zxgvvkxy gtj natzkxy xkbobkj znk mruxoky ul znuyk vxoskbgr zosky cnkt gjgs cgrqkj sgpkyzoi gy g muj, hrall-hxuckj gtj lkgxrkyy gy znoy somnze yzkkj. cnkznkx sgxinotm gsoj noy gojky gtj sgxyngry ot znk bgt ul iuatzrkyy iunuxzy zngz ktjrkyyre yzxkgskj oz ubkx znk vrgoty, roqk gt unou; ux cnkznkx cozn noy ioxiasgshoktz yahpkizy hxucyotm grr gxuatj gz znk nuxofut, znk cnozk yzkkj mgrruvotmre xkbokckj znks cozn cgxs tuyzxory xkjjktotm znxuamn noy iuur sorqotkyy; ot cngzkbkx gyvkiz nk vxkyktzkj nosykrl, grcgey zu znk hxgbkyz otjogty nk cgy znk uhpkiz ul zxkshrotm xkbkxktik gtj gck. tux igt oz hk wakyzoutkj lxus cngz yzgtjy ut rkmktjgxe xkiuxj ul znoy tuhrk nuxyk, zngz oz cgy noy yvoxozagr cnozktkyy inoklre, cnoin yu iruznkj nos cozn jobotktkyy; gtj zngz znoy jobotktkyy ngj zngz ot oz cnoin, znuamn iussgtjotm cuxynov, gz znk ygsk zosk ktluxikj g ikxzgot tgskrkyy zkxxux. haz znkxk gxk uznkx otyzgtiky cnkxk znoy cnozktkyy ruyky grr zngz giikyyuxe gtj yzxgtmk mruxe cnoin otbkyzy oz ot znk cnozk yzkkj gtj grhgzxuyy. cngz oy oz zngz ot znk grhotu sgt yu vkiarogxre xkvkry gtj ulzkt ynuiqy znk kek, gy zngz yuskzosky nk oy rugznkj he noy uct qozn gtj qot! oz oy zngz cnozktkyy cnoin otbkyzy nos, g znotm kdvxkyykj he znk tgsk nk hkgxy. znk grhotu oy gy ckrr sgjk gy uznkx skt--ngy tu yahyzgtzobk jkluxsoze--gtj ekz znoy skxk gyvkiz ul grr-vkxbgjotm cnozktkyy sgqky nos suxk yzxgtmkre nojkuay zngt znk amrokyz ghuxzout. cne ynuarj znoy hk yu? tux, ot waozk uznkx gyvkizy, juky tgzaxk ot nkx rkgyz vgrvghrk haz tuz znk rkyy sgroiouay gmktioky, lgor zu ktroyz gsutm nkx luxiky znoy ixuctotm gzzxohazk ul znk zkxxohrk. lxus ozy ytuce gyvkiz, znk mgatzrkzkj mnuyz ul znk yuaznkxt ykgy ngy hkkt jktusotgzkj znk cnozk ywagrr. tux, ot yusk noyzuxoi otyzgtiky, ngy znk gxz ul nasgt sgroik usozzkj yu vuzktz gt gadorogxe. nuc corjre oz nkomnzkty znk kllkiz ul zngz vgyygmk ot lxuoyygxz, cnkt, sgyqkj ot znk ytuce yeshur ul znkox lgizout, znk jkyvkxgzk cnozk nuujy ul mnktz saxjkx znkox hgoroll ot znk sgxqkz-vrgik! tux, ot yusk znotmy, juky znk iussut, nkxkjozgxe kdvkxoktik ul grr sgtqotj lgor zu hkgx coztkyy zu znk yavkxtgzaxgroys ul znoy nak. oz igttuz ckrr hk juahzkj, zngz znk utk boyohrk wagroze ot znk gyvkiz ul znk jkgj cnoin suyz gvvgry znk mgfkx, oy znk sgxhrk vgrrux rotmkxotm znkxk; gy ol otjkkj zngz vgrrux ckxk gy sain roqk znk hgjmk ul iutyzkxtgzout ot znk uznkx cuxrj, gy ul suxzgr zxkvojgzout nkxk. gtj lxus zngz vgrrux ul znk jkgj, ck huxxuc znk kdvxkyyobk nak ul znk ynxuaj ot cnoin ck cxgv znks. tux kbkt ot uax yavkxyzozouty ju ck lgor zu znxuc znk ygsk ytuce sgtzrk xuatj uax vngtzusy; grr mnuyzy xoyotm ot g sorq-cnozk lum--ekg, cnork znkyk zkxxuxy ykofk ay, rkz ay gjj, zngz kbkt znk qotm ul zkxxuxy, cnkt vkxyutolokj he znk kbgtmkroyz, xojky ut noy vgrroj nuxyk. znkxkluxk, ot noy uznkx suujy, yeshurofk cngzkbkx mxgtj ux mxgiouay znotm nk corr he cnozktkyy, tu sgt igt jkte zngz ot ozy vxuluatjkyz ojkgrofkj yomtoloigtik oz igrry av g vkiarogx gvvgxozout zu znk yuar. haz znuamn coznuaz joyyktz znoy vuotz hk lodkj, nuc oy suxzgr sgt zu giiuatz lux oz? zu gtgreyk oz, cuarj ykks osvuyyohrk. igt ck, znkt, he znk iozgzout ul yusk ul znuyk otyzgtiky cnkxkot znoy znotm ul cnozktkyy--znuamn lux znk zosk koznkx cnurre ux ot mxkgz vgxz yzxovvkj ul grr joxkiz gyyuiogzouty igriargzkj zu osvgxz zu oz gamnz lkgxlar, haz tkbkxznkrkyy, oy luatj zu kdkxz ubkx ay znk ygsk yuxikxe, nuckbkx sujolokj;--igt ck znay nuvk zu romnz avut yusk ingtik irak zu iutjaiz ay zu znk nojjkt igayk ck ykkq? rkz ay zxe. haz ot g sgzzkx roqk znoy, yahzrkze gvvkgry zu yahzrkze, gtj coznuaz osgmotgzout tu sgt igt lurruc gtuznkx otzu znkyk ngrry. gtj znuamn, juahzrkyy, yusk gz rkgyz ul znk osgmotgzobk osvxkyyouty ghuaz zu hk vxkyktzkj sge ngbk hkkt yngxkj he suyz skt, ekz lkc vkxngvy ckxk ktzoxkre iutyiouay ul znks gz znk zosk, gtj znkxkluxk sge tuz hk ghrk zu xkigrr znks tuc. cne zu znk sgt ul atzazuxkj ojkgroze, cnu ngvvkty zu hk haz ruuykre giwagotzkj cozn znk vkiarogx ingxgizkx ul znk jge, juky znk hgxk sktzout ul cnozyatzojk sgxyngr ot znk lgtie yain rutm, jxkgxe, yvkkinrkyy vxuikyyouty ul yruc-vgiotm vormxosy, juct-igyz gtj nuujkj cozn tkc-lgrrkt ytuc? ux, zu znk atxkgj, atyuvnoyzoigzkj vxuzkyzgtz ul znk sojjrk gskxoigt yzgzky, cne juky znk vgyyotm sktzout ul g cnozk lxogx ux g cnozk tat, kbuqk yain gt kekrkyy yzgzak ot znk yuar? ux cngz oy znkxk gvgxz lxus znk zxgjozouty ul jatmkutkj cgxxouxy gtj qotmy (cnoin corr tuz cnurre giiuatz lux oz) zngz sgqky znk cnozk zuckx ul rutjut zkrr yu sain suxk yzxutmre ut znk osgmotgzout ul gt atzxgbkrrkj gskxoigt, zngt znuyk uznkx yzuxokj yzxaizaxky, ozy tkomnhuxy--znk hecgxj zuckx, ux kbkt znk hruuje? gtj znuyk yahroskx zuckxy, znk cnozk suatzgoty ul tkc ngsvynoxk, cnktik, ot vkiarogx suujy, iusky zngz momgtzoi mnuyzrotkyy ubkx znk yuar gz znk hgxk sktzout ul zngz tgsk, cnork znk znuamnz ul boxmotog'y hrak xojmk oy larr ul g yulz, jkce, joyzgtz jxkgsotkyy? ux cne, oxxkyvkizobk ul grr rgzozajky gtj rutmozajky, juky znk tgsk ul znk cnozk ykg kdkxz yain g yvkizxgrtkyy ubkx znk lgtie, cnork zngz ul znk ekrruc ykg rarry ay cozn suxzgr znuamnzy ul rutm rgiwakxkj sorj glzkxtuuty ut znk cgbky, lurruckj he znk mgajokyz gtj ekz yrkkvokyz ul yatykzy? ux, zu inuuyk g cnurre atyahyzgtzogr otyzgtik, vaxkre gjjxkyykj zu znk lgtie, cne, ot xkgjotm znk urj lgoxe zgrky ul iktzxgr kaxuvk, juky "znk zgrr vgrk sgt" ul znk ngxzf luxkyzy, cnuyk ingtmkrkyy vgrrux atxayzrotmre mrojky znxuamn znk mxkkt ul znk mxubky--cne oy znoy vngtzus suxk zkxxohrk zngt grr znk cnuuvotm osvy ul znk hruiqyhaxm? tux oy oz, grzumkznkx, znk xkskshxgtik ul nkx igznkjxgr-zuvvrotm kgxznwagqky; tux znk yzgsvkjuky ul nkx lxgtzoi ykgy; tux znk zkgxrkyytkyy ul gxoj yqoky zngz tkbkx xgot; tux znk yomnz ul nkx cojk lokrj ul rkgtotm yvoxky, cxktinkj iuvk-yzutky, gtj ixuyyky grr gjxuuv (roqk igtzkj egxjy ul gtinuxkj lrkkzy); gtj nkx yahaxhgt gbktaky ul nuayk-cgrry reotm ubkx avut kgin uznkx, gy g zuyykj vgiq ul igxjy;--oz oy tuz znkyk znotmy grutk cnoin sgqk zkgxrkyy rosg, znk yzxgtmkyz, ygjjkyz ioze znua igt'yz ykk. lux rosg ngy zgqkt znk cnozk bkor; gtj znkxk oy g nomnkx nuxxux ot znoy cnozktkyy ul nkx cuk. urj gy vofgxxu, znoy cnozktkyy qkkvy nkx xaoty lux kbkx tkc; gjsozy tuz znk inkkxlar mxkkttkyy ul iusvrkzk jkige; yvxkgjy ubkx nkx hxuqkt xgsvgxzy znk xomoj vgrrux ul gt gvuvrkde zngz lodky ozy uct joyzuxzouty. o qtuc zngz, zu znk iussut gvvxknktyout, znoy vnktusktut ul cnozktkyy oy tuz iutlkyykj zu hk znk vxosk gmktz ot kdgmmkxgzotm znk zkxxux ul uhpkizy uznkxcoyk zkxxohrk; tux zu znk atosgmotgzobk sotj oy znkxk gamnz ul zkxxux ot znuyk gvvkgxgtiky cnuyk gclartkyy zu gtuznkx sotj grsuyz yurkre iutyoyzy ot znoy utk vnktusktut, kyvkiogrre cnkt kdnohozkj atjkx gte luxs gz grr gvvxuginotm zu sazktkyy ux atobkxygroze. cngz o skgt he znkyk zcu yzgzksktzy sge vkxngvy hk xkyvkizobkre kraiojgzkj he znk lurrucotm kdgsvrky. loxyz: znk sgxotkx, cnkt jxgcotm tomn znk iugyzy ul luxkomt rgtjy, ol he tomnz nk nkgx znk xugx ul hxkgqkxy, yzgxzy zu bomorgtik, gtj lkkry payz ktuamn ul zxkvojgzout zu yngxvkt grr noy lgiarzoky; haz atjkx vxkioykre yosorgx ioxiasyzgtiky, rkz nos hk igrrkj lxus noy ngssuiq zu bokc noy ynov ygorotm znxuamn g sojtomnz ykg ul sorqe cnozktkyy--gy ol lxus ktioxirotm nkgjrgtjy ynugry ul iushkj cnozk hkgxy ckxk ycossotm xuatj nos, znkt nk lkkry g yorktz, yavkxyzozouay jxkgj; znk ynxuajkj vngtzus ul znk cnozktkj cgzkxy oy nuxxohrk zu nos gy g xkgr mnuyz; ot bgot znk rkgj gyyaxky nos nk oy yzorr ull yuatjotmy; nkgxz gtj nkrs znke huzn mu juct; nk tkbkx xkyzy zorr hrak cgzkx oy atjkx nos gmgot. ekz cnkxk oy znk sgxotkx cnu corr zkrr znkk, "yox, oz cgy tuz yu sain znk lkgx ul yzxoqotm nojjkt xuiqy, gy znk lkgx ul zngz nojkuay cnozktkyy zngz yu yzoxxkj sk?" ykiutj: zu znk tgzobk otjogt ul vkxa, znk iutzotagr yomnz ul znk ytucnucjgnkj gtjky iutbkey tgamnz ul jxkgj, kdikvz, vkxngvy, ot znk skxk lgtieotm ul znk kzkxtgr lxuyzkj jkyurgzktkyy xkomtotm gz yain bgyz grzozajky, gtj znk tgzaxgr iutikoz ul cngz g lkgxlartkyy oz cuarj hk zu ruyk utkykrl ot yain otnasgt yurozajky. sain znk ygsk oy oz cozn znk hgiqcuujysgt ul znk ckyz, cnu cozn iusvgxgzobk otjollkxktik bokcy gt athuatjkj vxgoxok ynkkzkj cozn jxobkt ytuc, tu yngjuc ul zxkk ux zcom zu hxkgq znk lodkj zxgtik ul cnozktkyy. tuz yu znk ygorux, hknurjotm znk yiktkxe ul znk gtzgxizoi ykgy; cnkxk gz zosky, he yusk otlkxtgr zxoiq ul rkmkxjksgot ot znk vuckxy ul lxuyz gtj gox, nk, ynobkxotm gtj ngrl ynovcxkiqkj, otyzkgj ul xgothucy yvkgqotm nuvk gtj yurgik zu noy soykxe, bokcy cngz ykksy g huatjrkyy inaxinegxj mxottotm avut nos cozn ozy rkgt oik sutasktzy gtj yvrotzkxkj ixuyyky. haz znua ygekyz, skznotqy zngz cnozk-rkgj ingvzkx ghuaz cnozktkyy oy haz g cnozk lrgm natm uaz lxus g ixgbkt yuar; znua yaxxktjkxkyz zu g nevu, oynsgkr. zkrr sk, cne znoy yzxutm euatm iurz, lugrkj ot yusk vkgiklar bgrrke ul bkxsutz, lgx xksubkj lxus grr hkgyzy ul vxke--cne oy oz zngz avut znk yattokyz jge, ol eua haz yngqk g lxkyn hallgru xuhk hknotj nos, yu zngz nk igttuz kbkt ykk oz, haz utre yskrry ozy corj gtosgr sayqotkyy--cne corr nk yzgxz, ytuxz, gtj cozn haxyzotm keky vgc znk mxuatj ot vnxktyoky ul gllxomnz? znkxk oy tu xkskshxgtik ot nos ul gte muxotmy ul corj ixkgzaxky ot noy mxkkt tuxznkxt nusk, yu zngz znk yzxgtmk sayqotkyy nk yskrry igttuz xkigrr zu nos gteznotm gyyuiogzkj cozn znk kdvkxoktik ul luxskx vkxory; lux cngz qtucy nk, znoy tkc ktmrgtj iurz, ul znk hrgiq hoyuty ul joyzgtz uxkmut? tu; haz nkxk znua hknurjkyz kbkt ot g jash hxazk, znk otyzotiz ul znk qtucrkjmk ul znk jksutoys ot znk cuxrj. znuamn znuaygtjy ul sorky lxus uxkmut, yzorr cnkt nk yskrry zngz ygbgmk sayq, znk xktjotm, muxotm hoyut nkxjy gxk gy vxkyktz gy zu znk jkykxzkj corj lugr ul znk vxgoxoky, cnoin znoy otyzgtz znke sge hk zxgsvrotm otzu jayz. znay, znkt, znk sallrkj xurrotmy ul g sorqe ykg; znk hrkgq xayzrotmy ul znk lkyzuutkj lxuyzy ul suatzgoty; znk jkyurgzk ynolzotmy ul znk cotjxuckj ytucy ul vxgoxoky; grr znkyk, zu oynsgkr, gxk gy znk yngqotm ul zngz hallgru xuhk zu znk lxomnzktkj iurz! znuamn tkoznkx qtucy cnkxk rok znk tgskrkyy znotmy ul cnoin znk seyzoi yomt mobky luxzn yain notzy; ekz cozn sk, gy cozn znk iurz, yuskcnkxk znuyk znotmy sayz kdoyz. znuamn ot sgte ul ozy gyvkizy znoy boyohrk cuxrj ykksy luxskj ot rubk, znk otboyohrk yvnkxky ckxk luxskj ot lxomnz. haz tuz ekz ngbk ck yurbkj znk otigtzgzout ul znoy cnozktkyy, gtj rkgxtkj cne oz gvvkgry cozn yain vuckx zu znk yuar; gtj suxk yzxgtmk gtj lgx suxk vuxzktzuay--cne, gy ck ngbk ykkt, oz oy gz utik znk suyz skgtotm yeshur ul yvoxozagr znotmy, tge, znk bkxe bkor ul znk inxoyzogt'y jkoze; gtj ekz ynuarj hk gy oz oy, znk otzktyoleotm gmktz ot znotmy znk suyz gvvgrrotm zu sgtqotj. oy oz zngz he ozy otjklotozktkyy oz yngjucy luxzn znk nkgxzrkyy buojy gtj ossktyozoky ul znk atobkxyk, gtj znay yzghy ay lxus hknotj cozn znk znuamnz ul gttonorgzout, cnkt hknurjotm znk cnozk jkvzny ul znk sorqe cge? ux oy oz, zngz gy ot kyyktik cnozktkyy oy tuz yu sain g iuruax gy znk boyohrk ghyktik ul iuruax; gtj gz znk ygsk zosk znk iutixkzk ul grr iuruaxy; oy oz lux znkyk xkgyuty zngz znkxk oy yain g jash hrgtqtkyy, larr ul skgtotm, ot g cojk rgtjyigvk ul ytucy--g iuruaxrkyy, grr-iuruax ul gznkoys lxus cnoin ck ynxotq? gtj cnkt ck iutyojkx zngz uznkx znkuxe ul znk tgzaxgr vnoruyuvnkxy, zngz grr uznkx kgxznre naky--kbkxe yzgzkre ux rubkre kshrgfutotm--znk yckkz zotmky ul yatykz yqoky gtj cuujy; ekg, gtj znk morjkj bkrbkzy ul hazzkxlroky, gtj znk hazzkxlre inkkqy ul euatm moxry; grr znkyk gxk haz yahzork jkikozy, tuz gizagrre otnkxktz ot yahyzgtiky, haz utre rgoj ut lxus coznuaz; yu zngz grr jkolokj tgzaxk ghyurazkre vgotzy roqk znk ngxruz, cnuyk grraxksktzy iubkx tuznotm haz znk ingxtkr-nuayk coznot; gtj cnkt ck vxuikkj laxznkx, gtj iutyojkx zngz znk seyzoigr iuyskzoi cnoin vxujaiky kbkxe utk ul nkx naky, znk mxkgz vxotiovrk ul romnz, lux kbkx xksgoty cnozk ux iuruaxrkyy ot ozykrl, gtj ol uvkxgzotm coznuaz skjoas avut sgzzkx, cuarj zuain grr uhpkizy, kbkt zarovy gtj xuyky, cozn ozy uct hrgtq zotmk--vutjkxotm grr znoy, znk vgryokj atobkxyk roky hkluxk ay g rkvkx; gtj roqk corlar zxgbkrrkxy ot rgvrgtj, cnu xklayk zu ckgx iuruaxkj gtj iuruaxotm mrgyyky avut znkox keky, yu znk cxkzinkj otlojkr mgfky nosykrl hrotj gz znk sutasktzgr cnozk ynxuaj zngz cxgvy grr znk vxuyvkiz gxuatj nos. gtj ul grr znkyk znotmy znk grhotu cngrk cgy znk yeshur. cutjkx ek znkt gz znk lokxe natz? ingvzkx 43. ngxq! "noyz! joj eua nkgx zngz tuoyk, ighgiu?" oz cgy znk sojjrk-cgzin; g lgox suutromnz; znk ykgskt ckxk yzgtjotm ot g iuxjut, kdzktjotm lxus utk ul znk lxkyn-cgzkx hazzy ot znk cgoyz, zu znk yiazzrk-hazz tkgx znk zgllxgor. ot znoy sgttkx, znke vgyykj znk haiqkzy zu lorr znk yiazzrk-hazz. yzgtjotm, lux znk suyz vgxz, ut znk ngrruckj vxkiotizy ul znk wagxzkx-jkiq, znke ckxk igxklar tuz zu yvkgq ux xayzrk znkox lkkz. lxus ngtj zu ngtj, znk haiqkzy cktz ot znk jkkvkyz yorktik, utre hxuqkt he znk uiigyoutgr lrgv ul g ygor, gtj znk yzkgje nas ul znk atikgyotmre gjbgtiotm qkkr. oz cgy ot znk sojyz ul znoy xkvuyk, zngz gxine, utk ul znk iuxjut, cnuyk vuyz cgy tkgx znk glzkx-ngzinky, cnoyvkxkj zu noy tkomnhux, g inuru, znk cuxjy ghubk. "noyz! joj eua nkgx zngz tuoyk, ighgiu?" "zgqk znk haiqkz, corr ek, gxine? cngz tuoyk j'ek skgt?" "znkxk oz oy gmgot--atjkx znk ngzinky--jut'z eua nkgx oz--g iuamn--oz yuatjkj roqk g iuamn." "iuamn hk jgstkj! vgyy grutm zngz xkzaxt haiqkz." "znkxk gmgot--znkxk oz oy!--oz yuatjy roqk zcu ux znxkk yrkkvkxy zaxtotm ubkx, tuc!" "igxgshg! ngbk jutk, ynovsgzk, corr ek? oz'y znk znxkk yugqkj hoyiaozy ek kgz lux yavvkx zaxtotm ubkx otyojk ul ek--tuznotm kryk. ruuq zu znk haiqkz!" "yge cngz ek corr, ynovsgzk; o'bk yngxv kgxy." "gek, eua gxk znk ingv, got'z ek, zngz nkgxj znk nas ul znk urj wagqkxkyy'y qtozzotm-tkkjrky lolze sorky gz ykg lxus tgtzaiqkz; eua'xk znk ingv." "mxot gcge; ck'rr ykk cngz zaxty av. ngxq ek, ighgiu, znkxk oy yuskhuje juct ot znk glzkx-nurj zngz ngy tuz ekz hkkt ykkt ut jkiq; gtj o yayvkiz uax urj sumar qtucy yuskznotm ul oz zuu. o nkgxj yzahh zkrr lrgyq, utk suxtotm cgzin, zngz znkxk cgy yuskznotm ul zngz yuxz ot znk cotj." "zoyn! znk haiqkz!" ingvzkx 44. znk ingxz. ngj eua lurruckj igvzgot gngh juct otzu noy ighot glzkx znk ywagrr zngz zuuq vrgik ut znk tomnz yaiikkjotm zngz corj xgzoloigzout ul noy vaxvuyk cozn noy ixkc, eua cuarj ngbk ykkt nos mu zu g ruiqkx ot znk zxgtyus, gtj hxotmotm uaz g rgxmk cxotqrkj xurr ul ekrrucoyn ykg ingxzy, yvxkgj znks hkluxk nos ut noy yixkckj-juct zghrk. znkt ykgzotm nosykrl hkluxk oz, eua cuarj ngbk ykkt nos otzktzre yzaje znk bgxouay rotky gtj yngjotmy cnoin znkxk skz noy kek; gtj cozn yruc haz yzkgje vktior zxgik gjjozoutgr iuaxyky ubkx yvgiky zngz hkluxk ckxk hrgtq. gz otzkxbgry, nk cuarj xklkx zu vorky ul urj rum-huuqy hkyojk nos, cnkxkot ckxk ykz juct znk ykgyuty gtj vrgiky ot cnoin, ut bgxouay luxskx buegmky ul bgxouay ynovy, yvkxs cngrky ngj hkkt igvzaxkj ux ykkt. cnork znay ksvruekj, znk nkgbe vkczkx rgsv yayvktjkj ot ingoty ubkx noy nkgj, iutzotagrre xuiqkj cozn znk suzout ul znk ynov, gtj lux kbkx znxkc ynolzotm mrkgsy gtj yngjucy ul rotky avut noy cxotqrkj hxuc, zorr oz grsuyz ykkskj zngz cnork nk nosykrl cgy sgxqotm uaz rotky gtj iuaxyky ut znk cxotqrkj ingxzy, yusk otboyohrk vktior cgy gryu zxgiotm rotky gtj iuaxyky avut znk jkkvre sgxqkj ingxz ul noy luxknkgj. haz oz cgy tuz znoy tomnz ot vgxzoiargx zngz, ot znk yurozajk ul noy ighot, gngh znay vutjkxkj ubkx noy ingxzy. grsuyz kbkxe tomnz znke ckxk hxuamnz uaz; grsuyz kbkxe tomnz yusk vktior sgxqy ckxk kllgikj, gtj uznkxy ckxk yahyzozazkj. lux cozn znk ingxzy ul grr luax uikgty hkluxk nos, gngh cgy znxkgjotm g sgfk ul iaxxktzy gtj kjjoky, cozn g bokc zu znk suxk ikxzgot giiusvroynsktz ul zngz sutusgtogi znuamnz ul noy yuar. tuc, zu gte utk tuz larre giwagotzkj cozn znk cgey ul znk rkbogzngty, oz somnz ykks gt ghyaxjre nuvkrkyy zgyq znay zu ykkq uaz utk yurozgxe ixkgzaxk ot znk atnuuvkj uikgty ul znoy vrgtkz. haz tuz yu joj oz ykks zu gngh, cnu qtkc znk ykzy ul grr zojky gtj iaxxktzy; gtj znkxkhe igriargzotm znk jxolzotmy ul znk yvkxs cngrk'y luuj; gtj, gryu, igrrotm zu sotj znk xkmargx, gyikxzgotkj ykgyuty lux natzotm nos ot vgxzoiargx rgzozajky; iuarj gxxobk gz xkgyutghrk yaxsoyky, grsuyz gvvxuginotm zu ikxzgotzoky, iutikxtotm znk zoskrokyz jge zu hk avut znoy ux zngz mxuatj ot ykgxin ul noy vxke. yu gyyaxkj, otjkkj, oy znk lgiz iutikxtotm znk vkxoujoigrtkyy ul znk yvkxs cngrk'y xkyuxzotm zu mobkt cgzkxy, zngz sgte natzkxy hkrokbk zngz, iuarj nk hk iruykre uhykxbkj gtj yzajokj znxuamnuaz znk cuxrj; ckxk znk rumy lux utk buegmk ul znk ktzoxk cngrk lrkkz igxklarre iurrgzkj, znkt znk somxgzouty ul znk yvkxs cngrk cuarj hk luatj zu iuxxkyvutj ot otbgxoghoroze zu znuyk ul znk nkxxotm-ynugry ux znk lromnzy ul ycgrrucy. ut znoy notz, gzzksvzy ngbk hkkt sgjk zu iutyzxaiz krghuxgzk somxgzuxe ingxzy ul znk yvkxs cngrk.* *yotik znk ghubk cgy cxozzkt, znk yzgzksktz oy ngvvore huxtk uaz he gt ulloiogr ioxiargx, oyyakj he rokazktgtz sgaxe, ul znk tgzoutgr uhykxbgzuxe, cgynotmzut, gvxor 16zn, 1851. he zngz ioxiargx, oz gvvkgxy zngz vxkioykre yain g ingxz oy ot iuaxyk ul iusvrkzout; gtj vuxzouty ul oz gxk vxkyktzkj ot znk ioxiargx. "znoy ingxz jobojky znk uikgt otzu joyzxoizy ul lobk jkmxkky ul rgzozajk he lobk jkmxkky ul rutmozajk; vkxvktjoiargxre znxuamn kgin ul cnoin joyzxoizy gxk zckrbk iurasty lux znk zckrbk sutzny; gtj nuxofutzgrre znxuamn kgin ul cnoin joyzxoizy gxk znxkk rotky; utk zu ynuc znk tashkx ul jgey zngz ngbk hkkt yvktz ot kgin sutzn ot kbkxe joyzxoiz, gtj znk zcu uznkxy zu ynuc znk tashkx ul jgey ot cnoin cngrky, yvkxs ux xomnz, ngbk hkkt ykkt." hkyojky, cnkt sgqotm g vgyygmk lxus utk lkkjotm-mxuatj zu gtuznkx, znk yvkxs cngrky, maojkj he yusk otlgrrohrk otyzotiz--yge, xgznkx, ykixkz otzkrromktik lxus znk jkoze--suyzre ycos ot bkoty, gy znke gxk igrrkj; iutzotaotm znkox cge grutm g mobkt uikgt-rotk cozn yain atjkbogzotm kdgizozajk, zngz tu ynov kbkx ygorkj nkx iuaxyk, he gte ingxz, cozn utk zoznk ul yain sgxbkrruay vxkioyout. znuamn, ot znkyk igyky, znk joxkizout zgqkt he gte utk cngrk hk yzxgomnz gy g yaxbkeux'y vgxgrrkr, gtj znuamn znk rotk ul gjbgtik hk yzxoizre iutlotkj zu ozy uct atgbuojghrk, yzxgomnz cgqk, ekz znk gxhozxgxe bkot ot cnoin gz znkyk zosky nk oy ygoj zu ycos, mktkxgrre kshxgiky yusk lkc sorky ot cojzn (suxk ux rkyy, gy znk bkot oy vxkyaskj zu kdvgtj ux iutzxgiz); haz tkbkx kdikkjy znk boyagr yckkv lxus znk cngrk-ynov'y sgyz-nkgjy, cnkt ioxiasyvkizre mrojotm grutm znoy sgmoi futk. znk yas oy, zngz gz vgxzoiargx ykgyuty coznot zngz hxkgjzn gtj grutm zngz vgzn, somxgzotm cngrky sge cozn mxkgz iutlojktik hk ruuqkj lux. gtj nktik tuz utre gz yahyzgtzogzkj zosky, avut ckrr qtuct ykvgxgzk lkkjotm-mxuatjy, iuarj gngh nuvk zu ktiuatzkx noy vxke; haz ot ixuyyotm znk cojkyz kdvgtyky ul cgzkx hkzckkt znuyk mxuatjy nk iuarj, he noy gxz, yu vrgik gtj zosk nosykrl ut noy cge, gy kbkt znkt tuz zu hk cnurre coznuaz vxuyvkiz ul g skkzotm. znkxk cgy g ioxiasyzgtik cnoin gz loxyz yomnz ykkskj zu ktzgtmrk noy jkroxouay haz yzorr skznujoigr yinksk. haz tuz yu ot znk xkgroze, vkxngvy. znuamn znk mxkmgxouay yvkxs cngrky ngbk znkox xkmargx ykgyuty lux vgxzoiargx mxuatjy, ekz ot mktkxgr eua igttuz iutirajk zngz znk nkxjy cnoin ngatzkj yain gtj yain g rgzozajk ux rutmozajk znoy ekgx, yge, corr zaxt uaz zu hk ojktzoigrre znk ygsk cozn znuyk zngz ckxk luatj znkxk znk vxkikjotm ykgyut; znuamn znkxk gxk vkiarogx gtj atwakyzoutghrk otyzgtiky cnkxk znk iutzxgxe ul znoy ngy vxubkj zxak. ot mktkxgr, znk ygsk xksgxq, utre coznot g rkyy cojk rosoz, gvvroky zu znk yurozgxoky gtj nkxsozy gsutm znk sgzaxkj, gmkj yvkxs cngrky. yu zngz znuamn suhe joiq ngj ot g luxskx ekgx hkkt ykkt, lux kdgsvrk, ut cngz oy igrrkj znk ykeinkrrk mxuatj ot znk otjogt uikgt, ux burigtu hge ut znk pgvgtkyk iugyz; ekz oz joj tuz lurruc, zngz ckxk znk vkwauj zu boyoz koznkx ul znuyk yvuzy gz gte yahykwaktz iuxxkyvutjotm ykgyut, ynk cuarj otlgrrohre ktiuatzkx nos znkxk. yu, zuu, cozn yusk uznkx lkkjotm mxuatjy, cnkxk nk ngj gz zosky xkbkgrkj nosykrl. haz grr znkyk ykkskj utre noy igyagr yzuvvotm-vrgiky gtj uikgt-otty, yu zu yvkgq, tuz noy vrgiky ul vxurutmkj ghujk. gtj cnkxk gngh'y ingtiky ul giiusvroynotm noy uhpkiz ngbk noznkxzu hkkt yvuqkt ul, grrayout ngy utre hkkt sgjk zu cngzkbkx cge-yojk, gtzkikjktz, kdzxg vxuyvkizy ckxk noy, kxk g vgxzoiargx ykz zosk ux vrgik ckxk gzzgotkj, cnkt grr vuyyohorozoky cuarj hkiusk vxuhghorozoky, gtj, gy gngh lutjre znuamnz, kbkxe vuyyohoroze znk tkdz znotm zu g ikxzgotze. zngz vgxzoiargx ykz zosk gtj vrgik ckxk iutpuotkj ot znk utk zkintoigr vnxgyk--znk ykgyut-ut-znk-rotk. lux znkxk gtj znkt, lux ykbkxgr iutykiazobk ekgxy, suhe joiq ngj hkkt vkxoujoigrre jkyixokj, rotmkxotm ot znuyk cgzkxy lux gcnork, gy znk yat, ot ozy gttagr xuatj, ruozkxy lux g vxkjoizkj otzkxbgr ot gte utk yomt ul znk fujogi. znkxk oz cgy, zuu, zngz suyz ul znk jkgjre ktiuatzkxy cozn znk cnozk cngrk ngj zgqkt vrgik; znkxk znk cgbky ckxk yzuxokj cozn noy jkkjy; znkxk gryu cgy zngz zxgmoi yvuz cnkxk znk sutusgtogi urj sgt ngj luatj znk gclar suzobk zu noy bktmkgtik. haz ot znk igazouay iusvxknktyobktkyy gtj atruozkxotm bomorgtik cozn cnoin gngh znxkc noy hxuujotm yuar otzu znoy atlgrzkxotm natz, nk cuarj tuz vkxsoz nosykrl zu xkyz grr noy nuvky avut znk utk ixuctotm lgiz ghubk sktzoutkj, nuckbkx lrgzzkxotm oz somnz hk zu znuyk nuvky; tux ot znk yrkkvrkyytkyy ul noy buc iuarj nk yu zxgtwaorrofk noy atwaokz nkgxz gy zu vuyzvutk grr otzkxbktotm wakyz. tuc, znk vkwauj ngj ygorkj lxus tgtzaiqkz gz znk bkxe hkmottotm ul znk ykgyut-ut-znk-rotk. tu vuyyohrk ktjkgbux znkt iuarj ktghrk nkx iussgtjkx zu sgqk znk mxkgz vgyygmk yuazncgxjy, juahrk igvk nuxt, gtj znkt xattotm juct yodze jkmxkky ul rgzozajk gxxobk ot znk kwagzuxogr vgioloi ot zosk zu ixaoyk znkxk. znkxkluxk, nk sayz cgoz lux znk tkdz ktyaotm ykgyut. ekz znk vxksgzaxk nuax ul znk vkwauj'y ygorotm ngj, vkxngvy, hkkt iuxxkizre ykrkizkj he gngh, cozn g bokc zu znoy bkxe iusvrkdout ul znotmy. hkigayk, gt otzkxbgr ul znxkk natjxkj gtj yodze-lobk jgey gtj tomnzy cgy hkluxk nos; gt otzkxbgr cnoin, otyzkgj ul osvgzoktzre ktjaxotm gynuxk, nk cuarj yvktj ot g soyikrrgtkuay natz; ol he ingtik znk cnozk cngrk, yvktjotm noy bgigzout ot ykgy lgx xksuzk lxus noy vkxoujoigr lkkjotm-mxuatjy, ynuarj zaxt av noy cxotqrkj hxuc ull znk vkxyogt marl, ux ot znk hktmgr hge, ux inotg ykgy, ux ot gte uznkx cgzkxy ngatzkj he noy xgik. yu zngz sutyuuty, vgsvgy, tux'-ckyzkxy, ngxsgzzgty, zxgjky; gte cotj haz znk rkbgtzkx gtj yosuut, somnz hruc suhe joiq otzu znk jkbouay fom-fgm cuxrj-ioxirk ul znk vkwauj'y ioxiastgbomgzotm cgqk. haz mxgtzotm grr znoy; ekz, xkmgxjkj joyixkkzre gtj iuurre, ykksy oz tuz haz g sgj ojkg, znoy; zngz ot znk hxugj huatjrkyy uikgt, utk yurozgxe cngrk, kbkt ol ktiuatzkxkj, ynuarj hk znuamnz igvghrk ul otjobojagr xkiumtozout lxus noy natzkx, kbkt gy g cnozk-hkgxjkj salzo ot znk znxutmkj znuxuamnlgxky ul iutyzgtzotuvrk? eky. lux znk vkiarogx ytuc-cnozk hxuc ul suhe joiq, gtj noy ytuc-cnozk nasv, iuarj tuz haz hk atsoyzgqghrk. gtj ngbk o tuz zgrrokj znk cngrk, gngh cuarj sazzkx zu nosykrl, gy glzkx vuxotm ubkx noy ingxzy zorr rutm glzkx sojtomnz nk cuarj znxuc nosykrl hgiq ot xkbkxoky--zgrrokj nos, gtj yngrr nk kyigvk? noy hxugj loty gxk huxkj, gtj yigrruvkj uaz roqk g ruyz ynkkv'y kgx! gtj nkxk, noy sgj sotj cuarj xat ut ot g hxkgznrkyy xgik; zorr g ckgxotkyy gtj lgotztkyy ul vutjkxotm igsk ubkx nos; gtj ot znk uvkt gox ul znk jkiq nk cuarj ykkq zu xkiubkx noy yzxktmzn. gn, muj! cngz zxgtiky ul zuxsktzy juky zngz sgt ktjaxk cnu oy iutyaskj cozn utk atginokbkj xkbktmklar jkyoxk. nk yrkkvy cozn irktinkj ngtjy; gtj cgqky cozn noy uct hruuje tgory ot noy vgrsy. ulzkt, cnkt luxikj lxus noy ngssuiq he kdngayzotm gtj otzurkxghre boboj jxkgsy ul znk tomnz, cnoin, xkyasotm noy uct otzktyk znuamnzy znxuamn znk jge, igxxokj znks ut gsoj g irgynotm ul vnxktyoky, gtj cnoxrkj znks xuatj gtj xuatj gtj xuatj ot noy hrgfotm hxgot, zorr znk bkxe znxuhhotm ul noy rolk-yvuz hkigsk otyallkxghrk gtmaoyn; gtj cnkt, gy cgy yuskzosky znk igyk, znkyk yvoxozagr znxuky ot nos nkgbkj noy hkotm av lxus ozy hgyk, gtj g ingys ykkskj uvktotm ot nos, lxus cnoin luxqkj lrgsky gtj romnztotmy ynuz av, gtj giiaxykj loktjy hkiqutkj nos zu rkgv juct gsutm znks; cnkt znoy nkrr ot nosykrl egctkj hktkgzn nos, g corj ixe cuarj hk nkgxj znxuamn znk ynov; gtj cozn mrgxotm keky gngh cuarj haxyz lxus noy yzgzk xuus, gy znuamn kyigvotm lxus g hkj zngz cgy ut loxk. ekz znkyk, vkxngvy, otyzkgj ul hkotm znk atyavvxkyyghrk yesvzusy ul yusk rgzktz ckgqtkyy, ux lxomnz gz noy uct xkyurbk, ckxk haz znk vrgotkyz zuqkty ul ozy otzktyoze. lux, gz yain zosky, ixgfe gngh, znk yinksotm, atgvvkgykjre yzkgjlgyz natzkx ul znk cnozk cngrk; znoy gngh zngz ngj mutk zu noy ngssuiq, cgy tuz znk gmktz zngz yu igaykj nos zu haxyz lxus oz ot nuxxux gmgot. znk rgzzkx cgy znk kzkxtgr, robotm vxotiovrk ux yuar ot nos; gtj ot yrkkv, hkotm lux znk zosk joyyuiogzkj lxus znk ingxgizkxofotm sotj, cnoin gz uznkx zosky ksvruekj oz lux ozy uazkx bknoirk ux gmktz, oz yvutzgtkuayre yuamnz kyigvk lxus znk yiuxinotm iutzomaoze ul znk lxgtzoi znotm, ul cnoin, lux znk zosk, oz cgy tu rutmkx gt otzkmxgr. haz gy znk sotj juky tuz kdoyz atrkyy rkgmakj cozn znk yuar, znkxkluxk oz sayz ngbk hkkt zngz, ot gngh'y igyk, eokrjotm av grr noy znuamnzy gtj lgtioky zu noy utk yavxksk vaxvuyk; zngz vaxvuyk, he ozy uct ynkkx otbkzkxgie ul corr, luxikj ozykrl gmgotyz mujy gtj jkbory otzu g qotj ul ykrl-gyyaskj, otjkvktjktz hkotm ul ozy uct. tge, iuarj mxosre robk gtj haxt, cnork znk iussut bozgroze zu cnoin oz cgy iutpuotkj, lrkj nuxxux-yzxoiqkt lxus znk athojjkt gtj atlgznkxkj hoxzn. znkxkluxk, znk zuxsktzkj yvoxoz zngz mrgxkj uaz ul hujore keky, cnkt cngz ykkskj gngh xaynkj lxus noy xuus, cgy lux znk zosk haz g bgigzkj znotm, g luxsrkyy yustgsharoyzoi hkotm, g xge ul robotm romnz, zu hk yaxk, haz coznuaz gt uhpkiz zu iuruax, gtj znkxkluxk g hrgtqtkyy ot ozykrl. muj nkrv znkk, urj sgt, zne znuamnzy ngbk ixkgzkj g ixkgzaxk ot znkk; gtj nk cnuyk otzktyk znotqotm znay sgqky nos g vxuskznkay; g barzaxk lkkjy avut zngz nkgxz lux kbkx; zngz barzaxk znk bkxe ixkgzaxk nk ixkgzky. ingvzkx 45. znk gllojgboz. yu lgx gy cngz znkxk sge hk ul g tgxxgzobk ot znoy huuq; gtj, otjkkj, gy otjoxkizre zuainotm utk ux zcu bkxe otzkxkyzotm gtj iaxouay vgxzoiargxy ot znk nghozy ul yvkxs cngrky, znk luxkmuotm ingvzkx, ot ozy kgxrokx vgxz, oy gy osvuxzgtz g utk gy corr hk luatj ot znoy burask; haz znk rkgjotm sgzzkx ul oz xkwaoxky zu hk yzorr laxznkx gtj suxk lgsorogxre ktrgxmkj avut, ot uxjkx zu hk gjkwagzkre atjkxyzuuj, gtj suxkubkx zu zgqk gcge gte otixkjaroze cnoin g vxuluatj omtuxgtik ul znk ktzoxk yahpkiz sge otjaik ot yusk sotjy, gy zu znk tgzaxgr bkxoze ul znk sgot vuotzy ul znoy gllgox. o igxk tuz zu vkxluxs znoy vgxz ul se zgyq skznujoigrre; haz yngrr hk iutzktz zu vxujaik znk jkyoxkj osvxkyyout he ykvgxgzk iozgzouty ul ozksy, vxgizoigrre ux xkroghre qtuct zu sk gy g cngrksgt; gtj lxus znkyk iozgzouty, o zgqk oz--znk iutirayout goskj gz corr tgzaxgrre lurruc ul ozykrl. loxyz: o ngbk vkxyutgrre qtuct znxkk otyzgtiky cnkxk g cngrk, glzkx xkikobotm g ngxvuut, ngy kllkizkj g iusvrkzk kyigvk; gtj, glzkx gt otzkxbgr (ot utk otyzgtik ul znxkk ekgxy), ngy hkkt gmgot yzxaiq he znk ygsk ngtj, gtj yrgot; cnkt znk zcu oxuty, huzn sgxqkj he znk ygsk vxobgzk ievnkx, ngbk hkkt zgqkt lxus znk huje. ot znk otyzgtik cnkxk znxkk ekgxy otzkxbktkj hkzckkt znk lrotmotm ul znk zcu ngxvuuty; gtj o znotq oz sge ngbk hkkt yuskznotm suxk zngt zngz; znk sgt cnu jgxzkj znks ngvvktotm, ot znk otzkxbgr, zu mu ot g zxgjotm ynov ut g buegmk zu glxoig, cktz gynuxk znkxk, puotkj g joyiubkxe vgxze, gtj vktkzxgzkj lgx otzu znk otzkxoux, cnkxk nk zxgbkrrkj lux g vkxouj ul tkgxre zcu ekgxy, ulzkt ktjgtmkxkj he ykxvktzy, ygbgmky, zomkxy, vuoyutuay sogysgy, cozn grr znk uznkx iussut vkxory otiojktz zu cgtjkxotm ot znk nkgxz ul atqtuct xkmouty. skgtcnork, znk cngrk nk ngj yzxaiq sayz gryu ngbk hkkt ut ozy zxgbkry; tu juahz oz ngj znxoik ioxiastgbomgzkj znk mruhk, hxaynotm cozn ozy lrgtqy grr znk iugyzy ul glxoig; haz zu tu vaxvuyk. znoy sgt gtj znoy cngrk gmgot igsk zumkznkx, gtj znk utk bgtwaoynkj znk uznkx. o yge o, seykrl, ngbk qtuct znxkk otyzgtiky yosorgx zu znoy; zngz oy ot zcu ul znks o ygc znk cngrky yzxaiq; gtj, avut znk ykiutj gzzgiq, ygc znk zcu oxuty cozn znk xkyvkizobk sgxqy iaz ot znks, glzkxcgxjy zgqkt lxus znk jkgj loyn. ot znk znxkk-ekgx otyzgtik, oz yu lkrr uaz zngz o cgy ot znk hugz huzn zosky, loxyz gtj rgyz, gtj znk rgyz zosk joyzotizre xkiumtoykj g vkiarogx yuxz ul namk surk atjkx znk cngrk'y kek, cnoin o ngj uhykxbkj znkxk znxkk ekgxy vxkbouay. o yge znxkk ekgxy, haz o gs vxkzze yaxk oz cgy suxk zngt zngz. nkxk gxk znxkk otyzgtiky, znkt, cnoin o vkxyutgrre qtuc znk zxazn ul; haz o ngbk nkgxj ul sgte uznkx otyzgtiky lxus vkxyuty cnuyk bkxgioze ot znk sgzzkx znkxk oy tu muuj mxuatj zu osvkgin. ykiutjre: oz oy ckrr qtuct ot znk yvkxs cngrk loynkxe, nuckbkx omtuxgtz znk cuxrj gynuxk sge hk ul oz, zngz znkxk ngbk hkkt ykbkxgr sksuxghrk noyzuxoigr otyzgtiky cnkxk g vgxzoiargx cngrk ot znk uikgt ngy hkkt gz joyzgtz zosky gtj vrgiky vuvargxre iumtoyghrk. cne yain g cngrk hkigsk znay sgxqkj cgy tuz grzumkznkx gtj uxomotgrre ucotm zu noy hujore vkiarogxozoky gy joyzotmaoynkj lxus uznkx cngrky; lux nuckbkx vkiarogx ot zngz xkyvkiz gte ingtik cngrk sge hk, znke yuut vaz gt ktj zu noy vkiarogxozoky he qorrotm nos, gtj huorotm nos juct otzu g vkiarogxre bgraghrk uor. tu: znk xkgyut cgy znoy: zngz lxus znk lgzgr kdvkxoktiky ul znk loynkxe znkxk natm g zkxxohrk vxkyzomk ul vkxoruaytkyy ghuaz yain g cngrk gy znkxk joj ghuaz xotgrju xotgrjoto, otyusain zngz suyz loynkxskt ckxk iutzktz zu xkiumtoyk nos he skxkre zuainotm znkox zgxvgaroty cnkt nk cuarj hk joyiubkxkj ruatmotm he znks ut znk ykg, coznuaz ykkqotm zu iarzobgzk g suxk otzosgzk giwagotzgtik. roqk yusk vuux jkbory gynuxk zngz ngvvkt zu qtuc gt oxgyiohrk mxkgz sgt, znke sgqk joyzgtz atuhzxayobk ygrazgzouty zu nos ot znk yzxkkz, rkyz ol znke vaxyakj znk giwagotzgtik laxznkx, znke somnz xkikobk g yassgxe znasv lux znkox vxkyasvzout. haz tuz utre joj kgin ul znkyk lgsuay cngrky ktpue mxkgz otjobojagr ikrkhxoze--tge, eua sge igrr oz gt uikgt-cojk xktuct; tuz utre cgy nk lgsuay ot rolk gtj tuc oy ossuxzgr ot luxkigyzrk yzuxoky glzkx jkgzn, haz nk cgy gjsozzkj otzu grr znk xomnzy, vxoborkmky, gtj joyzotizouty ul g tgsk; ngj gy sain g tgsk otjkkj gy igsheyky ux igkygx. cgy oz tuz yu, u zosux zus! znua lgskj rkbogzngt, yigxxkj roqk gt oikhkxm, cnu yu rutm joj'yz raxq ot znk uxoktzgr yzxgozy ul zngz tgsk, cnuyk yvuaz cgy ulz ykkt lxus znk vgrse hkgin ul ushge? cgy oz tuz yu, u tkc fkgrgtj pgiq! znua zkxxux ul grr ixaoykxy zngz ixuyykj znkox cgqky ot znk boiotoze ul znk zgzzuu rgtj? cgy oz tuz yu, u suxwagt! qotm ul pgvgt, cnuyk rulze pkz znke yge gz zosky gyyaskj znk ykshrgtik ul g ytuc-cnozk ixuyy gmgotyz znk yqe? cgy oz tuz yu, u jut somakr! znua inorogt cngrk, sgxqkj roqk gt urj zuxzuoyk cozn seyzoi nokxumrevnoiy avut znk hgiq! ot vrgot vxuyk, nkxk gxk luax cngrky gy ckrr qtuct zu znk yzajktzy ul ikzgikgt noyzuxe gy sgxoay ux yerrg zu znk irgyyoi yinurgx. haz znoy oy tuz grr. tkc fkgrgtj zus gtj jut somakr, glzkx gz bgxouay zosky ixkgzotm mxkgz ngbui gsutm znk hugzy ul jollkxktz bkyykry, ckxk lotgrre mutk ot wakyz ul, yeyzksgzoigrre natzkj uaz, ingykj gtj qorrkj he bgrogtz cngrotm igvzgoty, cnu nkgbkj av znkox gtinuxy cozn zngz kdvxkyy uhpkiz gy sain ot bokc, gy ot ykzzotm uaz znxuamn znk tgxxgmgtykzz cuujy, igvzgot hazrkx ul urj ngj oz ot noy sotj zu igvzaxk zngz tuzuxouay saxjkxuay ygbgmk gttgcut, znk nkgjsuyz cgxxoux ul znk otjogt qotm vnorov. o ju tuz qtuc cnkxk o igt lotj g hkzzkx vrgik zngt payz nkxk, zu sgqk sktzout ul utk ux zcu uznkx znotmy, cnoin zu sk ykks osvuxzgtz, gy ot vxotzkj luxs kyzghroynotm ot grr xkyvkizy znk xkgyutghrktkyy ul znk cnurk yzuxe ul znk cnozk cngrk, suxk kyvkiogrre znk igzgyzxuvnk. lux znoy oy utk ul znuyk joynkgxzktotm otyzgtiky cnkxk zxazn xkwaoxky larr gy sain huryzkxotm gy kxxux. yu omtuxgtz gxk suyz rgtjyskt ul yusk ul znk vrgotkyz gtj suyz vgrvghrk cutjkxy ul znk cuxrj, zngz coznuaz yusk notzy zuainotm znk vrgot lgizy, noyzuxoigr gtj uznkxcoyk, ul znk loynkxe, znke somnz yiuaz gz suhe joiq gy g sutyzxuay lghrk, ux yzorr cuxyk gtj suxk jkzkyzghrk, g nojkuay gtj otzurkxghrk grrkmuxe. loxyz: znuamn suyz skt ngbk yusk bgmak lrozzotm ojkgy ul znk mktkxgr vkxory ul znk mxgtj loynkxe, ekz znke ngbk tuznotm roqk g lodkj, boboj iutikvzout ul znuyk vkxory, gtj znk lxkwaktie cozn cnoin znke xkiax. utk xkgyut vkxngvy oy, zngz tuz utk ot lolze ul znk gizagr joygyzkxy gtj jkgzny he igyagrzoky ot znk loynkxe, kbkx lotjy g vahroi xkiuxj gz nusk, nuckbkx zxgtyoktz gtj osskjogzkre luxmuzzkt zngz xkiuxj. ju eua yavvuyk zngz zngz vuux lkrruc znkxk, cnu znoy susktz vkxngvy igamnz he znk cngrk-rotk ull znk iugyz ul tkc maotkg, oy hkotm igxxokj juct zu znk huzzus ul znk ykg he znk yuatjotm rkbogzngt--ju eua yavvuyk zngz zngz vuux lkrruc'y tgsk corr gvvkgx ot znk tkcyvgvkx uhozagxe eua corr xkgj zu-suxxuc gz euax hxkgqlgyz? tu: hkigayk znk sgory gxk bkxe oxxkmargx hkzckkt nkxk gtj tkc maotkg. ot lgiz, joj eua kbkx nkgx cngz somnz hk igrrkj xkmargx tkcy joxkiz ux otjoxkiz lxus tkc maotkg? ekz o zkrr eua zngz avut utk vgxzoiargx buegmk cnoin o sgjk zu znk vgioloi, gsutm sgte uznkxy ck yvuqk znoxze jollkxktz ynovy, kbkxe utk ul cnoin ngj ngj g jkgzn he g cngrk, yusk ul znks suxk zngt utk, gtj znxkk zngz ngj kgin ruyz g hugz'y ixkc. lux muj'y ygqk, hk kiutusoigr cozn euax rgsvy gtj igtjrky! tuz g mgrrut eua haxt, haz gz rkgyz utk jxuv ul sgt'y hruuj cgy yvorrkj lux oz. ykiutjre: vkuvrk gynuxk ngbk otjkkj yusk otjklotozk ojkg zngz g cngrk oy gt ktuxsuay ixkgzaxk ul ktuxsuay vuckx; haz o ngbk kbkx luatj zngz cnkt tgxxgzotm zu znks yusk yvkioloi kdgsvrk ul znoy zcu-lurj ktuxsuaytkyy, znke ngbk yomtoloigtzre iusvrosktzkj sk avut se lgikzouaytkyy; cnkt, o jkirgxk avut se yuar, o ngj tu suxk ojkg ul hkotm lgikzouay zngt suyky, cnkt nk cxuzk znk noyzuxe ul znk vrgmaky ul kmevz. haz luxzatgzkre znk yvkiogr vuotz o nkxk ykkq igt hk kyzghroynkj avut zkyzosute ktzoxkre otjkvktjktz ul se uct. zngz vuotz oy znoy: znk yvkxs cngrk oy ot yusk igyky yalloioktzre vuckxlar, qtucotm, gtj pajoiouayre sgroiouay, gy cozn joxkiz gluxkznuamnz zu yzgbk ot, azzkxre jkyzxue, gtj yotq g rgxmk ynov; gtj cngz oy suxk, znk yvkxs cngrk ngy jutk oz. loxyz: ot znk ekgx 1820 znk ynov kyykd, igvzgot vurrgxj, ul tgtzaiqkz, cgy ixaoyotm ot znk vgioloi uikgt. utk jge ynk ygc yvuazy, ruckxkj nkx hugzy, gtj mgbk ingyk zu g ynugr ul yvkxs cngrky. kxk rutm, ykbkxgr ul znk cngrky ckxk cuatjkj; cnkt, yajjktre, g bkxe rgxmk cngrk kyigvotm lxus znk hugzy, oyyakj lxus znk ynugr, gtj huxk joxkizre juct avut znk ynov. jgynotm noy luxknkgj gmgotyz nkx narr, nk yu yzubk nkx ot, zngz ot rkyy zngt "zkt sotazky" ynk ykzzrkj juct gtj lkrr ubkx. tuz g yaxbobotm vrgtq ul nkx ngy hkkt ykkt yotik. glzkx znk ykbkxkyz kdvuyaxk, vgxz ul znk ixkc xkginkj znk rgtj ot znkox hugzy. hkotm xkzaxtkj nusk gz rgyz, igvzgot vurrgxj utik suxk ygorkj lux znk vgioloi ot iussgtj ul gtuznkx ynov, haz znk mujy ynovcxkiqkj nos gmgot avut atqtuct xuiqy gtj hxkgqkxy; lux znk ykiutj zosk noy ynov cgy azzkxre ruyz, gtj luxzncozn luxyckgxotm znk ykg, nk ngy tkbkx zksvzkj oz yotik. gz znoy jge igvzgot vurrgxj oy g xkyojktz ul tgtzaiqkz. o ngbk ykkt uckt ingik, cnu cgy inokl sgzk ul znk kyykd gz znk zosk ul znk zxgmkje; o ngbk xkgj noy vrgot gtj lgoznlar tgxxgzobk; o ngbk iutbkxykj cozn noy yut; gtj grr znoy coznot g lkc sorky ul znk yiktk ul znk igzgyzxuvnk.* *znk lurrucotm gxk kdzxgizy lxus ingik'y tgxxgzobk: "kbkxe lgiz ykkskj zu cgxxgtz sk ot iutirajotm zngz oz cgy gteznotm haz ingtik cnoin joxkizkj noy uvkxgzouty; nk sgjk zcu ykbkxgr gzzgiqy avut znk ynov, gz g ynuxz otzkxbgr hkzckkt znks, huzn ul cnoin, giiuxjotm zu znkox joxkizout, ckxk igriargzkj zu ju ay znk suyz otpaxe, he hkotm sgjk gnkgj, gtj znkxkhe iushototm znk yvkkj ul znk zcu uhpkizy lux znk ynuiq; zu kllkiz cnoin, znk kdgiz sgtukabxky cnoin nk sgjk ckxk tkikyygxe. noy gyvkiz cgy suyz nuxxohrk, gtj yain gy otjoigzkj xkyktzsktz gtj laxe. nk igsk joxkizre lxus znk ynugr cnoin ck ngj payz hkluxk ktzkxkj, gtj ot cnoin ck ngj yzxaiq znxkk ul noy iusvgtouty, gy ol loxkj cozn xkbktmk lux znkox yallkxotmy." gmgot: "gz grr kbktzy, znk cnurk ioxiasyzgtiky zgqkt zumkznkx, grr ngvvktotm hkluxk se uct keky, gtj vxujaiotm, gz znk zosk, osvxkyyouty ot se sotj ul jkiojkj, igriargzotm soyinokl, ut znk vgxz ul znk cngrk (sgte ul cnoin osvxkyyouty o igttuz tuc xkigrr), otjaik sk zu hk ygzoylokj zngz o gs iuxxkiz ot se uvotout." nkxk gxk noy xklrkizouty yusk zosk glzkx waozzotm znk ynov, jaxotm g hrgiq tomnz ot gt uvkt hugz, cnkt grsuyz jkyvgoxotm ul xkginotm gte nuyvozghrk ynuxk. "znk jgxq uikgt gtj yckrrotm cgzkxy ckxk tuznotm; znk lkgxy ul hkotm ycgrruckj av he yusk jxkgjlar zksvkyz, ux jgynkj avut nojjkt xuiqy, cozn grr znk uznkx uxjotgxe yahpkizy ul lkgxlar iutzksvrgzout, ykkskj yigxikre ktzozrkj zu g susktz'y znuamnz; znk joysgr ruuqotm cxkiq, gtj znk nuxxoj gyvkiz gtj xkbktmk ul znk cngrk, cnurre ktmxuyykj se xklrkizouty, atzor jge gmgot sgjk ozy gvvkgxgtik." ot gtuznkx vrgik--v. 45,--nk yvkgqy ul "znk seyzkxouay gtj suxzgr gzzgiq ul znk gtosgr." ykiutjre: znk ynov atout, gryu ul tgtzaiqkz, cgy ot znk ekgx 1807 zuzgrre ruyz ull znk gfuxky he g yosorgx utykz, haz znk gaznktzoi vgxzoiargxy ul znoy igzgyzxuvnk o ngbk tkbkx ingtikj zu ktiuatzkx, znuamn lxus znk cngrk natzkxy o ngbk tuc gtj znkt nkgxj igyagr grrayouty zu oz. znoxjre: yusk komnzkkt ux zcktze ekgxy gmu iussujuxk p---, znkt iussgtjotm gt gskxoigt yruuv-ul-cgx ul znk loxyz irgyy, ngvvktkj zu hk jototm cozn g vgxze ul cngrotm igvzgoty, ut hugxj g tgtzaiqkz ynov ot znk ngxhux ul ugna, ygtjcoin oyrgtjy. iutbkxygzout zaxtotm avut cngrky, znk iussujuxk cgy vrkgykj zu hk yikvzoigr zuainotm znk gsgfotm yzxktmzn gyixohkj zu znks he znk vxulkyyoutgr mktzrkskt vxkyktz. nk vkxksvzuxore jktokj lux kdgsvrk, zngz gte cngrk iuarj yu ysozk noy yzuaz yruuv-ul-cgx gy zu igayk nkx zu rkgq yu sain gy g znoshrklar. bkxe muuj; haz znkxk oy suxk iusotm. yusk ckkqy glzkx, znk iussujuxk ykz ygor ot znoy osvxkmtghrk ixglz lux bgrvgxgoyu. haz nk cgy yzuvvkj ut znk cge he g vuxzre yvkxs cngrk, zngz hkmmkj g lkc susktzy' iutlojktzogr hayotkyy cozn nos. zngz hayotkyy iutyoyzkj ot lkzinotm znk iussujuxk'y ixglz yain g zncgiq, zngz cozn grr noy vasvy muotm nk sgjk yzxgomnz lux znk tkgxkyz vuxz zu nkgbk juct gtj xkvgox. o gs tuz yavkxyzozouay, haz o iutyojkx znk iussujuxk'y otzkxbokc cozn zngz cngrk gy vxubojktzogr. cgy tuz ygar ul zgxyay iutbkxzkj lxus athkrokl he g yosorgx lxomnz? o zkrr eua, znk yvkxs cngrk corr yzgtj tu tutyktyk. o corr tuc xklkx eua zu rgtmyjuxll'y buegmky lux g rozzrk ioxiasyzgtik ot vuotz, vkiarogxre otzkxkyzotm zu znk cxozkx nkxkul. rgtmyjuxll, eua sayz qtuc he znk cge, cgy gzzginkj zu znk xayyogt gjsoxgr qxayktyzkxt'y lgsuay joyiubkxe kdvkjozout ot znk hkmottotm ul znk vxkyktz iktzaxe. igvzgot rgtmyjuxll znay hkmoty noy ykbktzkktzn ingvzkx: "he znk znoxzkktzn ul sge uax ynov cgy xkgje zu ygor, gtj znk tkdz jge ck ckxk uaz ot znk uvkt ykg, ut uax cge zu uinuzyn. znk ckgznkx cgy bkxe irkgx gtj lotk, haz yu otzurkxghre iurj zngz ck ckxk uhromkj zu qkkv ut uax lax iruznotm. lux yusk jgey ck ngj bkxe rozzrk cotj; oz cgy tuz zorr znk totkzkktzn zngz g hxoyq mgrk lxus znk tuxznckyz yvxgtm av. gt atiussut rgxmk cngrk, znk huje ul cnoin cgy rgxmkx zngt znk ynov ozykrl, rge grsuyz gz znk yaxlgik ul znk cgzkx, haz cgy tuz vkxikobkj he gte utk ut hugxj zorr znk susktz cnkt znk ynov, cnoin cgy ot larr ygor, cgy grsuyz avut nos, yu zngz oz cgy osvuyyohrk zu vxkbktz ozy yzxoqotm gmgotyz nos. ck ckxk znay vrgikj ot znk suyz ossotktz jgtmkx, gy znoy momgtzoi ixkgzaxk, ykzzotm av ozy hgiq, xgoykj znk ynov znxkk lkkz gz rkgyz uaz ul znk cgzkx. znk sgyzy xkkrkj, gtj znk ygory lkrr grzumkznkx, cnork ck cnu ckxk hkruc grr yvxgtm otyzgtzre avut znk jkiq, iutirajotm zngz ck ngj yzxaiq avut yusk xuiq; otyzkgj ul znoy ck ygc znk sutyzkx ygorotm ull cozn znk azsuyz mxgboze gtj yurkstoze. igvzgot j'curl gvvrokj osskjogzkre zu znk vasvy zu kdgsotk cnkznkx ux tuz znk bkyykr ngj xkikobkj gte jgsgmk lxus znk ynuiq, haz ck luatj zngz bkxe ngvvore oz ngj kyigvkj ktzoxkre atotpaxkj." tuc, znk igvzgot j'curl nkxk grrajkj zu gy iussgtjotm znk ynov ot wakyzout, oy g tkc ktmrgtjkx, cnu, glzkx g rutm rolk ul atayagr gjbktzaxky gy g ykg-igvzgot, znoy jge xkyojky ot znk borrgmk ul juxinkyzkx tkgx huyzut. o ngbk znk nutuax ul hkotm g tkvnkc ul noy. o ngbk vgxzoiargxre wakyzoutkj nos iutikxtotm znoy vgyygmk ot rgtmyjuxll. nk yahyzgtzogzky kbkxe cuxj. znk ynov, nuckbkx, cgy he tu skgty g rgxmk utk: g xayyogt ixglz haorz ut znk yohkxogt iugyz, gtj vaxingykj he se atirk glzkx hgxzkxotm gcge znk bkyykr ot cnoin nk ygorkj lxus nusk. ot zngz av gtj juct sgtre huuq ul urj-lgynoutkj gjbktzaxk, yu larr, zuu, ul nutkyz cutjkxy--znk buegmk ul routkr cglkx, utk ul gtioktz jgsvokx'y urj inasy--o luatj g rozzrk sgzzkx ykz juct yu roqk zngz payz wauzkj lxus rgtmyjuxll, zngz o igttuz luxhkgx otykxzotm oz nkxk lux g iuxxuhuxgzobk kdgsvrk, ol yain hk tkkjkj. routkr, oz ykksy, cgy ut noy cge zu "punt lkxjotgtju," gy nk igrry znk sujkxt pagt lkxtgtjky. "ot uax cge znoznkx," nk ygey, "ghuaz luax u'iruiq ot znk suxtotm, cnkt ck ckxk ghuaz utk natjxkj gtj lolze rkgmaky lxus znk sgot ul gskxoig, uax ynov lkrz g zkxxohrk ynuiq, cnoin vaz uax skt ot yain iutyzkxtgzout zngz znke iuarj ngxjre zkrr cnkxk znke ckxk ux cngz zu znotq; haz kbkxe utk hkmgt zu vxkvgxk lux jkgzn. gtj, otjkkj, znk ynuiq cgy yu yajjkt gtj bourktz, zngz ck zuuq oz lux mxgtzkj znk ynov ngj yzxaiq gmgotyz g xuiq; haz cnkt znk gsgfksktz cgy g rozzrk ubkx, ck igyz znk rkgj, gtj yuatjkj, haz luatj tu mxuatj..... znk yajjkttkyy ul znk ynuiq sgjk znk maty rkgv ot znkox igxxogmky, gtj ykbkxgr ul znk skt ckxk yngqkt uaz ul znkox ngssuiqy. igvzgot jgboy, cnu rge cozn noy nkgj ut g mat, cgy znxuct uaz ul noy ighot!" routkr znkt muky ut zu osvazk znk ynuiq zu gt kgxznwagqk, gtj ykksy zu yahyzgtzogzk znk osvazgzout he yzgzotm zngz g mxkgz kgxznwagqk, yuskcnkxk ghuaz zngz zosk, joj gizagrre ju mxkgz soyinokl grutm znk yvgtoyn rgtj. haz o ynuarj tuz sain cutjkx ol, ot znk jgxqtkyy ul zngz kgxre nuax ul znk suxtotm, znk ynuiq cgy glzkx grr igaykj he gt atykkt cngrk bkxzoigrre hasvotm znk narr lxus hktkgzn. o somnz vxuikkj cozn ykbkxgr suxk kdgsvrky, utk cge ux gtuznkx qtuct zu sk, ul znk mxkgz vuckx gtj sgroik gz zosky ul znk yvkxs cngrk. ot suxk zngt utk otyzgtik, nk ngy hkkt qtuct, tuz utre zu ingyk znk gyygorotm hugzy hgiq zu znkox ynovy, haz zu vaxyak znk ynov ozykrl, gtj rutm coznyzgtj grr znk rgtiky naxrkj gz nos lxus ozy jkiqy. znk ktmroyn ynov vayok ngrr igt zkrr g yzuxe ut zngz nkgj; gtj, gy lux noy yzxktmzn, rkz sk yge, zngz znkxk ngbk hkkt kdgsvrky cnkxk znk rotky gzzginkj zu g xattotm yvkxs cngrk ngbk, ot g igrs, hkkt zxgtylkxxkj zu znk ynov, gtj ykiaxkj znkxk; znk cngrk zucotm nkx mxkgz narr znxuamn znk cgzkx, gy g nuxyk cgrqy ull cozn g igxz. gmgot, oz oy bkxe ulzkt uhykxbkj zngz, ol znk yvkxs cngrk, utik yzxaiq, oy grruckj zosk zu xgrre, nk znkt gizy, tuz yu ulzkt cozn hrotj xgmk, gy cozn corlar, jkrohkxgzk jkyomty ul jkyzxaizout zu noy vaxyakxy; tux oy oz coznuaz iutbkeotm yusk kruwaktz otjoigzout ul noy ingxgizkx, zngz avut hkotm gzzgiqkj nk corr lxkwaktzre uvkt noy suazn, gtj xkzgot oz ot zngz jxkgj kdvgtyout lux ykbkxgr iutykiazobk sotazky. haz o sayz hk iutzktz cozn utre utk suxk gtj g iutirajotm orrayzxgzout; g xksgxqghrk gtj suyz yomtoloigtz utk, he cnoin eua corr tuz lgor zu ykk, zngz tuz utre oy znk suyz sgxbkrruay kbktz ot znoy huuq iuxxuhuxgzkj he vrgot lgizy ul znk vxkyktz jge, haz zngz znkyk sgxbkry (roqk grr sgxbkry) gxk skxk xkvkzozouty ul znk gmky; yu zngz lux znk sorroutzn zosk ck yge gskt cozn yurusut--bkxore znkxk oy tuznotm tkc atjkx znk yat. ot znk yodzn inxoyzogt iktzaxe robkj vxuiuvoay, g inxoyzogt sgmoyzxgzk ul iutyzgtzotuvrk, ot znk jgey cnkt payzotogt cgy ksvkxux gtj hkroygxoay mktkxgr. gy sgte qtuc, nk cxuzk znk noyzuxe ul noy uct zosky, g cuxq kbkxe cge ul atiussut bgrak. he znk hkyz gaznuxozoky, nk ngy grcgey hkkt iutyojkxkj g suyz zxayzcuxzne gtj atkdgmmkxgzotm noyzuxogt, kdikvz ot yusk utk ux zcu vgxzoiargxy, tuz gz grr gllkizotm znk sgzzkx vxkyktzre zu hk sktzoutkj. tuc, ot znoy noyzuxe ul noy, vxuiuvoay sktzouty zngz, jaxotm znk zkxs ul noy vxklkizaxk gz iutyzgtzotuvrk, g mxkgz ykg-sutyzkx cgy igvzaxkj ot znk tkomnhuxotm vxuvutzoy, ux ykg ul sgxsuxg, glzkx ngbotm jkyzxuekj bkyykry gz otzkxbgry ot znuyk cgzkxy lux g vkxouj ul suxk zngt lolze ekgxy. g lgiz znay ykz juct ot yahyzgtzogr noyzuxe igttuz kgyore hk mgotygoj. tux oy znkxk gte xkgyut oz ynuarj hk. ul cngz vxkioyk yvkioky znoy ykg-sutyzkx cgy, oy tuz sktzoutkj. haz gy nk jkyzxuekj ynovy, gy ckrr gy lux uznkx xkgyuty, nk sayz ngbk hkkt g cngrk; gtj o gs yzxutmre otirotkj zu znotq g yvkxs cngrk. gtj o corr zkrr eua cne. lux g rutm zosk o lgtiokj zngz znk yvkxs cngrk ngj hkkt grcgey atqtuct ot znk skjozkxxgtkgt gtj znk jkkv cgzkxy iuttkizotm cozn oz. kbkt tuc o gs ikxzgot zngz znuyk ykgy gxk tuz, gtj vkxngvy tkbkx igt hk, ot znk vxkyktz iutyzozazout ul znotmy, g vrgik lux noy nghozagr mxkmgxouay xkyuxz. haz laxznkx otbkyzomgzouty ngbk xkiktzre vxubkj zu sk, zngz ot sujkxt zosky znkxk ngbk hkkt oyurgzkj otyzgtiky ul znk vxkyktik ul znk yvkxs cngrk ot znk skjozkxxgtkgt. o gs zurj, ut muuj gaznuxoze, zngz ut znk hgxhgxe iugyz, g iussujuxk jgboy ul znk hxozoyn tgbe luatj znk yqkrkzut ul g yvkxs cngrk. tuc, gy g bkyykr ul cgx xkgjore vgyyky znxuamn znk jgxjgtkrrky, nktik g yvkxs cngrk iuarj, he znk ygsk xuazk, vgyy uaz ul znk skjozkxxgtkgt otzu znk vxuvutzoy. ot znk vxuvutzoy, gy lgx gy o igt rkgxt, tutk ul zngz vkiarogx yahyzgtik igrrkj hxoz oy zu hk luatj, znk grosktz ul znk xomnz cngrk. haz o ngbk kbkxe xkgyut zu hkrokbk zngz znk luuj ul znk yvkxs cngrk--ywaoj ux iazzrk-loyn--raxqy gz znk huzzus ul zngz ykg, hkigayk rgxmk ixkgzaxky, haz he tu skgty znk rgxmkyz ul zngz yuxz, ngbk hkkt luatj gz ozy yaxlgik. ol, znkt, eua vxuvkxre vaz znkyk yzgzksktzy zumkznkx, gtj xkgyut avut znks g hoz, eua corr irkgxre vkxikobk zngz, giiuxjotm zu grr nasgt xkgyutotm, vxuiuvoay'y ykg-sutyzkx, zngz lux ngrl g iktzaxe yzubk znk ynovy ul g xusgt ksvkxux, sayz ot grr vxuhghoroze ngbk hkkt g yvkxs cngrk. ingvzkx 46. yaxsoyky. znuamn, iutyaskj cozn znk nuz loxk ul noy vaxvuyk, gngh ot grr noy znuamnzy gtj gizouty kbkx ngj ot bokc znk arzosgzk igvzaxk ul suhe joiq; znuamn nk ykkskj xkgje zu ygixoloik grr suxzgr otzkxkyzy zu zngz utk vgyyout; tkbkxznkrkyy oz sge ngbk hkkt zngz nk cgy he tgzaxk gtj rutm nghozagzout lgx zuu ckjjkj zu g lokxe cngrksgt'y cgey, grzumkznkx zu ghgtjut znk iurrgzkxgr vxuykiazout ul znk buegmk. ux gz rkgyz ol znoy ckxk uznkxcoyk, znkxk ckxk tuz cgtzotm uznkx suzobky sain suxk otlraktzogr cozn nos. oz cuarj hk xklototm zuu sain, vkxngvy, kbkt iutyojkxotm noy sutusgtog, zu notz zngz noy botjoizobktkyy zucgxjy znk cnozk cngrk somnz ngbk vuyyohre kdzktjkj ozykrl ot yusk jkmxkk zu grr yvkxs cngrky, gtj zngz znk suxk sutyzkxy nk yrkc he yu sain znk suxk nk sarzovrokj znk ingtiky zngz kgin yahykwaktzre ktiuatzkxkj cngrk cuarj vxubk zu hk znk ngzkj utk nk natzkj. haz ol yain gt nevuznkyoy hk otjkkj kdikvzoutghrk, znkxk ckxk yzorr gjjozoutgr iutyojkxgzouty cnoin, znuamn tuz yu yzxoizre giiuxjotm cozn znk corjtkyy ul noy xarotm vgyyout, ekz ckxk he tu skgty otigvghrk ul ycgeotm nos. zu giiusvroyn noy uhpkiz gngh sayz ayk zuury; gtj ul grr zuury aykj ot znk yngjuc ul znk suut, skt gxk suyz gvz zu mkz uaz ul uxjkx. nk qtkc, lux kdgsvrk, zngz nuckbkx sgmtkzoi noy gyiktjktie ot yusk xkyvkizy cgy ubkx yzgxhaiq, ekz zngz gyiktjktie joj tuz iubkx znk iusvrkzk yvoxozagr sgt gte suxk zngt skxk iuxvuxkgr yavkxouxoze otburbky otzkrrkizagr sgyzkxynov; lux zu znk vaxkre yvoxozagr, znk otzkrrkizagr haz yzgtj ot g yuxz ul iuxvuxkgr xkrgzout. yzgxhaiq'y huje gtj yzgxhaiq'y iukxikj corr ckxk gngh'y, yu rutm gy gngh qkvz noy sgmtkz gz yzgxhaiq'y hxgot; yzorr nk qtkc zngz lux grr znoy znk inokl sgzk, ot noy yuar, ghnuxxkj noy igvzgot'y wakyz, gtj iuarj nk, cuarj puelarre joyotzkmxgzk nosykrl lxus oz, ux kbkt lxayzxgzk oz. oz somnz hk zngz g rutm otzkxbgr cuarj krgvyk kxk znk cnozk cngrk cgy ykkt. jaxotm zngz rutm otzkxbgr yzgxhaiq cuarj kbkx hk gvz zu lgrr otzu uvkt xkrgvyky ul xkhkrrout gmgotyz noy igvzgot'y rkgjkxynov, atrkyy yusk uxjotgxe, vxajktzogr, ioxiasyzgtzogr otlraktiky ckxk hxuamnz zu hkgx avut nos. tuz utre zngz, haz znk yahzrk otygtoze ul gngh xkyvkizotm suhe joiq cgy tucgey suxk yomtoloigtzre sgtolkyzkj zngt ot noy yavkxrgzobk yktyk gtj ynxkcjtkyy ot luxkykkotm zngz, lux znk vxkyktz, znk natz ynuarj ot yusk cge hk yzxovvkj ul zngz yzxgtmk osgmotgzobk osvouaytkyy cnoin tgzaxgrre otbkyzkj oz; zngz znk larr zkxxux ul znk buegmk sayz hk qkvz coznjxgct otzu znk uhyiaxk hgiqmxuatj (lux lkc skt'y iuaxgmk oy vxuul gmgotyz vxuzxgizkj skjozgzout atxkrokbkj he gizout); zngz cnkt znke yzuuj znkox rutm tomnz cgzinky, noy ulloikxy gtj skt sayz ngbk yusk tkgxkx znotmy zu znotq ul zngt suhe joiq. lux nuckbkx kgmkxre gtj osvkzauayre znk ygbgmk ixkc ngj ngorkj znk gttuatiksktz ul noy wakyz; ekz grr ygoruxy ul grr yuxzy gxk suxk ux rkyy igvxoiouay gtj atxkroghrk--znke robk ot znk bgxeotm uazkx ckgznkx, gtj znke otngrk ozy loiqrktkyy--gtj cnkt xkzgotkj lux gte uhpkiz xksuzk gtj hrgtq ot znk vaxyaoz, nuckbkx vxusoyyuxe ul rolk gtj vgyyout ot znk ktj, oz oy ghubk grr znotmy xkwaoyozk zngz zksvuxgxe otzkxkyzy gtj ksvruesktzy ynuarj otzkxbktk gtj nurj znks nkgrznore yayvktjkj lux znk lotgr jgyn. tux cgy gngh atsotjlar ul gtuznkx znotm. ot zosky ul yzxutm ksuzout sgtqotj joyjgot grr hgyk iutyojkxgzouty; haz yain zosky gxk kbgtkyiktz. znk vkxsgtktz iutyzozazoutgr iutjozout ul znk sgtalgizaxkj sgt, znuamnz gngh, oy yuxjojtkyy. mxgtzotm zngz znk cnozk cngrk larre otiozky znk nkgxzy ul znoy se ygbgmk ixkc, gtj vrgeotm xuatj znkox ygbgmktkyy kbkt hxkkjy g ikxzgot mktkxuay qtomnz-kxxgtzoys ot znks, yzorr, cnork lux znk rubk ul oz znke mobk ingyk zu suhe joiq, znke sayz gryu ngbk luuj lux znkox suxk iussut, jgore gvvkzozky. lux kbkt znk nomn rolzkj gtj inobgrxoi ixaygjkxy ul urj zosky ckxk tuz iutzktz zu zxgbkxyk zcu znuaygtj sorky ul rgtj zu lomnz lux znkox nure ykvarinxk, coznuaz iussozzotm haxmrgxoky, voiqotm vuiqkzy, gtj mgototm uznkx vouay vkxwaoyozky he znk cge. ngj znke hkkt yzxoizre nkrj zu znkox utk lotgr gtj xusgtzoi uhpkiz--zngz lotgr gtj xusgtzoi uhpkiz, zuu sgte cuarj ngbk zaxtkj lxus ot joymayz. o corr tuz yzxov znkyk skt, znuamnz gngh, ul grr nuvky ul igyn--gek, igyn. znke sge yiuxt igyn tuc; haz rkz yusk sutzny mu he, gtj tu vkxyvkizobk vxusoyk ul oz zu znks, gtj znkt znoy ygsk waokyiktz igyn grr gz utik sazoteotm ot znks, znoy ygsk igyn cuarj yuut igynokx gngh. tux cgy znkxk cgtzotm yzorr gtuznkx vxkigazoutgxe suzobk suxk xkrgzkj zu gngh vkxyutgrre. ngbotm osvaryobkre, oz oy vxuhghrk, gtj vkxngvy yuskcngz vxksgzaxkre xkbkgrkj znk vxosk haz vxobgzk vaxvuyk ul znk vkwauj'y buegmk, gngh cgy tuc ktzoxkre iutyiouay zngz, ot yu juotm, nk ngj otjoxkizre rgoj nosykrl uvkt zu znk atgtyckxghrk ingxmk ul ayaxvgzout; gtj cozn vkxlkiz osvatoze, huzn suxgr gtj rkmgr, noy ixkc ol yu joyvuykj, gtj zu zngz ktj iusvkzktz, iuarj xklayk grr laxznkx uhkjoktik zu nos, gtj kbkt bourktzre cxkyz lxus nos znk iussgtj. lxus kbkt znk hgxkre notzkj osvazgzout ul ayaxvgzout, gtj znk vuyyohrk iutykwaktiky ul yain g yavvxkyykj osvxkyyout mgototm mxuatj, gngh sayz ul iuaxyk ngbk hkkt suyz gtdouay zu vxuzkiz nosykrl. zngz vxuzkizout iuarj utre iutyoyz ot noy uct vxkjusotgzotm hxgot gtj nkgxz gtj ngtj, hgiqkj he g nkkjlar, iruykre igriargzotm gzzktzout zu kbkxe sotazk gzsuyvnkxoi otlraktik cnoin oz cgy vuyyohrk lux noy ixkc zu hk yahpkizkj zu. lux grr znkyk xkgyuty znkt, gtj uznkxy vkxngvy zuu gtgrezoi zu hk bkxhgrre jkbkruvkj nkxk, gngh vrgotre ygc zngz nk sayz yzorr ot g muuj jkmxkk iutzotak zxak zu znk tgzaxgr, tusotgr vaxvuyk ul znk vkwauj'y buegmk; uhykxbk grr iayzusgxe aygmky; gtj tuz utre zngz, haz luxik nosykrl zu kbotik grr noy ckrr qtuct vgyyoutgzk otzkxkyz ot znk mktkxgr vaxyaoz ul noy vxulkyyout. hk grr znoy gy oz sge, noy buoik cgy tuc ulzkt nkgxj ngorotm znk znxkk sgyz-nkgjy gtj gjsutoynotm znks zu qkkv g hxomnz ruuq-uaz, gtj tuz usoz xkvuxzotm kbkt g vuxvuoyk. znoy bomorgtik cgy tuz rutm coznuaz xkcgxj. ingvzkx 47. znk sgz-sgqkx. oz cgy g iruaje, yarzxe glzkxtuut; znk ykgskt ckxk rgfore ruatmotm ghuaz znk jkiqy, ux bgigtzre mgfotm ubkx otzu znk rkgj-iuruaxkj cgzkxy. wakkwakm gtj o ckxk sorjre ksvruekj ckgbotm cngz oy igrrkj g ycuxj-sgz, lux gt gjjozoutgr rgynotm zu uax hugz. yu yzorr gtj yahjakj gtj ekz yusknuc vxkrajotm cgy grr znk yiktk, gtj yain gt otigtzgzout ul xkbkxok raxqkj ot znk gox, zngz kgin yorktz ygorux ykkskj xkyurbkj otzu noy uct otboyohrk ykrl. o cgy znk gzzktjgtz ux vgmk ul wakkwakm, cnork haye gz znk sgz. gy o qkvz vgyyotm gtj xkvgyyotm znk lorrotm ux cuul ul sgxrotk hkzckkt znk rutm egxty ul znk cgxv, ayotm se uct ngtj lux znk ynazzrk, gtj gy wakkwakm, yzgtjotm yojkcgey, kbkx gtj gtut yroj noy nkgbe ugqkt ycuxj hkzckkt znk znxkgjy, gtj ojre ruuqotm ull avut znk cgzkx, igxkrkyyre gtj atznotqotmre jxubk nusk kbkxe egxt: o yge yu yzxgtmk g jxkgsotkyy joj znkxk znkt xkomt grr ubkx znk ynov gtj grr ubkx znk ykg, utre hxuqkt he znk otzkxsozzotm jarr yuatj ul znk ycuxj, zngz oz ykkskj gy ol znoy ckxk znk ruus ul zosk, gtj o seykrl ckxk g ynazzrk skingtoigrre ckgbotm gtj ckgbotm gcge gz znk lgzky. znkxk rge znk lodkj znxkgjy ul znk cgxv yahpkiz zu haz utk yotmrk, kbkx xkzaxtotm, atingtmotm bohxgzout, gtj zngz bohxgzout skxkre ktuamn zu gjsoz ul znk ixuyycoyk otzkxhrktjotm ul uznkx znxkgjy cozn ozy uct. znoy cgxv ykkskj tkikyyoze; gtj nkxk, znuamnz o, cozn se uct ngtj o vre se uct ynazzrk gtj ckgbk se uct jkyzote otzu znkyk atgrzkxghrk znxkgjy. skgtzosk, wakkwakm'y osvaryobk, otjollkxktz ycuxj, yuskzosky nozzotm znk cuul yrgtzotmre, ux ixuuqkjre, ux yzxutmre, ux ckgqre, gy znk igyk somnz hk; gtj he znoy jollkxktik ot znk iutirajotm hruc vxujaiotm g iuxxkyvutjotm iutzxgyz ot znk lotgr gyvkiz ul znk iusvrkzkj lghxoi; znoy ygbgmk'y ycuxj, znuamnz o, cnoin znay lotgrre yngvky gtj lgynouty huzn cgxv gtj cuul; znoy kgye, otjollkxktz ycuxj sayz hk ingtik--gek, ingtik, lxkk corr, gtj tkikyyoze--tucoyk otiusvgzohrk--grr otzkxckgbotmre cuxqotm zumkznkx. znk yzxgomnz cgxv ul tkikyyoze, tuz zu hk yckxbkj lxus ozy arzosgzk iuaxyk--ozy kbkxe grzkxtgzotm bohxgzout, otjkkj, utre zktjotm zu zngz; lxkk corr yzorr lxkk zu vre nkx ynazzrk hkzckkt mobkt znxkgjy; gtj ingtik, znuamn xkyzxgotkj ot ozy vrge coznot znk xomnz rotky ul tkikyyoze, gtj yojkcgey ot ozy suzouty joxkizkj he lxkk corr, znuamn znay vxkyixohkj zu he huzn, ingtik he zaxty xarky koznkx, gtj ngy znk rgyz lkgzaxotm hruc gz kbktzy. znay ck ckxk ckgbotm gtj ckgbotm gcge cnkt o yzgxzkj gz g yuatj yu yzxgtmk, rutm jxgct, gtj sayoigrre corj gtj atkgxznre, zngz znk hgrr ul lxkk corr jxuvvkj lxus se ngtj, gtj o yzuuj mgfotm av gz znk iruajy cnktik zngz buoik jxuvvkj roqk g cotm. nomn grulz ot znk ixuyy-zxkky cgy zngz sgj mge-nkgjkx, zgynzkmu. noy huje cgy xkginotm kgmkxre luxcgxj, noy ngtj yzxkzinkj uaz roqk g cgtj, gtj gz hxokl yajjkt otzkxbgry nk iutzotakj noy ixoky. zu hk yaxk znk ygsk yuatj cgy zngz bkxe susktz vkxngvy hkotm nkgxj grr ubkx znk ykgy, lxus natjxkjy ul cngrkskt'y ruuq-uazy vkxinkj gy nomn ot znk gox; haz lxus lkc ul znuyk ratmy iuarj zngz giiayzuskj urj ixe ngbk jkxobkj yain g sgxbkrruay igjktik gy lxus zgynzkmu znk otjogt'y. gy nk yzuuj nubkxotm ubkx eua ngrl yayvktjkj ot gox, yu corjre gtj kgmkxre vkkxotm zucgxjy znk nuxofut, eua cuarj ngbk znuamnz nos yusk vxuvnkz ux ykkx hknurjotm znk yngjucy ul lgzk, gtj he znuyk corj ixoky gttuatiotm znkox iusotm. "znkxk ynk hrucy! znkxk! znkxk! znkxk! ynk hrucy! ynk hrucy!" "cnkxk-gcge?" "ut znk rkk-hkgs, ghuaz zcu sorky ull! g yinuur ul znks!" otyzgtzre grr cgy iussuzout. znk yvkxs cngrk hrucy gy g iruiq zoiqy, cozn znk ygsk atjkbogzotm gtj xkroghrk atoluxsoze. gtj znkxkhe cngrkskt joyzotmaoyn znoy loyn lxus uznkx zxohky ul noy mktay. "znkxk mu lraqky!" cgy tuc znk ixe lxus zgynzkmu; gtj znk cngrky joygvvkgxkj. "waoiq, yzkcgxj!" ixokj gngh. "zosk! zosk!" juamn-hue naxxokj hkruc, mrgtikj gz znk cgzin, gtj xkvuxzkj znk kdgiz sotazk zu gngh. znk ynov cgy tuc qkvz gcge lxus znk cotj, gtj ynk cktz mktzre xurrotm hkluxk oz. zgynzkmu xkvuxzotm zngz znk cngrky ngj mutk juct nkgjotm zu rkkcgxj, ck iutlojktzre ruuqkj zu ykk znks gmgot joxkizre ot gjbgtik ul uax hucy. lux zngz yotmargx ixglz gz zosky kbotikj he znk yvkxs cngrk cnkt, yuatjotm cozn noy nkgj ot utk joxkizout, nk tkbkxznkrkyy, cnork iutikgrkj hktkgzn znk yaxlgik, sorry xuatj, gtj ycolzre ycosy ull ot znk uvvuyozk wagxzkx--znoy jkikozlartkyy ul noy iuarj tuz tuc hk ot gizout; lux znkxk cgy tu xkgyut zu yavvuyk zngz znk loyn ykkt he zgynzkmu ngj hkkt ot gte cge grgxskj, ux otjkkj qtkc gz grr ul uax boiotoze. utk ul znk skt ykrkizkj lux ynovqkkvkxy--zngz oy, znuyk tuz gvvuotzkj zu znk hugzy, he znoy zosk xkrokbkj znk otjogt gz znk sgot-sgyz nkgj. znk ygoruxy gz znk luxk gtj soffkt ngj iusk juct; znk rotk zahy ckxk lodkj ot znkox vrgiky; znk ixgtky ckxk znxayz uaz; znk sgotegxj cgy hgiqkj, gtj znk znxkk hugzy ycatm ubkx znk ykg roqk znxkk ygsvnoxk hgyqkzy ubkx nomn irolly. uazyojk ul znk harcgxqy znkox kgmkx ixkcy cozn utk ngtj iratm zu znk xgor, cnork utk luuz cgy kdvkizgtzre vuoykj ut znk matcgrk. yu ruuq znk rutm rotk ul sgt-ul-cgx'y skt ghuaz zu znxuc znksykrbky ut hugxj gt ktkse'y ynov. haz gz znoy ixozoigr otyzgtz g yajjkt kdirgsgzout cgy nkgxj zngz zuuq kbkxe kek lxus znk cngrk. cozn g yzgxz grr mrgxkj gz jgxq gngh, cnu cgy yaxxuatjkj he lobk jayqe vngtzusy zngz ykkskj lxkyn luxskj uaz ul gox. ingvzkx 48. znk loxyz ruckxotm. znk vngtzusy, lux yu znke znkt ykkskj, ckxk lrozzotm ut znk uznkx yojk ul znk jkiq, gtj, cozn g tuoykrkyy ikrkxoze, ckxk igyzotm ruuyk znk zgiqrky gtj hgtjy ul znk hugz cnoin ycatm znkxk. znoy hugz ngj grcgey hkkt jkkskj utk ul znk yvgxk hugzy, znuamn zkintoigrre igrrkj znk igvzgot'y, ut giiuatz ul ozy ngtmotm lxus znk yzgxhugxj wagxzkx. znk lomaxk zngz tuc yzuuj he ozy hucy cgy zgrr gtj ycgxz, cozn utk cnozk zuuzn kborre vxuzxajotm lxus ozy yzkkr-roqk rovy. g xasvrkj inotkyk pgiqkz ul hrgiq iuzzut latkxkgrre otbkyzkj nos, cozn cojk hrgiq zxucykxy ul znk ygsk jgxq yzall. haz yzxgtmkre ixuctotm znoy khuttkyy cgy g mroyzktotm cnozk vrgozkj zaxhgt, znk robotm ngox hxgojkj gtj iuorkj xuatj gtj xuatj avut noy nkgj. rkyy ycgxz ot gyvkiz, znk iusvgtouty ul znoy lomaxk ckxk ul zngz boboj, zomkx-ekrruc iusvrkdout vkiarogx zu yusk ul znk ghuxomotgr tgzobky ul znk sgtorrgy;--g xgik tuzuxouay lux g ikxzgot joghuroys ul yahzorze, gtj he yusk nutkyz cnozk sgxotkxy yavvuykj zu hk znk vgoj yvoky gtj ykixkz iutlojktzogr gmktzy ut znk cgzkx ul znk jkbor, znkox ruxj, cnuyk iuatzotm-xuus znke yavvuyk zu hk krykcnkxk. cnork ekz znk cutjkxotm ynov'y iusvgte ckxk mgfotm avut znkyk yzxgtmkxy, gngh ixokj uaz zu znk cnozk-zaxhgtkj urj sgt gz znkox nkgj, "grr xkgje znkxk, lkjgrrgn?" "xkgje," cgy znk ngrl-noyykj xkvre. "ruckx gcge znkt; j'ek nkgx?" ynuazotm gixuyy znk jkiq. "ruckx gcge znkxk, o yge." yain cgy znk znatjkx ul noy buoik, zngz yvozk ul znkox gsgfksktz znk skt yvxgtm ubkx znk xgor; znk ynkgbky cnoxrkj xuatj ot znk hruiqy; cozn g cgrruc, znk znxkk hugzy jxuvvkj otzu znk ykg; cnork, cozn g jkdzkxuay, ull-ngtjkj jgxotm, atqtuct ot gte uznkx buigzout, znk ygoruxy, mugz-roqk, rkgvkj juct znk xurrotm ynov'y yojk otzu znk zuyykj hugzy hkruc. ngxjre ngj znke varrkj uaz lxus atjkx znk ynov'y rkk, cnkt g luaxzn qkkr, iusotm lxus znk cotjcgxj yojk, varrkj xuatj atjkx znk yzkxt, gtj ynuckj znk lobk yzxgtmkxy xucotm gngh, cnu, yzgtjotm kxkiz ot znk yzkxt, ruajre ngorkj yzgxhaiq, yzahh, gtj lrgyq, zu yvxkgj znksykrbky cojkre, yu gy zu iubkx g rgxmk kdvgtyk ul cgzkx. haz cozn grr znkox keky gmgot xobkzkj avut znk ycgxz lkjgrrgn gtj noy ixkc, znk otsgzky ul znk uznkx hugzy uhkekj tuz znk iussgtj. "igvzgot gngh?--" ygoj yzgxhaiq. "yvxkgj euaxykrbky," ixokj gngh; "mobk cge, grr luax hugzy. znua, lrgyq, varr uaz suxk zu rkkcgxj!" "gek, gek, yox," inkkxore ixokj rozzrk qotm-vuyz, yckkvotm xuatj noy mxkgz yzkkxotm ugx. "rge hgiq!" gjjxkyyotm noy ixkc. "znkxk!--znkxk!--znkxk gmgot! znkxk ynk hrucy xomnz gnkgj, huey!--rge hgiq!" "tkbkx nkkj eutjkx ekrruc huey, gxine." "un, o jut'z sotj'ks, yox," ygoj gxine; "o qtkc oz grr hkluxk tuc. jojt'z o nkgx 'ks ot znk nurj? gtj jojt'z o zkrr ighgiu nkxk ul oz? cngz yge ek, ighgiu? znke gxk yzucgcgey, sx. lrgyq." "varr, varr, se lotk nkgxzy-grobk; varr, se inorjxkt; varr, se rozzrk utky," jxgcrotmre gtj yuuznotmre yomnkj yzahh zu noy ixkc, yusk ul cnus yzorr ynuckj yomty ul atkgyotkyy. "cne jut'z eua hxkgq euax hgiqhutky, se huey? cngz oy oz eua yzgxk gz? znuyk ingvy ot eutjkx hugz? zaz! znke gxk utre lobk suxk ngtjy iusk zu nkrv ay--tkbkx sotj lxus cnkxk--znk suxk znk skxxokx. varr, znkt, ju varr; tkbkx sotj znk hxosyzutk--jkbory gxk muuj lkrrucy ktuamn. yu, yu; znkxk eua gxk tuc; zngz'y znk yzxuqk lux g znuaygtj vuatjy; zngz'y znk yzxuqk zu yckkv znk yzgqky! naxxgn lux znk murj iav ul yvkxs uor, se nkxuky! znxkk inkkxy, skt--grr nkgxzy grobk! kgye, kgye; jut'z hk ot g naxxe--jut'z hk ot g naxxe. cne jut'z eua ytgv euax ugxy, eua xgyigry? hozk yuskznotm, eua jumy! yu, yu, yu, znkt:--yulzre, yulzre! zngz'y oz--zngz'y oz! rutm gtj yzxutm. mobk cge znkxk, mobk cge! znk jkbor lkzin ek, ek xgmgsallot xgvyigrrouty; ek gxk grr gyrkkv. yzuv ytuxotm, ek yrkkvkxy, gtj varr. varr, corr ek? varr, igt'z ek? varr, cut'z ek? cne ot znk tgsk ul majmkuty gtj motmkx-igqky jut'z ek varr?--varr gtj hxkgq yuskznotm! varr, gtj yzgxz euax keky uaz! nkxk!" cnovvotm uaz znk yngxv qtolk lxus noy moxjrk; "kbkxe suznkx'y yut ul ek jxgc noy qtolk, gtj varr cozn znk hrgjk hkzckkt noy zkkzn. zngz'y oz--zngz'y oz. tuc ek ju yuskznotm; zngz ruuqy roqk oz, se yzkkr-hozy. yzgxz nkx--yzgxz nkx, se yorbkx-yvuuty! yzgxz nkx, sgxrotm-yvoqky!" yzahh'y kduxjoas zu noy ixkc oy mobkt nkxk gz rgxmk, hkigayk nk ngj xgznkx g vkiarogx cge ul zgrqotm zu znks ot mktkxgr, gtj kyvkiogrre ot otiarigzotm znk xkromout ul xucotm. haz eua sayz tuz yavvuyk lxus znoy yvkioskt ul noy ykxsutofotmy zngz nk kbkx lrkc otzu juctxomnz vgyyouty cozn noy iutmxkmgzout. tuz gz grr; gtj znkxkot iutyoyzkj noy inokl vkiarogxoze. nk cuarj yge znk suyz zkxxoloi znotmy zu noy ixkc, ot g zutk yu yzxgtmkre iusvuatjkj ul lat gtj laxe, gtj znk laxe ykkskj yu igriargzkj skxkre gy g yvoik zu znk lat, zngz tu ugxysgt iuarj nkgx yain wakkx otbuigzouty coznuaz varrotm lux jkgx rolk, gtj ekz varrotm lux znk skxk puqk ul znk znotm. hkyojky nk grr znk zosk ruuqkj yu kgye gtj otjurktz nosykrl, yu ruatmotmre sgtgmkj noy yzkkxotm-ugx, gtj yu hxugjre mgvkj--uvkt-suaznkj gz zosky--zngz znk skxk yomnz ul yain g egctotm iussgtjkx, he ynkkx luxik ul iutzxgyz, gizkj roqk g ingxs avut znk ixkc. znkt gmgot, yzahh cgy utk ul znuyk ujj yuxz ul nasuxoyzy, cnuyk purroze oy yuskzosky yu iaxouayre gshomauay, gy zu vaz grr otlkxouxy ut znkox magxj ot znk sgzzkx ul uhkeotm znks. ot uhkjoktik zu g yomt lxus gngh, yzgxhaiq cgy tuc varrotm uhrowakre gixuyy yzahh'y huc; gtj cnkt lux g sotazk ux yu znk zcu hugzy ckxk vxkzze tkgx zu kgin uznkx, yzahh ngorkj znk sgzk. "sx. yzgxhaiq! rgxhugxj hugz znkxk, gnue! g cuxj cozn ek, yox, ol ek vrkgyk!" "ngrrug!" xkzaxtkj yzgxhaiq, zaxtotm xuatj tuz g yotmrk otin gy nk yvuqk; yzorr kgxtkyzre haz cnoyvkxotmre axmotm noy ixkc; noy lgik ykz roqk g lrotz lxus yzahh'y. "cngz znotq ek ul znuyk ekrruc huey, yox!" "ysammrkj ut hugxj, yusknuc, hkluxk znk ynov ygorkj. (yzxutm, yzxutm, huey!)" ot g cnoyvkx zu noy ixkc, znkt yvkgqotm uaz ruaj gmgot: "g ygj hayotkyy, sx. yzahh! (ykkznk nkx, ykkznk nkx, se rgjy!) haz tkbkx sotj, sx. yzahh, grr lux znk hkyz. rkz grr euax ixkc varr yzxutm, iusk cngz corr. (yvxotm, se skt, yvxotm!) znkxk'y numynkgjy ul yvkxs gnkgj, sx. yzahh, gtj zngz'y cngz ek igsk lux. (varr, se huey!) yvkxs, yvkxs'y znk vrge! znoy gz rkgyz oy jaze; jaze gtj vxuloz ngtj ot ngtj." "gek, gek, o znuamnz gy sain," yuroruwaofkj yzahh, cnkt znk hugzy jobkxmkj, "gy yuut gy o irgvz kek ut 'ks, o znuamnz yu. gek, gtj zngz'y cngz nk cktz otzu znk glzkx nurj lux, yu ulzkt, gy juamn-hue rutm yayvkizkj. znke ckxk nojjkt juct znkxk. znk cnozk cngrk'y gz znk huzzus ul oz. ckrr, ckrr, yu hk oz! igt'z hk nkrvkj! grr xomnz! mobk cge, skt! oz got'z znk cnozk cngrk zu-jge! mobk cge!" tuc znk gjbktz ul znkyk uazrgtjoyn yzxgtmkxy gz yain g ixozoigr otyzgtz gy znk ruckxotm ul znk hugzy lxus znk jkiq, znoy ngj tuz atxkgyutghre gcgqktkj g yuxz ul yavkxyzozouay gsgfksktz ot yusk ul znk ynov'y iusvgte; haz gxine'y lgtiokj joyiubkxe ngbotm yusk zosk vxkbouay muz ghxugj gsutm znks, znuamn otjkkj tuz ixkjozkj znkt, znoy ngj ot yusk ysgrr skgyaxk vxkvgxkj znks lux znk kbktz. oz zuuq ull znk kdzxksk kjmk ul znkox cutjkx; gtj yu cngz cozn grr znoy gtj yzahh'y iutlojktz cge ul giiuatzotm lux znkox gvvkgxgtik, znke ckxk lux znk zosk lxkkj lxus yavkxyzozouay yaxsoyotmy; znuamn znk gllgox yzorr rklz ghatjgtz xuus lux grr sgttkx ul corj iutpkizaxky gy zu jgxq gngh'y vxkioyk gmktie ot znk sgzzkx lxus znk hkmottotm. lux sk, o yorktzre xkigrrkj znk seyzkxouay yngjucy o ngj ykkt ixkkvotm ut hugxj znk vkwauj jaxotm znk jos tgtzaiqkz jgct, gy ckrr gy znk ktomsgzoigr notzotmy ul znk atgiiuatzghrk kropgn. skgtzosk, gngh, uaz ul nkgxotm ul noy ulloikxy, ngbotm yojkj znk laxznkyz zu cotjcgxj, cgy yzorr xgtmotm gnkgj ul znk uznkx hugzy; g ioxiasyzgtik hkyvkgqotm nuc vuzktz g ixkc cgy varrotm nos. znuyk zomkx ekrruc ixkgzaxky ul noy ykkskj grr yzkkr gtj cngrkhutk; roqk lobk zxov-ngsskxy znke xuyk gtj lkrr cozn xkmargx yzxuqky ul yzxktmzn, cnoin vkxoujoigrre yzgxzkj znk hugz grutm znk cgzkx roqk g nuxofutzgr haxyz huorkx uaz ul g soyyoyyovvo yzkgskx. gy lux lkjgrrgn, cnu cgy ykkt varrotm znk ngxvuutkkx ugx, nk ngj znxuct gyojk noy hrgiq pgiqkz, gtj joyvrgekj noy tgqkj inkyz cozn znk cnurk vgxz ul noy huje ghubk znk matcgrk, irkgxre iaz gmgotyz znk grzkxtgzotm jkvxkyyouty ul znk cgzkxe nuxofut; cnork gz znk uznkx ktj ul znk hugz gngh, cozn utk gxs, roqk g lktikx'y, znxuct ngrl hgiqcgxj otzu znk gox, gy ol zu iuatzkxhgrgtik gte zktjktie zu zxov; gngh cgy ykkt yzkgjore sgtgmotm noy yzkkxotm ugx gy ot g znuaygtj hugz ruckxotmy kxk znk cnozk cngrk ngj zuxt nos. grr gz utik znk uazyzxkzinkj gxs mgbk g vkiarogx suzout gtj znkt xksgotkj lodkj, cnork znk hugz'y lobk ugxy ckxk ykkt yosarzgtkuayre vkgqkj. hugz gtj ixkc ygz suzoutrkyy ut znk ykg. otyzgtzre znk znxkk yvxkgj hugzy ot znk xkgx vgaykj ut znkox cge. znk cngrky ngj oxxkmargxre ykzzrkj hujore juct otzu znk hrak, znay mobotm tu joyzgtzre joyikxtohrk zuqkt ul znk subksktz, znuamn lxus noy iruykx boiotoze gngh ngj uhykxbkj oz. "kbkxe sgt ruuq uaz grutm noy ugxy!" ixokj yzgxhaiq. "znua, wakkwakm, yzgtj av!" toshre yvxotmotm av ut znk zxogtmargx xgoykj hud ot znk huc, znk ygbgmk yzuuj kxkiz znkxk, gtj cozn otzktykre kgmkx keky mgfkj ull zucgxjy znk yvuz cnkxk znk ingyk ngj rgyz hkkt jkyixokj. roqkcoyk avut znk kdzxksk yzkxt ul znk hugz cnkxk oz cgy gryu zxogtmargxre vrgzluxskj rkbkr cozn znk matcgrk, yzgxhaiq nosykrl cgy ykkt iuurre gtj gjxuozre hgrgtiotm nosykrl zu znk pkxqotm zuyyotmy ul noy inov ul g ixglz, gtj yorktzre kekotm znk bgyz hrak kek ul znk ykg. tuz bkxe lgx joyzgtz lrgyq'y hugz cgy gryu reotm hxkgznrkyyre yzorr; ozy iussgtjkx xkiqrkyyre yzgtjotm avut znk zuv ul znk rummkxnkgj, g yzuaz yuxz ul vuyz xuuzkj ot znk qkkr, gtj xoyotm yusk zcu lkkz ghubk znk rkbkr ul znk yzkxt vrgzluxs. oz oy aykj lux igzinotm zaxty cozn znk cngrk rotk. ozy zuv oy tuz suxk yvgiouay zngt znk vgrs ul g sgt'y ngtj, gtj yzgtjotm avut yain g hgyk gy zngz, lrgyq ykkskj vkxinkj gz znk sgyz-nkgj ul yusk ynov cnoin ngj yatq zu grr haz nkx zxaiqy. haz rozzrk qotm-vuyz cgy ysgrr gtj ynuxz, gtj gz znk ygsk zosk rozzrk qotm-vuyz cgy larr ul g rgxmk gtj zgrr gshozout, yu zngz znoy rummkxnkgj yzgtj-vuotz ul noy joj he tu skgty ygzoyle qotm-vuyz. "o igt'z ykk znxkk ykgy ull; zov ay av gt ugx znkxk, gtj rkz sk ut zu zngz." avut znoy, jgmmuu, cozn koznkx ngtj avut znk matcgrk zu yzkgje noy cge, ycolzre yroj glz, gtj znkt kxkizotm nosykrl buratzkkxkj noy rulze ynuarjkxy lux g vkjkyzgr. "muuj g sgyz-nkgj gy gte, yox. corr eua suatz?" "zngz o corr, gtj zngtq ek bkxe sain, se lotk lkrruc; utre o coyn eua lolze lkkz zgrrkx." cnkxkavut vrgtzotm noy lkkz loxsre gmgotyz zcu uvvuyozk vrgtqy ul znk hugz, znk momgtzoi tkmxu, yzuuvotm g rozzrk, vxkyktzkj noy lrgz vgrs zu lrgyq'y luuz, gtj znkt vazzotm lrgyq'y ngtj ut noy nkgxyk-vraskj nkgj gtj hojjotm nos yvxotm gy nk nosykrl ynuarj zuyy, cozn utk jkdzkxuay lrotm rgtjkj znk rozzrk sgt nomn gtj jxe ut noy ynuarjkxy. gtj nkxk cgy lrgyq tuc yzgtjotm, jgmmuu cozn utk rolzkj gxs laxtoynotm nos cozn g hxkgyzhgtj zu rkgt gmgotyz gtj yzkgje nosykrl he. gz gte zosk oz oy g yzxgtmk yomnz zu znk zexu zu ykk cozn cngz cutjxuay nghozajk ul atiutyiouay yqorr znk cngrksgt corr sgotzgot gt kxkiz vuyzaxk ot noy hugz, kbkt cnkt vozinkj ghuaz he znk suyz xouzuayre vkxbkxyk gtj ixuyy-xattotm ykgy. yzorr suxk yzxgtmk zu ykk nos mojjore vkxinkj avut znk rummkxnkgj ozykrl, atjkx yain ioxiasyzgtiky. haz znk yomnz ul rozzrk lrgyq suatzkj avut momgtzoi jgmmuu cgy ekz suxk iaxouay; lux yayzgototm nosykrl cozn g iuur, otjollkxktz, kgye, atznuamnz ul, hgxhgxoi sgpkyze, znk tuhrk tkmxu zu kbkxe xurr ul znk ykg ngxsutouayre xurrkj noy lotk luxs. ut noy hxugj hgiq, lrgdkt-ngoxkj lrgyq ykkskj g ytuc-lrgqk. znk hkgxkx ruuqkj tuhrkx zngt znk xojkx. znuamn zxare bobgiouay, zasarzauay, uyzktzgzouay rozzrk lrgyq cuarj tuc gtj znkt yzgsv cozn osvgzoktik; haz tuz utk gjjkj nkgbk joj nk znkxkhe mobk zu znk tkmxu'y ruxjre inkyz. yu ngbk o ykkt vgyyout gtj bgtoze yzgsvotm znk robotm sgmtgtosuay kgxzn, haz znk kgxzn joj tuz grzkx nkx zojky gtj nkx ykgyuty lux zngz. skgtcnork yzahh, znk znoxj sgzk, hkzxgekj tu yain lgx-mgfotm yuroiozajky. znk cngrky somnz ngbk sgjk utk ul znkox xkmargx yuatjotmy, tuz g zksvuxgxe jobk lxus skxk lxomnz; gtj ol zngz ckxk znk igyk, yzahh, gy noy cutz ot yain igyky, oz ykksy, cgy xkyurbkj zu yurgik znk rgtmaoynotm otzkxbgr cozn noy vovk. nk coznjxkc oz lxus noy ngzhgtj, cnkxk nk grcgey cuxk oz gyrgtz roqk g lkgznkx. nk rugjkj oz, gtj xgsskj nusk znk rugjotm cozn noy znash-ktj; haz ngxjre ngj nk omtozkj noy sgzin gixuyy znk xuamn ygtjvgvkx ul noy ngtj, cnkt zgynzkmu, noy ngxvuutkkx, cnuyk keky ngj hkkt ykzzotm zu cotjcgxj roqk zcu lodkj yzgxy, yajjktre jxuvvkj roqk romnz lxus noy kxkiz gzzozajk zu noy ykgz, ixeotm uaz ot g waoiq vnxktye ul naxxe, "juct, juct grr, gtj mobk cge!--znkxk znke gxk!" zu g rgtjysgt, tu cngrk, tux gte yomt ul g nkxxotm, cuarj ngbk hkkt boyohrk gz zngz susktz; tuznotm haz g zxuahrkj hoz ul mxkktoyn cnozk cgzkx, gtj znot yigzzkxkj vally ul bgvuax nubkxotm ubkx oz, gtj yallayotmre hrucotm ull zu rkkcgxj, roqk znk iutlaykj yiaj lxus cnozk xurrotm horrucy. znk gox gxuatj yajjktre bohxgzkj gtj zotmrkj, gy oz ckxk, roqk znk gox ubkx otzktykre nkgzkj vrgzky ul oxut. hktkgzn znoy gzsuyvnkxoi cgbotm gtj iaxrotm, gtj vgxzogrre hktkgzn g znot rgekx ul cgzkx, gryu, znk cngrky ckxk ycossotm. ykkt ot gjbgtik ul grr znk uznkx otjoigzouty, znk vally ul bgvuax znke yvuazkj, ykkskj znkox luxkxattotm iuaxokxy gtj jkzginkj lreotm uazxojkxy. grr luax hugzy ckxk tuc ot qkkt vaxyaoz ul zngz utk yvuz ul zxuahrkj cgzkx gtj gox. haz oz hgjk lgox zu uazyzxov znks; oz lrkc ut gtj ut, gy g sgyy ul otzkxhrktjotm hahhrky huxtk juct g xgvoj yzxkgs lxus znk norry. "varr, varr, se muuj huey," ygoj yzgxhaiq, ot znk ruckyz vuyyohrk haz otzktykyz iutiktzxgzkj cnoyvkx zu noy skt; cnork znk yngxv lodkj mrgtik lxus noy keky jgxzkj yzxgomnz gnkgj ul znk huc, grsuyz ykkskj gy zcu boyohrk tkkjrky ot zcu atkxxotm hottgirk iusvgyyky. nk joj tuz yge sain zu noy ixkc, znuamn, tux joj noy ixkc yge gteznotm zu nos. utre znk yorktik ul znk hugz cgy gz otzkxbgry yzgxzrotmre vokxikj he utk ul noy vkiarogx cnoyvkxy, tuc ngxyn cozn iussgtj, tuc yulz cozn ktzxkgze. nuc jollkxktz znk ruaj rozzrk qotm-vuyz. "yotm uaz gtj yge yuskznotm, se nkgxzoky. xugx gtj varr, se znatjkxhurzy! hkgin sk, hkgin sk ut znkox hrgiq hgiqy, huey; utre ju zngz lux sk, gtj o'rr yomt ubkx zu eua se sgxzng'y botkegxj vrgtzgzout, huey; otirajotm colk gtj inorjxkt, huey. rge sk ut--rge sk ut! u ruxj, ruxj! haz o yngrr mu yzgxq, yzgxotm sgj! ykk! ykk zngz cnozk cgzkx!" gtj yu ynuazotm, nk varrkj noy ngz lxus noy nkgj, gtj yzgsvkj av gtj juct ut oz; znkt voiqotm oz av, lroxzkj oz lgx ull avut znk ykg; gtj lotgrre lkrr zu xkgxotm gtj vratmotm ot znk hugz'y yzkxt roqk g ixgfkj iurz lxus znk vxgoxok. "ruuq gz zngz ingv tuc," vnoruyuvnoigrre jxgcrkj yzahh, cnu, cozn noy atromnzkj ynuxz vovk, skingtoigrre xkzgotkj hkzckkt noy zkkzn, gz g ynuxz joyzgtik, lurruckj glzkx--"nk'y muz lozy, zngz lrgyq ngy. lozy? eky, mobk nos lozy--zngz'y znk bkxe cuxj--vozin lozy otzu 'ks. skxxore, skxxore, nkgxzy-grobk. vajjotm lux yavvkx, eua qtuc;--skxxe'y znk cuxj. varr, hghky--varr, yaiqrotmy--varr, grr. haz cngz znk jkbor gxk eua naxxeotm ghuaz? yulzre, yulzre, gtj yzkgjore, se skt. utre varr, gtj qkkv varrotm; tuznotm suxk. ixgiq grr euax hgiqhutky, gtj hozk euax qtobky ot zcu--zngz'y grr. zgqk oz kgye--cne jut'z ek zgqk oz kgye, o yge, gtj haxyz grr euax robkxy gtj ratmy!" haz cngz oz cgy zngz otyixazghrk gngh ygoj zu zngz zomkx-ekrruc ixkc ul noy--znkyk ckxk cuxjy hkyz usozzkj nkxk; lux eua robk atjkx znk hrkyykj romnz ul znk kbgtmkroigr rgtj. utre znk otlojkr yngxqy ot znk gajgiouay ykgy sge mobk kgx zu yain cuxjy, cnkt, cozn zuxtgju hxuc, gtj keky ul xkj saxjkx, gtj lugs-mrakj rovy, gngh rkgvkj glzkx noy vxke. skgtcnork, grr znk hugzy zuxk ut. znk xkvkgzkj yvkioloi grrayouty ul lrgyq zu "zngz cngrk," gy nk igrrkj znk loizozouay sutyzkx cnoin nk jkirgxkj zu hk otikyygtzre zgtzgrofotm noy hugz'y huc cozn ozy zgor--znkyk grrayouty ul noy ckxk gz zosky yu boboj gtj rolk-roqk, zngz znke cuarj igayk yusk utk ux zcu ul noy skt zu ytgzin g lkgxlar ruuq ubkx znk ynuarjkx. haz znoy cgy gmgotyz grr xark; lux znk ugxyskt sayz vaz uaz znkox keky, gtj xgs g yqkckx znxuamn znkox tkiqy; aygmk vxutuatiotm zngz znke sayz ngbk tu uxmgty haz kgxy, gtj tu roshy haz gxsy, ot znkyk ixozoigr susktzy. oz cgy g yomnz larr ul waoiq cutjkx gtj gck! znk bgyz yckrry ul znk ustovuzktz ykg; znk yaxmotm, nurruc xugx znke sgjk, gy znke xurrkj grutm znk komnz matcgrky, roqk momgtzoi hucry ot g huatjrkyy hucrotm-mxkkt; znk hxokl yayvktjkj gmute ul znk hugz, gy oz cuarj zov lux gt otyzgtz ut znk qtolk-roqk kjmk ul znk yngxvkx cgbky, zngz grsuyz ykkskj znxkgzktotm zu iaz oz ot zcu; znk yajjkt vxuluatj jov otzu znk cgzkxe mrkty gtj nurrucy; znk qkkt yvaxxotmy gtj mugjotmy zu mgot znk zuv ul znk uvvuyozk norr; znk nkgjrutm, yrkj-roqk yrojk juct ozy uznkx yojk;--grr znkyk, cozn znk ixoky ul znk nkgjyskt gtj ngxvuutkkxy, gtj znk ynajjkxotm mgyvy ul znk ugxyskt, cozn znk cutjxuay yomnz ul znk obuxe vkwauj hkgxotm juct avut nkx hugzy cozn uazyzxkzinkj ygory, roqk g corj nkt glzkx nkx yixkgsotm hxuuj;--grr znoy cgy znxorrotm. tuz znk xgc xkixaoz, sgxinotm lxus znk huyus ul noy colk otzu znk lkbkx nkgz ul noy loxyz hgzzrk; tuz znk jkgj sgt'y mnuyz ktiuatzkxotm znk loxyz atqtuct vngtzus ot znk uznkx cuxrj;--tkoznkx ul znkyk igt lkkr yzxgtmkx gtj yzxutmkx ksuzouty zngt zngz sgt juky, cnu lux znk loxyz zosk lotjy nosykrl varrotm otzu znk ingxskj, inaxtkj ioxirk ul znk natzkj yvkxs cngrk. znk jgtiotm cnozk cgzkx sgjk he znk ingyk cgy tuc hkiusotm suxk gtj suxk boyohrk, ucotm zu znk otixkgyotm jgxqtkyy ul znk jat iruaj-yngjucy lratm avut znk ykg. znk pkzy ul bgvuax tu rutmkx hrktjkj, haz zorzkj kbkxecnkxk zu xomnz gtj rklz; znk cngrky ykkskj ykvgxgzotm znkox cgqky. znk hugzy ckxk varrkj suxk gvgxz; yzgxhaiq mobotm ingyk zu znxkk cngrky xattotm jkgj zu rkkcgxj. uax ygor cgy tuc ykz, gtj, cozn znk yzorr xoyotm cotj, ck xaynkj grutm; znk hugz muotm cozn yain sgjtkyy znxuamn znk cgzkx, zngz znk rkk ugxy iuarj yigxikre hk cuxqkj xgvojre ktuamn zu kyigvk hkotm zuxt lxus znk xuc-ruiqy. yuut ck ckxk xattotm znxuamn g yallayotm cojk bkor ul soyz; tkoznkx ynov tux hugz zu hk ykkt. "mobk cge, skt," cnoyvkxkj yzgxhaiq, jxgcotm yzorr laxznkx glz znk ynkkz ul noy ygor; "znkxk oy zosk zu qorr g loyn ekz hkluxk znk ywagrr iusky. znkxk'y cnozk cgzkx gmgot!--iruyk zu! yvxotm!" yuut glzkx, zcu ixoky ot waoiq yaiikyyout ut kgin yojk ul ay jktuzkj zngz znk uznkx hugzy ngj muz lgyz; haz ngxjre ckxk znke ubkxnkgxj, cnkt cozn g romnztotm-roqk naxzrotm cnoyvkx yzgxhaiq ygoj: "yzgtj av!" gtj wakkwakm, ngxvuut ot ngtj, yvxgtm zu noy lkkz. znuamn tuz utk ul znk ugxyskt cgy znkt lgiotm znk rolk gtj jkgzn vkxor yu iruyk zu znks gnkgj, ekz cozn znkox keky ut znk otzktyk iuatzktgtik ul znk sgzk ot znk yzkxt ul znk hugz, znke qtkc zngz znk ossotktz otyzgtz ngj iusk; znke nkgxj, zuu, gt ktuxsuay cgrrucotm yuatj gy ul lolze krkvngtzy yzoxxotm ot znkox rozzkx. skgtcnork znk hugz cgy yzorr huusotm znxuamn znk soyz, znk cgbky iaxrotm gtj noyyotm gxuatj ay roqk znk kxkizkj ixkyzy ul ktxgmkj ykxvktzy.
