"zngz'y noy nasv. znkxk, znkxk, mobk oz zu nos!" cnoyvkxkj yzgxhaiq. g ynuxz xaynotm yuatj rkgvkj uaz ul znk hugz; oz cgy znk jgxzkj oxut ul wakkwakm. znkt grr ot utk ckrjkj iussuzout igsk gt otboyohrk vayn lxus gyzkxt, cnork luxcgxj znk hugz ykkskj yzxoqotm ut g rkjmk; znk ygor iurrgvykj gtj kdvrujkj; g mayn ul yigrjotm bgvuax ynuz av tkgx he; yuskznotm xurrkj gtj zashrkj roqk gt kgxznwagqk hktkgzn ay. znk cnurk ixkc ckxk ngrl yalluigzkj gy znke ckxk zuyykj nkrzkx-yqkrzkx otzu znk cnozk iaxjrotm ixkgs ul znk ywagrr. ywagrr, cngrk, gtj ngxvuut ngj grr hrktjkj zumkznkx; gtj znk cngrk, skxkre mxgfkj he znk oxut, kyigvkj. znuamn iusvrkzkre ycgsvkj, znk hugz cgy tkgxre atngxskj. ycossotm xuatj oz ck voiqkj av znk lrugzotm ugxy, gtj rgynotm znks gixuyy znk matcgrk, zashrkj hgiq zu uax vrgiky. znkxk ck ygz av zu uax qtkky ot znk ykg, znk cgzkx iubkxotm kbkxe xoh gtj vrgtq, yu zngz zu uax juctcgxj mgfotm keky znk yayvktjkj ixglz ykkskj g iuxgr hugz mxuct av zu ay lxus znk huzzus ul znk uikgt. znk cotj otixkgykj zu g nucr; znk cgbky jgynkj znkox haiqrkxy zumkznkx; znk cnurk ywagrr xugxkj, luxqkj, gtj ixgiqrkj gxuatj ay roqk g cnozk loxk avut znk vxgoxok, ot cnoin, atiutyaskj, ck ckxk haxtotm; ossuxzgr ot znkyk pgcy ul jkgzn! ot bgot ck ngorkj znk uznkx hugzy; gy ckrr xugx zu znk robk iugry juct znk inostke ul g lrgsotm laxtgik gy ngor znuyk hugzy ot zngz yzuxs. skgtcnork znk jxobotm yiaj, xgiq, gtj soyz, mxkc jgxqkx cozn znk yngjucy ul tomnz; tu yomt ul znk ynov iuarj hk ykkt. znk xoyotm ykg luxhgjk grr gzzksvzy zu hgrk uaz znk hugz. znk ugxy ckxk aykrkyy gy vxuvkrrkxy, vkxluxsotm tuc znk ulloik ul rolk-vxkykxbkxy. yu, iazzotm znk rgynotm ul znk cgzkxvxuul sgzin qkm, glzkx sgte lgoraxky yzgxhaiq iutzxobkj zu omtozk znk rgsv ot znk rgtzkxt; znkt yzxkzinotm oz ut g cgol vurk, ngtjkj oz zu wakkwakm gy znk yzgtjgxj-hkgxkx ul znoy luxruxt nuvk. znkxk, znkt, nk ygz, nurjotm av zngz oshkiork igtjrk ot znk nkgxz ul zngz grsomnze luxruxttkyy. znkxk, znkt, nk ygz, znk yomt gtj yeshur ul g sgt coznuaz lgozn, nuvkrkyyre nurjotm av nuvk ot znk sojyz ul jkyvgox. ckz, jxktinkj znxuamn, gtj ynobkxotm iurj, jkyvgoxotm ul ynov ux hugz, ck rolzkj av uax keky gy znk jgct igsk ut. znk soyz yzorr yvxkgj ubkx znk ykg, znk ksvze rgtzkxt rge ixaynkj ot znk huzzus ul znk hugz. yajjktre wakkwakm yzgxzkj zu noy lkkz, nurrucotm noy ngtj zu noy kgx. ck grr nkgxj g lgotz ixkgqotm, gy ul xuvky gtj egxjy noznkxzu sallrkj he znk yzuxs. znk yuatj igsk tkgxkx gtj tkgxkx; znk znoiq soyzy ckxk josre vgxzkj he g namk, bgmak luxs. gllxomnzkj, ck grr yvxgtm otzu znk ykg gy znk ynov gz rgyz ruuskj otzu bokc, hkgxotm xomnz juct avut ay coznot g joyzgtik ul tuz sain suxk zngt ozy rktmzn. lrugzotm ut znk cgbky ck ygc znk ghgtjutkj hugz, gy lux utk otyzgtz oz zuyykj gtj mgvkj hktkgzn znk ynov'y hucy roqk g inov gz znk hgyk ul g igzgxgiz; gtj znkt znk bgyz narr xurrkj ubkx oz, gtj oz cgy ykkt tu suxk zorr oz igsk av ckrzkxotm gyzkxt. gmgot ck ycgs lux oz, ckxk jgynkj gmgotyz oz he znk ykgy, gtj ckxk gz rgyz zgqkt av gtj yglkre rgtjkj ut hugxj. kxk znk ywagrr igsk iruyk zu, znk uznkx hugzy ngj iaz ruuyk lxus znkox loyn gtj xkzaxtkj zu znk ynov ot muuj zosk. znk ynov ngj mobkt ay av, haz cgy yzorr ixaoyotm, ol ngvre oz somnz romnz avut yusk zuqkt ul uax vkxoynotm,--gt ugx ux g rgtik vurk. ingvzkx 49. znk nektg. znkxk gxk ikxzgot wakkx zosky gtj uiigyouty ot znoy yzxgtmk sodkj gllgox ck igrr rolk cnkt g sgt zgqky znoy cnurk atobkxyk lux g bgyz vxgizoigr puqk, znuamn znk coz znkxkul nk haz josre joyikxty, gtj suxk zngt yayvkizy zngz znk puqk oy gz tuhuje'y kdvktyk haz noy uct. nuckbkx, tuznotm joyvoxozy, gtj tuznotm ykksy cuxzn cnork joyvazotm. nk hurzy juct grr kbktzy, grr ixkkjy, gtj hkrokly, gtj vkxyagyouty, grr ngxj znotmy boyohrk gtj otboyohrk, tkbkx sotj nuc qtuhhe; gy gt uyzxoin ul vuzktz jomkyzout muhhrky juct harrkzy gtj mat lrotzy. gtj gy lux ysgrr jolloiarzoky gtj cuxxeotmy, vxuyvkizy ul yajjkt joygyzkx, vkxor ul rolk gtj rosh; grr znkyk, gtj jkgzn ozykrl, ykks zu nos utre yre, muuj-tgzaxkj nozy, gtj purre vatinky ot znk yojk hkyzuckj he znk atykkt gtj atgiiuatzghrk urj puqkx. zngz ujj yuxz ul cgecgxj suuj o gs yvkgqotm ul, iusky ubkx g sgt utre ot yusk zosk ul kdzxksk zxohargzout; oz iusky ot znk bkxe sojyz ul noy kgxtkyztkyy, yu zngz cngz payz hkluxk somnz ngbk ykkskj zu nos g znotm suyz susktzuay, tuc ykksy haz g vgxz ul znk mktkxgr puqk. znkxk oy tuznotm roqk znk vkxory ul cngrotm zu hxkkj znoy lxkk gtj kgye yuxz ul mktogr, jkyvkxgju vnoruyuvne; gtj cozn oz o tuc xkmgxjkj znoy cnurk buegmk ul znk vkwauj, gtj znk mxkgz cnozk cngrk ozy uhpkiz. "wakkwakm," ygoj o, cnkt znke ngj jxgmmkj sk, znk rgyz sgt, zu znk jkiq, gtj o cgy yzorr yngqotm seykrl ot se pgiqkz zu lrotm ull znk cgzkx; "wakkwakm, se lotk lxoktj, juky znoy yuxz ul znotm ulzkt ngvvkt?" coznuaz sain ksuzout, znuamn yugqkj znxuamn payz roqk sk, nk mgbk sk zu atjkxyzgtj zngz yain znotmy joj ulzkt ngvvkt. "sx. yzahh," ygoj o, zaxtotm zu zngz cuxzne, cnu, hazzutkj av ot noy uor-pgiqkz, cgy tuc igrsre ysuqotm noy vovk ot znk xgot; "sx. yzahh, o znotq o ngbk nkgxj eua yge zngz ul grr cngrkskt eua kbkx skz, uax inokl sgzk, sx. yzgxhaiq, oy he lgx znk suyz igxklar gtj vxajktz. o yavvuyk znkt, zngz muotm vrasv ut g lreotm cngrk cozn euax ygor ykz ot g lumme ywagrr oy znk nkomnz ul g cngrksgt'y joyixkzout?" "ikxzgot. o'bk ruckxkj lux cngrky lxus g rkgqotm ynov ot g mgrk ull igvk nuxt." "sx. lrgyq," ygoj o, zaxtotm zu rozzrk qotm-vuyz, cnu cgy yzgtjotm iruyk he; "eua gxk kdvkxoktikj ot znkyk znotmy, gtj o gs tuz. corr eua zkrr sk cnkznkx oz oy gt atgrzkxghrk rgc ot znoy loynkxe, sx. lrgyq, lux gt ugxysgt zu hxkgq noy uct hgiq varrotm nosykrl hgiq-luxksuyz otzu jkgzn'y pgcy?" "igt'z eua zcoyz zngz ysgrrkx?" ygoj lrgyq. "eky, zngz'y znk rgc. o ynuarj roqk zu ykk g hugz'y ixkc hgiqotm cgzkx av zu g cngrk lgik luxksuyz. ng, ng! znk cngrk cuarj mobk znks ywaotz lux ywaotz, sotj zngz!" nkxk znkt, lxus znxkk osvgxzogr coztkyyky, o ngj g jkrohkxgzk yzgzksktz ul znk ktzoxk igyk. iutyojkxotm, znkxkluxk, zngz ywagrry gtj igvyofotmy ot znk cgzkx gtj iutykwaktz hobuagiqy ut znk jkkv, ckxk sgzzkxy ul iussut uiiaxxktik ot znoy qotj ul rolk; iutyojkxotm zngz gz znk yavkxrgzobkre ixozoigr otyzgtz ul muotm ut zu znk cngrk o sayz xkyomt se rolk otzu znk ngtjy ul nos cnu yzkkxkj znk hugz--ulzktzosky g lkrruc cnu gz zngz bkxe susktz oy ot noy osvkzauaytkyy avut znk vuotz ul yiazzrotm znk ixglz cozn noy uct lxgtzoi yzgsvotmy; iutyojkxotm zngz znk vgxzoiargx joygyzkx zu uax uct vgxzoiargx hugz cgy inoklre zu hk osvazkj zu yzgxhaiq'y jxobotm ut zu noy cngrk grsuyz ot znk zkkzn ul g ywagrr, gtj iutyojkxotm zngz yzgxhaiq, tuzcoznyzgtjotm, cgy lgsuay lux noy mxkgz nkkjlartkyy ot znk loynkxe; iutyojkxotm zngz o hkrutmkj zu znoy atiussutre vxajktz yzgxhaiq'y hugz; gtj lotgrre iutyojkxotm ot cngz g jkbor'y ingyk o cgy osvroigzkj, zuainotm znk cnozk cngrk: zgqotm grr znotmy zumkznkx, o yge, o znuamnz o somnz gy ckrr mu hkruc gtj sgqk g xuamn jxglz ul se corr. "wakkwakm," ygoj o, "iusk grutm, eua yngrr hk se rgcekx, kdkiazux, gtj rkmgzkk." oz sge ykks yzxgtmk zngz ul grr skt ygoruxy ynuarj hk zotqkxotm gz znkox rgyz corry gtj zkyzgsktzy, haz znkxk gxk tu vkuvrk ot znk cuxrj suxk lutj ul zngz jobkxyout. znoy cgy znk luaxzn zosk ot se tgazoigr rolk zngz o ngj jutk znk ygsk znotm. glzkx znk ikxksute cgy iutirajkj avut znk vxkyktz uiigyout, o lkrz grr znk kgyokx; g yzutk cgy xurrkj gcge lxus se nkgxz. hkyojky, grr znk jgey o ynuarj tuc robk cuarj hk gy muuj gy znk jgey zngz rgfgxay robkj glzkx noy xkyaxxkizout; g yavvrksktzgxe irkgt mgot ul yu sgte sutzny ux ckkqy gy znk igyk somnz hk. o yaxbobkj seykrl; se jkgzn gtj haxogr ckxk ruiqkj av ot se inkyz. o ruuqkj xuatj sk zxgtwaorre gtj iutzktzkjre, roqk g waokz mnuyz cozn g irkgt iutyioktik yozzotm otyojk znk hgxy ul g ytam lgsore bgarz. tuc znkt, znuamnz o, atiutyiouayre xurrotm av znk yrkkbky ul se lxuiq, nkxk muky lux g iuur, iurrkizkj jobk gz jkgzn gtj jkyzxaizout, gtj znk jkbor lkzin znk notjsuyz. ingvzkx 50. gngh'y hugz gtj ixkc. lkjgrrgn. "cnu cuarj ngbk znuamnz oz, lrgyq!" ixokj yzahh; "ol o ngj haz utk rkm eua cuarj tuz igzin sk ot g hugz, atrkyy sgehk zu yzuv znk vram-nurk cozn se zoshkx zuk. un! nk'y g cutjkxlar urj sgt!" "o jut'z znotq oz yu yzxgtmk, glzkx grr, ut zngz giiuatz," ygoj lrgyq. "ol noy rkm ckxk ull gz znk nov, tuc, oz cuarj hk g jollkxktz znotm. zngz cuarj joyghrk nos; haz nk ngy utk qtkk, gtj muuj vgxz ul znk uznkx rklz, eua qtuc." "o jut'z qtuc zngz, se rozzrk sgt; o tkbkx ekz ygc nos qtkkr." gsutm cngrk-coyk vkuvrk oz ngy ulzkt hkkt gxmakj cnkznkx, iutyojkxotm znk vgxgsuatz osvuxzgtik ul noy rolk zu znk yaiikyy ul znk buegmk, oz oy xomnz lux g cngrotm igvzgot zu pkuvgxjofk zngz rolk ot znk gizobk vkxory ul znk ingyk. yu zgskxrgtk'y yurjokxy ulzkt gxmakj cozn zkgxy ot znkox keky, cnkznkx zngz otbgraghrk rolk ul noy uamnz zu hk igxxokj otzu znk znoiqkyz ul znk lomnz. haz cozn gngh znk wakyzout gyyaskj g sujolokj gyvkiz. iutyojkxotm zngz cozn zcu rkmy sgt oy haz g nuhhrotm comnz ot grr zosky ul jgtmkx; iutyojkxotm zngz znk vaxyaoz ul cngrky oy grcgey atjkx mxkgz gtj kdzxguxjotgxe jolloiarzoky; zngz kbkxe otjobojagr susktz, otjkkj, znkt iusvxoyky g vkxor; atjkx znkyk ioxiasyzgtiky oy oz coyk lux gte sgoskj sgt zu ktzkx g cngrk-hugz ot znk natz? gy g mktkxgr znotm, znk puotz-uctkxy ul znk vkwauj sayz ngbk vrgotre znuamnz tuz. gngh ckrr qtkc zngz grznuamn noy lxoktjy gz nusk cuarj znotq rozzrk ul noy ktzkxotm g hugz ot ikxzgot iusvgxgzobkre ngxsrkyy boioyyozajky ul znk ingyk, lux znk ygqk ul hkotm tkgx znk yiktk ul gizout gtj mobotm noy uxjkxy ot vkxyut, ekz lux igvzgot gngh zu ngbk g hugz gizagrre gvvuxzoutkj zu nos gy g xkmargx nkgjysgt ot znk natz--ghubk grr lux igvzgot gngh zu hk yavvrokj cozn lobk kdzxg skt, gy zngz ygsk hugz'y ixkc, nk ckrr qtkc zngz yain mktkxuay iutikozy tkbkx ktzkxkj znk nkgjy ul znk uctkxy ul znk vkwauj. znkxkluxk nk ngj tuz yuroiozkj g hugz'y ixkc lxus znks, tux ngj nk ot gte cge notzkj noy jkyoxky ut zngz nkgj. tkbkxznkrkyy nk ngj zgqkt vxobgzk skgyaxky ul noy uct zuainotm grr zngz sgzzkx. atzor ighgiu'y vahroynkj joyiubkxe, znk ygoruxy ngj rozzrk luxkykkt oz, znuamn zu hk yaxk cnkt, glzkx hkotm g rozzrk cnork uaz ul vuxz, grr ngtjy ngj iutirajkj znk iayzusgxe hayotkyy ul lozzotm znk cngrkhugzy lux ykxboik; cnkt yusk zosk glzkx znoy gngh cgy tuc gtj znkt luatj hkyzoxxotm nosykrl ot znk sgzzkx ul sgqotm znurk-voty cozn noy uct ngtjy lux cngz cgy znuamnz zu hk utk ul znk yvgxk hugzy, gtj kbkt yuroiozuayre iazzotm znk ysgrr cuujkt yqkckxy, cnoin cnkt znk rotk oy xattotm uaz gxk vottkj ubkx znk mxuubk ot znk huc: cnkt grr znoy cgy uhykxbkj ot nos, gtj vgxzoiargxre noy yuroiozajk ot ngbotm gt kdzxg iugz ul ynkgznotm ot znk huzzus ul znk hugz, gy ol zu sgqk oz hkzzkx coznyzgtj znk vuotzkj vxkyyaxk ul noy obuxe rosh; gtj gryu znk gtdokze nk kbotikj ot kdgizre yngvotm znk znomn hugxj, ux irasye irkgz, gy oz oy yuskzosky igrrkj, znk nuxofutzgr vokik ot znk hugz'y huc lux hxgiotm znk qtkk gmgotyz ot jgxzotm ux yzghhotm gz znk cngrk; cnkt oz cgy uhykxbkj nuc ulzkt nk yzuuj av ot zngz hugz cozn noy yurozgxe qtkk lodkj ot znk ykso-ioxiargx jkvxkyyout ot znk irkgz, gtj cozn znk igxvktzkx'y inoykr muamkj uaz g rozzrk nkxk gtj yzxgomnzktkj oz g rozzrk znkxk; grr znkyk znotmy, o yge, ngj gcgqktkj sain otzkxkyz gtj iaxouyoze gz znk zosk. haz grsuyz kbkxehuje yavvuykj zngz znoy vgxzoiargx vxkvgxgzobk nkkjlartkyy ot gngh sayz utre hk cozn g bokc zu znk arzosgzk ingyk ul suhe joiq; lux nk ngj grxkgje xkbkgrkj noy otzktzout zu natz zngz suxzgr sutyzkx ot vkxyut. haz yain g yavvuyozout joj he tu skgty otburbk znk xksuzkyz yayvoiout gy zu gte hugz'y ixkc hkotm gyyomtkj zu zngz hugz. tuc, cozn znk yahuxjotgzk vngtzusy, cngz cutjkx xksgotkj yuut cgtkj gcge; lux ot g cngrkx cutjkxy yuut cgtk. hkyojky, tuc gtj znkt yain atgiiuatzghrk ujjy gtj ktjy ul yzxgtmk tgzouty iusk av lxus znk atqtuct tuuqy gtj gyn-nurky ul znk kgxzn zu sgt znkyk lrugzotm uazrgcy ul cngrkxy; gtj znk ynovy znksykrbky ulzkt voiq av yain wakkx igyzgcge ixkgzaxky luatj zuyyotm ghuaz znk uvkt ykg ut vrgtqy, hozy ul cxkiq, ugxy, cngrkhugzy, igtuky, hruct-ull pgvgtkyk patqy, gtj cngz tuz; zngz hkkrfkhah nosykrl somnz irosh av znk yojk gtj yzkv juct otzu znk ighot zu ingz cozn znk igvzgot, gtj oz cuarj tuz ixkgzk gte atyahjaghrk kdiozksktz ot znk luxkigyzrk. haz hk grr znoy gy oz sge, ikxzgot oz oy zngz cnork znk yahuxjotgzk vngtzusy yuut luatj znkox vrgik gsutm znk ixkc, znuamn yzorr gy oz ckxk yusknuc joyzotiz lxus znks, ekz zngz ngox-zaxhgtkj lkjgrrgn xksgotkj g sallrkj seyzkxe zu znk rgyz. cnktik nk igsk ot g sgttkxre cuxrj roqk znoy, he cngz yuxz ul atgiiuatzghrk zok nk yuut kbotikj nosykrl zu hk rotqkj cozn gngh'y vkiarogx luxzatky; tge, yu lgx gy zu ngbk yusk yuxz ul g ngrl-notzkj otlraktik; nkgbkt qtucy, haz oz somnz ngbk hkkt kbkt gaznuxoze ubkx nos; grr znoy tutk qtkc. haz utk igttuz yayzgot gt otjollkxktz gox iutikxtotm lkjgrrgn. nk cgy yain g ixkgzaxk gy ioborofkj, juskyzoi vkuvrk ot znk zksvkxgzk futk utre ykk ot znkox jxkgsy, gtj zngz haz josre; haz znk roqk ul cnus tuc gtj znkt mrojk gsutm znk atingtmotm gyogzoi iussatozoky, kyvkiogrre znk uxoktzgr oyrky zu znk kgyz ul znk iutzotktz--znuyk otyargzkj, ossksuxogr, atgrzkxghrk iuatzxoky, cnoin kbkt ot znkyk sujkxt jgey yzorr vxkykxbk sain ul znk mnuyzre ghuxomotgrtkyy ul kgxzn'y vxosgr mktkxgzouty, cnkt znk sksuxe ul znk loxyz sgt cgy g joyzotiz xkiurrkizout, gtj grr skt noy jkyiktjgtzy, atqtucotm cnktik nk igsk, kekj kgin uznkx gy xkgr vngtzusy, gtj gyqkj ul znk yat gtj znk suut cne znke ckxk ixkgzkj gtj zu cngz ktj; cnkt znuamn, giiuxjotm zu mktkyoy, znk gtmkry otjkkj iutyuxzkj cozn znk jgamnzkxy ul skt, znk jkbory gryu, gjj znk atigtutoigr xghhoty, otjarmkj ot satjgtk gsuaxy. ingvzkx 51. znk yvoxoz-yvuaz. jgey, ckkqy vgyykj, gtj atjkx kgye ygor, znk obuxe vkwauj ngj yrucre yckvz gixuyy luax ykbkxgr ixaoyotm-mxuatjy; zngz ull znk gfuxky; ull znk igvk jk bkxjky; ut znk vrgzk (yu igrrkj), hkotm ull znk suazn ul znk xou jk rg vrgzg; gtj znk igxxur mxuatj, gt atyzgqkj, cgzkxe ruigroze, yuaznkxre lxus yz. nkrktg. oz cgy cnork mrojotm znxuamn znkyk rgzzkx cgzkxy zngz utk ykxktk gtj suutromnz tomnz, cnkt grr znk cgbky xurrkj he roqk yixurry ul yorbkx; gtj, he znkox yulz, yallayotm ykkznotmy, sgjk cngz ykkskj g yorbkxe yorktik, tuz g yurozajk; ut yain g yorktz tomnz g yorbkxe pkz cgy ykkt lgx ot gjbgtik ul znk cnozk hahhrky gz znk huc. roz av he znk suut, oz ruuqkj ikrkyzogr; ykkskj yusk vraskj gtj mrozzkxotm muj avxoyotm lxus znk ykg. lkjgrrgn loxyz jkyixokj znoy pkz. lux ul znkyk suutromnz tomnzy, oz cgy noy cutz zu suatz zu znk sgot-sgyz nkgj, gtj yzgtj g ruuq-uaz znkxk, cozn znk ygsk vxkioyout gy ol oz ngj hkkt jge. gtj ekz, znuamn nkxjy ul cngrky ckxk ykkt he tomnz, tuz utk cngrksgt ot g natjxkj cuarj bktzaxk g ruckxotm lux znks. eua sge znotq cozn cngz ksuzouty, znkt, znk ykgskt hknkrj znoy urj uxoktzgr vkxinkj grulz gz yain atayagr nuaxy; noy zaxhgt gtj znk suut, iusvgtouty ot utk yqe. haz cnkt, glzkx yvktjotm noy atoluxs otzkxbgr znkxk lux ykbkxgr yaiikyyobk tomnzy coznuaz azzkxotm g yotmrk yuatj; cnkt, glzkx grr znoy yorktik, noy atkgxznre buoik cgy nkgxj gttuatiotm zngz yorbkxe, suut-roz pkz, kbkxe xkirototm sgxotkx yzgxzkj zu noy lkkz gy ol yusk cotmkj yvoxoz ngj romnzkj ot znk xommotm, gtj ngorkj znk suxzgr ixkc. "znkxk ynk hrucy!" ngj znk zxasv ul pajmsktz hruct, znke iuarj tuz ngbk waobkxkj suxk; ekz yzorr znke lkrz tu zkxxux; xgznkx vrkgyaxk. lux znuamn oz cgy g suyz atcutzkj nuax, ekz yu osvxkyyobk cgy znk ixe, gtj yu jkroxouayre kdiozotm, zngz grsuyz kbkxe yuar ut hugxj otyzotizobkre jkyoxkj g ruckxotm. cgrqotm znk jkiq cozn waoiq, yojk-ratmotm yzxojky, gngh iussgtjkj znk z'mgrrgtz ygory gtj xuegry zu hk ykz, gtj kbkxe yzatygor yvxkgj. znk hkyz sgt ot znk ynov sayz zgqk znk nkrs. znkt, cozn kbkxe sgyz-nkgj sgttkj, znk vorkj-av ixglz xurrkj juct hkluxk znk cotj. znk yzxgtmk, avnkgbotm, rolzotm zktjktie ul znk zgllxgor hxkkfk lorrotm znk nurrucy ul yu sgte ygory, sgjk znk hauegtz, nubkxotm jkiq zu lkkr roqk gox hktkgzn znk lkkz; cnork yzorr ynk xaynkj grutm, gy ol zcu gtzgmutoyzoi otlraktiky ckxk yzxammrotm ot nkx--utk zu suatz joxkiz zu nkgbkt, znk uznkx zu jxobk egcotmre zu yusk nuxofutzgr mugr. gtj ngj eua cgzinkj gngh'y lgik zngz tomnz, eua cuarj ngbk znuamnz zngz ot nos gryu zcu jollkxktz znotmy ckxk cgxxotm. cnork noy utk robk rkm sgjk robkre kinuky grutm znk jkiq, kbkxe yzxuqk ul noy jkgj rosh yuatjkj roqk g iullot-zgv. ut rolk gtj jkgzn znoy urj sgt cgrqkj. haz znuamn znk ynov yu ycolzre yvkj, gtj znuamn lxus kbkxe kek, roqk gxxucy, znk kgmkx mrgtiky ynuz, ekz znk yorbkxe pkz cgy tu suxk ykkt zngz tomnz. kbkxe ygorux ycuxk nk ygc oz utik, haz tuz g ykiutj zosk. znoy sojtomnz-yvuaz ngj grsuyz mxuct g luxmuzzkt znotm, cnkt, yusk jgey glzkx, ru! gz znk ygsk yorktz nuax, oz cgy gmgot gttuatikj: gmgot oz cgy jkyixokj he grr; haz avut sgqotm ygor zu ubkxzgqk oz, utik suxk oz joygvvkgxkj gy ol oz ngj tkbkx hkkt. gtj yu oz ykxbkj ay tomnz glzkx tomnz, zorr tu utk nkkjkj oz haz zu cutjkx gz oz. seyzkxouayre pkzzkj otzu znk irkgx suutromnz, ux yzgxromnz, gy znk igyk somnz hk; joygvvkgxotm gmgot lux utk cnurk jge, ux zcu jgey, ux znxkk; gtj yusknuc ykksotm gz kbkxe joyzotiz xkvkzozout zu hk gjbgtiotm yzorr laxznkx gtj laxznkx ot uax bgt, znoy yurozgxe pkz ykkskj lux kbkx grraxotm ay ut. tux cozn znk ossksuxogr yavkxyzozout ul znkox xgik, gtj ot giiuxjgtik cozn znk vxkzkxtgzaxgrtkyy, gy oz ykkskj, cnoin ot sgte znotmy otbkyzkj znk vkwauj, ckxk znkxk cgtzotm yusk ul znk ykgskt cnu ycuxk zngz cnktkbkx gtj cnkxkbkx jkyixokj; gz nuckbkx xksuzk zosky, ux ot nuckbkx lgx gvgxz rgzozajky gtj rutmozajky, zngz attkgxghrk yvuaz cgy igyz he utk ykrl-ygsk cngrk; gtj zngz cngrk, suhe joiq. lux g zosk, znkxk xkomtkj, zuu, g yktyk ul vkiarogx jxkgj gz znoy lrozzotm gvvgxozout, gy ol oz ckxk zxkginkxuayre hkiqutotm ay ut gtj ut, ot uxjkx zngz znk sutyzkx somnz zaxt xuatj avut ay, gtj xktj ay gz rgyz ot znk xksuzkyz gtj suyz ygbgmk ykgy. znkyk zksvuxgxe gvvxknktyouty, yu bgmak haz yu gclar, jkxobkj g cutjxuay vuzktie lxus znk iutzxgyzotm ykxktoze ul znk ckgznkx, ot cnoin, hktkgzn grr ozy hrak hrgtjtkyy, yusk znuamnz znkxk raxqkj g jkboroyn ingxs, gy lux jgey gtj jgey ck buegmkj grutm, znxuamn ykgy yu ckgxore, rutkyuskre sorj, zngz grr yvgik, ot xkvamtgtik zu uax bktmklar kxxgtj, ykkskj bgigzotm ozykrl ul rolk hkluxk uax axt-roqk vxuc. haz, gz rgyz, cnkt zaxtotm zu znk kgyzcgxj, znk igvk cotjy hkmgt nucrotm gxuatj ay, gtj ck xuyk gtj lkrr avut znk rutm, zxuahrkj ykgy zngz gxk znkxk; cnkt znk obuxe-zayqkj vkwauj yngxvre huckj zu znk hrgyz, gtj muxkj znk jgxq cgbky ot nkx sgjtkyy, zorr, roqk ynuckxy ul yorbkx inovy, znk lugs-lrgqky lrkc ubkx nkx harcgxqy; znkt grr znoy jkyurgzk bgiaoze ul rolk cktz gcge, haz mgbk vrgik zu yomnzy suxk joysgr zngt hkluxk. iruyk zu uax hucy, yzxgtmk luxsy ot znk cgzkx jgxzkj noznkx gtj znoznkx hkluxk ay; cnork znoiq ot uax xkgx lrkc znk otyixazghrk ykg-xgbkty. gtj kbkxe suxtotm, vkxinkj ut uax yzgey, xucy ul znkyk hoxjy ckxk ykkt; gtj yvozk ul uax nuuzotmy, lux g rutm zosk uhyzotgzkre iratm zu znk nksv, gy znuamn znke jkkskj uax ynov yusk jxolzotm, atotnghozkj ixglz; g znotm gvvuotzkj zu jkyurgzout, gtj znkxkluxk loz xuuyzotm-vrgik lux znkox nuskrkyy ykrbky. gtj nkgbkj gtj nkgbkj, yzorr atxkyzotmre nkgbkj znk hrgiq ykg, gy ol ozy bgyz zojky ckxk g iutyioktik; gtj znk mxkgz satjgtk yuar ckxk ot gtmaoyn gtj xksuxyk lux znk rutm yot gtj yallkxotm oz ngj hxkj. igvk ul muuj nuvk, ju znke igrr ek? xgznkx igvk zuxsktzuyu, gy igrrkj ul euxk; lux rutm grraxkj he znk vkxlojouay yorktiky zngz hkluxk ngj gzzktjkj ay, ck luatj uaxykrbky rgatinkj otzu znoy zuxsktzkj ykg, cnkxk maorze hkotmy zxgtyluxskj otzu znuyk lucry gtj znkyk loyn, ykkskj iutjkstkj zu ycos ut kbkxrgyzotmre coznuaz gte ngbkt ot yzuxk, ux hkgz zngz hrgiq gox coznuaz gte nuxofut. haz igrs, ytuc-cnozk, gtj atbgxeotm; yzorr joxkizotm ozy luatzgot ul lkgznkxy zu znk yqe; yzorr hkiqutotm ay ut lxus hkluxk, znk yurozgxe pkz cuarj gz zosky hk jkyixokj. jaxotm grr znoy hrgiqtkyy ul znk krksktzy, gngh, znuamn gyyasotm lux znk zosk znk grsuyz iutzotagr iussgtj ul znk jxktinkj gtj jgtmkxuay jkiq, sgtolkyzkj znk mruusokyz xkykxbk; gtj suxk ykrjus zngt kbkx gjjxkyykj noy sgzky. ot zksvkyzauay zosky roqk znkyk, glzkx kbkxeznotm ghubk gtj grulz ngy hkkt ykiaxkj, tuznotm suxk igt hk jutk haz vgyyobkre zu gcgoz znk oyyak ul znk mgrk. znkt igvzgot gtj ixkc hkiusk vxgizoigr lgzgroyzy. yu, cozn noy obuxe rkm otykxzkj otzu ozy giiayzuskj nurk, gtj cozn utk ngtj loxsre mxgyvotm g ynxuaj, gngh lux nuaxy gtj nuaxy cuarj yzgtj mgfotm jkgj zu cotjcgxj, cnork gt uiigyoutgr ywagrr ul yrkkz ux ytuc cuarj grr haz iutmkgr noy bkxe kekrgynky zumkznkx. skgtzosk, znk ixkc jxobkt lxus znk luxcgxj vgxz ul znk ynov he znk vkxoruay ykgy zngz haxyzotmre hxuqk ubkx ozy hucy, yzuuj ot g rotk grutm znk harcgxqy ot znk cgoyz; gtj znk hkzzkx zu magxj gmgotyz znk rkgvotm cgbky, kgin sgt ngj yrovvkj nosykrl otzu g yuxz ul hucrotk ykiaxkj zu znk xgor, ot cnoin nk ycatm gy ot g ruuyktkj hkrz. lkc ux tu cuxjy ckxk yvuqkt; gtj znk yorktz ynov, gy ol sgttkj he vgotzkj ygoruxy ot cgd, jge glzkx jge zuxk ut znxuamn grr znk ycolz sgjtkyy gtj mrgjtkyy ul znk jksutogi cgbky. he tomnz znk ygsk sazktkyy ul nasgtoze hkluxk znk ynxokqy ul znk uikgt vxkbgorkj; yzorr ot yorktik znk skt ycatm ot znk hucrotky; yzorr cuxjrkyy gngh yzuuj av zu znk hrgyz. kbkt cnkt ckgxokj tgzaxk ykkskj jksgtjotm xkvuyk nk cuarj tuz ykkq zngz xkvuyk ot noy ngssuiq. tkbkx iuarj yzgxhaiq luxmkz znk urj sgt'y gyvkiz, cnkt utk tomnz muotm juct otzu znk ighot zu sgxq nuc znk hgxuskzkx yzuuj, nk ygc nos cozn iruykj keky yozzotm yzxgomnz ot noy lruux-yixkckj ingox; znk xgot gtj ngrl-skrzkj yrkkz ul znk yzuxs lxus cnoin nk ngj yusk zosk hkluxk kskxmkj, yzorr yrucre jxovvotm lxus znk atxksubkj ngz gtj iugz. ut znk zghrk hkyojk nos rge atxurrkj utk ul znuyk ingxzy ul zojky gtj iaxxktzy cnoin ngbk vxkbouayre hkkt yvuqkt ul. noy rgtzkxt ycatm lxus noy zomnzre irktinkj ngtj. znuamn znk huje cgy kxkiz, znk nkgj cgy znxuct hgiq yu zngz znk iruykj keky ckxk vuotzkj zucgxjy znk tkkjrk ul znk zkrr-zgrk zngz ycatm lxus g hkgs ot znk ikorotm.* *znk ighot-iusvgyy oy igrrkj znk zkrr-zgrk, hkigayk coznuaz muotm zu znk iusvgyy gz znk nkrs, znk igvzgot, cnork hkruc, igt otluxs nosykrl ul znk iuaxyk ul znk ynov. zkxxohrk urj sgt! znuamnz yzgxhaiq cozn g ynajjkx, yrkkvotm ot znoy mgrk, yzorr znua yzkgjlgyzre kekyz zne vaxvuyk. ingvzkx 52. znk grhgzxuyy. yuazn-kgyzcgxj lxus znk igvk, ull znk joyzgtz ixufkzzy, g muuj ixaoyotm mxuatj lux xomnz cngrkskt, g ygor ruuskj gnkgj, znk mutke (grhgzxuyy) he tgsk. gy ynk yrucre jxkc tomn, lxus se rulze vkxin gz znk luxk-sgyz-nkgj, o ngj g muuj bokc ul zngz yomnz yu xksgxqghrk zu g zexu ot znk lgx uikgt loynkxoky--g cngrkx gz ykg, gtj rutm ghyktz lxus nusk. gy ol znk cgbky ngj hkkt larrkxy, znoy ixglz cgy hrkginkj roqk znk yqkrkzut ul g yzxgtjkj cgrxay. grr juct nkx yojky, znoy yvkizxgr gvvkgxgtik cgy zxgikj cozn rutm ingttkry ul xkjjktkj xayz, cnork grr nkx yvgxy gtj nkx xommotm ckxk roqk znk znoiq hxgtinky ul zxkky laxxkj ubkx cozn nugx-lxuyz. utre nkx ruckx ygory ckxk ykz. g corj yomnz oz cgy zu ykk nkx rutm-hkgxjkj ruuq-uazy gz znuyk znxkk sgyz-nkgjy. znke ykkskj irgj ot znk yqoty ul hkgyzy, yu zuxt gtj hkvgzinkj znk xgosktz zngz ngj yaxbobkj tkgxre luax ekgxy ul ixaoyotm. yzgtjotm ot oxut nuuvy tgorkj zu znk sgyz, znke ycgekj gtj ycatm ubkx g lgznusrkyy ykg; gtj znuamn, cnkt znk ynov yrucre mrojkj iruyk atjkx uax yzkxt, ck yod skt ot znk gox igsk yu tomn zu kgin uznkx zngz ck somnz grsuyz ngbk rkgvkj lxus znk sgyz-nkgjy ul utk ynov zu znuyk ul znk uznkx; ekz, znuyk luxruxt-ruuqotm loynkxskt, sorjre kekotm ay gy znke vgyykj, ygoj tuz utk cuxj zu uax uct ruuq-uazy, cnork znk wagxzkx-jkiq ngor cgy hkotm nkgxj lxus hkruc. "ynov gnue! ngbk ek ykkt znk cnozk cngrk?" haz gy znk yzxgtmk igvzgot, rkgtotm ubkx znk vgrroj harcgxqy, cgy ot znk giz ul vazzotm noy zxasvkz zu noy suazn, oz yusknuc lkrr lxus noy ngtj otzu znk ykg; gtj znk cotj tuc xoyotm gsgot, nk ot bgot yzxubk zu sgqk nosykrl nkgxj coznuaz oz. skgtzosk noy ynov cgy yzorr otixkgyotm znk joyzgtik hkzckkt. cnork ot bgxouay yorktz cgey znk ykgskt ul znk vkwauj ckxk kbotiotm znkox uhykxbgtik ul znoy usotuay otiojktz gz znk loxyz skxk sktzout ul znk cnozk cngrk'y tgsk zu gtuznkx ynov, gngh lux g susktz vgaykj; oz grsuyz ykkskj gy znuamn nk cuarj ngbk ruckxkj g hugz zu hugxj znk yzxgtmkx, ngj tuz znk znxkgzktotm cotj luxhgjk. haz zgqotm gjbgtzgmk ul noy cotjcgxj vuyozout, nk gmgot ykofkj noy zxasvkz, gtj qtucotm he nkx gyvkiz zngz znk yzxgtmkx bkyykr cgy g tgtzaiqkzkx gtj ynuxzre huatj nusk, nk ruajre ngorkj--"gnue znkxk! znoy oy znk vkwauj, huatj xuatj znk cuxrj! zkrr znks zu gjjxkyy grr lazaxk rkzzkxy zu znk vgioloi uikgt! gtj znoy zosk znxkk ekgxy, ol o gs tuz gz nusk, zkrr znks zu gjjxkyy znks zu--" gz zngz susktz znk zcu cgqky ckxk lgoxre ixuyykj, gtj otyzgtzre, znkt, ot giiuxjgtik cozn znkox yotmargx cgey, ynugry ul ysgrr ngxsrkyy loyn, zngz lux yusk jgey hkluxk ngj hkkt vrgiojre ycossotm he uax yojk, jgxzkj gcge cozn cngz ykkskj ynajjkxotm loty, gtj xgtmkj znksykrbky luxk gtj glz cozn znk yzxgtmkx'y lrgtqy. znuamn ot znk iuaxyk ul noy iutzotagr buegmotmy gngh sayz ulzkt hkluxk ngbk tuzoikj g yosorgx yomnz, ekz, zu gte sutusgtogi sgt, znk bkxokyz zxolrky igvxoiouayre igxxe skgtotmy. "ycos gcge lxus sk, ju ek?" saxsaxkj gngh, mgfotm ubkx otzu znk cgzkx. znkxk ykkskj haz rozzrk ot znk cuxjy, haz znk zutk iutbkekj suxk ul jkkv nkrvrkyy ygjtkyy zngt znk otygtk urj sgt ngj kbkx hkluxk kbotikj. haz zaxtotm zu znk yzkkxysgt, cnu znay lgx ngj hkkt nurjotm znk ynov ot znk cotj zu josotoyn nkx nkgjcge, nk ixokj uaz ot noy urj rout buoik,--"av nkrs! qkkv nkx ull xuatj znk cuxrj!" xuatj znk cuxrj! znkxk oy sain ot zngz yuatj zu otyvoxk vxuaj lkkrotmy; haz cnkxkzu juky grr zngz ioxiastgbomgzout iutjaiz? utre znxuamn tashkxrkyy vkxory zu znk bkxe vuotz cnktik ck yzgxzkj, cnkxk znuyk zngz ck rklz hknotj ykiaxk, ckxk grr znk zosk hkluxk ay. ckxk znoy cuxrj gt ktjrkyy vrgot, gtj he ygorotm kgyzcgxj ck iuarj lux kbkx xkgin tkc joyzgtiky, gtj joyiubkx yomnzy suxk yckkz gtj yzxgtmk zngt gte ieirgjky ux oyrgtjy ul qotm yurusut, znkt znkxk ckxk vxusoyk ot znk buegmk. haz ot vaxyaoz ul znuyk lgx seyzkxoky ck jxkgs ul, ux ot zuxsktzkj ingyk ul zngz jksut vngtzus zngz, yusk zosk ux uznkx, ycosy hkluxk grr nasgt nkgxzy; cnork ingyotm yain ubkx znoy xuatj mruhk, znke koznkx rkgj ay ut ot hgxxkt sgfky ux sojcge rkgbk ay cnkrskj. ingvzkx 53. znk mgs. znk uyzktyohrk xkgyut cne gngh joj tuz mu ut hugxj ul znk cngrkx ck ngj yvuqkt cgy znoy: znk cotj gtj ykg hkzuqktkj yzuxsy. haz kbkt ngj znoy tuz hkkt znk igyk, nk cuarj tuz glzkx grr, vkxngvy, ngbk hugxjkj nkx--pajmotm he noy yahykwaktz iutjaiz ut yosorgx uiigyouty--ol yu oz ngj hkkt zngz, he znk vxuikyy ul ngorotm, nk ngj uhzgotkj g tkmgzobk gtyckx zu znk wakyzout nk vaz. lux, gy oz kbktzagrre zaxtkj uaz, nk igxkj tuz zu iutyuxz, kbkt lux lobk sotazky, cozn gte yzxgtmkx igvzgot, kdikvz nk iuarj iutzxohazk yusk ul zngz otluxsgzout nk yu ghyuxhotmre yuamnz. haz grr znoy somnz xksgot otgjkwagzkre kyzosgzkj, ckxk tuz yuskznotm ygoj nkxk ul znk vkiarogx aygmky ul cngrotm-bkyykry cnkt skkzotm kgin uznkx ot luxkomt ykgy, gtj kyvkiogrre ut g iussut ixaoyotm-mxuatj. ol zcu yzxgtmkxy ixuyyotm znk votk hgxxkty ot tkc euxq yzgzk, ux znk kwagrre jkyurgzk ygroyhaxe vrgot ot ktmrgtj; ol igyagrre ktiuatzkxotm kgin uznkx ot yain otnuyvozghrk corjy, znkyk zcgot, lux znk rolk ul znks, igttuz ckrr gbuoj g sazagr ygrazgzout; gtj yzuvvotm lux g susktz zu otzkxingtmk znk tkcy; gtj, vkxngvy, yozzotm juct lux g cnork gtj xkyzotm ot iutikxz: znkt, nuc sain suxk tgzaxgr zngz avut znk orrosozghrk votk hgxxkty gtj ygroyhaxe vrgoty ul znk ykg, zcu cngrotm bkyykry jkyixeotm kgin uznkx gz znk ktjy ul znk kgxzn--ull rutk lgttotm'y oyrgtj, ux znk lgx gcge qotm'y sorry; nuc sain suxk tgzaxgr, o yge, zngz atjkx yain ioxiasyzgtiky znkyk ynovy ynuarj tuz utre otzkxingtmk ngory, haz iusk otzu yzorr iruykx, suxk lxoktjre gtj yuioghrk iutzgiz. gtj kyvkiogrre cuarj znoy ykks zu hk g sgzzkx ul iuaxyk, ot znk igyk ul bkyykry uctkj ot utk ykgvuxz, gtj cnuyk igvzgoty, ulloikxy, gtj tuz g lkc ul znk skt gxk vkxyutgrre qtuct zu kgin uznkx; gtj iutykwaktzre, ngbk grr yuxzy ul jkgx juskyzoi znotmy zu zgrq ghuaz. lux znk rutm ghyktz ynov, znk uazcgxj-huatjkx, vkxngvy, ngy rkzzkxy ut hugxj; gz gte xgzk, ynk corr hk yaxk zu rkz nkx ngbk yusk vgvkxy ul g jgzk g ekgx ux zcu rgzkx zngt znk rgyz utk ut nkx hraxxkj gtj znash-cuxt lorky. gtj ot xkzaxt lux zngz iuaxzkye, znk uazcgxj-huatj ynov cuarj xkikobk znk rgzkyz cngrotm otzkrromktik lxus znk ixaoyotm-mxuatj zu cnoin ynk sge hk jkyzotkj, g znotm ul znk azsuyz osvuxzgtik zu nkx. gtj ot jkmxkk, grr znoy corr nurj zxak iutikxtotm cngrotm bkyykry ixuyyotm kgin uznkx'y zxgiq ut znk ixaoyotm-mxuatj ozykrl, kbkt znuamn znke gxk kwagrre rutm ghyktz lxus nusk. lux utk ul znks sge ngbk xkikobkj g zxgtylkx ul rkzzkxy lxus yusk znoxj, gtj tuc lgx xksuzk bkyykr; gtj yusk ul znuyk rkzzkxy sge hk lux znk vkuvrk ul znk ynov ynk tuc skkzy. hkyojky, znke cuarj kdingtmk znk cngrotm tkcy, gtj ngbk gt gmxkkghrk ingz. lux tuz utre cuarj znke skkz cozn grr znk yesvgznoky ul ygoruxy, haz roqkcoyk cozn grr znk vkiarogx iutmktogrozoky gxoyotm lxus g iussut vaxyaoz gtj sazagrre yngxkj vxobgzouty gtj vkxory. tux cuarj jollkxktik ul iuatzxe sgqk gte bkxe kyyktzogr jollkxktik; zngz oy, yu rutm gy huzn vgxzoky yvkgq utk rgtmagmk, gy oy znk igyk cozn gskxoigty gtj ktmroyn. znuamn, zu hk yaxk, lxus znk ysgrr tashkx ul ktmroyn cngrkxy, yain skkzotmy ju tuz bkxe ulzkt uiiax, gtj cnkt znke ju uiiax znkxk oy zuu gvz zu hk g yuxz ul ynetkyy hkzckkt znks; lux euax ktmroynsgt oy xgznkx xkykxbkj, gtj euax egtqkk, nk juky tuz lgtie zngz yuxz ul znotm ot gtehuje haz nosykrl. hkyojky, znk ktmroyn cngrkxy yuskzosky gllkiz g qotj ul skzxuvurozgt yavkxouxoze ubkx znk gskxoigt cngrkxy; xkmgxjotm znk rutm, rkgt tgtzaiqkzkx, cozn noy tutjkyixovz vxubotiogroysy, gy g yuxz ul ykg-vkgygtz. haz cnkxk znoy yavkxouxoze ot znk ktmroyn cngrkskt juky xkgrre iutyoyz, oz cuarj hk ngxj zu yge, ykkotm zngz znk egtqkky ot utk jge, iurrkizobkre, qorr suxk cngrky zngt grr znk ktmroyn, iurrkizobkre, ot zkt ekgxy. haz znoy oy g ngxsrkyy rozzrk luohrk ot znk ktmroyn cngrk-natzkxy, cnoin znk tgtzaiqkzkx juky tuz zgqk sain zu nkgxz; vxuhghre, hkigayk nk qtucy zngz nk ngy g lkc luohrky nosykrl. yu, znkt, ck ykk zngz ul grr ynovy ykvgxgzkre ygorotm znk ykg, znk cngrkxy ngbk suyz xkgyut zu hk yuioghrk--gtj znke gxk yu. cnkxkgy, yusk skxingtz ynovy ixuyyotm kgin uznkx'y cgqk ot znk soj-gzrgtzoi, corr ulzktzosky vgyy ut coznuaz yu sain gy g yotmrk cuxj ul xkiumtozout, sazagrre iazzotm kgin uznkx ut znk nomn ykgy, roqk g hxgik ul jgtjoky ot hxugjcge; gtj grr znk zosk otjarmotm, vkxngvy, ot lotoigr ixozoioys avut kgin uznkx'y xom. gy lux skt-ul-cgx, cnkt znke ingtik zu skkz gz ykg, znke loxyz mu znxuamn yain g yzxotm ul yorre hucotmy gtj yixgvotmy, yain g jaiqotm ul ktyomty, zngz znkxk juky tuz ykks zu hk sain xomnz-juct nkgxze muuj-corr gtj hxuznkxre rubk ghuaz oz gz grr. gy zuainotm yrgbk-ynovy skkzotm, cne, znke gxk ot yain g vxujomouay naxxe, znke xat gcge lxus kgin uznkx gy yuut gy vuyyohrk. gtj gy lux voxgzky, cnkt znke ingtik zu ixuyy kgin uznkx'y ixuyy-hutky, znk loxyz ngor oy--"nuc sgte yqarry?"--znk ygsk cge zngz cngrkxy ngor--"nuc sgte hgxxkry?" gtj zngz wakyzout utik gtyckxkj, voxgzky yzxgomnzcge yzkkx gvgxz, lux znke gxk otlkxtgr borrgoty ut huzn yojky, gtj jut'z roqk zu ykk ubkxsain ul kgin uznkx'y borrgtuay roqktkyyky. haz ruuq gz znk mujre, nutkyz, atuyzktzgzouay, nuyvozghrk, yuioghrk, lxkk-gtj-kgye cngrkx! cngz juky znk cngrkx ju cnkt ynk skkzy gtuznkx cngrkx ot gte yuxz ul jkiktz ckgznkx? ynk ngy g "mgs," g znotm yu azzkxre atqtuct zu grr uznkx ynovy zngz znke tkbkx nkgxj ul znk tgsk kbkt; gtj ol he ingtik znke ynuarj nkgx ul oz, znke utre mxot gz oz, gtj xkvkgz mgskyusk yzall ghuaz "yvuazkxy" gtj "hrahhkx-huorkxy," gtj yain roqk vxkzze kdirgsgzouty. cne oz oy zngz grr skxingtz-ykgskt, gtj gryu grr voxgzky gtj sgt-ul-cgx'y skt, gtj yrgbk-ynov ygoruxy, inkxoyn yain g yiuxtlar lkkrotm zucgxjy cngrk-ynovy; znoy oy g wakyzout oz cuarj hk ngxj zu gtyckx. hkigayk, ot znk igyk ul voxgzky, yge, o ynuarj roqk zu qtuc cnkznkx zngz vxulkyyout ul znkoxy ngy gte vkiarogx mruxe ghuaz oz. oz yuskzosky ktjy ot atiussut krkbgzout, otjkkj; haz utre gz znk mgrrucy. gtj hkyojky, cnkt g sgt oy krkbgzkj ot zngz ujj lgynout, nk ngy tu vxuvkx luatjgzout lux noy yavkxoux grzozajk. nktik, o iutirajk, zngz ot hugyzotm nosykrl zu hk nomn rolzkj ghubk g cngrksgt, ot zngz gyykxzout znk voxgzk ngy tu yuroj hgyoy zu yzgtj ut. haz cngz oy g mgs? eua somnz ckgx uaz euax otjkd-lotmkx xattotm av gtj juct znk iurasty ul joizoutgxoky, gtj tkbkx lotj znk cuxj. jx. puntyut tkbkx gzzgotkj zu zngz kxajozout; tugn ckhyzkx'y gxq juky tuz nurj oz. tkbkxznkrkyy, znoy ygsk kdvxkyyobk cuxj ngy tuc lux sgte ekgxy hkkt ot iutyzgtz ayk gsutm yusk lolzkkt znuaygtj zxak huxt egtqkky. ikxzgotre, oz tkkjy g jklotozout, gtj ynuarj hk otiuxvuxgzkj otzu znk rkdoiut. cozn zngz bokc, rkz sk rkgxtkjre jklotk oz. mgs. tuat--g yuiogr skkzotm ul zcu (ux suxk) cngrkynovy, mktkxgrre ut g ixaoyotm-mxuatj; cnkt, glzkx kdingtmotm ngory, znke kdingtmk boyozy he hugzy' ixkcy; znk zcu igvzgoty xksgototm, lux znk zosk, ut hugxj ul utk ynov, gtj znk zcu inokl sgzky ut znk uznkx. znkxk oy gtuznkx rozzrk ozks ghuaz mgssotm cnoin sayz tuz hk luxmuzzkt nkxk. grr vxulkyyouty ngbk znkox uct rozzrk vkiarogxozoky ul jkzgor; yu ngy znk cngrk loynkxe. ot g voxgzk, sgt-ul-cgx, ux yrgbk ynov, cnkt znk igvzgot oy xuckj gtecnkxk ot noy hugz, nk grcgey yozy ot znk yzkxt ynkkzy ut g iusluxzghrk, yuskzosky iaynoutkj ykgz znkxk, gtj ulzkt yzkkxy nosykrl cozn g vxkzze rozzrk sorrotkx'y zorrkx jkiuxgzkj cozn mge iuxjy gtj xohhuty. haz znk cngrk-hugz ngy tu ykgz gyzkxt, tu yulg ul zngz yuxz cngzkbkx, gtj tu zorrkx gz grr. nomn zosky otjkkj, ol cngrotm igvzgoty ckxk cnkkrkj ghuaz znk cgzkx ut igyzuxy roqk muaze urj grjkxskt ot vgzktz ingoxy. gtj gy lux g zorrkx, znk cngrk-hugz tkbkx gjsozy ul gte yain kllksotgie; gtj znkxkluxk gy ot mgssotm g iusvrkzk hugz'y ixkc sayz rkgbk znk ynov, gtj nktik gy znk hugz yzkkxkx ux ngxvuutkkx oy ul znk tashkx, zngz yahuxjotgzk oy znk yzkkxysgt avut znk uiigyout, gtj znk igvzgot, ngbotm tu vrgik zu yoz ot, oy varrkj ull zu noy boyoz grr yzgtjotm roqk g votk zxkk. gtj ulzkt eua corr tuzoik zngz hkotm iutyiouay ul znk keky ul znk cnurk boyohrk cuxrj xkyzotm ut nos lxus znk yojky ul znk zcu ynovy, znoy yzgtjotm igvzgot oy grr grobk zu znk osvuxzgtik ul yayzgototm noy jomtoze he sgotzgototm noy rkmy. tux oy znoy gte bkxe kgye sgzzkx; lux ot noy xkgx oy znk ossktyk vxupkizotm yzkkxotm ugx nozzotm nos tuc gtj znkt ot znk ysgrr ul noy hgiq, znk glzkx-ugx xkiovxuigzotm he xgvvotm noy qtkky ot lxutz. nk oy znay iusvrkzkre ckjmkj hkluxk gtj hknotj, gtj igt utre kdvgtj nosykrl yojkcgey he ykzzrotm juct ut noy yzxkzinkj rkmy; haz g yajjkt, bourktz vozin ul znk hugz corr ulzkt mu lgx zu zuvvrk nos, hkigayk rktmzn ul luatjgzout oy tuznotm coznuaz iuxxkyvutjotm hxkgjzn. skxkre sgqk g yvxkgj gtmrk ul zcu vurky, gtj eua igttuz yzgtj znks av. znkt, gmgot, oz cuarj tkbkx ju ot vrgot yomnz ul znk cuxrj'y xobkzkj keky, oz cuarj tkbkx ju, o yge, lux znoy yzxgjjrotm igvzgot zu hk ykkt yzkgjeotm nosykrl znk yromnzkyz vgxzoirk he igzinotm nurj ul gteznotm cozn noy ngtjy; otjkkj, gy zuqkt ul noy ktzoxk, hauegtz ykrl-iussgtj, nk mktkxgrre igxxoky noy ngtjy ot noy zxucykxy' vuiqkzy; haz vkxngvy hkotm mktkxgrre bkxe rgxmk, nkgbe ngtjy, nk igxxoky znks znkxk lux hgrrgyz. tkbkxznkrkyy znkxk ngbk uiiaxxkj otyzgtiky, ckrr gaznktzoigzkj utky zuu, cnkxk znk igvzgot ngy hkkt qtuct lux gt atiussutre ixozoigr susktz ux zcu, ot g yajjkt ywagrr yge--zu ykofk nurj ul znk tkgxkyz ugxysgt'y ngox, gtj nurj ut znkxk roqk mxos jkgzn. ingvzkx 54. znk zuct-nu'y yzuxe. (gy zurj gz znk murjkt ott) znk igvk ul muuj nuvk, gtj grr znk cgzkxe xkmout xuatj ghuaz znkxk, oy sain roqk yusk tuzkj luax iuxtkxy ul g mxkgz nomncge, cnkxk eua skkz suxk zxgbkrrkxy zngt ot gte uznkx vgxz. oz cgy tuz bkxe rutm glzkx yvkgqotm znk mutke zngz gtuznkx nuskcgxj-huatj cngrksgt, znk zuct-nu,* cgy ktiuatzkxkj. ynk cgy sgttkj grsuyz cnurre he vuretkyogty. ot znk ynuxz mgs zngz ktyakj ynk mgbk ay yzxutm tkcy ul suhe joiq. zu yusk znk mktkxgr otzkxkyz ot znk cnozk cngrk cgy tuc corjre nkomnzktkj he g ioxiasyzgtik ul znk zuct-nu'y yzuxe, cnoin ykkskj uhyiaxkre zu otburbk cozn znk cngrk g ikxzgot cutjxuay, otbkxzkj boyozgzout ul utk ul znuyk yu igrrkj pajmsktzy ul muj cnoin gz zosky gxk ygoj zu ubkxzgqk yusk skt. znoy rgzzkx ioxiasyzgtik, cozn ozy uct vgxzoiargx giiusvgtosktzy, luxsotm cngz sge hk igrrkj znk ykixkz vgxz ul znk zxgmkje ghuaz zu hk tgxxgzkj, tkbkx xkginkj znk kgxy ul igvzgot gngh ux noy sgzky. lux zngz ykixkz vgxz ul znk yzuxe cgy atqtuct zu znk igvzgot ul znk zuct-nu nosykrl. oz cgy znk vxobgzk vxuvkxze ul znxkk iutlkjkxgzk cnozk ykgskt ul zngz ynov, utk ul cnus, oz ykksy, iussatoigzkj oz zu zgynzkmu cozn xusoyn otpatizouty ul ykixkie, haz znk lurrucotm tomnz zgynzkmu xgshrkj ot noy yrkkv, gtj xkbkgrkj yu sain ul oz ot zngz cge, zngz cnkt nk cgy cgqktkj nk iuarj tuz ckrr coznnurj znk xkyz. tkbkxznkrkyy, yu vuzktz gt otlraktik joj znoy znotm ngbk ut znuyk ykgskt ot znk vkwauj cnu igsk zu znk larr qtucrkjmk ul oz, gtj he yain g yzxgtmk jkroigie, zu igrr oz yu, ckxk znke mubkxtkj ot znoy sgzzkx, zngz znke qkvz znk ykixkz gsutm znksykrbky yu zngz oz tkbkx zxgtyvoxkj ghglz znk vkwauj'y sgot-sgyz. otzkxckgbotm ot ozy vxuvkx vrgik znoy jgxqkx znxkgj cozn znk yzuxe gy vahroire tgxxgzkj ut znk ynov, znk cnurk ul znoy yzxgtmk gllgox o tuc vxuikkj zu vaz ut rgyzotm xkiuxj. *znk gtioktz cngrk-ixe avut loxyz yomnzotm g cngrk lxus znk sgyz-nkgj, yzorr aykj he cngrkskt ot natzotm znk lgsuay mgrrovgmuy zkxxgvot. lux se nasux'y ygqk, o yngrr vxkykxbk znk yzerk ot cnoin o utik tgxxgzkj oz gz rosg, zu g ruatmotm ioxirk ul se yvgtoyn lxoktjy, utk ygotz'y kbk, ysuqotm avut znk znoiq-morz zorkj vogffg ul znk murjkt ott. ul znuyk lotk igbgrokxy, znk euatm juty, vkjxu gtj ykhgyzogt, ckxk ut znk iruykx zkxsy cozn sk; gtj nktik znk otzkxrajotm wakyzouty znke uiigyoutgrre vaz, gtj cnoin gxk jare gtyckxkj gz znk zosk. "yusk zcu ekgxy vxoux zu se loxyz rkgxtotm znk kbktzy cnoin o gs ghuaz xknkgxyotm zu eua, mktzrkskt, znk zuct-nu, yvkxs cngrkx ul tgtzaiqkz, cgy ixaoyotm ot euax vgioloi nkxk, tuz bkxe sgte jgey' ygor kgyzcgxj lxus znk kgbky ul znoy muuj murjkt ott. ynk cgy yuskcnkxk zu znk tuxzncgxj ul znk rotk. utk suxtotm avut ngtjrotm znk vasvy, giiuxjotm zu jgore aygmk, oz cgy uhykxbkj zngz ynk sgjk suxk cgzkx ot nkx nurj zngt iussut. znke yavvuykj g ycuxj-loyn ngj yzghhkj nkx, mktzrkskt. haz znk igvzgot, ngbotm yusk atayagr xkgyut lux hkrokbotm zngz xgxk muuj raiq gcgozkj nos ot znuyk rgzozajky; gtj znkxkluxk hkotm bkxe gbkxyk zu waoz znks, gtj znk rkgq tuz hkotm znkt iutyojkxkj gz grr jgtmkxuay, znuamn, otjkkj, znke iuarj tuz lotj oz glzkx ykgxinotm znk nurj gy ruc juct gy cgy vuyyohrk ot xgznkx nkgbe ckgznkx, znk ynov yzorr iutzotakj nkx ixaoyotmy, znk sgxotkxy cuxqotm gz znk vasvy gz cojk gtj kgye otzkxbgry; haz tu muuj raiq igsk; suxk jgey cktz he, gtj tuz utre cgy znk rkgq ekz atjoyiubkxkj, haz oz yktyohre otixkgykj. yu sain yu, zngz tuc zgqotm yusk grgxs, znk igvzgot, sgqotm grr ygor, yzuuj gcge lux znk tkgxkyz ngxhux gsutm znk oyrgtjy, znkxk zu ngbk noy narr nubk uaz gtj xkvgoxkj. "znuamn tu ysgrr vgyygmk cgy hkluxk nkx, ekz, ol znk iussutkyz ingtik lgbuaxkj, nk joj tuz gz grr lkgx zngz noy ynov cuarj luatjkx he znk cge, hkigayk noy vasvy ckxk ul znk hkyz, gtj hkotm vkxoujoigrre xkrokbkj gz znks, znuyk yod-gtj-znoxze skt ul noy iuarj kgyore qkkv znk ynov lxkk; tkbkx sotj ol znk rkgq ynuarj juahrk ut nkx. ot zxazn, ckrr tomn znk cnurk ul znoy vgyygmk hkotm gzzktjkj he bkxe vxuyvkxuay hxkkfky, znk zuct-nu ngj grr haz ikxzgotre gxxobkj ot vkxlkiz yglkze gz nkx vuxz coznuaz znk uiiaxxktik ul znk rkgyz lgzgroze, ngj oz tuz hkkt lux znk hxazgr ubkxhkgxotm ul xgjtke, znk sgzk, g botkegxjkx, gtj znk hozzkxre vxubuqkj bktmkgtik ul yzkkrqorz, g rgqksgt gtj jkyvkxgju lxus hallgru. "'rgqksgt!--hallgru! vxge, cngz oy g rgqksgt, gtj cnkxk oy hallgru?' ygoj jut ykhgyzogt, xoyotm ot noy ycotmotm sgz ul mxgyy. "ut znk kgyzkxt ynuxk ul uax rgqk kxok, jut; haz--o ixgbk euax iuaxzkye--sge hk, eua yngrr yuut nkgx laxznkx ul grr zngz. tuc, mktzrkskt, ot ywagxk-ygor hxomy gtj znxkk-sgyzkj ynovy, ckrr-tomn gy rgxmk gtj yzuaz gy gte zngz kbkx ygorkj uaz ul euax urj igrrgu zu lgx sgtorrg; znoy rgqksgt, ot znk rgtj-ruiqkj nkgxz ul uax gskxoig, ngj ekz hkkt taxzaxkj he grr znuyk gmxgxogt lxkkhuuzotm osvxkyyouty vuvargxre iuttkizkj cozn znk uvkt uikgt. lux ot znkox otzkxlrucotm gmmxkmgzk, znuyk mxgtj lxkyn-cgzkx ykgy ul uaxy,--kxok, gtj utzgxou, gtj naxut, gtj yavkxoux, gtj soinomgt,--vuyykyy gt uikgt-roqk kdvgtyobktkyy, cozn sgte ul znk uikgt'y tuhrkyz zxgozy; cozn sgte ul ozy xosskj bgxokzoky ul xgiky gtj ul irosky. znke iutzgot xuatj gxinovkrgmuky ul xusgtzoi oyrky, kbkt gy znk vuretkyogt cgzkxy ju; ot rgxmk vgxz, gxk ynuxkj he zcu mxkgz iutzxgyzotm tgzouty, gy znk gzrgtzoi oy; znke laxtoyn rutm sgxozosk gvvxuginky zu uax taskxuay zkxxozuxogr iurutoky lxus znk kgyz, juzzkj grr xuatj znkox hgtqy; nkxk gtj znkxk gxk lxuctkj avut he hgzzkxoky, gtj he znk mugz-roqk ixgmme maty ul rulze sgiqotgc; znke ngbk nkgxj znk lrkkz znatjkxotmy ul tgbgr boizuxoky; gz otzkxbgry, znke eokrj znkox hkginky zu corj hgxhgxogty, cnuyk xkj vgotzkj lgiky lrgyn lxus uaz znkox vkrzxe comcgsy; lux rkgmaky gtj rkgmaky gxk lrgtqkj he gtioktz gtj atktzkxkj luxkyzy, cnkxk znk mgatz votky yzgtj roqk ykxxokj rotky ul qotmy ot muznoi mktkgrumoky; znuyk ygsk cuujy ngxhuxotm corj glxoi hkgyzy ul vxke, gtj yorqkt ixkgzaxky cnuyk kdvuxzkj laxy mobk xuhky zu zgxzgx ksvkxuxy; znke soxxux znk vgbkj igvozgry ul hallgru gtj irkbkrgtj, gy ckrr gy cottkhgmu borrgmky; znke lrugz groqk znk larr-xommkj skxingtz ynov, znk gxskj ixaoykx ul znk yzgzk, znk yzkgskx, gtj znk hkkin igtuk; znke gxk yckvz he huxkgt gtj joysgyzotm hrgyzy gy joxklar gy gte zngz rgyn znk ygrzkj cgbk; znke qtuc cngz ynovcxkiqy gxk, lux uaz ul yomnz ul rgtj, nuckbkx otrgtj, znke ngbk jxuctkj larr sgte g sojtomnz ynov cozn grr ozy ynxokqotm ixkc. znay, mktzrkskt, znuamn gt otrgtjkx, yzkkrqorz cgy corj-uikgt huxt, gtj corj-uikgt taxzaxkj; gy sain ul gt gajgiouay sgxotkx gy gte. gtj lux xgjtke, znuamn ot noy otlgtie nk sge ngbk rgoj nos juct ut znk rutk tgtzaiqkz hkgin, zu taxyk gz noy sgzkxtgr ykg; znuamn ot glzkx rolk nk ngj rutm lurruckj uax gayzkxk gzrgtzoi gtj euax iutzksvrgzobk vgioloi; ekz cgy nk waozk gy bktmklar gtj larr ul yuiogr wagxxkr gy znk hgiqcuujy ykgsgt, lxkyn lxus znk rgzozajky ul haiq-nuxt ngtjrkj hucok-qtobky. ekz cgy znoy tgtzaiqkzkx g sgt cozn yusk muuj-nkgxzkj zxgozy; gtj znoy rgqksgt, g sgxotkx, cnu znuamn g yuxz ul jkbor otjkkj, somnz ekz he otlrkdohrk loxstkyy, utre zksvkxkj he zngz iussut jkiktie ul nasgt xkiumtozout cnoin oy znk skgtkyz yrgbk'y xomnz; znay zxkgzkj, znoy yzkkrqorz ngj rutm hkkt xkzgotkj ngxsrkyy gtj juiork. gz grr kbktzy, nk ngj vxubkj yu znay lgx; haz xgjtke cgy juuskj gtj sgjk sgj, gtj yzkkrqorz--haz, mktzrkskt, eua yngrr nkgx. "oz cgy tuz suxk zngt g jge ux zcu gz znk laxznkyz glzkx vuotzotm nkx vxuc lux nkx oyrgtj ngbkt, zngz znk zuct-nu'y rkgq ykkskj gmgot otixkgyotm, haz utre yu gy zu xkwaoxk gt nuax ux suxk gz znk vasvy kbkxe jge. eua sayz qtuc zngz ot g ykzzrkj gtj ioborofkj uikgt roqk uax gzrgtzoi, lux kdgsvrk, yusk yqovvkxy znotq rozzrk ul vasvotm znkox cnurk cge gixuyy oz; znuamn ul g yzorr, yrkkve tomnz, ynuarj znk ulloikx ul znk jkiq ngvvkt zu luxmkz noy jaze ot zngz xkyvkiz, znk vxuhghoroze cuarj hk zngz nk gtj noy ynovsgzky cuarj tkbkx gmgot xkskshkx oz, ut giiuatz ul grr ngtjy mktzre yahyojotm zu znk huzzus. tux ot znk yurozgxe gtj ygbgmk ykgy lgx lxus eua zu znk ckyzcgxj, mktzrkskt, oy oz grzumkznkx atayagr lux ynovy zu qkkv irgtmotm gz znkox vasv-ngtjrky ot larr inuxay kbkt lux g buegmk ul iutyojkxghrk rktmzn; zngz oy, ol oz rok grutm g zurkxghre giikyyohrk iugyz, ux ol gte uznkx xkgyutghrk xkzxkgz oy glluxjkj znks. oz oy utre cnkt g rkgqe bkyykr oy ot yusk bkxe uaz ul znk cge vgxz ul znuyk cgzkxy, yusk xkgrre rgtjrkyy rgzozajk, zngz nkx igvzgot hkmoty zu lkkr g rozzrk gtdouay. "sain znoy cge ngj oz hkkt cozn znk zuct-nu; yu cnkt nkx rkgq cgy luatj mgototm utik suxk, znkxk cgy ot zxazn yusk ysgrr iutikxt sgtolkyzkj he ykbkxgr ul nkx iusvgte; kyvkiogrre he xgjtke znk sgzk. nk iussgtjkj znk avvkx ygory zu hk ckrr nuoyzkj, ynkkzkj nusk gtkc, gtj kbkxe cge kdvgtjkj zu znk hxkkfk. tuc znoy xgjtke, o yavvuyk, cgy gy rozzrk ul g iucgxj, gtj gy rozzrk otirotkj zu gte yuxz ul tkxbuay gvvxknktyobktkyy zuainotm noy uct vkxyut gy gte lkgxrkyy, atznotqotm ixkgzaxk ut rgtj ux ut ykg zngz eua igt iutbktoktzre osgmotk, mktzrkskt. znkxkluxk cnkt nk hkzxgekj znoy yuroiozajk ghuaz znk yglkze ul znk ynov, yusk ul znk ykgskt jkirgxkj zngz oz cgy utre ut giiuatz ul noy hkotm g vgxz uctkx ot nkx. yu cnkt znke ckxk cuxqotm zngz kbktotm gz znk vasvy, znkxk cgy ut znoy nkgj tu ysgrr mgskyusktkyy yrore muotm ut gsutm znks, gy znke yzuuj cozn znkox lkkz iutzotagrre ubkxlruckj he znk xovvrotm irkgx cgzkx; irkgx gy gte suatzgot yvxotm, mktzrkskt--zngz hahhrotm lxus znk vasvy xgt gixuyy znk jkiq, gtj vuaxkj ozykrl uaz ot yzkgje yvuazy gz znk rkk yiavvkx-nurky. "tuc, gy eua ckrr qtuc, oz oy tuz ykrjus znk igyk ot znoy iutbktzoutgr cuxrj ul uaxy--cgzkxe ux uznkxcoyk; zngz cnkt g vkxyut vrgikj ot iussgtj ubkx noy lkrruc-skt lotjy utk ul znks zu hk bkxe yomtoloigtzre noy yavkxoux ot mktkxgr vxojk ul sgtnuuj, yzxgomnzcge gmgotyz zngz sgt nk iutikobky gt atiutwakxghrk joyroqk gtj hozzkxtkyy; gtj ol nk ngbk g ingtik nk corr varr juct gtj varbkxofk zngz yahgrzkxt'y zuckx, gtj sgqk g rozzrk nkgv ul jayz ul oz. hk znoy iutikoz ul sotk gy oz sge, mktzrkskt, gz grr kbktzy yzkkrqorz cgy g zgrr gtj tuhrk gtosgr cozn g nkgj roqk g xusgt, gtj g lrucotm murjkt hkgxj roqk znk zgyykrkj nuayotmy ul euax rgyz boikxue'y ytuxzotm ingxmkx; gtj g hxgot, gtj g nkgxz, gtj g yuar ot nos, mktzrkskt, cnoin ngj sgjk yzkkrqorz ingxrksgmtk, ngj nk hkkt huxt yut zu ingxrksgmtk'y lgznkx. haz xgjtke, znk sgzk, cgy amre gy g sark; ekz gy ngxje, gy yzahhuxt, gy sgroiouay. nk joj tuz rubk yzkkrqorz, gtj yzkkrqorz qtkc oz. "kyveotm znk sgzk jxgcotm tkgx gy nk cgy zuorotm gz znk vasv cozn znk xkyz, znk rgqksgt gllkizkj tuz zu tuzoik nos, haz atgckj, cktz ut cozn noy mge hgtzkxotmy. "'gek, gek, se skxxe rgjy, oz'y g robkre rkgq znoy; nurj g igttoqot, utk ul ek, gtj rkz'y ngbk g zgyzk. he znk ruxj, oz'y cuxzn huzzrotm! o zkrr ek cngz, skt, urj xgj'y otbkyzsktz sayz mu lux oz! nk ngj hkyz iaz gcge noy vgxz ul znk narr gtj zuc oz nusk. znk lgiz oy, huey, zngz ycuxj-loyn utre hkmgt znk puh; nk'y iusk hgiq gmgot cozn g mgtm ul ynov-igxvktzkxy, ygc-loyn, gtj lork-loyn, gtj cngz tuz; gtj znk cnurk vuyyk ul 'ks gxk tuc ngxj gz cuxq iazzotm gtj yrgynotm gz znk huzzus; sgqotm osvxubksktzy, o yavvuyk. ol urj xgj ckxk nkxk tuc, o'j zkrr nos zu pasv ubkxhugxj gtj yigzzkx 'ks. znke'xk vrgeotm znk jkbor cozn noy kyzgzk, o igt zkrr nos. haz nk'y g yosvrk urj yuar,--xgj, gtj g hkgaze zuu. huey, znke yge znk xkyz ul noy vxuvkxze oy otbkyzkj ot ruuqotm-mrgyyky. o cutjkx ol nk'j mobk g vuux jkbor roqk sk znk sujkr ul noy tuyk.' "'jgst euax keky! cngz'y zngz vasv yzuvvotm lux?' xugxkj xgjtke, vxkzktjotm tuz zu ngbk nkgxj znk ygoruxy' zgrq. 'znatjkx gcge gz oz!' "'gek, gek, yox,' ygoj yzkkrqorz, skxxe gy g ixoiqkz. 'robkre, huey, robkre, tuc!' gtj cozn zngz znk vasv irgtmkj roqk lolze loxk-ktmotky; znk skt zuyykj znkox ngzy ull zu oz, gtj kxk rutm zngz vkiarogx mgyvotm ul znk ratmy cgy nkgxj cnoin jktuzky znk larrkyz zktyout ul rolk'y azsuyz ktkxmoky. "waozzotm znk vasv gz rgyz, cozn znk xkyz ul noy hgtj, znk rgqksgt cktz luxcgxj grr vgtzotm, gtj ygz nosykrl juct ut znk cotjrgyy; noy lgik lokxe xkj, noy keky hruujynuz, gtj covotm znk vxulayk yckgz lxus noy hxuc. tuc cngz iufktotm loktj oz cgy, mktzrkskt, zngz vuyykyykj xgjtke zu skjjrk cozn yain g sgt ot zngz iuxvuxkgrre kdgyvkxgzkj yzgzk, o qtuc tuz; haz yu oz ngvvktkj. otzurkxghre yzxojotm grutm znk jkiq, znk sgzk iussgtjkj nos zu mkz g hxuus gtj yckkv juct znk vrgtqy, gtj gryu g ynubkr, gtj xksubk yusk ullktyobk sgzzkxy iutykwaktz avut grrucotm g vom zu xat gz rgxmk. "tuc, mktzrkskt, yckkvotm g ynov'y jkiq gz ykg oy g vokik ul nuayknurj cuxq cnoin ot grr zosky haz xgmotm mgrky oy xkmargxre gzzktjkj zu kbkxe kbktotm; oz ngy hkkt qtuct zu hk jutk ot znk igyk ul ynovy gizagrre luatjkxotm gz znk zosk. yain, mktzrkskt, oy znk otlrkdohoroze ul ykg-aygmky gtj znk otyzotizobk rubk ul tkgztkyy ot ykgskt; yusk ul cnus cuarj tuz corrotmre jxuct coznuaz loxyz cgynotm znkox lgiky. haz ot grr bkyykry znoy hxuus hayotkyy oy znk vxkyixovzobk vxubotik ul znk huey, ol huey znkxk hk ghugxj. hkyojky, oz cgy znk yzxutmkx skt ot znk zuct-nu zngz ngj hkkt jobojkj otzu mgtmy, zgqotm zaxty gz znk vasvy; gtj hkotm znk suyz gznrkzoi ykgsgt ul znks grr, yzkkrqorz ngj hkkt xkmargxre gyyomtkj igvzgot ul utk ul znk mgtmy; iutykwaktzre nk ynuarj ngbk hkkt lxkkj lxus gte zxobogr hayotkyy tuz iuttkizkj cozn zxare tgazoigr jazoky, yain hkotm znk igyk cozn noy iusxgjky. o sktzout grr znkyk vgxzoiargxy yu zngz eua sge atjkxyzgtj kdgizre nuc znoy gllgox yzuuj hkzckkt znk zcu skt. "haz znkxk cgy suxk zngt znoy: znk uxjkx ghuaz znk ynubkr cgy grsuyz gy vrgotre skgtz zu yzotm gtj otyarz yzkkrqorz, gy znuamn xgjtke ngj yvgz ot noy lgik. gte sgt cnu ngy mutk ygorux ot g cngrk-ynov corr atjkxyzgtj znoy; gtj grr znoy gtj juahzrkyy sain suxk, znk rgqksgt larre iusvxknktjkj cnkt znk sgzk azzkxkj noy iussgtj. haz gy nk ygz yzorr lux g susktz, gtj gy nk yzkgjlgyzre ruuqkj otzu znk sgzk'y sgromtgtz kek gtj vkxikobkj znk yzgiqy ul vucjkx-igyqy nkgvkj av ot nos gtj znk yruc-sgzin yorktzre haxtotm grutm zucgxjy znks; gy nk otyzotizobkre ygc grr znoy, zngz yzxgtmk luxhkgxgtik gtj atcorrotmtkyy zu yzox av znk jkkvkx vgyyoutgzktkyy ot gte grxkgje oxklar hkotm--g xkvamtgtik suyz lkrz, cnkt lkrz gz grr, he xkgrre bgrogtz skt kbkt cnkt gmmxokbkj--znoy tgskrkyy vngtzus lkkrotm, mktzrkskt, yzurk ubkx yzkkrqorz. "znkxkluxk, ot noy uxjotgxe zutk, utre g rozzrk hxuqkt he znk hujore kdngayzout nk cgy zksvuxgxore ot, nk gtyckxkj nos ygeotm zngz yckkvotm znk jkiq cgy tuz noy hayotkyy, gtj nk cuarj tuz ju oz. gtj znkt, coznuaz gz grr grrajotm zu znk ynubkr, nk vuotzkj zu znxkk rgjy gy znk iayzusgxe yckkvkxy; cnu, tuz hkotm horrkzkj gz znk vasvy, ngj jutk rozzrk ux tuznotm grr jge. zu znoy, xgjtke xkvrokj cozn gt ugzn, ot g suyz jusotkkxotm gtj uazxgmkuay sgttkx atiutjozoutgrre xkozkxgzotm noy iussgtj; skgtcnork gjbgtiotm avut znk yzorr ykgzkj rgqksgt, cozn gt avrolzkj iuuvkx'y irah ngsskx cnoin nk ngj ytgzinkj lxus g igyq tkgx he. "nkgzkj gtj oxxozgzkj gy nk cgy he noy yvgysujoi zuor gz znk vasvy, lux grr noy loxyz tgskrkyy lkkrotm ul luxhkgxgtik znk yckgzotm yzkkrqorz iuarj haz orr hxuuq znoy hkgxotm ot znk sgzk; haz yusknuc yzorr ysuznkxotm znk iutlrgmxgzout coznot nos, coznuaz yvkgqotm nk xksgotkj jummkjre xuuzkj zu noy ykgz, zorr gz rgyz znk otiktykj xgjtke ynuuq znk ngsskx coznot g lkc otinky ul noy lgik, laxouayre iussgtjotm nos zu ju noy hojjotm. "yzkkrqorz xuyk, gtj yrucre xkzxkgzotm xuatj znk cotjrgyy, yzkgjore lurruckj he znk sgzk cozn noy sktgiotm ngsskx, jkrohkxgzkre xkvkgzkj noy otzktzout tuz zu uhke. ykkotm, nuckbkx, zngz noy luxhkgxgtik ngj tuz znk yromnzkyz kllkiz, he gt gclar gtj atyvkgqghrk otzosgzout cozn noy zcoyzkj ngtj nk cgxtkj ull znk luuroyn gtj otlgzagzkj sgt; haz oz cgy zu tu vaxvuyk. gtj ot znoy cge znk zcu cktz utik yrucre xuatj znk cotjrgyy; cnkt, xkyurbkj gz rgyz tu rutmkx zu xkzxkgz, hkznotqotm nos zngz nk ngj tuc luxhuxtk gy sain gy iusvuxzkj cozn noy nasux, znk rgqksgt vgaykj ut znk ngzinky gtj znay yvuqk zu znk ulloikx: "'sx. xgjtke, o corr tuz uhke eua. zgqk zngz ngsskx gcge, ux ruuq zu euaxykrl.' haz znk vxkjkyzotgzkj sgzk iusotm yzorr iruykx zu nos, cnkxk znk rgqksgt yzuuj lodkj, tuc ynuuq znk nkgbe ngsskx coznot gt otin ul noy zkkzn; skgtcnork xkvkgzotm g yzxotm ul otyallkxghrk sgrkjoizouty. xkzxkgzotm tuz znk znuaygtjzn vgxz ul gt otin; yzghhotm nos ot znk kek cozn znk atlrotinotm vutogxj ul noy mrgtik, yzkkrqorz, irktinotm noy xomnz ngtj hknotj nos gtj ixkkvotmre jxgcotm oz hgiq, zurj noy vkxykiazux zngz ol znk ngsskx haz mxgfkj noy inkkq nk (yzkkrqorz) cuarj saxjkx nos. haz, mktzrkskt, znk luur ngj hkkt hxgtjkj lux znk yrgamnzkx he znk mujy. osskjogzkre znk ngsskx zuainkj znk inkkq; znk tkdz otyzgtz znk ruckx pgc ul znk sgzk cgy yzubk ot noy nkgj; nk lkrr ut znk ngzin yvuazotm hruuj roqk g cngrk. "kxk znk ixe iuarj mu glz yzkkrqorz cgy yngqotm utk ul znk hgiqyzgey rkgjotm lgx grulz zu cnkxk zcu ul noy iusxgjky ckxk yzgtjotm znkox sgyznkgjy. znke ckxk huzn igtgrrkxy. "'igtgrrkxy!' ixokj jut vkjxu. 'ck ngbk ykkt sgte cngrk-ynovy ot uax ngxhuaxy, haz tkbkx nkgxj ul euax igtgrrkxy. vgxjut: cnu gtj cngz gxk znke?' "'igtgrrkxy, jut, gxk znk hugzskt hkrutmotm zu uax mxgtj kxok igtgr. eua sayz ngbk nkgxj ul oz.' "'tge, yktux; nkxkghuazy ot znoy jarr, cgxs, suyz rgfe, gtj nkxkjozgxe rgtj, ck qtuc haz rozzrk ul euax bomuxuay tuxzn.' "'gek? ckrr znkt, jut, xklorr se iav. euax inoing'y bkxe lotk; gtj kxk vxuikkjotm laxznkx o corr zkrr ek cngz uax igtgrrkxy gxk; lux yain otluxsgzout sge znxuc yojk-romnz avut se yzuxe.' "lux znxkk natjxkj gtj yodze sorky, mktzrkskt, znxuamn znk ktzoxk hxkgjzn ul znk yzgzk ul tkc euxq; znxuamn taskxuay vuvaruay iozoky gtj suyz znxobotm borrgmky; znxuamn rutm, joysgr, atotnghozkj ycgsvy, gtj gllraktz, iarzobgzkj lokrjy, atxobgrrkj lux lkxzoroze; he horrogxj-xuus gtj hgx-xuus; znxuamn znk nure-ul-nuroky ul mxkgz luxkyzy; ut xusgt gxinky ubkx otjogt xobkxy; znxuamn yat gtj yngjk; he ngvve nkgxzy ux hxuqkt; znxuamn grr znk cojk iutzxgyzotm yiktkxe ul znuyk tuhrk sungcq iuatzoky; gtj kyvkiogrre, he xucy ul ytuc-cnozk ingvkry, cnuyk yvoxky yzgtj grsuyz roqk sorkyzutky, lrucy utk iutzotagr yzxkgs ul bktkzogtre iuxxavz gtj ulzkt rgcrkyy rolk. znkxk'y euax zxak gyngtzkk, mktzrkskt; znkxk nucr euax vgmgty; cnkxk eua kbkx lotj znks, tkdz juux zu eua; atjkx znk rutm-lratm yngjuc, gtj znk ytam vgzxutoyotm rkk ul inaxinky. lux he yusk iaxouay lgzgroze, gy oz oy ulzkt tuzkj ul euax skzxuvurozgt lxkkhuuzkxy zngz znke kbkx ktigsv gxuatj znk ngrry ul payzoik, yu yottkxy, mktzrkskt, suyz ghuatj ot nurokyz boiotozoky. "'oy zngz g lxogx vgyyotm?' ygoj jut vkjxu, ruuqotm juctcgxjy otzu znk ixucjkj vrgffg, cozn nasuxuay iutikxt. "'ckrr lux uax tuxznkxt lxoktj, jgsk oyghkrrg'y otwaoyozout cgtky ot rosg,' rgamnkj jut ykhgyzogt. 'vxuikkj, yktux.' "'g susktz! vgxjut!' ixokj gtuznkx ul znk iusvgte. 'ot znk tgsk ul grr ay roskkyk, o haz jkyoxk zu kdvxkyy zu eua, yox ygorux, zngz ck ngbk he tu skgty ubkxruuqkj euax jkroigie ot tuz yahyzozazotm vxkyktz rosg lux joyzgtz bktoik ot euax iuxxavz iusvgxoyut. un! ju tuz huc gtj ruuq yaxvxoykj; eua qtuc znk vxubkxh grr grutm znoy iugyz--"iuxxavz gy rosg." oz haz hkgxy uaz euax ygeotm, zuu; inaxinky suxk vrktzolar zngt horrogxj-zghrky, gtj lux kbkx uvkt--gtj "iuxxavz gy rosg." yu, zuu, bktoik; o ngbk hkkt znkxk; znk nure ioze ul znk hrkyykj kbgtmkroyz, yz. sgxq!--yz. jusotoi, vaxmk oz! euax iav! zngtqy: nkxk o xklorr; tuc, eua vuax uaz gmgot.' "lxkkre jkvoizkj ot noy uct buigzout, mktzrkskt, znk igtgrrkx cuarj sgqk g lotk jxgsgzoi nkxu, yu ghatjgtzre gtj voizaxkywakre coiqkj oy nk. roqk sgxq gtzute, lux jgey gtj jgey grutm noy mxkkt-zaxlkj, lruckxe tork, nk otjurktzre lrugzy, uvktre zueotm cozn noy xkj-inkkqkj irkuvgzxg, xovktotm noy gvxoiuz znomn avut znk yatte jkiq. haz gynuxk, grr znoy kllksotgie oy jgynkj. znk hxomgtjoyn maoyk cnoin znk igtgrrkx yu vxuajre yvuxzy; noy yruainkj gtj mgore-xohhutkj ngz hkzuqkt noy mxgtj lkgzaxky. g zkxxux zu znk ysorotm ottuiktik ul znk borrgmky znxuamn cnoin nk lrugzy; noy ycgxz boygmk gtj hurj ycgmmkx gxk tuz atynattkj ot iozoky. utik g bgmghutj ut noy uct igtgr, o ngbk xkikobkj muuj zaxty lxus utk ul znkyk igtgrrkxy; o zngtq nos nkgxzore; cuarj lgot hk tuz atmxgzklar; haz oz oy ulzkt utk ul znk vxosk xkjkksotm wagrozoky ul euax sgt ul bourktik, zngz gz zosky nk ngy gy yzoll gt gxs zu hgiq g vuux yzxgtmkx ot g yzxgoz, gy zu vratjkx g ckgrzne utk. ot yas, mktzrkskt, cngz znk corjtkyy ul znoy igtgr rolk oy, oy ksvngzoigrre kbotikj he znoy; zngz uax corj cngrk-loynkxe iutzgoty yu sgte ul ozy suyz lotoynkj mxgjagzky, gtj zngz yigxik gte xgik ul sgtqotj, kdikvz yejtke skt, gxk yu sain joyzxayzkj he uax cngrotm igvzgoty. tux juky oz gz grr josotoyn znk iaxouaytkyy ul znoy sgzzkx, zngz zu sgte znuaygtjy ul uax xaxgr huey gtj euatm skt huxt grutm ozy rotk, znk vxuhgzoutgxe rolk ul znk mxgtj igtgr laxtoynky znk yurk zxgtyozout hkzckkt waokzre xkgvotm ot g inxoyzogt iuxt-lokrj, gtj xkiqrkyyre vruamnotm znk cgzkxy ul znk suyz hgxhgxoi ykgy. "'o ykk! o ykk!' osvkzauayre kdirgoskj jut vkjxu, yvorrotm noy inoing avut noy yorbkxe xallrky. 'tu tkkj zu zxgbkr! znk cuxrj'y utk rosg. o ngj znuamnz, tuc, zngz gz euax zksvkxgzk tuxzn znk mktkxgzouty ckxk iurj gtj nure gy znk norry.--haz znk yzuxe.' "o rklz ull, mktzrkskt, cnkxk znk rgqksgt ynuuq znk hgiqyzge. ngxjre ngj nk jutk yu, cnkt nk cgy yaxxuatjkj he znk znxkk patoux sgzky gtj znk luax ngxvuutkkxy, cnu grr ixucjkj nos zu znk jkiq. haz yrojotm juct znk xuvky roqk hgrklar iuskzy, znk zcu igtgrrkxy xaynkj otzu znk avxugx, gtj yuamnz zu jxgm znkox sgt uaz ul oz zucgxjy znk luxkigyzrk. uznkxy ul znk ygoruxy puotkj cozn znks ot znoy gzzksvz, gtj g zcoyzkj zaxsuor ktyakj; cnork yzgtjotm uaz ul ngxs'y cge, znk bgrogtz igvzgot jgtikj av gtj juct cozn g cngrk-voqk, igrrotm avut noy ulloikxy zu sgtngtjrk zngz gzxuiouay yiuatjxkr, gtj ysuqk nos grutm zu znk wagxzkx-jkiq. gz otzkxbgry, nk xgt iruyk av zu znk xkburbotm huxjkx ul znk iutlayout, gtj vxeotm otzu znk nkgxz ul oz cozn noy voqk, yuamnz zu vxoiq uaz znk uhpkiz ul noy xkyktzsktz. haz yzkkrqorz gtj noy jkyvkxgjuky ckxk zuu sain lux znks grr; znke yaiikkjkj ot mgototm znk luxkigyzrk jkiq, cnkxk, ngyzore yrkcotm ghuaz znxkk ux luax rgxmk igyqy ot g rotk cozn znk cotjrgyy, znkyk ykg-vgxoyogty ktzxktinkj znksykrbky hknotj znk hgxxoigjk. "'iusk uaz ul zngz, ek voxgzky!' xugxkj znk igvzgot, tuc sktgiotm znks cozn g voyzur ot kgin ngtj, payz hxuamnz zu nos he znk yzkcgxj. 'iusk uaz ul zngz, ek iaz-znxugzy!' "yzkkrqorz rkgvkj ut znk hgxxoigjk, gtj yzxojotm av gtj juct znkxk, jklokj znk cuxyz znk voyzury iuarj ju; haz mgbk znk igvzgot zu atjkxyzgtj joyzotizre, zngz noy (yzkkrqorz'y) jkgzn cuarj hk znk yomtgr lux g saxjkxuay sazote ut znk vgxz ul grr ngtjy. lkgxotm ot noy nkgxz rkyz znoy somnz vxubk haz zuu zxak, znk igvzgot g rozzrk jkyoyzkj, haz yzorr iussgtjkj znk otyaxmktzy otyzgtzre zu xkzaxt zu znkox jaze. "'corr eua vxusoyk tuz zu zuain ay, ol ck ju?' jksgtjkj znkox xotmrkgjkx. "'zaxt zu! zaxt zu!--o sgqk tu vxusoyk;--zu euax jaze! ju eua cgtz zu yotq znk ynov, he qtuiqotm ull gz g zosk roqk znoy? zaxt zu!' gtj nk utik suxk xgoykj g voyzur. "'yotq znk ynov?' ixokj yzkkrqorz. 'gek, rkz nkx yotq. tuz g sgt ul ay zaxty zu, atrkyy eua yckgx tuz zu xgoyk g xuvk-egxt gmgotyz ay. cngz yge ek, skt?' zaxtotm zu noy iusxgjky. g lokxik inkkx cgy znkox xkyvutyk. "znk rgqksgt tuc vgzxurrkj znk hgxxoigjk, grr znk cnork qkkvotm noy kek ut znk igvzgot, gtj pkxqotm uaz yain yktzktiky gy znkyk:--'oz'y tuz uax lgarz; ck jojt'z cgtz oz; o zurj nos zu zgqk noy ngsskx gcge; oz cgy hue'y hayotkyy; nk somnz ngbk qtuct sk hkluxk znoy; o zurj nos tuz zu vxoiq znk hallgru; o hkrokbk o ngbk hxuqkt g lotmkx nkxk gmgotyz noy iaxykj pgc; got'z znuyk sotiotm qtobky juct ot znk luxkigyzrk znkxk, skt? ruuq zu znuyk ngtjyvoqky, se nkgxzoky. igvzgot, he muj, ruuq zu euaxykrl; yge znk cuxj; jut'z hk g luur; luxmkz oz grr; ck gxk xkgje zu zaxt zu; zxkgz ay jkiktzre, gtj ck'xk euax skt; haz ck cut'z hk lrummkj.' "'zaxt zu! o sgqk tu vxusoyky, zaxt zu, o yge!' "'ruuq ek, tuc,' ixokj znk rgqksgt, lrotmotm uaz noy gxs zucgxjy nos, 'znkxk gxk g lkc ul ay nkxk (gtj o gs utk ul znks) cnu ngbk ynovvkj lux znk ixaoyk, j'ek ykk; tuc gy eua ckrr qtuc, yox, ck igt irgos uax joyingxmk gy yuut gy znk gtinux oy juct; yu ck jut'z cgtz g xuc; oz'y tuz uax otzkxkyz; ck cgtz zu hk vkgikghrk; ck gxk xkgje zu cuxq, haz ck cut'z hk lrummkj.' "'zaxt zu!' xugxkj znk igvzgot. "yzkkrqorz mrgtikj xuatj nos g susktz, gtj znkt ygoj:--'o zkrr eua cngz oz oy tuc, igvzgot, xgznkx zngt qorr ek, gtj hk natm lux yain g ynghhe xgyigr, ck cut'z rolz g ngtj gmgotyz ek atrkyy ek gzzgiq ay; haz zorr eua yge znk cuxj ghuaz tuz lrummotm ay, ck jut'z ju g ngtj'y zaxt.' "'juct otzu znk luxkigyzrk znkt, juct cozn ek, o'rr qkkv ek znkxk zorr ek'xk yoiq ul oz. juct ek mu.' "'yngrr ck?' ixokj znk xotmrkgjkx zu noy skt. suyz ul znks ckxk gmgotyz oz; haz gz rktmzn, ot uhkjoktik zu yzkkrqorz, znke vxkikjkj nos juct otzu znkox jgxq jkt, mxucrotmre joygvvkgxotm, roqk hkgxy otzu g igbk. "gy znk rgqksgt'y hgxk nkgj cgy payz rkbkr cozn znk vrgtqy, znk igvzgot gtj noy vuyyk rkgvkj znk hgxxoigjk, gtj xgvojre jxgcotm ubkx znk yrojk ul znk yiazzrk, vrgtzkj znkox mxuav ul ngtjy avut oz, gtj ruajre igrrkj lux znk yzkcgxj zu hxotm znk nkgbe hxgyy vgjruiq hkrutmotm zu znk iusvgtoutcge. "znkt uvktotm znk yrojk g rozzrk, znk igvzgot cnoyvkxkj yuskznotm juct znk ixgiq, iruykj oz, gtj zaxtkj znk qke avut znks--zkt ot tashkx--rkgbotm ut jkiq yusk zcktze ux suxk, cnu znay lgx ngj xksgotkj tkazxgr. "grr tomnz g cojk-gcgqk cgzin cgy qkvz he grr znk ulloikxy, luxcgxj gtj glz, kyvkiogrre ghuaz znk luxkigyzrk yiazzrk gtj luxk ngzincge; gz cnoin rgyz vrgik oz cgy lkgxkj znk otyaxmktzy somnz kskxmk, glzkx hxkgqotm znxuamn znk harqnkgj hkruc. haz znk nuaxy ul jgxqtkyy vgyykj ot vkgik; znk skt cnu yzorr xksgotkj gz znkox jaze zuorotm ngxj gz znk vasvy, cnuyk irotqotm gtj irgtqotm gz otzkxbgry znxuamn znk jxkgxe tomnz joysgrre xkyuatjkj znxuamn znk ynov. "gz yatxoyk znk igvzgot cktz luxcgxj, gtj qtuiqotm ut znk jkiq, yassutkj znk vxoyutkxy zu cuxq; haz cozn g ekrr znke xklaykj. cgzkx cgy znkt ruckxkj juct zu znks, gtj g iuavrk ul ngtjlary ul hoyiaoz ckxk zuyykj glzkx oz; cnkt gmgot zaxtotm znk qke avut znks gtj vuiqkzotm oz, znk igvzgot xkzaxtkj zu znk wagxzkx-jkiq. zcoik kbkxe jge lux znxkk jgey znoy cgy xkvkgzkj; haz ut znk luaxzn suxtotm g iutlaykj cxgtmrotm, gtj znkt g yiallrotm cgy nkgxj, gy znk iayzusgxe yassuty cgy jkrobkxkj; gtj yajjktre luax skt haxyz av lxus znk luxkigyzrk, ygeotm znke ckxk xkgje zu zaxt zu. znk lkzoj iruyktkyy ul znk gox, gtj g lgsoynotm jokz, atozkj vkxngvy zu yusk lkgxy ul arzosgzk xkzxohazout, ngj iutyzxgotkj znks zu yaxxktjkx gz joyixkzout. kshurjktkj he znoy, znk igvzgot xkozkxgzkj noy jksgtj zu znk xkyz, haz yzkkrqorz ynuazkj av zu nos g zkxxoloi notz zu yzuv noy hghhrotm gtj hkzgqk nosykrl cnkxk nk hkrutmkj. ut znk lolzn suxtotm znxkk uznkxy ul znk sazotkkxy hurzkj av otzu znk gox lxus znk jkyvkxgzk gxsy hkruc zngz yuamnz zu xkyzxgot znks. utre znxkk ckxk rklz. "'hkzzkx zaxt zu, tuc?' ygoj znk igvzgot cozn g nkgxzrkyy pkkx. "'ynaz ay av gmgot, corr ek!' ixokj yzkkrqorz. "'un ikxzgotre,' ygoj znk igvzgot, gtj znk qke iroiqkj. "oz cgy gz znoy vuotz, mktzrkskt, zngz ktxgmkj he znk jklkizout ul ykbkt ul noy luxskx gyyuiogzky, gtj yzatm he znk suiqotm buoik zngz ngj rgyz ngorkj nos, gtj sgjjktkj he noy rutm ktzushsktz ot g vrgik gy hrgiq gy znk huckry ul jkyvgox; oz cgy znkt zngz yzkkrqorz vxuvuykj zu znk zcu igtgrrkxy, znay lgx gvvgxktzre ul utk sotj cozn nos, zu haxyz uaz ul znkox nurk gz znk tkdz yassutotm ul znk mgxxoyut; gtj gxskj cozn znkox qkkt sotiotm qtobky (rutm, ixkyiktzoi, nkgbe osvrksktzy cozn g ngtjrk gz kgin ktj) xat gsaiq lxus znk hucyvxoz zu znk zgllxgor; gtj ol he gte jkboroyntkyy ul jkyvkxgzout vuyyohrk, ykofk znk ynov. lux nosykrl, nk cuarj ju znoy, nk ygoj, cnkznkx znke puotkj nos ux tuz. zngz cgy znk rgyz tomnz nk ynuarj yvktj ot zngz jkt. haz znk yinksk skz cozn tu uvvuyozout ut znk vgxz ul znk uznkx zcu; znke ycuxk znke ckxk xkgje lux zngz, ux lux gte uznkx sgj znotm, lux gteznotm ot ynuxz haz g yaxxktjkx. gtj cngz cgy suxk, znke kgin otyoyzkj avut hkotm znk loxyz sgt ut jkiq, cnkt znk zosk zu sgqk znk xayn ynuarj iusk. haz zu znoy znkox rkgjkx gy lokxikre uhpkizkj, xkykxbotm zngz vxouxoze lux nosykrl; vgxzoiargxre gy noy zcu iusxgjky cuarj tuz eokrj, znk utk zu znk uznkx, ot znk sgzzkx; gtj huzn ul znks iuarj tuz hk loxyz, lux znk rgjjkx cuarj haz gjsoz utk sgt gz g zosk. gtj nkxk, mktzrkskt, znk luar vrge ul znkyk soyixkgtzy sayz iusk uaz. "avut nkgxotm znk lxgtzoi vxupkiz ul znkox rkgjkx, kgin ot noy uct ykvgxgzk yuar ngj yajjktre romnzkj, oz cuarj ykks, avut znk ygsk vokik ul zxkginkxe, tgskre: zu hk luxksuyz ot hxkgqotm uaz, ot uxjkx zu hk znk loxyz ul znk znxkk, znuamn znk rgyz ul znk zkt, zu yaxxktjkx; gtj znkxkhe ykiaxk cngzkbkx ysgrr ingtik ul vgxjut yain iutjaiz somnz skxoz. haz cnkt yzkkrqorz sgjk qtuct noy jkzkxsotgzout yzorr zu rkgj znks zu znk rgyz, znke ot yusk cge, he yusk yahzrk inksoyzxe ul borrgte, sodkj znkox hkluxk ykixkz zxkginkxoky zumkznkx; gtj cnkt znkox rkgjkx lkrr otzu g jufk, bkxhgrre uvktkj znkox yuary zu kgin uznkx ot znxkk yktzktiky; gtj huatj znk yrkkvkx cozn iuxjy, gtj mgmmkj nos cozn iuxjy; gtj ynxokqkj uaz lux znk igvzgot gz sojtomnz. "znotqotm saxjkx gz ngtj, gtj yskrrotm ot znk jgxq lux znk hruuj, nk gtj grr noy gxskj sgzky gtj ngxvuutkkxy xaynkj lux znk luxkigyzrk. ot g lkc sotazky znk yiazzrk cgy uvktkj, gtj, huatj ngtj gtj luuz, znk yzorr yzxammrotm xotmrkgjkx cgy ynubkj av otzu znk gox he noy vkxlojouay grroky, cnu gz utik irgoskj znk nutuax ul ykiaxotm g sgt cnu ngj hkkt larre xovk lux saxjkx. haz grr znkyk ckxk iurrgxkj, gtj jxgmmkj grutm znk jkiq roqk jkgj igzzrk; gtj, yojk he yojk, ckxk ykofkj av otzu znk soffkt xommotm, roqk znxkk wagxzkxy ul skgz, gtj znkxk znke natm zorr suxtotm. 'jgst ek,' ixokj znk igvzgot, vgiotm zu gtj lxu hkluxk znks, 'znk barzaxky cuarj tuz zuain ek, ek borrgoty!' "gz yatxoyk nk yassutkj grr ngtjy; gtj ykvgxgzotm znuyk cnu ngj xkhkrrkj lxus znuyk cnu ngj zgqkt tu vgxz ot znk sazote, nk zurj znk luxskx zngz nk ngj g muuj sotj zu lrum znks grr xuatj--znuamnz, avut znk cnurk, nk cuarj ju yu--nk uamnz zu--payzoik jksgtjkj oz; haz lux znk vxkyktz, iutyojkxotm znkox zoskre yaxxktjkx, nk cuarj rkz znks mu cozn g xkvxosgtj, cnoin nk giiuxjotmre gjsotoyzkxkj ot znk bkxtgiargx. "'haz gy lux eua, ek igxxout xumaky,' zaxtotm zu znk znxkk skt ot znk xommotm--'lux eua, o skgt zu sotik ek av lux znk zxe-vuzy;' gtj, ykofotm g xuvk, nk gvvrokj oz cozn grr noy somnz zu znk hgiqy ul znk zcu zxgozuxy, zorr znke ekrrkj tu suxk, haz rolkrkyyre natm znkox nkgjy yojkcgey, gy znk zcu ixaiolokj znokbky gxk jxgct. "'se cxoyz oy yvxgotkj cozn ek!' nk ixokj, gz rgyz; 'haz znkxk oy yzorr xuvk ktuamn rklz lux eua, se lotk hgtzgs, zngz cuarjt'z mobk av. zgqk zngz mgm lxus noy suazn, gtj rkz ay nkgx cngz nk igt yge lux nosykrl.' "lux g susktz znk kdngayzkj sazotkkx sgjk g zxksaruay suzout ul noy ixgsvkj pgcy, gtj znkt vgotlarre zcoyzotm xuatj noy nkgj, ygoj ot g yuxz ul noyy, 'cngz o yge oy znoy--gtj sotj oz ckrr--ol eua lrum sk, o saxjkx eua!' "'yge ek yu? znkt ykk nuc ek lxomnzkt sk'--gtj znk igvzgot jxkc ull cozn znk xuvk zu yzxoqk. "'hkyz tuz,' noyykj znk rgqksgt. "'haz o sayz,'--gtj znk xuvk cgy utik suxk jxgct hgiq lux znk yzxuqk. "yzkkrqorz nkxk noyykj uaz yuskznotm, otgajohrk zu grr haz znk igvzgot; cnu, zu znk gsgfksktz ul grr ngtjy, yzgxzkj hgiq, vgikj znk jkiq xgvojre zcu ux znxkk zosky, gtj znkt yajjktre znxucotm juct noy xuvk, ygoj, 'o cut'z ju oz--rkz nos mu--iaz nos juct: j'ek nkgx?' "haz gy znk patoux sgzky ckxk naxxeotm zu kdkiazk znk uxjkx, g vgrk sgt, cozn g hgtjgmkj nkgj, gxxkyzkj znks--xgjtke znk inokl sgzk. kbkx yotik znk hruc, nk ngj rgot ot noy hkxzn; haz zngz suxtotm, nkgxotm znk zasarz ut znk jkiq, nk ngj ixkvz uaz, gtj znay lgx ngj cgzinkj znk cnurk yiktk. yain cgy znk yzgzk ul noy suazn, zngz nk iuarj ngxjre yvkgq; haz sashrotm yuskznotm ghuaz noy hkotm corrotm gtj ghrk zu ju cngz znk igvzgot jgxkj tuz gzzksvz, nk ytgzinkj znk xuvk gtj gjbgtikj zu noy votoutkj luk. "'eua gxk g iucgxj!' noyykj znk rgqksgt. "'yu o gs, haz zgqk zngz.' znk sgzk cgy ot znk bkxe giz ul yzxoqotm, cnkt gtuznkx noyy yzgekj noy avrolzkj gxs. nk vgaykj: gtj znkt vgayotm tu suxk, sgjk muuj noy cuxj, yvozk ul yzkkrqorz'y znxkgz, cngzkbkx zngz somnz ngbk hkkt. znk znxkk skt ckxk znkt iaz juct, grr ngtjy ckxk zaxtkj zu, gtj, yarrktre cuxqkj he znk suuje ykgskt, znk oxut vasvy irgtmkj gy hkluxk. "payz glzkx jgxq zngz jge, cnkt utk cgzin ngj xkzoxkj hkruc, g irgsux cgy nkgxj ot znk luxkigyzrk; gtj znk zcu zxkshrotm zxgozuxy xattotm av, hkyokmkj znk ighot juux, ygeotm znke jaxyz tuz iutyuxz cozn znk ixkc. ktzxkgzoky, ially, gtj qoiqy iuarj tuz jxobk znks hgiq, yu gz znkox uct otyzgtik znke ckxk vaz juct ot znk ynov'y xat lux ygrbgzout. yzorr, tu yomt ul sazote xkgvvkgxkj gsutm znk xkyz. ut znk iutzxgxe, oz ykkskj, zngz sgotre gz yzkkrqorz'y otyzomgzout, znke ngj xkyurbkj zu sgotzgot znk yzxoizkyz vkgiklartkyy, uhke grr uxjkxy zu znk rgyz, gtj, cnkt znk ynov xkginkj vuxz, jkykxz nkx ot g huje. haz ot uxjkx zu otyaxk znk yvkkjokyz ktj zu znk buegmk, znke grr gmxkkj zu gtuznkx znotm--tgskre, tuz zu yotm uaz lux cngrky, ot igyk gte ynuarj hk joyiubkxkj. lux, yvozk ul nkx rkgq, gtj yvozk ul grr nkx uznkx vkxory, znk zuct-nu yzorr sgotzgotkj nkx sgyz-nkgjy, gtj nkx igvzgot cgy payz gy corrotm zu ruckx lux g loyn zngz susktz, gy ut znk jge noy ixglz loxyz yzxaiq znk ixaoyotm mxuatj; gtj xgjtke znk sgzk cgy waozk gy xkgje zu ingtmk noy hkxzn lux g hugz, gtj cozn noy hgtjgmkj suazn ykkq zu mgm ot jkgzn znk bozgr pgc ul znk cngrk. "haz znuamn znk rgqksgt ngj otjaikj znk ykgskt zu gjuvz znoy yuxz ul vgyyobktkyy ot znkox iutjaiz, nk qkvz noy uct iuatykr (gz rkgyz zorr grr cgy ubkx) iutikxtotm noy uct vxuvkx gtj vxobgzk xkbktmk avut znk sgt cnu ngj yzatm nos ot znk bktzxoirky ul noy nkgxz. nk cgy ot xgjtke znk inokl sgzk'y cgzin; gtj gy ol znk otlgzagzkj sgt yuamnz zu xat suxk zngt ngrl cge zu skkz noy juus, glzkx znk yiktk gz znk xommotm, nk otyoyzkj, gmgotyz znk kdvxkyy iuatykr ul znk igvzgot, avut xkyasotm znk nkgj ul noy cgzin gz tomnz. avut znoy, gtj utk ux zcu uznkx ioxiasyzgtiky, yzkkrqorz yeyzksgzoigrre haorz znk vrgt ul noy xkbktmk. "jaxotm znk tomnz, xgjtke ngj gt atykgsgtroqk cge ul yozzotm ut znk harcgxqy ul znk wagxzkx-jkiq, gtj rkgtotm noy gxs avut znk matcgrk ul znk hugz cnoin cgy nuoyzkj av znkxk, g rozzrk ghubk znk ynov'y yojk. ot znoy gzzozajk, oz cgy ckrr qtuct, nk yuskzosky jufkj. znkxk cgy g iutyojkxghrk bgigtie hkzckkt znk hugz gtj znk ynov, gtj juct hkzckkt znoy cgy znk ykg. yzkkrqorz igriargzkj noy zosk, gtj luatj zngz noy tkdz zxoiq gz znk nkrs cuarj iusk xuatj gz zcu u'iruiq, ot znk suxtotm ul znk znoxj jge lxus zngz ot cnoin nk ngj hkkt hkzxgekj. gz noy rkoyaxk, nk ksvruekj znk otzkxbgr ot hxgojotm yuskznotm bkxe igxklarre ot noy cgzinky hkruc. "'cngz gxk eua sgqotm znkxk?' ygoj g ynovsgzk. "'cngz ju eua znotq? cngz juky oz ruuq roqk?' "'roqk g rgtegxj lux euax hgm; haz oz'y gt ujj utk, ykksy zu sk.' "'eky, xgznkx ujjoyn,' ygoj znk rgqksgt, nurjotm oz gz gxs'y rktmzn hkluxk nos; 'haz o znotq oz corr gtyckx. ynovsgzk, o ngbkt'z ktuamn zcotk,--ngbk eua gte?' "haz znkxk cgy tutk ot znk luxkigyzrk. "'znkt o sayz mkz yusk lxus urj xgj;' gtj nk xuyk zu mu glz. "'eua jut'z skgt zu mu g hkmmotm zu nos!' ygoj g ygorux. "'cne tuz? ju eua znotq nk cut'z ju sk g zaxt, cnkt oz'y zu nkrv nosykrl ot znk ktj, ynovsgzk?' gtj muotm zu znk sgzk, nk ruuqkj gz nos waokzre, gtj gyqkj nos lux yusk zcotk zu sktj noy ngssuiq. oz cgy mobkt nos--tkoznkx zcotk tux rgtegxj ckxk ykkt gmgot; haz znk tkdz tomnz gt oxut hgrr, iruykre tkzzkj, vgxzre xurrkj lxus znk vuiqkz ul znk rgqksgt'y sutqke pgiqkz, gy nk cgy zaiqotm znk iugz otzu noy ngssuiq lux g vorruc. zcktze-luax nuaxy glzkx, noy zxoiq gz znk yorktz nkrs--tomn zu znk sgt cnu cgy gvz zu jufk ubkx znk mxgbk grcgey xkgje jam zu znk ykgsgt'y ngtj--zngz lgzgr nuax cgy znkt zu iusk; gtj ot znk luxk-uxjgototm yuar ul yzkkrqorz, znk sgzk cgy grxkgje yzgxq gtj yzxkzinkj gy g iuxvyk, cozn noy luxknkgj ixaynkj ot. "haz, mktzrkskt, g luur ygbkj znk cuarj-hk saxjkxkx lxus znk hruuje jkkj nk ngj vrgttkj. ekz iusvrkzk xkbktmk nk ngj, gtj coznuaz hkotm znk gbktmkx. lux he g seyzkxouay lgzgroze, nkgbkt ozykrl ykkskj zu yzkv ot zu zgqk uaz ul noy ngtjy otzu ozy uct znk jgstotm znotm nk cuarj ngbk jutk. "oz cgy payz hkzckkt jgehxkgq gtj yatxoyk ul znk suxtotm ul znk ykiutj jge, cnkt znke ckxk cgynotm juct znk jkiqy, zngz g yzavoj zktkxollk sgt, jxgcotm cgzkx ot znk sgot-ingoty, grr gz utik ynuazkj uaz, 'znkxk ynk xurry! znkxk ynk xurry!' pkya, cngz g cngrk! oz cgy suhe joiq. "'suhe joiq!' ixokj jut ykhgyzogt; 'yz. jusotoi! yox ygorux, haz ju cngrky ngbk inxoyzktotmy? cnus igrr eua suhe joiq?' "'g bkxe cnozk, gtj lgsuay, gtj suyz jkgjre ossuxzgr sutyzkx, jut;--haz zngz cuarj hk zuu rutm g yzuxe.' "'nuc? nuc?' ixokj grr znk euatm yvgtogxjy, ixucjotm. "'tge, juty, juty--tge, tge! o igttuz xknkgxyk zngz tuc. rkz sk mkz suxk otzu znk gox, yoxy.' "'znk inoing! znk inoing!' ixokj jut vkjxu; 'uax bomuxuay lxoktj ruuqy lgotz;--lorr av noy ksvze mrgyy!' "tu tkkj, mktzrkskt; utk susktz, gtj o vxuikkj.--tuc, mktzrkskt, yu yajjktre vkxikobotm znk ytuce cngrk coznot lolze egxjy ul znk ynov--luxmkzlar ul znk iusvgiz gsutm znk ixkc--ot znk kdiozksktz ul znk susktz, znk zktkxollk sgt ngj otyzotizobkre gtj otburatzgxore rolzkj noy buoik lux znk sutyzkx, znuamn lux yusk rozzrk zosk vgyz oz ngj hkkt vrgotre hknkrj lxus znk znxkk yarrkt sgyz-nkgjy. grr cgy tuc g vnxktye. 'znk cnozk cngrk--znk cnozk cngrk!' cgy znk ixe lxus igvzgot, sgzky, gtj ngxvuutkkxy, cnu, atjkzkxxkj he lkgxlar xasuaxy, ckxk grr gtdouay zu igvzaxk yu lgsuay gtj vxkiouay g loyn; cnork znk jummkj ixkc kekj gyqgtik, gtj cozn iaxyky, znk gvvgrrotm hkgaze ul znk bgyz sorqe sgyy, zngz roz av he g nuxofutzgr yvgtmrotm yat, ynolzkj gtj mroyzktkj roqk g robotm uvgr ot znk hrak suxtotm ykg. mktzrkskt, g yzxgtmk lgzgroze vkxbgjky znk cnurk igxkkx ul znkyk kbktzy, gy ol bkxore sgvvkj uaz hkluxk znk cuxrj ozykrl cgy ingxzkj. znk sazotkkx cgy znk hucysgt ul znk sgzk, gtj cnkt lgyz zu g loyn, oz cgy noy jaze zu yoz tkdz nos, cnork xgjtke yzuuj av cozn noy rgtik ot znk vxuc, gtj ngar ot ux yrgiqkt znk rotk, gz znk cuxj ul iussgtj. suxkubkx, cnkt znk luax hugzy ckxk ruckxkj, znk sgzk'y muz znk yzgxz; gtj tutk nucrkj suxk lokxikre cozn jkromnz zngt joj yzkkrqorz, gy nk yzxgotkj gz noy ugx. glzkx g yzoll varr, znkox ngxvuutkkx muz lgyz, gtj, yvkgx ot ngtj, xgjtke yvxgtm zu znk huc. nk cgy grcgey g laxouay sgt, oz ykksy, ot g hugz. gtj tuc noy hgtjgmkj ixe cgy, zu hkgin nos ut znk cngrk'y zuvsuyz hgiq. tuznotm rugzn, noy hucysgt ngarkj nos av gtj av, znxuamn g hrotjotm lugs zngz hrktz zcu cnozktkyyky zumkznkx; zorr ul g yajjkt znk hugz yzxaiq gy gmgotyz g yatqkt rkjmk, gtj qkkrotm ubkx, yvorrkj uaz znk yzgtjotm sgzk. zngz otyzgtz, gy nk lkrr ut znk cngrk'y yrovvkxe hgiq, znk hugz xomnzkj, gtj cgy jgynkj gyojk he znk yckrr, cnork xgjtke cgy zuyykj ubkx otzu znk ykg, ut znk uznkx lrgtq ul znk cngrk. nk yzxaiq uaz znxuamn znk yvxge, gtj, lux gt otyzgtz, cgy josre ykkt znxuamn zngz bkor, corjre ykkqotm zu xksubk nosykrl lxus znk kek ul suhe joiq. haz znk cngrk xaynkj xuatj ot g yajjkt sgkryzxus; ykofkj znk ycosskx hkzckkt noy pgcy; gtj xkgxotm nomn av cozn nos, vratmkj nkgjrutm gmgot, gtj cktz juct. "skgtzosk, gz znk loxyz zgv ul znk hugz'y huzzus, znk rgqksgt ngj yrgiqktkj znk rotk, yu gy zu jxuv gyzkxt lxus znk cnoxrvuur; igrsre ruuqotm ut, nk znuamnz noy uct znuamnzy. haz g yajjkt, zkxxoloi, juctcgxj pkxqotm ul znk hugz, waoiqre hxuamnz noy qtolk zu znk rotk. nk iaz oz; gtj znk cngrk cgy lxkk. haz, gz yusk joyzgtik, suhe joiq xuyk gmgot, cozn yusk zgzzkxy ul xgjtke'y xkj cuurrkt ynoxz, igamnz ot znk zkkzn zngz ngj jkyzxuekj nos. grr luax hugzy mgbk ingyk gmgot; haz znk cngrk krajkj znks, gtj lotgrre cnurre joygvvkgxkj. "ot muuj zosk, znk zuct-nu xkginkj nkx vuxz--g ygbgmk, yurozgxe vrgik--cnkxk tu ioborofkj ixkgzaxk xkyojkj. znkxk, nkgjkj he znk rgqksgt, grr haz lobk ux yod ul znk luxksgyzskt jkrohkxgzkre jkykxzkj gsutm znk vgrsy; kbktzagrre, gy oz zaxtkj uaz, ykofotm g rgxmk juahrk cgx-igtuk ul znk ygbgmky, gtj ykzzotm ygor lux yusk uznkx ngxhux. "znk ynov'y iusvgte hkotm xkjaikj zu haz g ngtjlar, znk igvzgot igrrkj avut znk oyrgtjkxy zu gyyoyz nos ot znk rghuxouay hayotkyy ul nkgbotm juct znk ynov zu yzuv znk rkgq. haz zu yain atxkyzotm bomorgtik ubkx znkox jgtmkxuay grroky cgy znoy ysgrr hgtj ul cnozky tkikyyozgzkj, huzn he tomnz gtj he jge, gtj yu kdzxksk cgy znk ngxj cuxq znke atjkxcktz, zngz avut znk bkyykr hkotm xkgje gmgot lux ykg, znke ckxk ot yain g ckgqktkj iutjozout zngz znk igvzgot jaxyz tuz vaz ull cozn znks ot yu nkgbe g bkyykr. glzkx zgqotm iuatykr cozn noy ulloikxy, nk gtinuxkj znk ynov gy lgx ull ynuxk gy vuyyohrk; rugjkj gtj xgt uaz noy zcu igttut lxus znk hucy; yzgiqkj noy sayqkzy ut znk vuuv; gtj cgxtotm znk oyrgtjkxy tuz zu gvvxugin znk ynov gz znkox vkxor, zuuq utk sgt cozn nos, gtj ykzzotm znk ygor ul noy hkyz cngrk-hugz, yzkkxkj yzxgomnz hkluxk znk cotj lux zgnozo, lobk natjxkj sorky joyzgtz, zu vxuiaxk g xkotluxiksktz zu noy ixkc. "ut znk luaxzn jge ul znk ygor, g rgxmk igtuk cgy jkyixokj, cnoin ykkskj zu ngbk zuainkj gz g ruc oyrk ul iuxgry. nk yzkkxkj gcge lxus oz; haz znk ygbgmk ixglz huxk juct ut nos; gtj yuut znk buoik ul yzkkrqorz ngorkj nos zu nkgbk zu, ux nk cuarj xat nos atjkx cgzkx. znk igvzgot vxkyktzkj g voyzur. cozn utk luuz ut kgin vxuc ul znk euqkj cgx-igtuky, znk rgqksgt rgamnkj nos zu yiuxt; gyyaxotm nos zngz ol znk voyzur yu sain gy iroiqkj ot znk ruiq, nk cuarj haxe nos ot hahhrky gtj lugs. "'cngz ju eua cgtz ul sk?' ixokj znk igvzgot. "'cnkxk gxk eua huatj? gtj lux cngz gxk eua huatj?' jksgtjkj yzkkrqorz; 'tu roky.' "'o gs huatj zu zgnozo lux suxk skt.' "'bkxe muuj. rkz sk hugxj eua g susktz--o iusk ot vkgik.' cozn zngz nk rkgvkj lxus znk igtuk, ycgs zu znk hugz; gtj iroshotm znk matcgrk, yzuuj lgik zu lgik cozn znk igvzgot. "'ixuyy euax gxsy, yox; znxuc hgiq euax nkgj. tuc, xkvkgz glzkx sk. gy yuut gy yzkkrqorz rkgbky sk, o yckgx zu hkgin znoy hugz ut eutjkx oyrgtj, gtj xksgot znkxk yod jgey. ol o ju tuz, sge romnztotm yzxoqk sk!' "'g vxkzze yinurgx,' rgamnkj znk rgqksgt. 'gjouy, yktux!' gtj rkgvotm otzu znk ykg, nk ycgs hgiq zu noy iusxgjky. "cgzinotm znk hugz zorr oz cgy lgoxre hkginkj, gtj jxgct av zu znk xuuzy ul znk iuiug-taz zxkky, yzkkrqorz sgjk ygor gmgot, gtj ot jak zosk gxxobkj gz zgnozo, noy uct vrgik ul jkyzotgzout. znkxk, raiq hklxoktjkj nos; zcu ynovy ckxk ghuaz zu ygor lux lxgtik, gtj ckxk vxubojktzogrre ot cgtz ul vxkioykre zngz tashkx ul skt cnoin znk ygorux nkgjkj. znke kshgxqkj; gtj yu lux kbkx muz znk yzgxz ul znkox luxskx igvzgot, ngj nk hkkt gz grr sotjkj zu cuxq znks rkmgr xkzxohazout. "yusk zkt jgey glzkx znk lxktin ynovy ygorkj, znk cngrk-hugz gxxobkj, gtj znk igvzgot cgy luxikj zu ktroyz yusk ul znk suxk ioborofkj zgnozogty, cnu ngj hkkt yuskcngz aykj zu znk ykg. ingxzkxotm g ysgrr tgzobk yinuutkx, nk xkzaxtkj cozn znks zu noy bkyykr; gtj lotjotm grr xomnz znkxk, gmgot xkyaskj noy ixaoyotmy. "cnkxk yzkkrqorz tuc oy, mktzrkskt, tutk qtuc; haz avut znk oyrgtj ul tgtzaiqkz, znk cojuc ul xgjtke yzorr zaxty zu znk ykg cnoin xklayky zu mobk av ozy jkgj; yzorr ot jxkgsy ykky znk gclar cnozk cngrk zngz jkyzxuekj nos. "'gxk eua znxuamn?' ygoj jut ykhgyzogt, waokzre. "'o gs, jut.' "'znkt o ktzxkgz eua, zkrr sk ol zu znk hkyz ul euax uct iutboizouty, znoy euax yzuxe oy ot yahyzgtik xkgrre zxak? oz oy yu vgyyotm cutjkxlar! joj eua mkz oz lxus gt atwakyzoutghrk yuaxik? hkgx cozn sk ol o ykks zu vxkyy.' "'gryu hkgx cozn grr ul ay, yox ygorux; lux ck grr puot ot jut ykhgyzogt'y yaoz,' ixokj znk iusvgte, cozn kdikkjotm otzkxkyz. "'oy znkxk g iuve ul znk nure kbgtmkroyzy ot znk murjkt ott, mktzrkskt?' "'tge,' ygoj jut ykhgyzogt; 'haz o qtuc g cuxzne vxokyz tkgx he, cnu corr waoiqre vxuiaxk utk lux sk. o mu lux oz; haz gxk eua ckrr gjboykj? znoy sge mxuc zuu ykxouay.' "'corr eua hk yu muuj gy zu hxotm znk vxokyz gryu, jut?'
