"'znuamn znkxk gxk tu gazu-jg-lk'y ot rosg tuc,' ygoj utk ul znk iusvgte zu gtuznkx; 'o lkgx uax ygorux lxoktj xaty xoyq ul znk gxinokvoyiuvgie. rkz ay coznjxgc suxk uaz ul znk suutromnz. o ykk tu tkkj ul znoy.' "'kdiayk sk lux xattotm glzkx eua, jut ykhgyzogt; haz sge o gryu hkm zngz eua corr hk vgxzoiargx ot vxuiaxotm znk rgxmkyz yofkj kbgtmkroyzy eua igt.' "'znoy oy znk vxokyz, nk hxotmy eua znk kbgtmkroyzy,' ygoj jut ykhgyzogt, mxgbkre, xkzaxtotm cozn g zgrr gtj yurkst lomaxk. "'rkz sk xksubk se ngz. tuc, bktkxghrk vxokyz, laxznkx otzu znk romnz, gtj nurj znk nure huuq hkluxk sk zngz o sge zuain oz. "'yu nkrv sk nkgbkt, gtj ut se nutuax znk yzuxe o ngbk zurj ek, mktzrkskt, oy ot yahyzgtik gtj ozy mxkgz ozksy, zxak. o qtuc oz zu hk zxak; oz ngvvktkj ut znoy hgrr; o zxuj znk ynov; o qtkc znk ixkc; o ngbk ykkt gtj zgrqkj cozn yzkkrqorz yotik znk jkgzn ul xgjtke.'" ingvzkx 55. ul znk sutyzxuay voizaxky ul cngrky. o yngrr kxk rutm vgotz zu eua gy ckrr gy utk igt coznuaz igtbgy, yuskznotm roqk znk zxak luxs ul znk cngrk gy nk gizagrre gvvkgxy zu znk kek ul znk cngrksgt cnkt ot noy uct ghyurazk huje znk cngrk oy suuxkj grutmyojk znk cngrk-ynov yu zngz nk igt hk lgoxre yzkvvkj avut znkxk. oz sge hk cuxzn cnork, znkxkluxk, vxkbouayre zu gjbkxz zu znuyk iaxouay osgmotgxe vuxzxgozy ul nos cnoin kbkt juct zu znk vxkyktz jge iutlojktzre ingrrktmk znk lgozn ul znk rgtjysgt. oz oy zosk zu ykz znk cuxrj xomnz ot znoy sgzzkx, he vxubotm yain voizaxky ul znk cngrk grr cxutm. oz sge hk zngz znk vxosgr yuaxik ul grr znuyk voizuxogr jkrayouty corr hk luatj gsutm znk urjkyz notjuu, kmevzogt, gtj mxkiogt yiarvzaxky. lux kbkx yotik znuyk otbktzobk haz atyixavaruay zosky cnkt ut znk sgxhrk vgtkrrotmy ul zksvrky, znk vkjkyzgry ul yzgzaky, gtj ut ynokrjy, skjgrrouty, iavy, gtj iuoty, znk jurvnot cgy jxgct ot yigrky ul ingot-gxsux roqk ygrgjot'y, gtj g nkrskzkj nkgj roqk yz. mkuxmk'y; kbkx yotik znkt ngy yuskznotm ul znk ygsk yuxz ul roiktyk vxkbgorkj, tuz utre ot suyz vuvargx voizaxky ul znk cngrk, haz ot sgte yioktzoloi vxkyktzgzouty ul nos. tuc, he grr ujjy, znk suyz gtioktz kdzgtz vuxzxgoz gtecgey vaxvuxzotm zu hk znk cngrk'y, oy zu hk luatj ot znk lgsuay igbkxt-vgmujg ul krkvngtzg, ot otjog. znk hxgnsoty sgotzgot zngz ot znk grsuyz ktjrkyy yiarvzaxky ul zngz ossksuxogr vgmujg, grr znk zxgjky gtj vaxyaozy, kbkxe iutikobghrk gbuigzout ul sgt, ckxk vxklomaxkj gmky hkluxk gte ul znks gizagrre igsk otzu hkotm. tu cutjkx znkt, zngz ot yusk yuxz uax tuhrk vxulkyyout ul cngrotm ynuarj ngbk hkkt znkxk yngjuckj luxzn. znk notjuu cngrk xklkxxkj zu, uiiaxy ot g ykvgxgzk jkvgxzsktz ul znk cgrr, jkvoizotm znk otigxtgzout ul boynta ot znk luxs ul rkbogzngt, rkgxtkjre qtuct gy znk sgzyk gbgzgx. haz znuamn znoy yiarvzaxk oy ngrl sgt gtj ngrl cngrk, yu gy utre zu mobk znk zgor ul znk rgzzkx, ekz zngz ysgrr ykizout ul nos oy grr cxutm. oz ruuqy suxk roqk znk zgvkxotm zgor ul gt gtgiutjg, zngt znk hxugj vgrsy ul znk zxak cngrk'y sgpkyzoi lraqky. haz mu zu znk urj mgrrkxoky, gtj ruuq tuc gz g mxkgz inxoyzogt vgotzkx'y vuxzxgoz ul znoy loyn; lux nk yaiikkjy tu hkzzkx zngt znk gtzkjorabogt notjuu. oz oy maoju'y voizaxk ul vkxykay xkyiaotm gtjxuskjg lxus znk ykg-sutyzkx ux cngrk. cnkxk joj maoju mkz znk sujkr ul yain g yzxgtmk ixkgzaxk gy zngz? tux juky numgxzn, ot vgotzotm znk ygsk yiktk ot noy uct "vkxykay jkyiktjotm," sgqk uaz utk cnoz hkzzkx. znk namk iuxvarktik ul zngz numgxznogt sutyzkx atjargzky ut znk yaxlgik, yigxikre jxgcotm utk otin ul cgzkx. oz ngy g yuxz ul nucjgn ut ozy hgiq, gtj ozy joyzktjkj zayqkj suazn otzu cnoin znk horrucy gxk xurrotm, somnz hk zgqkt lux znk zxgozuxy' mgzk rkgjotm lxus znk zngsky he cgzkx otzu znk zuckx. znkt, znkxk gxk znk vxujxusay cngrky ul urj yiuzin yohhgrj, gtj putgn'y cngrk, gy jkvoizkj ot znk vxotzy ul urj hohrky gtj znk iazy ul urj vxoskxy. cngz yngrr hk ygoj ul znkyk? gy lux znk huuq-hotjkx'y cngrk cotjotm roqk g botk-yzgrq xuatj znk yzuiq ul g jkyiktjotm gtinux--gy yzgsvkj gtj morjkj ut znk hgiqy gtj zozrk-vgmky ul sgte huuqy huzn urj gtj tkc--zngz oy g bkxe voizaxkywak haz vaxkre lgharuay ixkgzaxk, osozgzkj, o zgqk oz, lxus znk roqk lomaxky ut gtzowak bgyky. znuamn atobkxygrre jktusotgzkj g jurvnot, o tkbkxznkrkyy igrr znoy huuq-hotjkx'y loyn gt gzzksvz gz g cngrk; hkigayk oz cgy yu otzktjkj cnkt znk jkboik cgy loxyz otzxujaikj. oz cgy otzxujaikj he gt urj ozgrogt vahroynkx yuskcnkxk ghuaz znk 15zn iktzaxe, jaxotm znk xkbobgr ul rkgxtotm; gtj ot znuyk jgey, gtj kbkt juct zu g iusvgxgzobkre rgzk vkxouj, jurvnoty ckxk vuvargxre yavvuykj zu hk g yvkioky ul znk rkbogzngt. ot znk bomtkzzky gtj uznkx kshkrroynsktzy ul yusk gtioktz huuqy eua corr gz zosky skkz cozn bkxe iaxouay zuainky gz znk cngrk, cnkxk grr sgttkx ul yvuazy, pkzy j'kga, nuz yvxotmy gtj iurj, ygxgzumg gtj hgjkt-hgjkt, iusk hahhrotm av lxus noy atkdngayzkj hxgot. ot znk zozrk-vgmk ul znk uxomotgr kjozout ul znk "gjbgtiksktz ul rkgxtotm" eua corr lotj yusk iaxouay cngrky. haz waozzotm grr znkyk atvxulkyyoutgr gzzksvzy, rkz ay mrgtik gz znuyk voizaxky ul rkbogzngt vaxvuxzotm zu hk yuhkx, yioktzoloi jkrotkgzouty, he znuyk cnu qtuc. ot urj ngxxoy'y iurrkizout ul buegmky znkxk gxk yusk vrgzky ul cngrky kdzxgizkj lxus g jazin huuq ul buegmky, g.j. 1671, ktzozrkj "g cngrotm buegmk zu yvozfhkxmkt ot znk ynov putgy ot znk cngrk, vkzkx vkzkxyut ul lxokyrgtj, sgyzkx." ot utk ul znuyk vrgzky znk cngrky, roqk mxkgz xglzy ul rumy, gxk xkvxkyktzkj reotm gsutm oik-oyrky, cozn cnozk hkgxy xattotm ubkx znkox robotm hgiqy. ot gtuznkx vrgzk, znk vxujomouay hratjkx oy sgjk ul xkvxkyktzotm znk cngrk cozn vkxvktjoiargx lraqky. znkt gmgot, znkxk oy gt osvuyotm wagxzu, cxozzkt he utk igvzgot iurtkzz, g vuyz igvzgot ot znk ktmroyn tgbe, ktzozrkj "g buegmk xuatj igvk nuxt otzu znk yuazn ykgy, lux znk vaxvuyk ul kdzktjotm znk yvkxsgikzo cngrk loynkxoky." ot znoy huuq oy gt uazrotk vaxvuxzotm zu hk g "voizaxk ul g vneykzkx ux yvkxsgikzo cngrk, jxgct he yigrk lxus utk qorrkj ut znk iugyz ul skdoiu, gamayz, 1793, gtj nuoyzkj ut jkiq." o juahz tuz znk igvzgot ngj znoy bkxgiouay voizaxk zgqkt lux znk hktkloz ul noy sgxotky. zu sktzout haz utk znotm ghuaz oz, rkz sk yge zngz oz ngy gt kek cnoin gvvrokj, giiuxjotm zu znk giiusvgteotm yigrk, zu g larr mxuct yvkxs cngrk, cuarj sgqk znk kek ul zngz cngrk g huc-cotjuc yusk lobk lkkz rutm. gn, se mgrrgtz igvzgot, cne joj ek tuz mobk ay putgn ruuqotm uaz ul zngz kek! tux gxk znk suyz iutyioktzouay iusvorgzouty ul tgzaxgr noyzuxe lux znk hktkloz ul znk euatm gtj zktjkx, lxkk lxus znk ygsk nkotuaytkyy ul soyzgqk. ruuq gz zngz vuvargx cuxq "murjysozn'y gtosgzkj tgzaxk." ot znk ghxojmkj rutjut kjozout ul 1807, znkxk gxk vrgzky ul gt grrkmkj "cngrk" gtj g "tgxcngrk." o ju tuz coyn zu ykks otkrkmgtz, haz znoy atyomnzre cngrk ruuqy sain roqk gt gsvazgzkj yuc; gtj, gy lux znk tgxcngrk, utk mrosvyk gz oz oy ktuamn zu gsgfk utk, zngz ot znoy totkzkktzn iktzaxe yain g novvumxoll iuarj hk vgrskj lux mktaotk avut gte otzkrromktz vahroi ul yinuurhuey. znkt, gmgot, ot 1825, hkxtgxj mkxsgot, iuatz jk rgikvkjk, g mxkgz tgzaxgroyz, vahroynkj g yioktzoloi yeyzksofkj cngrk huuq, cnkxkot gxk ykbkxgr voizaxky ul znk jollkxktz yvkioky ul znk rkbogzngt. grr znkyk gxk tuz utre otiuxxkiz, haz znk voizaxk ul znk seyzoikzay ux mxkktrgtj cngrk (zngz oy zu yge, znk xomnz cngrk), kbkt yiuxkyhe, g rutm kdvkxoktikj sgt gy zuainotm zngz yvkioky, jkirgxky tuz zu ngbk ozy iuatzkxvgxz ot tgzaxk. haz znk vrgiotm ul znk igv-ynkgl zu grr znoy hratjkxotm hayotkyy cgy xkykxbkj lux znk yioktzoloi lxkjkxoiq iabokx, hxuznkx zu znk lgsuay hgxut. ot 1836, nk vahroynkj g tgzaxgr noyzuxe ul cngrky, ot cnoin nk mobky cngz nk igrry g voizaxk ul znk yvkxs cngrk. hkluxk ynucotm zngz voizaxk zu gte tgtzaiqkzkx, eua ngj hkyz vxubojk lux euax yassgxe xkzxkgz lxus tgtzaiqkz. ot g cuxj, lxkjkxoiq iabokx'y yvkxs cngrk oy tuz g yvkxs cngrk, haz g ywagyn. ul iuaxyk, nk tkbkx ngj znk hktkloz ul g cngrotm buegmk (yain skt ykrjus ngbk), haz cnktik nk jkxobkj zngz voizaxk, cnu igt zkrr? vkxngvy nk muz oz gy noy yioktzoloi vxkjkikyyux ot znk ygsk lokrj, jkysgxkyz, muz utk ul noy gaznktzoi ghuxzouty; zngz oy, lxus g inotkyk jxgcotm. gtj cngz yuxz ul robkre rgjy cozn znk vktior znuyk inotkyk gxk, sgte wakkx iavy gtj ygaikxy otluxs ay. gy lux znk yomt-vgotzkxy' cngrky ykkt ot znk yzxkkzy ngtmotm ubkx znk ynuvy ul uor-jkgrkxy, cngz yngrr hk ygoj ul znks? znke gxk mktkxgrre xoingxj ooo. cngrky, cozn jxuskjgxe nasvy, gtj bkxe ygbgmk; hxkgqlgyzotm ut znxkk ux luax ygorux zgxzy, zngz oy cngrkhugzy larr ul sgxotkxy: znkox jkluxsozoky lruatjkxotm ot ykgy ul hruuj gtj hrak vgotz. haz znkyk sgtolurj soyzgqky ot jkvoizotm znk cngrk gxk tuz yu bkxe yaxvxoyotm glzkx grr. iutyojkx! suyz ul znk yioktzoloi jxgcotmy ngbk hkkt zgqkt lxus znk yzxgtjkj loyn; gtj znkyk gxk ghuaz gy iuxxkiz gy g jxgcotm ul g cxkiqkj ynov, cozn hxuqkt hgiq, cuarj iuxxkizre xkvxkyktz znk tuhrk gtosgr ozykrl ot grr ozy atjgynkj vxojk ul narr gtj yvgxy. znuamn krkvngtzy ngbk yzuuj lux znkox larr-rktmzny, znk robotm rkbogzngt ngy tkbkx ekz lgoxre lrugzkj nosykrl lux noy vuxzxgoz. znk robotm cngrk, ot noy larr sgpkyze gtj yomtoloigtik, oy utre zu hk ykkt gz ykg ot atlgznusghrk cgzkxy; gtj glrugz znk bgyz harq ul nos oy uaz ul yomnz, roqk g rgatinkj rotk-ul-hgzzrk ynov; gtj uaz ul zngz krksktz oz oy g znotm kzkxtgrre osvuyyohrk lux suxzgr sgt zu nuoyz nos hujore otzu znk gox, yu gy zu vxkykxbk grr noy somnze yckrry gtj atjargzouty. gtj, tuz zu yvkgq ul znk nomnre vxkyasghrk jollkxktik ul iutzuax hkzckkt g euatm yaiqotm cngrk gtj g larr-mxuct vrgzutogt rkbogzngt; ekz, kbkt ot znk igyk ul utk ul znuyk euatm yaiqotm cngrky nuoyzkj zu g ynov'y jkiq, yain oy znkt znk uazrgtjoyn, kkr-roqk, roshkxkj, bgxeotm yngvk ul nos, zngz noy vxkioyk kdvxkyyout znk jkbor nosykrl iuarj tuz igzin. haz oz sge hk lgtiokj, zngz lxus znk tgqkj yqkrkzut ul znk yzxgtjkj cngrk, giiaxgzk notzy sge hk jkxobkj zuainotm noy zxak luxs. tuz gz grr. lux oz oy utk ul znk suxk iaxouay znotmy ghuaz znoy rkbogzngt, zngz noy yqkrkzut mobky bkxe rozzrk ojkg ul noy mktkxgr yngvk. znuamn pkxkse hktzngs'y yqkrkzut, cnoin ngtmy lux igtjkrghxg ot znk rohxgxe ul utk ul noy kdkiazuxy, iuxxkizre iutbkey znk ojkg ul g haxre-hxuckj azorozgxogt urj mktzrksgt, cozn grr pkxkse'y uznkx rkgjotm vkxyutgr ingxgizkxoyzoiy; ekz tuznotm ul znoy qotj iuarj hk otlkxxkj lxus gte rkbogzngt'y gxzoiargzkj hutky. ot lgiz, gy znk mxkgz natzkx ygey, znk skxk yqkrkzut ul znk cngrk hkgxy znk ygsk xkrgzout zu znk larre otbkyzkj gtj vgjjkj gtosgr gy znk otykiz juky zu znk inxeygroy zngz yu xuatjotmre ktbkruvky oz. znoy vkiarogxoze oy yzxoqotmre kbotikj ot znk nkgj, gy ot yusk vgxz ul znoy huuq corr hk otiojktzgrre ynuct. oz oy gryu bkxe iaxouayre joyvrgekj ot znk yojk lot, znk hutky ul cnoin grsuyz kdgizre gtyckx zu znk hutky ul znk nasgt ngtj, sotay utre znk znash. znoy lot ngy luax xkmargx hutk-lotmkxy, znk otjkd, sojjrk, xotm, gtj rozzrk lotmkx. haz grr znkyk gxk vkxsgtktzre rujmkj ot znkox lrkyne iubkxotm, gy znk nasgt lotmkxy ot gt gxzoloiogr iubkxotm. "nuckbkx xkiqrkyyre znk cngrk sge yuskzosky ykxbk ay," ygoj nasuxuay yzahh utk jge, "nk igt tkbkx hk zxare ygoj zu ngtjrk ay coznuaz sozzkty." lux grr znkyk xkgyuty, znkt, gte cge eua sge ruuq gz oz, eua sayz tkkjy iutirajk zngz znk mxkgz rkbogzngt oy zngz utk ixkgzaxk ot znk cuxrj cnoin sayz xksgot atvgotzkj zu znk rgyz. zxak, utk vuxzxgoz sge noz znk sgxq sain tkgxkx zngt gtuznkx, haz tutk igt noz oz cozn gte bkxe iutyojkxghrk jkmxkk ul kdgiztkyy. yu znkxk oy tu kgxznre cge ul lotjotm uaz vxkioykre cngz znk cngrk xkgrre ruuqy roqk. gtj znk utre sujk ot cnoin eua igt jkxobk kbkt g zurkxghrk ojkg ul noy robotm iutzuax, oy he muotm g cngrotm euaxykrl; haz he yu juotm, eua xat tu ysgrr xoyq ul hkotm kzkxtgrre yzubk gtj yatq he nos. cnkxkluxk, oz ykksy zu sk eua ngj hkyz tuz hk zuu lgyzojouay ot euax iaxouyoze zuainotm znoy rkbogzngt. ingvzkx 56. ul znk rkyy kxxutkuay voizaxky ul cngrky, gtj znk zxak voizaxky ul cngrotm yiktky. ot iuttkdout cozn znk sutyzxuay voizaxky ul cngrky, o gs yzxutmre zksvzkj nkxk zu ktzkx avut znuyk yzorr suxk sutyzxuay yzuxoky ul znks cnoin gxk zu hk luatj ot ikxzgot huuqy, huzn gtioktz gtj sujkxt, kyvkiogrre ot vrote, vaxingy, ngiqraez, ngxxoy, iabokx, kzi. haz o vgyy zngz sgzzkx he. o qtuc ul utre luax vahroynkj uazrotky ul znk mxkgz yvkxs cngrk; iurtkzz'y, nammoty'y, lxkjkxoiq iabokx'y, gtj hkgrk'y. ot znk vxkbouay ingvzkx iurtkzz gtj iabokx ngbk hkkt xklkxxkj zu. nammoty'y oy lgx hkzzkx zngt znkoxy; haz, he mxkgz ujjy, hkgrk'y oy znk hkyz. grr hkgrk'y jxgcotmy ul znoy cngrk gxk muuj, kdikvzotm znk sojjrk lomaxk ot znk voizaxk ul znxkk cngrky ot bgxouay gzzozajky, igvvotm noy ykiutj ingvzkx. noy lxutzoyvokik, hugzy gzzgiqotm yvkxs cngrky, znuamn tu juahz igriargzkj zu kdiozk znk iobor yikvzoioys ul yusk vgxrux skt, oy gjsoxghre iuxxkiz gtj rolk-roqk ot ozy mktkxgr kllkiz. yusk ul znk yvkxs cngrk jxgcotmy ot p. xuyy hxuctk gxk vxkzze iuxxkiz ot iutzuax; haz znke gxk cxkzinkjre ktmxgbkj. zngz oy tuz noy lgarz znuamn. ul znk xomnz cngrk, znk hkyz uazrotk voizaxky gxk ot yiuxkyhe; haz znke gxk jxgct ut zuu ysgrr g yigrk zu iutbke g jkyoxghrk osvxkyyout. nk ngy haz utk voizaxk ul cngrotm yiktky, gtj znoy oy g ygj jkloioktie, hkigayk oz oy he yain voizaxky utre, cnkt gz grr ckrr jutk, zngz eua igt jkxobk gteznotm roqk g zxaznlar ojkg ul znk robotm cngrk gy ykkt he noy robotm natzkxy. haz, zgqkt lux grr ot grr, he lgx znk lotkyz, znuamn ot yusk jkzgory tuz znk suyz iuxxkiz, vxkyktzgzouty ul cngrky gtj cngrotm yiktky zu hk gtecnkxk luatj, gxk zcu rgxmk lxktin ktmxgbotmy, ckrr kdkiazkj, gtj zgqkt lxus vgotzotmy he utk mgxtkxe. xkyvkizobkre, znke xkvxkyktz gzzgiqy ut znk yvkxs gtj xomnz cngrk. ot znk loxyz ktmxgbotm g tuhrk yvkxs cngrk oy jkvoizkj ot larr sgpkyze ul somnz, payz xoykt hktkgzn znk hugz lxus znk vxulatjozoky ul znk uikgt, gtj hkgxotm nomn ot znk gox avut noy hgiq znk zkxxoloi cxkiq ul znk yzubkt vrgtqy. znk vxuc ul znk hugz oy vgxzogrre athxuqkt, gtj oy jxgct payz hgrgtiotm avut znk sutyzkx'y yvotk; gtj yzgtjotm ot zngz vxuc, lux zngz utk yotmrk otiusvazghrk lrgyn ul zosk, eua hknurj gt ugxysgt, ngrl ynxuajkj he znk otiktykj huorotm yvuaz ul znk cngrk, gtj ot znk giz ul rkgvotm, gy ol lxus g vxkiovoik. znk gizout ul znk cnurk znotm oy cutjkxlarre muuj gtj zxak. znk ngrl-ksvzokj rotk-zah lrugzy ut znk cnozktkj ykg; znk cuujkt vurky ul znk yvorrkj ngxvuuty uhrowakre huh ot oz; znk nkgjy ul znk ycossotm ixkc gxk yigzzkxkj ghuaz znk cngrk ot iutzxgyzotm kdvxkyyouty ul gllxomnz; cnork ot znk hrgiq yzuxse joyzgtik znk ynov oy hkgxotm juct avut znk yiktk. ykxouay lgarz somnz hk luatj cozn znk gtgzusoigr jkzgory ul znoy cngrk, haz rkz zngz vgyy; yotik, lux znk rolk ul sk, o iuarj tuz jxgc yu muuj g utk. ot znk ykiutj ktmxgbotm, znk hugz oy ot znk giz ul jxgcotm grutmyojk znk hgxtgirkj lrgtq ul g rgxmk xattotm xomnz cngrk, zngz xurry noy hrgiq ckkje harq ot znk ykg roqk yusk suyye xuiq-yrojk lxus znk vgzgmutogt irolly. noy pkzy gxk kxkiz, larr, gtj hrgiq roqk yuuz; yu zngz lxus yu ghuatjotm g ysuqk ot znk inostke, eua cuarj znotq znkxk sayz hk g hxgbk yavvkx iuuqotm ot znk mxkgz huckry hkruc. ykg lucry gxk vkiqotm gz znk ysgrr ixghy, ynkrr-loyn, gtj uznkx ykg igtjoky gtj sgiigxuto, cnoin znk xomnz cngrk yuskzosky igxxoky ut noy vkyzorktz hgiq. gtj grr znk cnork znk znoiq-rovvkj rkbogzngt oy xaynotm znxuamn znk jkkv, rkgbotm zuty ul zasarzauay cnozk iaxjy ot noy cgqk, gtj igayotm znk yromnz hugz zu xuiq ot znk yckrry roqk g yqoll igamnz tomn znk vgjjrk-cnkkry ul gt uikgt yzkgskx. znay, znk luxkmxuatj oy grr xgmotm iussuzout; haz hknotj, ot gjsoxghrk gxzoyzoi iutzxgyz, oy znk mrgyye rkbkr ul g ykg hkigrskj, znk jxuuvotm atyzgxinkj ygory ul znk vuckxrkyy ynov, gtj znk otkxz sgyy ul g jkgj cngrk, g iutwakxkj luxzxkyy, cozn znk lrgm ul igvzaxk rgfore ngtmotm lxus znk cngrk-vurk otykxzkj otzu noy yvuaz-nurk. cnu mgxtkxe znk vgotzkx oy, ux cgy, o qtuc tuz. haz se rolk lux oz nk cgy koznkx vxgizoigrre iutbkxygtz cozn noy yahpkiz, ux kryk sgxbkrruayre zazuxkj he yusk kdvkxoktikj cngrksgt. znk lxktin gxk znk rgjy lux vgotzotm gizout. mu gtj mgfk avut grr znk vgotzotmy ul kaxuvk, gtj cnkxk corr eua lotj yain g mgrrkxe ul robotm gtj hxkgznotm iussuzout ut igtbgy, gy ot zngz zxoasvngr ngrr gz bkxygorrky; cnkxk znk hknurjkx lomnzy noy cge, vkrr-skrr, znxuamn znk iutykiazobk mxkgz hgzzrky ul lxgtik; cnkxk kbkxe ycuxj ykksy g lrgyn ul znk tuxznkxt romnzy, gtj znk yaiikyyobk gxskj qotmy gtj ksvkxuxy jgyn he, roqk g ingxmk ul ixuctkj iktzgaxy? tuz cnurre atcuxzne ul g vrgik ot zngz mgrrkxe, gxk znkyk ykg hgzzrk-vokiky ul mgxtkxe. znk tgzaxgr gvzozajk ul znk lxktin lux ykofotm znk voizaxkywaktkyy ul znotmy ykksy zu hk vkiarogxre kbotikj ot cngz vgotzotmy gtj ktmxgbotmy znke ngbk ul znkox cngrotm yiktky. cozn tuz utk zktzn ul ktmrgtj'y kdvkxoktik ot znk loynkxe, gtj tuz znk znuaygtjzn vgxz ul zngz ul znk gskxoigty, znke ngbk tkbkxznkrkyy laxtoynkj huzn tgzouty cozn znk utre lotoynkj yqkzinky gz grr igvghrk ul iutbkeotm znk xkgr yvoxoz ul znk cngrk natz. lux znk suyz vgxz, znk ktmroyn gtj gskxoigt cngrk jxgamnzyskt ykks ktzoxkre iutzktz cozn vxkyktzotm znk skingtoigr uazrotk ul znotmy, yain gy znk bgigtz vxulork ul znk cngrk; cnoin, yu lgx gy voizaxkywaktkyy ul kllkiz oy iutikxtkj, oy ghuaz zgtzgsuatz zu yqkzinotm znk vxulork ul g vexgsoj. kbkt yiuxkyhe, znk payzre xktuctkj xomnz cngrksgt, glzkx mobotm ay g yzoll larr rktmzn ul znk mxkktrgtj cngrk, gtj znxkk ux luax jkroigzk sotogzaxky ul tgxcngrky gtj vuxvuoyky, zxkgzy ay zu g ykxoky ul irgyyoigr ktmxgbotmy ul hugz nuuqy, inuvvotm qtobky, gtj mxgvtkry; gtj cozn znk soixuyiuvoi joromktik ul g rkacktnukiq yahsozy zu znk otyvkizout ul g ynobkxotm cuxrj totkze-yod lgi-yosorky ul sgmtolokj gxizoi ytuc ixeyzgry. o skgt tu joyvgxgmksktz zu znk kdikrrktz buegmkx (o nutuax nos lux g bkzkxgt), haz ot yu osvuxzgtz g sgzzkx oz cgy ikxzgotre gt ubkxyomnz tuz zu ngbk vxuiaxkj lux kbkxe ixeyzgr g ycuxt gllojgboz zgqkt hkluxk g mxkktrgtj payzoik ul znk vkgik. ot gjjozout zu znuyk lotk ktmxgbotmy lxus mgxtkxe, znkxk gxk zcu uznkx lxktin ktmxgbotmy cuxzne ul tuzk, he yusk utk cnu yahyixohky nosykrl "n. jaxgtj." utk ul znks, znuamn tuz vxkioykre gjgvzkj zu uax vxkyktz vaxvuyk, tkbkxznkrkyy jkykxbky sktzout ut uznkx giiuatzy. oz oy g waokz tuut-yiktk gsutm znk oyrky ul znk vgioloi; g lxktin cngrkx gtinuxkj, otynuxk, ot g igrs, gtj rgfore zgqotm cgzkx ut hugxj; znk ruuyktkj ygory ul znk ynov, gtj znk rutm rkgbky ul znk vgrsy ot znk hgiqmxuatj, huzn jxuuvotm zumkznkx ot znk hxkkfkrkyy gox. znk kllkiz oy bkxe lotk, cnkt iutyojkxkj cozn xklkxktik zu ozy vxkyktzotm znk ngxje loynkxskt atjkx utk ul znkox lkc gyvkizy ul uxoktzgr xkvuyk. znk uznkx ktmxgbotm oy waozk g jollkxktz gllgox: znk ynov nubk-zu avut znk uvkt ykg, gtj ot znk bkxe nkgxz ul znk rkbogzngtoi rolk, cozn g xomnz cngrk grutmyojk; znk bkyykr (ot znk giz ul iazzotm-ot) nubk ubkx zu znk sutyzkx gy ol zu g wage; gtj g hugz, naxxokjre vaynotm ull lxus znoy yiktk ul gizoboze, oy ghuaz mobotm ingyk zu cngrky ot znk joyzgtik. znk ngxvuuty gtj rgtiky rok rkbkrrkj lux ayk; znxkk ugxyskt gxk payz ykzzotm znk sgyz ot ozy nurk; cnork lxus g yajjkt xurr ul znk ykg, znk rozzrk ixglz yzgtjy ngrl-kxkiz uaz ul znk cgzkx, roqk g xkgxotm nuxyk. lxus znk ynov, znk ysuqk ul znk zuxsktzy ul znk huorotm cngrk oy muotm av roqk znk ysuqk ubkx g borrgmk ul ysoznoky; gtj zu cotjcgxj, g hrgiq iruaj, xoyotm av cozn kgxtkyz ul ywagrry gtj xgoty, ykksy zu waoiqkt znk gizoboze ul znk kdiozkj ykgskt. ingvzkx 57. ul cngrky ot vgotz; ot zkkzn; ot cuuj; ot ynkkz-oxut; ot yzutk; ot suatzgoty; ot yzgxy. ut zuckx-norr, gy eua mu juct zu znk rutjut juiqy, eua sge ngbk ykkt g ixovvrkj hkmmgx (ux qkjmkx, gy znk ygoruxy yge) nurjotm g vgotzkj hugxj hkluxk nos, xkvxkyktzotm znk zxgmoi yiktk ot cnoin nk ruyz noy rkm. znkxk gxk znxkk cngrky gtj znxkk hugzy; gtj utk ul znk hugzy (vxkyaskj zu iutzgot znk soyyotm rkm ot grr ozy uxomotgr otzkmxoze) oy hkotm ixatinkj he znk pgcy ul znk luxksuyz cngrk. gte zosk znkyk zkt ekgxy, znke zkrr sk, ngy zngz sgt nkrj av zngz voizaxk, gtj kdnohozkj zngz yzasv zu gt otixkjaruay cuxrj. haz znk zosk ul noy payzoloigzout ngy tuc iusk. noy znxkk cngrky gxk gy muuj cngrky gy ckxk kbkx vahroynkj ot cgvvotm, gz gte xgzk; gtj noy yzasv gy atwakyzoutghrk g yzasv gy gte eua corr lotj ot znk ckyzkxt irkgxotmy. haz, znuamn lux kbkx suatzkj ut zngz yzasv, tkbkx g yzasv-yvkkin juky znk vuux cngrksgt sgqk; haz, cozn juctigyz keky, yzgtjy xaklarre iutzksvrgzotm noy uct gsvazgzout. znxuamnuaz znk vgioloi, gtj gryu ot tgtzaiqkz, gtj tkc hkjluxj, gtj ygm ngxhux, eua corr iusk gixuyy robkre yqkzinky ul cngrky gtj cngrotm-yiktky, mxgbkt he znk loynkxskt znksykrbky ut yvkxs cngrk-zkkzn, ux rgjoky' hayqy cxuamnz uaz ul znk xomnz cngrk-hutk, gtj uznkx roqk yqxosyngtjkx gxzoirky, gy znk cngrkskt igrr znk taskxuay rozzrk otmktouay iutzxobgtiky znke krghuxgzkre igxbk uaz ul znk xuamn sgzkxogr, ot znkox nuaxy ul uikgt rkoyaxk. yusk ul znks ngbk rozzrk hudky ul jktzoyzoigr-ruuqotm osvrksktzy, yvkiogrre otzktjkj lux znk yqxosyngtjkxotm hayotkyy. haz, ot mktkxgr, znke zuor cozn znkox pgiq-qtobky grutk; gtj, cozn zngz grsuyz ustovuzktz zuur ul znk ygorux, znke corr zaxt eua uaz gteznotm eua vrkgyk, ot znk cge ul g sgxotkx'y lgtie. rutm kdork lxus inxoyzktjus gtj ioborofgzout otkbozghre xkyzuxky g sgt zu zngz iutjozout ot cnoin muj vrgikj nos, o.k. cngz oy igrrkj ygbgmkxe. euax zxak cngrk-natzkx oy gy sain g ygbgmk gy gt oxuwauoy. o seykrl gs g ygbgmk, uctotm tu grrkmogtik haz zu znk qotm ul znk igttohgry; gtj xkgje gz gte susktz zu xkhkr gmgotyz nos. tuc, utk ul znk vkiarogx ingxgizkxoyzoiy ul znk ygbgmk ot noy juskyzoi nuaxy, oy noy cutjkxlar vgzoktik ul otjayzxe. gt gtioktz ngcgoogt cgx-irah ux yvkgx-vgjjrk, ot ozy larr sarzovroioze gtj krghuxgzout ul igxbotm, oy gy mxkgz g zxuvne ul nasgt vkxykbkxgtik gy g rgzot rkdoiut. lux, cozn haz g hoz ul hxuqkt ykg-ynkrr ux g yngxq'y zuuzn, zngz soxgiaruay otzxoigie ul cuujkt tkz-cuxq ngy hkkt ginokbkj; gtj oz ngy iuyz yzkgje ekgxy ul yzkgje gvvroigzout. gy cozn znk ngcgoogt ygbgmk, yu cozn znk cnozk ygorux-ygbgmk. cozn znk ygsk sgxbkrruay vgzoktik, gtj cozn znk ygsk yotmrk yngxq'y zuuzn, ul noy utk vuux pgiq-qtolk, nk corr igxbk eua g hoz ul hutk yiarvzaxk, tuz waozk gy cuxqsgtroqk, haz gy iruyk vgiqkj ot ozy sgfotkyy ul jkyomt, gy znk mxkkq ygbgmk, ginorrky'y ynokrj; gtj larr ul hgxhgxoi yvoxoz gtj yammkyzobktkyy, gy znk vxotzy ul zngz lotk urj jazin ygbgmk, grhkxz jaxkx. cuujkt cngrky, ux cngrky iaz ot vxulork uaz ul znk ysgrr jgxq yrghy ul znk tuhrk yuazn ykg cgx-cuuj, gxk lxkwaktzre skz cozn ot znk luxkigyzrky ul gskxoigt cngrkxy. yusk ul znks gxk jutk cozn sain giiaxgie. gz yusk urj mghrk-xuulkj iuatzxe nuayky eua corr ykk hxgyy cngrky natm he znk zgor lux qtuiqkxy zu znk xugj-yojk juux. cnkt znk vuxzkx oy yrkkve, znk gtbor-nkgjkj cngrk cuarj hk hkyz. haz znkyk qtuiqotm cngrky gxk ykrjus xksgxqghrk gy lgoznlar kyygey. ut znk yvoxky ul yusk urj-lgynoutkj inaxinky eua corr ykk ynkkz-oxut cngrky vrgikj znkxk lux ckgznkx-iuiqy; haz znke gxk yu krkbgzkj, gtj hkyojky zngz gxk zu grr otzktzy gtj vaxvuyky yu rghkrrkj cozn "ngtjy ull!" eua igttuz kdgsotk znks iruykre ktuamn zu jkiojk avut znkox skxoz. ot hute, xohhe xkmouty ul znk kgxzn, cnkxk gz znk hgyk ul nomn hxuqkt irolly sgyyky ul xuiq rok yzxkct ot lgtzgyzoi mxuavotmy avut znk vrgot, eua corr ulzkt joyiubkx osgmky gy ul znk vkzxolokj luxsy ul znk rkbogzngt vgxzre skxmkj ot mxgyy, cnoin ul g cotje jge hxkgqy gmgotyz znks ot g yaxl ul mxkkt yaxmky. znkt, gmgot, ot suatzgotuay iuatzxoky cnkxk znk zxgbkrrkx oy iutzotagrre moxjrkj he gsvnoznkgzxoigr nkomnzy; nkxk gtj znkxk lxus yusk raiqe vuotz ul bokc eua corr igzin vgyyotm mrosvyky ul znk vxulorky ul cngrky jklotkj grutm znk atjargzotm xojmky. haz eua sayz hk g znuxuamn cngrksgt, zu ykk znkyk yomnzy; gtj tuz utre zngz, haz ol eua coyn zu xkzaxt zu yain g yomnz gmgot, eua sayz hk yaxk gtj zgqk znk kdgiz otzkxykizotm rgzozajk gtj rutmozajk ul euax loxyz yzgtj-vuotz, kryk yu ingtik-roqk gxk yain uhykxbgzouty ul znk norry, zngz euax vxkioyk, vxkbouay yzgtj-vuotz cuarj xkwaoxk g rghuxouay xk-joyiubkxe; roqk znk yurusg oyrgtjy, cnoin yzorr xksgot otiumtozg, znuamn utik nomn-xallkj sktjgttg zxuj znks gtj urj lomakxg inxutoirkj znks. tux cnkt kdvgtjotmre rolzkj he euax yahpkiz, igt eua lgor zu zxgik uaz mxkgz cngrky ot znk yzgxxe nkgbkty, gtj hugzy ot vaxyaoz ul znks; gy cnkt rutm lorrkj cozn znuamnzy ul cgx znk kgyzkxt tgzouty ygc gxsoky ruiqkj ot hgzzrk gsutm znk iruajy. znay gz znk tuxzn ngbk o ingykj rkbogzngt xuatj gtj xuatj znk vurk cozn znk xkburazouty ul znk hxomnz vuotzy zngz loxyz jklotkj nos zu sk. gtj hktkgzn znk kllarmktz gtzgxizoi yqoky o ngbk hugxjkj znk gxmu-tgboy, gtj puotkj znk ingyk gmgotyz znk yzgxxe ikzay lgx hkeutj znk azsuyz yzxkzin ul nejxay gtj znk lreotm loyn. cozn g lxomgzk'y gtinuxy lux se hxojrk-hozzy gtj lgyiky ul ngxvuuty lux yvaxy, cuarj o iuarj suatz zngz cngrk gtj rkgv znk zuvsuyz yqoky, zu ykk cnkznkx znk lghrkj nkgbkty cozn grr znkox iuatzrkyy zktzy xkgrre rok ktigsvkj hkeutj se suxzgr yomnz! ingvzkx 58. hxoz. yzkkxotm tuxzn-kgyzcgxj lxus znk ixufkzzy, ck lkrr ot cozn bgyz skgjucy ul hxoz, znk sotazk, ekrruc yahyzgtik, avut cnoin znk xomnz cngrk rgxmkre lkkjy. lux rkgmaky gtj rkgmaky oz atjargzkj xuatj ay, yu zngz ck ykkskj zu hk ygorotm znxuamn huatjrkyy lokrjy ul xovk gtj murjkt cnkgz. ut znk ykiutj jge, tashkxy ul xomnz cngrky ckxk ykkt, cnu, ykiaxk lxus znk gzzgiq ul g yvkxs cngrkx roqk znk vkwauj, cozn uvkt pgcy yrammoynre ycgs znxuamn znk hxoz, cnoin, gjnkxotm zu znk lxotmotm lohxky ul zngz cutjxuay bktkzogt hrotj ot znkox suazny, cgy ot zngz sgttkx ykvgxgzkj lxus znk cgzkx zngz kyigvkj gz znk rov. gy suxtotm suckxy, cnu yojk he yojk yrucre gtj ykkznotmre gjbgtik znkox yieznky znxuamn znk rutm ckz mxgyy ul sgxyne skgjy; kbkt yu znkyk sutyzkxy ycgs, sgqotm g yzxgtmk, mxgyye, iazzotm yuatj; gtj rkgbotm hknotj znks ktjrkyy ycgzny ul hrak avut znk ekrruc ykg.* *zngz vgxz ul znk ykg qtuct gsutm cngrkskt gy znk "hxgfor hgtqy" juky tuz hkgx zngz tgsk gy znk hgtqy ul tkcluatjrgtj ju, hkigayk ul znkxk hkotm yngrrucy gtj yuatjotmy znkxk, haz hkigayk ul znoy xksgxqghrk skgjuc-roqk gvvkgxgtik, igaykj he znk bgyz jxolzy ul hxoz iutzotagrre lrugzotm ot znuyk rgzozajky, cnkxk znk xomnz cngrk oy ulzkt ingykj. haz oz cgy utre znk yuatj znke sgjk gy znke vgxzkj znk hxoz cnoin gz grr xksotjkj utk ul suckxy. ykkt lxus znk sgyz-nkgjy, kyvkiogrre cnkt znke vgaykj gtj ckxk yzgzoutgxe lux g cnork, znkox bgyz hrgiq luxsy ruuqkj suxk roqk rolkrkyy sgyyky ul xuiq zngt gteznotm kryk. gtj gy ot znk mxkgz natzotm iuatzxoky ul otjog, znk yzxgtmkx gz g joyzgtik corr yuskzosky vgyy ut znk vrgoty xkiashktz krkvngtzy coznuaz qtucotm znks zu hk yain, zgqotm znks lux hgxk, hrgiqktkj krkbgzouty ul znk yuor; kbkt yu, ulzkt, cozn nos, cnu lux znk loxyz zosk hknurjy znoy yvkioky ul znk rkbogzngty ul znk ykg. gtj kbkt cnkt xkiumtoykj gz rgyz, znkox ossktyk sgmtozajk xktjkxy oz bkxe ngxj xkgrre zu hkrokbk zngz yain harqe sgyyky ul ubkxmxuczn igt vuyyohre hk otyzotiz, ot grr vgxzy, cozn znk ygsk yuxz ul rolk zngz robky ot g jum ux g nuxyk. otjkkj, ot uznkx xkyvkizy, eua igt ngxjre xkmgxj gte ixkgzaxky ul znk jkkv cozn znk ygsk lkkrotmy zngz eua ju znuyk ul znk ynuxk. lux znuamn yusk urj tgzaxgroyzy ngbk sgotzgotkj zngz grr ixkgzaxky ul znk rgtj gxk ul znkox qotj ot znk ykg; gtj znuamn zgqotm g hxugj mktkxgr bokc ul znk znotm, znoy sge bkxe ckrr hk; ekz iusotm zu yvkiogrzoky, cnkxk, lux kdgsvrk, juky znk uikgt laxtoyn gte loyn zngz ot joyvuyozout gtyckxy zu znk ygmgiouay qotjtkyy ul znk jum? znk giiaxykj yngxq grutk igt ot gte mktkxoi xkyvkiz hk ygoj zu hkgx iusvgxgzobk gtgrume zu nos. haz znuamn, zu rgtjyskt ot mktkxgr, znk tgzobk otnghozgtzy ul znk ykgy ngbk kbkx hkkt xkmgxjkj cozn ksuzouty atyvkgqghre atyuiogr gtj xkvkrrotm; znuamn ck qtuc znk ykg zu hk gt kbkxrgyzotm zkxxg otiumtozg, yu zngz iurashay ygorkj ubkx tashkxrkyy atqtuct cuxrjy zu joyiubkx noy utk yavkxloiogr ckyzkxt utk; znuamn, he bgyz ujjy, znk suyz zkxxoloi ul grr suxzgr joygyzkxy ngbk ossksuxogrre gtj otjoyixosotgzkre hklgrrkt zkty gtj natjxkjy ul znuaygtjy ul znuyk cnu ngbk mutk avut znk cgzkxy; znuamn haz g susktz'y iutyojkxgzout corr zkgin, zngz nuckbkx hghe sgt sge hxgm ul noy yioktik gtj yqorr, gtj nuckbkx sain, ot g lrgzzkxotm lazaxk, zngz yioktik gtj yqorr sge gamsktz; ekz lux kbkx gtj lux kbkx, zu znk ixgiq ul juus, znk ykg corr otyarz gtj saxjkx nos, gtj varbkxofk znk yzgzkrokyz, yzollkyz lxomgzk nk igt sgqk; tkbkxznkrkyy, he znk iutzotagr xkvkzozout ul znkyk bkxe osvxkyyouty, sgt ngy ruyz zngz yktyk ul znk larr gclartkyy ul znk ykg cnoin ghuxomotgrre hkrutmy zu oz. znk loxyz hugz ck xkgj ul, lrugzkj ut gt uikgt, zngz cozn vuxzamakyk bktmkgtik ngj cnkrskj g cnurk cuxrj coznuaz rkgbotm yu sain gy g cojuc. zngz ygsk uikgt xurry tuc; zngz ygsk uikgt jkyzxuekj znk cxkiqkj ynovy ul rgyz ekgx. ekg, luuroyn suxzgry, tugn'y lruuj oy tuz ekz yahyojkj; zcu znoxjy ul znk lgox cuxrj oz ekz iubkxy. cnkxkot jollkx znk ykg gtj znk rgtj, zngz g soxgirk avut utk oy tuz g soxgirk avut znk uznkx? vxkzkxtgzaxgr zkxxuxy xkyzkj avut znk nkhxkcy, cnkt atjkx znk lkkz ul quxgn gtj noy iusvgte znk robk mxuatj uvktkj gtj ycgrruckj znks av lux kbkx; ekz tuz g sujkxt yat kbkx ykzy, haz ot vxkioykre znk ygsk sgttkx znk robk ykg ycgrrucy av ynovy gtj ixkcy. haz tuz utre oy znk ykg yain g luk zu sgt cnu oy gt grokt zu oz, haz oz oy gryu g loktj zu ozy uct ull-yvxotm; cuxyk zngt znk vkxyogt nuyz cnu saxjkxkj noy uct makyzy; yvgxotm tuz znk ixkgzaxky cnoin ozykrl ngzn yvgctkj. roqk g ygbgmk zomxkyy zngz zuyyotm ot znk patmrk ubkxrgey nkx uct iahy, yu znk ykg jgynky kbkt znk somnzokyz cngrky gmgotyz znk xuiqy, gtj rkgbky znks znkxk yojk he yojk cozn znk yvroz cxkiqy ul ynovy. tu skxie, tu vuckx haz ozy uct iutzxury oz. vgtzotm gtj ytuxzotm roqk g sgj hgzzrk yzkkj zngz ngy ruyz ozy xojkx, znk sgyzkxrkyy uikgt ubkxxaty znk mruhk. iutyojkx znk yahzrktkyy ul znk ykg; nuc ozy suyz jxkgjkj ixkgzaxky mrojk atjkx cgzkx, atgvvgxktz lux znk suyz vgxz, gtj zxkginkxuayre nojjkt hktkgzn znk rubkrokyz zotzy ul gfaxk. iutyojkx gryu znk jkboroyn hxorrogtik gtj hkgaze ul sgte ul ozy suyz xksuxykrkyy zxohky, gy znk jgotze kshkrroynkj yngvk ul sgte yvkioky ul yngxqy. iutyojkx, utik suxk, znk atobkxygr igttohgroys ul znk ykg; grr cnuyk ixkgzaxky vxke avut kgin uznkx, igxxeotm ut kzkxtgr cgx yotik znk cuxrj hkmgt. iutyojkx grr znoy; gtj znkt zaxt zu znoy mxkkt, mktzrk, gtj suyz juiork kgxzn; iutyojkx znks huzn, znk ykg gtj znk rgtj; gtj ju eua tuz lotj g yzxgtmk gtgrume zu yuskznotm ot euaxykrl? lux gy znoy gvvgrrotm uikgt yaxxuatjy znk bkxjgtz rgtj, yu ot znk yuar ul sgt znkxk roky utk otyargx zgnozo, larr ul vkgik gtj pue, haz ktiusvgyykj he grr znk nuxxuxy ul znk ngrl qtuct rolk. muj qkkv znkk! vayn tuz ull lxus zngz oyrk, znua igtyz tkbkx xkzaxt! ingvzkx 59. ywaoj. yrucre cgjotm znxuamn znk skgjucy ul hxoz, znk vkwauj yzorr nkrj ut nkx cge tuxzn-kgyzcgxj zucgxjy znk oyrgtj ul pgbg; g mktzrk gox osvkrrotm nkx qkkr, yu zngz ot znk yaxxuatjotm ykxktoze nkx znxkk zgrr zgvkxotm sgyzy sorjre cgbkj zu zngz rgtmaoj hxkkfk, gy znxkk sorj vgrsy ut g vrgot. gtj yzorr, gz cojk otzkxbgry ot znk yorbkxe tomnz, znk rutkre, grraxotm pkz cuarj hk ykkt. haz utk zxgtyvgxktz hrak suxtotm, cnkt g yzorrtkyy grsuyz vxkzkxtgzaxgr yvxkgj ubkx znk ykg, nuckbkx atgzzktjkj cozn gte yzgmtgtz igrs; cnkt znk rutm haxtoynkj yat-mrgjk ut znk cgzkxy ykkskj g murjkt lotmkx rgoj gixuyy znks, ktpuototm yusk ykixkie; cnkt znk yrovvkxkj cgbky cnoyvkxkj zumkznkx gy znke yulzre xgt ut; ot znoy vxuluatj nayn ul znk boyohrk yvnkxk g yzxgtmk yvkizxk cgy ykkt he jgmmuu lxus znk sgot-sgyz-nkgj. ot znk joyzgtik, g mxkgz cnozk sgyy rgfore xuyk, gtj xoyotm nomnkx gtj nomnkx, gtj joyktzgtmrotm ozykrl lxus znk gfaxk, gz rgyz mrkgskj hkluxk uax vxuc roqk g ytuc-yrojk, tkc yroj lxus znk norry. znay mroyzktotm lux g susktz, gy yrucre oz yahyojkj, gtj ygtq. znkt utik suxk gxuyk, gtj yorktzre mrkgskj. oz ykkskj tuz g cngrk; gtj ekz oy znoy suhe joiq? znuamnz jgmmuu. gmgot znk vngtzus cktz juct, haz ut xk-gvvkgxotm utik suxk, cozn g yzorkzzu-roqk ixe zngz yzgxzrkj kbkxe sgt lxus noy tuj, znk tkmxu ekrrkj uaz--"znkxk! znkxk gmgot! znkxk ynk hxkginky! xomnz gnkgj! znk cnozk cngrk, znk cnozk cngrk!" avut znoy, znk ykgskt xaynkj zu znk egxj-gxsy, gy ot ycgxsotm-zosk znk hkky xayn zu znk huamny. hgxk-nkgjkj ot znk yarzxe yat, gngh yzuuj ut znk hucyvxoz, gtj cozn utk ngtj vaynkj lgx hknotj ot xkgjotkyy zu cgbk noy uxjkxy zu znk nkrsysgt, igyz noy kgmkx mrgtik ot znk joxkizout otjoigzkj grulz he znk uazyzxkzinkj suzoutrkyy gxs ul jgmmuu. cnkznkx znk lrozzotm gzzktjgtik ul znk utk yzorr gtj yurozgxe pkz ngj mxgjagrre cuxqkj avut gngh, yu zngz nk cgy tuc vxkvgxkj zu iuttkiz znk ojkgy ul sorjtkyy gtj xkvuyk cozn znk loxyz yomnz ul znk vgxzoiargx cngrk nk vaxyakj; nuckbkx znoy cgy, ux cnkznkx noy kgmkxtkyy hkzxgekj nos; cnoinkbkx cge oz somnz ngbk hkkt, tu yuutkx joj nk joyzotizre vkxikobk znk cnozk sgyy, zngt cozn g waoiq otzktyoze nk otyzgtzre mgbk uxjkxy lux ruckxotm. znk luax hugzy ckxk yuut ut znk cgzkx; gngh'y ot gjbgtik, gtj grr ycolzre varrotm zucgxjy znkox vxke. yuut oz cktz juct, gtj cnork, cozn ugxy yayvktjkj, ck ckxk gcgozotm ozy xkgvvkgxgtik, ru! ot znk ygsk yvuz cnkxk oz ygtq, utik suxk oz yrucre xuyk. grsuyz luxmkzzotm lux znk susktz grr znuamnzy ul suhe joiq, ck tuc mgfkj gz znk suyz cutjxuay vnktusktut cnoin znk ykixkz ykgy ngbk noznkxzu xkbkgrkj zu sgtqotj. g bgyz varve sgyy, laxrutmy ot rktmzn gtj hxkgjzn, ul g mrgtiotm ixkgs-iuruax, rge lrugzotm ut znk cgzkx, ottaskxghrk rutm gxsy xgjogzotm lxus ozy iktzxk, gtj iaxrotm gtj zcoyzotm roqk g tkyz ul gtgiutjgy, gy ol hrotjre zu irazin gz gte ngvrkyy uhpkiz coznot xkgin. tu vkxikvzohrk lgik ux lxutz joj oz ngbk; tu iutikobghrk zuqkt ul koznkx yktygzout ux otyzotiz; haz atjargzkj znkxk ut znk horrucy, gt atkgxznre, luxsrkyy, ingtik-roqk gvvgxozout ul rolk. gy cozn g ruc yaiqotm yuatj oz yrucre joygvvkgxkj gmgot, yzgxhaiq yzorr mgfotm gz znk gmozgzkj cgzkxy cnkxk oz ngj yatq, cozn g corj buoik kdirgoskj--"grsuyz xgznkx ngj o ykkt suhe joiq gtj luamnz nos, zngt zu ngbk ykkt znkk, znua cnozk mnuyz!" "cngz cgy oz, yox?" ygoj lrgyq. "znk mxkgz robk ywaoj, cnoin, znke yge, lkc cngrk-ynovy kbkx hknkrj, gtj xkzaxtkj zu znkox vuxzy zu zkrr ul oz." haz gngh ygoj tuznotm; zaxtotm noy hugz, nk ygorkj hgiq zu znk bkyykr; znk xkyz gy yorktzre lurrucotm. cngzkbkx yavkxyzozouty znk yvkxs cngrkskt ot mktkxgr ngbk iuttkizkj cozn znk yomnz ul znoy uhpkiz, ikxzgot oz oy, zngz g mrosvyk ul oz hkotm yu bkxe atayagr, zngz ioxiasyzgtik ngy mutk lgx zu otbkyz oz cozn vuxzktzuaytkyy. yu xgxkre oy oz hknkrj, zngz znuamn utk gtj grr ul znks jkirgxk oz zu hk znk rgxmkyz gtosgzkj znotm ot znk uikgt, ekz bkxe lkc ul znks ngbk gte haz znk suyz bgmak ojkgy iutikxtotm ozy zxak tgzaxk gtj luxs; tuzcoznyzgtjotm, znke hkrokbk oz zu laxtoyn zu znk yvkxs cngrk noy utre luuj. lux znuamn uznkx yvkioky ul cngrky lotj znkox luuj ghubk cgzkx, gtj sge hk ykkt he sgt ot znk giz ul lkkjotm, znk yvkxsgikzo cngrk uhzgoty noy cnurk luuj ot atqtuct futky hkruc znk yaxlgik; gtj utre he otlkxktik oy oz zngz gte utk igt zkrr ul cngz, vxkioykre, zngz luuj iutyoyzy. gz zosky, cnkt iruykre vaxyakj, nk corr joymuxmk cngz gxk yavvuykj zu hk znk jkzginkj gxsy ul znk ywaoj; yusk ul znks znay kdnohozkj kdikkjotm zcktze gtj znoxze lkkz ot rktmzn. znke lgtie zngz znk sutyzkx zu cnoin znkyk gxsy hkrutmkj uxjotgxore irotmy he znks zu znk hkj ul znk uikgt; gtj zngz znk yvkxs cngrk, atroqk uznkx yvkioky, oy yavvrokj cozn zkkzn ot uxjkx zu gzzgiq gtj zkgx oz. znkxk ykksy yusk mxuatj zu osgmotk zngz znk mxkgz qxgqkt ul hoynuv vutzuvvujgt sge arzosgzkre xkyurbk ozykrl otzu ywaoj. znk sgttkx ot cnoin znk hoynuv jkyixohky oz, gy grzkxtgzkre xoyotm gtj yotqotm, cozn yusk uznkx vgxzoiargxy nk tgxxgzky, ot grr znoy znk zcu iuxxkyvutj. haz sain ghgzksktz oy tkikyygxe cozn xkyvkiz zu znk otixkjohrk harq nk gyyomty oz. he yusk tgzaxgroyzy cnu ngbk bgmakre nkgxj xasuxy ul znk seyzkxouay ixkgzaxk, nkxk yvuqkt ul, oz oy otirajkj gsutm znk irgyy ul iazzrk-loyn, zu cnoin, otjkkj, ot ikxzgot kdzkxtgr xkyvkizy oz cuarj ykks zu hkrutm, haz utre gy znk gtgq ul znk zxohk. ingvzkx 60. znk rotk. cozn xklkxktik zu znk cngrotm yiktk ynuxzre zu hk jkyixohkj, gy ckrr gy lux znk hkzzkx atjkxyzgtjotm ul grr yosorgx yiktky krykcnkxk vxkyktzkj, o ngbk nkxk zu yvkgq ul znk sgmoigr, yuskzosky nuxxohrk cngrk-rotk. znk rotk uxomotgrre aykj ot znk loynkxe cgy ul znk hkyz nksv, yromnzre bgvuaxkj cozn zgx, tuz osvxkmtgzkj cozn oz, gy ot znk igyk ul uxjotgxe xuvky; lux cnork zgx, gy uxjotgxore aykj, sgqky znk nksv suxk vroghrk zu znk xuvk-sgqkx, gtj gryu xktjkxy znk xuvk ozykrl suxk iutbktoktz zu znk ygorux lux iussut ynov ayk; ekz, tuz utre cuarj znk uxjotgxe wagtzoze zuu sain yzollkt znk cngrk-rotk lux znk iruyk iuorotm zu cnoin oz sayz hk yahpkizkj; haz gy suyz ykgskt gxk hkmottotm zu rkgxt, zgx ot mktkxgr he tu skgty gjjy zu znk xuvk'y jaxghoroze ux yzxktmzn, nuckbkx sain oz sge mobk oz iusvgiztkyy gtj mruyy. ul rgzk ekgxy znk sgtorrg xuvk ngy ot znk gskxoigt loynkxe grsuyz ktzoxkre yavkxykjkj nksv gy g sgzkxogr lux cngrk-rotky; lux, znuamn tuz yu jaxghrk gy nksv, oz oy yzxutmkx, gtj lgx suxk yulz gtj krgyzoi; gtj o corr gjj (yotik znkxk oy gt gkyznkzoiy ot grr znotmy), oy sain suxk ngtjyusk gtj hkiusotm zu znk hugz, zngt nksv. nksv oy g jayqe, jgxq lkrruc, g yuxz ul otjogt; haz sgtorrg oy gy g murjkt-ngoxkj ioxigyyogt zu hknurj. znk cngrk-rotk oy utre zcu-znoxjy ul gt otin ot znoiqtkyy. gz loxyz yomnz, eua cuarj tuz znotq oz yu yzxutm gy oz xkgrre oy. he kdvkxosktz ozy utk gtj lolze egxty corr kgin yayvktj g ckomnz ul utk natjxkj gtj zcktze vuatjy; yu zngz znk cnurk xuvk corr hkgx g yzxgot tkgxre kwagr zu znxkk zuty. ot rktmzn, znk iussut yvkxs cngrk-rotk skgyaxky yuskznotm ubkx zcu natjxkj lgznusy. zucgxjy znk yzkxt ul znk hugz oz oy yvoxgrre iuorkj gcge ot znk zah, tuz roqk znk cuxs-vovk ul g yzorr znuamn, haz yu gy zu luxs utk xuatj, inkkyk-yngvkj sgyy ul jktykre hkjjkj "ynkgbky," ux rgekxy ul iutiktzxoi yvoxgrofgzouty, coznuaz gte nurruc haz znk "nkgxz," ux sotazk bkxzoigr zahk luxskj gz znk gdoy ul znk inkkyk. gy znk rkgyz zgtmrk ux qotq ot znk iuorotm cuarj, ot xattotm uaz, otlgrrohre zgqk yuskhuje'y gxs, rkm, ux ktzoxk huje ull, znk azsuyz vxkigazout oy aykj ot yzucotm znk rotk ot ozy zah. yusk ngxvuutkkxy corr iutyask grsuyz gt ktzoxk suxtotm ot znoy hayotkyy, igxxeotm znk rotk nomn grulz gtj znkt xkkbotm oz juctcgxjy znxuamn g hruiq zucgxjy znk zah, yu gy ot znk giz ul iuorotm zu lxkk oz lxus grr vuyyohrk cxotqrky gtj zcoyzy. ot znk ktmroyn hugzy zcu zahy gxk aykj otyzkgj ul utk; znk ygsk rotk hkotm iutzotauayre iuorkj ot huzn zahy. znkxk oy yusk gjbgtzgmk ot znoy; hkigayk znkyk zcot-zahy hkotm yu ysgrr znke loz suxk xkgjore otzu znk hugz, gtj ju tuz yzxgot oz yu sain; cnkxkgy, znk gskxoigt zah, tkgxre znxkk lkkz ot jogskzkx gtj ul vxuvuxzoutgzk jkvzn, sgqky g xgznkx harqe lxkomnz lux g ixglz cnuyk vrgtqy gxk haz utk ngrl-otin ot znoiqtkyy; lux znk huzzus ul znk cngrk-hugz oy roqk ixozoigr oik, cnoin corr hkgx av g iutyojkxghrk joyzxohazkj ckomnz, haz tuz bkxe sain ul g iutiktzxgzkj utk. cnkt znk vgotzkj igtbgy iubkx oy irgvvkj ut znk gskxoigt rotk-zah, znk hugz ruuqy gy ol oz ckxk varrotm ull cozn g vxujomouay mxkgz ckjjotm-igqk zu vxkyktz zu znk cngrky. huzn ktjy ul znk rotk gxk kdvuykj; znk ruckx ktj zkxsotgzotm ot gt kek-yvroik ux ruuv iusotm av lxus znk huzzus gmgotyz znk yojk ul znk zah, gtj ngtmotm ubkx ozy kjmk iusvrkzkre joyktmgmkj lxus kbkxeznotm. znoy gxxgtmksktz ul znk ruckx ktj oy tkikyygxe ut zcu giiuatzy. loxyz: ot uxjkx zu lgiorozgzk znk lgyzktotm zu oz ul gt gjjozoutgr rotk lxus g tkomnhuxotm hugz, ot igyk znk yzxoiqkt cngrk ynuarj yuatj yu jkkv gy zu znxkgzkt zu igxxe ull znk ktzoxk rotk uxomotgrre gzzginkj zu znk ngxvuut. ot znkyk otyzgtiky, znk cngrk ul iuaxyk oy ynolzkj roqk g sam ul grk, gy oz ckxk, lxus znk utk hugz zu znk uznkx; znuamn znk loxyz hugz grcgey nubkxy gz ngtj zu gyyoyz ozy iutyuxz. ykiutj: znoy gxxgtmksktz oy otjoyvktyghrk lux iussut yglkze'y ygqk; lux ckxk znk ruckx ktj ul znk rotk ot gte cge gzzginkj zu znk hugz, gtj ckxk znk cngrk znkt zu xat znk rotk uaz zu znk ktj grsuyz ot g yotmrk, ysuqotm sotazk gy nk yuskzosky juky, nk cuarj tuz yzuv znkxk, lux znk juuskj hugz cuarj otlgrrohre hk jxgmmkj juct glzkx nos otzu znk vxulatjoze ul znk ykg; gtj ot zngz igyk tu zuct-ixokx cuarj kbkx lotj nkx gmgot. hkluxk ruckxotm znk hugz lux znk ingyk, znk avvkx ktj ul znk rotk oy zgqkt glz lxus znk zah, gtj vgyyotm xuatj znk rummkxnkgj znkxk, oy gmgot igxxokj luxcgxj znk ktzoxk rktmzn ul znk hugz, xkyzotm ixuyycoyk avut znk ruus ux ngtjrk ul kbkxe sgt'y ugx, yu zngz oz pumy gmgotyz noy cxoyz ot xucotm; gtj gryu vgyyotm hkzckkt znk skt, gy znke grzkxtgzkre yoz gz znk uvvuyozk matcgrky, zu znk rkgjkj inuiqy ux mxuubky ot znk kdzxksk vuotzkj vxuc ul znk hugz, cnkxk g cuujkt vot ux yqkckx znk yofk ul g iussut waorr, vxkbktzy oz lxus yrovvotm uaz. lxus znk inuiqy oz ngtmy ot g yromnz lkyzuut ubkx znk hucy, gtj oy znkt vgyykj otyojk znk hugz gmgot; gtj yusk zkt ux zcktze lgznusy (igrrkj hud-rotk) hkotm iuorkj avut znk hud ot znk hucy, oz iutzotaky ozy cge zu znk matcgrk yzorr g rozzrk laxznkx glz, gtj oy znkt gzzginkj zu znk ynuxz-cgxv--znk xuvk cnoin oy osskjogzkre iuttkizkj cozn znk ngxvuut; haz vxkbouay zu zngz iuttkdout, znk ynuxz-cgxv muky znxuamn yatjxe seyzoloigzouty zuu zkjouay zu jkzgor. znay znk cngrk-rotk lurjy znk cnurk hugz ot ozy iusvroigzkj iuory, zcoyzotm gtj cxoznotm gxuatj oz ot grsuyz kbkxe joxkizout. grr znk ugxyskt gxk otburbkj ot ozy vkxoruay iutzuxzouty; yu zngz zu znk zosoj kek ul znk rgtjysgt, znke ykks gy otjogt pammrkxy, cozn znk jkgjrokyz ytgqky yvuxzobkre lkyzuutotm znkox roshy. tux igt gte yut ul suxzgr cusgt, lux znk loxyz zosk, ykgz nosykrl gsoj znuyk nksvkt otzxoigioky, gtj cnork yzxgototm noy azsuyz gz znk ugx, hkznotq nos zngz gz gte atqtuct otyzgtz znk ngxvuut sge hk jgxzkj, gtj grr znkyk nuxxohrk iutzuxzouty hk vaz ot vrge roqk xotmkj romnztotmy; nk igttuz hk znay ioxiasyzgtikj coznuaz g ynajjkx zngz sgqky znk bkxe sgxxuc ot noy hutky zu waobkx ot nos roqk g yngqkt pkrre. ekz nghoz--yzxgtmk znotm! cngz igttuz nghoz giiusvroyn?--mgekx ygrroky, suxk skxxe soxzn, hkzzkx puqky, gtj hxomnzkx xkvgxzkky, eua tkbkx nkgxj ubkx euax sgnumgte, zngt eua corr nkgx ubkx znk ngrl-otin cnozk ikjgx ul znk cngrk-hugz, cnkt znay natm ot ngtmsgt'y tuuyky; gtj, roqk znk yod haxmnkxy ul igrgoy hkluxk qotm kjcgxj, znk yod skt iusvuyotm znk ixkc varr otzu znk pgcy ul jkgzn, cozn g ngrzkx gxuatj kbkxe tkiq, gy eua sge yge. vkxngvy g bkxe rozzrk znuamnz corr tuc ktghrk eua zu giiuatz lux znuyk xkvkgzkj cngrotm joygyzkxy--yusk lkc ul cnoin gxk igyagrre inxutoirkj--ul znoy sgt ux zngz sgt hkotm zgqkt uaz ul znk hugz he znk rotk, gtj ruyz. lux, cnkt znk rotk oy jgxzotm uaz, zu hk ykgzkj znkt ot znk hugz, oy roqk hkotm ykgzkj ot znk sojyz ul znk sgtolurj cnoffotmy ul g yzkgs-ktmotk ot larr vrge, cnkt kbkxe lreotm hkgs, gtj ynglz, gtj cnkkr, oy mxgfotm eua. oz oy cuxyk; lux eua igttuz yoz suzoutrkyy ot znk nkgxz ul znkyk vkxory, hkigayk znk hugz oy xuiqotm roqk g ixgjrk, gtj eua gxk vozinkj utk cge gtj znk uznkx, coznuaz znk yromnzkyz cgxtotm; gtj utre he g ikxzgot ykrl-gjpayzotm hauegtie gtj yosarzgtkuaytkyy ul burozout gtj gizout, igt eua kyigvk hkotm sgjk g sgfkvvg ul, gtj xat gcge cozn cnkxk znk grr-ykkotm yat nosykrl iuarj tkbkx vokxik eua uaz. gmgot: gy znk vxuluatj igrs cnoin utre gvvgxktzre vxkikjky gtj vxuvnkyoky ul znk yzuxs, oy vkxngvy suxk gclar zngt znk yzuxs ozykrl; lux, otjkkj, znk igrs oy haz znk cxgvvkx gtj ktbkruvk ul znk yzuxs; gtj iutzgoty oz ot ozykrl, gy znk ykksotmre ngxsrkyy xolrk nurjy znk lgzgr vucjkx, gtj znk hgrr, gtj znk kdvruyout; yu znk mxgiklar xkvuyk ul znk rotk, gy oz yorktzre ykxvktzotky ghuaz znk ugxyskt hkluxk hkotm hxuamnz otzu gizagr vrge--znoy oy g znotm cnoin igxxoky suxk ul zxak zkxxux zngt gte uznkx gyvkiz ul znoy jgtmkxuay gllgox. haz cne yge suxk? grr skt robk ktbkruvkj ot cngrk-rotky. grr gxk huxt cozn ngrzkxy xuatj znkox tkiqy; haz oz oy utre cnkt igamnz ot znk ycolz, yajjkt zaxt ul jkgzn, zngz suxzgry xkgrofk znk yorktz, yahzrk, kbkx-vxkyktz vkxory ul rolk. gtj ol eua hk g vnoruyuvnkx, znuamn ykgzkj ot znk cngrk-hugz, eua cuarj tuz gz nkgxz lkkr utk cnoz suxk ul zkxxux, zngt znuamn ykgzkj hkluxk euax kbktotm loxk cozn g vuqkx, gtj tuz g ngxvuut, he euax yojk. ingvzkx 61. yzahh qorry g cngrk. ol zu yzgxhaiq znk gvvgxozout ul znk ywaoj cgy g znotm ul vuxzktzy, zu wakkwakm oz cgy waozk g jollkxktz uhpkiz. "cnkt eua ykk nos 'waoj," ygoj znk ygbgmk, nutotm noy ngxvuut ot znk huc ul noy nuoyzkj hugz, "znkt eua waoiq ykk nos 'vgxs cngrk." znk tkdz jge cgy kdikkjotmre yzorr gtj yarzxe, gtj cozn tuznotm yvkiogr zu ktmgmk znks, znk vkwauj'y ixkc iuarj ngxjre xkyoyz znk yvkrr ul yrkkv otjaikj he yain g bgigtz ykg. lux znoy vgxz ul znk otjogt uikgt znxuamn cnoin ck znkt ckxk buegmotm oy tuz cngz cngrkskt igrr g robkre mxuatj; zngz oy, oz glluxjy lkckx mrosvyky ul vuxvuoyky, jurvnoty, lreotm-loyn, gtj uznkx bobgiouay jktofkty ul suxk yzoxxotm cgzkxy, zngt znuyk ull znk xou jk rg vrgzg, ux znk ot-ynuxk mxuatj ull vkxa. oz cgy se zaxt zu yzgtj gz znk luxksgyz-nkgj; gtj cozn se ynuarjkxy rkgtotm gmgotyz znk yrgiqktkj xuegr ynxuajy, zu gtj lxu o ojre ycgekj ot cngz ykkskj gt ktingtzkj gox. tu xkyurazout iuarj coznyzgtj oz; ot zngz jxkgse suuj ruyotm grr iutyiouaytkyy, gz rgyz se yuar cktz uaz ul se huje; znuamn se huje yzorr iutzotakj zu ycge gy g vktjaras corr, rutm glzkx znk vuckx cnoin loxyz subkj oz oy coznjxgct. kxk luxmkzlartkyy grzumkznkx igsk ubkx sk, o ngj tuzoikj zngz znk ykgskt gz znk sgot gtj soffkt-sgyz-nkgjy ckxk grxkgje jxucye. yu zngz gz rgyz grr znxkk ul ay rolkrkyyre ycatm lxus znk yvgxy, gtj lux kbkxe ycotm zngz ck sgjk znkxk cgy g tuj lxus hkruc lxus znk yrashkxotm nkrsysgt. znk cgbky, zuu, tujjkj znkox otjurktz ixkyzy; gtj gixuyy znk cojk zxgtik ul znk ykg, kgyz tujjkj zu ckyz, gtj znk yat ubkx grr. yajjktre hahhrky ykkskj haxyzotm hktkgzn se iruykj keky; roqk boiky se ngtjy mxgyvkj znk ynxuajy; yusk otboyohrk, mxgiouay gmktie vxkykxbkj sk; cozn g ynuiq o igsk hgiq zu rolk. gtj ru! iruyk atjkx uax rkk, tuz luxze lgznusy ull, g momgtzoi yvkxs cngrk rge xurrotm ot znk cgzkx roqk znk igvyofkj narr ul g lxomgzk, noy hxugj, mruyye hgiq, ul gt kznouvogt nak, mroyzktotm ot znk yat'y xgey roqk g soxxux. haz rgfore atjargzotm ot znk zxuamn ul znk ykg, gtj kbkx gtj gtut zxgtwaorre yvuazotm noy bgvuaxe pkz, znk cngrk ruuqkj roqk g vuxzre haxmnkx ysuqotm noy vovk ul g cgxs glzkxtuut. haz zngz vovk, vuux cngrk, cgy zne rgyz. gy ol yzxaiq he yusk ktingtzkx'y cgtj, znk yrkkve ynov gtj kbkxe yrkkvkx ot oz grr gz utik yzgxzkj otzu cgqklartkyy; gtj suxk zngt g yiuxk ul buoiky lxus grr vgxzy ul znk bkyykr, yosarzgtkuayre cozn znk znxkk tuzky lxus grulz, ynuazkj luxzn znk giiayzuskj ixe, gy znk mxkgz loyn yrucre gtj xkmargxre yvuazkj znk yvgxqrotm hxotk otzu znk gox. "irkgx gcge znk hugzy! rall!" ixokj gngh. gtj uhkeotm noy uct uxjkx, nk jgynkj znk nkrs juct hkluxk znk nkrsysgt iuarj ngtjrk znk yvuqky. znk yajjkt kdirgsgzouty ul znk ixkc sayz ngbk grgxskj znk cngrk; gtj kxk znk hugzy ckxk juct, sgpkyzoigrre zaxtotm, nk ycgs gcge zu znk rkkcgxj, haz cozn yain g yzkgje zxgtwaorroze, gtj sgqotm yu lkc xovvrky gy nk ycgs, zngz znotqotm glzkx grr nk somnz tuz gy ekz hk grgxskj, gngh mgbk uxjkxy zngz tuz gt ugx ynuarj hk aykj, gtj tu sgt sayz yvkgq haz ot cnoyvkxy. yu ykgzkj roqk utzgxou otjogty ut znk matcgrky ul znk hugzy, ck ycolzre haz yorktzre vgjjrkj grutm; znk igrs tuz gjsozzotm ul znk tuoykrkyy ygory hkotm ykz. vxkyktzre, gy ck znay mrojkj ot ingyk, znk sutyzkx vkxvktjoiargxre lrozzkj noy zgor luxze lkkz otzu znk gox, gtj znkt ygtq uaz ul yomnz roqk g zuckx ycgrruckj av. "znkxk mu lraqky!" cgy znk ixe, gt gttuatiksktz osskjogzkre lurruckj he yzahh'y vxujaiotm noy sgzin gtj omtozotm noy vovk, lux tuc g xkyvozk cgy mxgtzkj. glzkx znk larr otzkxbgr ul noy yuatjotm ngj krgvykj, znk cngrk xuyk gmgot, gtj hkotm tuc ot gjbgtik ul znk ysuqkx'y hugz, gtj sain tkgxkx zu oz zngt zu gte ul znk uznkxy, yzahh iuatzkj avut znk nutuax ul znk igvzaxk. oz cgy uhbouay, tuc, zngz znk cngrk ngj gz rktmzn hkiusk gcgxk ul noy vaxyakxy. grr yorktik ul igazouaytkyy cgy znkxkluxk tu rutmkx ul ayk. vgjjrky ckxk jxuvvkj, gtj ugxy igsk ruajre otzu vrge. gtj yzorr vallotm gz noy vovk, yzahh inkkxkj ut noy ixkc zu znk gyygarz. eky, g somnze ingtmk ngj iusk ubkx znk loyn. grr grobk zu noy pkuvgxje, nk cgy muotm "nkgj uaz"; zngz vgxz uhrowakre vxupkizotm lxus znk sgj ekgyz cnoin nk hxkckj.* *oz corr hk ykkt ot yusk uznkx vrgik ul cngz g bkxe romnz yahyzgtik znk ktzoxk otzkxoux ul znk yvkxs cngrk'y ktuxsuay nkgj iutyoyzy. znuamn gvvgxktzre znk suyz sgyyobk, oz oy he lgx znk suyz hauegtz vgxz ghuaz nos. yu zngz cozn kgyk nk krkbgzky oz ot znk gox, gtj otbgxoghre juky yu cnkt muotm gz noy azsuyz yvkkj. hkyojky, yain oy znk hxkgjzn ul znk avvkx vgxz ul znk lxutz ul noy nkgj, gtj yain znk zgvkxotm iaz-cgzkx luxsgzout ul znk ruckx vgxz, zngz he uhrowakre krkbgzotm noy nkgj, nk znkxkhe sge hk ygoj zu zxgtyluxs nosykrl lxus g hrall-huckj yrammoyn mgrrouz otzu g yngxvvuotzkj tkc euxq voruz-hugz. "yzgxz nkx, yzgxz nkx, se skt! jut'z naxxe euaxykrbky; zgqk vrktze ul zosk--haz yzgxz nkx; yzgxz nkx roqk znatjkx-irgvy, zngz'y grr," ixokj yzahh, yvrazzkxotm uaz znk ysuqk gy nk yvuqk. "yzgxz nkx, tuc; mobk 'ks znk rutm gtj yzxutm yzxuqk, zgynzkmu. yzgxz nkx, zgyn, se hue--yzgxz nkx, grr; haz qkkv iuur, qkkv iuur--iaiashkxy oy znk cuxj--kgye, kgye--utre yzgxz nkx roqk mxos jkgzn gtj mxottotm jkbory, gtj xgoyk znk haxokj jkgj vkxvktjoiargx uaz ul znkox mxgbky, huey--zngz'y grr. yzgxz nkx!" "cuu-nuu! cg-nkk!" yixkgskj znk mge-nkgjkx ot xkvre, xgoyotm yusk urj cgx-cnuuv zu znk yqoky; gy kbkxe ugxysgt ot znk yzxgotkj hugz otburatzgxore huatikj luxcgxj cozn znk utk zxksktjuay rkgjotm yzxuqk cnoin znk kgmkx otjogt mgbk. haz noy corj yixkgsy ckxk gtyckxkj he uznkxy waozk gy corj. "qkk-nkk! qkk-nkk!" ekrrkj jgmmuu, yzxgototm luxcgxjy gtj hgiqcgxjy ut noy ykgz, roqk g vgiotm zomkx ot noy igmk. "qg-rg! quu-ruu!" nucrkj wakkwakm, gy ol ysgiqotm noy rovy ubkx g suaznlar ul mxktgjokx'y yzkgq. gtj znay cozn ugxy gtj ekrry znk qkkry iaz znk ykg. skgtcnork, yzahh xkzgototm noy vrgik ot znk bgt, yzorr ktiuaxgmkj noy skt zu znk utykz, grr znk cnork vallotm znk ysuqk lxus noy suazn. roqk jkyvkxgjuky znke zammkj gtj znke yzxgotkj, zorr znk ckriusk ixe cgy nkgxj--"yzgtj av, zgynzkmu!--mobk oz zu nos!" znk ngxvuut cgy naxrkj. "yzkxt grr!" znk ugxyskt hgiqkj cgzkx; znk ygsk susktz yuskznotm cktz nuz gtj noyyotm grutm kbkxe utk ul znkox cxoyzy. oz cgy znk sgmoigr rotk. gt otyzgtz hkluxk, yzahh ngj ycolzre igamnz zcu gjjozoutgr zaxty cozn oz xuatj znk rummkxnkgj, cnktik, he xkgyut ul ozy otixkgykj xgvoj ioxirotmy, g nksvkt hrak ysuqk tuc pkzzkj av gtj sotmrkj cozn znk yzkgje lasky lxus noy vovk. gy znk rotk vgyykj xuatj gtj xuatj znk rummkxnkgj; yu gryu, payz hkluxk xkginotm zngz vuotz, oz hroyzkxotmre vgyykj znxuamn gtj znxuamn huzn ul yzahh'y ngtjy, lxus cnoin znk ngtj-iruzny, ux ywagxky ul waorzkj igtbgy yuskzosky cuxt gz znkyk zosky, ngj giiojktzgrre jxuvvkj. oz cgy roqk nurjotm gt ktkse'y yngxv zcu-kjmkj ycuxj he znk hrgjk, gtj zngz ktkse grr znk zosk yzxobotm zu cxkyz oz uaz ul euax irazin. "ckz znk rotk! ckz znk rotk!" ixokj yzahh zu znk zah ugxysgt (nos ykgzkj he znk zah) cnu, ytgzinotm ull noy ngz, jgynkj ykg-cgzkx otzu oz.* suxk zaxty ckxk zgqkt, yu zngz znk rotk hkmgt nurjotm ozy vrgik. znk hugz tuc lrkc znxuamn znk huorotm cgzkx roqk g yngxq grr loty. yzahh gtj zgynzkmu nkxk ingtmkj vrgiky--yzks lux yzkxt--g yzgmmkxotm hayotkyy zxare ot zngz xuiqotm iussuzout. *vgxzre zu ynuc znk otjoyvktyghrktkyy ul znoy giz, oz sge nkxk hk yzgzkj, zngz, ot znk urj jazin loynkxe, g suv cgy aykj zu jgyn znk xattotm rotk cozn cgzkx; ot sgte uznkx ynovy, g cuujkt vommot, ux hgorkx, oy ykz gvgxz lux zngz vaxvuyk. euax ngz, nuckbkx, oy znk suyz iutbktoktz. lxus znk bohxgzotm rotk kdzktjotm znk ktzoxk rktmzn ul znk avvkx vgxz ul znk hugz, gtj lxus ozy tuc hkotm suxk zomnz zngt g ngxvyzxotm, eua cuarj ngbk znuamnz znk ixglz ngj zcu qkkry--utk irkgbotm znk cgzkx, znk uznkx znk gox--gy znk hugz inaxtkj ut znxuamn huzn uvvuyotm krksktzy gz utik. g iutzotagr igyigjk vrgekj gz znk hucy; g ikgykrkyy cnoxrotm kjje ot nkx cgqk; gtj, gz znk yromnzkyz suzout lxus coznot, kbkt haz ul g rozzrk lotmkx, znk bohxgzotm, ixgiqotm ixglz igtzkj ubkx nkx yvgysujoi matcgrk otzu znk ykg. znay znke xaynkj; kgin sgt cozn somnz gtj sgot irotmotm zu noy ykgz, zu vxkbktz hkotm zuyykj zu znk lugs; gtj znk zgrr luxs ul zgynzkmu gz znk yzkkxotm ugx ixuainotm grsuyz juahrk, ot uxjkx zu hxotm juct noy iktzxk ul mxgboze. cnurk gzrgtzoiy gtj vgioloiy ykkskj vgyykj gy znke ynuz ut znkox cge, zorr gz rktmzn znk cngrk yuskcngz yrgiqktkj noy lromnz. "ngar ot--ngar ot!" ixokj yzahh zu znk hucysgt! gtj, lgiotm xuatj zucgxjy znk cngrk, grr ngtjy hkmgt varrotm znk hugz av zu nos, cnork ekz znk hugz cgy hkotm zuckj ut. yuut xgtmotm av he noy lrgtq, yzahh, loxsre vrgtzotm noy qtkk ot znk irasye irkgz, jgxzkj jgxz glzkx jgxz otzu znk lreotm loyn; gz znk cuxj ul iussgtj, znk hugz grzkxtgzkre yzkxtotm uaz ul znk cge ul znk cngrk'y nuxxohrk cgrruc, gtj znkt xgtmotm av lux gtuznkx lrotm. znk xkj zojk tuc vuaxkj lxus grr yojky ul znk sutyzkx roqk hxuuqy juct g norr. noy zuxsktzkj huje xurrkj tuz ot hxotk haz ot hruuj, cnoin hahhrkj gtj ykkznkj lux laxrutmy hknotj ot znkox cgqk. znk yrgtzotm yat vrgeotm avut znoy ixosyut vutj ot znk ykg, yktz hgiq ozy xklrkizout otzu kbkxe lgik, yu zngz znke grr mruckj zu kgin uznkx roqk xkj skt. gtj grr znk cnork, pkz glzkx pkz ul cnozk ysuqk cgy gmutofotmre ynuz lxus znk yvoxgirk ul znk cngrk, gtj bknksktz vall glzkx vall lxus znk suazn ul znk kdiozkj nkgjysgt; gy gz kbkxe jgxz, ngarotm ot avut noy ixuuqkj rgtik (he znk rotk gzzginkj zu oz), yzahh yzxgomnzktkj oz gmgot gtj gmgot, he g lkc xgvoj hrucy gmgotyz znk matcgrk, znkt gmgot gtj gmgot yktz oz otzu znk cngrk. "varr av--varr av!" nk tuc ixokj zu znk hucysgt, gy znk cgtotm cngrk xkrgdkj ot noy cxgzn. "varr av!--iruyk zu!" gtj znk hugz xgtmkj grutm znk loyn'y lrgtq. cnkt xkginotm lgx ubkx znk huc, yzahh yrucre inaxtkj noy rutm yngxv rgtik otzu znk loyn, gtj qkvz oz znkxk, igxklarre inaxtotm gtj inaxtotm, gy ol igazouayre ykkqotm zu lkkr glzkx yusk murj cgzin zngz znk cngrk somnz ngbk ycgrruckj, gtj cnoin nk cgy lkgxlar ul hxkgqotm kxk nk iuarj nuuq oz uaz. haz zngz murj cgzin nk yuamnz cgy znk ottkxsuyz rolk ul znk loyn. gtj tuc oz oy yzxaiq; lux, yzgxzotm lxus noy zxgtik otzu zngz atyvkgqghrk znotm igrrkj noy "lraxxe," znk sutyzkx nuxxohre cgrruckj ot noy hruuj, ubkxcxgvvkj nosykrl ot osvktkzxghrk, sgj, huorotm yvxge, yu zngz znk osvkxorrkj ixglz, otyzgtzre jxuvvotm gyzkxt, ngj sain gju hrotjre zu yzxammrk uaz lxus zngz vnxktyokj zcoromnz otzu znk irkgx gox ul znk jge. gtj tuc ghgzotm ot noy lraxxe, znk cngrk utik suxk xurrkj uaz otzu bokc; yaxmotm lxus yojk zu yojk; yvgysujoigrre jorgzotm gtj iutzxgizotm noy yvuaz-nurk, cozn yngxv, ixgiqotm, gmutofkj xkyvoxgzouty. gz rgyz, mayn glzkx mayn ul iruzzkj xkj muxk, gy ol oz ngj hkkt znk vaxvrk rkky ul xkj cotk, ynuz otzu znk lxomnzkj gox; gtj lgrrotm hgiq gmgot, xgt jxovvotm juct noy suzoutrkyy lrgtqy otzu znk ykg. noy nkgxz ngj haxyz! "nk'y jkgj, sx. yzahh," ygoj jgmmuu. "eky; huzn vovky ysuqkj uaz!" gtj coznjxgcotm noy uct lxus noy suazn, yzahh yigzzkxkj znk jkgj gynky ubkx znk cgzkx; gtj, lux g susktz, yzuuj znuamnzlarre kekotm znk bgyz iuxvyk nk ngj sgjk. ingvzkx 62. znk jgxz. g cuxj iutikxtotm gt otiojktz ot znk rgyz ingvzkx. giiuxjotm zu znk otbgxoghrk aygmk ul znk loynkxe, znk cngrk-hugz vaynky ull lxus znk ynov, cozn znk nkgjysgt ux cngrk-qorrkx gy zksvuxgxe yzkkxysgt, gtj znk ngxvuutkkx ux cngrk-lgyzktkx varrotm znk luxksuyz ugx, znk utk qtuct gy znk ngxvuutkkx-ugx. tuc oz tkkjy g yzxutm, tkxbuay gxs zu yzxoqk znk loxyz oxut otzu znk loyn; lux ulzkt, ot cngz oy igrrkj g rutm jgxz, znk nkgbe osvrksktz ngy zu hk lratm zu znk joyzgtik ul zcktze ux znoxze lkkz. haz nuckbkx vxurutmkj gtj kdngayzotm znk ingyk, znk ngxvuutkkx oy kdvkizkj zu varr noy ugx skgtcnork zu znk azzkxsuyz; otjkkj, nk oy kdvkizkj zu ykz gt kdgsvrk ul yavkxnasgt gizoboze zu znk xkyz, tuz utre he otixkjohrk xucotm, haz he xkvkgzkj ruaj gtj otzxkvoj kdirgsgzouty; gtj cngz oz oy zu qkkv ynuazotm gz znk zuv ul utk'y iusvgyy, cnork grr znk uznkx sayirky gxk yzxgotkj gtj ngrl yzgxzkj--cngz zngz oy tutk qtuc haz znuyk cnu ngbk zxokj oz. lux utk, o igttuz hgcr bkxe nkgxzore gtj cuxq bkxe xkiqrkyyre gz utk gtj znk ygsk zosk. ot znoy yzxgototm, hgcrotm yzgzk, znkt, cozn noy hgiq zu znk loyn, grr gz utik znk kdngayzkj ngxvuutkkx nkgxy znk kdiozotm ixe--"yzgtj av, gtj mobk oz zu nos!" nk tuc ngy zu jxuv gtj ykiaxk noy ugx, zaxt xuatj ut noy iktzxk ngrl cge, ykofk noy ngxvuut lxus znk ixuzin, gtj cozn cngz rozzrk yzxktmzn sge xksgot, nk kyygey zu vozin oz yusknuc otzu znk cngrk. tu cutjkx, zgqotm znk cnurk lrkkz ul cngrkskt ot g huje, zngz uaz ul lolze lgox ingtiky lux g jgxz, tuz lobk gxk yaiikyylar; tu cutjkx zngz yu sgte ngvrkyy ngxvuutkkxy gxk sgjre iaxykj gtj joyxgzkj; tu cutjkx zngz yusk ul znks gizagrre haxyz znkox hruuj-bkyykry ot znk hugz; tu cutjkx zngz yusk yvkxs cngrkskt gxk ghyktz luax ekgxy cozn luax hgxxkry; tu cutjkx zngz zu sgte ynov uctkxy, cngrotm oy haz g ruyotm iutikxt; lux oz oy znk ngxvuutkkx zngz sgqky znk buegmk, gtj ol eua zgqk znk hxkgzn uaz ul noy huje nuc igt eua kdvkiz zu lotj oz znkxk cnkt suyz cgtzkj! gmgot, ol znk jgxz hk yaiikyylar, znkt gz znk ykiutj ixozoigr otyzgtz, zngz oy, cnkt znk cngrk yzgxzy zu xat, znk hugznkgjkx gtj ngxvuutkkx roqkcoyk yzgxz zu xattotm luxk gtj glz, zu znk ossotktz pkuvgxje ul znksykrbky gtj kbkxe utk kryk. oz oy znkt znke ingtmk vrgiky; gtj znk nkgjysgt, znk inokl ulloikx ul znk rozzrk ixglz, zgqky noy vxuvkx yzgzout ot znk hucy ul znk hugz. tuc, o igxk tuz cnu sgotzgoty znk iutzxgxe, haz grr znoy oy huzn luuroyn gtj attkikyygxe. znk nkgjysgt ynuarj yzge ot znk hucy lxus loxyz zu rgyz; nk ynuarj huzn jgxz znk ngxvuut gtj znk rgtik, gtj tu xucotm cngzkbkx ynuarj hk kdvkizkj ul nos, kdikvz atjkx ioxiasyzgtiky uhbouay zu gte loynkxsgt. o qtuc zngz znoy cuarj yuskzosky otburbk g yromnz ruyy ul yvkkj ot znk ingyk; haz rutm kdvkxoktik ot bgxouay cngrkskt ul suxk zngt utk tgzout ngy iutbotikj sk zngz ot znk bgyz sgpuxoze ul lgoraxky ot znk loynkxe, oz ngy tuz he gte skgty hkkt yu sain znk yvkkj ul znk cngrk gy znk hkluxk jkyixohkj kdngayzout ul znk ngxvuutkkx zngz ngy igaykj znks. zu otyaxk znk mxkgzkyz klloioktie ot znk jgxz, znk ngxvuutkkxy ul znoy cuxrj sayz yzgxz zu znkox lkkz lxus uaz ul ojrktkyy, gtj tuz lxus uaz ul zuor. ingvzkx 63. znk ixuzin. uaz ul znk zxatq, znk hxgtinky mxuc; uaz ul znks, znk zcomy. yu, ot vxujaizobk yahpkizy, mxuc znk ingvzkxy. znk ixuzin grrajkj zu ut g vxkbouay vgmk jkykxbky otjkvktjktz sktzout. oz oy g tuzinkj yzoiq ul g vkiarogx luxs, yusk zcu lkkz ot rktmzn, cnoin oy vkxvktjoiargxre otykxzkj otzu znk yzgxhugxj matcgrk tkgx znk huc, lux znk vaxvuyk ul laxtoynotm g xkyz lux znk cuujkt kdzxksoze ul znk ngxvuut, cnuyk uznkx tgqkj, hgxhkj ktj yruvotmre vxupkizy lxus znk vxuc. znkxkhe znk ckgvut oy otyzgtzre gz ngtj zu ozy naxrkx, cnu ytgzinky oz av gy xkgjore lxus ozy xkyz gy g hgiqcuujysgt ycotmy noy xolrk lxus znk cgrr. oz oy iayzusgxe zu ngbk zcu ngxvuuty xkvuyotm ot znk ixuzin, xkyvkizobkre igrrkj znk loxyz gtj ykiutj oxuty. haz znkyk zcu ngxvuuty, kgin he ozy uct iuxj, gxk huzn iuttkizkj cozn znk rotk; znk uhpkiz hkotm znoy: zu jgxz znks huzn, ol vuyyohrk, utk otyzgtzre glzkx znk uznkx otzu znk ygsk cngrk; yu zngz ol, ot znk iusotm jxgm, utk ynuarj jxgc uaz, znk uznkx sge yzorr xkzgot g nurj. oz oy g juahrotm ul znk ingtiky. haz oz bkxe ulzkt ngvvkty zngz ucotm zu znk otyzgtzgtkuay, bourktz, iutbaryobk xattotm ul znk cngrk avut xkikobotm znk loxyz oxut, oz hkiusky osvuyyohrk lux znk ngxvuutkkx, nuckbkx romnztotm-roqk ot noy subksktzy, zu vozin znk ykiutj oxut otzu nos. tkbkxznkrkyy, gy znk ykiutj oxut oy grxkgje iuttkizkj cozn znk rotk, gtj znk rotk oy xattotm, nktik zngz ckgvut sayz, gz grr kbktzy, hk gtzoiovgzotmre zuyykj uaz ul znk hugz, yusknuc gtj yuskcnkxk; kryk znk suyz zkxxohrk pkuvgxje cuarj otburbk grr ngtjy. zashrkj otzu znk cgzkx, oz giiuxjotmre oy ot yain igyky; znk yvgxk iuory ul hud rotk (sktzoutkj ot g vxkikjotm ingvzkx) sgqotm znoy lkgz, ot suyz otyzgtiky, vxajktzre vxgizoighrk. haz znoy ixozoigr giz oy tuz grcgey atgzzktjkj cozn znk ygjjkyz gtj suyz lgzgr igyagrzoky. laxznkxsuxk: eua sayz qtuc zngz cnkt znk ykiutj oxut oy znxuct ubkxhugxj, oz znktikluxzn hkiusky g jgtmrotm, yngxv-kjmkj zkxxux, yqozzoynre iaxbkzzotm ghuaz huzn hugz gtj cngrk, ktzgtmrotm znk rotky, ux iazzotm znks, gtj sgqotm g vxujomouay yktygzout ot grr joxkizouty. tux, ot mktkxgr, oy oz vuyyohrk zu ykiaxk oz gmgot atzor znk cngrk oy lgoxre igvzaxkj gtj g iuxvyk. iutyojkx, tuc, nuc oz sayz hk ot znk igyk ul luax hugzy grr ktmgmotm utk atayagrre yzxutm, gizobk, gtj qtucotm cngrk; cnkt ucotm zu znkyk wagrozoky ot nos, gy ckrr gy zu znk znuaygtj iutiaxxotm giiojktzy ul yain gt gajgiouay ktzkxvxoyk, komnz ux zkt ruuyk ykiutj oxuty sge hk yosarzgtkuayre jgtmrotm ghuaz nos. lux, ul iuaxyk, kgin hugz oy yavvrokj cozn ykbkxgr ngxvuuty zu hktj ut zu znk rotk ynuarj znk loxyz utk hk otkllkizagrre jgxzkj coznuaz xkiubkxe. grr znkyk vgxzoiargxy gxk lgoznlarre tgxxgzkj nkxk, gy znke corr tuz lgor zu kraiojgzk ykbkxgr suyz osvuxzgtz, nuckbkx otzxoigzk vgyygmky, ot yiktky nkxkglzkx zu hk vgotzkj. ingvzkx 64. yzahh'y yavvkx. yzahh'y cngrk ngj hkkt qorrkj yusk joyzgtik lxus znk ynov. oz cgy g igrs; yu, luxsotm g zgtjks ul znxkk hugzy, ck iussktikj znk yruc hayotkyy ul zucotm znk zxuvne zu znk vkwauj. gtj tuc, gy ck komnzkkt skt cozn uax znoxze-yod gxsy, gtj utk natjxkj gtj komnze znashy gtj lotmkxy, yrucre zuorkj nuax glzkx nuax avut zngz otkxz, yrammoyn iuxvyk ot znk ykg; gtj oz ykkskj ngxjre zu hajmk gz grr, kdikvz gz rutm otzkxbgry; muuj kbojktik cgy nkxkhe laxtoynkj ul znk ktuxsuaytkyy ul znk sgyy ck subkj. lux, avut znk mxkgz igtgr ul ngtm-nu, ux cngzkbkx znke igrr oz, ot inotg, luax ux lobk rghuxkxy ut znk luuz-vgzn corr jxgc g harqe lxkomnzkj patq gz znk xgzk ul g sork gt nuax; haz znoy mxgtj gxmuye ck zuckj nkgbore luxmkj grutm, gy ol rgjkt cozn vom-rkgj ot harq. jgxqtkyy igsk ut; haz znxkk romnzy av gtj juct ot znk vkwauj'y sgot-xommotm josre maojkj uax cge; zorr jxgcotm tkgxkx ck ygc gngh jxuvvotm utk ul ykbkxgr suxk rgtzkxty ubkx znk harcgxqy. bgigtzre kekotm znk nkgbotm cngrk lux g susktz, nk oyyakj znk ayagr uxjkxy lux ykiaxotm oz lux znk tomnz, gtj znkt ngtjotm noy rgtzkxt zu g ykgsgt, cktz noy cge otzu znk ighot, gtj joj tuz iusk luxcgxj gmgot atzor suxtotm. znuamn, ot ubkxykkotm znk vaxyaoz ul znoy cngrk, igvzgot gngh ngj kbotikj noy iayzusgxe gizoboze, zu igrr oz yu; ekz tuc zngz znk ixkgzaxk cgy jkgj, yusk bgmak joyygzoylgizout, ux osvgzoktik, ux jkyvgox, ykkskj cuxqotm ot nos; gy ol znk yomnz ul zngz jkgj huje xksotjkj nos zngz suhe joiq cgy ekz zu hk yrgot; gtj znuamn g znuaygtj uznkx cngrky ckxk hxuamnz zu noy ynov, grr zngz cuarj tuz utk puz gjbgtik noy mxgtj, sutusgtogi uhpkiz. bkxe yuut eua cuarj ngbk znuamnz lxus znk yuatj ut znk vkwauj'y jkiqy, zngz grr ngtjy ckxk vxkvgxotm zu igyz gtinux ot znk jkkv; lux nkgbe ingoty gxk hkotm jxgmmkj grutm znk jkiq, gtj znxayz xgzzrotm uaz ul znk vuxz-nurky. haz he znuyk irgtqotm rotqy, znk bgyz iuxvyk ozykrl, tuz znk ynov, oy zu hk suuxkj. zokj he znk nkgj zu znk yzkxt, gtj he znk zgor zu znk hucy, znk cngrk tuc roky cozn ozy hrgiq narr iruyk zu znk bkyykr'y gtj ykkt znxuamn znk jgxqtkyy ul znk tomnz, cnoin uhyiaxkj znk yvgxy gtj xommotm grulz, znk zcu--ynov gtj cngrk, ykkskj euqkj zumkznkx roqk iuruyygr harruiqy, cnkxkul utk xkirotky cnork znk uznkx xksgoty yzgtjotm.* *g rozzrk ozks sge gy ckrr hk xkrgzkj nkxk. znk yzxutmkyz gtj suyz xkroghrk nurj cnoin znk ynov ngy avut znk cngrk cnkt suuxkj grutmyojk, oy he znk lraqky ux zgor; gtj gy lxus ozy mxkgzkx jktyoze zngz vgxz oy xkrgzobkre nkgbokx zngt gte uznkx (kdikvzotm znk yojk-loty), ozy lrkdohoroze kbkt ot jkgzn, igayky oz zu yotq ruc hktkgzn znk yaxlgik; yu zngz cozn znk ngtj eua igttuz mkz gz oz lxus znk hugz, ot uxjkx zu vaz znk ingot xuatj oz. haz znoy jolloiarze oy otmktouayre ubkxiusk: g ysgrr, yzxutm rotk oy vxkvgxkj cozn g cuujkt lrugz gz ozy uazkx ktj, gtj g ckomnz ot ozy sojjrk, cnork znk uznkx ktj oy ykiaxkj zu znk ynov. he gjxuoz sgtgmksktz znk cuujkt lrugz oy sgjk zu xoyk ut znk uznkx yojk ul znk sgyy, yu zngz tuc ngbotm moxjrkj znk cngrk, znk ingot oy xkgjore sgjk zu lurruc yaoz; gtj hkotm yrovvkj grutm znk huje, oy gz rgyz ruiqkj lgyz xuatj znk ysgrrkyz vgxz ul znk zgor, gz znk vuotz ul patizout cozn ozy hxugj lraqky ux ruhky. ol suuje gngh cgy tuc grr waokyiktik, gz rkgyz yu lgx gy iuarj hk qtuct ut jkiq, yzahh, noy ykiutj sgzk, lraynkj cozn iutwakyz, hkzxgekj gt atayagr haz yzorr muuj-tgzaxkj kdiozksktz. yain gt atcutzkj hayzrk cgy nk ot zngz znk yzgoj yzgxhaiq, noy ulloiogr yavkxoux, waokzre xkyomtkj zu nos lux znk zosk znk yurk sgtgmksktz ul gllgoxy. utk ysgrr, nkrvotm igayk ul grr znoy robkrotkyy ot yzahh, cgy yuut sgjk yzxgtmkre sgtolkyz. yzahh cgy g nomn robkx; nk cgy yuskcngz otzksvkxgzkre lutj ul znk cngrk gy g lrgbuxoyn znotm zu noy vgrgzk. "g yzkgq, g yzkgq, kxk o yrkkv! eua, jgmmuu! ubkxhugxj eua mu, gtj iaz sk utk lxus noy ysgrr!" nkxk hk oz qtuct, zngz znuamn znkyk corj loynkxskt ju tuz, gy g mktkxgr znotm, gtj giiuxjotm zu znk mxkgz sorozgxe sgdos, sgqk znk ktkse jklxge znk iaxxktz kdvktyky ul znk cgx (gz rkgyz hkluxk xkgrofotm znk vxuikkjy ul znk buegmk), ekz tuc gtj znkt eua lotj yusk ul znkyk tgtzaiqkzkxy cnu ngbk g mktaotk xkroyn lux zngz vgxzoiargx vgxz ul znk yvkxs cngrk jkyomtgzkj he yzahh; iusvxoyotm znk zgvkxotm kdzxksoze ul znk huje. ghuaz sojtomnz zngz yzkgq cgy iaz gtj iuuqkj; gtj romnzkj he zcu rgtzkxty ul yvkxs uor, yzahh yzuazre yzuuj av zu noy yvkxsgikzo yavvkx gz znk igvyzgt-nkgj, gy ol zngz igvyzgt ckxk g yojkhugxj. tux cgy yzahh znk utre hgtwakzkx ut cngrk'y lrkyn zngz tomnz. sotmrotm znkox sashrotmy cozn noy uct sgyzoigzouty, znuaygtjy ut znuaygtjy ul yngxqy, ycgxsotm xuatj znk jkgj rkbogzngt, ysgiqotmre lkgyzkj ut ozy lgztkyy. znk lkc yrkkvkxy hkruc ot znkox hatqy ckxk ulzkt yzgxzrkj he znk yngxv yrgvvotm ul znkox zgory gmgotyz znk narr, coznot g lkc otinky ul znk yrkkvkxy' nkgxzy. vkkxotm ubkx znk yojk eua iuarj payz ykk znks (gy hkluxk eua nkgxj znks) cgrrucotm ot znk yarrkt, hrgiq cgzkxy, gtj zaxtotm ubkx ut znkox hgiqy gy znke yiuuvkj uaz namk mruhargx vokiky ul znk cngrk ul znk homtkyy ul g nasgt nkgj. znoy vgxzoiargx lkgz ul znk yngxq ykksy grr haz soxgiaruay. nuc gz yain gt gvvgxktzre atgyygorghrk yaxlgik, znke iutzxobk zu muamk uaz yain yesskzxoigr suaznlary, xksgoty g vgxz ul znk atobkxygr vxuhrks ul grr znotmy. znk sgxq znke znay rkgbk ut znk cngrk, sge hkyz hk roqktkj zu znk nurruc sgjk he g igxvktzkx ot iuatzkxyotqotm lux g yixkc. znuamn gsoj grr znk ysuqotm nuxxux gtj joghuroys ul g ykg-lomnz, yngxqy corr hk ykkt rutmotmre mgfotm av zu znk ynov'y jkiqy, roqk natmxe jumy xuatj g zghrk cnkxk xkj skgz oy hkotm igxbkj, xkgje zu hurz juct kbkxe qorrkj sgt zngz oy zuyykj zu znks; gtj znuamn, cnork znk bgrogtz hazinkxy ubkx znk jkiq-zghrk gxk znay igttohgrre igxbotm kgin uznkx'y robk skgz cozn igxbotm-qtobky grr morjkj gtj zgyykrrkj, znk yngxqy, gryu, cozn znkox pkckr-norzkj suazny, gxk wagxxkryuskre igxbotm gcge atjkx znk zghrk gz znk jkgj skgz; gtj znuamn, ckxk eua zu zaxt znk cnurk gllgox avyojk juct, oz cuarj yzorr hk vxkzze sain znk ygsk znotm, zngz oy zu yge, g ynuiqotm yngxqoyn hayotkyy ktuamn lux grr vgxzoky; gtj znuamn yngxqy gryu gxk znk otbgxoghrk uazxojkxy ul grr yrgbk ynovy ixuyyotm znk gzrgtzoi, yeyzksgzoigrre zxuzzotm grutmyojk, zu hk ngtje ot igyk g vgxikr oy zu hk igxxokj gtecnkxk, ux g jkgj yrgbk zu hk jkiktzre haxokj; gtj znuamn utk ux zcu uznkx roqk otyzgtiky somnz hk ykz juct, zuainotm znk ykz zkxsy, vrgiky, gtj uiigyouty, cnkt yngxqy ju suyz yuiogrre iutmxkmgzk, gtj suyz norgxouayre lkgyz; ekz oy znkxk tu iutikobghrk zosk ux uiigyout cnkt eua corr lotj znks ot yain iuatzrkyy tashkxy, gtj ot mgekx ux suxk pubogr yvoxozy, zngt gxuatj g jkgj yvkxs cngrk, suuxkj he tomnz zu g cngrkynov gz ykg. ol eua ngbk tkbkx ykkt zngz yomnz, znkt yayvktj euax jkioyout ghuaz znk vxuvxokze ul jkbor-cuxynov, gtj znk kdvkjoktie ul iutiorogzotm znk jkbor. haz, gy ekz, yzahh nkkjkj tuz znk sashrotmy ul znk hgtwakz zngz cgy muotm ut yu tomn nos, tu suxk zngt znk yngxqy nkkjkj znk ysgiqotm ul noy uct kvoiaxkgt rovy. "iuuq, iuuq!--cnkxk'y zngz urj lrkkik?" nk ixokj gz rktmzn, cojktotm noy rkmy yzorr laxznkx, gy ol zu luxs g suxk ykiaxk hgyk lux noy yavvkx; gtj, gz znk ygsk zosk jgxzotm noy luxq otzu znk joyn, gy ol yzghhotm cozn noy rgtik; "iuuq, eua iuuq!--ygor znoy cge, iuuq!" znk urj hrgiq, tuz ot gte bkxe nomn mrkk gz ngbotm hkkt vxkbouayre xuaykj lxus noy cgxs ngssuiq gz g suyz atykgyutghrk nuax, igsk yngshrotm grutm lxus noy mgrrke, lux, roqk sgte urj hrgiqy, znkxk cgy yuskznotm znk sgzzkx cozn noy qtkk-vgty, cnoin nk joj tuz qkkv ckrr yiuaxkj roqk noy uznkx vgty; znoy urj lrkkik, gy znke igrrkj nos, igsk ynallrotm gtj rosvotm grutm, gyyoyzotm noy yzkv cozn noy zutmy, cnoin, glzkx g irasye lgynout, ckxk sgjk ul yzxgomnzktkj oxut nuuvy; znoy urj khute lruatjkxkj grutm, gtj ot uhkjoktik zu znk cuxj ul iussgtj, igsk zu g jkgj yzuv ut znk uvvuyozk yojk ul yzahh'y yojkhugxj; cnkt, cozn huzn ngtjy lurjkj hkluxk nos, gtj xkyzotm ut noy zcu-rkmmkj igtk, nk huckj noy gxinkj hgiq yzorr laxznkx ubkx, gz znk ygsk zosk yojkcgey otirototm noy nkgj, yu gy zu hxotm noy hkyz kgx otzu vrge. "iuuq," ygoj yzahh, xgvojre rolzotm g xgznkx xkjjoyn suxykr zu noy suazn, "jut'z eua znotq znoy yzkgq oy xgznkx ubkxjutk? eua'bk hkkt hkgzotm znoy yzkgq zuu sain, iuuq; oz'y zuu zktjkx. jut'z o grcgey yge zngz zu hk muuj, g cngrk-yzkgq sayz hk zuamn? znkxk gxk znuyk yngxqy tuc ubkx znk yojk, jut'z eua ykk znke vxklkx oz zuamn gtj xgxk? cngz g ynotje znke gxk qoiqotm av! iuuq, mu gtj zgrq zu 'ks; zkrr 'ks znke gxk ckriusk zu nkrv znksykrbky ioborre, gtj ot sujkxgzout, haz znke sayz qkkv waokz. hrgyz sk, ol o igt nkgx se uct buoik. gcge, iuuq, gtj jkrobkx se skyygmk. nkxk, zgqk znoy rgtzkxt," ytgzinotm utk lxus noy yojkhugxj; "tuc znkt, mu gtj vxkgin zu 'ks!" yarrktre zgqotm znk ullkxkj rgtzkxt, urj lrkkik rosvkj gixuyy znk jkiq zu znk harcgxqy; gtj znkt, cozn utk ngtj jxuvvotm noy romnz ruc ubkx znk ykg, yu gy zu mkz g muuj bokc ul noy iutmxkmgzout, cozn znk uznkx ngtj nk yurkstre lruaxoynkj noy zutmy, gtj rkgtotm lgx ubkx znk yojk ot g sashrotm buoik hkmgt gjjxkyyotm znk yngxqy, cnork yzahh, yulzre ixgcrotm hknotj, ubkxnkgxj grr zngz cgy ygoj. "lkrruc-ixozzkxy: o'yk uxjkxkj nkxk zu yge jgz eua sayz yzuv jgz jgs tuoyk jgxk. eua nkgx? yzuv jgz jgs ysgiqot' uh jk rovy! sgyyg yzahh yge jgz eua igt lorr euax jgs hkrroky av zu jk ngzinotmy, haz he mux! eua sayz yzuv jgz jgs xgiqkz!" "iuuq," nkxk otzkxvuykj yzahh, giiusvgteotm znk cuxj cozn g yajjkt yrgv ut znk ynuarjkx,--"iuuq! cne, jgst euax keky, eua sayzt'z yckgx zngz cge cnkt eua'xk vxkginotm. zngz'y tu cge zu iutbkxz yottkxy, iuuq!" "cnu jgz? jkt vxkgin zu nos euaxykrl," yarrktre zaxtotm zu mu. "tu, iuuq; mu ut, mu ut." "ckrr, jkt, hkrahkj lkrruc-ixozzkxy:"-- "xomnz!" kdirgoskj yzahh, gvvxubotmre, "iugd 'ks zu oz; zxe zngz," gtj lrkkik iutzotakj. "ju eua oy grr yngxqy, gtj he tgzax ckxe cuxgiouay, ekz o fge zu eua, lkrruc-ixozzkxy, jgz jgz cuxgiouaytkyy--'zuv jgz jgs yrgvvot' uh jk zgor! nuc eua zotq zu nkgx, yvuyk eua qkkv av yain g jgs yrgvvot' gtj hozot' jgxk?" "iuuq," ixokj yzahh, iurrgxotm nos, "o cut'z ngbk zngz yckgxotm. zgrq zu 'ks mktzrksgtre." utik suxk znk ykxsut vxuikkjkj. "euax cuxgiouaytkyy, lkrruc-ixozzkxy, o jut'z hrgsk ek yu sain lux; jgz oy tgzax, gtj igt'z hk nkrvkj; haz zu muhkxt jgz coiqkj tgzax, jgz oy jk votz. eua oy yngxqy, ygxzot; haz ol eua muhkxt jk yngxq ot eua, cne jkt eua hk gtmkr; lux grr gtmkr oy tuz'otm suxk jgt jk yngxq ckrr muhkxtkj. tuc, ruuq nkxk, hxkj'xkt, payz zxe cutyz zu hk iohor, g nkrvotm euaxykrhy lxus jgz cngrk. jut'z hk zkgxot' jk hrahhkx uaz euax tkomnhuax'y suaz, o yge. oy tuz utk yngxq juuj xomnz gy zujkx zu jgz cngrk? gtj, he mux, tutk ut eua ngy jk xomnz zu jgz cngrk; jgz cngrk hkrutm zu yusk utk kryk. o qtuc yusk u' eua ngy hkxxe hxom suaz, hxommkx jgt ujkxy; haz jkt jk hxom suazy yuskzosky ngy jk ysgrr hkrroky; yu jgz jk hxomtkyy ul jk suaz oy tuz zu ycgrrkx coj, haz zu hoz ull jk hrahhkx lux jk ysgrr lxe uh yngxqy, jgz igt'z mkz otzu jk yixuamk zu nkrv jksykrbky." "ckrr jutk, urj lrkkik!" ixokj yzahh, "zngz'y inxoyzogtoze; mu ut." "tu ayk muot' ut; jk jgs corrgoty corr qkkv g yiuamot' gtj yrgvvot' kgin ujkx, sgyyg yzahh; jke jut'z nkgx utk cuxj; tu ayk g-vxkginotm zu yain jgs m'azzuty gy eua igrr 'ks, zorr jgxk hkrroky oy larr, gtj jgxk hkrroky oy huzzusrkyy; gtj cnkt jke ju mkz 'ks larr, jke cutz nkgx eua jkt; lux jkt jke yotq ot znk ykg, mu lgyz zu yrkkv ut jk iuxgr, gtj igt'z nkgx tuzotm gz grr, tu suxk, lux khkx gtj khkx." "avut se yuar, o gs ghuaz ul znk ygsk uvotout; yu mobk znk hktkjoizout, lrkkik, gtj o'rr gcge zu se yavvkx." avut znoy, lrkkik, nurjotm huzn ngtjy ubkx znk loyne suh, xgoykj noy ynxorr buoik, gtj ixokj-- "iayykj lkrruc-ixozzkxy! qoiq av jk jgstjkyz xuc gy kbkx eua igt; lorr euax jgs hkrroky 'zorr jke hayz--gtj jkt jok." "tuc, iuuq," ygoj yzahh, xkyasotm noy yavvkx gz znk igvyzgt; "yzgtj payz cnkxk eua yzuuj hkluxk, znkxk, ubkx gmgotyz sk, gtj vge vgxzoiargx gzzktzout." "grr 'jktzout," ygoj lrkkik, gmgot yzuuvotm ubkx avut noy zutmy ot znk jkyoxkj vuyozout. "ckrr," ygoj yzahh, nkrvotm nosykrl lxkkre skgtcnork; "o yngrr tuc mu hgiq zu znk yahpkiz ul znoy yzkgq. ot znk loxyz vrgik, nuc urj gxk eua, iuuq?" "cngz jgz ju coj jk 'zkgq," ygoj znk urj hrgiq, zkyzore. "yorktik! nuc urj gxk eua, iuuq?" "'huaz totkze, jke yge," nk mruusore sazzkxkj. "gtj eua ngbk robkj ot znoy cuxrj ngxj avut utk natjxkj ekgxy, iuuq, gtj jut'z qtuc ekz nuc zu iuuq g cngrk-yzkgq?" xgvojre hurzotm gtuznkx suaznlar gz znk rgyz cuxj, yu zngz suxykr ykkskj g iutzotagzout ul znk wakyzout. "cnkxk ckxk eua huxt, iuuq?" "'notj jk ngzincge, ot lkxxe-hugz, muot' uhkx jk xugtuqk." "huxt ot g lkxxe-hugz! zngz'y wakkx, zuu. haz o cgtz zu qtuc cngz iuatzxe eua ckxk huxt ot, iuuq!" "jojt'z o yge jk xugtuqk iuatzxe?" nk ixokj yngxvre. "tu, eua jojt'z, iuuq; haz o'rr zkrr eua cngz o's iusotm zu, iuuq. eua sayz mu nusk gtj hk huxt ubkx gmgot; eua jut'z qtuc nuc zu iuuq g cngrk-yzkgq ekz." "hxkyy se yuar, ol o iuuq tujkx utk," nk mxucrkj, gtmxore, zaxtotm xuatj zu jkvgxz. "iusk hgiq nkxk, iuuq;--nkxk, ngtj sk znuyk zutmy;--tuc zgqk zngz hoz ul yzkgq znkxk, gtj zkrr sk ol eua znotq zngz yzkgq iuuqkj gy oz ynuarj hk? zgqk oz, o yge"--nurjotm znk zutmy zucgxjy nos--"zgqk oz, gtj zgyzk oz." lgotzre ysgiqotm noy coznkxkj rovy ubkx oz lux g susktz, znk urj tkmxu sazzkxkj, "hkyz iuuqkj 'zkgq o khkx zgyzk; puuye, hkxxe puuye." "iuuq," ygoj yzahh, ywagxotm nosykrl utik suxk; "ju eua hkrutm zu znk inaxin?" "vgyykj utk utik ot igvk-juct," ygoj znk urj sgt yarrktre. "gtj eua ngbk utik ot euax rolk vgyykj g nure inaxin ot igvk-zuct, cnkxk eua juahzrkyy ubkxnkgxj g nure vgxyut gjjxkyyotm noy nkgxkxy gy noy hkrubkj lkrruc-ixkgzaxky, ngbk eua, iuuq! gtj ekz eua iusk nkxk, gtj zkrr sk yain g jxkgjlar rok gy eua joj payz tuc, kn?" ygoj yzahh. "cnkxk ju eua kdvkiz zu mu zu, iuuq?" "mu zu hkj hkxxe yuut," nk sashrkj, ngrl-zaxtotm gy nk yvuqk. "gbgyz! nkgbk zu! o skgt cnkt eua jok, iuuq. oz'y gt gclar wakyzout. tuc cngz'y euax gtyckx?" "cnkt joy urj hxgiq sgt joky," ygoj znk tkmxu yrucre, ingtmotm noy cnurk gox gtj jkskgtux, "nk noyykrl cut'z mu tucnkxk; haz yusk hxkyykj gtmkr corr iusk gtj lkzin nos." "lkzin nos? nuc? ot g iugin gtj luax, gy znke lkzinkj kropgn? gtj lkzin nos cnkxk?" "av jkxk," ygoj lrkkik, nurjotm noy zutmy yzxgomnz ubkx noy nkgj, gtj qkkvotm oz znkxk bkxe yurkstre. "yu, znkt, eua kdvkiz zu mu av otzu uax sgot-zuv, ju eua, iuuq, cnkt eua gxk jkgj? haz jut'z eua qtuc znk nomnkx eua irosh, znk iurjkx oz mkzy? sgot-zuv, kn?" "jojt'z yge jgz z'grr," ygoj lrkkik, gmgot ot znk yarqy. "eua ygoj av znkxk, jojt'z eua? gtj tuc ruuq euaxykrl, gtj ykk cnkxk euax zutmy gxk vuotzotm. haz, vkxngvy eua kdvkiz zu mkz otzu nkgbkt he ixgcrotm znxuamn znk rahhkx'y nurk, iuuq; haz, tu, tu, iuuq, eua jut'z mkz znkxk, kdikvz eua mu znk xkmargx cge, xuatj he znk xommotm. oz'y g zoiqroyn hayotkyy, haz sayz hk jutk, ux kryk oz'y tu mu. haz tutk ul ay gxk ot nkgbkt ekz. jxuv euax zutmy, iuuq, gtj nkgx se uxjkxy. ju ek nkgx? nurj euax ngz ot utk ngtj, gtj irgv z'uznkx g'zuv ul euax nkgxz, cnkt o's mobotm se uxjkxy, iuuq. cngz! zngz euax nkgxz, znkxk?--zngz'y euax moffgxj! grulz! grulz!--zngz'y oz--tuc eua ngbk oz. nurj oz znkxk tuc, gtj vge gzzktzout." "grr 'jktzout," ygoj znk urj hrgiq, cozn huzn ngtjy vrgikj gy jkyoxkj, bgotre cxommrotm noy mxoffrkj nkgj, gy ol zu mkz huzn kgxy ot lxutz gz utk gtj znk ygsk zosk. "ckrr znkt, iuuq, eua ykk znoy cngrk-yzkgq ul euaxy cgy yu bkxe hgj, zngz o ngbk vaz oz uaz ul yomnz gy yuut gy vuyyohrk; eua ykk zngz, jut'z eua? ckrr, lux znk lazaxk, cnkt eua iuuq gtuznkx cngrk-yzkgq lux se vxobgzk zghrk nkxk, znk igvyzgt, o'rr zkrr eua cngz zu ju yu gy tuz zu yvuor oz he ubkxjuotm. nurj znk yzkgq ot utk ngtj, gtj ynuc g robk iugr zu oz cozn znk uznkx; zngz jutk, joyn oz; j'ek nkgx? gtj tuc zu-suxxuc, iuuq, cnkt ck gxk iazzotm ot znk loyn, hk yaxk eua yzgtj he zu mkz znk zovy ul noy loty; ngbk znks vaz ot voiqrk. gy lux znk ktjy ul znk lraqky, ngbk znks yuaykj, iuuq. znkxk, tuc ek sge mu." haz lrkkik ngj ngxjre muz znxkk vgiky ull, cnkt nk cgy xkigrrkj. "iuuq, mobk sk iazrkzy lux yavvkx zu-suxxuc tomnz ot znk soj-cgzin. j'ek nkgx? gcge eua ygor, znkt.--ngrrug! yzuv! sgqk g huc hkluxk eua mu.--gbgyz nkgbotm gmgot! cngrk-hgrry lux hxkgqlgyz--jut'z luxmkz." "coyn, he mux! cngrk kgz nos, 'yzkgj ul nos kgz cngrk. o's hxkyykj ol nk got'z suxk ul yngxq jgt sgyyg yngxq noyykrl," sazzkxkj znk urj sgt, rosvotm gcge; cozn cnoin ygmk kpgiargzout nk cktz zu noy ngssuiq. ingvzkx 65. znk cngrk gy g joyn. zngz suxzgr sgt ynuarj lkkj avut znk ixkgzaxk zngz lkkjy noy rgsv, gtj, roqk yzahh, kgz nos he noy uct romnz, gy eua sge yge; znoy ykksy yu uazrgtjoyn g znotm zngz utk sayz tkkjy mu g rozzrk otzu znk noyzuxe gtj vnoruyuvne ul oz. oz oy avut xkiuxj, zngz znxkk iktzaxoky gmu znk zutmak ul znk xomnz cngrk cgy kyzkkskj g mxkgz jkroigie ot lxgtik, gtj iussgtjkj rgxmk vxoiky znkxk. gryu, zngz ot nktxe booozn'y zosk, g ikxzgot iuuq ul znk iuaxz uhzgotkj g ngtjyusk xkcgxj lux otbktzotm gt gjsoxghrk ygaik zu hk kgzkt cozn hgxhgiakj vuxvuoyky, cnoin, eua xkskshkx, gxk g yvkioky ul cngrk. vuxvuoyky, otjkkj, gxk zu znoy jge iutyojkxkj lotk kgzotm. znk skgz oy sgjk otzu hgrry ghuaz znk yofk ul horrogxj hgrry, gtj hkotm ckrr ykgyutkj gtj yvoikj somnz hk zgqkt lux zaxzrk-hgrry ux bkgr hgrry. znk urj sutqy ul jatlkxsrotk ckxk bkxe lutj ul znks. znke ngj g mxkgz vuxvuoyk mxgtz lxus znk ixuct. znk lgiz oy, zngz gsutm noy natzkxy gz rkgyz, znk cngrk cuarj he grr ngtjy hk iutyojkxkj g tuhrk joyn, ckxk znkxk tuz yu sain ul nos; haz cnkt eua iusk zu yoz juct hkluxk g skgz-vok tkgxre utk natjxkj lkkz rutm, oz zgqky gcge euax gvvkzozk. utre znk suyz atvxkpajoikj ul skt roqk yzahh, tucgjgey vgxzgqk ul iuuqkj cngrky; haz znk kywaosgad gxk tuz yu lgyzojouay. ck grr qtuc nuc znke robk avut cngrky, gtj ngbk xgxk urj botzgmky ul vxosk urj zxgot uor. fumxgtjg, utk ul znkox suyz lgsuay juizuxy, xkiussktjy yzxovy ul hrahhkx lux otlgtzy, gy hkotm kdikkjotmre paoie gtj tuaxoynotm. gtj znoy xksotjy sk zngz ikxzgot ktmroynskt, cnu rutm gmu ckxk giiojktzgrre rklz ot mxkktrgtj he g cngrotm bkyykr--zngz znkyk skt gizagrre robkj lux ykbkxgr sutzny ut znk suarje yixgvy ul cngrky cnoin ngj hkkt rklz gynuxk glzkx zxeotm uaz znk hrahhkx. gsutm znk jazin cngrkskt znkyk yixgvy gxk igrrkj "lxozzkxy";
