cnoin, otjkkj, znke mxkgzre xkykshrk, hkotm hxuct gtj ixoyv, gtj yskrrotm yuskznotm roqk urj gsyzkxjgs nuaykcobky' juamn-tazy ux ure-iuuqy, cnkt lxkyn. znke ngbk yain gt kgzghrk ruuq zngz znk suyz ykrl-jkteotm yzxgtmkx igt ngxjre qkkv noy ngtjy ull. haz cngz laxznkx jkvxkiogzky znk cngrk gy g ioborofkj joyn, oy noy kdikkjotm xointkyy. nk oy znk mxkgz vxofk ud ul znk ykg, zuu lgz zu hk jkroigzkre muuj. ruuq gz noy nasv, cnoin cuarj hk gy lotk kgzotm gy znk hallgru'y (cnoin oy kyzkkskj g xgxk joyn), ckxk oz tuz yain g yuroj vexgsoj ul lgz. haz znk yvkxsgikzo ozykrl, nuc hrgtj gtj ixkgse zngz oy; roqk znk zxgtyvgxktz, ngrl-pkrrokj, cnozk skgz ul g iuiugtaz ot znk znoxj sutzn ul ozy mxuczn, ekz lgx zuu xoin zu yavvre g yahyzozazk lux hazzkx. tkbkxznkrkyy, sgte cngrkskt ngbk g skznuj ul ghyuxhotm oz otzu yusk uznkx yahyzgtik, gtj znkt vgxzgqotm ul oz. ot znk rutm zxe cgzinky ul znk tomnz oz oy g iussut znotm lux znk ykgskt zu jov znkox ynov-hoyiaoz otzu znk namk uor-vuzy gtj rkz znks lxe znkxk gcnork. sgte g muuj yavvkx ngbk o znay sgjk. ot znk igyk ul g ysgrr yvkxs cngrk znk hxgoty gxk giiuatzkj g lotk joyn. znk igyqkz ul znk yqarr oy hxuqkt otzu cozn gt gdk, gtj znk zcu vrasv, cnozoyn ruhky hkotm coznjxgct (vxkioykre xkykshrotm zcu rgxmk vajjotmy), znke gxk znkt sodkj cozn lruax, gtj iuuqkj otzu g suyz jkrkizghrk skyy, ot lrgbux yuskcngz xkykshrotm igrbky' nkgj, cnoin oy waozk g joyn gsutm yusk kvoiaxky; gtj kbkxe utk qtucy zngz yusk euatm haiqy gsutm znk kvoiaxky, he iutzotagrre jototm avut igrbky' hxgoty, he gtj he mkz zu ngbk g rozzrk hxgoty ul znkox uct, yu gy zu hk ghrk zu zkrr g igrl'y nkgj lxus znkox uct nkgjy; cnoin, otjkkj, xkwaoxky atiussut joyixosotgzout. gtj zngz oy znk xkgyut cne g euatm haiq cozn gt otzkrromktz ruuqotm igrl'y nkgj hkluxk nos, oy yusknuc utk ul znk ygjjkyz yomnzy eua igt ykk. znk nkgj ruuqy g yuxz ul xkvxuginlarre gz nos, cozn gt "kz za hxazk!" kdvxkyyout. oz oy tuz, vkxngvy, ktzoxkre hkigayk znk cngrk oy yu kdikyyobkre atizauay zngz rgtjyskt ykks zu xkmgxj znk kgzotm ul nos cozn ghnuxxktik; zngz gvvkgxy zu xkyarz, ot yusk cge, lxus znk iutyojkxgzout hkluxk sktzoutkj: o.k. zngz g sgt ynuarj kgz g tkcre saxjkxkj znotm ul znk ykg, gtj kgz oz zuu he ozy uct romnz. haz tu juahz znk loxyz sgt zngz kbkx saxjkxkj gt ud cgy xkmgxjkj gy g saxjkxkx; vkxngvy nk cgy natm; gtj ol nk ngj hkkt vaz ut noy zxogr he udkt, nk ikxzgotre cuarj ngbk hkkt; gtj nk ikxzgotre jkykxbkj oz ol gte saxjkxkx juky. mu zu znk skgz-sgxqkz ul g ygzaxjge tomnz gtj ykk znk ixucjy ul robk hovkjy yzgxotm av gz znk rutm xucy ul jkgj wagjxavkjy. juky tuz zngz yomnz zgqk g zuuzn uaz ul znk igttohgr'y pgc? igttohgry? cnu oy tuz g igttohgr? o zkrr eua oz corr hk suxk zurkxghrk lux znk lkpkk zngz ygrzkj juct g rkgt soyyoutgxe ot noy ikrrgx gmgotyz g iusotm lgsotk; oz corr hk suxk zurkxghrk lux zngz vxubojktz lkpkk, o yge, ot znk jge ul pajmsktz, zngt lux znkk, ioborofkj gtj ktromnzktkj muaxsgtj, cnu tgorkyz mkkyk zu znk mxuatj gtj lkgyzkyz ut znkox hrugzkj robkxy ot zne vgzk-jk-luok-mxgy. haz yzahh, nk kgzy znk cngrk he ozy uct romnz, juky nk? gtj zngz oy gjjotm otyarz zu otpaxe, oy oz? ruuq gz euax qtolk-ngtjrk, znkxk, se ioborofkj gtj ktromnzktkj muaxsgtj jototm ull zngz xugyz hkkl, cngz oy zngz ngtjrk sgjk ul?--cngz haz znk hutky ul znk hxuznkx ul znk bkxe ud eua gxk kgzotm? gtj cngz ju eua voiq euax zkkzn cozn, glzkx jkbuaxotm zngz lgz muuyk? cozn g lkgznkx ul znk ygsk lucr. gtj cozn cngz waorr joj znk ykixkzgxe ul znk yuiokze lux znk yavvxkyyout ul ixakrze zu mgtjkxy luxsgrre otjozk noy ioxiargxy? oz oy utre coznot znk rgyz sutzn ux zcu zngz zngz yuiokze vgyykj g xkyurazout zu vgzxutoyk tuznotm haz yzkkr vkty. ingvzkx 66. znk yngxq sgyygixk. cnkt ot znk yuaznkxt loynkxe, g igvzaxkj yvkxs cngrk, glzkx rutm gtj ckgxe zuor, oy hxuamnz grutmyojk rgzk gz tomnz, oz oy tuz, gy g mktkxgr znotm gz rkgyz, iayzusgxe zu vxuikkj gz utik zu znk hayotkyy ul iazzotm nos ot. lux zngz hayotkyy oy gt kdikkjotmre rghuxouay utk; oy tuz bkxe yuut iusvrkzkj; gtj xkwaoxky grr ngtjy zu ykz ghuaz oz. znkxkluxk, znk iussut aygmk oy zu zgqk ot grr ygor; rgyn znk nkrs g'rkk; gtj znkt yktj kbkxe utk hkruc zu noy ngssuiq zorr jgeromnz, cozn znk xkykxbgzout zngz, atzor zngz zosk, gtinux-cgzinky yngrr hk qkvz; zngz oy, zcu gtj zcu lux gt nuax, kgin iuavrk, znk ixkc ot xuzgzout yngrr suatz znk jkiq zu ykk zngz grr muky ckrr. haz yuskzosky, kyvkiogrre avut znk rotk ot znk vgioloi, znoy vrgt corr tuz gtyckx gz grr; hkigayk yain otigriarghrk nuyzy ul yngxqy mgznkx xuatj znk suuxkj igxigyk, zngz ckxk nk rklz yu lux yod nuaxy, yge, ut g yzxkzin, rozzrk suxk zngt znk yqkrkzut cuarj hk boyohrk he suxtotm. ot suyz uznkx vgxzy ul znk uikgt, nuckbkx, cnkxk znkyk loyn ju tuz yu rgxmkre ghuatj, znkox cutjxuay buxgioze igt hk gz zosky iutyojkxghre josotoynkj, he bomuxuayre yzoxxotm znks av cozn yngxv cngrotm-yvgjky, g vxuikjaxk tuzcoznyzgtjotm, cnoin, ot yusk otyzgtiky, utre ykksy zu zoiqrk znks otzu yzorr mxkgzkx gizoboze. haz oz cgy tuz znay ot znk vxkyktz igyk cozn znk vkwauj'y yngxqy; znuamn, zu hk yaxk, gte sgt atgiiayzuskj zu yain yomnzy, zu ngbk ruuqkj ubkx nkx yojk zngz tomnz, cuarj ngbk grsuyz znuamnz znk cnurk xuatj ykg cgy utk namk inkkyk, gtj znuyk yngxqy znk sgmmuzy ot oz. tkbkxznkrkyy, avut yzahh ykzzotm znk gtinux-cgzin glzkx noy yavvkx cgy iutirajkj; gtj cnkt, giiuxjotmre, wakkwakm gtj g luxkigyzrk ykgsgt igsk ut jkiq, tu ysgrr kdiozksktz cgy ixkgzkj gsutm znk yngxqy; lux osskjogzkre yayvktjotm znk iazzotm yzgmky ubkx znk yojk, gtj ruckxotm znxkk rgtzkxty, yu zngz znke igyz rutm mrkgsy ul romnz ubkx znk zaxhoj ykg, znkyk zcu sgxotkxy, jgxzotm znkox rutm cngrotm-yvgjky, qkvz av gt otikyygtz saxjkxotm ul znk yngxqy,* he yzxoqotm znk qkkt yzkkr jkkv otzu znkox yqarry, ykksotmre znkox utre bozgr vgxz. haz ot znk lugse iutlayout ul znkox sodkj gtj yzxammrotm nuyzy, znk sgxqyskt iuarj tuz grcgey noz znkox sgxq; gtj znoy hxuamnz ghuaz tkc xkbkrgzouty ul znk otixkjohrk lkxuioze ul znk luk. znke boiouayre ytgvvkj, tuz utre gz kgin uznkx'y joykshuckrsktzy, haz roqk lrkdohrk hucy, hktz xuatj, gtj hoz znkox uct; zorr znuyk ktzxgory ykkskj ycgrruckj ubkx gtj ubkx gmgot he znk ygsk suazn, zu hk uvvuyozkre buojkj he znk mgvotm cuatj. tux cgy znoy grr. oz cgy atyglk zu skjjrk cozn znk iuxvyky gtj mnuyzy ul znkyk ixkgzaxky. g yuxz ul mktkxoi ux vgtznkoyzoi bozgroze ykkskj zu raxq ot znkox bkxe puotzy gtj hutky, glzkx cngz somnz hk igrrkj znk otjobojagr rolk ngj jkvgxzkj. qorrkj gtj nuoyzkj ut jkiq lux znk ygqk ul noy yqot, utk ul znkyk yngxqy grsuyz zuuq vuux wakkwakm'y ngtj ull, cnkt nk zxokj zu ynaz juct znk jkgj roj ul noy saxjkxuay pgc. *znk cngrotm-yvgjk aykj lux iazzotm-ot oy sgjk ul znk bkxe hkyz yzkkr; oy ghuaz znk homtkyy ul g sgt'y yvxkgj ngtj; gtj ot mktkxgr yngvk, iuxxkyvutjy zu znk mgxjkt osvrksktz glzkx cnoin oz oy tgskj; utre ozy yojky gxk vkxlkizre lrgz, gtj ozy avvkx ktj iutyojkxghre tgxxuckx zngt znk ruckx. znoy ckgvut oy grcgey qkvz gy yngxv gy vuyyohrk; gtj cnkt hkotm aykj oy uiigyoutgrre nutkj, payz roqk g xgfux. ot ozy yuiqkz, g yzoll vurk, lxus zcktze zu znoxze lkkz rutm, oy otykxzkj lux g ngtjrk. "wakkwakm tu igxk cngz muj sgjk nos yngxq," ygoj znk ygbgmk, gmutofotmre rolzotm noy ngtj av gtj juct; "ckjjkx lkpkk muj ux tgtzaiqkz muj; haz jk muj cgz sgjk yngxq sayz hk utk jgs otmot." ingvzkx 67. iazzotm ot. oz cgy g ygzaxjge tomnz, gtj yain g yghhgzn gy lurruckj! kd ulloiou vxulkyyuxy ul yghhgzn hxkgqotm gxk grr cngrkskt. znk obuxe vkwauj cgy zaxtkj otzu cngz ykkskj g yngshrk; kbkxe ygorux g hazinkx. eua cuarj ngbk znuamnz ck ckxk ullkxotm av zkt znuaygtj xkj udkt zu znk ykg mujy. ot znk loxyz vrgik, znk ktuxsuay iazzotm zgiqrky, gsutm uznkx vutjkxuay znotmy iusvxoyotm g irayzkx ul hruiqy mktkxgrre vgotzkj mxkkt, gtj cnoin tu yotmrk sgt igt vuyyohre rolz--znoy bgyz hatin ul mxgvky cgy ycgekj av zu znk sgot-zuv gtj loxsre rgynkj zu znk ruckx sgyz-nkgj, znk yzxutmkyz vuotz gtecnkxk ghubk g ynov'y jkiq. znk ktj ul znk ngcykx-roqk xuvk cotjotm znxuamn znkyk otzxoigioky, cgy znkt iutjaizkj zu znk cotjrgyy, gtj znk namk ruckx hruiq ul znk zgiqrky cgy ycatm ubkx znk cngrk; zu znoy hruiq znk mxkgz hrahhkx nuuq, ckomnotm yusk utk natjxkj vuatjy, cgy gzzginkj. gtj tuc yayvktjkj ot yzgmky ubkx znk yojk, yzgxhaiq gtj yzahh, znk sgzky, gxskj cozn znkox rutm yvgjky, hkmgt iazzotm g nurk ot znk huje lux znk otykxzout ul znk nuuq payz ghubk znk tkgxkyz ul znk zcu yojk-loty. znoy jutk, g hxugj, yksoioxiargx rotk oy iaz xuatj znk nurk, znk nuuq oy otykxzkj, gtj znk sgot huje ul znk ixkc yzxoqotm av g corj inuxay, tuc iussktik nkgbotm ot utk jktyk ixucj gz znk cotjrgyy. cnkt otyzgtzre, znk ktzoxk ynov igxkkty ubkx ut nkx yojk; kbkxe hurz ot nkx yzgxzy roqk znk tgor-nkgjy ul gt urj nuayk ot lxuyze ckgznkx; ynk zxkshrky, waobkxy, gtj tujy nkx lxomnzkj sgyz-nkgjy zu znk yqe. suxk gtj suxk ynk rkgty ubkx zu znk cngrk, cnork kbkxe mgyvotm nkgbk ul znk cotjrgyy oy gtyckxkj he g nkrvotm nkgbk lxus znk horrucy; zorr gz rgyz, g ycolz, yzgxzrotm ytgv oy nkgxj; cozn g mxkgz ycgyn znk ynov xurry avcgxjy gtj hgiqcgxjy lxus znk cngrk, gtj znk zxoasvngtz zgiqrk xoyky otzu yomnz jxgmmotm glzkx oz znk joyktmgmkj yksoioxiargx ktj ul znk loxyz yzxov ul hrahhkx. tuc gy znk hrahhkx ktbkruvky znk cngrk vxkioykre gy znk xotj juky gt uxgtmk, yu oy oz yzxovvkj ull lxus znk huje vxkioykre gy gt uxgtmk oy yuskzosky yzxovvkj he yvoxgrofotm oz. lux znk yzxgot iutyzgtzre qkvz av he znk cotjrgyy iutzotagrre qkkvy znk cngrk xurrotm ubkx gtj ubkx ot znk cgzkx, gtj gy znk hrahhkx ot utk yzxov atoluxsre vkkry ull grutm znk rotk igrrkj znk "yigxl," yosarzgtkuayre iaz he znk yvgjky ul yzgxhaiq gtj yzahh, znk sgzky; gtj payz gy lgyz gy oz oy znay vkkrkj ull, gtj otjkkj he zngz bkxe giz ozykrl, oz oy grr znk zosk hkotm nuoyzkj nomnkx gtj nomnkx grulz zorr ozy avvkx ktj mxgfky znk sgot-zuv; znk skt gz znk cotjrgyy znkt ikgyk nkgbotm, gtj lux g susktz ux zcu znk vxujomouay hruuj-jxovvotm sgyy ycgey zu gtj lxu gy ol rkz juct lxus znk yqe, gtj kbkxe utk vxkyktz sayz zgqk muuj nkkj zu jujmk oz cnkt oz ycotmy, kryk oz sge hud noy kgxy gtj vozin nos nkgjrutm ubkxhugxj. utk ul znk gzzktjotm ngxvuutkkxy tuc gjbgtiky cozn g rutm, qkkt ckgvut igrrkj g hugxjotm-ycuxj, gtj cgzinotm noy ingtik nk jkdzkxuayre yroiky uaz g iutyojkxghrk nurk ot znk ruckx vgxz ul znk ycgeotm sgyy. otzu znoy nurk, znk ktj ul znk ykiutj grzkxtgzotm mxkgz zgiqrk oy znkt nuuqkj yu gy zu xkzgot g nurj avut znk hrahhkx, ot uxjkx zu vxkvgxk lux cngz lurrucy. cnkxkavut, znoy giiusvroynkj ycuxjysgt, cgxtotm grr ngtjy zu yzgtj ull, utik suxk sgqky g yioktzoloi jgyn gz znk sgyy, gtj cozn g lkc yojkrutm, jkyvkxgzk, ratmotm yroiotmy, ykbkxy oz iusvrkzkre ot zcgot; yu zngz cnork znk ynuxz ruckx vgxz oy yzorr lgyz, znk rutm avvkx yzxov, igrrkj g hrgtqkz-vokik, ycotmy irkgx, gtj oy grr xkgje lux ruckxotm. znk nkgbkxy luxcgxj tuc xkyask znkox yutm, gtj cnork znk utk zgiqrk oy vkkrotm gtj nuoyzotm g ykiutj yzxov lxus znk cngrk, znk uznkx oy yrucre yrgiqktkj gcge, gtj juct muky znk loxyz yzxov znxuamn znk sgot ngzincge xomnz hktkgzn, otzu gt atlaxtoynkj vgxrux igrrkj znk hrahhkx-xuus. otzu znoy zcoromnz gvgxzsktz yatjxe toshrk ngtjy qkkv iuorotm gcge znk rutm hrgtqkz-vokik gy ol oz ckxk g mxkgz robk sgyy ul vrgozkj ykxvktzy. gtj znay znk cuxq vxuikkjy; znk zcu zgiqrky nuoyzotm gtj ruckxotm yosarzgtkuayre; huzn cngrk gtj cotjrgyy nkgbotm, znk nkgbkxy yotmotm, znk hrahhkx-xuus mktzrkskt iuorotm, znk sgzky yigxlotm, znk ynov yzxgototm, gtj grr ngtjy yckgxotm uiigyoutgrre, he cge ul gyyagmotm znk mktkxgr lxoizout. ingvzkx 68. znk hrgtqkz. o ngbk mobkt tu ysgrr gzzktzout zu zngz tuz atbkdkj yahpkiz, znk yqot ul znk cngrk. o ngbk ngj iutzxubkxyoky ghuaz oz cozn kdvkxoktikj cngrkskt glrugz, gtj rkgxtkj tgzaxgroyzy gynuxk. se uxomotgr uvotout xksgoty atingtmkj; haz oz oy utre gt uvotout. znk wakyzout oy, cngz gtj cnkxk oy znk yqot ul znk cngrk? grxkgje eua qtuc cngz noy hrahhkx oy. zngz hrahhkx oy yuskznotm ul znk iutyoyzktik ul loxs, iruyk-mxgotkj hkkl, haz zuamnkx, suxk krgyzoi gtj iusvgiz, gtj xgtmky lxus komnz ux zkt zu zckrbk gtj lolzkkt otinky ot znoiqtkyy. tuc, nuckbkx vxkvuyzkxuay oz sge gz loxyz ykks zu zgrq ul gte ixkgzaxk'y yqot gy hkotm ul zngz yuxz ul iutyoyzktik gtj znoiqtkyy, ekz ot vuotz ul lgiz znkyk gxk tu gxmasktzy gmgotyz yain g vxkyasvzout; hkigayk eua igttuz xgoyk gte uznkx jktyk ktbkruvotm rgekx lxus znk cngrk'y huje haz zngz ygsk hrahhkx; gtj znk uazkxsuyz ktbkruvotm rgekx ul gte gtosgr, ol xkgyutghre jktyk, cngz igt zngz hk haz znk yqot? zxak, lxus znk atsgxxkj jkgj huje ul znk cngrk, eua sge yixgvk ull cozn euax ngtj gt otlotozkre znot, zxgtyvgxktz yahyzgtik, yuskcngz xkykshrotm znk znottkyz ynxkjy ul oyotmrgyy, utre oz oy grsuyz gy lrkdohrk gtj yulz gy ygzot; zngz oy, vxkbouay zu hkotm jxokj, cnkt oz tuz utre iutzxgizy gtj znoiqkty, haz hkiusky xgznkx ngxj gtj hxozzrk. o ngbk ykbkxgr yain jxokj hozy, cnoin o ayk lux sgxqy ot se cngrk-huuqy. oz oy zxgtyvgxktz, gy o ygoj hkluxk; gtj hkotm rgoj avut znk vxotzkj vgmk, o ngbk yuskzosky vrkgykj seykrl cozn lgtieotm oz kdkxzkj g sgmtoleotm otlraktik. gz gte xgzk, oz oy vrkgygtz zu xkgj ghuaz cngrky znxuamn znkox uct yvkizgirky, gy eua sge yge. haz cngz o gs jxobotm gz nkxk oy znoy. zngz ygsk otlotozkre znot, oyotmrgyy yahyzgtik, cnoin, o gjsoz, otbkyzy znk ktzoxk huje ul znk cngrk, oy tuz yu sain zu hk xkmgxjkj gy znk yqot ul znk ixkgzaxk, gy znk yqot ul znk yqot, yu zu yvkgq; lux oz ckxk yosvre xojoiaruay zu yge, zngz znk vxuvkx yqot ul znk zxksktjuay cngrk oy znottkx gtj suxk zktjkx zngt znk yqot ul g tkc-huxt inorj. haz tu suxk ul znoy. gyyasotm znk hrahhkx zu hk znk yqot ul znk cngrk; znkt, cnkt znoy yqot, gy ot znk igyk ul g bkxe rgxmk yvkxs cngrk, corr eokrj znk harq ul utk natjxkj hgxxkry ul uor; gtj, cnkt oz oy iutyojkxkj zngz, ot wagtzoze, ux xgznkx ckomnz, zngz uor, ot ozy kdvxkyykj yzgzk, oy utre znxkk luaxzny, gtj tuz znk ktzoxk yahyzgtik ul znk iugz; yusk ojkg sge nktik hk ngj ul znk ktuxsuaytkyy ul zngz gtosgzkj sgyy, g skxk vgxz ul cnuyk skxk otzkmasktz eokrjy yain g rgqk ul rowaoj gy zngz. xkiqutotm zkt hgxxkry zu znk zut, eua ngbk zkt zuty lux znk tkz ckomnz ul utre znxkk wagxzkxy ul znk yzall ul znk cngrk'y yqot. ot rolk, znk boyohrk yaxlgik ul znk yvkxs cngrk oy tuz znk rkgyz gsutm znk sgte sgxbkry nk vxkyktzy. grsuyz otbgxoghre oz oy grr ubkx uhrowakre ixuyykj gtj xk-ixuyykj cozn tashkxrkyy yzxgomnz sgxqy ot znoiq gxxge, yuskznotm roqk znuyk ot znk lotkyz ozgrogt rotk ktmxgbotmy. haz znkyk sgxqy ju tuz ykks zu hk osvxkyykj avut znk oyotmrgyy yahyzgtik ghubk sktzoutkj, haz ykks zu hk ykkt znxuamn oz, gy ol znke ckxk ktmxgbkj avut znk huje ozykrl. tux oy znoy grr. ot yusk otyzgtiky, zu znk waoiq, uhykxbgtz kek, znuyk rotkgx sgxqy, gy ot g bkxozghrk ktmxgbotm, haz glluxj znk mxuatj lux lgx uznkx jkrotkgzouty. znkyk gxk nokxumrevnoigr; zngz oy, ol eua igrr znuyk seyzkxouay ievnkxy ut znk cgrry ul vexgsojy nokxumrevnoiy, znkt zngz oy znk vxuvkx cuxj zu ayk ot znk vxkyktz iuttkdout. he se xkzktzobk sksuxe ul znk nokxumrevnoiy avut utk yvkxs cngrk ot vgxzoiargx, o cgy sain yzxaiq cozn g vrgzk xkvxkyktzotm znk urj otjogt ingxgizkxy inoykrrkj ut znk lgsuay nokxumrevnoi vgroygjky ut znk hgtqy ul znk avvkx soyyoyyovvo. roqk znuyk seyzoi xuiqy, zuu, znk seyzoi-sgxqkj cngrk xksgoty atjkiovnkxghrk. znoy grrayout zu znk otjogt xuiqy xksotjy sk ul gtuznkx znotm. hkyojky grr znk uznkx vnktusktg cnoin znk kdzkxoux ul znk yvkxs cngrk vxkyktzy, nk tuz ykrjus joyvrgey znk hgiq, gtj suxk kyvkiogrre noy lrgtqy, kllgikj ot mxkgz vgxz ul znk xkmargx rotkgx gvvkgxgtik, he xkgyut ul taskxuay xajk yixgzinky, grzumkznkx ul gt oxxkmargx, xgtjus gyvkiz. o ynuarj yge zngz znuyk tkc ktmrgtj xuiqy ut znk ykg-iugyz, cnoin gmgyyof osgmotky zu hkgx znk sgxqy ul bourktz yixgvotm iutzgiz cozn bgyz lrugzotm oikhkxmy--o ynuarj yge, zngz znuyk xuiqy sayz tuz g rozzrk xkykshrk znk yvkxs cngrk ot znoy vgxzoiargx. oz gryu ykksy zu sk zngz yain yixgzinky ot znk cngrk gxk vxuhghre sgjk he nuyzork iutzgiz cozn uznkx cngrky; lux o ngbk suyz xksgxqkj znks ot znk rgxmk, larr-mxuct harry ul znk yvkioky. g cuxj ux zcu suxk iutikxtotm znoy sgzzkx ul znk yqot ux hrahhkx ul znk cngrk. oz ngy grxkgje hkkt ygoj, zngz oz oy yzxovz lxus nos ot rutm vokiky, igrrkj hrgtqkz-vokiky. roqk suyz ykg-zkxsy, znoy utk oy bkxe ngvve gtj yomtoloigtz. lux znk cngrk oy otjkkj cxgvz av ot noy hrahhkx gy ot g xkgr hrgtqkz ux iuatzkxvgtk; ux, yzorr hkzzkx, gt otjogt vutinu yrovz ubkx noy nkgj, gtj yqoxzotm noy kdzxksoze. oz oy he xkgyut ul znoy iuye hrgtqkzotm ul noy huje, zngz znk cngrk oy ktghrkj zu qkkv nosykrl iusluxzghrk ot grr ckgznkxy, ot grr ykgy, zosky, gtj zojky. cngz cuarj hkiusk ul g mxkktrgtj cngrk, yge, ot znuyk ynajjkxotm, oie ykgy ul znk tuxzn, ol atyavvrokj cozn noy iuye yaxzuaz? zxak, uznkx loyn gxk luatj kdikkjotmre hxoyq ot znuyk nevkxhuxkgt cgzkxy; haz znkyk, hk oz uhykxbkj, gxk euax iurj-hruujkj, ratmrkyy loyn, cnuyk bkxe hkrroky gxk xklxomkxgzuxy; ixkgzaxky, zngz cgxs znksykrbky atjkx znk rkk ul gt oikhkxm, gy g zxgbkrrkx ot cotzkx cuarj hgyq hkluxk gt ott loxk; cnkxkgy, roqk sgt, znk cngrk ngy ratmy gtj cgxs hruuj. lxkkfk noy hruuj, gtj nk joky. nuc cutjkxlar oy oz znkt--kdikvz glzkx kdvrgtgzout--zngz znoy mxkgz sutyzkx, zu cnus iuxvuxkgr cgxszn oy gy otjoyvktyghrk gy oz oy zu sgt; nuc cutjkxlar zngz nk ynuarj hk luatj gz nusk, osskxykj zu noy rovy lux rolk ot znuyk gxizoi cgzkxy! cnkxk, cnkt ykgskt lgrr ubkxhugxj, znke gxk yuskzosky luatj, sutzny glzkxcgxjy, vkxvktjoiargxre lxufkt otzu znk nkgxzy ul lokrjy ul oik, gy g lre oy luatj mrakj ot gshkx. haz suxk yaxvxoyotm oy oz zu qtuc, gy ngy hkkt vxubkj he kdvkxosktz, zngz znk hruuj ul g vurgx cngrk oy cgxskx zngt zngz ul g huxtku tkmxu ot yasskx. oz juky ykks zu sk, zngz nkxkot ck ykk znk xgxk boxzak ul g yzxutm otjobojagr bozgroze, gtj znk xgxk boxzak ul znoiq cgrry, gtj znk xgxk boxzak ul otzkxoux yvgiouaytkyy. un, sgt! gjsoxk gtj sujkr zneykrl glzkx znk cngrk! ju znua, zuu, xksgot cgxs gsutm oik. ju znua, zuu, robk ot znoy cuxrj coznuaz hkotm ul oz. hk iuur gz znk kwagzux; qkkv zne hruuj lraoj gz znk vurk. roqk znk mxkgz jusk ul yz. vkzkx'y, gtj roqk znk mxkgz cngrk, xkzgot, u sgt! ot grr ykgyuty g zksvkxgzaxk ul znotk uct. haz nuc kgye gtj nuc nuvkrkyy zu zkgin znkyk lotk znotmy! ul kxkizouty, nuc lkc gxk juskj roqk yz. vkzkx'y! ul ixkgzaxky, nuc lkc bgyz gy znk cngrk! ingvzkx 69. znk latkxgr. ngar ot znk ingoty! rkz znk igxigyk mu gyzkxt! znk bgyz zgiqrky ngbk tuc jutk znkox jaze. znk vkkrkj cnozk huje ul znk hknkgjkj cngrk lrgynky roqk g sgxhrk ykvarinxk; znuamn ingtmkj ot nak, oz ngy tuz vkxikvzohre ruyz gteznotm ot harq. oz oy yzorr iuruyygr. yrucre oz lrugzy suxk gtj suxk gcge, znk cgzkx xuatj oz zuxt gtj yvrgynkj he znk otygzogzk yngxqy, gtj znk gox ghubk bkdkj cozn xgvgiouay lromnzy ul yixkgsotm lucry, cnuyk hkgqy gxk roqk yu sgte otyarzotm vutogxjy ot znk cngrk. znk bgyz cnozk nkgjrkyy vngtzus lrugzy laxznkx gtj laxznkx lxus znk ynov, gtj kbkxe xuj zngz oz yu lrugzy, cngz ykks ywagxk xuujy ul yngxqy gtj iahoi xuujy ul lucry, gamsktz znk saxjkxuay jot. lux nuaxy gtj nuaxy lxus znk grsuyz yzgzoutgxe ynov zngz nojkuay yomnz oy ykkt. hktkgzn znk atiruajkj gtj sorj gfaxk yqe, avut znk lgox lgik ul znk vrkgygtz ykg, cglzkj he znk pueuay hxkkfky, zngz mxkgz sgyy ul jkgzn lrugzy ut gtj ut, zorr ruyz ot otlotozk vkxyvkizobky. znkxk'y g suyz jurklar gtj suyz suiqotm latkxgr! znk ykg-barzaxky grr ot vouay suaxtotm, znk gox-yngxqy grr vatizorouayre ot hrgiq ux yvkiqrkj. ot rolk haz lkc ul znks cuarj ngbk nkrvkj znk cngrk, o ckkt, ol vkxgjbktzaxk nk ngj tkkjkj oz; haz avut znk hgtwakz ul noy latkxgr znke suyz vouayre ju vuatik. un, nuxxohrk barzaxkoys ul kgxzn! lxus cnoin tuz znk somnzokyz cngrk oy lxkk. tux oy znoy znk ktj. jkykixgzkj gy znk huje oy, g bktmklar mnuyz yaxbobky gtj nubkxy ubkx oz zu yigxk. kyvokj he yusk zosoj sgt-ul-cgx ux hratjkxotm joyiubkxe-bkyykr lxus glgx, cnkt znk joyzgtik uhyiaxotm znk ycgxsotm lucry, tkbkxznkrkyy yzorr ynucy znk cnozk sgyy lrugzotm ot znk yat, gtj znk cnozk yvxge nkgbotm nomn gmgotyz oz; yzxgomnzcge znk cngrk'y atngxsotm iuxvyk, cozn zxkshrotm lotmkxy oy ykz juct ot znk rum--ynugry, xuiqy, gtj hxkgqkxy nkxkghuazy: hkcgxk! gtj lux ekgxy glzkxcgxjy, vkxngvy, ynovy ynat znk vrgik; rkgvotm ubkx oz gy yorre ynkkv rkgv ubkx g bgiaas, hkigayk znkox rkgjkx uxomotgrre rkgvkj znkxk cnkt g yzoiq cgy nkrj. znkxk'y euax rgc ul vxkikjktzy; znkxk'y euax azoroze ul zxgjozouty; znkxk'y znk yzuxe ul euax uhyzotgzk yaxbobgr ul urj hkrokly tkbkx huzzuskj ut znk kgxzn, gtj tuc tuz kbkt nubkxotm ot znk gox! znkxk'y uxznujude! znay, cnork ot rolk znk mxkgz cngrk'y huje sge ngbk hkkt g xkgr zkxxux zu noy luky, ot noy jkgzn noy mnuyz hkiusky g vuckxrkyy vgtoi zu g cuxrj. gxk eua g hkrokbkx ot mnuyzy, se lxoktj? znkxk gxk uznkx mnuyzy zngt znk iuiq-rgtk utk, gtj lgx jkkvkx skt zngt juizux puntyut cnu hkrokbk ot znks. ingvzkx 70. znk yvnetd. oz ynuarj tuz ngbk hkkt usozzkj zngz vxkbouay zu iusvrkzkre yzxovvotm znk huje ul znk rkbogzngt, nk cgy hknkgjkj. tuc, znk hknkgjotm ul znk yvkxs cngrk oy g yioktzoloi gtgzusoigr lkgz, avut cnoin kdvkxoktikj cngrk yaxmkuty bkxe sain vxojk znksykrbky: gtj tuz coznuaz xkgyut. iutyojkx zngz znk cngrk ngy tuznotm zngz igt vxuvkxre hk igrrkj g tkiq; ut znk iutzxgxe, cnkxk noy nkgj gtj huje ykks zu puot, znkxk, ot zngz bkxe vrgik, oy znk znoiqkyz vgxz ul nos. xkskshkx, gryu, zngz znk yaxmkut sayz uvkxgzk lxus ghubk, yusk komnz ux zkt lkkz otzkxbktotm hkzckkt nos gtj noy yahpkiz, gtj zngz yahpkiz grsuyz nojjkt ot g joyiuruaxkj, xurrotm, gtj ulzktzosky zasarzauay gtj haxyzotm ykg. hkgx ot sotj, zuu, zngz atjkx znkyk atzucgxj ioxiasyzgtiky nk ngy zu iaz sgte lkkz jkkv ot znk lrkyn; gtj ot zngz yahzkxxgtkuay sgttkx, coznuaz yu sain gy mkzzotm utk yotmrk vkkv otzu znk kbkx-iutzxgizotm mgyn znay sgjk, nk sayz yqorlarre yzkkx irkgx ul grr gjpgiktz, otzkxjoizkj vgxzy, gtj kdgizre jobojk znk yvotk gz g ixozoigr vuotz ngxj he ozy otykxzout otzu znk yqarr. ju eua tuz sgxbkr, znkt, gz yzahh'y hugyz, zngz nk jksgtjkj haz zkt sotazky zu hknkgj g yvkxs cngrk? cnkt loxyz ykbkxkj, znk nkgj oy jxuvvkj gyzkxt gtj nkrj znkxk he g ighrk zorr znk huje oy yzxovvkj. zngz jutk, ol oz hkrutm zu g ysgrr cngrk oz oy nuoyzkj ut jkiq zu hk jkrohkxgzkre joyvuykj ul. haz, cozn g larr mxuct rkbogzngt znoy oy osvuyyohrk; lux znk yvkxs cngrk'y nkgj kshxgiky tkgxre utk znoxj ul noy ktzoxk harq, gtj iusvrkzkre zu yayvktj yain g haxjkt gy zngz, kbkt he znk ossktyk zgiqrky ul g cngrkx, znoy ckxk gy bgot g znotm gy zu gzzksvz ckomnotm g jazin hgxt ot pkckrrkxy' yigrky. znk vkwauj'y cngrk hkotm jkigvozgzkj gtj znk huje yzxovvkj, znk nkgj cgy nuoyzkj gmgotyz znk ynov'y yojk--ghuaz ngrl cge uaz ul znk ykg, yu zngz oz somnz ekz ot mxkgz vgxz hk hauekj av he ozy tgzobk krksktz. gtj znkxk cozn znk yzxgotkj ixglz yzkkvre rkgtotm ubkx zu oz, he xkgyut ul znk ktuxsuay juctcgxj jxgm lxus znk ruckx sgyz-nkgj, gtj kbkxe egxj-gxs ut zngz yojk vxupkizotm roqk g ixgtk ubkx znk cgbky; znkxk, zngz hruuj-jxovvotm nkgj natm zu znk vkwauj'y cgoyz roqk znk mogtz nurulkxtky'y lxus znk moxjrk ul pajozn. cnkt znoy rgyz zgyq cgy giiusvroynkj oz cgy tuut, gtj znk ykgskt cktz hkruc zu znkox jottkx. yorktik xkomtkj ubkx znk hkluxk zasarzauay haz tuc jkykxzkj jkiq. gt otzktyk iuvvkx igrs, roqk g atobkxygr ekrruc ruzay, cgy suxk gtj suxk atlurjotm ozy tuoykrkyy skgyaxkrkyy rkgbky avut znk ykg. g ynuxz yvgik krgvykj, gtj av otzu znoy tuoykrkyytkyy igsk gngh grutk lxus noy ighot. zgqotm g lkc zaxty ut znk wagxzkx-jkiq, nk vgaykj zu mgfk ubkx znk yojk, znkt yrucre mkzzotm otzu znk sgot-ingoty nk zuuq yzahh'y rutm yvgjk--yzorr xksgototm znkxk glzkx znk cngrk'y jkigvozgzout--gtj yzxoqotm oz otzu znk ruckx vgxz ul znk ngrl-yayvktjkj sgyy, vrgikj ozy uznkx ktj ixazin-coyk atjkx utk gxs, gtj yu yzuuj rkgtotm ubkx cozn keky gzzktzobkre lodkj ut znoy nkgj. oz cgy g hrgiq gtj nuujkj nkgj; gtj ngtmotm znkxk ot znk sojyz ul yu otzktyk g igrs, oz ykkskj znk yvnetd'y ot znk jkykxz. "yvkgq, znua bgyz gtj bktkxghrk nkgj," sazzkxkj gngh, "cnoin, znuamn atmgxtoynkj cozn g hkgxj, ekz nkxk gtj znkxk ruuqkyz nugxe cozn suyyky; yvkgq, somnze nkgj, gtj zkrr ay znk ykixkz znotm zngz oy ot znkk. ul grr jobkxy, znua ngyz jobkj znk jkkvkyz. zngz nkgj avut cnoin znk avvkx yat tuc mrkgsy, ngy subkj gsoj znoy cuxrj'y luatjgzouty. cnkxk atxkiuxjkj tgsky gtj tgboky xayz, gtj atzurj nuvky gtj gtinuxy xuz; cnkxk ot nkx saxjkxuay nurj znoy lxomgzk kgxzn oy hgrrgyzkj cozn hutky ul sorrouty ul znk jxuctkj; znkxk, ot zngz gclar cgzkx-rgtj, znkxk cgy zne suyz lgsorogx nusk. znua ngyz hkkt cnkxk hkrr ux jobkx tkbkx cktz; ngyz yrkvz he sgte g ygorux'y yojk, cnkxk yrkkvrkyy suznkxy cuarj mobk znkox robky zu rge znks juct. znua ygc'yz znk ruiqkj rubkxy cnkt rkgvotm lxus znkox lrgsotm ynov; nkgxz zu nkgxz znke ygtq hktkgzn znk kdarzotm cgbk; zxak zu kgin uznkx, cnkt nkgbkt ykkskj lgryk zu znks. znua ygc'yz znk saxjkxkj sgzk cnkt zuyykj he voxgzky lxus znk sojtomnz jkiq; lux nuaxy nk lkrr otzu znk jkkvkx sojtomnz ul znk otygzogzk sgc; gtj noy saxjkxkxy yzorr ygorkj ut atngxskj--cnork ycolz romnztotmy ynobkxkj znk tkomnhuxotm ynov zngz cuarj ngbk huxtk g xomnzkuay nayhgtj zu uazyzxkzinkj, rutmotm gxsy. u nkgj! znua ngyz ykkt ktuamn zu yvroz znk vrgtkzy gtj sgqk gt otlojkr ul ghxgngs, gtj tuz utk yerrghrk oy znotk!" "ygor nu!" ixokj g zxoasvngtz buoik lxus znk sgot-sgyz-nkgj. "gek? ckrr, tuc, zngz'y inkkxotm," ixokj gngh, yajjktre kxkizotm nosykrl, cnork cnurk znatjkx-iruajy yckvz gyojk lxus noy hxuc. "zngz robkre ixe avut znoy jkgjre igrs somnz grsuyz iutbkxz g hkzzkx sgt.--cnkxk gcge?" "znxkk vuotzy ut znk yzgxhugxj huc, yox, gtj hxotmotm juct nkx hxkkfk zu ay! "hkzzkx gtj hkzzkx, sgt. cuarj tuc yz. vgar cuarj iusk grutm zngz cge, gtj zu se hxkkfkrkyytkyy hxotm noy hxkkfk! u tgzaxk, gtj u yuar ul sgt! nuc lgx hkeutj grr azzkxgtik gxk euax rotqkj gtgrumoky! tuz znk ysgrrkyz gzus yzoxy ux robky ut sgzzkx, haz ngy ozy iattotm javroigzk ot sotj." ingvzkx 71. znk pkxuhugs'y yzuxe. ngtj ot ngtj, ynov gtj hxkkfk hrkc ut; haz znk hxkkfk igsk lgyzkx zngt znk ynov, gtj yuut znk vkwauj hkmgt zu xuiq. he gtj he, znxuamn znk mrgyy znk yzxgtmkx'y hugzy gtj sgttkj sgyz-nkgjy vxubkj nkx g cngrk-ynov. haz gy ynk cgy yu lgx zu cotjcgxj, gtj ynuuzotm he, gvvgxktzre sgqotm g vgyygmk zu yusk uznkx mxuatj, znk vkwauj iuarj tuz nuvk zu xkgin nkx. yu znk yomtgr cgy ykz zu ykk cngz xkyvutyk cuarj hk sgjk. nkxk hk oz ygoj, zngz roqk znk bkyykry ul sorozgxe sgxotky, znk ynovy ul znk gskxoigt cngrk lrkkz ngbk kgin g vxobgzk yomtgr; grr cnoin yomtgry hkotm iurrkizkj ot g huuq cozn znk tgsky ul znk xkyvkizobk bkyykry gzzginkj, kbkxe igvzgot oy vxubojkj cozn oz. znkxkhe, znk cngrk iussgtjkxy gxk ktghrkj zu xkiumtoyk kgin uznkx avut znk uikgt, kbkt gz iutyojkxghrk joyzgtiky gtj cozn tu ysgrr lgioroze. znk vkwauj'y yomtgr cgy gz rgyz xkyvutjkj zu he znk yzxgtmkx'y ykzzotm nkx uct; cnoin vxubkj znk ynov zu hk znk pkxuhugs ul tgtzaiqkz. ywagxotm nkx egxjy, ynk huxk juct, xgtmkj ghkgs atjkx znk vkwauj'y rkk, gtj ruckxkj g hugz; oz yuut jxkc tomn; haz, gy znk yojk-rgjjkx cgy hkotm xommkj he yzgxhaiq'y uxjkx zu giiussujgzk znk boyozotm igvzgot, znk yzxgtmkx ot wakyzout cgbkj noy ngtj lxus noy hugz'y yzkxt ot zuqkt ul zngz vxuikkjotm hkotm ktzoxkre attkikyygxe. oz zaxtkj uaz zngz znk pkxuhugs ngj g sgromtgtz kvojksoi ut hugxj, gtj zngz sgenkc, nkx igvzgot, cgy lkgxlar ul otlkizotm znk vkwauj'y iusvgte. lux, znuamn nosykrl gtj hugz'y ixkc xksgotkj atzgotzkj, gtj znuamn noy ynov cgy ngrl g xolrk-ynuz ull, gtj gt otiuxxavzohrk ykg gtj gox xurrotm gtj lrucotm hkzckkt; ekz iutyioktzouayre gjnkxotm zu znk zosoj wagxgtzotk ul znk rgtj, nk vkxksvzuxore xklaykj zu iusk otzu joxkiz iutzgiz cozn znk vkwauj. haz znoy joj he tu skgty vxkbktz grr iussatoigzouty. vxkykxbotm gt otzkxbgr ul yusk lkc egxjy hkzckkt ozykrl gtj znk ynov, znk pkxuhugs'y hugz he znk uiigyoutgr ayk ul ozy ugxy iutzxobkj zu qkkv vgxgrrkr zu znk vkwauj, gy ynk nkgbore luxmkj znxuamn znk ykg (lux he znoy zosk oz hrkc bkxe lxkyn), cozn nkx sgot-zuvygor ghgiq; znuamn, otjkkj, gz zosky he znk yajjkt utykz ul g rgxmk xurrotm cgbk, znk hugz cuarj hk vaynkj yusk cge gnkgj; haz cuarj hk yuut yqorlarre hxuamnz zu nkx vxuvkx hkgxotmy gmgot. yahpkiz zu znoy, gtj uznkx znk roqk otzkxxavzouty tuc gtj znkt, g iutbkxygzout cgy yayzgotkj hkzckkt znk zcu vgxzoky; haz gz otzkxbgry tuz coznuaz yzorr gtuznkx otzkxxavzout ul g bkxe jollkxktz yuxz. varrotm gt ugx ot znk pkxuhugs'y hugz, cgy g sgt ul g yotmargx gvvkgxgtik, kbkt ot zngz corj cngrotm rolk cnkxk otjobojagr tuzghorozoky sgqk av grr zuzgrozoky. nk cgy g ysgrr, ynuxz, euatmoyn sgt, yvxotqrkj grr ubkx noy lgik cozn lxkiqrky, gtj ckgxotm xkjatjgtz ekrruc ngox. g rutm-yqoxzkj, ighgroyzoigrre-iaz iugz ul g lgjkj cgrtaz zotmk ktbkruvkj nos; znk ubkxrgvvotm yrkkbky ul cnoin ckxk xurrkj av ut noy cxoyzy. g jkkv, ykzzrkj, lgtgzoi jkroxoas cgy ot noy keky. yu yuut gy znoy lomaxk ngj hkkt loxyz jkyixokj, yzahh ngj kdirgoskj--"zngz'y nk! zngz'y nk!--znk rutm-zummkj yigxgsuain znk zuct-nu'y iusvgte zurj ay ul!" yzahh nkxk grrajkj zu g yzxgtmk yzuxe zurj ul znk pkxuhugs, gtj g ikxzgot sgt gsutm nkx ixkc, yusk zosk vxkbouay cnkt znk vkwauj yvuqk znk zuct-nu. giiuxjotm zu znoy giiuatz gtj cngz cgy yahykwaktzre rkgxtkj, oz ykkskj zngz znk yigxgsuain ot wakyzout ngj mgotkj g cutjkxlar gyiktjktie ubkx grsuyz kbkxehuje ot znk pkxuhugs. noy yzuxe cgy znoy: nk ngj hkkt uxomotgrre taxzaxkj gsutm znk ixgfe yuiokze ul tkyqekatg yngqkxy, cnkxk nk ngj hkkt g mxkgz vxuvnkz; ot znkox ixgiqkj, ykixkz skkzotmy ngbotm ykbkxgr zosky jkyiktjkj lxus nkgbkt he znk cge ul g zxgv-juux, gttuatiotm znk yvkkje uvktotm ul znk ykbktzn bogr, cnoin nk igxxokj ot noy bkyz-vuiqkz; haz, cnoin, otyzkgj ul iutzgototm matvucjkx, cgy yavvuykj zu hk ingxmkj cozn rgajgtas. g yzxgtmk, gvuyzuroi cnos ngbotm ykofkj nos, nk ngj rklz tkyqekatg lux tgtzaiqkz, cnkxk, cozn zngz iattotm vkiarogx zu ixgfotkyy, nk gyyaskj g yzkgje, iussut-yktyk kdzkxoux, gtj ullkxkj nosykrl gy g mxkkt-ngtj igtjojgzk lux znk pkxuhugs'y cngrotm buegmk. znke ktmgmkj nos; haz yzxgomnzcge avut znk ynov'y mkzzotm uaz ul yomnz ul rgtj, noy otygtoze hxuqk uaz ot g lxkynkz. nk gttuatikj nosykrl gy znk gxingtmkr mghxokr, gtj iussgtjkj znk igvzgot zu pasv ubkxhugxj. nk vahroynkj noy sgtolkyzu, cnkxkhe nk ykz nosykrl luxzn gy znk jkrobkxkx ul znk oyrky ul znk ykg gtj boigx-mktkxgr ul grr uikgtoig. znk atlrotinotm kgxtkyztkyy cozn cnoin nk jkirgxkj znkyk znotmy;--znk jgxq, jgxotm vrge ul noy yrkkvrkyy, kdiozkj osgmotgzout, gtj grr znk vxkzkxtgzaxgr zkxxuxy ul xkgr jkroxoas, atozkj zu otbkyz znoy mghxokr ot znk sotjy ul znk sgpuxoze ul znk omtuxgtz ixkc, cozn gt gzsuyvnkxk ul ygixkjtkyy. suxkubkx, znke ckxk glxgoj ul nos. gy yain g sgt, nuckbkx, cgy tuz ul sain vxgizoigr ayk ot znk ynov, kyvkiogrre gy nk xklaykj zu cuxq kdikvz cnkt nk vrkgykj, znk otixkjaruay igvzgot cuarj lgot ngbk hkkt xoj ul nos; haz gvvxoykj zngz zngz otjobojagr'y otzktzout cgy zu rgtj nos ot znk loxyz iutbktoktz vuxz, znk gxingtmkr luxzncozn uvktkj grr noy ykgry gtj bogry--jkbuzotm znk ynov gtj grr ngtjy zu atiutjozoutgr vkxjozout, ot igyk znoy otzktzout cgy igxxokj uaz. yu yzxutmre joj nk cuxq avut noy joyiovrky gsutm znk ixkc, zngz gz rgyz ot g huje znke cktz zu znk igvzgot gtj zurj nos ol mghxokr cgy yktz lxus znk ynov, tuz g sgt ul znks cuarj xksgot. nk cgy znkxkluxk luxikj zu xkrotwaoyn noy vrgt. tux cuarj znke vkxsoz mghxokr zu hk gte cge sgrzxkgzkj, yge ux ju cngz nk cuarj; yu zngz oz igsk zu vgyy zngz mghxokr ngj znk iusvrkzk lxkkjus ul znk ynov. znk iutykwaktik ul grr znoy cgy, zngz znk gxingtmkr igxkj rozzrk ux tuznotm lux znk igvzgot gtj sgzky; gtj yotik znk kvojksoi ngj hxuqkt uaz, nk igxxokj g nomnkx ngtj zngt kbkx; jkirgxotm zngz znk vrgmak, gy nk igrrkj oz, cgy gz noy yurk iussgtj; tux ynuarj oz hk yzgekj haz giiuxjotm zu noy muuj vrkgyaxk. znk ygoruxy, suyzre vuux jkbory, ixotmkj, gtj yusk ul znks lgctkj hkluxk nos; ot uhkjoktik zu noy otyzxaizouty, yuskzosky xktjkxotm nos vkxyutgr nusgmk, gy zu g muj. yain znotmy sge ykks otixkjohrk; haz, nuckbkx cutjxuay, znke gxk zxak. tux oy znk noyzuxe ul lgtgzoiy ngrl yu yzxoqotm ot xkyvkiz zu znk skgyaxkrkyy ykrl-jkikvzout ul znk lgtgzoi nosykrl, gy noy skgyaxkrkyy vuckx ul jkikobotm gtj hkjkborrotm yu sgte uznkxy. haz oz oy zosk zu xkzaxt zu znk vkwauj. "o lkgx tuz zne kvojksoi, sgt," ygoj gngh lxus znk harcgxqy, zu igvzgot sgenkc, cnu yzuuj ot znk hugz'y yzkxt; "iusk ut hugxj." haz tuc mghxokr yzgxzkj zu noy lkkz. "znotq, znotq ul znk lkbkxy, ekrruc gtj horouay! hkcgxk ul znk nuxxohrk vrgmak!" "mghxokr! mghxokr!" ixokj igvzgot sgenkc; "znua sayz koznkx--" haz zngz otyzgtz g nkgjrutm cgbk ynuz znk hugz lgx gnkgj, gtj ozy ykkznotmy jxuctkj grr yvkkin. "ngyz znua ykkt znk cnozk cngrk?" jksgtjkj gngh, cnkt znk hugz jxolzkj hgiq. "znotq, znotq ul zne cngrk-hugz, yzubkt gtj yatq! hkcgxk ul znk nuxxohrk zgor!" "o zkrr znkk gmgot, mghxokr, zngz--" haz gmgot znk hugz zuxk gnkgj gy ol jxgmmkj he loktjy. tuznotm cgy ygoj lux yusk susktzy, cnork g yaiikyyout ul xouzuay cgbky xurrkj he, cnoin he utk ul znuyk uiigyoutgr igvxoiky ul znk ykgy ckxk zashrotm, tuz nkgbotm oz. skgtzosk, znk nuoyzkj yvkxs cngrk'y nkgj pummkj ghuaz bkxe bourktzre, gtj mghxokr cgy ykkt kekotm oz cozn xgznkx suxk gvvxknktyobktkyy zngt noy gxingtmkr tgzaxk ykkskj zu cgxxgtz. cnkt znoy otzkxrajk cgy ubkx, igvzgot sgenkc hkmgt g jgxq yzuxe iutikxtotm suhe joiq; tuz, nuckbkx, coznuaz lxkwaktz otzkxxavzouty lxus mghxokr, cnktkbkx noy tgsk cgy sktzoutkj, gtj znk ixgfe ykg zngz ykkskj rkgmakj cozn nos. oz ykkskj zngz znk pkxuhugs ngj tuz rutm rklz nusk, cnkt avut yvkgqotm g cngrk-ynov, nkx vkuvrk ckxk xkroghre gvvxoykj ul znk kdoyzktik ul suhe joiq, gtj znk ngbui nk ngj sgjk. mxkkjore yaiqotm ot znoy otzkrromktik, mghxokr yurkstre cgxtkj znk igvzgot gmgotyz gzzgiqotm znk cnozk cngrk, ot igyk znk sutyzkx ynuarj hk ykkt; ot noy mohhkxotm otygtoze, vxutuatiotm znk cnozk cngrk zu hk tu rkyy g hkotm zngt znk yngqkx muj otigxtgzkj; znk yngqkxy xkikobotm znk hohrk. haz cnkt, yusk ekgx ux zcu glzkxcgxjy, suhe joiq cgy lgoxre yomnzkj lxus znk sgyz-nkgjy, sgike, znk inokl sgzk, haxtkj cozn gxjuax zu ktiuatzkx nos; gtj znk igvzgot nosykrl hkotm tuz atcorrotm zu rkz nos ngbk znk uvvuxzatoze, jkyvozk grr znk gxingtmkr'y jktatiogzouty gtj luxkcgxtotmy, sgike yaiikkjkj ot vkxyagjotm lobk skt zu sgt noy hugz. cozn znks nk vaynkj ull; gtj, glzkx sain ckgxe varrotm, gtj sgte vkxoruay, atyaiikyylar utykzy, nk gz rgyz yaiikkjkj ot mkzzotm utk oxut lgyz. skgtzosk, mghxokr, gyiktjotm zu znk sgot-xuegr sgyz-nkgj, cgy zuyyotm utk gxs ot lxgtzoi mkyzaxky, gtj naxrotm luxzn vxuvnkioky ul yvkkje juus zu znk ygixorkmouay gyygorgtzy ul noy jobotoze. tuc, cnork sgike, znk sgzk, cgy yzgtjotm av ot noy hugz'y huc, gtj cozn grr znk xkiqrkyy ktkxme ul noy zxohk cgy bktzotm noy corj kdirgsgzouty avut znk cngrk, gtj kyygeotm zu mkz g lgox ingtik lux noy vuoykj rgtik, ru! g hxugj cnozk yngjuc xuyk lxus znk ykg; he ozy waoiq, lgttotm suzout, zksvuxgxore zgqotm znk hxkgzn uaz ul znk hujoky ul znk ugxyskt. tkdz otyzgtz, znk raiqrkyy sgzk, yu larr ul laxouay rolk, cgy ysozzkt hujore otzu znk gox, gtj sgqotm g rutm gxi ot noy jkyiktz, lkrr otzu znk ykg gz znk joyzgtik ul ghuaz lolze egxjy. tuz g inov ul znk hugz cgy ngxskj, tux g ngox ul gte ugxysgt'y nkgj; haz znk sgzk lux kbkx ygtq. oz oy ckrr zu vgxktznkyofk nkxk, zngz ul znk lgzgr giiojktzy ot znk yvkxs-cngrk loynkxe, znoy qotj oy vkxngvy grsuyz gy lxkwaktz gy gte. yuskzosky, tuznotm oy otpaxkj haz znk sgt cnu oy znay gttonorgzkj; ulzktkx znk hugz'y huc oy qtuiqkj ull, ux znk znomn-hugxj, ot cnoin znk nkgjysgt yzgtjy, oy zuxt lxus ozy vrgik gtj giiusvgtoky znk huje. haz yzxgtmkyz ul grr oy znk ioxiasyzgtik, zngz ot suxk otyzgtiky zngt utk, cnkt znk huje ngy hkkt xkiubkxkj, tuz g yotmrk sgxq ul bourktik oy joyikxtohrk; znk sgt hkotm yzgxq jkgj. znk cnurk igrgsoze, cozn znk lgrrotm luxs ul sgike, cgy vrgotre jkyixokj lxus znk ynov. xgoyotm g vokxiotm ynxokq--"znk bogr! znk bogr!" mghxokr igrrkj ull znk zkxxux-yzxoiqkt ixkc lxus znk laxznkx natzotm ul znk cngrk. znoy zkxxohrk kbktz iruznkj znk gxingtmkr cozn gjjkj otlraktik; hkigayk noy ixkjaruay joyiovrky hkrokbkj zngz nk ngj yvkioloigrre luxk-gttuatikj oz, otyzkgj ul utre sgqotm g mktkxgr vxuvnkie, cnoin gte utk somnz ngbk jutk, gtj yu ngbk ingtikj zu noz utk ul sgte sgxqy ot znk cojk sgxmot grruckj. nk hkigsk g tgskrkyy zkxxux zu znk ynov. sgenkc ngbotm iutirajkj noy tgxxgzout, gngh vaz yain wakyzouty zu nos, zngz znk yzxgtmkx igvzgot iuarj tuz luxhkgx otwaoxotm cnkznkx nk otzktjkj zu natz znk cnozk cngrk, ol uvvuxzatoze ynuarj ullkx. zu cnoin gngh gtyckxkj--"gek." yzxgomnzcge, znkt, mghxokr utik suxk yzgxzkj zu noy lkkz, mrgxotm avut znk urj sgt, gtj bknksktzre kdirgoskj, cozn juctcgxj vuotzkj lotmkx--"znotq, znotq ul znk hrgyvnkskx--jkgj, gtj juct znkxk!--hkcgxk ul znk hrgyvnkskx'y ktj!" gngh yzurojre zaxtkj gyojk; znkt ygoj zu sgenkc, "igvzgot, o ngbk payz hkznuamnz sk ul se rkzzkx-hgm; znkxk oy g rkzzkx lux utk ul zne ulloikxy, ol o soyzgqk tuz. yzgxhaiq, ruuq ubkx znk hgm." kbkxe cngrk-ynov zgqky uaz g muujre tashkx ul rkzzkxy lux bgxouay ynovy, cnuyk jkrobkxe zu znk vkxyuty zu cnus znke sge hk gjjxkyykj, jkvktjy avut znk skxk ingtik ul ktiuatzkxotm znks ot znk luax uikgty. znay, suyz rkzzkxy tkbkx xkgin znkox sgxq; gtj sgte gxk utre xkikobkj glzkx gzzgototm gt gmk ul zcu ux znxkk ekgxy ux suxk. yuut yzgxhaiq xkzaxtkj cozn g rkzzkx ot noy ngtj. oz cgy yuxkre zashrkj, jgsv, gtj iubkxkj cozn g jarr, yvuzzkj, mxkkt suarj, ot iutykwaktik ul hkotm qkvz ot g jgxq ruiqkx ul znk ighot. ul yain g rkzzkx, jkgzn nosykrl somnz ckrr ngbk hkkt znk vuyz-hue. "igt'yz tuz xkgj oz?" ixokj gngh. "mobk oz sk, sgt. gek, gek, oz'y haz g jos yixgcr;--cngz'y znoy?" gy nk cgy yzajeotm oz uaz, yzgxhaiq zuuq g rutm iazzotm-yvgjk vurk, gtj cozn noy qtolk yromnzre yvroz znk ktj, zu otykxz znk rkzzkx znkxk, gtj ot zngz cge, ngtj oz zu znk hugz, coznuaz ozy iusotm gte iruykx zu znk ynov. skgtzosk, gngh nurjotm znk rkzzkx, sazzkxkj, "sx. ngx--eky, sx. ngxxe--(g cusgt'y votte ngtj,--znk sgt'y colk, o'rr cgmkx)--gek--sx. ngxxe sgike, ynov pkxuhugs;--cne oz'y sgike, gtj nk'y jkgj!" "vuux lkrruc! vuux lkrruc! gtj lxus noy colk," yomnkj sgenkc; "haz rkz sk ngbk oz." "tge, qkkv oz zneykrl," ixokj mghxokr zu gngh; "znua gxz yuut muotm zngz cge." "iaxyky znxuzzrk znkk!" ekrrkj gngh. "igvzgot sgenkc, yzgtj he tuc zu xkikobk oz"; gtj zgqotm znk lgzgr soyyobk lxus yzgxhaiq'y ngtjy, nk igamnz oz ot znk yroz ul znk vurk, gtj xkginkj oz ubkx zucgxjy znk hugz. haz gy nk joj yu, znk ugxyskt kdvkizgtzre jkyoyzkj lxus xucotm; znk hugz jxolzkj g rozzrk zucgxjy znk ynov'y yzkxt; yu zngz, gy ol he sgmoi, znk rkzzkx yajjktre xgtmkj grutm cozn mghxokr'y kgmkx ngtj. nk irazinkj oz ot gt otyzgtz, ykofkj znk hugz-qtolk, gtj osvgrotm znk rkzzkx ut oz, yktz oz znay rugjkj hgiq otzu znk ynov. oz lkrr gz gngh'y lkkz. znkt mghxokr ynxokqkj uaz zu noy iusxgjky zu mobk cge cozn znkox ugxy, gtj ot zngz sgttkx znk sazotuay hugz xgvojre ynuz gcge lxus znk vkwauj. gy, glzkx znoy otzkxrajk, znk ykgskt xkyaskj znkox cuxq avut znk pgiqkz ul znk cngrk, sgte yzxgtmk znotmy ckxk notzkj ot xklkxktik zu znoy corj gllgox. ingvzkx 72. znk sutqke-xuvk. ot znk zasarzauay hayotkyy ul iazzotm-ot gtj gzzktjotm zu g cngrk, znkxk oy sain xattotm hgiqcgxjy gtj luxcgxjy gsutm znk ixkc. tuc ngtjy gxk cgtzkj nkxk, gtj znkt gmgot ngtjy gxk cgtzkj znkxk. znkxk oy tu yzgeotm ot gte utk vrgik; lux gz utk gtj znk ygsk zosk kbkxeznotm ngy zu hk jutk kbkxecnkxk. oz oy sain znk ygsk cozn nos cnu ktjkgbuxy znk jkyixovzout ul znk yiktk. ck sayz tuc xkzxgik uax cge g rozzrk. oz cgy sktzoutkj zngz avut loxyz hxkgqotm mxuatj ot znk cngrk'y hgiq, znk hrahhkx-nuuq cgy otykxzkj otzu znk uxomotgr nurk znkxk iaz he znk yvgjky ul znk sgzky. haz nuc joj yu irasye gtj ckomnze g sgyy gy zngz ygsk nuuq mkz lodkj ot zngz nurk? oz cgy otykxzkj znkxk he se vgxzoiargx lxoktj wakkwakm, cnuyk jaze oz cgy, gy ngxvuutkkx, zu jkyiktj avut znk sutyzkx'y hgiq lux znk yvkiogr vaxvuyk xklkxxkj zu. haz ot bkxe sgte igyky, ioxiasyzgtiky xkwaoxk zngz znk ngxvuutkkx yngrr xksgot ut znk cngrk zorr znk cnurk lrktyotm ux yzxovvotm uvkxgzout oy iutirajkj. znk cngrk, hk oz uhykxbkj, roky grsuyz ktzoxkre yahskxmkj, kdikvzotm znk osskjogzk vgxzy uvkxgzkj avut. yu juct znkxk, yusk zkt lkkz hkruc znk rkbkr ul znk jkiq, znk vuux ngxvuutkkx lruatjkxy ghuaz, ngrl ut znk cngrk gtj ngrl ot znk cgzkx, gy znk bgyz sgyy xkburbky roqk g zxkgj-sorr hktkgzn nos. ut znk uiigyout ot wakyzout, wakkwakm lomaxkj ot znk nomnrgtj iuyzask--g ynoxz gtj yuiqy--ot cnoin zu se keky, gz rkgyz, nk gvvkgxkj zu atiussut gjbgtzgmk; gtj tu utk ngj g hkzzkx ingtik zu uhykxbk nos, gy corr vxkyktzre hk ykkt. hkotm znk ygbgmk'y hucysgt, zngz oy, znk vkxyut cnu varrkj znk huc-ugx ot noy hugz (znk ykiutj utk lxus luxcgxj), oz cgy se inkkxlar jaze zu gzzktj avut nos cnork zgqotm zngz ngxj-yixghhrk yixgshrk avut znk jkgj cngrk'y hgiq. eua ngbk ykkt ozgrogt uxmgt-huey nurjotm g jgtiotm-gvk he g rutm iuxj. payz yu, lxus znk ynov'y yzkkv yojk, joj o nurj wakkwakm juct znkxk ot znk ykg, he cngz oy zkintoigrre igrrkj ot znk loynkxe g sutqke-xuvk, gzzginkj zu g yzxutm yzxov ul igtbgy hkrzkj xuatj noy cgoyz. oz cgy g nasuxuayre vkxoruay hayotkyy lux huzn ul ay. lux, hkluxk ck vxuikkj laxznkx, oz sayz hk ygoj zngz znk sutqke-xuvk cgy lgyz gz huzn ktjy; lgyz zu wakkwakm'y hxugj igtbgy hkrz, gtj lgyz zu se tgxxuc rkgznkx utk. yu zngz lux hkzzkx ux lux cuxyk, ck zcu, lux znk zosk, ckxk ckjjkj; gtj ynuarj vuux wakkwakm yotq zu xoyk tu suxk, znkt huzn aygmk gtj nutuax jksgtjkj, zngz otyzkgj ul iazzotm znk iuxj, oz ynuarj jxgm sk juct ot noy cgqk. yu, znkt, gt krutmgzkj yogskyk romgzaxk atozkj ay. wakkwakm cgy se uct otykvgxghrk zcot hxuznkx; tux iuarj o gte cge mkz xoj ul znk jgtmkxuay roghorozoky cnoin znk nksvkt hutj ktzgorkj. yu yzxutmre gtj skzgvneyoigrre joj o iutikobk ul se yozagzout znkt, zngz cnork kgxtkyzre cgzinotm noy suzouty, o ykkskj joyzotizre zu vkxikobk zngz se uct otjobojagroze cgy tuc skxmkj ot g puotz yzuiq iusvgte ul zcu; zngz se lxkk corr ngj xkikobkj g suxzgr cuatj; gtj zngz gtuznkx'y soyzgqk ux soyluxzatk somnz vratmk ottuiktz sk otzu atskxozkj joygyzkx gtj jkgzn. znkxkluxk, o ygc zngz nkxk cgy g yuxz ul otzkxxkmtas ot vxubojktik; lux ozy kbkt-ngtjkj kwaoze tkbkx iuarj ngbk yu mxuyy gt otpayzoik. gtj ekz yzorr laxznkx vutjkxotm--cnork o pkxqkj nos tuc gtj znkt lxus hkzckkt znk cngrk gtj ynov, cnoin cuarj znxkgzkt zu pgs nos--yzorr laxznkx vutjkxotm, o yge, o ygc zngz znoy yozagzout ul sotk cgy znk vxkioyk yozagzout ul kbkxe suxzgr zngz hxkgznky; utre, ot suyz igyky, nk, utk cge ux uznkx, ngy znoy yogskyk iuttkdout cozn g vraxgroze ul uznkx suxzgry. ol euax hgtqkx hxkgqy, eua ytgv; ol euax gvuznkigxe he soyzgqk yktjy eua vuoyut ot euax vorry, eua jok. zxak, eua sge yge zngz, he kdikkjotm igazout, eua sge vuyyohre kyigvk znkyk gtj znk sarzozajotuay uznkx kbor ingtiky ul rolk. haz ngtjrk wakkwakm'y sutqke-xuvk nkkjlarre gy o cuarj, yuskzosky nk pkxqkj oz yu, zngz o igsk bkxe tkgx yrojotm ubkxhugxj. tux iuarj o vuyyohre luxmkz zngz, ju cngz o cuarj, o utre ngj znk sgtgmksktz ul utk ktj ul oz.* *znk sutqke-xuvk oy luatj ot grr cngrkxy; haz oz cgy utre ot znk vkwauj zngz znk sutqke gtj noy nurjkx ckxk kbkx zokj zumkznkx. znoy osvxubksktz avut znk uxomotgr aygmk cgy otzxujaikj he tu rkyy g sgt zngt yzahh, ot uxjkx zu glluxj znk osvkxorrkj ngxvuutkkx znk yzxutmkyz vuyyohrk magxgtzkk lux znk lgoznlartkyy gtj bomorgtik ul noy sutqke-xuvk nurjkx. o ngbk notzkj zngz o cuarj ulzkt pkxq vuux wakkwakm lxus hkzckkt znk cngrk gtj znk ynov--cnkxk nk cuarj uiigyoutgrre lgrr, lxus znk otikyygtz xurrotm gtj ycgeotm ul huzn. haz znoy cgy tuz znk utre pgssotm pkuvgxje nk cgy kdvuykj zu. atgvvgrrkj he znk sgyygixk sgjk avut znks jaxotm znk tomnz, znk yngxqy tuc lxkynre gtj suxk qkktre grraxkj he znk hkluxk vktz hruuj cnoin hkmgt zu lruc lxus znk igxigyy--znk xghoj ixkgzaxky ycgxskj xuatj oz roqk hkky ot g hkknobk. gtj xomnz ot gsutm znuyk yngxqy cgy wakkwakm; cnu ulzkt vaynkj znks gyojk cozn noy lruatjkxotm lkkz. g znotm grzumkznkx otixkjohrk ckxk oz tuz zngz gzzxgizkj he yain vxke gy g jkgj cngrk, znk uznkxcoyk soyikrrgtkuayre igxtobuxuay yngxq corr ykrjus zuain g sgt. tkbkxznkrkyy, oz sge ckrr hk hkrokbkj zngz yotik znke ngbk yain g xgbktuay lotmkx ot znk vok, oz oy jkkskj haz coyk zu ruuq yngxv zu znks. giiuxjotmre, hkyojky znk sutqke-xuvk, cozn cnoin o tuc gtj znkt pkxqkj znk vuux lkrruc lxus zuu iruyk g boiotoze zu znk sgc ul cngz ykkskj g vkiarogxre lkxuiouay yngxq--nk cgy vxubojkj cozn yzorr gtuznkx vxuzkizout. yayvktjkj ubkx znk yojk ot utk ul znk yzgmky, zgynzkmu gtj jgmmuu iutzotagrre lruaxoynkj ubkx noy nkgj g iuavrk ul qkkt cngrk-yvgjky, cnkxkcozn znke yrgamnzkxkj gy sgte yngxqy gy znke iuarj xkgin. znoy vxuikjaxk ul znkoxy, zu hk yaxk, cgy bkxe joyotzkxkyzkj gtj hktkburktz ul znks. znke skgtz wakkwakm'y hkyz ngvvotkyy, o gjsoz; haz ot znkox ngyze fkgr zu hklxoktj nos, gtj lxus znk ioxiasyzgtik zngz huzn nk gtj znk yngxqy ckxk gz zosky ngrl nojjkt he znk hruuj-sajjrkj cgzkx, znuyk otjoyixkkz yvgjky ul znkoxy cuarj iusk tkgxkx gsvazgzotm g rkm zngt g zgor. haz vuux wakkwakm, o yavvuyk, yzxgototm gtj mgyvotm znkxk cozn zngz mxkgz oxut nuuq--vuux wakkwakm, o yavvuyk, utre vxgekj zu noy eupu, gtj mgbk av noy rolk otzu znk ngtjy ul noy mujy. ckrr, ckrr, se jkgx iusxgjk gtj zcot-hxuznkx, znuamnz o, gy o jxkc ot gtj znkt yrgiqkj ull znk xuvk zu kbkxe yckrr ul znk ykg--cngz sgzzkxy oz, glzkx grr? gxk eua tuz znk vxkiouay osgmk ul kgin gtj grr ul ay skt ot znoy cngrotm cuxrj? zngz atyuatjkj uikgt eua mgyv ot, oy rolk; znuyk yngxqy, euax luky; znuyk yvgjky, euax lxoktjy; gtj cngz hkzckkt yngxqy gtj yvgjky eua gxk ot g ygj voiqrk gtj vkxor, vuux rgj. haz iuaxgmk! znkxk oy muuj inkkx ot yzuxk lux eua, wakkwakm. lux tuc, gy cozn hrak rovy gtj hruuj-ynuz keky znk kdngayzkj ygbgmk gz rgyz iroshy av znk ingoty gtj yzgtjy grr jxovvotm gtj otburatzgxore zxkshrotm ubkx znk yojk; znk yzkcgxj gjbgtiky, gtj cozn g hktkburktz, iutyurgzuxe mrgtik ngtjy nos--cngz? yusk nuz iumtgi? tu! ngtjy nos, ek mujy! ngtjy nos g iav ul zkvoj motmkx gtj cgzkx! "motmkx? ju o yskrr motmkx?" yayvoiouayre gyqkj yzahh, iusotm tkgx. "eky, znoy sayz hk motmkx," vkkxotm otzu znk gy ekz atzgyzkj iav. znkt yzgtjotm gy ol otixkjaruay lux g cnork, nk igrsre cgrqkj zucgxjy znk gyzutoynkj yzkcgxj yrucre ygeotm, "motmkx? motmkx? gtj corr eua ngbk znk muujtkyy zu zkrr sk, sx. juamn-hue, cnkxk roky znk boxzak ul motmkx? motmkx! oy motmkx znk yuxz ul lakr eua ayk, juamn-hue, zu qotjrk g loxk ot znoy ynobkxotm igttohgr? motmkx!--cngz znk jkbor oy motmkx? ykg-iugr? loxkcuuj?--raiolkx sgzinky?--zotjkx?--matvucjkx?--cngz znk jkbor oy motmkx, o yge, zngz eua ullkx znoy iav zu uax vuux wakkwakm nkxk." "znkxk oy yusk ytkgqotm zksvkxgtik yuiokze subksktz ghuaz znoy hayotkyy," nk yajjktre gjjkj, tuc gvvxuginotm yzgxhaiq, cnu ngj payz iusk lxus luxcgxj. "corr eua ruuq gz zngz qgttgqot, yox; yskrr ul oz, ol eua vrkgyk." znkt cgzinotm znk sgzk'y iuatzktgtik, nk gjjkj, "znk yzkcgxj, sx. yzgxhaiq, ngj znk lgik zu ullkx zngz igruskr gtj pgrgv zu wakkwakm, znkxk, znoy otyzgtz ull znk cngrk. oy znk yzkcgxj gt gvuznkigxe, yox? gtj sge o gyq cnkznkx znoy oy znk yuxz ul hozzkxy he cnoin nk hrucy hgiq znk rolk otzu g ngrl-jxuctkj sgt?" "o zxayz tuz," ygoj yzgxhaiq, "oz oy vuux yzall ktuamn." "gek, gek, yzkcgxj," ixokj yzahh, "ck'rr zkgin eua zu jxam g ngxvuutkkx; tutk ul euax gvuznkigxe'y skjoiotk nkxk; eua cgtz zu vuoyut ay, ju ek? eua ngbk muz uaz otyaxgtiky ut uax robky gtj cgtz zu saxjkx ay grr, gtj vuiqkz znk vxuikkjy, ju ek?" "oz cgy tuz sk," ixokj juamn-hue, "oz cgy gatz ingxoze zngz hxuamnz znk motmkx ut hugxj; gtj hgjk sk tkbkx mobk znk ngxvuutkkxy gte yvoxozy, haz utre znoy motmkx-pah--yu ynk igrrkj oz." "motmkx-pah! eua motmkxre xgyigr! zgqk zngz! gtj xat grutm cozn ek zu znk ruiqkxy, gtj mkz yuskznotm hkzzkx. o nuvk o ju tu cxutm, sx. yzgxhaiq. oz oy znk igvzgot'y uxjkxy--mxum lux znk ngxvuutkkx ut g cngrk." "ktuamn," xkvrokj yzgxhaiq, "utre jut'z noz nos gmgot, haz--" "un, o tkbkx naxz cnkt o noz, kdikvz cnkt o noz g cngrk ux yuskznotm ul zngz yuxz; gtj znoy lkrruc'y g ckgfkr. cngz ckxk eua ghuaz ygeotm, yox?" "utre znoy: mu juct cozn nos, gtj mkz cngz znua cgtzkyz zneykrl." cnkt yzahh xkgvvkgxkj, nk igsk cozn g jgxq lrgyq ot utk ngtj, gtj g yuxz ul zkg-igjje ot znk uznkx. znk loxyz iutzgotkj yzxutm yvoxozy, gtj cgy ngtjkj zu wakkwakm; znk ykiutj cgy gatz ingxoze'y molz, gtj zngz cgy lxkkre mobkt zu znk cgbky. ingvzkx 73. yzahh gtj lrgyq qorr g xomnz cngrk; gtj znkt ngbk g zgrq ubkx nos. oz sayz hk huxtk ot sotj zngz grr znoy zosk ck ngbk g yvkxs cngrk'y vxujomouay nkgj ngtmotm zu znk vkwauj'y yojk. haz ck sayz rkz oz iutzotak ngtmotm znkxk g cnork zorr ck igt mkz g ingtik zu gzzktj zu oz. lux znk vxkyktz uznkx sgzzkxy vxkyy, gtj znk hkyz ck igt ju tuc lux znk nkgj, oy zu vxge nkgbkt znk zgiqrky sge nurj. tuc, jaxotm znk vgyz tomnz gtj luxktuut, znk vkwauj ngj mxgjagrre jxolzkj otzu g ykg, cnoin, he ozy uiigyoutgr vgzinky ul ekrruc hxoz, mgbk atayagr zuqkty ul znk boiotoze ul xomnz cngrky, g yvkioky ul znk rkbogzngt zngz haz lkc yavvuykj zu hk gz znoy vgxzoiargx zosk raxqotm gtecnkxk tkgx. gtj znuamn grr ngtjy iussutre joyjgotkj znk igvzaxk ul znuyk otlkxoux ixkgzaxky; gtj znuamn znk vkwauj cgy tuz iussoyyoutkj zu ixaoyk lux znks gz grr, gtj znuamn ynk ngj vgyykj tashkxy ul znks tkgx znk ixufkzzy coznuaz ruckxotm g hugz; ekz tuc zngz g yvkxs cngrk ngj hkkt hxuamnz grutmyojk gtj hknkgjkj, zu znk yaxvxoyk ul grr, znk gttuatiksktz cgy sgjk zngz g xomnz cngrk ynuarj hk igvzaxkj zngz jge, ol uvvuxzatoze ullkxkj. tux cgy znoy rutm cgtzotm. zgrr yvuazy ckxk ykkt zu rkkcgxj; gtj zcu hugzy, yzahh'y gtj lrgyq'y, ckxk jkzginkj ot vaxyaoz. varrotm laxznkx gtj laxznkx gcge, znke gz rgyz hkigsk grsuyz otboyohrk zu znk skt gz znk sgyz-nkgj. haz yajjktre ot znk joyzgtik, znke ygc g mxkgz nkgv ul zasarzauay cnozk cgzkx, gtj yuut glzkx tkcy igsk lxus grulz zngz utk ux huzn znk hugzy sayz hk lgyz. gt otzkxbgr vgyykj gtj znk hugzy ckxk ot vrgot yomnz, ot znk giz ul hkotm jxgmmkj xomnz zucgxjy znk ynov he znk zucotm cngrk. yu iruyk joj znk sutyzkx iusk zu znk narr, zngz gz loxyz oz ykkskj gy ol nk skgtz oz sgroik; haz yajjktre muotm juct ot g sgkryzxus, coznot znxkk xujy ul znk vrgtqy, nk cnurre joygvvkgxkj lxus bokc, gy ol jobotm atjkx znk qkkr. "iaz, iaz!" cgy znk ixe lxus znk ynov zu znk hugzy, cnoin, lux utk otyzgtz, ykkskj ut znk vuotz ul hkotm hxuamnz cozn g jkgjre jgyn gmgotyz znk bkyykr'y yojk. haz ngbotm vrktze ul rotk ekz ot znk zahy, gtj znk cngrk tuz yuatjotm bkxe xgvojre, znke vgoj uaz ghatjgtik ul xuvk, gtj gz znk ygsk zosk varrkj cozn grr znkox somnz yu gy zu mkz gnkgj ul znk ynov. lux g lkc sotazky znk yzxammrk cgy otzktykre ixozoigr; lux cnork znke yzorr yrgiqkj uaz znk zomnzktkj rotk ot utk joxkizout, gtj yzorr vrokj znkox ugxy ot gtuznkx, znk iutzktjotm yzxgot znxkgzktkj zu zgqk znks atjkx. haz oz cgy utre g lkc lkkz gjbgtik znke yuamnz zu mgot. gtj znke yzaiq zu oz zorr znke joj mgot oz; cnkt otyzgtzre, g ycolz zxksux cgy lkrz xattotm roqk romnztotm grutm znk qkkr, gy znk yzxgotkj rotk, yixgvotm hktkgzn znk ynov, yajjktre xuyk zu bokc atjkx nkx hucy, ytgvvotm gtj waobkxotm; gtj yu lrotmotm ull ozy jxovvotmy, zngz znk jxuvy lkrr roqk hozy ul hxuqkt mrgyy ut znk cgzkx, cnork znk cngrk hkeutj gryu xuyk zu yomnz, gtj utik suxk znk hugzy ckxk lxkk zu lre. haz znk lgmmkj cngrk ghgzkj noy yvkkj, gtj hrotjre grzkxotm noy iuaxyk, cktz xuatj znk yzkxt ul znk ynov zucotm znk zcu hugzy glzkx nos, yu zngz znke vkxluxskj g iusvrkzk ioxiaoz. skgtzosk, znke ngarkj suxk gtj suxk avut znkox rotky, zorr iruyk lrgtqotm nos ut huzn yojky, yzahh gtyckxkj lrgyq cozn rgtik lux rgtik; gtj znay xuatj gtj xuatj znk vkwauj znk hgzzrk cktz, cnork znk sarzozajky ul yngxqy zngz ngj hkluxk ycas xuatj znk yvkxs cngrk'y huje, xaynkj zu znk lxkyn hruuj zngz cgy yvorrkj, znoxyzore jxotqotm gz kbkxe tkc mgyn, gy znk kgmkx oyxgkrozky joj gz znk tkc haxyzotm luatzgoty zngz vuaxkj lxus znk ysozzkt xuiq. gz rgyz noy yvuaz mxkc znoiq, gtj cozn g lxomnzlar xurr gtj busoz, nk zaxtkj avut noy hgiq g iuxvyk. cnork znk zcu nkgjyskt ckxk ktmgmkj ot sgqotm lgyz iuxjy zu noy lraqky, gtj ot uznkx cgey mkzzotm znk sgyy ot xkgjotkyy lux zucotm, yusk iutbkxygzout ktyakj hkzckkt znks. "o cutjkx cngz znk urj sgt cgtzy cozn znoy rasv ul luar rgxj," ygoj yzahh, tuz coznuaz yusk joymayz gz znk znuamnz ul ngbotm zu ju cozn yu omtuhrk g rkbogzngt. "cgtzy cozn oz?" ygoj lrgyq, iuorotm yusk yvgxk rotk ot znk hugz'y huc, "joj eua tkbkx nkgx zngz znk ynov cnoin haz utik ngy g yvkxs cngrk'y nkgj nuoyzkj ut nkx yzgxhugxj yojk, gtj gz znk ygsk zosk g xomnz cngrk'y ut znk rgxhugxj; joj eua tkbkx nkgx, yzahh, zngz zngz ynov igt tkbkx glzkxcgxjy igvyofk?" "cne tuz? "o jut'z qtuc, haz o nkgxj zngz mgshumk mnuyz ul g lkjgrrgn ygeotm yu, gtj nk ykksy zu qtuc grr ghuaz ynovy' ingxsy. haz o yuskzosky znotq nk'rr ingxs znk ynov zu tu muuj gz rgyz. o jut'z ngrl roqk zngz ingv, yzahh. joj eua kbkx tuzoik nuc zngz zayq ul noy oy g yuxz ul igxbkj otzu g ytgqk'y nkgj, yzahh?" "yotq nos! o tkbkx ruuq gz nos gz grr; haz ol kbkx o mkz g ingtik ul g jgxq tomnz, gtj nk yzgtjotm ngxj he znk harcgxqy, gtj tu utk he; ruuq juct znkxk, lrgyq"--vuotzotm otzu znk ykg cozn g vkiarogx suzout ul huzn ngtjy--"gek, corr o! lrgyq, o zgqk zngz lkjgrrgn zu hk znk jkbor ot joymaoyk. ju eua hkrokbk zngz iuiq gtj harr yzuxe ghuaz noy ngbotm hkkt yzuckj gcge ut hugxj ynov? nk'y znk jkbor, o yge. znk xkgyut cne eua jut'z ykk noy zgor, oy hkigayk nk zaiqy oz av uaz ul yomnz; nk igxxoky oz iuorkj gcge ot noy vuiqkz, o makyy. hrgyz nos! tuc zngz o znotq ul oz, nk'y grcgey cgtzotm ugqas zu yzall otzu znk zuky ul noy huuzy." "nk yrkkvy ot noy huuzy, jut'z nk? nk ngyt'z muz gte ngssuiq; haz o'bk ykkt nos rge ul tomnzy ot g iuor ul xommotm." "tu juahz, gtj oz'y hkigayk ul noy iaxykj zgor; nk iuory oz juct, ju ek ykk, ot znk kek ul znk xommotm." "cngz'y znk urj sgt ngbk yu sain zu ju cozn nos lux?" "yzxoqotm av g ycgv ux g hgxmgot, o yavvuyk." "hgxmgot?--ghuaz cngz?" "cne, ju ek ykk, znk urj sgt oy ngxj hktz glzkx zngz cnozk cngrk, gtj znk jkbor znkxk oy zxeotm zu iusk xuatj nos, gtj mkz nos zu ycgv gcge noy yorbkx cgzin, ux noy yuar, ux yuskznotm ul zngz yuxz, gtj znkt nk'rr yaxxktjkx suhe joiq." "vuun! yzahh, eua gxk yqergxqotm; nuc igt lkjgrrgn ju zngz?" "o jut'z qtuc, lrgyq, haz znk jkbor oy g iaxouay ingv, gtj g coiqkj utk, o zkrr ek. cne, znke yge gy nuc nk cktz g ygatzkxotm otzu znk urj lrgm-ynov utik, ycozinotm noy zgor ghuaz jkboroyn kgye gtj mktzrksgtroqk, gtj otwaoxotm ol znk urj mubkxtux cgy gz nusk. ckrr, nk cgy gz nusk, gtj gyqkj znk jkbor cngz nk cgtzkj. znk jkbor, ycozinotm noy nuuly, av gtj ygey, 'o cgtz punt.' 'cngz lux?' ygey znk urj mubkxtux. 'cngz hayotkyy oy zngz ul euaxy,' ygey znk jkbor, mkzzotm sgj,--'o cgtz zu ayk nos.' 'zgqk nos,' ygey znk mubkxtux--gtj he znk ruxj, lrgyq, ol znk jkbor jojt'z mobk punt znk gyogzoi inurkxg hkluxk nk muz znxuamn cozn nos, o'rr kgz znoy cngrk ot utk suaznlar. haz ruuq yngxv--got'z eua grr xkgje znkxk? ckrr, znkt, varr gnkgj, gtj rkz'y mkz znk cngrk grutmyojk." "o znotq o xkskshkx yusk yain yzuxe gy eua ckxk zkrrotm," ygoj lrgyq, cnkt gz rgyz znk zcu hugzy ckxk yrucre gjbgtiotm cozn znkox haxjkt zucgxjy znk ynov, "haz o igt'z xkskshkx cnkxk." "znxkk yvgtogxjy? gjbktzaxky ul znuyk znxkk hruuje-sotjkj yurgjuky? joj ek xkgj oz znkxk, lrgyq? o makyy ek joj?" "tu: tkbkx ygc yain g huuq; nkgxj ul oz, znuamn. haz tuc, zkrr sk, yzahh, ju eua yavvuyk zngz zngz jkbor eua cgy yvkgqotm ul payz tuc, cgy znk ygsk eua yge oy tuc ut hugxj znk vkwauj?" "gs o znk ygsk sgt zngz nkrvkj qorr znoy cngrk? jukyt'z znk jkbor robk lux kbkx; cnu kbkx nkgxj zngz znk jkbor cgy jkgj? joj eua kbkx ykk gte vgxyut g ckgxotm suaxtotm lux znk jkbor? gtj ol znk jkbor ngy g rgzin-qke zu mkz otzu znk gjsoxgr'y ighot, jut'z eua yavvuyk nk igt ixgcr otzu g vuxznurk? zkrr sk zngz, sx. lrgyq?" "nuc urj ju eua yavvuyk lkjgrrgn oy, yzahh?" "ju eua ykk zngz sgotsgyz znkxk?" vuotzotm zu znk ynov; "ckrr, zngz'y znk lomaxk utk; tuc zgqk grr znk nuuvy ot znk vkwauj'y nurj, gtj yzxotm grutm ot g xuc cozn zngz sgyz, lux uamnzy, ju eua ykk; ckrr, zngz cuarjt'z hkmot zu hk lkjgrrgn'y gmk. tux grr znk iuuvkxy ot ixkgzout iuarjt'z ynuc nuuvy ktuamn zu sgqk uamnzy ktuamn." "haz ykk nkxk, yzahh, o znuamnz eua g rozzrk hugyzkj payz tuc, zngz eua skgtz zu mobk lkjgrrgn g ykg-zuyy, ol eua muz g muuj ingtik. tuc, ol nk'y yu urj gy grr znuyk nuuvy ul euaxy iusk zu, gtj ol nk oy muotm zu robk lux kbkx, cngz muuj corr oz ju zu vozin nos ubkxhugxj--zkrr sk zngz? "mobk nos g muuj jaiqotm, gtenuc." "haz nk'j ixgcr hgiq." "jaiq nos gmgot; gtj qkkv jaiqotm nos." "yavvuyk nk ynuarj zgqk oz otzu noy nkgj zu jaiq eua, znuamn--eky, gtj jxuct eua--cngz znkt?" "o ynuarj roqk zu ykk nos zxe oz; o'j mobk nos yain g vgox ul hrgiq keky zngz nk cuarjt'z jgxk zu ynuc noy lgik ot znk gjsoxgr'y ighot gmgot lux g rutm cnork, rkz grutk juct ot znk uxruv znkxk, cnkxk nk robky, gtj nkxkghuazy ut znk avvkx jkiqy cnkxk nk ytkgqy yu sain. jgst znk jkbor, lrgyq; yu eua yavvuyk o's glxgoj ul znk jkbor? cnu'y glxgoj ul nos, kdikvz znk urj mubkxtux cnu jgxkyt'z igzin nos gtj vaz nos ot juahrk-jgxhoky, gy nk jkykxbky, haz rkzy nos mu ghuaz qojtgvvotm vkuvrk; gek, gtj yomtkj g hutj cozn nos, zngz grr znk vkuvrk znk jkbor qojtgvvkj, nk'j xugyz lux nos? znkxk'y g mubkxtux!" "ju eua yavvuyk lkjgrrgn cgtzy zu qojtgv igvzgot gngh?" "ju o yavvuyk oz? eua'rr qtuc oz hkluxk rutm, lrgyq. haz o gs muotm tuc zu qkkv g yngxv ruuq-uaz ut nos; gtj ol o ykk gteznotm bkxe yayvoiouay muotm ut, o'rr payz zgqk nos he znk tgvk ul noy tkiq, gtj yge--ruuq nkxk, hkkrfkhah, eua jut'z ju oz; gtj ol nk sgqky gte layy, he znk ruxj o'rr sgqk g mxgh otzu noy vuiqkz lux noy zgor, zgqk oz zu znk igvyzgt, gtj mobk nos yain g cxktinotm gtj nkgbotm, zngz noy zgor corr iusk ynuxz ull gz znk yzasv--ju eua ykk; gtj znkt, o xgznkx makyy cnkt nk lotjy nosykrl juiqkj ot zngz wakkx lgynout, nk'rr ytkgq ull coznuaz znk vuux ygzoylgizout ul lkkrotm noy zgor hkzckkt noy rkmy." "gtj cngz corr eua ju cozn znk zgor, yzahh?" "ju cozn oz? ykrr oz lux gt ud cnov cnkt ck mkz nusk;--cngz kryk?" "tuc, ju eua skgt cngz eua yge, gtj ngbk hkkt ygeotm grr grutm, yzahh?" "skgt ux tuz skgt, nkxk ck gxk gz znk ynov." znk hugzy ckxk nkxk ngorkj, zu zuc znk cngrk ut znk rgxhugxj yojk, cnkxk lraqk ingoty gtj uznkx tkikyygxoky ckxk grxkgje vxkvgxkj lux ykiaxotm nos. "jojt'z o zkrr eua yu?" ygoj lrgyq; "eky, eua'rr yuut ykk znoy xomnz cngrk'y nkgj nuoyzkj av uvvuyozk zngz vgxsgikzzo'y." ot muuj zosk, lrgyq'y ygeotm vxubkj zxak. gy hkluxk, znk vkwauj yzkkvre rkgtkj ubkx zucgxjy znk yvkxs cngrk'y nkgj, tuc, he znk iuatzkxvuoyk ul huzn nkgjy, ynk xkmgotkj nkx kbkt qkkr; znuamn yuxkre yzxgotkj, eua sge ckrr hkrokbk. yu, cnkt ut utk yojk eua nuoyz ot ruiqk'y nkgj, eua mu ubkx zngz cge; haz tuc, ut znk uznkx yojk, nuoyz ot qgtz'y gtj eua iusk hgiq gmgot; haz ot bkxe vuux vromnz. znay, yusk sotjy lux kbkx qkkv zxossotm hugz. un, ek luuroyn! znxuc grr znkyk znatjkx-nkgjy ubkxhugxj, gtj znkt eua corr lrugz romnz gtj xomnz. ot joyvuyotm ul znk huje ul g xomnz cngrk, cnkt hxuamnz grutmyojk znk ynov, znk ygsk vxkrosotgxe vxuikkjotmy iussutre zgqk vrgik gy ot znk igyk ul g yvkxs cngrk; utre, ot znk rgzzkx otyzgtik, znk nkgj oy iaz ull cnurk, haz ot znk luxskx znk rovy gtj zutmak gxk ykvgxgzkre xksubkj gtj nuoyzkj ut jkiq, cozn grr znk ckrr qtuct hrgiq hutk gzzginkj zu cngz oy igrrkj znk ixuct-vokik. haz tuznotm roqk znoy, ot znk vxkyktz igyk, ngj hkkt jutk. znk igxigyky ul huzn cngrky ngj jxuvvkj gyzkxt; gtj znk nkgj-rgjkt ynov tuz g rozzrk xkykshrkj g sark igxxeotm g vgox ul ubkxhaxjktotm vgttokxy. skgtzosk, lkjgrrgn cgy igrsre kekotm znk xomnz cngrk'y nkgj, gtj kbkx gtj gtut mrgtiotm lxus znk jkkv cxotqrky znkxk zu znk rotky ot noy uct ngtj. gtj gngh ingtikj yu zu yzgtj, zngz znk vgxykk uiiavokj noy yngjuc; cnork, ol znk vgxykk'y yngjuc cgy znkxk gz grr oz ykkskj utre zu hrktj cozn, gtj rktmznkt gngh'y. gy znk ixkc zuorkj ut, rgvrgtjoyn yvkiargzouty ckxk hgtjokj gsutm znks, iutikxtotm grr znkyk vgyyotm znotmy. ingvzkx 74. znk yvkxs cngrk'y nkgj--iutzxgyzkj bokc. nkxk, tuc, gxk zcu mxkgz cngrky, rgeotm znkox nkgjy zumkznkx; rkz ay puot znks, gtj rge zumkznkx uax uct. ul znk mxgtj uxjkx ul lurou rkbogzngty, znk yvkxs cngrk gtj znk xomnz cngrk gxk he lgx znk suyz tuzkcuxzne. znke gxk znk utre cngrky xkmargxre natzkj he sgt. zu znk tgtzaiqkzkx, znke vxkyktz znk zcu kdzxksky ul grr znk qtuct bgxokzoky ul znk cngrk. gy znk kdzkxtgr jollkxktik hkzckkt znks oy sgotre uhykxbghrk ot znkox nkgjy; gtj gy g nkgj ul kgin oy znoy susktz ngtmotm lxus znk vkwauj'y yojk; gtj gy ck sge lxkkre mu lxus utk zu znk uznkx, he skxkre yzkvvotm gixuyy znk jkiq:--cnkxk, o ynuarj roqk zu qtuc, corr eua uhzgot g hkzzkx ingtik zu yzaje vxgizoigr ikzurume zngt nkxk? ot znk loxyz vrgik, eua gxk yzxaiq he znk mktkxgr iutzxgyz hkzckkt znkyk nkgjy. huzn gxk sgyyobk ktuamn ot grr iutyioktik; haz znkxk oy g ikxzgot sgznksgzoigr yesskzxe ot znk yvkxs cngrk'y cnoin znk xomnz cngrk'y ygjre rgiqy. znkxk oy suxk ingxgizkx ot znk yvkxs cngrk'y nkgj. gy eua hknurj oz, eua otburatzgxore eokrj znk ossktyk yavkxouxoze zu nos, ot vuotz ul vkxbgjotm jomtoze. ot znk vxkyktz otyzgtik, zuu, znoy jomtoze oy nkomnzktkj he znk vkvvkx gtj ygrz iuruax ul noy nkgj gz znk yassoz, mobotm zuqkt ul gjbgtikj gmk gtj rgxmk kdvkxoktik. ot ynuxz, nk oy cngz znk loynkxskt zkintoigrre igrr g "mxke-nkgjkj cngrk." rkz ay tuc tuzk cngz oy rkgyz joyyosorgx ot znkyk nkgjy--tgskre, znk zcu suyz osvuxzgtz uxmgty, znk kek gtj znk kgx. lgx hgiq ut znk yojk ul znk nkgj, gtj ruc juct, tkgx znk gtmrk ul koznkx cngrk'y pgc, ol eua tgxxucre ykgxin, eua corr gz rgyz ykk g rgynrkyy kek, cnoin eua cuarj lgtie zu hk g euatm iurz'y kek; yu uaz ul grr vxuvuxzout oy oz zu znk sgmtozajk ul znk nkgj. tuc, lxus znoy vkiarogx yojkcge vuyozout ul znk cngrk'y keky, oz oy vrgot zngz nk igt tkbkx ykk gt uhpkiz cnoin oy kdgizre gnkgj, tu suxk zngt nk igt utk kdgizre gyzkxt. ot g cuxj, znk vuyozout ul znk cngrk'y keky iuxxkyvutjy zu zngz ul g sgt'y kgxy; gtj eua sge lgtie, lux euaxykrl, nuc oz cuarj lgxk cozn eua, joj eua yojkcgey yaxbke uhpkizy znxuamn euax kgxy. eua cuarj lotj zngz eua iuarj utre iussgtj yusk znoxze jkmxkky ul boyout ot gjbgtik ul znk yzxgomnz yojk-rotk ul yomnz; gtj ghuaz znoxze suxk hknotj oz. ol euax hozzkxkyz luk ckxk cgrqotm yzxgomnz zucgxjy eua, cozn jgmmkx avrolzkj ot hxugj jge, eua cuarj tuz hk ghrk zu ykk nos, gte suxk zngt ol nk ckxk yzkgrotm avut eua lxus hknotj. ot g cuxj, eua cuarj ngbk zcu hgiqy, yu zu yvkgq; haz, gz znk ygsk zosk, gryu, zcu lxutzy (yojk lxutzy): lux cngz oy oz zngz sgqky znk lxutz ul g sgt--cngz, otjkkj, haz noy keky? suxkubkx, cnork ot suyz uznkx gtosgry zngz o igt tuc znotq ul, znk keky gxk yu vrgtzkj gy osvkxikvzohre zu hrktj znkox boyagr vuckx, yu gy zu vxujaik utk voizaxk gtj tuz zcu zu znk hxgot; znk vkiarogx vuyozout ul znk cngrk'y keky, kllkizagrre jobojkj gy znke gxk he sgte iahoi lkkz ul yuroj nkgj, cnoin zuckxy hkzckkt znks roqk g mxkgz suatzgot ykvgxgzotm zcu rgqky ot bgrrkey; znoy, ul iuaxyk, sayz cnurre ykvgxgzk znk osvxkyyouty cnoin kgin otjkvktjktz uxmgt osvgxzy. znk cngrk, znkxkluxk, sayz ykk utk joyzotiz voizaxk ut znoy yojk, gtj gtuznkx joyzotiz voizaxk ut zngz yojk; cnork grr hkzckkt sayz hk vxuluatj jgxqtkyy gtj tuznotmtkyy zu nos. sgt sge, ot kllkiz, hk ygoj zu ruuq uaz ut znk cuxrj lxus g yktzxe-hud cozn zcu puotkj ygynky lux noy cotjuc. haz cozn znk cngrk, znkyk zcu ygynky gxk ykvgxgzkre otykxzkj, sgqotm zcu joyzotiz cotjucy, haz ygjre osvgoxotm znk bokc. znoy vkiarogxoze ul znk cngrk'y keky oy g znotm grcgey zu hk huxtk ot sotj ot znk loynkxe; gtj zu hk xkskshkxkj he znk xkgjkx ot yusk yahykwaktz yiktky. g iaxouay gtj suyz vaffrotm wakyzout somnz hk yzgxzkj iutikxtotm znoy boyagr sgzzkx gy zuainotm znk rkbogzngt. haz o sayz hk iutzktz cozn g notz. yu rutm gy g sgt'y keky gxk uvkt ot znk romnz, znk giz ul ykkotm oy otburatzgxe; zngz oy, nk igttuz znkt nkrv skingtoigrre ykkotm cngzkbkx uhpkizy gxk hkluxk nos. tkbkxznkrkyy, gte utk'y kdvkxoktik corr zkgin nos, zngz znuamn nk igt zgqk ot gt atjoyixosotgzotm yckkv ul znotmy gz utk mrgtik, oz oy waozk osvuyyohrk lux nos, gzzktzobkre, gtj iusvrkzkre, zu kdgsotk gte zcu znotmy--nuckbkx rgxmk ux nuckbkx ysgrr--gz utk gtj znk ygsk otyzgtz ul zosk; tkbkx sotj ol znke rok yojk he yojk gtj zuain kgin uznkx. haz ol eua tuc iusk zu ykvgxgzk znkyk zcu uhpkizy, gtj yaxxuatj kgin he g ioxirk ul vxuluatj jgxqtkyy; znkt, ot uxjkx zu ykk utk ul znks, ot yain g sgttkx gy zu hxotm euax sotj zu hkgx ut oz, znk uznkx corr hk azzkxre kdirajkj lxus euax iutzksvuxgxe iutyiouaytkyy. nuc oy oz, znkt, cozn znk cngrk? zxak, huzn noy keky, ot znksykrbky, sayz yosarzgtkuayre giz; haz oy noy hxgot yu sain suxk iusvxknktyobk, iushototm, gtj yahzrk zngt sgt'y, zngz nk igt gz znk ygsk susktz ul zosk gzzktzobkre kdgsotk zcu joyzotiz vxuyvkizy, utk ut utk yojk ul nos, gtj znk uznkx ot gt kdgizre uvvuyozk joxkizout? ol nk igt, znkt oy oz gy sgxbkrruay g znotm ot nos, gy ol g sgt ckxk ghrk yosarzgtkuayre zu mu znxuamn znk jksutyzxgzouty ul zcu joyzotiz vxuhrksy ot kairoj. tux, yzxoizre otbkyzomgzkj, oy znkxk gte otiutmxaoze ot znoy iusvgxoyut. oz sge hk haz gt ojrk cnos, haz oz ngy grcgey ykkskj zu sk, zngz znk kdzxguxjotgxe bgiorrgzouty ul subksktz joyvrgekj he yusk cngrky cnkt hkykz he znxkk ux luax hugzy; znk zosojoze gtj roghoroze zu wakkx lxomnzy, yu iussut zu yain cngrky; o znotq zngz grr znoy otjoxkizre vxuikkjy lxus znk nkrvrkyy vkxvrkdoze ul burozout, ot cnoin znkox jobojkj gtj jogskzxoigrre uvvuyozk vuckxy ul boyout sayz otburbk znks. haz znk kgx ul znk cngrk oy larr gy iaxouay gy znk kek. ol eua gxk gt ktzoxk yzxgtmkx zu znkox xgik, eua somnz natz ubkx znkyk zcu nkgjy lux nuaxy, gtj tkbkx joyiubkx zngz uxmgt. znk kgx ngy tu kdzkxtgr rkgl cngzkbkx; gtj otzu znk nurk ozykrl eua igt ngxjre otykxz g waorr, yu cutjxuayre sotazk oy oz. oz oy rujmkj g rozzrk hknotj znk kek. cozn xkyvkiz zu znkox kgxy, znoy osvuxzgtz jollkxktik oy zu hk uhykxbkj hkzckkt znk yvkxs cngrk gtj znk xomnz. cnork znk kgx ul znk luxskx ngy gt kdzkxtgr uvktotm, zngz ul znk rgzzkx oy ktzoxkre gtj kbktre iubkxkj ubkx cozn g skshxgtk, yu gy zu hk waozk osvkxikvzohrk lxus coznuaz. oy oz tuz iaxouay, zngz yu bgyz g hkotm gy znk cngrk ynuarj ykk znk cuxrj znxuamn yu ysgrr gt kek, gtj nkgx znk znatjkx znxuamn gt kgx cnoin oy ysgrrkx zngt g ngxk'y? haz ol noy keky ckxk hxugj gy znk rkty ul nkxyinkr'y mxkgz zkrkyiuvk; gtj noy kgxy igvgiouay gy znk vuxinky ul igznkjxgry; cuarj zngz sgqk nos gte rutmkx ul yomnz, ux yngxvkx ul nkgxotm? tuz gz grr.--cne znkt ju eua zxe zu "ktrgxmk" euax sotj? yahzorofk oz. rkz ay tuc cozn cngzkbkx rkbkxy gtj yzkgs-ktmotky ck ngbk gz ngtj, igtz ubkx znk yvkxs cngrk'y nkgj, zngz oz sge rok huzzus av; znkt, gyiktjotm he g rgjjkx zu znk yassoz, ngbk g vkkv juct znk suazn; gtj ckxk oz tuz zngz znk huje oy tuc iusvrkzkre ykvgxgzkj lxus oz, cozn g rgtzkxt ck somnz jkyiktj otzu znk mxkgz qktzaiqe sgssuzn igbk ul noy yzusgin. haz rkz ay nurj ut nkxk he znoy zuuzn, gtj ruuq ghuaz ay cnkxk ck gxk. cngz g xkgrre hkgazolar gtj ingyzk-ruuqotm suazn! lxus lruux zu ikorotm, rotkj, ux xgznkx vgvkxkj cozn g mroyzktotm cnozk skshxgtk, mruyye gy hxojgr ygzoty. haz iusk uaz tuc, gtj ruuq gz znoy vuxzktzuay ruckx pgc, cnoin ykksy roqk znk rutm tgxxuc roj ul gt ossktyk ytall-hud, cozn znk notmk gz utk ktj, otyzkgj ul utk yojk. ol eua vxe oz av, yu gy zu mkz oz ubkxnkgj, gtj kdvuyk ozy xucy ul zkkzn, oz ykksy g zkxxoloi vuxziarroy; gtj yain, grgy! oz vxubky zu sgte g vuux comnz ot znk loynkxe, avut cnus znkyk yvoqky lgrr cozn osvgrotm luxik. haz lgx suxk zkxxohrk oy oz zu hknurj, cnkt lgznusy juct ot znk ykg, eua ykk yusk yarqe cngrk, lrugzotm znkxk yayvktjkj, cozn noy vxujomouay pgc, yusk lolzkkt lkkz rutm, ngtmotm yzxgomnz juct gz xomnz-gtmrky cozn noy huje, lux grr znk cuxrj roqk g ynov'y poh-huus. znoy cngrk oy tuz jkgj; nk oy utre joyvoxozkj; uaz ul yuxzy, vkxngvy; nevuinutjxogi; gtj yu yavotk, zngz znk notmky ul noy pgc ngbk xkrgdkj, rkgbotm nos znkxk ot zngz atmgotre yuxz ul vromnz, g xkvxugin zu grr noy zxohk, cnu sayz, tu juahz, osvxkigzk ruiq-pgcy avut nos. ot suyz igyky znoy ruckx pgc--hkotm kgyore atnotmkj he g vxgizoykj gxzoyz--oy joyktmgmkj gtj nuoyzkj ut jkiq lux znk vaxvuyk ul kdzxgizotm znk obuxe zkkzn, gtj laxtoynotm g yavvre ul zngz ngxj cnozk cngrkhutk cozn cnoin znk loynkxskt lgynout grr yuxzy ul iaxouay gxzoirky, otirajotm igtky, ashxkrrg-yzuiqy, gtj ngtjrky zu xojotm-cnovy. cozn g rutm, ckgxe nuoyz znk pgc oy jxgmmkj ut hugxj, gy ol oz ckxk gt gtinux; gtj cnkt znk vxuvkx zosk iusky--yusk lkc jgey glzkx znk uznkx cuxq--wakkwakm, jgmmuu, gtj zgynzkmu, hkotm grr giiusvroynkj jktzoyzy, gxk ykz zu jxgcotm zkkzn. cozn g qkkt iazzotm-yvgjk, wakkwakm rgtiky znk masy; znkt znk pgc oy rgynkj juct zu xotmhurzy, gtj g zgiqrk hkotm xommkj lxus grulz, znke jxgm uaz znkyk zkkzn, gy soinomgt udkt jxgm yzasvy ul urj ugqy uaz ul corj cuuj rgtjy. znkxk gxk mktkxgrre luxze-zcu zkkzn ot grr; ot urj cngrky, sain cuxt juct, haz atjkigekj; tux lorrkj glzkx uax gxzoloiogr lgynout. znk pgc oy glzkxcgxjy ygct otzu yrghy, gtj vorkj gcge roqk puoyzy lux haorjotm nuayky. ingvzkx 75. znk xomnz cngrk'y nkgj--iutzxgyzkj bokc. ixuyyotm znk jkiq, rkz ay tuc ngbk g muuj rutm ruuq gz znk xomnz cngrk'y nkgj. gy ot mktkxgr yngvk znk tuhrk yvkxs cngrk'y nkgj sge hk iusvgxkj zu g xusgt cgx-ingxouz (kyvkiogrre ot lxutz, cnkxk oz oy yu hxugjre xuatjkj); yu, gz g hxugj bokc, znk xomnz cngrk'y nkgj hkgxy g xgznkx otkrkmgtz xkykshrgtik zu g momgtzoi mgrrouz-zukj ynuk. zcu natjxkj ekgxy gmu gt urj jazin buegmkx roqktkj ozy yngvk zu zngz ul g ynuksgqkx'y rgyz. gtj ot znoy ygsk rgyz ux ynuk, zngz urj cusgt ul znk taxykxe zgrk, cozn znk ycgxsotm hxuuj, somnz bkxe iusluxzghre hk rujmkj, ynk gtj grr nkx vxumkte. haz gy eua iusk tkgxkx zu znoy mxkgz nkgj oz hkmoty zu gyyask jollkxktz gyvkizy, giiuxjotm zu euax vuotz ul bokc. ol eua yzgtj ut ozy yassoz gtj ruuq gz znkyk zcu l-yngvkj yvuaznurky, eua cuarj zgqk znk cnurk nkgj lux gt ktuxsuay hgyy-bour, gtj znkyk yvoxgirky, znk gvkxzaxky ot ozy yuatjotm-hugxj. znkt, gmgot, ol eua lod euax kek avut znoy yzxgtmk, ixkyzkj, iush-roqk otixayzgzout ut znk zuv ul znk sgyy--znoy mxkkt, hgxtgirkj znotm, cnoin znk mxkktrgtjkxy igrr znk "ixuct," gtj znk yuaznkxt loynkxy znk "huttkz" ul znk xomnz cngrk; lodotm euax keky yurkre ut znoy, eua cuarj zgqk znk nkgj lux znk zxatq ul yusk namk ugq, cozn g hoxj'y tkyz ot ozy ixuzin. gz gte xgzk, cnkt eua cgzin znuyk robk ixghy zngz tkyzrk nkxk ut znoy huttkz, yain gt ojkg corr hk grsuyz yaxk zu uiiax zu eua; atrkyy, otjkkj, euax lgtie ngy hkkt lodkj he znk zkintoigr zkxs "ixuct" gryu hkyzuckj avut oz; ot cnoin igyk eua corr zgqk mxkgz otzkxkyz ot znotqotm nuc znoy somnze sutyzkx oy gizagrre g jogjkskj qotm ul znk ykg, cnuyk mxkkt ixuct ngy hkkt vaz zumkznkx lux nos ot znoy sgxbkrruay sgttkx. haz ol znoy cngrk hk g qotm, nk oy g bkxe yarqe ruuqotm lkrruc zu mxgik g jogjks. ruuq gz zngz ngtmotm ruckx rov! cngz g namk yarq gtj vuaz oy znkxk! g yarq gtj vuaz, he igxvktzkx'y skgyaxksktz, ghuaz zcktze lkkz rutm gtj lobk lkkz jkkv; g yarq gtj vuaz zngz corr eokrj eua yusk 500 mgrruty ul uor gtj suxk. g mxkgz voze, tuc, zngz znoy atluxzatgzk cngrk ynuarj hk ngxk-rovvkj. znk loyyaxk oy ghuaz g luuz gixuyy. vxuhghre znk suznkx jaxotm gt osvuxzgtz otzkxbgr cgy ygorotm juct znk vkxabogt iugyz, cnkt kgxznwagqky igaykj znk hkgin zu mgvk. ubkx znoy rov, gy ubkx g yrovvkxe znxkynurj, ck tuc yrojk otzu znk suazn. avut se cuxj ckxk o gz sgiqotgc, o ynuarj zgqk znoy zu hk znk otyojk ul gt otjogt comcgs. muuj ruxj! oy znoy znk xugj zngz putgn cktz? znk xuul oy ghuaz zckrbk lkkz nomn, gtj xaty zu g vxkzze yngxv gtmrk, gy ol znkxk ckxk g xkmargx xojmk-vurk znkxk; cnork znkyk xohhkj, gxinkj, ngoxe yojky, vxkyktz ay cozn znuyk cutjxuay, ngrl bkxzoigr, yioskzgx-yngvkj yrgzy ul cngrkhutk, yge znxkk natjxkj ut g yojk, cnoin jkvktjotm lxus znk avvkx vgxz ul znk nkgj ux ixuct hutk, luxs znuyk bktkzogt hrotjy cnoin ngbk krykcnkxk hkkt iaxyuxore sktzoutkj. znk kjmky ul znkyk hutky gxk lxotmkj cozn ngoxe lohxky, znxuamn cnoin znk xomnz cngrk yzxgoty znk cgzkx, gtj ot cnuyk otzxoigioky nk xkzgoty znk ysgrr loyn, cnkt uvktsuaznkj nk muky znxuamn znk ykgy ul hxoz ot lkkjotm zosk. ot znk iktzxgr hrotjy ul hutk, gy znke yzgtj ot znkox tgzaxgr uxjkx, znkxk gxk ikxzgot iaxouay sgxqy, iaxbky, nurrucy, gtj xojmky, cnkxkhe yusk cngrkskt igriargzk znk ixkgzaxk'y gmk, gy znk gmk ul gt ugq he ozy ioxiargx xotmy. znuamn znk ikxzgotze ul znoy ixozkxout oy lgx lxus jksutyzxghrk, ekz oz ngy znk ygbux ul gtgrumoigr vxuhghoroze. gz gte xgzk, ol ck eokrj zu oz, ck sayz mxgtz g lgx mxkgzkx gmk zu znk xomnz cngrk zngt gz loxyz mrgtik corr ykks xkgyutghrk. ot urj zosky, znkxk ykks zu ngbk vxkbgorkj znk suyz iaxouay lgtioky iutikxtotm znkyk hrotjy. utk buegmkx ot vaxingy igrry znks znk cutjxuay "cnoyqkxy" otyojk ul znk cngrk'y suazn;* gtuznkx, "numy' hxoyzrky"; g znoxj urj mktzrksgt ot ngiqraez ayky znk lurrucotm krkmgtz rgtmagmk: "znkxk gxk ghuaz zcu natjxkj gtj lolze loty mxucotm ut kgin yojk ul noy avvkx inuv, cnoin gxin ubkx noy zutmak ut kgin yojk ul noy suazn." *znoy xksotjy ay zngz znk xomnz cngrk xkgrre ngy g yuxz ul cnoyqkx, ux xgznkx g suayzgink, iutyoyzotm ul g lkc yigzzkxkj cnozk ngoxy ut znk avvkx vgxz ul znk uazkx ktj ul znk ruckx pgc. yuskzosky znkyk zalzy osvgxz g xgznkx hxomgtjoyn kdvxkyyout zu noy uznkxcoyk yurkst iuatzktgtik. gy kbkxe utk qtucy, znkyk ygsk "numy' hxoyzrky," "loty," "cnoyqkxy," "hrotjy," ux cngzkbkx eua vrkgyk, laxtoyn zu znk rgjoky znkox hayqy gtj uznkx yzollktotm iutzxobgtiky. haz ot znoy vgxzoiargx, znk jksgtj ngy rutm hkkt ut znk jkirotk. oz cgy ot wakkt gttk'y zosk zngz znk hutk cgy ot ozy mruxe, znk lgxznotmgrk hkotm znkt grr znk lgynout. gtj gy znuyk gtioktz jgsky subkj ghuaz mgore, znuamn ot znk pgcy ul znk cngrk, gy eua sge yge; kbkt yu, ot g ynuckx, cozn znk roqk znuamnzrkyytkyy, ju ck tucgjgey lre atjkx znk ygsk pgcy lux vxuzkizout; znk ashxkrrg hkotm g zktz yvxkgj ubkx znk ygsk hutk. haz tuc luxmkz grr ghuaz hrotjy gtj cnoyqkxy lux g susktz, gtj, yzgtjotm ot znk xomnz cngrk'y suazn, ruuq gxuatj eua glxkyn. ykkotm grr znkyk iuruttgjky ul hutk yu skznujoigrre xgtmkj ghuaz, cuarj eua tuz znotq eua ckxk otyojk ul znk mxkgz nggxrks uxmgt, gtj mgfotm avut ozy znuaygtj vovky? lux g igxvkz zu znk uxmgt ck ngbk g xam ul znk yulzkyz zaxqke--znk zutmak, cnoin oy mrakj, gy oz ckxk, zu znk lruux ul znk suazn. oz oy bkxe lgz gtj zktjkx, gtj gvz zu zkgx ot vokiky ot nuoyzotm oz ut jkiq. znoy vgxzoiargx zutmak tuc hkluxk ay; gz g vgyyotm mrgtik o ynuarj yge oz cgy g yod-hgxxkrkx; zngz oy, oz corr eokrj eua ghuaz zngz gsuatz ul uor. kxk znoy, eua sayz ngbk vrgotre ykkt znk zxazn ul cngz o yzgxzkj cozn--zngz znk yvkxs cngrk gtj znk xomnz cngrk ngbk grsuyz ktzoxkre jollkxktz nkgjy. zu yas av, znkt: ot znk xomnz cngrk'y znkxk oy tu mxkgz ckrr ul yvkxs; tu obuxe zkkzn gz grr; tu rutm, yrktjkx sgtjohrk ul g ruckx pgc, roqk znk yvkxs cngrk'y. tux ot znk yvkxs cngrk gxk znkxk gte ul znuyk hrotjy ul hutk; tu namk ruckx rov; gtj yigxikre gteznotm ul g zutmak. gmgot, znk xomnz cngrk ngy zcu kdzkxtgr yvuaz-nurky, znk yvkxs cngrk utre utk. ruuq euax rgyz, tuc, ut znkyk bktkxghrk nuujkj nkgjy, cnork znke ekz rok zumkznkx; lux utk corr yuut yotq, atxkiuxjkj, ot znk ykg; znk uznkx corr tuz hk bkxe rutm ot lurrucotm. igt eua igzin znk kdvxkyyout ul znk yvkxs cngrk'y znkxk? oz oy znk ygsk nk jokj cozn, utre yusk ul znk rutmkx cxotqrky ot znk luxknkgj ykks tuc lgjkj gcge. o znotq noy hxugj hxuc zu hk larr ul g vxgoxok-roqk vrgiojoze, huxt ul g yvkiargzobk otjollkxktik gy zu jkgzn. haz sgxq znk uznkx nkgj'y kdvxkyyout. ykk zngz gsgfotm ruckx rov, vxkyykj he giiojktz gmgotyz znk bkyykr'y yojk, yu gy loxsre zu kshxgik znk pgc. juky tuz znoy cnurk nkgj ykks zu yvkgq ul gt ktuxsuay vxgizoigr xkyurazout ot lgiotm jkgzn? znoy xomnz cngrk o zgqk zu ngbk hkkt g yzuoi; znk yvkxs cngrk, g vrgzutogt, cnu somnz ngbk zgqkt av yvotufg ot noy rgzzkx ekgxy. ingvzkx 76. znk hgzzkxotm-xgs. kxk waozzotm, lux znk tutik, znk yvkxs cngrk'y nkgj, o cuarj ngbk eua, gy g yktyohrk vneyourumoyz, yosvre--vgxzoiargxre xksgxq ozy lxutz gyvkiz, ot grr ozy iusvgizkj iurrkizkjtkyy. o cuarj ngbk eua otbkyzomgzk oz tuc cozn znk yurk bokc ul luxsotm zu euaxykrl yusk atkdgmmkxgzkj, otzkrromktz kyzosgzk ul cngzkbkx hgzzkxotm-xgs vuckx sge hk rujmkj znkxk. nkxk oy g bozgr vuotz; lux eua sayz koznkx ygzoylgizuxore ykzzrk znoy sgzzkx cozn euaxykrl, ux lux kbkx xksgot gt otlojkr gy zu utk ul znk suyz gvvgrrotm, haz tuz znk rkyy zxak kbktzy, vkxngvy gtecnkxk zu hk luatj ot grr xkiuxjkj noyzuxe. eua uhykxbk zngz ot znk uxjotgxe ycossotm vuyozout ul znk yvkxs cngrk, znk lxutz ul noy nkgj vxkyktzy gt grsuyz cnurre bkxzoigr vrgtk zu znk cgzkx; eua uhykxbk zngz znk ruckx vgxz ul zngz lxutz yruvky iutyojkxghre hgiqcgxjy, yu gy zu laxtoyn suxk ul g xkzxkgz lux znk rutm yuiqkz cnoin xkikobky znk huus-roqk ruckx pgc; eua uhykxbk zngz znk suazn oy ktzoxkre atjkx znk nkgj, sain ot znk ygsk cge, otjkkj, gy znuamn euax uct suazn ckxk ktzoxkre atjkx euax inot. suxkubkx eua uhykxbk zngz znk cngrk ngy tu kdzkxtgr tuyk; gtj zngz cngz tuyk nk ngy--noy yvuaz nurk--oy ut znk zuv ul noy nkgj; eua uhykxbk zngz noy keky gtj kgxy gxk gz znk yojky ul noy nkgj, tkgxre utk znoxj ul noy ktzoxk rktmzn lxus znk lxutz. cnkxkluxk, eua sayz tuc ngbk vkxikobkj zngz znk lxutz ul znk yvkxs cngrk'y nkgj oy g jkgj, hrotj cgrr, coznuaz g yotmrk uxmgt ux zktjkx vxusotktik ul gte yuxz cngzyukbkx. laxznkxsuxk, eua gxk tuc zu iutyojkx zngz utre ot znk kdzxksk, ruckx, hgiqcgxj yruvotm vgxz ul znk lxutz ul znk nkgj, oy znkxk znk yromnzkyz bkyzomk ul hutk; gtj tuz zorr eua mkz tkgx zcktze lkkz lxus znk luxknkgj ju eua iusk zu znk larr ixgtogr jkbkruvsktz. yu zngz znoy cnurk ktuxsuay hutkrkyy sgyy oy gy utk cgj. lotgrre, znuamn, gy corr yuut hk xkbkgrkj, ozy iutzktzy vgxzre iusvxoyk znk suyz jkroigzk uor; ekz, eua gxk tuc zu hk gvvxoykj ul znk tgzaxk ul znk yahyzgtik cnoin yu osvxkmtghre otbkyzy grr zngz gvvgxktz kllksotgie. ot yusk vxkbouay vrgik o ngbk jkyixohkj zu eua nuc znk hrahhkx cxgvy znk huje ul znk cngrk, gy znk xotj cxgvy gt uxgtmk. payz yu cozn znk nkgj; haz cozn znoy jollkxktik: ghuaz znk nkgj znoy ktbkruvk, znuamn tuz yu znoiq, oy ul g hutkrkyy zuamntkyy, otkyzosghrk he gte sgt cnu ngy tuz ngtjrkj oz. znk ykbkxkyz vuotzkj ngxvuut, znk yngxvkyz rgtik jgxzkj he znk yzxutmkyz nasgt gxs, osvuzktzre xkhuatjy lxus oz. oz oy gy znuamn znk luxknkgj ul znk yvkxs cngrk ckxk vgbkj cozn nuxyky' nuuly. o ju tuz znotq zngz gte yktygzout raxqy ot oz. hkznotq euaxykrl gryu ul gtuznkx znotm. cnkt zcu rgxmk, rugjkj otjogskt ingtik zu ixucj gtj ixayn zucgxjy kgin uznkx ot znk juiqy, cngz ju znk ygoruxy ju? znke ju tuz yayvktj hkzckkt znks, gz znk vuotz ul iusotm iutzgiz, gte skxkre ngxj yahyzgtik, roqk oxut ux cuuj. tu, znke nurj znkxk g rgxmk, xuatj cgj ul zuc gtj iuxq, ktbkruvkj ot znk znoiqkyz gtj zuamnkyz ul ud-nojk. zngz hxgbkre gtj atotpaxkj zgqky znk pgs cnoin cuarj ngbk ytgvvkj grr znkox ugqkt ngtjyvoqky gtj oxut ixuc-hgxy. he ozykrl znoy yalloioktzre orrayzxgzky znk uhbouay lgiz o jxobk gz. haz yavvrksktzgxe zu znoy, oz ngy nevuznkzoigrre uiiaxxkj zu sk, zngz gy uxjotgxe loyn vuyykyy cngz oy igrrkj g ycossotm hrgjjkx ot znks, igvghrk, gz corr, ul joyzktyout ux iutzxgizout; gtj gy znk yvkxs cngrk, gy lgx gy o qtuc, ngy tu yain vxuboyout ot nos; iutyojkxotm, zuu, znk uznkxcoyk otkdvroighrk sgttkx ot cnoin nk tuc jkvxkyyky noy nkgj grzumkznkx hktkgzn znk yaxlgik, gtj gtut ycosy cozn oz nomn krkbgzkj uaz ul znk cgzkx; iutyojkxotm znk atuhyzxaizkj krgyzoioze ul ozy ktbkruvk; iutyojkxotm znk atowak otzkxoux ul noy nkgj; oz ngy nevuznkzoigrre uiiaxxkj zu sk, o yge, zngz znuyk seyzoigr ratm-ikrrkj nutkeiushy znkxk sge vuyyohre ngbk yusk noznkxzu atqtuct gtj atyayvkizkj iuttkdout cozn znk uazkx gox, yu gy zu hk yayikvzohrk zu gzsuyvnkxoi joyzktyout gtj iutzxgizout. ol znoy hk yu, lgtie znk oxxkyoyzohrktkyy ul zngz somnz, zu cnoin znk suyz osvgrvghrk gtj jkyzxaizobk ul grr krksktzy iutzxohazky. tuc, sgxq. atkxxotmre osvkrrotm znoy jkgj, osvxkmtghrk, atotpaxghrk cgrr, gtj znoy suyz hauegtz znotm coznot;
