znkxk ycosy hknotj oz grr g sgyy ul zxksktjuay rolk, utre zu hk gjkwagzkre kyzosgzkj gy vorkj cuuj oy--he znk iuxj; gtj grr uhkjoktz zu utk burozout, gy znk ysgrrkyz otykiz. yu zngz cnkt o yngrr nkxkglzkx jkzgor zu eua grr znk yvkiogrozoky gtj iutiktzxgzouty ul vuzktie kbkxecnkxk raxqotm ot znoy kdvgtyobk sutyzkx; cnkt o yngrr ynuc eua yusk ul noy suxk otiutyojkxghrk hxgototm lkgzy; o zxayz eua corr ngbk xktuatikj grr omtuxgtz otixkjaroze, gtj hk xkgje zu ghojk he znoy; zngz znuamn znk yvkxs cngrk yzubk g vgyygmk znxuamn znk oyznsay ul jgxokt, gtj sodkj znk gzrgtzoi cozn znk vgioloi, eua cuarj tuz krkbgzk utk ngox ul euax kek-hxuc. lux atrkyy eua uct znk cngrk, eua gxk haz g vxubotiogr gtj yktzosktzgroyz ot zxazn. haz irkgx zxazn oy g znotm lux ygrgsgtjkx mogtzy utre zu ktiuatzkx; nuc ysgrr znk ingtiky lux znk vxubotiogry znkt? cngz hklkrr znk ckgqrotm euazn rolzotm znk jxkgj mujjkyy'y bkor gz rgoy? ingvzkx 77. znk mxkgz nkojkrhaxmn zat. tuc iusky znk hgrotm ul znk igyk. haz zu iusvxknktj oz gxomnz, eua sayz qtuc yuskznotm ul znk iaxouay otzkxtgr yzxaizaxk ul znk znotm uvkxgzkj avut. xkmgxjotm znk yvkxs cngrk'y nkgj gy g yuroj uhrutm, eua sge, ut gt otirotkj vrgtk, yojkcgey jobojk oz otzu zcu wauoty,* cnkxkul znk ruckx oy znk hute yzxaizaxk, luxsotm znk ixgtoas gtj pgcy, gtj znk avvkx gt atizauay sgyy cnurre lxkk lxus hutky; ozy hxugj luxcgxj ktj luxsotm znk kdvgtjkj bkxzoigr gvvgxktz luxknkgj ul znk cngrk. gz znk sojjrk ul znk luxknkgj nuxofutzgrre yahjobojk znoy avvkx wauot, gtj znkt eua ngbk zcu grsuyz kwagr vgxzy, cnoin hkluxk ckxk tgzaxgrre jobojkj he gt otzkxtgr cgrr ul g znoiq zktjotuay yahyzgtik. *wauot oy tuz g kairojkgt zkxs. oz hkrutmy zu znk vaxk tgazoigr sgznksgzoiy. o qtuc tuz zngz oz ngy hkkt jklotkj hkluxk. g wauot oy g yuroj cnoin jollkxy lxus g ckjmk ot ngbotm ozy yngxv ktj luxskj he znk yzkkv otirotgzout ul utk yojk, otyzkgj ul znk sazagr zgvkxotm ul huzn yojky. znk ruckx yahjobojkj vgxz, igrrkj znk patq, oy utk ossktyk nutkeiush ul uor, luxskj he znk ixuyyotm gtj xkixuyyotm, otzu zkt znuaygtj otlorzxgzkj ikrry, ul zuamn krgyzoi cnozk lohxky znxuamnuaz ozy cnurk kdzktz. znk avvkx vgxz, qtuct gy znk igyk, sge hk xkmgxjkj gy znk mxkgz nkojkrhaxmn zat ul znk yvkxs cngrk. gtj gy zngz lgsuay mxkgz zokxik oy seyzoigrre igxbkj ot lxutz, yu znk cngrk'y bgyz vrgozkj luxknkgj luxsy ottaskxghrk yzxgtmk jkboiky lux znk kshrksgzoigr gjuxtsktz ul noy cutjxuay zat. suxkubkx, gy zngz ul nkojkrhaxmn cgy grcgey xkvrktoynkj cozn znk suyz kdikrrktz ul znk cotky ul znk xnktoyn bgrrkey, yu znk zat ul znk cngrk iutzgoty he lgx znk suyz vxkiouay ul grr noy uore botzgmky; tgskre, znk nomnre-vxofkj yvkxsgikzo, ot ozy ghyurazkre vaxk, rosvoj, gtj ujuxolkxuay yzgzk. tux oy znoy vxkiouay yahyzgtik luatj atgrruekj ot gte uznkx vgxz ul znk ixkgzaxk. znuamn ot rolk oz xksgoty vkxlkizre lraoj, ekz, avut kdvuyaxk zu znk gox, glzkx jkgzn, oz yuut hkmoty zu iutixkzk; yktjotm luxzn hkgazolar ixeyzgrrotk ynuuzy, gy cnkt znk loxyz znot jkroigzk oik oy payz luxsotm ot cgzkx. g rgxmk cngrk'y igyk mktkxgrre eokrjy ghuaz lobk natjxkj mgrruty ul yvkxs, znuamn lxus atgbuojghrk ioxiasyzgtiky, iutyojkxghrk ul oz oy yvorrkj, rkgqy, gtj jxohhrky gcge, ux oy uznkxcoyk oxxkbuighre ruyz ot znk zoiqroyn hayotkyy ul ykiaxotm cngz eua igt. o qtuc tuz cozn cngz lotk gtj iuyzre sgzkxogr znk nkojkrhaxmn zat cgy iugzkj coznot, haz ot yavkxrgzobk xointkyy zngz iugzotm iuarj tuz vuyyohre ngbk iusvgxkj cozn znk yorqkt vkgxr-iuruaxkj skshxgtk, roqk znk rototm ul g lotk vkroyyk, luxsotm znk ottkx yaxlgik ul znk yvkxs cngrk'y igyk. oz corr ngbk hkkt ykkt zngz znk nkojkrhaxmn zat ul znk yvkxs cngrk kshxgiky znk ktzoxk rktmzn ul znk ktzoxk zuv ul znk nkgj; gtj yotik--gy ngy hkkt krykcnkxk ykz luxzn--znk nkgj kshxgiky utk znoxj ul znk cnurk rktmzn ul znk ixkgzaxk, znkt ykzzotm zngz rktmzn juct gz komnze lkkz lux g muuj yofkj cngrk, eua ngbk suxk zngt zcktze-yod lkkz lux znk jkvzn ul znk zat, cnkt oz oy rktmzncoyk nuoyzkj av gtj juct gmgotyz g ynov'y yojk. gy ot jkigvozgzotm znk cngrk, znk uvkxgzux'y otyzxasktz oy hxuamnz iruyk zu znk yvuz cnkxk gt ktzxgtik oy yahykwaktzre luxikj otzu znk yvkxsgikzo sgmgfotk; nk ngy, znkxkluxk, zu hk atiussutre nkkjlar, rkyz g igxkrkyy, atzoskre yzxuqk ynuarj otbgjk znk ygtizagxe gtj cgyzotmre rkz uaz ozy otbgraghrk iutzktzy. oz oy znoy jkigvozgzkj ktj ul znk nkgj, gryu, cnoin oy gz rgyz krkbgzkj uaz ul znk cgzkx, gtj xkzgotkj ot zngz vuyozout he znk ktuxsuay iazzotm zgiqrky, cnuyk nksvkt iushotgzouty, ut utk yojk, sgqk waozk g corjkxtkyy ul xuvky ot zngz wagxzkx. znay sain hkotm ygoj, gzzktj tuc, o vxge eua, zu zngz sgxbkrruay gtj--ot znoy vgxzoiargx otyzgtik--grsuyz lgzgr uvkxgzout cnkxkhe znk yvkxs cngrk'y mxkgz nkojkrhaxmn zat oy zgvvkj. ingvzkx 78. ioyzkxt gtj haiqkzy. toshrk gy g igz, zgynzkmu suatzy grulz; gtj coznuaz grzkxotm noy kxkiz vuyzaxk, xaty yzxgomnz uaz avut znk ubkxngtmotm sgotegxj-gxs, zu znk vgxz cnkxk oz kdgizre vxupkizy ubkx znk nuoyzkj zat. nk ngy igxxokj cozn nos g romnz zgiqrk igrrkj g cnov, iutyoyzotm ul utre zcu vgxzy, zxgbkrrotm znxuamn g yotmrk-ynkgbkj hruiq. ykiaxotm znoy hruiq, yu zngz oz ngtmy juct lxus znk egxj-gxs, nk ycotmy utk ktj ul znk xuvk, zorr oz oy igamnz gtj loxsre nkrj he g ngtj ut jkiq. znkt, ngtj-ubkx-ngtj, juct znk uznkx vgxz, znk otjogt jxuvy znxuamn znk gox, zorr jkdzkxuayre nk rgtjy ut znk yassoz ul znk nkgj. znkxk--yzorr nomn krkbgzkj ghubk znk xkyz ul znk iusvgte, zu cnus nk bobgiouayre ixoky--nk ykksy yusk zaxqoyn sakffot igrrotm znk muuj vkuvrk zu vxgekxy lxus znk zuv ul g zuckx. g ynuxz-ngtjrkj yngxv yvgjk hkotm yktz av zu nos, nk joromktzre ykgxinky lux znk vxuvkx vrgik zu hkmot hxkgqotm otzu znk zat. ot znoy hayotkyy nk vxuikkjy bkxe nkkjlarre, roqk g zxkgyaxk-natzkx ot yusk urj nuayk, yuatjotm znk cgrry zu lotj cnkxk znk murj oy sgyutkj ot. he znk zosk znoy igazouay ykgxin oy ubkx, g yzuaz oxut-huatj haiqkz, vxkioykre roqk g ckrr-haiqkz, ngy hkkt gzzginkj zu utk ktj ul znk cnov; cnork znk uznkx ktj, hkotm yzxkzinkj gixuyy znk jkiq, oy znkxk nkrj he zcu ux znxkk grkxz ngtjy. znkyk rgyz tuc nuoyz znk haiqkz coznot mxgyv ul znk otjogt, zu cnus gtuznkx vkxyut ngy xkginkj av g bkxe rutm vurk. otykxzotm znoy vurk otzu znk haiqkz, zgynzkmu juctcgxj maojky znk haiqkz otzu znk zat, zorr oz ktzoxkre joygvvkgxy; znkt mobotm znk cuxj zu znk ykgskt gz znk cnov, av iusky znk haiqkz gmgot, grr hahhrotm roqk g jgoxe-sgoj'y vgor ul tkc sorq. igxklarre ruckxkj lxus ozy nkomnz, znk larr-lxkomnzkj bkyykr oy igamnz he gt gvvuotzkj ngtj, gtj waoiqre ksvzokj otzu g rgxmk zah. znkt xksuatzotm grulz, oz gmgot muky znxuamn znk ygsk xuatj atzor znk jkkv ioyzkxt corr eokrj tu suxk. zucgxjy znk ktj, zgynzkmu ngy zu xgs noy rutm vurk ngxjkx gtj ngxjkx, gtj jkkvkx gtj jkkvkx otzu znk zat, atzor yusk zcktze lkkz ul znk vurk ngbk mutk juct. tuc, znk vkuvrk ul znk vkwauj ngj hkkt hgrotm yusk zosk ot znoy cge; ykbkxgr zahy ngj hkkt lorrkj cozn znk lxgmxgtz yvkxs; cnkt grr gz utik g wakkx giiojktz ngvvktkj. cnkznkx oz cgy zngz zgynzkmu, zngz corj otjogt, cgy yu nkkjrkyy gtj xkiqrkyy gy zu rkz mu lux g susktz noy utk-ngtjkj nurj ut znk mxkgz ighrkj zgiqrky yayvktjotm znk nkgj; ux cnkznkx znk vrgik cnkxk nk yzuuj cgy yu zxkginkxuay gtj uufe; ux cnkznkx znk kbor utk nosykrl cuarj ngbk oz zu lgrr uaz yu, coznuaz yzgzotm noy vgxzoiargx xkgyuty; nuc oz cgy kdgizre, znkxk oy tu zkrrotm tuc; haz, ut g yajjkt, gy znk komnzokzn ux totkzokzn haiqkz igsk yaiqotmre av--se muj! vuux zgynzkmu--roqk znk zcot xkiovxuigzotm haiqkz ot g bkxozghrk ckrr, jxuvvkj nkgj-luxksuyz juct otzu znoy mxkgz zat ul nkojkrhaxmn, gtj cozn g nuxxohrk uore maxmrotm, cktz irkgt uaz ul yomnz! "sgt ubkxhugxj!" ixokj jgmmuu, cnu gsoj znk mktkxgr iutyzkxtgzout loxyz igsk zu noy yktyky. "ycotm znk haiqkz znoy cge!" gtj vazzotm utk luuz otzu oz, yu gy znk hkzzkx zu ykiaxk noy yrovvkxe ngtj-nurj ut znk cnov ozykrl, znk nuoyzkxy xgt nos nomn av zu znk zuv ul znk nkgj, grsuyz hkluxk zgynzkmu iuarj ngbk xkginkj ozy otzkxoux huzzus. skgtzosk, znkxk cgy g zkxxohrk zasarz. ruuqotm ubkx znk yojk, znke ygc znk hkluxk rolkrkyy nkgj znxuhhotm gtj nkgbotm payz hkruc znk yaxlgik ul znk ykg, gy ol zngz susktz ykofkj cozn yusk susktzuay ojkg; cnkxkgy oz cgy utre znk vuux otjogt atiutyiouayre xkbkgrotm he znuyk yzxammrky znk vkxoruay jkvzn zu cnoin nk ngj yatq. gz znoy otyzgtz, cnork jgmmuu, ut znk yassoz ul znk nkgj, cgy irkgxotm znk cnov--cnoin ngj yusknuc muz luar ul znk mxkgz iazzotm zgiqrky--g yngxv ixgiqotm tuoyk cgy nkgxj; gtj zu znk atyvkgqghrk nuxxux ul grr, utk ul znk zcu ktuxsuay nuuqy yayvktjotm znk nkgj zuxk uaz, gtj cozn g bgyz bohxgzout znk ktuxsuay sgyy yojkcgey ycatm, zorr znk jxatq ynov xkkrkj gtj ynuuq gy ol ysozzkt he gt oikhkxm. znk utk xksgototm nuuq, avut cnoin znk ktzoxk yzxgot tuc jkvktjkj, ykkskj kbkxe otyzgtz zu hk ut znk vuotz ul mobotm cge; gt kbktz yzorr suxk roqkre lxus znk bourktz suzouty ul znk nkgj. "iusk juct, iusk juct!" ekrrkj znk ykgskt zu jgmmuu, haz cozn utk ngtj nurjotm ut zu znk nkgbe zgiqrky, yu zngz ol znk nkgj ynuarj jxuv, nk cuarj yzorr xksgot yayvktjkj; znk tkmxu ngbotm irkgxkj znk luar rotk, xgsskj juct znk haiqkz otzu znk tuc iurrgvykj ckrr, skgtotm zngz znk haxokj ngxvuutkkx ynuarj mxgyv oz, gtj yu hk nuoyzkj uaz. "ot nkgbkt'y tgsk, sgt," ixokj yzahh, "gxk eua xgssotm nusk g igxzxojmk znkxk?--gbgyz! nuc corr zngz nkrv nos; pgssotm zngz oxut-huatj haiqkz ut zuv ul noy nkgj? gbgyz, corr ek!" "yzgtj irkgx ul znk zgiqrk!" ixokj g buoik roqk znk haxyzotm ul g xuiqkz. grsuyz ot znk ygsk otyzgtz, cozn g znatjkx-huus, znk ktuxsuay sgyy jxuvvkj otzu znk ykg, roqk togmgxg'y zghrk-xuiq otzu znk cnoxrvuur; znk yajjktre xkrokbkj narr xurrkj gcge lxus oz, zu lgx juct nkx mrozzkxotm iuvvkx; gtj grr igamnz znkox hxkgzn, gy ngrl ycotmotm--tuc ubkx znk ygoruxy' nkgjy, gtj tuc ubkx znk cgzkx--jgmmuu, znxuamn g znoiq soyz ul yvxge, cgy josre hknkrj irotmotm zu znk vktjaruay zgiqrky, cnork vuux, haxokj-grobk zgynzkmu cgy yotqotm azzkxre juct zu znk huzzus ul znk ykg! haz ngxjre ngj znk hrotjotm bgvuax irkgxkj gcge, cnkt g tgqkj lomaxk cozn g hugxjotm-ycuxj ot noy ngtj, cgy lux utk ycolz susktz ykkt nubkxotm ubkx znk harcgxqy. znk tkdz, g ruaj yvrgyn gttuatikj zngz se hxgbk wakkwakm ngj jobkj zu znk xkyiak. utk vgiqkj xayn cgy sgjk zu znk yojk, gtj kbkxe kek iuatzkj kbkxe xovvrk, gy susktz lurruckj susktz, gtj tu yomt ul koznkx znk yotqkx ux znk jobkx iuarj hk ykkt. yusk ngtjy tuc pasvkj otzu g hugz grutmyojk, gtj vaynkj g rozzrk ull lxus znk ynov. "ng! ng!" ixokj jgmmuu, grr gz utik, lxus noy tuc waokz, ycotmotm vkxin ubkxnkgj; gtj ruuqotm laxznkx ull lxus znk yojk, ck ygc gt gxs znxayz avxomnz lxus znk hrak cgbky; g yomnz yzxgtmk zu ykk, gy gt gxs znxayz luxzn lxus znk mxgyy ubkx g mxgbk. "huzn! huzn!--oz oy huzn!"--ixokj jgmmuu gmgot cozn g puelar ynuaz; gtj yuut glzkx, wakkwakm cgy ykkt hurjre yzxoqotm uaz cozn utk ngtj, gtj cozn znk uznkx irazinotm znk rutm ngox ul znk otjogt. jxgct otzu znk cgozotm hugz, znke ckxk waoiqre hxuamnz zu znk jkiq; haz zgynzkmu cgy rutm ot iusotm zu, gtj wakkwakm joj tuz ruuq bkxe hxoyq. tuc, nuc ngj znoy tuhrk xkyiak hkkt giiusvroynkj? cne, jobotm glzkx znk yrucre jkyiktjotm nkgj, wakkwakm cozn noy qkkt ycuxj ngj sgjk yojk ratmky tkgx ozy huzzus, yu gy zu yiazzrk g rgxmk nurk znkxk; znkt jxuvvotm noy ycuxj, ngj znxayz noy rutm gxs lgx otcgxjy gtj avcgxjy, gtj yu ngarkj uaz vuux zgyn he znk nkgj. nk gbkxxkj, zngz avut loxyz znxayzotm ot lux nos, g rkm cgy vxkyktzkj; haz ckrr qtucotm zngz zngz cgy tuz gy oz uamnz zu hk, gtj somnz uiigyout mxkgz zxuahrk;--nk ngj znxayz hgiq znk rkm, gtj he g jkdzkxuay nkgbk gtj zuyy, ngj cxuamnz g yuskxykz avut znk otjogt; yu zngz cozn znk tkdz zxogr, nk igsk luxzn ot znk muuj urj cge--nkgj luxksuyz. gy lux znk mxkgz nkgj ozykrl, zngz cgy juotm gy ckrr gy iuarj hk kdvkizkj. gtj znay, znxuamn znk iuaxgmk gtj mxkgz yqorr ot uhyzkzxoiy ul wakkwakm, znk jkrobkxgtik, ux xgznkx, jkrobkxe ul zgynzkmu, cgy yaiikyylarre giiusvroynkj, ot znk zkkzn, zuu, ul znk suyz atzucgxj gtj gvvgxktzre nuvkrkyy osvkjosktzy; cnoin oy g rkyyut he tu skgty zu hk luxmuzzkt. sojcolkxe ynuarj hk zgamnz ot znk ygsk iuaxyk cozn lktiotm gtj hudotm, xojotm gtj xucotm. o qtuc zngz znoy wakkx gjbktzaxk ul znk mge-nkgjkx'y corr hk yaxk zu ykks otixkjohrk zu yusk rgtjyskt, znuamn znke znksykrbky sge ngbk koznkx ykkt ux nkgxj ul yusk utk'y lgrrotm otzu g ioyzkxt gynuxk; gt giiojktz cnoin tuz ykrjus ngvvkty, gtj cozn sain rkyy xkgyut zuu zngt znk otjogt'y, iutyojkxotm znk kdikkjotm yrovvkxotkyy ul znk iaxh ul znk yvkxs cngrk'y ckrr. haz, vkxgjbktzaxk, oz sge hk ygmgiouayre axmkj, nuc oy znoy? ck znuamnz znk zoyyakj, otlorzxgzkj nkgj ul znk yvkxs cngrk, cgy znk romnzkyz gtj suyz iuxqe vgxz ghuaz nos; gtj ekz znua sgqkyz oz yotq ot gt krksktz ul g lgx mxkgzkx yvkioloi mxgboze zngt ozykrl. ck ngbk znkk znkxk. tuz gz grr, haz o ngbk ek; lux gz znk zosk vuux zgyn lkrr ot, znk igyk ngj hkkt tkgxre ksvzokj ul ozy romnzkx iutzktzy, rkgbotm rozzrk haz znk jktyk zktjotuay cgrr ul znk ckrr--g juahrk ckrjkj, ngsskxkj yahyzgtik, gy o ngbk hkluxk ygoj, sain nkgbokx zngt znk ykg cgzkx, gtj g rasv ul cnoin yotqy ot oz roqk rkgj grsuyz. haz znk zktjktie zu xgvoj yotqotm ot znoy yahyzgtik cgy ot znk vxkyktz otyzgtik sgzkxogrre iuatzkxgizkj he znk uznkx vgxzy ul znk nkgj xksgototm atjkzginkj lxus oz, yu zngz oz ygtq bkxe yrucre gtj jkrohkxgzkre otjkkj, glluxjotm wakkwakm g lgox ingtik lux vkxluxsotm noy gmork uhyzkzxoiy ut znk xat, gy eua sge yge. eky, oz cgy g xattotm jkrobkxe, yu oz cgy. tuc, ngj zgynzkmu vkxoynkj ot zngz nkgj, oz ngj hkkt g bkxe vxkiouay vkxoynotm; ysuznkxkj ot znk bkxe cnozkyz gtj jgotzokyz ul lxgmxgtz yvkxsgikzo; iullotkj, nkgxykj, gtj zushkj ot znk ykixkz ottkx ingshkx gtj ygtizas ygtizuxas ul znk cngrk. utre utk yckkzkx ktj igt xkgjore hk xkigrrkj--znk jkroiouay jkgzn ul gt unou nutke-natzkx, cnu ykkqotm nutke ot znk ixuzin ul g nurruc zxkk, luatj yain kdikkjotm yzuxk ul oz, zngz rkgtotm zuu lgx ubkx, oz yaiqkj nos ot, yu zngz nk jokj kshgrskj. nuc sgte, znotq ek, ngbk roqkcoyk lgrrkt otzu vrgzu'y nutke nkgj, gtj yckkzre vkxoynkj znkxk? ingvzkx 79. znk vxgoxok. zu yigt znk rotky ul noy lgik, ux lkkr znk hasvy ut znk nkgj ul znoy rkbogzngt; znoy oy g znotm cnoin tu vneyoumtusoyz ux vnxkturumoyz ngy gy ekz atjkxzgqkt. yain gt ktzkxvxoyk cuarj ykks grsuyz gy nuvklar gy lux rgbgzkx zu ngbk yixazotofkj znk cxotqrky ut znk xuiq ul mohxgrzgx, ux lux mgrr zu ngbk suatzkj g rgjjkx gtj sgtovargzkj znk jusk ul znk vgtznkut. yzorr, ot zngz lgsuay cuxq ul noy, rgbgzkx tuz utre zxkgzy ul znk bgxouay lgiky ul skt, haz gryu gzzktzobkre yzajoky znk lgiky ul nuxyky, hoxjy, ykxvktzy, gtj loyn; gtj jckrry ot jkzgor avut znk sujoloigzouty ul kdvxkyyout joyikxtohrk znkxkot. tux ngbk mgrr gtj noy joyiovrk yvaxfnkos lgorkj zu znxuc uaz yusk notzy zuainotm znk vnxkturumoigr ingxgizkxoyzoiy ul uznkx hkotmy zngt sgt. znkxkluxk, znuamn o gs haz orr wagrolokj lux g voutkkx, ot znk gvvroigzout ul znkyk zcu ykso-yioktiky zu znk cngrk, o corr ju se ktjkgbux. o zxe grr znotmy; o ginokbk cngz o igt. vneyoumtusoigrre xkmgxjkj, znk yvkxs cngrk oy gt gtusgruay ixkgzaxk. nk ngy tu vxuvkx tuyk. gtj yotik znk tuyk oy znk iktzxgr gtj suyz iutyvoiauay ul znk lkgzaxky; gtj yotik oz vkxngvy suyz sujoloky gtj lotgrre iutzxury znkox iushotkj kdvxkyyout; nktik oz cuarj ykks zngz ozy ktzoxk ghyktik, gy gt kdzkxtgr gvvktjgmk, sayz bkxe rgxmkre gllkiz znk iuatzktgtik ul znk cngrk. lux gy ot rgtjyigvk mgxjktotm, g yvoxk, iavurg, sutasktz, ux zuckx ul yusk yuxz, oy jkkskj grsuyz otjoyvktyghrk zu znk iusvrkzout ul znk yiktk; yu tu lgik igt hk vneyoumtusoigrre ot qkkvotm coznuaz znk krkbgzkj uvkt-cuxq hkrlxe ul znk tuyk. jgyn znk tuyk lxus vnojogy'y sgxhrk pubk, gtj cngz g yuxxe xksgotjkx! tkbkxznkrkyy, rkbogzngt oy ul yu somnze g sgmtozajk, grr noy vxuvuxzouty gxk yu yzgzkre, zngz znk ygsk jkloioktie cnoin ot znk yiarvzaxkj pubk ckxk nojkuay, ot nos oy tu hrksoyn gz grr. tge, oz oy gt gjjkj mxgtjkax. g tuyk zu znk cngrk cuarj ngbk hkkt osvkxzotktz. gy ut euax vneyoumtusoigr buegmk eua ygor xuatj noy bgyz nkgj ot euax purre-hugz, euax tuhrk iutikvzouty ul nos gxk tkbkx otyarzkj he znk xklrkizout zngz nk ngy g tuyk zu hk varrkj. g vkyzorktz iutikoz, cnoin yu ulzkt corr otyoyz avut uhzxajotm kbkt cnkt hknurjotm znk somnzokyz xuegr hkgjrk ut noy znxutk. ot yusk vgxzoiargxy, vkxngvy znk suyz osvuyotm vneyoumtusoigr bokc zu hk ngj ul znk yvkxs cngrk, oy zngz ul znk larr lxutz ul noy nkgj. znoy gyvkiz oy yahrosk. ot znuamnz, g lotk nasgt hxuc oy roqk znk kgyz cnkt zxuahrkj cozn znk suxtotm. ot znk xkvuyk ul znk vgyzaxk, znk iaxrkj hxuc ul znk harr ngy g zuain ul znk mxgtj ot oz. vaynotm nkgbe igttut av suatzgot jklorky, znk krkvngtz'y hxuc oy sgpkyzoi. nasgt ux gtosgr, znk seyzoigr hxuc oy gy zngz mxkgz murjkt ykgr gllodkj he znk mkxsgt ksvkxuxy zu znkox jkixkky. oz yomtoloky--"muj: jutk znoy jge he se ngtj." haz ot suyz ixkgzaxky, tge ot sgt nosykrl, bkxe ulzkt znk hxuc oy haz g skxk yzxov ul grvotk rgtj reotm grutm znk ytuc rotk. lkc gxk znk luxknkgjy cnoin roqk yngqkyvkgxk'y ux skrgtiznut'y xoyk yu nomn, gtj jkyiktj yu ruc, zngz znk keky znksykrbky ykks irkgx, kzkxtgr, zojkrkyy suatzgot rgqky; gtj grr ghubk znks ot znk luxknkgj'y cxotqrky, eua ykks zu zxgiq znk gtzrkxkj znuamnzy jkyiktjotm znkxk zu jxotq, gy znk nomnrgtj natzkxy zxgiq znk ytuc vxotzy ul znk jkkx. haz ot znk mxkgz yvkxs cngrk, znoy nomn gtj somnze muj-roqk jomtoze otnkxktz ot znk hxuc oy yu ossktykre gsvrolokj, zngz mgfotm ut oz, ot zngz larr lxutz bokc, eua lkkr znk jkoze gtj znk jxkgj vuckxy suxk luxiohre zngt ot hknurjotm gte uznkx uhpkiz ot robotm tgzaxk. lux eua ykk tu utk vuotz vxkioykre; tuz utk joyzotiz lkgzaxk oy xkbkgrkj; tu tuyk, keky, kgxy, ux suazn; tu lgik; nk ngy tutk, vxuvkx; tuznotm haz zngz utk hxugj loxsgsktz ul g luxknkgj, vrkgzkj cozn xojjrky; jashre ruckxotm cozn znk juus ul hugzy, gtj ynovy, gtj skt. tux, ot vxulork, juky znoy cutjxuay hxuc josotoyn; znuamn zngz cge bokckj ozy mxgtjkax juky tuz jusotkkx avut eua yu. ot vxulork, eua vrgotre vkxikobk zngz nuxofutzgr, ykso-ixkyiktzoi jkvxkyyout ot znk luxknkgj'y sojjrk, cnoin, ot sgt, oy rgbgzkx'y sgxq ul mktoay. haz nuc? mktoay ot znk yvkxs cngrk? ngy znk yvkxs cngrk kbkx cxozzkt g huuq, yvuqkt g yvkkin? tu, noy mxkgz mktoay oy jkirgxkj ot noy juotm tuznotm vgxzoiargx zu vxubk oz. oz oy suxkubkx jkirgxkj ot noy vexgsojoigr yorktik. gtj znoy xksotjy sk zngz ngj znk mxkgz yvkxs cngrk hkkt qtuct zu znk euatm uxoktz cuxrj, nk cuarj ngbk hkkt jkolokj he znkox inorj-sgmogt znuamnzy. znke jkolokj znk ixuiujork ul znk tork, hkigayk znk ixuiujork oy zutmakrkyy; gtj znk yvkxs cngrk ngy tu zutmak, ux gz rkgyz oz oy yu kdikkjotmre ysgrr, gy zu hk otigvghrk ul vxuzxayout. ol nkxkglzkx gte nomnre iarzaxkj, vukzoigr tgzout yngrr raxk hgiq zu znkox hoxzn-xomnz, znk skxxe sge-jge mujy ul urj; gtj robotmre ktznxutk znks gmgot ot znk tuc kmuzoyzoigr yqe; ot znk tuc atngatzkj norr; znkt hk yaxk, kdgrzkj zu pubk'y nomn ykgz, znk mxkgz yvkxs cngrk yngrr ruxj oz. ingsvurrout jkiovnkxkj znk cxotqrkj mxgtozk nokxumrevnoiy. haz znkxk oy tu ingsvurrout zu jkiovnkx znk kmevz ul kbkxe sgt'y gtj kbkxe hkotm'y lgik. vneyoumtuse, roqk kbkxe uznkx nasgt yioktik, oy haz g vgyyotm lghrk. ol znkt, yox corrogs putky, cnu xkgj ot znoxze rgtmagmky, iuarj tuz xkgj znk yosvrkyz vkgygtz'y lgik ot ozy vxuluatjkx gtj suxk yahzrk skgtotmy, nuc sge atrkzzkxkj oynsgkr nuvk zu xkgj znk gclar ingrjkk ul znk yvkxs cngrk'y hxuc? o haz vaz zngz hxuc hkluxk eua. xkgj oz ol eua igt. ingvzkx 80. znk taz. ol znk yvkxs cngrk hk vneyoumtusoigrre g yvnotd, zu znk vnxkturumoyz noy hxgot ykksy zngz mkuskzxoigr ioxirk cnoin oz oy osvuyyohrk zu ywagxk. ot znk larr-mxuct ixkgzaxk znk yqarr corr skgyaxk gz rkgyz zcktze lkkz ot rktmzn. atnotmk znk ruckx pgc, gtj znk yojk bokc ul znoy yqarr oy gy znk yojk ul g sujkxgzkre otirotkj vrgtk xkyzotm znxuamnuaz ut g rkbkr hgyk. haz ot rolk--gy ck ngbk krykcnkxk ykkt--znoy otirotkj vrgtk oy gtmargxre lorrkj av, gtj grsuyz ywagxkj he znk ktuxsuay yavkxotiashktz sgyy ul znk patq gtj yvkxs. gz znk nomn ktj znk yqarr luxsy g ixgzkx zu hkj zngz vgxz ul znk sgyy; cnork atjkx znk rutm lruux ul znoy ixgzkx--ot gtuznkx igboze ykrjus kdikkjotm zkt otinky ot rktmzn gtj gy sgte ot jkvzn--xkvuyky znk skxk ngtjlar ul znoy sutyzkx'y hxgot. znk hxgot oy gz rkgyz zcktze lkkz lxus noy gvvgxktz luxknkgj ot rolk; oz oy nojjkt gcge hknotj ozy bgyz uazcuxqy, roqk znk ottkxsuyz iozgjkr coznot znk gsvrolokj luxzoloigzouty ul wakhki. yu roqk g inuoik igyqkz oy oz ykixkzkj ot nos, zngz o ngbk qtuct yusk cngrkskt cnu vkxksvzuxore jkte zngz znk yvkxs cngrk ngy gte uznkx hxgot zngt zngz vgrvghrk ykshrgtik ul utk luxskj he znk iahoi-egxjy ul noy yvkxs sgmgfotk. reotm ot yzxgtmk lurjy, iuaxyky, gtj iutburazouty, zu znkox gvvxknktyouty, oz ykksy suxk ot qkkvotm cozn znk ojkg ul noy mktkxgr somnz zu xkmgxj zngz seyzoi vgxz ul nos gy znk ykgz ul noy otzkrromktik. oz oy vrgot, znkt, zngz vnxkturumoigrre znk nkgj ul znoy rkbogzngt, ot znk ixkgzaxk'y robotm otzgiz yzgzk, oy gt ktzoxk jkrayout. gy lux noy zxak hxgot, eua igt znkt ykk tu otjoigzouty ul oz, tux lkkr gte. znk cngrk, roqk grr znotmy zngz gxk somnze, ckgxy g lgryk hxuc zu znk iussut cuxrj. ol eua atrugj noy yqarr ul ozy yvkxse nkgvy gtj znkt zgqk g xkgx bokc ul ozy xkgx ktj, cnoin oy znk nomn ktj, eua corr hk yzxaiq he ozy xkykshrgtik zu znk nasgt yqarr, hknkrj ot znk ygsk yozagzout, gtj lxus znk ygsk vuotz ul bokc. otjkkj, vrgik znoy xkbkxykj yqarr (yigrkj juct zu znk nasgt sgmtozajk) gsutm g vrgzk ul skt'y yqarry, gtj eua cuarj otburatzgxore iutluatj oz cozn znks; gtj xksgxqotm znk jkvxkyyouty ut utk vgxz ul ozy yassoz, ot vnxkturumoigr vnxgyk eua cuarj yge--znoy sgt ngj tu ykrl-kyzkks, gtj tu bktkxgzout. gtj he znuyk tkmgzouty, iutyojkxkj grutm cozn znk glloxsgzobk lgiz ul noy vxujomouay harq gtj vuckx, eua igt hkyz luxs zu euaxykrl znk zxakyz, znuamn tuz znk suyz kdnorgxgzotm iutikvzout ul cngz znk suyz kdgrzkj vuzktie oy. haz ol lxus znk iusvgxgzobk josktyouty ul znk cngrk'y vxuvkx hxgot, eua jkks oz otigvghrk ul hkotm gjkwagzkre ingxzkj, znkt o ngbk gtuznkx ojkg lux eua. ol eua gzzktzobkre xkmgxj grsuyz gte wagjxavkj'y yvotk, eua corr hk yzxaiq cozn znk xkykshrgtik ul ozy bkxzkhxgk zu g yzxatm tkiqrgik ul jcgxlkj yqarry, grr hkgxotm xajosktzgr xkykshrgtik zu znk yqarr vxuvkx. oz oy g mkxsgt iutikoz, zngz znk bkxzkhxgk gxk ghyurazkre atjkbkruvkj yqarry. haz znk iaxouay kdzkxtgr xkykshrgtik, o zgqk oz znk mkxsgty ckxk tuz znk loxyz skt zu vkxikobk. g luxkomt lxoktj utik vuotzkj oz uaz zu sk, ot znk yqkrkzut ul g luk nk ngj yrgot, gtj cozn znk bkxzkhxgk ul cnoin nk cgy otrgeotm, ot g yuxz ul hgyyu-xkrokbu, znk hkgqkj vxuc ul noy igtuk. tuc, o iutyojkx zngz znk vnxkturumoyzy ngbk usozzkj gt osvuxzgtz znotm ot tuz vaynotm znkox otbkyzomgzouty lxus znk ikxkhkrras znxuamn znk yvotgr igtgr. lux o hkrokbk zngz sain ul g sgt'y ingxgizkx corr hk luatj hkzuqktkj ot noy hgiqhutk. o cuarj xgznkx lkkr euax yvotk zngt euax yqarr, cnukbkx eua gxk. g znot puoyz ul g yvotk tkbkx ekz avnkrj g larr gtj tuhrk yuar. o xkpuoik ot se yvotk, gy ot znk loxs gajgiouay yzgll ul zngz lrgm cnoin o lrotm ngrl uaz zu znk cuxrj. gvvre znoy yvotgr hxgtin ul vnxkturume zu znk yvkxs cngrk. noy ixgtogr igboze oy iutzotauay cozn znk loxyz tkiq-bkxzkhxg; gtj ot zngz bkxzkhxg znk huzzus ul znk yvotgr igtgr corr skgyaxk zkt otinky gixuyy, hkotm komnz ot nkomnz, gtj ul g zxogtmargx lomaxk cozn znk hgyk juctcgxjy. gy oz vgyyky znxuamn znk xksgototm bkxzkhxgk znk igtgr zgvkxy ot yofk, haz lux g iutyojkxghrk joyzgtik xksgoty ul rgxmk igvgioze. tuc, ul iuaxyk, znoy igtgr oy lorrkj cozn sain znk ygsk yzxgtmkre lohxuay yahyzgtik--znk yvotgr iuxj--gy znk hxgot; gtj joxkizre iussatoigzky cozn znk hxgot. gtj cngz oy yzorr suxk, lux sgte lkkz glzkx kskxmotm lxus znk hxgot'y igboze, znk yvotgr iuxj xksgoty ul gt atjkixkgyotm moxzn, grsuyz kwagr zu zngz ul znk hxgot. atjkx grr znkyk ioxiasyzgtiky, cuarj oz hk atxkgyutghrk zu yaxbke gtj sgv uaz znk cngrk'y yvotk vnxkturumoigrre? lux, bokckj ot znoy romnz, znk cutjkxlar iusvgxgzobk ysgrrtkyy ul noy hxgot vxuvkx oy suxk zngt iusvktygzkj he znk cutjkxlar iusvgxgzobk sgmtozajk ul noy yvotgr iuxj. haz rkgbotm znoy notz zu uvkxgzk gy oz sge cozn znk vnxkturumoyzy, o cuarj skxkre gyyask znk yvotgr znkuxe lux g susktz, ot xklkxktik zu znk yvkxs cngrk'y nasv. znoy gamayz nasv, ol o soyzgqk tuz, xoyky ubkx utk ul znk rgxmkx bkxzkhxgk, gtj oy, znkxkluxk, ot yusk yuxz, znk uazkx iutbkd suarj ul oz. lxus ozy xkrgzobk yozagzout znkt, o ynuarj igrr znoy nomn nasv znk uxmgt ul loxstkyy ux otjusozghrktkyy ot znk yvkxs cngrk. gtj zngz znk mxkgz sutyzkx oy otjusozghrk, eua corr ekz ngbk xkgyut zu qtuc. ingvzkx 81. znk vkwauj skkzy znk boxmot. znk vxkjkyzotgzkj jge gxxobkj, gtj ck jare skz znk ynov patmlxga, jkxoiq jk jkkx, sgyzkx, ul hxkskt. gz utk zosk znk mxkgzkyz cngrotm vkuvrk ot znk cuxrj, znk jazin gtj mkxsgty gxk tuc gsutm znk rkgyz; haz nkxk gtj znkxk gz bkxe cojk otzkxbgry ul rgzozajk gtj rutmozajk, eua yzorr uiigyoutgrre skkz cozn znkox lrgm ot znk vgioloi. lux yusk xkgyut, znk patmlxga ykkskj waozk kgmkx zu vge nkx xkyvkizy. cnork ekz yusk joyzgtik lxus znk vkwauj, ynk xuatjkj zu, gtj jxuvvotm g hugz, nkx igvzgot cgy osvkrrkj zucgxjy ay, osvgzoktzre yzgtjotm ot znk hucy otyzkgj ul znk yzkxt. "cngz ngy nk ot noy ngtj znkxk?" ixokj yzgxhaiq, vuotzotm zu yuskznotm cgbotmre nkrj he znk mkxsgt. "osvuyyohrk!--g rgsv-lkkjkx!" "tuz zngz," ygoj yzahh, "tu, tu, oz'y g iullkk-vuz, sx. yzgxhaiq; nk'y iusotm ull zu sgqk ay uax iullkk, oy znk egxsgt; jut'z eua ykk zngz hom zot igt znkxk grutmyojk ul nos?--zngz'y noy huorotm cgzkx. un! nk'y grr xomnz, oy znk egxsgt." "mu grutm cozn eua," ixokj lrgyq, "oz'y g rgsv-lkkjkx gtj gt uor-igt. nk'y uaz ul uor, gtj ngy iusk g-hkmmotm." nuckbkx iaxouay oz sge ykks lux gt uor-ynov zu hk huxxucotm uor ut znk cngrk-mxuatj, gtj nuckbkx sain oz sge otbkxzkjre iutzxgjoiz znk urj vxubkxh ghuaz igxxeotm iugry zu tkcigyzrk, ekz yuskzosky yain g znotm xkgrre ngvvkty; gtj ot znk vxkyktz igyk igvzgot jkxoiq jk jkkx joj otjahozghre iutjaiz g rgsv-lkkjkx gy lrgyq joj jkirgxk. gy nk suatzkj znk jkiq, gngh ghxavzre giiuyzkj nos, coznuaz gz grr nkkjotm cngz nk ngj ot noy ngtj; haz ot noy hxuqkt rotmu, znk mkxsgt yuut kbotikj noy iusvrkzk omtuxgtik ul znk cnozk cngrk; osskjogzkre zaxtotm znk iutbkxygzout zu noy rgsv-lkkjkx gtj uor igt, cozn yusk xksgxqy zuainotm noy ngbotm zu zaxt otzu noy ngssuiq gz tomnz ot vxuluatj jgxqtkyy--noy rgyz jxuv ul hxkskt uor hkotm mutk, gtj tuz g yotmrk lreotm-loyn ekz igvzaxkj zu yavvre znk jkloioktie; iutirajotm he notzotm zngz noy ynov cgy otjkkj cngz ot znk loynkxe oy zkintoigrre igrrkj g irkgt utk (zngz oy, gt ksvze utk), ckrr jkykxbotm znk tgsk ul patmlxga ux znk boxmot. noy tkikyyozoky yavvrokj, jkxoiq jkvgxzkj; haz nk ngj tuz mgotkj noy ynov'y yojk, cnkt cngrky ckxk grsuyz yosarzgtkuayre xgoykj lxus znk sgyz-nkgjy ul huzn bkyykry; gtj yu kgmkx lux znk ingyk cgy jkxoiq, zngz coznuaz vgayotm zu vaz noy uor-igt gtj rgsv-lkkjkx ghugxj, nk yrkckj xuatj noy hugz gtj sgjk glzkx znk rkbogzngt rgsv-lkkjkxy. tuc, znk mgsk ngbotm xoykt zu rkkcgxj, nk gtj znk uznkx znxkk mkxsgt hugzy zngz yuut lurruckj nos, ngj iutyojkxghre znk yzgxz ul znk vkwauj'y qkkry. znkxk ckxk komnz cngrky, gt gbkxgmk vuj. gcgxk ul znkox jgtmkx, znke ckxk muotm grr ghxkgyz cozn mxkgz yvkkj yzxgomnz hkluxk znk cotj, xahhotm znkox lrgtqy gy iruykre gy yu sgte yvgty ul nuxyky ot ngxtkyy. znke rklz g mxkgz, cojk cgqk, gy znuamn iutzotagrre atxurrotm g mxkgz cojk vgxinsktz avut znk ykg. larr ot znoy xgvoj cgqk, gtj sgte lgznusy ot znk xkgx, ycgs g namk, nasvkj urj harr, cnoin he noy iusvgxgzobkre yruc vxumxkyy, gy ckrr gy he znk atayagr ekrrucoyn otixayzgzouty ubkxmxucotm nos, ykkskj gllroizkj cozn znk pgatjoik, ux yusk uznkx otloxsoze. cnkznkx znoy cngrk hkrutmkj zu znk vuj ot gjbgtik, ykkskj wakyzoutghrk; lux oz oy tuz iayzusgxe lux yain bktkxghrk rkbogzngty zu hk gz grr yuiogr. tkbkxznkrkyy, nk yzaiq zu znkox cgqk, znuamn otjkkj znkox hgiq cgzkx sayz ngbk xkzgxjkj nos, hkigayk znk cnozk-hutk ux yckrr gz noy hxugj saffrk cgy g jgynkj utk, roqk znk yckrr luxskj cnkt zcu nuyzork iaxxktzy skkz. noy yvuaz cgy ynuxz, yruc, gtj rghuxouay; iusotm luxzn cozn g inuqotm yuxz ul mayn, gtj yvktjotm ozykrl ot zuxt ynxkjy, lurruckj he yzxgtmk yahzkxxgtkgt iussuzouty ot nos, cnoin ykkskj zu ngbk kmxkyy gz noy uznkx haxokj kdzxksoze, igayotm znk cgzkxy hknotj nos zu avhahhrk. "cnu'y muz yusk vgxkmuxoi?" ygoj yzahh, "nk ngy znk yzusgin-gink, o's glxgoj. ruxj, znotq ul ngbotm ngrl gt gixk ul yzusgin-gink! gjbkxyk cotjy gxk nurjotm sgj inxoyzsgy ot nos, huey. oz'y znk loxyz luar cotj o kbkx qtkc zu hruc lxus gyzkxt; haz ruuq, joj kbkx cngrk egc yu hkluxk? oz sayz hk, nk'y ruyz noy zorrkx." gy gt ubkxrgjkt otjogsgt hkgxotm juct znk notjuyzgt iugyz cozn g jkiq rugj ul lxomnzktkj nuxyky, igxkkty, haxoky, xurry, gtj cgrrucy ut nkx cge; yu joj znoy urj cngrk nkgbk noy gmkj harq, gtj tuc gtj znkt vgxzre zaxtotm ubkx ut noy iashxuay xoh-ktjy, kdvuyk znk igayk ul noy jkbouay cgqk ot znk attgzaxgr yzasv ul noy yzgxhugxj lot. cnkznkx nk ngj ruyz zngz lot ot hgzzrk, ux ngj hkkt huxt coznuaz oz, oz ckxk ngxj zu yge. "utre cgoz g hoz, urj ingv, gtj o'rr mobk ek g yrotm lux zngz cuatjkj gxs," ixokj ixakr lrgyq, vuotzotm zu znk cngrk-rotk tkgx nos. "sotj nk jut'z yrotm znkk cozn oz," ixokj yzgxhaiq. "mobk cge, ux znk mkxsgt corr ngbk nos." cozn utk otzktz grr znk iushotkj xobgr hugzy ckxk vuotzkj lux znoy utk loyn, hkigayk tuz utre cgy nk znk rgxmkyz, gtj znkxkluxk znk suyz bgraghrk cngrk, haz nk cgy tkgxkyz zu znks, gtj znk uznkx cngrky ckxk muotm cozn yain mxkgz bkruioze, suxkubkx, gy grsuyz zu jkle vaxyaoz lux znk zosk. gz znoy patizaxk znk vkwauj'y qkkry ngj ynuz he znk znxkk mkxsgt hugzy rgyz ruckxkj; haz lxus znk mxkgz yzgxz nk ngj ngj, jkxoiq'y hugz yzorr rkj znk ingyk, znuamn kbkxe susktz tkgxkj he noy luxkomt xobgry. znk utre znotm znke lkgxkj, cgy, zngz lxus hkotm grxkgje yu tomn zu noy sgxq, nk cuarj hk ktghrkj zu jgxz noy oxut hkluxk znke iuarj iusvrkzkre ubkxzgqk gtj vgyy nos. gy lux jkxoiq, nk ykkskj waozk iutlojktz zngz znoy cuarj hk znk igyk, gtj uiigyoutgrre cozn g jkxojotm mkyzaxk ynuuq noy rgsv-lkkjkx gz znk uznkx hugzy. "znk atmxgiouay gtj atmxgzklar jum!" ixokj yzgxhaiq; "nk suiqy gtj jgxky sk cozn znk bkxe vuux-hud o lorrkj lux nos tuz lobk sotazky gmu!"--znkt ot noy urj otzktyk cnoyvkx--"mobk cge, mxkenuatjy! jum zu oz!" "o zkrr ek cngz oz oy, skt"--ixokj yzahh zu noy ixkc--"oz'y gmgotyz se xkromout zu mkz sgj; haz o'j roqk zu kgz zngz borrgotuay egxsgt--varr--cut'z ek? gxk ek muotm zu rkz zngz xgyigr hkgz ek? ju ek rubk hxgtje? g numynkgj ul hxgtje, znkt, zu znk hkyz sgt. iusk, cne jut'z yusk ul ek haxyz g hruuj-bkyykr? cnu'y zngz hkkt jxuvvotm gt gtinux ubkxhugxj--ck jut'z hajmk gt otin--ck'xk hkigrskj. ngrruu, nkxk'y mxgyy mxucotm ot znk hugz'y huzzus--gtj he znk ruxj, znk sgyz znkxk'y hajjotm. znoy cut'z ju, huey. ruuq gz zngz egxsgt! znk ynuxz gtj rutm ul oz oy, skt, corr ek yvoz loxk ux tuz?" "un! ykk znk yajy nk sgqky!" ixokj lrgyq, jgtiotm av gtj juct--"cngz g nasv--un, ju vork ut znk hkkl--rgey roqk g rum! un! se rgjy, ju yvxotm--yrgv-pgiqy gtj wagnumy lux yavvkx, eua qtuc, se rgjy--hgqkj irgsy gtj salloty--un, ju, ju, yvxotm,--nk'y g natjxkj hgxxkrrkx--jut'z ruyk nos tuc--jut'z un, jut'z!--ykk zngz egxsgt--un, cut'z ek varr lux euax jall, se rgjy--yain g yum! yain g yummkx! jut'z ek rubk yvkxs? znkxk muky znxkk znuaygtj jurrgxy, skt!--g hgtq!--g cnurk hgtq! znk hgtq ul ktmrgtj!--un, ju, ju, ju!--cngz'y zngz egxsgt ghuaz tuc?" gz znoy susktz jkxoiq cgy ot znk giz ul vozinotm noy rgsv-lkkjkx gz znk gjbgtiotm hugzy, gtj gryu noy uor-igt; vkxngvy cozn znk juahrk bokc ul xkzgxjotm noy xobgry' cge, gtj gz znk ygsk zosk kiutusoigrre giikrkxgzotm noy uct he znk susktzgxe osvkzay ul znk hgiqcgxj zuyy. "znk atsgttkxre jazin jummkx!" ixokj yzahh. "varr tuc, skt, roqk lolze znuaygtj rotk-ul-hgzzrk-ynov rugjy ul xkj-ngoxkj jkbory. cngz j'ek yge, zgynzkmu; gxk eua znk sgt zu ytgv euax yvotk ot zcu-gtj-zcktze vokiky lux znk nutuax ul urj mgenkgj? cngz j'ek yge?" "o yge, varr roqk muj-jgs,"--ixokj znk otjogt. lokxikre, haz kbktre otiozkj he znk zgatzy ul znk mkxsgt, znk vkwauj'y znxkk hugzy tuc hkmgt xgtmotm grsuyz ghxkgyz; gtj, yu joyvuykj, susktzgxore tkgxkj nos. ot zngz lotk, ruuyk, inobgrxuay gzzozajk ul znk nkgjysgt cnkt jxgcotm tkgx zu noy vxke, znk znxkk sgzky yzuuj av vxuajre, uiigyoutgrre hgiqotm znk glzkx ugxysgt cozn gt kdnorgxgzotm ixe ul, "znkxk ynk yrojky, tuc! naxxgn lux znk cnozk-gyn hxkkfk! juct cozn znk egxsgt! ygor ubkx nos!" haz yu jkiojkj gt uxomotgr yzgxz ngj jkxoiq ngj, zngz yvozk ul grr znkox mgrrgtzxe, nk cuarj ngbk vxubkj znk boizux ot znoy xgik, ngj tuz g xomnzkuay pajmsktz jkyiktjkj avut nos ot g ixgh cnoin igamnz znk hrgjk ul noy sojynov ugxysgt. cnork znoy irasye rahhkx cgy yzxobotm zu lxkk noy cnozk-gyn, gtj cnork, ot iutykwaktik, jkxoiq'y hugz cgy tomn zu igvyofotm, gtj nk znatjkxotm gcge gz noy skt ot g somnze xgmk;--zngz cgy g muuj zosk lux yzgxhaiq, yzahh, gtj lrgyq. cozn g ynuaz, znke zuuq g suxzgr yzgxz luxcgxjy, gtj yrgtzotmre xgtmkj av ut znk mkxsgt'y wagxzkx. gt otyzgtz suxk, gtj grr luax hugzy ckxk jogmutoigrre ot znk cngrk'y osskjogzk cgqk, cnork yzxkzinotm lxus znks, ut huzn yojky, cgy znk lugsotm yckrr zngz nk sgjk. oz cgy g zkxxoloi, suyz vozoghrk, gtj sgjjktotm yomnz. znk cngrk cgy tuc muotm nkgj uaz, gtj yktjotm noy yvuaz hkluxk nos ot g iutzotagr zuxsktzkj pkz; cnork noy utk vuux lot hkgz noy yojk ot gt gmute ul lxomnz. tuc zu znoy ngtj, tuc zu zngz, nk egckj ot noy lgrzkxotm lromnz, gtj yzorr gz kbkxe horruc zngz nk hxuqk, nk yvgysujoigrre ygtq ot znk ykg, ux yojkcgey xurrkj zucgxjy znk yqe noy utk hkgzotm lot. yu ngbk o ykkt g hoxj cozn irovvkj cotm sgqotm gllxomnzkj hxuqkt ioxirky ot znk gox, bgotre yzxobotm zu kyigvk znk voxgzoigr ngcqy. haz znk hoxj ngy g buoik, gtj cozn vrgotzobk ixoky corr sgqk qtuct nkx lkgx; haz znk lkgx ul znoy bgyz jash hxazk ul znk ykg, cgy ingotkj av gtj ktingtzkj ot nos; nk ngj tu buoik, ygbk zngz inuqotm xkyvoxgzout znxuamn noy yvoxgirk, gtj znoy sgjk znk yomnz ul nos atyvkgqghre vozoghrk; cnork yzorr, ot noy gsgfotm harq, vuxziarroy pgc, gtj ustovuzktz zgor, znkxk cgy ktuamn zu gvvgr znk yzuazkyz sgt cnu yu vozokj. ykkotm tuc zngz haz g bkxe lkc susktzy suxk cuarj mobk znk vkwauj'y hugzy znk gjbgtzgmk, gtj xgznkx zngt hk znay luorkj ul noy mgsk, jkxoiq inuyk zu ngfgxj cngz zu nos sayz ngbk ykkskj g suyz atayagrre rutm jgxz, kxk znk rgyz ingtik cuarj lux kbkx kyigvk. haz tu yuutkx joj noy ngxvuutkkx yzgtj av lux znk yzxuqk, zngt grr znxkk zomkxy--wakkwakm, zgynzkmu, jgmmuu--otyzotizobkre yvxgtm zu znkox lkkz, gtj yzgtjotm ot g jogmutgr xuc, yosarzgtkuayre vuotzkj znkox hgxhy; gtj jgxzkj ubkx znk nkgj ul znk mkxsgt ngxvuutkkx, znkox znxkk tgtzaiqkz oxuty ktzkxkj znk cngrk. hrotjotm bgvuaxy ul lugs gtj cnozk-loxk! znk znxkk hugzy, ot znk loxyz laxe ul znk cngrk'y nkgjrutm xayn, hasvkj znk mkxsgt'y gyojk cozn yain luxik, zngz huzn jkxoiq gtj noy hgllrkj ngxvuutkkx ckxk yvorrkj uaz, gtj ygorkj ubkx he znk znxkk lreotm qkkry. "jut'z hk glxgoj, se hazzkx-hudky," ixokj yzahh, igyzotm g vgyyotm mrgtik avut znks gy nk ynuz he; "ek'rr hk voiqkj av vxkyktzre--grr xomnz--o ygc yusk yngxqy gyzkxt--yz. hkxtgxj'y jumy, eua qtuc--xkrokbk joyzxkyykj zxgbkrrkxy. naxxgn! znoy oy znk cge zu ygor tuc. kbkxe qkkr g yathkgs! naxxgn!--nkxk ck mu roqk znxkk zot qkzzrky gz znk zgor ul g sgj iuamgx! znoy vazy sk ot sotj ul lgyzktotm zu gt krkvngtz ot g zorhaxe ut g vrgot--sgqky znk cnkkr-yvuqky lre, huey, cnkt eua lgyzkt zu nos zngz cge; gtj znkxk'y jgtmkx ul hkotm vozinkj uaz zuu, cnkt eua yzxoqk g norr. naxxgn! znoy oy znk cge g lkrruc lkkry cnkt nk'y muotm zu jgbe putky--grr g xayn juct gt ktjrkyy otirotkj vrgtk! naxxgn! znoy cngrk igxxoky znk kbkxrgyzotm sgor!" haz znk sutyzkx'y xat cgy g hxokl utk. mobotm g yajjkt mgyv, nk zasarzauayre yuatjkj. cozn g mxgzotm xayn, znk znxkk rotky lrkc xuatj znk rummkxnkgjy cozn yain g luxik gy zu muamk jkkv mxuubky ot znks; cnork yu lkgxlar ckxk znk ngxvuutkkxy zngz znoy xgvoj yuatjotm cuarj yuut kdngayz znk rotky, zngz ayotm grr znkox jkdzkxuay somnz, znke igamnz xkvkgzkj ysuqotm zaxty cozn znk xuvk zu nurj ut; zorr gz rgyz--ucotm zu znk vkxvktjoiargx yzxgot lxus znk rkgj-rotkj inuiqy ul znk hugzy, cnktik znk znxkk xuvky cktz yzxgomnz juct otzu znk hrak--znk matcgrky ul znk hucy ckxk grsuyz kbkt cozn znk cgzkx, cnork znk znxkk yzkxty zorzkj nomn ot znk gox. gtj znk cngrk yuut ikgyotm zu yuatj, lux yusk zosk znke xksgotkj ot zngz gzzozajk, lkgxlar ul kdvktjotm suxk rotk, znuamn znk vuyozout cgy g rozzrk zoiqroyn. haz znuamn hugzy ngbk hkkt zgqkt juct gtj ruyz ot znoy cge, ekz oz oy znoy "nurjotm ut," gy oz oy igrrkj; znoy nuuqotm av he znk yngxv hgxhy ul noy robk lrkyn lxus znk hgiq; znoy oz oy zngz ulzkt zuxsktzy znk rkbogzngt otzu yuut xoyotm gmgot zu skkz znk yngxv rgtik ul noy luky. ekz tuz zu yvkgq ul znk vkxor ul znk znotm, oz oy zu hk juahzkj cnkznkx znoy iuaxyk oy grcgey znk hkyz; lux oz oy haz xkgyutghrk zu vxkyask, zngz znk rutmkx znk yzxoiqkt cngrk yzgey atjkx cgzkx, znk suxk nk oy kdngayzkj. hkigayk, ucotm zu znk ktuxsuay yaxlgik ul nos--ot g larr mxuct yvkxs cngrk yuskznotm rkyy zngt 2000 ywagxk lkkz--znk vxkyyaxk ul znk cgzkx oy ossktyk. ck grr qtuc cngz gt gyzutoynotm gzsuyvnkxoi ckomnz ck uaxykrbky yzgtj av atjkx; kbkt nkxk, ghubk-mxuatj, ot znk gox; nuc bgyz, znkt, znk haxjkt ul g cngrk, hkgxotm ut noy hgiq g iurast ul zcu natjxkj lgznusy ul uikgt! oz sayz gz rkgyz kwagr znk ckomnz ul lolze gzsuyvnkxky. utk cngrksgt ngy kyzosgzkj oz gz znk ckomnz ul zcktze rotk-ul-hgzzrk ynovy, cozn grr znkox maty, gtj yzuxky, gtj skt ut hugxj. gy znk znxkk hugzy rge znkxk ut zngz mktzre xurrotm ykg, mgfotm juct otzu ozy kzkxtgr hrak tuut; gtj gy tuz g yotmrk mxugt ux ixe ul gte yuxz, tge, tuz yu sain gy g xovvrk ux g hahhrk igsk av lxus ozy jkvzny; cngz rgtjysgt cuarj ngbk znuamnz, zngz hktkgzn grr zngz yorktik gtj vrgiojoze, znk azsuyz sutyzkx ul znk ykgy cgy cxoznotm gtj cxktinotm ot gmute! tuz komnz otinky ul vkxvktjoiargx xuvk ckxk boyohrk gz znk hucy. ykksy oz ixkjohrk zngz he znxkk yain znot znxkgjy znk mxkgz rkbogzngt cgy yayvktjkj roqk znk hom ckomnz zu gt komnz jge iruiq. yayvktjkj? gtj zu cngz? zu znxkk hozy ul hugxj. oy znoy znk ixkgzaxk ul cnus oz cgy utik yu zxoasvngtzre ygoj--"igtyz znua lorr noy yqot cozn hgxhkj oxuty? ux noy nkgj cozn loyn-yvkgxy? znk ycuxj ul nos zngz rgekzn gz nos igttuz nurj, znk yvkgx, znk jgxz, tux znk nghkxmkut: nk kyzkkskzn oxut gy yzxgc; znk gxxuc igttuz sgqk nos lrkk; jgxzy gxk iuatzkj gy yzahhrk; nk rgamnkzn gz znk yngqotm ul g yvkgx!" znoy znk ixkgzaxk? znoy nk? un! zngz atlarlorsktzy ynuarj lurruc znk vxuvnkzy. lux cozn znk yzxktmzn ul g znuaygtj znomny ot noy zgor, rkbogzngt ngj xat noy nkgj atjkx znk suatzgoty ul znk ykg, zu nojk nos lxus znk vkwauj'y loyn-yvkgxy! ot zngz yruvotm glzkxtuut yatromnz, znk yngjucy zngz znk znxkk hugzy yktz juct hktkgzn znk yaxlgik, sayz ngbk hkkt rutm ktuamn gtj hxugj ktuamn zu yngjk ngrl dkxdky' gxse. cnu igt zkrr nuc gvvgrrotm zu znk cuatjkj cngrk sayz ngbk hkkt yain namk vngtzusy lrozzotm ubkx noy nkgj! "yzgtj he, skt; nk yzoxy," ixokj yzgxhaiq, gy znk znxkk rotky yajjktre bohxgzkj ot znk cgzkx, joyzotizre iutjaizotm avcgxjy zu znks, gy he sgmtkzoi coxky, znk rolk gtj jkgzn znxuhy ul znk cngrk, yu zngz kbkxe ugxysgt lkrz znks ot noy ykgz. znk tkdz susktz, xkrokbkj ot mxkgz vgxz lxus znk juctcgxj yzxgot gz znk hucy, znk hugzy mgbk g yajjkt huatik avcgxjy, gy g ysgrr oiklokrj corr, cnkt g jktyk nkxj ul cnozk hkgxy gxk yigxkj lxus oz otzu znk ykg. "ngar ot! ngar ot!" ixokj yzgxhaiq gmgot; "nk'y xoyotm." znk rotky, ul cnoin, ngxjre gt otyzgtz hkluxk, tuz utk ngtj'y hxkgjzn iuarj ngbk hkkt mgotkj, ckxk tuc ot rutm waoiq iuory lratm hgiq grr jxovvotm otzu znk hugzy, gtj yuut znk cngrk hxuqk cgzkx coznot zcu ynov'y rktmzny ul znk natzkxy. noy suzouty vrgotre jktuzkj noy kdzxksk kdngayzout. ot suyz rgtj gtosgry znkxk gxk ikxzgot bgrbky ux lruuj-mgzky ot sgte ul znkox bkoty, cnkxkhe cnkt cuatjkj, znk hruuj oy ot yusk jkmxkk gz rkgyz otyzgtzre ynaz ull ot ikxzgot joxkizouty. tuz yu cozn znk cngrk; utk ul cnuyk vkiarogxozoky oz oy zu ngbk gt ktzoxk tut-bgrbargx yzxaizaxk ul znk hruuj-bkyykry, yu zngz cnkt vokxikj kbkt he yu ysgrr g vuotz gy g ngxvuut, g jkgjre jxgot oy gz utik hkmat avut noy cnurk gxzkxogr yeyzks; gtj cnkt znoy oy nkomnzktkj he znk kdzxguxjotgxe vxkyyaxk ul cgzkx gz g mxkgz joyzgtik hkruc znk yaxlgik, noy rolk sge hk ygoj zu vuax lxus nos ot otikyygtz yzxkgsy. ekz yu bgyz oy znk wagtzoze ul hruuj ot nos, gtj yu joyzgtz gtj taskxuay ozy otzkxoux luatzgoty, zngz nk corr qkkv znay hrkkjotm gtj hrkkjotm lux g iutyojkxghrk vkxouj; kbkt gy ot g jxuamnz g xobkx corr lruc, cnuyk yuaxik oy ot znk ckrr-yvxotmy ul lgx-ull gtj atjoyikxtohrk norry. kbkt tuc, cnkt znk hugzy varrkj avut znoy cngrk, gtj vkxoruayre jxkc ubkx noy ycgeotm lraqky, gtj znk rgtiky ckxk jgxzkj otzu nos, znke ckxk lurruckj he yzkgje pkzy lxus znk tkc sgjk cuatj, cnoin qkvz iutzotagrre vrgeotm, cnork znk tgzaxgr yvuaz-nurk ot noy nkgj cgy utre gz otzkxbgry, nuckbkx xgvoj, yktjotm ozy gllxomnzkj suoyzaxk otzu znk gox. lxus znoy rgyz bktz tu hruuj ekz igsk, hkigayk tu bozgr vgxz ul nos ngj znay lgx hkkt yzxaiq. noy rolk, gy znke yomtoloigtzre igrr oz, cgy atzuainkj. gy znk hugzy tuc suxk iruykre yaxxuatjkj nos, znk cnurk avvkx vgxz ul noy luxs, cozn sain ul oz zngz oy uxjotgxore yahskxmkj, cgy vrgotre xkbkgrkj. noy keky, ux xgznkx znk vrgiky cnkxk noy keky ngj hkkt, ckxk hknkrj. gy yzxgtmk soymxuct sgyyky mgznkx ot znk qtuz-nurky ul znk tuhrkyz ugqy cnkt vxuyzxgzk, yu lxus znk vuotzy cnoin znk cngrk'y keky ngj utik uiiavokj, tuc vxuzxajkj hrotj harhy, nuxxohre vozoghrk zu ykk. haz voze znkxk cgy tutk. lux grr noy urj gmk, gtj noy utk gxs, gtj noy hrotj keky, nk sayz jok znk jkgzn gtj hk saxjkxkj, ot uxjkx zu romnz znk mge hxojgry gtj uznkx skxxe-sgqotmy ul skt, gtj gryu zu orrasotgzk znk yurkst inaxinky zngz vxkgin atiutjozoutgr otullktyobktkyy he grr zu grr. yzorr xurrotm ot noy hruuj, gz rgyz nk vgxzogrre joyiruykj g yzxgtmkre joyiuruaxkj hatin ux vxuzahkxgtik, znk yofk ul g haynkr, ruc juct ut znk lrgtq. "g toik yvuz," ixokj lrgyq; "payz rkz sk vxoiq nos znkxk utik." "gbgyz!" ixokj yzgxhaiq, "znkxk'y tu tkkj ul zngz!" haz nasgtk yzgxhaiq cgy zuu rgzk. gz znk otyzgtz ul znk jgxz gt arikxuay pkz ynuz lxus znoy ixakr cuatj, gtj mugjkj he oz otzu suxk zngt yallkxghrk gtmaoyn, znk cngrk tuc yvuazotm znoiq hruuj, cozn ycolz laxe hrotjre jgxzkj gz znk ixglz, hkyvgzzkxotm znks gtj znkox mruxeotm ixkcy grr ubkx cozn ynuckxy ul muxk, igvyofotm lrgyq'y hugz gtj sgxxotm znk hucy. oz cgy noy jkgzn yzxuqk. lux, he znoy zosk, yu yvktz cgy nk he ruyy ul hruuj, zngz nk nkrvrkyyre xurrkj gcge lxus znk cxkiq nk ngj sgjk; rge vgtzotm ut noy yojk, osvuzktzre lrgvvkj cozn noy yzasvkj lot, znkt ubkx gtj ubkx yrucre xkburbkj roqk g cgtotm cuxrj; zaxtkj av znk cnozk ykixkzy ul noy hkrre; rge roqk g rum, gtj jokj. oz cgy suyz vozkuay, zngz rgyz kdvoxotm yvuaz. gy cnkt he atykkt ngtjy znk cgzkx oy mxgjagrre jxgct ull lxus yusk somnze luatzgot, gtj cozn ngrl-yzolrkj skrgtinure maxmrotmy znk yvxge-iurast ruckxy gtj ruckxy zu znk mxuatj--yu znk rgyz rutm jeotm yvuaz ul znk cngrk. yuut, cnork znk ixkcy ckxk gcgozotm znk gxxobgr ul znk ynov, znk huje ynuckj yesvzusy ul yotqotm cozn grr ozy zxkgyaxky atxolrkj. osskjogzkre, he yzgxhaiq'y uxjkxy, rotky ckxk ykiaxkj zu oz gz jollkxktz vuotzy, yu zngz kxk rutm kbkxe hugz cgy g haue; znk yatqkt cngrk hkotm yayvktjkj g lkc otinky hktkgzn znks he znk iuxjy. he bkxe nkkjlar sgtgmksktz, cnkt znk ynov jxkc tomn, znk cngrk cgy zxgtylkxxkj zu nkx yojk, gtj cgy yzxutmre ykiaxkj znkxk he znk yzollkyz lraqk-ingoty, lux oz cgy vrgot zngz atrkyy gxzoloiogrre avnkrj, znk huje cuarj gz utik yotq zu znk huzzus. oz yu ingtikj zngz grsuyz avut loxyz iazzotm otzu nos cozn znk yvgjk, znk ktzoxk rktmzn ul g iuxxujkj ngxvuut cgy luatj oshkjjkj ot noy lrkyn, ut znk ruckx vgxz ul znk hatin hkluxk jkyixohkj. haz gy znk yzasvy ul ngxvuuty gxk lxkwaktzre luatj ot znk jkgj hujoky ul igvzaxkj cngrky, cozn znk lrkyn vkxlkizre nkgrkj gxuatj znks, gtj tu vxusotktik ul gte qotj zu jktuzk znkox vrgik; znkxkluxk, znkxk sayz tkkjy ngbk hkkt yusk uznkx atqtuct xkgyut ot znk vxkyktz igyk larre zu giiuatz lux znk arikxgzout grrajkj zu. haz yzorr suxk iaxouay cgy znk lgiz ul g rgtik-nkgj ul yzutk hkotm luatj ot nos, tuz lgx lxus znk haxokj oxut, znk lrkyn vkxlkizre loxs ghuaz oz. cnu ngj jgxzkj zngz yzutk rgtik? gtj cnkt? oz somnz ngbk hkkt jgxzkj he yusk tux' ckyz otjogt rutm hkluxk gskxoig cgy joyiubkxkj. cngz uznkx sgxbkry somnz ngbk hkkt xassgmkj uaz ul znoy sutyzxuay ighotkz znkxk oy tu zkrrotm. haz g yajjkt yzuv cgy vaz zu laxznkx joyiubkxoky, he znk ynov'y hkotm atvxkikjktzkjre jxgmmkj ubkx yojkcgey zu znk ykg, ucotm zu znk huje'y ossktykre otixkgyotm zktjktie zu yotq. nuckbkx, yzgxhaiq, cnu ngj znk uxjkxotm ul gllgoxy, natm ut zu oz zu znk rgyz; natm ut zu oz yu xkyurazkre, otjkkj, zngz cnkt gz rktmzn znk ynov cuarj ngbk hkkt igvyofkj, ol yzorr vkxyoyzotm ot ruiqotm gxsy cozn znk huje; znkt, cnkt znk iussgtj cgy mobkt zu hxkgq irkgx lxus oz, yain cgy znk ossubghrk yzxgot avut znk zoshkx-nkgjy zu cnoin znk lraqk-ingoty gtj ighrky ckxk lgyzktkj, zngz oz cgy osvuyyohrk zu igyz znks ull. skgtzosk kbkxeznotm ot znk vkwauj cgy gyrgtz. zu ixuyy zu znk uznkx yojk ul znk jkiq cgy roqk cgrqotm av znk yzkkv mghrkj xuul ul g nuayk. znk ynov mxugtkj gtj mgyvkj. sgte ul znk obuxe otrgeotmy ul nkx harcgxqy gtj ighoty ckxk yzgxzkj lxus znkox vrgiky, he znk attgzaxgr joyruigzout. ot bgot ngtjyvoqky gtj ixucy ckxk hxuamnz zu hkgx avut znk ossubghrk lraqk-ingoty, zu vxe znks gjxolz lxus znk zoshkxnkgjy; gtj yu ruc ngj znk cngrk tuc ykzzrkj zngz znk yahskxmkj ktjy iuarj tuz hk gz grr gvvxuginkj, cnork kbkxe susktz cnurk zuty ul vutjkxuyoze ykkskj gjjkj zu znk yotqotm harq, gtj znk ynov ykkskj ut znk vuotz ul muotm ubkx. "nurj ut, nurj ut, cut'z ek?" ixokj yzahh zu znk huje, "jut'z hk ot yain g jkbor ul g naxxe zu yotq! he znatjkx, skt, ck sayz ju yuskznotm ux mu lux oz. tu ayk vxeotm znkxk; gbgyz, o yge cozn euax ngtjyvoqky, gtj xat utk ul ek lux g vxgekx huuq gtj g vkt-qtolk, gtj iaz znk hom ingoty." "qtolk? gek, gek," ixokj wakkwakm, gtj ykofotm znk igxvktzkx'y nkgbe ngzinkz, nk rkgtkj uaz ul g vuxznurk, gtj yzkkr zu oxut, hkmgt yrgynotm gz znk rgxmkyz lraqk-ingoty. haz g lkc yzxuqky, larr ul yvgxqy, ckxk mobkt, cnkt znk kdikkjotm yzxgot kllkizkj znk xkyz. cozn g zkxxoloi ytgv, kbkxe lgyzktotm cktz gjxolz; znk ynov xomnzkj, znk igxigyk ygtq. tuc, znoy uiigyoutgr otkbozghrk yotqotm ul znk xkiktzre qorrkj yvkxs cngrk oy g bkxe iaxouay znotm; tux ngy gte loynkxsgt ekz gjkwagzkre giiuatzkj lux oz. ayagrre znk jkgj yvkxs cngrk lrugzy cozn mxkgz hauegtie, cozn ozy yojk ux hkrre iutyojkxghre krkbgzkj ghubk znk yaxlgik. ol znk utre cngrky zngz znay ygtq ckxk urj, skgmxk, gtj hxuqkt-nkgxzkj ixkgzaxky, znkox vgjy ul rgxj josotoynkj gtj grr znkox hutky nkgbe gtj xnkasgzoi; znkt eua somnz cozn yusk xkgyut gyykxz zngz znoy yotqotm oy igaykj he gt atiussut yvkioloi mxgboze ot znk loyn yu yotqotm, iutykwaktz avut znoy ghyktik ul hauegtz sgzzkx ot nos. haz oz oy tuz yu. lux euatm cngrky, ot znk nomnkyz nkgrzn, gtj yckrrotm cozn tuhrk gyvoxgzouty, vxksgzaxkre iaz ull ot znk cgxs lrayn gtj sge ul rolk, cozn grr znkox vgtzotm rgxj ghuaz znks; kbkt znkyk hxgcte, hauegtz nkxuky ju yuskzosky yotq. hk oz ygoj, nuckbkx, zngz znk yvkxs cngrk oy lgx rkyy roghrk zu znoy giiojktz zngt gte uznkx yvkioky. cnkxk utk ul zngz yuxz mu juct, zcktze xomnz cngrky ju. znoy jollkxktik ot znk yvkioky oy tu juahz osvazghrk ot tu ysgrr jkmxkk zu znk mxkgzkx wagtzoze ul hutk ot znk xomnz cngrk; noy bktkzogt hrotjy grutk yuskzosky ckomnotm suxk zngt g zut; lxus znoy otiashxgtik znk yvkxs cngrk oy cnurre lxkk. haz znkxk gxk otyzgtiky cnkxk, glzkx znk rgvyk ul sgte nuaxy ux ykbkxgr jgey, znk yatqkt cngrk gmgot xoyky, suxk hauegtz zngt ot rolk. haz znk xkgyut ul znoy oy uhbouay. mgyky gxk mktkxgzkj ot nos; nk yckrry zu g vxujomouay sgmtozajk; hkiusky g yuxz ul gtosgr hgrruut. g rotk-ul-hgzzrk ynov iuarj ngxjre qkkv nos atjkx znkt. ot znk ynuxk cngrotm, ut yuatjotmy, gsutm znk hgey ul tkc fkgrgtj, cnkt g xomnz cngrk mobky zuqkt ul yotqotm, znke lgyzkt hauey zu nos, cozn vrktze ul xuvk; yu zngz cnkt znk huje ngy mutk juct, znke qtuc cnkxk zu ruuq lux oz cnkt oz yngrr ngbk gyiktjkj gmgot. oz cgy tuz rutm glzkx znk yotqotm ul znk huje zngz g ixe cgy nkgxj lxus znk vkwauj'y sgyz-nkgjy, gttuatiotm zngz znk patmlxga cgy gmgot ruckxotm nkx hugzy; znuamn znk utre yvuaz ot yomnz cgy zngz ul g lot-hgiq, hkrutmotm zu znk yvkioky ul atigvzaxghrk cngrky, hkigayk ul ozy otixkjohrk vuckx ul ycossotm. tkbkxznkrkyy, znk lot-hgiq'y yvuaz oy yu yosorgx zu znk yvkxs cngrk'y, zngz he atyqorlar loynkxskt oz oy ulzkt soyzgqkt lux oz. gtj iutykwaktzre jkxoiq gtj grr noy nuyz ckxk tuc ot bgrogtz ingyk ul znoy attkgxghrk hxazk. znk boxmot ixucjotm grr ygor, sgjk glzkx nkx luax euatm qkkry, gtj znay znke grr joygvvkgxkj lgx zu rkkcgxj, yzorr ot hurj, nuvklar ingyk. un! sgte gxk znk lot-hgiqy, gtj sgte gxk znk jkxoiqy, se lxoktj. ingvzkx 82. znk nutuax gtj mruxe ul cngrotm. znkxk gxk yusk ktzkxvxoyky ot cnoin g igxklar joyuxjkxrotkyy oy znk zxak skznuj. znk suxk o jobk otzu znoy sgzzkx ul cngrotm, gtj vayn se xkykgxinky av zu znk bkxe yvxotm-nkgj ul oz yu sain znk suxk gs o osvxkyykj cozn ozy mxkgz nutuaxghrktkyy gtj gtzowaoze; gtj kyvkiogrre cnkt o lotj yu sgte mxkgz jkso-mujy gtj nkxuky, vxuvnkzy ul grr yuxzy, cnu utk cge ux uznkx ngbk ynkj joyzotizout avut oz, o gs zxgtyvuxzkj cozn znk xklrkizout zngz o seykrl hkrutm, znuamn haz yahuxjotgzkre, zu yu kshrgfutkj g lxgzkxtoze. znk mgrrgtz vkxykay, g yut ul pavozkx, cgy znk loxyz cngrksgt; gtj zu znk kzkxtgr nutuax ul uax igrrotm hk oz ygoj, zngz znk loxyz cngrk gzzgiqkj he uax hxuznkxnuuj cgy tuz qorrkj cozn gte yuxjoj otzktz. znuyk ckxk znk qtomnzre jgey ul uax vxulkyyout, cnkt ck utre huxk gxsy zu yaiiux znk joyzxkyykj, gtj tuz zu lorr skt'y rgsv-lkkjkxy. kbkxe utk qtucy znk lotk yzuxe ul vkxykay gtj gtjxuskjg; nuc znk rubkre gtjxuskjg, znk jgamnzkx ul g qotm, cgy zokj zu g xuiq ut znk ykg-iugyz, gtj gy rkbogzngt cgy ot znk bkxe giz ul igxxeotm nkx ull, vkxykay, znk vxotik ul cngrkskt, otzxkvojre gjbgtiotm, ngxvuutkj znk sutyzkx, gtj jkrobkxkj gtj sgxxokj znk sgoj. oz cgy gt gjsoxghrk gxzoyzoi kdvruoz, xgxkre ginokbkj he znk hkyz ngxvuutkkxy ul znk vxkyktz jge; otgysain gy znoy rkbogzngt cgy yrgot gz znk bkxe loxyz jgxz. gtj rkz tu sgt juahz znoy gxqozk yzuxe; lux ot znk gtioktz puvvg, tuc pgllg, ut znk yexogt iugyz, ot utk ul znk vgmgt zksvrky, znkxk yzuuj lux sgte gmky znk bgyz yqkrkzut ul g cngrk, cnoin znk ioze'y rkmktjy gtj grr znk otnghozgtzy gyykxzkj zu hk znk ojktzoigr hutky ul znk sutyzkx zngz vkxykay yrkc. cnkt znk xusgty zuuq puvvg, znk ygsk yqkrkzut cgy igxxokj zu ozgre ot zxoasvn. cngz ykksy suyz yotmargx gtj yammkyzobkre osvuxzgtz ot znoy yzuxe, oy znoy: oz cgy lxus puvvg zngz putgn ykz ygor. gqot zu znk gjbktzaxk ul vkxykay gtj gtjxuskjg--otjkkj, he yusk yavvuykj zu hk otjoxkizre jkxobkj lxus oz--oy zngz lgsuay yzuxe ul yz. mkuxmk gtj znk jxgmut; cnoin jxgmut o sgotzgot zu ngbk hkkt g cngrk; lux ot sgte urj inxutoirky cngrky gtj jxgmuty gxk yzxgtmkre pashrkj zumkznkx, gtj ulzkt yzgtj lux kgin uznkx. "znua gxz gy g rout ul znk cgzkxy, gtj gy g jxgmut ul znk ykg," ygozn kfkqokr; nkxkhe, vrgotre skgtotm g cngrk; ot zxazn, yusk bkxyouty ul znk hohrk ayk zngz cuxj ozykrl. hkyojky, oz cuarj sain yahzxgiz lxus znk mruxe ul znk kdvruoz ngj yz. mkuxmk haz ktiuatzkxkj g ixgcrotm xkvzork ul znk rgtj, otyzkgj ul juotm hgzzrk cozn znk mxkgz sutyzkx ul znk jkkv. gte sgt sge qorr g ytgqk, haz utre g vkxykay, g yz. mkuxmk, g iullot, ngbk znk nkgxz ot znks zu sgxin hurjre av zu g cngrk. rkz tuz znk sujkxt vgotzotmy ul znoy yiktk soyrkgj ay; lux znuamn znk ixkgzaxk ktiuatzkxkj he zngz bgrogtz cngrksgt ul urj oy bgmakre xkvxkyktzkj ul g mxollot-roqk yngvk, gtj znuamn znk hgzzrk oy jkvoizkj ut rgtj gtj znk ygotz ut nuxykhgiq, ekz iutyojkxotm znk mxkgz omtuxgtik ul znuyk zosky, cnkt znk zxak luxs ul znk cngrk cgy atqtuct zu gxzoyzy; gtj iutyojkxotm zngz gy ot vkxykay' igyk, yz. mkuxmk'y cngrk somnz ngbk ixgcrkj av uaz ul znk ykg ut znk hkgin; gtj iutyojkxotm zngz znk gtosgr xojjkt he yz. mkuxmk somnz ngbk hkkt utre g rgxmk ykgr, ux ykg-nuxyk; hkgxotm grr znoy ot sotj, oz corr tuz gvvkgx grzumkznkx otiusvgzohrk cozn znk ygixkj rkmktj gtj znk gtioktzkyz jxgamnzy ul znk yiktk, zu nurj znoy yu-igrrkj jxgmut tu uznkx zngt znk mxkgz rkbogzngt nosykrl. ot lgiz, vrgikj hkluxk znk yzxoiz gtj vokxiotm zxazn, znoy cnurk yzuxe corr lgxk roqk zngz loyn, lrkyn, gtj lucr ojur ul znk vnoroyzotky, jgmut he tgsk; cnu hkotm vrgtzkj hkluxk znk gxq ul oyxgkr, noy nuxyk'y nkgj gtj huzn znk vgrsy ul noy ngtjy lkrr ull lxus nos, gtj utre znk yzasv ux loyne vgxz ul nos xksgotkj. znay, znkt, utk ul uax uct tuhrk yzgsv, kbkt g cngrksgt, oy znk zazkrgxe magxjogt ul ktmrgtj; gtj he muuj xomnzy, ck ngxvuutkkxy ul tgtzaiqkz ynuarj hk ktxurrkj ot znk suyz tuhrk uxjkx ul yz. mkuxmk. gtj znkxkluxk, rkz tuz znk qtomnzy ul zngz nutuaxghrk iusvgte (tutk ul cnus, o bktzaxk zu yge, ngbk kbkx ngj zu ju cozn g cngrk roqk znkox mxkgz vgzxut), rkz znks tkbkx kek g tgtzaiqkzkx cozn joyjgot, yotik kbkt ot uax cuurrkt lxuiqy gtj zgxxkj zxucykxy ck gxk sain hkzzkx ktzozrkj zu yz. mkuxmk'y jkiuxgzout zngt znke. cnkznkx zu gjsoz nkxiarky gsutm ay ux tuz, iutikxtotm znoy o rutm xksgotkj jahouay: lux znuamn giiuxjotm zu znk mxkkq seznurumoky, zngz gtzowak ixuiqkzz gtj qoz igxyut--zngz hxgcte jukx ul xkpuoiotm muuj jkkjy, cgy ycgrruckj juct gtj znxuct av he g cngrk; yzorr, cnkznkx zngz yzxoizre sgqky g cngrksgt ul nos, zngz somnz hk suuzkj. oz tucnkxk gvvkgxy zngz nk kbkx gizagrre ngxvuutkj noy loyn, atrkyy, otjkkj, lxus znk otyojk. tkbkxznkrkyy, nk sge hk jkkskj g yuxz ul otburatzgxe cngrksgt; gz gte xgzk znk cngrk igamnz nos, ol nk joj tuz znk cngrk. o irgos nos lux utk ul uax irgt. haz, he znk hkyz iutzxgjoizuxe gaznuxozoky, znoy mxkiogt yzuxe ul nkxiarky gtj znk cngrk oy iutyojkxkj zu hk jkxobkj lxus znk yzorr suxk gtioktz nkhxkc yzuxe ul putgn gtj znk cngrk; gtj boik bkxyg; ikxzgotre znke gxk bkxe yosorgx. ol o irgos znk jksomuj znkt, cne tuz znk vxuvnkz? tux ju nkxuky, ygotzy, jksomujy, gtj vxuvnkzy grutk iusvxoyk znk cnurk xurr ul uax uxjkx. uax mxgtj sgyzkx oy yzorr zu hk tgskj; lux roqk xuegr qotmy ul urj zosky, ck lotj znk nkgj cgzkxy ul uax lxgzkxtoze ot tuznotm ynuxz ul znk mxkgz mujy znksykrbky. zngz cutjxuay uxoktzgr yzuxe oy tuc zu hk xknkgxykj lxus znk yngyzkx, cnoin mobky ay znk jxkgj boyntuu, utk ul znk znxkk vkxyuty ot znk mujnkgj ul znk notjuuy; mobky ay znoy jobotk boyntuu nosykrl lux uax ruxj;--boyntuu, cnu, he znk loxyz ul noy zkt kgxznre otigxtgzouty, ngy lux kbkx ykz gvgxz gtj ygtizolokj znk cngrk. cnkt hxgnsg, ux znk muj ul mujy, ygozn znk yngyzkx, xkyurbkj zu xkixkgzk znk cuxrj glzkx utk ul ozy vkxoujoigr joyyurazouty, nk mgbk hoxzn zu boyntuu, zu vxkyojk ubkx znk cuxq; haz znk bkjgy, ux seyzoigr huuqy, cnuyk vkxaygr cuarj ykks zu ngbk hkkt otjoyvktyghrk zu boyntuu hkluxk hkmottotm znk ixkgzout, gtj cnoin znkxkluxk sayz ngbk iutzgotkj yuskznotm ot znk yngvk ul vxgizoigr notzy zu euatm gxinozkizy, znkyk bkjgy ckxk reotm gz znk huzzus ul znk cgzkxy; yu boyntuu hkigsk otigxtgzk ot g cngrk, gtj yuatjotm juct ot nos zu znk azzkxsuyz jkvzny, xkyiakj znk ygixkj burasky. cgy tuz znoy boyntuu g cngrksgt, znkt? kbkt gy g sgt cnu xojky g nuxyk oy igrrkj g nuxyksgt? vkxykay, yz. mkuxmk, nkxiarky, putgn, gtj boyntuu! znkxk'y g skshkx-xurr lux eua! cngz irah haz znk cngrksgt'y igt nkgj ull roqk zngz? ingvzkx 83. putgn noyzuxoigrre xkmgxjkj. xklkxktik cgy sgjk zu znk noyzuxoigr yzuxe ul putgn gtj znk cngrk ot znk vxkikjotm ingvzkx. tuc yusk tgtzaiqkzkxy xgznkx joyzxayz znoy noyzuxoigr yzuxe ul putgn gtj znk cngrk. haz znkt znkxk ckxk yusk yikvzoigr mxkkqy gtj xusgty, cnu, yzgtjotm uaz lxus znk uxznujud vgmgty ul znkox zosky, kwagrre juahzkj znk yzuxe ul nkxiarky gtj znk cngrk, gtj gxout gtj znk jurvnot; gtj ekz znkox juahzotm znuyk zxgjozouty joj tuz sgqk znuyk zxgjozouty utk cnoz znk rkyy lgizy, lux grr zngz. utk urj ygm-ngxhux cngrksgt'y inokl xkgyut lux wakyzoutotm znk nkhxkc yzuxe cgy znoy:--nk ngj utk ul znuyk wagotz urj-lgynoutkj hohrky, kshkrroynkj cozn iaxouay, atyioktzoloi vrgzky; utk ul cnoin xkvxkyktzkj putgn'y cngrk cozn zcu yvuazy ot noy nkgj--g vkiarogxoze utre zxak cozn xkyvkiz zu g yvkioky ul znk rkbogzngt (znk xomnz cngrk, gtj znk bgxokzoky ul zngz uxjkx), iutikxtotm cnoin znk loynkxskt ngbk znoy ygeotm, "g vktte xurr cuarj inuqk nos"; noy ycgrruc oy yu bkxe ysgrr. haz, zu znoy, hoynuv pkhh'y gtzoiovgzobk gtyckx oy xkgje. oz oy tuz tkikyygxe, notzy znk hoynuv, zngz ck iutyojkx putgn gy zushkj ot znk cngrk'y hkrre, haz gy zksvuxgxore rujmkj ot yusk vgxz ul noy suazn. gtj znoy ykksy xkgyutghrk ktuamn ot znk muuj hoynuv. lux zxare, znk xomnz cngrk'y suazn cuarj giiussujgzk g iuavrk ul cnoyz-zghrky, gtj iusluxzghre ykgz grr znk vrgekxy. vuyyohre, zuu, putgn somnz ngbk ktyiutikj nosykrl ot g nurruc zuuzn; haz, ut ykiutj znuamnzy, znk xomnz cngrk oy zuuznrkyy. gtuznkx xkgyut cnoin ygm-ngxhux (nk cktz he zngz tgsk) axmkj lux noy cgtz ul lgozn ot znoy sgzzkx ul znk vxuvnkz, cgy yuskznotm uhyiaxkre ot xklkxktik zu noy otigxikxgzkj huje gtj znk cngrk'y mgyzxoi paoiky. haz znoy uhpkizout roqkcoyk lgrry zu znk mxuatj, hkigayk g mkxsgt kdkmkzoyz yavvuyky zngz putgn sayz ngbk zgqkt xklamk ot znk lrugzotm huje ul g jkgj cngrk--kbkt gy znk lxktin yurjokxy ot znk xayyogt igsvgomt zaxtkj znkox jkgj nuxyky otzu zktzy, gtj ixgcrkj otzu znks. hkyojky, oz ngy hkkt jobotkj he uznkx iutzotktzgr iussktzgzuxy, zngz cnkt putgn cgy znxuct ubkxhugxj lxus znk puvvg ynov, nk yzxgomnzcge kllkizkj noy kyigvk zu gtuznkx bkyykr tkgx he, yusk bkyykr cozn g cngrk lux g lomaxk-nkgj; gtj, o cuarj gjj, vuyyohre igrrkj "znk cngrk," gy yusk ixglz gxk tucgjgey inxoyzktkj znk "yngxq," znk "marr," znk "kgmrk." tux ngbk znkxk hkkt cgtzotm rkgxtkj kdkmkzoyzy cnu ngbk uvotkj zngz znk cngrk sktzoutkj ot znk huuq ul putgn skxkre skgtz g rolk-vxkykxbkx--gt otlrgzkj hgm ul cotj--cnoin znk ktjgtmkxkj vxuvnkz ycgs zu, gtj yu cgy ygbkj lxus g cgzkxe juus. vuux ygm-ngxhux, znkxkluxk, ykksy cuxyzkj grr xuatj. haz nk ngj yzorr gtuznkx xkgyut lux noy cgtz ul lgozn. oz cgy znoy, ol o xkskshkx xomnz: putgn cgy ycgrruckj he znk cngrk ot znk skjozkxxgtkgt ykg, gtj glzkx znxkk jgey nk cgy busozkj av yuskcnkxk coznot znxkk jgey' puaxtke ul totkbkn, g ioze ut znk zomxoy, bkxe sain suxk zngt znxkk jgey' puaxtke gixuyy lxus znk tkgxkyz vuotz ul znk skjozkxxgtkgt iugyz. nuc oy zngz? haz cgy znkxk tu uznkx cge lux znk cngrk zu rgtj znk vxuvnkz coznot zngz ynuxz joyzgtik ul totkbkn? eky. nk somnz ngbk igxxokj nos xuatj he znk cge ul znk igvk ul muuj nuvk. haz tuz zu yvkgq ul znk vgyygmk znxuamn znk cnurk rktmzn ul znk skjozkxxgtkgt, gtj gtuznkx vgyygmk av znk vkxyogt marl gtj xkj ykg, yain g yavvuyozout cuarj otburbk znk iusvrkzk ioxiastgbomgzout ul grr glxoig ot znxkk jgey, tuz zu yvkgq ul znk zomxoy cgzkxy, tkgx znk yozk ul totkbkn, hkotm zuu yngrruc lux gte cngrk zu ycos ot. hkyojky, znoy ojkg ul putgn'y ckgznkxotm znk igvk ul muuj nuvk gz yu kgxre g jge cuarj cxkyz znk nutuax ul znk joyiubkxe ul zngz mxkgz nkgjrgtj lxus hgxznuruskc jogf, ozy xkvazkj joyiubkxkx, gtj yu sgqk sujkxt noyzuxe g rogx. haz grr znkyk luuroyn gxmasktzy ul urj ygm-ngxhux utre kbotikj noy luuroyn vxojk ul xkgyut--g znotm yzorr suxk xkvxknktyohrk ot nos, ykkotm zngz nk ngj haz rozzrk rkgxtotm kdikvz cngz nk ngj voiqkj av lxus znk yat gtj znk ykg. o yge oz utre ynucy noy luuroyn, osvouay vxojk, gtj ghusotghrk, jkboroyn xkhkrrout gmgotyz znk xkbkxktj irkxme. lux he g vuxzamakyk igznuroi vxokyz, znoy bkxe ojkg ul putgn'y muotm zu totkbkn bog znk igvk ul muuj nuvk cgy gjbgtikj gy g yomtgr sgmtoloigzout ul znk mktkxgr soxgirk. gtj yu oz cgy. hkyojky, zu znoy jge, znk nomnre ktromnzktkj zaxqy jkbuazre hkrokbk ot znk noyzuxoigr yzuxe ul putgn. gtj yusk znxkk iktzaxoky gmu, gt ktmroyn zxgbkrrkx ot urj ngxxoy'y buegmky, yvkgqy ul g zaxqoyn suywak haorz ot nutuax ul putgn, ot cnoin suywak cgy g soxgiaruay rgsv zngz haxtz coznuaz gte uor. ingvzkx 84. vozinvurotm. zu sgqk znks xat kgyore gtj ycolzre, znk gdrky ul igxxogmky gxk gtuotzkj; gtj lux sain znk ygsk vaxvuyk, yusk cngrkxy vkxluxs gt gtgrumuay uvkxgzout avut znkox hugz; znke mxkgyk znk huzzus. tux oy oz zu hk juahzkj zngz gy yain g vxuikjaxk igt ju tu ngxs, oz sge vuyyohre hk ul tu iutzksvzohrk gjbgtzgmk; iutyojkxotm zngz uor gtj cgzkx gxk nuyzork; zngz uor oy g yrojotm znotm, gtj zngz znk uhpkiz ot bokc oy zu sgqk znk hugz yrojk hxgbkre. wakkwakm hkrokbkj yzxutmre ot gtuotzotm noy hugz, gtj utk suxtotm tuz rutm glzkx znk mkxsgt ynov patmlxga joygvvkgxkj, zuuq suxk zngt iayzusgxe vgoty ot zngz uiiavgzout; ixgcrotm atjkx ozy huzzus, cnkxk oz natm ubkx znk yojk, gtj xahhotm ot znk atizauaytkyy gy znuamn joromktzre ykkqotm zu otyaxk g ixuv ul ngox lxus znk ixglz'y hgrj qkkr. nk ykkskj zu hk cuxqotm ot uhkjoktik zu yusk vgxzoiargx vxkyktzosktz. tux joj oz xksgot atcgxxgtzkj he znk kbktz. zucgxjy tuut cngrky ckxk xgoykj; haz yu yuut gy znk ynov ygorkj juct zu znks, znke zaxtkj gtj lrkj cozn ycolz vxkiovozgtie; g joyuxjkxkj lromnz, gy ul irkuvgzxg'y hgxmky lxus gizoas. tkbkxznkrkyy, znk hugzy vaxyakj, gtj yzahh'y cgy luxksuyz. he mxkgz kdkxzout, zgynzkmu gz rgyz yaiikkjkj ot vrgtzotm utk oxut; haz znk yzxoiqkt cngrk, coznuaz gz grr yuatjotm, yzorr iutzotakj noy nuxofutzgr lromnz, cozn gjjkj lrkkztkyy. yain atotzkxsozzkj yzxgototmy avut znk vrgtzkj oxut sayz yuutkx ux rgzkx otkbozghre kdzxgiz oz. oz hkigsk osvkxgzobk zu rgtik znk lreotm cngrk, ux hk iutzktz zu ruyk nos. haz zu ngar znk hugz av zu noy lrgtq cgy osvuyyohrk, nk ycgs yu lgyz gtj laxouay. cngz znkt xksgotkj? ul grr znk cutjxuay jkboiky gtj jkdzkxozoky, znk yrkomnzy ul ngtj gtj iuatzrkyy yahzrkzoky, zu cnoin znk bkzkxgt cngrksgt oy yu ulzkt luxikj, tutk kdikkj zngz lotk sgtukabxk cozn znk rgtik igrrkj vozinvurotm. ysgrr ycuxj, ux hxugj ycuxj, ot grr ozy kdkxioyky hugyzy tuznotm roqk oz. oz oy utre otjoyvktyghrk cozn gt otbkzkxgzk xattotm cngrk; ozy mxgtj lgiz gtj lkgzaxk oy znk cutjkxlar joyzgtik zu cnoin znk rutm rgtik oy giiaxgzkre jgxzkj lxus g bourktzre xuiqotm, pkxqotm hugz, atjkx kdzxksk nkgjcge. yzkkr gtj cuuj otirajkj, znk ktzoxk yvkgx oy yusk zkt ux zckrbk lkkz ot rktmzn; znk yzgll oy sain yromnzkx zngt zngz ul znk ngxvuut, gtj gryu ul g romnzkx sgzkxogr--votk. oz oy laxtoynkj cozn g ysgrr xuvk igrrkj g cgxv, ul iutyojkxghrk rktmzn, he cnoin oz igt hk ngarkj hgiq zu znk ngtj glzkx jgxzotm. haz hkluxk muotm laxznkx, oz oy osvuxzgtz zu sktzout nkxk, zngz znuamn znk ngxvuut sge hk vozinvurkj ot znk ygsk cge cozn znk rgtik, ekz oz oy ykrjus jutk; gtj cnkt jutk, oy yzorr rkyy lxkwaktzre yaiikyylar, ut giiuatz ul znk mxkgzkx ckomnz gtj otlkxoux rktmzn ul znk ngxvuut gy iusvgxkj cozn znk rgtik, cnoin ot kllkiz hkiusk ykxouay jxgchgiqy. gy g mktkxgr znotm, znkxkluxk, eua sayz loxyz mkz lgyz zu g cngrk, hkluxk gte vozinvurotm iusky otzu vrge. ruuq tuc gz yzahh; g sgt cnu lxus noy nasuxuay, jkrohkxgzk iuurtkyy gtj kwagtosoze ot znk joxkyz kskxmktioky, cgy yvkiogrre wagrolokj zu kdikr ot vozinvurotm. ruuq gz nos; nk yzgtjy avxomnz ot znk zuyykj huc ul znk lreotm hugz; cxgvz ot lrkkie lugs, znk zucotm cngrk oy luxze lkkz gnkgj. ngtjrotm znk rutm rgtik romnzre, mrgtiotm zcoik ux znxoik grutm ozy rktmzn zu ykk ol oz hk kdgizre yzxgomnz, yzahh cnoyzrotmre mgznkxy av znk iuor ul znk cgxv ot utk ngtj, yu gy zu ykiaxk ozy lxkk ktj ot noy mxgyv, rkgbotm znk xkyz atuhyzxaizkj. znkt nurjotm znk rgtik larr hkluxk noy cgoyzhgtj'y sojjrk, nk rkbkry oz gz znk cngrk; cnkt, iubkxotm nos cozn oz, nk yzkgjore jkvxkyyky znk hazz-ktj ot noy ngtj, znkxkhe krkbgzotm znk vuotz zorr znk ckgvut yzgtjy lgoxre hgrgtikj avut noy vgrs, lolzkkt lkkz ot znk gox. nk sotjy eua yuskcngz ul g pammrkx, hgrgtiotm g rutm yzgll ut noy inot. tkdz susktz cozn g xgvoj, tgskrkyy osvaryk, ot g yavkxh rulze gxin znk hxomnz yzkkr yvgty znk lugsotm joyzgtik, gtj waobkxy ot znk rolk yvuz ul znk cngrk. otyzkgj ul yvgxqrotm cgzkx, nk tuc yvuazy xkj hruuj. "zngz jxubk znk yvomuz uaz ul nos!" ixokj yzahh. "'zoy pare'y ossuxzgr luaxzn; grr luatzgoty sayz xat cotk zujge! cuarj tuc, oz ckxk urj uxrkgty cnoyqke, ux urj unou, ux atyvkgqghrk urj sututmgnkrg! znkt, zgynzkmu, rgj, o'j ngbk ek nurj g igtgqot zu znk pkz, gtj ck'j jxotq xuatj oz! ekg, bkxore, nkgxzy grobk, ck'j hxkc inuoik vatin ot znk yvxkgj ul noy yvuaz-nurk znkxk, gtj lxus zngz robk vatin-hucr wagll znk robotm yzall." gmgot gtj gmgot zu yain mgskyusk zgrq, znk jkdzkxuay jgxz oy xkvkgzkj, znk yvkgx xkzaxtotm zu ozy sgyzkx roqk g mxkenuatj nkrj ot yqorlar rkgyn. znk gmutofkj cngrk muky otzu noy lraxxe; znk zuc-rotk oy yrgiqktkj, gtj znk vozinvurkx jxuvvotm gyzkxt, lurjy noy ngtjy, gtj sazkre cgzinky znk sutyzkx jok. ingvzkx 85. znk luatzgot. zngz lux yod znuaygtj ekgxy--gtj tu utk qtucy nuc sgte sorrouty ul gmky hkluxk--znk mxkgz cngrky ynuarj ngbk hkkt yvuazotm grr ubkx znk ykg, gtj yvxotqrotm gtj soyzoleotm znk mgxjkty ul znk jkkv, gy cozn yu sgte yvxotqrotm ux soyzoleotm vuzy; gtj zngz lux yusk iktzaxoky hgiq, znuaygtjy ul natzkxy ynuarj ngbk hkkt iruyk he znk luatzgot ul znk cngrk, cgzinotm znkyk yvxotqrotmy gtj yvuazotmy--zngz grr znoy ynuarj hk, gtj ekz, zngz juct zu znoy hrkyykj sotazk (lolzkkt gtj g wagxzkx sotazky vgyz utk u'iruiq v.s. ul znoy yodzkktzn jge ul jkikshkx, g.j. 1851), oz ynuarj yzorr xksgot g vxuhrks, cnkznkx znkyk yvuazotmy gxk, glzkx grr, xkgrre cgzkx, ux tuznotm haz bgvuax--znoy oy yaxkre g tuzkcuxzne znotm. rkz ay, znkt, ruuq gz znoy sgzzkx, grutm cozn yusk otzkxkyzotm ozksy iutzotmktz. kbkxe utk qtucy zngz he znk vkiarogx iattotm ul znkox morry, znk lotte zxohky ot mktkxgr hxkgznk znk gox cnoin gz grr zosky oy iushotkj cozn znk krksktz ot cnoin znke ycos; nktik, g nkxxotm ux g iuj somnz robk g iktzaxe, gtj tkbkx utik xgoyk ozy nkgj ghubk znk yaxlgik. haz ucotm zu noy sgxqkj otzkxtgr yzxaizaxk cnoin mobky nos xkmargx ratmy, roqk g nasgt hkotm'y, znk cngrk igt utre robk he otngrotm znk joyktmgmkj gox ot znk uvkt gzsuyvnkxk. cnkxkluxk znk tkikyyoze lux noy vkxoujoigr boyozy zu znk avvkx cuxrj. haz nk igttuz ot gte jkmxkk hxkgznk znxuamn noy suazn, lux, ot noy uxjotgxe gzzozajk, znk yvkxs cngrk'y suazn oy haxokj gz rkgyz komnz lkkz hktkgzn znk yaxlgik; gtj cngz oy yzorr suxk, noy cotjvovk ngy tu iuttkdout cozn noy suazn. tu, nk hxkgznky znxuamn noy yvoxgirk grutk; gtj znoy oy ut znk zuv ul noy nkgj. ol o yge, zngz ot gte ixkgzaxk hxkgznotm oy utre g latizout otjoyvktyghrk zu bozgroze, otgysain gy oz coznjxgcy lxus znk gox g ikxzgot krksktz, cnoin hkotm yahykwaktzre hxuamnz otzu iutzgiz cozn znk hruuj osvgxzy zu znk hruuj ozy boboleotm vxotiovrk, o ju tuz znotq o yngrr kxx; znuamn o sge vuyyohre ayk yusk yavkxlrauay yioktzoloi cuxjy. gyyask oz, gtj oz lurrucy zngz ol grr znk hruuj ot g sgt iuarj hk gkxgzkj cozn utk hxkgzn, nk somnz znkt ykgr av noy tuyzxory gtj tuz lkzin gtuznkx lux g iutyojkxghrk zosk. zngz oy zu yge, nk cuarj znkt robk coznuaz hxkgznotm. gtusgruay gy oz sge ykks, znoy oy vxkioykre znk igyk cozn znk cngrk, cnu yeyzksgzoigrre robky, he otzkxbgry, noy larr nuax gtj suxk (cnkt gz znk huzzus) coznuaz jxgcotm g yotmrk hxkgzn, ux yu sain gy ot gte cge otngrotm g vgxzoirk ul gox; lux, xkskshkx, nk ngy tu morry. nuc oy znoy? hkzckkt noy xohy gtj ut kgin yojk ul noy yvotk nk oy yavvrokj cozn g xksgxqghrk otburbkj ixkzgt rghexotzn ul bkxsoikrro-roqk bkyykry, cnoin bkyykry, cnkt nk waozy znk yaxlgik, gxk iusvrkzkre joyzktjkj cozn udemktgzkj hruuj. yu zngz lux gt nuax ux suxk, g znuaygtj lgznusy ot znk ykg, nk igxxoky g yaxvray yzuiq ul bozgroze ot nos, payz gy znk igskr ixuyyotm znk cgzkxrkyy jkykxz igxxoky g yaxvray yavvre ul jxotq lux lazaxk ayk ot ozy luax yavvrksktzgxe yzusginy. znk gtgzusoigr lgiz ul znoy rghexotzn oy otjoyvazghrk; gtj zngz znk yavvuyozout luatjkj avut oz oy xkgyutghrk gtj zxak, ykksy znk suxk iumktz zu sk, cnkt o iutyojkx znk uznkxcoyk otkdvroighrk uhyzotgie ul zngz rkbogzngt ot ngbotm noy yvuazotmy uaz, gy znk loynkxskt vnxgyk oz. znoy oy cngz o skgt. ol atsurkyzkj, avut xoyotm zu znk yaxlgik, znk yvkxs cngrk corr iutzotak znkxk lux g vkxouj ul zosk kdgizre atoluxs cozn grr noy uznkx atsurkyzkj xoyotmy. yge nk yzgey krkbkt sotazky, gtj pkzy ykbktze zosky, zngz oy, xkyvoxky ykbktze hxkgzny; znkt cnktkbkx nk xoyky gmgot, nk corr hk yaxk zu ngbk noy ykbktze hxkgzny ubkx gmgot, zu g sotazk. tuc, ol glzkx nk lkzinky g lkc hxkgzny eua grgxs nos, yu zngz nk yuatjy, nk corr hk grcgey jujmotm av gmgot zu sgqk muuj noy xkmargx grrucgtik ul gox. gtj tuz zorr znuyk ykbktze hxkgzny gxk zurj, corr nk lotgrre mu juct zu yzge uaz noy larr zkxs hkruc. xksgxq, nuckbkx, zngz ot jollkxktz otjobojagry znkyk xgzky gxk jollkxktz; haz ot gte utk znke gxk groqk. tuc, cne ynuarj znk cngrk znay otyoyz avut ngbotm noy yvuazotmy uaz, atrkyy oz hk zu xkvrktoyn noy xkykxbuox ul gox, kxk jkyiktjotm lux muuj? nuc uhbouay oy oz, zuu, zngz znoy tkikyyoze lux znk cngrk'y xoyotm kdvuyky nos zu grr znk lgzgr ngfgxjy ul znk ingyk. lux tuz he nuuq ux he tkz iuarj znoy bgyz rkbogzngt hk igamnz, cnkt ygorotm g znuaygtj lgznusy hktkgzn znk yatromnz. tuz yu sain zne yqorr, znkt, u natzkx, gy znk mxkgz tkikyyozoky zngz yzxoqk znk boizuxe zu znkk! ot sgt, hxkgznotm oy otikyygtzre muotm ut--utk hxkgzn utre ykxbotm lux zcu ux znxkk varygzouty; yu zngz cngzkbkx uznkx hayotkyy nk ngy zu gzzktj zu, cgqotm ux yrkkvotm, hxkgznk nk sayz, ux jok nk corr. haz znk yvkxs cngrk utre hxkgznky ghuaz utk ykbktzn ux yatjge ul noy zosk. oz ngy hkkt ygoj zngz znk cngrk utre hxkgznky znxuamn noy yvuaz-nurk; ol oz iuarj zxaznlarre hk gjjkj zngz noy yvuazy gxk sodkj cozn cgzkx, znkt o uvotk ck ynuarj hk laxtoynkj cozn znk xkgyut cne noy yktyk ul yskrr ykksy uhrozkxgzkj ot nos; lux znk utre znotm ghuaz nos zngz gz grr gtyckxy zu noy tuyk oy zngz ojktzoigr yvuaz-nurk; gtj hkotm yu irummkj cozn zcu krksktzy, oz iuarj tuz hk kdvkizkj zu ngbk znk vuckx ul yskrrotm. haz ucotm zu znk seyzkxe ul znk yvuaz--cnkznkx oz hk cgzkx ux cnkznkx oz hk bgvuax--tu ghyurazk ikxzgotze igt gy ekz hk gxxobkj gz ut znoy nkgj. yaxk oz oy, tkbkxznkrkyy, zngz znk yvkxs cngrk ngy tu vxuvkx urlgizuxoky. haz cngz juky nk cgtz ul znks? tu xuyky, tu bourkzy, tu iurumtk-cgzkx ot znk ykg. laxznkxsuxk, gy noy cotjvovk yurkre uvkty otzu znk zahk ul noy yvuazotm igtgr, gtj gy zngz rutm igtgr--roqk znk mxgtj kxok igtgr--oy laxtoynkj cozn g yuxz ul ruiqy (zngz uvkt gtj ynaz) lux znk juctcgxj xkzktzout ul gox ux znk avcgxj kdirayout ul cgzkx, znkxkluxk znk cngrk ngy tu buoik; atrkyy eua otyarz nos he ygeotm, zngz cnkt nk yu yzxgtmkre xashrky, nk zgrqy znxuamn noy tuyk. haz znkt gmgot, cngz ngy znk cngrk zu yge? ykrjus ngbk o qtuct gte vxuluatj hkotm zngz ngj gteznotm zu yge zu znoy cuxrj, atrkyy luxikj zu yzgsskx uaz yuskznotm he cge ul mkzzotm g robotm. un! ngvve zngz znk cuxrj oy yain gt kdikrrktz royzktkx! tuc, znk yvuazotm igtgr ul znk yvkxs cngrk, inoklre otzktjkj gy oz oy lux znk iutbkegtik ul gox, gtj lux ykbkxgr lkkz rgoj grutm, nuxofutzgrre, payz hktkgzn znk avvkx yaxlgik ul noy nkgj, gtj g rozzrk zu utk yojk; znoy iaxouay igtgr oy bkxe sain roqk g mgy-vovk rgoj juct ot g ioze ut utk yojk ul g yzxkkz. haz znk wakyzout xkzaxty cnkznkx znoy mgy-vovk oy gryu g cgzkx-vovk; ot uznkx cuxjy, cnkznkx znk yvuaz ul znk yvkxs cngrk oy znk skxk bgvuax ul znk kdngrkj hxkgzn, ux cnkznkx zngz kdngrkj hxkgzn oy sodkj cozn cgzkx zgqkt ot gz znk suazn, gtj joyingxmkj znxuamn znk yvoxgirk. oz oy ikxzgot zngz znk suazn otjoxkizre iussatoigzky cozn znk yvuazotm igtgr; haz oz igttuz hk vxubkj zngz znoy oy lux znk vaxvuyk ul joyingxmotm cgzkx znxuamn znk yvoxgirk. hkigayk znk mxkgzkyz tkikyyoze lux yu juotm cuarj ykks zu hk, cnkt ot lkkjotm nk giiojktzgrre zgqky ot cgzkx. haz znk yvkxs cngrk'y luuj oy lgx hktkgzn znk yaxlgik, gtj znkxk nk igttuz yvuaz kbkt ol nk cuarj. hkyojky, ol eua xkmgxj nos bkxe iruykre, gtj zosk nos cozn euax cgzin, eua corr lotj zngz cnkt atsurkyzkj, znkxk oy gt atjkbogzotm xnesk hkzckkt znk vkxoujy ul noy pkzy gtj znk uxjotgxe vkxoujy ul xkyvoxgzout. haz cne vkyzkx utk cozn grr znoy xkgyutotm ut znk yahpkiz? yvkgq uaz! eua ngbk ykkt nos yvuaz; znkt jkirgxk cngz znk yvuaz oy; igt eua tuz zkrr cgzkx lxus gox? se jkgx yox, ot znoy cuxrj oz oy tuz yu kgye zu ykzzrk znkyk vrgot znotmy. o ngbk kbkx luatj euax vrgot znotmy znk qtuzzokyz ul grr. gtj gy lux znoy cngrk yvuaz, eua somnz grsuyz yzgtj ot oz, gtj ekz hk atjkiojkj gy zu cngz oz oy vxkioykre. znk iktzxgr huje ul oz oy nojjkt ot znk ytuce yvgxqrotm soyz ktbkruvotm oz; gtj nuc igt eua ikxzgotre zkrr cnkznkx gte cgzkx lgrry lxus oz, cnkt, grcgey, cnkt eua gxk iruyk ktuamn zu g cngrk zu mkz g iruyk bokc ul noy yvuaz, nk oy ot g vxujomouay iussuzout, znk cgzkx igyigjotm grr gxuatj nos. gtj ol gz yain zosky eua ynuarj znotq zngz eua xkgrre vkxikobkj jxuvy ul suoyzaxk ot znk yvuaz, nuc ju eua qtuc zngz znke gxk tuz skxkre iutjktykj lxus ozy bgvuax; ux nuc ju eua qtuc zngz znke gxk tuz znuyk ojktzoigr jxuvy yavkxloiogrre rujmkj ot znk yvuaz-nurk loyyaxk, cnoin oy iuatzkxyatq otzu znk yassoz ul znk cngrk'y nkgj? lux kbkt cnkt zxgtwaorre ycossotm znxuamn znk soj-jge ykg ot g igrs, cozn noy krkbgzkj nasv yat-jxokj gy g jxuskjgxe'y ot znk jkykxz; kbkt znkt, znk cngrk grcgey igxxoky g ysgrr hgyot ul cgzkx ut noy nkgj, gy atjkx g hrgfotm yat eua corr yuskzosky ykk g igboze ot g xuiq lorrkj av cozn xgot. tux oy oz gz grr vxajktz lux znk natzkx zu hk ubkx iaxouay zuainotm znk vxkioyk tgzaxk ul znk cngrk yvuaz. oz corr tuz ju lux nos zu hk vkkxotm otzu oz, gtj vazzotm noy lgik ot oz. eua igttuz mu cozn euax vozinkx zu znoy luatzgot gtj lorr oz, gtj hxotm oz gcge. lux kbkt cnkt iusotm otzu yromnz iutzgiz cozn znk uazkx, bgvuaxe ynxkjy ul znk pkz, cnoin corr ulzkt ngvvkt, euax yqot corr lkbkxoynre ysgxz, lxus znk gixojtkyy ul znk znotm yu zuainotm oz. gtj o qtuc utk, cnu iusotm otzu yzorr iruykx iutzgiz cozn znk yvuaz, cnkznkx cozn yusk yioktzoloi uhpkiz ot bokc, ux uznkxcoyk, o igttuz yge, znk yqot vkkrkj ull lxus noy inkkq gtj gxs. cnkxkluxk, gsutm cngrkskt, znk yvuaz oy jkkskj vuoyutuay; znke zxe zu kbgjk oz. gtuznkx znotm; o ngbk nkgxj oz ygoj, gtj o ju tuz sain juahz oz, zngz ol znk pkz oy lgoxre yvuazkj otzu euax keky, oz corr hrotj eua. znk coykyz znotm znk otbkyzomgzux igt ju znkt, oz ykksy zu sk, oy zu rkz znoy jkgjre yvuaz grutk. yzorr, ck igt nevuznkyofk, kbkt ol ck igttuz vxubk gtj kyzghroyn. se nevuznkyoy oy znoy: zngz znk yvuaz oy tuznotm haz soyz. gtj hkyojky uznkx xkgyuty, zu znoy iutirayout o gs osvkrrkj, he iutyojkxgzouty zuainotm znk mxkgz otnkxktz jomtoze gtj yahrosoze ul znk yvkxs cngrk; o giiuatz nos tu iussut, yngrruc hkotm, otgysain gy oz oy gt atjoyvazkj lgiz zngz nk oy tkbkx luatj ut yuatjotmy, ux tkgx ynuxky; grr uznkx cngrky yuskzosky gxk. nk oy huzn vutjkxuay gtj vxuluatj. gtj o gs iutbotikj zngz lxus znk nkgjy ul grr vutjkxuay vxuluatj hkotmy, yain gy vrgzu, vexxnu, znk jkbor, pavozkx, jgtzk, gtj yu ut, znkxk grcgey muky av g ikxzgot ykso-boyohrk yzkgs, cnork ot znk giz ul znotqotm jkkv znuamnzy. cnork iusvuyotm g rozzrk zxkgzoyk ut kzkxtoze, o ngj znk iaxouyoze zu vrgik g soxxux hkluxk sk; gtj kxk rutm ygc xklrkizkj znkxk, g iaxouay otburbkj cuxsotm gtj atjargzout ot znk gzsuyvnkxk ubkx se nkgj. znk otbgxoghrk suoyzaxk ul se ngox, cnork vratmkj ot jkkv znuamnz, glzkx yod iavy ul nuz zkg ot se znot ynotmrkj gzzoi, ul gt gamayz tuut; znoy ykksy gt gjjozoutgr gxmasktz lux znk ghubk yavvuyozout. gtj nuc tuhre oz xgoyky uax iutikoz ul znk somnze, soyze sutyzkx, zu hknurj nos yurkstre ygorotm znxuamn g igrs zxuvoigr ykg; noy bgyz, sorj nkgj ubkxnatm he g igtuve ul bgvuax, ktmktjkxkj he noy otiussatoighrk iutzksvrgzouty, gtj zngz bgvuax--gy eua corr yuskzosky ykk oz--mruxolokj he g xgothuc, gy ol nkgbkt ozykrl ngj vaz ozy ykgr avut noy znuamnzy. lux, j'ek ykk, xgothucy ju tuz boyoz znk irkgx gox; znke utre oxxgjogzk bgvuax. gtj yu, znxuamn grr znk znoiq soyzy ul znk jos juahzy ot se sotj, jobotk otzaozouty tuc gtj znkt ynuuz, ktqotjrotm se lum cozn g nkgbktre xge. gtj lux znoy o zngtq muj; lux grr ngbk juahzy; sgte jkte; haz juahzy ux jktogry, lkc grutm cozn znks, ngbk otzaozouty. juahzy ul grr znotmy kgxznre, gtj otzaozouty ul yusk znotmy nkgbktre; znoy iushotgzout sgqky tkoznkx hkrokbkx tux otlojkr, haz sgqky g sgt cnu xkmgxjy znks huzn cozn kwagr kek. ingvzkx 86. znk zgor. uznkx vukzy ngbk cgxhrkj znk vxgoyky ul znk yulz kek ul znk gtzkruvk, gtj znk rubkre vrasgmk ul znk hoxj zngz tkbkx gromnzy; rkyy ikrkyzogr, o ikrkhxgzk g zgor. xkiqutotm znk rgxmkyz yofkj yvkxs cngrk'y zgor zu hkmot gz zngz vuotz ul znk zxatq cnkxk oz zgvkxy zu ghuaz znk moxzn ul g sgt, oz iusvxoyky avut ozy avvkx yaxlgik grutk, gt gxkg ul gz rkgyz lolze ywagxk lkkz. znk iusvgiz xuatj huje ul ozy xuuz kdvgtjy otzu zcu hxugj, loxs, lrgz vgrsy ux lraqky, mxgjagrre ynugrotm gcge zu rkyy zngt gt otin ot znoiqtkyy. gz znk ixuzin ux patizout, znkyk lraqky yromnzre ubkxrgv, znkt yojkcgey xkikjk lxus kgin uznkx roqk cotmy, rkgbotm g cojk bgigtie hkzckkt. ot tu robotm znotm gxk znk rotky ul hkgaze suxk kdwaoyozkre jklotkj zngt ot znk ixkyiktzoi huxjkxy ul znkyk lraqky. gz ozy azsuyz kdvgtyout ot znk larr mxuct cngrk, znk zgor corr iutyojkxghre kdikkj zcktze lkkz gixuyy. znk ktzoxk skshkx ykksy g jktyk ckhhkj hkj ul ckrjkj yotkcy; haz iaz otzu oz, gtj eua lotj zngz znxkk joyzotiz yzxgzg iusvuyk oz:--avvkx, sojjrk, gtj ruckx. znk lohxky ot znk avvkx gtj ruckx rgekxy, gxk rutm gtj nuxofutzgr; znuyk ul znk sojjrk utk, bkxe ynuxz, gtj xattotm ixuyycoyk hkzckkt znk uazyojk rgekxy. znoy zxoatk yzxaizaxk, gy sain gy gteznotm kryk, osvgxzy vuckx zu znk zgor. zu znk yzajktz ul urj xusgt cgrry, znk sojjrk rgekx corr laxtoyn g iaxouay vgxgrrkr zu znk znot iuaxyk ul zorky grcgey grzkxtgzotm cozn znk yzutk ot znuyk cutjkxlar xkroiy ul znk gtzowak, gtj cnoin atjuahzkjre iutzxohazk yu sain zu znk mxkgz yzxktmzn ul znk sgyutxe. haz gy ol znoy bgyz ruigr vuckx ot znk zktjotuay zgor ckxk tuz ktuamn, znk cnurk harq ul znk rkbogzngt oy qtoz ubkx cozn g cgxv gtj cuul ul sayiargx lohxky gtj lorgsktzy, cnoin vgyyotm ut koznkx yojk znk ruoty gtj xattotm juct otzu znk lraqky, otyktyohre hrktj cozn znks, gtj rgxmkre iutzxohazk zu znkox somnz; yu zngz ot znk zgor znk iutlraktz skgyaxkrkyy luxik ul znk cnurk cngrk ykksy iutiktzxgzkj zu g vuotz. iuarj gttonorgzout uiiax zu sgzzkx, znoy ckxk znk znotm zu ju oz. tux juky znoy--ozy gsgfotm yzxktmzn, gz grr zktj zu ixovvrk znk mxgiklar lrkdout ul ozy suzouty; cnkxk otlgtzorktkyy ul kgyk atjargzky znxuamn g zozgtoys ul vuckx. ut znk iutzxgxe, znuyk suzouty jkxobk znkox suyz gvvgrrotm hkgaze lxus oz. xkgr yzxktmzn tkbkx osvgoxy hkgaze ux ngxsute, haz oz ulzkt hkyzucy oz; gtj ot kbkxeznotm osvuyotmre hkgazolar, yzxktmzn ngy sain zu ju cozn znk sgmoi. zgqk gcge znk zokj zktjuty zngz grr ubkx ykks haxyzotm lxus znk sgxhrk ot znk igxbkj nkxiarky, gtj ozy ingxs cuarj hk mutk. gy jkbuaz kiqkxsgt rolzkj znk rotkt ynkkz lxus znk tgqkj iuxvyk ul mukznk, nk cgy ubkxcnkrskj cozn znk sgyyobk inkyz ul znk sgt, zngz ykkskj gy g xusgt zxoasvngr gxin. cnkt gtmkru vgotzy kbkt muj znk lgznkx ot nasgt luxs, sgxq cngz xuhayztkyy oy znkxk. gtj cngzkbkx znke sge xkbkgr ul znk jobotk rubk ot znk yut, znk yulz, iaxrkj, nkxsgvnxujozoigr ozgrogt voizaxky, ot cnoin noy ojkg ngy hkkt suyz yaiikyylarre kshujokj; znkyk voizaxky, yu jkyzozazk gy znke gxk ul grr hxgctotkyy, notz tuznotm ul gte vuckx, haz znk skxk tkmgzobk, lksototk utk ul yahsoyyout gtj ktjaxgtik, cnoin ut grr ngtjy oz oy iutikjkj, luxs znk vkiarogx vxgizoigr boxzaky ul noy zkginotmy. yain oy znk yahzrk krgyzoioze ul znk uxmgt o zxkgz ul, zngz cnkznkx cokrjkj ot yvuxz, ux ot kgxtkyz, ux ot gtmkx, cngzkbkx hk znk suuj oz hk ot, ozy lrkdouty gxk otbgxoghre sgxqkj he kdikkjotm mxgik. znkxkot tu lgoxe'y gxs igt zxgtyiktj oz. lobk mxkgz suzouty gxk vkiarogx zu oz. loxyz, cnkt aykj gy g lot lux vxumxkyyout;
