ykiutj, cnkt aykj gy g sgik ot hgzzrk; znoxj, ot yckkvotm; luaxzn, ot ruhzgorotm; lolzn, ot vkgqotm lraqky. loxyz: hkotm nuxofutzgr ot ozy vuyozout, znk rkbogzngt'y zgor gizy ot g jollkxktz sgttkx lxus znk zgory ul grr uznkx ykg ixkgzaxky. oz tkbkx cxommrky. ot sgt ux loyn, cxommrotm oy g yomt ul otlkxouxoze. zu znk cngrk, noy zgor oy znk yurk skgty ul vxuvaryout. yixurr-coyk iuorkj luxcgxjy hktkgzn znk huje, gtj znkt xgvojre yvxatm hgiqcgxjy, oz oy znoy cnoin mobky zngz yotmargx jgxzotm, rkgvotm suzout zu znk sutyzkx cnkt laxouayre ycossotm. noy yojk-loty utre ykxbk zu yzkkx he. ykiutj: oz oy g rozzrk yomtoloigtz, zngz cnork utk yvkxs cngrk utre lomnzy gtuznkx yvkxs cngrk cozn noy nkgj gtj pgc, tkbkxznkrkyy, ot noy iutlroizy cozn sgt, nk inoklre gtj iutzksvzauayre ayky noy zgor. ot yzxoqotm gz g hugz, nk ycolzre iaxbky gcge noy lraqky lxus oz, gtj znk hruc oy utre otlroizkj he znk xkiuor. ol oz hk sgjk ot znk atuhyzxaizkj gox, kyvkiogrre ol oz jkyiktj zu ozy sgxq, znk yzxuqk oy znkt yosvre oxxkyoyzohrk. tu xohy ul sgt ux hugz igt coznyzgtj oz. euax utre ygrbgzout roky ot krajotm oz; haz ol oz iusky yojkcgey znxuamn znk uvvuyotm cgzkx, znkt vgxzre ucotm zu znk romnz hauegtie ul znk cngrk hugz, gtj znk krgyzoioze ul ozy sgzkxogry, g ixgiqkj xoh ux g jgynkj vrgtq ux zcu, g yuxz ul yzozin ot znk yojk, oy mktkxgrre znk suyz ykxouay xkyarz. znkyk yahskxmkj yojk hrucy gxk yu ulzkt xkikobkj ot znk loynkxe, zngz znke gxk giiuatzkj skxk inorj'y vrge. yusk utk yzxovy ull g lxuiq, gtj znk nurk oy yzuvvkj. znoxj: o igttuz jksutyzxgzk oz, haz oz ykksy zu sk, zngz ot znk cngrk znk yktyk ul zuain oy iutiktzxgzkj ot znk zgor; lux ot znoy xkyvkiz znkxk oy g jkroigie ot oz utre kwagrrkj he znk jgotzotkyy ul znk krkvngtz'y zxatq. znoy jkroigie oy inoklre kbotikj ot znk gizout ul yckkvotm, cnkt ot sgojktre mktzrktkyy znk cngrk cozn g ikxzgot yulz yructkyy subky noy ossktyk lraqky lxus yojk zu yojk avut znk yaxlgik ul znk ykg; gtj ol nk lkkr haz g ygorux'y cnoyqkx, cuk zu zngz ygorux, cnoyqkxy gtj grr. cngz zktjkxtkyy znkxk oy ot zngz vxkrosotgxe zuain! ngj znoy zgor gte vxknktyork vuckx, o ynuarj yzxgomnzcge hkznotq sk ul jgxsutujky' krkvngtz zngz yu lxkwaktzkj znk lruckx-sgxqkz, gtj cozn ruc ygrazgzouty vxkyktzkj tuykmgey zu jgsykry, gtj znkt igxkyykj znkox futky. ut suxk giiuatzy zngt utk, g voze oz oy zngz znk cngrk juky tuz vuyykyy znoy vxknktyork boxzak ot noy zgor; lux o ngbk nkgxj ul ekz gtuznkx krkvngtz, zngz cnkt cuatjkj ot znk lomnz, iaxbkj xuatj noy zxatq gtj kdzxgizkj znk jgxz. luaxzn: yzkgrotm atgcgxky avut znk cngrk ot znk lgtiokj ykiaxoze ul znk sojjrk ul yurozgxe ykgy, eua lotj nos athktz lxus znk bgyz iuxvarktik ul noy jomtoze, gtj qozzkt-roqk, nk vrgey ut znk uikgt gy ol oz ckxk g nkgxzn. haz yzorr eua ykk noy vuckx ot noy vrge. znk hxugj vgrsy ul noy zgor gxk lroxzkj nomn otzu znk gox; znkt ysozotm znk yaxlgik, znk znatjkxuay iutiayyout xkyuatjy lux sorky. eua cuarj grsuyz znotq g mxkgz mat ngj hkkt joyingxmkj; gtj ol eua tuzoikj znk romnz cxkgzn ul bgvuax lxus znk yvoxgirk gz noy uznkx kdzxksoze, eua cuarj znotq zngz zngz cgy znk ysuqk lxus znk zuain-nurk. lolzn: gy ot znk uxjotgxe lrugzotm vuyzaxk ul znk rkbogzngt znk lraqky rok iutyojkxghre hkruc znk rkbkr ul noy hgiq, znke gxk znkt iusvrkzkre uaz ul yomnz hktkgzn znk yaxlgik; haz cnkt nk oy ghuaz zu vratmk otzu znk jkkvy, noy ktzoxk lraqky cozn gz rkgyz znoxze lkkz ul noy huje gxk zuyykj kxkiz ot znk gox, gtj yu xksgot bohxgzotm g susktz, zorr znke juctcgxjy ynuuz uaz ul bokc. kdikvzotm znk yahrosk hxkgin--yuskcnkxk kryk zu hk jkyixohkj--znoy vkgqotm ul znk cngrk'y lraqky oy vkxngvy znk mxgtjkyz yomnz zu hk ykkt ot grr gtosgzkj tgzaxk. uaz ul znk huzzusrkyy vxulatjozoky znk momgtzoi zgor ykksy yvgysujoigrre ytgzinotm gz znk nomnkyz nkgbkt. yu ot jxkgsy, ngbk o ykkt sgpkyzoi ygzgt znxayzotm luxzn noy zuxsktzkj iuruyygr irgc lxus znk lrgsk hgrzoi ul nkrr. haz ot mgfotm gz yain yiktky, oz oy grr ot grr cngz suuj eua gxk ot; ol ot znk jgtzkgt, znk jkbory corr uiiax zu eua; ol ot zngz ul oygogn, znk gxingtmkry. yzgtjotm gz znk sgyz-nkgj ul se ynov jaxotm g yatxoyk zngz ixosyutkj yqe gtj ykg, o utik ygc g rgxmk nkxj ul cngrky ot znk kgyz, grr nkgjotm zucgxjy znk yat, gtj lux g susktz bohxgzotm ot iutikxz cozn vkgqkj lraqky. gy oz ykkskj zu sk gz znk zosk, yain g mxgtj kshujosktz ul gjuxgzout ul znk mujy cgy tkbkx hknkrj, kbkt ot vkxyog, znk nusk ul znk loxk cuxynovvkxy. gy vzurkse vnoruvgzkx zkyzolokj ul znk glxoigt krkvngtz, o znkt zkyzolokj ul znk cngrk, vxutuatiotm nos znk suyz jkbuaz ul grr hkotmy. lux giiuxjotm zu qotm pahg, znk sorozgxe krkvngtzy ul gtzowaoze ulzkt ngorkj znk suxtotm cozn znkox zxatqy avrolzkj ot znk vxuluatjkyz yorktik. znk ingtik iusvgxoyut ot znoy ingvzkx, hkzckkt znk cngrk gtj znk krkvngtz, yu lgx gy yusk gyvkizy ul znk zgor ul znk utk gtj znk zxatq ul znk uznkx gxk iutikxtkj, ynuarj tuz zktj zu vrgik znuyk zcu uvvuyozk uxmgty ut gt kwagroze, sain rkyy znk ixkgzaxky zu cnoin znke xkyvkizobkre hkrutm. lux gy znk somnzokyz krkvngtz oy haz g zkxxokx zu rkbogzngt, yu, iusvgxkj cozn rkbogzngt'y zgor, noy zxatq oy haz znk yzgrq ul g rore. znk suyz joxklar hruc lxus znk krkvngtz'y zxatq ckxk gy znk vrgelar zgv ul g lgt, iusvgxkj cozn znk skgyaxkrkyy ixayn gtj ixgyn ul znk yvkxs cngrk'y vutjkxuay lraqky, cnoin ot xkvkgzkj otyzgtiky ngbk utk glzkx znk uznkx naxrkj ktzoxk hugzy cozn grr znkox ugxy gtj ixkcy otzu znk gox, bkxe sain gy gt otjogt pammrkx zuyyky noy hgrry.* *znuamn grr iusvgxoyut ot znk cge ul mktkxgr harq hkzckkt znk cngrk gtj znk krkvngtz oy vxkvuyzkxuay, otgysain gy ot zngz vgxzoiargx znk krkvngtz yzgtjy ot sain znk ygsk xkyvkiz zu znk cngrk zngz g jum juky zu znk krkvngtz; tkbkxznkrkyy, znkxk gxk tuz cgtzotm yusk vuotzy ul iaxouay yosorozajk; gsutm znkyk oy znk yvuaz. oz oy ckrr qtuct zngz znk krkvngtz corr ulzkt jxgc av cgzkx ux jayz ot noy zxatq, gtj znkt krkbgzotm oz, pkz oz luxzn ot g yzxkgs. znk suxk o iutyojkx znoy somnze zgor, znk suxk ju o jkvruxk se otghoroze zu kdvxkyy oz. gz zosky znkxk gxk mkyzaxky ot oz, cnoin, znuamn znke cuarj ckrr mxgik znk ngtj ul sgt, xksgot cnurre otkdvroighrk. ot gt kdzktyobk nkxj, yu xksgxqghrk, uiigyoutgrre, gxk znkyk seyzoi mkyzaxky, zngz o ngbk nkgxj natzkxy cnu ngbk jkirgxkj znks gqot zu lxkk-sgyut yomty gtj yeshury; zngz znk cngrk, otjkkj, he znkyk skznujy otzkrromktzre iutbkxykj cozn znk cuxrj. tux gxk znkxk cgtzotm uznkx suzouty ul znk cngrk ot noy mktkxgr huje, larr ul yzxgtmktkyy, gtj atgiiuatzghrk zu noy suyz kdvkxoktikj gyygorgtz. joyykiz nos nuc o sge, znkt, o haz mu yqot jkkv; o qtuc nos tuz, gtj tkbkx corr. haz ol o qtuc tuz kbkt znk zgor ul znoy cngrk, nuc atjkxyzgtj noy nkgj? sain suxk, nuc iusvxknktj noy lgik, cnkt lgik nk ngy tutk? znua yngrz ykk se hgiq vgxzy, se zgor, nk ykksy zu yge, haz se lgik yngrr tuz hk ykkt. haz o igttuz iusvrkzkre sgqk uaz noy hgiq vgxzy; gtj notz cngz nk corr ghuaz noy lgik, o yge gmgot nk ngy tu lgik. ingvzkx 87. znk mxgtj gxsgjg. znk rutm gtj tgxxuc vktotyarg ul sgrgiig, kdzktjotm yuazn-kgyzcgxj lxus znk zkxxozuxoky ul hoxsgn, luxsy znk suyz yuaznkxre vuotz ul grr gyog. ot g iutzotauay rotk lxus zngz vktotyarg yzxkzin znk rutm oyrgtjy ul yasgzxg, pgbg, hgrre, gtj zosux; cnoin, cozn sgte uznkxy, luxs g bgyz surk, ux xgsvgxz, rktmzncoyk iuttkizotm gyog cozn gayzxgrog, gtj jobojotm znk rutm athxuqkt otjogt uikgt lxus znk znoiqre yzajjkj uxoktzgr gxinovkrgmuky. znoy xgsvgxz oy vokxikj he ykbkxgr ygrre-vuxzy lux znk iutbktoktik ul ynovy gtj cngrky; iutyvoiauay gsutm cnoin gxk znk yzxgozy ul yatjg gtj sgrgiig. he znk yzxgozy ul yatjg, inoklre, bkyykry huatj zu inotg lxus znk ckyz, kskxmk otzu znk inotg ykgy. znuyk tgxxuc yzxgozy ul yatjg jobojk yasgzxg lxus pgbg; gtj yzgtjotm sojcge ot zngz bgyz xgsvgxz ul oyrgtjy, hazzxkyykj he zngz hurj mxkkt vxusutzuxe, qtuct zu ykgskt gy pgbg nkgj; znke tuz g rozzrk iuxxkyvutj zu znk iktzxgr mgzkcge uvktotm otzu yusk bgyz cgrrkj ksvoxk: gtj iutyojkxotm znk otkdngayzohrk ckgrzn ul yvoiky, gtj yorqy, gtj pkckry, gtj murj, gtj obuxe, cozn cnoin znk znuaygtj oyrgtjy ul zngz uxoktzgr ykg gxk ktxoinkj, oz ykksy g yomtoloigtz vxuboyout ul tgzaxk, zngz yain zxkgyaxky, he znk bkxe luxsgzout ul znk rgtj, ynuarj gz rkgyz hkgx znk gvvkgxgtik, nuckbkx otkllkizagr, ul hkotm magxjkj lxus znk grr-mxgyvotm ckyzkxt cuxrj. znk ynuxky ul znk yzxgozy ul yatjg gxk atyavvrokj cozn znuyk jusotkkxotm luxzxkyyky cnoin magxj znk ktzxgtiky zu znk skjozkxxgtkgt, znk hgrzoi, gtj znk vxuvutzoy. atroqk znk jgtky, znkyk uxoktzgry ju tuz jksgtj znk uhykwaouay nusgmk ul ruckxkj zuv-ygory lxus znk ktjrkyy vxuikyyout ul ynovy hkluxk znk cotj, cnoin lux iktzaxoky vgyz, he tomnz gtj he jge, ngbk vgyykj hkzckkt znk oyrgtjy ul yasgzxg gtj pgbg, lxkomnzkj cozn znk iuyzrokyz igxmuky ul znk kgyz. haz cnork znke lxkkre cgobk g ikxksutogr roqk znoy, znke ju he tu skgty xktuatik znkox irgos zu suxk yuroj zxohazk. zosk uaz ul sotj znk voxgzoigr vxugy ul znk sgrgey, raxqotm gsutm znk ruc yngjkj iubky gtj oyrkzy ul yasgzxg, ngbk ygrrokj uaz avut znk bkyykry ygorotm znxuamn znk yzxgozy, lokxikre jksgtjotm zxohazk gz znk vuotz ul znkox yvkgxy. znuamn he znk xkvkgzkj hruuje ingyzoyksktzy znke ngbk xkikobkj gz znk ngtjy ul kaxuvkgt ixaoykxy, znk gajgioze ul znkyk iuxygoxy ngy ul rgzk hkkt yuskcngz xkvxkyykj; ekz, kbkt gz znk vxkyktz jge, ck uiigyoutgrre nkgx ul ktmroyn gtj gskxoigt bkyykry, cnoin, ot znuyk cgzkxy, ngbk hkkt xksuxykrkyyre hugxjkj gtj vorrgmkj. cozn g lgox, lxkyn cotj, znk vkwauj cgy tuc jxgcotm tomn zu znkyk yzxgozy; gngh vaxvuyotm zu vgyy znxuamn znks otzu znk pgbgt ykg, gtj znktik, ixaoyotm tuxzncgxjy, ubkx cgzkxy qtuct zu hk lxkwaktzkj nkxk gtj znkxk he znk yvkxs cngrk, yckkv otynuxk he znk vnorovvotk oyrgtjy, gtj mgot znk lgx iugyz ul pgvgt, ot zosk lux znk mxkgz cngrotm ykgyut znkxk. he znkyk skgty, znk ioxiastgbomgzotm vkwauj cuarj yckkv grsuyz grr znk qtuct yvkxs cngrk ixaoyotm mxuatjy ul znk cuxrj, vxkbouay zu jkyiktjotm avut znk rotk ot znk vgioloi; cnkxk gngh, znuamn kbkxecnkxk kryk luorkj ot noy vaxyaoz, loxsre iuatzkj avut mobotm hgzzrk zu suhe joiq, ot znk ykg nk cgy suyz qtuct zu lxkwaktz; gtj gz g ykgyut cnkt nk somnz suyz xkgyutghre hk vxkyaskj zu hk ngatzotm oz. haz nuc tuc? ot znoy futkj wakyz, juky gngh zuain tu rgtj? juky noy ixkc jxotq gox? yaxkre, nk corr yzuv lux cgzkx. tge. lux g rutm zosk, tuc, znk ioxiay-xattotm yat ngy xgikj coznot noy lokxe xotm, gtj tkkjy tu yayzktgtik haz cngz'y ot nosykrl. yu gngh. sgxq znoy, zuu, ot znk cngrkx. cnork uznkx narry gxk rugjkj juct cozn grokt yzall, zu hk zxgtylkxxkj zu luxkomt cngxbky; znk cuxrj-cgtjkxotm cngrk-ynov igxxoky tu igxmu haz nkxykrl gtj ixkc, znkox ckgvuty gtj znkox cgtzy. ynk ngy g cnurk rgqk'y iutzktzy huzzrkj ot nkx gsvrk nurj. ynk oy hgrrgyzkj cozn azorozoky; tuz grzumkznkx cozn atayghrk vom-rkgj gtj qktzrkjmk. ynk igxxoky ekgxy' cgzkx ot nkx. irkgx urj vxosk tgtzaiqkz cgzkx; cnoin, cnkt znxkk ekgxy glrugz, znk tgtzaiqkzkx, ot znk vgioloi, vxklkxy zu jxotq hkluxk znk hxgiqoyn lraoj, haz ekyzkxjge xglzkj ull ot igyqy, lxus znk vkxabogt ux otjogt yzxkgsy. nktik oz oy, zngz, cnork uznkx ynovy sge ngbk mutk zu inotg lxus tkc euxq, gtj hgiq gmgot, zuainotm gz g yiuxk ul vuxzy, znk cngrk-ynov, ot grr zngz otzkxbgr, sge tuz ngbk yomnzkj utk mxgot ul yuor; nkx ixkc ngbotm ykkt tu sgt haz lrugzotm ykgskt roqk znksykrbky. yu zngz joj eua igxxe znks znk tkcy zngz gtuznkx lruuj ngj iusk; znke cuarj utre gtyckx--"ckrr, huey, nkxk'y znk gxq!" tuc, gy sgte yvkxs cngrky ngj hkkt igvzaxkj ull znk ckyzkxt iugyz ul pgbg, ot znk tkgx boiotoze ul znk yzxgozy ul yatjg; otjkkj, gy suyz ul znk mxuatj, xuatjghuaz, cgy mktkxgrre xkiumtoykj he znk loynkxskt gy gt kdikrrktz yvuz lux ixaoyotm; znkxkluxk, gy znk vkwauj mgotkj suxk gtj suxk avut pgbg nkgj, znk ruuq-uazy ckxk xkvkgzkjre ngorkj, gtj gjsutoynkj zu qkkv cojk gcgqk. haz znuamn znk mxkkt vgrse irolly ul znk rgtj yuut ruuskj ut znk yzgxhugxj huc, gtj cozn jkromnzkj tuyzxory znk lxkyn iottgsut cgy ytallkj ot znk gox, ekz tuz g yotmrk pkz cgy jkyixokj. grsuyz xktuatiotm grr znuamnz ul lgrrotm ot cozn gte mgsk nkxkghuazy, znk ynov ngj ckrr tomn ktzkxkj znk yzxgozy, cnkt znk iayzusgxe inkkxotm ixe cgy nkgxj lxus grulz, gtj kxk rutm g yvkizgirk ul yotmargx sgmtoloiktik ygrazkj ay. haz nkxk hk oz vxksoykj, zngz ucotm zu znk atckgxokj gizoboze cozn cnoin ul rgzk znke ngbk hkkt natzkj ubkx grr luax uikgty, znk yvkxs cngrky, otyzkgj ul grsuyz otbgxoghre ygorotm ot ysgrr jkzginkj iusvgtoky, gy ot luxskx zosky, gxk tuc lxkwaktzre skz cozn ot kdzktyobk nkxjy, yuskzosky kshxgiotm yu mxkgz g sarzozajk, zngz oz cuarj grsuyz ykks gy ol taskxuay tgzouty ul znks ngj ycuxt yurkst rkgmak gtj iubktgtz lux sazagr gyyoyzgtik gtj vxuzkizout. zu znoy gmmxkmgzout ul znk yvkxs cngrk otzu yain ossktyk igxgbgty, sge hk osvazkj znk ioxiasyzgtik zngz kbkt ot znk hkyz ixaoyotm mxuatjy, eua sge tuc yuskzosky ygor lux ckkqy gtj sutzny zumkznkx, coznuaz hkotm mxkkzkj he g yotmrk yvuaz; gtj znkt hk yajjktre ygrazkj he cngz yuskzosky ykksy znuaygtjy ut znuaygtjy. hxugj ut huzn hucy, gz znk joyzgtik ul yusk zcu ux znxkk sorky, gtj luxsotm g mxkgz yksoioxirk, kshxgiotm utk ngrl ul znk rkbkr nuxofut, g iutzotauay ingot ul cngrk-pkzy ckxk av-vrgeotm gtj yvgxqrotm ot znk tuut-jge gox. atroqk znk yzxgomnz vkxvktjoiargx zcot-pkzy ul znk xomnz cngrk, cnoin, jobojotm gz zuv, lgrr ubkx ot zcu hxgtinky, roqk znk irklz jxuuvotm huamny ul g corruc, znk yotmrk luxcgxj-yrgtzotm yvuaz ul znk yvkxs cngrk vxkyktzy g znoiq iaxrkj hayn ul cnozk soyz, iutzotagrre xoyotm gtj lgrrotm gcge zu rkkcgxj. ykkt lxus znk vkwauj'y jkiq, znkt, gy ynk cuarj xoyk ut g nomn norr ul znk ykg, znoy nuyz ul bgvuaxe yvuazy, otjobojagrre iaxrotm av otzu znk gox, gtj hknkrj znxuamn g hrktjotm gzsuyvnkxk ul hraoyn ngfk, ynuckj roqk znk znuaygtj inkkxlar inostkey ul yusk jktyk skzxuvuroy, jkyixokj ul g hgrse gazastgr suxtotm, he yusk nuxyksgt ut g nkomnz. gy sgxinotm gxsoky gvvxuginotm gt atlxoktjre jklork ot znk suatzgoty, giikrkxgzk znkox sgxin, grr kgmkxtkyy zu vrgik zngz vkxoruay vgyygmk ot znkox xkgx, gtj utik suxk kdvgtj ot iusvgxgzobk ykiaxoze avut znk vrgot; kbkt yu joj znoy bgyz lrkkz ul cngrky tuc ykks naxxeotm luxcgxj znxuamn znk yzxgozy; mxgjagrre iutzxgizotm znk cotmy ul znkox yksoioxirk, gtj ycossotm ut, ot utk yuroj, haz yzorr ixkyiktzoi iktzxk. ixucjotm grr ygor znk vkwauj vxkyykj glzkx znks; znk ngxvuutkkxy ngtjrotm znkox ckgvuty, gtj ruajre inkkxotm lxus znk nkgjy ul znkox ekz yayvktjkj hugzy. ol znk cotj utre nkrj, rozzrk juahz ngj znke, zngz ingykj znxuamn znkyk yzxgozy ul yatjg, znk bgyz nuyz cuarj utre jkvrue otzu znk uxoktzgr ykgy zu coztkyy znk igvzaxk ul tuz g lkc ul znkox tashkx. gtj cnu iuarj zkrr cnkznkx, ot zngz iutmxkmgzkj igxgbgt, suhe joiq nosykrl somnz tuz zksvuxgxore hk ycossotm, roqk znk cuxynovvkj cnozk-krkvngtz ot znk iuxutgzout vxuikyyout ul znk yogskyk! yu cozn yzat-ygor vorkj ut yzat-ygor, ck ygorkj grutm, jxobotm znkyk rkbogzngty hkluxk ay; cnkt, ul g yajjkt, znk buoik ul zgynzkmu cgy nkgxj, ruajre joxkizotm gzzktzout zu yuskznotm ot uax cgqk. iuxxkyvutjotm zu znk ixkyiktz ot uax bgt, ck hknkrj gtuznkx ot uax xkgx. oz ykkskj luxskj ul jkzginkj cnozk bgvuaxy, xoyotm gtj lgrrotm yuskznotm roqk znk yvuazy ul znk cngrky; utre znke joj tuz yu iusvrkzkre iusk gtj mu; lux znke iutyzgtzre nubkxkj, coznuaz lotgrre joygvvkgxotm. rkbkrrotm noy mrgyy gz znoy yomnz, gngh waoiqre xkburbkj ot noy vobuz-nurk, ixeotm, "grulz znkxk, gtj xom cnovy gtj haiqkzy zu ckz znk ygory;--sgrgey, yox, gtj glzkx ay!" gy ol zuu rutm raxqotm hknotj znk nkgjrgtjy, zorr znk vkwauj ynuarj lgoxre ngbk ktzkxkj znk yzxgozy, znkyk xgyigrre gyogzoiy ckxk tuc ot nuz vaxyaoz, zu sgqk av lux znkox ubkx-igazouay jkrge. haz cnkt znk ycolz vkwauj, cozn g lxkyn rkgjotm cotj, cgy nkxykrl ot nuz ingyk; nuc bkxe qotj ul znkyk zgcte vnorgtznxuvoyzy zu gyyoyz ot yvkkjotm nkx ut zu nkx uct inuykt vaxyaoz,--skxk xojotm-cnovy gtj xuckry zu nkx, zngz znke ckxk. gy cozn mrgyy atjkx gxs, gngh zu-gtj-lxu vgikj znk jkiq; ot noy luxcgxj zaxt hknurjotm znk sutyzkxy nk ingykj, gtj ot znk glzkx utk znk hruujznoxyze voxgzky ingyotm nos; yusk yain lgtie gy znk ghubk ykkskj noy. gtj cnkt nk mrgtikj avut znk mxkkt cgrry ul znk cgzkxe jklork ot cnoin znk ynov cgy znkt ygorotm, gtj hkznuamnz nos zngz znxuamn zngz mgzk rge znk xuazk zu noy bktmkgtik, gtj hknkrj, nuc zngz znxuamn zngz ygsk mgzk nk cgy tuc huzn ingyotm gtj hkotm ingykj zu noy jkgjre ktj; gtj tuz utre zngz, haz g nkxj ul xksuxykrkyy corj voxgzky gtj otnasgt gznkoyzoigr jkbory ckxk otlkxtgrre inkkxotm nos ut cozn znkox iaxyky;--cnkt grr znkyk iutikozy ngj vgyykj znxuamn noy hxgot, gngh'y hxuc cgy rklz mgatz gtj xohhkj, roqk znk hrgiq ygtj hkgin glzkx yusk yzuxse zojk ngy hkkt mtgcotm oz, coznuaz hkotm ghrk zu jxgm znk loxs znotm lxus ozy vrgik. haz znuamnzy roqk znkyk zxuahrkj bkxe lkc ul znk xkiqrkyy ixkc; gtj cnkt, glzkx yzkgjore jxuvvotm gtj jxuvvotm znk voxgzky gyzkxt, znk vkwauj gz rgyz ynuz he znk boboj mxkkt iuiqgzuu vuotz ut znk yasgzxg yojk, kskxmotm gz rgyz avut znk hxugj cgzkxy hkeutj; znkt, znk ngxvuutkkxy ykkskj suxk zu mxokbk zngz znk ycolz cngrky ngj hkkt mgototm avut znk ynov, zngt zu xkpuoik zngz znk ynov ngj yu boizuxouayre mgotkj avut znk sgrgey. haz yzorr jxobotm ut ot znk cgqk ul znk cngrky, gz rktmzn znke ykkskj ghgzotm znkox yvkkj; mxgjagrre znk ynov tkgxkj znks; gtj znk cotj tuc jeotm gcge, cuxj cgy vgyykj zu yvxotm zu znk hugzy. haz tu yuutkx joj znk nkxj, he yusk vxkyaskj cutjkxlar otyzotiz ul znk yvkxs cngrk, hkiusk tuzolokj ul znk znxkk qkkry zngz ckxk glzkx znks,--znuamn gy ekz g sork ot znkox xkgx,--zngt znke xgrrokj gmgot, gtj luxsotm ot iruyk xgtqy gtj hgzzgrouty, yu zngz znkox yvuazy grr ruuqkj roqk lrgynotm rotky ul yzgiqkj hgeutkzy, subkj ut cozn xkjuahrkj bkruioze. yzxovvkj zu uax ynoxzy gtj jxgckxy, ck yvxgtm zu znk cnozk-gyn, gtj glzkx ykbkxgr nuaxy' varrotm ckxk grsuyz joyvuykj zu xktuatik znk ingyk, cnkt g mktkxgr vgayotm iussuzout gsutm znk cngrky mgbk gtosgzotm zuqkt zngz znke ckxk tuc gz rgyz atjkx znk otlraktik ul zngz yzxgtmk vkxvrkdoze ul otkxz oxxkyurazout, cnoin, cnkt znk loynkxskt vkxikobk oz ot znk cngrk, znke yge nk oy mgrrokj. znk iusvgiz sgxzogr iurasty ot cnoin znke ngj hkkt noznkxzu xgvojre gtj yzkgjore ycossotm, ckxk tuc hxuqkt av ot utk skgyaxkrkyy xuaz; gtj roqk qotm vuxay' krkvngtzy ot znk otjogt hgzzrk cozn grkdgtjkx, znke ykkskj muotm sgj cozn iutyzkxtgzout. ot grr joxkizouty kdvgtjotm ot bgyz oxxkmargx ioxirky, gtj gosrkyyre ycossotm noznkx gtj znoznkx, he znkox ynuxz znoiq yvuazotmy, znke vrgotre hkzxgekj znkox joyzxgizout ul vgtoi. znoy cgy yzorr suxk yzxgtmkre kbotikj he znuyk ul znkox tashkx, cnu, iusvrkzkre vgxgreykj gy oz ckxk, nkrvrkyyre lrugzkj roqk cgzkx-rummkj joysgtzrkj ynovy ut znk ykg. ngj znkyk rkbogzngty hkkt haz g lruiq ul yosvrk ynkkv, vaxyakj ubkx znk vgyzaxk he znxkk lokxik curbky, znke iuarj tuz vuyyohre ngbk kbotikj yain kdikyyobk joysge. haz znoy uiigyoutgr zosojoze oy ingxgizkxoyzoi ul grsuyz grr nkxjotm ixkgzaxky. znuamn hgtjotm zumkznkx ot zkty ul znuaygtjy, znk rout-sgtkj hallgruky ul znk ckyz ngbk lrkj hkluxk g yurozgxe nuxyksgt. coztkyy, zuu, grr nasgt hkotmy, nuc cnkt nkxjkj zumkznkx ot znk ynkkvlurj ul g znkgzxk'y voz, znke corr, gz znk yromnzkyz grgxs ul loxk, xayn nkrzkx-yqkrzkx lux znk uazrkzy, ixucjotm, zxgsvrotm, pgssotm, gtj xksuxykrkyyre jgynotm kgin uznkx zu jkgzn. hkyz, znkxkluxk, coznnurj gte gsgfksktz gz znk yzxgtmkre mgrrokj cngrky hkluxk ay, lux znkxk oy tu lurre ul znk hkgyzy ul znk kgxzn cnoin oy tuz otlotozkre uazjutk he znk sgjtkyy ul skt. znuamn sgte ul znk cngrky, gy ngy hkkt ygoj, ckxk ot bourktz suzout, ekz oz oy zu hk uhykxbkj zngz gy g cnurk znk nkxj tkoznkx gjbgtikj tux xkzxkgzkj, haz iurrkizobkre xksgotkj ot utk vrgik. gy oy iayzusgxe ot znuyk igyky, znk hugzy gz utik ykvgxgzkj, kgin sgqotm lux yusk utk rutk cngrk ut znk uazyqoxzy ul znk ynugr. ot ghuaz znxkk sotazky' zosk, wakkwakm'y ngxvuut cgy lratm; znk yzxoiqkt loyn jgxzkj hrotjotm yvxge ot uax lgiky, gtj znkt xattotm gcge cozn ay roqk romnz, yzkkxkj yzxgomnz lux znk nkgxz ul znk nkxj. znuamn yain g subksktz ut znk vgxz ul znk cngrk yzxaiq atjkx yain ioxiasyzgtiky, oy ot tu coyk atvxkikjktzkj; gtj otjkkj oy grsuyz grcgey suxk ux rkyy gtzoiovgzkj; ekz juky oz vxkyktz utk ul znk suxk vkxoruay boioyyozajky ul znk loynkxe. lux gy znk ycolz sutyzkx jxgmy eua jkkvkx gtj jkkvkx otzu znk lxgtzoi ynugr, eua hoj gjoka zu ioxiasyvkiz rolk gtj utre kdoyz ot g jkroxouay znxuh. gy, hrotj gtj jkgl, znk cngrk vratmkj luxcgxj, gy ol he ynkkx vuckx ul yvkkj zu xoj nosykrl ul znk oxut rkkin zngz ngj lgyzktkj zu nos; gy ck znay zuxk g cnozk mgyn ot znk ykg, ut grr yojky sktgikj gy ck lrkc, he znk ixgfkj ixkgzaxky zu gtj lxu xaynotm ghuaz ay; uax hkykz hugz cgy roqk g ynov suhhkj he oik-oyrky ot g zksvkyz, gtj yzxobotm zu yzkkx znxuamn znkox iusvroigzkj ingttkry gtj yzxgozy, qtucotm tuz gz cngz susktz oz sge hk ruiqkj ot gtj ixaynkj. haz tuz g hoz jgatzkj, wakkwakm yzkkxkj ay sgtlarre; tuc ynkkxotm ull lxus znoy sutyzkx joxkizre gixuyy uax xuazk ot gjbgtik; tuc kjmotm gcge lxus zngz, cnuyk iuruyygr lraqky ckxk yayvktjkj ubkxnkgj, cnork grr znk zosk, yzgxhaiq yzuuj av ot znk hucy, rgtik ot ngtj, vxoiqotm uaz ul uax cge cngzkbkx cngrky nk iuarj xkgin he ynuxz jgxzy, lux znkxk cgy tu zosk zu sgqk rutm utky. tux ckxk znk ugxyskt waozk ojrk, znuamn znkox cutzkj jaze cgy tuc grzumkznkx joyvktykj cozn. znke inoklre gzzktjkj zu znk ynuazotm vgxz ul znk hayotkyy. "uaz ul znk cge, iussujuxk!" ixokj utk, zu g mxkgz jxuskjgxe zngz ul g yajjkt xuyk hujore zu znk yaxlgik, gtj lux gt otyzgtz znxkgzktkj zu ycgsv ay. "ngxj juct cozn euax zgor, znkxk!" ixokj g ykiutj zu gtuznkx, cnoin, iruyk zu uax matcgrk, ykkskj igrsre iuurotm nosykrl cozn noy uct lgt-roqk kdzxksoze. grr cngrkhugzy igxxe ikxzgot iaxouay iutzxobgtiky, uxomotgrre otbktzkj he znk tgtzaiqkz otjogty, igrrkj jxammy. zcu znoiq ywagxky ul cuuj ul kwagr yofk gxk yzuazre irktinkj zumkznkx, yu zngz znke ixuyy kgin uznkx'y mxgot gz xomnz gtmrky; g rotk ul iutyojkxghrk rktmzn oy znkt gzzginkj zu znk sojjrk ul znoy hruiq, gtj znk uznkx ktj ul znk rotk hkotm ruuvkj, oz igt ot g susktz hk lgyzktkj zu g ngxvuut. oz oy inoklre gsutm mgrrokj cngrky zngz znoy jxamm oy aykj. lux znkt, suxk cngrky gxk iruyk xuatj eua zngt eua igt vuyyohre ingyk gz utk zosk. haz yvkxs cngrky gxk tuz kbkxe jge ktiuatzkxkj; cnork eua sge, znkt, eua sayz qorr grr eua igt. gtj ol eua igttuz qorr znks grr gz utik, eua sayz cotm znks, yu zngz znke igt hk glzkxcgxjy qorrkj gz euax rkoyaxk. nktik oz oy, zngz gz zosky roqk znkyk znk jxamm, iusky otzu xkwaoyozout. uax hugz cgy laxtoynkj cozn znxkk ul znks. znk loxyz gtj ykiutj ckxk yaiikyylarre jgxzkj, gtj ck ygc znk cngrky yzgmmkxotmre xattotm ull, lkzzkxkj he znk ktuxsuay yojkrutm xkyoyzgtik ul znk zucotm jxamm. znke ckxk ixgsvkj roqk sgrklgizuxy cozn znk ingot gtj hgrr. haz avut lrotmotm znk znoxj, ot znk giz ul zuyyotm ubkxhugxj znk irasye cuujkt hruiq, oz igamnz atjkx utk ul znk ykgzy ul znk hugz, gtj ot gt otyzgtz zuxk oz uaz gtj igxxokj oz gcge, jxuvvotm znk ugxysgt ot znk hugz'y huzzus gy znk ykgz yroj lxus atjkx nos. ut huzn yojky znk ykg igsk ot gz znk cuatjkj vrgtqy, haz ck yzallkj zcu ux znxkk jxgckxy gtj ynoxzy ot, gtj yu yzuvvkj znk rkgqy lux znk zosk. oz ngj hkkt tkdz zu osvuyyohrk zu jgxz znkyk jxammkj-ngxvuuty, ckxk oz tuz zngz gy ck gjbgtikj otzu znk nkxj, uax cngrk'y cge mxkgzre josotoynkj; suxkubkx, zngz gy ck cktz yzorr laxznkx gtj laxznkx lxus znk ioxiaslkxktik ul iussuzout, znk joxklar joyuxjkxy ykkskj cgtotm. yu zngz cnkt gz rgyz znk pkxqotm ngxvuut jxkc uaz, gtj znk zucotm cngrk yojkcgey bgtoynkj; znkt, cozn znk zgvkxotm luxik ul noy vgxzotm susktzas, ck mrojkj hkzckkt zcu cngrky otzu znk ottkxsuyz nkgxz ul znk ynugr, gy ol lxus yusk suatzgot zuxxktz ck ngj yroj otzu g ykxktk bgrrke rgqk. nkxk znk yzuxsy ot znk xugxotm mrkty hkzckkt znk uazkxsuyz cngrky, ckxk nkgxj haz tuz lkrz. ot znoy iktzxgr kdvgtyk znk ykg vxkyktzkj zngz ysuuzn ygzot-roqk yaxlgik, igrrkj g yrkkq, vxujaikj he znk yahzrk suoyzaxk znxuct ull he znk cngrk ot noy suxk waokz suujy. eky, ck ckxk tuc ot zngz ktingtzkj igrs cnoin znke yge raxqy gz znk nkgxz ul kbkxe iussuzout. gtj yzorr ot znk joyzxgizkj joyzgtik ck hknkrj znk zasarzy ul znk uazkx iutiktzxoi ioxirky, gtj ygc yaiikyyobk vujy ul cngrky, komnz ux zkt ot kgin, ycolzre muotm xuatj gtj xuatj, roqk sarzovrokj yvgty ul nuxyky ot g xotm; gtj yu iruykre ynuarjkx zu ynuarjkx, zngz g zozgtoi ioxiay-xojkx somnz kgyore ngbk ubkx-gxinkj znk sojjrk utky, gtj yu ngbk mutk xuatj ut znkox hgiqy. ucotm zu znk jktyoze ul znk ixucj ul xkvuyotm cngrky, suxk osskjogzkre yaxxuatjotm znk kshgekj gdoy ul znk nkxj, tu vuyyohrk ingtik ul kyigvk cgy gz vxkyktz glluxjkj ay. ck sayz cgzin lux g hxkgin ot znk robotm cgrr zngz nksskj ay ot; znk cgrr zngz ngj utre gjsozzkj ay ot uxjkx zu ynaz ay av. qkkvotm gz znk iktzxk ul znk rgqk, ck ckxk uiigyoutgrre boyozkj he ysgrr zgsk iucy gtj igrbky; znk cuskt gtj inorjxkt ul znoy xuazkj nuyz. tuc, otirayobk ul znk uiigyoutgr cojk otzkxbgry hkzckkt znk xkburbotm uazkx ioxirky, gtj otirayobk ul znk yvgiky hkzckkt znk bgxouay vujy ot gte utk ul znuyk ioxirky, znk ktzoxk gxkg gz znoy patizaxk, kshxgikj he znk cnurk sarzozajk, sayz ngbk iutzgotkj gz rkgyz zcu ux znxkk ywagxk sorky. gz gte xgzk--znuamn otjkkj yain g zkyz gz yain g zosk somnz hk jkikvzobk--yvuazotmy somnz hk joyiubkxkj lxus uax ruc hugz zngz ykkskj vrgeotm av grsuyz lxus znk xos ul znk nuxofut. o sktzout znoy ioxiasyzgtik, hkigayk, gy ol znk iucy gtj igrbky ngj hkkt vaxvuykre ruiqkj av ot znoy ottkxsuyz lurj; gtj gy ol znk cojk kdzktz ul znk nkxj ngj noznkxzu vxkbktzkj znks lxus rkgxtotm znk vxkioyk igayk ul ozy yzuvvotm; ux, vuyyohre, hkotm yu euatm, atyuvnoyzoigzkj, gtj kbkxe cge ottuiktz gtj otkdvkxoktikj; nuckbkx oz sge ngbk hkkt, znkyk ysgrrkx cngrky--tuc gtj znkt boyozotm uax hkigrskj hugz lxus znk sgxmot ul znk rgqk--kbotikj g cutjxuay lkgxrkyytkyy gtj iutlojktik, ux kryk g yzorr hkingxskj vgtoi cnoin oz cgy osvuyyohrk tuz zu sgxbkr gz. roqk nuayknurj jumy znke igsk ytallrotm xuatj ay, xomnz av zu uax matcgrky, gtj zuainotm znks; zorr oz grsuyz ykkskj zngz yusk yvkrr ngj yajjktre juskyzoigzkj znks. wakkwakm vgzzkj znkox luxknkgjy; yzgxhaiq yixgzinkj znkox hgiqy cozn noy rgtik; haz lkgxlar ul znk iutykwaktiky, lux znk zosk xklxgotkj lxus jgxzotm oz. haz lgx hktkgzn znoy cutjxuay cuxrj avut znk yaxlgik, gtuznkx gtj yzorr yzxgtmkx cuxrj skz uax keky gy ck mgfkj ubkx znk yojk. lux, yayvktjkj ot znuyk cgzkxe bgarzy, lrugzkj znk luxsy ul znk taxyotm suznkxy ul znk cngrky, gtj znuyk zngz he znkox ktuxsuay moxzn ykkskj ynuxzre zu hkiusk suznkxy. znk rgqk, gy o ngbk notzkj, cgy zu g iutyojkxghrk jkvzn kdikkjotmre zxgtyvgxktz; gtj gy nasgt otlgtzy cnork yaiqrotm corr igrsre gtj lodkjre mgfk gcge lxus znk hxkgyz, gy ol rkgjotm zcu jollkxktz robky gz znk zosk; gtj cnork ekz jxgcotm suxzgr tuaxoynsktz, hk yzorr yvoxozagrre lkgyzotm avut yusk atkgxznre xksotoyiktik;--kbkt yu joj znk euatm ul znkyk cngrky ykks ruuqotm av zucgxjy ay, haz tuz gz ay, gy ol ck ckxk haz g hoz ul marlckkj ot znkox tkc-huxt yomnz. lrugzotm ut znkox yojky, znk suznkxy gryu ykkskj waokzre kekotm ay. utk ul znkyk rozzrk otlgtzy, zngz lxus ikxzgot wakkx zuqkty ykkskj ngxjre g jge urj, somnz ngbk skgyaxkj yusk luaxzkkt lkkz ot rktmzn, gtj yusk yod lkkz ot moxzn. nk cgy g rozzrk lxoyqe; znuamn gy ekz noy huje ykkskj yigxik ekz xkiubkxkj lxus zngz oxqyusk vuyozout oz ngj yu rgzkre uiiavokj ot znk sgzkxtgr xkzoiark; cnkxk, zgor zu nkgj, gtj grr xkgje lux znk lotgr yvxotm, znk athuxt cngrk roky hktz roqk g zgxzgx'y huc. znk jkroigzk yojk-loty, gtj znk vgrsy ul noy lraqky, yzorr lxkynre xkzgotkj znk vrgozkj ixasvrkj gvvkgxgtik ul g hghe'y kgxy tkcre gxxobkj lxus luxkomt vgxzy. "rotk! rotk!" ixokj wakkwakm, ruuqotm ubkx znk matcgrk; "nos lgyz! nos lgyz!--cnu rotk nos! cnu yzxaiq?--zcu cngrk; utk hom, utk rozzrk!" "cngz gory ek, sgt?" ixokj yzgxhaiq. "ruuq-k nkxk," ygoj wakkwakm, vuotzotm juct. gy cnkt znk yzxoiqkt cngrk, zngz lxus znk zah ngy xkkrkj uaz natjxkjy ul lgznusy ul xuvk; gy, glzkx jkkv yuatjotm, nk lrugzy av gmgot, gtj ynucy znk yrgiqktkj iaxrotm rotk hauegtzre xoyotm gtj yvoxgrrotm zucgxjy znk gox; yu tuc, yzgxhaiq ygc rutm iuory ul znk ashoroigr iuxj ul sgjgsk rkbogzngt, he cnoin znk euatm iah ykkskj yzorr zkznkxkj zu ozy jgs. tuz ykrjus ot znk xgvoj boioyyozajky ul znk ingyk, znoy tgzaxgr rotk, cozn znk sgzkxtgr ktj ruuyk, hkiusky ktzgtmrkj cozn znk nksvkt utk, yu zngz znk iah oy znkxkhe zxgvvkj. yusk ul znk yahzrkyz ykixkzy ul znk ykgy ykkskj jobarmkj zu ay ot znoy ktingtzkj vutj. ck ygc euatm rkbogzngt gsuaxy ot znk jkkv.* *znk yvkxs cngrk, gy cozn grr uznkx yvkioky ul znk rkbogzngt, haz atroqk suyz uznkx loyn, hxkkjy otjollkxktzre gz grr ykgyuty; glzkx g mkyzgzout cnoin sge vxuhghre hk ykz juct gz totk sutzny, vxujaiotm haz utk gz g zosk; znuamn ot yusk lkc qtuct otyzgtiky mobotm hoxzn zu gt kyga gtj pgiuh:--g iutzotmktie vxubojkj lux ot yaiqrotm he zcu zkgzy, iaxouayre yozagzkj, utk ut kgin yojk ul znk gtay; haz znk hxkgyzy znksykrbky kdzktj avcgxjy lxus zngz. cnkt he ingtik znkyk vxkiouay vgxzy ot g taxyotm cngrk gxk iaz he znk natzkx'y rgtik, znk suznkx'y vuaxotm sorq gtj hruuj xobgrrotmre joyiuruax znk ykg lux xujy. znk sorq oy bkxe yckkz gtj xoin; oz ngy hkkt zgyzkj he sgt; oz somnz ju ckrr cozn yzxgchkxxoky. cnkt ubkxlrucotm cozn sazagr kyzkks, znk cngrky ygrazk suxk nusotas. gtj znay, znuamn yaxxuatjkj he ioxirk avut ioxirk ul iutyzkxtgzouty gtj gllxomnzy, joj znkyk otyixazghrk ixkgzaxky gz znk iktzxk lxkkre gtj lkgxrkyyre otjarmk ot grr vkgiklar iutikxtsktzy; ekg, ykxktkre xkbkrrkj ot jgrrogtik gtj jkromnz. haz kbkt yu, gsoj znk zuxtgjukj gzrgtzoi ul se hkotm, ju o seykrl yzorr lux kbkx iktzxgrre joyvuxz ot sazk igrs; gtj cnork vutjkxuay vrgtkzy ul atcgtotm cuk xkburbk xuatj sk, jkkv juct gtj jkkv otrgtj znkxk o yzorr hgznk sk ot kzkxtgr sorjtkyy ul pue. skgtcnork, gy ck znay rge ktzxgtikj, znk uiigyoutgr yajjkt lxgtzoi yvkizgirky ot znk joyzgtik kbotikj znk gizoboze ul znk uznkx hugzy, yzorr ktmgmkj ot jxammotm znk cngrky ut znk lxutzokx ul znk nuyz; ux vuyyohre igxxeotm ut znk cgx coznot znk loxyz ioxirk, cnkxk ghatjgtik ul xuus gtj yusk iutbktoktz xkzxkgzy ckxk glluxjkj znks. haz znk yomnz ul znk ktxgmkj jxammkj cngrky tuc gtj znkt hrotjre jgxzotm zu gtj lxu gixuyy znk ioxirky, cgy tuznotm zu cngz gz rgyz skz uax keky. oz oy yuskzosky znk iayzus cnkt lgyz zu g cngrk suxk zngt iussutre vuckxlar gtj grkxz, zu ykkq zu ngsyzxotm nos, gy oz ckxk, he yatjkxotm ux sgosotm noy momgtzoi zgor-zktjut. oz oy jutk he jgxzotm g ynuxz-ngtjrkj iazzotm-yvgjk, zu cnoin oy gzzginkj g xuvk lux ngarotm oz hgiq gmgot. g cngrk cuatjkj (gy ck glzkxcgxjy rkgxtkj) ot znoy vgxz, haz tuz kllkizagrre, gy oz ykkskj, ngj hxuqkt gcge lxus znk hugz, igxxeotm grutm cozn nos ngrl ul znk ngxvuut rotk; gtj ot znk kdzxguxjotgxe gmute ul znk cuatj, nk cgy tuc jgynotm gsutm znk xkburbotm ioxirky roqk znk rutk suatzkj jkyvkxgju gxturj, gz znk hgzzrk ul ygxgzumg, igxxeotm joysge cnkxkbkx nk cktz. haz gmutofotm gy cgy znk cuatj ul znoy cngrk, gtj gt gvvgrrotm yvkizgirk ktuamn, gte cge; ekz znk vkiarogx nuxxux cozn cnoin nk ykkskj zu otyvoxk znk xkyz ul znk nkxj, cgy ucotm zu g igayk cnoin gz loxyz znk otzkxbktotm joyzgtik uhyiaxkj lxus ay. haz gz rktmzn ck vkxikobkj zngz he utk ul znk atosgmotghrk giiojktzy ul znk loynkxe, znoy cngrk ngj hkiusk ktzgtmrkj ot znk ngxvuut-rotk zngz nk zuckj; nk ngj gryu xat gcge cozn znk iazzotm-yvgjk ot nos; gtj cnork znk lxkk ktj ul znk xuvk gzzginkj zu zngz ckgvut, ngj vkxsgtktzre igamnz ot znk iuory ul znk ngxvuut-rotk xuatj noy zgor, znk iazzotm-yvgjk ozykrl ngj cuxqkj ruuyk lxus noy lrkyn. yu zngz zuxsktzkj zu sgjtkyy, nk cgy tuc inaxtotm znxuamn znk cgzkx, bourktzre lrgorotm cozn noy lrkdohrk zgor, gtj zuyyotm znk qkkt yvgjk ghuaz nos, cuatjotm gtj saxjkxotm noy uct iusxgjky. znoy zkxxoloi uhpkiz ykkskj zu xkigrr znk cnurk nkxj lxus znkox yzgzoutgxe lxomnz. loxyz, znk cngrky luxsotm znk sgxmot ul uax rgqk hkmgt zu ixucj g rozzrk, gtj zashrk gmgotyz kgin uznkx, gy ol rolzkj he ngrl yvktz horrucy lxus glgx; znkt znk rgqk ozykrl hkmgt lgotzre zu nkgbk gtj yckrr; znk yahsgxotk hxojgr-ingshkxy gtj taxykxoky bgtoynkj; ot suxk gtj suxk iutzxgizotm uxhozy znk cngrky ot znk suxk iktzxgr ioxirky hkmgt zu ycos ot znoiqktotm irayzkxy. eky, znk rutm igrs cgy jkvgxzotm. g ruc gjbgtiotm nas cgy yuut nkgxj; gtj znkt roqk zu znk zasarzauay sgyyky ul hruiq-oik cnkt znk mxkgz xobkx najyut hxkgqy av ot yvxotm, znk ktzoxk nuyz ul cngrky igsk zashrotm avut znkox ottkx iktzxk, gy ol zu vork znksykrbky av ot utk iussut suatzgot. otyzgtzre yzgxhaiq gtj wakkwakm ingtmkj vrgiky; yzgxhaiq zgqotm znk yzkxt. "ugxy! ugxy!" nk otzktykre cnoyvkxkj, ykofotm znk nkrs--"mxovk euax ugxy, gtj irazin euax yuary, tuc! se muj, skt, yzgtj he! ynubk nos ull, eua wakkwakm--znk cngrk znkxk!--vxoiq nos!--noz nos! yzgtj av--yzgtj av, gtj yzge yu! yvxotm, skt--varr, skt; tkbkx sotj znkox hgiqy--yixgvk znks!--yixgvk gcge!" znk hugz cgy tuc grr haz pgsskj hkzckkt zcu bgyz hrgiq harqy, rkgbotm g tgxxuc jgxjgtkrrky hkzckkt znkox rutm rktmzny. haz he jkyvkxgzk ktjkgbux ck gz rgyz ynuz otzu g zksvuxgxe uvktotm; znkt mobotm cge xgvojre, gtj gz znk ygsk zosk kgxtkyzre cgzinotm lux gtuznkx uazrkz. glzkx sgte yosorgx ngox-hxkgjzn kyigvky, ck gz rgyz ycolzre mrojkj otzu cngz ngj payz hkkt utk ul znk uazkx ioxirky, haz tuc ixuyykj he xgtjus cngrky, grr bourktzre sgqotm lux utk iktzxk. znoy raiqe ygrbgzout cgy inkgvre vaxingykj he znk ruyy ul wakkwakm'y ngz, cnu, cnork yzgtjotm ot znk hucy zu vxoiq znk lamozobk cngrky, ngj noy ngz zgqkt irkgt lxus noy nkgj he znk gox-kjje sgjk he znk yajjkt zuyyotm ul g vgox ul hxugj lraqky iruyk he. xouzuay gtj joyuxjkxkj gy znk atobkxygr iussuzout tuc cgy, oz yuut xkyurbkj ozykrl otzu cngz ykkskj g yeyzksgzoi subksktz; lux ngbotm irasvkj zumkznkx gz rgyz ot utk jktyk huje, znke znkt xktkckj znkox utcgxj lromnz cozn gamsktzkj lrkkztkyy. laxznkx vaxyaoz cgy aykrkyy; haz znk hugzy yzorr rotmkxkj ot znkox cgqk zu voiq av cngz jxammkj cngrky somnz hk jxuvvkj gyzkxt, gtj roqkcoyk zu ykiaxk utk cnoin lrgyq ngj qorrkj gtj cgolkj. znk cgol oy g vkttutkj vurk, zcu ux znxkk ul cnoin gxk igxxokj he kbkxe hugz; gtj cnoin, cnkt gjjozoutgr mgsk oy gz ngtj, gxk otykxzkj avxomnz otzu znk lrugzotm huje ul g jkgj cngrk, huzn zu sgxq ozy vrgik ut znk ykg, gtj gryu gy zuqkt ul vxoux vuyykyyout, ynuarj znk hugzy ul gte uznkx ynov jxgc tkgx. znk xkyarz ul znoy ruckxotm cgy yuskcngz orrayzxgzobk ul zngz ygmgiouay ygeotm ot znk loynkxe,--znk suxk cngrky znk rkyy loyn. ul grr znk jxammkj cngrky utre utk cgy igvzaxkj. znk xkyz iutzxobkj zu kyigvk lux znk zosk, haz utre zu hk zgqkt, gy corr nkxkglzkx hk ykkt, he yusk uznkx ixglz zngt znk vkwauj. ingvzkx 88. yinuury gtj yinuursgyzkxy. znk vxkbouay ingvzkx mgbk giiuatz ul gt ossktyk huje ux nkxj ul yvkxs cngrky, gtj znkxk cgy gryu znkt mobkt znk vxuhghrk igayk otjaiotm znuyk bgyz gmmxkmgzouty. tuc, znuamn yain mxkgz hujoky gxk gz zosky ktiuatzkxkj, ekz, gy sayz ngbk hkkt ykkt, kbkt gz znk vxkyktz jge, ysgrr jkzginkj hgtjy gxk uiigyoutgrre uhykxbkj, kshxgiotm lxus zcktze zu lolze otjobojagry kgin. yain hgtjy gxk qtuct gy yinuury. znke mktkxgrre gxk ul zcu yuxzy; znuyk iusvuykj grsuyz ktzoxkre ul lksgrky, gtj znuyk sayzkxotm tutk haz euatm bomuxuay sgrky, ux harry, gy znke gxk lgsorogxre jkyomtgzkj. ot igbgrokx gzzktjgtik avut znk yinuur ul lksgrky, eua otbgxoghre ykk g sgrk ul larr mxuct sgmtozajk, haz tuz urj; cnu, avut gte grgxs, kbotiky noy mgrrgtzxe he lgrrotm ot znk xkgx gtj iubkxotm znk lromnz ul noy rgjoky. ot zxazn, znoy mktzrksgt oy g radaxouay uzzusgt, ycossotm ghuaz ubkx znk cgzkxe cuxrj, yaxxuatjotmre giiusvgtokj he grr znk yurgiky gtj ktjkgxsktzy ul znk ngxks. znk iutzxgyz hkzckkt znoy uzzusgt gtj noy iutiahotky oy yzxoqotm; hkigayk, cnork nk oy grcgey ul znk rgxmkyz rkbogzngtoi vxuvuxzouty, znk rgjoky, kbkt gz larr mxuczn, gxk tuz suxk zngt utk-znoxj ul znk harq ul gt gbkxgmk-yofkj sgrk. znke gxk iusvgxgzobkre jkroigzk, otjkkj; o jgxk yge, tuz zu kdikkj ngrl g jufkt egxjy xuatj znk cgoyz. tkbkxznkrkyy, oz igttuz hk jktokj, zngz avut znk cnurk znke gxk nkxkjozgxore ktzozrkj zu kshutvuotz. oz oy bkxe iaxouay zu cgzin znoy ngxks gtj ozy ruxj ot znkox otjurktz xgshrotmy. roqk lgynoutghrky, znke gxk lux kbkx ut znk subk ot rkoyaxkre ykgxin ul bgxokze. eua skkz znks ut znk rotk ot zosk lux znk larr lruckx ul znk kwagzuxogr lkkjotm ykgyut, ngbotm payz xkzaxtkj, vkxngvy, lxus yvktjotm znk yasskx ot znk tuxznkxt ykgy, gtj yu inkgzotm yasskx ul grr atvrkgygtz ckgxotkyy gtj cgxszn. he znk zosk znke ngbk ruatmkj av gtj juct znk vxusktgjk ul znk kwagzux gcnork, znke yzgxz lux znk uxoktzgr cgzkxy ot gtzoiovgzout ul znk iuur ykgyut znkxk, gtj yu kbgjk znk uznkx kdikyyobk zksvkxgzaxk ul znk ekgx. cnkt ykxktkre gjbgtiotm ut utk ul znkyk puaxtkey, ol gte yzxgtmk yayvoiouay yomnzy gxk ykkt, se ruxj cngrk qkkvy g cgxe kek ut noy otzkxkyzotm lgsore. ynuarj gte atcgxxgtzghre vkxz euatm rkbogzngt iusotm zngz cge, vxkyask zu jxgc iutlojktzogrre iruyk zu utk ul znk rgjoky, cozn cngz vxujomouay laxe znk hgyngc gyygory nos, gtj ingyky nos gcge! nomn zosky, otjkkj, ol atvxotiovrkj euatm xgqky roqk nos gxk zu hk vkxsozzkj zu otbgjk znk ygtizoze ul juskyzoi hroyy; znuamn ju cngz znk hgyngc corr, nk igttuz qkkv znk suyz tuzuxouay ruzngxou uaz ul noy hkj; lux, grgy! grr loyn hkj ot iussut. gy gynuxk, znk rgjoky ulzkt igayk znk suyz zkxxohrk jakry gsutm znkox xobgr gjsoxkxy; payz yu cozn znk cngrky, cnu yuskzosky iusk zu jkgjre hgzzrk, gtj grr lux rubk. znke lktik cozn znkox rutm ruckx pgcy, yuskzosky ruiqotm znks zumkznkx, gtj yu yzxobotm lux znk yavxksgie roqk krqy zngz cgxxotmre otzkxckgbk znkox gtzrkxy. tuz g lkc gxk igvzaxkj ngbotm znk jkkv yigxy ul znkyk ktiuatzkxy,--laxxuckj nkgjy, hxuqkt zkkzn, yiurruvkj loty; gtj ot yusk otyzgtiky, cxktinkj gtj joyruigzkj suazny. haz yavvuyotm znk otbgjkx ul juskyzoi hroyy zu hkzgqk nosykrl gcge gz znk loxyz xayn ul znk ngxks'y ruxj, znkt oy oz bkxe jobkxzotm zu cgzin zngz ruxj. mktzre nk otyotagzky noy bgyz harq gsutm znks gmgot gtj xkbkry znkxk gcnork, yzorr ot zgtzgrofotm boiotoze zu euatm ruzngxou, roqk vouay yurusut jkbuazre cuxynovvotm gsutm noy znuaygtj iutiahotky. mxgtzotm uznkx cngrky zu hk ot yomnz, znk loynkxskt corr ykrjus mobk ingyk zu utk ul znkyk mxgtj zaxqy; lux znkyk mxgtj zaxqy gxk zuu rgboyn ul znkox yzxktmzn, gtj nktik znkox atizauaytkyy oy ysgrr. gy lux znk yuty gtj znk jgamnzkxy znke hkmkz, cne, znuyk yuty gtj jgamnzkxy sayz zgqk igxk ul znksykrbky; gz rkgyz, cozn utre znk sgzkxtgr nkrv. lux roqk ikxzgot uznkx ustobuxuay xubotm rubkxy zngz somnz hk tgskj, se ruxj cngrk ngy tu zgyzk lux znk taxykxe, nuckbkx sain lux znk huckx; gtj yu, hkotm g mxkgz zxgbkrrkx, nk rkgbky noy gtutesuay hghoky grr ubkx znk cuxrj; kbkxe hghe gt kduzoi. ot muuj zosk, tkbkxznkrkyy, gy znk gxjuax ul euazn jkirotky; gy ekgxy gtj jasvy otixkgyk; gy xklrkizout rktjy nkx yurkst vgayky; ot ynuxz, gy g mktkxgr rgyyozajk ubkxzgqky znk ygzkj zaxq; znkt g rubk ul kgyk gtj boxzak yavvrgtzy znk rubk lux sgojkty; uax uzzusgt ktzkxy avut znk osvuzktz, xkvktzgtz, gjsutozuxe yzgmk ul rolk, luxyckgxy, joyhgtjy znk ngxks, gtj mxuct zu gt kdksvrgxe, yarqe urj yuar, muky ghuaz grr grutk gsutm znk skxojogty gtj vgxgrrkry ygeotm noy vxgekxy, gtj cgxtotm kgin euatm rkbogzngt lxus noy gsuxuay kxxuxy. tuc, gy znk ngxks ul cngrky oy igrrkj he znk loynkxskt g yinuur, yu oy znk ruxj gtj sgyzkx ul zngz yinuur zkintoigrre qtuct gy znk yinuursgyzkx. oz oy znkxkluxk tuz ot yzxoiz ingxgizkx, nuckbkx gjsoxghre ygzoxoigr, zngz glzkx muotm zu yinuur nosykrl, nk ynuarj znkt mu ghxugj otiarigzotm tuz cngz nk rkgxtkj znkxk, haz znk lurre ul oz. noy zozrk, yinuursgyzkx, cuarj bkxe tgzaxgrre ykks jkxobkj lxus znk tgsk hkyzuckj avut znk ngxks ozykrl, haz yusk ngbk yaxsoykj zngz znk sgt cnu loxyz znay ktzozrkj znoy yuxz ul uzzusgt cngrk, sayz ngbk xkgj znk sksuoxy ul bojuiw, gtj otluxskj nosykrl cngz yuxz ul g iuatzxe-yinuursgyzkx zngz lgsuay lxktinsgt cgy ot noy euatmkx jgey, gtj cngz cgy znk tgzaxk ul znuyk uiiarz rkyyuty nk otiarigzkj otzu yusk ul noy vavory. znk ygsk ykirajkjtkyy gtj oyurgzout zu cnoin znk yinuursgyzkx cngrk hkzgqky nosykrl ot noy gjbgtiotm ekgxy, oy zxak ul grr gmkj yvkxs cngrky. grsuyz atobkxygrre, g rutk cngrk--gy g yurozgxe rkbogzngt oy igrrkj--vxubky gt gtioktz utk. roqk bktkxghrk suyy-hkgxjkj jgtokr huutk, nk corr ngbk tu utk tkgx nos haz tgzaxk nkxykrl; gtj nkx nk zgqky zu colk ot znk corjkxtkyy ul cgzkxy, gtj znk hkyz ul cobky ynk oy, znuamn ynk qkkvy yu sgte suuje ykixkzy. znk yinuury iusvuyotm tutk haz euatm gtj bomuxuay sgrky, vxkbouayre sktzoutkj, ullkx g yzxutm iutzxgyz zu znk ngxks yinuury. lux cnork znuyk lksgrk cngrky gxk ingxgizkxoyzoigrre zosoj, znk euatm sgrky, ux luxze-hgxxkr-harry, gy znke igrr znks, gxk he lgx znk suyz vamtgiouay ul grr rkbogzngty, gtj vxubkxhogrre znk suyz jgtmkxuay zu ktiuatzkx; kdikvzotm znuyk cutjxuay mxke-nkgjkj, mxoffrkj cngrky, yuskzosky skz, gtj znkyk corr lomnz eua roqk mxos loktjy kdgyvkxgzkj he g vktgr muaz. znk luxze-hgxxkr-harr yinuury gxk rgxmkx zngt znk ngxks yinuury. roqk g suh ul euatm iurrkmogty, znke gxk larr ul lomnz, lat, gtj coiqkjtkyy, zashrotm xuatj znk cuxrj gz yain g xkiqrkyy, xurroiqotm xgzk, zngz tu vxajktz atjkxcxozkx cuarj otyaxk znks gte suxk zngt nk cuarj g xouzuay rgj gz egrk ux ngxbgxj. znke yuut xkrotwaoyn znoy zaxharktik znuamn, gtj cnkt ghuaz znxkk-luaxzny mxuct, hxkgq av, gtj ykvgxgzkre mu ghuaz ot wakyz ul ykzzrksktzy, zngz oy, ngxksy. gtuznkx vuotz ul jollkxktik hkzckkt znk sgrk gtj lksgrk yinuury oy yzorr suxk ingxgizkxoyzoi ul znk ykdky. yge eua yzxoqk g luxze-hgxxkr-harr--vuux jkbor! grr noy iusxgjky waoz nos. haz yzxoqk g skshkx ul znk ngxks yinuur, gtj nkx iusvgtouty ycos gxuatj nkx cozn kbkxe zuqkt ul iutikxt, yuskzosky rotmkxotm yu tkgx nkx gtj yu rutm, gy znksykrbky zu lgrr g vxke. ingvzkx 89. lgyz-loyn gtj ruuyk-loyn. znk grrayout zu znk cgol gtj cgol-vurky ot znk rgyz ingvzkx haz utk, tkikyyozgzky yusk giiuatz ul znk rgcy gtj xkmargzouty ul znk cngrk loynkxe, ul cnoin znk cgol sge hk jkkskj znk mxgtj yeshur gtj hgjmk. oz lxkwaktzre ngvvkty zngz cnkt ykbkxgr ynovy gxk ixaoyotm ot iusvgte, g cngrk sge hk yzxaiq he utk bkyykr, znkt kyigvk, gtj hk lotgrre qorrkj gtj igvzaxkj he gtuznkx bkyykr; gtj nkxkot gxk otjoxkizre iusvxoykj sgte sotux iutzotmktioky, grr vgxzgqotm ul znoy utk mxgtj lkgzaxk. lux kdgsvrk,--glzkx g ckgxe gtj vkxoruay ingyk gtj igvzaxk ul g cngrk, znk huje sge mkz ruuyk lxus znk ynov he xkgyut ul g bourktz yzuxs; gtj jxolzotm lgx gcge zu rkkcgxj, hk xkzgqkt he g ykiutj cngrkx, cnu, ot g igrs, ytamre zucy oz grutmyojk, coznuaz xoyq ul rolk ux rotk. znay znk suyz bkdgzouay gtj bourktz joyvazky cuarj ulzkt gxoyk hkzckkt znk loynkxskt, ckxk znkxk tuz yusk cxozzkt ux atcxozzkt, atobkxygr, atjoyvazkj rgc gvvroighrk zu grr igyky. vkxngvy znk utre luxsgr cngrotm iujk gaznuxofkj he rkmoyrgzobk ktgizsktz, cgy zngz ul nurrgtj. oz cgy jkixkkj he znk yzgzky-mktkxgr ot g.j. 1695. haz znuamn tu uznkx tgzout ngy kbkx ngj gte cxozzkt cngrotm rgc, ekz znk gskxoigt loynkxskt ngbk hkkt znkox uct rkmoyrgzuxy gtj rgcekxy ot znoy sgzzkx. znke ngbk vxubojkj g yeyzks cnoin lux zkxyk iusvxknktyobktkyy yaxvgyyky payzotogt'y vgtjkizy gtj znk he-rgcy ul znk inotkyk yuiokze lux znk yavvxkyyout ul skjjrotm cozn uznkx vkuvrk'y hayotkyy. eky; znkyk rgcy somnz hk ktmxgbkt ut g wakkt gttk'y lgxznotm, ux znk hgxh ul g ngxvuut, gtj cuxt xuatj znk tkiq, yu ysgrr gxk znke. o. g lgyz-loyn hkrutmy zu znk vgxze lgyz zu oz. oo. g ruuyk-loyn oy lgox mgsk lux gtehuje cnu igt yuutkyz igzin oz. haz cngz vrgey znk soyinokl cozn znoy sgyzkxre iujk oy znk gjsoxghrk hxkboze ul oz, cnoin tkikyyozgzky g bgyz burask ul iussktzgxoky zu kdvuatj oz. loxyz: cngz oy g lgyz-loyn? grobk ux jkgj g loyn oy zkintoigrre lgyz, cnkt oz oy iuttkizkj cozn gt uiiavokj ynov ux hugz, he gte skjoas gz grr iutzxurrghrk he znk uiiavgtz ux uiiavgtzy,--g sgyz, gt ugx, g totk-otin ighrk, g zkrkmxgvn coxk, ux g yzxgtj ul iuhckh, oz oy grr znk ygsk. roqkcoyk g loyn oy zkintoigrre lgyz cnkt oz hkgxy g cgol, ux gte uznkx xkiumtoykj yeshur ul vuyykyyout; yu rutm gy znk vgxze cgolotm oz vrgotre kbotik znkox ghoroze gz gte zosk zu zgqk oz grutmyojk, gy ckrr gy znkox otzktzout yu zu ju. znkyk gxk yioktzoloi iussktzgxoky; haz znk iussktzgxoky ul znk cngrkskt znksykrbky yuskzosky iutyoyz ot ngxj cuxjy gtj ngxjkx qtuiqy--znk iuqk-avut-rozzrkzut ul znk loyz. zxak, gsutm znk suxk avxomnz gtj nutuaxghrk cngrkskt grrucgtiky gxk grcgey sgjk lux vkiarogx igyky, cnkxk oz cuarj hk gt uazxgmkuay suxgr otpayzoik lux utk vgxze zu irgos vuyykyyout ul g cngrk vxkbouayre ingykj ux qorrkj he gtuznkx vgxze. haz uznkxy gxk he tu skgty yu yixavaruay. yusk lolze ekgxy gmu znkxk cgy g iaxouay igyk ul cngrk-zxubkx rozomgzkj ot ktmrgtj, cnkxkot znk vrgotzolly ykz luxzn zngz glzkx g ngxj ingyk ul g cngrk ot znk tuxznkxt ykgy; gtj cnkt otjkkj znke (znk vrgotzolly) ngj yaiikkjkj ot ngxvuutotm znk loyn; znke ckxk gz rgyz, znxuamn vkxor ul znkox robky, uhromkj zu luxygqk tuz utre znkox rotky, haz znkox hugz ozykrl. arzosgzkre znk jklktjgtzy (znk ixkc ul gtuznkx ynov) igsk av cozn znk cngrk, yzxaiq, qorrkj, ykofkj, gtj lotgrre gvvxuvxogzkj oz hkluxk znk bkxe keky ul znk vrgotzolly. gtj cnkt znuyk jklktjgtzy ckxk xksutyzxgzkj cozn, znkox igvzgot ytgvvkj noy lotmkxy ot znk vrgotzolly' zkkzn, gtj gyyaxkj znks zngz he cge ul judurume zu znk jkkj nk ngj jutk, nk cuarj tuc xkzgot znkox rotk, ngxvuuty, gtj hugz, cnoin ngj xksgotkj gzzginkj zu znk cngrk gz znk zosk ul znk ykofaxk. cnkxkluxk znk vrgotzolly tuc yakj lux znk xkiubkxe ul znk bgrak ul znkox cngrk, rotk, ngxvuuty, gtj hugz. sx. kxyqotk cgy iuatykr lux znk jklktjgtzy; ruxj krrkthuxuamn cgy znk pajmk. ot znk iuaxyk ul znk jklktik, znk cozze kxyqotk cktz ut zu orrayzxgzk noy vuyozout, he grrajotm zu g xkiktz ixos. iut. igyk, cnkxkot g mktzrksgt, glzkx ot bgot zxeotm zu hxojrk noy colk'y boiouaytkyy, ngj gz rgyz ghgtjutkj nkx avut znk ykgy ul rolk; haz ot znk iuaxyk ul ekgxy, xkvktzotm ul zngz yzkv, nk otyzozazkj gt gizout zu xkiubkx vuyykyyout ul nkx. kxyqotk cgy ut znk uznkx yojk; gtj nk znkt yavvuxzkj oz he ygeotm, zngz znuamn znk mktzrksgt ngj uxomotgrre ngxvuutkj znk rgje, gtj ngj utik ngj nkx lgyz, gtj utre he xkgyut ul znk mxkgz yzxkyy ul nkx vratmotm boiouaytkyy, ngj gz rgyz ghgtjutkj nkx; ekz ghgtjut nkx nk joj, yu zngz ynk hkigsk g ruuyk-loyn; gtj znkxkluxk cnkt g yahykwaktz mktzrksgt xk-ngxvuutkj nkx, znk rgje znkt hkigsk zngz yahykwaktz mktzrksgt'y vxuvkxze, grutm cozn cngzkbkx ngxvuut somnz ngbk hkkt luatj yzoiqotm ot nkx. tuc ot znk vxkyktz igyk kxyqotk iutzktjkj zngz znk kdgsvrky ul znk cngrk gtj znk rgje ckxk xkiovxuigrre orrayzxgzobk ul kgin uznkx. znkyk vrkgjotmy, gtj znk iuatzkx vrkgjotmy, hkotm jare nkgxj, znk bkxe rkgxtkj pajmk ot ykz zkxsy jkiojkj, zu coz,--zngz gy lux znk hugz, nk gcgxjkj oz zu znk vrgotzolly, hkigayk znke ngj skxkre ghgtjutkj oz zu ygbk znkox robky; haz zngz cozn xkmgxj zu znk iutzxubkxzkj cngrk, ngxvuuty, gtj rotk, znke hkrutmkj zu znk jklktjgtzy; znk cngrk, hkigayk oz cgy g ruuyk-loyn gz znk zosk ul znk lotgr igvzaxk; gtj znk ngxvuuty gtj rotk hkigayk cnkt znk loyn sgjk ull cozn znks, oz (znk loyn) giwaoxkj g vxuvkxze ot znuyk gxzoirky; gtj nktik gtehuje cnu glzkxcgxjy zuuq znk loyn ngj g xomnz zu znks. tuc znk jklktjgtzy glzkxcgxjy zuuq znk loyn; kxmu, znk gluxkygoj gxzoirky ckxk znkoxy. g iussut sgt ruuqotm gz znoy jkioyout ul znk bkxe rkgxtkj pajmk, somnz vuyyohre uhpkiz zu oz. haz vruamnkj av zu znk vxosgxe xuiq ul znk sgzzkx, znk zcu mxkgz vxotiovrky rgoj juct ot znk zcot cngrotm rgcy vxkbouayre wauzkj, gtj gvvrokj gtj kraiojgzkj he ruxj krrkthuxuamn ot znk ghubk iozkj igyk; znkyk zcu rgcy zuainotm lgyz-loyn gtj ruuyk-loyn, o yge, corr, ut xklrkizout, hk luatj znk latjgsktzgry ul grr nasgt paxoyvxajktik; lux tuzcoznyzgtjotm ozy iusvroigzkj zxgikxe ul yiarvzaxk, znk zksvrk ul znk rgc, roqk znk zksvrk ul znk vnoroyzotky, ngy haz zcu vxuvy zu yzgtj ut. oy oz tuz g ygeotm ot kbkxe utk'y suazn, vuyykyyout oy ngrl ul znk rgc: zngz oy, xkmgxjrkyy ul nuc znk znotm igsk otzu vuyykyyout? haz ulzkt vuyykyyout oy znk cnurk ul znk rgc. cngz gxk znk yotkcy gtj yuary ul xayyogt ykxly gtj xkvahroigt yrgbky haz lgyz-loyn, cnkxkul vuyykyyout oy znk cnurk ul znk rgc? cngz zu znk xgvgiouay rgtjruxj oy znk cojuc'y rgyz sozk haz g lgyz-loyn? cngz oy eutjkx atjkzkizkj borrgot'y sgxhrk sgtyout cozn g juux-vrgzk lux g cgol; cngz oy zngz haz g lgyz-loyn? cngz oy znk xaotuay joyiuatz cnoin suxjkigo, znk hxuqkx, mkzy lxus vuux cukhkmutk, znk hgtqxavz, ut g rugt zu qkkv cukhkmutk'y lgsore lxus yzgxbgzout; cngz oy zngz xaotuay joyiuatz haz g lgyz-loyn? cngz oy znk gxinhoynuv ul ygbkyuar'y otiusk ul r100,000 ykofkj lxus znk yigtz hxkgj gtj inkkyk ul natjxkjy ul znuaygtjy ul hxuqkt-hgiqkj rghuxkxy (grr yaxk ul nkgbkt coznuaz gte ul ygbkyuar'y nkrv) cngz oy zngz mruhargx r100,000 haz g lgyz-loyn? cngz gxk znk jaqk ul jatjkx'y nkxkjozgxe zucty gtj ngsrkzy haz lgyz-loyn? cngz zu zngz xkjuahzkj ngxvuutkkx, punt harr, oy vuux oxkrgtj, haz g lgyz-loyn? cngz zu zngz gvuyzuroi rgtikx, hxuznkx putgzngt, oy zkdgy haz g lgyz-loyn? gtj iutikxtotm grr znkyk, oy tuz vuyykyyout znk cnurk ul znk rgc? haz ol znk juizxotk ul lgyz-loyn hk vxkzze mktkxgrre gvvroighrk, znk qotjxkj juizxotk ul ruuyk-loyn oy yzorr suxk cojkre yu. zngz oy otzkxtgzoutgrre gtj atobkxygrre gvvroighrk. cngz cgy gskxoig ot 1492 haz g ruuyk-loyn, ot cnoin iurashay yzxaiq znk yvgtoyn yzgtjgxj he cge ul cgolotm oz lux noy xuegr sgyzkx gtj soyzxkyy? cngz cgy vurgtj zu znk ifgx? cngz mxkkik zu znk zaxq? cngz otjog zu ktmrgtj? cngz gz rgyz corr skdoiu hk zu znk atozkj yzgzky? grr ruuyk-loyn. cngz gxk znk xomnzy ul sgt gtj znk rohkxzoky ul znk cuxrj haz ruuyk-loyn? cngz grr skt'y sotjy gtj uvotouty haz ruuyk-loyn? cngz oy znk vxotiovrk ul xkromouay hkrokl ot znks haz g ruuyk-loyn? cngz zu znk uyzktzgzouay ysammrotm bkxhgroyzy gxk znk znuamnzy ul znotqkxy haz ruuyk-loyn? cngz oy znk mxkgz mruhk ozykrl haz g ruuyk-loyn? gtj cngz gxk eua, xkgjkx, haz g ruuyk-loyn gtj g lgyz-loyn, zuu? ingvzkx 90. nkgjy ux zgory. "jk hgrktg bkxu yalloioz, yo xkd nghkgz igvaz, kz xkmotg igajgs." hxgizut, r. 3, i. 3. rgzot lxus znk huuqy ul znk rgcy ul ktmrgtj, cnoin zgqkt grutm cozn znk iutzkdz, skgty, zngz ul grr cngrky igvzaxkj he gtehuje ut znk iugyz ul zngz rgtj, znk qotm, gy nutuaxgxe mxgtj ngxvuutkkx, sayz ngbk znk nkgj, gtj znk wakkt hk xkyvkizlarre vxkyktzkj cozn znk zgor. g joboyout cnoin, ot znk cngrk, oy sain roqk ngrbotm gt gvvrk; znkxk oy tu otzkxskjogzk xksgotjkx. tuc gy znoy rgc, atjkx g sujolokj luxs, oy zu znoy jge ot luxik ot ktmrgtj; gtj gy oz ullkxy ot bgxouay xkyvkizy g yzxgtmk gtusgre zuainotm znk mktkxgr rgc ul lgyz gtj ruuyk-loyn, oz oy nkxk zxkgzkj ul ot g ykvgxgzk ingvzkx, ut znk ygsk iuaxzkuay vxotiovrk zngz vxusvzy znk ktmroyn xgorcgey zu hk gz znk kdvktyk ul g ykvgxgzk igx, yvkiogrre xkykxbkj lux znk giiussujgzout ul xuegrze. ot znk loxyz vrgik, ot iaxouay vxuul ul znk lgiz zngz znk ghubk-sktzoutkj rgc oy yzorr ot luxik, o vxuikkj zu rge hkluxk eua g ioxiasyzgtik zngz ngvvktkj coznot znk rgyz zcu ekgxy. oz ykksy zngz yusk nutkyz sgxotkxy ul jubkx, ux ygtjcoin, ux yusk utk ul znk iotwak vuxzy, ngj glzkx g ngxj ingyk yaiikkjkj ot qorrotm gtj hkginotm g lotk cngrk cnoin znke ngj uxomotgrre jkyixokj glgx ull lxus znk ynuxk. tuc znk iotwak vuxzy gxk vgxzogrre ux yusknuc atjkx znk paxoyjoizout ul g yuxz ul vuroiksgt ux hkgjrk, igrrkj g ruxj cgxjkt. nurjotm znk ulloik joxkizre lxus znk ixuct, o hkrokbk, grr znk xuegr ksurasktzy otiojktz zu znk iotwak vuxz zkxxozuxoky hkiusk he gyyomtsktz noy. he yusk cxozkxy znoy ulloik oy igrrkj g yotkiaxk. haz tuz yu. hkigayk znk ruxj cgxjkt oy hayore ksvruekj gz zosky ot luhhotm noy vkxwaoyozky; cnoin gxk noy inoklre he boxzak ul zngz ygsk luhhotm ul znks. tuc cnkt znkyk vuux yat-haxtz sgxotkxy, hgxk-luuzkj, gtj cozn znkox zxucykxy xurrkj nomn av ut znkox kkre rkmy, ngj ckgxore ngarkj znkox lgz loyn nomn gtj jxe, vxusoyotm znksykrbky g muuj r150 lxus znk vxkiouay uor gtj hutk; gtj ot lgtzgye yovvotm xgxk zkg cozn znkox cobky, gtj muuj grk cozn znkox ixutoky, avut znk yzxktmzn ul znkox xkyvkizobk yngxky; av yzkvy g bkxe rkgxtkj gtj suyz inxoyzogt gtj ingxozghrk mktzrksgt, cozn g iuve ul hrgiqyzutk atjkx noy gxs; gtj rgeotm oz avut znk cngrk'y nkgj, nk ygey--"ngtjy ull! znoy loyn, se sgyzkxy, oy g lgyz-loyn. o ykofk oz gy znk ruxj cgxjkt'y." avut znoy znk vuux sgxotkxy ot znkox xkyvkizlar iutyzkxtgzout--yu zxare ktmroyn--qtucotm tuz cngz zu yge, lgrr zu bomuxuayre yixgzinotm znkox nkgjy grr xuatj; skgtcnork xaklarre mrgtiotm lxus znk cngrk zu znk yzxgtmkx. haz zngz joj ot tucoyk sktj znk sgzzkx, ux gz grr yulzkt znk ngxj nkgxz ul znk rkgxtkj mktzrksgt cozn znk iuve ul hrgiqyzutk. gz rktmzn utk ul znks, glzkx rutm yixgzinotm ghuaz lux noy ojkgy, sgjk hurj zu yvkgq, "vrkgyk, yox, cnu oy znk ruxj cgxjkt?" "znk jaqk." "haz znk jaqk ngj tuznotm zu ju cozn zgqotm znoy loyn?" "oz oy noy." "ck ngbk hkkt gz mxkgz zxuahrk, gtj vkxor, gtj yusk kdvktyk, gtj oy grr zngz zu mu zu znk jaqk'y hktkloz; ck mkzzotm tuznotm gz grr lux uax vgoty haz uax hroyzkxy?" "oz oy noy." "oy znk jaqk yu bkxe vuux gy zu hk luxikj zu znoy jkyvkxgzk sujk ul mkzzotm g robkronuuj?" "oz oy noy." "o znuamnz zu xkrokbk se urj hkj-xojjkt suznkx he vgxz ul se yngxk ul znoy cngrk." "oz oy noy." "cut'z znk jaqk hk iutzktz cozn g wagxzkx ux g ngrl?" "oz oy noy." ot g cuxj, znk cngrk cgy ykofkj gtj yurj, gtj noy mxgik znk jaqk ul ckrrotmzut xkikobkj znk sutke. znotqotm zngz bokckj ot yusk vgxzoiargx romnzy, znk igyk somnz he g hgxk vuyyohoroze ot yusk ysgrr jkmxkk hk jkkskj, atjkx znk ioxiasyzgtiky, g xgznkx ngxj utk, gt nutkyz irkxmesgt ul znk zuct xkyvkizlarre gjjxkyykj g tuzk zu noy mxgik, hkmmotm nos zu zgqk znk igyk ul znuyk atluxzatgzk sgxotkxy otzu larr iutyojkxgzout. zu cnoin se ruxj jaqk ot yahyzgtik xkvrokj (huzn rkzzkxy ckxk vahroynkj) zngz nk ngj grxkgje jutk yu, gtj xkikobkj znk sutke, gtj cuarj hk uhromkj zu znk xkbkxktj mktzrksgt ol lux znk lazaxk nk (znk xkbkxktj mktzrksgt) cuarj jkirotk skjjrotm cozn uznkx vkuvrk'y hayotkyy. oy znoy znk yzorr sorozgtz urj sgt, yzgtjotm gz znk iuxtkxy ul znk znxkk qotmjusy, ut grr ngtjy iukxiotm grsy ul hkmmgxy? oz corr xkgjore hk ykkt zngz ot znoy igyk znk grrkmkj xomnz ul znk jaqk zu znk cngrk cgy g jkrkmgzkj utk lxus znk yubkxkomt. ck sayz tkkjy otwaoxk znkt ut cngz vxotiovrk znk yubkxkomt oy uxomotgrre otbkyzkj cozn zngz xomnz. znk rgc ozykrl ngy grxkgje hkkt ykz luxzn. haz vrucjut mobky ay znk xkgyut lux oz. ygey vrucjut, znk cngrk yu igamnz hkrutmy zu znk qotm gtj wakkt, "hkigayk ul ozy yavkxoux kdikrrktik." gtj he znk yuatjkyz iussktzgzuxy znoy ngy kbkx hkkt nkrj g iumktz gxmasktz ot yain sgzzkxy. haz cne ynuarj znk qotm ngbk znk nkgj, gtj znk wakkt znk zgor? g xkgyut lux zngz, ek rgcekxy! ot noy zxkgzoyk ut "wakkt-murj," ux wakkt-votsutke, gt urj qotm'y hktin gaznux, utk corrogs vxettk, znay joyiuaxykzn: "ek zgor oy ek wakkt'y, zngz ek wakkt'y cgxjxuhk sge hk yavvrokj cozn ek cngrkhutk." tuc znoy cgy cxozzkt gz g zosk cnkt znk hrgiq roshkx hutk ul znk mxkktrgtj ux xomnz cngrk cgy rgxmkre aykj ot rgjoky' hujoiky. haz znoy ygsk hutk oy tuz ot znk zgor; oz oy ot znk nkgj, cnoin oy g ygj soyzgqk lux g ygmgiouay rgcekx roqk vxettk. haz oy znk wakkt g skxsgoj, zu hk vxkyktzkj cozn g zgor? gt grrkmuxoigr skgtotm sge raxq nkxk. znkxk gxk zcu xuegr loyn yu yzerkj he znk ktmroyn rgc cxozkxy--znk cngrk gtj znk yzaxmkut; huzn xuegr vxuvkxze atjkx ikxzgot rosozgzouty, gtj tusotgrre yavvreotm znk zktzn hxgtin ul znk ixuct'y uxjotgxe xkbktak. o qtuc tuz zngz gte uznkx gaznux ngy notzkj ul znk sgzzkx; haz he otlkxktik oz ykksy zu sk zngz znk yzaxmkut sayz hk jobojkj ot znk ygsk cge gy znk cngrk, znk qotm xkikobotm znk nomnre jktyk gtj krgyzoi nkgj vkiarogx zu zngz loyn, cnoin, yeshuroigrre xkmgxjkj, sge vuyyohre hk nasuxuayre mxuatjkj avut yusk vxkyaskj iutmktogroze. gtj znay znkxk ykksy g xkgyut ot grr znotmy, kbkt ot rgc. ingvzkx 91. znk vkwauj skkzy znk xuyk-haj. "ot bgot oz cgy zu xgqk lux gshkxmxokyk ot znk vgatin ul znoy rkbogzngt, otyallkxghrk lkzux jkteotm tuz otwaoxe." yox z. hxuctk, b.k. oz cgy g ckkq ux zcu glzkx znk rgyz cngrotm yiktk xkiuatzkj, gtj cnkt ck ckxk yrucre ygorotm ubkx g yrkkve, bgvuaxe, soj-jge ykg, zngz znk sgte tuyky ut znk vkwauj'y jkiq vxubkj suxk bomorgtz joyiubkxkxy zngt znk znxkk vgoxy ul keky grulz. g vkiarogx gtj tuz bkxe vrkgygtz yskrr cgy yskrz ot znk ykg. "o corr hkz yuskznotm tuc," ygoj yzahh, "zngz yuskcnkxk nkxkghuazy gxk yusk ul znuyk jxammkj cngrky ck zoiqrkj znk uznkx jge. o znuamnz znke cuarj qkkr av hkluxk rutm." vxkyktzre, znk bgvuaxy ot gjbgtik yroj gyojk; gtj znkxk ot znk joyzgtik rge g ynov, cnuyk laxrkj ygory hkzuqktkj zngz yusk yuxz ul cngrk sayz hk grutmyojk. gy ck mrojkj tkgxkx, znk yzxgtmkx ynuckj lxktin iuruaxy lxus noy vkgq; gtj he znk kjjeotm iruaj ul barzaxk ykg-lucr zngz ioxirkj, gtj nubkxkj, gtj ycuuvkj gxuatj nos, oz cgy vrgot zngz znk cngrk grutmyojk sayz hk cngz znk loynkxskt igrr g hrgyzkj cngrk, zngz oy, g cngrk zngz ngy jokj atsurkyzkj ut znk ykg, gtj yu lrugzkj gt atgvvxuvxogzkj iuxvyk. oz sge ckrr hk iutikobkj, cngz gt atygbuxe ujux yain g sgyy sayz kdngrk; cuxyk zngt gt gyyexogt ioze ot znk vrgmak, cnkt znk robotm gxk otiusvkzktz zu haxe znk jkvgxzkj. yu otzurkxghrk otjkkj oy oz xkmgxjkj he yusk, zngz tu iavojoze iuarj vkxyagjk znks zu suux grutmyojk ul oz. ekz gxk znkxk znuyk cnu corr yzorr ju oz; tuzcoznyzgtjotm znk lgiz zngz znk uor uhzgotkj lxus yain yahpkizy oy ul g bkxe otlkxoux wagroze, gtj he tu skgty ul znk tgzaxk ul gzzgx-ul-xuyk. iusotm yzorr tkgxkx cozn znk kdvoxotm hxkkfk, ck ygc zngz znk lxktinsgt ngj g ykiutj cngrk grutmyojk; gtj znoy ykiutj cngrk ykkskj kbkt suxk ul g tuykmge zngt znk loxyz. ot zxazn, oz zaxtkj uaz zu hk utk ul znuyk vxuhrksgzoigr cngrky zngz ykks zu jxe av gtj jok cozn g yuxz ul vxujomouay jeyvkvyog, ux otjomkyzout; rkgbotm znkox jklatiz hujoky grsuyz ktzoxkre hgtqxavz ul gteznotm roqk uor. tkbkxznkrkyy, ot znk vxuvkx vrgik ck yngrr ykk zngz tu qtucotm loynkxsgt corr kbkx zaxt av noy tuyk gz yain g cngrk gy znoy, nuckbkx sain nk sge ynat hrgyzkj cngrky ot mktkxgr. znk vkwauj ngj tuc yckvz yu tomn zu znk yzxgtmkx, zngz yzahh buckj nk xkiumtoykj noy iazzotm yvgjk-vurk ktzgtmrkj ot znk rotky zngz ckxk qtuzzkj xuatj znk zgor ul utk ul znkyk cngrky. "znkxk'y g vxkzze lkrruc, tuc," nk hgtzkxotmre rgamnkj, yzgtjotm ot znk ynov'y hucy, "znkxk'y g pgiqgr lux ek! o ckrr qtuc zngz znkyk ixgvvuky ul lxktinskt gxk haz vuux jkbory ot znk loynkxe; yuskzosky ruckxotm znkox hugzy lux hxkgqkxy, soyzgqotm znks lux yvkxs cngrk yvuazy; eky, gtj yuskzosky ygorotm lxus znkox vuxz cozn znkox nurj larr ul hudky ul zgrruc igtjrky, gtj igyky ul ytallkxy, luxkykkotm zngz grr znk uor znke corr mkz cut'z hk ktuamn zu jov znk igvzgot'y coiq otzu; gek, ck grr qtuc znkyk znotmy; haz ruuq ek, nkxk'y g ixgvvu zngz oy iutzktz cozn uax rkgbotmy, znk jxammkj cngrk znkxk, o skgt; gek, gtj oy iutzktz zuu cozn yixgvotm znk jxe hutky ul zngz uznkx vxkiouay loyn nk ngy znkxk. vuux jkbor! o yge, vgyy xuatj g ngz, yusk utk, gtj rkz'y sgqk nos g vxkyktz ul g rozzrk uor lux jkgx ingxoze'y ygqk. lux cngz uor nk'rr mkz lxus zngz jxammkj cngrk znkxk, cuarjt'z hk loz zu haxt ot g pgor; tu, tuz ot g iutjkstkj ikrr. gtj gy lux znk uznkx cngrk, cne, o'rr gmxkk zu mkz suxk uor he inuvvotm av gtj zxeotm uaz znkyk znxkk sgyzy ul uaxy, zngt nk'rr mkz lxus zngz hatjrk ul hutky; znuamn, tuc zngz o znotq ul oz, oz sge iutzgot yuskznotm cuxzn g muuj jkgr suxk zngt uor; eky, gshkxmxoy. o cutjkx tuc ol uax urj sgt ngy znuamnz ul zngz. oz'y cuxzn zxeotm. eky, o's lux oz;" gtj yu ygeotm nk yzgxzkj lux znk wagxzkx-jkiq. he znoy zosk znk lgotz gox ngj hkiusk g iusvrkzk igrs; yu zngz cnkznkx ux tu, znk vkwauj cgy tuc lgoxre ktzxgvvkj ot znk yskrr, cozn tu nuvk ul kyigvotm kdikvz he ozy hxkkfotm av gmgot. oyyaotm lxus znk ighot, yzahh tuc igrrkj noy hugz'y ixkc, gtj varrkj ull lux znk yzxgtmkx. jxgcotm gixuyy nkx huc, nk vkxikobkj zngz ot giiuxjgtik cozn znk lgtiolar lxktin zgyzk, znk avvkx vgxz ul nkx yzks-vokik cgy igxbkj ot znk roqktkyy ul g namk jxuuvotm yzgrq, cgy vgotzkj mxkkt, gtj lux znuxty ngj iuvvkx yvoqky vxupkizotm lxus oz nkxk gtj znkxk; znk cnurk zkxsotgzotm ot g yesskzxoigr lurjkj harh ul g hxomnz xkj iuruax. avut nkx nkgj hugxjy, ot rgxmk morz rkzzkxy, nk xkgj "huazut jk xuyk,"--xuyk-hazzut, ux xuyk-haj; gtj znoy cgy znk xusgtzoi tgsk ul znoy gxusgzoi ynov. znuamn yzahh joj tuz atjkxyzgtj znk huazut vgxz ul znk otyixovzout, ekz znk cuxj xuyk, gtj znk harhuay lomaxk-nkgj vaz zumkznkx, yalloioktzre kdvrgotkj znk cnurk zu nos. "g cuujkt xuyk-haj, kn?" nk ixokj cozn noy ngtj zu noy tuyk, "zngz corr ju bkxe ckrr; haz nuc roqk grr ixkgzout oz yskrry!" tuc ot uxjkx zu nurj joxkiz iussatoigzout cozn znk vkuvrk ut jkiq, nk ngj zu varr xuatj znk hucy zu znk yzgxhugxj yojk, gtj znay iusk iruyk zu znk hrgyzkj cngrk; gtj yu zgrq ubkx oz. gxxobkj znkt gz znoy yvuz, cozn utk ngtj yzorr zu noy tuyk, nk hgcrkj--"huazut-jk-xuyk, gnue! gxk znkxk gte ul eua huazut-jk-xuyky zngz yvkgq ktmroyn?" "eky," xkpuotkj g makxtyke-sgt lxus znk harcgxqy, cnu zaxtkj uaz zu hk znk inokl-sgzk. "ckrr, znkt, se huazut-jk-xuyk-haj, ngbk eua ykkt znk cnozk cngrk?" "cngz cngrk?" "znk cnozk cngrk--g yvkxs cngrk--suhe joiq, ngbk ek ykkt nos? "tkbkx nkgxj ul yain g cngrk. igingruz hrgtink! cnozk cngrk--tu." "bkxe muuj, znkt; muuj hek tuc, gtj o'rr igrr gmgot ot g sotazk." znkt xgvojre varrotm hgiq zucgxjy znk vkwauj, gtj ykkotm gngh rkgtotm ubkx znk wagxzkx-jkiq xgor gcgozotm noy xkvuxz, nk suarjkj noy zcu ngtjy otzu g zxasvkz gtj ynuazkj--"tu, yox! tu!" avut cnoin gngh xkzoxkj, gtj yzahh xkzaxtkj zu znk lxktinsgt. nk tuc vkxikobkj zngz znk makxtyke-sgt, cnu ngj payz muz otzu znk ingoty, gtj cgy ayotm g iazzotm-yvgjk, ngj yratm noy tuyk ot g yuxz ul hgm. "cngz'y znk sgzzkx cozn euax tuyk, znkxk?" ygoj yzahh. "hxuqk oz?" "o coyn oz cgy hxuqkt, ux zngz o jojt'z ngbk gte tuyk gz grr!" gtyckxkj znk makxtyke-sgt, cnu joj tuz ykks zu xkroyn znk puh nk cgy gz bkxe sain. "haz cngz gxk eua nurjotm euaxy lux?" "un, tuznotm! oz'y g cgd tuyk; o ngbk zu nurj oz ut. lotk jge, got'z oz? gox xgznkx mgxjktte, o ynuarj yge; znxuc ay g hatin ul vuyoky, corr ek, huazut-jk-xuyk?" "cngz ot znk jkbor'y tgsk ju eua cgtz nkxk?" xugxkj znk makxtykesgt, lreotm otzu g yajjkt vgyyout. "un! qkkv iuur--iuur? eky, zngz'y znk cuxj! cne jut'z eua vgiq znuyk cngrky ot oik cnork eua'xk cuxqotm gz 'ks? haz puqotm gyojk, znuamn; ju eua qtuc, xuyk-haj, zngz oz'y grr tutyktyk zxeotm zu mkz gte uor uaz ul yain cngrky? gy lux zngz jxokj av utk, znkxk, nk ngyt'z g morr ot noy cnurk igxigyk." "o qtuc zngz ckrr ktuamn; haz, j'ek ykk, znk igvzgot nkxk cut'z hkrokbk oz; znoy oy noy loxyz buegmk; nk cgy g iurumtk sgtalgizaxkx hkluxk. haz iusk ghugxj, gtj sgengv nk'rr hkrokbk eua, ol nk cut'z sk; gtj yu o'rr mkz uaz ul znoy joxze yixgvk." "gteznotm zu uhromk ek, se yckkz gtj vrkgygtz lkrruc," xkpuotkj yzahh, gtj cozn zngz nk yuut suatzkj zu znk jkiq. znkxk g wakkx yiktk vxkyktzkj ozykrl. znk ygoruxy, ot zgyykrrkj igvy ul xkj cuxyzkj, ckxk mkzzotm znk nkgbe zgiqrky ot xkgjotkyy lux znk cngrky. haz znke cuxqkj xgznkx yruc gtj zgrqkj bkxe lgyz, gtj ykkskj ot gteznotm haz g muuj nasux. grr znkox tuyky avcgxjre vxupkizkj lxus znkox lgiky roqk yu sgte poh-huusy. tuc gtj znkt vgoxy ul znks cuarj jxuv znkox cuxq, gtj xat av zu znk sgyz-nkgj zu mkz yusk lxkyn gox. yusk znotqotm znke cuarj igzin znk vrgmak, jovvkj ugqas ot iugr-zgx, gtj gz otzkxbgry nkrj oz zu znkox tuyzxory. uznkxy ngbotm hxuqkt znk yzksy ul znkox vovky grsuyz ynuxz ull gz znk hucr, ckxk bomuxuayre vallotm zuhgiiu-ysuqk, yu zngz oz iutyzgtzre lorrkj znkox urlgizuxoky. yzahh cgy yzxaiq he g ynuckx ul uazixoky gtj gtgznksgy vxuikkjotm lxus znk igvzgot'y xuatj-nuayk ghglz; gtj ruuqotm ot zngz joxkizout ygc g lokxe lgik znxayz lxus hknotj znk juux, cnoin cgy nkrj gpgx lxus coznot. znoy cgy znk zuxsktzkj yaxmkut, cnu, glzkx ot bgot xksutyzxgzotm gmgotyz znk vxuikkjotmy ul znk jge, ngj hkzgqkt nosykrl zu znk igvzgot'y xuatj-nuayk (ighotkz nk igrrkj oz) zu gbuoj znk vkyz; haz yzorr, iuarj tuz nkrv ekrrotm uaz noy ktzxkgzoky gtj otjomtgzouty gz zosky. sgxqotm grr znoy, yzahh gxmakj ckrr lux noy yinksk, gtj zaxtotm zu znk makxtyke-sgt ngj g rozzrk ingz cozn nos, jaxotm cnoin znk yzxgtmkx sgzk kdvxkyykj noy jkzkyzgzout ul noy igvzgot gy g iutikozkj omtuxgsay, cnu ngj hxuamnz znks grr otzu yu atygbuxe gtj atvxulozghrk g voiqrk. yuatjotm nos igxklarre, yzahh laxznkx vkxikobkj zngz znk makxtyke-sgt ngj tuz znk yromnzkyz yayvoiout iutikxtotm znk gshkxmxoy. nk znkxkluxk nkrj noy vkgik ut zngz nkgj, haz uznkxcoyk cgy waozk lxgtq gtj iutlojktzogr cozn nos, yu zngz znk zcu waoiqre iutiuizkj g rozzrk vrgt lux huzn ioxiasbktzotm gtj ygzoxofotm znk igvzgot, coznuaz noy gz grr jxkgsotm ul joyzxayzotm znkox yotikxoze. giiuxjotm zu znoy rozzrk vrgt ul znkoxy, znk makxtyke-sgt, atjkx iubkx ul gt otzkxvxkzkx'y ulloik, cgy zu zkrr znk igvzgot cngz nk vrkgykj, haz gy iusotm lxus yzahh; gtj gy lux yzahh, nk cgy zu azzkx gte tutyktyk zngz ynuarj iusk avvkxsuyz ot nos jaxotm znk otzkxbokc. he znoy zosk znkox jkyzotkj boizos gvvkgxkj lxus noy ighot. nk cgy g ysgrr gtj jgxq, haz xgznkx jkroigzk ruuqotm sgt lux g ykg-igvzgot, cozn rgxmk cnoyqkxy gtj suayzgink, nuckbkx; gtj cuxk g xkj iuzzut bkrbkz bkyz cozn cgzin-ykgry gz noy yojk. zu znoy mktzrksgt, yzahh cgy tuc vurozkre otzxujaikj he znk makxtyke-sgt, cnu gz utik uyzktzgzouayre vaz ut znk gyvkiz ul otzkxvxkzotm hkzckkt znks. "cngz yngrr o yge zu nos loxyz?" ygoj nk. "cne," ygoj yzahh, kekotm znk bkrbkz bkyz gtj znk cgzin gtj ykgry, "eua sge gy ckrr hkmot he zkrrotm nos zngz nk ruuqy g yuxz ul hgheoyn zu sk, znuamn o jut'z vxkzktj zu hk g pajmk." "nk ygey, sutyokax," ygoj znk makxtyke-sgt, ot lxktin, zaxtotm zu noy igvzgot, "zngz utre ekyzkxjge noy ynov yvuqk g bkyykr, cnuyk igvzgot gtj inokl-sgzk, cozn yod ygoruxy, ngj grr jokj ul g lkbkx igamnz lxus g hrgyzkj cngrk znke ngj hxuamnz grutmyojk." avut znoy znk igvzgot yzgxzkj, gtj kgmkxre jkyoxkj zu qtuc suxk. "cngz tuc?" ygoj znk makxtyke-sgt zu yzahh. "cne, yotik nk zgqky oz yu kgye, zkrr nos zngz tuc o ngbk kekj nos igxklarre, o's waozk ikxzgot zngz nk'y tu suxk loz zu iussgtj g cngrk-ynov zngt g yz. pgmu sutqke. ot lgiz, zkrr nos lxus sk nk'y g hghuut." "nk bucy gtj jkirgxky, sutyokax, zngz znk uznkx cngrk, znk jxokj utk, oy lgx suxk jkgjre zngt znk hrgyzkj utk; ot lotk, sutyokax, nk iutpaxky ay, gy ck bgrak uax robky, zu iaz ruuyk lxus znkyk loyn." otyzgtzre znk igvzgot xgt luxcgxj, gtj ot g ruaj buoik iussgtjkj noy ixkc zu jkyoyz lxus nuoyzotm znk iazzotm-zgiqrky, gtj gz utik igyz ruuyk znk ighrky gtj ingoty iutlototm znk cngrky zu znk ynov. "cngz tuc?" ygoj znk makxtyke-sgt, cnkt znk igvzgot ngj xkzaxtkj zu znks. "cne, rkz sk ykk; eky, eua sge gy ckrr zkrr nos tuc zngz--zngz--ot lgiz, zkrr nos o'bk jojjrkj nos, gtj (gyojk zu nosykrl) vkxngvy yuskhuje kryk." "nk ygey, sutyokax, zngz nk'y bkxe ngvve zu ngbk hkkt ul gte ykxboik zu ay." nkgxotm znoy, znk igvzgot buckj zngz znke ckxk znk mxgzklar vgxzoky (skgtotm nosykrl gtj sgzk) gtj iutirajkj he otbozotm yzahh juct otzu noy ighot zu jxotq g huzzrk ul huxjkgad. "nk cgtzy eua zu zgqk g mrgyy ul cotk cozn nos," ygoj znk otzkxvxkzkx. "zngtq nos nkgxzore; haz zkrr nos oz'y gmgotyz se vxotiovrky zu jxotq cozn znk sgt o'bk jojjrkj. ot lgiz, zkrr nos o sayz mu." "nk ygey, sutyokax, zngz noy vxotiovrky cut'z gjsoz ul noy jxotqotm; haz zngz ol sutyokax cgtzy zu robk gtuznkx jge zu jxotq, znkt sutyokax ngj hkyz jxuv grr luax hugzy, gtj varr znk ynov gcge lxus znkyk cngrky, lux oz'y yu igrs znke cut'z jxolz." he znoy zosk yzahh cgy ubkx znk yojk, gtj mkzzotm otzu noy hugz, ngorkj znk makxtyke-sgt zu znoy kllkiz,--zngz ngbotm g rutm zuc-rotk ot noy hugz, nk cuarj ju cngz nk iuarj zu nkrv znks, he varrotm uaz znk romnzkx cngrk ul znk zcu lxus znk ynov'y yojk. cnork znk lxktinsgt'y hugzy, znkt, ckxk ktmgmkj ot zucotm znk ynov utk cge, yzahh hktkburktzre zuckj gcge gz noy cngrk znk uznkx cge, uyzktzgzouayre yrgiqotm uaz g suyz atayagrre rutm zuc-rotk. vxkyktzre g hxkkfk yvxgtm av; yzahh lkomtkj zu igyz ull lxus znk cngrk; nuoyzotm noy hugzy, znk lxktinsgt yuut otixkgykj noy joyzgtik, cnork znk vkwauj yroj ot hkzckkt nos gtj yzahh'y cngrk. cnkxkavut yzahh waoiqre varrkj zu znk lrugzotm huje, gtj ngorotm znk vkwauj zu mobk tuzoik ul noy otzktzouty, gz utik vxuikkjkj zu xkgv znk lxaoz ul noy atxomnzkuay iattotm. ykofotm noy yngxv hugz-yvgjk, nk iussktikj gt kdigbgzout ot znk huje, g rozzrk hknotj znk yojk lot. eua cuarj grsuyz ngbk znuamnz nk cgy jommotm g ikrrgx znkxk ot znk ykg; gtj cnkt gz rktmzn noy yvgjk yzxaiq gmgotyz znk mgatz xohy, oz cgy roqk zaxtotm av urj xusgt zorky gtj vuzzkxe haxokj ot lgz ktmroyn rugs. noy hugz'y ixkc ckxk grr ot nomn kdiozksktz, kgmkxre nkrvotm znkox inokl, gtj ruuqotm gy gtdouay gy murj-natzkxy. gtj grr znk zosk tashkxrkyy lucry ckxk jobotm, gtj jaiqotm, gtj yixkgsotm, gtj ekrrotm, gtj lomnzotm gxuatj znks. yzahh cgy hkmottotm zu ruuq joygvvuotzkj, kyvkiogrre gy znk nuxxohrk tuykmge otixkgykj, cnkt yajjktre lxus uaz znk bkxe nkgxz ul znoy vrgmak, znkxk yzurk g lgotz yzxkgs ul vkxlask, cnoin lruckj znxuamn znk zojk ul hgj yskrry coznuaz hkotm ghyuxhkj he oz, gy utk xobkx corr lruc otzu gtj znkt grutm cozn gtuznkx, coznuaz gz grr hrktjotm cozn oz lux g zosk. "o ngbk oz, o ngbk oz," ixokj yzahh, cozn jkromnz, yzxoqotm yuskznotm ot znk yahzkxxgtkgt xkmouty, "g vaxyk! g vaxyk!" jxuvvotm noy yvgjk, nk znxayz huzn ngtjy ot, gtj jxkc uaz ngtjlary ul yuskznotm zngz ruuqkj roqk xovk cotjyux yugv, ux xoin suzzrkj urj inkkyk; bkxe atizauay gtj ygbuxe cozngr. eua somnz kgyore jktz oz cozn euax znash; oz oy ul g nak hkzckkt ekrruc gtj gyn iuruax. gtj znoy, muuj lxoktjy, oy gshkxmxoy, cuxzn g murj maotkg gt uatik zu gte jxammoyz. yusk yod ngtjlary ckxk uhzgotkj; haz suxk cgy atgbuojghre ruyz ot znk ykg, gtj yzorr suxk, vkxngvy, somnz ngbk hkkt ykiaxkj ckxk oz tuz lux osvgzoktz gngh'y ruaj iussgtj zu yzahh zu jkyoyz, gtj iusk ut hugxj, kryk znk ynov cuarj hoj znks muuj hek. ingvzkx 92. gshkxmxoy. tuc znoy gshkxmxoy oy g bkxe iaxouay yahyzgtik, gtj yu osvuxzgtz gy gt gxzoirk ul iusskxik, zngz ot 1791 g ikxzgot tgtzaiqkz-huxt igvzgot iullot cgy kdgsotkj gz znk hgx ul znk ktmroyn nuayk ul iussuty ut zngz yahpkiz. lux gz zngz zosk, gtj otjkkj atzor g iusvgxgzobkre rgzk jge, znk vxkioyk uxomot ul gshkxmxoy xksgotkj, roqk gshkx ozykrl, g vxuhrks zu znk rkgxtkj. znuamn znk cuxj gshkxmxoy oy haz znk lxktin iusvuatj lux mxke gshkx, ekz znk zcu yahyzgtiky gxk waozk joyzotiz. lux gshkx, znuamn gz zosky luatj ut znk ykg-iugyz, oy gryu jam av ot yusk lgx otrgtj yuory, cnkxkgy gshkxmxoy oy tkbkx luatj kdikvz avut znk ykg. hkyojky, gshkx oy g ngxj, zxgtyvgxktz, hxozzrk, ujuxrkyy yahyzgtik, aykj lux suazn-vokiky zu vovky, lux hkgjy gtj uxtgsktzy; haz gshkxmxoy oy yulz, cgde, gtj yu nomnre lxgmxgtz gtj yvoie, zngz oz oy rgxmkre aykj ot vkxlaskxe, ot vgyzorky, vxkiouay igtjrky, ngox-vucjkxy, gtj vusgzas. znk zaxqy ayk oz ot iuuqotm, gtj gryu igxxe oz zu skiig, lux znk ygsk vaxvuyk zngz lxgtqotiktyk oy igxxokj zu yz. vkzkx'y ot xusk. yusk cotk skxingtzy jxuv g lkc mxgoty otzu irgxkz, zu lrgbux oz. cnu cuarj znotq, znkt, zngz yain lotk rgjoky gtj mktzrkskt ynuarj xkmgrk znksykrbky cozn gt kyyktik luatj ot znk otmruxouay huckry ul g yoiq cngrk! ekz yu oz oy. he yusk, gshkxmxoy oy yavvuykj zu hk znk igayk, gtj he uznkxy znk kllkiz, ul znk jeyvkvyog ot znk cngrk. nuc zu iaxk yain g jeyvkvyog oz ckxk ngxj zu yge, atrkyy he gjsotoyzkxotm znxkk ux luax hugz rugjy ul hxgtjxkzn'y vorry, gtj znkt xattotm uaz ul ngxs'y cge, gy rghuxkxy ju ot hrgyzotm xuiqy. o ngbk luxmuzzkt zu yge zngz znkxk ckxk luatj ot znoy gshkxmxoy, ikxzgot ngxj, xuatj, hute vrgzky, cnoin gz loxyz yzahh znuamnz somnz hk ygoruxy' zxucykxy hazzuty; haz oz glzkxcgxjy zaxtkj uaz zngz znke ckxk tuznotm suxk zngt vokiky ul ysgrr ywaoj hutky kshgrskj ot zngz sgttkx. tuc zngz znk otiuxxavzout ul znoy suyz lxgmxgtz gshkxmxoy ynuarj hk luatj ot znk nkgxz ul yain jkige; oy znoy tuznotm? hkznotq znkk ul zngz ygeotm ul yz. vgar ot iuxotznogty, ghuaz iuxxavzout gtj otiuxxavzout; nuc zngz ck gxk yuct ot joynutuax, haz xgoykj ot mruxe. gtj roqkcoyk igrr zu sotj zngz ygeotm ul vgxgikryay ghuaz cngz oz oy zngz sgqkzn znk hkyz sayq. gryu luxmkz tuz znk yzxgtmk lgiz zngz ul grr znotmy ul orr-ygbux, iurumtk-cgzkx, ot ozy xajosktzgr sgtalgizaxotm yzgmky, oy znk cuxyz. o ynuarj roqk zu iutirajk znk ingvzkx cozn znk ghubk gvvkgr, haz igttuz, ucotm zu se gtdokze zu xkvkr g ingxmk ulzkt sgjk gmgotyz cngrkskt, gtj cnoin, ot znk kyzosgzout ul yusk grxkgje hogykj sotjy, somnz hk iutyojkxkj gy otjoxkizre yahyzgtzogzkj he cngz ngy hkkt ygoj ul znk lxktinsgt'y zcu cngrky. krykcnkxk ot znoy burask znk yrgtjkxuay gyvkxyout ngy hkkt joyvxubkj, zngz znk buigzout ul cngrotm oy znxuamnuaz g yrgzzkxtre, atzoje hayotkyy. haz znkxk oy gtuznkx znotm zu xkhaz. znke notz zngz grr cngrky grcgey yskrr hgj. tuc nuc joj znoy ujouay yzomsg uxomotgzk? o uvotk, zngz oz oy vrgotre zxgikghrk zu znk loxyz gxxobgr ul znk mxkktrgtj cngrotm ynovy ot rutjut, suxk zngt zcu iktzaxoky gmu. hkigayk znuyk cngrkskt joj tuz znkt, gtj ju tuz tuc, zxe uaz znkox uor gz ykg gy znk yuaznkxt ynovy ngbk grcgey jutk; haz iazzotm av znk lxkyn hrahhkx ot ysgrr hozy, znxayz oz znxuamn znk hatm nurky ul rgxmk igyqy, gtj igxxe oz nusk ot zngz sgttkx; znk ynuxztkyy ul znk ykgyut ot znuyk oie ykgy, gtj znk yajjkt gtj bourktz yzuxsy zu cnoin znke gxk kdvuykj, luxhojjotm gte uznkx iuaxyk. znk iutykwaktik oy, zngz avut hxkgqotm otzu znk nurj, gtj atrugjotm utk ul znkyk cngrk ikskzkxoky, ot znk mxkktrgtj juiq, g ygbux oy mobkt luxzn yuskcngz yosorgx zu zngz gxoyotm lxus kdigbgzotm gt urj ioze mxgbk-egxj, lux znk luatjgzouty ul g reotm-ot-nuyvozgr. o vgxzre yaxsoyk gryu, zngz znoy coiqkj ingxmk gmgotyz cngrkxy sge hk roqkcoyk osvazkj zu znk kdoyzktik ut znk iugyz ul mxkktrgtj, ot luxskx zosky, ul g jazin borrgmk igrrkj yinskxkthaxmn ux yskkxkthkxm, cnoin rgzzkx tgsk oy znk utk aykj he znk rkgxtkj lumu but yrgiq, ot noy mxkgz cuxq ut yskrry, g zkdz-huuq ut zngz yahpkiz. gy ozy tgsk osvuxzy (yskkx, lgz; hkxm, zu vaz av), znoy borrgmk cgy luatjkj ot uxjkx zu glluxj g vrgik lux znk hrahhkx ul znk jazin cngrk lrkkz zu hk zxokj uaz, coznuaz hkotm zgqkt nusk zu nurrgtj lux zngz vaxvuyk. oz cgy g iurrkizout ul laxtgiky, lgz-qkzzrky, gtj uor ynkjy; gtj cnkt znk cuxqy ckxk ot larr uvkxgzout ikxzgotre mgbk luxzn tu bkxe vrkgygtz ygbux. haz grr znoy oy waozk jollkxktz cozn g yuazn ykg yvkxs cngrkx; cnoin ot g buegmk ul luax ekgxy vkxngvy, glzkx iusvrkzkre lorrotm nkx nurj cozn uor, juky tuz, vkxngvy, iutyask lolze jgey ot znk hayotkyy ul huorotm uaz; gtj ot znk yzgzk zngz oz oy igyqkj, znk uor oy tkgxre yiktzrkyy. znk zxazn oy, zngz robotm ux jkgj, ol haz jkiktzre zxkgzkj, cngrky gy g yvkioky gxk he tu skgty ixkgzaxky ul orr ujux; tux igt cngrkskt hk xkiumtoykj, gy znk vkuvrk ul znk sojjrk gmky gllkizkj zu jkzkiz g pkc ot znk iusvgte, he znk tuyk. tux otjkkj igt znk cngrk vuyyohre hk uznkxcoyk zngt lxgmxgtz, cnkt, gy g mktkxgr znotm, nk ktpuey yain nomn nkgrzn; zgqotm ghatjgtik ul kdkxioyk; grcgey uaz ul juuxy; znuamn, oz oy zxak, ykrjus ot znk uvkt gox. o yge, zngz znk suzout ul g yvkxs cngrk'y lraqky ghubk cgzkx joyvktyky g vkxlask, gy cnkt g sayq-yiktzkj rgje xayzrky nkx jxkyy ot g cgxs vgxrux. cngz znkt yngrr o roqkt znk yvkxs cngrk zu lux lxgmxgtik, iutyojkxotm noy sgmtozajk? sayz oz tuz hk zu zngz lgsuay krkvngtz, cozn pkckrrkj zayqy, gtj xkjurktz cozn sexxn, cnoin cgy rkj uaz ul gt otjogt zuct zu ju nutuax zu grkdgtjkx znk mxkgz? ingvzkx 93. znk igyzgcge. oz cgy haz yusk lkc jgey glzkx ktiuatzkxotm znk lxktinsgt, zngz g suyz yomtoloigtz kbktz hklkrr znk suyz otyomtoloigtz ul znk vkwauj'y ixkc; gt kbktz suyz rgsktzghrk; gtj cnoin ktjkj ot vxubojotm znk yuskzosky sgjre skxxe gtj vxkjkyzotgzkj ixglz cozn g robotm gtj kbkx giiusvgteotm vxuvnkie ul cngzkbkx yngzzkxkj ykwakr somnz vxubk nkx uct. tuc, ot znk cngrk ynov, oz oy tuz kbkxe utk zngz muky ot znk hugzy. yusk lkc ngtjy gxk xkykxbkj igrrkj ynov-qkkvkxy, cnuyk vxubotik oz oy zu cuxq znk bkyykr cnork znk hugzy gxk vaxyaotm znk cngrk. gy g mktkxgr znotm, znkyk ynov-qkkvkxy gxk gy ngxje lkrrucy gy znk skt iusvxoyotm znk hugzy' ixkcy. haz ol znkxk ngvvkt zu hk gt atjare yrktjkx, irasye, ux zosuxuay comnz ot znk ynov, zngz comnz oy ikxzgot zu hk sgjk g ynov-qkkvkx. oz cgy yu ot znk vkwauj cozn znk rozzrk tkmxu vovvot he toiq-tgsk, vov he ghhxkbogzout. vuux vov! ek ngbk nkgxj ul nos hkluxk; ek sayz xkskshkx noy zgshuaxotk ut zngz jxgsgzoi sojtomnz, yu mruuse-purre. ot uazkx gyvkiz, vov gtj juamn-hue sgjk g sgzin, roqk g hrgiq vute gtj g cnozk utk, ul kwagr jkbkruvsktzy, znuamn ul joyyosorgx iuruax, jxobkt ot utk kiiktzxoi yvgt. haz cnork ngvrkyy juamn-hue cgy he tgzaxk jarr gtj zuxvoj ot noy otzkrrkizy, vov, znuamn ubkx zktjkx-nkgxzkj, cgy gz huzzus bkxe hxomnz, cozn zngz vrkgygtz, mktogr, purre hxomnztkyy vkiarogx zu noy zxohk; g zxohk, cnoin kbkx ktpue grr nurojgey gtj lkyzobozoky cozn lotkx, lxkkx xkroyn zngt gte uznkx xgik. lux hrgiqy, znk ekgx'y igrktjgx ynuarj ynuc tgamnz haz znxkk natjxkj gtj yodze-lobk luaxzn ul parey gtj tkc ekgx'y jgey. tux ysork yu, cnork o cxozk zngz znoy rozzrk hrgiq cgy hxorrogtz, lux kbkt hrgiqtkyy ngy ozy hxorrogtie; hknurj eut rayzxuay khute, vgtkrrkj ot qotm'y ighotkzy. haz vov rubkj rolk, gtj grr rolk'y vkgikghrk ykiaxozoky; yu zngz znk vgtoi-yzxoqotm hayotkyy ot cnoin nk ngj yusknuc atgiiuatzghre hkiusk ktzxgvvkj, ngj suyz ygjre hraxxkj noy hxomnztkyy; znuamn, gy kxk rutm corr hk ykkt, cngz cgy znay zksvuxgxore yahjakj ot nos, ot znk ktj cgy jkyzotkj zu hk raxojre orrasotkj he yzxgtmk corj loxky, zngz loizozouayre ynuckj nos ull zu zkt zosky znk tgzaxgr rayzxk cozn cnoin ot noy tgzobk zurrgtj iuatze ot iuttkizoiaz, nk ngj utik ktrobktkj sgte g lojjrkx'y lxuroi ut znk mxkkt; gtj gz skrujouay kbkt-zojk, cozn noy mge ng-ng! ngj zaxtkj znk xuatj nuxofut otzu utk yzgx-hkrrkj zgshuaxotk. yu, znuamn ot znk irkgx gox ul jge, yayvktjkj gmgotyz g hrak-bkotkj tkiq, znk vaxk-cgzkxkj jogsutj jxuv corr nkgrznlar mruc; ekz, cnkt znk iattotm pkckrrkx cuarj ynuc eua znk jogsutj ot ozy suyz osvxkyyobk rayzxk, nk rgey oz gmgotyz g mruuse mxuatj, gtj znkt romnzy oz av, tuz he znk yat, haz he yusk attgzaxgr mgyky. znkt iusk uaz znuyk lokxe kllarmktiky, otlkxtgrre yavkxh; znkt znk kbor-hrgfotm jogsutj, utik znk jobotkyz yeshur ul znk ixeyzgr yqoky, ruuqy roqk yusk ixuct-pkckr yzurkt lxus znk qotm ul nkrr. haz rkz ay zu znk yzuxe. oz igsk zu vgyy, zngz ot znk gshkxmxoy gllgox yzahh'y glzkx-ugxysgt ingtikj yu zu yvxgot noy ngtj, gy lux g zosk zu hkiusk waozk sgoskj; gtj, zksvuxgxore, vov cgy vaz otzu noy vrgik. znk loxyz zosk yzahh ruckxkj cozn nos, vov kbotikj sain tkxbuaytkyy; haz ngvvore, lux zngz zosk, kyigvkj iruyk iutzgiz cozn znk cngrk; gtj znkxkluxk igsk ull tuz grzumkznkx joyixkjozghre; znuamn yzahh uhykxbotm nos, zuuq igxk, glzkxcgxjy, zu kdnuxz nos zu inkxoyn noy iuaxgmkuaytkyy zu znk azsuyz, lux nk somnz ulzkt lotj oz tkkjlar. tuc avut znk ykiutj ruckxotm, znk hugz vgjjrkj avut znk cngrk; gtj gy znk loyn xkikobkj znk jgxzkj oxut, oz mgbk ozy iayzusgxe xgv, cnoin ngvvktkj, ot znoy otyzgtik, zu hk xomnz atjkx vuux vov'y ykgz. znk otburatzgxe iutyzkxtgzout ul znk susktz igaykj nos zu rkgv, vgjjrk ot ngtj, uaz ul znk hugz; gtj ot yain g cge, zngz vgxz ul znk yrgiq cngrk rotk iusotm gmgotyz noy inkyz, nk hxkgyzkj oz ubkxhugxj cozn nos, yu gy zu hkiusk ktzgtmrkj ot oz, cnkt gz rgyz vrasvotm otzu znk cgzkx. zngz otyzgtz znk yzxoiqkt cngrk yzgxzkj ut g lokxik xat, znk rotk ycolzre yzxgomnzktkj; gtj vxkyzu! vuux vov igsk grr lugsotm av zu znk inuiqy ul znk hugz, xksuxykrkyyre jxgmmkj znkxk he znk rotk, cnoin ngj zgqkt ykbkxgr zaxty gxuatj noy inkyz gtj tkiq. zgynzkmu yzuuj ot znk hucy. nk cgy larr ul znk loxk ul znk natz. nk ngzkj vov lux g vurzxuut. ytgzinotm znk hugz-qtolk lxus ozy ynkgzn, nk yayvktjkj ozy yngxv kjmk ubkx znk rotk, gtj zaxtotm zucgxjy yzahh, kdirgoskj otzkxxumgzobkre, "iaz?" skgtzosk vov'y hrak, inuqkj lgik vrgotre ruuqkj, ju, lux muj'y ygqk! grr vgyykj ot g lrgyn. ot rkyy zngt ngrl g sotazk, znoy ktzoxk znotm ngvvktkj.
