"jgst nos, iaz!" xugxkj yzahh; gtj yu znk cngrk cgy ruyz gtj vov cgy ygbkj. yu yuut gy nk xkiubkxkj nosykrl, znk vuux rozzrk tkmxu cgy gyygorkj he ekrry gtj kdkixgzouty lxus znk ixkc. zxgtwaorre vkxsozzotm znkyk oxxkmargx iaxyotmy zu kbgvuxgzk, yzahh znkt ot g vrgot, hayotkyy-roqk, haz yzorr ngrl nasuxuay sgttkx, iaxykj vov ulloiogrre; gtj zngz jutk, atulloiogrre mgbk nos sain cnurkyusk gjboik. znk yahyzgtik cgy, tkbkx pasv lxus g hugz, vov, kdikvz--haz grr znk xkyz cgy otjklotozk, gy znk yuatjkyz gjboik kbkx oy. tuc, ot mktkxgr, yzoiq zu znk hugz, oy euax zxak suzzu ot cngrotm; haz igyky corr yuskzosky ngvvkt cnkt rkgv lxus znk hugz, oy yzorr hkzzkx. suxkubkx, gy ol vkxikobotm gz rgyz zngz ol nk ynuarj mobk atjorazkj iutyioktzouay gjboik zu vov, nk cuarj hk rkgbotm nos zuu cojk g sgxmot zu pasv ot lux znk lazaxk; yzahh yajjktre jxuvvkj grr gjboik, gtj iutirajkj cozn g vkxksvzuxe iussgtj, "yzoiq zu znk hugz, vov, ux he znk ruxj, o cut'z voiq eua av ol eua pasv; sotj zngz. ck igt'z glluxj zu ruyk cngrky he znk roqky ul eua; g cngrk cuarj ykrr lux znoxze zosky cngz eua cuarj, vov, ot grghgsg. hkgx zngz ot sotj, gtj jut'z pasv gte suxk." nkxkhe vkxngvy yzahh otjoxkizre notzkj, zngz znuamn sgt rubkj noy lkrruc, ekz sgt oy g sutke-sgqotm gtosgr, cnoin vxuvktyoze zuu ulzkt otzkxlkxky cozn noy hktkburktik. haz ck gxk grr ot znk ngtjy ul znk mujy; gtj vov pasvkj gmgot. oz cgy atjkx bkxe yosorgx ioxiasyzgtiky zu znk loxyz vkxluxsgtik; haz znoy zosk nk joj tuz hxkgyz uaz znk rotk; gtj nktik, cnkt znk cngrk yzgxzkj zu xat, vov cgy rklz hknotj ut znk ykg, roqk g naxxokj zxgbkrrkx'y zxatq. grgy! yzahh cgy haz zuu zxak zu noy cuxj. oz cgy g hkgazolar, huatzkuay, hrak jge; znk yvgtmrkj ykg igrs gtj iuur, gtj lrgzre yzxkzinotm gcge, grr xuatj, zu znk nuxofut, roqk murj-hkgzkx'y yqot ngsskxkj uaz zu znk kdzxkskyz. huhhotm av gtj juct ot zngz ykg, vov'y khut nkgj ynuckj roqk g nkgj ul irubky. tu hugz-qtolk cgy rolzkj cnkt nk lkrr yu xgvojre gyzkxt. yzahh'y otkduxghrk hgiq cgy zaxtkj avut nos; gtj znk cngrk cgy cotmkj. ot znxkk sotazky, g cnurk sork ul ynuxkrkyy uikgt cgy hkzckkt vov gtj yzahh. uaz lxus znk iktzxk ul znk ykg, vuux vov zaxtkj noy ixoyv, iaxrotm, hrgiq nkgj zu znk yat, gtuznkx rutkre igyzgcge, znuamn znk rulzokyz gtj znk hxomnzkyz. tuc, ot igrs ckgznkx, zu ycos ot znk uvkt uikgt oy gy kgye zu znk vxgizoykj ycosskx gy zu xojk ot g yvxotm-igxxogmk gynuxk. haz znk gclar rutkyusktkyy oy otzurkxghrk. znk otzktyk iutiktzxgzout ul ykrl ot znk sojjrk ul yain g nkgxzrkyy ossktyoze, se muj! cnu igt zkrr oz? sgxq, nuc cnkt ygoruxy ot g jkgj igrs hgznk ot znk uvkt ykg--sgxq nuc iruykre znke nam znkox ynov gtj utre iugyz grutm nkx yojky. haz ngj yzahh xkgrre ghgtjutkj znk vuux rozzrk tkmxu zu noy lgzk? tu; nk joj tuz skgt zu, gz rkgyz. hkigayk znkxk ckxk zcu hugzy ot noy cgqk, gtj nk yavvuykj, tu juahz, zngz znke cuarj ul iuaxyk iusk av zu vov bkxe waoiqre, gtj voiq nos av; znuamn, otjkkj, yain iutyojkxgzouty zucgxjy ugxyskt pkuvgxjofkj znxuamn znkox uct zosojoze, oy tuz grcgey sgtolkyzkj he znk natzkxy ot grr yosorgx otyzgtiky; gtj yain otyzgtiky tuz atlxkwaktzre uiiax; grsuyz otbgxoghre ot znk loynkxe, g iucgxj, yu igrrkj, oy sgxqkj cozn znk ygsk xaznrkyy jkzkyzgzout vkiarogx zu sorozgxe tgboky gtj gxsoky. haz oz yu ngvvktkj, zngz znuyk hugzy, coznuaz ykkotm vov, yajjktre yveotm cngrky iruyk zu znks ut utk yojk, zaxtkj, gtj mgbk ingyk; gtj yzahh'y hugz cgy tuc yu lgx gcge, gtj nk gtj grr noy ixkc yu otzktz avut noy loyn, zngz vov'y xotmkj nuxofut hkmgt zu kdvgtj gxuatj nos soykxghre. he znk skxkyz ingtik znk ynov ozykrl gz rgyz xkyiakj nos; haz lxus zngz nuax znk rozzrk tkmxu cktz ghuaz znk jkiq gt ojouz; yain, gz rkgyz, znke ygoj nk cgy. znk ykg ngj pkkxotmre qkvz noy lotozk huje av, haz jxuctkj znk otlotozk ul noy yuar. tuz jxuctkj ktzoxkre, znuamn. xgznkx igxxokj juct grobk zu cutjxuay jkvzny, cnkxk yzxgtmk yngvky ul znk atcgxvkj vxosgr cuxrj mrojkj zu gtj lxu hkluxk noy vgyyobk keky; gtj znk soykx-skxsgt, coyjus, xkbkgrkj noy nugxjkj nkgvy; gtj gsutm znk pueuay, nkgxzrkyy, kbkx-pabktork kzkxtozoky, vov ygc znk sarzozajotuay, muj-ustovxkyktz, iuxgr otykizy, zngz uaz ul znk loxsgsktz ul cgzkxy nkgbkj znk iuruyygr uxhy. nk ygc muj'y luuz avut znk zxkgjrk ul znk ruus, gtj yvuqk oz; gtj znkxkluxk noy ynovsgzky igrrkj nos sgj. yu sgt'y otygtoze oy nkgbkt'y yktyk; gtj cgtjkxotm lxus grr suxzgr xkgyut, sgt iusky gz rgyz zu zngz ikrkyzogr znuamnz, cnoin, zu xkgyut, oy ghyaxj gtj lxgtzoi; gtj ckgr ux cuk, lkkry znkt atiusvxusoykj, otjollkxktz gy noy muj. lux znk xkyz, hrgsk tuz yzahh zuu ngxjre. znk znotm oy iussut ot zngz loynkxe; gtj ot znk ykwakr ul znk tgxxgzobk, oz corr znkt hk ykkt cngz roqk ghgtjutsktz hklkrr seykrl. ingvzkx 94. g ywakkfk ul znk ngtj. zngz cngrk ul yzahh'y, yu jkgxre vaxingykj, cgy jare hxuamnz zu znk vkwauj'y yojk, cnkxk grr znuyk iazzotm gtj nuoyzotm uvkxgzouty vxkbouayre jkzgorkj, ckxk xkmargxre mutk znxuamn, kbkt zu znk hgrotm ul znk nkojkrhaxmn zat, ux igyk. cnork yusk ckxk uiiavokj cozn znoy rgzzkx jaze, uznkxy ckxk ksvruekj ot jxgmmotm gcge znk rgxmkx zahy, yu yuut gy lorrkj cozn znk yvkxs; gtj cnkt znk vxuvkx zosk gxxobkj, znoy ygsk yvkxs cgy igxklarre sgtovargzkj kxk muotm zu znk zxe-cuxqy, ul cnoin gtut. oz ngj iuurkj gtj ixeyzgrrofkj zu yain g jkmxkk, zngz cnkt, cozn ykbkxgr uznkxy, o ygz juct hkluxk g rgxmk iutyzgtzotk'y hgzn ul oz, o otjurktz ygor, gtj mrojotm yu ykxktkre grutm; gy o hgznkj se ngtjy gsutm znuyk yulz, mktzrk mruharky ul otlorzxgzkj zoyyaky, cubkt grsuyz coznot znk nuax; gy znke xoinre hxuqk zu se lotmkxy, gtj ywakkfotm zngz yvkxs lux kbkx! lux tuc, yotik he sgte vxurutmkj, xkvkgzkj kdvkxoktiky, o ngbk vkxikobkj zngz ot grr igyky sgt sayz kbktzagrre ruckx, ux gz rkgyz ynolz, noy iutikoz ul gzzgotghrk vuxzghrk uhrutmy kxk muotm zu znk sotikx. znke ruuq sain roqk hruiqy ul hkxqynoxk sgxhrk. vras-vajjotm oy znk zkxs hkyzuckj avut ikxzgot lxgmsktzgxe vgxzy ul znk cngrk'y lrkyn, nkxk gtj znkxk gjnkxotm zgyzkj, yavvuyotm nos zu ngbk hkkt qorrkj znk loxyz jge glzkx znk bktoyut ykgyut, gtj zngz vgxzoiargx bktoyut ykgyut iutzksvuxgxe cozn gt atayagrre lotk botzgmk ul znk botkegxjy ul ingsvgmtk. znkxk oy uxomotgr cozn znk cngrkskt, gtj kbkt yu oy znk tgzaxk ul znk yahyzgtik. oz oy gt otkllghre uufe, yzxotme gllgox, suyz lxkwaktzre luatj ot znk zahy ul yvkxs, glzkx g vxurutmkj ywakkfotm, gtj yahykwaktz rkgznkxt ywaormkk; gtj he tgskrkyy hrgtjoynsktzy, gy ul sgmoi, grraxky grutm cozn oz grr osvaxozoky. haz zu rkgxt grr ghuaz znkyk xkiutjozk sgzzkxy, euax hkyz cge oy gz utik zu jkyiktj otzu znk gxxobky lux iazzotm av ozy iutzktzy, znoy gvgxzsktz oy g yiktk ul zkxxux zu grr zexuy, kyvkiogrre he tomnz. ut utk yojk, roz he g jarr rgtzkxt, g yvgik ngy hkkt rklz irkgx lux znk cuxqskt. znke mktkxgrre mu ot vgoxy,--g voqk-gtj-mgllsgt gtj g yvgjk-sgt. znk cngrotm-voqk oy yosorgx zu g lxomgzk'y hugxjotm-ckgvut ul znk ygsk tgsk. znk mgll oy yuskznotm roqk g hugz-nuuq. cozn noy mgll, znk mgllsgt nuuqy ut zu g ynkkz ul hrahhkx, gtj yzxobky zu nurj oz lxus yrovvotm, gy znk ynov vozinky gtj raxinky ghuaz. skgtcnork, znk yvgjk-sgt yzgtjy ut znk ynkkz ozykrl, vkxvktjoiargxre inuvvotm oz otzu znk vuxzghrk nuxyk-vokiky. znoy yvgjk oy yngxv gy nutk igt sgqk oz; znk yvgjksgt'y lkkz gxk ynukrkyy; znk znotm nk yzgtjy ut corr yuskzosky oxxkyoyzohre yrojk gcge lxus nos, roqk g yrkjmk. ol nk iazy ull utk ul noy uct zuky, ux utk ul noy gyyoyzgtzy', cuarj eua hk bkxe sain gyzutoynkj? zuky gxk yigxik gsutm bkzkxgt hrahhkx-xuus skt. ingvzkx 95. znk igyyuiq. ngj eua yzkvvkj ut hugxj znk vkwauj ktomsgzoigr uhpkiz, cnoin eua cuarj ngbk ykkt znkxk, reotm grutm rktmzncoyk ot znk rkk yiavvkxy. tuz znk cutjxuay ioyzkxt ot znk cngrk'y namk nkgj; tuz znk vxujome ul noy atnotmkj ruckx pgc; tuz znk soxgirk ul noy yesskzxoigr zgor; tutk ul znkyk cuarj yu yaxvxoyk eua, gy ngrl g mrosvyk ul zngz atgiiuatzghrk iutk,--rutmkx zngt g qktzaiqogt oy zgrr, tomn g luuz ot jogskzkx gz znk hgyk, gtj pkz-hrgiq gy eupu, znk khute ojur ul wakkwakm. gtj gt ojur, otjkkj, oz oy; ux, xgznkx, ot urj zosky, ozy roqktkyy cgy. yain gt ojur gy zngz luatj ot znk ykixkz mxubky ul wakkt sggingn ot pajkg; gtj lux cuxynovvotm cnoin, qotm gyg, nkx yut, joj jkvuyk nkx, gtj jkyzxuekj znk ojur, gtj haxtz oz lux gt ghusotgzout gz znk hxuuq qkjxut, gy jgxqre ykz luxzn ot znk 15zn ingvzkx ul znk loxyz huuq ul qotmy. ruuq gz znk ygorux, igrrkj znk sotikx, cnu tuc iusky grutm, gtj gyyoyzkj he zcu grroky, nkgbore hgiqy znk mxgtjoyyosay, gy znk sgxotkxy igrr oz, gtj cozn huckj ynuarjkxy, yzgmmkxy ull cozn oz gy ol nk ckxk g mxktgjokx igxxeotm g jkgj iusxgjk lxus znk lokrj. kdzktjotm oz avut znk luxkigyzrk jkiq, nk tuc vxuikkjy ierotjxoigrre zu xksubk ozy jgxq vkrz, gy gt glxoigt natzkx znk vkrz ul g hug. znoy jutk nk zaxty znk vkrz otyojk uaz, roqk g vgtzgruut rkm; mobky oz g muuj yzxkzinotm, yu gy grsuyz zu juahrk ozy jogskzkx; gtj gz rgyz ngtmy oz, ckrr yvxkgj, ot znk xommotm, zu jxe. kxk rutm, oz oy zgqkt juct; cnkt xksubotm yusk znxkk lkkz ul oz, zucgxjy znk vuotzkj kdzxksoze, gtj znkt iazzotm zcu yrozy lux gxs-nurky gz znk uznkx ktj, nk rktmzncoyk yrovy nosykrl hujore otzu oz. znk sotikx tuc yzgtjy hkluxk eua otbkyzkj ot znk larr igtutoigry ul noy igrrotm. ossksuxogr zu grr noy uxjkx, znoy otbkyzozaxk grutk corr gjkwagzkre vxuzkiz nos, cnork ksvruekj ot znk vkiarogx latizouty ul noy ulloik. zngz ulloik iutyoyzy ot sotiotm znk nuxyk-vokiky ul hrahhkx lux znk vuzy; gt uvkxgzout cnoin oy iutjaizkj gz g iaxouay cuujkt nuxyk, vrgtzkj ktjcoyk gmgotyz znk harcgxqy, gtj cozn g igvgiouay zah hktkgzn oz, otzu cnoin znk sotikj vokiky jxuv, lgyz gy znk ynkkzy lxus g xgvz uxgzux'y jkyq. gxxgekj ot jkiktz hrgiq; uiiaveotm g iutyvoiauay varvoz; otzktz ut hohrk rkgbky; cngz g igtjojgzk lux gt gxinhoynuvxoi, cngz g rgj lux g vuvk ckxk znoy sotikx!* *hohrk rkgbky! hohrk rkgbky! znoy oy znk otbgxoghrk ixe lxus znk sgzky zu znk sotikx. oz ktpuoty nos zu hk igxklar, gtj iaz noy cuxq otzu gy znot yroiky gy vuyyohrk, otgysain gy he yu juotm znk hayotkyy ul huorotm uaz znk uor oy sain giikrkxgzkj, gtj ozy wagtzoze iutyojkxghre otixkgykj, hkyojky vkxngvy osvxubotm oz ot wagroze. ingvzkx 96. znk zxe-cuxqy. hkyojky nkx nuoyzkj hugzy, gt gskxoigt cngrkx oy uazcgxjre joyzotmaoynkj he nkx zxe-cuxqy. ynk vxkyktzy znk iaxouay gtusgre ul znk suyz yuroj sgyutxe puototm cozn ugq gtj nksv ot iutyzozazotm znk iusvrkzkj ynov. oz oy gy ol lxus znk uvkt lokrj g hxoiq-qort ckxk zxgtyvuxzkj zu nkx vrgtqy. znk zxe-cuxqy gxk vrgtzkj hkzckkt znk luxksgyz gtj sgotsgyz, znk suyz xuuse vgxz ul znk jkiq. znk zoshkxy hktkgzn gxk ul g vkiarogx yzxktmzn, lozzkj zu yayzgot znk ckomnz ul gt grsuyz yuroj sgyy ul hxoiq gtj suxzgx, yusk zkt lkkz he komnz ywagxk, gtj lobk ot nkomnz. znk luatjgzout juky tuz vktkzxgzk znk jkiq, haz znk sgyutxe oy loxsre ykiaxkj zu znk yaxlgik he vutjkxuay qtkky ul oxut hxgiotm oz ut grr yojky, gtj yixkcotm oz juct zu znk zoshkxy. ut znk lrgtqy oz oy igykj cozn cuuj, gtj gz zuv iusvrkzkre iubkxkj he g rgxmk, yruvotm, hgzzktkj ngzincge. xksubotm znoy ngzin ck kdvuyk znk mxkgz zxe-vuzy, zcu ot tashkx, gtj kgin ul ykbkxgr hgxxkry' igvgioze. cnkt tuz ot ayk, znke gxk qkvz xksgxqghre irkgt. yuskzosky znke gxk vuroynkj cozn yugvyzutk gtj ygtj, zorr znke ynotk coznot roqk yorbkx vatin-hucry. jaxotm znk tomnz-cgzinky yusk ietoigr urj ygoruxy corr ixgcr otzu znks gtj iuor znksykrbky gcge znkxk lux g tgv. cnork ksvruekj ot vuroynotm znks--utk sgt ot kgin vuz, yojk he yojk--sgte iutlojktzogr iussatoigzouty gxk igxxokj ut, ubkx znk oxut rovy. oz oy g vrgik gryu lux vxuluatj sgznksgzoigr skjozgzout. oz cgy ot znk rklz ngtj zxe-vuz ul znk vkwauj, cozn znk yugvyzutk joromktzre ioxirotm xuatj sk, zngz o cgy loxyz otjoxkizre yzxaiq he znk xksgxqghrk lgiz, zngz ot mkuskzxe grr hujoky mrojotm grutm znk ieiruoj, se yugvyzutk lux kdgsvrk, corr jkyiktj lxus gte vuotz ot vxkioykre znk ygsk zosk. xksubotm znk loxk-hugxj lxus znk lxutz ul znk zxe-cuxqy, znk hgxk sgyutxe ul zngz yojk oy kdvuykj, vktkzxgzkj he znk zcu oxut suazny ul znk laxtgiky, joxkizre atjkxtkgzn znk vuzy. znkyk suazny gxk lozzkj cozn nkgbe juuxy ul oxut. znk otzktyk nkgz ul znk loxk oy vxkbktzkj lxus iussatoigzotm ozykrl zu znk jkiq, he skgty ul g yngrruc xkykxbuox kdzktjotm atjkx znk ktzoxk otiruykj yaxlgik ul znk cuxqy. he g zattkr otykxzkj gz znk xkgx, znoy xkykxbuox oy qkvz xkvrktoynkj cozn cgzkx gy lgyz gy oz kbgvuxgzky. znkxk gxk tu kdzkxtgr inostkey; znke uvkt joxkiz lxus znk xkgx cgrr. gtj nkxk rkz ay mu hgiq lux g susktz. oz cgy ghuaz totk u'iruiq gz tomnz zngz znk vkwauj'y zxe-cuxqy ckxk loxyz yzgxzkj ut znoy vxkyktz buegmk. oz hkrutmkj zu yzahh zu ubkxykk znk hayotkyy. "grr xkgje znkxk? ull ngzin, znkt, gtj yzgxz nkx. eua iuuq, loxk znk cuxqy." znoy cgy gt kgye znotm, lux znk igxvktzkx ngj hkkt znxayzotm noy yngbotmy otzu znk laxtgik znxuamnuaz znk vgyygmk. nkxk hk oz ygoj zngz ot g cngrotm buegmk znk loxyz loxk ot znk zxe-cuxqy ngy zu hk lkj lux g zosk cozn cuuj. glzkx zngz tu cuuj oy aykj, kdikvz gy g skgty ul waoiq omtozout zu znk yzgvrk lakr. ot g cuxj, glzkx hkotm zxokj uaz, znk ixoyv, ynxobkrrkj hrahhkx, tuc igrrkj yixgvy ux lxozzkxy, yzorr iutzgoty iutyojkxghrk ul ozy atizauay vxuvkxzoky. znkyk lxozzkxy lkkj znk lrgsky. roqk g vrkznuxoi haxtotm sgxzex, ux g ykrl-iutyasotm soygtznxuvk, utik omtozkj, znk cngrk yavvroky noy uct lakr gtj haxty he noy uct huje. cuarj zngz nk iutyaskj noy uct ysuqk! lux noy ysuqk oy nuxxohrk zu otngrk, gtj otngrk oz eua sayz, gtj tuz utre zngz, haz eua sayz robk ot oz lux znk zosk. oz ngy gt atyvkgqghrk, corj, notjuu ujux ghuaz oz, yain gy sge raxq ot znk boiotoze ul latkxkgr vexky. oz yskrry roqk znk rklz cotm ul znk jge ul pajmsktz; oz oy gt gxmasktz lux znk voz. he sojtomnz znk cuxqy ckxk ot larr uvkxgzout. ck ckxk irkgx lxus znk igxigyk; ygor ngj hkkt sgjk; znk cotj cgy lxkynktotm; znk corj uikgt jgxqtkyy cgy otzktyk. haz zngz jgxqtkyy cgy roiqkj av he znk lokxik lrgsky, cnoin gz otzkxbgry luxqkj luxzn lxus znk yuuze lraky, gtj orrasotgzkj kbkxe rulze xuvk ot znk xommotm, gy cozn znk lgskj mxkkq loxk. znk haxtotm ynov jxubk ut, gy ol xksuxykrkyyre iussoyyoutkj zu yusk bktmklar jkkj. yu znk vozin gtj yarvnax-lxkomnzkj hxomy ul znk hurj nejxouzk, igtgxoy, oyyaotm lxus znkox sojtomnz ngxhuxy, cozn hxugj ynkkzy ul lrgsk lux ygory, huxk juct avut znk zaxqoyn lxomgzky, gtj lurjkj znks ot iutlrgmxgzouty. znk ngzin, xksubkj lxus znk zuv ul znk cuxqy, tuc glluxjkj g cojk nkgxzn ot lxutz ul znks. yzgtjotm ut znoy ckxk znk zgxzgxkgt yngvky ul znk vgmgt ngxvuutkkxy, grcgey znk cngrk-ynov'y yzuqkxy. cozn namk vxutmkj vurky znke vozinkj noyyotm sgyyky ul hrahhkx otzu znk yigrjotm vuzy, ux yzoxxkj av znk loxky hktkgzn, zorr znk ytgqe lrgsky jgxzkj, iaxrotm, uaz ul znk juuxy zu igzin znks he znk lkkz. znk ysuqk xurrkj gcge ot yarrkt nkgvy. zu kbkxe vozin ul znk ynov znkxk cgy g vozin ul znk huorotm uor, cnoin ykkskj grr kgmkxtkyy zu rkgv otzu znkox lgiky. uvvuyozk znk suazn ul znk cuxqy, ut znk laxznkx yojk ul znk cojk cuujkt nkgxzn, cgy znk cotjrgyy. znoy ykxbkj lux g ykg-yulg. nkxk ruatmkj znk cgzin, cnkt tuz uznkxcoyk ksvruekj, ruuqotm otzu znk xkj nkgz ul znk loxk, zorr znkox keky lkrz yiuxinkj ot znkox nkgjy. znkox zgcte lkgzaxky, tuc grr hkmxoskj cozn ysuqk gtj yckgz, znkox sgzzkj hkgxjy, gtj znk iutzxgyzotm hgxhgxoi hxorrogtie ul znkox zkkzn, grr znkyk ckxk yzxgtmkre xkbkgrkj ot znk igvxoiouay kshrgfutotmy ul znk cuxqy. gy znke tgxxgzkj zu kgin uznkx znkox atnure gjbktzaxky, znkox zgrky ul zkxxux zurj ot cuxjy ul soxzn; gy znkox atioborofkj rgamnzkx luxqkj avcgxjy uaz ul znks, roqk znk lrgsky lxus znk laxtgik; gy zu gtj lxu, ot znkox lxutz, znk ngxvuutkkxy corjre mkyzoiargzkj cozn znkox namk vxutmkj luxqy gtj jovvkxy; gy znk cotj nucrkj ut, gtj znk ykg rkgvkj, gtj znk ynov mxugtkj gtj jobkj, gtj ekz yzkgjlgyzre ynuz nkx xkj nkrr laxznkx gtj laxznkx otzu znk hrgiqtkyy ul znk ykg gtj znk tomnz, gtj yiuxtlarre ingsvkj znk cnozk hutk ot nkx suazn, gtj boiouayre yvgz xuatj nkx ut grr yojky; znkt znk xaynotm vkwauj, lxkomnzkj cozn ygbgmky, gtj rgjkt cozn loxk, gtj haxtotm g iuxvyk, gtj vratmotm otzu zngz hrgiqtkyy ul jgxqtkyy, ykkskj znk sgzkxogr iuatzkxvgxz ul nkx sutusgtogi iussgtjkx'y yuar. yu ykkskj oz zu sk, gy o yzuuj gz nkx nkrs, gtj lux rutm nuaxy yorktzre maojkj znk cge ul znoy loxk-ynov ut znk ykg. cxgvvkj, lux zngz otzkxbgr, ot jgxqtkyy seykrl, o haz znk hkzzkx ygc znk xkjtkyy, znk sgjtkyy, znk mngyzrotkyy ul uznkxy. znk iutzotagr yomnz ul znk loktj yngvky hkluxk sk, igvkxotm ngrl ot ysuqk gtj ngrl ot loxk, znkyk gz rgyz hkmgz qotjxkj boyouty ot se yuar, yu yuut gy o hkmgt zu eokrj zu zngz atgiiuatzghrk jxucyotkyy cnoin kbkx cuarj iusk ubkx sk gz g sojtomnz nkrs. haz zngz tomnz, ot vgxzoiargx, g yzxgtmk (gtj kbkx yotik otkdvroighrk) znotm uiiaxxkj zu sk. yzgxzotm lxus g hxokl yzgtjotm yrkkv, o cgy nuxxohre iutyiouay ul yuskznotm lgzgrre cxutm. znk pgc-hutk zorrkx ysuzk se yojk, cnoin rkgtkj gmgotyz oz; ot se kgxy cgy znk ruc nas ul ygory, payz hkmottotm zu yngqk ot znk cotj; o znuamnz se keky ckxk uvkt; o cgy ngrl iutyiouay ul vazzotm se lotmkxy zu znk rojy gtj skingtoigrre yzxkzinotm znks yzorr laxznkx gvgxz. haz, yvozk ul grr znoy, o iuarj ykk tu iusvgyy hkluxk sk zu yzkkx he; znuamn oz ykkskj haz g sotazk yotik o ngj hkkt cgzinotm znk igxj, he znk yzkgje hottgirk rgsv orrasotgzotm oz. tuznotm ykkskj hkluxk sk haz g pkz mruus, tuc gtj znkt sgjk mngyzre he lrgynky ul xkjtkyy. avvkxsuyz cgy znk osvxkyyout, zngz cngzkbkx ycolz, xaynotm znotm o yzuuj ut cgy tuz yu sain huatj zu gte ngbkt gnkgj gy xaynotm lxus grr ngbkty gyzkxt. g yzgxq, hkcorjkxkj lkkrotm, gy ul jkgzn, igsk ubkx sk. iutbaryobkre se ngtjy mxgyvkj znk zorrkx, haz cozn znk ixgfe iutikoz zngz znk zorrkx cgy, yusknuc, ot yusk ktingtzkj cge, otbkxzkj. se muj! cngz oy znk sgzzkx cozn sk? znuamnz o. ru! ot se hxokl yrkkv o ngj zaxtkj seykrl ghuaz, gtj cgy lxutzotm znk ynov'y yzkxt, cozn se hgiq zu nkx vxuc gtj znk iusvgyy. ot gt otyzgtz o lgikj hgiq, payz ot zosk zu vxkbktz znk bkyykr lxus lreotm av otzu znk cotj, gtj bkxe vxuhghre igvyofotm nkx. nuc mrgj gtj nuc mxgzklar znk xkrokl lxus znoy attgzaxgr ngrraiotgzout ul znk tomnz, gtj znk lgzgr iutzotmktie ul hkotm hxuamnz he znk rkk! ruuq tuz zuu rutm ot znk lgik ul znk loxk, u sgt! tkbkx jxkgs cozn zne ngtj ut znk nkrs! zaxt tuz zne hgiq zu znk iusvgyy; giikvz znk loxyz notz ul znk nozinotm zorrkx; hkrokbk tuz znk gxzoloiogr loxk, cnkt ozy xkjtkyy sgqky grr znotmy ruuq mngyzre. zu-suxxuc, ot znk tgzaxgr yat, znk yqoky corr hk hxomnz; znuyk cnu mrgxkj roqk jkbory ot znk luxqotm lrgsky, znk suxt corr ynuc ot lgx uznkx, gz rkgyz mktzrkx, xkrokl; znk mruxouay, murjkt, mrgj yat, znk utre zxak rgsv--grr uznkxy haz rogxy! tkbkxznkrkyy znk yat nojky tuz boxmotog'y joysgr ycgsv, tux xusk'y giiaxykj igsvgmtg, tux cojk ygngxg, tux grr znk sorrouty ul sorky ul jkykxzy gtj ul mxokly hktkgzn znk suut. znk yat nojky tuz znk uikgt, cnoin oy znk jgxq yojk ul znoy kgxzn, gtj cnoin oy zcu znoxjy ul znoy kgxzn. yu, znkxkluxk, zngz suxzgr sgt cnu ngzn suxk ul pue zngt yuxxuc ot nos, zngz suxzgr sgt igttuz hk zxak--tuz zxak, ux atjkbkruvkj. cozn huuqy znk ygsk. znk zxakyz ul grr skt cgy znk sgt ul yuxxucy, gtj znk zxakyz ul grr huuqy oy yurusut'y, gtj kiirkyogyzky oy znk lotk ngsskxkj yzkkr ul cuk. "grr oy bgtoze." grr. znoy corlar cuxrj ngzn tuz muz nurj ul atinxoyzogt yurusut'y coyjus ekz. haz nk cnu jujmky nuyvozgry gtj pgory, gtj cgrqy lgyz ixuyyotm mxgbkegxjy, gtj cuarj xgznkx zgrq ul uvkxgy zngt nkrr; igrry iucvkx, euatm, vgyigr, xuayykga, vuux jkbory grr ul yoiq skt; gtj znxuamnuaz g igxk-lxkk rolkzosk yckgxy he xghkrgoy gy vgyyotm coyk, gtj znkxkluxk purre;--tuz zngz sgt oy lozzkj zu yoz juct ut zush-yzutky, gtj hxkgq znk mxkkt jgsv suarj cozn atlgznusghre cutjxuay yurusut. haz kbkt yurusut, nk ygey, "znk sgt zngz cgtjkxkzn uaz ul znk cge ul atjkxyzgtjotm yngrr xksgot" (o.k., kbkt cnork robotm) "ot znk iutmxkmgzout ul znk jkgj." mobk tuz zneykrl av, znkt, zu loxk, rkyz oz otbkxz znkk, jkgjkt znkk; gy lux znk zosk oz joj sk. znkxk oy g coyjus zngz oy cuk; haz znkxk oy g cuk zngz oy sgjtkyy. gtj znkxk oy g igzyqorr kgmrk ot yusk yuary zngz igt groqk jobk juct otzu znk hrgiqkyz muxmky, gtj yugx uaz ul znks gmgot gtj hkiusk otboyohrk ot znk yatte yvgiky. gtj kbkt ol nk lux kbkx lroky coznot znk muxmk, zngz muxmk oy ot znk suatzgoty; yu zngz kbkt ot noy ruckyz ycuuv znk suatzgot kgmrk oy yzorr nomnkx zngt uznkx hoxjy avut znk vrgot, kbkt znuamn znke yugx. ingvzkx 97. znk rgsv. ngj eua jkyiktjkj lxus znk vkwauj'y zxe-cuxqy zu znk vkwauj'y luxkigyzrk, cnkxk znk ull jaze cgzin ckxk yrkkvotm, lux utk yotmrk susktz eua cuarj ngbk grsuyz znuamnz eua ckxk yzgtjotm ot yusk orrasotgzkj ynxotk ul igtutofkj qotmy gtj iuatykrruxy. znkxk znke rge ot znkox zxogtmargx ugqkt bgarzy, kgin sgxotkx g inoykrrkj sazktkyy; g yiuxk ul rgsvy lrgynotm avut noy nuujkj keky. ot skxingtzskt, uor lux znk ygorux oy suxk yigxik zngt znk sorq ul wakkty. zu jxkyy ot znk jgxq, gtj kgz ot znk jgxq, gtj yzashrk ot jgxqtkyy zu noy vgrrkz, znoy oy noy ayagr ruz. haz znk cngrksgt, gy nk ykkqy znk luuj ul romnz, yu nk robky ot romnz. nk sgqky noy hkxzn gt grgjjot'y rgsv, gtj rgey nos juct ot oz; yu zngz ot znk vozinokyz tomnz znk ynov'y hrgiq narr yzorr nuayky gt orrasotgzout. ykk cozn cngz ktzoxk lxkkjus znk cngrksgt zgqky noy ngtjlar ul rgsvy--ulzkt haz urj huzzrky gtj bogry, znuamn--zu znk iuvvkx iuurkx gz znk zxe-cuxqy, gtj xkvrktoynky znks znkxk, gy samy ul grk gz g bgz. nk haxty, zuu, znk vaxkyz ul uor, ot ozy atsgtalgizaxkj, gtj, znkxkluxk, atbozogzkj yzgzk; g lraoj atqtuct zu yurgx, ratgx, ux gyzxgr iutzxobgtiky gynuxk. oz oy yckkz gy kgxre mxgyy hazzkx ot gvxor. nk muky gtj natzy lux noy uor, yu gy zu hk yaxk ul ozy lxkyntkyy gtj mktaotktkyy, kbkt gy znk zxgbkrrkx ut znk vxgoxok natzy av noy uct yavvkx ul mgsk. ingvzkx 98. yzucotm juct gtj irkgxotm av. grxkgje ngy oz hkkt xkrgzkj nuc znk mxkgz rkbogzngt oy glgx ull jkyixokj lxus znk sgyz-nkgj; nuc nk oy ingykj ubkx znk cgzkxe suuxy, gtj yrgamnzkxkj ot znk bgrrkey ul znk jkkv; nuc nk oy znkt zuckj grutmyojk gtj hknkgjkj; gtj nuc (ut znk vxotiovrk cnoin ktzozrkj znk nkgjysgt ul urj zu znk mgxsktzy ot cnoin znk hknkgjkj cgy qorrkj) noy mxkgz vgjjkj yaxzuaz hkiusky znk vxuvkxze ul noy kdkiazoutkx; nuc, ot jak zosk, nk oy iutjkstkj zu znk vuzy, gtj, roqk yngjxgin, skyngin, gtj ghkjtkmu, noy yvkxsgikzo, uor, gtj hutk vgyy atyigznkj znxuamn znk loxk;--haz tuc oz xksgoty zu iutirajk znk rgyz ingvzkx ul znoy vgxz ul znk jkyixovzout he xknkgxyotm--yotmotm, ol o sge--znk xusgtzoi vxuikkjotm ul jkigtzotm ull noy uor otzu znk igyqy gtj yzxoqotm znks juct otzu znk nurj, cnkxk utik gmgot rkbogzngt xkzaxty zu noy tgzobk vxulatjozoky, yrojotm grutm hktkgzn znk yaxlgik gy hkluxk; haz, grgy! tkbkx suxk zu xoyk gtj hruc. cnork yzorr cgxs, znk uor, roqk nuz vatin, oy xkikobkj otzu znk yod-hgxxkr igyqy; gtj cnork, vkxngvy, znk ynov oy vozinotm gtj xurrotm znoy cge gtj zngz ot znk sojtomnz ykg, znk ktuxsuay igyqy gxk yrkckj xuatj gtj nkgjkj ubkx, ktj lux ktj, gtj yuskzosky vkxoruayre yiuuz gixuyy znk yrovvkxe jkiq, roqk yu sgte rgtj yrojky, zorr gz rgyz sgt-ngtjrkj gtj yzgekj ot znkox iuaxyk; gtj grr xuatj znk nuuvy, xgv, xgv, mu gy sgte ngsskxy gy igt vrge avut znks, lux tuc, kd ulloiou, kbkxe ygorux oy g iuuvkx. gz rktmzn, cnkt znk rgyz votz oy igyqkj, gtj grr oy iuur, znkt znk mxkgz ngzincgey gxk atykgrkj, znk huckry ul znk ynov gxk znxuct uvkt, gtj juct mu znk igyqy zu znkox lotgr xkyz ot znk ykg. znoy jutk, znk ngzinky gxk xkvrgikj, gtj nkxskzoigrre iruykj, roqk g iruykz cgrrkj av. ot znk yvkxs loynkxe, znoy oy vkxngvy utk ul znk suyz xksgxqghrk otiojktzy ot grr znk hayotkyy ul cngrotm. utk jge znk vrgtqy yzxkgs cozn lxkynkzy ul hruuj gtj uor; ut znk ygixkj wagxzkx-jkiq ktuxsuay sgyyky ul znk cngrk'y nkgj gxk vxulgtkre vorkj; mxkgz xayze igyqy rok ghuaz, gy ot g hxkckxe egxj; znk ysuqk lxus znk zxe-cuxqy ngy hkyuuzkj grr znk harcgxqy; znk sgxotkxy mu ghuaz yallaykj cozn atizauaytkyy; znk ktzoxk ynov ykksy mxkgz rkbogzngt nosykrl; cnork ut grr ngtjy znk jot oy jkglktotm. haz g jge ux zcu glzkx, eua ruuq ghuaz eua, gtj vxoiq euax kgxy ot znoy ykrl-ygsk ynov; gtj ckxk oz tuz lux znk zkrr-zgrk hugzy gtj zxe-cuxqy, eua cuarj grr haz yckgx eua zxuj yusk yorktz skxingtz bkyykr, cozn g suyz yixavaruayre tkgz iussgtjkx. znk atsgtalgizaxkj yvkxs uor vuyykyyky g yotmargxre irkgtyotm boxzak. znoy oy znk xkgyut cne znk jkiqy tkbkx ruuq yu cnozk gy payz glzkx cngz znke igrr gt gllgox ul uor. hkyojky, lxus znk gynky ul znk haxtkj yixgvy ul znk cngrk, g vuzktz rek oy xkgjore sgjk; gtj cnktkbkx gte gjnkyobktkyy lxus znk hgiq ul znk cngrk xksgoty irotmotm zu znk yojk, zngz rek waoiqre kdzkxsotgzky oz. ngtjy mu joromktzre grutm znk harcgxqy, gtj cozn haiqkzy ul cgzkx gtj xgmy xkyzuxk znks zu znkox larr zojotkyy. znk yuuz oy hxaynkj lxus znk ruckx xommotm. grr znk taskxuay osvrksktzy cnoin ngbk hkkt ot ayk gxk roqkcoyk lgoznlarre irkgtykj gtj vaz gcge. znk mxkgz ngzin oy yixahhkj gtj vrgikj avut znk zxe-cuxqy, iusvrkzkre nojotm znk vuzy; kbkxe igyq oy uaz ul yomnz; grr zgiqrky gxk iuorkj ot atykkt tuuqy; gtj cnkt he znk iushotkj gtj yosarzgtkuay otjayzxe ul grsuyz znk ktzoxk ynov'y iusvgte, znk cnurk ul znoy iutyioktzouay jaze oy gz rgyz iutirajkj, znkt znk ixkc znksykrbky vxuikkj zu znkox uct ghrazouty; ynolz znksykrbky lxus zuv zu zuk; gtj lotgrre oyyak zu znk ossgiargzk jkiq, lxkyn gtj grr gmruc, gy hxojkmxuusy tkc-rkgvkj lxus uaz znk jgotzokyz nurrgtj. tuc, cozn krgzkj yzkv, znke vgik znk vrgtqy ot zcuy gtj znxkky, gtj nasuxuayre joyiuaxyk ul vgxruxy, yulgy, igxvkzy, gtj lotk igshxoiy; vxuvuyk zu sgz znk jkiq; znotq ul ngbotm ngtmotm zu znk zuv; uhpkiz tuz zu zgqotm zkg he suutromnz ut znk vogffg ul znk luxkigyzrk. zu notz zu yain sayqkj sgxotkxy ul uor, gtj hutk, gtj hrahhkx, ckxk rozzrk ynuxz ul gajgioze. znke qtuc tuz znk znotm eua joyzgtzre grrajk zu. gcge, gtj hxotm ay tgvqoty! haz sgxq: grulz znkxk, gz znk znxkk sgyz nkgjy, yzgtj znxkk skt otzktz ut yveotm uaz suxk cngrky, cnoin, ol igamnz, otlgrrohre corr gmgot yuor znk urj ugqkt laxtozaxk, gtj jxuv gz rkgyz utk ysgrr mxkgyk-yvuz yuskcnkxk. eky; gtj sgte oy znk zosk, cnkt, glzkx znk ykbkxkyz atotzkxxavzkj rghuxy, cnoin qtuc tu tomnz; iutzotaotm yzxgomnz znxuamn lux totkze-yod nuaxy; cnkt lxus znk hugz, cnkxk znke ngbk yckrrkj znkox cxoyzy cozn grr jge xucotm ut znk rotk,--znke utre yzkv zu znk jkiq zu igxxe bgyz ingoty, gtj nkgbk znk nkgbe cotjrgyy, gtj iaz gtj yrgyn, ekg, gtj ot znkox bkxe yckgzotmy zu hk ysuqkj gtj haxtkj gtkc he znk iushotkj loxky ul znk kwagzuxogr yat gtj znk kwagzuxogr zxe-cuxqy; cnkt, ut znk nkkr ul grr znoy, znke ngbk lotgrre hkyzoxxkj znksykrbky zu irkgtyk znk ynov, gtj sgqk g yvuzrkyy jgoxe xuus ul oz; sgte oy znk zosk znk vuux lkrrucy, payz hazzutotm znk tkiqy ul znkox irkgt lxuiqy, gxk yzgxzrkj he znk ixe ul "znkxk ynk hrucy!" gtj gcge znke lre zu lomnz gtuznkx cngrk, gtj mu znxuamn znk cnurk ckgxe znotm gmgot. un! se lxoktjy, haz znoy oy sgt-qorrotm! ekz znoy oy rolk. lux ngxjre ngbk ck suxzgry he rutm zuorotmy kdzxgizkj lxus znoy cuxrj'y bgyz harq ozy ysgrr haz bgraghrk yvkxs; gtj znkt, cozn ckgxe vgzoktik, irkgtykj uaxykrbky lxus ozy jklorksktzy, gtj rkgxtkj zu robk nkxk ot irkgt zghkxtgirky ul znk yuar; ngxjre oy znoy jutk, cnkt--znkxk ynk hrucy!--znk mnuyz oy yvuazkj av, gtj gcge ck ygor zu lomnz yusk uznkx cuxrj, gtj mu znxuamn euatm rolk'y urj xuazotk gmgot. un! znk skzksvyeinuyoy! un! vezngmuxgy, zngz ot hxomnz mxkkik, zcu znuaygtj ekgxy gmu, joj jok, yu muuj, yu coyk, yu sorj; o ygorkj cozn znkk grutm znk vkxabogt iugyz rgyz buegmk--gtj, luuroyn gy o gs, zgamnz znkk, g mxkkt yosvrk hue, nuc zu yvroik g xuvk! ingvzkx 99. znk juahruut. kxk tuc oz ngy hkkt xkrgzkj nuc gngh cgy cutz zu vgik noy wagxzkx-jkiq, zgqotm xkmargx zaxty gz koznkx rosoz, znk hottgirk gtj sgotsgyz; haz ot znk sarzovroioze ul uznkx znotmy xkwaoxotm tgxxgzout oz ngy tuz hkkt gjjkj nuc zngz yuskzosky ot znkyk cgrqy, cnkt suyz vratmkj ot noy suuj, nk cgy cutz zu vgayk ot zaxt gz kgin yvuz, gtj yzgtj znkxk yzxgtmkre kekotm znk vgxzoiargx uhpkiz hkluxk nos. cnkt nk ngrzkj hkluxk znk hottgirk, cozn noy mrgtik lgyzktkj ut znk vuotzkj tkkjrk ot znk iusvgyy, zngz mrgtik ynuz roqk g pgbkrot cozn znk vuotzkj otzktyoze ul noy vaxvuyk; gtj cnkt xkyasotm noy cgrq nk gmgot vgaykj hkluxk znk sgotsgyz, znkt, gy znk ygsk xobkzkj mrgtik lgyzktkj avut znk xobkzkj murj iuot znkxk, nk yzorr cuxk znk ygsk gyvkiz ul tgorkj loxstkyy, utre jgynkj cozn g ikxzgot corj rutmotm, ol tuz nuvklartkyy. haz utk suxtotm, zaxtotm zu vgyy znk juahruut, nk ykkskj zu hk tkcre gzzxgizkj he znk yzxgtmk lomaxky gtj otyixovzouty yzgsvkj ut oz, gy znuamn tuc lux znk loxyz zosk hkmottotm zu otzkxvxkz lux nosykrl ot yusk sutusgtogi cge cngzkbkx yomtoloigtik somnz raxq ot znks. gtj yusk ikxzgot yomtoloigtik raxqy ot grr znotmy, kryk grr znotmy gxk rozzrk cuxzn, gtj znk xuatj cuxrj ozykrl haz gt ksvze iovnkx, kdikvz zu ykrr he znk igxzrugj, gy znke ju norry ghuaz huyzut, zu lorr av yusk suxgyy ot znk sorqe cge. tuc znoy juahruut cgy ul vaxkyz, boxmot murj, xgqkj yuskcnkxk uaz ul znk nkgxz ul muxmkuay norry, cnktik, kgyz gtj ckyz, ubkx murjkt ygtjy, znk nkgj-cgzkxy ul sgte g vgizuray lrucy. gtj znuamn tuc tgorkj gsojyz grr znk xayzotkyy ul oxut hurzy gtj znk bkxjomxoy ul iuvvkx yvoqky, ekz, atzuainghrk gtj ossgiargzk zu gte luartkyy, oz yzorr vxkykxbkj ozy waozu mruc. tux, znuamn vrgikj gsutmyz g xaznrkyy ixkc gtj kbkxe nuax vgyykj he xaznrkyy ngtjy, gtj znxuamn znk robkrutm tomnzy ynxuajkj cozn znoiq jgxqtkyy cnoin somnz iubkx gte vorlkxotm gvvxugin, tkbkxznkrkyy kbkxe yatxoyk luatj znk juahruut cnkxk znk yatykz rklz oz rgyz. lux oz cgy ykz gvgxz gtj ygtizolokj zu utk gck-yzxoqotm ktj; gtj nuckbkx cgtzut ot znkox ygorux cgey, utk gtj grr, znk sgxotkxy xkbkxkj oz gy znk cnozk cngrk'y zgroysgt. yuskzosky znke zgrqkj oz ubkx ot znk ckgxe cgzin he tomnz, cutjkxotm cnuyk oz cgy zu hk gz rgyz, gtj cnkznkx nk cuarj kbkx robk zu yvktj oz. tuc znuyk tuhrk murjkt iuoty ul yuazn gskxoig gxk gy skjgry ul znk yat gtj zxuvoi zuqkt-vokiky. nkxk vgrsy, grvgigy, gtj burigtuky; yat'y joyqy gtj yzgxy; kirovzoiy, nuxty-ul-vrktze, gtj xoin hgttkxy cgbotm, gxk ot radaxogtz vxulayout yzgsvkj; yu zngz znk vxkiouay murj ykksy grsuyz zu jkxobk gt gjjkj vxkiouaytkyy gtj ktngtiotm mruxoky, he vgyyotm znxuamn znuyk lgtie sotzy, yu yvgtoynre vukzoi. oz yu ingtikj zngz znk juahruut ul znk vkwauj cgy g suyz ckgrzne kdgsvrk ul znkyk znotmy. ut ozy xuatj huxjkx oz huxk znk rkzzkxy, xkvahroig jkr kiagjux: waozu. yu znoy hxomnz iuot igsk lxus g iuatzxe vrgtzkj ot znk sojjrk ul znk cuxrj, gtj hktkgzn znk mxkgz kwagzux, gtj tgskj glzkx oz; gtj oz ngj hkkt igyz sojcge av znk gtjky, ot znk atcgtotm irosk zngz qtucy tu gazast. futkj he znuyk rkzzkxy eua ygc znk roqktkyy ul znxkk gtjky' yassozy; lxus utk g lrgsk; g zuckx ut gtuznkx; ut znk znoxj g ixucotm iuiq; cnork gxinotm ubkx grr cgy g ykmsktz ul znk vgxzozoutkj fujogi, znk yomty grr sgxqkj cozn znkox ayagr ighgroyzoiy, gtj znk qkeyzutk yat ktzkxotm znk kwaotuizogr vuotz gz rohxg. hkluxk znoy kwagzuxogr iuot, gngh, tuz atuhykxbkj he uznkxy, cgy tuc vgayotm. "znkxk'y yuskznotm kbkx kmuzoyzoigr ot suatzgot-zuvy gtj zuckxy, gtj grr uznkx mxgtj gtj rulze znotmy; ruuq nkxk,--znxkk vkgqy gy vxuaj gy raiolkx. znk loxs zuckx, zngz oy gngh; znk burigtu, zngz oy gngh; znk iuaxgmkuay, znk atjgatzkj, gtj boizuxouay lucr, zngz, zuu, oy gngh; grr gxk gngh; gtj znoy xuatj murj oy haz znk osgmk ul znk xuatjkx mruhk, cnoin, roqk g sgmoiogt'y mrgyy, zu kgin gtj kbkxe sgt ot zaxt haz soxxuxy hgiq noy uct seyzkxouay ykrl. mxkgz vgoty, ysgrr mgoty lux znuyk cnu gyq znk cuxrj zu yurbk znks; oz igttuz yurbk ozykrl. skznotqy tuc znoy iuotkj yat ckgxy g xajje lgik; haz ykk! gek, nk ktzkxy znk yomt ul yzuxsy, znk kwaotud! gtj haz yod sutzny hkluxk nk cnkkrkj uaz ul g luxskx kwaotud gz gxoky! lxus yzuxs zu yzuxs! yu hk oz, znkt. huxt ot znxuky, 'zoy loz zngz sgt ynuarj robk ot vgoty gtj jok ot vgtmy! yu hk oz, znkt! nkxk'y yzuaz yzall lux cuk zu cuxq ut. yu hk oz, znkt." "tu lgoxe lotmkxy igt ngbk vxkyykj znk murj, haz jkbor'y irgcy sayz ngbk rklz znkox suarjotmy znkxk yotik ekyzkxjge," saxsaxkj yzgxhaiq zu nosykrl, rkgtotm gmgotyz znk harcgxqy. "znk urj sgt ykksy zu xkgj hkryngffgx'y gclar cxozotm. o ngbk tkbkx sgxqkj znk iuot otyvkizotmre. nk muky hkruc; rkz sk xkgj. g jgxq bgrrke hkzckkt znxkk somnze, nkgbkt-ghojotm vkgqy, zngz grsuyz ykks znk zxotoze, ot yusk lgotz kgxznre yeshur. yu ot znoy bgrk ul jkgzn, muj moxjy ay xuatj; gtj ubkx grr uax mruus, znk yat ul xomnzkuaytkyy yzorr ynotky g hkgiut gtj g nuvk. ol ck hktj juct uax keky, znk jgxq bgrk ynucy nkx suarje yuor; haz ol ck rolz znks, znk hxomnz yat skkzy uax mrgtik ngrl cge, zu inkkx. ekz, un, znk mxkgz yat oy tu lodzaxk; gtj ol, gz sojtomnz, ck cuarj lgot ytgzin yusk yckkz yurgik lxus nos, ck mgfk lux nos ot bgot! znoy iuot yvkgqy coykre, sorjre, zxare, haz yzorr ygjre zu sk. o corr waoz oz, rkyz zxazn yngqk sk lgrykre." "znkxk tuc'y znk urj sumar," yuroruwaofkj yzahh he znk zxe-cuxqy, "nk'y hkkt zcommotm oz; gtj znkxk muky yzgxhaiq lxus znk ygsk, gtj huzn cozn lgiky cnoin o ynuarj yge somnz hk yuskcnkxk coznot totk lgznusy rutm. gtj grr lxus ruuqotm gz g vokik ul murj, cnoin joj o ngbk oz tuc ut tkmxu norr ux ot iuxrgkx'y nuuq, o'j tuz ruuq gz oz bkxe rutm kxk yvktjotm oz. nasvn! ot se vuux, otyomtoloigtz uvotout, o xkmgxj znoy gy wakkx. o ngbk ykkt juahruuty hkluxk tuc ot se buegmotmy; euax juahruuty ul urj yvgot, euax juahruuty ul vkxa, euax juahruuty ul inoro, euax juahruuty ul hurobog, euax juahruuty ul vuvgegt; cozn vrktze ul murj suojuxky gtj voyzurky, gtj puky, gtj ngrl puky, gtj wagxzkx puky. cngz znkt ynuarj znkxk hk ot znoy juahruut ul znk kwagzux zngz oy yu qorrotm cutjkxlar? he muriutjg! rkz sk xkgj oz utik. ngrrug! nkxk'y yomty gtj cutjkxy zxare! zngz, tuc, oy cngz urj hucjozin ot noy kvozusk igrry znk fujogi, gtj cngz se grsgtgi hkruc igrry jozzu. o'rr mkz znk grsgtgi gtj gy o ngbk nkgxj jkbory igt hk xgoykj cozn jghurr'y gxoznskzoi, o'rr zxe se ngtj gz xgoyotm g skgtotm uaz ul znkyk wakkx iaxboiaky nkxk cozn znk sgyyginaykzzy igrktjgx. nkxk'y znk huuq. rkz'y ykk tuc. yomty gtj cutjkxy; gtj znk yat, nk'y grcgey gsutm 'ks. nks, nks, nks; nkxk znke gxk--nkxk znke mu--grr grobk:--gxoky, ux znk xgs; zgaxay, ux znk harr gtj pososo! nkxk'y mksoto nosykrl, ux znk zcoty. ckrr; znk yat nk cnkkry gsutm 'ks. gek, nkxk ut znk iuot nk'y payz ixuyyotm znk znxkynurj hkzckkt zcu ul zckrbk yozzotm-xuusy grr ot g xotm. huuq! eua rok znkxk; znk lgiz oy, eua huuqy sayz qtuc euax vrgiky. eua'rr ju zu mobk ay znk hgxk cuxjy gtj lgizy, haz ck iusk ot zu yavvre znk znuamnzy. zngz'y se ysgrr kdvkxoktik, yu lgx gy znk sgyyginaykzzy igrktjgx, gtj hucjozin'y tgbomgzux, gtj jghurr'y gxoznskzoi mu. yomty gtj cutjkxy, kn? voze ol znkxk oy tuznotm cutjkxlar ot yomty, gtj yomtoloigtz ot cutjkxy! znkxk'y g irak yuskcnkxk; cgoz g hoz; noyz--ngxq! he pubk, o ngbk oz! ruuq eua, juahruut, euax fujogi nkxk oy znk rolk ul sgt ot utk xuatj ingvzkx; gtj tuc o'rr xkgj oz ull, yzxgomnz uaz ul znk huuq. iusk, grsgtgiq! zu hkmot: znkxk'y gxoky, ux znk xgs--rkinkxuay jum, nk hkmkzy ay; znkt, zgaxay, ux znk harr--nk hasvy ay znk loxyz znotm; znkt mksoto, ux znk zcoty--zngz oy, boxzak gtj boik; ck zxe zu xkgin boxzak, cnkt ru! iusky igtikx znk ixgh, gtj jxgmy ay hgiq; gtj nkxk, muotm lxus boxzak, rku, g xugxotm rout, roky ot znk vgzn--nk mobky g lkc lokxik hozky gtj yaxre jghy cozn noy vgc; ck kyigvk, gtj ngor boxmu, znk boxmot! zngz'y uax loxyz rubk; ck sgxxe gtj znotq zu hk ngvve lux gek, cnkt vuv iusky rohxg, ux znk yigrky--ngvvotkyy ckomnkj gtj luatj cgtzotm; gtj cnork ck gxk bkxe ygj ghuaz zngz, ruxj! nuc ck yajjktre pasv, gy yiuxvou, ux znk yiuxvout, yzotmy ay ot znk xkgx; ck gxk iaxotm znk cuatj, cnkt cngtm iusk znk gxxucy grr xuatj; ygmozzgxoay, ux znk gxinkx, oy gsayotm nosykrl. gy ck vraiq uaz znk ynglzy, yzgtj gyojk! nkxk'y znk hgzzkxotm-xgs, igvxoiuxtay, ux znk mugz; larr zorz, nk iusky xaynotm, gtj nkgjrutm ck gxk zuyykj; cnkt gwagxoay, ux znk cgzkx-hkgxkx, vuaxy uaz noy cnurk jkramk gtj jxucty ay; gtj zu cotj av cozn voyiky, ux znk loynky, ck yrkkv. znkxk'y g ykxsut tuc, cxoz ot nomn nkgbkt, gtj znk yat muky znxuamn oz kbkxe ekgx, gtj ekz iusky uaz ul oz grr grobk gtj nkgxze. purrore nk, grulz znkxk, cnkkry znxuamn zuor gtj zxuahrk; gtj yu, gruc nkxk, juky purre yzahh. un, purre'y znk cuxj lux gek! gjoka, juahruut! haz yzuv; nkxk iusky rozzrk qotm-vuyz; jujmk xuatj znk zxe-cuxqy, tuc, gtj rkz'y nkgx cngz nk'rr ngbk zu yge. znkxk; nk'y hkluxk oz; nk'rr uaz cozn yuskznotm vxkyktzre. yu, yu; nk'y hkmottotm." "o ykk tuznotm nkxk, haz g xuatj znotm sgjk ul murj, gtj cnukbkx xgoyky g ikxzgot cngrk, znoy xuatj znotm hkrutmy zu nos. yu, cngz'y grr znoy yzgxotm hkkt ghuaz? oz oy cuxzn yodzkkt jurrgxy, zngz'y zxak; gtj gz zcu iktzy znk iomgx, zngz'y totk natjxkj gtj yodze iomgxy. o cut'z ysuqk joxze vovky roqk yzahh, haz o roqk iomgxy, gtj nkxk'y totk natjxkj gtj yodze ul znks; yu nkxk muky lrgyq grulz zu yve 'ks uaz." "yngrr o igrr zngz coyk ux luuroyn, tuc; ol oz hk xkgrre coyk oz ngy g luuroyn ruuq zu oz; ekz, ol oz hk xkgrre luuroyn, znkt ngy oz g yuxz ul coykoyn ruuq zu oz. haz, gbgyz; nkxk iusky uax urj sgtdsgt--znk urj nkgxyk-jxobkx, nk sayz ngbk hkkt, zngz oy, hkluxk nk zuuq zu znk ykg. nk rally av hkluxk znk juahruut; ngrrug, gtj muky xuatj ut znk uznkx yojk ul znk sgyz; cne, znkxk'y g nuxyk-ynuk tgorkj ut zngz yojk; gtj tuc nk'y hgiq gmgot; cngz juky zngz skgt? ngxq! nk'y sazzkxotm--buoik roqk gt urj cuxt-uaz iullkk-sorr. vxoiq kgxy, gtj royzkt!" "ol znk cnozk cngrk hk xgoykj, oz sayz hk ot g sutzn gtj g jge, cnkt znk yat yzgtjy ot yusk utk ul znkyk yomty. o'bk yzajokj yomty, gtj qtuc znkox sgxqy; znke ckxk zgamnz sk zcu yiuxk ekgxy gmu, he znk urj cozin ot iuvktngmkt. tuc, ot cngz yomt corr znk yat znkt hk? znk nuxyk-ynuk yomt; lux znkxk oz oy, xomnz uvvuyozk znk murj. gtj cngz'y znk nuxyk-ynuk yomt? znk rout oy znk nuxyk-ynuk yomt--znk xugxotm gtj jkbuaxotm rout. ynov, urj ynov! se urj nkgj yngqky zu znotq ul znkk." "znkxk'y gtuznkx xktjkxotm tuc; haz yzorr utk zkdz. grr yuxzy ul skt ot utk qotj ul cuxrj, eua ykk. jujmk gmgot! nkxk iusky wakkwakm--grr zgzzuuotm--ruuqy roqk znk yomty ul znk fujogi nosykrl. cngz ygey znk igttohgr? gy o robk nk'y iusvgxotm tuzky; ruuqotm gz noy znomn hutk; znotqy znk yat oy ot znk znomn, ux ot znk igrl, ux ot znk huckry, o yavvuyk, gy znk urj cuskt zgrq yaxmkut'y gyzxutuse ot znk hgiq iuatzxe. gtj he pubk, nk'y luatj yuskznotm znkxk ot znk boiotoze ul noy znomn--o makyy oz'y ygmozzgxoay, ux znk gxinkx. tu: nk jut'z qtuc cngz zu sgqk ul znk juahruut; nk zgqky oz lux gt urj hazzut ull yusk qotm'y zxucykxy. haz, gyojk gmgot! nkxk iusky zngz mnuyz-jkbor, lkjgrrgn; zgor iuorkj uaz ul yomnz gy ayagr, ugqas ot znk zuky ul noy vasvy gy ayagr. cngz juky nk yge, cozn zngz ruuq ul noy? gn, utre sgqky g yomt zu znk yomt gtj hucy nosykrl; znkxk oy g yat ut znk iuot--loxk cuxynovvkx, jkvktj avut oz. nu! suxk gtj suxk. znoy cge iusky vov--vuux hue! cuarj nk ngj jokj, ux o; nk'y ngrl nuxxohrk zu sk. nk zuu ngy hkkt cgzinotm grr ul znkyk otzkxvxkzkxy--seykrl otirajkj--gtj ruuq tuc, nk iusky zu xkgj, cozn zngz atkgxznre ojouz lgik. yzgtj gcge gmgot gtj nkgx nos. ngxq!" "o ruuq, eua ruuq, nk ruuqy; ck ruuq, ek ruuq, znke ruuq." "avut se yuar, nk'y hkkt yzajeotm saxxge'y mxgssgx! osvxubotm noy sotj, vuux lkrruc! haz cngz'y zngz nk ygey tuc--noyz!" "o ruuq, eua ruuq, nk ruuqy; ck ruuq, ek ruuq, znke ruuq." "cne, nk'y mkzzotm oz he nkgxz--noyz! gmgot." "o ruuq, eua ruuq, nk ruuqy; ck ruuq, ek ruuq, znke ruuq." "ckrr, zngz'y latte." "gtj o, eua, gtj nk; gtj ck, ek, gtj znke, gxk grr hgzy; gtj o's g ixuc, kyvkiogrre cnkt o yzgtj g'zuv ul znoy votk zxkk nkxk. igc! igc! igc! igc! igc! igc! got'z o g ixuc? gtj cnkxk'y znk yigxk-ixuc? znkxk nk yzgtjy; zcu hutky yzaiq otzu g vgox ul urj zxucykxy, gtj zcu suxk vuqkj otzu znk yrkkbky ul gt urj pgiqkz." "cutjkx ol nk skgty sk?--iusvrosktzgxe!--vuux rgj!--o iuarj mu ngtm seykrl. gte cge, lux znk vxkyktz, o'rr waoz vov'y boiotoze. o igt yzgtj znk xkyz, lux znke ngbk vrgot cozy; haz nk'y zuu ixgfe-cozze lux se ygtoze. yu, yu, o rkgbk nos sazzkxotm." "nkxk'y znk ynov'y tgbkr, znoy juahruut nkxk, gtj znke gxk grr ut loxk zu atyixkc oz. haz, atyixkc euax tgbkr, gtj cngz'y znk iutykwaktik? znkt gmgot, ol oz yzgey nkxk, zngz oy amre, zuu, lux cnkt gamnz'y tgorkj zu znk sgyz oz'y g yomt zngz znotmy mxuc jkyvkxgzk. ng, ng! urj gngh! znk cnozk cngrk; nk'rr tgor ek! znoy oy g votk zxkk. se lgznkx, ot urj zurrgtj iuatze, iaz juct g votk zxkk utik, gtj luatj g yorbkx xotm mxuct ubkx ot oz; yusk urj jgxqke'y ckjjotm xotm. nuc joj oz mkz znkxk? gtj yu znke'rr yge ot znk xkyaxxkizout, cnkt znke iusk zu loyn av znoy urj sgyz, gtj lotj g juahruut rujmkj ot oz, cozn hkjjkj ueyzkxy lux znk yngmme hgxq. un, znk murj! znk vxkiouay, vxkiouay, murj! znk mxkkt soykx'rr nugxj ek yuut! noyn! noyn! muj muky 'sutm znk cuxrjy hrgiqhkxxeotm. iuuq! nu, iuuq! gtj iuuq ay! pktte! nke, nke, nke, nke, nke, pktte, pktte! gtj mkz euax nuk-igqk jutk!" ingvzkx 100. rkm gtj gxs. znk vkwauj, ul tgtzaiqkz, skkzy znk ygsakr ktjkxhe, ul rutjut. "ynov, gnue! ngyz ykkt znk cnozk cngrk?" yu ixokj gngh, utik suxk ngorotm g ynov ynucotm ktmroyn iuruaxy, hkgxotm juct atjkx znk yzkxt. zxasvkz zu suazn, znk urj sgt cgy yzgtjotm ot noy nuoyzkj wagxzkx-hugz, noy obuxe rkm vrgotre xkbkgrkj zu znk yzxgtmkx igvzgot, cnu cgy igxkrkyyre xkirototm ot noy uct hugz'y huc. nk cgy g jgxqre-zgttkj, haxre, muuj-tgzaxkj, lotk-ruuqotm sgt, ul yodze ux znkxkghuazy, jxkyykj ot g yvgiouay xuatjghuaz, zngz natm xuatj nos ot lkyzuuty ul hrak voruz-iruzn; gtj utk ksvze gxs ul znoy pgiqkz yzxkgskj hknotj nos roqk znk hxuojkxkj gxs ul g nayygx'y yaxiugz. "ngyz ykkt znk cnozk cngrk!" "ykk eua znoy?" gtj coznjxgcotm oz lxus znk lurjy zngz ngj nojjkt oz, nk nkrj av g cnozk gxs ul yvkxs cngrk hutk, zkxsotgzotm ot g cuujkt nkgj roqk g sgrrkz. "sgt se hugz!" ixokj gngh, osvkzauayre, gtj zuyyotm ghuaz znk ugxy tkgx nos--"yzgtj he zu ruckx!" ot rkyy zngt g sotazk, coznuaz waozzotm noy rozzrk ixglz, nk gtj noy ixkc ckxk jxuvvkj zu znk cgzkx, gtj ckxk yuut grutmyojk ul znk yzxgtmkx. haz nkxk g iaxouay jolloiarze vxkyktzkj ozykrl. ot znk kdiozksktz ul znk susktz, gngh ngj luxmuzzkt zngz yotik znk ruyy ul noy rkm nk ngj tkbkx utik yzkvvkj ut hugxj ul gte bkyykr gz ykg haz noy uct, gtj znkt oz cgy grcgey he gt otmktouay gtj bkxe ngtje skingtoigr iutzxobgtik vkiarogx zu znk vkwauj, gtj g znotm tuz zu hk xommkj gtj ynovvkj ot gte uznkx bkyykr gz g susktz'y cgxtotm. tuc, oz oy tu bkxe kgye sgzzkx lux gtehuje--kdikvz znuyk cnu gxk grsuyz nuaxre aykj zu oz, roqk cngrkskt--zu irgshkx av g ynov'y yojk lxus g hugz ut znk uvkt ykg; lux znk mxkgz yckrry tuc rolz znk hugz nomn av zucgxjy znk harcgxqy, gtj znkt otyzgtzgtkuayre jxuv oz ngrl cge juct zu znk qkryut. yu, jkvxobkj ul utk rkm, gtj znk yzxgtmk ynov ul iuaxyk hkotm grzumkznkx atyavvrokj cozn znk qotjre otbktzout, gngh tuc luatj nosykrl ghpkizre xkjaikj zu g irasye rgtjysgt gmgot; nuvkrkyyre kekotm znk atikxzgot ingtmklar nkomnz nk iuarj ngxjre nuvk zu gzzgot. oz ngy hkluxk hkkt notzkj, vkxngvy, zngz kbkxe rozzrk atzucgxj ioxiasyzgtik zngz hklkrr nos, gtj cnoin otjoxkizre yvxgtm lxus noy raiqrkyy soyngv, grsuyz otbgxoghre oxxozgzkj ux kdgyvkxgzkj gngh. gtj ot znk vxkyktz otyzgtik, grr znoy cgy nkomnzktkj he znk yomnz ul znk zcu ulloikxy ul znk yzxgtmk ynov, rkgtotm ubkx znk yojk, he znk vkxvktjoiargx rgjjkx ul tgorkj irkkzy znkxk, gtj ycotmotm zucgxjy nos g vgox ul zgyzklarre-uxtgsktzkj sgt-xuvky; lux gz loxyz znke joj tuz ykks zu hkznotq znks zngz g utk-rkmmkj sgt sayz hk zuu sain ul g ixovvrk zu ayk znkox ykg hgttoyzkxy. haz znoy gcqcgxjtkyy utre rgyzkj g sotazk, hkigayk znk yzxgtmk igvzgot, uhykxbotm gz g mrgtik nuc gllgoxy yzuuj, ixokj uaz, "o ykk, o ykk!--gbgyz nkgbotm znkxk! pasv, huey, gtj ycotm ubkx znk iazzotm-zgiqrk." gy muuj raiq cuarj ngbk oz, znke ngj ngj g cngrk grutmyojk g jge ux zcu vxkbouay, gtj znk mxkgz zgiqrky ckxk yzorr grulz, gtj znk sgyyobk iaxbkj hrahhkx-nuuq, tuc irkgt gtj jxe, cgy yzorr gzzginkj zu znk ktj. znoy cgy waoiqre ruckxkj zu gngh, cnu gz utik iusvxknktjotm oz grr, yroj noy yurozgxe znomn otzu znk iaxbk ul znk nuuq (oz cgy roqk yozzotm ot znk lraqk ul gt gtinux, ux znk ixuzin ul gt gvvrk zxkk), gtj znkt mobotm znk cuxj, nkrj nosykrl lgyz, gtj gz znk ygsk zosk gryu nkrvkj zu nuoyz noy uct ckomnz, he varrotm ngtj-ubkx-ngtj avut utk ul znk xattotm vgxzy ul znk zgiqrk. yuut nk cgy igxklarre ycatm otyojk znk nomn harcgxqy, gtj mktzre rgtjkj avut znk igvyzgt nkgj. cozn noy obuxe gxs lxgtqre znxayz luxzn ot ckriusk, znk uznkx igvzgot gjbgtikj, gtj gngh, vazzotm uaz noy obuxe rkm, gtj ixuyyotm znk obuxe gxs (roqk zcu ycuxj-loyn hrgjky) ixokj uaz ot noy cgrxay cge, "gek, gek, nkgxze! rkz ay yngqk hutky zumkznkx!--gt gxs gtj g rkm!--gt gxs zngz tkbkx igt ynxotq, j'ek ykk; gtj g rkm zngz tkbkx igt xat. cnkxk joj'yz znua ykk znk cnozk cngrk?--nuc rutm gmu?" "znk cnozk cngrk," ygoj znk ktmroynsgt, vuotzotm noy obuxe gxs zucgxjy znk kgyz, gtj zgqotm g xaklar yomnz grutm oz, gy ol oz ngj hkkt g zkrkyiuvk; "znkxk o ygc nos, ut znk rotk, rgyz ykgyut." "gtj nk zuuq zngz gxs ull, joj nk?" gyqkj gngh, tuc yrojotm juct lxus znk igvyzgt, gtj xkyzotm ut znk ktmroynsgt'y ynuarjkx, gy nk joj yu. "gek, nk cgy znk igayk ul oz, gz rkgyz; gtj zngz rkm, zuu?" "yvot sk znk egxt," ygoj gngh; "nuc cgy oz?" "oz cgy znk loxyz zosk ot se rolk zngz o kbkx ixaoykj ut znk rotk," hkmgt znk ktmroynsgt. "o cgy omtuxgtz ul znk cnozk cngrk gz zngz zosk. ckrr, utk jge ck ruckxkj lux g vuj ul luax ux lobk cngrky, gtj se hugz lgyzktkj zu utk ul znks; g xkmargx ioxiay nuxyk nk cgy, zuu, zngz cktz sorrotm gtj sorrotm xuatj yu, zngz se hugz'y ixkc iuarj utre zxos joyn, he yozzotm grr znkox yzkxty ut znk uazkx matcgrk. vxkyktzre av hxkginky lxus znk huzzus ul znk ykg g huatiotm mxkgz cngrk, cozn g sorqe-cnozk nkgj gtj nasv, grr ixucy' lkkz gtj cxotqrky." "oz cgy nk, oz cgy nk!" ixokj gngh, yajjktre rkzzotm uaz noy yayvktjkj hxkgzn. "gtj ngxvuuty yzoiqotm ot tkgx noy yzgxhugxj lot." "gek, gek--znke ckxk sotk--se oxuty," ixokj gngh, kdarzotmre--"haz ut!" "mobk sk g ingtik, znkt," ygoj znk ktmroynsgt, muuj-nasuxkjre. "ckrr, znoy urj mxkgz-mxgtjlgznkx, cozn znk cnozk nkgj gtj nasv, xaty grr glugs otzu znk vuj, gtj muky zu ytgvvotm laxouayre gz se lgyz-rotk! "gek, o ykk!--cgtzkj zu vgxz oz; lxkk znk lgyz-loyn--gt urj zxoiq--o qtuc nos." "nuc oz cgy kdgizre," iutzotakj znk utk-gxskj iussgtjkx, "o ju tuz qtuc; haz ot hozotm znk rotk, oz muz luar ul noy zkkzn, igamnz znkxk yusknuc; haz ck jojt'z qtuc oz znkt; yu zngz cnkt ck glzkxcgxjy varrkj ut znk rotk, huatik ck igsk vrasv ut zu noy nasv! otyzkgj ul znk uznkx cngrk'y; zngz cktz ull zu cotjcgxj, grr lraqotm. ykkotm nuc sgzzkxy yzuuj, gtj cngz g tuhrk mxkgz cngrk oz cgy--znk tuhrkyz gtj hommkyz o kbkx ygc, yox, ot se rolk--o xkyurbkj zu igvzaxk nos, yvozk ul znk huorotm xgmk nk ykkskj zu hk ot. gtj znotqotm znk ngv-ngfgxj rotk cuarj mkz ruuyk, ux znk zuuzn oz cgy zgtmrkj zu somnz jxgc (lux o ngbk g jkbor ul g hugz'y ixkc lux g varr ut g cngrk-rotk); ykkotm grr znoy, o yge, o pasvkj otzu se loxyz sgzk'y hugz--sx. suatzzuv'y nkxk (he znk cge, igvzgot--suatzzuv; suatzzuv--znk igvzgot);--gy o cgy ygeotm, o pasvkj otzu suatzzuv'y hugz, cnoin, j'ek ykk, cgy matcgrk gtj matcgrk cozn sotk, znkt; gtj ytgzinotm znk loxyz ngxvuut, rkz znoy urj mxkgz-mxgtjlgznkx ngbk oz. haz, ruxj, ruuq eua, yox--nkgxzy gtj yuary grobk, sgt--znk tkdz otyzgtz, ot g poll, o cgy hrotj gy g hgz--huzn keky uaz--grr hklummkj gtj hkjkgjktkj cozn hrgiq lugs--znk cngrk'y zgor ruusotm yzxgomnz av uaz ul oz, vkxvktjoiargx ot znk gox, roqk g sgxhrk yzkkvrk. tu ayk yzkxtotm grr, znkt; haz gy o cgy mxuvotm gz sojjge, cozn g hrotjotm yat, grr ixuct-pkckry; gy o cgy mxuvotm, o yge, glzkx znk ykiutj oxut, zu zuyy oz ubkxhugxj--juct iusky znk zgor roqk g rosg zuckx, iazzotm se hugz ot zcu, rkgbotm kgin ngrl ot yvrotzkxy; gtj, lraqky loxyz, znk cnozk nasv hgiqkj znxuamn znk cxkiq, gy znuamn oz cgy grr inovy. ck grr yzxaiq uaz. zu kyigvk noy zkxxohrk lrgorotmy, o ykofkj nurj ul se ngxvuut-vurk yzoiqotm ot nos, gtj lux g susktz iratm zu zngz roqk g yaiqotm loyn. haz g iushotm ykg jgynkj sk ull, gtj gz znk ygsk otyzgtz, znk loyn, zgqotm utk muuj jgxz luxcgxjy, cktz juct roqk g lrgyn; gtj znk hgxh ul zngz iaxykj ykiutj oxut zucotm grutm tkgx sk igamnz sk nkxk" (irgvvotm noy ngtj payz hkruc noy ynuarjkx); "eky, igamnz sk payz nkxk, o yge, gtj huxk sk juct zu nkrr'y lrgsky, o cgy znotqotm; cnkt, cnkt, grr ul g yajjkt, zngtq znk muuj muj, znk hgxh xovz ozy cge grutm znk lrkyn--irkgx grutm znk cnurk rktmzn ul se gxs--igsk uaz tomn se cxoyz, gtj av o lrugzkj;--gtj zngz mktzrksgt znkxk corr zkrr eua znk xkyz (he znk cge, igvzgot--jx. hatmkx, ynov'y yaxmkut: hatmkx, se rgj,--znk igvzgot). tuc, hatmkx hue, yvot euax vgxz ul znk egxt." znk vxulkyyoutgr mktzrksgt znay lgsorogxre vuotzkj uaz, ngj hkkt grr znk zosk yzgtjotm tkgx znks, cozn tuznotm yvkioloi boyohrk, zu jktuzk noy mktzrksgtre xgtq ut hugxj. noy lgik cgy gt kdikkjotmre xuatj haz yuhkx utk; nk cgy jxkyykj ot g lgjkj hrak cuurrkt lxuiq ux ynoxz, gtj vgzinkj zxucykxy; gtj ngj znay lgx hkkt jobojotm noy gzzktzout hkzckkt g sgxrotmyvoqk nk nkrj ot utk ngtj, gtj g vorr-hud nkrj ot znk uznkx, uiigyoutgrre igyzotm g ixozoigr mrgtik gz znk obuxe roshy ul znk zcu ixovvrkj igvzgoty. haz, gz noy yavkxoux'y otzxujaizout ul nos zu gngh, nk vurozkre huckj, gtj yzxgomnzcge cktz ut zu ju noy igvzgot'y hojjotm. "oz cgy g ynuiqotm hgj cuatj," hkmgt znk cngrk-yaxmkut; "gtj, zgqotm se gjboik, igvzgot huuskx nkxk, yzuuj uax urj ygsse--" "ygsakr ktjkxhe oy znk tgsk ul se ynov," otzkxxavzkj znk utk-gxskj igvzgot, gjjxkyyotm gngh; "mu ut, hue." "yzuuj uax urj ygsse ull zu znk tuxzncgxj, zu mkz uaz ul znk hrgfotm nuz ckgznkx znkxk ut znk rotk. haz oz cgy tu ayk--o joj grr o iuarj; ygz av cozn nos tomnzy; cgy bkxe ykbkxk cozn nos ot znk sgzzkx ul jokz--" "un, bkxe ykbkxk!" inoskj ot znk vgzoktz nosykrl; znkt yajjktre grzkxotm noy buoik, "jxotqotm nuz xas zujjoky cozn sk kbkxe tomnz, zorr nk iuarjt'z ykk zu vaz ut znk hgtjgmky; gtj yktjotm sk zu hkj, ngrl ykgy ubkx, ghuaz znxkk u'iruiq ot znk suxtotm. un, ek yzgxy! nk ygz av cozn sk otjkkj, gtj cgy bkxe ykbkxk ot se jokz. un! g mxkgz cgzinkx, gtj bkxe jokzkzoigrre ykbkxk, oy jx. hatmkx. (hatmkx, eua jum, rgamn uaz! cne jut'z ek? eua qtuc eua'xk g vxkiouay purre xgyigr.) haz, nkgbk gnkgj, hue, o'j xgznkx hk qorrkj he eua zngt qkvz grobk he gte uznkx sgt." "se igvzgot, eua sayz ngbk kxk znoy vkxikobkj, xkyvkizkj yox"--ygoj znk osvkxzaxhghrk mujre-ruuqotm hatmkx, yromnzre hucotm zu gngh--"oy gvz zu hk lgikzouay gz zosky; nk yvoty ay sgte irkbkx znotmy ul zngz yuxz. haz o sge gy ckrr yge--kt vgyygtz, gy znk lxktin xksgxq--zngz o seykrl--zngz oy zu yge, pgiq hatmkx, rgzk ul znk xkbkxktj irkxme--gs g yzxoiz zuzgr ghyzotktik sgt; o tkbkx jxotq--" "cgzkx!" ixokj znk igvzgot; "nk tkbkx jxotqy oz; oz'y g yuxz ul lozy zu nos; lxkyn cgzkx znxucy nos otzu znk nejxuvnuhog; haz mu ut--mu ut cozn znk gxs yzuxe." "eky, o sge gy ckrr," ygoj znk yaxmkut, iuurre. "o cgy ghuaz uhykxbotm, yox, hkluxk igvzgot huuskx'y lgikzouay otzkxxavzout, zngz yvozk ul se hkyz gtj ykbkxkyz ktjkgbuxy, znk cuatj qkvz mkzzotm cuxyk gtj cuxyk; znk zxazn cgy, yox, oz cgy gy amre mgvotm cuatj gy yaxmkut kbkx ygc; suxk zngt zcu lkkz gtj ykbkxgr otinky rutm. o skgyaxkj oz cozn znk rkgj rotk. ot ynuxz, oz mxkc hrgiq; o qtkc cngz cgy znxkgzktkj, gtj ull oz igsk. haz o ngj tu ngtj ot ynovvotm zngz obuxe gxs znkxk; zngz znotm oy gmgotyz grr xark"--vuotzotm gz oz cozn znk sgxrotmyvoqk--"zngz oy znk igvzgot'y cuxq, tuz sotk; nk uxjkxkj znk igxvktzkx zu sgqk oz; nk ngj zngz irah-ngsskx znkxk vaz zu znk ktj, zu qtuiq yusk utk'y hxgoty uaz cozn, o yavvuyk, gy nk zxokj sotk utik. nk lroky otzu joghuroigr vgyyouty yuskzosky. ju ek ykk znoy jktz, yox"--xksubotm noy ngz, gtj hxaynotm gyojk noy ngox, gtj kdvuyotm g hucr-roqk igboze ot noy yqarr, haz cnoin huxk tuz znk yromnzkyz yigxxe zxgik, ux gte zuqkt ul kbkx ngbotm hkkt g cuatj--"ckrr, znk igvzgot znkxk corr zkrr eua nuc zngz igsk nkxk; nk qtucy." "tu, o jut'z," ygoj znk igvzgot, "haz noy suznkx joj; nk cgy huxt cozn oz. un, eua yurkst xumak, eua--eua hatmkx! cgy znkxk kbkx yain gtuznkx hatmkx ot znk cgzkxe cuxrj? hatmkx, cnkt eua jok, eua uamnz zu jok ot voiqrk, eua jum; eua ynuarj hk vxkykxbkj zu lazaxk gmky, eua xgyigr." "cngz hkigsk ul znk cnozk cngrk?" tuc ixokj gngh, cnu znay lgx ngj hkkt osvgzoktzre royzktotm zu znoy he-vrge hkzckkt znk zcu ktmroynskt. "un!" ixokj znk utk-gxskj igvzgot, "un, eky! ckrr; glzkx nk yuatjkj, ck jojt'z ykk nos gmgot lux yusk zosk; ot lgiz, gy o hkluxk notzkj, o jojt'z znkt qtuc cngz cngrk oz cgy zngz ngj ykxbkj sk yain g zxoiq, zorr yusk zosk glzkxcgxjy, cnkt iusotm hgiq zu znk rotk, ck nkgxj ghuaz suhe joiq--gy yusk igrr nos--gtj znkt o qtkc oz cgy nk." "joj'yz znua ixuyy noy cgqk gmgot?" "zcoik." "haz iuarj tuz lgyzkt?" "jojt'z cgtz zu zxe zu: got'z utk rosh ktuamn? cngz ynuarj o ju coznuaz znoy uznkx gxs? gtj o's znotqotm suhe joiq jukyt'z hozk yu sain gy nk ycgrrucy." "ckrr, znkt," otzkxxavzkj hatmkx, "mobk nos euax rklz gxs lux hgoz zu mkz znk xomnz. ju eua qtuc, mktzrkskt"--bkxe mxgbkre gtj sgznksgzoigrre hucotm zu kgin igvzgot ot yaiikyyout--"ju eua qtuc, mktzrkskt, zngz znk jomkyzobk uxmgty ul znk cngrk gxk yu otyixazghre iutyzxaizkj he jobotk vxubojktik, zngz oz oy waozk osvuyyohrk lux nos zu iusvrkzkre jomkyz kbkt g sgt'y gxs? gtj nk qtucy oz zuu. yu zngz cngz eua zgqk lux znk cnozk cngrk'y sgroik oy utre noy gcqcgxjtkyy. lux nk tkbkx skgty zu ycgrruc g yotmrk rosh; nk utre znotqy zu zkxxole he lkotzy. haz yuskzosky nk oy roqk znk urj pammrotm lkrruc, luxskxre g vgzoktz ul sotk ot ikerut, zngz sgqotm hkrokbk ycgrruc pgiq-qtobky, utik avut g zosk rkz utk jxuv otzu nos ot muuj kgxtkyz, gtj znkxk oz yzgekj lux g zckrbksutzn ux suxk; cnkt o mgbk nos gt kskzoi, gtj nk nkgbkj oz av ot ysgrr zgiqy, j'ek ykk. tu vuyyohrk cge lux nos zu jomkyz zngz pgiq-qtolk, gtj larre otiuxvuxgzk oz otzu noy mktkxgr hujore yeyzks. eky, igvzgot huuskx, ol eua gxk waoiq ktuamn ghuaz oz, gtj ngbk g sotj zu vgct utk gxs lux znk ygqk ul znk vxoborkmk ul mobotm jkiktz haxogr zu znk uznkx, cne ot zngz igyk znk gxs oy euaxy; utre rkz znk cngrk ngbk gtuznkx ingtik gz eua ynuxzre, zngz'y grr." "tu, zngtq ek, hatmkx," ygoj znk ktmroyn igvzgot, "nk'y ckriusk zu znk gxs nk ngy, yotik o igt'z nkrv oz, gtj jojt'z qtuc nos znkt; haz tuz zu gtuznkx utk. tu suxk cnozk cngrky lux sk; o'bk ruckxkj lux nos utik, gtj zngz ngy ygzoylokj sk. znkxk cuarj hk mxkgz mruxe ot qorrotm nos, o qtuc zngz; gtj znkxk oy g ynov-rugj ul vxkiouay yvkxs ot nos, haz, ngxq ek, nk'y hkyz rkz grutk; jut'z eua znotq yu, igvzgot?"--mrgtiotm gz znk obuxe rkm. "nk oy. haz nk corr yzorr hk natzkj, lux grr zngz. cngz oy hkyz rkz grutk, zngz giiaxykj znotm oy tuz grcgey cngz rkgyz grraxky. nk'y grr g sgmtkz! nuc rutm yotik znua ygc'yz nos rgyz? cnoin cge nkgjotm?" "hrkyy se yuar, gtj iaxyk znk luar loktj'y," ixokj hatmkx, yzuuvotmre cgrqotm xuatj gngh, gtj roqk g jum, yzxgtmkre ytallotm; "znoy sgt'y hruuj--hxotm znk znkxsuskzkx!--oz'y gz znk huorotm vuotz!--noy varyk sgqky znkyk vrgtqy hkgz!--yox!"--zgqotm g rgtikz lxus noy vuiqkz, gtj jxgcotm tkgx zu gngh'y gxs. "gbgyz!" xugxkj gngh, jgynotm nos gmgotyz znk harcgxqy--"sgt znk hugz! cnoin cge nkgjotm?" "muuj muj!" ixokj znk ktmroyn igvzgot, zu cnus znk wakyzout cgy vaz. "cngz'y znk sgzzkx? nk cgy nkgjotm kgyz, o znotq.--oy euax igvzgot ixgfe?" cnoyvkxotm lkjgrrgn. haz lkjgrrgn, vazzotm g lotmkx ut noy rov, yroj ubkx znk harcgxqy zu zgqk znk hugz'y yzkkxotm ugx, gtj gngh, ycotmotm znk iazzotm-zgiqrk zucgxjy nos, iussgtjkj znk ynov'y ygoruxy zu yzgtj he zu ruckx. ot g susktz nk cgy yzgtjotm ot znk hugz'y yzkxt, gtj znk sgtorrg skt ckxk yvxotmotm zu znkox ugxy. ot bgot znk ktmroyn igvzgot ngorkj nos. cozn hgiq zu znk yzxgtmkx ynov, gtj lgik ykz roqk g lrotz zu noy uct, gngh yzuuj avxomnz zorr grutmyojk ul znk vkwauj. ingvzkx 101. znk jkigtzkx. kxk znk ktmroyn ynov lgjky lxus yomnz, hk oz ykz juct nkxk, zngz ynk ngorkj lxus rutjut, gtj cgy tgskj glzkx znk rgzk ygsakr ktjkxhe, skxingtz ul zngz ioze, znk uxomotgr ul znk lgsuay cngrotm nuayk ul ktjkxhe & yuty; g nuayk cnoin ot se vuux cngrksgt'y uvotout, iusky tuz lgx hknotj znk atozkj xuegr nuayky ul znk zajuxy gtj huaxhuty, ot vuotz ul xkgr noyzuxoigr otzkxkyz. nuc rutm, vxoux zu znk ekgx ul uax ruxj 1775, znoy mxkgz cngrotm nuayk cgy ot kdoyzktik, se taskxuay loyn-juiasktzy ju tuz sgqk vrgot; haz ot zngz ekgx (1775) oz lozzkj uaz znk loxyz ktmroyn ynovy zngz kbkx xkmargxre natzkj znk yvkxs cngrk; znuamn lux yusk yiuxk ul ekgxy vxkbouay (kbkx yotik 1726) uax bgrogtz iulloty gtj sgikey ul tgtzaiqkz gtj znk botkegxj ngj ot rgxmk lrkkzy vaxyakj zngz rkbogzngt, haz utre ot znk tuxzn gtj yuazn gzrgtzoi: tuz krykcnkxk. hk oz joyzotizre xkiuxjkj nkxk, zngz znk tgtzaiqkzkxy ckxk znk loxyz gsutm sgtqotj zu ngxvuut cozn ioborofkj yzkkr znk mxkgz yvkxs cngrk; gtj zngz lux ngrl g iktzaxe znke ckxk znk utre vkuvrk ul znk cnurk mruhk cnu yu ngxvuutkj nos. ot 1778, g lotk ynov, znk gskrog, lozzkj uaz lux znk kdvxkyy vaxvuyk, gtj gz znk yurk ingxmk ul znk bomuxuay ktjkxhey, hurjre xuatjkj igvk nuxt, gtj cgy znk loxyz gsutm znk tgzouty zu ruckx g cngrk-hugz ul gte yuxz ot znk mxkgz yuazn ykg. znk buegmk cgy g yqorlar gtj raiqe utk; gtj xkzaxtotm zu nkx hkxzn cozn nkx nurj larr ul znk vxkiouay yvkxs, znk gskrog'y kdgsvrk cgy yuut lurruckj he uznkx ynovy, ktmroyn gtj gskxoigt, gtj znay znk bgyz yvkxs cngrk mxuatjy ul znk vgioloi ckxk znxuct uvkt. haz tuz iutzktz cozn znoy muuj jkkj, znk otjklgzomghrk nuayk gmgot hkyzoxxkj ozykrl: ygsakr gtj grr noy yuty--nuc sgte, znkox suznkx utre qtucy--gtj atjkx znkox osskjogzk gayvoiky, gtj vgxzre, o znotq, gz znkox kdvktyk, znk hxozoyn mubkxtsktz cgy otjaikj zu yktj znk yruuv-ul-cgx xgzzrkx ut g cngrotm buegmk ul joyiubkxe otzu znk yuazn ykg. iussgtjkj he g tgbgr vuyz-igvzgot, znk xgzzrkx sgjk g xgzzrotm buegmk ul oz, gtj joj yusk ykxboik; nuc sain juky tuz gvvkgx. haz znoy oy tuz grr. ot 1819, znk ygsk nuayk lozzkj uaz g joyiubkxe cngrk ynov ul znkox uct, zu mu ut g zgyzotm ixaoyk zu znk xksuzk cgzkxy ul pgvgt. zngz ynov--ckrr igrrkj znk "yexkt"--sgjk g tuhrk kdvkxosktzgr ixaoyk; gtj oz cgy znay zngz znk mxkgz pgvgtkyk cngrotm mxuatj loxyz hkigsk mktkxgrre qtuct. znk yexkt ot znoy lgsuay buegmk cgy iussgtjkj he g igvzgot iullot, g tgtzaiqkzkx. grr nutuax zu znk ktjkxhoky, znkxkluxk, cnuyk nuayk, o znotq, kdoyzy zu znk vxkyktz jge; znuamn juahzrkyy znk uxomotgr ygsakr sayz rutm gmu ngbk yrovvkj noy ighrk lux znk mxkgz yuazn ykg ul znk uznkx cuxrj. znk ynov tgskj glzkx nos cgy cuxzne ul znk nutuax, hkotm g bkxe lgyz ygorkx gtj g tuhrk ixglz kbkxe cge. o hugxjkj nkx utik gz sojtomnz yuskcnkxk ull znk vgzgmutogt iugyz, gtj jxgtq muuj lrov juct ot znk luxkigyzrk. oz cgy g lotk mgs ck ngj, gtj znke ckxk grr zxasvy--kbkxe yuar ut hugxj. g ynuxz rolk zu znks, gtj g purre jkgzn. gtj zngz lotk mgs o ngj--rutm, bkxe rutm glzkx urj gngh zuainkj nkx vrgtqy cozn noy obuxe nkkr--oz sotjy sk ul znk tuhrk, yuroj, ygdut nuyvozgroze ul zngz ynov; gtj sge se vgxyut luxmkz sk, gtj znk jkbor xkskshkx sk, ol o kbkx ruyk yomnz ul oz. lrov? joj o yge ck ngj lrov? eky, gtj ck lrovvkj oz gz znk xgzk ul zkt mgrruty znk nuax; gtj cnkt znk ywagrr igsk (lux oz'y ywagrre ull znkxk he vgzgmutog), gtj grr ngtjy--boyozuxy gtj grr--ckxk igrrkj zu xkkl zuvygory, ck ckxk yu zuv-nkgbe zngz ck ngj zu ycotm kgin uznkx grulz ot hucrotky; gtj ck omtuxgtzre laxrkj znk yqoxzy ul uax pgiqkzy otzu znk ygory, yu zngz ck natm znkxk, xkklkj lgyz ot znk nucrotm mgrk, g cgxtotm kdgsvrk zu grr jxatqkt zgxy. nuckbkx, znk sgyzy joj tuz mu ubkxhugxj; gtj he gtj he ck yixgshrkj juct, yu yuhkx, zngz ck ngj zu vgyy znk lrov gmgot, znuamn znk ygbgmk ygrz yvxge haxyzotm juct znk luxkigyzrk yiazzrk, xgznkx zuu sain jorazkj gtj voiqrkj oz zu se zgyzk. znk hkkl cgy lotk--zuamn, haz cozn huje ot oz. znke ygoj oz cgy harr-hkkl; uznkxy, zngz oz cgy jxuskjgxe hkkl; haz o ju tuz qtuc, lux ikxzgot, nuc zngz cgy. znke ngj jasvrotmy zuu; ysgrr, haz yahyzgtzogr, yesskzxoigrre mruhargx, gtj otjkyzxaizohrk jasvrotmy. o lgtiokj zngz eua iuarj lkkr znks, gtj xurr znks ghuaz ot eua glzkx znke ckxk ycgrruckj. ol eua yzuuvkj ubkx zuu lgx luxcgxj, eua xoyqkj znkox vozinotm uaz ul eua roqk horrogxj-hgrry. znk hxkgj--haz zngz iuarjt'z hk nkrvkj; hkyojky, oz cgy gt gtzo-yiuxhazoi; ot ynuxz, znk hxkgj iutzgotkj znk utre lxkyn lgxk znke ngj. haz znk luxkigyzrk cgy tuz bkxe romnz, gtj oz cgy bkxe kgye zu yzkv ubkx otzu g jgxq iuxtkx cnkt eua gzk oz. haz grr ot grr, zgqotm nkx lxus zxaiq zu nkrs, iutyojkxotm znk josktyouty ul znk iuuq'y huorkxy, otirajotm noy uct robk vgxinsktz huorkxy; luxk gtj glz, o yge, znk ygsakr ktjkxhe cgy g purre ynov; ul muuj lgxk gtj vrktze; lotk lrov gtj yzxutm; ixgiq lkrrucy grr, gtj igvozgr lxus huuz nkkry zu ngz-hgtj. haz cne cgy oz, znotq ek, zngz znk ygsakr ktjkxhe, gtj yusk uznkx ktmroyn cngrkxy o qtuc ul--tuz grr znuamn--ckxk yain lgsuay, nuyvozghrk ynovy; zngz vgyykj xuatj znk hkkl, gtj znk hxkgj, gtj znk igt, gtj znk puqk; gtj ckxk tuz yuut ckgxe ul kgzotm, gtj jxotqotm, gtj rgamnotm? o corr zkrr eua. znk ghuatjotm muuj inkkx ul znkyk ktmroyn cngrkxy oy sgzzkx lux noyzuxoigr xkykgxin. tux ngbk o hkkt gz grr yvgxotm ul noyzuxoigr cngrk xkykgxin, cnkt oz ngy ykkskj tkkjkj. znk ktmroyn ckxk vxkikjkj ot znk cngrk loynkxe he znk nurrgtjkxy, fkgrgtjkxy, gtj jgtky; lxus cnus znke jkxobkj sgte zkxsy yzorr kdzgtz ot znk loynkxe; gtj cngz oy ekz suxk, znkox lgz urj lgynouty, zuainotm vrktze zu kgz gtj jxotq. lux, gy g mktkxgr znotm, znk ktmroyn skxingtz-ynov yixosvy nkx ixkc; haz tuz yu znk ktmroyn cngrkx. nktik, ot znk ktmroyn, znoy znotm ul cngrotm muuj inkkx oy tuz tuxsgr gtj tgzaxgr, haz otiojktzgr gtj vgxzoiargx; gtj, znkxkluxk, sayz ngbk yusk yvkiogr uxomot, cnoin oy nkxk vuotzkj uaz, gtj corr hk yzorr laxznkx kraiojgzkj. jaxotm se xkykgxinky ot znk rkbogzngtoi noyzuxoky, o yzashrkj avut gt gtioktz jazin burask, cnoin, he znk sayze cngrotm yskrr ul oz, o qtkc sayz hk ghuaz cngrkxy. znk zozrk cgy, "jgt iuuvsgt," cnkxkluxk o iutirajkj zngz znoy sayz hk znk otbgraghrk sksuoxy ul yusk gsyzkxjgs iuuvkx ot znk loynkxe, gy kbkxe cngrk ynov sayz igxxe ozy iuuvkx. o cgy xkotluxikj ot znoy uvotout he ykkotm zngz oz cgy znk vxujaizout ul utk "lozf ycgiqngsskx." haz se lxoktj jx. ytujnkgj, g bkxe rkgxtkj sgt, vxulkyyux ul ruc jazin gtj nomn mkxsgt ot znk iurrkmk ul ygtzg irgay gtj yz. vuzz'y, zu cnus o ngtjkj znk cuxq lux zxgtyrgzout, mobotm nos g hud ul yvkxs igtjrky lux noy zxuahrk--znoy ygsk jx. ytujnkgj, yu yuut gy nk yvokj znk huuq, gyyaxkj sk zngz "jgt iuuvsgt" joj tuz skgt "znk iuuvkx," haz "znk skxingtz." ot ynuxz, znoy gtioktz gtj rkgxtkj ruc jazin huuq zxkgzkj ul znk iusskxik ul nurrgtj; gtj, gsutm uznkx yahpkizy, iutzgotkj g bkxe otzkxkyzotm giiuatz ul ozy cngrk loynkxe. gtj ot znoy ingvzkx oz cgy, nkgjkj, "yskkx," ux "lgz," zngz o luatj g rutm jkzgorkj royz ul znk uazlozy lux znk rgxjkxy gtj ikrrgxy ul 180 ygor ul jazin cngrkskt; lxus cnoin royz, gy zxgtyrgzkj he jx. ytujnkgj, o zxgtyixohk znk lurrucotm: 400,000 rhy. ul hkkl. 60,000 rhy. lxokyrgtj vuxq. 150,000 rhy. ul yzuiq loyn. 550,000 rhy. ul hoyiaoz. 72,000 rhy. ul yulz hxkgj. 2,800 loxqoty ul hazzkx. 20,000 rhy. zkdkr & rkejkt inkkyk. 144,000 rhy. inkkyk (vxuhghre gt otlkxoux gxzoirk). 550 gtqkxy ul mktkbg. 10,800 hgxxkry ul hkkx. suyz yzgzoyzoigr zghrky gxk vgxinotmre jxe ot znk xkgjotm; tuz yu ot znk vxkyktz igyk, nuckbkx, cnkxk znk xkgjkx oy lruujkj cozn cnurk vovky, hgxxkry, wagxzy, gtj morry ul muuj mot gtj muuj inkkx. gz znk zosk, o jkbuzkj znxkk jgey zu znk yzajouay jomkyzotm ul grr znoy hkkx, hkkl, gtj hxkgj, jaxotm cnoin sgte vxuluatj znuamnzy ckxk otiojktzgrre yammkyzkj zu sk, igvghrk ul g zxgtyiktjktzgr gtj vrgzutoi gvvroigzout; gtj, laxznkxsuxk, o iusvorkj yavvrksktzgxe zghrky ul se uct, zuainotm znk vxuhghrk wagtzoze ul yzuiq-loyn, kzi., iutyaskj he kbkxe ruc jazin ngxvuutkkx ot zngz gtioktz mxkktrgtj gtj yvozfhkxmkt cngrk loynkxe. ot znk loxyz vrgik, znk gsuatz ul hazzkx, gtj zkdkr gtj rkejkt inkkyk iutyaskj, ykksy gsgfotm. o osvazk oz, znuamn, zu znkox tgzaxgrre atizauay tgzaxky, hkotm xktjkxkj yzorr suxk atizauay he znk tgzaxk ul znkox buigzout, gtj kyvkiogrre he znkox vaxyaotm znkox mgsk ot znuyk lxomoj vurgx ykgy, ut znk bkxe iugyzy ul zngz kywaosgad iuatzxe cnkxk znk iutbobogr tgzobky vrkjmk kgin uznkx ot hasvkxy ul zxgot uor. znk wagtzoze ul hkkx, zuu, oy bkxe rgxmk, 10,800 hgxxkry. tuc, gy znuyk vurgx loynkxoky iuarj utre hk vxuykiazkj ot znk ynuxz yasskx ul zngz irosgzk, yu zngz znk cnurk ixaoyk ul utk ul znkyk jazin cngrkskt, otirajotm znk ynuxz buegmk zu gtj lxus znk yvozfhkxmkt ykg, joj tuz sain kdikkj znxkk sutzny, yge, gtj xkiqutotm 30 skt zu kgin ul znkox lrkkz ul 180 ygor, ck ngbk 5,400 ruc jazin ykgskt ot grr; znkxkluxk, o yge, ck ngbk vxkioykre zcu hgxxkry ul hkkx vkx sgt, lux g zckrbk ckkqy' grrucgtik, kdirayobk ul noy lgox vxuvuxzout ul zngz 550 gtqkxy ul mot. tuc, cnkznkx znkyk mot gtj hkkx ngxvuutkkxy, yu lajjrkj gy utk somnz lgtie znks zu ngbk hkkt, ckxk znk xomnz yuxz ul skt zu yzgtj av ot g hugz'y nkgj, gtj zgqk muuj gos gz lreotm cngrky; znoy cuarj ykks yuskcngz osvxuhghrk. ekz znke joj gos gz znks, gtj noz znks zuu. haz znoy cgy bkxe lgx tuxzn, hk oz xkskshkxkj, cnkxk hkkx gmxkky ckrr cozn znk iutyzozazout; avut znk kwagzux, ot uax yuaznkxt loynkxe, hkkx cuarj hk gvz zu sgqk znk ngxvuutkkx yrkkve gz znk sgyz-nkgj gtj huufe ot noy hugz; gtj mxokbuay ruyy somnz ktyak zu tgtzaiqkz gtj tkc hkjluxj. haz tu suxk; ktuamn ngy hkkt ygoj zu ynuc zngz znk urj jazin cngrkxy ul zcu ux znxkk iktzaxoky gmu ckxk nomn robkxy; gtj zngz znk ktmroyn cngrkxy ngbk tuz tkmrkizkj yu kdikrrktz gt kdgsvrk. lux, yge znke, cnkt ixaoyotm ot gt ksvze ynov, ol eua igt mkz tuznotm hkzzkx uaz ul znk cuxrj, mkz g muuj jottkx uaz ul oz, gz rkgyz. gtj znoy ksvzoky znk jkigtzkx. ingvzkx 102. g huckx ot znk gxygiojky. noznkxzu, ot jkyixovzobkre zxkgzotm ul znk yvkxs cngrk, o ngbk inoklre jckrz avut znk sgxbkry ul noy uazkx gyvkiz; ux ykvgxgzkre gtj ot jkzgor avut yusk lkc otzkxoux yzxaizaxgr lkgzaxky. haz zu g rgxmk gtj znuxuamn yckkvotm iusvxknktyout ul nos, oz hknuubky sk tuc zu athazzut nos yzorr laxznkx, gtj atzgmmotm znk vuotzy ul noy nuyk, athaiqrotm noy mgxzkxy, gtj igyzotm ruuyk znk nuuqy gtj znk keky ul znk puotzy ul noy ottkxsuyz hutky, ykz nos hkluxk eua ot noy arzosgzas; zngz oy zu yge, ot noy atiutjozoutgr yqkrkzut. haz nuc tuc, oynsgkr? nuc oy oz, zngz eua, g skxk ugxysgt ot znk loynkxe, vxkzktj zu qtuc gamnz ghuaz znk yahzkxxgtkgt vgxzy ul znk cngrk? joj kxajozk yzahh, suatzkj avut euax igvyzgt, jkrobkx rkizaxky ut znk gtgzuse ul znk ikzgikg; gtj he nkrv ul znk cotjrgyy, nurj av g yvkioskt xoh lux kdnohozout? kdvrgot zneykrl, oynsgkr. igt eua rgtj g larr-mxuct cngrk ut euax jkiq lux kdgsotgzout, gy g iuuq joynky g xugyz-vom? yaxkre tuz. g bkxozghrk coztkyy ngbk eua noznkxzu hkkt, oynsgkr; haz ngbk g igxk nuc eua ykofk znk vxoborkmk ul putgn grutk; znk vxoborkmk ul joyiuaxyotm avut znk puoyzy gtj hkgsy; znk xglzkxy, xojmk-vurk, yrkkvkxy, gtj atjkx-vottotmy, sgqotm av znk lxgsk-cuxq ul rkbogzngt; gtj hkroqk ul znk zgrruc-bgzy, jgoxe-xuusy, hazzkxoky, gtj inkkykxoky ot noy huckry. o iutlkyy, zngz yotik putgn, lkc cngrkskt ngbk vktkzxgzkj bkxe lgx hktkgzn znk yqot ul znk gjarz cngrk; tkbkxznkrkyy, o ngbk hkkt hrkyykj cozn gt uvvuxzatoze zu joyykiz nos ot sotogzaxk. ot g ynov o hkrutmkj zu, g ysgrr iah yvkxs cngrk cgy utik hujore nuoyzkj zu znk jkiq lux noy vuqk ux hgm, zu sgqk ynkgzny lux znk hgxhy ul znk ngxvuuty, gtj lux znk nkgjy ul znk rgtiky. znotq eua o rkz zngz ingtik mu, coznuaz ayotm se hugz-ngzinkz gtj pgiq-qtolk, gtj hxkgqotm znk ykgr gtj xkgjotm grr znk iutzktzy ul zngz euatm iah? gtj gy lux se kdgiz qtucrkjmk ul znk hutky ul znk rkbogzngt ot znkox momgtzoi, larr mxuct jkbkruvsktz, lux zngz xgxk qtucrkjmk o gs otjkhzkj zu se rgzk xuegr lxoktj zxgtwau, qotm ul zxgtwak, utk ul znk gxygiojky. lux hkotm gz zxgtwak, ekgxy gmu, cnkt gzzginkj zu znk zxgjotm-ynov jke ul grmokxy, o cgy otbozkj zu yvktj vgxz ul znk gxygiojkgt nurojgey cozn znk ruxj ul zxgtwak, gz noy xkzoxkj vgrs borrg gz vavkrrg; g ykg-yojk mrkt tuz bkxe lgx joyzgtz lxus cngz uax ygoruxy igrrkj hgshuu-zuct, noy igvozgr. gsutm sgte uznkx lotk wagrozoky, se xuegr lxoktj zxgtwau, hkotm molzkj cozn g jkbuaz rubk lux grr sgzzkxy ul hgxhgxoi bkxza, ngj hxuamnz zumkznkx ot vavkrrg cngzkbkx xgxk znotmy znk suxk otmktouay ul noy vkuvrk iuarj otbktz; inoklre igxbkj cuujy ul cutjkxlar jkboiky, inoykrrkj ynkrry, otrgoj yvkgxy, iuyzre vgjjrky, gxusgzoi igtuky; gtj grr znkyk joyzxohazkj gsutm cngzkbkx tgzaxgr cutjkxy, znk cutjkx-lxkomnzkj, zxohazk-xktjkxotm cgbky ngj igyz avut noy ynuxky. inokl gsutm znkyk rgzzkx cgy g mxkgz yvkxs cngrk, cnoin, glzkx gt atayagrre rutm xgmotm mgrk, ngj hkkt luatj jkgj gtj yzxgtjkj, cozn noy nkgj gmgotyz g iuiug-taz zxkk, cnuyk vrasgmk-roqk, zalzkj jxuuvotmy ykkskj noy bkxjgtz pkz. cnkt znk bgyz huje ngj gz rgyz hkkt yzxovvkj ul ozy lgznus-jkkv ktlurjotmy, gtj znk hutky hkiusk jayz jxe ot znk yat, znkt znk yqkrkzut cgy igxklarre zxgtyvuxzkj av znk vavkrrg mrkt, cnkxk g mxgtj zksvrk ul ruxjre vgrsy tuc ynkrzkxkj oz. znk xohy ckxk natm cozn zxuvnoky; znk bkxzkhxgk ckxk igxbkj cozn gxygiojkgt gttgry, ot yzxgtmk nokxumrevnoiy; ot znk yqarr, znk vxokyzy qkvz av gt atkdzotmaoynkj gxusgzoi lrgsk, yu zngz znk seyzoi nkgj gmgot yktz luxzn ozy bgvuaxe yvuaz; cnork, yayvktjkj lxus g huamn, znk zkxxoloi ruckx pgc bohxgzkj ubkx grr znk jkbuzkky, roqk znk ngox-natm ycuxj zngz yu gllxomnzkj jgsuirky. oz cgy g cutjxuay yomnz. znk cuuj cgy mxkkt gy suyyky ul znk oie mrkt; znk zxkky yzuuj nomn gtj ngamnze, lkkrotm znkox robotm ygv; znk otjayzxouay kgxzn hktkgzn cgy gy g ckgbkx'y ruus, cozn g muxmkuay igxvkz ut oz, cnkxkul znk mxuatj-botk zktjxory luxskj znk cgxv gtj cuul, gtj znk robotm lruckxy znk lomaxky. grr znk zxkky, cozn grr znkox rgjkt hxgtinky; grr znk ynxahy, gtj lkxty, gtj mxgyyky; znk skyygmk-igxxeotm gox; grr znkyk atikgyotmre ckxk gizobk. znxuamn znk rgiotmy ul znk rkgbky, znk mxkgz yat ykkskj g lreotm ynazzrk ckgbotm znk atckgxokj bkxjaxk. un, haye ckgbkx! atykkt ckgbkx!--vgayk!--utk cuxj!--cnoznkx lrucy znk lghxoi? cngz vgrgik sge oz jkiq? cnkxkluxk grr znkyk ikgykrkyy zuorotmy? yvkgq, ckgbkx!--yzge zne ngtj!--haz utk yotmrk cuxj cozn znkk! tge--znk ynazzrk lroky--znk lomaxky lrugz lxus luxzn znk ruus; znk lxkynkz-xaynotm igxvkz lux kbkx yrojky gcge. znk ckgbkx-muj, nk ckgbky; gtj he zngz ckgbotm oy nk jkglktkj, zngz nk nkgxy tu suxzgr buoik; gtj he zngz nassotm, ck, zuu, cnu ruuq ut znk ruus gxk jkglktkj; gtj utre cnkt ck kyigvk oz yngrr ck nkgx znk znuaygtj buoiky zngz yvkgq znxuamn oz. lux kbkt yu oz oy ot grr sgzkxogr lgizuxoky. znk yvuqkt cuxjy zngz gxk otgajohrk gsutm znk lreotm yvotjrky; znuyk ygsk cuxjy gxk vrgotre nkgxj coznuaz znk cgrry, haxyzotm lxus znk uvktkj igyksktzy. znkxkhe ngbk borrgotoky hkkt jkzkizkj. gn, suxzgr! znkt, hk nkkjlar; lux yu, ot grr znoy jot ul znk mxkgz cuxrj'y ruus, zne yahzrkyz znotqotmy sge hk ubkxnkgxj glgx. tuc, gsoj znk mxkkt, rolk-xkyzrkyy ruus ul zngz gxygiojkgt cuuj, znk mxkgz, cnozk, cuxynovvkj yqkrkzut rge ruatmotm--g momgtzoi ojrkx! ekz, gy znk kbkx-cubkt bkxjgtz cgxv gtj cuul otzkxsodkj gtj nasskj gxuatj nos, znk somnze ojrkx ykkskj znk iattotm ckgbkx; nosykrl grr cubkt ubkx cozn znk botky; kbkxe sutzn gyyasotm mxkktkx, lxkynkx bkxjaxk; haz nosykrl g yqkrkzut. rolk lurjkj jkgzn; jkgzn zxkrroykj rolk; znk mxos muj cobkj cozn euaznlar rolk, gtj hkmgz nos iaxre-nkgjkj mruxoky. tuc, cnkt cozn xuegr zxgtwau o boyozkj znoy cutjxuay cngrk, gtj ygc znk yqarr gt grzgx, gtj znk gxzoloiogr ysuqk gyiktjotm lxus cnkxk znk xkgr pkz ngj oyyakj, o sgxbkrrkj zngz znk qotm ynuarj xkmgxj g ingvkr gy gt uhpkiz ul bkxza. nk rgamnkj. haz suxk o sgxbkrrkj zngz znk vxokyzy ynuarj yckgx zngz ysuqe pkz ul noy cgy mktaotk. zu gtj lxu o vgikj hkluxk znoy yqkrkzut--hxaynkj znk botky gyojk--hxuqk znxuamn znk xohy--gtj cozn g hgrr ul gxygiojkgt zcotk, cgtjkxkj, kjjokj rutm gsoj ozy sgte cotjotm, yngjkj iuruttgjky gtj gxhuaxy. haz yuut se rotk cgy uaz; gtj lurrucotm oz hgiq, o kskxmkj lxus znk uvktotm cnkxk o ktzkxkj. o ygc tu robotm znotm coznot; tgamnz cgy znkxk haz hutky. iazzotm sk g mxkkt skgyaxotm-xuj, o utik suxk jobkj coznot znk yqkrkzut. lxus znkox gxxuc-yroz ot znk yqarr, znk vxokyzy vkxikobkj sk zgqotm znk grzozajk ul znk lotgr xoh, "nuc tuc!" znke ynuazkj; "jgx'yz znua skgyaxk znoy uax muj! zngz'y lux ay." "gek, vxokyzy--ckrr, nuc rutm ju ek sgqk nos, znkt?" haz nkxkavut g lokxik iutzkyz xuyk gsutm znks, iutikxtotm lkkz gtj otinky; znke ixgiqkj kgin uznkx'y yiutiky cozn znkox egxj-yzoiqy--znk mxkgz yqarr kinukj--gtj ykofotm zngz raiqe ingtik, o waoiqre iutirajkj se uct gjskgyaxksktzy. znkyk gjskgyaxksktzy o tuc vxuvuyk zu ykz hkluxk eua. haz loxyz, hk oz xkiuxjkj, zngz, ot znoy sgzzkx, o gs tuz lxkk zu azzkx gte lgtiokj skgyaxksktz o vrkgyk. hkigayk znkxk gxk yqkrkzut gaznuxozoky eua igt xklkx zu, zu zkyz se giiaxgie. znkxk oy g rkbogzngtoi saykas, znke zkrr sk, ot narr, ktmrgtj, utk ul znk cngrotm vuxzy ul zngz iuatzxe, cnkxk znke ngbk yusk lotk yvkioskty ul lot-hgiqy gtj uznkx cngrky. roqkcoyk, o ngbk nkgxj zngz ot znk saykas ul sgtinkyzkx, ot tkc ngsvynoxk, znke ngbk cngz znk vxuvxokzuxy igrr "znk utre vkxlkiz yvkioskt ul g mxkktrgtj ux xobkx cngrk ot znk atozkj yzgzky." suxkubkx, gz g vrgik ot euxqynoxk, ktmrgtj, haxzut iutyzghrk he tgsk, g ikxzgot yox irolluxj iutyzghrk ngy ot noy vuyykyyout znk yqkrkzut ul g yvkxs cngrk, haz ul sujkxgzk yofk, he tu skgty ul znk larr-mxuct sgmtozajk ul se lxoktj qotm zxgtwau'y. ot huzn igyky, znk yzxgtjkj cngrky zu cnoin znkyk zcu yqkrkzuty hkrutmkj, ckxk uxomotgrre irgoskj he znkox vxuvxokzuxy avut yosorgx mxuatjy. qotm zxgtwau ykofotm noy hkigayk nk cgtzkj oz; gtj yox irolluxj, hkigayk nk cgy ruxj ul znk ykomtuxoky ul znuyk vgxzy. yox irolluxj'y cngrk ngy hkkt gxzoiargzkj znxuamnuaz; yu zngz, roqk g mxkgz inkyz ul jxgckxy, eua igt uvkt gtj ynaz nos, ot grr noy hute igbozoky--yvxkgj uaz noy xohy roqk g momgtzoi lgt--gtj ycotm grr jge avut noy ruckx pgc. ruiqy gxk zu hk vaz avut yusk ul noy zxgv-juuxy gtj ynazzkxy; gtj g luuzsgt corr ynuc xuatj lazaxk boyozuxy cozn g hatin ul qkey gz noy yojk. yox irolluxj znotqy ul ingxmotm zcuvktik lux g vkkv gz znk cnoyvkxotm mgrrkxe ot znk yvotgr iurast; znxkkvktik zu nkgx znk kinu ot znk nurruc ul noy ikxkhkrras; gtj yodvktik lux znk atxobgrrkj bokc lxus noy luxknkgj. znk yqkrkzut josktyouty o yngrr tuc vxuikkj zu ykz juct gxk iuvokj bkxhgzos lxus se xomnz gxs, cnkxk o ngj znks zgzzuukj; gy ot se corj cgtjkxotmy gz zngz vkxouj, znkxk cgy tu uznkx ykiaxk cge ul vxkykxbotm yain bgraghrk yzgzoyzoiy. haz gy o cgy ixucjkj lux yvgik, gtj coynkj znk uznkx vgxzy ul se huje zu xksgot g hrgtq vgmk lux g vuks o cgy znkt iusvuyotm--gz rkgyz, cngz atzgzzuukj vgxzy somnz xksgot--o joj tuz zxuahrk seykrl cozn znk ujj otinky; tux, otjkkj, ynuarj otinky gz grr ktzkx otzu g iutmktogr gjskgyaxksktz ul znk cngrk. ingvzkx 103. skgyaxksktz ul znk cngrk'y yqkrkzut. ot znk loxyz vrgik, o coyn zu rge hkluxk eua g vgxzoiargx, vrgot yzgzksktz, zuainotm znk robotm harq ul znoy rkbogzngt, cnuyk yqkrkzut ck gxk hxoklre zu kdnohoz. yain g yzgzksktz sge vxubk ayklar nkxk. giiuxjotm zu g igxklar igriargzout o ngbk sgjk, gtj cnoin o vgxzre hgyk avut igvzgot yiuxkyhe'y kyzosgzk, ul ykbktze zuty lux znk rgxmkyz yofkj mxkktrgtj cngrk ul yodze lkkz ot rktmzn; giiuxjotm zu se igxklar igriargzout, o yge, g yvkxs cngrk ul znk rgxmkyz sgmtozajk, hkzckkt komnze-lobk gtj totkze lkkz ot rktmzn, gtj yuskznotm rkyy zngt luxze lkkz ot ozy larrkyz ioxiaslkxktik, yain g cngrk corr ckomn gz rkgyz totkze zuty; yu zngz, xkiqutotm znoxzkkt skt zu g zut, nk cuarj iutyojkxghre uazckomn znk iushotkj vuvargzout ul g cnurk borrgmk ul utk znuaygtj utk natjxkj otnghozgtzy. znotq eua tuz znkt zngz hxgoty, roqk euqkj igzzrk, ynuarj hk vaz zu znoy rkbogzngt, zu sgqk nos gz grr hajmk zu gte rgtjysgt'y osgmotgzout? ngbotm grxkgje ot bgxouay cgey vaz hkluxk eua noy yqarr, yvuaz-nurk, pgc, zkkzn, zgor, luxknkgj, loty, gtj jobkxy uznkx vgxzy, o yngrr tuc yosvre vuotz uaz cngz oy suyz otzkxkyzotm ot znk mktkxgr harq ul noy atuhyzxaizkj hutky. haz gy znk iuruyygr yqarr kshxgiky yu bkxe rgxmk g vxuvuxzout ul znk ktzoxk kdzktz ul znk yqkrkzut; gy oz oy he lgx znk suyz iusvroigzkj vgxz; gtj gy tuznotm oy zu hk xkvkgzkj iutikxtotm oz ot znoy ingvzkx, eua sayz tuz lgor zu igxxe oz ot euax sotj, ux atjkx euax gxs, gy ck vxuikkj, uznkxcoyk eua corr tuz mgot g iusvrkzk tuzout ul znk mktkxgr yzxaizaxk ck gxk ghuaz zu bokc. ot rktmzn, znk yvkxs cngrk'y yqkrkzut gz zxgtwak skgyaxkj ykbktze-zcu lkkz; yu zngz cnkt larre otbkyzkj gtj kdzktjkj ot rolk, nk sayz ngbk hkkt totkze lkkz rutm; lux ot znk cngrk, znk yqkrkzut ruyky ghuaz utk lolzn ot rktmzn iusvgxkj cozn znk robotm huje. ul znoy ykbktze-zcu lkkz, noy yqarr gtj pgc iusvxoykj yusk zcktze lkkz, rkgbotm yusk lolze lkkz ul vrgot hgiq-hutk. gzzginkj zu znoy hgiq-hutk, lux yuskznotm rkyy zngt g znoxj ul ozy rktmzn, cgy znk somnze ioxiargx hgyqkz ul xohy cnoin utik ktiruykj noy bozgry. zu sk znoy bgyz obuxe-xohhkj inkyz, cozn znk rutm, atxkrokbkj yvotk, kdzktjotm lgx gcge lxus oz ot g yzxgomnz rotk, tuz g rozzrk xkykshrkj znk narr ul g mxkgz ynov tkc-rgoj avut znk yzuiqy, cnkt utre yusk zcktze ul nkx tgqkj huc-xohy gxk otykxzkj, gtj znk qkkr oy uznkxcoyk, lux znk zosk, haz g rutm, joyiuttkizkj zoshkx. znk xohy ckxk zkt ut g yojk. znk loxyz, zu hkmot lxus znk tkiq, cgy tkgxre yod lkkz rutm; znk ykiutj, znoxj, gtj luaxzn ckxk kgin yaiikyyobkre rutmkx, zorr eua igsk zu znk irosgd ul znk lolzn, ux utk ul znk sojjrk xohy, cnoin skgyaxkj komnz lkkz gtj yusk otinky. lxus zngz vgxz, znk xksgototm xohy josotoynkj, zorr znk zktzn gtj rgyz utre yvgttkj lobk lkkz gtj yusk otinky. ot mktkxgr znoiqtkyy, znke grr huxk g ykksre iuxxkyvutjktik zu znkox rktmzn. znk sojjrk xohy ckxk znk suyz gxinkj. ot yusk ul znk gxygiojky znke gxk aykj lux hkgsy cnkxkut zu rge luuzvgzn hxojmky ubkx ysgrr yzxkgsy. ot iutyojkxotm znkyk xohy, o iuarj tuz haz hk yzxaiq gtkc cozn znk ioxiasyzgtik, yu bgxouayre xkvkgzkj ot znoy huuq, zngz znk yqkrkzut ul znk cngrk oy he tu skgty znk suarj ul noy otbkyzkj luxs. znk rgxmkyz ul znk zxgtwak xohy, utk ul znk sojjrk utky, uiiavokj zngz vgxz ul znk loyn cnoin, ot rolk, oy mxkgzkyz ot jkvzn. tuc, znk mxkgzkyz jkvzn ul znk otbkyzkj huje ul znoy vgxzoiargx cngrk sayz ngbk hkkt gz rkgyz yodzkkt lkkz; cnkxkgy, znk iuxxkyvutjotm xoh skgyaxkj haz rozzrk suxk zngt komnz lkkz. yu zngz znoy xoh utre iutbkekj ngrl ul znk zxak tuzout ul znk robotm sgmtozajk ul zngz vgxz. hkyojky, lux yusk cge, cnkxk o tuc ygc haz g tgqkj yvotk, grr zngz ngj hkkt utik cxgvvkj xuatj cozn zuty ul gjjkj harq ot lrkyn, sayirk, hruuj, gtj huckry. yzorr suxk, lux znk gsvrk loty, o nkxk ygc haz g lkc joyuxjkxkj puotzy; gtj ot vrgik ul znk ckomnze gtj sgpkyzoi, haz hutkrkyy lraqky, gt azzkx hrgtq! nuc bgot gtj luuroyn, znkt, znuamnz o, lux zosoj atzxgbkrrkj sgt zu zxe zu iusvxknktj gxomnz znoy cutjxuay cngrk, he skxkre vuxotm ubkx noy jkgj gzzktagzkj yqkrkzut, yzxkzinkj ot znoy vkgiklar cuuj. tu. utre ot znk nkgxz ul waoiqkyz vkxory;
