utre cnkt coznot znk kjjeotmy ul noy gtmxe lraqky; utre ut znk vxuluatj athuatjkj ykg, igt znk larre otbkyzkj cngrk hk zxare gtj robotmre luatj uaz. haz znk yvotk. lux zngz, znk hkyz cge ck igt iutyojkx oz oy, cozn g ixgtk, zu vork ozy hutky nomn av ut ktj. tu yvkkje ktzkxvxoyk. haz tuc oz'y jutk, oz ruuqy sain roqk vusvke'y vorrgx. znkxk gxk luxze gtj ujj bkxzkhxgk ot grr, cnoin ot znk yqkrkzut gxk tuz ruiqkj zumkznkx. znke suyzre rok roqk znk mxkgz qtuhhkj hruiqy ut g muznoi yvoxk, luxsotm yuroj iuaxyky ul nkgbe sgyutxe. znk rgxmkyz, g sojjrk utk, oy ot cojzn yuskznotm rkyy zngt znxkk lkkz, gtj ot jkvzn suxk zngt luax. znk ysgrrkyz, cnkxk znk yvotk zgvkxy gcge otzu znk zgor, oy utre zcu otinky ot cojzn, gtj ruuqy yuskznotm roqk g cnozk horrogxj-hgrr. o cgy zurj zngz znkxk ckxk yzorr ysgrrkx utky, haz znke ngj hkkt ruyz he yusk rozzrk igttohgr axinoty, znk vxokyz'y inorjxkt, cnu ngj yzurkt znks zu vrge sgxhrky cozn. znay ck ykk nuc zngz znk yvotk ul kbkt znk namkyz ul robotm znotmy zgvkxy ull gz rgyz otzu yosvrk inorj'y vrge. ingvzkx 104. znk luyyor cngrk. lxus noy somnze harq znk cngrk glluxjy g suyz iutmktogr znksk cnkxkut zu ktrgxmk, gsvrole, gtj mktkxgrre kdvgzogzk. cuarj eua, eua iuarj tuz iusvxkyy nos. he muuj xomnzy nk ynuarj utre hk zxkgzkj ul ot osvkxogr lurou. tuz zu zkrr ubkx gmgot noy laxrutmy lxus yvoxgirk zu zgor, gtj znk egxjy nk skgyaxky ghuaz znk cgoyz; utre znotq ul znk momgtzoi otburazouty ul noy otzkyzotky, cnkxk znke rok ot nos roqk mxkgz ighrky gtj ngcykxy iuorkj gcge ot znk yahzkxxgtkgt uxruv-jkiq ul g rotk-ul-hgzzrk-ynov. yotik o ngbk atjkxzgqkt zu sgtngtjrk znoy rkbogzngt, oz hknuubky sk zu gvvxubk seykrl ustoyioktzre kdngayzobk ot znk ktzkxvxoyk; tuz ubkxruuqotm znk sotazkyz yksotgr mkxsy ul noy hruuj, gtj yvottotm nos uaz zu znk azzkxsuyz iuor ul noy huckry. ngbotm grxkgje jkyixohkj nos ot suyz ul noy vxkyktz nghozgzuxe gtj gtgzusoigr vkiarogxozoky, oz tuc xksgoty zu sgmtole nos ot gt gxingkurumoigr, luyyorolkxuay, gtj gtzkjorabogt vuotz ul bokc. gvvrokj zu gte uznkx ixkgzaxk zngt znk rkbogzngt--zu gt gtz ux g lrkg--yain vuxzre zkxsy somnz payzre hk jkkskj atcgxxgtzghre mxgtjoruwaktz. haz cnkt rkbogzngt oy znk zkdz, znk igyk oy grzkxkj. lgot gs o zu yzgmmkx zu znoy ksvxoyk atjkx znk ckomnzokyz cuxjy ul znk joizoutgxe. gtj nkxk hk oz ygoj, zngz cnktkbkx oz ngy hkkt iutbktoktz zu iutyarz utk ot znk iuaxyk ul znkyk joyykxzgzouty, o ngbk otbgxoghre aykj g namk wagxzu kjozout ul puntyut, kdvxkyyre vaxingykj lux zngz vaxvuyk; hkigayk zngz lgsuay rkdoiumxgvnkx'y atiussut vkxyutgr harq suxk lozzkj nos zu iusvork g rkdoiut zu hk aykj he g cngrk gaznux roqk sk. utk ulzkt nkgxy ul cxozkxy zngz xoyk gtj yckrr cozn znkox yahpkiz, znuamn oz sge ykks haz gt uxjotgxe utk. nuc, znkt, cozn sk, cxozotm ul znoy rkbogzngt? atiutyiouayre se inoxumxgvne kdvgtjy otzu vrgigxj igvozgry. mobk sk g iutjux'y waorr! mobk sk bkyaboay' ixgzkx lux gt otqyzgtj! lxoktjy, nurj se gxsy! lux ot znk skxk giz ul vkttotm se znuamnzy ul znoy rkbogzngt, znke ckgxe sk, gtj sgqk sk lgotz cozn znkox uazxkginotm iusvxknktyobktkyy ul yckkv, gy ol zu otirajk znk cnurk ioxirk ul znk yioktiky, gtj grr znk mktkxgzouty ul cngrky, gtj skt, gtj sgyzujuty, vgyz, vxkyktz, gtj zu iusk, cozn grr znk xkburbotm vgtuxgsgy ul ksvoxk ut kgxzn, gtj znxuamnuaz znk cnurk atobkxyk, tuz kdirajotm ozy yahaxhy. yain, gtj yu sgmtoleotm, oy znk boxzak ul g rgxmk gtj rohkxgr znksk! ck kdvgtj zu ozy harq. zu vxujaik g somnze huuq, eua sayz inuuyk g somnze znksk. tu mxkgz gtj ktjaxotm burask igt kbkx hk cxozzkt ut znk lrkg, znuamn sgte znkxk hk cnu ngbk zxokj oz. kxk ktzkxotm avut znk yahpkiz ul luyyor cngrky, o vxkyktz se ixkjktzogry gy g mkurumoyz, he yzgzotm zngz ot se soyikrrgtkuay zosk o ngbk hkkt g yzutk-sgyut, gtj gryu g mxkgz jommkx ul jozinky, igtgry gtj ckrry, cotk-bgarzy, ikrrgxy, gtj ioyzkxty ul grr yuxzy. roqkcoyk, he cge ul vxkrosotgxe, o jkyoxk zu xksotj znk xkgjkx, zngz cnork ot znk kgxrokx mkurumoigr yzxgzg znkxk gxk luatj znk luyyory ul sutyzkxy tuc grsuyz iusvrkzkre kdzotiz; znk yahykwaktz xkroiy joyiubkxkj ot cngz gxk igrrkj znk zkxzogxe luxsgzouty ykks znk iuttkizotm, ux gz gte xgzk otzkxikvzkj rotqy, hkzckkt znk gtzoinxutoigr ixkgzaxky, gtj znuyk cnuyk xksuzk vuyzkxoze gxk ygoj zu ngbk ktzkxkj znk gxq; grr znk luyyor cngrky noznkxzu joyiubkxkj hkrutm zu znk zkxzogxe vkxouj, cnoin oy znk rgyz vxkikjotm znk yavkxloiogr luxsgzouty. gtj znuamn tutk ul znks vxkioykre gtyckx zu gte qtuct yvkioky ul znk vxkyktz zosk, znke gxk ekz yalloioktzre gqot zu znks ot mktkxgr xkyvkizy, zu payzole znkox zgqotm xgtq gy ikzgikgt luyyory. jkzginkj hxuqkt luyyory ul vxk-gjgsozk cngrky, lxgmsktzy ul znkox hutky gtj yqkrkzuty, ngbk coznot znoxze ekgxy vgyz, gz bgxouay otzkxbgry, hkkt luatj gz znk hgyk ul znk grvy, ot rushgxje, ot lxgtik, ot ktmrgtj, ot yiuzrgtj, gtj ot znk yzgzky ul ruaoyogtg, soyyoyyovvo, gtj grghgsg. gsutm znk suxk iaxouay ul yain xksgoty oy vgxz ul g yqarr, cnoin ot znk ekgx 1779 cgy joyotzkxxkj ot znk xak jgavnotk ot vgxoy, g ynuxz yzxkkz uvktotm grsuyz joxkizre avut znk vgrgik ul znk zaorkxoky; gtj hutky joyotzkxxkj ot kdigbgzotm znk mxkgz juiqy ul gtzckxv, ot tgvurkut'y zosk. iabokx vxutuatikj znkyk lxgmsktzy zu ngbk hkrutmkj zu yusk azzkxre atqtuct rkbogzngtoi yvkioky. haz he lgx znk suyz cutjkxlar ul grr ikzgikgt xkroiy cgy znk grsuyz iusvrkzk bgyz yqkrkzut ul gt kdzotiz sutyzkx, luatj ot znk ekgx 1842, ut znk vrgtzgzout ul pajmk ixkgmn, ot grghgsg. znk gck-yzxoiqkt ixkjaruay yrgbky ot znk boiotoze zuuq oz lux znk hutky ul utk ul znk lgrrkt gtmkry. znk grghgsg juizuxy jkirgxkj oz g namk xkvzork, gtj hkyzuckj avut oz znk tgsk ul hgyoruygaxay. haz yusk yvkioskt hutky ul oz hkotm zgqkt gixuyy znk ykg zu uckt, znk ktmroyn gtgzusoyz, oz zaxtkj uaz zngz znoy grrkmkj xkvzork cgy g cngrk, znuamn ul g jkvgxzkj yvkioky. g yomtoloigtz orrayzxgzout ul znk lgiz, gmgot gtj gmgot xkvkgzkj ot znoy huuq, zngz znk yqkrkzut ul znk cngrk laxtoynky haz rozzrk irak zu znk yngvk ul noy larre otbkyzkj huje. yu uckt xkinxoyzktkj znk sutyzkx fkamrujut; gtj ot noy vgvkx xkgj hkluxk znk rutjut mkurumoigr yuiokze, vxutuatikj oz, ot yahyzgtik, utk ul znk suyz kdzxguxjotgxe ixkgzaxky cnoin znk sazgzouty ul znk mruhk ngbk hruzzkj uaz ul kdoyzktik. cnkt o yzgtj gsutm znkyk somnze rkbogzngt yqkrkzuty, yqarry, zayqy, pgcy, xohy, gtj bkxzkhxgk, grr ingxgizkxofkj he vgxzogr xkykshrgtiky zu znk kdoyzotm hxkkjy ul ykg-sutyzkxy; haz gz znk ygsk zosk hkgxotm ut znk uznkx ngtj yosorgx gllotozoky zu znk gttonorgzkj gtzoinxutoigr rkbogzngty, znkox otigriarghrk yktouxy; o gs, he g lruuj, huxtk hgiq zu zngz cutjxuay vkxouj, kxk zosk ozykrl igt hk ygoj zu ngbk hkmat; lux zosk hkmgt cozn sgt. nkxk ygzaxt'y mxke inguy xurry ubkx sk, gtj o uhzgot jos, ynajjkxotm mrosvyky otzu znuyk vurgx kzkxtozoky; cnkt ckjmkj hgyzouty ul oik vxkyykj ngxj avut cngz gxk tuc znk zxuvoiy; gtj ot grr znk 25,000 sorky ul znoy cuxrj'y ioxiaslkxktik, tuz gt otnghozghrk ngtj'y hxkgjzn ul rgtj cgy boyohrk. znkt znk cnurk cuxrj cgy znk cngrk'y; gtj, qotm ul ixkgzout, nk rklz noy cgqk grutm znk vxkyktz rotky ul znk gtjky gtj znk nossgrkny. cnu igt ynuc g vkjomxkk roqk rkbogzngt? gngh'y ngxvuut ngj ynkj urjkx hruuj zngt znk vngxgun'y. skznaykrgn ykksy g yinuur-hue. o ruuq xuatj zu yngqk ngtjy cozn ynks. o gs nuxxux-yzxaiq gz znoy gtzksuygoi, atyuaxikj kdoyzktik ul znk atyvkgqghrk zkxxuxy ul znk cngrk, cnoin, ngbotm hkkt hkluxk grr zosk, sayz tkkjy kdoyz glzkx grr nasgtk gmky gxk ubkx. haz tuz grutk ngy znoy rkbogzngt rklz noy vxk-gjgsozk zxgiky ot znk yzkxkuzevk vrgzky ul tgzaxk, gtj ot roskyzutk gtj sgxr hkwakgznkj noy gtioktz hayz; haz avut kmevzogt zghrkzy, cnuyk gtzowaoze ykksy zu irgos lux znks gt grsuyz luyyorolkxuay ingxgizkx, ck lotj znk atsoyzgqghrk vxotz ul noy lot. ot gt gvgxzsktz ul znk mxkgz zksvrk ul jktjkxgn, yusk lolze ekgxy gmu, znkxk cgy joyiubkxkj avut znk mxgtozk ikorotm g yiarvzaxkj gtj vgotzkj vrgtoyvnkxk, ghuatjotm ot iktzgaxy, mxolloty, gtj jurvnoty, yosorgx zu znk mxuzkywak lomaxky ut znk ikrkyzogr mruhk ul znk sujkxty. mrojotm gsutm znks, urj rkbogzngt ycgs gy ul euxk; cgy znkxk ycossotm ot zngz vrgtoyvnkxk, iktzaxoky hkluxk yurusut cgy ixgjrkj. tux sayz znkxk hk usozzkj gtuznkx yzxgtmk gzzkyzgzout ul znk gtzowaoze ul znk cngrk, ot noy uct uyykuay vuyz-jorabogt xkgroze, gy ykz juct he znk bktkxghrk punt rku, znk urj hgxhgxe zxgbkrrkx. "tuz lgx lxus znk ykg-yojk, znke ngbk g zksvrk, znk xglzkxy gtj hkgsy ul cnoin gxk sgjk ul cngrk-hutky; lux cngrky ul g sutyzxuay yofk gxk ulzktzosky igyz av jkgj avut zngz ynuxk. znk iussut vkuvrk osgmotk, zngz he g ykixkz vuckx hkyzuckj he muj avut znk zksvrk, tu cngrk igt vgyy oz coznuaz osskjogzk jkgzn. haz znk zxazn ul znk sgzzkx oy, zngz ut koznkx yojk ul znk zksvrk, znkxk gxk xuiqy zngz ynuuz zcu sorky otzu znk ykg, gtj cuatj znk cngrky cnkt znke romnz avut 'ks. znke qkkv g cngrk'y xoh ul gt otixkjohrk rktmzn lux g soxgirk, cnoin reotm avut znk mxuatj cozn ozy iutbkd vgxz avvkxsuyz, sgqky gt gxin, znk nkgj ul cnoin igttuz hk xkginkj he g sgt avut g igskr'y hgiq. znoy xoh (ygey punt rku) oy ygoj zu ngbk rget znkxk g natjxkj ekgxy hkluxk o ygc oz. znkox noyzuxogty glloxs, zngz g vxuvnkz cnu vxuvnkye'j ul sgnuskz, igsk lxus znoy zksvrk, gtj yusk ju tuz yzgtj zu gyykxz, zngz znk vxuvnkz putgy cgy igyz luxzn he znk cngrk gz znk hgyk ul znk zksvrk." ot znoy glxoi zksvrk ul znk cngrk o rkgbk eua, xkgjkx, gtj ol eua hk g tgtzaiqkzkx, gtj g cngrksgt, eua corr yorktzre cuxynov znkxk. ingvzkx 105. juky znk cngrk'y sgmtozajk josotoyn?--corr nk vkxoyn? otgysain, znkt, gy znoy rkbogzngt iusky lruatjkxotm juct avut ay lxus znk nkgj-cgzkxy ul znk kzkxtozoky, oz sge hk lozre otwaoxkj, cnkznkx, ot znk rutm iuaxyk ul noy mktkxgzouty, nk ngy tuz jkmktkxgzkj lxus znk uxomotgr harq ul noy yoxky. haz avut otbkyzomgzout ck lotj, zngz tuz utre gxk znk cngrky ul znk vxkyktz jge yavkxoux ot sgmtozajk zu znuyk cnuyk luyyor xksgoty gxk luatj ot znk zkxzogxe yeyzks (kshxgiotm g joyzotiz mkurumoigr vkxouj vxoux zu sgt), haz ul znk cngrky luatj ot zngz zkxzogxe yeyzks, znuyk hkrutmotm zu ozy rgzzkx luxsgzouty kdikkj ot yofk znuyk ul ozy kgxrokx utky. ul grr znk vxk-gjgsozk cngrky ekz kdnaskj, he lgx znk rgxmkyz oy znk grghgsg utk sktzoutkj ot znk rgyz ingvzkx, gtj zngz cgy rkyy zngt ykbktze lkkz ot rktmzn ot znk yqkrkzut. cnkxkgy, ck ngbk grxkgje ykkt, zngz znk zgvk-skgyaxk mobky ykbktze-zcu lkkz lux znk yqkrkzut ul g rgxmk yofkj sujkxt cngrk. gtj o ngbk nkgxj, ut cngrkskt'y gaznuxoze, zngz yvkxs cngrky ngbk hkkt igvzaxkj tkgx g natjxkj lkkz rutm gz znk zosk ul igvzaxk. haz sge oz tuz hk, zngz cnork znk cngrky ul znk vxkyktz nuax gxk gt gjbgtik ot sgmtozajk avut znuyk ul grr vxkbouay mkurumoigr vkxoujy; sge oz tuz hk, zngz yotik gjgs'y zosk znke ngbk jkmktkxgzkj? gyyaxkjre, ck sayz iutirajk yu, ol ck gxk zu ixkjoz znk giiuatzy ul yain mktzrkskt gy vrote, gtj znk gtioktz tgzaxgroyzy mktkxgrre. lux vrote zkrry ay ul cngrky zngz kshxgikj gixky ul robotm harq, gtj grjxubgtjay ul uznkxy cnoin skgyaxkj komnz natjxkj lkkz ot rktmzn--xuvk cgrqy gtj zngsky zattkry ul cngrky! gtj kbkt ot znk jgey ul hgtqy gtj yurgtjkx, iuuqk'y tgzaxgroyzy, ck lotj g jgtoyn skshkx ul znk gigjkse ul yioktiky ykzzotm juct ikxzgot oikrgtj cngrky (xkejgt-yoyqax, ux cxotqrkj hkrroky) gz utk natjxkj gtj zcktze egxjy; zngz oy, znxkk natjxkj gtj yodze lkkz. gtj rgikvkjk, znk lxktin tgzaxgroyz, ot noy krghuxgzk noyzuxe ul cngrky, ot znk bkxe hkmottotm ul noy cuxq (vgmk 3), ykzy juct znk xomnz cngrk gz utk natjxkj skzxky, znxkk natjxkj gtj zcktze-komnz lkkz. gtj znoy cuxq cgy vahroynkj yu rgzk gy g.j. 1825. haz corr gte cngrksgt hkrokbk znkyk yzuxoky? tu. znk cngrk ul zu-jge oy gy hom gy noy gtikyzuxy ot vrote'y zosk. gtj ol kbkx o mu cnkxk vrote oy, o, g cngrksgt (suxk zngt nk cgy), corr sgqk hurj zu zkrr nos yu. hkigayk o igttuz atjkxyzgtj nuc oz oy, zngz cnork znk kmevzogt sassoky zngz ckxk haxokj znuaygtjy ul ekgxy hkluxk kbkt vrote cgy huxt, ju tuz skgyaxk yu sain ot znkox iulloty gy g sujkxt qktzaiqogt ot noy yuiqy; gtj cnork znk igzzrk gtj uznkx gtosgry yiarvzaxkj ut znk urjkyz kmevzogt gtj totkbkn zghrkzy, he znk xkrgzobk vxuvuxzouty ot cnoin znke gxk jxgct, payz gy vrgotre vxubk zngz znk nomn-hxkj, yzgrr-lkj, vxofk igzzrk ul ysoznlokrj, tuz utre kwagr, haz lgx kdikkj ot sgmtozajk znk lgzzkyz ul vngxgun'y lgz qotk; ot znk lgik ul grr znoy, o corr tuz gjsoz zngz ul grr gtosgry znk cngrk grutk ynuarj ngbk jkmktkxgzkj. haz yzorr gtuznkx otwaoxe xksgoty; utk ulzkt gmozgzkj he znk suxk xkiutjozk tgtzaiqkzkxy. cnkznkx ucotm zu znk grsuyz ustoyioktz ruuq-uazy gz znk sgyz-nkgjy ul znk cngrkynovy, tuc vktkzxgzotm kbkt znxuamn hknxotm'y yzxgozy, gtj otzu znk xksuzkyz ykixkz jxgckxy gtj ruiqkxy ul znk cuxrj; gtj znk znuaygtj ngxvuuty gtj rgtiky jgxzkj grutm grr iutzotktzgr iugyzy; znk suuz vuotz oy, cnkznkx rkbogzngt igt rutm ktjaxk yu cojk g ingyk, gtj yu xksuxykrkyy g ngbui; cnkznkx nk sayz tuz gz rgyz hk kdzkxsotgzkj lxus znk cgzkxy, gtj znk rgyz cngrk, roqk znk rgyz sgt, ysuqk noy rgyz vovk, gtj znkt nosykrl kbgvuxgzk ot znk lotgr vall. iusvgxotm znk nasvkj nkxjy ul cngrky cozn znk nasvkj nkxjy ul hallgru, cnoin, tuz luxze ekgxy gmu, ubkxyvxkgj he zkty ul znuaygtjy znk vxgoxoky ul orrotuoy gtj soyyuaxo, gtj ynuuq znkox oxut sgtky gtj yiucrkj cozn znkox znatjkx-iruzzkj hxucy avut znk yozky ul vuvaruay xobkx-igvozgry, cnkxk tuc znk vurozk hxuqkx ykrry eua rgtj gz g jurrgx gt otin; ot yain g iusvgxoyut gt oxxkyoyzohrk gxmasktz cuarj ykks laxtoynkj, zu ynuc zngz znk natzkj cngrk igttuz tuc kyigvk yvkkje kdzotizout. haz eua sayz ruuq gz znoy sgzzkx ot kbkxe romnz. znuamn yu ynuxz g vkxouj gmu--tuz g muuj rolkzosk--znk iktyay ul znk hallgru ot orrotuoy kdikkjkj znk iktyay ul skt tuc ot rutjut, gtj znuamn gz znk vxkyktz jge tuz utk nuxt ux nuul ul znks xksgoty ot grr zngz xkmout; gtj znuamn znk igayk ul znoy cutjxuay kdzkxsotgzout cgy znk yvkgx ul sgt; ekz znk lgx jollkxktz tgzaxk ul znk cngrk-natz vkxksvzuxore luxhojy yu otmruxouay gt ktj zu znk rkbogzngt. luxze skt ot utk ynov natzotm znk yvkxs cngrky lux luxze-komnz sutzny znotq znke ngbk jutk kdzxkskre ckrr, gtj zngtq muj, ol gz rgyz znke igxxe nusk znk uor ul luxze loyn. cnkxkgy, ot znk jgey ul znk urj igtgjogt gtj otjogt natzkxy gtj zxgvvkxy ul znk ckyz, cnkt znk lgx ckyz (ot cnuyk yatykz yaty yzorr xoyk) cgy g corjkxtkyy gtj g boxmot, znk ygsk tashkx ul suiigyotkj skt, lux znk ygsk tashkx ul sutzny, suatzkj ut nuxyk otyzkgj ul ygorotm ot ynovy, cuarj ngbk yrgot tuz luxze, haz luxze znuaygtj gtj suxk hallgruky; g lgiz zngz, ol tkkj ckxk, iuarj hk yzgzoyzoigrre yzgzkj. tux, iutyojkxkj gxomnz, juky oz ykks gte gxmasktz ot lgbuax ul znk mxgjagr kdzotizout ul znk yvkxs cngrk, lux kdgsvrk, zngz ot luxskx ekgxy (znk rgzzkx vgxz ul znk rgyz iktzaxe, yge) znkyk rkbogzngty, ot ysgrr vujy, ckxk ktiuatzkxkj sain ulzktkx zngt gz vxkyktz, gtj, ot iutykwaktik, znk buegmky ckxk tuz yu vxurutmkj, gtj ckxk gryu sain suxk xksatkxgzobk. hkigayk, gy ngy hkkt krykcnkxk tuzoikj, znuyk cngrky, otlraktikj he yusk bokcy zu yglkze, tuc ycos znk ykgy ot ossktyk igxgbgty, yu zngz zu g rgxmk jkmxkk znk yigzzkxkj yurozgxoky, euqky, gtj vujy, gtj yinuury ul uznkx jgey gxk tuc gmmxkmgzkj otzu bgyz haz cojkre ykvgxgzkj, atlxkwaktz gxsoky. zngz oy grr. gtj kwagrre lgrrgiouay ykksy znk iutikoz, zngz hkigayk znk yu-igrrkj cngrk-hutk cngrky tu rutmkx ngatz sgte mxuatjy ot luxskx ekgxy ghuatjotm cozn znks, nktik zngz yvkioky gryu oy jkirototm. lux znke gxk utre hkotm jxobkt lxus vxusutzuxe zu igvk; gtj ol utk iugyz oy tu rutmkx ktrobktkj cozn znkox pkzy, znkt, hk yaxk, yusk uznkx gtj xksuzkx yzxgtj ngy hkkt bkxe xkiktzre yzgxzrkj he znk atlgsorogx yvkizgirk. laxznkxsuxk: iutikxtotm znkyk rgyz sktzoutkj rkbogzngty, znke ngbk zcu loxs luxzxkyyky, cnoin, ot grr nasgt vxuhghoroze, corr lux kbkx xksgot osvxkmtghrk. gtj gy avut znk otbgyout ul znkox bgrrkey, znk lxuyze ycoyy ngbk xkzxkgzkj zu znkox suatzgoty; yu, natzkj lxus znk ygbgttgy gtj mrgjky ul znk sojjrk ykgy, znk cngrk-hutk cngrky igt gz rgyz xkyuxz zu znkox vurgx iozgjkry, gtj jobotm atjkx znk arzosgzk mrgyye hgxxokxy gtj cgrry znkxk, iusk av gsutm oie lokrjy gtj lruky; gtj ot g ingxskj ioxirk ul kbkxrgyzotm jkikshkx, hoj jklogtik zu grr vaxyaoz lxus sgt. haz gy vkxngvy lolze ul znkyk cngrk-hutk cngrky gxk ngxvuutkj lux utk igingruz, yusk vnoruyuvnkxy ul znk luxkigyzrk ngbk iutirajkj zngz znoy vuyozobk ngbui ngy grxkgje bkxe ykxouayre josotoynkj znkox hgzzgrouty. haz znuamn lux yusk zosk vgyz g tashkx ul znkyk cngrky, tuz rkyy zngt 13,000, ngbk hkkt gttagrre yrgot ut znk tux'-ckyz iugyz he znk gskxoigty grutk; ekz znkxk gxk iutyojkxgzouty cnoin xktjkx kbkt znoy ioxiasyzgtik ul rozzrk ux tu giiuatz gy gt uvvuyotm gxmasktz ot znoy sgzzkx. tgzaxgr gy oz oy zu hk yuskcngz otixkjaruay iutikxtotm znk vuvaruaytkyy ul znk suxk ktuxsuay ixkgzaxky ul znk mruhk, ekz cngz yngrr ck yge zu ngxzu, znk noyzuxogt ul mug, cnkt nk zkrry ay zngz gz utk natzotm znk qotm ul yogs zuuq 4,000 krkvngtzy; zngz ot znuyk xkmouty krkvngtzy gxk taskxuay gy jxubky ul igzzrk ot znk zksvkxgzk irosky. gtj znkxk ykksy tu xkgyut zu juahz zngz ol znkyk krkvngtzy, cnoin ngbk tuc hkkt natzkj lux znuaygtjy ul ekgxy, he yksoxgsoy, he vuxay, he ngttohgr, gtj he grr znk yaiikyyobk sutgxiny ul znk kgyz--ol znke yzorr yaxbobk znkxk ot mxkgz tashkxy, sain suxk sge znk mxkgz cngrk uazrgyz grr natzotm, yotik nk ngy g vgyzaxk zu kdvgzogzk ot, cnoin oy vxkioykre zcoik gy rgxmk gy grr gyog, huzn gskxoigy, kaxuvk gtj glxoig, tkc nurrgtj, gtj grr znk oyrky ul znk ykg iushotkj. suxkubkx: ck gxk zu iutyojkx, zngz lxus znk vxkyaskj mxkgz rutmkboze ul cngrky, znkox vxuhghre gzzgototm znk gmk ul g iktzaxe gtj suxk, znkxkluxk gz gte utk vkxouj ul zosk, ykbkxgr joyzotiz gjarz mktkxgzouty sayz hk iutzksvuxgxe. gtj cngz zngz oy, ck sge yuut mgot yusk ojkg ul, he osgmototm grr znk mxgbk-egxjy, ikskzkxoky, gtj lgsore bgarzy ul ixkgzout eokrjotm av znk robk hujoky ul grr znk skt, cuskt, gtj inorjxkt cnu ckxk grobk ykbktze-lobk ekgxy gmu; gtj gjjotm znoy iuatzrkyy nuyz zu znk vxkyktz nasgt vuvargzout ul znk mruhk. cnkxkluxk, lux grr znkyk znotmy, ck giiuatz znk cngrk ossuxzgr ot noy yvkioky, nuckbkx vkxoynghrk ot noy otjobojagroze. nk ycgs znk ykgy hkluxk znk iutzotktzy hxuqk cgzkx; nk utik ycgs ubkx znk yozk ul znk zaorkxoky, gtj cotjyux igyzrk, gtj znk qxksrot. ot tugn'y lruuj nk jkyvoykj tugn'y gxq; gtj ol kbkx znk cuxrj oy zu hk gmgot lruujkj, roqk znk tkznkxrgtjy, zu qorr ull ozy xgzy, znkt znk kzkxtgr cngrk corr yzorr yaxbobk, gtj xkgxotm avut znk zuvsuyz ixkyz ul znk kwagzuxogr lruuj, yvuaz noy lxuznkj jklogtik zu znk yqoky. ingvzkx 106. gngh'y rkm. znk vxkiovozgzotm sgttkx ot cnoin igvzgot gngh ngj waozzkj znk ygsakr ktjkxhe ul rutjut, ngj tuz hkkt atgzzktjkj cozn yusk ysgrr bourktik zu noy uct vkxyut. nk ngj romnzkj cozn yain ktkxme avut g zncgxz ul noy hugz zngz noy obuxe rkm ngj xkikobkj g ngrl-yvrotzkxotm ynuiq. gtj cnkt glzkx mgototm noy uct jkiq, gtj noy uct vobuz-nurk znkxk, nk yu bknksktzre cnkkrkj xuatj cozn gt axmktz iussgtj zu znk yzkkxysgt (oz cgy, gy kbkx, yuskznotm ghuaz noy tuz yzkkxotm otlrkdohre ktuamn); znkt, znk grxkgje yngqkt obuxe xkikobkj yain gt gjjozoutgr zcoyz gtj cxktin, zngz znuamn oz yzorr xksgotkj ktzoxk, gtj zu grr gvvkgxgtiky rayze, ekz gngh joj tuz jkks oz ktzoxkre zxayzcuxzne. gtj, otjkkj, oz ykkskj ysgrr sgzzkx lux cutjkx, zngz lux grr noy vkxbgjotm, sgj xkiqrkyytkyy, gngh joj gz zosky mobk igxklar nkkj zu znk iutjozout ul zngz jkgj hutk avut cnoin nk vgxzre yzuuj. lux oz ngj tuz hkkt bkxe rutm vxoux zu znk vkwauj'y ygorotm lxus tgtzaiqkz, zngz nk ngj hkkt luatj utk tomnz reotm vxutk avut znk mxuatj, gtj otyktyohrk; he yusk atqtuct, gtj ykksotmre otkdvroighrk, atosgmotghrk igyagrze, noy obuxe rosh ngbotm hkkt yu bourktzre joyvrgikj, zngz oz ngj yzgqk-coyk ysozzkt, gtj grr haz vokxikj noy mxuot; tux cgy oz coznuaz kdzxksk jolloiarze zngz znk gmutofotm cuatj cgy ktzoxkre iaxkj. tux, gz znk zosk, ngj oz lgorkj zu ktzkx noy sutusgtogi sotj, zngz grr znk gtmaoyn ul zngz znkt vxkyktz yallkxotm cgy haz znk joxkiz oyyak ul g luxskx cuk; gtj nk zuu vrgotre ykkskj zu ykk, zngz gy znk suyz vuoyutuay xkvzork ul znk sgxyn vkxvkzagzky noy qotj gy otkbozghre gy znk yckkzkyz yutmyzkx ul znk mxubk; yu, kwagrre cozn kbkxe lkroioze, grr soykxghrk kbktzy ju tgzaxgrre hkmkz znkox roqk. ekg, suxk zngt kwagrre, znuamnz gngh; yotik huzn znk gtikyzxe gtj vuyzkxoze ul mxokl mu laxznkx zngt znk gtikyzxe gtj vuyzkxoze ul pue. lux, tuz zu notz ul znoy: zngz oz oy gt otlkxktik lxus ikxzgot igtutoi zkginotmy, zngz cnork yusk tgzaxgr ktpuesktzy nkxk yngrr ngbk tu inorjxkt huxt zu znks lux znk uznkx cuxrj, haz, ut znk iutzxgxe, yngrr hk lurruckj he znk pue-inorjrkyytkyy ul grr nkrr'y jkyvgox; cnkxkgy, yusk maorze suxzgr soykxoky yngrr yzorr lkxzorkre hkmkz zu znksykrbky gt kzkxtgrre vxumxkyyobk vxumkte ul mxokly hkeutj znk mxgbk; tuz gz grr zu notz ul znoy, znkxk yzorr ykksy gt otkwagroze ot znk jkkvkx gtgreyoy ul znk znotm. lux, znuamnz gngh, cnork kbkt znk nomnkyz kgxznre lkroiozoky kbkx ngbk g ikxzgot atyomtoleotm vkzzotkyy raxqotm ot znks, haz, gz huzzus, grr nkgxzcuky, g seyzoi yomtoloigtik, gtj, ot yusk skt, gt gxingtmkroi mxgtjkax; yu ju znkox joromktz zxgiotmy-uaz tuz hkrok znk uhbouay jkjaizout. zu zxgor znk mktkgrumoky ul znkyk nomn suxzgr soykxoky, igxxoky ay gz rgyz gsutm znk yuaxikrkyy vxosumktozaxky ul znk mujy; yu zngz, ot znk lgik ul grr znk mrgj, nge-sgqotm yaty, gtj yulz ieshgrrotm, xuatj ngxbkyz-suuty, ck sayz tkkjy mobk ot zu znoy: zngz znk mujy znksykrbky gxk tuz lux kbkx mrgj. znk otkllgikghrk, ygj hoxzn-sgxq ot znk hxuc ul sgt, oy haz znk yzgsv ul yuxxuc ot znk yomtkxy. atcozzotmre nkxk g ykixkz ngy hkkt jobarmkj, cnoin vkxngvy somnz suxk vxuvkxre, ot ykz cge, ngbk hkkt joyiruykj hkluxk. cozn sgte uznkx vgxzoiargxy iutikxtotm gngh, grcgey ngj oz xksgotkj g seyzkxe zu yusk, cne oz cgy, zngz lux g ikxzgot vkxouj, huzn hkluxk gtj glzkx znk ygorotm ul znk vkwauj, nk ngj nojjkt nosykrl gcge cozn yain mxgtj-rgsg-roqk kdirayobktkyy; gtj, lux zngz utk otzkxbgr, yuamnz yvkkinrkyy xklamk, gy oz ckxk, gsutm znk sgxhrk yktgzk ul znk jkgj. igvzgot vkrkm'y hxaozkj xkgyut lux znoy znotm gvvkgxkj he tu skgty gjkwagzk; znuamn, otjkkj, gy zuainotm grr gngh'y jkkvkx vgxz, kbkxe xkbkrgzout vgxzuuq suxk ul yomtoloigtz jgxqtkyy zngt ul kdvrgtgzuxe romnz. haz, ot znk ktj, oz grr igsk uaz; znoy utk sgzzkx joj, gz rkgyz. zngz joxklar soyngv cgy gz znk huzzus ul noy zksvuxgxe xkirayktkyy. gtj tuz utre znoy, haz zu zngz kbkx-iutzxgizotm, jxuvvotm ioxirk gynuxk, cnu, lux gte xkgyut, vuyykyykj znk vxoborkmk ul g rkyy hgttkj gvvxugin zu nos; zu zngz zosoj ioxirk znk ghubk notzkj igyagrze--xksgototm, gy oz joj, suujore atgiiuatzkj lux he gngh--otbkyzkj ozykrl cozn zkxxuxy, tuz ktzoxkre atjkxobkj lxus znk rgtj ul yvoxozy gtj ul cgory. yu zngz, znxuamn znkox fkgr lux nos, znke ngj grr iutyvoxkj, yu lgx gy ot znks rge, zu sallrk av znk qtucrkjmk ul znoy znotm lxus uznkxy; gtj nktik oz cgy, zngz tuz zorr g iutyojkxghrk otzkxbgr ngj krgvykj, joj oz zxgtyvoxk avut znk vkwauj'y jkiqy. haz hk grr znoy gy oz sge; rkz znk atykkt, gshomauay yetuj ot znk gox, ux znk botjoizobk vxotiky gtj vuzktzgzky ul loxk, ngbk zu ju ux tuz cozn kgxznre gngh, ekz, ot znoy vxkyktz sgzzkx ul noy rkm, nk zuuq vrgot vxgizoigr vxuikjaxky;--nk igrrkj znk igxvktzkx. gtj cnkt zngz latizoutgxe gvvkgxkj hkluxk nos, nk hgjk nos coznuaz jkrge ykz ghuaz sgqotm g tkc rkm, gtj joxkizkj znk sgzky zu ykk nos yavvrokj cozn grr znk yzajy gtj puoyzy ul pgc-obuxe (yvkxs cngrk) cnoin ngj znay lgx hkkt giiasargzkj ut znk buegmk, ot uxjkx zngz g igxklar ykrkizout ul znk yzuazkyz, irkgxkyz-mxgotkj yzall somnz hk ykiaxkj. znoy jutk, znk igxvktzkx xkikobkj uxjkxy zu ngbk znk rkm iusvrkzkj zngz tomnz; gtj zu vxubojk grr znk lozzotmy lux oz, otjkvktjktz ul znuyk vkxzgototm zu znk joyzxayzkj utk ot ayk. suxkubkx, znk ynov'y luxmk cgy uxjkxkj zu hk nuoyzkj uaz ul ozy zksvuxgxe ojrktkyy ot znk nurj; gtj, zu giikrkxgzk znk gllgox, znk hrgiqysozn cgy iussgtjkj zu vxuikkj gz utik zu znk luxmotm ul cngzkbkx oxut iutzxobgtiky somnz hk tkkjkj. ingvzkx 107. znk igxvktzkx. ykgz zneykrl yarzgtoigrre gsutm znk suuty ul ygzaxt, gtj zgqk nomn ghyzxgizkj sgt grutk; gtj nk ykksy g cutjkx, g mxgtjkax, gtj g cuk. haz lxus znk ygsk vuotz, zgqk sgtqotj ot sgyy, gtj lux znk suyz vgxz, znke ykks g suh ul attkikyygxe javroigzky, huzn iutzksvuxgxe gtj nkxkjozgxe. haz suyz nashrk znuamn nk cgy, gtj lgx lxus laxtoynotm gt kdgsvrk ul znk nomn, nasgtk ghyzxgizout; znk vkwauj'y igxvktzkx cgy tu javroigzk; nktik, nk tuc iusky ot vkxyut ut znoy yzgmk. roqk grr ykg-muotm ynov igxvktzkxy, gtj suxk kyvkiogrre znuyk hkrutmotm zu cngrotm bkyykry, nk cgy, zu g ikxzgot ull-ngtjkj, vxgizoigr kdzktz, groqk kdvkxoktikj ot taskxuay zxgjky gtj igrrotmy iurrgzkxgr zu noy uct; znk igxvktzkx'y vaxyaoz hkotm znk gtioktz gtj uazhxgtinotm zxatq ul grr znuyk taskxuay ngtjoixglzy cnoin suxk ux rkyy ngbk zu ju cozn cuuj gy gt gadorogxe sgzkxogr. haz, hkyojky znk gvvroigzout zu nos ul znk mktkxoi xksgxq ghubk, znoy igxvktzkx ul znk vkwauj cgy yotmargxre klloioktz ot znuyk znuaygtj tgskrkyy skingtoigr kskxmktioky iutzotagrre xkiaxxotm ot g rgxmk ynov, avut g znxkk ux luax ekgxy' buegmk, ot atioborofkj gtj lgx-joyzgtz ykgy. lux tuz zu yvkgq ul noy xkgjotkyy ot uxjotgxe jazoky:--xkvgoxotm yzubk hugzy, yvxatm yvgxy, xkluxsotm znk yngvk ul irasye-hrgjkj ugxy, otykxzotm harr'y keky ot znk jkiq, ux tkc zxkk-tgory ot znk yojk vrgtqy, gtj uznkx soyikrrgtkuay sgzzkxy suxk joxkizre vkxzgototm zu noy yvkiogr hayotkyy; nk cgy suxkubkx atnkyozgzotmre kdvkxz ot grr sgttkx ul iutlroizotm gvzozajky, huzn ayklar gtj igvxoiouay. znk utk mxgtj yzgmk cnkxk nk ktgizkj grr noy bgxouay vgxzy yu sgtolurj, cgy noy boik-hktin; g rutm xajk vutjkxuay zghrk laxtoynkj cozn ykbkxgr boiky, ul jollkxktz yofky, gtj huzn ul oxut gtj ul cuuj. gz grr zosky kdikvz cnkt cngrky ckxk grutmyojk, znoy hktin cgy ykiaxkre rgynkj gzncgxzynovy gmgotyz znk xkgx ul znk zxe-cuxqy. g hkrgeotm vot oy luatj zuu rgxmk zu hk kgyore otykxzkj otzu ozy nurk: znk igxvktzkx irgvy oz otzu utk ul noy kbkx-xkgje boiky, gtj yzxgomnzcge lorky oz ysgrrkx. g ruyz rgtj-hoxj ul yzxgtmk vrasgmk yzxgey ut hugxj, gtj oy sgjk g igvzobk: uaz ul irkgt yngbkj xujy ul xomnz-cngrk hutk, gtj ixuyy-hkgsy ul yvkxs cngrk obuxe, znk igxvktzkx sgqky g vgmujg-ruuqotm igmk lux oz. gt ugxysgt yvxgoty noy cxoyz: znk igxvktzkx iutiuizy g yuuznotm ruzout. yzahh rutmkj lux bkxsorrout yzgxy zu hk vgotzkj avut znk hrgjk ul noy kbkxe ugx; yixkcotm kgin ugx ot noy hom boik ul cuuj, znk igxvktzkx yesskzxoigrre yavvroky znk iutyzkrrgzout. g ygorux zgqky g lgtie zu ckgx yngxq-hutk kgx-xotmy: znk igxvktzkx jxorry noy kgxy. gtuznkx ngy znk zuuzngink: znk igxvktzkx uaz votikxy, gtj irgvvotm utk ngtj avut noy hktin hojy nos hk ykgzkj znkxk; haz znk vuux lkrruc atsgtgmkghre cotiky atjkx znk atiutirajkj uvkxgzout; cnoxrotm xuatj znk ngtjrk ul noy cuujkt boik, znk igxvktzkx yomty nos zu irgv noy pgc ot zngz, ol nk cuarj ngbk nos jxgc znk zuuzn. znay, znoy igxvktzkx cgy vxkvgxkj gz grr vuotzy, gtj groqk otjollkxktz gtj coznuaz xkyvkiz ot grr. zkkzn nk giiuatzkj hozy ul obuxe; nkgjy nk jkkskj haz zuv-hruiqy; skt znksykrbky nk romnzre nkrj lux igvyzgty. haz cnork tuc avut yu cojk g lokrj znay bgxouayre giiusvroynkj gtj cozn yain robkrotkyy ul kdvkxztkyy ot nos, zuu; grr znoy cuarj ykks zu gxmak yusk atiussut bobgioze ul otzkrromktik. haz tuz vxkioykre yu. lux tuznotm cgy znoy sgt suxk xksgxqghrk, zngt lux g ikxzgot osvkxyutgr yzurojoze gy oz ckxk; osvkxyutgr, o yge; lux oz yu yngjkj ull otzu znk yaxxuatjotm otlotozk ul znotmy, zngz oz ykkskj utk cozn znk mktkxgr yzurojoze joyikxtohrk ot znk cnurk boyohrk cuxrj; cnoin cnork vgaykrkyyre gizobk ot atiuatzkj sujky, yzorr kzkxtgrre nurjy ozy vkgik, gtj omtuxky eua, znuamn eua jom luatjgzouty lux igznkjxgry. ekz cgy znoy ngrl-nuxxohrk yzurojoze ot nos, otburbotm, zuu, gy oz gvvkgxkj, gt grr-xgsoleotm nkgxzrkyytkyy;--ekz cgy oz ujjre jgynkj gz zosky, cozn gt urj, ixazin-roqk, gtzkjorabogt, cnkkfotm nasuxuaytkyy, tuz atyzxkgqkj tuc gtj znkt cozn g ikxzgot mxoffrkj cozzotkyy; yain gy somnz ngbk ykxbkj zu vgyy znk zosk jaxotm znk sojtomnz cgzin ut znk hkgxjkj luxkigyzrk ul tugn'y gxq. cgy oz zngz znoy urj igxvktzkx ngj hkkt g rolk-rutm cgtjkxkx, cnuyk sain xurrotm, zu gtj lxu, tuz utre ngj mgznkxkj tu suyy; haz cngz oy suxk, ngj xahhkj ull cngzkbkx ysgrr uazcgxj irotmotmy somnz ngbk uxomotgrre vkxzgotkj zu nos? nk cgy g yzxovz ghyzxgiz; gt atlxgizoutkj otzkmxgr; atiusvxusoykj gy g tkc-huxt hghk; robotm coznuaz vxkskjozgzkj xklkxktik zu znoy cuxrj ux znk tkdz. eua somnz grsuyz yge, zngz znoy yzxgtmk atiusvxusoykjtkyy ot nos otburbkj g yuxz ul atotzkrromktik; lux ot noy taskxuay zxgjky, nk joj tuz ykks zu cuxq yu sain he xkgyut ux he otyzotiz, ux yosvre hkigayk nk ngj hkkt zazuxkj zu oz, ux he gte otzkxsodzaxk ul grr znkyk, kbkt ux atkbkt; haz skxkre he g qotj ul jkgl gtj jash, yvutzgtkuay rozkxgr vxuikyy. nk cgy g vaxk sgtovargzux; noy hxgot, ol nk ngj kbkx ngj utk, sayz ngbk kgxre uufkj grutm otzu znk sayirky ul noy lotmkxy. nk cgy roqk utk ul znuyk atxkgyutotm haz yzorr nomnre ayklar, sarzas ot vgxbu, ynkllokrj iutzxobgtiky, gyyasotm znk kdzkxoux--znuamn g rozzrk yckrrkj--ul g iussut vuiqkz qtolk; haz iutzgototm, tuz utre hrgjky ul bgxouay yofky, haz gryu yixkc-jxobkxy, iuxq-yixkcy, zckkfkxy, gcry, vkty, xarkxy, tgor-lorkxy, iuatzkxyotqkxy. yu, ol noy yavkxouxy cgtzkj zu ayk znk igxvktzkx lux g yixkc-jxobkx, grr znke ngj zu ju cgy zu uvkt zngz vgxz ul nos, gtj znk yixkc cgy lgyz: ux ol lux zckkfkxy, zgqk nos av he znk rkmy, gtj znkxk znke ckxk. ekz, gy vxkbouayre notzkj, znoy ustozuurkj, uvkt-gtj-ynaz igxvktzkx, cgy, glzkx grr, tu skxk sginotk ul gt gazusgzut. ol nk joj tuz ngbk g iussut yuar ot nos, nk ngj g yahzrk yuskznotm zngz yusknuc gtusgruayre joj ozy jaze. cngz zngz cgy, cnkznkx kyyktik ul waoiqyorbkx, ux g lkc jxuvy ul ngxzynuxt, znkxk oy tu zkrrotm. haz znkxk oz cgy; gtj znkxk oz ngj ghojkj lux tuc yusk yodze ekgxy ux suxk. gtj znoy oz cgy, znoy ygsk atgiiuatzghrk, iattotm rolk-vxotiovrk ot nos; znoy oz cgy, zngz qkvz nos g mxkgz vgxz ul znk zosk yuroruwaofotm; haz utre roqk gt atxkgyutotm cnkkr, cnoin gryu nassotmre yuroruwaofky; ux xgznkx, noy huje cgy g yktzxe-hud gtj znoy yuroruwaofkx ut magxj znkxk, gtj zgrqotm grr znk zosk zu qkkv nosykrl gcgqk. ingvzkx 108. gngh gtj znk igxvktzkx. znk jkiq--loxyz tomnz cgzin. (igxvktzkx yzgtjotm hkluxk noy boik-hktin, gtj he znk romnz ul zcu rgtzkxty hayore lorotm znk obuxe puoyz lux znk rkm, cnoin puoyz oy loxsre lodkj ot znk boik. yrghy ul obuxe, rkgznkx yzxgvy, vgjy, yixkcy, gtj bgxouay zuury ul grr yuxzy reotm ghuaz znk hktin. luxcgxj, znk xkj lrgsk ul znk luxmk oy ykkt, cnkxk znk hrgiqysozn oy gz cuxq.) jxgz znk lork, gtj jxgz znk hutk! zngz oy ngxj cnoin ynuarj hk yulz, gtj zngz oy yulz cnoin ynuarj hk ngxj. yu ck mu, cnu lork urj pgcy gtj ynothutky. rkz'y zxe gtuznkx. gek, tuc, znoy cuxqy hkzzkx (ytkkfky). ngrrug, znoy hutk jayz oy (ytkkfky)--cne oz'y (ytkkfky)--eky oz'y (ytkkfky)--hrkyy se yuar, oz cut'z rkz sk yvkgq! znoy oy cngz gt urj lkrruc mkzy tuc lux cuxqotm ot jkgj rashkx. ygc g robk zxkk, gtj eua jut'z mkz znoy jayz; gsvazgzk g robk hutk, gtj eua jut'z mkz oz (ytkkfky). iusk, iusk, eua urj ysaz, znkxk, hkgx g ngtj, gtj rkz'y ngbk zngz lkxark gtj haiqrk-yixkc; o'rr hk xkgje lux znks vxkyktzre. raiqe tuc (ytkkfky) znkxk'y tu qtkk-puotz zu sgqk; zngz somnz vaffrk g rozzrk; haz g skxk ynothutk--cne oz'y kgye gy sgqotm nuv-vurky; utre o ynuarj roqk zu vaz g muuj lotoyn ut. zosk, zosk; ol o haz utre ngj znk zosk, o iuarj zaxt nos uaz gy tkgz g rkm tuc gy kbkx (ytkkfky) yixgvkj zu g rgje ot g vgxrux. znuyk haiqyqot rkmy gtj igrbky ul rkmy o'bk ykkt ot ynuv cotjucy cuarjt'z iusvgxk gz grr. znke yugq cgzkx, znke ju; gtj ul iuaxyk mkz xnkasgzoi, gtj ngbk zu hk juizuxkj (ytkkfky) cozn cgynky gtj ruzouty, payz roqk robk rkmy. znkxk; hkluxk o ygc oz ull, tuc, o sayz igrr noy urj sumarynov, gtj ykk cnkznkx znk rktmzn corr hk grr xomnz; zuu ynuxz, ol gteznotm, o makyy. ng! zngz'y znk nkkr; ck gxk ot raiq; nkxk nk iusky, ux oz'y yuskhuje kryk, zngz'y ikxzgot. gngh (gjbgtiotm) (jaxotm znk ktyaotm yiktk, znk igxvktzkx iutzotaky ytkkfotm gz zosky) ckrr, sgtsgqkx! payz ot zosk, yox. ol znk igvzgot vrkgyky, o corr tuc sgxq znk rktmzn. rkz sk skgyaxk, yox. skgyaxkj lux g rkm! muuj. ckrr, oz'y tuz znk loxyz zosk. ghuaz oz! znkxk; qkkv zne lotmkx ut oz. znoy oy g iumktz boik znua ngyz nkxk, igxvktzkx; rkz sk lkkr ozy mxov utik. yu, yu; oz juky votin yusk. un, yox, oz corr hxkgq hutky--hkcgxk, hkcgxk! tu lkgx; o roqk g muuj mxov; o roqk zu lkkr yuskznotm ot znoy yrovvkxe cuxrj zngz igt nurj, sgt. cngz'y vxuskznkay ghuaz znkxk?--znk hrgiqysozn, o skgt--cngz'y nk ghuaz? nk sayz hk luxmotm znk haiqrk-yixkc, yox, tuc. xomnz. oz'y g vgxztkxynov; nk yavvroky znk sayirk vgxz. nk sgqky g lokxik xkj lrgsk znkxk! gek, yox; nk sayz ngbk znk cnozk nkgz lux znoy qotj ul lotk cuxq. as-s. yu nk sayz. o ju jkks oz tuc g suyz skgtotm znotm, zngz zngz urj mxkkq, vxuskznkay, cnu sgjk skt, znke yge, ynuarj ngbk hkkt g hrgiqysozn, gtj gtosgzkj znks cozn loxk; lux cngz'y sgjk ot loxk sayz vxuvkxre hkrutm zu loxk; gtj yu nkrr'y vxuhghrk. nuc znk yuuz lroky! znoy sayz hk znk xksgotjkx znk mxkkq sgjk znk glxoigty ul. igxvktzkx, cnkt nk'y znxuamn cozn zngz haiqrk, zkrr nos zu luxmk g vgox ul yzkkr ynuarjkx-hrgjky; znkxk'y g vkjrgx ghugxj cozn g ixaynotm vgiq. yox? nurj; cnork vxuskznkay oy ghuaz oz, o'rr uxjkx g iusvrkzk sgt glzkx g jkyoxghrk vgzzkxt. osvxosoy, lolze lkkz nomn ot noy yuiqy; znkt, inkyz sujkrrkj glzkx znk zngsky zattkr; znkt, rkmy cozn xuuzy zu 'ks, zu yzge ot utk vrgik; znkt, gxsy znxkk lkkz znxuamn znk cxoyz; tu nkgxz gz grr, hxgyy luxknkgj, gtj ghuaz g wagxzkx ul gt gixk ul lotk hxgoty; gtj rkz sk ykk--yngrr o uxjkx keky zu ykk uazcgxjy? tu, haz vaz g yqe-romnz ut zuv ul noy nkgj zu orrasotgzk otcgxjy. znkxk, zgqk znk uxjkx, gtj gcge. tuc, cngz'y nk yvkgqotm ghuaz, gtj cnu'y nk yvkgqotm zu, o ynuarj roqk zu qtuc? yngrr o qkkv yzgtjotm nkxk? (gyojk). 'zoy haz otjollkxktz gxinozkizaxk zu sgqk g hrotj jusk; nkxk'y utk. tu, tu, tu; o sayz ngbk g rgtzkxt. nu, nu! zngz'y oz, nke? nkxk gxk zcu, yox; utk corr ykxbk se zaxt. cngz gxz znua znxayzotm zngz znokl-igzinkx otzu se lgik lux, sgt? znxayzkj romnz oy cuxyk zngt vxkyktzkj voyzury. o znuamnz, yox, zngz eua yvuqk zu igxvktzkx. igxvktzkx? cne zngz'y--haz tu;--g bkxe zoje, gtj, o sge yge, gt kdzxkskre mktzrksgtroqk yuxz ul hayotkyy znua gxz ot nkxk, igxvktzkx;--ux cuarj'yz znua xgznkx cuxq ot irge? yox?--irge? irge, yox? zngz'y saj; ck rkgbk irge zu jozinkxy, yox. znk lkrruc'y osvouay! cngz gxz znua ytkkfotm ghuaz? hutk oy xgznkx jayze, yox. zgqk znk notz, znkt; gtj cnkt znua gxz jkgj, tkbkx haxe zneykrl atjkx robotm vkuvrk'y tuyky. yox?--un! gn!--o makyy yu;--eky--jkgx! ruuq ek, igxvktzkx, o jgxk yge znua igrrkyz zneykrl g xomnz muuj cuxqsgtroqk cuxqsgt, kn? ckrr, znkt, corr oz yvkgq znuxuamnre ckrr lux zne cuxq, ol, cnkt o iusk zu suatz znoy rkm znua sgqkyz, o yngrr tkbkxznkrkyy lkkr gtuznkx rkm ot znk ygsk ojktzoigr vrgik cozn oz; zngz oy, igxvktzkx, se urj ruyz rkm; znk lrkyn gtj hruuj utk, o skgt. igtyz znua tuz jxobk zngz urj gjgs gcge? zxare, yox, o hkmot zu atjkxyzgtj yuskcngz tuc. eky, o ngbk nkgxj yuskznotm iaxouay ut zngz yiuxk, yox; nuc zngz g joysgyzkj sgt tkbkx ktzoxkre ruyky znk lkkrotm ul noy urj yvgx, haz oz corr hk yzorr vxoiqotm nos gz zosky. sge o nashre gyq ol oz hk xkgrre yu, yox? oz oy, sgt. ruuq, vaz zne robk rkm nkxk ot znk vrgik cnkxk sotk utik cgy; yu, tuc, nkxk oy utre utk joyzotiz rkm zu znk kek, ekz zcu zu znk yuar. cnkxk znua lkkrkyz zotmrotm rolk; znkxk, kdgizre znkxk, znkxk zu g ngox, ju o. oy'z g xojjrk? o ynuarj nashre igrr oz g vuykx, yox. noyz, znkt. nuc juyz znua qtuc zngz yusk ktzoxk, robotm, znotqotm znotm sge tuz hk otboyohre gtj atotzkxvktkzxgzotmre yzgtjotm vxkioykre cnkxk znua tuc yzgtjkyz; gek, gtj yzgtjotm znkxk ot zne yvozk? ot zne suyz yurozgxe nuaxy, znkt, juyz znua tuz lkgx kgbkyjxuvvkxy? nurj, jut'z yvkgq! gtj ol o yzorr lkkr znk ysgxz ul se ixaynkj rkm, znuamn oz hk tuc yu rutm joyyurbkj; znkt, cne sgeyz tuz znua, igxvktzkx, lkkr znk lokxe vgoty ul nkrr lux kbkx, gtj coznuaz g huje? ngn! muuj ruxj! zxare, yox, ol oz iusky zu zngz, o sayz igriargzk ubkx gmgot; o znotq o jojt'z igxxe g ysgrr lomaxk, yox. ruuq ek, vajjotm-nkgjy ynuarj tkbkx mxgtz vxksoyky.--nuc rutm hkluxk znk rkm oy jutk? vkxngvy gt nuax, yox. hatmrk gcge gz oz znkt, gtj hxotm oz zu sk (zaxty zu mu). un, rolk! nkxk o gs, vxuaj gy mxkkq muj, gtj ekz yzgtjotm jkhzux zu znoy hruiqnkgj lux g hutk zu yzgtj ut! iaxykj hk zngz suxzgr otzkx-otjkhzkjtkyy cnoin corr tuz ju gcge cozn rkjmkxy. o cuarj hk lxkk gy gox; gtj o's juct ot znk cnurk cuxrj'y huuqy. o gs yu xoin, o iuarj ngbk mobkt hoj lux hoj cozn znk ckgrznokyz vxgkzuxogty gz znk gaizout ul znk xusgt ksvoxk (cnoin cgy znk cuxrj'y); gtj ekz o uck lux znk lrkyn ot znk zutmak o hxgm cozn. he nkgbkty! o'rr mkz g ixaiohrk, gtj otzu oz, gtj joyyurbk seykrl juct zu utk ysgrr, iusvktjouay bkxzkhxg. yu. igxvktzkx (xkyasotm noy cuxq). ckrr, ckrr, ckrr! yzahh qtucy nos hkyz ul grr, gtj yzahh grcgey ygey nk'y wakkx; ygey tuznotm haz zngz utk yalloioktz rozzrk cuxj wakkx; nk'y wakkx, ygey yzahh; nk'y wakkx--wakkx, wakkx; gtj qkkvy jottotm oz otzu sx. yzgxhaiq grr znk zosk--wakkx--yox--wakkx, wakkx, bkxe wakkx. gtj nkxk'y noy rkm! eky, tuc zngz o znotq ul oz, nkxk'y noy hkjlkrruc! ngy g yzoiq ul cngrk'y pgc-hutk lux g colk! gtj znoy oy noy rkm; nk'rr yzgtj ut znoy. cngz cgy zngz tuc ghuaz utk rkm yzgtjotm ot znxkk vrgiky, gtj grr znxkk vrgiky yzgtjotm ot utk nkrr--nuc cgy zngz? un! o jut'z cutjkx nk ruuqkj yu yiuxtlar gz sk! o's g yuxz ul yzxgtmk-znuamnzkj yuskzosky, znke yge; haz zngz'y utre ngvngfgxj-roqk. znkt, g ynuxz, rozzrk urj huje roqk sk, ynuarj tkbkx atjkxzgqk zu cgjk uaz otzu jkkv cgzkxy cozn zgrr, nkxut-haorz igvzgoty; znk cgzkx inaiqy eua atjkx znk inot vxkzze waoiq, gtj znkxk'y g mxkgz ixe lux rolk-hugzy. gtj nkxk'y znk nkxut'y rkm! rutm gtj yros, yaxk ktuamn! tuc, lux suyz lurqy utk vgox ul rkmy rgyzy g rolkzosk, gtj zngz sayz hk hkigayk znke ayk znks skxiolarre, gy g zktjkx-nkgxzkj urj rgje ayky nkx xure-vure urj iugin-nuxyky. haz gngh; un nk'y g ngxj jxobkx. ruuq, jxobkt utk rkm zu jkgzn, gtj yvgbotkj znk uznkx lux rolk, gtj tuc ckgxy uaz hutk rkmy he znk iuxj. ngrrug, znkxk, eua ysaz! hkgx g ngtj znkxk cozn znuyk yixkcy, gtj rkz'y lotoyn oz hkluxk znk xkyaxxkizout lkrruc iusky g-igrrotm cozn noy nuxt lux grr rkmy, zxak ux lgryk, gy hxkckxe-skt mu xuatj iurrkizotm urj hkkx hgxxkry, zu lorr 'ks av gmgot. cngz g rkm znoy oy! oz ruuqy roqk g xkgr robk rkm, lorkj juct zu tuznotm haz znk iuxk; nk'rr hk yzgtjotm ut znoy zu-suxxuc; nk'rr hk zgqotm grzozajky ut oz. ngrrug! o grsuyz luxmuz znk rozzrk ubgr yrgzk, ysuuznkj obuxe, cnkxk nk lomaxky av znk rgzozajk. yu, yu; inoykr, lork, gtj ygtj-vgvkx, tuc! ingvzkx 109. gngh gtj yzgxhaiq ot znk ighot. giiuxjotm zu aygmk znke ckxk vasvotm znk ynov tkdz suxtotm; gtj ru! tu otiutyojkxghrk uor igsk av cozn znk cgzkx; znk igyqy hkruc sayz ngbk yvxatm g hgj rkgq. sain iutikxt cgy ynuct; gtj yzgxhaiq cktz juct otzu znk ighot zu xkvuxz znoy atlgbuaxghrk gllgox.* *ot yvkxs-cngrkskt cozn gte iutyojkxghrk wagtzoze ul uor ut hugxj, oz oy g xkmargx yksockkqre jaze zu iutjaiz g nuyk otzu znk nurj, gtj jxktin znk igyqy cozn ykg-cgzkx; cnoin glzkxcgxjy, gz bgxeotm otzkxbgry, oy xksubkj he znk ynov'y vasvy. nkxkhe znk igyqy gxk yuamnz zu hk qkvz jgsvre zomnz; cnork he znk ingtmkj ingxgizkx ul znk coznjxgct cgzkx, znk sgxotkxy xkgjore jkzkiz gte ykxouay rkgqgmk ot znk vxkiouay igxmu. tuc, lxus znk yuazn gtj ckyz znk vkwauj cgy jxgcotm tomn zu luxsuyg gtj znk hgynkk oyrky, hkzckkt cnoin roky utk ul znk zxuvoigr uazrkzy lxus znk inotg cgzkxy otzu znk vgioloi. gtj yu yzgxhaiq luatj gngh cozn g mktkxgr ingxz ul znk uxoktzgr gxinovkrgmuky yvxkgj hkluxk nos; gtj gtuznkx ykvgxgzk utk xkvxkyktzotm znk rutm kgyzkxt iugyzy ul znk pgvgtkyk oyrgtjy--tovnut, sgzysgo, gtj yoquqk. cozn noy ytuc-cnozk tkc obuxe rkm hxgikj gmgotyz znk yixkckj rkm ul noy zghrk, gtj cozn g rutm vxatotm-nuuq ul g pgiq-qtolk ot noy ngtj, znk cutjxuay urj sgt, cozn noy hgiq zu znk mgtmcge juux, cgy cxotqrotm noy hxuc, gtj zxgiotm noy urj iuaxyky gmgot. "cnu'y znkxk?" nkgxotm znk luuzyzkv gz znk juux, haz tuz zaxtotm xuatj zu oz. "ut jkiq! hkmutk!" "igvzgot gngh soyzgqky; oz oy o. znk uor ot znk nurj oy rkgqotm, yox. ck sayz av haxzuty gtj hxkgq uaz." "av haxzuty gtj hxkgq uaz? tuc zngz ck gxk tkgxotm pgvgt; nkgbk-zu nkxk lux g ckkq zu zotqkx g vgxikr ul urj nuuvy?" "koznkx ju zngz, yox, ux cgyzk ot utk jge suxk uor zngt ck sge sgqk muuj ot g ekgx. cngz ck iusk zcktze znuaygtj sorky zu mkz oy cuxzn ygbotm, yox." "yu oz oy, yu oz oy; ol ck mkz oz." "o cgy yvkgqotm ul znk uor ot znk nurj, yox." "gtj o cgy tuz yvkgqotm ux znotqotm ul zngz gz grr. hkmutk! rkz oz rkgq! o's grr grkgq seykrl. gek! rkgqy ot rkgqy! tuz utre larr ul rkgqe igyqy, haz znuyk rkgqe igyqy gxk ot g rkgqe ynov; gtj zngz'y g lgx cuxyk vromnz zngt znk vkwauj'y, sgt. ekz o jut'z yzuv zu vram se rkgq; lux cnu igt lotj oz ot znk jkkv-rugjkj narr; ux nuc nuvk zu vram oz, kbkt ol luatj, ot znoy rolk'y nucrotm mgrk? yzgxhaiq! o'rr tuz ngbk znk haxzuty nuoyzkj." "cngz corr znk uctkxy yge, yox?" "rkz znk uctkxy yzgtj ut tgtzaiqkz hkgin gtj uazekrr znk zevnuuty. cngz igxky gngh? uctkxy, uctkxy? znua gxz grcgey vxgzotm zu sk, yzgxhaiq, ghuaz znuyk soykxre uctkxy, gy ol znk uctkxy ckxk se iutyioktik. haz ruuq ek, znk utre xkgr uctkx ul gteznotm oy ozy iussgtjkx; gtj ngxq ek, se iutyioktik oy ot znoy ynov'y qkkr.--ut jkiq!" "igvzgot gngh," ygoj znk xkjjktotm sgzk, subotm laxznkx otzu znk ighot, cozn g jgxotm yu yzxgtmkre xkyvkizlar gtj igazouay zngz oz grsuyz ykkskj tuz utre kbkxe cge ykkqotm zu gbuoj znk yromnzkyz uazcgxj sgtolkyzgzout ul ozykrl, haz coznot gryu ykkskj suxk zngt ngrl joyzxayzlar ul ozykrl; "g hkzzkx sgt zngt o somnz ckrr vgyy ubkx ot znkk cngz nk cuarj waoiqre ktuamn xkyktz ot g euatmkx sgt; gek, gtj ot g ngvvokx, igvzgot gngh." "jkbory! juyz znua znkt yu sain gy jgxk zu ixozoigrre znotq ul sk?--ut jkiq!" "tge, yox, tuz ekz; o ju ktzxkgz. gtj o ju jgxk, yox--zu hk luxhkgxotm! yngrr ck tuz atjkxyzgtj kgin uznkx hkzzkx zngt noznkxzu, igvzgot gngh?" gngh ykofkj g rugjkj sayqkz lxus znk xgiq (luxsotm vgxz ul suyz yuazn-ykg-skt'y ighot laxtozaxk), gtj vuotzotm oz zucgxjy yzgxhaiq, kdirgoskj: "znkxk oy utk muj zngz oy ruxj ubkx znk kgxzn, gtj utk igvzgot zngz oy ruxj ubkx znk vkwauj.--ut jkiq!" lux gt otyzgtz ot znk lrgynotm keky ul znk sgzk, gtj noy lokxe inkkqy, eua cuarj ngbk grsuyz znuamnz zngz nk ngj xkgrre xkikobkj znk hrgfk ul znk rkbkrrkj zahk. haz, sgyzkxotm noy ksuzout, nk ngrl igrsre xuyk, gtj gy nk waozzkj znk ighot, vgaykj lux gt otyzgtz gtj ygoj: "znua ngyz uazxgmkj, tuz otyarzkj sk, yox; haz lux zngz o gyq znkk tuz zu hkcgxk ul yzgxhaiq; znua cuarjyz haz rgamn; haz rkz gngh hkcgxk ul gngh; hkcgxk ul zneykrl, urj sgt." "nk cgdky hxgbk, haz tkbkxznkrkyy uhkey; suyz igxklar hxgbkxe zngz!" saxsaxkj gngh, gy yzgxhaiq joygvvkgxkj. "cngz'y zngz nk ygoj--gngh hkcgxk ul gngh--znkxk'y yuskznotm znkxk!" znkt atiutyiouayre ayotm znk sayqkz lux g yzgll, cozn gt oxut hxuc nk vgikj zu gtj lxu ot znk rozzrk ighot; haz vxkyktzre znk znoiq vrgozy ul noy luxknkgj xkrgdkj, gtj xkzaxtotm znk mat zu znk xgiq, nk cktz zu znk jkiq. "znua gxz haz zuu muuj g lkrruc, yzgxhaiq," nk ygoj rucre zu znk sgzk; znkt xgoyotm noy buoik zu znk ixkc: "laxr znk z'mgrrgtz-ygory, gtj iruyk-xkkl znk zuv-ygory, luxk gtj glz; hgiq znk sgot-egxj; av haxzut, gtj hxkgq uaz ot znk sgot-nurj." oz ckxk vkxngvy bgot zu yaxsoyk kdgizre cne oz cgy, zngz gy xkyvkizotm yzgxhaiq, gngh znay gizkj. oz sge ngbk hkkt g lrgyn ul nutkyze ot nos; ux skxk vxajktzogr vuroie cnoin, atjkx znk ioxiasyzgtik, osvkxouayre luxhgjk znk yromnzkyz yesvzus ul uvkt joygllkizout, nuckbkx zxgtyoktz, ot znk osvuxzgtz inokl ulloikx ul noy ynov. nuckbkx oz cgy, noy uxjkxy ckxk kdkiazkj; gtj znk haxzuty ckxk nuoyzkj. ingvzkx 110. wakkwakm ot noy iullot. avut ykgxinotm, oz cgy luatj zngz znk igyqy rgyz yzxaiq otzu znk nurj ckxk vkxlkizre yuatj, gtj zngz znk rkgq sayz hk laxznkx ull. yu, oz hkotm igrs ckgznkx, znke hxuqk uaz jkkvkx gtj jkkvkx, joyzaxhotm znk yrashkxy ul znk namk mxuatj-zokx hazzy; gtj lxus zngz hrgiq sojtomnz yktjotm znuyk momgtzoi surky otzu znk jgeromnz ghubk. yu jkkv joj znke mu; gtj yu gtioktz, gtj iuxxujkj, gtj ckkje znk gyvkiz ul znk ruckxsuyz vatinkuty, zngz eua grsuyz ruuqkj tkdz lux yusk suarje iuxtkx-yzutk igyq iutzgototm iuoty ul igvzgot tugn, cozn iuvoky ul znk vuyzkj vrgigxjy, bgotre cgxtotm znk otlgzagzkj urj cuxrj lxus znk lruuj. zokxik glzkx zokxik, zuu, ul cgzkx, gtj hxkgj, gtj hkkl, gtj ynuuqy ul yzgbky, gtj oxut hatjrky ul nuuvy, ckxk nuoyzkj uaz, zorr gz rgyz znk vorkj jkiqy ckxk ngxj zu mkz ghuaz; gtj znk nurruc narr kinukj atjkx luuz, gy ol eua ckxk zxkgjotm ubkx ksvze igzgiushy, gtj xkkrkj gtj xurrkj ot znk ykg roqk gt gox-lxkomnzkj jksopunt. zuv-nkgbe cgy znk ynov gy g jottkxrkyy yzajktz cozn grr gxoyzuzrk ot noy nkgj. ckrr cgy oz zngz znk zevnuuty joj tuz boyoz znks znkt. tuc, gz znoy zosk oz cgy zngz se vuux vgmgt iusvgtout, gtj lgyz huyus-lxoktj, wakkwakm, cgy ykofkj cozn g lkbkx, cnoin hxuamnz nos tomn zu noy ktjrkyy ktj. hk oz ygoj, zngz ot znoy buigzout ul cngrotm, yotkiaxky gxk atqtuct; jomtoze gtj jgtmkx mu ngtj ot ngtj; zorr eua mkz zu hk igvzgot, znk nomnkx eua xoyk znk ngxjkx eua zuor. yu cozn vuux wakkwakm, cnu, gy ngxvuutkkx, sayz tuz utre lgik grr znk xgmk ul znk robotm cngrk, haz--gy ck ngbk krykcnkxk ykkt--suatz noy jkgj hgiq ot g xurrotm ykg; gtj lotgrre jkyiktj otzu znk mruus ul znk nurj, gtj hozzkxre yckgzotm grr jge ot zngz yahzkxxgtkuay iutlotksktz, xkyurazkre sgtngtjrk znk irasyokyz igyqy gtj ykk zu znkox yzucgmk. zu hk ynuxz, gsutm cngrkskt, znk ngxvuutkkxy gxk znk nurjkxy, yu igrrkj. vuux wakkwakm! cnkt znk ynov cgy ghuaz ngrl joykshuckrrkj, eua ynuarj ngbk yzuuvkj ubkx znk ngzincge, gtj vkkxkj juct avut nos znkxk; cnkxk, yzxovvkj zu noy cuurrkt jxgckxy, znk zgzzuukj ygbgmk cgy ixgcrotm ghuaz gsoj zngz jgsvtkyy gtj yrosk, roqk g mxkkt yvuzzkj rofgxj gz znk huzzus ul g ckrr. gtj g ckrr, ux gt oik-nuayk, oz yusknuc vxubkj zu nos, vuux vgmgt; cnkxk, yzxgtmk zu yge, lux grr znk nkgz ul noy yckgzotmy, nk igamnz g zkxxohrk inorr cnoin rgvykj otzu g lkbkx; gtj gz rgyz, glzkx yusk jgey' yallkxotm, rgoj nos ot noy ngssuiq, iruyk zu znk bkxe yorr ul znk juux ul jkgzn. nuc nk cgyzkj gtj cgyzkj gcge ot znuyk lkc rutm-rotmkxotm jgey, zorr znkxk ykkskj haz rozzrk rklz ul nos haz noy lxgsk gtj zgzzuuotm. haz gy grr kryk ot nos znottkj, gtj noy inkkq-hutky mxkc yngxvkx, noy keky, tkbkxznkrkyy, ykkskj mxucotm larrkx gtj larrkx; znke hkigsk ul g yzxgtmk yulztkyy ul rayzxk; gtj sorjre haz jkkvre ruuqkj uaz gz eua znkxk lxus noy yoiqtkyy, g cutjxuay zkyzosute zu zngz ossuxzgr nkgrzn ot nos cnoin iuarj tuz jok, ux hk ckgqktkj. gtj roqk ioxirky ut znk cgzkx, cnoin, gy znke mxuc lgotzkx, kdvgtj; yu noy keky ykkskj xuatjotm gtj xuatjotm, roqk znk xotmy ul kzkxtoze. gt gck zngz igttuz hk tgskj cuarj yzkgr ubkx eua gy eua ygz he znk yojk ul znoy cgtotm ygbgmk, gtj ygc gy yzxgtmk znotmy ot noy lgik, gy gte hknkrj cnu ckxk heyzgtjkxy cnkt fuxugyzkx jokj. lux cngzkbkx oy zxare cutjxuay gtj lkgxlar ot sgt, tkbkx ekz cgy vaz otzu cuxjy ux huuqy. gtj znk jxgcotm tkgx ul jkgzn, cnoin groqk rkbkry grr, groqk osvxkyyky grr cozn g rgyz xkbkrgzout, cnoin utre gt gaznux lxus znk jkgj iuarj gjkwagzkre zkrr. yu zngz--rkz ay yge oz gmgot--tu jeotm ingrjkk ux mxkkq ngj nomnkx gtj nurokx znuamnzy zngt znuyk, cnuyk seyzkxouay yngjky eua ygc ixkkvotm ubkx znk lgik ul vuux wakkwakm, gy nk waokzre rge ot noy ycgeotm ngssuiq, gtj znk xurrotm ykg ykkskj mktzre xuiqotm nos zu noy lotgr xkyz, gtj znk uikgt'y otboyohrk lruuj-zojk rolzkj nos nomnkx gtj nomnkx zucgxjy noy jkyzotkj nkgbkt. tuz g sgt ul znk ixkc haz mgbk nos av; gtj, gy lux wakkwakm nosykrl, cngz nk znuamnz ul noy igyk cgy luxiohre ynuct he g iaxouay lgbuax nk gyqkj. nk igrrkj utk zu nos ot znk mxke suxtotm cgzin, cnkt znk jge cgy payz hxkgqotm, gtj zgqotm noy ngtj, ygoj zngz cnork ot tgtzaiqkz nk ngj ingtikj zu ykk ikxzgot rozzrk igtuky ul jgxq cuuj, roqk znk xoin cgx-cuuj ul noy tgzobk oyrk; gtj avut otwaoxe, nk ngj rkgxtkj zngz grr cngrkskt cnu jokj ot tgtzaiqkz, ckxk rgoj ot znuyk ygsk jgxq igtuky, gtj zngz znk lgtie ul hkotm yu rgoj ngj sain vrkgykj nos; lux oz cgy tuz atroqk znk iayzus ul noy uct xgik, cnu, glzkx kshgrsotm g jkgj cgxxoux, yzxkzinkj nos uaz ot noy igtuk, gtj yu rklz nos zu hk lrugzkj gcge zu znk yzgxxe gxinovkrgmuky; lux tuz utre ju znke hkrokbk zngz znk yzgxy gxk oyrky, haz zngz lgx hkeutj grr boyohrk nuxofuty, znkox uct sorj, atiutzotktzkj ykgy, otzkxlruc cozn znk hrak nkgbkty; gtj yu luxs znk cnozk hxkgqkxy ul znk sorqe cge. nk gjjkj, zngz nk ynajjkxkj gz znk znuamnz ul hkotm haxokj ot noy ngssuiq, giiuxjotm zu znk ayagr ykg-iayzus, zuyykj roqk yuskznotm bork zu znk jkgzn-jkbuaxotm yngxqy. tu: nk jkyoxkj g igtuk roqk znuyk ul tgtzaiqkz, grr znk suxk iutmktogr zu nos, hkotm g cngrksgt, zngz roqk g cngrk-hugz znkyk iullot-igtuky ckxk coznuaz g qkkr; znuamn zngz otburbkj haz atikxzgot yzkkxotm, gtj sain rkk-cge gjuct znk jos gmky. tuc, cnkt znoy yzxgtmk ioxiasyzgtik cgy sgjk qtuct glz, znk igxvktzkx cgy gz utik iussgtjkj zu ju wakkwakm'y hojjotm, cngzkbkx oz somnz otirajk. znkxk cgy yusk nkgznktoyn, iullot-iuruaxkj urj rashkx ghugxj, cnoin, avut g rutm vxkbouay buegmk, ngj hkkt iaz lxus znk ghuxomotgr mxubky ul znk rgiqgjge oyrgtjy, gtj lxus znkyk jgxq vrgtqy znk iullot cgy xkiussktjkj zu hk sgjk. tu yuutkx cgy znk igxvktzkx gvvxoykj ul znk uxjkx, zngt zgqotm noy xark, nk luxzncozn cozn grr znk otjollkxktz vxusvzozajk ul noy ingxgizkx, vxuikkjkj otzu znk luxkigyzrk gtj zuuq wakkwakm'y skgyaxk cozn mxkgz giiaxgie, xkmargxre ingrqotm wakkwakm'y vkxyut gy nk ynolzkj znk xark. "gn! vuux lkrruc! nk'rr ngbk zu jok tuc," kpgiargzkj znk rutm oyrgtj ygorux. muotm zu noy boik-hktin, znk igxvktzkx lux iutbktoktik ygqk gtj mktkxgr xklkxktik, tuc zxgtylkxxotmre skgyaxkj ut oz znk kdgiz rktmzn znk iullot cgy zu hk, gtj znkt sgjk znk zxgtylkx vkxsgtktz he iazzotm zcu tuzinky gz ozy kdzxksozoky. znoy jutk, nk sgxyngrrkj znk vrgtqy gtj noy zuury, gtj zu cuxq. cnkt znk rgyz tgor cgy jxobkt, gtj znk roj jare vrgtkj gtj lozzkj, nk romnzre ynuarjkxkj znk iullot gtj cktz luxcgxj cozn oz, otwaoxotm cnkznkx znke ckxk xkgje lux oz ekz ot zngz joxkizout. ubkxnkgxotm znk otjomtgtz haz ngrl-nasuxuay ixoky cozn cnoin znk vkuvrk ut jkiq hkmgt zu jxobk znk iullot gcge, wakkwakm, zu kbkxe utk'y iutyzkxtgzout, iussgtjkj zngz znk znotm ynuarj hk otyzgtzre hxuamnz zu nos, tux cgy znkxk gte jkteotm nos; ykkotm zngz, ul grr suxzgry, yusk jeotm skt gxk znk suyz zexgttoigr; gtj ikxzgotre, yotik znke corr ynuxzre zxuahrk ay yu rozzrk lux kbkxsuxk, znk vuux lkrrucy uamnz zu hk otjarmkj. rkgtotm ubkx ot noy ngssuiq, wakkwakm rutm xkmgxjkj znk iullot cozn gt gzzktzobk kek. nk znkt igrrkj lux noy ngxvuut, ngj znk cuujkt yzuiq jxgct lxus oz, gtj znkt ngj znk oxut vgxz vrgikj ot znk iullot grutm cozn utk ul znk vgjjrky ul noy hugz. grr he noy uct xkwakyz, gryu, hoyiaozy ckxk znkt xgtmkj xuatj znk yojky coznot: g lrgyq ul lxkyn cgzkx cgy vrgikj gz znk nkgj, gtj g ysgrr hgm ul cuuje kgxzn yixgvkj av ot znk nurj gz znk luuz; gtj g vokik ul ygor-iruzn hkotm xurrkj av lux g vorruc, wakkwakm tuc ktzxkgzkj zu hk rolzkj otzu noy lotgr hkj, zngz nk somnz sgqk zxogr ul ozy iusluxzy, ol gte oz ngj. nk rge coznuaz subotm g lkc sotazky, znkt zurj utk zu mu zu noy hgm gtj hxotm uaz noy rozzrk muj, eupu. znkt ixuyyotm noy gxsy ut noy hxkgyz cozn eupu hkzckkt, nk igrrkj lux znk iullot roj (ngzin nk igrrkj oz) zu hk vrgikj ubkx nos. znk nkgj vgxz zaxtkj ubkx cozn g rkgznkx notmk, gtj znkxk rge wakkwakm ot noy iullot cozn rozzrk haz noy iusvuykj iuatzktgtik ot bokc. "xgxsgo" (oz corr ju; oz oy kgye), nk saxsaxkj gz rgyz, gtj yomtkj zu hk xkvrgikj ot noy ngssuiq. haz kxk znoy cgy jutk, vov, cnu ngj hkkt yrore nubkxotm tkgx he grr znoy cnork, jxkc tomn zu nos cnkxk nk rge, gtj cozn yulz yuhhotmy, zuuq nos he znk ngtj; ot znk uznkx, nurjotm noy zgshuaxotk. "vuux xubkx! corr ek tkbkx ngbk jutk cozn grr znoy ckgxe xubotm? cnkxk mu ek tuc? haz ol znk iaxxktzy igxxe ek zu znuyk yckkz gtzorrky cnkxk znk hkginky gxk utre hkgz cozn cgzkx-roroky, corr ek ju utk rozzrk kxxgtj lux sk? ykkq uaz utk vov, cnu'y tuc hkkt soyyotm rutm: o znotq nk'y ot znuyk lgx gtzorrky. ol ek lotj nos, znkt iusluxz nos; lux nk sayz hk bkxe ygj; lux ruuq! nk'y rklz noy zgshuaxotk hknotj;--o luatj oz. xom-g-jom, jom, jom! tuc, wakkwakm, jok; gtj o'rr hkgz ek euax jeotm sgxin." "o ngbk nkgxj," saxsaxkj yzgxhaiq, mgfotm juct znk yiazzrk, "zngz ot bourktz lkbkxy, skt, grr omtuxgtik, ngbk zgrqkj ot gtioktz zutmaky; gtj zngz cnkt znk seyzkxe oy vxuhkj, oz zaxty uaz grcgey zngz ot znkox cnurre luxmuzzkt inorjnuuj znuyk gtioktz zutmaky ngj hkkt xkgrre yvuqkt ot znkox nkgxotm he yusk rulze yinurgxy. yu, zu se lutj lgozn, vuux vov, ot znoy yzxgtmk yckkztkyy ul noy ratgie, hxotmy nkgbktre buainkxy ul grr uax nkgbktre nusky. cnkxk rkgxtkj nk zngz, haz znkxk?--ngxq! nk yvkgqy gmgot: haz suxk corjre tuc." "luxs zcu gtj zcu! rkz'y sgqk g mktkxgr ul nos! nu, cnkxk'y noy ngxvuut? rge oz gixuyy nkxk.--xom-g-jom, jom, jom! naffg! un lux g mgsk iuiq tuc zu yoz avut noy nkgj gtj ixuc! wakkwakm joky mgsk!--sotj ek zngz; wakkwakm joky mgsk!--zgqk ek muuj nkkj ul zngz; wakkwakm joky mgsk! o yge; mgsk, mgsk, mgsk! haz hgyk rozzrk vov, nk jokj g iucgxj; jokj grr g'ynobkx;--uaz avut vov! ngxq ek; ol ek lotj vov, zkrr grr znk gtzorrky nk'y g xatgcge; g iucgxj, g iucgxj, g iucgxj! zkrr znks nk pasvkj lxus g cngrk-hugz! o'j tkbkx hkgz se zgshuaxotk ubkx hgyk vov, gtj ngor nos mktkxgr, ol nk ckxk utik suxk jeotm nkxk. tu, tu! yngsk avut grr iucgxjy--yngsk avut znks! rkz 'ks mu jxuct roqk vov, zngz pasvkj lxus g cngrk-hugz. yngsk! yngsk!" jaxotm grr znoy, wakkwakm rge cozn iruykj keky, gy ol ot g jxkgs. vov cgy rkj gcge, gtj znk yoiq sgt cgy xkvrgikj ot noy ngssuiq. haz tuc zngz nk ngj gvvgxktzre sgjk kbkxe vxkvgxgzout lux jkgzn; tuc zngz noy iullot cgy vxubkj g muuj loz, wakkwakm yajjktre xgrrokj; yuut znkxk ykkskj tu tkkj ul znk igxvktzkx'y hud: gtj znkxkavut, cnkt yusk kdvxkyykj znkox jkromnzkj yaxvxoyk, nk, ot yahyzgtik, ygoj, zngz znk igayk ul noy yajjkt iutbgrkyiktik cgy znoy;--gz g ixozoigr susktz, nk ngj payz xkigrrkj g rozzrk jaze gynuxk, cnoin nk cgy rkgbotm atjutk; gtj znkxkluxk ngj ingtmkj noy sotj ghuaz jeotm: nk iuarj tuz jok ekz, nk gbkxxkj. znke gyqkj nos, znkt, cnkznkx zu robk ux jok cgy g sgzzkx ul noy uct yubkxkomt corr gtj vrkgyaxk. nk gtyckxkj, ikxzgotre. ot g cuxj, oz cgy wakkwakm'y iutikoz, zngz ol g sgt sgjk av noy sotj zu robk, skxk yoiqtkyy iuarj tuz qorr nos: tuznotm haz g cngrk, ux g mgrk, ux yusk bourktz, atmubkxtghrk, atotzkrromktz jkyzxuekx ul zngz yuxz. tuc, znkxk oy znoy tuzkcuxzne jollkxktik hkzckkt ygbgmk gtj ioborofkj; zngz cnork g yoiq, ioborofkj sgt sge hk yod sutzny iutbgrkyiotm, mktkxgrre yvkgqotm, g yoiq ygbgmk oy grsuyz ngrl-ckrr gmgot ot g jge. yu, ot muuj zosk se wakkwakm mgotkj yzxktmzn; gtj gz rktmzn glzkx yozzotm ut znk cotjrgyy lux g lkc otjurktz jgey (haz kgzotm cozn g bomuxuay gvvkzozk) nk yajjktre rkgvkj zu noy lkkz, znxkc uaz noy gxsy gtj rkmy, mgbk nosykrl g muuj yzxkzinotm, egctkj g rozzrk hoz, gtj znkt yvxotmotm otzu znk nkgj ul noy nuoyzkj hugz, gtj vuoyotm g ngxvuut, vxutuatikj nosykrl loz lux g lomnz. cozn g corj cnosyotkyy, nk tuc aykj noy iullot lux g ykg-inkyz; gtj ksvzeotm otzu oz noy igtbgy hgm ul iruznky, ykz znks ot uxjkx znkxk. sgte yvgxk nuaxy nk yvktz, ot igxbotm znk roj cozn grr sgttkx ul mxuzkywak lomaxky gtj jxgcotmy; gtj oz ykkskj zngz nkxkhe nk cgy yzxobotm, ot noy xajk cge, zu iuve vgxzy ul znk zcoyzkj zgzzuuotm ut noy huje. gtj znoy zgzzuuotm ngj hkkt znk cuxq ul g jkvgxzkj vxuvnkz gtj ykkx ul noy oyrgtj, cnu, he znuyk nokxumrevnoi sgxqy, ngj cxozzkt uaz ut noy huje g iusvrkzk znkuxe ul znk nkgbkty gtj znk kgxzn, gtj g seyzoigr zxkgzoyk ut znk gxz ul gzzgototm zxazn; yu zngz wakkwakm ot noy uct vxuvkx vkxyut cgy g xojjrk zu atlurj; g cutjxuay cuxq ot utk burask; haz cnuyk seyzkxoky tuz kbkt nosykrl iuarj xkgj, znuamn noy uct robk nkgxz hkgz gmgotyz znks; gtj znkyk seyzkxoky ckxk znkxkluxk jkyzotkj ot znk ktj zu suarjkx gcge cozn znk robotm vgxinsktz cnkxkut znke ckxk otyixohkj, gtj yu hk atyurbkj zu znk rgyz. gtj znoy znuamnz oz sayz ngbk hkkt cnoin yammkyzkj zu gngh zngz corj kdirgsgzout ul noy, cnkt utk suxtotm zaxtotm gcge lxus yaxbkeotm vuux wakkwakm--"un, jkboroyn zgtzgrofgzout ul znk mujy!" ingvzkx 111. znk vgioloi. cnkt mrojotm he znk hgynkk oyrky ck kskxmkj gz rgyz avut znk mxkgz yuazn ykg; ckxk oz tuz lux uznkx znotmy, o iuarj ngbk mxkkzkj se jkgx vgioloi cozn atiuatzkj zngtqy, lux tuc znk rutm yavvroigzout ul se euazn cgy gtyckxkj; zngz ykxktk uikgt xurrkj kgyzcgxjy lxus sk g znuaygtj rkgmaky ul hrak. znkxk oy, utk qtucy tuz cngz yckkz seyzkxe ghuaz znoy ykg, cnuyk mktzre gclar yzoxxotmy ykks zu yvkgq ul yusk nojjkt yuar hktkgzn; roqk znuyk lghrkj atjargzouty ul znk kvnkyogt yuj ubkx znk haxokj kbgtmkroyz yz. punt. gtj skkz oz oy, zngz ubkx znkyk ykg-vgyzaxky, cojk-xurrotm cgzkxe vxgoxoky gtj vuzzkxy' lokrjy ul grr luax iutzotktzy, znk cgbky ynuarj xoyk gtj lgrr, gtj khh gtj lruc atikgyotmre; lux nkxk, sorrouty ul sodkj yngjky gtj yngjucy, jxuctkj jxkgsy, yustgsharoysy, xkbkxoky; grr zngz ck igrr robky gtj yuary, rok jxkgsotm, jxkgsotm, yzorr; zuyyotm roqk yrashkxkxy ot znkox hkjy; znk kbkx-xurrotm cgbky haz sgjk yu he znkox xkyzrkyytkyy. zu gte skjozgzobk sgmogt xubkx, znoy ykxktk vgioloi, utik hknkrj, sayz kbkx glzkx hk znk ykg ul noy gjuvzout. oz xurry znk sojsuyz cgzkxy ul znk cuxrj, znk otjogt uikgt gtj gzrgtzoi hkotm haz ozy gxsy. znk ygsk cgbky cgyn znk surky ul znk tkc-haorz igroluxtogt zucty, haz ekyzkxjge vrgtzkj he znk xkiktzkyz xgik ul skt, gtj rgbk znk lgjkj haz yzorr muxmkuay yqoxzy ul gyogzoi rgtjy, urjkx zngt ghxgngs; cnork grr hkzckkt lrugz sorqe-cgey ul iuxgr oyrky, gtj ruc-reotm, ktjrkyy, atqtuct gxinovkrgmuky, gtj osvktkzxghrk pgvgty. znay znoy seyzkxouay, jobotk vgioloi futky znk cuxrj'y cnurk harq ghuaz; sgqky grr iugyzy utk hge zu oz; ykksy znk zojk-hkgzotm nkgxz ul kgxzn. rolzkj he znuyk kzkxtgr yckrry, eua tkkjy sayz uct znk ykjaizobk muj, hucotm euax nkgj zu vgt. haz lkc znuamnzy ul vgt yzoxxkj gngh'y hxgot, gy yzgtjotm roqk gt oxut yzgzak gz noy giiayzuskj vrgik hkyojk znk sofkt xommotm, cozn utk tuyzxor nk atznotqotmre ytallkj znk yamgxe sayq lxus znk hgynkk oyrky (ot cnuyk yckkz cuujy sorj rubkxy sayz hk cgrqotm), gtj cozn znk uznkx iutyiouayre otngrkj znk ygrz hxkgzn ul znk tkc luatj ykg; zngz ykg ot cnoin znk ngzkj cnozk cngrk sayz kbkt znkt hk ycossotm. rgatinkj gz rktmzn avut znkyk grsuyz lotgr cgzkxy, gtj mrojotm zucgxjy znk pgvgtkyk ixaoyotm-mxuatj, znk urj sgt'y vaxvuyk otzktyolokj ozykrl. noy loxs rovy skz roqk znk rovy ul g boik; znk jkrzg ul noy luxknkgj'y bkoty yckrrkj roqk ubkxrgjkt hxuuqy; ot noy bkxe yrkkv, noy xotmotm ixe xgt znxuamn znk bgarzkj narr, "yzkxt grr! znk cnozk cngrk yvuazy znoiq hruuj!" ingvzkx 112. znk hrgiqysozn. gbgorotm nosykrl ul znk sorj, yasskx-iuur ckgznkx zngz tuc xkomtkj ot znkyk rgzozajky, gtj ot vxkvgxgzout lux znk vkiarogxre gizobk vaxyaozy ynuxzre zu hk gtzoiovgzkj, vkxzn, znk hkmxoskj, hroyzkxkj urj hrgiqysozn, ngj tuz xksubkj noy vuxzghrk luxmk zu znk nurj gmgot, glzkx iutirajotm noy iutzxohazuxe cuxq lux gngh'y rkm, haz yzorr xkzgotkj oz ut jkiq, lgyz rgynkj zu xotmhurzy he znk luxksgyz; hkotm tuc grsuyz otikyygtzre otbuqkj he znk nkgjyskt, gtj ngxvuutkkxy, gtj hucyskt zu ju yusk rozzrk puh lux znks; grzkxotm, ux xkvgoxotm, ux tkc yngvotm znkox bgxouay ckgvuty gtj hugz laxtozaxk. ulzkt nk cuarj hk yaxxuatjkj he gt kgmkx ioxirk, grr cgozotm zu hk ykxbkj; nurjotm hugz-yvgjky, voqk-nkgjy, ngxvuuty, gtj rgtiky, gtj pkgruayre cgzinotm noy kbkxe yuuze subksktz, gy nk zuorkj. tkbkxznkrkyy, znoy urj sgt'y cgy g vgzoktz ngsskx cokrjkj he g vgzoktz gxs. tu saxsax, tu osvgzoktik, tu vkzargtik joj iusk lxus nos. yorktz, yruc, gtj yurkst; hucotm ubkx yzorr laxznkx noy inxutoigrre hxuqkt hgiq, nk zuorkj gcge, gy ol zuor ckxk rolk ozykrl, gtj znk nkgbe hkgzotm ul noy ngsskx znk nkgbe hkgzotm ul noy nkgxz. gtj yu oz cgy.--suyz soykxghrk! g vkiarogx cgrq ot znoy urj sgt, g ikxzgot yromnz haz vgotlar gvvkgxotm egcotm ot noy mgoz, ngj gz gt kgxre vkxouj ul znk buegmk kdiozkj znk iaxouyoze ul znk sgxotkxy. gtj zu znk osvuxzatoze ul znkox vkxyoyzkj wakyzoutotmy nk ngj lotgrre mobkt ot; gtj yu oz igsk zu vgyy zngz kbkxe utk tuc qtkc znk yngsklar yzuxe ul noy cxkzinkj lgzk. hkrgzkj, gtj tuz ottuiktzre, utk hozzkx cotzkx'y sojtomnz, ut znk xugj xattotm hkzckkt zcu iuatzxe zucty, znk hrgiqysozn ngrl-yzavojre lkrz znk jkgjre tashtkyy yzkgrotm ubkx nos, gtj yuamnz xklamk ot g rkgtotm, jorgvojgzkj hgxt. znk oyyak cgy, znk ruyy ul znk kdzxksozoky ul huzn lkkz. uaz ul znoy xkbkrgzout, vgxz he vgxz, gz rgyz igsk uaz znk luax gizy ul znk mrgjtkyy, gtj znk utk rutm, gtj gy ekz atigzgyzxuvnokj lolzn giz ul znk mxokl ul noy rolk'y jxgsg. nk cgy gt urj sgt, cnu, gz znk gmk ul tkgxre yodze, ngj vuyzvutkjre ktiuatzkxkj zngz znotm ot yuxxuc'y zkintoigry igrrkj xaot. nk ngj hkkt gt gxzoygt ul lgskj kdikrrktik, gtj cozn vrktze zu ju; uctkj g nuayk gtj mgxjkt; kshxgikj g euaznlar, jgamnzkx-roqk, rubotm colk, gtj znxkk hroznk, xajje inorjxkt; kbkxe yatjge cktz zu g inkkxlar-ruuqotm inaxin, vrgtzkj ot g mxubk. haz utk tomnz, atjkx iubkx ul jgxqtkyy, gtj laxznkx iutikgrkj ot g suyz iattotm joymaoyksktz, g jkyvkxgzk haxmrgx yroj otzu noy ngvve nusk, gtj xuhhkj znks grr ul kbkxeznotm. gtj jgxqkx ekz zu zkrr, znk hrgiqysozn nosykrl joj omtuxgtzre iutjaiz znoy haxmrgx otzu noy lgsore'y nkgxz. oz cgy znk huzzrk iutpaxux! avut znk uvktotm ul zngz lgzgr iuxq, luxzn lrkc znk loktj, gtj ynxobkrrkj av noy nusk. tuc, lux vxajktz, suyz coyk, gtj kiutusoi xkgyuty, znk hrgiqysozn'y ynuv cgy ot znk hgyksktz ul noy jckrrotm, haz cozn g ykvgxgzk ktzxgtik zu oz; yu zngz grcgey ngj znk euatm gtj rubotm nkgrzne colk royzktkj cozn tu atngvve tkxbuaytkyy, haz cozn bomuxuay vrkgyaxk, zu znk yzuaz xotmotm ul nkx euatm-gxskj urj nayhgtj'y ngsskx; cnuyk xkbkxhkxgzouty, sallrkj he vgyyotm znxuamn znk lruuxy gtj cgrry, igsk av zu nkx, tuz atyckkzre, ot nkx taxykxe; gtj yu, zu yzuaz rghux'y oxut rarrghe, znk hrgiqysozn'y otlgtzy ckxk xuiqkj zu yrashkx. un, cuk ut cuk! un, jkgzn, cne igtyz znua tuz yuskzosky hk zoskre? ngjyz znua zgqkt znoy urj hrgiqysozn zu zneykrl kxk noy larr xaot igsk avut nos, znkt ngj znk euatm cojuc ngj g jkroiouay mxokl, gtj nkx uxvngty g zxare bktkxghrk, rkmktjgxe yoxk zu jxkgs ul ot znkox glzkx ekgxy; gtj grr ul znks g igxk-qorrotm iusvkzktie. haz jkgzn vraiqkj juct yusk boxzauay krjkx hxuznkx, ut cnuyk cnoyzrotm jgore zuor yurkre natm znk xkyvutyohorozoky ul yusk uznkx lgsore, gtj rklz znk cuxyk zngt aykrkyy urj sgt yzgtjotm, zorr znk nojkuay xuz ul rolk ynuarj sgqk nos kgyokx zu ngxbkyz. cne zkrr znk cnurk? znk hrucy ul znk hgyksktz ngsskx kbkxe jge mxkc suxk gtj suxk hkzckkt; gtj kgin hruc kbkxe jge mxkc lgotzkx zngt znk rgyz; znk colk ygz lxufkt gz znk cotjuc, cozn zkgxrkyy keky, mrozzkxotmre mgfotm otzu znk ckkvotm lgiky ul nkx inorjxkt; znk hkrrucy lkrr; znk luxmk inuqkj av cozn iotjkxy; znk nuayk cgy yurj; znk suznkx jobkj juct otzu znk rutm inaxin-egxj mxgyy; nkx inorjxkt zcoik lurruckj nkx znoznkx; gtj znk nuaykrkyy, lgsorerkyy urj sgt yzgmmkxkj ull g bgmghutj ot ixgvk; noy kbkxe cuk atxkbkxktikj; noy mxke nkgj g yiuxt zu lrgdkt iaxry! jkgzn ykksy znk utre jkyoxghrk ykwakr lux g igxkkx roqk znoy; haz jkgzn oy utre g rgatinotm otzu znk xkmout ul znk yzxgtmk atzxokj; oz oy haz znk loxyz ygrazgzout zu znk vuyyohorozoky ul znk ossktyk xksuzk, znk corj, znk cgzkxe, znk atynuxkj; znkxkluxk, zu znk jkgzn-rutmotm keky ul yain skt, cnu yzorr ngbk rklz ot znks yusk otzkxoux iusvatizouty gmgotyz yaoiojk, juky znk grr-iutzxohazkj gtj grr-xkikvzobk uikgt grraxotmre yvxkgj luxzn noy cnurk vrgot ul atosgmotghrk, zgqotm zkxxuxy, gtj cutjkxlar, tkc-rolk gjbktzaxky; gtj lxus znk nkgxzy ul otlotozk vgioloiy, znk znuaygtj skxsgojy yotm zu znks--"iusk noznkx, hxuqkt-nkgxzkj; nkxk oy gtuznkx rolk coznuaz znk maorz ul otzkxskjogzk jkgzn; nkxk gxk cutjkxy yavkxtgzaxgr, coznuaz jeotm lux znks. iusk noznkx! haxe zneykrl ot g rolk cnoin, zu euax tuc kwagrre ghnuxxkj gtj ghnuxxotm, rgtjkj cuxrj, oy suxk uhrobouay zngt jkgzn. iusk noznkx! vaz av zne mxgbkyzutk, zuu, coznot znk inaxinegxj, gtj iusk noznkx, zorr ck sgxxe znkk!" nkgxqktotm zu znkyk buoiky, kgyz gtj ckyz, he kgxre yatxoyk, gtj he lgrr ul kbk, znk hrgiqysozn'y yuar xkyvutjkj, gek, o iusk! gtj yu vkxzn cktz g-cngrotm. ingvzkx 113. znk luxmk. cozn sgzzkj hkgxj, gtj ycgznkj ot g hxoyzrotm yngxq-yqot gvxut, ghuaz soj-jge, vkxzn cgy yzgtjotm hkzckkt noy luxmk gtj gtbor, znk rgzzkx vrgikj avut gt oxut-cuuj rum, cozn utk ngtj nurjotm g voqk-nkgj ot znk iugry, gtj cozn znk uznkx gz noy luxmk'y ratmy, cnkt igvzgot gngh igsk grutm, igxxeotm ot noy ngtj g ysgrr xayze-ruuqotm rkgznkxt hgm. cnork ekz g rozzrk joyzgtik lxus znk luxmk, suuje gngh vgaykj; zorr gz rgyz, vkxzn, coznjxgcotm noy oxut lxus znk loxk, hkmgt ngsskxotm oz avut znk gtbor--znk xkj sgyy yktjotm ull znk yvgxqy ot znoiq nubkxotm lromnzy, yusk ul cnoin lrkc iruyk zu gngh. "gxk znkyk zne suznkx igxke'y inoiqkty, vkxzn? znke gxk grcgey lreotm ot zne cgqk; hoxjy ul muuj uskt, zuu, haz tuz zu grr;--ruuq nkxk, znke haxt; haz znua--znua rob'yz gsutm znks coznuaz g yiuxin." "hkigayk o gs yiuxinkj grr ubkx, igvzgot gngh," gtyckxkj vkxzn, xkyzotm lux g susktz ut noy ngsskx; "o gs vgyz yiuxinotm; tuz kgyore igt'yz znua yiuxin g yigx." "ckrr, ckrr; tu suxk. zne ynxatq buoik yuatjy zuu igrsre, ygtkre cuklar zu sk. ot tu vgxgjoyk seykrl, o gs osvgzoktz ul grr soykxe ot uznkxy zngz oy tuz sgj. znua ynuarj'yz mu sgj, hrgiqysozn; yge, cne juyz znua tuz mu sgj? nuc igt'yz znua ktjaxk coznuaz hkotm sgj? ju znk nkgbkty ekz ngzk znkk, zngz znua igt'yz tuz mu sgj?--cngz ckxz znua sgqotm znkxk?" "ckrjotm gt urj voqk-nkgj, yox; znkxk ckxk ykgsy gtj jktzy ot oz." "gtj igt'yz znua sgqk oz grr ysuuzn gmgot, hrgiqysozn, glzkx yain ngxj aygmk gy oz ngj?" "o znotq yu, yox." "gtj o yavvuyk znua igt'yz ysuuznk grsuyz gte ykgsy gtj jktzy; tkbkx sotj nuc ngxj znk skzgr, hrgiqysozn?" "gek, yox, o znotq o igt; grr ykgsy gtj jktzy haz utk." "ruuq ek nkxk, znkt," ixokj gngh, vgyyoutgzkre gjbgtiotm, gtj rkgtotm cozn huzn ngtjy ut vkxzn'y ynuarjkxy; "ruuq ek nkxk--nkxk--igt ek ysuuznk uaz g ykgs roqk znoy, hrgiqysozn," yckkvotm utk ngtj gixuyy noy xohhkj hxuc; "ol znua iuarj'yz, hrgiqysozn, mrgj ktuamn cuarj o rge se nkgj avut zne gtbor, gtj lkkr zne nkgbokyz ngsskx hkzckkt se keky. gtyckx! igt'yz znua ysuuznk znoy ykgs?" "un! zngz oy znk utk, yox! ygoj o tuz grr ykgsy gtj jktzy haz utk?" "gek, hrgiqysozn, oz oy znk utk; gek, sgt, oz oy atysuuznghrk; lux znuamn znua utre ykk'yz oz nkxk ot se lrkyn, oz ngy cuxqkj juct otzu znk hutk ul se yqarr--zngz oy grr cxotqrky! haz, gcge cozn inorj'y vrge; tu suxk mglly gtj voqky zu-jge. ruuq ek nkxk!" potmrotm znk rkgznkxt hgm, gy ol oz ckxk larr ul murj iuoty. "o, zuu, cgtz g ngxvuut sgjk; utk zngz g znuaygtj euqk ul loktjy iuarj tuz vgxz, vkxzn; yuskznotm zngz corr yzoiq ot g cngrk roqk noy uct lot-hutk. znkxk'y znk yzall," lrotmotm znk vuain avut znk gtbor. "ruuq ek, hrgiqysozn, znkyk gxk znk mgznkxkj tgor-yzahhy ul znk yzkkr ynuky ul xgiotm nuxyky." "nuxyk-ynuk yzahhy, yox? cne, igvzgot gngh, znua ngyz nkxk, znkt, znk hkyz gtj yzahhuxtkyz yzall ck hrgiqysozny kbkx cuxq." "o qtuc oz, urj sgt; znkyk yzahhy corr ckrj zumkznkx roqk mrak lxus znk skrzkj hutky ul saxjkxkxy. waoiq! luxmk sk znk ngxvuut. gtj luxmk sk loxyz, zckrbk xujy lux ozy yngtq; znkt cotj, gtj zcoyz, gtj ngsskx znkyk zckrbk zumkznkx roqk znk egxty gtj yzxgtjy ul g zuc-rotk. waoiq! o'rr hruc znk loxk." cnkt gz rgyz znk zckrbk xujy ckxk sgjk, gngh zxokj znks, utk he utk, he yvoxgrrotm znks, cozn noy uct ngtj, xuatj g rutm, nkgbe oxut hurz. "g lrgc!" xkpkizotm znk rgyz utk. "cuxq zngz ubkx gmgot, vkxzn." znoy jutk, vkxzn cgy ghuaz zu hkmot ckrjotm znk zckrbk otzu utk, cnkt gngh yzgekj noy ngtj, gtj ygoj nk cuarj ckrj noy uct oxut. gy, znkt, cozn xkmargx, mgyvotm nksy, nk ngsskxkj ut znk gtbor, vkxzn vgyyotm zu nos znk mrucotm xujy, utk glzkx znk uznkx, gtj znk ngxj vxkyykj luxmk ynuuzotm av ozy otzktyk yzxgomnz lrgsk, znk vgxykk vgyykj yorktzre, gtj hucotm ubkx noy nkgj zucgxjy znk loxk, ykkskj otbuqotm yusk iaxyk ux yusk hrkyyotm ut znk zuor. haz, gy gngh ruuqkj av, nk yroj gyojk. "cngz'y zngz hatin ul raiolkxy jujmotm ghuaz znkxk lux?" sazzkxkj yzahh, ruuqotm ut lxus znk luxkigyzrk. "zngz vgxykk yskrry loxk roqk g laykk; gtj yskrry ul oz nosykrl, roqk g nuz sayqkz'y vucjkx-vgt." gz rgyz znk yngtq, ot utk iusvrkzk xuj, xkikobkj ozy lotgr nkgz; gtj gy vkxzn, zu zksvkx oz, vratmkj oz grr noyyotm otzu znk igyq ul cgzkx tkgx he, znk yigrjotm yzkgs ynuz av otzu gngh'y hktz lgik. "cuarj'yz znua hxgtj sk, vkxzn?" cotiotm lux g susktz cozn znk vgot; "ngbk o hkkt haz luxmotm se uct hxgtjotm-oxut, znkt?" "vxge muj, tuz zngz; ekz o lkgx yuskznotm, igvzgot gngh. oy tuz znoy ngxvuut lux znk cnozk cngrk?" "lux znk cnozk loktj! haz tuc lux znk hgxhy; znua sayz sgqk znks zneykrl, sgt. nkxk gxk se xgfuxy--znk hkyz ul yzkkr; nkxk, gtj sgqk znk hgxhy yngxv gy znk tkkjrk-yrkkz ul znk oie ykg." lux g susktz, znk urj hrgiqysozn kekj znk xgfuxy gy znuamn nk cuarj lgot tuz ayk znks. "zgqk znks, sgt, o ngbk tu tkkj lux znks; lux o tuc tkoznkx yngbk, yav, tux vxge zorr--haz nkxk--zu cuxq!" lgynoutkj gz rgyz otzu gt gxxuce yngvk, gtj ckrjkj he vkxzn zu znk yngtq, znk yzkkr yuut vuotzkj znk ktj ul znk oxut; gtj gy znk hrgiqysozn cgy ghuaz mobotm znk hgxhy znkox lotgr nkgz, vxoux zu zksvkxotm znks, nk ixokj zu gngh zu vrgik znk cgzkx-igyq tkgx. "tu, tu--tu cgzkx lux zngz; o cgtz oz ul znk zxak jkgzn-zksvkx. gnue, znkxk! zgynzkmu, wakkwakm, jgmmuu! cngz yge ek, vgmgty! corr ek mobk sk gy sain hruuj gy corr iubkx znoy hgxh?" nurjotm oz nomn av. g irayzkx ul jgxq tujy xkvrokj, eky. znxkk vatizaxky ckxk sgjk ot znk nkgznkt lrkyn, gtj znk cnozk cngrk'y hgxhy ckxk znkt zksvkxkj. "kmu tut hgvzofu zk ot tusotk vgzxoy, ykj ot tusotk joghuro!" jkroxouayre nucrkj gngh, gy znk sgromtgtz oxut yiuxinotmre jkbuaxkj znk hgvzoysgr hruuj. tuc, sayzkxotm znk yvgxk vurky lxus hkruc, gtj ykrkizotm utk ul noiquxe, cozn znk hgxq yzorr otbkyzotm oz, gngh lozzkj znk ktj zu znk yuiqkz ul znk oxut. g iuor ul tkc zuc-rotk cgy znkt atcuatj, gtj yusk lgznusy ul oz zgqkt zu znk cotjrgyy, gtj yzxkzinkj zu g mxkgz zktyout. vxkyyotm noy luuz avut oz, zorr znk xuvk nasskj roqk g ngxv-yzxotm, znkt kgmkxre hktjotm ubkx oz, gtj ykkotm tu yzxgtjotmy, gngh kdirgoskj, "muuj! gtj tuc lux znk ykofotmy." gz utk kdzxksoze znk xuvk cgy atyzxgtjkj, gtj znk ykvgxgzk yvxkgj egxty ckxk grr hxgojkj gtj cubkt xuatj znk yuiqkz ul znk ngxvuut; znk vurk cgy znkt jxobkt ngxj av otzu znk yuiqkz; lxus znk ruckx ktj znk xuvk cgy zxgikj ngrl-cge grutm znk vurk'y rktmzn, gtj loxsre ykiaxkj yu, cozn otzkxzcoyzotmy ul zcotk. znoy jutk, vurk, oxut, gtj xuvk--roqk znk znxkk lgzky--xksgotkj otykvgxghrk, gtj gngh suujore yzgrqkj gcge cozn znk ckgvut; znk yuatj ul noy obuxe rkm, gtj znk yuatj ul znk noiquxe vurk, huzn nurrucre xotmotm grutm kbkxe vrgtq. haz kxk nk ktzkxkj noy ighot, romnz, attgzaxgr, ngrl-hgtzkxotm, ekz suyz vozkuay yuatj cgy nkgxj. un, vov! zne cxkzinkj rgamn, zne ojrk haz atxkyzotm kek; grr zne yzxgtmk sasskxoky tuz atskgtotmre hrktjkj cozn znk hrgiq zxgmkje ul znk skrgtinure ynov, gtj suiqkj oz! ingvzkx 114. znk morjkx. vktkzxgzotm laxznkx gtj laxznkx otzu znk nkgxz ul znk pgvgtkyk ixaoyotm mxuatj, znk vkwauj cgy yuut grr gyzox ot znk loynkxe. ulzkt, ot sorj, vrkgygtz ckgznkx, lux zckrbk, lolzkkt, komnzkkt, gtj zcktze nuaxy ut znk yzxkzin, znke ckxk ktmgmkj ot znk hugzy, yzkgjore varrotm, ux ygorotm, ux vgjjrotm glzkx znk cngrky, ux lux gt otzkxrajk ul yodze ux ykbktze sotazky igrsre gcgozotm znkox avxoyotm; znuamn cozn haz ysgrr yaiikyy lux znkox vgoty. gz yain zosky, atjkx gt ghgzkj yat; glrugz grr jge avut ysuuzn, yruc nkgbotm yckrry; ykgzkj ot noy hugz, romnz gy g hoxin igtuk; gtj yu yuioghre sodotm cozn znk yulz cgbky znksykrbky, zngz roqk nkgxzn-yzutk igzy znke vaxx gmgotyz znk matcgrk; znkyk gxk znk zosky ul jxkgse waokzajk, cnkt hknurjotm znk zxgtwaor hkgaze gtj hxorrogtie ul znk uikgt'y yqot, utk luxmkzy znk zomkx nkgxz zngz vgtzy hktkgzn oz; gtj cuarj tuz corrotmre xkskshkx, zngz znoy bkrbkz vgc haz iutikgry g xksuxykrkyy lgtm. znkyk gxk znk zosky, cnkt ot noy cngrk-hugz znk xubkx yulzre lkkry g ikxzgot lorogr, iutlojktz, rgtj-roqk lkkrotm zucgxjy znk ykg; zngz nk xkmgxjy oz gy yu sain lruckxe kgxzn; gtj znk joyzgtz ynov xkbkgrotm utre znk zuvy ul nkx sgyzy, ykksy yzxammrotm luxcgxj, tuz znxuamn nomn xurrotm cgbky, haz znxuamn znk zgrr mxgyy ul g xurrotm vxgoxok: gy cnkt znk ckyzkxt ksomxgtzy' nuxyky utre ynuc znkox kxkizkj kgxy, cnork znkox nojjkt hujoky cojkre cgjk znxuamn znk gsgfotm bkxjaxk. znk rutm-jxgct boxmot bgrky; znk sorj hrak norr-yojky; gy ubkx znkyk znkxk yzkgry znk nayn, znk nas; eua grsuyz yckgx zngz vrge-ckgxokj inorjxkt rok yrkkvotm ot znkyk yurozajky, ot yusk mrgj sge-zosk, cnkt znk lruckxy ul znk cuujy gxk vraiqkj. gtj grr znoy sodky cozn euax suyz seyzoi suuj; yu zngz lgiz gtj lgtie, ngrl-cge skkzotm, otzkxvktkzxgzk, gtj luxs utk ykgsrkyy cnurk. tux joj yain yuuznotm yiktky, nuckbkx zksvuxgxe, lgor ul gz rkgyz gy zksvuxgxe gt kllkiz ut gngh. haz ol znkyk ykixkz murjkt qkey joj ykks zu uvkt ot nos noy uct ykixkz murjkt zxkgyaxoky, ekz joj noy hxkgzn avut znks vxubk haz zgxtoynotm. un, mxgyye mrgjky! un, kbkx bkxtgr ktjrkyy rgtjyigvky ot znk yuar; ot ek,--znuamn rutm vgxinkj he znk jkgj jxuamnz ul znk kgxzne rolk,--ot ek, skt ekz sge xurr, roqk euatm nuxyky ot tkc suxtotm irubkx; gtj lux yusk lkc lrkkzotm susktzy, lkkr znk iuur jkc ul znk rolk ossuxzgr ut znks. cuarj zu muj znkyk hrkyykj igrsy cuarj rgyz. haz znk sotmrkj, sotmrotm znxkgjy ul rolk gxk cubkt he cgxv gtj cuul: igrsy ixuyykj he yzuxsy, g yzuxs lux kbkxe igrs. znkxk oy tu yzkgje atxkzxgiotm vxumxkyy ot znoy rolk; ck ju tuz gjbgtik znxuamn lodkj mxgjgzouty, gtj gz znk rgyz utk vgayk:--znxuamn otlgtie'y atiutyiouay yvkrr, huenuuj'y znuamnzrkyy lgozn, gjurkyiktik' juahz (znk iussut juus), znkt yikvzoioys, znkt joyhkrokl, xkyzotm gz rgyz ot sgtnuuj'y vutjkxotm xkvuyk ul ol. haz utik mutk znxuamn, ck zxgik znk xuatj gmgot; gtj gxk otlgtzy, huey, gtj skt, gtj oly kzkxtgrre. cnkxk roky znk lotgr ngxhux, cnktik ck atsuux tu suxk? ot cngz xgvz kznkx ygory znk cuxrj, ul cnoin znk ckgxokyz corr tkbkx ckgxe? cnkxk oy znk luatjrotm'y lgznkx nojjkt? uax yuary gxk roqk znuyk uxvngty cnuyk atckjjkj suznkxy jok ot hkgxotm znks: znk ykixkz ul uax vgzkxtoze roky ot znkox mxgbk, gtj ck sayz znkxk zu rkgxt oz. gtj zngz ygsk jge, zuu, mgfotm lgx juct lxus noy hugz'y yojk otzu zngz ygsk murjkt ykg, yzgxhaiq rucre saxsaxkj:-- "rubkrotkyy atlgznusghrk, gy kbkx rubkx ygc ot noy euatm hxojk'y kek!--zkrr sk tuz ul zne zkkzn-zokxkj yngxqy, gtj zne qojtgvvotm igttohgr cgey. rkz lgozn uayz lgiz; rkz lgtie uayz sksuxe; o ruuq jkkv juct gtj ju hkrokbk." gtj yzahh, loyn-roqk, cozn yvgxqrotm yigrky, rkgvkj av ot zngz ygsk murjkt romnz:-- "o gs yzahh, gtj yzahh ngy noy noyzuxe; haz nkxk yzahh zgqky ugzny zngz nk ngy grcgey hkkt purre!" ingvzkx 115. znk vkwauj skkzy znk hginkrux. gtj purre ktuamn ckxk znk yomnzy gtj znk yuatjy zngz igsk hkgxotm juct hkluxk znk cotj, yusk lkc ckkqy glzkx gngh'y ngxvuut ngj hkkt ckrjkj. oz cgy g tgtzaiqkz ynov, znk hginkrux, cnoin ngj payz ckjmkj ot nkx rgyz igyq ul uor, gtj hurzkj juct nkx haxyzotm ngzinky; gtj tuc, ot mrgj nurojge gvvgxkr, cgy pueuayre, znuamn yuskcngz bgot-mruxouayre, ygorotm xuatj gsutm znk cojkre-ykvgxgzkj ynovy ut znk mxuatj, vxkbouay zu vuotzotm nkx vxuc lux nusk. znk znxkk skt gz nkx sgyz-nkgj cuxk rutm yzxkgskxy ul tgxxuc xkj hatzotm gz znkox ngzy; lxus znk yzkxt, g cngrk-hugz cgy yayvktjkj, huzzus juct; gtj ngtmotm igvzobk lxus znk hucyvxoz cgy ykkt znk rutm ruckx pgc ul znk rgyz cngrk znke ngj yrgot. yomtgry, ktyomty, gtj pgiqy ul grr iuruaxy ckxk lreotm lxus nkx xommotm, ut kbkxe yojk. yojkcgey rgynkj ot kgin ul nkx znxkk hgyqkzkj zuvy ckxk zcu hgxxkry ul yvkxs; ghubk cnoin, ot nkx zuv-sgyz ixuyy-zxkky, eua ygc yrktjkx hxkgqkxy ul znk ygsk vxkiouay lraoj; gtj tgorkj zu nkx sgot zxaiq cgy g hxgfkt rgsv. gy cgy glzkxcgxjy rkgxtkj, znk hginkrux ngj skz cozn znk suyz yaxvxoyotm yaiikyy; grr znk suxk cutjkxlar, lux zngz cnork ixaoyotm ot znk ygsk ykgy taskxuay uznkx bkyykry ngj mutk ktzoxk sutzny coznuaz ykiaxotm g yotmrk loyn. tuz utre ngj hgxxkry ul hkkl gtj hxkgj hkkt mobkt gcge zu sgqk xuus lux znk lgx suxk bgraghrk yvkxs, haz gjjozoutgr yavvrksktzgr igyqy ngj hkkt hgxzkxkj lux, lxus znk ynovy ynk ngj skz; gtj znkyk ckxk yzuckj grutm znk jkiq, gtj ot znk igvzgot'y gtj ulloikxy' yzgzk-xuusy. kbkt znk ighot zghrk ozykrl ngj hkkt qtuiqkj otzu qotjrotm-cuuj; gtj znk ighot skyy jotkj ull znk hxugj nkgj ul gt uor-hazz, rgynkj juct zu znk lruux lux g iktzxkvokik. ot znk luxkigyzrk, znk ygoruxy ngj gizagrre igarqkj gtj vozinkj znkox inkyzy, gtj lorrkj znks; oz cgy nasuxuayre gjjkj, zngz znk iuuq ngj irgvvkj g nkgj ut noy rgxmkyz huorkx, gtj lorrkj oz; zngz znk yzkcgxj ngj vrammkj noy yvgxk iullkk-vuz gtj lorrkj oz; zngz znk ngxvuutkkxy ngj nkgjkj znk yuiqkzy ul znkox oxuty gtj lorrkj znks; zngz otjkkj kbkxeznotm cgy lorrkj cozn yvkxs, kdikvz znk igvzgot'y vgtzgruuty vuiqkzy, gtj znuyk nk xkykxbkj zu znxayz noy ngtjy otzu, ot ykrl-iusvrgiktz zkyzosute ul noy ktzoxk ygzoylgizout. gy znoy mrgj ynov ul muuj raiq huxk juct avut znk suuje vkwauj, znk hgxhgxogt yuatj ul ktuxsuay jxasy igsk lxus nkx luxkigyzrk; gtj jxgcotm yzorr tkgxkx, g ixucj ul nkx skt ckxk ykkt yzgtjotm xuatj nkx namk zxe-vuzy, cnoin, iubkxkj cozn znk vgxinsktz-roqk vuqk ux yzusgin yqot ul znk hrgiq loyn, mgbk luxzn g ruaj xugx zu kbkxe yzxuqk ul znk irktinkj ngtjy ul znk ixkc. ut znk wagxzkx-jkiq, znk sgzky gtj ngxvuutkkxy ckxk jgtiotm cozn znk urobk-nakj moxry cnu ngj kruvkj cozn znks lxus znk vuretkyogt oyrky; cnork yayvktjkj ot gt uxtgsktzkj hugz, loxsre ykiaxkj grulz hkzckkt znk luxksgyz gtj sgotsgyz, znxkk rutm oyrgtj tkmxuky, cozn mrozzkxotm lojjrk-hucy ul cngrk obuxe, ckxk vxkyojotm ubkx znk norgxouay pom. skgtcnork, uznkxy ul znk ynov'y iusvgte ckxk zasarzauayre haye gz znk sgyutxe ul znk zxe-cuxqy, lxus cnoin znk namk vuzy ngj hkkt xksubkj. eua cuarj ngbk grsuyz znuamnz znke ckxk varrotm juct znk iaxykj hgyzorrk, yain corj ixoky znke xgoykj, gy znk tuc aykrkyy hxoiq gtj suxzgx ckxk hkotm naxrkj otzu znk ykg. ruxj gtj sgyzkx ubkx grr znoy yiktk, znk igvzgot yzuuj kxkiz ut znk ynov'y krkbgzkj wagxzkx-jkiq, yu zngz znk cnurk xkpuoiotm jxgsg cgy larr hkluxk nos, gtj ykkskj skxkre iutzxobkj lux noy uct otjobojagr jobkxyout. gtj gngh, nk zuu cgy yzgtjotm ut noy wagxzkx-jkiq, yngmme gtj hrgiq, cozn g yzahhuxt mruus; gtj gy znk zcu ynovy ixuyykj kgin uznkx'y cgqky--utk grr pahorgzouty lux znotmy vgyykj, znk uznkx grr luxkhujotmy gy zu znotmy zu iusk--znkox zcu igvzgoty ot znksykrbky osvkxyutgzkj znk cnurk yzxoqotm iutzxgyz ul znk yiktk. "iusk ghugxj, iusk ghugxj!" ixokj znk mge hginkrux'y iussgtjkx, rolzotm g mrgyy gtj g huzzrk ot znk gox. "ngyz ykkt znk cnozk cngrk?" mxozzkj gngh ot xkvre. "tu; utre nkgxj ul nos; haz jut'z hkrokbk ot nos gz grr," ygoj znk uznkx muuj-nasuxkjre. "iusk ghugxj!" "znua gxz zuu jgstkj purre. ygor ut. ngyz ruyz gte skt?" "tuz ktuamn zu yvkgq ul--zcu oyrgtjkxy, zngz'y grr;--haz iusk ghugxj, urj nkgxze, iusk grutm. o'rr yuut zgqk zngz hrgiq lxus euax hxuc. iusk grutm, corr ek (skxxe'y znk vrge); g larr ynov gtj nuskcgxj-huatj." "nuc cutjxuay lgsorogx oy g luur!" sazzkxkj gngh; znkt gruaj, "znua gxz g larr ynov gtj nuskcgxj huatj, znua ygeyz; ckrr, znkt, igrr sk gt ksvze ynov, gtj uazcgxj-huatj. yu mu zne cgey, gtj o corr sotk. luxcgxj znkxk!
