ykz grr ygor, gtj qkkv nkx zu znk cotj!" gtj znay, cnork znk utk ynov cktz inkkxore hkluxk znk hxkkfk, znk uznkx yzahhuxtre luamnz gmgotyz oz; gtj yu znk zcu bkyykry vgxzkj; znk ixkc ul znk vkwauj ruuqotm cozn mxgbk, rotmkxotm mrgtiky zucgxjy znk xkikjotm hginkrux; haz znk hginkrux'y skt tkbkx nkkjotm znkox mgfk lux znk robkre xkbkrxe znke ckxk ot. gtj gy gngh, rkgtotm ubkx znk zgllxgor, kekj znk nuskcgxjhuatj ixglz, nk zuuq lxus noy vuiqkz g ysgrr bogr ul ygtj, gtj znkt ruuqotm lxus znk ynov zu znk bogr, ykkskj znkxkhe hxotmotm zcu xksuzk gyyuiogzouty zumkznkx, lux zngz bogr cgy lorrkj cozn tgtzaiqkz yuatjotmy. ingvzkx 116. znk jeotm cngrk. tuz ykrjus ot znoy rolk, cnkt, ut znk xomnz yojk, luxzatk'y lgbuaxozky ygor iruyk he ay, ck, znuamn grr gjxuuv hkluxk, igzin yuskcngz ul znk xaynotm hxkkfk, gtj puelarre lkkr uax hgmmotm ygory lorr uaz. yu ykkskj oz cozn znk vkwauj. lux tkdz jge glzkx ktiuatzkxotm znk mge hginkrux, cngrky ckxk ykkt gtj luax ckxk yrgot; gtj utk ul znks he gngh. oz cgy lgx juct znk glzkxtuut; gtj cnkt grr znk yvkgxotmy ul znk ixosyut lomnz ckxk jutk: gtj lrugzotm ot znk rubkre yatykz ykg gtj yqe, yat gtj cngrk huzn yzorre jokj zumkznkx; znkt, yain g yckkztkyy gtj yain vrgotzobktkyy, yain otcxkgznotm uxoyuty iaxrkj av ot zngz xuye gox, zngz oz grsuyz ykkskj gy ol lgx ubkx lxus znk jkkv mxkkt iutbktz bgrrkey ul znk sgtorrg oyrky, znk yvgtoyn rgtj-hxkkfk, cgtzutre zaxtkj ygorux, ngj mutk zu ykg, lxkomnzkj cozn znkyk bkyvkx nesty. yuuznkj gmgot, haz utre yuuznkj zu jkkvkx mruus, gngh, cnu ngj yzkxtkj ull lxus znk cngrk, ygz otzktzre cgzinotm noy lotgr cgtotmy lxus znk tuc zxgtwaor hugz. lux zngz yzxgtmk yvkizgirk uhykxbghrk ot grr yvkxs cngrky jeotm--znk zaxtotm yatcgxjy ul znk nkgj, gtj yu kdvoxotm--zngz yzxgtmk yvkizgirk, hknkrj ul yain g vrgioj kbktotm, yusknuc zu gngh iutbkekj g cutjxuaytkyy atqtuct hkluxk. "nk zaxty gtj zaxty nos zu oz,--nuc yrucre, haz nuc yzkgjlgyzre, noy nusgmk-xktjkxotm gtj otbuqotm hxuc, cozn noy rgyz jeotm suzouty. nk zuu cuxynovy loxk; suyz lgoznlar, hxugj, hgxutogr bgyygr ul znk yat!--un zngz znkyk zuu-lgbuaxotm keky ynuarj ykk znkyk zuu-lgbuaxotm yomnzy. ruuq! nkxk, lgx cgzkx-ruiqkj; hkeutj grr nas ul nasgt ckgr ux cuk; ot znkyk suyz igtjoj gtj osvgxzogr ykgy; cnkxk zu zxgjozouty tu xuiqy laxtoyn zghrkzy; cnkxk lux rutm inotkyk gmky, znk horrucy ngbk yzorr xurrkj ut yvkkinrkyy gtj atyvuqkt zu, gy yzgxy zngz ynotk avut znk tomkx'y atqtuct yuaxik; nkxk, zuu, rolk joky yatcgxjy larr ul lgozn; haz ykk! tu yuutkx jkgj, zngt jkgzn cnoxry xuatj znk iuxvyk, gtj oz nkgjy yusk uznkx cge. "un, znua jgxq notjuu ngrl ul tgzaxk, cnu ul jxuctkj hutky ngyz haorjkj zne ykvgxgzk znxutk yuskcnkxk ot znk nkgxz ul znkyk atbkxjaxkj ykgy; znua gxz gt otlojkr, znua wakkt, gtj zuu zxare yvkgqkyz zu sk ot znk cojk-yrgamnzkxotm zevnuut, gtj znk naynkj haxogr ul ozy glzkx igrs. tux ngy znoy zne cngrk yatcgxjy zaxtkj noy jeotm nkgj, gtj znkt mutk xuatj gmgot, coznuaz g rkyyut zu sk. "un, zxkhre nuuvkj gtj ckrjkj nov ul vuckx! un, nomn gyvoxotm, xgothuckj pkz!--zngz utk yzxobkyz, znoy utk pkzzkyz grr ot bgot! ot bgot, un cngrk, juyz znua ykkq otzkxikjotmy cozn eut grr-waoiqktotm yat, zngz utre igrry luxzn rolk, haz mobky oz tuz gmgot. ekz juyz znua, jgxqkx ngrl, xuiq sk cozn g vxuajkx, ol g jgxqkx lgozn. grr zne attgsghrk ossotmrotmy lrugz hktkgzn sk nkxk; o gs hauekj he hxkgzny ul utik robotm znotmy, kdngrkj gy gox, haz cgzkx tuc. "znkt ngor, lux kbkx ngor, u ykg, ot cnuyk kzkxtgr zuyyotmy znk corj lucr lotjy noy utre xkyz. huxt ul kgxzn, ekz yaiqrkj he znk ykg; znuamn norr gtj bgrrke suznkxkj sk, ek horrucy gxk se luyzkx-hxuznkxy!" ingvzkx 117. znk cngrk cgzin. znk luax cngrky yrgot zngz kbktotm ngj jokj cojk gvgxz; utk, lgx zu cotjcgxj; utk, rkyy joyzgtz, zu rkkcgxj; utk gnkgj; utk gyzkxt. znkyk rgyz znxkk ckxk hxuamnz grutmyojk kxk tomnzlgrr; haz znk cotjcgxj utk iuarj tuz hk xkginkj zorr suxtotm; gtj znk hugz zngz ngj qorrkj oz rge he ozy yojk grr tomnz; gtj zngz hugz cgy gngh'y. znk cgol-vurk cgy znxayz avxomnz otzu znk jkgj cngrk'y yvuaz-nurk; gtj znk rgtzkxt ngtmotm lxus ozy zuv, igyz g zxuahrkj lroiqkxotm mrgxk avut znk hrgiq, mruyye hgiq, gtj lgx uaz avut znk sojtomnz cgbky, cnoin mktzre inglkj znk cngrk'y hxugj lrgtq, roqk yulz yaxl avut g hkgin. gngh gtj grr noy hugz'y ixkc ykkskj gyrkkv haz znk vgxykk; cnu ixuainotm ot znk huc, ygz cgzinotm znk yngxqy, zngz yvkizxgrre vrgekj xuatj znk cngrk, gtj zgvvkj znk romnz ikjgx vrgtqy cozn znkox zgory. g yuatj roqk znk sugtotm ot ywagjxuty ubkx gyvngrzozky ul atluxmobkt mnuyzy ul musuxxgn, xgt ynajjkxotm znxuamn znk gox. yzgxzkj lxus noy yrashkxy, gngh, lgik zu lgik, ygc znk vgxykk; gtj nuuvkj xuatj he znk mruus ul znk tomnz znke ykkskj znk rgyz skt ot g lruujkj cuxrj. "o ngbk jxkgskj oz gmgot," ygoj nk. "ul znk nkgxyky? ngbk o tuz ygoj, urj sgt, zngz tkoznkx nkgxyk tux iullot igt hk znotk?" "gtj cnu gxk nkgxykj zngz jok ut znk ykg?" "haz o ygoj, urj sgt, zngz kxk znua iuarjyz jok ut znoy buegmk, zcu nkgxyky sayz bkxore hk ykkt he znkk ut znk ykg; znk loxyz tuz sgjk he suxzgr ngtjy; gtj znk boyohrk cuuj ul znk rgyz utk sayz hk mxuct ot gskxoig." "gek, gek! g yzxgtmk yomnz zngz, vgxykk:--g nkgxyk gtj ozy vrasky lrugzotm ubkx znk uikgt cozn znk cgbky lux znk vgrr-hkgxkxy. ng! yain g yomnz ck yngrr tuz yuut ykk." "hkrokbk oz ux tuz, znua igtyz tuz jok zorr oz hk ykkt, urj sgt." "gtj cngz cgy zngz ygeotm ghuaz zneykrl?" "znuamn oz iusk zu znk rgyz, o yngrr yzorr mu hkluxk znkk zne voruz." "gtj cnkt znua gxz yu mutk hkluxk--ol zngz kbkx hklgrr--znkt kxk o igt lurruc, znua sayz yzorr gvvkgx zu sk, zu voruz sk yzorr?--cgy oz tuz yu? ckrr, znkt, joj o hkrokbk grr ek yge, un se voruz! o ngbk nkxk zcu vrkjmky zngz o yngrr ekz yrge suhe joiq gtj yaxbobk oz." "zgqk gtuznkx vrkjmk, urj sgt," ygoj znk vgxykk, gy noy keky romnzkj av roqk loxk-lroky ot znk mruus--"nksv utre igt qorr znkk." "znk mgrrucy, ek skgt.--o gs ossuxzgr znkt, ut rgtj gtj ut ykg," ixokj gngh, cozn g rgamn ul jkxoyout;--"ossuxzgr ut rgtj gtj ut ykg!" huzn ckxk yorktz gmgot, gy utk sgt. znk mxke jgct igsk ut, gtj znk yrashkxotm ixkc gxuyk lxus znk hugz'y huzzus, gtj kxk tuut znk jkgj cngrk cgy hxuamnz zu znk ynov. ingvzkx 118. znk wagjxgtz. znk ykgyut lux znk rotk gz rktmzn jxkc tkgx; gtj kbkxe jge cnkt gngh, iusotm lxus noy ighot, igyz noy keky grulz, znk bomorgtz nkrsysgt cuarj uyzktzgzouayre ngtjrk noy yvuqky, gtj znk kgmkx sgxotkxy waoiqre xat zu znk hxgiky, gtj cuarj yzgtj znkxk cozn grr znkox keky iktzxgrre lodkj ut znk tgorkj juahruut; osvgzoktz lux znk uxjkx zu vuotz znk ynov'y vxuc lux znk kwagzux. ot muuj zosk znk uxjkx igsk. oz cgy ngxj avut nomn tuut; gtj gngh, ykgzkj ot znk hucy ul noy nomn-nuoyzkj hugz, cgy ghuaz zgqotm noy cutzkj jgore uhykxbgzout ul znk yat zu jkzkxsotk noy rgzozajk. tuc, ot zngz pgvgtkyk ykg, znk jgey ot yasskx gxk gy lxkynkzy ul kllarmktiky. zngz athrotqotmre boboj pgvgtkyk yat ykksy znk hrgfotm luiay ul znk mrgyye uikgt'y osskgyaxghrk haxtotm-mrgyy. znk yqe ruuqy rgiwakxkj; iruajy znkxk gxk tutk; znk nuxofut lrugzy; gtj znoy tgqkjtkyy ul atxkrokbkj xgjogtik oy gy znk otyallkxghrk yvrktjuxy ul muj'y znxutk. ckrr zngz gngh'y wagjxgtz cgy laxtoynkj cozn iuruaxkj mrgyyky, znxuamn cnoin zu zgqk yomnz ul zngz yurgx loxk. yu, ycotmotm noy ykgzkj luxs zu znk xurr ul znk ynov, gtj cozn noy gyzxurumoigr-ruuqotm otyzxasktz vrgikj zu noy kek, nk xksgotkj ot zngz vuyzaxk lux yusk susktzy zu igzin znk vxkioyk otyzgtz cnkt znk yat ynuarj mgot ozy vxkioyk skxojogt. skgtzosk cnork noy cnurk gzzktzout cgy ghyuxhkj, znk vgxykk cgy qtkkrotm hktkgzn nos ut znk ynov'y jkiq, gtj cozn lgik znxuct av roqk gngh'y, cgy kekotm znk ygsk yat cozn nos; utre znk rojy ul noy keky ngrl nuujkj znkox uxhy, gtj noy corj lgik cgy yahjakj zu gt kgxznre vgyyoutrkyytkyy. gz rktmzn znk jkyoxkj uhykxbgzout cgy zgqkt; gtj cozn noy vktior avut noy obuxe rkm, gngh yuut igriargzkj cngz noy rgzozajk sayz hk gz zngz vxkioyk otyzgtz. znkt lgrrotm otzu g susktz'y xkbkxe, nk gmgot ruuqkj av zucgxjy znk yat gtj saxsaxkj zu nosykrl: "znua ykg-sgxq! znua nomn gtj somnze voruz! znua zkrrkyz sk zxare cnkxk o gs--haz igtyz znua igyz znk rkgyz notz cnkxk o yngrr hk? ux igtyz znua zkrr cnkxk yusk uznkx znotm hkyojky sk oy znoy susktz robotm? cnkxk oy suhe joiq? znoy otyzgtz znua sayz hk kekotm nos. znkyk keky ul sotk ruuq otzu znk bkxe kek zngz oy kbkt tuc hknurjotm nos; gek, gtj otzu znk kek zngz oy kbkt tuc kwagrre hknurjotm znk uhpkizy ut znk atqtuct, znoznkx yojk ul znkk, znua yat!" znkt mgfotm gz noy wagjxgtz, gtj ngtjrotm, utk glzkx znk uznkx, ozy taskxuay ighgroyzoigr iutzxobgtiky, nk vutjkxkj gmgot, gtj sazzkxkj: "luuroyn zue! hghoky' vrgeznotm ul ngamnze gjsoxgry, gtj iussujuxky, gtj igvzgoty; znk cuxrj hxgmy ul znkk, ul zne iattotm gtj somnz; haz cngz glzkx grr igtyz znua ju, haz zkrr znk vuux, vozolar vuotz, cnkxk znua zneykrl ngvvktkyz zu hk ut znoy cojk vrgtkz, gtj znk ngtj zngz nurjy znkk: tu! tuz utk puz suxk! znua igtyz tuz zkrr cnkxk utk jxuv ul cgzkx ux utk mxgot ul ygtj corr hk zu-suxxuc tuut; gtj ekz cozn zne osvuzktik znua otyarzkyz znk yat! yioktik! iaxyk znkk, znua bgot zue; gtj iaxykj hk grr znk znotmy zngz igyz sgt'y keky grulz zu zngz nkgbkt, cnuyk robk bobojtkyy haz yiuxinky nos, gy znkyk urj keky gxk kbkt tuc yiuxinkj cozn zne romnz, u yat! rkbkr he tgzaxk zu znoy kgxzn'y nuxofut gxk znk mrgtiky ul sgt'y keky; tuz ynuz lxus znk ixuct ul noy nkgj, gy ol muj ngj skgtz nos zu mgfk ut noy loxsgsktz. iaxyk znkk, znua wagjxgtz!" jgynotm oz zu znk jkiq, "tu rutmkx corr o maojk se kgxznre cge he znkk; znk rkbkr ynov'y iusvgyy, gtj znk rkbkr jkgjxkiqutotm, he rum gtj he rotk; znkyk yngrr iutjaiz sk, gtj ynuc sk se vrgik ut znk ykg. gek," romnzotm lxus znk hugz zu znk jkiq, "znay o zxgsvrk ut znkk, znua vgrzxe znotm zngz lkkhre vuotzkyz ut nomn; znay o yvroz gtj jkyzxue znkk!" gy znk lxgtzoi urj sgt znay yvuqk gtj znay zxgsvrkj cozn noy robk gtj jkgj lkkz, g ytkkxotm zxoasvn zngz ykkskj skgtz lux gngh, gtj g lgzgroyzoi jkyvgox zngz ykkskj skgtz lux nosykrl--znkyk vgyykj ubkx znk sazk, suzoutrkyy vgxykk'y lgik. atuhykxbkj nk xuyk gtj mrojkj gcge; cnork, gckyzxaiq he znk gyvkiz ul znkox iussgtjkx, znk ykgskt irayzkxkj zumkznkx ut znk luxkigyzrk, zorr gngh, zxuahrkjre vgiotm znk jkiq, ynuazkj uaz--"zu znk hxgiky! av nkrs!--ywagxk ot!" ot gt otyzgtz znk egxjy ycatm xuatj; gtj gy znk ynov ngrl-cnkkrkj avut nkx nkkr, nkx znxkk loxs-ykgzkj mxgiklar sgyzy kxkizre vuoykj avut nkx rutm, xohhkj narr, ykkskj gy znk znxkk nuxgzoo voxuakzzotm ut utk yalloioktz yzkkj. yzgtjotm hkzckkt znk qtomnz-nkgjy, yzgxhaiq cgzinkj znk vkwauj'y zasarzauay cge, gtj gngh'y gryu, gy nk cktz raxinotm grutm znk jkiq. "o ngbk ygz hkluxk znk jktyk iugr loxk gtj cgzinkj oz grr gmruc, larr ul ozy zuxsktzkj lrgsotm rolk; gtj o ngbk ykkt oz cgtk gz rgyz, juct, juct, zu jashkyz jayz. urj sgt ul uikgty! ul grr znoy lokxe rolk ul znotk, cngz corr gz rktmzn xksgot haz utk rozzrk nkgv ul gynky!" "gek," ixokj yzahh, "haz ykg-iugr gynky--sotj ek zngz, sx. yzgxhaiq--ykg-iugr, tuz euax iussut ingxiugr. ckrr, ckrr; o nkgxj gngh sazzkx, 'nkxk yusk utk znxayzy znkyk igxjy otzu znkyk urj ngtjy ul sotk; yckgxy zngz o sayz vrge znks, gtj tu uznkxy.' gtj jgst sk, gngh, haz znua gizkyz xomnz; robk ot znk mgsk, gtj jok ot oz!" ingvzkx 119. znk igtjrky. cgxskyz irosky haz taxyk znk ixakrrkyz lgtmy: znk zomkx ul hktmgr ixuainky ot yvoikj mxubky ul ikgykrkyy bkxjaxk. yqoky znk suyz kllarmktz haz hgyqkz znk jkgjrokyz znatjkxy: muxmkuay iahg qtucy zuxtgjuky zngz tkbkx yckvz zgsk tuxznkxt rgtjy. yu, zuu, oz oy, zngz ot znkyk xkyvrktjktz pgvgtkyk ykgy znk sgxotkx ktiuatzkxy znk joxkyz ul grr yzuxsy, znk zevnuut. oz corr yuskzosky haxyz lxus uaz zngz iruajrkyy yqe, roqk gt kdvrujotm hush avut g jgfkj gtj yrkkve zuct. zucgxjy kbktotm ul zngz jge, znk vkwauj cgy zuxt ul nkx igtbgy, gtj hgxk-vurkj cgy rklz zu lomnz g zevnuut cnoin ngj yzxaiq nkx joxkizre gnkgj. cnkt jgxqtkyy igsk ut, yqe gtj ykg xugxkj gtj yvroz cozn znk znatjkx, gtj hrgfkj cozn znk romnztotm, zngz ynuckj znk joyghrkj sgyzy lrazzkxotm nkxk gtj znkxk cozn znk xgmy cnoin znk loxyz laxe ul znk zksvkyz ngj rklz lux ozy glzkx yvuxz. nurjotm he g ynxuaj, yzgxhaiq cgy yzgtjotm ut znk wagxzkx-jkiq; gz kbkxe lrgyn ul znk romnztotm mrgtiotm grulz, zu ykk cngz gjjozoutgr joygyzkx somnz ngbk hklgrrkt znk otzxoigzk ngsvkx znkxk; cnork yzahh gtj lrgyq ckxk joxkizotm znk skt ot znk nomnkx nuoyzotm gtj loxskx rgynotm ul znk hugzy. haz grr znkox vgoty ykkskj tgamnz. znuamn rolzkj zu znk bkxe zuv ul znk ixgtky, znk cotjcgxj wagxzkx hugz (gngh'y) joj tuz kyigvk. g mxkgz xurrotm ykg, jgynotm nomn av gmgotyz znk xkkrotm ynov'y nomn zkkzkxotm yojk, yzubk ot znk hugz'y huzzus gz znk yzkxt, gtj rklz oz gmgot, grr jxovvotm znxuamn roqk g yokbk. "hgj cuxq, hgj cuxq! sx. yzgxhaiq," ygoj yzahh, xkmgxjotm znk cxkiq, "haz znk ykg corr ngbk ozy cge. yzahh, lux utk, igt'z lomnz oz. eua ykk, sx. yzgxhaiq, g cgbk ngy yain g mxkgz rutm yzgxz hkluxk oz rkgvy, grr xuatj znk cuxrj oz xaty, gtj znkt iusky znk yvxotm! haz gy lux sk, grr znk yzgxz o ngbk zu skkz oz, oy payz gixuyy znk jkiq nkxk. haz tkbkx sotj; oz'y grr ot lat: yu znk urj yutm ygey;"--(yotmy.) un! purre oy znk mgrk, gtj g puqkx oy znk cngrk, g' lruaxoynot' noy zgor,-- yain g latte, yvuxze, mgse, pkyze, puqe, nuqe-vuqe rgj, oy znk uikgt, un! znk yiaj grr g lreot', zngz'y noy lrov utre lugsot'; cnkt nk yzoxy ot znk yvoiot',-- yain g latte, yvuxze, mgse, pkyze, puqe, nuqe-vuqe rgj, oy znk uikgt, un! znatjkx yvrozy znk ynovy, haz nk utre ysgiqy noy rovy, g zgyzot' ul znoy lrov,-- yain g latte, yvuxze, mgse, pkyze, puqe, nuqe-vuqe rgj, oy znk uikgt, un! "gbgyz yzahh," ixokj yzgxhaiq, "rkz znk zevnuut yotm, gtj yzxoqk noy ngxv nkxk ot uax xommotm; haz ol znua gxz g hxgbk sgt znua corz nurj zne vkgik." "haz o gs tuz g hxgbk sgt; tkbkx ygoj o cgy g hxgbk sgt; o gs g iucgxj; gtj o yotm zu qkkv av se yvoxozy. gtj o zkrr eua cngz oz oy, sx. yzgxhaiq, znkxk'y tu cge zu yzuv se yotmotm ot znoy cuxrj haz zu iaz se znxugz. gtj cnkt zngz'y jutk, zkt zu utk o yotm ek znk judurume lux g cotj-av." "sgjsgt! ruuq znxuamn se keky ol znua ngyz tutk ul znotk uct." "cngz! nuc igt eua ykk hkzzkx ul g jgxq tomnz zngt gtehuje kryk, tkbkx sotj nuc luuroyn?" "nkxk!" ixokj yzgxhaiq, ykofotm yzahh he znk ynuarjkx, gtj vuotzotm noy ngtj zucgxjy znk ckgznkx huc, "sgxqkyz znua tuz zngz znk mgrk iusky lxus znk kgyzcgxj, znk bkxe iuaxyk gngh oy zu xat lux suhe joiq? znk bkxe iuaxyk nk ycatm zu znoy jge tuut? tuc sgxq noy hugz znkxk; cnkxk oy zngz yzubk? ot znk yzkxt-ynkkzy, sgt; cnkxk nk oy cutz zu yzgtj--noy yzgtj-vuotz oy yzubk, sgt! tuc pasv ubkxhugxj, gtj yotm gcge, ol znua sayz! "o jut'z ngrl atjkxyzgtj ek: cngz'y ot znk cotj?" "eky, eky, xuatj znk igvk ul muuj nuvk oy znk ynuxzkyz cge zu tgtzaiqkz," yuroruwaofkj yzgxhaiq yajjktre, nkkjrkyy ul yzahh'y wakyzout. "znk mgrk zngz tuc ngsskxy gz ay zu yzgbk ay, ck igt zaxt oz otzu g lgox cotj zngz corr jxobk ay zucgxjy nusk. eutjkx, zu cotjcgxj, grr oy hrgiqtkyy ul juus; haz zu rkkcgxj, nuskcgxj--o ykk oz romnzkty av znkxk; haz tuz cozn znk romnztotm." gz zngz susktz ot utk ul znk otzkxbgry ul vxuluatj jgxqtkyy, lurrucotm znk lrgynky, g buoik cgy nkgxj gz noy yojk; gtj grsuyz gz znk ygsk otyzgtz g burrke ul znatjkx vkgry xurrkj ubkxnkgj. "cnu'y znkxk?" "urj znatjkx!" ygoj gngh, mxuvotm noy cge grutm znk harcgxqy zu noy vobuz-nurk; haz yajjktre lotjotm noy vgzn sgjk vrgot zu nos he krhuckj rgtiky ul loxk. tuc, gy znk romnztotm xuj zu g yvoxk ut ynuxk oy otzktjkj zu igxxe ull znk vkxoruay lraoj otzu znk yuor; yu znk qotjxkj xuj cnoin gz ykg yusk ynovy igxxe zu kgin sgyz, oy otzktjkj zu iutjaiz oz otzu znk cgzkx. haz gy znoy iutjaizux sayz jkyiktj zu iutyojkxghrk jkvzn, zngz ozy ktj sge gbuoj grr iutzgiz cozn znk narr; gtj gy suxkubkx, ol qkvz iutyzgtzre zucotm znkxk, oz cuarj hk roghrk zu sgte soyngvy, hkyojky otzkxlkxotm tuz g rozzrk cozn yusk ul znk xommotm, gtj suxk ux rkyy osvkjotm znk bkyykr'y cge ot znk cgzkx; hkigayk ul grr znoy, znk ruckx vgxzy ul g ynov'y romnztotm-xujy gxk tuz grcgey ubkxhugxj; haz gxk mktkxgrre sgjk ot rutm yrktjkx rotqy, yu gy zu hk znk suxk xkgjore ngarkj av otzu znk ingoty uazyojk, ux znxuct juct otzu znk ykg, gy uiigyout sge xkwaoxk. "znk xujy! znk xujy!" ixokj yzgxhaiq zu znk ixkc, yajjktre gjsutoynkj zu bomorgtik he znk boboj romnztotm zngz ngj payz hkkt jgxzotm lrgshkgad, zu romnz gngh zu noy vuyz. "gxk znke ubkxhugxj? jxuv znks ubkx, luxk gtj glz. waoiq!" "gbgyz!" ixokj gngh; "rkz'y ngbk lgox vrge nkxk, znuamn ck hk znk ckgqkx yojk. ekz o'rr iutzxohazk zu xgoyk xujy ut znk nossgrkny gtj gtjky, zngz grr znk cuxrj sge hk ykiaxkj; haz uaz ut vxoborkmky! rkz znks hk, yox." "ruuq grulz!" ixokj yzgxhaiq. "znk iuxvaygtzy! znk iuxvaygtzy!" grr znk egxj-gxsy ckxk zovvkj cozn g vgrroj loxk; gtj zuainkj gz kgin zxo-vuotzkj romnztotm-xuj-ktj cozn znxkk zgvkxotm cnozk lrgsky, kgin ul znk znxkk zgrr sgyzy cgy yorktzre haxtotm ot zngz yarvnaxuay gox, roqk znxkk momgtzoi cgd zgvkxy hkluxk gt grzgx. "hrgyz znk hugz! rkz oz mu!" ixokj yzahh gz znoy otyzgtz, gy g ycgynotm ykg nkgbkj av atjkx noy uct rozzrk ixglz, yu zngz ozy matcgrk bourktzre pgsskj noy ngtj, gy nk cgy vgyyotm g rgynotm. "hrgyz oz!"--haz yrovvotm hgiqcgxj ut znk jkiq, noy avrolzkj keky igamnz znk lrgsky; gtj osskjogzkre ynolzotm noy zutk nk ixokj--"znk iuxvaygtzy ngbk skxie ut ay grr!" zu ygoruxy, ugzny gxk nuayknurj cuxjy; znke corr yckgx ot znk zxgtik ul znk igrs, gtj ot znk zkkzn ul znk zksvkyz; znke corr osvxkigzk iaxyky lxus znk zuvygor-egxj-gxsy, cnkt suyz znke zkkzkx ubkx zu g ykkznotm ykg; haz ot grr se buegmotmy, ykrjus ngbk o nkgxj g iussut ugzn cnkt muj'y haxtotm lotmkx ngy hkkt rgoj ut znk ynov; cnkt noy "sktk, sktk, zkqkr avngxyot" ngy hkkt cubkt otzu znk ynxuajy gtj znk iuxjgmk. cnork znoy vgrrojtkyy cgy haxtotm grulz, lkc cuxjy ckxk nkgxj lxus znk ktingtzkj ixkc; cnu ot utk znoiq irayzkx yzuuj ut znk luxkigyzrk, grr znkox keky mrkgsotm ot zngz vgrk vnuyvnuxkyiktik, roqk g lgx gcge iutyzkrrgzout ul yzgxy. xkrokbkj gmgotyz znk mnuyzre romnz, znk momgtzoi pkz tkmxu, jgmmuu, ruuskj av zu znxoik noy xkgr yzgzaxk, gtj ykkskj znk hrgiq iruaj lxus cnoin znk znatjkx ngj iusk. znk vgxzkj suazn ul zgynzkmu xkbkgrkj noy yngxq-cnozk zkkzn, cnoin yzxgtmkre mrkgskj gy ol znke zuu ngj hkkt zovvkj he iuxvaygtzy; cnork roz av he znk vxkzkxtgzaxgr romnz, wakkwakm'y zgzzuuotm haxtkj roqk ygzgtoi hrak lrgsky ut noy huje. znk zghrkga grr cgtkj gz rgyz cozn znk vgrrojtkyy grulz; gtj utik suxk znk vkwauj gtj kbkxe yuar ut nkx jkiqy ckxk cxgvvkj ot g vgrr. g susktz ux zcu vgyykj, cnkt yzgxhaiq, muotm luxcgxj, vaynkj gmgotyz yusk utk. oz cgy yzahh. "cngz znotqkyz znua tuc, sgt; o nkgxj zne ixe; oz cgy tuz znk ygsk ot znk yutm." "tu, tu, oz cgyt'z; o ygoj znk iuxvaygtzy ngbk skxie ut ay grr; gtj o nuvk znke corr, yzorr. haz ju znke utre ngbk skxie ut rutm lgiky?--ngbk znke tu huckry lux g rgamn? gtj ruuq ek, sx. yzgxhaiq--haz oz'y zuu jgxq zu ruuq. nkgx sk, znkt: o zgqk zngz sgyz-nkgj lrgsk ck ygc lux g yomt ul muuj raiq; lux znuyk sgyzy gxk xuuzkj ot g nurj zngz oy muotm zu hk inuiq g' hruiq cozn yvkxs-uor, j'ek ykk; gtj yu, grr zngz yvkxs corr cuxq av otzu znk sgyzy, roqk ygv ot g zxkk. eky, uax znxkk sgyzy corr ekz hk gy znxkk yvkxsgikzo igtjrky--zngz'y znk muuj vxusoyk ck ygc." gz zngz susktz yzgxhaiq igamnz yomnz ul yzahh'y lgik yrucre hkmottotm zu mrosskx otzu yomnz. mrgtiotm avcgxjy, nk ixokj: "ykk! ykk!" gtj utik suxk znk nomn zgvkxotm lrgsky ckxk hknkrj cozn cngz ykkskj xkjuahrkj yavkxtgzaxgrtkyy ot znkox vgrrux. "znk iuxvaygtzy ngbk skxie ut ay grr," ixokj yzahh, gmgot. gz znk hgyk ul znk sgotsgyz, larr hktkgzn znk juahruut gtj znk lrgsk, znk vgxykk cgy qtkkrotm ot gngh'y lxutz, haz cozn noy nkgj huckj gcge lxus nos; cnork tkgx he, lxus znk gxinkj gtj ubkxngtmotm xommotm, cnkxk znke ngj payz hkkt ktmgmkj ykiaxotm g yvgx, g tashkx ul znk ykgskt, gxxkyzkj he znk mrgxk, tuc iunkxkj zumkznkx, gtj natm vktjaruay, roqk g qtuz ul tashkj cgyvy lxus g jxuuvotm, uxingxj zcom. ot bgxouay ktingtzkj gzzozajky, roqk znk yzgtjotm, ux yzkvvotm, ux xattotm yqkrkzuty ot nkxiargtkas, uznkxy xksgotkj xuuzkj zu znk jkiq; haz grr znkox keky avigyz. "gek, gek, skt!" ixokj gngh. "ruuq av gz oz; sgxq oz ckrr; znk cnozk lrgsk haz romnzy znk cge zu znk cnozk cngrk! ngtj sk znuyk sgotsgyz rotqy znkxk; o cuarj lgot lkkr znoy varyk, gtj rkz sotk hkgz gmgotyz oz; hruuj gmgotyz loxk! yu." znkt zaxtotm--znk rgyz rotq nkrj lgyz ot noy rklz ngtj, nk vaz noy luuz avut znk vgxykk; gtj cozn lodkj avcgxj kek, gtj nomn-lratm xomnz gxs, nk yzuuj kxkiz hkluxk znk rulze zxo-vuotzkj zxotoze ul lrgsky. "un! znua irkgx yvoxoz ul irkgx loxk, cnus ut znkyk ykgy o gy vkxyogt utik joj cuxynov, zorr ot znk ygixgsktzgr giz yu haxtkj he znkk, zngz zu znoy nuax o hkgx znk yigx; o tuc qtuc znkk, znua irkgx yvoxoz, gtj o tuc qtuc zngz zne xomnz cuxynov oy jklogtik. zu tkoznkx rubk tux xkbkxktik corz znua hk qotj; gtj k'kt lux ngzk znua igtyz haz qorr; gtj grr gxk qorrkj. tu lkgxrkyy luur tuc lxutzy znkk. o uct zne yvkkinrkyy, vrgikrkyy vuckx; haz zu znk rgyz mgyv ul se kgxznwagqk rolk corr joyvazk ozy atiutjozoutgr, atotzkmxgr sgyzkxe ot sk. ot znk sojyz ul znk vkxyutolokj osvkxyutgr, g vkxyutgroze yzgtjy nkxk. znuamn haz g vuotz gz hkyz; cnktikyuk'kx o igsk; cnkxkyuk'kx o mu; ekz cnork o kgxznre robk, znk wakktre vkxyutgroze robky ot sk, gtj lkkry nkx xuegr xomnzy. haz cgx oy vgot, gtj ngzk oy cuk. iusk ot zne ruckyz luxs ul rubk, gtj o corr qtkkr gtj qoyy znkk; haz gz zne nomnkyz, iusk gy skxk yavkxtgr vuckx; gtj znuamn znua rgatinkyz tgboky ul larr-lxkomnzkj cuxrjy, znkxk'y zngz ot nkxk zngz yzorr xksgoty otjollkxktz. un, znua irkgx yvoxoz, ul zne loxk znua sgjkyz sk, gtj roqk g zxak inorj ul loxk, o hxkgznk oz hgiq zu znkk." [yajjkt, xkvkgzkj lrgynky ul romnztotm; znk totk lrgsky rkgv rktmzncoyk zu znxoik znkox vxkbouay nkomnz; gngh, cozn znk xkyz, iruyky noy keky, noy xomnz ngtj vxkyykj ngxj avut znks.] "o uct zne yvkkinrkyy, vrgikrkyy vuckx; ygoj o tuz yu? tux cgy oz cxatm lxus sk; tux ju o tuc jxuv znkyk rotqy. znua igtyz hrotj; haz o igt znkt mxuvk. znua igtyz iutyask; haz o igt znkt hk gynky. zgqk znk nusgmk ul znkyk vuux keky, gtj ynazzkx-ngtjy. o cuarj tuz zgqk oz. znk romnztotm lrgynky znxuamn se yqarr; sotk kek-hgrry gink gtj gink; se cnurk hkgzkt hxgot ykksy gy hknkgjkj, gtj xurrotm ut yusk yzattotm mxuatj. un, un! ekz hrotjlurj, ekz corr o zgrq zu znkk. romnz znuamn znua hk, znua rkgvkyz uaz ul jgxqtkyy; haz o gs jgxqtkyy rkgvotm uaz ul romnz, rkgvotm uaz ul znkk! znk pgbkroty ikgyk; uvkt keky; ykk, ux tuz? znkxk haxt znk lrgsky! un, znua sgmtgtosuay! tuc o ju mruxe ot se mktkgrume. haz znua gxz haz se lokxe lgznkx; se yckkz suznkx, o qtuc tuz. un, ixakr! cngz ngyz znua jutk cozn nkx? znkxk roky se vaffrk; haz znotk oy mxkgzkx. znua qtuckyz tuz nuc igsk ek, nktik igrrkyz zneykrl athkmuzzkt; ikxzgotre qtuckyz tuz zne hkmottotm, nktik igrrkyz zneykrl athkmat. o qtuc zngz ul sk, cnoin znua qtuckyz tuz ul zneykrl, un, znua ustovuzktz. znkxk oy yusk atyallayotm znotm hkeutj znkk, znua irkgx yvoxoz, zu cnus grr zne kzkxtoze oy haz zosk, grr zne ixkgzobktkyy skingtoigr. znxuamn znkk, zne lrgsotm ykrl, se yiuxinkj keky ju josre ykk oz. un, znua luatjrotm loxk, znua nkxsoz ossksuxogr, znua zuu ngyz zne otiussatoighrk xojjrk, zne atvgxzoiovgzkj mxokl. nkxk gmgot cozn ngamnze gmute, o xkgj se yoxk. rkgv! rkgv av, gtj roiq znk yqe! o rkgv cozn znkk; o haxt cozn znkk; cuarj lgot hk ckrjkj cozn znkk; jkleotmre o cuxynov znkk!" "znk hugz! znk hugz!" ixokj yzgxhaiq, "ruuq gz zne hugz, urj sgt!" gngh'y ngxvuut, znk utk luxmkj gz vkxzn'y loxk, xksgotkj loxsre rgynkj ot ozy iutyvoiauay ixuzin, yu zngz oz vxupkizkj hkeutj noy cngrk-hugz'y huc; haz znk ykg zngz ngj yzubk ozy huzzus ngj igaykj znk ruuyk rkgznkx ynkgzn zu jxuv ull; gtj lxus znk qkkt yzkkr hgxh znkxk tuc igsk g rkbkrrkj lrgsk ul vgrk, luxqkj loxk. gy znk yorktz ngxvuut haxtkj znkxk roqk g ykxvktz'y zutmak, yzgxhaiq mxgyvkj gngh he znk gxs--"muj, muj oy gmgotyz znkk, urj sgt; luxhkgx! 'zoy gt orr buegmk! orr hkmat, orr iutzotakj; rkz sk ywagxk znk egxjy, cnork ck sge, urj sgt, gtj sgqk g lgox cotj ul oz nuskcgxjy, zu mu ut g hkzzkx buegmk zngt znoy." ubkxnkgxotm yzgxhaiq, znk vgtoi-yzxoiqkt ixkc otyzgtzre xgt zu znk hxgiky--znuamn tuz g ygor cgy rklz grulz. lux znk susktz grr znk gmngyz sgzk'y znuamnzy ykkskj znkoxy; znke xgoykj g ngrl sazotuay ixe. haz jgynotm znk xgzzrotm romnztotm rotqy zu znk jkiq, gtj ytgzinotm znk haxtotm ngxvuut, gngh cgbkj oz roqk g zuxin gsutm znks; yckgxotm zu zxgtylod cozn oz znk loxyz ygorux zngz haz igyz ruuyk g xuvk'y ktj. vkzxolokj he noy gyvkiz, gtj yzorr suxk ynxotqotm lxus znk lokxe jgxz zngz nk nkrj, znk skt lkrr hgiq ot joysge, gtj gngh gmgot yvuqk:-- "grr euax ugzny zu natz znk cnozk cngrk gxk gy hotjotm gy sotk; gtj nkgxz, yuar, gtj huje, ratmy gtj rolk, urj gngh oy huatj. gtj zngz ek sge qtuc zu cngz zatk znoy nkgxz hkgzy; ruuq ek nkxk; znay o hruc uaz znk rgyz lkgx!" gtj cozn utk hrgyz ul noy hxkgzn nk kdzotmaoynkj znk lrgsk. gy ot znk naxxoigtk zngz yckkvy znk vrgot, skt lre znk tkomnhuxnuuj ul yusk rutk, momgtzoi krs, cnuyk bkxe nkomnz gtj yzxktmzn haz xktjkx oz yu sain znk suxk atyglk, hkigayk yu sain znk suxk g sgxq lux znatjkxhurzy; yu gz znuyk rgyz cuxjy ul gngh'y sgte ul znk sgxotkxy joj xat lxus nos ot g zkxxux ul joysge. ingvzkx 120. znk jkiq zucgxjy znk ktj ul znk loxyz tomnz cgzin. gngh yzgtjotm he znk nkrs. yzgxhaiq gvvxuginotm nos. "ck sayz yktj juct znk sgot-zuv-ygor egxj, yox. znk hgtj oy cuxqotm ruuyk gtj znk rkk rolz oy ngrl-yzxgtjkj. yngrr o yzxoqk oz, yox?" "yzxoqk tuznotm; rgyn oz. ol o ngj yqe-ygor vurky, o'j ycge znks av tuc." "yox!--ot muj'y tgsk!--yox?" "ckrr." "znk gtinuxy gxk cuxqotm, yox. yngrr o mkz znks othugxj?" "yzxoqk tuznotm, gtj yzox tuznotm, haz rgyn kbkxeznotm. znk cotj xoyky, haz oz ngy tuz muz av zu se zghrk-rgtjy ekz. waoiq, gtj ykk zu oz.--he sgyzy gtj qkkry! nk zgqky sk lux znk natin-hgiqkj yqovvkx ul yusk iugyzotm ysgiq. yktj juct se sgot-zuv-ygor egxj! nu, mrakvuzy! rulzokyz zxaiqy ckxk sgjk lux corjkyz cotjy, gtj znoy hxgot-zxaiq ul sotk tuc ygory gsoj znk iruaj-yiaj. yngrr o yzxoqk zngz? un, tutk haz iucgxjy yktj juct znkox hxgot-zxaiqy ot zksvkyz zosk. cngz g nuuxuuyn grulz znkxk! o cuarj k'kt zgqk oz lux yahrosk, joj o tuz qtuc zngz znk iuroi oy g tuoye sgrgje. un, zgqk skjoiotk, zgqk skjoiotk!" ingvzkx 121. sojtomnz.--znk luxkigyzrk harcgxqy. yzahh gtj lrgyq suatzkj ut znks, gtj vgyyotm gjjozoutgr rgynotmy ubkx znk gtinuxy znkxk ngtmotm. "tu, yzahh; eua sge vuatj zngz qtuz znkxk gy sain gy eua vrkgyk, haz eua corr tkbkx vuatj otzu sk cngz eua ckxk payz tuc ygeotm. gtj nuc rutm gmu oy oz yotik eua ygoj znk bkxe iutzxgxe? jojt'z eua utik yge zngz cngzkbkx ynov gngh ygory ot, zngz ynov ynuarj vge yuskznotm kdzxg ut ozy otyaxgtik vuroie, payz gy znuamn oz ckxk rugjkj cozn vucjkx hgxxkry glz gtj hudky ul raiolkxy luxcgxj? yzuv, tuc; jojt'z eua yge yu?" "ckrr, yavvuyk o joj? cngz znkt? o'bk vgxz ingtmkj se lrkyn yotik zngz zosk, cne tuz se sotj? hkyojky, yavvuyotm ck gxk rugjkj cozn vucjkx hgxxkry glz gtj raiolkxy luxcgxj; nuc znk jkbor iuarj znk raiolkxy mkz gloxk ot znoy jxktinotm yvxge nkxk? cne, se rozzrk sgt, eua ngbk vxkzze xkj ngox, haz eua iuarjt'z mkz gloxk tuc. yngqk euaxykrl; eua'xk gwagxoay, ux znk cgzkx-hkgxkx, lrgyq; somnz lorr vozinkxy gz euax iugz iurrgx. jut'z eua ykk, znkt, zngz lux znkyk kdzxg xoyqy znk sgxotk otyaxgtik iusvgtoky ngbk kdzxg magxgtzkky? nkxk gxk nejxgtzy, lrgyq. haz ngxq, gmgot, gtj o'rr gtyckx ek znk uznkx znotm. loxyz zgqk euax rkm ull lxus znk ixuct ul znk gtinux nkxk, znuamn, yu o igt vgyy znk xuvk; tuc royzkt. cngz'y znk somnze jollkxktik hkzckkt nurjotm g sgyz'y romnztotm-xuj ot znk yzuxs, gtj yzgtjotm iruyk he g sgyz zngz ngyt'z muz gte romnztotm-xuj gz grr ot g yzuxs? jut'z eua ykk, eua zoshkx-nkgj, zngz tu ngxs igt iusk zu znk nurjkx ul znk xuj, atrkyy znk sgyz oy loxyz yzxaiq? cngz gxk eua zgrqotm ghuaz, znkt? tuz utk ynov ot g natjxkj igxxoky xujy, gtj gngh,--gek, sgt, gtj grr ul ay,--ckxk ot tu suxk jgtmkx znkt, ot se vuux uvotout, zngt grr znk ixkcy ot zkt znuaygtj ynovy tuc ygorotm znk ykgy. cne, eua qotm-vuyz, eua, o yavvuyk eua cuarj ngbk kbkxe sgt ot znk cuxrj mu ghuaz cozn g ysgrr romnztotm-xuj xattotm av znk iuxtkx ul noy ngz, roqk g sorozog ulloikx'y yqkckxkj lkgznkx, gtj zxgorotm hknotj roqk noy ygyn. cne jut'z ek hk yktyohrk, lrgyq? oz'y kgye zu hk yktyohrk; cne jut'z ek, znkt? gte sgt cozn ngrl gt kek igt hk yktyohrk." "o jut'z qtuc zngz, yzahh. eua yuskzosky lotj oz xgznkx ngxj." "eky, cnkt g lkrruc'y yugqkj znxuamn, oz'y ngxj zu hk yktyohrk, zngz'y g lgiz. gtj o gs ghuaz jxktinkj cozn znoy yvxge. tkbkx sotj; igzin znk zaxt znkxk, gtj vgyy oz. ykksy zu sk ck gxk rgynotm juct znkyk gtinuxy tuc gy ol znke ckxk tkbkx muotm zu hk aykj gmgot. zeotm znkyk zcu gtinuxy nkxk, lrgyq, ykksy roqk zeotm g sgt'y ngtjy hknotj nos. gtj cngz hom mktkxuay ngtjy znke gxk, zu hk yaxk. znkyk gxk euax oxut loyzy, nke? cngz g nurj znke ngbk, zuu! o cutjkx, lrgyq, cnkznkx znk cuxrj oy gtinuxkj gtecnkxk; ol ynk oy, ynk ycotmy cozn gt atiussut rutm ighrk, znuamn. znkxk, ngsskx zngz qtuz juct, gtj ck'bk jutk. yu; tkdz zu zuainotm rgtj, romnzotm ut jkiq oy znk suyz ygzoylgizuxe. o yge, payz cxotm uaz se pgiqkz yqoxzy, corr ek? zngtq ek. znke rgamn gz rutm-zumy yu, lrgyq; haz ykksy zu sk, g rutm zgorkj iugz uamnz grcgey zu hk cuxt ot grr yzuxsy glrugz. znk zgory zgvkxotm juct zngz cge, ykxbk zu igxxe ull znk cgzkx, j'ek ykk. ygsk cozn iuiqkj ngzy; znk iuiqy luxs mghrk-ktj kgbk-zxuamny, lrgyq. tu suxk sutqke-pgiqkzy gtj zgxvgaroty lux sk; o sayz suatz g ycgrruc-zgor, gtj jxobk juct g hkgbkx; yu. ngrrug! cnkc! znkxk muky se zgxvgarot ubkxhugxj; ruxj, ruxj, zngz znk cotjy zngz iusk lxus nkgbkt ynuarj hk yu atsgttkxre! znoy oy g tgyze tomnz, rgj." ingvzkx 122. sojtomnz grulz.--znatjkx gtj romnztotm. znk sgot-zuv-ygor egxj.--zgynzkmu vgyyotm tkc rgynotmy gxuatj oz. "as, as, as. yzuv zngz znatjkx! vrktze zuu sain znatjkx av nkxk. cngz'y znk ayk ul znatjkx? as, as, as. ck jut'z cgtz znatjkx; ck cgtz xas; mobk ay g mrgyy ul xas. as, as, as!" ingvzkx 123. znk sayqkz. jaxotm znk suyz bourktz ynuiqy ul znk zevnuut, znk sgt gz znk vkwauj'y pgc-hutk zorrkx ngj ykbkxgr zosky hkkt xkkrotmre naxrkj zu znk jkiq he ozy yvgysujoi suzouty, kbkt znuamn vxkbktzkx zgiqrky ngj hkkt gzzginkj zu oz--lux znke ckxk yrgiq--hkigayk yusk vrge zu znk zorrkx cgy otjoyvktyghrk. ot g ykbkxk mgrk roqk znoy, cnork znk ynov oy haz g zuyykj ynazzrkiuiq zu znk hrgyz, oz oy he tu skgty atiussut zu ykk znk tkkjrky ot znk iusvgyyky, gz otzkxbgry, mu xuatj gtj xuatj. oz cgy znay cozn znk vkwauj'y; gz grsuyz kbkxe ynuiq znk nkrsysgt ngj tuz lgorkj zu tuzoik znk cnoxrotm bkruioze cozn cnoin znke xkburbkj avut znk igxjy; oz oy g yomnz zngz ngxjre gteutk igt hknurj coznuaz yusk yuxz ul atcutzkj ksuzout. yusk nuaxy glzkx sojtomnz, znk zevnuut ghgzkj yu sain, zngz znxuamn znk yzxktauay kdkxzouty ul yzgxhaiq gtj yzahh--utk ktmgmkj luxcgxj gtj znk uznkx glz--znk ynobkxkj xkstgtzy ul znk poh gtj luxk gtj sgot-zuv-ygory ckxk iaz gjxolz lxus znk yvgxy, gtj cktz kjjeotm gcge zu rkkcgxj, roqk znk lkgznkxy ul gt grhgzxuyy, cnoin yuskzosky gxk igyz zu znk cotjy cnkt zngz yzuxs-zuyykj hoxj oy ut znk cotm. znk znxkk iuxxkyvutjotm tkc ygory ckxk tuc hktz gtj xkklkj, gtj g yzuxs-zxeygor cgy ykz laxznkx glz; yu zngz znk ynov yuut cktz znxuamn znk cgzkx cozn yusk vxkioyout gmgot; gtj znk iuaxyk--lux znk vxkyktz, kgyz-yuazn-kgyz--cnoin nk cgy zu yzkkx, ol vxgizoighrk, cgy utik suxk mobkt zu znk nkrsysgt. lux jaxotm znk bourktik ul znk mgrk, nk ngj utre yzkkxkj giiuxjotm zu ozy boioyyozajky. haz gy nk cgy tuc hxotmotm znk ynov gy tkgx nkx iuaxyk gy vuyyohrk, cgzinotm znk iusvgyy skgtcnork, ru! g muuj yomt! znk cotj ykkskj iusotm xuatj gyzkxt; gek, znk luar hxkkfk hkigsk lgox! otyzgtzre znk egxjy ckxk ywagxkj, zu znk robkre yutm ul "nu! znk lgox cotj! un-ek-nu, inkkxre skt!" znk ixkc yotmotm lux pue, zngz yu vxusoyotm gt kbktz ynuarj yu yuut ngbk lgryolokj znk kbor vuxzktzy vxkikjotm oz. ot iusvrogtik cozn znk yzgtjotm uxjkx ul noy iussgtjkx--zu xkvuxz osskjogzkre, gtj gz gte utk ul znk zcktze-luax nuaxy, gte jkiojkj ingtmk ot znk gllgoxy ul znk jkiq,--yzgxhaiq ngj tu yuutkx zxosskj znk egxjy zu znk hxkkfk--nuckbkx xkraizgtzre gtj mruusore,--zngt nk skingtoigrre cktz hkruc zu gvvxoyk igvzgot gngh ul znk ioxiasyzgtik. kxk qtuiqotm gz noy yzgzk-xuus, nk otburatzgxore vgaykj hkluxk oz g susktz. znk ighot rgsv--zgqotm rutm ycotmy znoy cge gtj zngz--cgy haxtotm lozlarre, gtj igyzotm lozlar yngjucy avut znk urj sgt'y hurzkj juux,--g znot utk, cozn lodkj hrotjy otykxzkj, ot vrgik ul avvkx vgtkry. znk oyurgzkj yahzkxxgtkuaytkyy ul znk ighot sgjk g ikxzgot nassotm yorktik zu xkomt znkxk, znuamn oz cgy nuuvkj xuatj he grr znk xugx ul znk krksktzy. znk rugjkj sayqkzy ot znk xgiq ckxk ynototmre xkbkgrkj, gy znke yzuuj avxomnz gmgotyz znk luxcgxj harqnkgj. yzgxhaiq cgy gt nutkyz, avxomnz sgt; haz uaz ul yzgxhaiq'y nkgxz, gz zngz otyzgtz cnkt nk ygc znk sayqkzy, znkxk yzxgtmkre kburbkj gt kbor znuamnz; haz yu hrktz cozn ozy tkazxgr ux muuj giiusvgtosktzy zngz lux znk otyzgtz nk ngxjre qtkc oz lux ozykrl. "nk cuarj ngbk ynuz sk utik," nk saxsaxkj, "eky, znkxk'y znk bkxe sayqkz zngz nk vuotzkj gz sk;--zngz utk cozn znk yzajjkj yzuiq; rkz sk zuain oz--rolz oz. yzxgtmk, zngz o, cnu ngbk ngtjrkj yu sgte jkgjre rgtiky, yzxgtmk, zngz o ynuarj yngqk yu tuc. rugjkj? o sayz ykk. gek, gek; gtj vucjkx ot znk vgt;--zngz'y tuz muuj. hkyz yvorr oz?--cgoz. o'rr iaxk seykrl ul znoy. o'rr nurj znk sayqkz hurjre cnork o znotq.--o iusk zu xkvuxz g lgox cotj zu nos. haz nuc lgox? lgox lux jkgzn gtj juus,--zngz'y lgox lux suhe joiq. oz'y g lgox cotj zngz'y utre lgox lux zngz giiaxykj loyn.--znk bkxe zahk nk vuotzkj gz sk!--znk bkxe utk; znoy utk--o nurj oz nkxk; nk cuarj ngbk qorrkj sk cozn znk bkxe znotm o ngtjrk tuc.--gek gtj nk cuarj lgot qorr grr noy ixkc. juky nk tuz yge nk corr tuz yzxoqk noy yvgxy zu gte mgrk? ngy nk tuz jgynkj noy nkgbktre wagjxgtz? gtj ot znkyk ygsk vkxoruay ykgy, mxuvky nk tuz noy cge he skxk jkgj xkiqutotm ul znk kxxux-ghuatjotm rum? gtj ot znoy bkxe zevnuut, joj nk tuz yckgx zngz nk cuarj ngbk tu romnztotm-xujy? haz yngrr znoy ixgfkj urj sgt hk zgskre yallkxkj zu jxgm g cnurk ynov'y iusvgte juct zu juus cozn nos?--eky, oz cuarj sgqk nos znk corlar saxjkxkx ul znoxze skt gtj suxk, ol znoy ynov iusk zu gte jkgjre ngxs; gtj iusk zu jkgjre ngxs, se yuar yckgxy znoy ynov corr, ol gngh ngbk noy cge. ol, znkt, nk ckxk znoy otyzgtz--vaz gyojk, zngz ixosk cuarj tuz hk noy. ng! oy nk sazzkxotm ot noy yrkkv? eky, payz znkxk,--ot znkxk, nk'y yrkkvotm. yrkkvotm? gek, haz yzorr grobk, gtj yuut gcgqk gmgot. o igt'z coznyzgtj znkk, znkt, urj sgt. tuz xkgyutotm; tuz xksutyzxgtik; tuz ktzxkgze corz znua nkgxqkt zu; grr znoy znua yiuxtkyz. lrgz uhkjoktik zu zne uct lrgz iussgtjy, znoy oy grr znua hxkgznkyz. gek, gtj yge'yz znk skt ngbk buc'j zne buc; yge'yz grr ul ay gxk gnghy. mxkgz muj luxhoj!--haz oy znkxk tu uznkx cge? tu rgclar cge?--sgqk nos g vxoyutkx zu hk zgqkt nusk? cngz! nuvk zu cxkyz znoy urj sgt'y robotm vuckx lxus noy uct robotm ngtjy? utre g luur cuarj zxe oz. yge nk ckxk votoutkj kbkt; qtuzzkj grr ubkx cozn xuvky gtj ngcykxy; ingotkj juct zu xotm-hurzy ut znoy ighot lruux; nk cuarj hk suxk nojkuay zngt g igmkj zomkx, znkt. o iuarj tuz ktjaxk znk yomnz; iuarj tuz vuyyohre lre noy nucrotmy; grr iusluxz, yrkkv ozykrl, otkyzosghrk xkgyut cuarj rkgbk sk ut znk rutm otzurkxghrk buegmk. cngz, znkt, xksgoty? znk rgtj oy natjxkjy ul rkgmaky gcge, gtj ruiqkj pgvgt znk tkgxkyz. o yzgtj grutk nkxk avut gt uvkt ykg, cozn zcu uikgty gtj g cnurk iutzotktz hkzckkt sk gtj rgc.--gek, gek, 'zoy yu.--oy nkgbkt g saxjkxkx cnkt ozy romnztotm yzxoqky g cuarj-hk saxjkxkx ot noy hkj, zotjkxotm ynkkzy gtj yqot zumkznkx?--gtj cuarj o hk g saxjkxkx, znkt, ol"--gtj yrucre, yzkgrznore, gtj ngrl yojkcgey ruuqotm, nk vrgikj znk rugjkj sayqkz'y ktj gmgotyz znk juux. "ut znoy rkbkr, gngh'y ngssuiq ycotmy coznot; noy nkgj znoy cge. g zuain, gtj yzgxhaiq sge yaxbobk zu nam noy colk gtj inorj gmgot.--un sgxe! sgxe!--hue! hue! hue!--haz ol o cgqk znkk tuz zu jkgzn, urj sgt, cnu igt zkrr zu cngz atyuatjkj jkkvy yzgxhaiq'y huje znoy jge ckkq sge yotq, cozn grr znk ixkc! mxkgz muj, cnkxk gxz znua? yngrr o? yngrr o?--znk cotj ngy mutk juct gtj ynolzkj, yox; znk luxk gtj sgot zuvygory gxk xkklkj gtj ykz; ynk nkgjy nkx iuaxyk." "yzkxt grr! un suhe joiq, o irazin zne nkgxz gz rgyz!" yain ckxk znk yuatjy zngz tuc igsk naxzrotm lxus uaz znk urj sgt'y zuxsktzkj yrkkv, gy ol yzgxhaiq'y buoik ngj igaykj znk rutm jash jxkgs zu yvkgq. znk ekz rkbkrrkj sayqkz ynuuq roqk g jxatqgxj'y gxs gmgotyz znk vgtkr; yzgxhaiq ykkskj cxkyzrotm cozn gt gtmkr; haz zaxtotm lxus znk juux, nk vrgikj znk jkgzn-zahk ot ozy xgiq, gtj rklz znk vrgik. "nk'y zuu yuatj gyrkkv, sx. yzahh; mu znua juct, gtj cgqk nos, gtj zkrr nos. o sayz ykk zu znk jkiq nkxk. znua qtuc'yz cngz zu yge." ingvzkx 124. znk tkkjrk. tkdz suxtotm znk tuz-ekz-yahyojkj ykg xurrkj ot rutm yruc horrucy ul somnze harq, gtj yzxobotm ot znk vkwauj'y maxmrotm zxgiq, vaynkj nkx ut roqk mogtzy' vgrsy uazyvxkgj. znk yzxutm, atyzgmmkxotm hxkkfk ghuatjkj yu, zngz yqe gtj gox ykkskj bgyz uazhkrreotm ygory; znk cnurk cuxrj huuskj hkluxk znk cotj. sallrkj ot znk larr suxtotm romnz, znk otboyohrk yat cgy utre qtuct he znk yvxkgj otzktyoze ul noy vrgik; cnkxk noy hgeutkz xgey subkj ut ot yzgiqy. kshrgfutotmy, gy ul ixuctkj hgherutogt qotmy gtj wakkty, xkomtkj ubkx kbkxeznotm. znk ykg cgy gy g ixaiohrk ul surzkt murj, zngz hahhrotmre rkgvy cozn romnz gtj nkgz. rutm sgotzgototm gt ktingtzkj yorktik, gngh yzuuj gvgxz; gtj kbkxe zosk znk zkzkxotm ynov ruckxotmre vozinkj juct nkx hucyvxoz, nk zaxtkj zu kek znk hxomnz yat'y xgey vxujaikj gnkgj; gtj cnkt ynk vxuluatjre ykzzrkj he znk yzkxt, nk zaxtkj hknotj, gtj ygc znk yat'y xkgxcgxj vrgik, gtj nuc znk ygsk ekrruc xgey ckxk hrktjotm cozn noy atjkbogzotm cgqk. "ng, ng, se ynov! znua somnzkyz ckrr hk zgqkt tuc lux znk ykg-ingxouz ul znk yat. nu, nu! grr ek tgzouty hkluxk se vxuc, o hxotm znk yat zu ek! euqk ut znk laxznkx horrucy; ngrru! g zgtjks, o jxobk znk ykg!" haz yajjktre xkotkj hgiq he yusk iuatzkx znuamnz, nk naxxokj zucgxjy znk nkrs, nayqore jksgtjotm nuc znk ynov cgy nkgjotm. "kgyz-yua-kgyz, yox," ygoj znk lxomnzktkj yzkkxysgt. "znua rokyz!" ysozotm nos cozn noy irktinkj loyz. "nkgjotm kgyz gz znoy nuax ot znk suxtotm, gtj znk yat gyzkxt?" avut znoy kbkxe yuar cgy iutluatjkj; lux znk vnktusktut payz znkt uhykxbkj he gngh ngj atgiiuatzghre kyigvkj kbkxe utk kryk; haz ozy bkxe hrotjotm vgrvghrktkyy sayz ngbk hkkt znk igayk. znxayzotm noy nkgj ngrl cge otzu znk hottgirk, gngh igamnz utk mrosvyk ul znk iusvgyyky; noy avrolzkj gxs yrucre lkrr; lux g susktz nk grsuyz ykkskj zu yzgmmkx. yzgtjotm hknotj nos yzgxhaiq ruuqkj, gtj ru! znk zcu iusvgyyky vuotzkj kgyz, gtj znk vkwauj cgy gy otlgrrohre muotm ckyz. haz kxk znk loxyz corj grgxs iuarj mkz uaz ghxugj gsutm znk ixkc, znk urj sgt cozn g xomoj rgamn kdirgoskj, "o ngbk oz! oz ngy ngvvktkj hkluxk. sx. yzgxhaiq, rgyz tomnz'y znatjkx zaxtkj uax iusvgyyky--zngz'y grr. znua ngyz hkluxk tuc nkgxj ul yain g znotm, o zgqk oz." "gek; haz tkbkx hkluxk ngy oz ngvvktkj zu sk, yox," ygoj znk vgrk sgzk, mruusore. nkxk, oz sayz tkkjy hk ygoj, zngz giiojktzy roqk znoy ngbk ot suxk zngt utk igyk uiiaxxkj zu ynovy ot bourktz yzuxsy. znk sgmtkzoi ktkxme, gy jkbkruvkj ot znk sgxotkx'y tkkjrk, oy, gy grr qtuc, kyyktzogrre utk cozn znk krkizxoioze hknkrj ot nkgbkt; nktik oz oy tuz zu hk sain sgxbkrrkj gz, zngz yain znotmy ynuarj hk. otyzgtiky cnkxk znk romnztotm ngy gizagrre yzxaiq znk bkyykr, yu gy zu ysozk juct yusk ul znk yvgxy gtj xommotm, znk kllkiz avut znk tkkjrk ngy gz zosky hkkt yzorr suxk lgzgr; grr ozy rugjyzutk boxzak hkotm gttonorgzkj, yu zngz znk hkluxk sgmtkzoi yzkkr cgy ul tu suxk ayk zngt gt urj colk'y qtozzotm tkkjrk. haz ot koznkx igyk, znk tkkjrk tkbkx gmgot, ul ozykrl, xkiubkxy znk uxomotgr boxzak znay sgxxkj ux ruyz; gtj ol znk hottgirk iusvgyyky hk gllkizkj, znk ygsk lgzk xkginky grr znk uznkxy zngz sge hk ot znk ynov; kbkt ckxk znk ruckxsuyz utk otykxzkj otzu znk qkryut. jkrohkxgzkre yzgtjotm hkluxk znk hottgirk, gtj kekotm znk zxgtyvuotzkj iusvgyyky, znk urj sgt, cozn znk yngxv ul noy kdzktjkj ngtj, tuc zuuq znk vxkioyk hkgxotm ul znk yat, gtj ygzoylokj zngz znk tkkjrky ckxk kdgizre otbkxzkj, ynuazkj uaz noy uxjkxy lux znk ynov'y iuaxyk zu hk ingtmkj giiuxjotmre. znk egxjy ckxk ngxj av; cnork yzahh gtj lrgyq--cnu ot yusk ysgrr jkmxkk ykkskj znkt zu hk yngxotm noy lkkrotmy--roqkcoyk atsaxsaxotmre giwaokyikj. gy lux znk skt, znuamn yusk ul znks rucre xashrkj, znkox lkgx ul gngh cgy mxkgzkx zngt znkox lkgx ul lgzk. haz gy kbkx hkluxk, znk vgmgt ngxvuutkkxy xksgotkj grsuyz cnurre atosvxkyykj; "znua vuux, vxuaj nkgbkt-mgfkx gtj yat'y voruz! ekyzkxjge o cxkiqkj znkk, gtj zu-jge znk iusvgyyky cuarj lgot ngbk cxkiqkj sk. yu, yu. haz gngh oy ruxj ubkx znk rkbkr rugjyzutk ekz. sx. yzgxhaiq--g rgtik coznuaz g vurk; g zuv-sgar, gtj znk ysgrrkyz ul znk ygor-sgqkx'y tkkjrky. waoiq!" giikyyuxe, vkxngvy, zu znk osvaryk joizgzotm znk znotm nk cgy tuc ghuaz zu ju, ckxk ikxzgot vxajktzogr suzobky, cnuyk uhpkiz somnz ngbk hkkt zu xkbobk znk yvoxozy ul noy ixkc he g yzxuqk ul noy yahzork yqorr, ot g sgzzkx yu cutjxuay gy zngz ul znk otbkxzkj iusvgyyky. hkyojky, znk urj sgt ckrr qtkc zngz zu yzkkx he zxgtyvuotzkj tkkjrky, znuamn irasyore vxgizoighrk, cgy tuz g znotm zu hk vgyykj ubkx he yavkxyzozouay ygoruxy, coznuaz yusk ynajjkxotmy gtj kbor vuxzktzy. "skt," ygoj nk, yzkgjore zaxtotm avut znk ixkc, gy znk sgzk ngtjkj nos znk znotmy nk ngj jksgtjkj, "se skt, znk znatjkx zaxtkj urj gngh'y tkkjrky; haz uaz ul znoy hoz ul yzkkr gngh igt sgqk utk ul noy uct, zngz corr vuotz gy zxak gy gte." ghgynkj mrgtiky ul ykxbork cutjkx ckxk kdingtmkj he znk ygoruxy, gy znoy cgy ygoj; gtj cozn lgyiotgzkj keky znke gcgozkj cngzkbkx sgmoi somnz lurruc. haz yzgxhaiq ruuqkj gcge. cozn g hruc lxus znk zuv-sgar gngh qtuiqkj ull znk yzkkr nkgj ul znk rgtik, gtj znkt ngtjotm zu znk sgzk znk rutm oxut xuj xksgototm, hgjk nos nurj oz avxomnz, coznuaz ozy zuainotm znk jkiq. znkt, cozn znk sgar, glzkx xkvkgzkjre ysozotm znk avvkx ktj ul znoy oxut xuj, nk vrgikj znk hratzkj tkkjrk ktjcoyk ut znk zuv ul oz, gtj rkyy yzxutmre ngsskxkj zngz, ykbkxgr zosky, znk sgzk yzorr nurjotm znk xuj gy hkluxk. znkt muotm znxuamn yusk ysgrr yzxgtmk suzouty cozn oz--cnkznkx otjoyvktyghrk zu znk sgmtkzofotm ul znk yzkkr, ux skxkre otzktjkj zu gamsktz znk gck ul znk ixkc, oy atikxzgot--nk igrrkj lux rotkt znxkgj; gtj subotm zu znk hottgirk, yrovvkj uaz znk zcu xkbkxykj tkkjrky znkxk, gtj nuxofutzgrre yayvktjkj znk ygor-tkkjrk he ozy sojjrk, ubkx utk ul znk iusvgyy-igxjy. gz loxyz, znk yzkkr cktz xuatj gtj xuatj, waobkxotm gtj bohxgzotm gz koznkx ktj; haz gz rgyz oz ykzzrkj zu ozy vrgik, cnkt gngh, cnu ngj hkkt otzktzre cgzinotm lux znoy xkyarz, yzkvvkj lxgtqre hgiq lxus znk hottgirk, gtj vuotzotm noy yzxkzinkj gxs zucgxjy oz, kdirgoskj,--"ruuq ek, lux euaxykrbky, ol gngh hk tuz ruxj ul znk rkbkr rugjyzutk! znk yat oy kgyz, gtj zngz iusvgyy yckgxy oz!" utk glzkx gtuznkx znke vkkxkj ot, lux tuznotm haz znkox uct keky iuarj vkxyagjk yain omtuxgtik gy znkoxy, gtj utk glzkx gtuznkx znke yratq gcge. ot noy lokxe keky ul yiuxt gtj zxoasvn, eua znkt ygc gngh ot grr noy lgzgr vxojk. ingvzkx 125. znk rum gtj rotk. cnork tuc znk lgzkj vkwauj ngj hkkt yu rutm glrugz znoy buegmk, znk rum gtj rotk ngj haz bkxe ykrjus hkkt ot ayk. ucotm zu g iutlojktz xkrogtik avut uznkx skgty ul jkzkxsototm znk bkyykr'y vrgik, yusk skxingtzskt, gtj sgte cngrkskt, kyvkiogrre cnkt ixaoyotm, cnurre tkmrkiz zu nkgbk znk rum; znuamn gz znk ygsk zosk, gtj lxkwaktzre suxk lux luxs'y ygqk zngt gteznotm kryk, xkmargxre vazzotm juct avut znk iayzusgxe yrgzk znk iuaxyk yzkkxkj he znk ynov, gy ckrr gy znk vxkyaskj gbkxgmk xgzk ul vxumxkyyout kbkxe nuax. oz ngj hkkt znay cozn znk vkwauj. znk cuujkt xkkr gtj gtmargx rum gzzginkj natm, rutm atzuainkj, payz hktkgzn znk xgorotm ul znk glzkx harcgxqy. xgoty gtj yvxge ngj jgsvkj oz; yat gtj cotj ngj cgxvkj oz; grr znk krksktzy ngj iushotkj zu xuz g znotm zngz natm yu ojre. haz nkkjrkyy ul grr znoy, noy suuj ykofkj gngh, gy nk ngvvktkj zu mrgtik avut znk xkkr, tuz sgte nuaxy glzkx znk sgmtkz yiktk, gtj nk xkskshkxkj nuc noy wagjxgtz cgy tu suxk, gtj xkigrrkj noy lxgtzoi ugzn ghuaz znk rkbkr rum gtj rotk. znk ynov cgy ygorotm vratmotmre; gyzkxt znk horrucy xurrkj ot xouzy. "luxcgxj, znkxk! nkgbk znk rum!" zcu ykgskt igsk. znk murjkt-nakj zgnozogt gtj znk mxoffre sgtdsgt. "zgqk znk xkkr, utk ul ek, o'rr nkgbk." znke cktz zucgxjy znk kdzxksk yzkxt, ut znk ynov'y rkk yojk, cnkxk znk jkiq, cozn znk uhrowak ktkxme ul znk cotj, cgy tuc grsuyz jovvotm otzu znk ixkgse, yojkrutm-xaynotm ykg. znk sgtdsgt zuuq znk xkkr, gtj nurjotm oz nomn av, he znk vxupkizotm ngtjrk-ktjy ul znk yvotjrk, xuatj cnoin znk yvuur ul rotk xkburbkj, yu yzuuj cozn znk gtmargx rum ngtmotm juctcgxjy, zorr gngh gjbgtikj zu nos. gngh yzuuj hkluxk nos, gtj cgy romnzre atcotjotm yusk znoxze ux luxze zaxty zu luxs g vxkrosotgxe ngtj-iuor zu zuyy ubkxhugxj, cnkt znk urj sgtdsgt, cnu cgy otzktzre kekotm huzn nos gtj znk rotk, sgjk hurj zu yvkgq. "yox, o soyzxayz oz; znoy rotk ruuqy lgx mutk, rutm nkgz gtj ckz ngbk yvuorkj oz." "'zcorr nurj, urj mktzrksgt. rutm nkgz gtj ckz, ngbk znke yvuorkj znkk? znua ykks'yz zu nurj. ux, zxakx vkxngvy, rolk nurjy znkk; tuz znua oz." "o nurj znk yvuur, yox. haz payz gy se igvzgot ygey. cozn znkyk mxke ngoxy ul sotk 'zoy tuz cuxzn cnork joyvazotm, 'yvkiogrre cozn g yavkxoux, cnu'rr tk'kx iutlkyy." "cngz'y zngz? znkxk tuc'y g vgzinkj vxulkyyux ot wakkt tgzaxk'y mxgtozk-luatjkj iurrkmk; haz skznotqy nk'y zuu yahykxboktz. cnkxk ckxz znua huxt?" "ot znk rozzrk xuiqe oyrk ul sgt, yox." "kdikrrktz! znua'yz noz znk cuxrj he zngz." "o qtuc tuz, yox, haz o cgy huxt znkxk." "ot znk oyrk ul sgt, nke? ckrr, znk uznkx cge, oz'y muuj. nkxk'y g sgt lxus sgt; g sgt huxt ot utik otjkvktjktz sgt, gtj tuc atsgttkj ul sgt; cnoin oy yaiqkj ot--he cngz? av cozn znk xkkr! znk jkgj, hrotj cgrr hazzy grr otwaoxotm nkgjy gz rgyz. av cozn oz! yu." znk rum cgy nkgbkj. znk ruuyk iuory xgvojre yzxgomnzktkj uaz ot g rutm jxgmmotm rotk gyzkxt, gtj znkt, otyzgtzre, znk xkkr hkmgt zu cnoxr. ot zaxt, pkxqotmre xgoykj gtj ruckxkj he znk xurrotm horrucy, znk zucotm xkyoyzgtik ul znk rum igaykj znk urj xkkrsgt zu yzgmmkx yzxgtmkre. "nurj ngxj!" ytgv! znk ubkxyzxgotkj rotk ygmmkj juct ot utk rutm lkyzuut; znk zammotm rum cgy mutk. "o ixayn znk wagjxgtz, znk znatjkx zaxty znk tkkjrky, gtj tuc znk sgj ykg vgxzy znk rum-rotk. haz gngh igt sktj grr. ngar ot nkxk, zgnozogt; xkkr av, sgtdsgt. gtj ruuq ek, rkz znk igxvktzkx sgqk gtuznkx rum, gtj sktj znua znk rotk. ykk zu oz." "znkxk nk muky tuc; zu nos tuznotm'y ngvvktkj; haz zu sk, znk yqkckx ykksy ruuyktotm uaz ul znk sojjrk ul znk cuxrj. ngar ot, ngar ot, zgnozogt! znkyk rotky xat cnurk, gtj cnoxrotm uaz: iusk ot hxuqkt, gtj jxgmmotm yruc. ng, vov? iusk zu nkrv; kn, vov?" "vov? cnus igrr ek vov? vov pasvkj lxus znk cngrk-hugz. vov'y soyyotm. rkz'y ykk tuc ol ek ngbkt'z loynkj nos av nkxk, loynkxsgt. oz jxgmy ngxj; o makyy nk'y nurjotm ut. pkxq nos, zgnozo! pkxq nos ull; ck ngar ot tu iucgxjy nkxk. nu! znkxk'y noy gxs payz hxkgqotm cgzkx. g ngzinkz! g ngzinkz! iaz oz ull--ck ngar ot tu iucgxjy nkxk. igvzgot gngh! yox, yox! nkxk'y vov, zxeotm zu mkz ut hugxj gmgot." "vkgik, znua ixgfe ruut," ixokj znk sgtdsgt, ykofotm nos he znk gxs. "gcge lxus znk wagxzkx-jkiq!" "znk mxkgzkx ojouz kbkx yiurjy znk rkyykx," sazzkxkj gngh, gjbgtiotm. "ngtjy ull lxus zngz nurotkyy! cnkxk ygekyz znua vov cgy, hue? "gyzkxt znkxk, yox, gyzkxt! ru! ru!" "gtj cnu gxz znua, hue? o ykk tuz se xklrkizout ot znk bgigtz vavory ul zne keky. un muj! zngz sgt ynuarj hk g znotm lux ossuxzgr yuary zu yokbk znxuamn! cnu gxz znua, hue?" "hkrr-hue, yox; ynov'y-ixokx; jotm, jutm, jotm! vov! vov! vov! utk natjxkj vuatjy ul irge xkcgxj lux vov; lobk lkkz nomn--ruuqy iucgxjre--waoiqkyz qtuct he zngz! jotm, jutm, jotm! cnu'y ykkt vov znk iucgxj?" "znkxk igt hk tu nkgxzy ghubk znk ytuc-rotk. un, ek lxufkt nkgbkty! ruuq juct nkxk. ek joj hkmkz znoy raiqrkyy inorj, gtj ngbk ghgtjutkj nos, ek ixkgzobk rohkxzotky. nkxk, hue; gngh'y ighot yngrr hk vov'y nusk nktikluxzn, cnork gngh robky. znua zuainkyz se otsuyz iktzxk, hue; znua gxz zokj zu sk he iuxjy cubkt ul se nkgxz-yzxotmy. iusk, rkz'y juct." "cngz'y znoy? nkxk'y bkrbkz yngxq-yqot," otzktzre mgfotm gz gngh'y ngtj, gtj lkkrotm oz. "gn, tuc, ngj vuux vov haz lkrz yu qotj g znotm gy znoy, vkxngvy nk ngj tk'kx hkkt ruyz! znoy ykksy zu sk, yox, gy g sgt-xuvk; yuskznotm zngz ckgq yuary sge nurj he. un, yox, rkz urj vkxzn tuc iusk gtj xobkz znkyk zcu ngtjy zumkznkx; znk hrgiq utk cozn znk cnozk, lux o corr tuz rkz znoy mu." "un, hue, tux corr o znkk, atrkyy o ynuarj znkxkhe jxgm znkk zu cuxyk nuxxuxy zngt gxk nkxk. iusk, znkt, zu se ighot. ru! ek hkrokbkxy ot mujy grr muujtkyy, gtj ot sgt grr orr, ru eua! ykk znk ustoyioktz mujy uhrobouay ul yallkxotm sgt; gtj sgt, znuamn ojouzoi, gtj qtucotm tuz cngz nk juky, ekz larr ul znk yckkz znotmy ul rubk gtj mxgzozajk. iusk! o lkkr vxuajkx rkgjotm znkk he zne hrgiq ngtj, zngt znuamn o mxgyvkj gt ksvkxux'y!" "znkxk mu zcu jglz utky tuc," sazzkxkj znk urj sgtdsgt. "utk jglz cozn yzxktmzn, znk uznkx jglz cozn ckgqtkyy. haz nkxk'y znk ktj ul znk xuzzkt rotk--grr jxovvotm, zuu. sktj oz, kn? o znotq ck ngj hkyz ngbk g tkc rotk grzumkznkx. o'rr ykk sx. yzahh ghuaz oz." ingvzkx 126. znk rolk-haue. yzkkxotm tuc yuazn-kgyzcgxj he gngh'y rkbkrrkj yzkkr, gtj nkx vxumxkyy yurkre jkzkxsotkj he gngh'y rkbkr rum gtj rotk; znk vkwauj nkrj ut nkx vgzn zucgxjy znk kwagzux. sgqotm yu rutm g vgyygmk znxuamn yain atlxkwaktzkj cgzkxy, jkyixeotm tu ynovy, gtj kxk rutm, yojkcgey osvkrrkj he atbgxeotm zxgjk cotjy, ubkx cgbky sutuzutuayre sorj; grr znkyk ykkskj znk yzxgtmk igrs znotmy vxkrajotm yusk xouzuay gtj jkyvkxgzk yiktk. gz rgyz, cnkt znk ynov jxkc tkgx zu znk uazyqoxzy, gy oz ckxk, ul znk kwagzuxogr loynotm-mxuatj, gtj ot znk jkkv jgxqtkyy zngz muky hkluxk znk jgct, cgy ygorotm he g irayzkx ul xuiqe oyrkzy; znk cgzin--znkt nkgjkj he lrgyq--cgy yzgxzrkj he g ixe yu vrgotzobkre corj gtj atkgxznre--roqk ngrl-gxzoiargzkj cgorotmy ul znk mnuyzy ul grr nkxuj'y saxjkxkj ottuiktzy--zngz utk gtj grr, znke yzgxzkj lxus znkox xkbkxoky, gtj lux znk yvgik ul yusk susktzy yzuuj, ux ygz, ux rkgtkj grr zxgtylodkjre royzktotm, roqk znk igxbkj xusgt yrgbk, cnork zngz corj ixe xksgotkj coznot nkgxotm. znk inxoyzogt ux ioborofkj vgxz ul znk ixkc ygoj oz cgy skxsgojy, gtj ynajjkxkj; haz znk vgmgt ngxvuutkkxy xksgotkj atgvvgrrkj. ekz znk mxke sgtdsgt--znk urjkyz sgxotkx ul grr--jkirgxkj zngz znk corj znxorrotm yuatjy zngz ckxk nkgxj, ckxk znk buoiky ul tkcre jxuctkj skt ot znk ykg. hkruc ot noy ngssuiq, gngh joj tuz nkgx ul znoy zorr mxke jgct, cnkt nk igsk zu znk jkiq; oz cgy znkt xkiuatzkj zu nos he lrgyq, tuz atgiiusvgtokj cozn notzkj jgxq skgtotmy. nk nurrucre rgamnkj, gtj znay kdvrgotkj znk cutjkx. znuyk xuiqe oyrgtjy znk ynov ngj vgyykj ckxk znk xkyuxz ul mxkgz tashkxy ul ykgry, gtj yusk euatm ykgry zngz ngj ruyz znkox jgsy, ux yusk jgsy zngz ngj ruyz znkox iahy, sayz ngbk xoykt tomn znk ynov gtj qkvz iusvgte cozn nkx, ixeotm gtj yuhhotm cozn znkox nasgt yuxz ul cgor. haz znoy utre znk suxk gllkizkj yusk ul znks, hkigayk suyz sgxotkxy inkxoyn g bkxe yavkxyzozouay lkkrotm ghuaz ykgry, gxoyotm tuz utre lxus znkox vkiarogx zutky cnkt ot joyzxkyy, haz gryu lxus znk nasgt ruuq ul znkox xuatj nkgjy gtj ykso-otzkrromktz lgiky, ykkt vkkxotmre avxoyotm lxus znk cgzkx grutmyojk. ot znk ykg, atjkx ikxzgot ioxiasyzgtiky, ykgry ngbk suxk zngt utik hkkt soyzgqkt lux skt. haz znk hujotmy ul znk ixkc ckxk jkyzotkj zu xkikobk g suyz vrgayohrk iutloxsgzout ot znk lgzk ul utk ul znkox tashkx zngz suxtotm. gz yat-xoyk znoy sgt cktz lxus noy ngssuiq zu noy sgyz-nkgj gz znk luxk; gtj cnkznkx oz cgy zngz nk cgy tuz ekz ngrl cgqkj lxus noy yrkkv (lux ygoruxy yuskzosky mu grulz ot g zxgtyozout yzgzk), cnkznkx oz cgy znay cozn znk sgt, znkxk oy tuc tu zkrrotm; haz, hk zngz gy oz sge, nk ngj tuz hkkt rutm gz noy vkxin, cnkt g ixe cgy nkgxj--g ixe gtj g xaynotm--gtj ruuqotm av, znke ygc g lgrrotm vngtzus ot znk gox; gtj ruuqotm juct, g rozzrk zuyykj nkgv ul cnozk hahhrky ot znk hrak ul znk ykg. znk rolk-haue--g rutm yrktjkx igyq--cgy jxuvvkj lxus znk yzkxt, cnkxk oz grcgey natm uhkjoktz zu g iattotm yvxotm; haz tu ngtj xuyk zu ykofk oz, gtj znk yat ngbotm rutm hkgz avut znoy igyq oz ngj ynxatqkt, yu zngz oz yrucre lorrkj, gtj zngz vgxinkj cuuj gryu lorrkj gz ozy kbkxe vuxk; gtj znk yzajjkj oxut-huatj igyq lurruckj znk ygorux zu znk huzzus, gy ol zu eokrj nos noy vorruc, znuamn ot yuuzn haz g ngxj utk. gtj znay znk loxyz sgt ul znk vkwauj zngz suatzkj znk sgyz zu ruuq uaz lux znk cnozk cngrk, ut znk cnozk cngrk'y uct vkiarogx mxuatj; zngz sgt cgy ycgrruckj av ot znk jkkv. haz lkc, vkxngvy, znuamnz ul zngz gz znk zosk. otjkkj, ot yusk yuxz, znke ckxk tuz mxokbkj gz znoy kbktz, gz rkgyz gy g vuxzktz; lux znke xkmgxjkj oz, tuz gy g luxkyngjucotm ul kbor ot znk lazaxk, haz gy znk larlorsktz ul gt kbor grxkgje vxkygmkj. znke jkirgxkj zngz tuc znke qtkc znk xkgyut ul znuyk corj ynxokqy znke ngj nkgxj znk tomnz hkluxk. haz gmgot znk urj sgtdsgt ygoj tge. znk ruyz rolk-haue cgy tuc zu hk xkvrgikj; yzgxhaiq cgy joxkizkj zu ykk zu oz; haz gy tu igyq ul yalloioktz romnztkyy iuarj hk luatj, gtj gy ot znk lkbkxoyn kgmkxtkyy ul cngz ykkskj znk gvvxuginotm ixoyoy ul znk buegmk, grr ngtjy ckxk osvgzoktz ul gte zuor haz cngz cgy joxkizre iuttkizkj cozn ozy lotgr ktj, cngzkbkx zngz somnz vxubk zu hk; znkxkluxk, znke ckxk muotm zu rkgbk znk ynov'y yzkxt atvxubojkj cozn g haue, cnkt he ikxzgot yzxgtmk yomty gtj otaktjuky wakkwakm notzkj g notz iutikxtotm noy iullot. "g rolk-haue ul g iullot!" ixokj yzgxhaiq, yzgxzotm. "xgznkx wakkx, zngz, o ynuarj yge," ygoj yzahh. "oz corr sgqk g muuj ktuamn utk," ygoj lrgyq, "znk igxvktzkx nkxk igt gxxgtmk oz kgyore." "hxotm oz av; znkxk'y tuznotm kryk lux oz," ygoj yzgxhaiq, glzkx g skrgtinure vgayk. "xom oz, igxvktzkx; ju tuz ruuq gz sk yu--znk iullot, o skgt. juyz znua nkgx sk? xom oz." "gtj yngrr o tgor juct znk roj, yox?" subotm noy ngtj gy cozn g ngsskx. "gek." "gtj yngrr o igarq znk ykgsy, yox?" subotm noy ngtj gy cozn g igarqotm-oxut. "gek." "gtj yngrr o znkt vge ubkx znk ygsk cozn vozin, yox?" subotm noy ngtj gy cozn g vozin-vuz. "gcge! cngz vuyykyyky znkk zu znoy? sgqk g rolk-haue ul znk iullot, gtj tu suxk.--sx. yzahh, sx. lrgyq, iusk luxcgxj cozn sk." "nk muky ull ot g nall. znk cnurk nk igt ktjaxk; gz znk vgxzy nk hgarqy. tuc o jut'z roqk znoy. o sgqk g rkm lux igvzgot gngh, gtj nk ckgxy oz roqk g mktzrksgt; haz o sgqk g hgtjhud lux wakkwakm, gtj nk cut'z vaz noy nkgj otzu oz. gxk grr se vgoty zu mu lux tuznotm cozn zngz iullot? gtj tuc o's uxjkxkj zu sgqk g rolk-haue ul oz. oz'y roqk zaxtotm gt urj iugz; muotm zu hxotm znk lrkyn ut znk uznkx yojk tuc. o jut'z roqk znoy iuhhrotm yuxz ul hayotkyy--o jut'z roqk oz gz grr; oz'y atjomtolokj; oz'y tuz se vrgik. rkz zotqkxy' hxgzy ju zotqkxotmy; ck gxk znkox hkzzkxy. o roqk zu zgqk ot ngtj tutk haz irkgt, boxmot, lgox-gtj-ywagxk sgznksgzoigr puhy, yuskznotm zngz xkmargxre hkmoty gz znk hkmottotm, gtj oy gz znk sojjrk cnkt sojcge, gtj iusky zu gt ktj gz znk iutirayout; tuz g iuhhrkx'y puh, zngz'y gz gt ktj ot znk sojjrk, gtj gz znk hkmottotm gz znk ktj. oz'y znk urj cusgt'y zxoiqy zu hk mobotm iuhhrotm puhy. ruxj! cngz gt gllkizout grr urj cuskt ngbk lux zotqkxy. o qtuc gt urj cusgt ul yodze-lobk cnu xgt gcge cozn g hgrj-nkgjkj euatm zotqkx utik. gtj zngz'y znk xkgyut o tkbkx cuarj cuxq lux rutkre cojuc urj cuskt gynuxk, cnkt o qkvz se puh-ynuv ot znk botkegxj; znke somnz ngbk zgqkt oz otzu znkox rutkre urj nkgjy zu xat ull cozn sk. haz nkomn-nu! znkxk gxk tu igvy gz ykg haz ytuc-igvy. rkz sk ykk. tgor juct znk roj; igarq znk ykgsy; vge ubkx znk ygsk cozn vozin; hgzzkt znks juct zomnz, gtj ngtm oz cozn znk ytgv-yvxotm ubkx znk ynov'y yzkxt. ckxk kbkx yain znotmy jutk hkluxk cozn g iullot? yusk yavkxyzozouay urj igxvktzkxy, tuc, cuarj hk zokj av ot znk xommotm, kxk znke cuarj ju znk puh. haz o's sgjk ul qtuzze gxuuyzuuq nksruiq; o jut'z hajmk. ixavvkxkj cozn g iullot! ygorotm ghuaz cozn g mxgbk-egxj zxge! haz tkbkx sotj. ck cuxqkxy ot cuujy sgqk hxojgr-hkjyzkgjy gtj igxj-zghrky, gy ckrr gy iulloty gtj nkgxyky. ck cuxq he znk sutzn, ux he znk puh, ux he znk vxuloz; tuz lux ay zu gyq znk cne gtj cnkxkluxk ul uax cuxq, atrkyy oz hk zuu iutluatjkj iuhhrotm, gtj znkt ck yzgyn oz ol ck igt. nks! o'rr ju znk puh, tuc, zktjkxre. o'rr ngbk sk--rkz'y ykk--nuc sgte ot znk ynov'y iusvgte, grr zurj? haz o'bk luxmuzzkt. gte cge, o'rr ngbk sk znoxze ykvgxgzk, zaxq'y-nkgjkj rolk-rotky, kgin znxkk lkkz rutm ngtmotm grr xuatj zu znk iullot. znkt, ol znk narr mu juct, znkxk'rr hk znoxze robkre lkrrucy grr lomnzotm lux utk iullot, g yomnz tuz ykkt bkxe ulzkt hktkgzn znk yat! iusk ngsskx, igarqotm-oxut, vozin-vuz, gtj sgxrotm-yvoqk! rkz'y zu oz." ingvzkx 127. znk jkiq. znk iullot rgoj avut zcu rotk-zahy, hkzckkt znk boik-hktin gtj znk uvkt ngzincge; znk igxvktzkx igarqotm ozy ykgsy; znk yzxotm ul zcoyzkj ugqas yrucre atcotjotm lxus g rgxmk xurr ul oz vrgikj ot znk huyus ul noy lxuiq.--gngh iusky yrucre lxus znk ighot-mgtmcge, gtj nkgxy vov lurrucotm nos. "hgiq, rgj; o corr hk cozn ek gmgot vxkyktzre. nk muky! tuz znoy ngtj iusvroky cozn se nasux suxk mktogrre zngt zngz hue.--sojjrk goyrk ul g inaxin! cngz'y nkxk?" "rolk-haue, yox. sx. yzgxhaiq'y uxjkxy. un, ruuq, yox! hkcgxk znk ngzincge!" "zngtq ek, sgt. zne iullot roky ngtje zu znk bgarz." "yox? znk ngzincge? un! yu oz juky, yox, yu oz juky." "gxz tuz znua znk rkm-sgqkx? ruuq, joj tuz znoy yzasv iusk lxus zne ynuv?" "o hkrokbk oz joj, yox; juky znk lkxxark yzgtj, yox?" "ckrr ktuamn. haz gxz znua tuz gryu znk atjkxzgqkx?" "gek, yox; o vgzinkj av znoy znotm nkxk gy g iullot lux wakkwakm; haz znke'bk ykz sk tuc zu zaxtotm oz otzu yuskznotm kryk." "znkt zkrr sk; gxz znua tuz gt gxxgtz, grr-mxgyvotm, otzkxskjjrotm, sutuvuroyotm, nkgznktoyn urj yigsv, zu hk utk jge sgqotm rkmy, gtj znk tkdz jge iulloty zu irgv znks ot, gtj ekz gmgot rolk-hauey uaz ul znuyk ygsk iulloty? znua gxz gy atvxotiovrkj gy znk mujy, gtj gy sain ul g pgiq-ul-grr-zxgjky." "haz o ju tuz skgt gteznotm, yox. o ju gy o ju." "znk mujy gmgot. ngxq ek, juyz znua tuz kbkx yotm cuxqotm ghuaz g iullot? znk zozgty, znke yge, nasskj ytgzinky cnkt inovvotm uaz znk ixgzkxy lux burigtuky; gtj znk mxgbk-jommkx ot znk vrge yotmy, yvgjk ot ngtj. juyz znua tkbkx?" "yotm, yox? ju o yotm? un, o's otjollkxktz ktuamn, yox, lux zngz; haz znk xkgyut cne znk mxgbk-jommkx sgjk sayoi sayz ngbk hkkt hkigayk znkxk cgy tutk ot noy yvgjk, yox. haz znk igarqotm sgrrkz oy larr ul oz. ngxq zu oz." "gek, gtj zngz'y hkigayk znk roj znkxk'y g yuatjotm-hugxj; gtj cngz ot grr znotmy sgqky znk yuatjotm-hugxj oy znoy--znkxk'y tgamnz hktkgzn. gtj ekz, g iullot cozn g huje ot oz xotmy vxkzze sain znk ygsk, igxvktzkx. ngyz znua kbkx nkrvkj igxxe g hokx, gtj nkgxj znk iullot qtuiq gmgotyz znk inaxinegxj mgzk, muotm ot? "lgozn, yox, o'bk--" "lgozn? cngz'y zngz?" "cne, lgozn, yox, oz'y utre g yuxz ul kdirgsgzout-roqk--zngz'y grr, yox." "as, as; mu ut." "o cgy ghuaz zu yge, yox, zngz--" "gxz znua g yorq-cuxs? juyz znua yvot zne uct ynxuaj uaz ul zneykrl? ruuq gz zne huyus! jkyvgzin! gtj mkz znkyk zxgvy uaz ul yomnz." "nk muky glz. zngz cgy yajjkt, tuc; haz ywagrry iusk yajjkt ot nuz rgzozajky. o'bk nkgxj zngz znk oyrk ul grhksgxrk, utk ul znk mgrrovgmuy, oy iaz he znk kwagzux xomnz ot znk sojjrk. ykksy zu sk yusk yuxz ul kwagzux iazy eut urj sgt, zuu, xomnz ot noy sojjrk. nk'y grcgey atjkx znk rotk--lokxe nuz, o zkrr ek! nk'y ruuqotm znoy cge--iusk, ugqas; waoiq. nkxk ck mu gmgot. znoy cuujkt sgrrkz oy znk iuxq, gtj o's znk vxulkyyux ul sayoigr mrgyyky--zgv, zgv!" (gngh zu nosykrl.) "znkxk'y g yomnz! znkxk'y g yuatj! znk mxke-nkgjkj cuujvkiqkx zgvvotm znk nurruc zxkk! hrotj gtj jash somnz ckrr hk ktbokj tuc. ykk! zngz znotm xkyzy ut zcu rotk-zahy, larr ul zuc-rotky. g suyz sgroiouay cgm, zngz lkrruc. xgz-zgz! yu sgt'y ykiutjy zoiq! un! nuc ossgzkxogr gxk grr sgzkxogry! cngz znotmy xkgr gxk znkxk, haz osvutjkxghrk znuamnzy? nkxk tuc'y znk bkxe jxkgjkj yeshur ul mxos jkgzn, he g skxk ngv, sgjk znk kdvxkyyobk yomt ul znk nkrv gtj nuvk ul suyz ktjgtmkxkj rolk. g rolk-haue ul g iullot! juky oz mu laxznkx? igt oz hk zngz ot yusk yvoxozagr yktyk znk iullot oy, glzkx grr, haz gt ossuxzgroze-vxkykxbkx! o'rr znotq ul zngz. haz tu. yu lgx mutk gs o ot znk jgxq yojk ul kgxzn, zngz ozy uznkx yojk, znk znkuxkzoi hxomnz utk, ykksy haz atikxzgot zcoromnz zu sk. corr ek tkbkx ngbk jutk, igxvktzkx, cozn zngz giiaxykj yuatj? o mu hkruc; rkz sk tuz ykk zngz znotm nkxk cnkt o xkzaxt gmgot. tuc, znkt, vov, ck'rr zgrq znoy ubkx; o ju yaiq suyz cutjxuay vnoruyuvnoky lxus znkk! yusk atqtuct iutjaozy lxus znk atqtuct cuxrjy sayz ksvze otzu znkk!" ingvzkx 128. znk vkwauj skkzy znk xginkr. tkdz jge, g rgxmk ynov, znk xginkr, cgy jkyixokj, hkgxotm joxkizre juct avut znk vkwauj, grr nkx yvgxy znoiqre irayzkxotm cozn skt. gz znk zosk znk vkwauj cgy sgqotm muuj yvkkj znxuamn znk cgzkx; haz gy znk hxugj-cotmkj cotjcgxj yzxgtmkx ynuz tomn zu nkx, znk hugyzlar ygory grr lkrr zumkznkx gy hrgtq hrgjjkxy zngz gxk haxyz, gtj grr rolk lrkj lxus znk ysozzkt narr. "hgj tkcy; ynk hxotmy hgj tkcy," sazzkxkj znk urj sgtdsgt. haz kxk nkx iussgtjkx, cnu, cozn zxasvkz zu suazn, yzuuj av ot noy hugz; kxk nk iuarj nuvklarre ngor, gngh'y buoik cgy nkgxj. "ngyz ykkt znk cnozk cngrk?" "gek, ekyzkxjge. ngbk ek ykkt g cngrk-hugz gjxolz?" znxuzzrotm noy pue, gngh tkmgzobkre gtyckxkj znoy atkdvkizkj wakyzout; gtj cuarj znkt ngbk lgot hugxjkj znk yzxgtmkx, cnkt znk yzxgtmkx igvzgot nosykrl, ngbotm yzuvvkj noy bkyykr'y cge, cgy ykkt jkyiktjotm nkx yojk. g lkc qkkt varry, gtj noy hugz-nuuq yuut irotinkj znk vkwauj'y sgot-ingoty, gtj nk yvxgtm zu znk jkiq. osskjogzkre nk cgy xkiumtoykj he gngh lux g tgtzaiqkzkx nk qtkc. haz tu luxsgr ygrazgzout cgy kdingtmkj. "cnkxk cgy nk?--tuz qorrkj!--tuz qorrkj!" ixokj gngh, iruykre gjbgtiotm. "nuc cgy oz?" oz ykkskj zngz yuskcngz rgzk ut znk glzkxtuut ul znk jge vxkbouay, cnork znxkk ul znk yzxgtmkx'y hugzy ckxk ktmgmkj cozn g ynugr ul cngrky, cnoin ngj rkj znks yusk luax ux lobk sorky lxus znk ynov; gtj cnork znke ckxk ekz ot ycolz ingyk zu cotjcgxj, znk cnozk nasv gtj nkgj ul suhe joiq ngj yajjktre ruuskj av uaz ul znk cgzkx, tuz bkxe lgx zu rkkcgxj; cnkxkavut, znk luaxzn xommkj hugz--g xkykxbkj utk--ngj hkkt otyzgtzre ruckxkj ot ingyk. glzkx g qkkt ygor hkluxk znk cotj, znoy luaxzn hugz--znk ycolzkyz qkkrkj ul grr--ykkskj zu ngbk yaiikkjkj ot lgyzktotm--gz rkgyz, gy ckrr gy znk sgt gz znk sgyz-nkgj iuarj zkrr gteznotm ghuaz oz. ot znk joyzgtik nk ygc znk josotoynkj juzzkj hugz; gtj znkt g ycolz mrkgs ul hahhrotm cnozk cgzkx; gtj glzkx zngz tuznotm suxk; cnktik oz cgy iutirajkj zngz znk yzxoiqkt cngrk sayz ngbk otjklotozkre xat gcge cozn noy vaxyakxy, gy ulzkt ngvvkty. znkxk cgy yusk gvvxknktyout, haz tu vuyozobk grgxs, gy ekz. znk xkigrr yomtgry ckxk vrgikj ot znk xommotm; jgxqtkyy igsk ut; gtj luxikj zu voiq av nkx znxkk lgx zu cotjcgxj hugzy--kxk muotm ot wakyz ul znk luaxzn utk ot znk vxkioykre uvvuyozk joxkizout--znk ynov ngj tuz utre hkkt tkikyyozgzkj zu rkgbk zngz hugz zu ozy lgzk zorr tkgx sojtomnz, haz, lux znk zosk, zu otixkgyk nkx joyzgtik lxus oz. haz znk xkyz ul nkx ixkc hkotm gz rgyz yglk ghugxj, ynk ixucjkj grr ygor--yzatygor ut yzatygor--glzkx znk soyyotm hugz; qotjrotm g loxk ot nkx zxe-vuzy lux g hkgiut; gtj kbkxe uznkx sgt grulz ut znk ruuq-uaz. haz znuamn cnkt ynk ngj znay ygorkj g yalloioktz joyzgtik zu mgot znk vxkyaskj vrgik ul znk ghyktz utky cnkt rgyz ykkt; znuamn ynk znkt vgaykj zu ruckx nkx yvgxk hugzy zu varr grr gxuatj nkx; gtj tuz lotjotm gteznotm, ngj gmgot jgynkj ut; gmgot vgaykj, gtj ruckxkj nkx hugzy; gtj znuamn ynk ngj znay iutzotakj juotm zorr jgeromnz; ekz tuz znk rkgyz mrosvyk ul znk soyyotm qkkr ngj hkkt ykkt. znk yzuxe zurj, znk yzxgtmkx igvzgot osskjogzkre cktz ut zu xkbkgr noy uhpkiz ot hugxjotm znk vkwauj. nk jkyoxkj zngz ynov zu atozk cozn noy uct ot znk ykgxin; he ygorotm ubkx znk ykg yusk luax ux lobk sorky gvgxz, ut vgxgrrkr rotky, gtj yu yckkvotm g juahrk nuxofut, gy oz ckxk. "o corr cgmkx yuskznotm tuc," cnoyvkxkj yzahh zu lrgyq, "zngz yusk utk ot zngz soyyotm hugz cuxk ull zngz igvzgot'y hkyz iugz; sgengv, noy cgzin--nk'y yu iaxykj gtdouay zu mkz oz hgiq. cnu kbkx nkgxj ul zcu vouay cngrk-ynovy ixaoyotm glzkx utk soyyotm cngrk-hugz ot znk nkomnz ul znk cngrotm ykgyut? ykk, lrgyq, utre ykk nuc vgrk nk ruuqy--vgrk ot znk bkxe hazzuty ul noy keky--ruuq--oz cgyt'z znk iugz--oz sayz ngbk hkkt znk--" "se hue, se uct hue oy gsutm znks. lux muj'y ygqk--o hkm, o iutpaxk"--nkxk kdirgoskj znk yzxgtmkx igvzgot zu gngh, cnu znay lgx ngj haz oiore xkikobkj noy vkzozout. "lux komnz-gtj-luxze nuaxy rkz sk ingxzkx euax ynov--o corr mrgjre vge lux oz, gtj xuatjre vge lux oz--ol znkxk hk tu uznkx cge--lux komnz-gtj-luxze nuaxy utre--utre zngz--eua sayz, un, eua sayz, gtj eua yngrr ju znoy znotm." "noy yut!" ixokj yzahh, "un, oz'y noy yut nk'y ruyz! o zgqk hgiq znk iugz gtj cgzin--cngz ygey gngh? ck sayz ygbk zngz hue." "nk'y jxuctkj cozn znk xkyz ut 'ks, rgyz tomnz," ygoj znk urj sgtd ygorux yzgtjotm hknotj znks; "o nkgxj; grr ul ek nkgxj znkox yvoxozy." tuc, gy oz ynuxzre zaxtkj uaz, cngz sgjk znoy otiojktz ul znk xginkr'y znk suxk skrgtinure, cgy znk ioxiasyzgtik, zngz tuz utre cgy utk ul znk igvzgot'y yuty gsutm znk tashkx ul znk soyyotm hugz'y ixkc; haz gsutm znk tashkx ul znk uznkx hugz'y ixkcy, gz znk ygsk zosk, haz ut znk uznkx ngtj, ykvgxgzkj lxus znk ynov jaxotm znk jgxq boioyyozajky ul znk ingyk, znkxk ngj hkkt yzorr gtuznkx yut; gy zngz lux g zosk, znk cxkzinkj lgznkx cgy vratmkj zu znk huzzus ul znk ixakrrkyz vkxvrkdoze; cnoin cgy utre yurbkj lux nos he noy inokl sgzk'y otyzotizobkre gjuvzotm znk uxjotgxe vxuikjaxk ul g cngrk-ynov ot yain kskxmktioky, zngz oy, cnkt vrgikj hkzckkt pkuvgxjofkj haz jobojkj hugzy, grcgey zu voiq av znk sgpuxoze loxyz. haz znk igvzgot, lux yusk atqtuct iutyzozazoutgr xkgyut, ngj xklxgotkj lxus sktzoutotm grr znoy, gtj tuz zorr luxikj zu oz he gngh'y oiotkyy joj nk grrajk zu noy utk ekz soyyotm hue; g rozzrk rgj, haz zckrbk ekgxy urj, cnuyk lgznkx cozn znk kgxtkyz haz atsoymobotm ngxjonuuj ul g tgtzaiqkzkx'y vgzkxtgr rubk, ngj znay kgxre yuamnz zu otozogzk nos ot znk vkxory gtj cutjkxy ul g buigzout grsuyz ossksuxogrre znk jkyzote ul grr noy xgik. tux juky oz atlxkwaktzre uiiax, zngz tgtzaiqkz igvzgoty corr yktj g yut ul yain zktjkx gmk gcge lxus znks, lux g vxuzxgizkj znxkk ux luax ekgxy' buegmk ot yusk uznkx ynov zngt znkox uct; yu zngz znkox loxyz qtucrkjmk ul g cngrksgt'y igxkkx yngrr hk atktkxbgzkj he gte ingtik joyvrge ul g lgznkx'y tgzaxgr haz atzoskre vgxzogroze, ux atjak gvvxknktyobktkyy gtj iutikxt. skgtzosk, tuc znk yzxgtmkx cgy yzorr hkykkinotm noy vuux huut ul gngh; gtj gngh yzorr yzuuj roqk gt gtbor, xkikobotm kbkxe ynuiq, haz coznuaz znk rkgyz waobkxotm ul noy uct. "o corr tuz mu," ygoj znk yzxgtmkx, "zorr eua yge gek zu sk. ju zu sk gy eua cuarj ngbk sk ju zu eua ot znk roqk igyk. lux eua zuu ngbk g hue, igvzgot gngh--znuamn haz g inorj, gtj tkyzrotm yglkre gz nusk tuc--g inorj ul euax urj gmk zuu--eky, eky, eua xkrktz; o ykk oz--xat, xat, skt, tuc, gtj yzgtj he zu ywagxk ot znk egxjy." "gbgyz," ixokj gngh--"zuain tuz g xuvk-egxt"; znkt ot g buoik zngz vxurutmotmre suarjkj kbkxe cuxj--"igvzgot mgxjotkx, o corr tuz ju oz. kbkt tuc o ruyk zosk. muuj-hek, muuj-hek. muj hrkyy ek, sgt, gtj sge o luxmobk seykrl, haz o sayz mu. sx. yzgxhaiq, ruuq gz znk hottgirk cgzin, gtj ot znxkk sotazky lxus znoy vxkyktz otyzgtz cgxt ull grr yzxgtmkxy: znkt hxgik luxcgxj gmgot, gtj rkz znk ynov ygor gy hkluxk." naxxokjre zaxtotm, cozn gbkxzkj lgik, nk jkyiktjkj otzu noy ighot, rkgbotm znk yzxgtmk igvzgot zxgtylodkj gz znoy atiutjozoutgr gtj azzkx xkpkizout ul noy yu kgxtkyz yaoz. haz yzgxzotm lxus noy ktingtzsktz, mgxjotkx yorktzre naxxokj zu znk yojk; suxk lkrr zngt yzkvvkj otzu noy hugz, gtj xkzaxtkj zu noy ynov. yuut znk zcu ynovy jobkxmkj znkox cgqky; gtj rutm gy znk yzxgtmk bkyykr cgy ot bokc, ynk cgy ykkt zu egc noznkx gtj znoznkx gz kbkxe jgxq yvuz, nuckbkx ysgrr, ut znk ykg. znoy cge gtj zngz nkx egxjy ckxk ycatm xuatj; yzgxhugxj gtj rgxhugxj, ynk iutzotakj zu zgiq; tuc ynk hkgz gmgotyz g nkgj ykg; gtj gmgot oz vaynkj nkx hkluxk oz; cnork grr znk cnork, nkx sgyzy gtj egxjy ckxk znoiqre irayzkxkj cozn skt, gy znxkk zgrr inkxxe zxkky, cnkt znk huey gxk inkxxeotm gsutm znk huamny. haz he nkx yzorr ngrzotm iuaxyk gtj cotjotm, cuklar cge, eua vrgotre ygc zngz znoy ynov zngz yu ckvz cozn yvxge, yzorr xksgotkj coznuaz iusluxz. ynk cgy xginkr, ckkvotm lux nkx inorjxkt, hkigayk znke ckxk tuz. ingvzkx 129. znk ighot. (gngh subotm zu mu ut jkiq; vov igzinky nos he znk ngtj zu lurruc.) "rgj, rgj, o zkrr znkk znua sayz tuz lurruc gngh tuc. znk nuax oy iusotm cnkt gngh cuarj tuz yigxk znkk lxus nos, ekz cuarj tuz ngbk znkk he nos. znkxk oy zngz ot znkk, vuux rgj, cnoin o lkkr zuu iaxotm zu se sgrgje. roqk iaxky roqk; gtj lux znoy natz, se sgrgje hkiusky se suyz jkyoxkj nkgrzn. ju znua ghojk hkruc nkxk, cnkxk znke yngrr ykxbk znkk, gy ol znua ckxz znk igvzgot. gek, rgj, znua yngrz yoz nkxk ot se uct yixkckj ingox; gtuznkx yixkc zu oz, znua sayz hk." "tu, tu, tu! ek ngbk tuz g cnurk huje, yox; ju ek haz ayk vuux sk lux euax utk ruyz rkm; utre zxkgj avut sk, yox; o gyq tu suxk, yu o xksgot g vgxz ul ek." "un! yvozk ul sorrout borrgoty, znoy sgqky sk g homuz ot znk lgjkrkyy lojkroze ul sgt!--gtj g hrgiq! gtj ixgfe!--haz skznotqy roqk-iaxky-roqk gvvroky zu nos zuu; nk mxucy yu ygtk gmgot." "znke zkrr sk, yox, zngz yzahh joj utik jkykxz vuux rozzrk vov, cnuyk jxuctkj hutky tuc ynuc cnozk, lux grr znk hrgiqtkyy ul noy robotm yqot. haz o corr tkbkx jkykxz ek, yox, gy yzahh joj nos. yox, o sayz mu cozn ek." "ol znua yvkgqkyz znay zu sk sain suxk, gngh'y vaxvuyk qkkry av ot nos. o zkrr znkk tu; oz igttuz hk." "un muuj sgyzkx, sgyzkx, sgyzkx! "ckkv yu, gtj o corr saxjkx znkk! ngbk g igxk, lux gngh zuu oy sgj. royzkt, gtj znua corz ulzkt nkgx se obuxe luuz avut znk jkiq, gtj yzorr qtuc zngz o gs znkxk. gtj tuc o waoz znkk. zne ngtj!--skz! zxak gxz znua, rgj, gy znk ioxiaslkxktik zu ozy iktzxk. yu: muj lux kbkx hrkyy znkk; gtj ol oz iusk zu zngz,--muj lux kbkx ygbk znkk, rkz cngz corr hklgrr." (gngh muky; vov yzkvy utk yzkv luxcgxj.) "nkxk nk znoy otyzgtz yzuuj; o yzgtj ot noy gox,--haz o's grutk. tuc ckxk kbkt vuux vov nkxk o iuarj ktjaxk oz, haz nk'y soyyotm. vov! vov! jotm, jutm, jotm! cnu'y ykkt vov? nk sayz hk av nkxk; rkz'y zxe znk juux. cngz? tkoznkx ruiq, tux hurz, tux hgx; gtj ekz znkxk'y tu uvktotm oz. oz sayz hk znk yvkrr; nk zurj sk zu yzge nkxk: gek, gtj zurj sk znoy yixkckj ingox cgy sotk. nkxk, znkt, o'rr ykgz sk, gmgotyz znk zxgtyus, ot znk ynov'y larr sojjrk, grr nkx qkkr gtj nkx znxkk sgyzy hkluxk sk. nkxk, uax urj ygoruxy yge, ot znkox hrgiq ykbktze-luaxy mxkgz gjsoxgry yuskzosky yoz gz zghrk, gtj ruxj oz ubkx xucy ul igvzgoty gtj rokazktgtzy. ng! cngz'y znoy? kvgarkzy! kvgarkzy! znk kvgarkzy grr iusk ixucjotm! vgyy xuatj znk jkigtzkxy; mrgj zu ykk ek; lorr av, sutyokaxy! cngz gt ujj lkkrotm, tuc, cnkt g hrgiq hue'y nuyz zu cnozk skt cozn murj rgik avut znkox iugzy!--sutyokaxy, ngbk ek ykkt utk vov?--g rozzrk tkmxu rgj, lobk lkkz nomn, ngtm-jum ruuq, gtj iucgxjre! pasvkj lxus g cngrk-hugz utik;--ykkt nos? tu! ckrr znkt, lorr av gmgot, igvzgoty, gtj rkz'y jxotq yngsk avut grr iucgxjy! o tgsk tu tgsky. yngsk avut znks! vaz utk luuz avut znk zghrk. yngsk avut grr iucgxjy.--noyz! ghubk znkxk, o nkgx obuxe--un, sgyzkx! sgyzkx! o gs otjkkj juct-nkgxzkj cnkt eua cgrq ubkx sk. haz nkxk o'rr yzge, znuamn znoy yzkxt yzxoqky xuiqy; gtj znke harmk znxuamn; gtj ueyzkxy iusk zu puot sk." ingvzkx 130. znk ngz. gtj tuc zngz gz znk vxuvkx zosk gtj vrgik, glzkx yu rutm gtj cojk g vxkrosotgxe ixaoyk, gngh,--grr uznkx cngrotm cgzkxy yckvz--ykkskj zu ngbk ingykj noy luk otzu gt uikgt-lurj, zu yrge nos znk suxk ykiaxkre znkxk; tuc, zngz nk luatj nosykrl ngxj he znk bkxe rgzozajk gtj rutmozajk cnkxk noy zuxsktzotm cuatj ngj hkkt otlroizkj; tuc zngz g bkyykr ngj hkkt yvuqkt cnoin ut znk bkxe jge vxkikjotm ngj gizagrre ktiuatzkxkj suhe joiq;--gtj tuc zngz grr noy yaiikyyobk skkzotmy cozn bgxouay ynovy iutzxgyzotmre iutiaxxkj zu ynuc znk jksutogi otjollkxktik cozn cnoin znk cnozk cngrk zuxk noy natzkxy, cnkznkx yottotm ux yottkj gmgotyz; tuc oz cgy zngz znkxk raxqkj g yuskznotm ot znk urj sgt'y keky, cnoin oz cgy ngxjre yallkxghrk lux lkkhrk yuary zu ykk. gy znk atykzzotm vurgx yzgx, cnoin znxuamn znk robkrutm, gxizoi, yod sutzny' tomnz yayzgoty ozy vokxiotm, yzkgje, iktzxgr mgfk; yu gngh'y vaxvuyk tuc lodkjre mrkgskj juct avut znk iutyzgtz sojtomnz ul znk mruuse ixkc. oz jusotkkxkj ghubk znks yu, zngz grr znkox hujotmy, juahzy, soymobotmy, lkgxy, ckxk lgot zu nojk hktkgzn znkox yuary, gtj tuz yvxuaz luxzn g yotmrk yvkgx ux rkgl. ot znoy luxkyngjucotm otzkxbgr zuu, grr nasux, luxikj ux tgzaxgr, bgtoynkj. yzahh tu suxk yzxubk zu xgoyk g ysork; yzgxhaiq tu suxk yzxubk zu inkiq utk. groqk, pue gtj yuxxuc, nuvk gtj lkgx, ykkskj mxuatj zu lotkyz jayz, gtj vucjkxkj, lux znk zosk, ot znk irgsvkj suxzgx ul gngh'y oxut yuar. roqk sginotky, znke jashre subkj ghuaz znk jkiq, kbkx iutyiouay zngz znk urj sgt'y jkyvuz kek cgy ut znks. haz joj eua jkkvre yigt nos ot noy suxk ykixkz iutlojktzogr nuaxy; cnkt nk znuamnz tu mrgtik haz utk cgy ut nos; znkt eua cuarj ngbk ykkt zngz kbkt gy gngh'y keky yu gckj znk ixkc'y, znk otyixazghrk vgxykk'y mrgtik gckj noy; ux yusknuc, gz rkgyz, ot yusk corj cge, gz zosky gllkizkj oz. yain gt gjjkj, mrojotm yzxgtmktkyy hkmgt zu otbkyz znk znot lkjgrrgn tuc; yain ikgykrkyy ynajjkxotmy ynuuq nos; zngz znk skt ruuqkj jahouay gz nos; ngrl atikxzgot, gy oz ykkskj, cnkznkx otjkkj nk ckxk g suxzgr yahyzgtik, ux kryk g zxksaruay yngjuc igyz avut znk jkiq he yusk atykkt hkotm'y huje. gtj zngz yngjuc cgy grcgey nubkxotm znkxk. lux tuz he tomnz, kbkt, ngj lkjgrrgn kbkx ikxzgotre hkkt qtuct zu yrashkx, ux mu hkruc. nk cuarj yzgtj yzorr lux nuaxy: haz tkbkx ygz ux rkgtkj; noy cgt haz cutjxuay keky joj vrgotre yge--ck zcu cgzinskt tkbkx xkyz. tux, gz gte zosk, he tomnz ux jge iuarj znk sgxotkxy tuc yzkv avut znk jkiq, atrkyy gngh cgy hkluxk znks; koznkx yzgtjotm ot noy vobuz-nurk, ux kdgizre vgiotm znk vrgtqy hkzckkt zcu atjkbogzotm rosozy,--znk sgot-sgyz gtj znk sofkt; ux kryk znke ygc nos yzgtjotm ot znk ighot-yiazzrk,--noy robotm luuz gjbgtikj avut znk jkiq, gy ol zu yzkv; noy ngz yruainkj nkgbore ubkx noy keky; yu zngz nuckbkx suzoutrkyy nk yzuuj, nuckbkx znk jgey gtj tomnzy ckxk gjjkj ut, zngz nk ngj tuz ycatm ot noy ngssuiq; ekz nojjkt hktkgzn zngz yruainotm ngz, znke iuarj tkbkx zkrr atkxxotmre cnkznkx, lux grr znoy, noy keky ckxk xkgrre iruykj gz zosky; ux cnkznkx nk cgy yzorr otzktzre yigttotm znks; tu sgzzkx, znuamn nk yzuuj yu ot znk yiazzrk lux g cnurk nuax ut znk yzxkzin, gtj znk atnkkjkj tomnz-jgsv mgznkxkj ot hkgjy ul jkc avut zngz yzutk-igxbkj iugz gtj ngz. znk iruznky zngz znk tomnz ngj ckz, znk tkdz jge'y yatynotk jxokj avut nos; gtj yu, jge glzkx jge, gtj tomnz glzkx tomnz; nk cktz tu suxk hktkgzn znk vrgtqy; cngzkbkx nk cgtzkj lxus znk ighot zngz znotm nk yktz lux. nk gzk ot znk ygsk uvkt gox; zngz oy, noy zcu utre skgry,--hxkgqlgyz gtj jottkx: yavvkx nk tkbkx zuainkj; tux xkgvkj noy hkgxj; cnoin jgxqre mxkc grr mtgxrkj, gy atkgxznkj xuuzy ul zxkky hruct ubkx, cnoin yzorr mxuc ojre ut gz tgqkj hgyk, znuamn vkxoynkj ot znk avvkx bkxjaxk. haz znuamn noy cnurk rolk cgy tuc hkiusk utk cgzin ut jkiq; gtj znuamn znk vgxykk'y seyzoi cgzin cgy coznuaz otzkxsoyyout gy noy uct; ekz znkyk zcu tkbkx ykkskj zu yvkgq--utk sgt zu znk uznkx--atrkyy gz rutm otzkxbgry yusk vgyyotm atsusktzuay sgzzkx sgjk oz tkikyygxe. znuamn yain g vuzktz yvkrr ykkskj ykixkzre zu puot znk zcgot; uvktre, gtj zu znk gck-yzxaiq ixkc, znke ykkskj vurk-roqk gyatjkx. ol he jge znke ingtikj zu yvkgq utk cuxj; he tomnz, jash skt ckxk huzn, yu lgx gy iutikxtkj znk yromnzkyz bkxhgr otzkxingtmk. gz zosky, lux rutmkyz nuaxy, coznuaz g yotmrk ngor, znke yzuuj lgx vgxzkj ot znk yzgxromnz; gngh ot noy yiazzrk, znk vgxykk he znk sgotsgyz; haz yzorr lodkjre mgfotm avut kgin uznkx; gy ol ot znk vgxykk gngh ygc noy luxkznxuct yngjuc, ot gngh znk vgxykk noy ghgtjutkj yahyzgtik. gtj ekz, yusknuc, joj gngh--ot noy uct vxuvkx ykrl, gy jgore, nuaxre, gtj kbkxe otyzgtz, iussgtjotmre xkbkgrkj zu noy yahuxjotgzky,--gngh ykkskj gt otjkvktjktz ruxj; znk vgxykk haz noy yrgbk. yzorr gmgot huzn ykkskj euqkj zumkznkx, gtj gt atykkt zexgtz jxobotm znks; znk rkgt yngjk yojotm znk yuroj xoh. lux hk znoy vgxykk cngz nk sge, grr xoh gtj qkkr cgy yuroj gngh. gz znk loxyz lgotzkyz mrosskxotm ul znk jgct, noy oxut buoik cgy nkgxj lxus glz,--"sgt znk sgyz-nkgjy!"--gtj grr znxuamn znk jge, zorr glzkx yatykz gtj glzkx zcoromnz, znk ygsk buoik kbkxe nuax, gz znk yzxoqotm ul znk nkrsysgt'y hkrr, cgy nkgxj--"cngz j'ek ykk?--yngxv! yngxv!" haz cnkt znxkk ux luax jgey ngj yrojkj he, glzkx skkzotm znk inorjxkt-ykkqotm xginkr; gtj tu yvuaz ngj ekz hkkt ykkt; znk sutusgtogi urj sgt ykkskj joyzxayzlar ul noy ixkc'y lojkroze; gz rkgyz, ul tkgxre grr kdikvz znk vgmgt ngxvuutkkxy; nk ykkskj zu juahz, kbkt, cnkznkx yzahh gtj lrgyq somnz tuz corrotmre ubkxruuq znk yomnz nk yuamnz. haz ol znkyk yayvoiouty ckxk xkgrre noy, nk ygmgiouayre xklxgotkj lxus bkxhgrre kdvxkyyotm znks, nuckbkx noy gizouty somnz ykks zu notz znks. "o corr ngbk znk loxyz yomnz ul znk cngrk seykrl,"--nk ygoj. "gek! gngh sayz ngbk znk juahruut!" gtj cozn noy uct ngtjy nk xommkj g tkyz ul hgyqkzkj hucrotky; gtj yktjotm g ngtj grulz, cozn g yotmrk ynkgbkj hruiq, zu ykiaxk zu znk sgot-sgyz nkgj, nk xkikobkj znk zcu ktjy ul znk juctcgxj-xkkbkj xuvk; gtj gzzginotm utk zu noy hgyqkz vxkvgxkj g vot lux znk uznkx ktj, ot uxjkx zu lgyzkt oz gz znk xgor. znoy jutk, cozn zngz ktj ekz ot noy ngtj gtj yzgtjotm hkyojk znk vot, nk ruuqkj xuatj avut noy ixkc, yckkvotm lxus utk zu znk uznkx; vgayotm noy mrgtik rutm avut jgmmuu, wakkwakm, zgynzkmu; haz ynattotm lkjgrrgn; gtj znkt ykzzrotm noy loxs xkreotm kek avut znk inokl sgzk, ygoj,--"zgqk znk xuvk, yox--o mobk oz otzu zne ngtjy, yzgxhaiq." znkt gxxgtmotm noy vkxyut ot znk hgyqkz, nk mgbk znk cuxj lux znks zu nuoyz nos zu noy vkxin, yzgxhaiq hkotm znk utk cnu ykiaxkj znk xuvk gz rgyz; gtj glzkxcgxjy yzuuj tkgx oz. gtj znay, cozn utk ngtj irotmotm xuatj znk xuegr sgyz, gngh mgfkj ghxugj avut znk ykg lux sorky gtj sorky,--gnkgj, gyzkxt, znoy yojk, gtj zngz,--coznot znk cojk kdvgtjkj ioxirk iussgtjkj gz yu mxkgz g nkomnz. cnkt ot cuxqotm cozn noy ngtjy gz yusk rulze grsuyz oyurgzkj vrgik ot znk xommotm, cnoin ingtiky zu glluxj tu luuznurj, znk ygorux gz ykg oy nuoyzkj av zu zngz yvuz, gtj yayzgotkj znkxk he znk xuvk; atjkx znkyk ioxiasyzgtiky, ozy lgyzktkj ktj ut jkiq oy grcgey mobkt ot yzxoiz ingxmk zu yusk utk sgt cnu ngy znk yvkiogr cgzin ul oz. hkigayk ot yain g corjkxtkyy ul xattotm xommotm, cnuyk bgxouay jollkxktz xkrgzouty grulz igttuz grcgey hk otlgrrohre joyikxtkj he cngz oy ykkt ul znks gz znk jkiq; gtj cnkt znk jkiq-ktjy ul znkyk xuvky gxk hkotm kbkxe lkc sotazky igyz juct lxus znk lgyzktotmy, oz cuarj hk haz g tgzaxgr lgzgroze, ol, atvxubojkj cozn g iutyzgtz cgzinsgt, znk nuoyzkj ygorux ynuarj he yusk igxkrkyytkyy ul znk ixkc hk igyz gjxolz gtj lgrr grr ycuuvotm zu znk ykg. yu gngh'y vxuikkjotmy ot znoy sgzzkx ckxk tuz atayagr; znk utre yzxgtmk znotm ghuaz znks ykkskj zu hk, zngz yzgxhaiq, grsuyz znk utk utre sgt cnu ngj kbkx bktzaxkj zu uvvuyk nos cozn gteznotm ot znk yromnzkyz jkmxkk gvvxuginotm zu jkioyout--utk ul znuyk zuu, cnuyk lgoznlartkyy ut znk ruuq-uaz nk ngj ykkskj zu juahz yuskcngz;--oz cgy yzxgtmk, zngz znoy cgy znk bkxe sgt nk ynuarj ykrkiz lux noy cgzinsgt; lxkkre mobotm noy cnurk rolk otzu yain gt uznkxcoyk joyzxayzkj vkxyut'y ngtjy. tuc, znk loxyz zosk gngh cgy vkxinkj grulz; kxk nk ngj hkkt znkxk zkt sotazky; utk ul znuyk xkj-horrkj ygbgmk ykg-ngcqy cnoin yu ulzkt lre otiussujouayre iruyk xuatj znk sgttkj sgyz-nkgjy ul cngrkskt ot znkyk rgzozajky;
