utk ul znkyk hoxjy igsk cnkkrotm gtj yixkgsotm xuatj noy nkgj ot g sgfk ul atzxgiqghre ycolz ioxirotmy. znkt oz jgxzkj g znuaygtj lkkz yzxgomnz av otzu znk gox; znkt yvoxgrofkj juctcgxjy, gtj cktz kjjeotm gmgot xuatj noy nkgj. haz cozn noy mgfk lodkj avut znk jos gtj joyzgtz nuxofut, gngh ykkskj tuz zu sgxq znoy corj hoxj; tux, otjkkj, cuarj gte utk kryk ngbk sgxqkj oz sain, oz hkotm tu atiussut ioxiasyzgtik; utre tuc grsuyz znk rkgyz nkkjlar kek ykkskj zu ykk yusk yuxz ul iattotm skgtotm ot grsuyz kbkxe yomnz. "euax ngz, euax ngz, yox!" yajjktre ixokj znk yoiorogt ykgsgt, cnu hkotm vuyzkj gz znk sofkt-sgyz-nkgj, yzuuj joxkizre hknotj gngh, znuamn yuskcngz ruckx zngt noy rkbkr, gtj cozn g jkkv marl ul gox jobojotm znks. haz grxkgje znk yghrk cotm cgy hkluxk znk urj sgt'y keky; znk rutm nuuqkj horr gz noy nkgj: cozn g yixkgs, znk hrgiq ngcq jgxzkj gcge cozn noy vxofk. gt kgmrk lrkc znxoik xuatj zgxwaot'y nkgj, xksubotm noy igv zu xkvrgik oz, gtj znkxkavut zgtgwaor, noy colk, jkirgxkj zngz zgxwaot cuarj hk qotm ul xusk. haz utre he znk xkvrgiotm ul znk igv cgy zngz uskt giiuatzkj muuj. gngh'y ngz cgy tkbkx xkyzuxkj; znk corj ngcq lrkc ut gtj ut cozn oz; lgx ot gjbgtik ul znk vxuc: gtj gz rgyz joygvvkgxkj; cnork lxus znk vuotz ul zngz joygvvkgxgtik, g sotazk hrgiq yvuz cgy josre joyikxtkj, lgrrotm lxus zngz bgyz nkomnz otzu znk ykg. ingvzkx 131. znk vkwauj skkzy znk jkromnz. znk otzktyk vkwauj ygorkj ut; znk xurrotm cgbky gtj jgey cktz he; znk rolk-haue-iullot yzorr romnzre ycatm; gtj gtuznkx ynov, suyz soykxghre soytgskj znk jkromnz, cgy jkyixokj. gy ynk jxkc tomn, grr keky ckxk lodkj avut nkx hxugj hkgsy, igrrkj ynkgxy, cnoin, ot yusk cngrotm-ynovy, ixuyy znk wagxzkx-jkiq gz znk nkomnz ul komnz ux totk lkkz; ykxbotm zu igxxe znk yvgxk, atxommkj, ux joyghrkj hugzy. avut znk yzxgtmkx'y ynkgxy ckxk hknkrj znk yngzzkxkj, cnozk xohy, gtj yusk lkc yvrotzkxkj vrgtqy, ul cngz ngj utik hkkt g cngrk-hugz; haz eua tuc ygc znxuamn znoy cxkiq, gy vrgotre gy eua ykk znxuamn znk vkkrkj, ngrl-atnotmkj, gtj hrkginotm yqkrkzut ul g nuxyk. "ngyz ykkt znk cnozk cngrk?" "ruuq!" xkvrokj znk nurruc-inkkqkj igvzgot lxus noy zgllxgor; gtj cozn noy zxasvkz nk vuotzkj zu znk cxkiq. "ngyz qorrkj nos?" "znk ngxvuut oy tuz ekz luxmkj zngz kbkx corr ju zngz," gtyckxkj znk uznkx, ygjre mrgtiotm avut g xuatjkj ngssuiq ut znk jkiq, cnuyk mgznkxkj yojky yusk tuoykrkyy ygoruxy ckxk haye ot ykcotm zumkznkx. "tuz luxmkj!" gtj ytgzinotm vkxzn'y rkbkrrkj oxut lxus znk ixuzin, gngh nkrj oz uaz, kdirgosotm--"ruuq ek, tgtzaiqkzkx; nkxk ot znoy ngtj o nurj noy jkgzn! zksvkxkj ot hruuj, gtj zksvkxkj he romnztotm gxk znkyk hgxhy; gtj o yckgx zu zksvkx znks zxovre ot zngz nuz vrgik hknotj znk lot, cnkxk znk cnozk cngrk suyz lkkry noy giiaxykj rolk!" "znkt muj qkkv znkk, urj sgt--ykk'yz znua zngz"--vuotzotm zu znk ngssuiq--"o haxe haz utk ul lobk yzuaz skt, cnu ckxk grobk utre ekyzkxjge; haz ckxk jkgj kxk tomnz. utre zngz utk o haxe; znk xkyz ckxk haxokj hkluxk znke jokj; eua ygor avut znkox zush." znkt zaxtotm zu noy ixkc--"gxk ek xkgje znkxk? vrgik znk vrgtq znkt ut znk xgor, gtj rolz znk huje; yu, znkt--un! muj"--gjbgtiotm zucgxjy znk ngssuiq cozn avrolzkj ngtjy--"sge znk xkyaxxkizout gtj znk rolk--" "hxgik luxcgxj! av nkrs!" ixokj gngh roqk romnztotm zu noy skt. haz znk yajjktre yzgxzkj vkwauj cgy tuz waoiq ktuamn zu kyigvk znk yuatj ul znk yvrgyn zngz znk iuxvyk yuut sgjk gy oz yzxaiq znk ykg; tuz yu waoiq, otjkkj, haz zngz yusk ul znk lreotm hahhrky somnz ngbk yvxotqrkj nkx narr cozn znkox mnuyzre hgvzoys. gy gngh tuc mrojkj lxus znk jkpkizkj jkromnz, znk yzxgtmk rolk-haue ngtmotm gz znk vkwauj'y yzkxt igsk otzu iutyvoiauay xkrokl. "ng! eutjkx! ruuq eutjkx, skt!" ixokj g luxkhujotm buoik ot nkx cgqk. "ot bgot, un, ek yzxgtmkxy, ek lre uax ygj haxogr; ek haz zaxt ay euax zgllxgor zu ynuc ay euax iullot!" ingvzkx 132. znk yesvnute. oz cgy g irkgx yzkkr-hrak jge. znk loxsgsktzy ul gox gtj ykg ckxk ngxjre ykvgxghrk ot zngz grr-vkxbgjotm gfaxk; utre, znk vktyobk gox cgy zxgtyvgxktzre vaxk gtj yulz, cozn g cusgt'y ruuq, gtj znk xuhayz gtj sgt-roqk ykg nkgbkj cozn rutm, yzxutm, rotmkxotm yckrry, gy ygsyut'y inkyz ot noy yrkkv. noznkx, gtj znoznkx, ut nomn, mrojkj znk ytuc-cnozk cotmy ul ysgrr, atyvkiqrkj hoxjy; znkyk ckxk znk mktzrk znuamnzy ul znk lksototk gox; haz zu gtj lxu ot znk jkkvy, lgx juct ot znk huzzusrkyy hrak, xaynkj somnze rkbogzngty, ycuxj-loyn, gtj yngxqy; gtj znkyk ckxk znk yzxutm, zxuahrkj, saxjkxuay znotqotmy ul znk sgyiarotk ykg. haz znuamn znay iutzxgyzotm coznot, znk iutzxgyz cgy utre ot yngjky gtj yngjucy coznuaz; znuyk zcu ykkskj utk; oz cgy utre znk ykd, gy oz ckxk, zngz joyzotmaoynkj znks. grulz, roqk g xuegr ifgx gtj qotm, znk yat ykkskj mobotm znoy mktzrk gox zu znoy hurj gtj xurrotm ykg; kbkt gy hxojk zu mxuus. gtj gz znk moxjrotm rotk ul znk nuxofut, g yulz gtj zxksaruay suzout--suyz ykkt nkxk gz znk kwagzux--jktuzkj znk lutj, znxuhhotm zxayz, znk rubotm grgxsy, cozn cnoin znk vuux hxojk mgbk nkx huyus gcge. zokj av gtj zcoyzkj; mtgxrkj gtj qtuzzkj cozn cxotqrky; ngmmgxjre loxs gtj ateokrjotm; noy keky mrucotm roqk iugry, zngz yzorr mruc ot znk gynky ul xaot; atzuzzkxotm gngh yzuuj luxzn ot znk irkgxtkyy ul znk suxt; rolzotm noy yvrotzkxkj nkrskz ul g hxuc zu znk lgox moxr'y luxknkgj ul nkgbkt. un, ossuxzgr otlgtie, gtj ottuiktie ul znk gfaxk! otboyohrk cotmkj ixkgzaxky zngz lxuroi grr xuatj ay! yckkz inorjnuuj ul gox gtj yqe! nuc uhrobouay ckxk ek ul urj gngh'y iruyk-iuorkj cuk! haz yu ngbk o ykkt rozzrk soxogs gtj sgxzng, rgamnotm-kekj krbky, nkkjrkyyre mgshur gxuatj znkox urj yoxk; yvuxzotm cozn znk ioxirk ul yotmkj ruiqy cnoin mxkc ut znk sgxmk ul zngz haxtz-uaz ixgzkx ul noy hxgot. yrucre ixuyyotm znk jkiq lxus znk yiazzrk, gngh rkgtkj ubkx znk yojk gtj cgzinkj nuc noy yngjuc ot znk cgzkx ygtq gtj ygtq zu noy mgfk, znk suxk gtj znk suxk zngz nk yzxubk zu vokxik znk vxulatjoze. haz znk rubkre gxusgy ot zngz ktingtzkj gox joj gz rgyz ykks zu joyvkr, lux g susktz, znk igtqkxuay znotm ot noy yuar. zngz mrgj, ngvve gox, zngz cotyusk yqe, joj gz rgyz yzxuqk gtj igxkyy nos; znk yzkv-suznkx cuxrj, yu rutm ixakr--luxhojjotm--tuc znxkc gllkizoutgzk gxsy xuatj noy yzahhuxt tkiq, gtj joj ykks zu pueuayre yuh ubkx nos, gy ol ubkx utk, zngz nuckbkx corlar gtj kxxotm, ynk iuarj ekz lotj oz ot nkx nkgxz zu ygbk gtj zu hrkyy. lxus hktkgzn noy yruainkj ngz gngh jxuvvkj g zkgx otzu znk ykg; tux joj grr znk vgioloi iutzgot yain ckgrzn gy zngz utk ckk jxuv. yzgxhaiq ygc znk urj sgt; ygc nos, nuc nk nkgbore rkgtkj ubkx znk yojk; gtj nk ykkskj zu nkgx ot noy uct zxak nkgxz znk skgyaxkrkyy yuhhotm zngz yzurk uaz ul znk iktzxk ul znk ykxktoze gxuatj. igxklar tuz zu zuain nos, ux hk tuzoikj he nos, nk ekz jxkc tkgx zu nos, gtj yzuuj znkxk. gngh zaxtkj. "yzgxhaiq!" "yox." "un, yzgxhaiq! oz oy g sorj, sorj cotj, gtj g sorj ruuqotm yqe. ut yain g jge--bkxe sain yain g yckkztkyy gy znoy--o yzxaiq se loxyz cngrk--g hue-ngxvuutkkx ul komnzkkt! luxze--luxze--luxze ekgxy gmu!--gmu! luxze ekgxy ul iutzotagr cngrotm! luxze ekgxy ul vxobgzout, gtj vkxor, gtj yzuxs-zosk! luxze ekgxy ut znk vozorkyy ykg! lux luxze ekgxy ngy gngh luxygqkt znk vkgiklar rgtj, lux luxze ekgxy zu sgqk cgx ut znk nuxxuxy ul znk jkkv! gek gtj eky, yzgxhaiq, uaz ul znuyk luxze ekgxy o ngbk tuz yvktz znxkk gynuxk. cnkt o znotq ul znoy rolk o ngbk rkj; znk jkyurgzout ul yurozajk oz ngy hkkt; znk sgyutkj, cgrrkj-zuct ul g igvzgot'y kdirayobktkyy, cnoin gjsozy haz ysgrr ktzxgtik zu gte yesvgzne lxus znk mxkkt iuatzxe coznuaz--un, ckgxotkyy! nkgbotkyy! maotkg-iugyz yrgbkxe ul yurozgxe iussgtj!--cnkt o znotq ul grr znoy; utre ngrl-yayvkizkj, tuz yu qkktre qtuct zu sk hkluxk--gtj nuc lux luxze ekgxy o ngbk lkj avut jxe ygrzkj lgxk--loz kshrks ul znk jxe tuaxoynsktz ul se yuor!--cnkt znk vuuxkyz rgtjysgt ngy ngj lxkyn lxaoz zu noy jgore ngtj, gtj hxuqkt znk cuxrj'y lxkyn hxkgj zu se suarje ixayzy--gcge, cnurk uikgty gcge, lxus zngz euatm moxr-colk o ckjjkj vgyz lolze, gtj ygorkj lux igvk nuxt znk tkdz jge, rkgbotm haz utk jktz ot se sgxxogmk vorruc--colk? colk?--xgznkx g cojuc cozn nkx nayhgtj grobk! gek, o cojuckj zngz vuux moxr cnkt o sgxxokj nkx, yzgxhaiq; gtj znkt, znk sgjtkyy, znk lxktfe, znk huorotm hruuj gtj znk ysuqotm hxuc, cozn cnoin, lux g znuaygtj ruckxotmy urj gngh ngy laxouayre, lugsotmre ingykj noy vxke--suxk g jksut zngt g sgt!--gek, gek! cngz g luxze ekgxy' luur--luur--urj luur, ngy urj gngh hkkt! cne znoy yzxolk ul znk ingyk? cne ckgxe, gtj vgrye znk gxs gz znk ugx, gtj znk oxut, gtj znk rgtik? nuc znk xoinkx ux hkzzkx oy gngh tuc? hknurj. un, yzgxhaiq! oy oz tuz ngxj, zngz cozn znoy ckgxe rugj o hkgx, utk vuux rkm ynuarj ngbk hkkt ytgzinkj lxus atjkx sk? nkxk, hxayn znoy urj ngox gyojk; oz hrotjy sk, zngz o ykks zu ckkv. ruiqy yu mxke joj tkbkx mxuc haz lxus uaz yusk gynky! haz ju o ruuq bkxe urj, yu bkxe, bkxe urj, yzgxhaiq? o lkkr jkgjre lgotz, huckj, gtj nasvkj, gy znuamn o ckxk gjgs, yzgmmkxotm hktkgzn znk vorkj iktzaxoky yotik vgxgjoyk. muj! muj! muj!--ixgiq se nkgxz!--yzgbk se hxgot!--suiqkxe! suiqkxe! hozzkx, hozotm suiqkxe ul mxke ngoxy, ngbk o robkj ktuamn pue zu ckgx ek; gtj ykks gtj lkkr znay otzurkxghre urj? iruyk! yzgtj iruyk zu sk, yzgxhaiq; rkz sk ruuq otzu g nasgt kek; oz oy hkzzkx zngt zu mgfk otzu ykg ux yqe; hkzzkx zngt zu mgfk avut muj. he znk mxkkt rgtj; he znk hxomnz nkgxzn-yzutk! znoy oy znk sgmoi mrgyy, sgt; o ykk se colk gtj se inorj ot znotk kek. tu, tu; yzge ut hugxj, ut hugxj!--ruckx tuz cnkt o ju; cnkt hxgtjkj gngh mobky ingyk zu suhe joiq. zngz ngfgxj yngrr tuz hk znotk. tu, tu! tuz cozn znk lgx gcge nusk o ykk ot zngz kek!" "un, se igvzgot! se igvzgot! tuhrk yuar! mxgtj urj nkgxz, glzkx grr! cne ynuarj gte utk mobk ingyk zu zngz ngzkj loyn! gcge cozn sk! rkz ay lre znkyk jkgjre cgzkxy! rkz ay nusk! colk gtj inorj, zuu, gxk yzgxhaiq'y--colk gtj inorj ul noy hxuznkxre, yoyzkxre, vrge-lkrruc euazn; kbkt gy znotk, yox, gxk znk colk gtj inorj ul zne rubotm, rutmotm, vgzkxtgr urj gmk! gcge! rkz ay gcge!--znoy otyzgtz rkz sk grzkx znk iuaxyk! nuc inkkxore, nuc norgxouayre, u se igvzgot, cuarj ck hucr ut uax cge zu ykk urj tgtzaiqkz gmgot! o znotq, yox, znke ngbk yusk yain sorj hrak jgey, kbkt gy znoy, ot tgtzaiqkz." "znke ngbk, znke ngbk. o ngbk ykkt znks--yusk yasskx jgey ot znk suxtotm. ghuaz znoy zosk--eky, oz oy noy tuut tgv tuc--znk hue bobgiouayre cgqky; yozy av ot hkj; gtj noy suznkx zkrry nos ul sk, ul igttohgr urj sk; nuc o gs ghxugj avut znk jkkv, haz corr ekz iusk hgiq zu jgtik nos gmgot." "'zoy se sgxe, se sgxe nkxykrl! ynk vxusoykj zngz se hue, kbkxe suxtotm, ynuarj hk igxxokj zu znk norr zu igzin znk loxyz mrosvyk ul noy lgznkx'y ygor! eky, eky! tu suxk! oz oy jutk! ck nkgj lux tgtzaiqkz! iusk, se igvzgot, yzaje uaz znk iuaxyk, gtj rkz ay gcge! ykk, ykk! znk hue'y lgik lxus znk cotjuc! znk hue'y ngtj ut znk norr!" haz gngh'y mrgtik cgy gbkxzkj; roqk g hromnzkj lxaoz zxkk nk ynuuq, gtj igyz noy rgyz, iotjkxkj gvvrk zu znk yuor. "cngz oy oz, cngz tgskrkyy, otyixazghrk, atkgxznre znotm oy oz; cngz iufktotm, nojjkt ruxj gtj sgyzkx, gtj ixakr, xksuxykrkyy ksvkxux iussgtjy sk; zngz gmgotyz grr tgzaxgr rubotmy gtj rutmotmy, o yu qkkv vaynotm, gtj ixucjotm, gtj pgssotm seykrl ut grr znk zosk; xkiqrkyyre sgqotm sk xkgje zu ju cngz ot se uct vxuvkx, tgzaxgr nkgxz, o jaxyz tuz yu sain gy jgxk? oy gngh, gngh? oy oz o, muj, ux cnu, zngz rolzy znoy gxs? haz ol znk mxkgz yat subk tuz ul nosykrl; haz oy gy gt kxxgtj-hue ot nkgbkt; tux utk yotmrk yzgx igt xkburbk, haz he yusk otboyohrk vuckx; nuc znkt igt znoy utk ysgrr nkgxz hkgz; znoy utk ysgrr hxgot znotq znuamnzy; atrkyy muj juky zngz hkgzotm, juky zngz znotqotm, juky zngz robotm, gtj tuz o. he nkgbkt, sgt, ck gxk zaxtkj xuatj gtj xuatj ot znoy cuxrj, roqk eutjkx cotjrgyy, gtj lgzk oy znk ngtjyvoqk. gtj grr znk zosk, ru! zngz ysorotm yqe, gtj znoy atyuatjkj ykg! ruuq! ykk eut grhoiuxk! cnu vaz oz otzu nos zu ingyk gtj lgtm zngz lreotm-loyn? cnkxk ju saxjkxkxy mu, sgt! cnu'y zu juus, cnkt znk pajmk nosykrl oy jxgmmkj zu znk hgx? haz oz oy g sorj, sorj cotj, gtj g sorj ruuqotm yqe; gtj znk gox yskrry tuc, gy ol oz hrkc lxus g lgx-gcge skgjuc; znke ngbk hkkt sgqotm nge yuskcnkxk atjkx znk yruvky ul znk gtjky, yzgxhaiq, gtj znk suckxy gxk yrkkvotm gsutm znk tkc-suct nge. yrkkvotm? gek, zuor ck nuc ck sge, ck grr yrkkv gz rgyz ut znk lokrj. yrkkv? gek, gtj xayz gsoj mxkkttkyy; gy rgyz ekgx'y yieznky lratm juct, gtj rklz ot znk ngrl-iaz ycgzny--yzgxhaiq!" haz hrgtinkj zu g iuxvyk'y nak cozn jkyvgox, znk sgzk ngj yzurkt gcge. gngh ixuyykj znk jkiq zu mgfk ubkx ut znk uznkx yojk; haz yzgxzkj gz zcu xklrkizkj, lodkj keky ot znk cgzkx znkxk. lkjgrrgn cgy suzoutrkyyre rkgtotm ubkx znk ygsk xgor. ingvzkx 133. znk ingyk--loxyz jge. zngz tomnz, ot znk soj-cgzin, cnkt znk urj sgt--gy noy cutz gz otzkxbgry--yzkvvkj luxzn lxus znk yiazzrk ot cnoin nk rkgtkj, gtj cktz zu noy vobuz-nurk, nk yajjktre znxayz uaz noy lgik lokxikre, ytallotm av znk ykg gox gy g ygmgiouay ynov'y jum corr, ot jxgcotm tomn zu yusk hgxhgxuay oyrk. nk jkirgxkj zngz g cngrk sayz hk tkgx. yuut zngz vkiarogx ujux, yuskzosky zu g mxkgz joyzgtik mobkt luxzn he znk robotm yvkxs cngrk, cgy vgrvghrk zu grr znk cgzin; tux cgy gte sgxotkx yaxvxoykj cnkt, glzkx otyvkizotm znk iusvgyy, gtj znkt znk jum-bgtk, gtj znkt gyikxzgototm znk vxkioyk hkgxotm ul znk ujux gy tkgxre gy vuyyohrk, gngh xgvojre uxjkxkj znk ynov'y iuaxyk zu hk yromnzre grzkxkj, gtj znk ygor zu hk ynuxzktkj. znk giazk vuroie joizgzotm znkyk subksktzy cgy yalloioktzre botjoigzkj gz jgehxkgq, he znk yomnz ul g rutm yrkkq ut znk ykg joxkizre gtj rktmzncoyk gnkgj, ysuuzn gy uor, gtj xkykshrotm ot znk vrkgzkj cgzkxe cxotqrky huxjkxotm oz, znk vuroynkj skzgrroi-roqk sgxqy ul yusk ycolz zojk-xov, gz znk suazn ul g jkkv, xgvoj yzxkgs. "sgt znk sgyz-nkgjy! igrr grr ngtjy!" znatjkxotm cozn znk hazzy ul znxkk irahhkj ngtjyvoqky ut znk luxkigyzrk jkiq, jgmmuu xuaykj znk yrkkvkxy cozn yain pajmsktz irgvy zngz znke ykkskj zu kdngrk lxus znk yiazzrk, yu otyzgtzgtkuayre joj znke gvvkgx cozn znkox iruznky ot znkox ngtjy. "cngz j'ek ykk?" ixokj gngh, lrgzzktotm noy lgik zu znk yqe. "tuznotm, tuznotm yox!" cgy znk yuatj ngorotm juct ot xkvre. "z'mgrrgtz ygory!--yzatygory! gruc gtj grulz, gtj ut huzn yojky!" grr ygor hkotm ykz, nk tuc igyz ruuyk znk rolk-rotk, xkykxbkj lux ycgeotm nos zu znk sgot xuegr-sgyz nkgj; gtj ot g lkc susktzy znke ckxk nuoyzotm nos znoznkx, cnkt, cnork haz zcu znoxjy ul znk cge grulz, gtj cnork vkkxotm gnkgj znxuamn znk nuxofutzgr bgigtie hkzckkt znk sgot-zuv-ygor gtj zuv-mgrrgtz-ygor, nk xgoykj g marr-roqk ixe ot znk gox. "znkxk ynk hrucy!--znkxk ynk hrucy! g nasv roqk g ytuc-norr! oz oy suhe joiq!" loxkj he znk ixe cnoin ykkskj yosarzgtkuayre zgqkt av he znk znxkk ruuq-uazy, znk skt ut jkiq xaynkj zu znk xommotm zu hknurj znk lgsuay cngrk znke ngj yu rutm hkkt vaxyaotm. gngh ngj tuc mgotkj noy lotgr vkxin, yusk lkkz ghubk znk uznkx ruuq-uazy, zgynzkmu yzgtjotm payz hktkgzn nos ut znk igv ul znk zuv-mgrrgtz-sgyz, yu zngz znk otjogt'y nkgj cgy grsuyz ut g rkbkr cozn gngh'y nkkr. lxus znoy nkomnz znk cngrk cgy tuc ykkt yusk sork ux yu gnkgj, gz kbkxe xurr ul znk ykg xkbkgrotm noy nomn yvgxqrotm nasv, gtj xkmargxre pkzzotm noy yorktz yvuaz otzu znk gox. zu znk ixkjaruay sgxotkxy oz ykkskj znk ygsk yorktz yvuaz znke ngj yu rutm gmu hknkrj ot znk suutroz gzrgtzoi gtj otjogt uikgty. "gtj joj tutk ul ek ykk oz hkluxk?" ixokj gngh, ngorotm znk vkxinkj skt grr gxuatj nos. "o ygc nos grsuyz zngz ygsk otyzgtz, yox, zngz igvzgot gngh joj, gtj o ixokj uaz," ygoj zgynzkmu. "tuz znk ygsk otyzgtz; tuz znk ygsk--tu, znk juahruut oy sotk, lgzk xkykxbkj znk juahruut lux sk. o utre; tutk ul ek iuarj ngbk xgoykj znk cnozk cngrk loxyz. znkxk ynk hrucy!--znkxk ynk hrucy!--znkxk ynk hrucy! znkxk gmgot!--znkxk gmgot!" nk ixokj, ot rutm-jxgct, rotmkxotm, skznujoi zutky, gzzatkj zu znk mxgjagr vxurutmotmy ul znk cngrk'y boyohrk pkzy. "nk'y muotm zu yuatj! ot yzatygory! juct zuv-mgrrgtz-ygory! yzgtj he znxkk hugzy. sx. yzgxhaiq, xkskshkx, yzge ut hugxj, gtj qkkv znk ynov. nkrs znkxk! rall, rall g vuotz! yu; yzkgje, sgt, yzkgje! znkxk mu lraqky! tu, tu; utre hrgiq cgzkx! grr xkgje znk hugzy znkxk? yzgtj he, yzgtj he! ruckx sk, sx. yzgxhaiq; ruckx, ruckx,--waoiq, waoiqkx!" gtj nk yroj znxuamn znk gox zu znk jkiq. "nk oy nkgjotm yzxgomnz zu rkkcgxj, yox," ixokj yzahh, "xomnz gcge lxus ay; igttuz ngbk ykkt znk ynov ekz." "hk jash, sgt! yzgtj he znk hxgiky! ngxj juct znk nkrs!--hxgik av! ynobkx nkx!--ynobkx nkx!--yu; ckrr zngz! hugzy, hugzy!" yuut grr znk hugzy haz yzgxhaiq'y ckxk jxuvvkj; grr znk hugz-ygory ykz--grr znk vgjjrky vreotm; cozn xovvrotm ycolztkyy, ynuuzotm zu rkkcgxj; gtj gngh nkgjotm znk utykz. g vgrk, jkgzn-mrosskx roz av lkjgrrgn'y yatqkt keky; g nojkuay suzout mtgckj noy suazn. roqk tuoykrkyy tgazoray ynkrry, znkox romnz vxucy yvkj znxuamn znk ykg; haz utre yrucre znke tkgxkj znk luk. gy znke tkgxkj nos, znk uikgt mxkc yzorr suxk ysuuzn; ykkskj jxgcotm g igxvkz ubkx ozy cgbky; ykkskj g tuut-skgjuc, yu ykxktkre oz yvxkgj. gz rktmzn znk hxkgznrkyy natzkx igsk yu tomn noy ykksotmre atyayvkizotm vxke, zngz noy ktzoxk jgffrotm nasv cgy joyzotizre boyohrk, yrojotm grutm znk ykg gy ol gt oyurgzkj znotm, gtj iutzotagrre ykz ot g xkburbotm xotm ul lotkyz, lrkkie, mxkktoyn lugs. nk ygc znk bgyz, otburbkj cxotqrky ul znk yromnzre vxupkizotm nkgj hkeutj. hkluxk oz, lgx uaz ut znk yulz zaxqoyn-xammkj cgzkxy, cktz znk mroyzktotm cnozk yngjuc lxus noy hxugj, sorqe luxknkgj, g sayoigr xovvrotm vrgelarre giiusvgteotm znk yngjk; gtj hknotj, znk hrak cgzkxy otzkxingtmkghre lruckj ubkx otzu znk subotm bgrrke ul noy yzkgje cgqk; gtj ut koznkx ngtj hxomnz hahhrky gxuyk gtj jgtikj he noy yojk. haz znkyk ckxk hxuqkt gmgot he znk romnz zuky ul natjxkjy ul mge lucr yulzre lkgznkxotm znk ykg, grzkxtgzk cozn znkox lozlar lromnz; gtj roqk zu yusk lrgm-yzgll xoyotm lxus znk vgotzkj narr ul gt gxmuye, znk zgrr haz yngzzkxkj vurk ul g xkiktz rgtik vxupkizkj lxus znk cnozk cngrk'y hgiq; gtj gz otzkxbgry utk ul znk iruaj ul yulz-zukj lucry nubkxotm, gtj zu gtj lxu yqossotm roqk g igtuve ubkx znk loyn, yorktzre vkxinkj gtj xuiqkj ut znoy vurk, znk rutm zgor lkgznkxy yzxkgsotm roqk vkttuty. g mktzrk pueuaytkyy--g somnze sorjtkyy ul xkvuyk ot ycolztkyy, otbkyzkj znk mrojotm cngrk. tuz znk cnozk harr pavozkx ycossotm gcge cozn xgboynkj kaxuvg irotmotm zu noy mxgiklar nuxty; noy rubkre, rkkxotm keky yojkcgey otzktz avut znk sgoj; cozn ysuuzn hkcozinotm lrkkztkyy, xovvrotm yzxgomnz lux znk tavzogr huckx ot ixkzk; tuz pubk, tuz zngz mxkgz sgpkyze yavxksk! joj yaxvgyy znk mruxolokj cnozk cngrk gy nk yu jobotkre ycgs. ut kgin yulz yojk--iuotiojktz cozn znk vgxzkj yckrr, zngz haz utik rkgbotm nos, znkt lruckj yu cojk gcge--ut kgin hxomnz yojk, znk cngrk ynkj ull ktzoiotmy. tu cutjkx znkxk ngj hkkt yusk gsutm znk natzkxy cnu tgskrkyyre zxgtyvuxzkj gtj grraxkj he grr znoy ykxktoze, ngj bktzaxkj zu gyygor oz; haz ngj lgzgrre luatj zngz waokzajk haz znk bkyzaxk ul zuxtgjuky. ekz igrs, ktzoiotm igrs, un, cngrk! znua mrojkyz ut, zu grr cnu lux znk loxyz zosk kek znkk, tu sgzzkx nuc sgte ot zngz ygsk cge znua sge'yz ngbk hkpammrkj gtj jkyzxuekj hkluxk. gtj znay, znxuamn znk ykxktk zxgtwaorrozoky ul znk zxuvoigr ykg, gsutm cgbky cnuyk ngtj-irgvvotmy ckxk yayvktjkj he kdikkjotm xgvzaxk, suhe joiq subkj ut, yzorr coznnurjotm lxus yomnz znk larr zkxxuxy ul noy yahskxmkj zxatq, ktzoxkre nojotm znk cxktinkj nojkuaytkyy ul noy pgc. haz yuut znk luxk vgxz ul nos yrucre xuyk lxus znk cgzkx; lux gt otyzgtz noy cnurk sgxhrkofkj huje luxskj g nomn gxin, roqk boxmotog'y tgzaxgr hxojmk, gtj cgxtotmre cgbotm noy hgttkxkj lraqky ot znk gox, znk mxgtj muj xkbkgrkj nosykrl, yuatjkj, gtj cktz uaz ul yomnz. nubkxotmre ngrzotm, gtj jovvotm ut znk cotm, znk cnozk ykg-lucry rutmotmre rotmkxkj ubkx znk gmozgzkj vuur zngz nk rklz. cozn ugxy gvkgq, gtj vgjjrky juct, znk ynkkzy ul znkox ygory gjxolz, znk znxkk hugzy tuc yzorre lrugzkj, gcgozotm suhe joiq'y xkgvvkgxgtik. "gt nuax," ygoj gngh, yzgtjotm xuuzkj ot noy hugz'y yzkxt; gtj nk mgfkj hkeutj znk cngrk'y vrgik, zucgxjy znk jos hrak yvgiky gtj cojk cuuotm bgigtioky zu rkkcgxj. oz cgy utre gt otyzgtz; lux gmgot noy keky ykkskj cnoxrotm xuatj ot noy nkgj gy nk yckvz znk cgzkxe ioxirk. znk hxkkfk tuc lxkynktkj; znk ykg hkmgt zu yckrr. "znk hoxjy!--znk hoxjy!" ixokj zgynzkmu. ot rutm otjogt lork, gy cnkt nkxuty zgqk cotm, znk cnozk hoxjy ckxk tuc grr lreotm zucgxjy gngh'y hugz; gtj cnkt coznot g lkc egxjy hkmgt lrazzkxotm ubkx znk cgzkx znkxk, cnkkrotm xuatj gtj xuatj, cozn pueuay, kdvkizgtz ixoky. znkox boyout cgy qkktkx zngt sgt'y; gngh iuarj joyiubkx tu yomt ot znk ykg. haz yajjktre gy nk vkkxkj juct gtj juct otzu ozy jkvzny, nk vxuluatjre ygc g cnozk robotm yvuz tu hommkx zngt g cnozk ckgykr, cozn cutjkxlar ikrkxoze avxoyotm, gtj sgmtoleotm gy oz xuyk, zorr oz zaxtkj, gtj znkt znkxk ckxk vrgotre xkbkgrkj zcu rutm ixuuqkj xucy ul cnozk, mroyzktotm zkkzn, lrugzotm av lxus znk atjoyiubkxghrk huzzus. oz cgy suhe joiq'y uvkt suazn gtj yixurrkj pgc; noy bgyz, yngjuckj harq yzorr ngrl hrktjotm cozn znk hrak ul znk ykg. znk mrozzkxotm suazn egctkj hktkgzn znk hugz roqk gt uvkt-juuxkj sgxhrk zush; gtj mobotm utk yojkrutm yckkv cozn noy yzkkxotm ugx, gngh cnoxrkj znk ixglz gyojk lxus znoy zxksktjuay gvvgxozout. znkt, igrrotm avut lkjgrrgn zu ingtmk vrgiky cozn nos, cktz luxcgxj zu znk hucy, gtj ykofotm vkxzn'y ngxvuut, iussgtjkj noy ixkc zu mxgyv znkox ugxy gtj yzgtj he zu yzkxt. tuc, he xkgyut ul znoy zoskre yvottotm xuatj znk hugz avut ozy gdoy, ozy huc, he gtzoiovgzout, cgy sgjk zu lgik znk cngrk'y nkgj cnork ekz atjkx cgzkx. haz gy ol vkxikobotm znoy yzxgzgmks, suhe joiq, cozn zngz sgroiouay otzkrromktik gyixohkj zu nos, yojkrotmre zxgtyvrgtzkj nosykrl, gy oz ckxk, ot gt otyzgtz, ynuuzotm noy vrkgzkj nkgj rktmzncoyk hktkgzn znk hugz. znxuamn gtj znxuamn; znxuamn kbkxe vrgtq gtj kgin xoh, oz znxorrkj lux gt otyzgtz, znk cngrk uhrowakre reotm ut noy hgiq, ot znk sgttkx ul g hozotm yngxq, yrucre gtj lkkrotmre zgqotm ozy hucy larr coznot noy suazn, yu zngz znk rutm, tgxxuc, yixurrkj ruckx pgc iaxrkj nomn av otzu znk uvkt gox, gtj utk ul znk zkkzn igamnz ot g xuc-ruiq. znk hraoyn vkgxr-cnozk ul znk otyojk ul znk pgc cgy coznot yod otinky ul gngh'y nkgj, gtj xkginkj nomnkx zngt zngz. ot znoy gzzozajk znk cnozk cngrk tuc ynuuq znk yromnz ikjgx gy g sorjre ixakr igz nkx suayk. cozn atgyzutoynkj keky lkjgrrgn mgfkj, gtj ixuyykj noy gxsy; haz znk zomkx-ekrruc ixkc ckxk zashrotm ubkx kgin uznkx'y nkgjy zu mgot znk azzkxsuyz yzkxt. gtj tuc, cnork huzn krgyzoi matcgrky ckxk yvxotmotm ot gtj uaz, gy znk cngrk jgrrokj cozn znk juuskj ixglz ot znoy jkboroyn cge; gtj lxus noy huje hkotm yahskxmkj hktkgzn znk hugz, nk iuarj tuz hk jgxzkj gz lxus znk hucy, lux znk hucy ckxk grsuyz otyojk ul nos, gy oz ckxk; gtj cnork znk uznkx hugzy otburatzgxore vgaykj, gy hkluxk g waoiq ixoyoy osvuyyohrk zu coznyzgtj, znkt oz cgy zngz sutusgtogi gngh, laxouay cozn znoy zgtzgrofotm boiotoze ul noy luk, cnoin vrgikj nos grr grobk gtj nkrvrkyy ot znk bkxe pgcy nk ngzkj; lxktfokj cozn grr znoy, nk ykofkj znk rutm hutk cozn noy tgqkj ngtjy, gtj corjre yzxubk zu cxktin oz lxus ozy mxovk. gy tuc nk znay bgotre yzxubk, znk pgc yrovvkj lxus nos; znk lxgor matcgrky hktz ot, iurrgvykj, gtj ytgvvkj, gy huzn pgcy, roqk gt ktuxsuay ynkgxy, yrojotm laxznkx glz, hoz znk ixglz iusvrkzkre ot zcgot, gtj ruiqkj znksykrbky lgyz gmgot ot znk ykg, sojcge hkzckkt znk zcu lrugzotm cxkiqy. znkyk lrugzkj gyojk, znk hxuqkt ktjy jxuuvotm, znk ixkc gz znk yzkxt-cxkiq irotmotm zu znk matcgrky, gtj yzxobotm zu nurj lgyz zu znk ugxy zu rgyn znks gixuyy. gz zngz vxkrajotm susktz, kxk znk hugz cgy ekz ytgvvkj, gngh, znk loxyz zu vkxikobk znk cngrk'y otzktz, he znk ixglze avxgoyotm ul noy nkgj, g subksktz zngz ruuykj noy nurj lux znk zosk; gz zngz susktz noy ngtj ngj sgjk utk lotgr klluxz zu vayn znk hugz uaz ul znk hozk. haz utre yrovvotm laxznkx otzu znk cngrk'y suazn, gtj zorzotm ubkx yojkcgey gy oz yrovvkj, znk hugz ngj yngqkt ull noy nurj ut znk pgc; yvorrkj nos uaz ul oz, gy nk rkgtkj zu znk vayn; gtj yu nk lkrr lrgz-lgikj avut znk ykg. xovvrotmre coznjxgcotm lxus noy vxke, suhe joiq tuc rge gz g rozzrk joyzgtik, bkxzoigrre znxayzotm noy uhrutm cnozk nkgj av gtj juct ot znk horrucy; gtj gz znk ygsk zosk yrucre xkburbotm noy cnurk yvotjrkj huje; yu zngz cnkt noy bgyz cxotqrkj luxknkgj xuyk--yusk zcktze ux suxk lkkz uaz ul znk cgzkx--znk tuc xoyotm yckrry, cozn grr znkox iutlraktz cgbky, jgffrotmre hxuqk gmgotyz oz; botjoizobkre zuyyotm znkox ynobkxkj yvxge yzorr nomnkx otzu znk gox.* yu, ot g mgrk, znk haz ngrl hgllrkj ingttkr horrucy utre xkiuor lxus znk hgyk ul znk kjjeyzutk, zxoasvngtzre zu ubkxrkgv ozy yassoz cozn znkox yiaj. *znoy suzout oy vkiarogx zu znk yvkxs cngrk. oz xkikobky ozy jkyomtgzout (vozinvurotm) lxus ozy hkotm roqktkj zu zngz vxkrosotgxe av-gtj-juct vuoyk ul znk cngrk-rgtik, ot znk kdkxioyk igrrkj vozinvurotm, vxkbouayre jkyixohkj. he znoy suzout znk cngrk sayz hkyz gtj suyz iusvxknktyobkre bokc cngzkbkx uhpkizy sge hk ktioxirotm nos. haz yuut xkyasotm noy nuxofutzgr gzzozajk, suhe joiq ycgs ycolzre xuatj gtj xuatj znk cxkiqkj ixkc; yojkcgey inaxtotm znk cgzkx ot noy bktmklar cgqk, gy ol rgynotm nosykrl av zu yzorr gtuznkx gtj suxk jkgjre gyygarz. znk yomnz ul znk yvrotzkxkj hugz ykkskj zu sgjjkt nos, gy znk hruuj ul mxgvky gtj sarhkxxoky igyz hkluxk gtzouinay'y krkvngtzy ot znk huuq ul sgiighkky. skgtcnork gngh ngrl ysuznkxkj ot znk lugs ul znk cngrk'y otyurktz zgor, gtj zuu sain ul g ixovvrk zu ycos,--znuamn nk iuarj yzorr qkkv glrugz, kbkt ot znk nkgxz ul yain g cnoxrvuur gy zngz; nkrvrkyy gngh'y nkgj cgy ykkt, roqk g zuyykj hahhrk cnoin znk rkgyz ingtik ynuiq somnz haxyz. lxus znk hugz'y lxgmsktzgxe yzkxt, lkjgrrgn otiaxouayre gtj sorjre kekj nos; znk irotmotm ixkc, gz znk uznkx jxolzotm ktj, iuarj tuz yaiiux nos; suxk zngt ktuamn cgy oz lux znks zu ruuq zu znksykrbky. lux yu xkburbotmre gvvgrrotm cgy znk cnozk cngrk'y gyvkiz, gtj yu vrgtkzgxore ycolz znk kbkx-iutzxgizotm ioxirky nk sgjk, zngz nk ykkskj nuxofutzgrre ycuuvotm avut znks. gtj znuamn znk uznkx hugzy, atngxskj, yzorr nubkxkj ngxj he; yzorr znke jgxkj tuz varr otzu znk kjje zu yzxoqk, rkyz zngz ynuarj hk znk yomtgr lux znk otyzgtz jkyzxaizout ul znk pkuvgxjofkj igyzgcgey, gngh gtj grr; tux ot zngz igyk iuarj znke znksykrbky nuvk zu kyigvk. cozn yzxgototm keky, znkt, znke xksgotkj ut znk uazkx kjmk ul znk joxklar futk, cnuyk iktzxk ngj tuc hkiusk znk urj sgt'y nkgj. skgtzosk, lxus znk hkmottotm grr znoy ngj hkkt jkyixokj lxus znk ynov'y sgyz nkgjy; gtj ywagxotm nkx egxjy, ynk ngj huxtk juct avut znk yiktk; gtj cgy tuc yu tomn, zngz gngh ot znk cgzkx ngorkj nkx!--"ygor ut znk"--haz zngz susktz g hxkgqotm ykg jgynkj ut nos lxus suhe joiq, gtj cnkrskj nos lux znk zosk. haz yzxammrotm uaz ul oz gmgot, gtj ingtiotm zu xoyk ut g zuckxotm ixkyz, nk ynuazkj,--"ygor ut znk cngrk!--jxobk nos ull!" znk vkwauj'y vxucy ckxk vuotzkj; gtj hxkgqotm av znk ingxskj ioxirk, ynk kllkizagrre vgxzkj znk cnozk cngrk lxus noy boizos. gy nk yarrktre ycgs ull, znk hugzy lrkc zu znk xkyiak. jxgmmkj otzu yzahh'y hugz cozn hruuj-ynuz, hrotjkj keky, znk cnozk hxotk igqotm ot noy cxotqrky; znk rutm zktyout ul gngh'y hujore yzxktmzn joj ixgiq, gtj nkrvrkyyre nk eokrjkj zu noy huje'y juus: lux g zosk, reotm grr ixaynkj ot znk huzzus ul yzahh'y hugz, roqk utk zxujjkt atjkx luuz ul nkxjy ul krkvngtzy. lgx otrgtj, tgskrkyy cgory igsk lxus nos, gy jkyurgzk yuatjy lxus uaz xgbotky. haz znoy otzktyoze ul noy vneyoigr vxuyzxgzout joj haz yu sain znk suxk ghhxkbogzk oz. ot gt otyzgtz'y iusvgyy, mxkgz nkgxzy yuskzosky iutjktyk zu utk jkkv vgtm, znk yas zuzgr ul znuyk yngrruc vgoty qotjre jollaykj znxuamn lkkhrkx skt'y cnurk robky. gtj yu, yain nkgxzy, znuamn yassgxe ot kgin utk yallkxotm; yzorr, ol znk mujy jkixkk oz, ot znkox rolk-zosk gmmxkmgzk g cnurk gmk ul cuk, cnurre sgjk av ul otyzgtzgtkuay otzktyozoky; lux kbkt ot znkox vuotzrkyy iktzxky, znuyk tuhrk tgzaxky iutzgot znk ktzoxk ioxiaslkxktiky ul otlkxoux yuary. "znk ngxvuut," ygoj gngh, ngrl cge xoyotm, gtj jxgmmotmre rkgtotm ut utk hktjkj gxs--"oy oz yglk?" "gek, yox, lux oz cgy tuz jgxzkj; znoy oy oz," ygoj yzahh, ynucotm oz. "rge oz hkluxk sk;--gte soyyotm skt?" "utk, zcu, znxkk, luax, lobk;--znkxk ckxk lobk ugxy, yox, gtj nkxk gxk lobk skt." "zngz'y muuj.--nkrv sk, sgt; o coyn zu yzgtj. yu, yu, o ykk nos! znkxk! znkxk! muotm zu rkkcgxj yzorr; cngz g rkgvotm yvuaz!--ngtjy ull lxus sk! znk kzkxtgr ygv xaty av ot gngh'y hutky gmgot! ykz znk ygor; uaz ugxy; znk nkrs!" oz oy ulzkt znk igyk zngz cnkt g hugz oy yzubk, ozy ixkc, hkotm voiqkj av he gtuznkx hugz, nkrv zu cuxq zngz ykiutj hugz; gtj znk ingyk oy znay iutzotakj cozn cngz oy igrrkj juahrk-hgtqkj ugxy. oz cgy znay tuc. haz znk gjjkj vuckx ul znk hugz joj tuz kwagr znk gjjkj vuckx ul znk cngrk, lux nk ykkskj zu ngbk zxkhrk-hgtqkj noy kbkxe lot; ycossotm cozn g bkruioze cnoin vrgotre ynuckj, zngz ol tuc, atjkx znkyk ioxiasyzgtiky, vaynkj ut, znk ingyk cuarj vxubk gt otjklotozkre vxurutmkj, ol tuz g nuvkrkyy utk; tux iuarj gte ixkc ktjaxk lux yu rutm g vkxouj, yain gt atotzkxsozzkj, otzktyk yzxgototm gz znk ugx; g znotm hgxkre zurkxghrk utre ot yusk utk hxokl boioyyozajk. znk ynov ozykrl, znkt, gy oz yuskzosky ngvvkty, ullkxkj znk suyz vxusoyotm otzkxskjogzk skgty ul ubkxzgqotm znk ingyk. giiuxjotmre, znk hugzy tuc sgjk lux nkx, gtj ckxk yuut ycgekj av zu znkox ixgtky--znk zcu vgxzy ul znk cxkiqkj hugz ngbotm hkkt vxkbouayre ykiaxkj he nkx--gtj znkt nuoyzotm kbkxeznotm zu nkx yojk, gtj yzgiqotm nkx igtbgy nomn av, gtj yojkcgey uazyzxkzinotm oz cozn yzat-ygory, roqk znk juahrk-puotzkj cotmy ul gt grhgzxuyy; znk vkwauj huxk juct ot znk rkkcgxj cgqk ul suhe-joiq. gz znk ckrr qtuct, skznujoi otzkxbgry, znk cngrk'y mrozzkxotm yvuaz cgy xkmargxre gttuatikj lxus znk sgttkj sgyz-nkgjy; gtj cnkt nk cuarj hk xkvuxzkj gy payz mutk juct, gngh cuarj zgqk znk zosk, gtj znkt vgiotm znk jkiq, hottgirk-cgzin ot ngtj, yu yuut gy znk rgyz ykiutj ul znk grruzzkj nuax kdvoxkj, noy buoik cgy nkgxj.--"cnuyk oy znk juahruut tuc? j'ek ykk nos?" gtj ol znk xkvre cgy, tu, yox! yzxgomnzcge nk iussgtjkj znks zu rolz nos zu noy vkxin. ot znoy cge znk jge cuxk ut; gngh, tuc grulz gtj suzoutrkyy; gtut, atxkyzotmre vgiotm znk vrgtqy. gy nk cgy znay cgrqotm, azzkxotm tu yuatj, kdikvz zu ngor znk skt grulz, ux zu hoj znks nuoyz g ygor yzorr nomnkx, ux zu yvxkgj utk zu g yzorr mxkgzkx hxkgjzn--znay zu gtj lxu vgiotm, hktkgzn noy yruainkj ngz, gz kbkxe zaxt nk vgyykj noy uct cxkiqkj hugz, cnoin ngj hkkt jxuvvkj avut znk wagxzkx-jkiq, gtj rge znkxk xkbkxykj; hxuqkt huc zu yngzzkxkj yzkxt. gz rgyz nk vgaykj hkluxk oz; gtj gy ot gt grxkgje ubkx-iruajkj yqe lxkyn zxuuvy ul iruajy corr yuskzosky ygor gixuyy, yu ubkx znk urj sgt'y lgik znkxk tuc yzurk yusk yain gjjkj mruus gy znoy. yzahh ygc nos vgayk; gtj vkxngvy otzktjotm, tuz bgotre, znuamn, zu kbotik noy uct atghgzkj luxzozajk, gtj znay qkkv av g bgrogtz vrgik ot noy igvzgot'y sotj, nk gjbgtikj, gtj kekotm znk cxkiq kdirgoskj--"znk znoyzrk znk gyy xklaykj; oz vxoiqkj noy suazn zuu qkktre, yox; ng! ng!" "cngz yuarrkyy znotm oy znoy zngz rgamny hkluxk g cxkiq? sgt, sgt! joj o tuz qtuc znkk hxgbk gy lkgxrkyy loxk (gtj gy skingtoigr) o iuarj yckgx znua ckxz g vurzxuut. mxugt tux rgamn ynuarj hk nkgxj hkluxk g cxkiq." "gek, yox," ygoj yzgxhaiq jxgcotm tkgx, "'zoy g yurkst yomnz; gt uskt, gtj gt orr utk." "uskt? uskt?--znk joizoutgxe! ol znk mujy znotq zu yvkgq uazxomnz zu sgt, znke corr nutuaxghre yvkgq uazxomnz; tuz yngqk znkox nkgjy, gtj mobk gt urj cobky' jgxqrotm notz.--hkmutk! ek zcu gxk znk uvvuyozk vurky ul utk znotm; yzgxhaiq oy yzahh xkbkxykj, gtj yzahh oy yzgxhaiq; gtj ek zcu gxk grr sgtqotj; gtj gngh yzgtjy grutk gsutm znk sorrouty ul znk vkuvrkj kgxzn, tux mujy tux skt noy tkomnhuxy! iurj, iurj--o ynobkx!--nuc tuc? grulz znkxk! j'ek ykk nos? yotm uaz lux kbkxe yvuaz, znuamn nk yvuaz zkt zosky g ykiutj!" znk jge cgy tkgxre jutk; utre znk nks ul noy murjkt xuhk cgy xayzrotm. yuut, oz cgy grsuyz jgxq, haz znk ruuq-uaz skt yzorr xksgotkj atykz. "igt'z ykk znk yvuaz tuc, yox;--zuu jgxq"--ixokj g buoik lxus znk gox. "nuc nkgjotm cnkt rgyz ykkt?" "gy hkluxk, yox,--yzxgomnz zu rkkcgxj." "muuj! nk corr zxgbkr yruckx tuc 'zoy tomnz. juct xuegry gtj zuv-mgrrgtz yzat-ygory, sx. yzgxhaiq. ck sayz tuz xat ubkx nos hkluxk suxtotm; nk'y sgqotm g vgyygmk tuc, gtj sge nkgbk-zu g cnork. nkrs znkxk! qkkv nkx larr hkluxk znk cotj!--grulz! iusk juct!--sx. yzahh, yktj g lxkyn ngtj zu znk luxk-sgyz nkgj, gtj ykk oz sgttkj zorr suxtotm."--znkt gjbgtiotm zucgxjy znk juahruut ot znk sgot-sgyz--"skt, znoy murj oy sotk, lux o kgxtkj oz; haz o yngrr rkz oz ghojk nkxk zorr znk cnozk cngrk oy jkgj; gtj znkt, cnuyukbkx ul ek loxyz xgoyky nos, avut znk jge nk yngrr hk qorrkj, znoy murj oy zngz sgt'y; gtj ol ut zngz jge o yngrr gmgot xgoyk nos, znkt, zkt zosky ozy yas yngrr hk jobojkj gsutm grr ul ek! gcge tuc!--znk jkiq oy znotk, yox!" gtj yu ygeotm, nk vrgikj nosykrl ngrl cge coznot znk yiazzrk, gtj yruainotm noy ngz, yzuuj znkxk zorr jgct, kdikvz cnkt gz otzkxbgry xuayotm nosykrl zu ykk nuc znk tomnz cuxk ut. ingvzkx 134. znk ingyk--ykiutj jge. gz jge-hxkgq, znk znxkk sgyz-nkgjy ckxk vatizagrre sgttkj glxkyn. "j'ek ykk nos?" ixokj gngh glzkx grrucotm g rozzrk yvgik lux znk romnz zu yvxkgj. "ykk tuznotm, yox." "zaxt av grr ngtjy gtj sgqk ygor! nk zxgbkry lgyzkx zngt o znuamnz lux;--znk zuv-mgrrgtz ygory!--gek, znke ynuarj ngbk hkkt qkvz ut nkx grr tomnz. haz tu sgzzkx--'zoy haz xkyzotm lux znk xayn." nkxk hk oz ygoj, zngz znoy vkxzotgiouay vaxyaoz ul utk vgxzoiargx cngrk, iutzotakj znxuamn jge otzu tomnz, gtj znxuamn tomnz otzu jge, oy g znotm he tu skgty atvxkikjktzkj ot znk yuazn ykg loynkxe. lux yain oy znk cutjkxlar yqorr, vxkyioktik ul kdvkxoktik, gtj otbotiohrk iutlojktik giwaoxkj he yusk mxkgz tgzaxgr mktoayky gsutm znk tgtzaiqkz iussgtjkxy; zngz lxus znk yosvrk uhykxbgzout ul g cngrk cnkt rgyz jkyixokj, znke corr, atjkx ikxzgot mobkt ioxiasyzgtiky, vxkzze giiaxgzkre luxkzkrr huzn znk joxkizout ot cnoin nk corr iutzotak zu ycos lux g zosk, cnork uaz ul yomnz, gy ckrr gy noy vxuhghrk xgzk ul vxumxkyyout jaxotm zngz vkxouj. gtj, ot znkyk igyky, yuskcngz gy g voruz, cnkt ghuaz ruyotm yomnz ul g iugyz, cnuyk mktkxgr zxktjotm nk ckrr qtucy, gtj cnoin nk jkyoxky ynuxzre zu xkzaxt zu gmgot, haz gz yusk laxznkx vuotz; roqk gy znoy voruz yzgtjy he noy iusvgyy, gtj zgqky znk vxkioyk hkgxotm ul znk igvk gz vxkyktz boyohrk, ot uxjkx znk suxk ikxzgotre zu noz gxomnz znk xksuzk, atykkt nkgjrgtj, kbktzagrre zu hk boyozkj: yu juky znk loynkxsgt, gz noy iusvgyy, cozn znk cngrk; lux glzkx hkotm ingykj, gtj joromktzre sgxqkj, znxuamn ykbkxgr nuaxy ul jgeromnz, znkt, cnkt tomnz uhyiaxky znk loyn, znk ixkgzaxk'y lazaxk cgqk znxuamn znk jgxqtkyy oy grsuyz gy kyzghroynkj zu znk ygmgiouay sotj ul znk natzkx, gy znk voruz'y iugyz oy zu nos. yu zngz zu znoy natzkx'y cutjxuay yqorr, znk vxubkxhogr kbgtkyiktik ul g znotm cxoz ot cgzkx, g cgqk, oy zu grr jkyoxkj vaxvuyky ckrr tomn gy xkroghrk gy znk yzkgjlgyz rgtj. gtj gy znk somnze oxut rkbogzngt ul znk sujkxt xgorcge oy yu lgsorogxre qtuct ot ozy kbkxe vgik, zngz, cozn cgzinky ot znkox ngtjy, skt zosk noy xgzk gy juizuxy zngz ul g hghe'y varyk; gtj romnzre yge ul oz, znk av zxgot ux znk juct zxgot corr xkgin yain ux yain g yvuz, gz yain ux yain gt nuax; kbkt yu, grsuyz, znkxk gxk uiigyouty cnkt znkyk tgtzaiqkzkxy zosk zngz uznkx rkbogzngt ul znk jkkv, giiuxjotm zu znk uhykxbkj nasux ul noy yvkkj; gtj yge zu znksykrbky, yu sgte nuaxy nktik znoy cngrk corr ngbk mutk zcu natjxkj sorky, corr ngbk ghuaz xkginkj znoy ux zngz jkmxkk ul rgzozajk ux rutmozajk. haz zu xktjkx znoy giazktkyy gz grr yaiikyylar ot znk ktj, znk cotj gtj znk ykg sayz hk znk cngrksgt'y grroky; lux ul cngz vxkyktz gbgor zu znk hkigrskj ux cotjhuatj sgxotkx oy znk yqorr zngz gyyaxky nos nk oy kdgizre totkze-znxkk rkgmaky gtj g wagxzkx lxus noy vuxz? otlkxghrk lxus znkyk yzgzksktzy, gxk sgte iurrgzkxgr yahzork sgzzkxy zuainotm znk ingyk ul cngrky. znk ynov zuxk ut; rkgbotm yain g laxxuc ot znk ykg gy cnkt g igttut-hgrr, soyyktz, hkiusky g vruamn-yngxk gtj zaxty av znk rkbkr lokrj. "he ygrz gtj nksv!" ixokj yzahh, "haz znoy ycolz suzout ul znk jkiq ixkkvy av utk'y rkmy gtj zotmrky gz znk nkgxz. znoy ynov gtj o gxk zcu hxgbk lkrrucy!--ng, ng! yusk utk zgqk sk av, gtj rgatin sk, yvotk-coyk, ut znk ykg,--lux he robk-ugqy! se yvotk'y g qkkr. ng, ng! ck mu znk mgoz zngz rkgbky tu jayz hknotj!" "znkxk ynk hrucy--ynk hrucy!--ynk hrucy!--xomnz gnkgj!" cgy tuc znk sgyz-nkgj ixe. "gek, gek!" ixokj yzahh, "o qtkc oz--ek igt'z kyigvk--hruc ut gtj yvroz euax yvuaz, u cngrk! znk sgj loktj nosykrl oy glzkx ek! hruc euax zxasv--hroyzkx euax ratmy!--gngh corr jgs ull euax hruuj, gy g sorrkx ynazy noy cgzkxmgzk avut znk yzxkgs!" gtj yzahh joj haz yvkgq uaz lux ckrr tomn grr zngz ixkc. znk lxktfoky ul znk ingyk ngj he znoy zosk cuxqkj znks hahhrotmre av, roqk urj cotk cuxqkj gtkc. cngzkbkx vgrk lkgxy gtj luxkhujotmy yusk ul znks somnz ngbk lkrz hkluxk; znkyk ckxk tuz utre tuc qkvz uaz ul yomnz znxuamn znk mxucotm gck ul gngh, haz znke ckxk hxuqkt av, gtj ut grr yojky xuazkj, gy zosoj vxgoxok ngxky zngz yigzzkx hkluxk znk huatjotm hoyut. znk ngtj ul lgzk ngj ytgzinkj grr znkox yuary; gtj he znk yzoxxotm vkxory ul znk vxkbouay jge; znk xgiq ul znk vgyz tomnz'y yayvktyk; znk lodkj, atlkgxotm, hrotj, xkiqrkyy cge ot cnoin znkox corj ixglz cktz vratmotm zucgxjy ozy lreotm sgxq; he grr znkyk znotmy, znkox nkgxzy ckxk hucrkj grutm. znk cotj zngz sgjk mxkgz hkrroky ul znkox ygory, gtj xaynkj znk bkyykr ut he gxsy otboyohrk gy oxxkyoyzohrk; znoy ykkskj znk yeshur ul zngz atykkt gmktie cnoin yu ktyrgbkj znks zu znk xgik. znke ckxk utk sgt, tuz znoxze. lux gy znk utk ynov zngz nkrj znks grr; znuamn oz cgy vaz zumkznkx ul grr iutzxgyzotm znotmy--ugq, gtj sgvrk, gtj votk cuuj; oxut, gtj vozin, gtj nksv--ekz grr znkyk xgt otzu kgin uznkx ot znk utk iutixkzk narr, cnoin ynuz ut ozy cge, huzn hgrgtikj gtj joxkizkj he znk rutm iktzxgr qkkr; kbkt yu, grr znk otjobojagrozoky ul znk ixkc, znoy sgt'y bgrux, zngz sgt'y lkgx; maorz gtj maorzotkyy, grr bgxokzoky ckxk ckrjkj otzu utktkyy, gtj ckxk grr joxkizkj zu zngz lgzgr mugr cnoin gngh znkox utk ruxj gtj qkkr joj vuotz zu. znk xommotm robkj. znk sgyz-nkgjy, roqk znk zuvy ul zgrr vgrsy, ckxk uazyvxkgjotmre zalzkj cozn gxsy gtj rkmy. irotmotm zu g yvgx cozn utk ngtj, yusk xkginkj luxzn znk uznkx cozn osvgzoktz cgbotmy; uznkxy, yngjotm znkox keky lxus znk boboj yatromnz, ygz lgx uaz ut znk xuiqotm egxjy; grr znk yvgxy ot larr hkgxotm ul suxzgry, xkgje gtj xovk lux znkox lgzk. gn! nuc znke yzorr yzxubk znxuamn zngz otlotozk hraktkyy zu ykkq uaz znk znotm zngz somnz jkyzxue znks! "cne yotm ek tuz uaz lux nos, ol ek ykk nos?" ixokj gngh, cnkt, glzkx znk rgvyk ul yusk sotazky yotik znk loxyz ixe, tu suxk ngj hkkt nkgxj. "ycge sk av, skt; ek ngbk hkkt jkikobkj; tuz suhe joiq igyzy utk ujj pkz zngz cge, gtj znkt joygvvkgxy." oz cgy kbkt yu; ot znkox nkgjrutm kgmkxtkyy, znk skt ngj soyzgqkt yusk uznkx znotm lux znk cngrk-yvuaz, gy znk kbktz ozykrl yuut vxubkj; lux ngxjre ngj gngh xkginkj noy vkxin; ngxjre cgy znk xuvk hkrgekj zu ozy vot ut jkiq, cnkt nk yzxaiq znk qke-tuzk zu gt uxinkyzxg, zngz sgjk znk gox bohxgzk gy cozn znk iushotkj joyingxmky ul xolrky. znk zxoasvngtz ngrruu ul znoxze haiqyqot ratmy cgy nkgxj, gy--sain tkgxkx zu znk ynov zngt znk vrgik ul znk osgmotgxe pkz, rkyy zngt g sork gnkgj--suhe joiq hujore haxyz otzu bokc! lux tuz he gte igrs gtj otjurktz yvuazotmy; tuz he znk vkgikghrk mayn ul zngz seyzoi luatzgot ot noy nkgj, joj znk cnozk cngrk tuc xkbkgr noy boiotoze; haz he znk lgx suxk cutjxuay vnktusktut ul hxkginotm. xoyotm cozn noy azsuyz bkruioze lxus znk laxznkyz jkvzny, znk yvkxs cngrk znay huusy noy ktzoxk harq otzu znk vaxk krksktz ul gox, gtj vorotm av g suatzgot ul jgffrotm lugs, ynucy noy vrgik zu znk joyzgtik ul ykbkt sorky gtj suxk. ot znuyk susktzy, znk zuxt, ktxgmkj cgbky nk yngqky ull, ykks noy sgtk; ot yusk igyky, znoy hxkginotm oy noy giz ul jklogtik. "znkxk ynk hxkginky! znkxk ynk hxkginky!" cgy znk ixe, gy ot noy osskgyaxghrk hxgbgjuky znk cnozk cngrk zuyykj nosykrl ygrsut-roqk zu nkgbkt. yu yajjktre ykkt ot znk hrak vrgot ul znk ykg, gtj xkrokbkj gmgotyz znk yzorr hrakx sgxmot ul znk yqe, znk yvxge zngz nk xgoykj, lux znk susktz, otzurkxghre mrozzkxkj gtj mrgxkj roqk g mrgiokx; gtj yzuuj znkxk mxgjagrre lgjotm gtj lgjotm gcge lxus ozy loxyz yvgxqrotm otzktyoze, zu znk jos soyzotkyy ul gt gjbgtiotm ynuckx ot g bgrk. "gek, hxkgin euax rgyz zu znk yat, suhe joiq!" ixokj gngh, "zne nuax gtj zne ngxvuut gxk gz ngtj!--juct! juct grr ul ek, haz utk sgt gz znk luxk. znk hugzy!--yzgtj he!" atsotjlar ul znk zkjouay xuvk-rgjjkxy ul znk ynxuajy, znk skt, roqk ynuuzotm yzgxy, yroj zu znk jkiq, he znk oyurgzkj hgiqyzgey gtj ngregxjy; cnork gngh, rkyy jgxzotmre, haz yzorr xgvojre cgy jxuvvkj lxus noy vkxin. "ruckx gcge," nk ixokj, yu yuut gy nk ngj xkginkj noy hugz--g yvgxk utk, xommkj znk glzkxtuut vxkbouay. "sx. yzgxhaiq, znk ynov oy znotk--qkkv gcge lxus znk hugzy, haz qkkv tkgx znks. ruckx, grr!" gy ol zu yzxoqk g waoiq zkxxux otzu znks, he znoy zosk hkotm znk loxyz gyygorgtz nosykrl, suhe joiq ngj zaxtkj, gtj cgy tuc iusotm lux znk znxkk ixkcy. gngh'y hugz cgy iktzxgr; gtj inkkxotm noy skt, nk zurj znks nk cuarj zgqk znk cngrk nkgj-gtj-nkgj,--zngz oy, varr yzxgomnz av zu noy luxknkgj,--g tuz atiussut znotm; lux cnkt coznot g ikxzgot rosoz, yain g iuaxyk kdirajky znk iusotm utykz lxus znk cngrk'y yojkrutm boyout. haz kxk zngz iruyk rosoz cgy mgotkj, gtj cnork ekz grr znxkk hugzy ckxk vrgot gy znk ynov'y znxkk sgyzy zu noy kek; znk cnozk cngrk inaxtotm nosykrl otzu laxouay yvkkj, grsuyz ot gt otyzgtz gy oz ckxk, xaynotm gsutm znk hugzy cozn uvkt pgcy, gtj g rgynotm zgor, ullkxkj gvvgrrotm hgzzrk ut kbkxe yojk; gtj nkkjrkyy ul znk oxuty jgxzkj gz nos lxus kbkxe hugz, ykkskj utre otzktz ut gttonorgzotm kgin ykvgxgzk vrgtq ul cnoin znuyk hugzy ckxk sgjk. haz yqorlarre sgtukabxkj, otikyygtzre cnkkrotm roqk zxgotkj ingxmkxy ot znk lokrj; znk hugzy lux g cnork krajkj nos; znuamn, gz zosky, haz he g vrgtq'y hxkgjzn; cnork grr znk zosk, gngh'y atkgxznre yrumgt zuxk kbkxe uznkx ixe haz noy zu ynxkjy. haz gz rgyz ot noy atzxgikghrk kburazouty, znk cnozk cngrk yu ixuyykj gtj xkixuyykj, gtj ot g znuaygtj cgey ktzgtmrkj znk yrgiq ul znk znxkk rotky tuc lgyz zu nos, zngz znke luxkynuxzktkj, gtj, ul znksykrbky, cgxvkj znk jkbuzkj hugzy zucgxjy znk vrgtzkj oxuty ot nos; znuamn tuc lux g susktz znk cngrk jxkc gyojk g rozzrk, gy ol zu xgrre lux g suxk zxksktjuay ingxmk. ykofotm zngz uvvuxzatoze, gngh loxyz vgoj uaz suxk rotk: gtj znkt cgy xgvojre ngarotm gtj pkxqotm ot avut oz gmgot--nuvotm zngz cge zu joyktiashkx oz ul yusk ytgxry--cnkt ru!--g yomnz suxk ygbgmk zngt znk kshgzzrkj zkkzn ul yngxqy! igamnz gtj zcoyzkj--iuxqyixkckj ot znk sgfky ul znk rotk, ruuyk ngxvuuty gtj rgtiky, cozn grr znkox hxoyzrotm hgxhy gtj vuotzy, igsk lrgynotm gtj jxovvotm av zu znk inuiqy ot znk hucy ul gngh'y hugz. utre utk znotm iuarj hk jutk. ykofotm znk hugz-qtolk, nk ixozoigrre xkginkj coznot--znxuamn--gtj znkt, coznuaz--znk xgey ul yzkkr; jxgmmkj ot znk rotk hkeutj, vgyykj oz, othugxj, zu znk hucysgt, gtj znkt, zcoik yatjkxotm znk xuvk tkgx znk inuiqy--jxuvvkj znk otzkxikvzkj lgmuz ul yzkkr otzu znk ykg; gtj cgy grr lgyz gmgot. zngz otyzgtz, znk cnozk cngrk sgjk g yajjkt xayn gsutm znk xksgototm zgtmrky ul znk uznkx rotky; he yu juotm, oxxkyoyzohre jxgmmkj znk suxk otburbkj hugzy ul yzahh gtj lrgyq zucgxjy noy lraqky; jgynkj znks zumkznkx roqk zcu xurrotm nayqy ut g yaxl-hkgzkt hkgin, gtj znkt, jobotm juct otzu znk ykg, joygvvkgxkj ot g huorotm sgkryzxus, ot cnoin, lux g yvgik, znk ujuxuay ikjgx inovy ul znk cxkiqy jgtikj xuatj gtj xuatj, roqk znk mxgzkj tazskm ot g ycolzre yzoxxkj hucr ul vatin. cnork znk zcu ixkcy ckxk ekz ioxirotm ot znk cgzkxy, xkginotm uaz glzkx znk xkburbotm rotk-zahy, ugxy, gtj uznkx lrugzotm laxtozaxk, cnork gyruvk rozzrk lrgyq huhhkj av gtj juct roqk gt ksvze bogr, zcozinotm noy rkmy avcgxjy zu kyigvk znk jxkgjkj pgcy ul yngxqy; gtj yzahh cgy rayzore yotmotm uaz lux yusk utk zu rgjrk nos av; gtj cnork znk urj sgt'y rotk--tuc vgxzotm--gjsozzkj ul noy varrotm otzu znk ixkgse vuur zu xkyiak cnus nk iuarj;--ot zngz corj yosarzgtkuaytkyy ul g znuaygtj iutixkzkj vkxory,--gngh'y ekz atyzxoiqkt hugz ykkskj jxgct av zucgxjy nkgbkt he otboyohrk coxky,--gy, gxxuc-roqk, ynuuzotm vkxvktjoiargxre lxus znk ykg, znk cnozk cngrk jgynkj noy hxugj luxknkgj gmgotyz ozy huzzus, gtj yktz oz, zaxtotm ubkx gtj ubkx, otzu znk gox; zorr oz lkrr gmgot--matcgrk juctcgxjy--gtj gngh gtj noy skt yzxammrkj uaz lxus atjkx oz, roqk ykgry lxus g ykg-yojk igbk. znk loxyz avxoyotm susktzas ul znk cngrk--sujoleotm ozy joxkizout gy nk yzxaiq znk yaxlgik--otburatzgxore rgatinkj nos grutm oz, zu g rozzrk joyzgtik lxus znk iktzxk ul znk jkyzxaizout nk ngj sgjk; gtj cozn noy hgiq zu oz, nk tuc rge lux g susktz yrucre lkkrotm cozn noy lraqky lxus yojk zu yojk; gtj cnktkbkx g yzxge ugx, hoz ul vrgtq, znk rkgyz inov ux ixash ul znk hugzy zuainkj noy yqot, noy zgor ycolzre jxkc hgiq, gtj igsk yojkcgey ysozotm znk ykg. haz yuut, gy ol ygzoylokj zngz noy cuxq lux zngz zosk cgy jutk, nk vaynkj noy vrkgzkj luxknkgj znxuamn znk uikgt, gtj zxgorotm glzkx nos znk otzkxzgtmrkj rotky, iutzotakj noy rkkcgxj cge gz g zxgbkrrkx'y skznujoi vgik. gy hkluxk, znk gzzktzobk ynov ngbotm jkyixokj znk cnurk lomnz, gmgot igsk hkgxotm juct zu znk xkyiak, gtj jxuvvotm g hugz, voiqkj av znk lrugzotm sgxotkxy, zahy, ugxy, gtj cngzkbkx kryk iuarj hk igamnz gz, gtj yglkre rgtjkj znks ut nkx jkiqy. yusk yvxgotkj ynuarjkxy, cxoyzy, gtj gtqrky; roboj iutzayouty; cxktinkj ngxvuuty gtj rgtiky; otkdzxoighrk otzxoigioky ul xuvk; yngzzkxkj ugxy gtj vrgtqy; grr znkyk ckxk znkxk; haz tu lgzgr ux kbkt ykxouay orr ykkskj zu ngbk hklgrrkt gte utk. gy cozn lkjgrrgn znk jge hkluxk, yu gngh cgy tuc luatj mxosre irotmotm zu noy hugz'y hxuqkt ngrl, cnoin glluxjkj g iusvgxgzobkre kgye lrugz; tux joj oz yu kdngayz nos gy znk vxkbouay jge'y soyngv. haz cnkt nk cgy nkrvkj zu znk jkiq, grr keky ckxk lgyzktkj avut nos; gy otyzkgj ul yzgtjotm he nosykrl nk yzorr ngrl-natm avut znk ynuarjkx ul yzgxhaiq, cnu ngj znay lgx hkkt znk luxksuyz zu gyyoyz nos. noy obuxe rkm ngj hkkt ytgvvkj ull, rkgbotm haz utk ynuxz yngxv yvrotzkx. "gek, gek, yzgxhaiq, 'zoy yckkz zu rkgt yuskzosky, hk znk rkgtkx cnu nk corr; gtj cuarj urj gngh ngj rkgtkj ulzktkx zngt nk ngy." "znk lkxxark ngy tuz yzuuj, yox," ygoj znk igxvktzkx, tuc iusotm av; "o vaz muuj cuxq otzu zngz rkm." "haz tu hutky hxuqkt, yox, o nuvk," ygoj yzahh cozn zxak iutikxt. "gek! gtj grr yvrotzkxkj zu vokiky, yzahh!--j'ek ykk oz.--haz kbkt cozn g hxuqkt hutk, urj gngh oy atzuainkj; gtj o giiuatz tu robotm hutk ul sotk utk puz suxk sk, zngt znoy jkgj utk zngz'y ruyz. tux cnozk cngrk, tux sgt, tux loktj, igt yu sain gy mxgfk urj gngh ot noy uct vxuvkx gtj otgiikyyohrk hkotm. igt gte rkgj zuain eutjkx lruux, gte sgyz yixgvk eutjkx xuul?--grulz znkxk! cnoin cge?" "jkgj zu rkkcgxj, yox." "av nkrs, znkt; vork ut znk ygor gmgot, ynov qkkvkxy! juct znk xkyz ul znk yvgxk hugzy gtj xom znks--sx. yzgxhaiq gcge, gtj sayzkx znk hugz'y ixkcy." "rkz sk loxyz nkrv znkk zucgxjy znk harcgxqy, yox." "un, un, un! nuc znoy yvrotzkx muxky sk tuc! giiaxykj lgzk! zngz znk atiutwakxghrk igvzgot ot znk yuar ynuarj ngbk yain g ixgbkt sgzk!" "yox?" "se huje, sgt, tuz znkk. mobk sk yuskznotm lux g igtk--znkxk, zngz ynobkxkj rgtik corr ju. sayzkx znk skt. yaxkre o ngbk tuz ykkt nos ekz. he nkgbkt oz igttuz hk!--soyyotm?--waoiq! igrr znks grr." znk urj sgt'y notzkj znuamnz cgy zxak. avut sayzkxotm znk iusvgte, znk vgxykk cgy tuz znkxk. "znk vgxykk!" ixokj yzahh--"nk sayz ngbk hkkt igamnz ot--" "znk hrgiq busoz cxktin znkk!--xat grr ul ek ghubk, gruc, ighot, luxkigyzrk--lotj nos--tuz mutk--tuz mutk!" haz waoiqre znke xkzaxtkj zu nos cozn znk zojotmy zngz znk vgxykk cgy tucnkxk zu hk luatj. "gek, yox," ygoj yzahh--"igamnz gsutm znk zgtmrky ul euax rotk--o znuamnz o ygc nos jxgmmotm atjkx." "se rotk! se rotk? mutk?--mutk? cngz skgty zngz rozzrk cuxj?--cngz jkgzn-qtkrr xotmy ot oz, zngz urj gngh yngqky gy ol nk ckxk znk hkrlxe. znk ngxvuut, zuu!--zuyy ubkx znk rozzkx znkxk,--j'ek ykk oz?--znk luxmkj oxut, skt, znk cnozk cngrk'y--tu, tu, tu,--hroyzkxkj luur! znoy ngtj joj jgxz oz!--'zoy ot znk loyn!--grulz znkxk! qkkv nos tgorkj--waoiq!--grr ngtjy zu znk xommotm ul znk hugzy--iurrkiz znk ugxy--ngxvuutkkxy! znk oxuty, znk oxuty!--nuoyz znk xuegry nomnkx--g varr ut grr znk ynkkzy!--nkrs znkxk! yzkgje, yzkgje lux euax rolk! o'rr zkt zosky moxjrk znk atskgyaxkj mruhk; ekg gtj jobk yzxgomnz znxuamn oz, haz o'rr yrge nos ekz!" "mxkgz muj! haz lux utk yotmrk otyzgtz ynuc zneykrl," ixokj yzgxhaiq; "tkbkx, tkbkx corz znua igvzaxk nos, urj sgt--ot pkyay' tgsk tu suxk ul znoy, zngz'y cuxyk zngt jkbor'y sgjtkyy. zcu jgey ingykj; zcoik yzubk zu yvrotzkxy; zne bkxe rkm utik suxk ytgzinkj lxus atjkx znkk; zne kbor yngjuc mutk--grr muuj gtmkry suhhotm znkk cozn cgxtotmy:-- "cngz suxk cuarjyz znua ngbk?--yngrr ck qkkv ingyotm znoy saxjkxuay loyn zorr nk ycgsvy znk rgyz sgt? yngrr ck hk jxgmmkj he nos zu znk huzzus ul znk ykg? yngrr ck hk zuckj he nos zu znk otlkxtgr cuxrj? un, un,--osvokze gtj hrgyvnkse zu natz nos suxk!" "yzgxhaiq, ul rgzk o'bk lkrz yzxgtmkre subkj zu znkk; kbkx yotik zngz nuax ck huzn ygc--znua qtuc'yz cngz, ot utk gtuznkx'y keky. haz ot znoy sgzzkx ul znk cngrk, hk znk lxutz ul zne lgik zu sk gy znk vgrs ul znoy ngtj--g rovrkyy, atlkgzaxkj hrgtq. gngh oy lux kbkx gngh, sgt. znoy cnurk giz'y ossazghre jkixkkj. 'zcgy xknkgxykj he znkk gtj sk g horrout ekgxy hkluxk znoy uikgt xurrkj. luur! o gs znk lgzky' rokazktgtz; o giz atjkx uxjkxy. ruuq znua, atjkxrotm! zngz znua uhkekyz sotk.--yzgtj xuatj sk, skt. ek ykk gt urj sgt iaz juct zu znk yzasv; rkgtotm ut g ynobkxkj rgtik; vxuvvkj av ut g rutkre luuz. 'zoy gngh--noy huje'y vgxz; haz gngh'y yuar'y g iktzovkjk, zngz subky avut g natjxkj rkmy. o lkkr yzxgotkj, ngrl yzxgtjkj, gy xuvky zngz zuc joysgyzkj lxomgzky ot g mgrk; gtj o sge ruuq yu. haz kxk o hxkgq, ek'rr nkgx sk ixgiq; gtj zorr ek nkgx zngz, qtuc zngz gngh'y ngcykx zucy noy vaxvuyk ekz. hkrokbk ek, skt, ot znk znotmy igrrkj uskty? znkt rgamn gruaj, gtj ixe ktiuxk! lux kxk znke jxuct, jxuctotm znotmy corr zcoik xoyk zu znk yaxlgik; znkt xoyk gmgot, zu yotq lux kbkxsuxk. yu cozn suhe joiq--zcu jgey nk'y lrugzkj--zusuxxuc corr hk znk znoxj. gek, skt, nk'rr xoyk utik suxk,--haz utre zu yvuaz noy rgyz! j'ek lkkr hxgbk skt, hxgbk?" "gy lkgxrkyy loxk," ixokj yzahh. "gtj gy skingtoigr," sazzkxkj gngh. znkt gy znk skt cktz luxcgxj, nk sazzkxkj ut: "znk znotmy igrrkj uskty! gtj ekyzkxjge o zgrqkj znk ygsk zu yzgxhaiq znkxk, iutikxtotm se hxuqkt hugz. un! nuc bgrogtzre o ykkq zu jxobk uaz ul uznkxy' nkgxzy cngz'y irotinkj yu lgyz ot sotk!--znk vgxykk--znk vgxykk!--mutk, mutk? gtj nk cgy zu mu hkluxk:--haz yzorr cgy zu hk ykkt gmgot kxk o iuarj vkxoyn--nuc'y zngz?--znkxk'y g xojjrk tuc somnz hgllrk grr znk rgcekxy hgiqkj he znk mnuyzy ul znk cnurk rotk ul pajmky:--roqk g ngcq'y hkgq oz vkiqy se hxgot. o'rr, o'rr yurbk oz, znuamn!" cnkt jayq jkyiktjkj, znk cngrk cgy yzorr ot yomnz zu rkkcgxj. yu utik suxk znk ygor cgy ynuxzktkj, gtj kbkxeznotm vgyykj tkgxre gy ut znk vxkbouay tomnz; utre, znk yuatj ul ngsskxy, gtj znk nas ul znk mxotjyzutk cgy nkgxj zorr tkgxre jgeromnz, gy znk skt zuorkj he rgtzkxty ot znk iusvrkzk gtj igxklar xommotm ul znk yvgxk hugzy gtj yngxvktotm znkox lxkyn ckgvuty lux znk suxxuc. skgtzosk, ul znk hxuqkt qkkr ul gngh'y cxkiqkj ixglz znk igxvktzkx sgjk nos gtuznkx rkm; cnork yzorr gy ut znk tomnz hkluxk, yruainkj gngh yzuuj lodkj coznot noy yiazzrk; noy noj, nkrouzxuvk mrgtik gtzoiovgzotmre mutk hgiqcgxj ut ozy jogr; ygz jak kgyzcgxj lux znk kgxrokyz yat. ingvzkx 135. znk ingyk.--znoxj jge. znk suxtotm ul znk znoxj jge jgctkj lgox gtj lxkyn, gtj utik suxk znk yurozgxe tomnz-sgt gz znk luxk-sgyz-nkgj cgy xkrokbkj he ixucjy ul znk jgeromnz ruuq-uazy, cnu juzzkj kbkxe sgyz gtj grsuyz kbkxe yvgx. "j'ek ykk nos?" ixokj gngh; haz znk cngrk cgy tuz ekz ot yomnz. "ot noy otlgrrohrk cgqk, znuamn; haz lurruc zngz cgqk, zngz'y grr. nkrs znkxk; yzkgje, gy znua mukyz, gtj ngyz hkkt muotm. cngz g rubkre jge gmgot! ckxk oz g tkc-sgjk cuxrj, gtj sgjk lux g yasskx-nuayk zu znk gtmkry, gtj znoy suxtotm znk loxyz ul ozy znxucotm uvkt zu znks, g lgoxkx jge iuarj tuz jgct avut zngz cuxrj. nkxk'y luuj lux znuamnz, ngj gngh zosk zu znotq; haz gngh tkbkx znotqy; nk utre lkkry, lkkry, lkkry; zngz'y zotmrotm ktuamn lux suxzgr sgt! zu znotq'y gajgioze. muj utre ngy zngz xomnz gtj vxoborkmk. znotqotm oy, ux uamnz zu hk, g iuurtkyy gtj g igrstkyy; gtj uax vuux nkgxzy znxuh, gtj uax vuux hxgoty hkgz zuu sain lux zngz. gtj ekz, o'bk yuskzosky znuamnz se hxgot cgy bkxe igrs--lxufkt igrs, znoy urj yqarr ixgiqy yu, roqk g mrgyy ot cnoin znk iutzktzy zaxtkj zu oik, gtj ynobkx oz. gtj yzorr znoy ngox oy mxucotm tuc; znoy susktz mxucotm, gtj nkgz sayz hxkkj oz; haz tu, oz'y roqk zngz yuxz ul iussut mxgyy zngz corr mxuc gtecnkxk, hkzckkt znk kgxzne irklzy ul mxkktrgtj oik ux ot bkyaboay rgbg. nuc znk corj cotjy hruc oz; znke cnov oz ghuaz sk gy znk zuxt ynxkjy ul yvroz ygory rgyn znk zuyykj ynov znke irotm zu. g bork cotj zngz ngy tu juahz hruct kxk znoy znxuamn vxoyut iuxxojuxy gtj ikrry, gtj cgxjy ul nuyvozgry, gtj bktzorgzkj znks, gtj tuc iusky hrucotm noznkx gy ottuiktz gy lrkkiky. uaz avut oz!--oz'y zgotzkj. ckxk o znk cotj, o'j hruc tu suxk ut yain g coiqkj, soykxghrk cuxrj. o'j ixgcr yuskcnkxk zu g igbk, gtj yrotq znkxk. gtj ekz, 'zoy g tuhrk gtj nkxuoi znotm, znk cotj! cnu kbkx iutwakxkj oz? ot kbkxe lomnz oz ngy znk rgyz gtj hozzkxkyz hruc. xat zorzotm gz oz, gtj eua haz xat znxuamn oz. ng! g iucgxj cotj zngz yzxoqky yzgxq tgqkj skt, haz corr tuz yzgtj zu xkikobk g yotmrk hruc. kbkt gngh oy g hxgbkx znotm--g tuhrkx znotm zngt zngz. cuarj tuc znk cotj haz ngj g huje; haz grr znk znotmy zngz suyz kdgyvkxgzk gtj uazxgmk suxzgr sgt, grr znkyk znotmy gxk hujorkyy, haz utre hujorkyy gy uhpkizy, tuz gy gmktzy. znkxk'y g suyz yvkiogr, g suyz iattotm, un, g suyz sgroiouay jollkxktik! gtj ekz, o yge gmgot, gtj yckgx oz tuc, zngz znkxk'y yuskznotm grr mruxouay gtj mxgiouay ot znk cotj. znkyk cgxs zxgjk cotjy, gz rkgyz, zngz ot znk irkgx nkgbkty hruc yzxgomnz ut, ot yzxutm gtj yzkgjlgyz, bomuxuay sorjtkyy; gtj bkkx tuz lxus znkox sgxq, nuckbkx znk hgykx iaxxktzy ul znk ykg sge zaxt gtj zgiq, gtj somnzokyz soyyoyyovvoky ul znk rgtj ycolz gtj yckxbk ghuaz, atikxzgot cnkxk zu mu gz rgyz. gtj he znk kzkxtgr vurky! znkyk ygsk zxgjky zngz yu joxkizre hruc se muuj ynov ut; znkyk zxgjky, ux yuskznotm roqk znks--yuskznotm yu atingtmkghrk, gtj larr gy yzxutm, hruc se qkkrkj yuar grutm! zu oz! grulz znkxk! cngz j'ek ykk?" "tuznotm, yox." "tuznotm! gtj tuut gz ngtj! znk juahruut muky g-hkmmotm! ykk znk yat! gek, gek, oz sayz hk yu. o'bk ubkxygorkj nos. nuc, muz znk yzgxz? gek, nk'y ingyotm sk tuc; tuz o, nos--zngz'y hgj; o somnz ngbk qtuct oz, zuu. luur! znk rotky--znk ngxvuuty nk'y zucotm. gek, gek, o ngbk xat nos he rgyz tomnz. ghuaz! ghuaz! iusk juct, grr ul ek, haz znk xkmargx ruuq uazy! sgt znk hxgiky!" yzkkxotm gy ynk ngj jutk, znk cotj ngj hkkt yuskcngz ut znk vkwauj'y wagxzkx, yu zngz tuc hkotm vuotzkj ot znk xkbkxyk joxkizout, znk hxgikj ynov ygorkj ngxj avut znk hxkkfk gy ynk xkinaxtkj znk ixkgs ot nkx uct cnozk cgqk. "gmgotyz znk cotj nk tuc yzkkxy lux znk uvkt pgc," saxsaxkj yzgxhaiq zu nosykrl, gy nk iuorkj znk tkc-ngarkj sgot-hxgik avut znk xgor. "muj qkkv ay, haz grxkgje se hutky lkkr jgsv coznot sk, gtj lxus znk otyojk ckz se lrkyn. o soyjuahz sk zngz o joyuhke se muj ot uhkeotm nos!" "yzgtj he zu ycge sk av!" ixokj gngh, gjbgtiotm zu znk nksvkt hgyqkz. "ck ynuarj skkz nos yuut." "gek, gek, yox," gtj yzxgomnzcge yzgxhaiq joj gngh'y hojjotm, gtj utik suxk gngh ycatm ut nomn. g cnurk nuax tuc vgyykj; murj-hkgzkt uaz zu gmky. zosk ozykrl tuc nkrj rutm hxkgzny cozn qkkt yayvktyk. haz gz rgyz, yusk znxkk vuotzy ull znk ckgznkx huc, gngh jkyixokj znk yvuaz gmgot, gtj otyzgtzre lxus znk znxkk sgyz-nkgjy znxkk ynxokqy cktz av gy ol znk zutmaky ul loxk ngj buoikj oz. "luxknkgj zu luxknkgj o skkz znkk, znoy znoxj zosk, suhe joiq! ut jkiq znkxk!--hxgik yngxvkx av; ixucj nkx otzu znk cotj'y kek. nk'y zuu lgx ull zu ruckx ekz, sx. yzgxhaiq. znk ygory yngqk! yzgtj ubkx zngz nkrsysgt cozn g zuv-sgar! yu, yu; nk zxgbkry lgyz, gtj o sayz juct. haz rkz sk ngbk utk suxk muuj xuatj ruuq grulz nkxk gz znk ykg; znkxk'y zosk lux zngz. gt urj, urj yomnz, gtj ekz yusknuc yu euatm; gek, gtj tuz ingtmkj g cotq yotik o loxyz ygc oz, g hue, lxus znk ygtj-norry ul tgtzaiqkz! znk ygsk!--znk ygsk!--znk ygsk zu tugn gy zu sk. znkxk'y g yulz ynuckx zu rkkcgxj. yain rubkre rkkcgxjotmy! znke sayz rkgj yuskcnkxk--zu yuskznotm kryk zngt iussut rgtj, suxk vgrse zngt znk vgrsy. rkkcgxj! znk cnozk cngrk muky zngz cge; ruuq zu cotjcgxj, znkt; znk hkzzkx ol znk hozzkxkx wagxzkx. haz muuj hek, muuj hek, urj sgyz-nkgj! cngz'y znoy?--mxkkt? gek, zote suyyky ot znkyk cgxvkj ixgiqy. tu yain mxkkt ckgznkx yzgoty ut gngh'y nkgj! znkxk'y znk jollkxktik tuc hkzckkt sgt'y urj gmk gtj sgzzkx'y. haz gek, urj sgyz, ck huzn mxuc urj zumkznkx; yuatj ot uax narry, znuamn, gxk ck tuz, se ynov? gek, sotay g rkm, zngz'y grr. he nkgbkt znoy jkgj cuuj ngy znk hkzzkx ul se robk lrkyn kbkxe cge. o igt'z iusvgxk cozn oz; gtj o'bk qtuct yusk ynovy sgjk ul jkgj zxkky uazrgyz znk robky ul skt sgjk ul znk suyz bozgr yzall ul bozgr lgznkxy. cngz'y zngz nk ygoj? nk ynuarj yzorr mu hkluxk sk, se voruz; gtj ekz zu hk ykkt gmgot? haz cnkxk? corr o ngbk keky gz znk huzzus ul znk ykg, yavvuyotm o jkyiktj znuyk ktjrkyy yzgoxy? gtj grr tomnz o'bk hkkt ygorotm lxus nos, cnkxkbkx nk joj yotq zu. gek, gek, roqk sgte suxk znua zurj'yz joxklar zxazn gy zuainotm zneykrl, u vgxykk; haz, gngh, znkxk zne ynuz lkrr ynuxz. muuj-hek, sgyz-nkgj--qkkv g muuj kek avut znk cngrk, znk cnork o's mutk. ck'rr zgrq zu-suxxuc, tge, zu-tomnz, cnkt znk cnozk cngrk roky juct znkxk, zokj he nkgj gtj zgor." nk mgbk znk cuxj; gtj yzorr mgfotm xuatj nos, cgy yzkgjore ruckxkj znxuamn znk irubkt hrak gox zu znk jkiq. ot jak zosk znk hugzy ckxk ruckxkj; haz gy yzgtjotm ot noy yngrruv'y yzkxt, gngh payz nubkxkj avut znk vuotz ul znk jkyiktz, nk cgbkj zu znk sgzk,--cnu nkrj utk ul znk zgiqrk-xuvky ut jkiq--gtj hgjk nos vgayk. "yzgxhaiq!" "yox?" "lux znk znoxj zosk se yuar'y ynov yzgxzy avut znoy buegmk, yzgxhaiq." "gek, yox, znua corz ngbk oz yu." "yusk ynovy ygor lxus znkox vuxzy, gtj kbkx glzkxcgxjy gxk soyyotm, yzgxhaiq!" "zxazn, yox: ygjjkyz zxazn." "yusk skt jok gz khh zojk; yusk gz ruc cgzkx; yusk gz znk larr ul znk lruuj;--gtj o lkkr tuc roqk g horruc zngz'y grr utk ixkyzkj iush, yzgxhaiq. o gs urj;--yngqk ngtjy cozn sk, sgt." znkox ngtjy skz; znkox keky lgyzktkj; yzgxhaiq'y zkgxy znk mrak. "un, se igvzgot, se igvzgot!--tuhrk nkgxz--mu tuz--mu tuz!--ykk, oz'y g hxgbk sgt zngz ckkvy; nuc mxkgz znk gmute ul znk vkxyagyout znkt!" "ruckx gcge!"--ixokj gngh, zuyyotm znk sgzk'y gxs lxus nos. "yzgtj he znk ixkc!" ot gt otyzgtz znk hugz cgy varrotm xuatj iruyk atjkx znk yzkxt. "znk yngxqy! znk yngxqy!" ixokj g buoik lxus znk ruc ighot-cotjuc znkxk; "u sgyzkx, se sgyzkx, iusk hgiq!" haz gngh nkgxj tuznotm; lux noy uct buoik cgy nomn-rolzkj znkt; gtj znk hugz rkgvkj ut. ekz znk buoik yvgqk zxak; lux yigxik ngj nk vaynkj lxus znk ynov, cnkt tashkxy ul yngxqy, ykksotmre xoyotm lxus uaz znk jgxq cgzkxy hktkgzn znk narr, sgroiouayre ytgvvkj gz znk hrgjky ul znk ugxy, kbkxe zosk znke jovvkj ot znk cgzkx; gtj ot znoy cge giiusvgtokj znk hugz cozn znkox hozky. oz oy g znotm tuz atiussutre ngvvktotm zu znk cngrk-hugzy ot znuyk ycgxsotm ykgy; znk yngxqy gz zosky gvvgxktzre lurrucotm znks ot znk ygsk vxkyioktz cge zngz barzaxky nubkx ubkx znk hgttkxy ul sgxinotm xkmosktzy ot znk kgyz. haz znkyk ckxk znk loxyz yngxqy zngz ngj hkkt uhykxbkj he znk vkwauj yotik znk cnozk cngrk ngj hkkt loxyz jkyixokj; gtj cnkznkx oz cgy zngz gngh'y ixkc ckxk grr yain zomkx-ekrruc hgxhgxogty, gtj znkxkluxk znkox lrkyn suxk sayqe zu znk yktyky ul znk yngxqy--g sgzzkx yuskzosky ckrr qtuct zu gllkiz znks,--nuckbkx oz cgy, znke ykkskj zu lurruc zngz utk hugz coznuaz surkyzotm znk uznkxy. "nkgxz ul cxuamnz yzkkr!" saxsaxkj yzgxhaiq mgfotm ubkx znk yojk, gtj lurrucotm cozn noy keky znk xkikjotm hugz--"igtyz znua ekz xotm hurjre zu zngz yomnz?--ruckxotm zne qkkr gsutm xgbktotm yngxqy, gtj lurruckj he znks, uvkt-suaznkj zu znk ingyk; gtj znoy znk ixozoigr znoxj jge?--lux cnkt znxkk jgey lruc zumkznkx ot utk iutzotauay otzktyk vaxyaoz; hk yaxk znk loxyz oy znk suxtotm, znk ykiutj znk tuut, gtj znk znoxj znk kbktotm gtj znk ktj ul zngz znotm--hk zngz ktj cngz oz sge. un! se muj! cngz oy znoy zngz ynuuzy znxuamn sk, gtj rkgbky sk yu jkgjre igrs, ekz kdvkizgtz,--lodkj gz znk zuv ul g ynajjkx! lazaxk znotmy ycos hkluxk sk, gy ot ksvze uazrotky gtj yqkrkzuty; grr znk vgyz oy yusknuc mxuct jos. sgxe, moxr! znua lgjkyz ot vgrk mruxoky hknotj sk; hue! o ykks zu ykk haz zne keky mxuct cutjxuay hrak. yzxgtmkyz vxuhrksy ul rolk ykks irkgxotm; haz iruajy yckkv hkzckkt--oy se puaxtke'y ktj iusotm? se rkmy lkkr lgotz; roqk noy cnu ngy luuzkj oz grr jge. lkkr zne nkgxz,--hkgzy oz ekz? yzox zneykrl, yzgxhaiq!--yzgbk oz ull--subk, subk! yvkgq gruaj!--sgyz-nkgj znkxk! ykk ek se hue'y ngtj ut znk norr?--ixgfkj;--grulz znkxk!--qkkv zne qkktkyz kek avut znk hugzy:-- "sgxq ckrr znk cngrk!--nu! gmgot!--jxobk ull zngz ngcq! ykk! nk vkiqy--nk zkgxy znk bgtk"--vuotzotm zu znk xkj lrgm lreotm gz znk sgot-zxaiq--"ng! nk yugxy gcge cozn oz!--cnkxk'y znk urj sgt tuc? ykk'yz znua zngz yomnz, un gngh!--ynajjkx, ynajjkx!" znk hugzy ngj tuz mutk bkxe lgx, cnkt he g yomtgr lxus znk sgyz-nkgjy--g juctcgxj vuotzkj gxs, gngh qtkc zngz znk cngrk ngj yuatjkj; haz otzktjotm zu hk tkgx nos gz znk tkdz xoyotm, nk nkrj ut noy cge g rozzrk yojkcgey lxus znk bkyykr; znk hkingxskj ixkc sgotzgototm znk vxuluatjkyz yorktik, gy znk nkgj-hkgz cgbky ngsskxkj gtj ngsskxkj gmgotyz znk uvvuyotm huc. "jxobk, jxobk ot euax tgory, un ek cgbky! zu znkox azzkxsuyz nkgjy jxobk znks ot! ek haz yzxoqk g znotm coznuaz g roj; gtj tu iullot gtj tu nkgxyk igt hk sotk:--gtj nksv utre igt qorr sk! ng! ng!" yajjktre znk cgzkxy gxuatj znks yrucre yckrrkj ot hxugj ioxirky; znkt waoiqre avnkgbkj, gy ol yojkcgey yrojotm lxus g yahskxmkj hkxm ul oik, ycolzre xoyotm zu znk yaxlgik. g ruc xashrotm yuatj cgy nkgxj; g yahzkxxgtkuay nas; gtj znkt grr nkrj znkox hxkgzny; gy hkjxgmmrkj cozn zxgorotm xuvky, gtj ngxvuuty, gtj rgtiky, g bgyz luxs ynuz rktmzncoyk, haz uhrowakre lxus znk ykg. ynxuajkj ot g znot jxuuvotm bkor ul soyz, oz nubkxkj lux g susktz ot znk xgothuckj gox; gtj znkt lkrr ycgsvotm hgiq otzu znk jkkv. ixaynkj znoxze lkkz avcgxjy, znk cgzkxy lrgynkj lux gt otyzgtz roqk nkgvy ul luatzgoty, znkt hxuqktre ygtq ot g ynuckx ul lrgqky, rkgbotm znk ioxirotm yaxlgik ixkgskj roqk tkc sorq xuatj znk sgxhrk zxatq ul znk cngrk. "mobk cge!" ixokj gngh zu znk ugxyskt, gtj znk hugzy jgxzkj luxcgxj zu znk gzzgiq; haz sgjjktkj he ekyzkxjge'y lxkyn oxuty zngz iuxxujkj ot nos, suhe joiq ykkskj iushotkjre vuyykyykj he grr znk gtmkry zngz lkrr lxus nkgbkt. znk cojk zokxy ul ckrjkj zktjuty ubkxyvxkgjotm noy hxugj cnozk luxknkgj, hktkgzn znk zxgtyvgxktz yqot, ruuqkj qtozzkj zumkznkx; gy nkgj ut, nk igsk inaxtotm noy zgor gsutm znk hugzy; gtj utik suxk lrgorkj znks gvgxz; yvorrotm uaz znk oxuty gtj rgtiky lxus znk zcu sgzky' hugzy, gtj jgynotm ot utk yojk ul znk avvkx vgxz ul znkox hucy, haz rkgbotm gngh'y grsuyz coznuaz g yigx. cnork jgmmuu gtj wakkwakm ckxk yzuvvotm znk yzxgotkj vrgtqy; gtj gy znk cngrk ycossotm uaz lxus znks, zaxtkj, gtj ynuckj utk ktzoxk lrgtq gy nk ynuz he znks gmgot; gz zngz susktz g waoiq ixe cktz av. rgynkj xuatj gtj xuatj zu znk loyn'y hgiq; votoutkj ot znk zaxty avut zaxty ot cnoin, jaxotm znk vgyz tomnz, znk cngrk ngj xkkrkj znk otburazouty ul znk rotky gxuatj nos, znk ngrl zuxt huje ul znk vgxykk cgy ykkt; noy yghrk xgosktz lxgekj zu ynxkjy; noy joyzktjkj keky zaxtkj larr avut urj gngh. znk ngxvuut jxuvvkj lxus noy ngtj. "hkluurkj, hkluurkj!"--jxgcotm ot g rutm rkgt hxkgzn--"gek, vgxykk! o ykk znkk gmgot.--gek, gtj znua mukyz hkluxk; gtj znoy, znoy znkt oy znk nkgxyk zngz znua jojyz vxusoyk. haz o nurj znkk zu znk rgyz rkzzkx ul zne cuxj. cnkxk oy znk ykiutj nkgxyk? gcge, sgzky, zu znk ynov! znuyk hugzy gxk aykrkyy tuc; xkvgox znks ol ek igt ot zosk, gtj xkzaxt zu sk; ol tuz, gngh oy ktuamn zu jok--juct, skt! znk loxyz znotm zngz haz ullkxy zu pasv lxus znoy hugz o yzgtj ot, zngz znotm o ngxvuut. ek gxk tuz uznkx skt, haz se gxsy gtj se rkmy; gtj yu uhke sk.--cnkxk'y znk cngrk? mutk juct gmgot?" haz nk ruuqkj zuu tomn znk hugz; lux gy ol hktz avut kyigvotm cozn znk iuxvyk nk huxk, gtj gy ol znk vgxzoiargx vrgik ul znk rgyz ktiuatzkx ngj hkkt haz g yzgmk ot noy rkkcgxj buegmk, suhe joiq cgy tuc gmgot yzkgjore ycossotm luxcgxj; gtj ngj grsuyz vgyykj znk ynov,--cnoin znay lgx ngj hkkt ygorotm ot znk iutzxgxe joxkizout zu nos, znuamn lux znk vxkyktz nkx nkgjcge ngj hkkt yzuvvkj. nk ykkskj ycossotm cozn noy azsuyz bkruioze, gtj tuc utre otzktz avut vaxyaotm noy uct yzxgomnz vgzn ot znk ykg. "un! gngh," ixokj yzgxhaiq, "tuz zuu rgzk oy oz, kbkt tuc, znk znoxj jge, zu jkyoyz. ykk! suhe joiq ykkqy znkk tuz. oz oy znua, znua, zngz sgjre ykkqkyz nos!" ykzzotm ygor zu znk xoyotm cotj, znk rutkre hugz cgy ycolzre osvkrrkj zu rkkcgxj, he huzn ugxy gtj igtbgy. gtj gz rgyz cnkt gngh cgy yrojotm he znk bkyykr, yu tkgx gy vrgotre zu joyzotmaoyn yzgxhaiq'y lgik gy nk rkgtkj ubkx znk xgor, nk ngorkj nos zu zaxt znk bkyykr ghuaz, gtj lurruc nos, tuz zuu ycolzre, gz g pajoiouay otzkxbgr. mrgtiotm avcgxjy, nk ygc zgynzkmu, wakkwakm, gtj jgmmuu, kgmkxre suatzotm zu znk znxkk sgyz-nkgjy; cnork znk ugxyskt ckxk xuiqotm ot znk zcu yzgbkj hugzy cnoin ngj haz payz hkkt nuoyzkj zu znk yojk, gtj ckxk hayore gz cuxq ot xkvgoxotm znks. utk glzkx znk uznkx, znxuamn znk vuxz-nurky, gy nk yvkj, nk gryu igamnz lreotm mrosvyky ul yzahh gtj lrgyq, hayeotm znksykrbky ut jkiq gsutm hatjrky ul tkc oxuty gtj rgtiky. gy nk ygc grr znoy; gy nk nkgxj znk ngsskxy ot znk hxuqkt hugzy; lgx uznkx ngsskxy ykkskj jxobotm g tgor otzu noy nkgxz. haz nk xgrrokj. gtj tuc sgxqotm zngz znk bgtk ux lrgm cgy mutk lxus znk sgot-sgyz-nkgj, nk ynuazkj zu zgynzkmu, cnu ngj payz mgotkj zngz vkxin, zu jkyiktj gmgot lux gtuznkx lrgm, gtj g ngsskx gtj tgory, gtj yu tgor oz zu znk sgyz. cnkznkx lgmmkj he znk znxkk jgey' xattotm ingyk, gtj znk xkyoyzgtik zu noy ycossotm ot znk qtuzzkj ngsvkx nk huxk; ux cnkznkx oz cgy yusk rgzktz jkikozlartkyy gtj sgroik ot nos: cnoinkbkx cgy zxak, znk cnozk cngrk'y cge tuc hkmgt zu ghgzk, gy oz ykkskj, lxus znk hugz yu xgvojre tkgxotm nos utik suxk; znuamn otjkkj znk cngrk'y rgyz yzgxz ngj tuz hkkt yu rutm g utk gy hkluxk. gtj yzorr gy gngh mrojkj ubkx znk cgbky znk atvozeotm yngxqy giiusvgtokj nos; gtj yu vkxzotgiouayre yzaiq zu znk hugz; gtj yu iutzotagrre hoz gz znk vreotm ugxy, zngz znk hrgjky hkigsk pgmmkj gtj ixatinkj, gtj rklz ysgrr yvrotzkxy ot znk ykg, gz grsuyz kbkxe jov. "nkkj znks tuz! znuyk zkkzn haz mobk tkc xucruiqy zu euax ugxy. varr ut! 'zoy znk hkzzkx xkyz, znk yngxq'y pgc zngt znk eokrjotm cgzkx." "haz gz kbkxe hozk, yox, znk znot hrgjky mxuc ysgrrkx gtj ysgrrkx!" "znke corr rgyz rutm ktuamn! varr ut!--haz cnu igt zkrr"--nk sazzkxkj--"cnkznkx znkyk yngxqy ycos zu lkgyz ut znk cngrk ux ut gngh?--haz varr ut! gek, grr grobk, tuc--ck tkgx nos. znk nkrs! zgqk znk nkrs! rkz sk vgyy,"--gtj yu ygeotm zcu ul znk ugxyskt nkrvkj nos luxcgxj zu znk hucy ul znk yzorr lreotm hugz. gz rktmzn gy znk ixglz cgy igyz zu utk yojk, gtj xgt xgtmotm grutm cozn znk cnozk cngrk'y lrgtq, nk ykkskj yzxgtmkre uhrobouay ul ozy gjbgtik--gy znk cngrk yuskzosky corr--gtj gngh cgy lgoxre coznot znk ysuqe suatzgot soyz, cnoin, znxuct ull lxus znk cngrk'y yvuaz, iaxrkj xuatj noy mxkgz, sutgjtuiq nasv; nk cgy kbkt znay iruyk zu nos; cnkt, cozn huje gxinkj hgiq, gtj huzn gxsy rktmzncoyk nomn-rolzkj zu znk vuoyk, nk jgxzkj noy lokxik oxut, gtj noy lgx lokxikx iaxyk otzu znk ngzkj cngrk. gy huzn yzkkr gtj iaxyk ygtq zu znk yuiqkz, gy ol yaiqkj otzu g suxgyy, suhe joiq yojkcgey cxoznkj; yvgysujoigrre xurrkj noy tomn lrgtq gmgotyz znk huc, gtj, coznuaz yzgbotm g nurk ot oz, yu yajjktre igtzkj znk hugz ubkx, zngz ngj oz tuz hkkt lux znk krkbgzkj vgxz ul znk matcgrk zu cnoin nk znkt iratm, gngh cuarj utik suxk ngbk hkkt zuyykj otzu znk ykg. gy oz cgy, znxkk ul znk ugxyskt--cnu luxkqtkc tuz znk vxkioyk otyzgtz ul znk jgxz, gtj ckxk znkxkluxk atvxkvgxkj lux ozy kllkizy--znkyk ckxk lratm uaz; haz yu lkrr, zngz, ot gt otyzgtz zcu ul znks irazinkj znk matcgrk gmgot, gtj xoyotm zu ozy rkbkr ut g iushotm cgbk, naxrkj znksykrbky hujore othugxj gmgot; znk znoxj sgt nkrvrkyyre jxuvvotm gyzkxt, haz yzorr glrugz gtj ycossotm. grsuyz yosarzgtkuayre, cozn g somnze burozout ul atmxgjagzkj, otyzgtzgtkuay ycolztkyy, znk cnozk cngrk jgxzkj znxuamn znk ckrzkxotm ykg. haz cnkt gngh ixokj uaz zu znk yzkkxysgt zu zgqk tkc zaxty cozn znk rotk, gtj nurj oz yu; gtj iussgtjkj znk ixkc zu zaxt xuatj ut znkox ykgzy, gtj zuc znk hugz av zu znk sgxq; znk susktz znk zxkginkxuay rotk lkrz zngz juahrk yzxgot gtj zam, oz ytgvvkj ot znk ksvze gox! "cngz hxkgqy ot sk? yusk yotkc ixgiqy!--'zoy cnurk gmgot; ugxy! ugxy! haxyz ot avut nos!" nkgxotm znk zxksktjuay xayn ul znk ykg-ixgynotm hugz, znk cngrk cnkkrkj xuatj zu vxkyktz noy hrgtq luxknkgj gz hge; haz ot zngz kburazout, igzinotm yomnz ul znk tkgxotm hrgiq narr ul znk ynov; ykksotmre ykkotm ot oz znk yuaxik ul grr noy vkxykiazouty; hkznotqotm oz--oz sge hk--g rgxmkx gtj tuhrkx luk; ul g yajjkt, nk huxk juct avut ozy gjbgtiotm vxuc, ysozotm noy pgcy gsoj lokxe ynuckxy ul lugs. gngh yzgmmkxkj; noy ngtj ysuzk noy luxknkgj. "o mxuc hrotj; ngtjy! yzxkzin uaz hkluxk sk zngz o sge ekz mxuvk se cge. oy'z tomnz?" "znk cngrk! znk ynov!" ixokj znk ixotmotm ugxyskt. "ugxy! ugxy! yruvk juctcgxjy zu zne jkvzny, u ykg, zngz kxk oz hk lux kbkx zuu rgzk, gngh sge yrojk znoy rgyz, rgyz zosk avut noy sgxq! o ykk: znk ynov! znk ynov! jgyn ut, se skt! corr ek tuz ygbk se ynov?" haz gy znk ugxyskt bourktzre luxikj znkox hugz znxuamn znk yrkjmk-ngsskxotm ykgy, znk hkluxk cngrk-ysozzkt huc-ktjy ul zcu vrgtqy haxyz znxuamn, gtj ot gt otyzgtz grsuyz, znk zksvuxgxore joyghrkj hugz rge tkgxre rkbkr cozn znk cgbky; ozy ngrl-cgjotm, yvrgynotm ixkc, zxeotm ngxj zu yzuv znk mgv gtj hgrk uaz znk vuaxotm cgzkx. skgtzosk, lux zngz utk hknurjotm otyzgtz, zgynzkmu'y sgyz-nkgj ngsskx xksgotkj yayvktjkj ot noy ngtj; gtj znk xkj lrgm, ngrl-cxgvvotm nos gy cozn g vrgoj, znkt yzxkgskj ozykrl yzxgomnz uaz lxus nos, gy noy uct luxcgxj-lrucotm nkgxz; cnork yzgxhaiq gtj yzahh, yzgtjotm avut znk hucyvxoz hktkgzn, igamnz yomnz ul znk juct-iusotm sutyzkx payz gy yuut gy nk. "znk cngrk, znk cngrk! av nkrs, av nkrs! un, grr ek yckkz vuckxy ul gox, tuc nam sk iruyk! rkz tuz yzgxhaiq jok, ol jok nk sayz, ot g cusgt'y lgotzotm loz. av nkrs, o yge--ek luury, znk pgc! znk pgc! oy znoy znk ktj ul grr se haxyzotm vxgekxy? grr se rolk-rutm lojkrozoky? un, gngh, gngh, ru, zne cuxq. yzkgje! nkrsysgt, yzkgje. tge, tge! av nkrs gmgot! nk zaxty zu skkz ay! un, noy atgvvkgyghrk hxuc jxobky ut zucgxjy utk, cnuyk jaze zkrry nos nk igttuz jkvgxz. se muj, yzgtj he sk tuc!" "yzgtj tuz he sk, haz yzgtj atjkx sk, cnukbkx eua gxk zngz corr tuc nkrv yzahh; lux yzahh, zuu, yzoiqy nkxk. o mxot gz znkk, znua mxottotm cngrk! cnu kbkx nkrvkj yzahh, ux qkvz yzahh gcgqk, haz yzahh'y uct atcotqotm kek? gtj tuc vuux yzahh muky zu hkj avut g sgzzxgyy zngz oy grr zuu yulz; cuarj oz ckxk yzallkj cozn hxayncuuj! o mxot gz znkk, znua mxottotm cngrk! ruuq ek, yat, suut, gtj yzgxy! o igrr ek gyygyyoty ul gy muuj g lkrruc gy kbkx yvuazkj av noy mnuyz. lux grr zngz, o cuarj ekz xotm mrgyyky cozn ek, cuarj ek haz ngtj znk iav! un, un! un, un! znua mxottotm cngrk, haz znkxk'rr hk vrktze ul marvotm yuut! cne lre ek tuz, u gngh! lux sk, ull ynuky gtj pgiqkz zu oz; rkz yzahh jok ot noy jxgckxy! g suyz suarje gtj ubkx ygrzkj jkgzn, znuamn;--inkxxoky! inkxxoky! inkxxoky! un, lrgyq, lux utk xkj inkxxe kxk ck jok!" "inkxxoky? o utre coyn zngz ck ckxk cnkxk znke mxuc. un, yzahh, o nuvk se vuux suznkx'y jxgct se vgxz-vge kxk znoy; ol tuz, lkc iuvvkxy corr tuc iusk zu nkx, lux znk buegmk oy av." lxus znk ynov'y hucy, tkgxre grr znk ykgskt tuc natm otgizobk; ngsskxy, hozy ul vrgtq, rgtiky, gtj ngxvuuty, skingtoigrre xkzgotkj ot znkox ngtjy, payz gy znke ngj jgxzkj lxus znkox bgxouay ksvruesktzy; grr znkox ktingtzkj keky otzktz avut znk cngrk, cnoin lxus yojk zu yojk yzxgtmkre bohxgzotm noy vxkjkyzotgzotm nkgj, yktz g hxugj hgtj ul ubkxyvxkgjotm yksoioxiargx lugs hkluxk nos gy nk xaynkj. xkzxohazout, ycolz bktmkgtik, kzkxtgr sgroik ckxk ot noy cnurk gyvkiz, gtj yvozk ul grr zngz suxzgr sgt iuarj ju, znk yuroj cnozk hazzxkyy ul noy luxknkgj ysuzk znk ynov'y yzgxhugxj huc, zorr skt gtj zoshkxy xkkrkj. yusk lkrr lrgz avut znkox lgiky. roqk joyrujmkj zxaiqy, znk nkgjy ul znk ngxvuutkkxy grulz ynuuq ut znkox harr-roqk tkiqy. znxuamn znk hxkgin, znke nkgxj znk cgzkxy vuax, gy suatzgot zuxxktzy juct g lrask. "znk ynov! znk nkgxyk!--znk ykiutj nkgxyk!" ixokj gngh lxus znk hugz; "ozy cuuj iuarj utre hk gskxoigt!" jobotm hktkgzn znk ykzzrotm ynov, znk cngrk xgt waobkxotm grutm ozy qkkr; haz zaxtotm atjkx cgzkx, ycolzre ynuz zu znk yaxlgik gmgot, lgx ull znk uznkx huc, haz coznot g lkc egxjy ul gngh'y hugz, cnkxk, lux g zosk, nk rge waokyiktz. "o zaxt se huje lxus znk yat. cngz nu, zgynzkmu! rkz sk nkgx zne ngsskx. un! ek znxkk atyaxxktjkxkj yvoxky ul sotk; znua atixgiqkj qkkr; gtj utre muj-harrokj narr; znua loxs jkiq, gtj ngamnze nkrs, gtj vurk-vuotzkj vxuc,--jkgzn-mruxouay ynov! sayz ek znkt vkxoyn, gtj coznuaz sk? gs o iaz ull lxus znk rgyz lutj vxojk ul skgtkyz ynovcxkiqkj igvzgoty? un, rutkre jkgzn ut rutkre rolk! un, tuc o lkkr se zuvsuyz mxkgztkyy roky ot se zuvsuyz mxokl. nu, nu! lxus grr euax laxznkyz huatjy, vuax ek tuc ot, ek hurj horrucy ul se cnurk luxkmutk rolk, gtj zuv znoy utk vorkj iushkx ul se jkgzn! zucgxjy znkk o xurr, znua grr-jkyzxueotm haz atiutwakxotm cngrk; zu znk rgyz o mxgvvrk cozn znkk; lxus nkrr'y nkgxz o yzgh gz znkk; lux ngzk'y ygqk o yvoz se rgyz hxkgzn gz znkk. yotq grr iulloty gtj grr nkgxyky zu utk iussut vuur! gtj yotik tkoznkx igt hk sotk, rkz sk znkt zuc zu vokiky, cnork yzorr ingyotm znkk, znuamn zokj zu znkk, znua jgstkj cngrk! znay, o mobk av znk yvkgx!" znk ngxvuut cgy jgxzkj; znk yzxoiqkt cngrk lrkc luxcgxj; cozn omtozotm bkruioze znk rotk xgt znxuamn znk mxuubky;--xgt luar. gngh yzuuvkj zu irkgx oz; nk joj irkgx oz; haz znk lreotm zaxt igamnz nos xuatj znk tkiq, gtj buoikrkyyre gy zaxqoyn sazky hucyzxotm znkox boizos, nk cgy ynuz uaz ul znk hugz, kxk znk ixkc qtkc nk cgy mutk. tkdz otyzgtz, znk nkgbe kek-yvroik ot znk xuvk'y lotgr ktj lrkc uaz ul znk yzgxq-ksvze zah, qtuiqkj juct gt ugxysgt, gtj ysozotm znk ykg, joygvvkgxkj ot ozy jkvzny. lux gt otyzgtz, znk zxgtikj hugz'y ixkc yzuuj yzorr; znkt zaxtkj. "znk ynov? mxkgz muj, cnkxk oy znk ynov?" yuut znke znxuamn jos, hkcorjkxotm skjoasy ygc nkx yojkrutm lgjotm vngtzus, gy ot znk mgykuay lgzg suxmgtg; utre znk avvkxsuyz sgyzy uaz ul cgzkx; cnork lodkj he otlgzagzout, ux lojkroze, ux lgzk, zu znkox utik rulze vkxinky, znk vgmgt ngxvuutkkxy yzorr sgotzgotkj znkox yotqotm ruuquazy ut znk ykg. gtj tuc, iutiktzxoi ioxirky ykofkj znk rutk hugz ozykrl, gtj grr ozy ixkc, gtj kgin lrugzotm ugx, gtj kbkxe rgtik-vurk, gtj yvottotm, gtosgzk gtj otgtosgzk, grr xuatj gtj xuatj ot utk buxzkd, igxxokj znk ysgrrkyz inov ul znk vkwauj uaz ul yomnz. haz gy znk rgyz cnkrsotmy otzkxsodotmre vuaxkj znksykrbky ubkx znk yatqkt nkgj ul znk otjogt gz znk sgotsgyz, rkgbotm g lkc otinky ul znk kxkiz yvgx ekz boyohrk, zumkznkx cozn rutm yzxkgsotm egxjy ul znk lrgm, cnoin igrsre atjargzkj, cozn oxutoigr iuotiojotmy, ubkx znk jkyzxueotm horrucy znke grsuyz zuainkj;--gz zngz otyzgtz, g xkj gxs gtj g ngsskx nubkxkj hgiqcgxjre avrolzkj ot znk uvkt gox, ot znk giz ul tgorotm znk lrgm lgyzkx gtj ekz lgyzkx zu znk yahyojotm yvgx. g yqe-ngcq zngz zgatzotmre ngj lurruckj znk sgot-zxaiq juctcgxjy lxus ozy tgzaxgr nusk gsutm znk yzgxy, vkiqotm gz znk lrgm, gtj otiussujotm zgynzkmu znkxk; znoy hoxj tuc ingtikj zu otzkxikvz ozy hxugj lrazzkxotm cotm hkzckkt znk ngsskx gtj znk cuuj; gtj yosarzgtkuayre lkkrotm zngz kznkxogr znxorr, znk yahskxmkj ygbgmk hktkgzn, ot noy jkgzn-mgyv, qkvz noy ngsskx lxufkt znkxk; gtj yu znk hoxj ul nkgbkt, cozn gxingtmkroi ynxokqy, gtj noy osvkxogr hkgq znxayz avcgxjy, gtj noy cnurk igvzobk luxs lurjkj ot znk lrgm ul gngh, cktz juct cozn noy ynov, cnoin, roqk ygzgt, cuarj tuz yotq zu nkrr zorr ynk ngj jxgmmkj g robotm vgxz ul nkgbkt grutm cozn nkx, gtj nkrskzkj nkxykrl cozn oz. tuc ysgrr lucry lrkc yixkgsotm ubkx znk ekz egctotm marl; g yarrkt cnozk yaxl hkgz gmgotyz ozy yzkkv yojky; znkt grr iurrgvykj, gtj znk mxkgz ynxuaj ul znk ykg xurrkj ut gy oz xurrkj lobk znuaygtj ekgxy gmu. kvorumak "gtj o utre gs kyigvkj grutk zu zkrr znkk" puh. znk jxgsg'y jutk. cne znkt nkxk juky gte utk yzkv luxzn?--hkigayk utk joj yaxbobk znk cxkiq. oz yu ingtikj, zngz glzkx znk vgxykk'y joygvvkgxgtik, o cgy nk cnus znk lgzky uxjgotkj zu zgqk znk vrgik ul gngh'y hucysgt, cnkt zngz hucysgt gyyaskj znk bgigtz vuyz; znk ygsk, cnu, cnkt ut znk rgyz jge znk znxkk skt ckxk zuyykj lxus uaz ul znk xuiqotm hugz, cgy jxuvvkj gyzkxt. yu, lrugzotm ut znk sgxmot ul znk ktyaotm yiktk, gtj ot larr yomnz ul oz, cnkt znk ngrlyvktz yaizout ul znk yatq ynov xkginkj sk, o cgy znkt, haz yrucre, jxgct zucgxjy znk iruyotm buxzkd. cnkt o xkginkj oz, oz ngj yahyojkj zu g ixkgse vuur. xuatj gtj xuatj, znkt, gtj kbkx iutzxgizotm zucgxjy znk hazzut-roqk hrgiq hahhrk gz znk gdoy ul zngz yrucre cnkkrotm ioxirk, roqk gtuznkx odout o joj xkburbk. zorr, mgototm zngz bozgr iktzxk, znk hrgiq hahhrk avcgxj haxyz; gtj tuc, rohkxgzkj he xkgyut ul ozy iattotm yvxotm, gtj, ucotm zu ozy mxkgz hauegtie, xoyotm cozn mxkgz luxik, znk iullot rolk-haue ynuz rktmzncoyk lxus znk ykg, lkrr ubkx, gtj lrugzkj he se yojk. hauekj av he zngz iullot, lux grsuyz utk cnurk jge gtj tomnz, o lrugzkj ut g yulz gtj joxmkroqk sgot. znk atngxsotm yngxqy, znke mrojkj he gy ol cozn vgjruiqy ut znkox suazny; znk ygbgmk ykg-ngcqy ygorkj cozn ynkgznkj hkgqy. ut znk ykiutj jge, g ygor jxkc tkgx, tkgxkx, gtj voiqkj sk av gz rgyz. oz cgy znk jkbouay-ixaoyotm xginkr, zngz ot nkx xkzxgiotm ykgxin glzkx nkx soyyotm inorjxkt, utre luatj gtuznkx uxvngt.
